40001001	Uwɔng ulenɛ lakɔɔl itutum a Jesus Christ wa ussinɛ ka kikkwu a David, la kikkwu Abraham.
40001002	Abraham ɔfɔɔn Isaac; Isaac ɔfɔɔn Jacob; Jacob ɔfɔɔn Judah la itele a Judah.
40001003	Judah ɔfɔɔn Perez la Zerah, (Abakka abbɛ ɔdɔkɔ ɔzzanga Tamar); Perez ɔfɔɔn Hezron; Hezron ɔfɔɔn Ram;
40001004	Ram ɔfɔɔn Amminadab; Amminadab ɔfɔɔn Nahshon; Nahshon ɔfɔɔn Salmon;
40001005	Salmon ɔfɔɔn Boaz (Rahab ɔdɔkɔnɛ abakka); Boaz ɔfɔɔn Obed (Ruth ɔdɔkɔnɛ abakka); Obed ɔfɔɔn Jesse;
40001006	Jesse ɔfɔɔn Ubeet David. David ɔfɔɔn Solomon (abakka Solomon ɔdɔkɔ wanavva Uria)
40001007	Solomon ɔfɔɔn Rehoboam; Rehoboam ɔfɔɔn Abijah; Abijah ɔfɔɔn Asa;
40001008	Asa ɔfɔɔn Jehosaphat; Jehosaphat ɔfɔɔn Joram; Joram ɔfɔɔn Uzziah;
40001009	Uzziah ɔfɔɔn Jotham; Jotham ɔfɔɔn Ahaz; Ahaz ɔfɔɔn Hezekiah
40001010	Hezekiah ɔfɔɔn Manasseh; Manasseh ɔfɔɔn Amon; Amon ɔfɔɔn Josiah;
40001011	Josiah ɔfɔɔn Jechoniah la itele a Jechoniah ka ɛkɛtɛ ya basamnɛ balɔɔt a Israel bamii ka Babylon.
40001012	Ka ɛkɛtɛ ya balenɛ ka Babylon; Jechoniah ɔfɔɔn Shealtiel; Shealtiel ɔfɔɔn Zerubbabel;
40001013	Zerubbabel ɔfɔɔn Abiud; Abiud ɔfɔɔn Eliakim; Eliakim ɔfɔɔn Azor;
40001014	Azor ɔfɔɔn Zadok; Zadok ɔfɔɔn Achim; Achim ɔfɔɔn Eliud;
40001015	Eliud ɔfɔɔn Eleazar; Eleazor ɔfɔɔn Matthan; Matthan ɔfɔɔn Jacob;
40001016	Jacob ɔfɔɔn Joseph walam a Mary, wa ɔdɔkɔnɛ abakka Jesus, wa ulenɛ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ.
40001017	Ɔdɔkɔ bɛkkpa ɔsɛlɛzzil, ka ussinɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ Abraham uffu ɔffɔ a ka ɛkɛtɛ a David. Ka ussinɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ a David, ɔdɔkɔ bɛkkpa ɔsɛlɛzzil uffu ɔffɔ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya basamnɛbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ bamii Babylon. Bɛkkpa ɔsɛlɛzzil ka ussinɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ bamiinɛ Babylon uffu ɔffɔ ɛkɛtɛ bamaatnɛ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ.
40001018	Uwɔng ɔdɔkɔnɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ bamaatnɛ Jesus Christ, Joseph ɔdɔkɔnɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔggyannɛ Mary, abakka Jesus. Bong tɛ́ttɛ́ ballu, Mary ɔggba lɛsan ɔttɛ vvenɛ ɔmaat waan ka likke Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
40001019	Walam ammɛ Joseph ɔdɔkɔ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔnaangnɛ kɔlɔɔk kwa bbwak ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, usi lɛggyan ɔttɛ ɔssɛɛn Mary ka izzit ppwool ppwool. Ɔnaang luttina gwa kitunu iggyan ka lalup.
40001020	Ɛkɛtɛ ya ɔdɔkɔnɛ baang ka uttinanɛ utum lilɔɔk ’sɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ, uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm utuma ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ ka lɔlakala, ɔlɔɔk la ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Joseph wa kikkwu a David, tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔbbwɔpɔwɔ kɛtɔk a Mary tɛ̀ttɛ̀ wanavva annɔ. Ɔyɛ̀ɛm ka likke Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
40001021	Vvenɛ ɔmaat waanawalam, wa ale akɔlɔmɛ Jesus, ka ule ɔkkala balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ka bubbi abbɛ.”
40001022	Nkwɔng kɔnaangbong nkwaaning kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔɔmnɛ uppyee-kutolo ammɛ uffu ɔyaam ɔbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt ammɛ ɔttɛ,
40001023	“Waanawanavva wa ɔtakanɛ la walam limini vvenɛ ɔyɛɛm ka likke Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔmaat waanawalam wa bale bakkwɔɔmɛ Emmanuel.” Ning baang ulenɛ kɛttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule la ayyɔɔt.”
40001024	Ɔzzànga Joseph ufungalanɛ ka bilaa, ɔnaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ uyilabɔtɔɔm Ebinukkpaapi ɔlɔɔknɛ; ɔtɔk Mary.
40001025	Ɔzzànga la ammɛ usi limini tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔyɛɛm ɔmaat waanawalam. Joseph ɔkɔlɔmɛ Jesus.
40002001	Jesus badɔkɔ bamaatmɛ ka lɛffɛ za lɛzzanganɛ Bethlehem ka ɛkpansi a Judea. Ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang Herod ɔdɔkɔnɛ ubeet. Usi lɛmmɛ, balɔɔt ba bakkoopnɛ bwaanittuma bassi ka lusso gwa livve-luwee lɔfɔm baffu Jerusalem. Babap battɛ
40002002	“Waan wa ɔzzanganɛ ubeet-a-Jews bamaatmɛ ka ’yang ee? Iyɛnbong waanettuma ammɛ ka ussinɛ ka lusso gwa livve-luwee lɔfɔm uffu. Mung iffubong kɛzɔɔm innyimɛ.”
40002003	Ubeet Herod uppyeenɛ ning baang, luppyam lɔbbɔlmɛ. Gɔɔ lɔbbɔl lutini ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ka Jerusalem.
40002004	Ɔkkwɔɔ bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la bakopolo-Lafɔɔ uloko ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Mung Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ bamaatmɛ ka ’yang ee?”
40002005	Bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, “Bamaatmɛ ka lɛffɛ za lɛzzanganɛ Bethlehem ka ɛkpansi Judea. Nkwɔng mung kulenɛ kwa uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkpɔknɛ ɔttɛ,
40002006	‘Annyɔɔng balɔɔt a Bethlehem ka ɛkpansi a Judah, annyɔɔng lissi attanɛyɔng lissup ka lɔkaan a Judah; Uzzilɛttɔ ule ussi ka annyɔɔng uffu, Ammɛ ule ɔat Israel, balɔɔt anaam’.”
40002007	Ɔzzanga Herod ɔkkwɔɔ balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba, bassinɛ ka lusso livve-luwee lɔfɔm, likup uloko ka wɛɛk, ɔbapbɛ ɛkɛtɛ ya bbwak ya waanettuma utumanɛ.
40002008	Ɔzzánga ɔtɔɔmbɛ bamii Bethlehem la lɔttama ’gwɔng ɔttɛ, “Ammiiyɔng, anaangyɔng bɛtɛbɛtɛ, asanyɔng ka ɛfɛɛn a waantiti ulenɛ. Alemɛnɛyɔng lɛyɛn anaangnɛyɔng anaam nsan, nkwaaning nssɛ nmii nzɔɔm nnyimɛ.”
40002009	Bafeele la lɔttama ’gwɔng baffɔ ka ɛtɔk waanettuma utuma. Ammɛ baang vvɔn wa bayɛnmɛnɛ ka lusso gwa livve-luwee lɔfɔm. Ɔzzanga ɔkɔɔm ɛtɔk uffu ɔkɔɔng baang ubee ka ɛfɛɛn waantiti ɔdɔkɔnɛ.
40002010	Baggele gaang gaang, ka bayɛnnɛ waanettuma.
40002011	Bamii ka tɔkɔlɔ a ggwoon bayɛn waantiti la abakka ammɛ, Mary. Bakun laddu bazɔɔm bannyimɛ. Ɔzzánga bawongolo issɔ abbɛ banaangmɛ lɛsɔɔk la gold, la frankincense (bɔfɛɛn bwa bafɔɔpnɛ buyyɛɛp kizoom ka ggwoon a luzɔɔm), la myrrh (wa appwɔɔngnɛ asi lɛddɔlɔ).
40002012	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttamabɛ ka lɔlakala ɔttɛ, tɛ̀ttɛ́ bappyɛlɛ isimi-isimi bamii ka ɛfɛɛn a Herod. Ɔzzánga bappyɛɛ bassɛ ɛtɔk ɛlɔk bafula.
40002013	Balenɛ lɛgbata, uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm utuma ka ɛfɛɛn a Joseph ka lɔlakala, ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛ ɔttɛ, “Afeele asam waantiti la abakka agbata amii Egypt. Ataa bakang tɔttɔt ɔffɔ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya nle nbwɔɔlɔwɔ nttɛ appyɛlɛ. Herod ule ka kɛggyan ɛtɔk ya kɛwwɔɔl a waantiti ’wɔng baang.”
40002014	Ɔzzanga Joseph ufeele ɔsam waantiti la abakka, bagbata ka kasɛkɛ kɛtɔm bamii Egypt.
40002015	Ɔtaa bakang tɔttɔt Herod ubbe. Nkwɔng kɔdɔkɔ kɔnaang nkwaaning kɔlɔɔk kwa Ebinukkpaapi ɛtɔɔmnɛ uppyee-kutolo annyɛ uffu ɔyaam, kɔnaang ka lɔkkwɔɔn tɛ̀ttɜ ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔttɛ, “Nkkwɔɔ Waan anaam ka Egypt.”
40002016	Herod ɔsannɛ ɔttɛ bakoolo-lukoolo ’bɔng baang ba bassinɛ ka lusso gwa livve-luwee lɔfɔm, banaangmɛbong lagban, kutunmɛ gaang gaang. Ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ bawwɔɔl bwaanabwalam ɔkkpɛlɛ ka Bethlehem, la billu bya ballunɛ bakkpit Bethlehem, ka ussinɛ ka bwɔɔn ba likkpa liffa ɔppyɛlɛ kuttɔɔk. Ɔnaang ning baang ukup kwa bakoolo-lukoolo babwɔɔlɔmɛnɛ batum ɛkɛtɛ ya waanettuma utumanɛ.
40002017	Nkwɔng mung kɔnaangnɛ kɔlɔɔk kwa uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔzzanganɛ Jeremiah ɔlɔɔknɛ kɔnaang ka lɔkkwɔɔn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔttɛ,
40002018	“Bappyee kibungu ka Ramah, Kibungu akama la kullu, Rachel ɔkkwanɛ bwaan ammɛ, Ɔkkwa usimɛ lɛbɛlɛ lɛkkyaa, Ka bwaan ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ balenɛ libbe.”
40002019	Herod ulenɛ libbe, uyilabɔtɔɔm Ebinukkpappi utuma ka ɛfɛɛn a Joseph ka lɔlakala ka Egypt ɔttɛ,
40002020	“Afeele asam waantiti la abakka appyɛlɛ isimi-isimi amii ɛkpansi a Israel, ka balɔɔt ba babumnɛ battɛ bawwɔɔlmɛ balenɛ libbe.”
40002021	Ɔzzánga Joseph ufeele ɔsam waantiti la abakka, ɔppyɛlɛ isimi-isimi umii ka ɛkpansi a Israel.
40002022	Uppyeenɛ ɔttɛ Archelaus ɔtɔkbong lɛttɔ kibeet abassɛ ka Judea, Joseph ɔbbwɔpɔmɛ killu baang. Ɔyanga lɔttama ɔgbaa ka lɔlakala ɔzzànga ufeele umii ka ɛkpansi a Galilee.
40002023	Ɔnaang ssala ka lɛffɛ za bakkwɔɔnɛzɛ Nazareth. Nkwɔng baang kɔnaangnɛ kɔlɔɔk kwa bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm balɔɔknɛ kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn ka balɔɔknɛ battɛ, “Vvenɛ bakkwɔɔmɛ wa Nazareth.”
40003001	Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang, John, Ɔnaang-a-baptizim, uffunɛ, utte kɛyaam ka kasɛkɛ kɛmat a Judea.
40003002	Ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Afooloyɔng lafal annyɔɔng, akkyaayɔng bubbi afɔngɔyɔng, Itutum la Likke-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm itii kɛtɛkɛtɛ.”
40003003	John ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa Isaiah, uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔlɔɔknɛ utummɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ule akang ning ka ubungunɛ ka kɛmat ɔttɛ, ‘Alɔngɔlɔyɔng ɛtɔk ya Uyini, alokomɛyɔng; anaangyɔngyɛ bbit, alokomɛyɔng ɔssɛ!’ ”
40003004	Iwɔkɔlɔ a John badɔkɔ battayɛ la issɔp-ɛsɛɛn. Ukwula ɛkkpa-ɛsɛɛn ka kɛsan, uzzi ogelese, uggyeel itɔngɔtɔngɔ.
40003005	Balɔɔt ba bassinɛ Jerusalem, la ba bassinɛ ka ɛkpansi a Judea la ikaan ɔkkpɛlɛ ya illunɛ ikkpit lɔyɔngɔ a Jordan, baffu ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ.
40003006	Bayila kamma bubbi abbɛ, ɔnaangbɛ baptizim ka lɔyɔngɔ a Jordan.
40003007	John, ɔyɛnnɛ balɔɔt a Pharisees la Sadducees ka baffunɛ ggbadam ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ battɛ ɔnaangbɛ baptizim, ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Annyɔɔng bwɔɔn igbazim mbɔng, nnyinɔɔng ɔbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng ɔttɛ akkwoong mung amma akɔngɔyɔng binyanga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm pya bile ka biffunɛ?
40003008	“Anaangyɔng linaang sa ayɔɔnɛyɔng kifoolo lafal annyɔɔng.
40003009	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ attina attɛ vvenɛ attayɔng ka akkwɛ ka ale alɔɔk attɛyɔng, ‘Abraham ulenɛ uyini kikku ayyɔɔt.’ Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ukkwoong mung ɔsam lattaal ’zɔng mung ɔnaangzɛ lasikili bwɔɔn unnyi Abraham.
40003010	Ɛbwɔt etii ka kɛfɔk a bɛssɛ. Lɛsan a kɛssɛ duu za lisinɛ lakkpo za doddo lɛwɔm, vvenɛ babbɔkzɛ bazzɔɔk, battɔng bassɛɛn ka lɔkɔɔn.
40003011	Anaam nnaangwɔyɔng baptizim la bannyi, ning baang ulenɛ kɛyɔɔ kɛttɛ akkyaayɔngbong bubbi afɔngɔyɔng. Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa ule uffunɛ ukupnɛ anaam, ule ɔnaangwɔyɔng baptizim la Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la lɔkɔɔn. Ammɛ ule ɔttanɛ anaam liggbenge, anaam gɔɔ ba nkkɔnɔ wa nkɔɔmnɛ ikkpa-bukkpa ammɛ.
40003012	Ɔyanga uggwul a bɛfɛɛn ammɛ wa uggwulnɛ ifɔɔk a bɛfɛɛn uggumu ya doddo uloko ka ukunu, ɔttɔng lɔkɔɔn ɔssɛɛn bippwo bɛkkɔm lɔkɔɔn lusi lɛbɛlɛ lizum.”
40003013	Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang Jesus ussi ka Galilee umii Jordan, uffu ka ɛfɛɛn a John ɔttɛ ɔnaangmɛ baptizim.
40003014	Ɔzzánga John ubum ɔttɛ usikilimɛ luppyam. Ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Anaam nlenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa buffunɛ ka ɛfɛɛn annɔ anaangnɛ baptizim, annɔ appyɛɛnɛ affu ka ɛfɛɛn anaam ɔɔ?”
40003015	Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Kɔkɔɔm kɔtaa ning baang gedegede mung. Inaangnɛ ning mung, vvenɛ inaang bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyannɛ.” Ɔzzánga John uyila.
40003016	Uvvenɛ Jesus baptizim lɛnaang, Jesus ɔtta ka tɔkɔlɔ bannyi, kikku a ssala Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kiwongolo kinnyimɛ. Ɔzzanga ɔyɛn Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka kusininɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lekkpelekete kuffu kuttelemɛ.
40003017	Lɛmmwɔɔl lissi ka libat lɛlɔɔk lɛttɛ, “Uwɔng ulenɛ Waan a luppyam anaam wa ɔwaanɛnɛ kwa ammɛ.”
40004001	Ɔzzánga Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔmana Jesus kumii ka kɛmat, Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm a kuyeeng ubummɛ kɛllɛ.
40004002	Ulenɛ bakang lɛtaa ka lalɔp a bɛtɔm laffa usi bɔfɛɛn lizzi, buwɔɔng busaapmɛ.
40004003	Ɔzzánga Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm a kuyeeng uffu ɔlɔɔkmɛ ɔttɛ, “Alenɛ Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, adda lɛttaal ’zɔng mung lasikili brɛɛd ee.”
40004004	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, ‘Ɔlɔɔt kwa brɛɛd kɛyɔɔng lissi ka uddunɛ, uddu kwa lutini lɛmmwɔɔl ɔkkpɛlɛ za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔknɛ.’ ”
40004005	Ɔzzánga Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm a kuyeeng ɔsam Jesus umii ka tɔkɔlɔ a ssala kɛyyɛɛp, utdelemɛ ka ɛfɛɛn ya ggologgolo ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm,
40004006	Ɔlɔɔk la ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Alenɛ Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, akut attɔ ka lisse ee, kɔttɛ luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, ‘Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔdda bayila-bɔtɔɔm ammɛ bakimiwɔ la labɔɔk abbɛ, nkwaaning kikkpɔ annɔ ssɔn gbɔɔ kisi ka lɛttaal lilip.’ ”
40004007	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔbbal lɛlɔɔk lɔttɛ, ‘Tɛ̀ttɛ́ allɛ Uyini, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm annɔ.’ ”
40004008	Ɔzzánga Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm a kuyeeng ɔsam Jesus umii ka libat ekpok ya ggologgolo, ɔyɔɔmɛ ikaan ɔkkpɛlɛ a vveng-odde la iyyɛɛp annyɛ.
40004009	Ɔlɔɔk la Jesus ɔttɛ, “Vvenɛ nsam bɛfɛɛn mbyɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ nnyiwɔ, akunnɛ laddu azɔɔm annyinɛ.”
40004010	Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Agbata assekenɛ, Satan, luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, ‘Azɔɔm annyi Ebinukpaapi, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm annɔ keem, annyɛ elenɛ ya atelenɛyɛ!’ ”
40004011	Ɔzzánga Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm a kuyeeng ɔgbata ussekemɛ. Bayila bɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm baffu bayaam Jesus.
40004012	Jesus uppyeenɛ ɔttɛ bassɛɛnbong John igbakkɔpɔ, ufeele umii Galilee.
40004013	Ka Nazareth usi lillu, ɔdɔkɔ ufeele umii ullu ka Capernaum kɛtɛkɛtɛ libbwe a Galilee ka ɛkpansi Zebulun la Naphtali.
40004014	Nkwɔng baang kɔnaangnɛ basan battɛ kɔlɔɔk kwa uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔzzanganɛ Isaiah ɔlɔɔknɛ kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn ka ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔttɛ,
40004015	“Ɛkpansi a Zebulun la ɛkpansi a Naphtali, ka lusso lihu, ka lufoom a Jordan, Galilee wa ikanakana!
40004016	Annyɔɔng ba allunɛyɔng ka kisul vvenɛ ayɛnyɔng buppwolo bwa lɛbaang. Balɔɔt ba ballunɛ ka ɛkpansi kisul a ntɛm a lubbe, vvenɛ bayɛn buppwolo bwa lɛbaang.”
40004017	Ka ussinɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang Jesus ɔyaam ibwɔɔlɔ bɔtɔɔm bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔɔmmɛnɛ ɔttɛ, “Akkyaayɔng bubbi annyɔɔng afɔngɔyɔng, Itutum la Likke-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm itii kɛtɛkɛtɛ.”
40004018	Jesus ɔdɔkɔ baang ka ɔssɛnɛ ka lufoom a libbwe a Galilee, ɔzzánga ɔyɛn etele la etele, balɔɔt baffa, ba balapnɛ kulap isɛɛnabannyi. Simon (wa bakkwɔɔmɛnɛ Peter) la etele ammɛ, Andrew, balenɛ ka kɛkaa isɛɛnabannyi ka liggbɔ ka libbwe.
40004019	Jesus ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Akupnɛyɔng, vvenɛ nkopolowɔyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ale akkwɔɔyɔng balɔɔt.”
40004020	Eseese bakkyaa liggbo abbɛ bafɔngɔ, bamii bakup Jesus.
40004021	Ɔbbal ka lusso limii, ɔyɛn etele la etele, balɔɔt baffa, James la John, bwaan a Zebedee. Badɔkɔ ka tɔkɔlɔ akkpaat abbɛ la abassɛ abbɛ Zebedee. Babamabong liggbɔ abbɛ baloko, Jesus ɔkkwɔɔbɛ.
40004022	Eseese bagbata bakɔngɔ akkpaat abbɛ la abassɛ abbɛ, bamii bakup Jesus.
40004023	Jesus ɔssɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ Galilee ududa ukopolobɛ ka idda mitin. Ɔyaam Kuttu-budoddo Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Uttula balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba usinɛbɛ lɛppwa, ɔppwabɛ.
40004024	Kuttu ammɛ kɔwaala ɔkkpɛlɛ lɔkaan a Syria. Ɔzzánga balɔɔt bakɔɔm balɔɔt ba usinɛbɛ lɛppwa bafeemɛ: ba ɔssɔpnɛbɛ bɛssanga bɛssanga, la balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ ipiliza, la balɔɔt ba battɔnɛ lɔbbaak, la balɔɔt ba bannɔknɛ kikkwu. Jesus uttulabɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
40004025	Balɔɔt ggbadam bakupmɛ ba bassinɛ Galilee la Laffɛ Zzɔɔp, la ba bassinɛ Jerusalem, la Judea, la ɛkpansi ya lufoom a Jordan ’gwɔng kang.
40005001	Jesus, ɔyɛnnɛ kibbi ’sɔng baang, ufeele umii ka libat ekkpok ka ɛfɛɛn ya ɔtaanɛ lɔtaa. Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ baggba bataa bakkpitmɛ.
40005002	Ɔzzanga ukopolobɛ ɔttɛ:
40005003	“Laggele lale za balɔɔt ba basannɛ battɛ abbɛ banaang-a-bubbi; Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ile ya abbɛ.
40005004	“Laggele za balɔɔt ba bataanɛ bukee; Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔnaangbɛ ɔwaabɛ!
40005005	“Laggele lale za bakeebwɔɔn; vvenɛ batɔk bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usekelenɛbɛ.
40005006	“Laggele lale za balɔɔt ba kɔbɛtɛnɛbɛ ka kɔlɔɔk kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyannɛ; Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔnaangbɛ buddoddo bbwak.
40005007	“Laggele lale za balɔɔt ba balɔɔt babbenɛbɛ lɛttɔ; vvenɛ bassɛ babbe Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛttɔ!
40005008	“Laggele lale za balɔɔt ba luppyam abbɛ lɔllaatnɛ; vvenɛ bayɛn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm!
40005009	“Laggele lale za balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ bɔkaat la ba abbɛ; Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔkkwɔɔbɛ bwaan ammɛ.
40005010	“Laggele lale za balɔɔt ba bayɛnnɛ akama ka banaangnɛ kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyannɛ; Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ile ya abbɛ!
40005011	“Laggele lale za annyɔɔng ka ɛkɛtɛ balɔɔt banyɔɔkawɔnɛyɔng; bayɔɔwɔyɔng akama; balɔɔk kɔlɔɔk a kɛkkala lɛlaak ɔkkpɛlɛ batumwɔyɔng, ka alenɛyɔng balɔɔt a kɔssɛ anaam.
40005012	Ɔwaawɔyɔng aggeleyɔng ka lɛsɔɔk za lɛbaang a lɛbaang lilewɔnɛyɔng ka ssala Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ badɔkɔ bayapbɛ akama ning baang.
40005013	“Ataayɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bunɔk ɔssɛbbitbbit ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ulenɛ ka bunɔk businɛ lɛbɛlɛ liggwoom, ɛtɔk ya ale abbalbwɛ lɛnaang buzzanga bunɔk ba ɛbɛlɛ lile, busseke ubbu bɔfɛɛn bwa asamnɛ azzɔɔk balɔɔt basing bukkpɔ.
40005014	“Annyɔɔng alenɛyɔng buppwolo a vveengodde. Killu sa ballunɛ ka libat ekpok, ɔlɔɔt sɛ ba ukkwoong usi lɛyɛn.
40005015	Ɔlɔɔt wa uyengenɛ otinika, ɔsam, ulup ka tɔkɔlɔ ekkpo ba ule. Lutini ’gwɔng utelemɛ ka okkpokkolo wa ɔggbanɛ lissi utele otinika ka ɛfɛɛn a ule uppwolo ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔyɛn buppwolo ka tɔkɔlɔ a ggwoon.
40005016	Kɔssɛ kule ning baang la annyɔɔng. Buppwolo annyɔɔng vvenɛ buppwolo ka lusso balɔɔt nkwaaning bayɛn budoddo lilɔɔk sa anaangnɛyɔng. Usseke babungu Ssaawɔ annyɔɔng ka libat.
40005017	“Tɛ̀ttɛ́ attina attɛyɔng mung nffu kɛbɛpɛ Lafɔɔ a Moses la lukopolo bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Kɛbɛpɛ abbyɛ ba nffu. Nffu nnyibɛ ifɛɛt abbyɛ ya bbwak.
40005018	Akkeyɔng nkwɔng tɛ! Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ libat la ɛkpansi bile bittumu bɛffɔ, lifɔɔ zzɔɔn gɔɔ, gɔɔ kufoom a lifɔɔ kwa kule kɔbɛpɛ baala kule tɔttɔt ɔffɔ ka lakpeke bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ.
40005019	Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa usinɛ lafɔɔ litele nkkpa lassup ning, ukopolo balɔɔt balɔk bassɛ banaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ammɛ, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ule bɔfɛɛn bwa gbɔɔ ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔm. Ɔzzàngà ɔlɔɔt wa utelenɛ lafɔɔ, ukopolo balɔɔt balɔk bassɛ banaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ammɛ; ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ule ɔlɔɔt wa lɛbaang a lɛbaang ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
40005020	Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ ka ussinɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang baala akkwoong amalyɔng ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, kiyila annyɔɔng kisinɛ lɛsak sa bakopolo-Lafɔɔ la balɔɔt a Pharisees ka kɛnaang a bɛnaang bya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyannɛ.
40005021	“Aggbayɔng lippyee ka bakopolonɛ balɔɔt iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ battɛ, ‘Tɛ̀ttɛ́ awwɔɔl balɔɔt, ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔwwɔɔlnɛ ɔlɔɔt, vvenɛ bakɔɔmmɛ baffu ka lusso kɛkaal’.
40005022	Ɔzzànga gedegede mung nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ, ɔlɔɔt duu wa kɔlɔɔk kutunmɛnɛ la wabbɛ, vvenɛ bakɔɔmmɛ baffu ka lusso kɛkaal! Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔlɔɔknɛ la wabbɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Annɔ mung ayyɛɛp gbɔɔ ka bulɔk ba affɔ’, vvenɛ bakɔɔmmɛ baffu ka lusso ikkansulu; ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔttɛnɛ wabbɛ uzingizingi wa bgɔɔ, usinɛ lɛsan ɔnaang, vvenɛ ule ka ɛtɔk akama ya kimii ka lɔkɔɔn a hell.
40005023	Alenɛ ka annyinɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛsɔɔk annɔ ka labun ammɛ, akkenɛ attɛ wannyɔɔng ɔyanga kɔlɔɔk la annɔ,
40005024	akkyaa lɛsɔɔk annɔ afɔngɔ baang ka lusso labun a Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, afeele eseese amii anaang bɔkaat la ammɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ appyɛlɛ affu asam lɛsɔɔk annɔ annyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
40005025	“Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkwɔɔwɔnɛ kɛkaal ka attɔmɛnɛ ka lafɔɔ, akkpengemɛ ka atakanɛ ka ɔdda ɔdda-kɛkaal lɛffɔ. Alenɛ bakang lɛffɔ vvenɛ ɔsamwɔ unnyi ɔkaal-a-kɛkaal. Ɔkaal-a-kɛkaal vvenɛ ɔsamwɔ unnyi ippoloosi, bassɛɛnwɔ igbakkɔpɔ.
40005026	Nbwɔɔlɔwɔ nttɛ vvenɛ ataa baang ka igbakkɔpɔ ɔddɔkɔddɔkɔ avve ikkpoko ya bazzawɔnɛ linnyi.
40005027	“Aggbayɔng lippyee ka battɛnɛ, ‘Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akup wanavva ɔlɔɔt. Wanavva tɛ̀ttɛ́ akup walam ɔlɔɔt.’
40005028	Ɔzzànga gedegede mung nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ, ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔppyɛɛknɛ wanavva ɔggyan ɔttɛ ɔnaang budoddo la ammɛ, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔnaangbong bubbi ka luppyam ammɛ biini.
40005029	Zzeen annɔ za kɔbɔɔk-ɛlaabɔɔk lɛnaangwɔnɛ attɔ ka bubbi, kɔyyɛɛp ka asanganɛzɛ azzɔɔk kang. Kɔtta lɛyyɛɛp ka atakanɛ kikkeep a kkwɔɔt annɔ, ssɔn, lutini ayanganɛ bikkeep a kkwɔɔt annɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ amii ka lɔkɔɔn.
40005030	Kɔbɔɔk annɔ kwa ɛlaabɔɔk kɔnaangwɔnɛ attɔ ka bubbi, azzakwɛ azzɔɔk. Kɔtta lɛyyɛɛp ka abɛpɛnɛ kikkeep a kkwɔɔt annɔ ssɔn lutini ayanganɛ bikkeep a kkwɔɔt annɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ amii ka lɔkɔɔn.
40005031	“Balɔɔk ngbaa battɛ, ‘Ɔlɔɔt duu wa oggbanɛ wanavva ammɛ, ɔkkpɔk luvva luteele unnyimɛ.’
40005032	Ɔzzànga gedegede mung nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ, ɔlɔɔt wa ɔggbanɛ wanavva ammɛ ka ɔtakanɛ la walam ɔlɔk limini, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔnaangbong bubbi utum wanavva ammɛ. Wanavva ’wɔng baang ɔbbalnɛ walam ɔlɔk lillu, ɔtɔm a walam ammɛ ɔnaangmɛbong ɔnaang bubbi. Walam ’wɔng baang wa ɔtɔkmɛnɛ ɔssɛbong ɔnaang bubbi ɔgbaa.
40005033	“Aggbayɔng lippyee ka baggbanɛ balɔɔt lɛbwɔɔlɔ battɛ, ‘Tɛ̀ttɛ́ abɛpɛyɔng nsekele; ɔzzànga anaangyɔng kwa alenɛyɔng liyim ka lusso Ebinukkpaapi attɛ vvenɛ anaangyɔng.’
40005034	Ɔzzànga gedegede mung nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ ayimyɔng ka ɛkɛtɛ anaangnɛyɔng nsekele. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ayimyɔng libat. Libat lilenɛ ugbaal a kibeet, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
40005035	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ayimyɔng ɛkpansi, ɛkpansi elenɛ ɛfɛɛn a Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usingnɛ bukkpɔ ammɛ, ɔlɔk ayimyɔng Jerusalem. Akkenɛ attɛ Jerusalem ulenɛ killu Ubeet wa lɛbaang.
40005036	Gɔɔ tɛ̀ttɛ́ ayimyɔng lɛttɔ annyɔɔng ka asinɛ kikkwoong anaang ulata eggbe kittulu nnyɔn gbɔɔ ɔlɔk ubili.
40005037	Alɔɔk gbɔɔ bwɛt attɛ, ‘Iii’ ɔlɔk ‘Maaye!’ Kɔlɔɔk kɔlɔk kulenɛ bakang kwa attinanɛ kɛlɔɔk agbaa kussi ka Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm.
40005038	“Appyeeyɔngbong ka badɔkɔnɛ balɔɔk battɛ, ‘Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔbwɔɔtwɔnɛ zzeen, assɛ abwɔɔtmɛ za ammɛ. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔkkpɛɛwɔnɛ lɛsaal assɛ akkpɛɛmɛ za ammɛ.’
40005039	Ɔzzànga gedegede mung nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ apipiliyɔng ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔnaangwɔnɛyɔng kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa utupwɔnɛ kabut ka kugga kwa kɔbɔɔk ɛlaabɔɔk asikili kwa ɛbyakɔm, alokomɛ ɔbbal litup ɔgbaa.
40005040	Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔkaawɔnɛ umii ka ɔdda kɛkaal ɔttɛ ɔsam uwɔkɔlɔ annɔ, afɔngɔmɛ ɔbbal wa vvɔn lɛsam ɔgbaa.
40005041	Ullu-lɛkɔɔng ɔttɛnɛ atɔkɔmɛ bɛfɛɛn ka maal vvɔn, abbal wa vvɔn lɛtɔkɔ agbaa.
40005042	Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔbapwɔnɛ bɔfɛɛn bwa ayanganɛ, annyimɛbwɛ, ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk uffuwɔnɛ kifolo bɔfɛɛn, annyimɛbwɛ ufolo.
40005043	“Appyeeyɔngbong kkpal ka balɔɔknɛ battɛ inngwa annyɔɔng isaapwɔyɔng, balɔɔt a kɔfɔk annyɔɔng batunwɔyɔng!
40005044	Ɔzzànga gedegede mung nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ balɔɔt a kɔfok annyɔɔng basaapwɔyɔng. Azɔɔm annyiyɔng balɔɔt ba bayɔɔwɔnɛyɔng akama,
40005045	nkwaaning azzangayɔng bwaan a Ssaawɔ annyɔɔng ka libat. Ammɛ ɔnaangnɛ livve-luwee ammɛ lippwolo lɛllɔt babbyap la balɔɔt ba bayyɛɛpnɛ. Uteep ɔllɔt balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ kwa bbwak la balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ kwa kɔbbolnɛ.
40005046	Anaang nang tɛ́ttɛ́ aggyanyɔng lɛsɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka atelenɛyɔng balɔɔt ba batelewɔnɛyɔng annyɔɔng keem. Nlɔɔk ka batɔk-innamba bassɛnɛ banaang ning baang.
40005047	Atolonɛyɔng kutolo la inngwa annyɔɔng keem, attina attɛyɔng baang anaangyɔngbong kɔlɔɔk kwa ssɔng ɔɔ? Nlɔɔk ka balɔɔt ba batakanɛ baptizim lɛnaang bassɛnɛ banaang ning baang.
40005048	Anaangyɔng bbwak bbwak tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ssaawɔ annyɔɔng wa ulenɛ ka libat ɔnaangnɛ.”
40006001	“Tɛ̀ttɛ́ anaangyɔng kɛnaang a luzɔɔm annyɔɔng ka kkpelegede nkwaaning balɔɔt bayɛn kwa anaangnɛyɔng. Anaangnɛyɔng bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung ka kkpelegede, lɛsɔɔk baala ayangayɔng ka labɔɔk a Ssaawɔ annyɔɔng ka libat.
40006002	“Annyinɛ ɔlɔɔt bɔfɛɛn bwa ɔggyannɛ, tɛ̀ttɛ́ anaang linaang sa alemɛnɛ bɔfɛɛn linnyi tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt ba bayɔɔnɛbɛ kɛyɔɔng ka idda mitin la itɔk battɛ abbɛ balenɛ banaang-a-budoddo. Banaang battɛ nkwaaning balɔɔt babungubɛ. Akke asan attɛyɔng kikkpele abbɛ kɛggba lɛsaal tɛ.
40006003	Ɔzzànga ayaamnɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔbbyamɛnɛ, anaangkwɛ ka ɛtɔk ya ɛnngwa?-?luppyam annɔ ele esikwɛ lɛsan.
40006004	Kule kɔlɔɔk a lalup, Ssaawɔ annɔ wa ɔyɛnnɛ kwa anaangnɛ ka lalup vvenɛ ɔnaangwɔ lɛsɔɔk.
40006005	“Ɛkɛtɛ azɔɔmnɛyɔng, tɛ̀ttɛ́ anaangyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt ba bayɛnnɛbɛ kɛyɔɔng, basaap kibee ka idda mitin la lufoom a itɔk bazɔɔm nkwaaning balɔɔt bayɛnbɛ. Akke asan attɛyɔng kikkpele abbɛ kɛggba lɛsaal.
40006006	Ale ka azɔɔmnɛ luzɔɔm, amii ka tɔkɔlɔ lɛnɔk-a-ggwoon, annɔ afɛɛn lɛmma ggwoon, azɔɔm annyi Ssaawɔ annɔ wa asimɛnɛ lɛyɛn. Ssaawɔ annɔ wa ule ɔyɛn kwa anaangnɛ ka lalup, vvenɛ ɔnaangwɔ lɛsɔɔk.
40006007	“Azɔɔmnɛyɔng luzɔɔm, tɛ̀ttɛ́ azɔɔmyɔng tɔkɔtɔkɔtɔkɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt a ikaan ilɔk, ba battinanɛ battɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule uppyeebɛ ka bazɔɔmnɛ mmɛmmɛ.
40006008	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ anaangyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ abbɛ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Ssaawɔ annyɔɔng, ɔggba lɛsan bwa aggyannɛyɔng ka labɔɔk ammɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ abapmɛyɔng.
40006009	Uwɔng ulenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ale azɔɔmnɛyɔng: ‘Dedde ayyɔɔt wa ulenɛ ka libat, Ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt ikɔɔm lɛkɔɔl annɔ ka budoddo, itelezɛ.
40006010	Afɔngɔyɛlɛ ifula ka Itutum annɔ. Bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng bya aggyannɛ attɛ inaangbyɛ, anaangyɛlɛ inaangbyɛ ka vveeng ’wɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ banaangnɛ ka libat.
40006011	Annyiyɛlɛ bwa kuzzi bwa iggyannɛ mmwɔɔn.
40006012	Asɔɔkyɛlɛ bubbi ayyɔɔt, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ayyɔɔt isɔɔknɛ balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ bubbi batumyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt.
40006013	Afɔngɔyɛlɛ kɛllɛ gaang gaang, ɔzzànga akatyɛlɛ asseke Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm.’
40006014	“Asɔɔknɛ balɔɔt kɔlɔɔk kwa banaangnɛ kɔbbɔl batumwɔ, Ssaawɔ annyɔɔng ka libat vvenɛ ɔssɛ ɔsɔɔkwɔyɔng.
40006015	Ɔzzànga asinɛ balɔɔt balɔk lɛsɔɔk, Ssaawɔ annɔ ka libat baala ɔssɛ ɔsɔɔkwɔ annɔ ka kɔlɔɔk kwa anaangnɛ kɔbbɔl.
40006016	“Ɛkɛtɛ ya ale ka ataanɛ buwɔɔng, tɛ̀ttɛ́ abbɔl lusso tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt ba bayɛnnɛbɛ kɛyɔɔng. Bassɛ baang bakkpit la lɛppyɛɛk a buwɔɔng nkwaaning balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ basan battɛ bale ka kɛtaa buwɔɔng. Akke attɛyɔng kikkpele abbɛ kɛggba lɛsaal tɛ.
40006017	Ayilayɔng lusso, assakayɔng bittulu ka ɛkɛtɛ ataanɛyɔng buwɔɔng
40006018	nkwaaning balɔɔt balɔk basi lɛsan battɛ aleyɔng ka kɛtaa buwɔɔng. Ssaawɔ annyɔɔng kɛyɔɔng wa asimɛnɛyɔng lɛyɛn ule ɔsan. Ammɛ wa ɔsannɛ bwa anaangnɛyɔng ka lalup vvenɛ ɔnaangwɔyɔng lɛsɔɔk.
40006019	“Tɛ̀ttɛ́ abɔngɔlɔyɔng iyyɛɛp annyɔɔng ka ɛkpansi ’yɔng mung, ka ɛfɛɛn itilikɔɔt la bisili bile bɛbɛpɛyɛ, bassip vvenɛ babwɔɔt bamal bamii bayip.
40006020	Lutini ’gwɔng, abɔngɔlɔyɔng iyyɛɛp annyɔɔng ka libat, ka ɛfɛɛn a itilikɔɔt la bisili bile bisi likkwoong bɛbɛpɛyɛ, bassip basi likkwoong babwɔɔt bamal bayipyɛ.
40006021	Ɛfɛɛn a kibeet annɔ kilenɛ, luppyam annɔ lɔssɛ lule baang ɔgbaa.
40006022	“Zzeen lale tɛ̀ttɛ̀ otinika ka kkwɔɔt ɔlɔɔt. Zzeen annɔ lalenɛ kkpaladada, kkwɔɔt annɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ liyanga buppwolo.
40006023	Ɔzzànga zzeen annɔ labbɔlnɛ, kkwɔɔt annɔ lile ka tɔkɔlɔ kisul. Buppwolo bwa ayanganɛ bulenɛ kisul, nzang kisul kɛttalawɔ gaang gaang ka tɔkɔlɔ.
40006024	“Ɔlɔɔt wa ule ukkwoong ɔtaa bubili ibassɛ ammɛ iffa ba ule; vvenɛ vvɔn utunwɔ, wa vvɔn ɔsaapwɔ. Vvenɛ annyi vvɔn latele, wa vvɔn utunwɔ. Ba akkwoong atele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la ikkpoko ɛkɛtɛ kkwɔn.
40006025	“Akkwɛ kɔnaangnɛ nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ: tɛ̀ttɛ́ attinayɔng gaang gaang kwa kazzi la bannyi ba avvanɛ adduyɔng, ɔlɔk attinayɔng kwa iwɔkɔlɔ ya kɛwɔkɔlɔ ka kkwɔɔt. Kkpɔɔ mung kuddu lissi kɔttanɛ kazzi ɔɔ? Faa kuddu lissi kɔttanɛ iwɔkɔlɔ?
40006026	Ppyɛɛkyɔng bunɔɔn bwa bukutnɛ bukkpitwɔyɔng mung. Iwopowo ba buwoop, ɔlɔk buyaat liyaat buloko ka ikunu. Ssaawɔ annyɔɔng ka libat ɔkɔɔmnɛbwɛ. Kkpɔɔ annyɔɔng lissi attanɛyɔng bunɔɔn ɔɔ?
40006027	Ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng baang nnyinɔɔng uttinanɛ ɔttɛ vvenɛ ɔtaa likkpa ggbadam tɛ̀ttɛ̀ uffiknɛ?
40006028	“Ngkka bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ luppyam lɔzzawɔyɔng kwa ibba? Ppyɛɛkyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ idodo kɛmat immalanɛ. Kɛnaang ba inaang ɔlɔk vvenɛ ikaang iwɔkɔlɔ issɛɛnyɛ kɛyɔɔng.
40006029	Ɔzzànga nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ, gɔɔ Solomon ka iyyɛɛp ammɛ ka utiinɛ ikokolo, iwɔkɔlɔ usi lɛyanga ya iyyɛɛpnɛ ikkɛtɛ la idodo ’yɔng mung.
40006030	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ukulanɛ lifaat sa lilenɛ mung mmwɔɔn ibba, vvenɛ likkɔm lɔkɔɔn lufat, ba attina attɛ annyɔɔng vvenɛ ɔppyɛɛkwɔyɔng ɔsak ɔɔ? ’Bɔng kiyila kissupwɔnɛyɔng ning!
40006031	Afɔngɔyɔng kɛbɛlɛ littina attɛyɔng, mung bwa kuzzi nle nyɛn yang nzzi ee? ɔlɔk bannyi mung nle nyɛn yang nvva ee?
40006032	(Mbyɔng bilenɛ kɛssanga bɛfɛɛn bya balɔɔt a ikaan a vveengodde baggyannɛ.) Ssaawɔ annyɔɔng ka libat, ɔsan lɔsan ɔttɛ bɛfɛɛn mbyɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ bɛsaapwɔyɔng lɔsaap.
40006033	Lutini ’gwɔng, akɔɔm ɛtɔk assɛɛnyɔng Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka luppyam la bɛfɛɛn bya aggyannɛ ka ibɔɔk annyɔɔng, vvenɛ unnyiwɔyɔng bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ bya aggyannɛyɔng.
40006034	Afɔngɔyɔng kittina kwa lufat, tɛ̀ttɛ́ ittina iffu iyipiwɔyɔng ka kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang. Akama wa kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang ɔyyɛɛpbong ka kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang.”
40007001	“Tɛ̀ttɛ́ annyi balɔɔt kibbi ggbɔɔgbɔɔ nkwaaning Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usiwɔ annɔ lɛssɛ unnyi.
40007002	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ùlé ɔkaal kɛkaal annɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ akaalnɛ kɛkaal a balɔɔt balɔk. Ule ɔkɔɔm kɛssanga kɛkaal sa annɔ akaalnɛ balɔɔt ’bɔng baang, ɔkaal kɛkaal annɔ.
40007003	Mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ appyɛɛk kwa ezuku bɔfɛɛn ya tɔkɔlɔ a zzeen etele annɔ, asi kwa lɛffɛ-kɛssɛ za lɛbaang za lilenɛ ka zzeen annɔ biini lɛppyɛɛk?
40007004	Mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ akkpenge ɔkpana annɔ attɛ ‘Nsangawɔ ezuku bɔfɛɛn ka zzeen.’ Ka bɔfɛɛn bwa lɛbaang bulewɔnɛ ka zzeen za annɔ biini?
40007005	Annɔ ɔnaang-a-lagban ’wɔng! Akɔɔm ɛtɔk asanga bɔfɛɛn bwa zzeen za annɔ biini, tɛ́ttɛ́ vvenɛ akkwoong appyɛɛk asanga bɔfɛɛn bwa bulenɛ ka zzeen a ɔkpana annɔ.
40007006	“Tɛ̀ttɛ́ asam bɔfɛɛn bwa bulenɛ bwa latele annyi ibbwa, nzang vvenɛ isikili iddopowɔ. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ asam ifɔɔk-akpana atɔɔp ka lusso ikkumma; atɔɔpnɛ ning baang, vvenɛ isusukuyɛ ka bukkpɔ.
40007007	“Abapnɛ, vvenɛ atɔk; aggyannɛ, vvenɛ ayɛn; alipnɛ, vvenɛ lɛmma liwongolowɔ.
40007008	Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔbapnɛ, vvenɛ ɔyanga ’bwɛ; ɔlɔɔt wa ɔggyannɛ, vvenɛ ɔyenbwɛ; ɔlɔɔt duu wa ulipnɛ ka lɛmma ggwoon, vvenɛ liwongolomɛ.
40007009	Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ule baang wa waan ammɛ ɔkkwanɛ kazzi, ɔsam lɛttaal unnyimɛ ɔɔ?
40007010	Ɔlɔk vvenɛ ɔsam ɛzzɔkɔ unnyi awan, ka awan ɔkkwanɛ ɛsɛɛnabannyi ɔɔ?
40007011	Ka abbɔlnɛyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ abbɔlnɛyɔng lɔbbɔl baang, asanyɔng lɔsan tɛ̀ttɛ̀ annyinɛyɔng bwaan annyɔɔng bɛfɛɛn bya doddo, la nzang Ssaawo annyɔɔng ka libat, usi balɔɔt ba babapmɛnɛ bɛfɛɛn bwa doddo linnyi ɔɔ!
40007012	“Anaangyɔng linaang la bannyɔɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ aggyannɛ attɛ bannyɔɔng banaang la annyɔɔng. Ning baang ulenɛ ifɛɛt a Lafɔɔ-a-Moses la lukopolo bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
40007013	“Assɛyɔng ka lɛmma-kikku za ppyep ammiiyɔng ka tɔkɔlɔ. Ɛtɔk ya ɛggbamnɛ, ɛyyɛɛp, emii ka Hell. Balɔɔt bale batta ka annyɛ lɛssɛ.
40007014	Lɛmma-kikku za ppyep za likoolnɛ lɔssɛ, limiinɛ ka ɛfɛɛn a kuddu, bwaan a balɔɔt ssup basannɛ ɛtɔk ’yɔng baang.
40007015	“Akatyɔng kwa bakkaalalaak ba battɛnɛ abbɛ bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Bale baffu tɛ̀ttɛ̀ itɔɔn ka appyɛɛknɛyɔngbɛ ka zzeen. Ɔzzànga ka tɔkɔlɔ bale tɛ̀ttɛ̀ igɔɔt.
40007016	Vvenɛ akɔɔlɔyɔngbɛ ka eleme abbɛ. Lalaak-ɛkkpɛ la lifaat, lakkpo mangolo ba bɛwɔm.
40007017	Kɛssɛ sa doddo kɛwɔmnɛ lakkpo za layyɛɛpnɛ. Kɛssɛ sa kisinɛ lɛyyɛɛp kɛwɔm babbu lakkpo.
40007018	Kɛssɛ sa doddo lakkpo za lasinɛ lɛyyɛɛp ba kɛwɔm. Kɛssɛ sa kisinɛ lɛyyɛɛp lakkpo za layyɛɛpnɛ ba kɛwɔm.
40007019	Lɛsan-a-kɛssɛ za lisinɛ lakkpo za doddo lɛwɔm, vvenɛ bazzasɛ bazzɔɔk babbɔk bassɛɛn ka lɔkɔɔn.
40007020	Ka ussinɛ baang vvenɛ akɔɔlɔyɔng bakkaalalaak ba battɛnɛ abbɛ bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
40007021	“Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ wa ɔkkwɔɔnɛnɛ ‘Uyini’, ‘Uyini’ lissi ule ɔmal ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔzzànga ule balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ kwa Dedde anaam ka libat ɔggyannɛ ɔttɛ banaang ka bale bamal ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
40007022	Ɛkɛtɛ ya kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang kile kiffu, balɔɔt ggbadam vvenɛ bakkwɔɔnɛ ‘Uyini, Uyini’, balɔɔk battɛ, ‘Ibwɔɔlɔ ibwɔɔlɔ bɔtɔɔm bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔɔmnɛ ka lɛkɔɔl annɔ. Iggbabong ipiliza ggbadam ka lɛkɔɔl annɔ, inaang bɛmaanga ggbadam igbaa.’
40007023	Ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang vvenɛ nlɔɔk la abbɛ nttɛ, ‘Wɔyɔng ba ntaka nsan, agbata assekenɛyɔng, annyɔɔng banaang-a-bubbi.’
40007024	“Ka ussinɛ mung, ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ wa uppyeenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl anaam utelezɛ, ɔtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔsan-a-kɔlɔɔk ɔlɔɔt wa ɔbɔɔknɛ ggwoon ammɛ ka libat akpana.
40007025	Usini bannyi uteep, iyɔngɔ iyipi, ɛlɔlɔ etuma, kɛffa kɛffa gaang gaang kibum kitut a ggwoon kɛzzɔɔk. Ɔzzànga ggwoon lusi lɛttɔ, ka babɔɔknɛ gwɛ ka libat akpana.
40007026	Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ wa uppyeenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl anaam usizɛ litele, ule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ uzingizingi ɔlɔɔt wa ɔbɔɔknɛ ggwoon ka libat a kususuk.
40007027	Usini bannyi uteep, iyɔngɔ iyipi, kɛffa kɛffa gaang gaang kitut ggwoon lɔttɔ, kɛttɔ kɛbbɔl.”
40007028	Jesus uvvenɛ lilɔɔk ’sɔng lɛlɔɔk, kibbi ’sɔng baang kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ gaang gaang ka lukopolo gwa ukopolonɛ.
40007029	Ba ule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bakopolo-Lafɔɔ abbɛ. Ammɛ ukopolo la lakke.
40008001	Jesus usininɛ ka ekpok uffu kuttɔɔk, kɛkaan a balɔɔt ggbadam kikupmɛ.
40008002	Ɔlɔɔt-ɔffaal uffu ukunmɛ laddu ɔttɛ, “Dedde kɔsaapwɔnɛ, anaangnɛ ɔppwanɛ.”
40008003	Jesus utuulu kɔbɔɔk usingimɛ, ɔlɔɔk la ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔppwawɔ.” Eseese ɔffaal ɔsaalmɛ.
40008004	Jesus ɔlɔɔk la ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Gɔpɔlɔ! Tɛ̀ttɛ́ abwɔɔlɔ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk tɛ! Amii ssɔng ka ɛfɛɛn a Ɔssɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm, ɔppyɛɛkwɔ, anaang Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛsɔɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lafɔɔ Moses lalɔɔknɛ, usseke ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔsan ɔttɛ ɔppwawɔbong.”
40008005	Jesus ɔffɔnɛ Capernaum, Akkala Rome uffu ukupmɛ ukkpengemɛ ɔttɛ uttelemɛ.
40008006	Ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Dedde, bɔɔyi anaam ulenɛ ka ssala ka igolo ka umininɛ ka usimɛnɛ lɛppwa, ba ukkwoong ufeele, ɔssɔpmɛ gaang gaang.”
40008007	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Vvenɛ nmii nttulamɛ.”
40008008	Akkala ’wɔng baang ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Ning lissi, Dedde, nsi lɛggyan nttɛ annɔ vvenɛ affu ka ssala anaam. Azza lɛmmwɔɔl azzɛ azzɛ, usseke bɔɔyi anaam ɔppwanɛ.
40008009	Anaam mgbaa nssɛ nyanga balɔɔt ba battanɛnɛ anaam liggbenge. Anaam mgbaa nssɛ nyanga isɔdya ya nkɔɔmnɛ. Nlɔɔknɛ la ’wɔng nttɛ umii, umii. Nlɔɔknɛ la ’wɔng nttɛ uffu, uffu. Nlɔɔknɛ la ubili anaam nttɛ ɔnaang bwɔng, ɔnaang bwɛ.”
40008010	Jesus uppyeenɛ ’kwɔng mung, kɔkɛɛlɛmɛ gaang gaang, ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt ba bakupmɛnɛ ɔttɛ, “Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng ka lɔkkwɔɔn nttɛ, kɛssanga kiyila ’sɔng ba ntaka nyɛn ka ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔyanganɛ ka Israel.
40008011	Akkeyɔng attɛyɔng balɔɔt ggbadam vvenɛ bassi ka lusso gwa livve-luwee lɔfɔm baffu, balɔk bassi ka lusso gwa livve-luwee kulele baffu bataa ka okkpokolo ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, la Abraham la Isaac la Jacob.
40008012	Balɔɔt ba bulenɛ ba Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ bassangbɛ ballɔt ka tɔkɔlɔ kisul ka ɛfɛɛn a bale bataa bakkwa bazzi lasaal.”
40008013	Jesus ɔlɔɔk la akkala ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Amii ka ssala. Kwa alenɛ kiyila lɛyanga atum, vvenɛ kubee la annɔ.” Ubili akkala ’wɔng baang ɔppwamɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang eseese.
40008014	Jesus umii ka ssala Peter. Ɔffɔnɛ bakang ɔyɛn abakka wanavva Peter ka kisi lɛppwa ka igolo ka umininɛ; ɔffaakmɛ buyili.
40008015	Jesus usingimɛ ka kɔbɔɔk, eseese buyili busaalmɛ. Ufeele ɔtaa lɔtaa unnyibɛ kazzi.
40008016	Kulele kɔnaangnɛ, balɔɔt bakɔɔm balɔɔt ipiliza bafee Jesus. Jesus ɔkɔɔm lɛmmwɔɔl, ɔggba ipiliza, uttula balɔɔt ba ɔssɔpnɛbɛ.
40008017	Ɔnaang nkwɔng ngkwaaning kɔlɔɔk kwa Isaiah, uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔlɔɔknɛ kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn ka ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔttɛ, “Ammɛ biini ɔtɔknɛ bukoolo a kkwɔɔt ayyɔɔt ɔsam iffaak ayyɔɔt ɔgbata.”
40008018	Jesus ɔyɛnnɛ kibbi sa kikkpitmɛnɛ, ɔdda balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ bafeele bamii ka kukupa libbwe kwa kkwɔn.
40008019	Ukopolo-Lafɔɔ uffu ukup Jesus, ɔlɔɔk la ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo, nyilabong kɛssɛ la annɔ kimii ka ɛfɛɛn duu ya amiinɛ.”
40008020	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Lifat liyanga ibbe ya lillunɛ, bunɔɔn buyanga lakɔt za bukkwununɛ, ɔzzànga Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ɛfɛɛn ya umininɛ ɔfɛkɛlɛ ba ɔyanga.”
40008021	Ɔlɔɔt wa vvɔn wa ɔdɔkɔnɛ ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ, ɔlɔɔk la ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Dedde, afɔngɔnɛbong nmii nlli dedde anaam.”
40008022	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Akupnɛ, afɔngɔ babbu balli ba abbɛ babbu.”
40008023	Jesus ɔmal ka akkpaat; balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bakupmɛ.
40008024	Kitipili kitipili, kɛffa-bannyi sa lɛbaang kɛffa ka libbwe ’zɔng baang. Ɔzzánga bannyi bakupa bassɛɛn ka akkpaat ka Jesus ulenɛ ka bilaa.
40008025	Balɔɔt-a-kɔssɛ ammɛ bamii bafungalamɛ, battɛ “Mung ile ka ɛtɔk a lubbe tɛ.”
40008026	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Bɔng abbwɔpɔnɛyɔng ning? Bɔka kiyila kissupwɔnɛyɔng ning!” Ufeele ubee ubee, ɔkkpa kɛffa la labba-bannyi kiwele. Kɛffa kizum eseese.
40008027	Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ balɔɔk battɛ, “Mung bɔka kɛssanga ɔlɔɔt wa kɛffa la labba-bannyi bitelemɛnɛ?”
40008028	Jesus uffunɛ ka ɛkpansi a Gadarenes, ka lufoom a libbwe gwa ggwɔn, ududa balɔɔt baffa ba battanɛ ka ulupu. Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bayanga ipiliza, babbwɔpɔ kɛppyɛɛk. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔbbɔnɛ ɔbbal ka ɛtɔk ’yɔng baang lɛssɛ ba ule.
40008029	Eseese bazzɔɔk kibungu batte, “Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm aggyan bɔng la ayyɔɔt? Affubongyɛlɛ kɛyɔɔ akama tɛ́ttɛ́ ɛkɛtɛ ya bbwak ɛffɔ ɔɔ?”
40008030	Ɛfɛɛn ikkumma idɔkɔnɛ ka kazzi ba efulu.
40008031	Ipiliza ’yɔng baang ikkpenge Jesus ittɛ, “Ale ka aggbanɛyɛlɛ itta isseke ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung, atɔɔmyɛlɛ imii ka kibbi ikkumma ’sɔng baang.”
40008032	Jesus ɔlɔɔk la ipiliza ’yɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Ammiiyɔng.” Ɔzzánga annyɛ igbata imii ikup ikkumma. Kibbi ikkumma ’sɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ kɛmma kisini kuttɔɔk a lɛttaal kimii kɛttɔ ka bannyi kɛtaak.
40008033	Balɔɔt ba bakatnɛ ikkumma ’yɔng baang bamma bamii ka tɔkɔlɔ a ssala babwɔɔlɔbɛ lilɔɔk ’sɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ batum balɔɔt baffa ba bayanganɛ ipiliza.
40008034	Ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ wa ussinɛ ka lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang ufeele umii kɛyɛn a Jesus. Bayɛnmɛnɛ bakkpengemɛ battɛ ɔgbata usseke lɛffɛ abbɛ.
40009001	Jesus ɔmal ka akkpaat ukum libbwe ɔppyɛlɛ isimisimi ufula ka lɛffɛ ammɛ biini.
40009002	Balɔɔt balɔk batɔkɔ ɔlɔɔt ositta baffu ka ewula. Jesus ɔyɛnnɛ ka kiyila balɔɔt ’bɔng baang kɛttalanɛ, ɔlɔɔk la ɔlɔɔt a ositta ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, ‘Kkaam luppyam, waan anaam, nsɔɔkwɔbong bubbi annɔ.”
40009003	Bakopolo-Lafɔɔ balɔk balɔɔk abbɛ abbɛ battɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung ɔkpɛnbong Ebinukkpaapi!”
40009004	Jesus ɔggba ittina abbɛ lɛsan. Ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ attinayɔng babbu lilɔɔk ning?
40009005	Mung kule bbwɛt kɛttɛ ‘Nsɔɔkwɔbong bubbi annɔ’ faa kɛttɛ, ‘Afeele asse’?
40009006	Vvenɛ nbwɔɔlɔwɔng, nyɔɔwɔyɔng ayɛnyɔng ka zzeen nttɛ, Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔyanga lakke za kɛsɔɔk a bubbi.” Ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔk la ɔlɔɔt ositta ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Afeele, asam ewula annɔ afula.”
40009007	Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ufeele ɔsam ewula ammɛ ufula.
40009008	Balɔɔt bayɛnnɛ ning baang, ɔbbwɔpɔbɛ babungu Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ukkwoongnɛ unnyi balɔɔt likke ’zɔng baang.
40009009	Jesus ɔgbatanɛ ka ɛfɛɛn ’yɔng baang, ulenɛ baang ka ɔssɛnɛ, ɔyɛn ɔtɔk-innamba wa ɔzzanganɛ Matthew ka ɔtaanɛ ka ggwoon a kɛnaang ammɛ. Ɔlɔɔk la Matthew ɔttɛ, “Feele akupnɛ.” Ɔzzánga Matthew ufeele ukupmɛ.
40009010	Ka ɛkɛtɛ ya Jesus ɔdɔkɔnɛ ka kizzi kazzi ka ssala Matthew, batɔk-innamba ggbadam la babbyap baffu batoolo baang ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bazzi kazzi ka okkpokkolo.
40009011	Balɔɔt a Pharisees balɔk, bayɛnnɛ ning baang, balɔɔk la balɔɔt-a-kɔssɛ a Jesus battɛ, “Bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ ukopolo-lukopolo annyɔɔng utul kazzi la batɔk-innamba, la babbyap uzzi?”
40009012	Jesus uppyeenɛbɛ ka balɔɔknɛ ning baang, ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Balɔɔt ba ɔppwanɛbɛ uttula-ittula ba baggyan, ule balɔɔt ba usinɛbɛ lɛppwa ka baggyannɛ uttula-ittula.
40009013	Amii akkoopyɔng bwa luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, ‘Luzɔɔm gwa akɔɔmnɛyɔng isɛɛn azɔɔmyɔng ba nggyan, nggyan kɛyyɛɛp a bɛnaang.’ Kɛkkwɔɔ balɔɔt a latele lissi ka nffunɛ, nffu kwa balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ bubbi.”
40009014	Balɔɔt-a-kɔssɛ a John, Ɔnaang-a-baptizim, baffu babap Jesus battɛ, “Mung ’bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ ayyɔɔt la balɔɔt a Pharisees itaa buwɔɔng kpɛtkpɛt, balɔɔt a kɔssɛ annɔ basi lɛtaa?”
40009015	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Attina attɛyɔng bakekeen ba baffunɛ libbeel vvenɛ bataa bukee ka uyini libbeel ulenɛ baang ɔɔ? Ning baang baala kule. Ɔzzànga ɛkɛtɛ vvenɛ ɛffɔ ya bale basam uyini libbeel bagbata bakɔngɔbɛ. Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang vvenɛ bafula buwɔɔng a buwɔɔng.
40009016	“Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔkɔɔmnɛ ufaa ubba ɔsal lemmɛ ɔtɔm ubba ba ule. Akɔɔmnɛ ning baang ufaa vvenɛ ɔyaak ɔtɔm, ɔnaangmɛ lɛmma lɛggbam lɛgbaa.
40009017	Ɔlɔk asam batak asikili assɛɛn ka ɔtɔm ɛssɔ ɛkkpa-ɛsɛɛn. Assɛɛnnɛ ning baang vvenɛ ɛssɔ etuma batak ballɔt ɛssɔ ɛkkpa-ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang esseke ubbu bɔfɛɛn. Lutini ’gwɔng ufaa batak bassɛɛn ka ufaa ɛssɔ ɛkkpa-ɛsɛɛn. Ɔssɛɛnnɛ ning baang ɔpkpɛlɛ abbyɛ vvenɛ bɛtaa ka budoddo.”
40009018	Ka Jesus ulenɛbɛ ka kɛbwɔɔlɔ kɔlɔɔk nkwɔng baang, Akkala wa Jew uffu ukupmɛ, ukunmɛ laddu ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Waan anaam wa wanavva ussuma libbe gedegede mung. Affu atelemɛ labɔɔk nkwaaning uddu.”
40009019	Ɔzzánga Jesus ufeele ukupmɛ. Balɔɔt-a-kɔssɛ ammɛ batɔɔmɛ.
40009020	Wanavva vvɔn ɔdɔkɔ baang wa linnyi lissimɛnɛ ka likkpa zzɔɔppaliffa, uffu ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus, usingi Jesus ka ewuula.
40009021	Ɔlɔɔk kɛyɔɔng ɔttɛ, “Nsinginɛ ewuulu ammɛ mung, vvenɛ ɔppwanɛ.”
40009022	Jesus usikili ɔyɛnmɛ, ɔlɔɔk la ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Akkaam luppyam waan anaam! Kiyila annɔ kɛnaangwɔbong ɔppwawɔ.” Wanavva ’wɔng baang ɔppwamɛ eseese.
40009023	Ɔzzánga Jesus ufeele umii ka ssala akkala ’wɔng baang ɔyɛn bakkpa ibin ka kɛnaang a ibin ka kullu ’kwɔng baang, la balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ka bassɛnɛ yɔngɔlɔ-yɔngɔlɔ-yɔngɔlɔ.
40009024	Ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔtta ka vveeng; waan a wanavva ’wɔng baang kubbe lissi ka ubbenɛ, ule ka bilaa.” Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ basseke ka banyɔɔkamɛnɛ, basɛɛk.
40009025	Baggbanɛ balɔɔt basaal, Jesus ɔmal ka lɛnɔk a waanawanavva ’wɔng baang, ɔlɔm waantiti ka kɔbɔɔk, ufeele, ɔppyɛlɛ ɔtaa ka kuddu.
40009026	Kuttu kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng kɔwaala ɔkkpɛlɛ lɔkaan ’gwɔng baang.
40009027	Jesus ɔgbatanɛ ka ɛfɛɛn ’kwɔng baang, bassi-ifim baffa bakupmɛ la kibungu la kibungu battɛ, “Waan a David ibbewɔ lɛttɔ.”
40009028	Jesus ulenɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ a ggwoon lɛmal, bassi-ifim ’bɔng baang baffu ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ. Ɔzzánga ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Ayila mung attɛyɔng nkkwoong mung nnaang ’kwɔng ɔɔ?” Bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, “Iii tɛ Dedde;”
40009029	Jesus usingibɛ ka zzeen, ɔttɛ, “Buttɛ kɔnaang ning baang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ayilanɛyɔng.”
40009030	Ɔzzánga ifim abbɛ isaalbɛ. Jesus ɔttamabɛ kɔkɔlɔm ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ abwɔɔlɔyɔng ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk tɛ!”
40009031	Bagbatanɛ, bamii babwɔɔlɔ kuttu budoddo bwa Jesus ɔnaangnɛ la abbɛ bakkpit lufoom ɛkpansi ’yɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ.
40009032	Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bagbatanɛ, balɔɔt balɔk bakɔɔm ɔlɔɔt wa ipiliza inaangmɛnɛ usi kɛlɔɔk lɛbɛlɛ likkwoong, baffu ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus.
40009033	Ɔggbanɛ ipiliza ’yɔng baang ussekemɛ, utte kɛlɔɔk eseese. Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ kɔkɛɛlɛmɛ. Battɛ, “Kɛssanga kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng ba itaka iyɛn ka ɛkpansi a Israel.”
40009034	Ɔzzánga balɔɔt a Pharisees balɔɔk battɛ, “Ubeet ubbukanggbe unnyimɛnɛ lakke za kɛggba ipiliza itta isseke balɔɔt.”
40009035	Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔssɛ ukkpit laffɛ la igyila ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ukopolobɛ ka idda mitin. Ɔyaam Kuttu?-?budoddo Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Uttula balɔɔt bɛssanga iffaak duu ya ɔffaaknɛbɛ.
40009036	Ɔyɛnnɛ kibbi ’sɔng baang, babbemɛ lɛttɔ gaang gaang, ka balenɛ ggbɔɔ ka bassɛnɛ bawɔngɔ bakkpit, uttele uttele ba bayanga. Bale tɛ̀ttɛ̀ itɔɔn ya isɛlɛnɛ ɔkat-ɔkat.
40009037	Ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Liyaat sa lɛbaang a lɛbaang lissolobong. Ɔzzànga bayaat-ɔyaat bale ssup.
40009038	Azɔɔm annyiyɔng Uyini-liyaat nkwaaning ɔtɔɔm balɔɔt ggbadam bamiinɛ liyaat.”
40010001	Jesus ɔkkwɔɔ bayilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ ba zzɔɔppabaffa uloko ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn unnyibɛ lakke za kɛggba ipiliza la kittula balɔɔt ba ɔssɔpnɛbɛ la bɛssanga iffaak duu bya ɔffaaknɛbɛ.
40010002	Uwɔng ulenɛ lakɔɔl a bayila bɔtɔɔm a Jesus ba zzɔɔpabaffa. Ɔkɔɔm ɛtɔk, Simon (wa bakkwɔɔmɛnɛ Peter) la etele ammɛ Andrew. James la etele ammɛ John, bwaan a Zebedee.
40010003	Philip la Bartholomew, Thomas la Matthew, ɔtɔk-innamba; la James, waan Alphaeus, la Thaddaeus.
40010004	Simon, wa lɔkaan ammɛ lɔsaapmɛnɛ, la Judas Iscariot, wa uzzinɛ issɛ a Jesus.
40010005	Jesus ɔtɔɔm Balɔɔt-a-kɔssɛ ammɛ la lɔttama ’gwɔng ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ amiiyɔng ka laffɛ ikaan ilɔk, ɔlɔk ka laffɛ a Samaria.
40010006	Lutini ’gwɔng ammiiyɔng ka ɛfɛɛn a balɔɔt a Israel ba balenɛ lɛtaak tɛ̀ttɛ̀ itɔɔn.
40010007	Amii ayaam abwɔɔlɔyɔngbɛ attɛyɔng Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm itii kɛtɛkɛtɛ.
40010008	Attulayɔng balɔɔt iffaak, afungalayɔng balɔɔt ba babbenɛ, attulayɔng balɔɔt ɔffaal, aggbayɔng ipiliza. Atɔkyɔngbong lakke ’zɔng ka lɛsɔɔk, annyɔɔng assɛnɛ annyiyɔng balɔɔt balɔk ka lɛsɔɔk.
40010009	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ assɛɛnyɔng Naira, gɔɔ sili, gɔɔ kobo, ɔlɔk nddeli ka ɛssɔ.
40010010	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akɔɔmyɔng ɛssɔ lubbwoom ka kɔssɛ kwa ale ka ammiinɛyɔng, gɔɔ uwɔkɔlɔ, gɔɔ ikkpa-bukkpɔ, gɔɔ lukut a kɔssɛ. Ɔnaang-a-kɛnaang ule wa bannyimɛnɛ bwa ɔggyannɛ.
40010011	Affɔnɛyɔng ka lɛffɛ ɔlɔk ɛ̀sàm, amiiyɔng ka tɔkɔlɔ a ssala aggyanyɔng ɔlɔɔt wa ule ɔtɔkwɔyɔng ka laggele, ataayɔng baang la ammɛ tɔttɔt agbatayɔng baang.
40010012	Amiinɛyɔng ka tɔkɔlɔ a ggwoon, alɔɔk attɛyɔng ‘Bɔkaat butaa la annyɔɔng.’
40010013	Balɔɔt ba ssala ’sɔng baang batɔkwɔnɛyɔng, bukaat butaa la abbɛ. Ɔzzànga basiwɔnɛyɔng ka laggele lɛtɔk, appyɛlɛ luwomo bɔkaat annyɔɔng atɔkyɔng.
40010014	Ule ssala ɔlɔk lɛffɛ za basiwɔnɛyɔng ka laggele lɛtɔk; basi lɛmmwɔɔl annyɔɔng lɛgɔpɔlɔ, akkwɔlɔ ibut-a-bukkpɔ annyɔɔng allɔtyɔng baang, agbata assekeyɔng ɛfɛɛn ’yɔng baang.
40010015	Akkeyɔng ’kwɔng tɛ! Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvene ɔyɔɔ balɔɔt a Sodom la Gomorrah kibbe lɛttɔ ka Kɛtɔm-a-kɛkaal ɔtta balɔɔt a killu ’sɔng baang.
40010016	“Gɔpɔlɔyɔng! mung ntɔɔmwɔyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ itɔɔn ka kɛtaa igɔɔt. Abbɔnɔyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ izzɔkɔ, anaangyɔng bɛtɛbɛtɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lakkpelekete.
40010017	Akatyɔng tɛ, balɔɔt bale bale baang ba bale bakaawɔyɔng basamwɔyɔng bamii ka idda kɛkaal. Vvenɛ batupwɔyɔng ka idda mitin abbɛ.
40010018	Vvenɛ bakɔɔmwɔyɔng bamii kɛkaal ka lusso bayini lusse la babeet ka lɛttɔ anaam, ka abwɔɔlɔnɛyɔng balɔɔt a Jews la balɔɔt ikaan ilɔk Kuttu budoddo.
40010019	Ɛkɛtɛ ya bale bakɔɔmwɔyɔng bamii kɛkaal, tɛ̀ttɛ́ attina atumyɔng kwa ale alɔɔkyɔng ɔlɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ale anaangyɔng. Ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang ɛffɔnɛ vvenɛ nnnyiwɔyɔng bwa ale alɔɔkyɔng.
40010020	Lɛmmwɔɔl za ale alɔɔkyɔng ka luttina annyɔɔng baala lissi, lissiwɔyɔng ka Kuyeeng a Ssaawɔ annyɔɔng.
40010021	“Balɔɔt vvenɛ basam itele abbɛ bannyi battɛ bawwɔɔl. Ibassɛ a bwɔɔn bale banaang ning baang la ibbwɔɔn ɔgbaa. Ibbwɔɔn vvenɛ kusikili kutunbɛ la ibassɛ abbɛ la ibakka, basambɛ bawwɔɔl.
40010022	Vvenɛ atunyɔng ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ka lɛttɔ anaam. Ɔzzanga ɔlɔɔt wa uttumunɛ ka budoddo, ɔffɔ ka lakpeke, vvenɛ ɔtaa ka kuddu kwa doddo.
40010023	Bayɔɔwɔnɛyɔng akama ka lɛffɛ zzɔn afoto amma amiiyɔng ka za zzɔn. Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ, kɛnaang annyɔɔng baala avveyɔng ka laffɛ a Israel ɔkkpɛlɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ uffu.
40010024	“Waan wa uggbengenɛ ɔtta ɔlɔɔt wa ukopolomɛnɛ ba ule. Ubili wa uggbengenɛ ɔtta abassɛ ammɛ ba ule.
40010025	Waan ɔwaamɛ ka uggbengenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt wa ukopolomɛnɛ. Ubili ɔssɛ ɔwaamɛ ka uggbengenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ abassɛ. Ulenɛ ka Beelzebul (ubeet ubbukanggbe) ulenɛ uzzilɛttɔ itutum, bwaan itutum ’yɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ bakɔlɔbɛ lakɔɔl za labbɔlnɛ lasak!
40010026	“Tɛ̀ttɛ́ balɔɔt babbwɔpɔwɔyɔng ka ussinɛ mung. Lutini bɔfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bwa bavvoongnɛbwɛ vvenɛ buwongolo. Lutini likup ɔkkpɛlɛ za babwɔpnɛ, vvenɛ lɛtta ka vveeng.
40010027	Kwa nbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng mung ka kisul, vvenɛ abbalyɔngkwɛ lɛbwɔɔlɔ kikoon; ɔzzànga kwa appyeenɛyɔng ka lalup, vvenɛ abwɔɔlɔyɔngkwɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ addongonɛyɔng ka bɛsanga.
40010028	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ balɔɔt ba bawwɔɔlnɛ kkwɔɔt kɛyɔɔng basi likkwoong bawwɔɔl lɛfɛkɛlɛ babbwɔpɔwɔyɔng. Lutini ’gwɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔbbwɔpɔwɔyɔng wa ukkwoongnɛ ɔwwɔɔl kkwɔɔt la lɛfɛkɛlɛ ka lɔkɔɔn.
40010029	Akkwoong mung alɛɛp buggwele buffa ka kobo; ɔzzànga ppyɔn gbɔɔ ka lisse baala bittɔ, Ssaawɔ usi lɛsan.
40010030	Ulenɛ kwa annyɔɔng iggbe bittulu annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ itii ka lukkwoon.
40010031	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔbbwɔpɔwɔyɔng; attayɔng buggwele ggbadam.
40010032	“Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔbwɔɔlɔnɛ ppwool ɔttɛ ammɛ ule wa anaam, vvenɛ nssɛ nnaang ning baang la ammɛ ka Iusso a Dedde anaam ka libat.
40010033	Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa ɔkalanɛ ppwool ppwool ɔttɛ, ammɛ wa anaam lissi, anaam vvenɛ nssɛ nkalamɛ ka lusso a Dedde anaam ka libat.
40010034	“Tɛ̀ttɛ́ attina attɛyɔng mung nkɔɔm bɔkaat nffu ka vveeng ’wɔng. Bɔkaat lissi ka nkɔɔmnɛ nffu, nkɔɔm ogge.
40010035	Nffu nssɛɛn bwaanabwalam la ibassɛ abbɛ kɔlɔɔk; nssɛɛn bwaanabwanavva kɔlɔɔk la ibakka abbɛ. Nssɛɛn bakka lilɔɔk la ibakka abbɛ.
40010036	Kɔfɔk ɔlɔɔt kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ kussi ka itutum ammɛ biini.
40010037	Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔttanɛ abassɛ la ibakka litele ussekenɛ anaam usinɛ litele, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang wa anaam lissi. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔttanɛ awaan litele ussekenɛ anaam usinɛ litele, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang wa anaam lissi.
40010038	Ɔlɔɔt duu wa usinɛ cross ammɛ lɛsam ukup ɛtɔk anaam, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang wa anaam lissi.
40010039	Ɔlɔɔt wa ubumnɛ ɔggyan kwa kuddu ammɛ biini, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang vvenɛ ɔtakakwɛ. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔtakanɛ kuddu ammɛ ka lɛttɔ anaam, vvenɛ uddu.
40010040	“Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔtɔkwɔnɛyɔng ka latele, ɔtɔknɛbong anaam ɔgbaa. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔtɔknɛnɛ anaam ka latele, ɔtɔkbong ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtɔɔmnɛnɛ anaam.
40010041	Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔtɔknɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔlɔɔknɛ kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka latele, ka ɔlɔɔknɛ kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm; vvenɛ batul lɛsɔɔk ’zɔng baang la ammɛ. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔtɔknɛ ɔlɔɔt wa doddo ka latele, ka ɔsannɛ ɔttɛ ule ɔlɔɔt wa doddo; vvenɛ batul lɛsɔɔk la ammɛ.
40010042	Akkeyɔng ’kwɔng tɛ! ɔlɔɔt duu wa unnyinɛ ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ anaam bannyi ɔvva, ka ɔsannɛ ɔttɛ ule ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ anaam; vvenɛ ɔyanga lɛsɔɔk ammɛ.”
40011001	Jesus uvvenɛ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ba zzɔɔppabaffa lɔttama ’gwɔng linnyi, ɔgbata ka ɛfɛɛn ’kwɔng baang umii ukopolo, ɔyaam kuttu Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka laffɛ za lɛkkɛtɛnɛ baang ɔgbaa.
40011002	John, Ɔnaang-a-baptizim, ɔtaanɛ ka igbakkɔpɔ, uppyee kɔlɔɔk a kɛnaang a Christ, ɔtɔɔm balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ balɔk ufeemɛ.
40011003	Babap Jesus battɛ, “Abwɔɔlɔyɛlɛ, mung annɔ alenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa John ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔttɛ vvenɛ uffu ɔɔ? Faa ikat ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk?”
40011004	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Appyɛlɛyɔng isimisimi amii abwɔɔlɔyɔng John bwa appyeenɛyɔng, ayɛnyɔng ka zzeen agbaayɔng.
40011005	Bassi-ifim bakkwoong bayɛn; basi-kɔssɛ-likkwoong, bakkwoong bassɛ. Balɔɔt-ɔffaal ɔppwabɛ; bassi-latɔɔk bappyee. Babbu bafungala ka lubbe bataa ka kuddu, bayaam Kuttu-budoddo babwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt ba ɔbbɔlnɛbɛ.
40011006	Ɔlɔɔt wa usinɛ bɛkangala ka luppyam lɛssɛɛn utumnɛ, vvenɛ ɔtaa ka laggele za lɛbaang.”
40011007	Ka ɛkɛtɛ ya balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a John balenɛ ka kifula, Jesus ɔlɔɔk la kibbi ’sɔng baang utum John ɔttɛ, “Ka ɛkɛtɛ ya amiinɛ akupyɔng John ka kɛmat, adɔkɔ attina attɛ ale ayɛnyɔng bɔng? Ɛmma lɔfaat ya ɛtɛngɛnɛ ekup kɛffa ɔɔ?
40011008	Adɔkɔ amii ayɛnyɔng bɔng? Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔwɔkɔlɔnɛ iwɔkɔlɔ ya iyyɛɛpnɛ gaang ɔɔ? Balɔɔt ba bawɔkɔlɔ ya ning baang ballu ka igala babeet.
40011009	Bwɔɔlɔnɛyɔng! mung adɔkɔ attɛ atta amii ayɛnyɔng bɔng? Uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔɔ? Iii nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ, ayɛnyɔng ɔlɔɔt wa ɔttanɛ Uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
40011010	John ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, ‘Uwɔng ulenɛ uyilabɔtɔɔm anaam wa nle ntɔɔmmɛ ka kɛkɔɔm ɛtɔk uffu ɔlɔngɔlɔ ɛtɔk ulokowɔ.’
40011011	Akkeyɔng ’kwɔng tɛ! John, Ɔnaang-a-baptizim, ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔttanɛ ɔssɛbibit ɔkkpɛlɛ liggbenge. Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa ussupnɛ ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule ɔttamɛ liggbenge.
40011012	Ka ussinɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya John ɔyaamnɛ kuttu ammɛ tɔttɔt uffu ɔffɔ ka kɛtɔm sa mmwɔɔn, Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm iyɛnbong akama kullu gaang gaang, bábbyap babumyɛ kɛnnaa.
40011013	Bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ la Lafɔɔ-a-Moses tɔttɔt uffu ɔffɔ ka ɛkɛtɛ a John, balɔɔk batum kɔlɔɔk a Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
40011014	Aggyannɛ kiyila kɔlɔɔk kwa balɔɔknɛ, John ulenɛ Elijah wa babwɔɔlɔnɛ ɛkɛtɛ kiffu ammɛ ka isimi ka isimi.
40011015	Agɔpɔlɔyɔng, ayanganɛyɔng latɔɔk.
40011016	“Gedegede mung nle nssa balɔɔt a bɛtɔm mbyɔng la bɔng ee? Bale tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bwɔɔntiti ba bakkyeetnɛ ka ogyila kappya, likup zzɔn libungu linnyi za zzɔn.
40011017	‘Isoom ibin a libbeel ilokowɔyɔng, afimyɔng kɛtɔm. Ikkwa ittɔl layilili, ɔzzanga annyɔɔng afimyɔng kɛkkwa!’
40011018	John ka uffunɛ ɔtaa buwɔɔng, batak usi lɛvva. Ɔzzànga balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ battɛ, ‘John ɔyanga ipiliza’.
40011019	Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ uffunɛ, uzzi kazzi, ɔvva kɛvva. Balɔɔt battɛ, ‘Ppyɛɛk ɔwɔnɔwɔnɔ ’wɔng! Ɔvva-batak-ɔlɔɔt, ɛnngwa batɔk-innamba la banaang a bubbi!’ Kɛsan-a-kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛyɔɔ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya kɛttanɛ ka vveeng.”
40011020	Jesus ɔwɔlɔ laffɛ ’zɔng baang za ulenɛ bɛmaanga ggbadam baang lɛnaang, ka batakanɛ bubbi abbɛ lɛkkyaa bafɔngɔ.
40011021	“Vvenɛ ayɛnyɔng akama gaang gaang, annyɔɔng balɔɔt a Chorazin! Vvenɛ assɛ ayɛnyɔng akama gaang gaang, annyɔɔng Bethsaida! Bɛmaanga ’byɔng bya nnaangnɛ ka ɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng mmɛmmɛ bakang, bulenɛ ka nnaangnɛ ka Tyre la Sidon, nzang balɔɔt ’bɔng baang basseke ka bawɔkɔlɔnɛ bissaka issɔ bakook ibili baggbɔbɛ kɛyɔɔng, bayɔɔ battɛ bakkyaabong bubbi abbɛ bafɔngɔ.
40011022	Akkeyɔng nkwɔng tɛ!, ka Kɛtɔm-a-kɛkaal vvenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyɔɔ balɔɔt a Tyre la Sidon kibbe lɛttɔ gaang gaang ɔttawɔyɔng annyɔɔng.
40011023	Kwa annyɔɔng balɔɔt a Capernaum, anaangyɔng nang tɛ́ttɛ́ aggyan attɛ ayeekwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng amiiyɔng ka libat? Vvenɛ basamwɔyɔng bassɛɛn ka Hell! Bɛmaanga bya nnaangnɛ ka laffɛ annyɔɔng, bulenɛ ka nnaangnɛbyɛ ka Sodom, nzang Sodom utii baang ɔffɔ mmwɔɔn mung.
40011024	Akkeyɔng tɛ!, ka Kɛtɔm-a-kɛkaal, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔyɔɔ kibbe lɛttɔ ammɛ gaang gaang la balɔɔt a Sodom battawɔyɔng annyɔɔng.
40011025	Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang, Jesus ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Dedde, Uyini libat la ɛkpansi, nwomowɔ kɛnaang ka ayɔɔnɛ balɔɔt ba batakanɛ likkoop bwa alupnɛ asseke basan-a-kɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt ba balenɛ likkoop.
40011026	Iii, Dedde, anaang ’kwɔng mung ka luttina annɔ la kɛsaap.
40011027	“Dedde anaam unnyinɛbong bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsannɛ Awaan ba ule, usinɛ Abassɛ lile. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsannɛ Abassɛ ba ule, usinɛ Awaan lile, la balɔɔt ba Awaan ɔggyannɛ ɔttɛ basan.
40011028	“Affu akupnɛyɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng ba atɔkɔnɛ latɔkɔ ɔkɔɔtwɔyɔng, vvenɛ nnyiwɔyɔng kɛfɛkɛlɛ. Asamyɔng ikpooka anaam awɔkɔlɔyɔng ka lukat.
40011029	Akupnɛyɔng ka itɔk anaam ɔkkpɛlɛ akoopyɔng lilɔɔk anaam ɔkkpɛlɛ, ka nlenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa bɛɛm, nyánga kɛppwa luppyam ka tɔkɔlɔ, vvenɛ ayangayɔng kɛfɛkɛlɛ.
40011030	Ikpooka ya nle nnyiwɔyɔng ba ikɔɔt. Latɔkɔ za nle nnyiwɔyɔng ba lalɔɔp.”
40012001	Usi lɛmmɛ, Jesus ɔdɔkɔ baang ka ɔssɛnɛ ka kasɛkɛ bibwoto-isasa ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ. Balɔɔt-a-kɔssɛ ammɛ buwɔɔng busaapbongbɛ. Ɔzzánga batɛngɛnɛ lasan-isasa bakkwɔlɔ ifɔɔk bassɛɛn ka eddu basam bazzi.
40012002	Balɔɔt a Pharisees bayɛnnɛ ning baang, balɔɔk la Jesus battɛ, “Ppyɛɛk ule kɔlɔɔk a Lafɔɔ ayyɔɔt ka bɛnaang bya balɔɔt a kɔssɛ annɔ banaangnɛ baang ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ!”
40012003	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Akkwɔɔyɔngbong luvva gwa kɔlɔɔk kwa David ɔdɔkɔnɛ ɔnaang la balɔɔt ammɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya buwɔɔng busaapnɛbɛ ɔɔ?
40012004	Ɔgbata umii ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la balɔɔt ammɛ, bamii basam brɛɛd wa bakɔɔmnɛ bassɛɛn luzɔɔm bannyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bazzi, ɔzzanga ɔdɔkɔ kɔlɔɔk a Lafɔɔ ka bazzinɛ brɛɛd ’wɔng baang. Ule Bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm kɛyɔɔng ka bazzinɛ.
40012005	Faa ka luvva Lafɔɔ a Moses ba ataka akkwɔɔyɔng ka lutini Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ duu bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm babɛpɛnɛ lafɔɔ-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔzzànga basi ka Lafɔɔ lɛttɔ ɔɔ?
40012006	Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ, bɔfɛɛn bulɔk bule mung bwa buggbengenɛ butta Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
40012007	Luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, ‘Kɛkɔɔm a lakɔmɔlɔ kɛzɔɔm kinnyinɛ ba nggyan, nggyan kɛyɛɛp a bɛnaang.’ Bulenɛ ka asannɛ attɛyɔng kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn, nzang balɔɔt ba batakanɛ ka kɔlɔɔk lɛttɔ, ka kɔlɔɔk yɔngbɛ baala assɛɛnyɔng.
40012008	Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ulenɛ Uyini Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ.”
40012009	Jesus ɔgbata ka ɛfɛɛn ’yɔng baang umii ka ɔdda mitin abbɛ vvɔn.
40012010	Ɔlɔɔt ɔdɔkɔ baang la ubbu kɔbɔɔk. Balɔɔt balɔk badɔkɔ baang ba baggyannɛ Jesus kɛssɛɛn ka kɔlɔɔk ka usinɛ bbwak lɛnaang. Ɔzzánga babapmɛ battɛ, “Mung ule kɔlɔɔk a Lafɔɔ ayyɔɔt ka ɔlɔɔt uttulanɛ ittula ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ ɔɔ?”
40012011	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Ale anaangyɔng nang ulenɛ ka ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ka bɛzzɔkɔ annyɔɔng ɔyanganɛ ɛbal emii ɛttɔ ka lubbe gwa lɔddɔngnɛ ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ. Yɛ baala umii ɔsanga ɔɔ?
40012012	Ɔzzanga kaang ɔlɔɔt ɔtta ɛtɔɔn! Kwakkwɛ Lafɔɔ ayyɔɔt lafɔngɔnɛyɛlɛ ittele ɔlɔɔt ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ.”
40012013	Ɔlɔɔk la ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Tuulu kɔbɔɔk.” Ammɛ utuulukwɛ, ɔppyɛlɛ ɔppwamɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɔbɔɔk kwa kkwɔn.
40012014	Balɔɔt a Pharisees bagbata bamii banaang likup za kɛwwɔɔl a Jesus.
40012015	Jesus uppyeenɛ utumkwɛ, ɔgbata baang. Balɔɔt ggbadam bakupmɛ. Uttula balɔɔt ba ɔssɔpnɛbɛ.
40012016	Ɔzzanga unnyibɛ lɔttama ’gwɔng ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ abwɔɔlɔyɔng ɔlɔɔt kɔlɔɔk kɔlɔk atumnɛyɔng tɛ.”
40012017	Nkwɔng kɔnaangnɛ kɔlɔɔk kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔɔmnɛ uppyee-kutolo ammɛ wa ɔzzanganɛ Isaiah, ɔttɛ vvenɛ kɔnaang ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Isaiah ɔttɛ;
40012018	“Yɛn bɔɔyi anaam mung wa nlenɛ lɛsanga, wa ntelemɛnɛ. Luppyam anaam ɔkkpɛlɛ lule ka ammɛ. Vvenɛ nssɛɛnmɛ kuyeeng anaam ɔlɔɔk ɔbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ kɔlɔɔk a kɛkaal anaam.
40012019	Ɔzzanga baala ule ɔkangala-ikangala, ɔlɔk ɔlɔɔk kɛlɔɔk sa gagaga, gɔɔ balɔɔt baala bappyeemɛ lɛmmwɔɔl ka ɛtɔk.
40012020	Baala ɔkpɛɛlɛ lɔfaat gwa lukokonɛ. Gɔɔ vvenɛ uzum lɛlaak a lɔkɔɔn za lilenɛ ka kizum. Vvenɛ upiiti ɔddɔkɔddɔkɔ ɔnaang lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk luyeek kɔbɔɔk.
40012021	Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ baloko ittina abbɛ ka ammɛ.”
40012022	Balɔɔt balɔk bakɔɔm ɔlɔɔt wa ussinɛ ifim usi kɛlɔɔk likkwoong bafee Jesus. Ɔyanga ipiliza ya ibbɔlnɛ. Jesus uttulamɛ ukkwoong kɛlɔɔk ɔyɛn ka zzeen.
40012023	Kibbi ’sɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ, babap battɛ, “Baang Waan-a-David ɔɔ?”
40012024	Balɔɔt a Pharisees bappyeenɛ ning baang, battɛ, “Beelzebul, uzzilɛttɔ lippyem, unnyimɛnɛ lakke ɔttɛ ɔggba ipiliza.”
40012025	Jesus ɔggba lɛsan bwa battinanɛ, ɔzzanga ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Lɔkaan duu gwa lɔbɛngɛlɛnɛgwɛ kɛyɔɔng lusseke lakup lakup, likup zzɔn lillu zakang, lɔkaan ’gwɔng baang baala luttumu. Lɛffɛ duu ɔlɔk itutum ya ibɛngɛlɛnɛyɛ kɛyɔɔng ballubɛ kɛyɔɔng vvenɛ babbum.
40012026	Ɔzzanga likup zzɔn lillunɛ za zzɔn kullu ka itutum a Satan, ning baang vvenɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔsan ɔttɛ babɛngɛlɛbongbɛ kɛyɔɔng basseke lakup lakup. Lakup ’zɔng baang baala ɔmmɛ labbum.
40012027	Attɛyɔng anaam Beelzebul unnyinɛnɛ lakke nggba ipiliza. Kɔyyɛɛp mung, ngkka nnyinɔɔng unnyinɛ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ annyɔɔng lakke za kɛssɛ kɛggba ipiliza? Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ annyɔɔng balɔɔkbong battɛ annyɔɔng bbwak ba anaangyɔng!
40012028	Ning ba kule. Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kunnyinɛnɛ lakke za kɛggba ipiliza kɔyɔɔ kɔttɛ Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm itiiwɔyɔng baang ka kkwɔɔt.
40012029	“Ɔlɔɔt wa ule ukkwoong ɔmal ka ggwoon ɔlɔɔt wa ɔkkaamnɛ umii uyipmɛ bɛfɛɛn ba ule, usinɛ Uyini izzi lɛggbɔ uloko kang bong tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔsam bɛfɛɛn.
40012030	“Ɔlɔɔt wa usinɛ wa anaam lile, ule ɔlɔɔt a kɔfɔk anaam ka lɔkkwɔɔn, ɔlɔɔt wa usinɛnɛ littele nkkwɔɔk bɛfɛɛn nbbi ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn, nzang ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ulebyɛ ka kibbum.
40012031	Akkwɛ kɔnaangnɛ nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlcɔm ukkwoong mung ɔsɔɔk balɔɔt bubbi bwa banaangnɛ la lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ sa lisinɛ lɛyyɛɛp. Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa ɔlɔɔknɛ bbɔlbbɔl utum Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bubbi ’bwɔng baang mɛ baala ɔsɔɔk.
40012032	Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ wa ɔlɔɔknɛ lilɔɔk sa libbɔlnɛ utum Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ukkwoong mung ɔsɔɔkmɛ. Ɔzzanga ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔlɔɔknɛ lilɔɔk za libbɔlnɛ utum Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, mɛ baala ɔsɔɔk kɛfal a kɛfal.
40012033	“Aggyannɛ attɛ ayanga lakkpo bɛssɛ za doddo, ale akɔɔn lasan-a-bɛssɛ bya doddo. Akɔɔnnɛ lɛsan-a-kɛssɛ za lisinɛ lɛyyɛɛp, vvenɛ affa lakkpo bɛssɛ za lasinɛ lɛyyɛɛp. Kɛssɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ikɔɔlɔsɛ ka lakkpo assɛ.
40012034	Annyɔɔng izzɔkɔ ’yɔng! anaang nang akkwoong alɔɔkyɔng lilɔɔk sa liyyɛɛpnɛ ka abbɔlnɛyɔng ning? Nlɔɔk ka kamma ɔlɔɔt kalɔɔknɛ kwa uttinanɛ ka luppyam.
40012035	Ɔlɔɔt wa doddo ɔnaang kɔlɔɔk kwa kɔyyɛɛpnɛ ka ɔyanganɛ luppyam gwa doddo. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔbbɔlnɛ ɔnaang lilɔɔk sa libbɔlnɛ, ka ɔyanganɛ ubbu luppyam.
40012036	“Ɔzzanga nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ, ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛkaal, lutini ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ ɔbwɔɔlɔ babbu lammwɔɔl za ussinɛ utolo.
40012037	Bale bakɔɔm lammwɔɔl annyɔɔng bakaal kɛkaal annyɔɔng. Ulenɛ ka ale attayɔng ka akkwɛ, attayɔng. Ulenɛ ka attɔyɔng ka akkwɛ, attɔyɔng.”
40012038	Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang, bakopolo-Lafɔɔ, la balɔɔt a Pharisees bafeele battɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo, iggyan ittɛ anaang bɛmaanga ayɔɔyɛlɛ.”
40012039	Jesus ɔkɛɛlɛ ɔttɛ, “Annyɔɔng balɔɔt a bɛtɔm mbyɔng nnaang nang abbɔlnɛyɔng ning asiyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm litele! Abapnɛyɔng kwa bɛmaanga ɔɔ? Maaye! Bɛmaanga bya nle ka nyɔɔwɔnɛyɔng ule bya Jonah, uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
40012040	Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Jonah ukkununɛ ka lɛmmɛ ɛsɛɛnabannyi ka bɛtɔm bɛkkyaat, Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ule ɔssɛ ukkunu ning baang ka tɔkɔlɔ lisse ka bɛtɔm bɛkkyaat.
40012041	Ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛkaal, balɔɔt a Nineveh vvenɛ bafeele babee bakatawɔyɔng lilɔɔk ka bakkyaane bubbi abbɛ bafɔngɔ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya bappyeenɛ Jonah ka ɔyaamnɛ Kuttu-Budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔzzanga kɔlɔɔk kɔlɔk kule mung kwa nle nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng. Kule kuggbenge kɔtta Jonah.
40012042	Ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛkaal, ubeet a wanavva wa ussinɛ kuttɔɔk a lɔfɔɔn vvenɛ ubee ɔkatawɔyɔng lilɔɔk, ka ulenɛ lɛssɛ ukkpit kufaak a vveengodde, ɔgɔpɔlɔ lukopolo kɛsan-a-kɔlɔɔk a Solomon. Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ bulɔk bule mung bwa buttanɛ Solomon!
40012043	“Ipiliza ya ibbɔlnɛ ittanɛ ɔlɔɔt kkwɔɔt issɛ imii ka ɛfɛɛn ya ɛbbɔlnɛ iggyan ɛfɛɛn a kɛfɛkɛlɛ. Isinɛ ɛfɛɛn a kɛfɛkɛlɛ lɛyɛn,
40012044	ilɔɔk kɛyɔɔng annyɛ ittɛ, ‘Vvenɛ nppyɛlɛ isimisimi nmii ka ɔtɔm a ssala anaam sa ngbatanɛ.’ Ɔzzánga ippyɛlɛ, isimisimi imii ka ssala annyɛ sa igbatanɛ ikɔngɔ, imiinɛ ssala litii ppwool yyɛɛp-a-yyɛɛp ka balenɛsɛ lɛlɔngɔlɔ.
40012045	Vvenɛ imii iggyan babbɛ ipiliza bannambakkyaat ya ibbɔlnɛ gaang gaang ittamɛ ammɛ iffu igbaa illu baang ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn. Ipiliza vvenɛ ikama-ɔkama inaang ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang isak tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ittemɛnɛ lɛnaang. Banaang a bubbi bɛtɔm mbyɔng kule kɔnaangbɛ ning baang.”
40012046	Jesus ɔdɔkɔ utii ka kɛlɔɔk la balɔɔt ka ɛkɛtɛ itele ammɛ la abakka baffunɛ. Baffunɛ bakɔɔng bakang ka vveeng babee baggyan battɛ balɔɔk la ammɛ.
40012047	Ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ɔlɔɔk la Jesus ɔttɛ, “Ppyɛɛk ssakawɔ la itele annɔ ka babeenɛ bakang ka vveeng, baggyan battɛ batolo kutolo la annɔ tɛ.”
40012048	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Nnyinɔɔng ulenɛ ɛnɛ anaam? Babang balenɛ itele anaam?”
40012049	Ɔzzanga ɔbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Ppyɛɛkyɔng! Mbɔng balenɛ ɛnɛ anaam la itele anaam!
40012050	Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔnaangnɛ kwa Dedde Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyannɛ ɔttɛ ɔnaang, ammɛ baang ulenɛ etele anaam la Ɛnɛ anaam.”
40013001	Ka kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang ssɔn Jesus ɔgbata ka ssala umii kukupa libbwe. Ɔtaa bakang ukopolo.
40013002	Kibbi balɔɔt kilenɛ lɛsak lɛttala, ɔmal ka akkpaat ɔtaa baang ka tɔkɔlɔ. Kibbi ’sɔng baang kibee ka likum.
40013003	Ɔkɔɔm ifɛɛt ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ lilɔɔk ggbadam ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ɔdɔkɔ baang wa ufeelenɛ umii ɔkɔɔn bɛfɛɛn.
40013004	Ka ulenɛ baang ka kɛkɔɔn a bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng baang ka bɔtɔɔm, ifɔɔk ilɔk ittɔ ɛtɔk-ɛtɔk, bunɔɔn buffu buttɔng buzzi.
40013005	Ifɔɔk ilɔk ittɔ ka ɛkpansi ya lattaal a lattaal, ka ɛfɛɛn a lisse lilenɛ ssup. Ifɔɔk ’yɔng baang imeet immala. Keem ɛkpansi ka esinɛ lɛddɔng,
40013006	iffaat imal ka lisse doddo, luwee lɔsanganɛ lutup lasan ’zɔng baang usi lɛmmɛ labbe.
40013007	Ifɔɔk ilɔk ittɔ ka ɛfɛɛn a billeep a billeep. Imeetnɛ immala, billeep bɛwwɔɔl lasan ’zɔng baang.
40013008	Ifɔɔk ilɔk ittɔ ka lisse sa doddo immala iwɔm ifɔɔk. Lasan lalɔk lawɔm lalɔp ifɔɔk kubbwɔɔk, lalɔk lalɔp lakkyaat, lalɔk lɔlɔp la ifɔɔk zzɔɔp.”
40013009	Ɔzzanga Jesus utele lɛttɔ ɔttɛ, “Agɔpɔlɔyɔng, ayanganɛyɔng latɔɔk!”
40013010	Ɔzzánga balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus baffu ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ babapmɛ battɛ, “Bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ akɔɔm ifɛɛt atolo kutolo la abbɛ ee?”
40013011	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Annyɔɔng nnyiwɔyɔngbong kukele kwa kɛsan kɔlɔɔk-a-lalup Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔzzànga abbɛ nsibɛ linnyi.
40013012	Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyanganɛ bɔfɛɛn vvenɛ ɔyanga ɔgbaa ɔtta tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔggbanɛ lissi ɔyanga. Ɔlɔɔt wa usinɛ bulɔk lɛyanga vvenɛ bakup ezuku ya ɔyanganɛ batɔk.
40013013	Nkwɔng kulenɛ kwa nkɔɔmnɛ ifɛɛt ntolo kutolo la abbɛ, nttɛ ɔlɔk nkkpa bappyɛɛk, baala bayɛn. Nkkpa bagɔpɔlɔ, baala bappyee, ɔlɔk basankwɛ.
40013014	Ɔzzanga biyɛnɛ uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔzzanganɛ Isaiah ɔyɛnnɛ kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn ka ɔttɛnɛ, ‘Vvenɛ agɔpɔlɔ abbal lɛgɔpɔlɔ ɔzzànga baala appyee. Vvenɛ appyɛɛk abbalyɔng lɛppyɛɛk, ɔzzànga baala ayɛnyɔng.
40013015	Ka ittina balɔɔt ’bɔng mung isinɛ ya kippyee kɔlɔɔk lile, balakabong latɔɔk bavvoong zzeen. Usinɛ ning lile, nzang zzeen abbɛ vvenɛ layɛn, latɔɔk abbɛ lappyee, lɔtan abbɛ lɔsan, ɔlɔk basikili bappyɛɛknɛ nttulabɛ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔknɛ ning.’
40013016	“Annyɔɔng mung kɛyyɛɛp a lɔfɔm kɛttalawɔyɔngbong gaang, zzeen annyɔɔng layɛn, latɔɔk annyɔɔng lappyee.
40013017	Akke attɛyɔng bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ggbadam la balɔɔt a Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm balɔk babum gaang gaang battɛ bayɛn bwa annyɔɔng ayɛnnɛyɔng gɔɔ ba bakkwoong. Babum battɛ bappyee bwa annyɔɔng appyeenɛyɔng, basi lippyee.
40013018	“Agɔpɔlɔyɔng akkoopyɔng kwa ifɛɛt ya ɔkɔɔn a bɛfɛɛn itumnɛ.
40013019	Balɔɔt ba bappyeenɛ bɔtɔɔm bwa butumnɛ Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm basi lɛsan batumbwɛ, bataa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ifɔɔk a bɛfɛɛn ya ittɔnɛ ka lufoom a ɛtɔk. Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm a kuyeeng uffunɛ ɔffɔ baang, ɔttɔngyɛ umii.
40013020	Ifɔɔk ya illɔtnɛ ka akpana itaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt ba batɔknɛ lɛmmwɔɔl a Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka laggele ka kɛggɔ kippyee.
40013021	Ɔzzànga ka luttina bɛ ba lɛmal. Ɛkɛtɛ ya kɔlɔɔk akama kuffunɛ kutum lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng baang bakkyaa kiyila bafɔngɔ eseese.
40013022	Ifɔɔk ya ittɔnɛ ka billeep itaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt ba bappyeenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔzzanga lilɔɔk a vveengodde ’wɔng la kusapa iyyɛɛp, bɛdɛmbɛ bakkyaa kiyila abbɛ bafɔngɔ. Balɔɔt ba ning baang ba bammala.
40013023	Ifɔɔk ya ittɔnɛ ka ɛkpansi ya doddo itaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt ba bappyeenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm basan kwa lɛlɔɔknɛ. Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bammalanɛ bawɔm lakkpo lalɔk layipi luyipi laffɔ lalɔp kubbwɔɔk, lalɔk lalɔp lakkyaat, lalɔk lɔlɔp la lakkpo zzɔɔp.”
40013024	Jesus ɔbbalnɛ ifɛɛt ’yɔng lɛssa ɔttɛ, “Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ile tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔmmyangnɛ ifɔɔk a bɛfɛɛn ya doddo ka bɔtɔɔm ammɛ.
40013025	Kɛtɔm ssɔn ka ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ulenɛ ka bilaa, ɔlɔɔt-a-kɔfɔk ammɛ ɔbɔɔl umii ɔkɔɔn lifaat sa lisinɛ lɛyyɛɛp ka bɛfɛɛn bya ɔmmyangnɛ ɔgbata ufula.
40013026	Bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng baang bigbengenɛ bitte kɛnaang a bizza, lifaat ’sɔng baang limmala littabyɛ.
40013027	Ubili ammɛ umii ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Dedde, ɔdɔkɔ ifɔɔk a bɛfɛɛn ya doddo ka ammyangnɛ, ngkka lifaat ’sɔng sa lisinɛ lɛyyɛɛp lissi yang?’
40013028	Ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, ‘Baang balɔɔt a kɔfɔk anaam balɔk bale banaang ning baang.’ Babili ammɛ ’bɔng baang babapmɛ battɛ, ‘Ngkka aggyan attɛ imii ilɔp lifaat ’sɔng baang ɔɔ?’
40013029	Ɔttɛ, ‘Ihii, alɔpnɛyɔng lifaat ’sɔng baang, vvenɛ alɔpyɔng bɛfɛɛn bya ikɔɔnnɛ baang ɔgbaa.
40013030	Afɔngɔyɔng lifaat la bɛfɛɛn byɔng bɛtaa baang, bɛmmala tɔttɔt ɔffɔ ɛkɛtɛ liyaat. Ɔffɔnɛ ɛkɛtɛ kwɔng baang. Vvenɛ nbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt a liyaat nttɛ balɔp lifaat ’sɔng baang sa lisinɛ lɛyyɛɛp baggbɔ bisat bisat bassɛɛn ka lɔkɔɔn. Appyɛlɛ affu abbɔkyɔng bizza bɛfɛɛn bya nmmyangnɛ assɛɛnyɔng ka ukunu.’ ”
40013031	Jesus ɔbbalbɛ ifɛɛt ilɔk lɛssa ɔttɛ, “Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ile tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɛfɔɔk a bɛfɛɛn ya ɔlɔɔt ɔsamnɛ ɔkɔɔn ka bɔtɔɔm ɔmmɛ.
40013032	Essup-lussup ɛtta ifɔɔk a bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ɔlɔɔt ɔsamnɛyɛ ɔkɔɔn vvenɛ egbenge ɛzzanga lɛsan a kɛssɛ za lɛbaang a lɛbaang kɛtta bɛssɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Vvenɛ kɛzzanga lɛsan a kɛssɛ za uggboggbo za bunɔɔn bule buffu bulɔɔk lakɔt ka bɛbɔɔk assɛ.”
40013033	Jesus ɔbbalbɛ ifɛɛt ’yɔng lɛssa ɔttɛ, “Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ile tɛ̀ttɛ̀ yeast wa wanavva ɔsamnɛ ɔnɔk la ɔzzɔngɔ a brɛɛd, tɔttɔt ugɔngɔ a brɛɛd ’wɔng baang utum uggboggbo ning.”
40013034	Jesus ɔkɔɔm ifɛɛt, ɔlɔɔk kɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ. Kɔlɔɔk gbɔɔ kwa ɔlɔɔknɛ usi ifɛɛt lɛkɔɔm kusi lile.
40013035	Ɔnaang ’kwɔng nkwaaning kɔnaang ka lɔkkwɔɔn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔttɛ, “Vvenɛ nkɔɔm ifɛɛt ka ɛkɛtɛ ya nle nlɔɔk kɔlɔɔk la abbɛ, vvenɛ nbwɔɔlɔbɛ bɛfɛɛn bya ɔlɔɔt ɔtakanɛ lɛsan ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ussinɛ ɔlɔɔm vveengodde.”
40013036	Jesus ɔgbata ɔkɔngɔ kibbi ’sɔng baang umii ka tɔkɔlɔ a ggwoon. Balɔɔt a Kɔssɛ ammɛ bamii ka ɛfɛɛn a ɔtaanɛ battɛ, “Abwɔɔlɔyɛlɛ bwa ifɛɛt ya lifaat ka bɔtɔɔm itumnɛ.”
40013037	Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔkɔɔnnɛ ifɔɔk a bɛfɛɛn ya iyyɛɛpnɛ, ammɛ ule Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ.
40013038	Bɔtɔɔm ulenɛ vveeng ’wɔng, ifɔɔk a bɛfɛɛn ulenɛ balɔɔt ba bassinɛ ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Lifaat ulenɛ balɔɔt ba bakupnɛ Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm-a-kuyeeng.
40013039	Ɔlɔɔt a kɔfɔk wa ɔkɔɔnnɛ lifaat ’sɔng baang ulenɛ Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm-a-kuyeeng biini. Kɛyaat a liyaat kilenɛ lakpeke a vveengodde. Bayaat a liyaat balenɛ bayila-bɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
40013040	Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔpnɛ lifaat babbi ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn, battɔng lɔkɔɔn bassɛɛnsɛ likkɔm kule kule ning baang ka lakpeke a vveengodde.
40013041	Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ ɔtɔɔm bayilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ bamii ballak balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba banaangnɛ balɔɔt banaang bubbi, la balɔɔt balɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ ba banaangnɛ lilɔɔk sa libbɔlnɛ baffu babbi ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn.
40013042	Vvenɛ basam balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bassɛɛn ka lɔkɔɔn gwa lɔfɔɔpnɛ gaang gaang bataa bakang bakkwa, bazzi lasaal.
40013043	Balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ bayanga buppwolo bwa bussinɛ ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm tɛ̀ttɛ̀ buppwolo bwa livve-luwee. Gɔpɔlɔyɔng, ayanganɛyɔng latɔɔk!
40013044	“Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ile tɛ̀ttɛ̀ iyyɛɛp ya balupnɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ bɔtɔɔm. Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔyɛnnɛyɛ, ɔsamyɛ ɔbbal lilup, uggele gaang gaang ufeele umii ɔtaan bɛfɛɛn ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ bya ɔyanganɛ ɔppyɛlɛ umii ɔlɛɛp bɔtɔɔm ’bwɔng baang.
40013045	“Ɔgbaa Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm itaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔssɛ-kappya wa ɔggyannɛ ifɔɔk akpana ya iyyɛɛpnɛ.
40013046	Ɔyɛnnɛ ɛfɔɔk akpana ya ɛttanɛ lɛyyɛɛp, ufeele umii ɔtaan bɛfɛɛn ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔlɛɛp ɛfɔɔk akpana yɔng baang.
40013047	“Ɔgbaa Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm itaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kuggbɔ kwa batɔɔpnɛ ka bannyi bakaa bɛssanga isɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ.
40013048	Isɛɛnabannyi ilenɛ liyipi, bayini kuggbɔ bamii battulu kuggbɔ baffu ka likum. Bataa-ɔtaa bassang isɛɛn ya iyyɛɛpnɛ bassɛɛn ka isangala; ya isinɛ lɛyyɛɛp batɔɔp kang.
40013049	Kule kule ning baang la annyɔɔng ka kɛtɔm-a-lakpeke a vveengodde. Bayila-bɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ batta ka vveeng bamii bassang balɔɔt ba bbɔl-bbɔl basseke balɔɔt ba bayyɛɛpnɛ.
40013050	Vvenɛ bayila-bɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm basam balɔɔt ba babbɔlnɛ bassɛɛn ka lɔkɔɔn gwa lɔfɔɔpnɛ gaang gaang bataa bakang bakkwa bazzi lasaal.”
40013051	Jesus ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Annyɔɔng asanyɔng mung bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng ɔɔ?” Abbɛ bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, “Iii.”
40013052	Ɔzzanga ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Uwɔng ulenɛ kɛ́ttɛ́ ukopolo-Lafɔɔ duu wa ɔttɛnɛ ammɛ ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyanganɛ ssala, ɔsanga bafaa la batɔm a bɛfɛɛn ka tɔkɔlɔ lɛnɔk a ggwoon ammɛ ɔtta.”
40013053	Jesus uvvenɛ ifɛɛt ’yɔng mung lɛssa, ɔgbata ka ɛfɛɛn ’yɔng baang.
40013054	Ufeele ɔppyɛlɛ isimisimi umii lɛffɛ ammɛ. Ukopolo ka idda mitin abbɛ. Balɔɔt ba bappyeemɛnɛ kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ. Battɛ, “Lakke ’zɔng ɔyanga ka yang ee?” Babbal lɛttɛ, “Ngkka kɛnaang-imaanga ammɛ ngbaa bɛɛ?
40013055	Mung ammɛ lissi ulenɛ waan a kapenta ɔɔ? Mary lissi ulenɛ abakka ɔɔ? James, Joseph, Simon la Judas lissi balenɛ itele ammɛ ɔɔ?
40013056	Itele ammɛ ya bwanavva lissi ballunɛ mung ɔɔ? Ngkka ’byɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ bissimɛ yang?”
40013057	Ɔzzánga bafimmɛ. Jesus ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm batelemɛ ifɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ usseke ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ la itutum ammɛ.”
40013058	Usi bɛmaanga ggbadam baang lɛnaang ka basɛlɛnɛ kiyila.
40014001	Ɔdɔkɔ ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang bbwak ya Herod, uzzilɛttɔ ɛkpansi a Galilee, uppyeenɛ kuttu a Jesus.
40014002	Ɔbwɔɔlɔ ikkala ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Baang ka lɔkkwɔɔn John, Ɔnaang-a-baptizim, ufungalabong ka lubbe kwakkwɛ lakke lalenɛ baang ka kkwɔɔt ammɛ: ukkwoong ɔnaang kɛnaang ’sɔng mung tɛ.”
40014003	Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng bakang, John ɔbwɔɔlɔ Herod ɔttɛ, “Ba kɔyyɛɛp ka atɔknɛ Herodias, wanavva etele annɔ Philip tɛ.” Ɔzzánga Herod uppyeenɛ ning baang ɔkaa John ɔggbɔ izzi ɔsammɛ ɔssɛɛn ka igbakkɔpɔ.
40014005	Herod ɔnaang luttina gwa kɛwwɔɔlmɛ, usi lɛbbɔ, ɔmma balɔɔt a Jews ka batɔknɛ John tɛ̀ttɛ̀ uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
40014006	Uffu ɔffɔ ka kɛtɔm ekokomele Herod, waanawanavva wa Herodias ɔmaatnɛ ufeele ɔtɔm ka lusso kibbi ’sɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ɔzzánga ɔwaa Herod gaang gaang.
40014007	Ɔssɛɛn nsekele ɔttɛ, “Nyimbong nttɛ vvenɛ nnyiwɔ bɔfɛɛn duu bwa aggyannɛ.”
40014008	Waantiti ɔbapnɛ abakka, Herodias, Herodias ɔttɛ ɔffaam lɛttɔ a John. Ɔzzánga waantiti ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Assɛɛnnɛ lɛttɔ a John, Ɔnaang-a-baptizim, ka kɛkkpala ’sɔng mung.”
40014009	Ubeet livve lɛbbɔlmɛ, keem ka ulenɛ nsekele lɛffɔ ɔssɛɛn ka lusso balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ, usi lɛbbɔ ufim. Ɔttɛ bwa waanawanavva ’wɔng baang ɔggyannɛ vvenɛ unnyimɛ.
40014010	Ɔzzanga Herod ɔlɔɔkbɛ bazza lɛttɔ a John ka tɔkɔlɔ a igbakkɔpɔ,
40014011	bassɛɛn ka tɔkɔlɔ kɛkkpala, bafee waanawanavva ’wɔng baang. Ammɛ ɔsam ufee abakka.
40014012	Bayilabɔtɔɔm a John baffu basam kakkwu ammɛ bamii balli. Bafeele bamii babwɔɔlɔ Jesus.
40014013	Jesus uppyeenɛ kuttu lubbe a John, ɔgbata ka ɛfɛɛn ’kwɔng baang la akkpaat umii ka ɛfɛɛn ya ulenɛ kɛyɔɔng. Balɔɔt bappyeenɛ ning baang bagbata ka laffɛ abbɛ bamii bakupmɛ.
40014014	Jesus ɔtta ka tɔkɔlɔ akkpaat ka ɔyɛnnɛ kibbi balɔɔt ggbadam. Babbemɛ lɛttɔ gaang gaang, uttula balɔɔt iffaak.
40014015	Kulele ’kwɔng baang, balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ baffu balɔɔkmɛ batte, “Mung usulbong, ɔlɔɔt mung ba ule ka ullunɛ. Abwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt ’bɔng mung bamii ka tɔkɔlɔ a ssala balɛɛp kazzi kɛyɔɔng bazzi.”
40014016	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ bagbata, annyɔɔng annyiyɔngbɛ kazzi, bazzi.”
40014017	Bappyɛlɛ Jesus kamma battɛ, “Bwa iyanganɛ mung ɔkkpɛlɛ ule igɔngɔ a brɛɛd kubbwɔɔk la isɛɛnabannyi iffa keem tɛ.”
40014018	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Asamyɔngbyɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ afeenɛyɔng kaang.”
40014019	Ɔbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ɔttɛ bataa-ɔtaa ka lifaat. Balenɛ lɛtaa, ɔsam igɔngɔ a brɛɛd ’yɔng baang kubbwɔɔk la isɛɛnabannyi iffa uyeek, ɔppyɛɛk ka libat, uwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang. Ɔsamyɛ ɔbbɔk, unnyi balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ. Basam, babɛngɛlɛ balɔɔt ’bɔng baang.
40014020	Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔt uzzi tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kaddumɛnɛ. Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ battɔng isangala kazzi zzɔɔppiffa ya issekenɛ.
40014021	Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba bazzinɛ kazzi ’kwɔng baang badɔkɔ innɔ zzɔɔppiffa la lalɔp zzɔɔp. Bwanavva la bwɔɔntiti ka lukkwoon ba bale.
40014022	Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ bamal ka akkpaat bawaat bakɔɔm ɛtɔk bassɛ bamii kukupa libbwe za zzɔn. Ammɛ ɔkɔɔm ubee ɔbwɔɔlɔ kibbi ’sɔng baang ɔttɛ bakkyaap.
40014023	Ulenɛ balɔɔt ’bɔng baang lɛbwɔɔlɔ bagbata, ufeele umii ka libat ekpok kɛyɔɔng ammɛ ɔssɛɛn luzɔɔm. Kulele kɔnaangnɛ, usseke kɛyɔɔng.
40014024	Ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang akkpaat utii fulufulu ka tɔkɔlɔ libbwe ɔkɔɔm uggbuku ka kɛffa kilenɛ baang ka kɛffanɛ.
40014025	Bɛzzɔkɔ ikalangka ikkyaat la ikalangka bwɔlanning ɔdɔkɔnɛ ɛkɛtɛ ya Jesus ɔssɛnɛ ka ɛkkpa bannyi, umii ukupbɛ lɔfɔm a lɔfɔm.
40014026	Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bayɛnmɛnɛ ka ɔssɛnɛ ka ɛkkpa-bannyi, kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ gaang gaang battɛ, “Baang ubbu-kɔwɔkɔlɔ tɛ.” Ɔbbwɔpɔbɛ baffula.
40014027	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Kkaamyɔng luppyam! Anaam tɛ, tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔbbwɔpɔwɔyɔng.”
40014028	Peter ufeele ɔttɛ, “Uyini, ulewɔnɛ annɔ ka lɔkkwɔɔn anaangnɛ ntta ka akkpaat nssɛ ka bannyi nffu ka ɛfɛɛn annɔ.”
40014029	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Affu.” Ɔzzánga Peter ɔtta ka tɔkɔlɔ akkpaat, ɔssɛ ka ɛkkpa-bannyi umii ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus.
40014030	Uppyeenɛ kɛffa, ɔbbwɔpɔmɛ. Ɔbbwɔpɔmɛnɛ upiti ka tɔkɔlɔ bannyi. Ɔkkwa ɔttɛ, “Uyini akkalanɛ.”
40014031	Eseese Jesus umii ɔffɔ ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ ɔlɔmmɛ, ɔttɛ, “Bɔng waan a kiyila ussupwɔnɛ ning! Bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ ayanga ndeeta ka luppyam?”
40014032	Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ bappyɛlɛ isimisimi bamii ka tɔkɔlɔ akkpaat. Kɛffa kizum eseese.
40014033	Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus ba balenɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ akkpaat bazɔɔm battɛ, “Isanbong ka lɔkkwɔɔn ittɛ annɔ alenɛ Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
40014034	Bakum libbwe ’zɔng baang baffu ka ɛkpansi Gennesaret,
40014035	ɛfɛɛn a balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bakɔɔlɔnɛ Jesus. Ɔzzánga batɔɔm ka balɔɔt iffaak ba ballunɛ bakkpit ɛkpansi ’yɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ baffu ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus.
40014036	Bakkpengemɛ battɛ ɔfɔngɔ balɔɔt iffaak basingi ligook ewuulu ammɛ. Ɔzzanga balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba basinginɛzɛ ɔppwabɛ.
40015001	Balɔɔt a Pharisees balɔk la bakopolo-Lafɔɔ bassi Jerusalem baffu babap Jesus battɛ,
40015002	“Mbɔng balɔɔt a kɔssɛ annɔ basinɛ kwa lukopolo balɔɔt ayyɔɔt ba iyɛddɛ-yɛddɛ liyila? Ibɔɔk ba bayila tɛ́ttɛ́ bazzi kazzi!”
40015003	Jesus oppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ asiyɔng Lafɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm litele, appyɛɛ allɛwɔyɔng kikup kwa lukopolo annyɔɔng biini?
40015004	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔkbong ɔttɛ, ‘Atele ssaawɔ la ssakawɔ! Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ wa ɔlɔɔknɛ bubbi utum abassɛ ɔlɔk abakka, vvenɛ bawwɔɔlmɛ.’
40015005	Ɔzzànga annyɔɔng akopolonɛ attɛyɔng ɔlɔɔt ɔyanganɛ bɔfɛɛn bwa bukɔɔmnɛ ɔyaam abakka ɔlɔk abassɛ, ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔttɛ ‘Bɔfɛɛn ’bwɔng baang bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm’, ule bbwak ka ufimnɛ abakka la abassɛ litele.
40015006	Uwɔng ulenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ afimnɛyɔng lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm; akupyɔng lukopolo annyɔɔng biini.
40015007	Annyɔɔng banaang-a-lagban ’bɔng! Isaiah ɔdɔkɔ bbwak ka biyɛnɛ pya ɔyɛnnɛ utumwɔyɔng! ɔttɛ,
40015008	‘Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛ, ‘Balɔɔt ’bɔng mung batelenɛ ka bɛkkpa-kamma keem, ippyam abbɛ ile fulufulu issekenɛ.
40015009	Ba kɔyyɛɛp ka bassɛɛnnɛ luzɔɔm bannyinɛ ka bakopolonɛ lafɔɔ za balɔɔt banaangnɛ lataa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Lafɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm!’ ”
40015010	Jesus ɔkkwɔɔ kibbi ’sɔng baang kiffu ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Agɔpɔlɔ appyeeyɔng!
40015011	Bɔfɛɛn bwa bumiinɛ ɔlɔɔt ka kamma lissi bunaangmɛnɛ ɔbbɔl, bwa buttanɛ ka akkwɛ bunaangmɛnɛ ɔbbɔl.”
40015012	Nkwɔng baang kɔsaalnɛ, balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bassinɛ bakang baffu ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ battɛ, “Asan mung attɛ kɔlɔɔk kwa alɔɔknɛ baang kutunbong balɔɔt a Pharisees ɔɔ?”
40015013	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Kɛssɛ duu sa usinɛ Dedde anaam lile ɔkɔɔnnɛ, vvenɛ balɔpsɛ bazzɔɔk.
40015014	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ attinayɔng kwa abbɛ, baang bassi-ifim a bazzi-lɛttɔ. Ussi-ifim ɔkɔɔmnɛ wabbɛ ussi-ifim ɛtɔk, ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ vvenɛ battɔ ka lubbe.”
40015015	Peter ɔttɛ, “Abwɔɔlɔyɛlɛ bwa ifɛɛt ’yɔng mung itumnɛ.”
40015016	Jesus ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Kɔlɔɔk ba ataka asan asakyɔng balɔɔt balɔk.
40015017	Ba asanyɔng ɔɔ? Bɔfɛɛn duu bwa ɔlɔɔt uzzinɛ bumiimɛ ka kifulu tɛ́ttɛ́ buttamɛ ka kkwɔɔt.
40015018	Ɔzzanga bɔfɛɛn bwa ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔknɛ ka kamma bussimɛ ka luppyam. Lilɔɔk sa ning baang linaangnɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔbbɔl.
40015019	Ubbu luttina ɔnaangmɛnɛ ka luppyam ɔdɔmmɛ ɔwwɔɔl balɔɔt, ukup bwanavva balɔɔt, ɔssɛ-kɛzak, uyip, ɔnnaa bɛfɛɛn a balɔɔt ka lakke, ɔkkala-lɛlaak, ɔbwɔɔlɔ-ibwɔɔlɔ ya ibbɔlnɛ utum balɔɔt balɔk.
40015020	Bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng bɛnaangnɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔbbɔl. Kizzi kazzi asi ibɔɔk liyila tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt a Pharisees balɔɔknɛ lissi kɛnaangnɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔbbɔl.”
40015021	Jesus ɔgbata ka ɛfɛɛn ’kwɔng baang, umii ka ɛkpansi a Tyre la Sidon.
40015022	Wanavva wa ussinɛ Canaan ule baang ka ɛkpansi ’yɔng baang ka ullunɛ, uffu ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus ɔttɛ, “Waan-a-David Dedde! Mbbewɔ lɛttɔ, Waan wa wanavva ɔyanga ipiliza ya ibbɔlnɛ lɔbbɔl.”
40015023	Ɔzzànga Jesus lɛmmwɔɔl usimɛ lɛzza. Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ baffu ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ bakkpengemɛ battɛ, “Aggbamɛ umii ussekeyɛlɛ! Ule baang ka ukupnɛyɛlɛ la lɔsap la lɔsap!”
40015024	Tɛ́ttɛ́ bɔk Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Ɔtɔɔmnɛ kwa balɔɔt a Israel ba balenɛ lɛtaak tɛ̀ttɛ̀ itɔɔn.”
40015025	Wanavva ’wɔng mung uppyeenɛ ning baang uffu ɔttɔ Jesus ka lataak ɔttɛ, “Dedde attelenɛ!”
40015026	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Bbwak ba kule ka itɔknɛ kazzi kwa bwɔɔntiti, illɔt ibbwa, izzi.”
40015027	Ammɛ ɔppyɛlɛ Jesus kamma ɔttɛ, “Kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn Dedde; Gbaak la ibbwa ittɔng mung bwa kuzzi bwa bussinɛ ka okkpokolo ibassɛ annyɛ, buttɔ ka lisse, izzi.”
40015028	Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Annɔ wanavva wa ɔyanganɛ kiyila sa lɛbaang! Bwa aggyannɛ vvenɛ nnyiwɔ.” Eseese waan ammɛ ɔppwamɛ.
40015029	Jesus ɔgbata ka ɛfɛɛn ’yɔng baang umii ka lufoom a libbwe Galilee. Umii ɔtaa ka libat ekpok.
40015030	Bɛkaan a balɔɔt ggbadam biffu ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ, bakɔɔm bannɔk-a-kikkwu, la bassi-ifim, la babbe-labɔɔk, la basi-kɛlɔɔk-likkwoong, la balɔɔt iffaak balɔk ggbadam baffu bawulu Jesus ka lataak. Jesus uttulabɛ ɔppwabɛ.
40015031	Balɔɔt kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ ka bayɛnnɛ usi-kɛlɔɔk-likkwoong ka ukkwoongnɛ ɔlɔɔk kɛlɔɔk. Babbe-labɔɔk la bannɔk-a-kikkwu bakkwoong bassɛ, bassi-ifim bayɛn. Ɔzzánga babungu Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm a Israel.
40015032	Jesus ɔkkwɔɔ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ baffu ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Balɔɔt ’bɔng mung babbenɛbong lɛttɔ gaang, bataabong la anaam mung ka bɛtɔm bɛkkyaat, ɔzzànga mung bulɔk ba bataka bazzi. Ba nggyan nttɛ bafula ka batakanɛ kazzi lizzi, tɛ́ttɛ́ balɔk baffu babbe buwɔɔng ka ɛtɔk.”
40015033	Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ babapmɛ battɛ, “Kazzi ile iyɛn ka yang kaddu balɔɔt ’bɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ kizzi ka kasɛkɛ atingating ’kwɔng?”
40015034	Jesus ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Igɔngɔ a brɛɛd ilewɔyɔng ifang?” Abbɛ bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, “Iyanga igɔngɔ a brɛɛd innamikkyaat la isɛɛnabannyi ssup mung tɛ.”
40015035	Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔlɔɔk kibbi ’sɔng baang ɔttɛ bataa-ɔtaa ka lisse.
40015036	Ɔsam igɔngɔ a brɛɛd ’yɔng baang innamikkyaat la isɛɛnabannyi uwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang, ɔsam ɔbbɔk unnyi balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ. Abbɛ basam batan balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ.
40015037	Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ bazzi tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kaddunɛbɛ. Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ battɔng izuku ya issekenɛ bassɛɛn, isangala innamikkyaat iyipi.
40015038	Balɔɔt ba bazzinɛ kazzi ’kwɔng baang badɔkɔ innɔ zzɔɔp. Bwanavva la bwɔɔntiti ka lukkwoon ba bale.
40015039	Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bafula. Ammɛ ɔmal ka akkpaat umii ka ɛkpansi a Magadan.
40016001	Balɔɔt a Pharisees balɔk, la balɔɔt a Sadducees baffu ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus, battɛ bassɛɛnmɛ ka kɔlɔɔk. Ɔzzanga babapmɛ battɛ ɔnaang bɛmaanga, ɔyɔɔbɛ, basan battɛ baang ɔnaang kɛnaang Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
40016002	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Livve lile ka lipitinɛ, attɛyɔng, ‘Kɛtɔm sa mmwɔɔn vvenɛ kile sa ssayii,’ ka ayɛnnɛyɔng libat ka likootnɛ.
40016003	Ɔffɔnɛ lɔfɔmalɔfɔm, attɛyɔng, ‘Ule ka uteepnɛ ka iyɛnnɛyɔng libat ka lisulnɛ.’ Akkwoong mung abwɔɔlɔyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛtɔm sa mmwɔɔn kile kile ka appyɛɛknɛyɔng ka libat. Ɔzzànga ba akkwoong abwɔɔlɔyɔng linaang sa litumnɛ ɛkɛtɛ yɔng!
40016004	Balɔɔt ba bɛtɔm mbyɔng, abbyapyɔngbong, asiyɔng kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛsan! Abapnɛ attɛyɔng nyɔɔwɔyɔng bɛmaanga ɔɔ? Maaye! Bɛmaanga bya nle nyɔɔwɔyɔng ule bya Jonah kɛyɔɔng.” Ɔzzánga ɔgbata umii ussekebɛ.
40016005	Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus bakupmɛ bamii kukupa libbwe kwa kkwɔn, basumala brɛɛd kɛsam kɛkɔɔm kimii.
40016006	Jesus ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Ppyɛɛkyɔng! akatwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng assekeyɔng yeast a balɔɔt a Pharisees la balɔɔt a Sadducees tɛ.”
40016007	Batte kɛlɔɔk abbɛ abbɛ battɛ, “Ɔlɔɔk ka isinɛ brɛɛd lɛkɔɔm.”
40016008	Jesus ɔggba lɛsan bwa balɔɔknɛ abbɛ abbɛ: Ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ alɔɔkyɔng annyɔɔng annyɔɔng atumyɔng kisi kazzi lɛkɔɔm? Kiyila kissupwɔyɔngbong kɛsak!
40016009	Ba ataka asanyɔng ɔɔ? Ba akkeyɔng ka nsamnɛ igɔngɔ a brɛɛd kubbwɔɔk, nbbɔk, nnyi innɔ balɔɔt zzɔɔppiffa la lalɔp zzɔɔp bazzi ɔɔ? Isangala idɔkɔ ifang ka attɔngnɛyɔng izuku ya issekenɛ assɛɛnyɔng iyipi?
40016010	Ɔzzánga kwa igɔngɔ ya innamikkyaat ya nnyinɛ innɔ zzɔɔp bazzi bɛɛ? Isangala ifang ka attɔngnɛyɔng iyipi?
40016011	Mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ asiyɔng lɛsan attɛyɔng kwa brɛɛd lissi ka nlɔɔknɛ ntum? Akatwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng assekeyɔng yeast a balɔɔt a Pharisees la balɔɔt a Sadducees.”
40016012	Ɔzzànga balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ baggɔgɔ basan battɛ ba ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ kwa yeast wa ɔnaangnɛ brɛɛd utum. Ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ bakatbɛ kɛyɔɔng basseke lukopolo balɔɔt a Pharisees la balɔɔt a Sadducees.
40016013	Jesus ufeele umii ka ɛkpansi ya ɛkkɛtɛnɛ lɛffɛ a Ceasarea Philippi. Ɔffɔnɛ bakang ɔbap balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Mung balɔɔt battina battɛ Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ulenɛ nnyinɔɔng?”
40016014	Bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, “Balɔɔt balɔk battɛ ammɛ ulenɛ John, Ɔnaang-a-baptizim. Balɔk battɛ Elijah. Balɔk battɛ Jeremiah ɔlɔk uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔk.”
40016015	Ɔbapbɛ abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Ngkka annyɔɔng bɛɛ? Attina attɛyɔng anaam nlenɛ nnyinɔɔng?”
40016016	Simon Peter ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Annɔ alenɛ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ, Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm-a-kuddu.”
40016017	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Simon, waan a John, aggele gaang gaang. Lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk ’gwɔng mung ka ɔssɛbibbit ba lussi luffu ka annɔ, Dedde anaam ka libat unnyiwɔnɛgwɛ.
