40016018	Nbwɔɔlɔwɔ tɛ! Peter, annɔ alenɛ akpana. Vvenɛ nbɔɔk Ggwoon-a-Luzɔɔm anaam ka libat a akpana ’wɔng baang. Lubbe baala lukkwoong lɔbɛpɛ Ggwoon-a-Luzɔɔm anaam.
40016019	Vvenɛ nnyiwɔ ɛkpɔkɔlɔ lɛmma ggwoon a Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Bwa bulenɛ bwa lafɔɔ ka ɛkpansi bussɛ bule bwa lafɔɔ ka libat. Bwa akkyaanɛ afɔngɔ ka ɛkpansi, vvenɛ nssɛ nkkyaabwɛ nfɔngɔ ka libat.”
40016020	Jesus ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ abwɔɔlɔyɔng ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk attɛyɔng anaam nlenɛ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ tɛ.”
40016021	Ka ussinɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang, Jesus ɔlɔɔk ppwool ppwool ɔbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Vvenɛ nmii Jerusalem, nyɛn akama wa lɛbaang ka labɔɔk a bagɛlɛnya la bazzilɛttɔ-bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la bakopolo-Lafɔɔ. Vvenɛ basamnɛ bamii bawwɔɔl, ɔzzanga ka bɛtɔm bɛkkyaat vvenɛ nfungala ka lubbe.”
40016022	Peter ɔkkwɔɔmɛ uloko kufɛngɛ ɔttɛ, “Uyini anaam, Laggbo-laggbo, tɛ̀ttɛ́ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangwɔ ning baang. Nkwɔng annɔ wɔ baala kɔnaang tɛ.”
40016023	Jesus usikili ɔlɔɔk la Peter ɔttɛ, “Agbata mung assekenɛ annɔ Satan ’wɔng! Ale tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɔfɛɛn bwa bubeenɛ buzzanɛ ɛtɔk buttɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ nsak. Luttina annɔ, luttina balɔɔt; gwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lissi.”
40016024	Jesus ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ule ka uffunɛ ukupnɛ, usumalamɛ kɛyɔɔng, ɔsam cross anaam ukupnɛ.
40016025	Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔggyannɛ ɔttɛ ɔkkala kuddu ammɛ biini, vvenɛ ɔtakakwɛ. Ɔzzanga ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtakanɛ kuddu ammɛ ka lɛttɔ anaam, vvenɛ ɔyangakwɛ.
40016026	Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔggyannɛ ɔttɛ ɔyanga lutini bɔfɛɛn la duu ka vveeng ’wɔng mung ɔtaka lɛfal ammɛ isak ilemɛ ka ’bɔng? Ning baang ba kule; bɔfɛɛn bulɔk bwa ule ukkwoong ɔsam ussila lɛttɔ kuddu ammɛ ba bule.
40016027	Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ule ka uffunɛ la latele Abassɛ la bayilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ. Uffunɛ, vvenɛ ɔppyɛlɛ ɔlɔɔt duu bwa ɔnaangnɛ.
40016028	Akkeyɔng ’kwɔng tɛ, balɔɔt balɔk bale mung ba basi libbe tɔttɔt bayɛn Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ule uffu tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ubeet.”
40017001	Bɛtɔm bwɔlaaning bɛsaknɛ, Jesus ɔsam Peter la James la John, etele a James, bamii ka libat a lɛttaal za ggologgolo bataa bakang kɛyɔɔng.
40017002	Bale baang ka bappyɛɛknɛ, Jesus ufoolo kɛssanga kɛlɔk: Lusso luppwolomɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ livve-luwee, iwɔkɔlɔ ammɛ ilaat inyanya.
40017003	Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ba bakkyaat ’bɔng baang bayɛn Moses la Elijah ka kutolo la Jesus.
40017004	Ɔzzánga Peter ufeele ubee-ubee ɔlɔɔk la Jesus ɔttɛ, “Uyini, kɔyyɛɛp gaang ka ilenɛ mung; kɔsaapwɔnɛ, vvenɛ nnaang idda ikkyaat, vvɔn wa annɔ, vvɔn wa Moses, vvɔn wa Elijah.”
40017005	Utii baang ka kɛlɔɔk, ikkpálá ya illaatnɛ inyanya iffu ivvoongbɛ kuyeeng, lɛmmwɔɔl lɛtta ka tɔkɔlɔ ikkpálá ’yɔng lɛttɛ, “Uwɔng ulenɛ Waan a luppyam anaam wa ɔsaapnɛnɛ gaang; agɔpɔlɔmɛyɔng.”
40017006	Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ, bappyeenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng baang, ɔbbwɔpɔbɛ gaang gaang, bakun laddu balli isso ka lisse.
40017007	Jesus uffu ka ɛfɛɛn abbɛ usingibɛ ɔttɛ, “Afeeleyɔng, tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔbbwɔpɔwɔyɔng.”
40017008	Ɔzzánga bayeek bappyɛɛk ka libat; ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk basi lɛbɛlɛ lɛyɛn ɔgbaa la Jesus.
40017009	Ka balenɛ baang ka kisini lɛttaal, Jesus ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ abwɔɔlɔyɔng ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk kɔlɔɔk kɔlɔk atumyɔng biyɛnɛ pya ayɛnnɛyɔng tɔttɔt Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ufungala ka lubbe tɛ.”
40017010	Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ babapmɛ battɛ, “Bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ bakopolo-Lafɔɔ balɔɔk battɛ Elijah ule utte liffu?”
40017011	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Elijah uttenɛ liffu ka lɔkkwɔɔn, ɔbama bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ uloko.
40017012	Ɔzzànga nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ, Elijah ɔggba liffu ɔzzànga balɔɔt mɛ ba bakɔɔlɔ. Bakɔɔmmɛ gbɔɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɔsaapnɛbɛ. Bale bassɛ bakɔɔm Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ning baang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɔsaapnɛbɛ.”
40017013	Balɔɔt a Kɔssɛ ammɛ basan battɛ ɔlɔɔk utum John, Ɔnaang-a-baptizim.
40017014	Bappyɛlɛnɛ bamii ka kibbi ’sɔng baang, ɔlɔɔt vvɔn uffu ukun Jesus laddu.
40017015	Ɔttɛ, “Uyini, waan anaam ubbewɔ lɛttɔ! Ɔyanga lɔbbaak, ɔssɔpmɛ gaang gaang, ɔtaa ɔttɔ ka lɔkɔɔn, ɛkɛtɛ elɔk ɔttɔ ka bannyi.
40017016	Nkɔɔmmɛbong nffu ka ɛfɛɛn a balɔɔt a kɔssɛ annɔ, ɔzzanga basi likkwoong battulamɛ.”
40017017	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Bɔng annyɔɔng balɔɔt ’bɔng asɛlɛnɛyɔng kiyila, anaangyɔng ubbu kɔlɔɔk ning! Nle ntaa ɔmmɛ ɔffɔ nang la annyɔɔng? Nle nlɔɔk nang la annyɔɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ appyeeyɔng? Akɔɔm waan ’wɔng baang affu mung.”
40017018	Jesus ɔlɔɔk la ipiliza, itta, isseke waanawalam ’wɔng baang, ɔppwamɛ lɔbbaak eseese.
40017019	Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus baffu babapmɛ ka wɛɛk battɛ, “Mung ’bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ ayyɔɔt isi lɔbbaak likkwoong ittula ee?”
40017020	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Kussi ka asinɛyɔng kiyila doddo lɛyanga. Akke attɛyɔng bulenɛ ka ayanganɛyɔng kiyila kɛffɔwɔyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɛfɔɔk-ɛsasa, nzang akkwoong mung alɔɔkyɔng la ekpok ’yɔng mung attɛyɔng, ‘Gbata mung, amii kang’ vvenɛ emii, nzang vvenɛ akkwoong anaangyɔng bɔfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ!
40017021	[Ule kɛtaa-buwɔɔng la kɛssɛɛn a luzɔɔm kɛyɔɔng ka kikkwoongnɛ kɛggba kɛssanga bɛfɛɛn mbyɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ, bulɔk ba bule.]”
40017022	Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus baffunɛ baggba ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn ka Galilee, Jesus ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Bale ka basamnɛ Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ bannyi balɔɔt
40017023	ba bale bawwɔɔlmɛ, ɔzzanga ka bɛtɔm bɛkkyaat, vvenɛ ufungala ka lubbe ɔtaa ka kuddu.” Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ bappyeenɛ ning baang, bukee bunaangbɛ gaang gaang.
40017024	Jesus la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ baffunɛ ka Capernaum, batɔk-innamba Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm baffu ka ɛfɛɛn a Peter babapmɛ battɛ, “Ukopolo-ukopolo annyɔɔng unnyi mung innamba Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔɔ?”
40017025	Peter ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Iii.” Peter umiinɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ a ggwoon, Jesus ɔkɔɔm ɛtɔk ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ “Simon, annɔ attina nang? Nyinɔɔng ɔkkpɛɛnɛ innamba ka eddu babeet ɛkpansi ’yɔng? Bayini ɛkpansi faa bakekeen?”
40017026	Peter ɔttɛ, “Bakekeen bakkpɛɛnɛ.” Jesus ɔttɛ, “Kɔyyɛɛpɔyyɛɛp! ning ulenɛ kɛttɛ bayini ɛkpansi innamba ba bakkpɛɛ.
40017027	Ayyɔɔt ba iggyan ittɛ inaang kwa kutunnɛ balɔɔt ’bɔng mung. Amii assɛɛn ɔbaana ka libbwe. Appyɛɛk ɛsɛɛnabannyi ya ikeeng ya ale akaa ka kamma. Vvenɛ ayɛn sili wa ɔggbanɛ ka kikkpele innamba Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm anaam la annɔ. Asam sili ’wɔng baang amii akkpɛɛ inamba ayyɔɔt.”
40018001	Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang, balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus baffu ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ babapmɛ battɛ, “Mung nnyinɛ ɔttanɛ liggbenge ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm?”
40018002	Jesus ɔkkwɔɔ waantiti, ɔsammɛ, ubee ka lusso abbɛ ɔttɛ,
40018003	“Akkeyɔng ’kwɔng tɛ! Asinɛyɔng lafal annyɔɔng lifoolo assekeyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bwɔɔntiti, ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm baala amalyɔng.
40018004	Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔttanɛ liggbenge ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa uyilanɛ busook a wabbɛ, usseke tɛ̀ttɛ̀ waantiti ’wɔng mung.
40018005	Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa uwomonɛ waantiti ’wɔng ka lɛkɔɔl anaam, nzang uwomonɛ anaam.
40018006	“Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔnaangnɛ bwɔɔntiti basi kunaam liyila, kɔyyɛɛp ka asamnɛ kizzi, asiki ka kukook kwa lɛbaang, asikimɛ ka lukat asammɛ assɛɛn ka lihu.
40018007	Vvveeng ’wɔng vvenɛ ɔyɛn akama ka bɛfɛɛn ppwap bilenɛ baang bya bɛnaangnɛ balɔɔt basɛlɛ kiyila. Kɛssanga bɛfɛɛn byɔng baang bile bɛnaang kpɛtkpɛt. Ɔzzànga akama ule wa ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang wa ɔggyannɛ lilɔɔk nsɔng baang!
40018008	“Ulenɛ kɔbɔɔk annɔ ɔlɔk kikkpɔ annɔ kɛnaangwɔnɛ azzɔɔk lilɔɔk ’sɔng azzasɛ azzɔɔk. Kɔtta kɛyyɛɛp ka asɛlɛnɛ kɔbɔɔk la kikkpɔ ataa ka kuddu, lutini ayanganɛ kɔbɔɔk la kikkpɔ basamwɔ bamii bassɛɛn ka akama wa kɛfal a kɛfal.
40018009	Ulenɛ zzeen annɔ lɛnaangwɔnɛ anaang bubbi; kɔtta lɛyyɛɛp ka akpakalanɛzɛ azzɔɔk ayanga kuddu, lutini ayanganɛ zzeen laffa basamwɔ bassɛɛn ka lɔkɔɔn ka Hell.”
40018010	“Tɛ̀ttɛ́ alokoyɔng kɔlɔɔk la bwɔɔntiti ba sɛkɛsɛkɛ. Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ bayila-bɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm abbɛ ka libat bataa ka ɛfɛɛn a Dedde anaam ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
40018011	[Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ uffu ɔkkala balɔɔt ba bataaknɛ.]
40018012	“Attinayɔng nang? Ɔlɔɔt ɔyanganɛ lalɔp itɔɔn kubbwɔɔk, nnyɔn ɛfakala ɛtaakmɛ, ule ɔnaang nang? Vvenɛ ɔgbata lalɔp itɔɔn za lanna la itɔɔn ɔsɛlɔlɔp ɔkɔngɔ umii ɔggyan ya ɛtaaknɛ.
40018013	Ɔyɛnnɛyɛ, vvenɛ uggele gaang gaang, ka ɛtɔɔn ya ɛtaaknɛ ɛttanɛ lalɔp itɔɔn za lanna la itɔɔn ɔsɛlɔlɔp ya isinɛ lɛtaak.
40018014	Ssaawɔ annyɔɔng ka libat ngbaa ba ɔssɛ ɔggyan ɔttɛ waantiti vvɔn gbɔɔ ɔtaak.
40018015	“Ɔkpana annɔ ɔnaangnɛ bubbi utumwɔ, amii abwɔɔlɔmɛ bubbi bwa ɔnaangnɛ utumwɔ. Ɔzzànga akupmɛ ka wɛɛk atoloyɔng kutolo ’kwɔng baang annyɔɔng balɔɔt baffa kɛyɔɔng. Ɔgɔpɔlɔnɛ kwa alɔɔknɛ nzang uyilabong kwa annɔ. Akkwɔɔmɛ assɛɛn ka kkwɔɔt.
40018016	Ɔzzànga usinɛ kwa alɔɔknɛ lɛgɔpɔlɔ, akɔɔm ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ɔlɔk balɔɔt baffa amii akupmɛ nkwaaning itɛɛsɛ ’yɔng baang iffa ilɔɔknɛ, balɔɔt basan battɛ kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
40018017	Usinɛ kwa balɔɔt ’bɔng baang lɛgɔpɔlɔ asam kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng baang amii abwɔɔlɔ ka luzɔɔm. Usinɛ kwa lɛbbal lɛgɔpɔlɔ, anaangmɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt a lɔkaan lɔlɔk, ɔlɔk ɔtɔk-innamba.
40018018	“Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ nttɛ; Kɔlɔɔk duu kwa kulenɛ kwa lafɔɔ ka ɛkpansi ’yɔng, kɔssɛ kule kwa lafɔɔ ka libat. Kwa kusinɛ kwa lafɔɔ lile ka ɛkpansi ’yɔng mung kwa lafɔɔ ba kɔssɛ kule ka libat.
40018019	“Nbbalwɔyɔng lɛbwɔɔlɔ, ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ya annyɔɔng balɔɔt baffa alokonɛyɔng luttina ka bɔfɛɛn bwa azɔɔmnɛ aggyanyɔng, vvenɛ Dedde anaam ka libat ɔnaangbwɛ unnyiwɔyɔng.
40018020	Ka ɛfɛɛn a balɔɔt baffa, bakkyaat bataanɛ ka lɛkɔɔl anaam, anaam nssɛ nle baang la abbɛ.”
40018021	Ɔzzánga Peter uffu ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ, “Uyini, mung ɔlɔɔt ɔnaangnɛ bubbi utumnɛ nle nsɔɔkmɛ bikkpit bɛfang? Bikkpit bɛnnambɛkkyaat ɔɔ?”
40018022	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Maaye, bikkpit bɛnnambɛkkyaat lissi, ale asɔɔkmɛ nnɔ la lalɔp lanna la bikkpit zzɔɔp (70x7).
40018023	Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ile tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ubeet wa uttinanɛ kiffik a ikkpoko ya ilenɛ ka labɔɔk a babili ammɛ.
40018024	Utii ka lutte luffik annyɛ gbɔɔ, bakɔɔm ubili ammɛ vvɔn wa ulemɛnɛ la ippwoot a innɔ innɔ Naira baffu.
40018025	Ubili ’wɔng baang ikkpoko usi lɛyanga ya ule ɔtaknɛ ippwoot. Ɔzzánga abassɛ ammɛ ɔddabɛ ɔttɛ bakaamɛ la wanavva ammɛ la bwaan ammɛ bamii bataan. Bataan bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya ɔyanganɛ nkwaaning ikkpoko iffɔ ka ippwoot ’yɔng baang.
40018026	Bɔɔyi ’wɔng baang ukun laddu ka lusso abassɛ, ukkpengemɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Abbe luppyam vvenɛ ntak ippwoot annɔ la bwɔn la bwɔn.’
40018027	Ɔzzánga bɔɔyi ’wɔng baang ubbe abassɛ lɛttɔ, ɔtɔk ippwoot ’yɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔsɔɔkmɛ, ɔkkyaa mɛ ɔfɔngɔ umii.
40018028	“Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔgbata umii gbak la wabbɛ bɔɔyi wa ɔssɛnɛ ulemɛ ammɛ la bwaan ippwoot; ɔggbɔmɛ, uggbe ɔttɛ, ‘Ataknɛ bɛfɛɛn anaam bya alenɛnɛ la ippwoot.’
40018029	Wabbɛ a bɔɔyi ’wɔng ɔttɔ ka lisse, ukunmɛ laddu, ukkpengemɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Abbe luppyam vvenɛ ntakwɔ ippwoot annɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ.’
40018030	Ufim, ɔkaamɛ umii ɔssɛɛn ngbakkɔpɔ ɔttɛ ɔtaa bakang, ɔyɛn akama tɔttɔt ɔtak ippwoot ammɛ.
40018031	Babbɛ ibɔɔyi bayɛnnɛ kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng baang kɔssɔpbɛ gaang gaang, bafeele bamii ka ɛfɛɛn abassɛ abbɛ, babwɔɔlɔmɛ.
40018032	Ɔzzánga abassɛ abbɛ ɔkkwɔɔ bɔɔyi ’wɔng baang ɔmal ka tɔkɔlɔ a ggwoon, ɔttɛ, ‘Annɔ ubili wa asinɛ wa kɔlɔɔk lile ffet, nsɔɔkwɔ ikkpoko ’yɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ ya alenɛnɛ la ippwoot, ka akkpengenɛnɛ.
40018033	Tɛ nzang wa annyɔɔng ubili ɔssɛ ubbewɔ lɛttɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ annɔ abbenɛnɛ anaam lɛttɔ.’
40018034	Abassɛ abbɛ ’wɔng baang kɔssɔpmɛ gaang gaang, ɔkaa bɔɔyi ammɛ ’wɔng baang ɔssɛɛn ngbakkɔpɔ ɔttɛ ɔtaa bakang, ɔyɛn akama tɔttɔt ɔtak ippwoot ammɛ isaal ɔkkpɛlɛ.”
40018035	Jesus utele lɛttɔ ɔttɛ, “Dedde anaam ka libat ule ɔyapwɔyɔng akama ning baang kusiwɔnɛyɔng ka luppyam lissi asɔɔkyɔng Wannyɔɔng bubbi.”
40019001	Jesus ulenɛ bɛfɛɛn byɔng livve lɛlɔɔk, ɔgbata ka ɛkpansi a Galilee ɔssɛ ka lufoom a lɔyɔngɔ a Jordan gwa ggwɔn umii Judea.
40019002	Bɛkaan a balɔɔt ggbadam bikupmɛ, uttulabɛ bakang.
40019003	Balɔɔt a Pharisees bakɔɔm ibap, baffu ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus nkwaaning bassɛɛnmɛ ka kɔlɔɔk. Babapmɛ battɛ, “Mung Lafɔɔ ayyɔɔt layila mung ɔlɔɔt ɔggba wanavva ammɛ ka ɔnaangnɛ kɔlɔɔk kwa kusimɛnɛ lɛsaap ɔɔ?”
40019004	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Ba ataka akkwɔɔyɔng luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔɔ? Ka ussinɛ ka lutte, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangbɛ wanavva la waanwalam.
40019005	Ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, ‘Waanwalam vvenɛ ɔgbata ɔkɔngɔ abassɛ la abakka, umii ullu ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn la wanavva ammɛ. Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ baffa basseke ɔlɔɔt vvɔn.’
40019006	Balɔɔt baffa ba babɛlɛ lile, basseke ɔlɔɔt vvɔn. Ɔlɔɔt tɛ̀ttɛ́ ubbum bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ lɛsam utoolo ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn.”
40019007	Balɔɔt a Pharisees babapmɛ battɛ, “Bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ Moses unnyi lafɔɔ za kɛttɛ waanwalam ule ka ɔggbanɛ wanavva ammɛ, ɔkkpɔk luvva-luteele unnyi avva tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔggbamɛ?”
40019008	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Moses unnyiwɔyɔng lakke za kɛggba wanavva ka alenɛyɔng balɔɔt ba akoolonɛyɔng kikopolo kɔlɔɔk. Ɔzzànga ning baang kusi lile ka ussinɛ ka lutte a vveeng.
40019009	Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ, ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔggbanɛ wanavva ammɛ ka ɔtakanɛ la ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk limini, ɔtɔknɛ wanavva ɔlɔk, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔnaangbong bubbi.”
40019010	Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ balɔɔk la ammɛ battɛ, “Killu a wanavva la waanwalam kilenɛ ning kɔtta lɛyyɛɛp kɛtaa buyya.”
40019011	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Lukopolo ’gwɔng mung gwa ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ lissi, lule gwa balɔɔt ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛbɛ gwɛ linnyi.
40019012	Itɔk ile buu buu ya balɔɔt basinɛ bwanavva lɛtɔk. Balɔɔt balɔk ɔlɔɔmbɛ ning baang; balɔk babbɛ balɔɔt basanganɛbɛ idakɔp, balɔk bafim kɛtɔk a wanavva kwa Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Afɔngɔyɔng ɔlɔɔt wa ukkwoongnɛ ɔtɔk lukopolo ’gwɔng.”
40019013	Balɔɔt balɔk bakɔɔm bwɔɔntiti bafee Jesus, battɛ utelebɛ labɔɔk ammɛ, ɔssɛɛn luzɔɔm unnyibɛ, ɔzzánga balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ baggba balɔɔt ’bɔng baang.
40019014	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Afɔngɔyɔng bwɔɔntiti baffu ka ɛfɛɛn anaam, tɛ̀ttɛ́ atunuyɔngbɛ. Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ile ya kɛssanga balɔɔt tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ’sɔng mung.”
40019015	Jesus utelebɛ labɔɔk, ɔgbata.
40019016	Ɛkɛtɛ ɛdɔkɔ baang ya ɔlɔɔt uffunɛ ka Jesus ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo, mung nle nnaang bɔka budoddo tɛ́tt’t vvenɛ ntɔk kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal?”
40019017	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ abapnɛ lɔbap atum kɔlɔɔk kwa kɔyyɛɛpnɛ? Ule Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn kɛyɔɔng ka ɔyyɛɛpnɛ. Aloko lafɔɔ, aggyannɛ attɛ amal ka kuddu.”
40019018	Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ, “Lafɔɔ ’zɔzɔng?” Jesus Ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ awwɔɔl ɔlɔɔt; tɛ̀ttɛ́ akup wanavva ɔlɔɔt; Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ayip; Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akkala lɛlaak.
40019019	Atele ssakawɔ la ssaawɔ; Balɔɔt basaapwɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ asaapwɔnɛ kɛyɔɔng.”
40019020	Okolobya ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Nlokobong lafɔɔ ’zɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ, mung nbbal bɔka abbwɛ lɛnaang?”
40019021	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Aggyannɛ attɛ anaang affata, amii ataan bɛfɛɛn bya ayanganɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, asam ikkpoko annyi balɔɔt ba ɔbbɔlnɛbɛ. Vvenɛ ayanga kibeet ka libat. Avvenɛ ning baang lɛnaang, affu akupnɛ.”
40019022	Okolobya ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang uppyeenɛ ning baang ɔgbata la kɛbbɔl a livve ka ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt iyyɛɛp.
40019023	Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng, kukoolo lukoolo kɔsak tɛ́ttɛ́ uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt ufula ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
40019024	Nbbalwɔyɔng lɛbwɔɔlɔ nttɛ vvenɛ kukoolo uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt kifula ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔtta ɔgɔdɔ kɛmal ka lɛmma-ɔnnya.”
40019025	Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bappyeenɛ ning baang, kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ gaang gaang battɛ, “Nnyinɛ ule ukkwoong ɔsɛɛm ka ɛkɛtɛ yɔng baang?”
40019026	Jesus uyeek ɔppyɛɛkbɛ zzip ka isso ɔttɛ, “Nkwɔng mung kukoolo balɔɔt lukoolo, ɔzzànga ka labɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔlɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ kule kkpɛkɛlɛm.”
40019027	Peter ufeele ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Ppyɛɛk igbatabong bɛfɛɛn ayyɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ikɔngɔ, iffu ikupwɔ, mung ile ibbal ’bɔng lɛyanga?”
40019028	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Ppyɛɛk nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng, ɛkɛtɛ ya Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ule ɔtaa ka ugbaal-a-kibeet ammɛ ka ufaa kɛkkpa, annyɔɔng balɔɔt ’bɔng ba zzɔɔppabaffa mung ba akupnɛnɛyɔng anaam, vvenɛ assɛ ataayɔng ka igbaal-a-kibeet akaalyɔng kɛkaal ifɔɔn a Israel ya zzɔɔppiffa.
40019029	Ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn wa ɔgbatanɛ ssoon ammɛ ɔkɔngɔ, ɔlɔk etele ammɛ, ɔlɔk abassɛ, ɔlɔk abakka, ɔlɔk bwɔɔntiti ɔlɔk bɔtɔɔm ammɛ ka lɛttɔ anaam, vvenɛ ɔyanga bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng baang bikkpit lalɔp kubbwɔɔk ɔgbaa. Vvenɛ ɔbbal kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal lɛyanga ɔgbaa.
40019030	Balɔɔt ggbadam ba bale bakɔɔm ɛtɔk ka gedegede mung, vvenɛ basseke isimi. Ba bassekenɛ isimi ka gedegede mung, vvenɛ bakɔɔm ɛtɔk.”
40020001	“Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ile tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyanganɛ bɔtɔɔm, ɔfɔm lɔfɔm a lɔfɔm umii ɔtɔk balɔɔt ba bale banaangmɛ kɛnaang ka bɔtɔɔm.
40020002	Uyila kamma kinnyibɛ ikipili kɛssanga ssɔn ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ɔttɛ vvenɛ ukipilibɛ lalɔp a ikkobo lakkyaat ka livve. Ɔsangabɛ ɔtɔɔm ɔttɛ bamii banaang kɛnaang ka bɔtɔɔm ammɛ.
40020003	Ɔppyɛlɛ isimisimi umii ka kappya ka ikalangka ɔsɛlɛzzɔɔp. Ɔyɛn balɔɔt balɔk ka babeenɛ gbɔɔ.
40020004	Ɔzzánga ɔttɛ, ‘Annyɔɔng ngbaa assɛ amii anaangyɔng kɛnaang ka ɛbwɔɔma bɔtɔɔm. Vvenɛ nkipiliwɔyɔng doddo.’
40020005	Ɔzzánga bamii. Ka ikalangka zzɔɔppiffa la ka ikalangka ikkyaat ɔbbal ning baang lɛlɔɔk la balɔɔt balɔk.
40020006	Usseke ssup ɔffɔ ikalangka kubbwɔɔk ka umiinɛ ka kappya, ɔbbal balɔɔt balɔk lɛyɛn baang ka babeenɛ. Ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ abɛpɛyɔng kɛtɔm ’sɔng mung gbɔɔ asiyɔng bulɔk lɛnaang?’
40020007	Bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, ‘Ɔlɔɔt usinɛyɛlɛ lɛtɔk ka kɛnaang; kwakkwɛ.’ Ɔttɛ, ‘Annyɔɔng ɔgbaa amii anaangnɛyɔng kɛnaang ka bɔtɔɔm.’
40020008	“Kulele kɔnaangnɛ, uyini ɔkkwɔɔ uzzilɛttɔ ɔttɛ ɔkkwɔɔ banaang a kɛnaang ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ unnyibɛ ikipili abbɛ, ka ussinɛ ka balɔɔt ba bamalnɛ kɛnaang basseke isimi, uffu ɔffɔ ka balɔɔt ba bakɔɔmnɛ ɛtɔk bamal kɛnaang.
40020009	Balɔɔt ba battenɛ kɛnaang abbɛ ka ikalangka kubbwɔɔk ukipilibɛ lalɔp ikkobo lakkyaat.
40020010	“Ɔzzánga uffu ɔffɔ ka balɔɔt ba bakɔɔmnɛ ɛtɔk banaang kɛnaang batɔknɛ ikipili abbɛ, battina battɛ vvenɛ imii ka lusso. Abbɛ ngbaa ɔssɛ ukipilibɛ lalɔp ikkobo lakkyaat.
40020011	Batɔk ikkpoko abbɛ la lɔzzɔ la lɔzzɔ batum ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtɔknɛbɛ ka kɛnaang.
40020012	Battɛ, ‘Balɔɔt ba atɔknɛbɛ ka kɛnaang gedegede kulele mung, banaang kɛnaang ka awa vvɔn keem, akipilibɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ akipilinɛyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt ba iggbanɛ lissi lɔfɔm a lɔfɔm inaang kɛnaang ka luwee.’
40020013	Uyini bɔtɔɔm ɔppyɛlɛ ɔlɔɔt vvɔn kamma ɔttɛ, ‘Gɔpɔlɔ ɛnngwa anaam, isakwɔyɔng ba ntaka nzzi ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng. Annyɔɔng ayilanɛyɔng kwa kɛnaang a kɛnaang ka lalɔp ikkobo lakkyaat ka kɛtɔm.
40020014	Atɔk ikipili annyɔɔng afulayɔng. Nle ka nkipilinɛ balɔɔt ba nssumanɛ lɛtɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ nkipiliwɔnɛyɔng annyɔɔng.
40020015	Lakke ba nyanga za nnaangnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ nttinanɛ la ikkpoko anaam ɔɔ? Annyɔɔng kutunwɔyɔng ka nggwoomnɛ kɔlɔɔk ɔɔ?’ ”
40020016	Jesus utele lɛttɔ ɔttɛ, “Balɔɔt ba bassekenɛ isimi vvenɛ bakɔɔm ɛtɔk. Balɔɔt ba bakɔɔmnɛ ɛtɔk vvenɛ basseke isimi.”
40020017	Jesus ka ulenɛ ka kimii Jerusalem, ufeele la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ba zzɔɔppabaffa. Bale baang ka bassɛnɛ, Jesus ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ka lalup ɔttɛ,
40020018	“Gɔpɔlɔyɔng! Mung ile ka imiinɛ Jerusalem ka ɛfɛɛn a bale bakaa Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ, bannyi bazzilɛttɔ-bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la bakopolo-Lafɔɔ ba bale bazza kɛkaal ammɛ, battɛ ubbe.
40020019	Vvenɛ basammɛ bannyi ikanakana bannyɔɔkamɛ, batupmɛ, bakamamɛ bɛfɔl bakaka ka cross. Ɔzzànga ka bɛtɔm bɛkkyaat vvenɛ ufungala ka lubbe ɔtaa ka kuddu.”
40020020	Ɔzzánga abakka bwaan a Zebedee ba bwaanbwalam uffu ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus la bwaan ammɛ ukun Jesus laddu, ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ ɔnaangmɛ ammɛ budoddo.
40020021	Jesus ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ, “Aggyan ’bɔng?” Ammɛ ɔppyɛlɛ Jesus kamma ɔttɛ, “Ayila kamma attɛ bwaan anaam ’bɔng mung baffa vvenɛ bataa ka kɔbɔɔk-ɛlaabɔɔk annɔ la kɔbɔɔk-ɛbyakɔm annɔ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya ale àzzánga Ubeet.”
40020022	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Ba asan bwa abapnɛyɔng. Akkwoong mung avvayɔng ka ommonggo wa nle ka nvvanɛ ɔɔ?” Abbɛ bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, “Ikkwoong mung ivva.”
40020023	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Vvenɛ avvayɔng ka ommonggo anaam ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Ɔzzànga lakke ba nyanga za kɛsanga ɔlɔɔt wa ule ɔtaa ka kɔbɔɔk-ɛlaabɔɔk anaam la kɔbɔɔk-ɛbyakɔm anaam. Bɛtaa ’byɔng baang bile bya balɔɔt ba Dedde anaam ulenɛ lɛlɔngɔlɔ ulokobɛ.”
40020024	Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ba zzɔɔp bappyeenɛ ning baang, kutunbɛ la etele la etele ’yɔng baang, balɔɔt baffa.
40020025	Jesus ɔkkwɔɔbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, baffu babbi ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn ɔttɛ, “Asanyɔng lɔsan attɛyɔng bazzi-lɛttɔ bayanga lakke batta balɔɔt. Bazzi-lɛttɔ ’bɔng baang bakɔɔmnɛbɛ.
40020026	Nkkpa kɔnaang, ’kwɔng ning baang la annyɔɔng baala kule. Ulenɛ ka ɔlɔɔt annyɔɔng vvɔn ɔggyannɛ lɛbaang, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔkɔɔm ɛtɔk ɔ̀zzánga ubili babbɛ.
40020027	Ɔlɔɔt annyɔɔng vvɔn ɔggyannɛ kɛkɔɔm ɛtɔk, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔkɔɔm ɛtɔk ɔ̀zzánga ubili annyɔɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀
40020028	Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ, wa usinɛ liffu kɛggyan a latele ka labɔɔk a balɔɔt, uffu ɔttɛ ammɛ ɔ̀zzánga bɔɔyi abbɛ, nkwaaning ɔsam lɛfal ammɛ unnyi ɔkkala balɔɔt ppwap.”
40020029	Ka balenɛ ka kɛgbata ka Jericho, kɛkaan a balɔɔt ppwap ning kikup Jesus.
40020030	Bassi-ifim baffa badɔkɔ baang ka bataanɛ ka lufoom ɛtɔk. Bappyeenɛ battɛ Jesus ule ka ɔsaknɛ, babungu battɛ, “Waan a David, ibbewɔ lɛttɔ, Dedde!”
40020031	Kibbi ’sɔng baang bakkpabɛ lɛmmwɔɔl battɛ bataa zzum. Keem bakama ɔkama babungu bagaga battɛ, “Waan a David, ibbewɔ lɛttɔ, Dedde!”
40020032	Jesus ɔkɔɔng baang ubee, ɔkkwɔɔbɛ ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Aggyan attɛ nnaangwɔyɔng bɔng?”
40020033	Bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, “Dedde, iggyan ittɛ anaangyɛlɛ iyɛn!”
40020034	Jesus ɔppyɛɛkbɛ, babbemɛ lɛttɔ, ɔkɔɔm kɔbɔɔk usingibɛ ka zzeen, eseese bayɛn bafeele bakupmɛ.
40021001	Bakkɛtɛnɛ Jerusalem, baffu baffɔ Bethphage ka lɛttaal Olives. Jesus ɔsanga balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ baffa ɔttɛ bakɔɔm ɛtɔk bassɛ.
40021002	Ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Amiiyɔng ka killu sa lusso baang, vvenɛ ayɛnyɔng eyim ka basikinɛ la waan annyɛ baang. Akkyaayɔngyɛ afeenɛyɔng.
40021003	Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔlɔɔkwɔnɛyɔng kɔlɔk, abwɔɔlɔmɛ attɛyɔng, ‘Uyini ɔggyannɛbyɛ.’ Vvenɛ ɔfɔngɔwɔyɔng eseese.”
40021004	Nkwɔng kɔnaang nkwaaning kwa uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔknɛ kɔnaang ka lɔkkwɔɔn ka ɔttɛnɛ,
40021005	“Abwɔɔlɔyɔng tɔkɔlɔ a ssala Zion Ubeet annyɔɔng ule ka uffunɛ ukupwɔyɔng, ule ɔppwa-luppyam ɔlɔɔt, ule uttele eyim, la waan annyɛ.”
40021006	Ɔzzánga balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ’bɔng baang bakɔɔm bassɛ, bamii banaang kwa Jesus ɔlɔɔknɛbɛ ɔttɛ banaang.
40021007	Bakɔɔm eyim la waan annyɛ baffu. Baggbolo iwɔkɔlɔ abbɛ bavvoongyɛ la awaan. Jesus ukut utteleyɛ.
40021008	Balɔɔt ggbadam ballɔt iwɔkɔlɔ abbɛ ka ɛtɔk, balɔk babbɔk liteet-uddi ballɔt ka ɛtɔk.
40021009	Kɛkaan sa kɛssɛnɛ ka lusso a Jesus la sa kɛssɛnɛ kikupmɛ ka isimi babungu battɛ, “Abunguyɔng Waan-a-David! Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangmɛ ppyɛɛ, ammɛ wa uffunɛ ka lɛkɔɔl a Uyini! Kibungu kile sa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm!”
40021010	Jesus ɔffɔnɛ Jerusalem, ɛfɛɛn ebubutu. Balɔɔt babap battɛ, “Baang nnyinɛ ee?”
40021011	Bɛkaan ’byɔng baang babwɔɔlɔbɛ battɛ, “Uwɔng ulenɛ Jesus, Uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, wa ussinɛ Nazareth ka ɛkpansi a Galilee.”
40021012	Jesus ufeele umii ka tɔkɔlɔ a Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm; ɔggba balɔɔt ba bataanɛ bɛfɛɛn la ba balɛɛpnɛ-ɔlɛɛp ka tɔkɔlɔ a Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Usikili ikkpokkolo balɔɔt ba bafoolonɛ balɔɔt ikkpoko uggup, la ikkpokkolo ya balɔɔt ba bataanɛ idugbɔnnyɛ.
40021013	Ɔttɛ, “Bakkpɔkbong ka luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm battɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛ, ‘Ggwoon anaam bale bakkwɔɔgwɛ ggwoon a luzɔɔm mung, asikiliyɔngbong gwɛ lusseke kiddumu bassip!’ ”
40021014	Bassi-ifim la bannɔk-a-kikkwu baffu bakupmɛ ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uttulabɛ.
40021015	Bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm, la bakopolo-Lafɔɔ kutunbɛ gaang gaang ka bayɛnnɛ bɛfɛɛn a bikɛɛlɛ bya ɔnaangnɛ. Bwɔɔntiti babungu bakkwa ka tɔkɔlɔ a Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm battɛ, “Abunguyɔng, Waan a David.”
40021016	Bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la bakopolo-Lafɔɔ balɔɔk la Jesus battɛ, “Mung appyee mung kwa balɔɔknɛ baang ɔɔ?” Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Iii, nppyee mung. Mung ba ataka akkwɔɔyɔng kwa Luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ ɔɔ? lɔttɛ, ‘Akopoloyɔngbong bwɔɔntiti ba lisse la ba eddu tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bale babungu ɔlɔɔt kibungu sa lɔkkwɔɔn.’ ”
40021017	Jesus ɔgbata ka lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang umii ukkwunu Bethany.
40021018	Ɔffɔnɛ libbessolo ka ulenɛ ka ɛtɔk a kɛppyɛlɛ kimii tɔkɔlɔ a ssala, buwɔɔng busaapmɛ.
40021019	Ɔyɛn kɛssɛ ka lufoom ɛtɔk. Ɔbɛnɛ, umii ka lɛsan assɛ. Umiinɛ, likkpo gbɔɔ usi lɛyɛn. Ule livva livva keem. Ɔzzánga ɔzɔɔmsɛ ɔttɛ, “Kɛfal a kɛfal likkpo ba abɛlɛ lɛwɔm!” Eseese lɛsan a kɛssɛ ’zɔng baang linikili.
40021020	Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bayɛnnɛ ning baang, kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ, babap battɛ, “Bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ lɛsan a kɛssɛ ’zɔng baang linikili like-like ning?”
40021021	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Akkeyɔng ’kwɔng tɛ! Ulenɛ ka ayanganɛyɔng kiyila asiyɔng lɛkangala, akkwoong mung anaangyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ nnaangnɛ la kɛssɛ ’sɔng mung. Nkwɔng baang kɛyɔɔng lissi, gɔɔ akkwoong mung alɔɔk la ekpok attɛyɔng ‘Gbata mung abbumwɔ kɛyɔɔng allɔt bakang ka lihu’ Vvenɛ ebbumyɛ kɛyɔɔng ɛllɔt.
40021022	Ayanganɛyɔng kiyila, vvenɛ akɔɔmyɔng luzɔɔm ayangayɔng bwa aggyannɛyɔng.”
40021023	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛ isimi-simi uffu ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ule baang ka ukopolonɛ, bazzilɛttɔ-bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la bagɛlɛnya Jews baffu battɛ, “Nyinɔɔng unnyiwɔnɛ lakke za kɛnaang a bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng?”
40021024	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Fɔngɔyɔng ssii, nbapwɔyɔng lɔbap ggwɔn. Appyɛlɛnɛnɛyɔng kamma, vvenɛ nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng lakke za nyanganɛ nkɔɔm nnaang bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung.
40021025	John lakke kɛnaang-a-baptizim lassimɛ yang? Lassimɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm faa ka ɔlɔɔt?” Ɔzzánga bazzɔɔk bɛkangala abbɛ abbɛ battɛ, “Mung ile ilɔɔk nang? Iyilanɛ ittɛ lassimɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, vvenɛ ɔttɛ ‘Anaang nang asinɛyɔng kwa John liyila?’
40021026	Ilɔɔknɛ ittɛ lassimɛ ka ɔlɔɔt, ba isan bwa balɔɔt bale banaang ka ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ balenɛ liyila battɛ John uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
40021027	Bappyɛlɛ Jesus kamma battɛ, “Ayyɔɔt ba isan.” Jesus ɔttɛ, “Ɔzzànga anaam baala nssɛ nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng ka ɛfɛɛn a lakke za nkɔɔmnɛ nnaang bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng lassinɛnɛ.”
40021028	“Attinayɔng nang gedegede mung? Ɔlɔɔt ɔdɔkɔ baang wa ɔfɔɔnnɛ bwaanabwalam baffa. Ufeele umii ukup waan ammɛ wa utumalɔɔt ɔttɛ, ‘Amii anaangnɛ kɛnaang ka bɔtɔɔm mmwɔɔn’.
40021029	Awaan ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, ‘Ka kimii ba nle’. Ɔmmɛ ssup usikili luttina ufeele umii kɛnaang ka bɔtɔɔm.
40021030	Abassɛ ufeele umii ukup waan wa vvɔn ɔbbal ning baang lɛlɔɔk. Waan ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, ‘Kɔyyɛɛppɔyyɛɛp, Dedde’. Ɔzzànga usi limii.
40021031	Mung bwɔɔn ’bɔng baang baffa, uwɔwɔng ɔnaangnɛ kwa abbassɛ ɔttɛnɛ ɔnaang?” Battɛ, “Waan wa utumalɔɔt.” Jesus ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ batɔk innamba la ikkpàlà bale ka bamiinɛ ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bakɔngɔwɔyɔng annyɔɔng ka isimi.
40021032	John, Ɔnaang-a-baptizim, uffu ɔyɔɔwɔyɔng ɛtɔk ya bbwak ya bukupnɛ, afimyɔng kwa ammɛ liyila. Batɔk innamba la ikkpàlà bayila kwa ammɛ. Gɔɔ ka ayɛnnɛyɔng ’kwɔng asiyɔng ippyam lisikili ayilayɔng kwa ammɛ.”
40021033	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Agɔpɔlɔyɔng ifɛɛt ilɔk. Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ɔdɔkɔ baang wa uwoopnɛ bɔtɔɔm, ɔbba kikoom ukkpit bwɛ. Ɔtɔɔk lubbe gwa bale bakaam batak bassɛɛn. Ɔbɔɔk ggwoon gwa bakat-a-bɔtɔɔm. Ɔsam bɔtɔɔm unnyibɛ kɔkat. Ɔgbata ka ssala umii kɔssɛ.
40021034	Ɛkɛtɛ liyaat ɛffɔnɛ, ɔtɔɔm babili ammɛ ɔttɛ bamii batɔk etini liyaat ya ammɛ bafeemɛ.
40021035	Bakat-a-bɔtɔɔm ’bɔng baang bakaa babili ammɛ. Batup vvɔn. Bawwɔɔl wa vvɔn. Batɔɔp wa vvɔn lattaal.
40021036	Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔbbal babili ammɛ balɔk lɛtɔɔm ba battanɛ ba uttenɛ lɛtɔɔm, bakat-a-bɔtɔɔm ’bɔng baang babbalbɛ kɛssanga akama ’sɔng baang lɛyɔɔ.
40021037	Ka lakuma, ɔsanga waan ammɛ ɔbbal lɛtɔɔm, ɔttɛ, ‘Bayɛnnɛ waan anaam, vvenɛ batelemɛ ka lɔkkwɔɔn’.
40021038	Bakat-a-bɔtɔɔm ’bɔng baang bayɛnnɛ waan abassɛ abbɛ, balɔɔk abbabbɛ battɛ ‘Mung waan a uyini bɔtɔɔm tɛ, feele iwwɔɔlmɛyɔng nkwaaning isamyɔng bɔtɔɔm ilɛkɛ.’
40021039	Ɔzzánga babwɔɔpmɛ tangam bazzɔɔk kukupa bɔtɔɔm bappyɛl bawwɔɔl.”
40021040	Jesus ɔbap ɔttɛ, “Ɛkɛtɛ ya uyini bɔtɔɔm uffunɛ ule ɔnaang bakat-a-bɔtɔɔm ’bɔng baang nang?”
40021041	Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, “Vvenɛ ɔwwɔɔl banaang-a-bubbi ’bɔng baang; ɔsam bɔtɔɔm unnyi bakat-a-bɔtɔɔm balɔk ba bale bannyimɛ etini liyaat ya ammɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya bbwak.”
40021042	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Kɛtɔm kɛlɔk ba ataka akkwɔɔyɔng kwa luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ ɔɔ? ‘Lɛttaal ’zɔng baang za ɔbɔɔk-a-ggwoon ɔttɛnɛ ba lɛyyɛɛp, lile za gbɔɔ, lɛppyɛlɛbong lɛzzanga lɛttaal za lɛyyɛɛpnɛ lɛsak. Nkwɔng mung uyini ɔnaangnɛ tɛ; kule kɔlɔɔk a bikɛɛlɛ kɔsak.’ ”
40021043	Jesus ɔlɔɔk ɔgbaa ɔttɛ, “Ɔzzànga nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔggbawɔyɔng ka Itutum ammɛ, ɔsanga balɔɔt ba bale bawɔm lakkpo za doddo ɔppyɛlɛ uffu ɔssɛɛn.
40021044	[Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔttɔnɛ ka libat a lɛttaal ’zɔng, vvenɛ ɔbɔbɔlɔ usseke lakkpɔ lakkpɔ. Ulenɛ lɛttaal ’zɔng lɛttɔnɛ lɛbɛtɛmɛ, vvenɛ likookmɛ usikili ubut.]”
40021045	Bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm, la balɔɔt a Pharisees bappyeenɛ ifɛɛt ya Jesus ɔssanɛ baang, basan battɛ ɔlɔɔk utumbɛ abbɛ.
40021046	Ɔzzánga babummɛ kɛkaa. Keem kibbi ’sɔng baang kɛbbwɔpɔbɛ, basi lɛbbɔ bakaamɛ ka balɔɔt ’bɔng battina battɛ Jesus uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
40022001	Jesus ɔbbal ifɛɛt ’yɔng lɛkɔɔm ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt ɔttɛ,
40022002	“Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ile tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ubeet wa ɔbamanɛ bɛfɛɛn a libbeel uloko awaan wa waanwalam.
40022003	Ɔtɔɔm babili ammɛ ɔttɛ bamii babumala baffu-libbeel. Ɔzzánga baffu-libbeel bafim kiffu.
40022004	Ɔbbal babili balɔk lɛtɔɔm ɔttɛ, ‘Amii abwɔɔlɔyɔng baffu-libbeel attɛyɔng nbamabong bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ nlokobɛ, bwakuzzi ɔkkpɛlɛ bubalbong. Bawwɔɔlbong balam igɔdɔ la bitook a igɔdɔ bya biggbengenɛ gaang. Affuyɔng libbeel bɔk.’
40022005	Keem balɔɔt ba babwɔɔlɔnɛbɛ libbeel basi lɛgɔpɔlɔ. Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔt ɔgbata umii lɛkkɔ za ammɛ. Balɔk bagbata bamii ka itɔɔm abbɛ, balɔk bagbata bamii ka ssoon a lippya abbɛ.
40022006	Balɔk bakaa babili ’bɔng batup bawwɔɔl.
40022007	Ubeet kutunmɛ gaang gaang ɔtɔɔm isodya ammɛ bamii bawwɔɔl balɔɔt ’bɔng baang, ba bawwɔɔlnɛ babili ammɛ. Bassɛɛn killu abbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ kɛkkɔm.
40022008	Ɔkkwɔɔ babili ammɛ libbeel ɔttɛ, ‘Nbamabong bɛfɛɛn a libbeel nvve, ɔzzànga balɔɔt ba nbwɔɔlɔnɛbɛ bafimbong latele.
40022009	Amiiyɔng ka itɔk ka itɔk abwɔɔlɔyɔng ɔlɔɔt duu wa ayɛnnɛyɔng uffu libbeel.’
40022010	Ɔzzánga babili ammɛ bafeele bamii itɔk itɔk babwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba bayɛnnɛ mkkpa babbɔl, bayyɛɛp, nkwaaning balɔɔt ggbadam baffu ggwoon a libbeel luyipi.
40022011	“Ubeet ufeele umii kikoolo balɔɔt ba baffunɛ libbeel, ɔyɛn ɔlɔɔt wa usinɛ uwɔkɔlɔ libbeel lɛwɔkɔlɔ.
40022012	Ubeet ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Ɛnngwa anaam, anaang nang tɛ́ttɛ́ amal mung asi uwɔkɔlɔ libbeel lɛwɔkɔlɔ?’ Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang lɛmmwɔɔl usi lɛzza.
40022013	Ɔzzánga ubeet ɔbwɔɔlɔ ibɔɔyi ammɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Ggbɔmɛyɔng izzi ka labɔɔk la bukkpɔ asamnɛyɔng azzɔɔkyɔng ka vveeng ka kisul; ɔtaa baang ɔkkwa ɔkɔɔm uzzi lasaal.’ ”
40022014	Jesus utele lɛttɔ ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ɔkkwɔɔnɛ balɔɔt, ɔkkwɔɔ ggbadam; ɔzzànga ɔffɔnɛ ka ɔsanganɛ, ɔsanga ssup.”
40022015	Balɔɔt a Pharisees bamii banaang likup za bale bakɔɔm ibap bassɛɛn Jesus ka kɔlɔɔk.
40022016	Ɔzzánga batɔɔm balɔɔt a kɔssɛ abbɛ balɔk la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Herod bamii ka ɛfɛɛn Jesus battɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo isan lɔsan ittɛ ale ɔlɔɔt wa ayyɛɛpnɛ bɛnaang, akopolo balɔɔt lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk atum kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uttinanɛ la ɔlɔɔt. Ba akeke kwa balɔɔt battinanɛ. Wɔ ba kɔbɛtɛ ka kwa balɔɔt baggyannɛ battɛ bale.
40022017	Abwɔɔlɔyɛlɛ bbɔk, annɔ attina nang atum Lafɔɔ ayyɔɔt? Mung ikkpɛɛ innamba ayyɔɔt ka labɔɔk a uzzilɛttɔ a Rome faa ifɔngɔ?”
40022018	Jesus ɔggba babbu ittina abbɛ lɛsan. Ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Annyɔɔng banaang-a-lalaak ’bɔng, mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ abumnɛyɔng kɛssɛɛn ka kɔlɔɔk?
40022019	Ayɔɔnɛyɔng sili wa akkpɛɛnɛyɔng innamba!” Bakɔɔm sili bafeemɛ.
40022020	Ɔzzánga ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Baang lusso nyinɔɔng la lɛkɔɔl ammɛ ka sili ’wɔng baang?”
40022021	Abbɛ bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, “Uzzilɛttɔ a Rome.” Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔttɛ, “Annyiyɔng uzzilɛttɔ a Rome bwa bulenɛ bwa ammɛ, annyiyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bwa bulenɛ bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
40022022	Bappyeenɛ ning baang kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ, bagbata bakɔngɔmɛ.
40022023	Kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang ssɔn, balɔɔt a Sadducees balɔk baffu ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus. (Abbɛ balenɛ balɔɔt ba battɛnɛ ɔlɔɔt ulenɛ libbe ka lubbe, ba ɔbɛlɛ lifungala.)
40022024	Babwɔɔlɔmɛ battɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo, Moses ukopoloyɛlɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtakanɛ bwɔɔn lɛfɔɔn ubbenɛ, etele ammɛ ɔtɔk wanavva ubbu ’wɔng baang, ɔlɔk bwɔɔn ɔfɔɔn unnyi ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang wa ulenɛ libbe.’
40022025	Ɔzzànga etele la etele balɔɔt bannambakkyaat badɔkɔ ballu mung. Ɔkɔɔm-ɛtɔk abbɛ ɔtɔk wanavva, ubbe ɔkɔngɔ wanavva ammɛ ka ɔtakanɛ bwɔɔn lɛfɔɔn. Wanavva ammɛ ufeele umii ullu la etele ulam.
40022026	Kɛssanga kɔlɔɔk ’sɔng kɛbbal etele ammɛ lɛnaang. Ɔbbal libbe ɔkɔngɔ wanavva ’wɔng baang. Ɔbbal etele ulam wa vvɔn lillu tɔttɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ bannambakkyaat babbe basaal, bwɔɔn basi lɛfɔɔn bannyi etele abbɛ wa ɔgɛlɛnya.
40022027	Ka lakuma, wanavva ’wɔng baang ɔssɛ ubbe.
40022028	Mung ka kɛtɔm sa babbu bale bafungala ka lubbe bappyɛlɛ bataa ka kuddu, wanavva ’wɔng baang ule ule wa nnyinɔɔng ka ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ balemɛnɛ lɛtɔk?”
40022029	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Bbwak baleyɔng ka nakanaka! Kussi ka asinɛyɔng luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛsan ɔlɔk lakke ammɛ.
40022030	Ɔffɔnɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya babbu bale bafungala ka lubbe, bàssèkè ka bale bataa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bayilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka libat. Killu ba kɛbɛlɛ lile.
40022031	Ulenɛ kwa babbu kifungala ka lubbe; ba ataka akkwɔɔyɔng kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng ɔɔ? Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛ,
40022032	‘Anaam nlenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm a Abraham, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm a Isaac, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm a Jacob.’ Ning baang ulenɛ kɛttɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyanganɛ bakokolo la babbu; kwakkwɛ baang babbu bale bafungala!”
40022033	Kibbi ’sɔng baang bappyeenɛ ning baang kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ gaang gaang ka lukopolo ammɛ ’gwɔng baang.
40022034	Balɔɔt a Pharisees bappyeenɛ battɛ Jesus ɔbɛtɛbong balɔɔt a Sadducees ka kɛlɔɔk, baggba ka ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn.
40022035	Ɔlɔɔt abbɛ vvɔn wa ukopolonɛ-Lafɔɔ ubum ɔttɛ ɔkɔɔm lɔbap ɔssɛɛn Jesus ka kɔlɔɔk.
40022036	Ɔbap Jesus ɔttɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo, mung lafɔɔ ’zɔzɔng lattanɛ liggbenge?”
40022037	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “ ‘Atele Uyini, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm annɔ, la luppyam annɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ la lɛfɛkɛlɛ annɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ, la luttina annɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ.’
40022038	Uwɔng ulenɛ lafɔɔ za lɛbaang. Azzɛ lalenɛ lafɔɔ ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
40022039	Lifɔɔ za lissɛnɛ liggbenge likup ’zɔng baang lile littɛ, ‘Wannyɔɔng ɔsaapwɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ asaapwɔnɛ kɛyɔɔng.’
40022040	Lafɔɔ a Moses la lukopolo bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lutum lafɔɔ ’zɔng mung laffa.”
40022041	Balɔɔt a Pharisees baggbanɛ ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn, Jesus ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ,
40022042	“Attinayɔng nang atumyɔng Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ? Ussi ka kikkwu sa nyinɔɔng?” Abbɛ battɛ, “Ussi ka kikkwu a David.”
40022043	Jesus ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kunnyi David bikɔɔm pya kɛkkwɔɔ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ ‘Uyini’? David ɔttɛ,
40022044	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔk la Uyini anaam ɔttɛ: Taa mung ka kɔbɔɔk-ɛlabɔɔk anaam tɔttɔt nsam balɔɔt a kɔfɔk annɔ nlokowɔ asing bukkpɔ.’
40022045	David ɔkkwɔɔmɛnɛ ‘Uyini’: ɔnaang nang tɛ́ttɛ́ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ ule waan a David?”
40022046	Ɔlɔɔt wa úkkwoongnɛ ɔppyɛlɛ Jesus lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng usi lile. Ka ussinɛ ka kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang ɔlɔɔt usi lɛbɛlɛ lɛbbɔ ɔbap Jesus lɔbap.
40023001	Jesus ɔlɔɔk la kibbi ’sɔng baang la balɔɔt-a-kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ,
40023002	“Bakopolo-Lafɔɔ la balɔɔt a Pharisees balebong babwɔɔlɔ ifɛɛt a Lafɔɔ a Moses.
40023003	Ayilayɔng duu bwa babwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng; ɔzzànga tɛ̀ttɛ́ akeetyɔng eleme abbɛ. Kwa bakopolonɛ, akkwɛ ba banaang.
40023004	Basam latɔkɔ za lalɔɔpnɛ bafeek balɔɔt, gɔɔ luttina gwa kɛyaambɛ latɔkɔ ’sɔng baang ba bayanga.
40023005	Banaang bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ nkwaaning balɔɔt bayɛn. Ppyɛɛk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɛfɛɛn bya bassɛɛn lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm basam baggbɔ ka lattɔ lusso la labɔɔk biggbengenɛ. Iwuulu abbɛ ilɔm iffɔ kang.
40023006	Baggyan bɛtaa bya doddo ka libbeel la idda mitin.
40023007	Baggyan battɛ balɔɔt bawomobɛ la latele ka itɔk a kappya, bakkwɔɔbɛ ‘Bakopolo-lukopolo’.
40023008	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ bakkwɔɔwɔ ukopolo-lukopolo ka ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng alenɛyɔng ɔkpana la ɔkpana, ayangayɔng ukopolo-lukopolo vvɔn.
40023009	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akkwɔɔyɔng ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ka ɛkpansi mung ‘Dedde’, ka ayanganɛyɔng Dedde vvɔn keem ka libat.
40023010	Gɔɔ tɛ̀ttɛ́ bakkwɔɔwɔ ‘Uzzilɛttɔ’ ka Uzzilɛttɔ annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ ulenɛ Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn keem wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ.
40023011	Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn wa ɔttanɛ liggbenge ka bɛzzɔkɔ annyɔɔng mung ule ule ubili annyɔɔng.
40023012	Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔnaangmɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt, ule uyila busook. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa uyilanɛ busook vvenɛ ɔ̀zzánga uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt.”
40023013	“Annyɔɔng bakopolo-Lafɔɔ la balɔɔt a Pharisees! Bakkala lalaak ’bɔng! Vvenɛ ayɛnyɔng akama ka afɛɛnnɛyɔng lɛmma kikkwu Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm; Ɔssɛbibbit usi ɛtɔk lɛyɛn. Ɔzzànga, annyɔɔng biini ba amalyɔng ka tɔkɔlɔ. Balɔɔt ba babumnɛ kɛmal ba afɔngɔyɔng bamal![
40023014	“Vvenɛ ayɛnyɔng akama gaang gaang annyɔɔng bakopolo-Lafɔɔ la balɔɔt a Pharisees, bakkala lalaak ’bɔng! Kwa annyɔɔng kɔsaalwɔyɔngbong! Alokoyɔng bwanavva babbu asokoloyɔng kizzi isak, atɔkyɔngbɛ ssala akɔɔmyɔng; anaangyɔng buggboggbo ka kɛzɔɔm a luzɔɔm gbɔlɔng. Akama wa annyɔɔng ule ɔtta lɛbbɔl.]
40023015	“Vvenɛ ayɛnyɔng akama gaang gaang annyɔɔng bakopolo-Lafɔɔ la balɔɔt a Pharisees, bakkala lalaak ’bɔng! Awookyɔng iyɔngɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ akum aggyanyɔng ɔlɔɔt wa ule uyila kwa annyɔɔng. Ayɛnmɛnɛyɔng, anaangmɛyɔng ɔnaang bubbi ɔsakwɔyɔng annyɔɔng biini. Vvenɛ amiiyɔng ka lɔkɔɔn ɔkkpɛlɛ.
40023016	“Vvenɛ ayɛnyɔng akama annyɔɔng bassi-ifim a bakat-ikata ’bɔng. Akopolo attɛyɔng ‘Ɔlɔɔt uyimnɛ Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lafɔɔ mɛ ba lakaa. Ɔzzànga uyimnɛ ikkpoko ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lafɔɔ lakkwoong mung lakaamɛ.’
40023017	Annyɔɔng bazingizingi ’bɔng, bassi-ifim a bɛfɛɛn! Bɔng buttanɛ liggbenge, ikkpoko faa Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm gwa lɔnaangnɛ ikkpoko ile ka latele.
40023018	Abbalyɔng likopolo attɛyɔng, ‘Ɔlɔɔt uyimnɛ labun Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lafɔɔ mɛ ba lakaa, ɔzzànga uyimnɛ lɛsɔɔk za labun-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lafɔɔ lakkwoong mung lakaamɛ’.
40023019	Anaang nang azizinginɛyɔng ning! Bɔng buttanɛ liggbenge, lɛsɔɔk faa labun Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm za lanaangnɛ lɛsɔɔk lɛyanga latele?
40023020	Ppyɛɛk nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng! Ɔlɔɔt uyimnɛ labun Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, uyimbong ɔgbaa la lɛsɔɔk za lilenɛ baang.
40023021	Ɔlɔɔt uyimnɛ Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, uyimbong ɔgbaa la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ullunɛ baang.
40023022	Ɔlɔɔt wa uyimnɛ libat, uyimbong ugbaal-a-kibeet Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtaanɛ ka ugbaal ’wɔng baang ɔgbaa.
40023023	“Vvenɛ ayɛnyɔng akama gaang gaang annyɔɔng bakopolo-Lafɔɔ la balɔɔt a Pharisees, bakkala lalaak ’bɔng! Akkwoongyɔng kinnyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm waan a kufaak a bɛfɛɛn a lifaat annyɔɔng keem afimyɔng kitele lukopolo gwa lɔkkwɔɔn gwa lutumnɛ lafɔɔ: tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk, kibbelɛttɔ la bɔllɛ luppyam. Uwɔng ulenɛ kɔlɔɔk kwa ale akkoopyɔng. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ afimyɔng bɛlɔk usseke bɛlɔk.
40023024	Annyɔɔng bassi-ifim a bakat-ikata ’bɔng! Asangayɔng esing ka tɔkɔlɔ batak annyɔɔng azzɔɔkyɔng, appyɛɛ amɛɛlyɔng ɔgɔdɔ!
40023025	“Vvenɛ ayɛnyɔng akama gaang gaang annyɔɔng bakopolo-Lafɔɔ la balɔɔt a Pharisees, bakkala-lalaak ’bɔng! Azzaayɔng immonggo la bɛkkpala ka isimi abbyɛ usseke tɔkɔlɔ ɔtaa nyɔk la bɛfɛɛn bya akɔɔmnɛyɔng kɛssɔp-a-bɔfɛɛn la likke ayangayɔng.
40023026	Annyɔɔng bassi-ifim ’bɔng, Pharisees! Atteyɔng bwa bulenɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ ommonggo lɛzzaa, bwa bulenɛ ka vveeng vvenɛ bukkpɔlɔ!
40023027	“Vvenɛ ayɛnyɔng akama gaang gaang, annyɔɔng bakopolo-Lafɔɔ la balɔɔt a Pharisees, bakkala lalaak ’bɔng! Aleyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lilli za bappwɔɔngnɛzɛ ulata abente. Liyyɛɛp lɛppyɛɛk ka vveeng, ɔzzànga ka tɔkɔlɔ ayɛn bɛkɔp a babbu balɔɔt.
40023028	Annyɔɔng aleyɔng ning baang. Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔppyɛɛkwɔnɛyɔng ka kkwɔɔt aleyɔng balɔɔt ba doddo, ɔzzànga ka tɔkɔlɔ ulewɔyɔng kɛnaang a lalaak la bubbi.”
40023029	“Vvenɛ ayɛnyɔng akama gaang gaang annyɔɔng bakopolo-Lafɔɔ la balɔɔt a Pharisees bakkala-lalaak ’bɔng! Anaangyɔng lalli za doddo alokoyɔng bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, alɔngɔlɔyɔng libat a lalli balɔɔt ba ɔdɔkɔnɛ ɔyyɛɛpbɛ ka bukokolo.
40023030	Attɛyɔng, ‘Bulenɛ ka iggbanɛ lɛfal ka ɛkɛtɛ balɔɔt ayyɔɔt ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ, nzang ba inaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ abbɛ badɔkɔnɛ banaang bawwɔɔl bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.’
40023031	Ayilayɔngbong attɛyɔng annyɔɔng bwaan a balɔɔt ba bawwɔɔlnɛ bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm!
40023032	Ɔkkaamwɔyɔng, akeeleyɔng kɛnaang a issaawɔ annyɔɔng ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ battenɛ.
40023033	Annyɔɔng bwaan-izzɔkɔ ’bɔng! Anaang nang attina attɛyɔng kɛkaal wɔyɔng baala kɛbbɔl amiiyɔng ka Hɛɛl?
40023034	Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng vvenɛ ntɔɔm bappyee-kutolo la basan-a-kɔlɔɔk la bakopolo-lukopolo nfeewɔyɔng. Ɔzzànga vvenɛ awwɔɔlyɔng balɔk, akamayɔng balɔk bɛfɔl akakayɔng ka Cross, atupyɔng balɔk ka idda mitin, aggbayɔng balɔk ka laffɛ ka laffɛ.
40023035	Akkwɛ baang kɔnaangnɛ akama wa bawwɔɔlnɛ balɔɔt ba basinɛ kkwɛ lɛsan, ule ɔttɔ ɔffɛlɛwɔyɔng annyɔɔng ka ussinɛ ka kɛwwɔɔl sa bawwɔɔlnɛ Abel wa usinɛ kkwɛ lɛsan tɔttɔt uffu ɔffɔ ka Zachariah, waan a Berechiah, wa awwɔɔlnɛyɔng ka bɛzzɔkɔ a Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la labun-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
40023036	Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng ka lɔkkwɔɔn nttɛ akama wa balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ ule ka lɛttɔ balɔɔt ba bɛtɔm ’byɔng mung.”
40023037	“O, Jerusalem, Jerusalem! Annɔ awwɔɔlnɛ bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, atɔɔp balɔɔt ba balɔɔknɛ kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔɔmnɛ ufeewɔ lattaal. Nttɛ nzang nkkwɔɔ balɔɔt annɔ nssɛɛn ka kkwɔɔt ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ tɛ̀ttè bikɔkɔ biwupnɛ bwɔɔn appyɛ. Ɔzzànga ba ayilanɛ.
40023038	Vvenɛ amma Ggwɔɔn-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm akɔngɔ, lisseke ubbu-a-ssala.
40023039	Nbwɔɔlɔwɔ nttɛ; ka ussinɛ mung umii ka lusso: nɛ ba abɛlɛ lɛyɛn, ning ning alɔɔk attɛ ‘Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangmɛ ammɛ wa uffunɛ ka lɛkɔɔl Uyini ppyɛɛ!’ ”
40024001	Jesus ule ka kɛgbata ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, keem balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ baffu bayɔɔmɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ babɔɔknɛ Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
40024002	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Iii, ayɛnyɔng bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ doddo. Ɔzzànga nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ waan a lɛttaal zzɔn gbɔɔ wa ule usseke ka ggwoon ’gwɔng mung baala ule. Lutini lɛttaal la zzɔn za lilenɛ baang vvenɛ lɛbɔl sukusuku lɛllɔt.”
40024003	Jesus ule baang ka ɔtaanɛ ka lɛttaal Olives, balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ baffu babapmɛ ka wɛɛk battɛ, “Abwɔɔlɔyɛlɛ ɛkɛtɛ ya bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ bile bɛnaang. Mung mbɔng bule bunaang buyɔɔyɛlɛ isan ittɛ ɛkɛtɛ kiffu annɔ la lakpeke a vveengodde ɛffɔbong.”
40024004	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Akatyɔng, tɛ̀ttɛ́ balɔɔt balɔk banaangwɔyɔng agbigbiniyɔng.
40024005	Balɔɔt ggbadam vvenɛ baffu ka lɛkɔɔl anaam, battɛ ‘Anaam nlenɛ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ’ badɛm balɔɔt ggbadam bagbigbini.
40024006	Vvenɛ appyeeyɔng lɔsap a lɛkɔɔng kɛtɛkɛtɛ mung, kuttu azzɛ fulu-fulu. Ɔzzànga gɔpɔlɔyɔng: Tɛ̀ttɛ́ kɔbbwɔpɔwɔyɔng. Bɛssanga a lilɔɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ abbyɛ baang vvenɛ bɛnaang, ɔzzànga ’kwɔng baang lissi kulenɛ lakpeke a vveeng.
40024007	Lɔkaan ngwakang vvenɛ ballu gwakang; ellu yakang vvenɛ ballu la yakang. Buwɔɔng vvenɛ buttɔ gaang gaang. Ɛkpansi vvenɛ ɛnnyɛkɛ ebutu la ɛfɛɛn la ɛfɛɛn.
40024008	Bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ bile bɛtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɔssɔp ikeeng bwa wanavva uppyeenɛ ka kɛppwɔlɔ imala.
40024009	“Balɔɔt vvenɛ bakaawɔyɔng, basam bannyi balɔɔt ba bale bayapwɔyɔng akama, bawwɔɔlwɔyɔng. Vvenɛ atunyɔng ɔssɛbibit ’wɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ ka lɛttɔ anaam.
40024010	Balɔɔt ggbadam vvenɛ bakkyaa kiyila abbɛ bafɔngɔ ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang. Vvenɛ bazzi issɛ abbabbɛ, batunbɛ abbɛ-abbɛ kɛyɔɔng.
40024011	Bakkaalalaak ba battɛnɛ abbɛ bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ batuma ggbadam, banaang balɔɔt ppwap bagbigbini.
40024012	Uwɔng ulenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bubbi bule buwaala, kɛsaap a balɔɔt ggbadam kɛkkpɛɛm.
40024013	Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyanganɛ kɛsaap ’sɔng baang ɔffɔ ka lakpeke vvenɛ ɔtaa ka kuddu.
40024014	Ɔzzánga Kuttu-budoddo Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ kule la kikopolo ka vveengodde ka kulenɛ itɛɛsɛ ɔssɛbibit; tɛ́ttɛ́ bɔk lakpeke laffu.
40024015	“Vvenɛ ayɛnyɔng ‘Lakkpi-za-labbɔlnɛ’, za uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔzzanganɛ Daniel ɔlɔɔknɛ ka labeenɛ ka labun-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.” (Ɔkkwɔɔkwɔɔ, akke tɛ!)
40024016	“Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang balɔɔt ba balenɛ ka Judea vvenɛ bamma babbulu ikpok.
40024017	Ɔlɔɔt wa ulenɛ ka libat a ggwoon ammɛ, baala usini umii ɔsam bɛfɛɛn ka tɔkɔlɔ a ggwoon.
40024018	Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ulenɛ ka bɔtɔɔm ammɛ, isimisimi ba ɔbɛlɛ lɛppyɛlɛ umii ɔsan iwɔkɔlɔ ammɛ.
40024019	Bwanavva-zzɛɛm la ibakka bwɔɔn ba sɛkɛsɛkɛ vvenɛ bayɛn akama.
40024020	Azɔɔm akkwɔɔyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm nkwaaning asiyɔng lɛtta ammayɔng akɔngɔyɔng ssala ka ɛkɛtɛ a lukook ɔlɔk ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ.
40024021	Kɔlɔɔk kwa ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔngbaang vvenɛ kɔbbɔl gaang gaang kɔtta lilɔɔk za lissinɛ linaang ka ussinɛ ka lutte ɛkpansi uffu udum ka kɛtɔm-a-mmwɔɔn; kɔlɔɔk kɔlɔk baala kɔnaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ akkwɛ baang.
40024022	Ɔzzanga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggba bɛtɔm ’byɔng baang lɛzza: usinɛ ning baang lɛnaang, ɔlɔɔt wa ule uddu ba ule. Ka lɛttɔ balɔɔt ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ nkkpa kɔnaang, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔzza bɛtɔm.
40024023	“Ka ɛkɛtɛ yɔng bang ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔkwɔnɛyɔng ɔttɛ, ‘Ppyɛɛk Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ’ ɔlɔk ɔttɛ, ‘Ppyɛɛkmɛ kang’, tɛ̀ttɛ́ ayilamɛyɔngkwɛ.
40024024	Bakkala-lalaak ba battɛnɛ abbɛ balɔɔt ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ ɔlɔk abbɛ bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm; bakkwoongnɛ, vvenɛ banaang bɛfɛɛn ggbadam bya bɛkɛɛlɛnɛ balɔɔt nkwaaning balɔɔt ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ bayila kwa abbɛ.
40024025	Gɔpɔlɔyɔng! Nkka wɔyɔngbong lɛbwɔɔlɔ tɛ́ttɛ́ ɛkɛtɛ ɛffɔ tɛ.
40024026	“Ɔlɔk, ulenɛ ka balɔɔt bale babwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng battɛ, ‘Ppyɛɛk, utii ka kasɛkɛ atingating’ tɛ̀ttɛ́ amiiyɔng baang, ɔlɔk balɔɔk battɛ ‘Pyɛɛk ule mung ka uddumunɛ’ tɛ̀ttɛ́ ayilayɔngbɛkwɛ.
40024027	Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ule uffu tɛ̀ttɛ̀ immwalang ya ifakanɛ libat ka ussinɛ ka lusso gwa livve-lɛttanɛ umii ɔffɔ ka lusso gwa livve-luwee lipitinɛ.
40024028	“Lutini ɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ya ubbu-ɛsɛɛn ubbenɛ umini, idɛlɛ iggba lattɔ baang.”
40024029	“Lilɔɔk sa bɛtɔm byɔng baang lisaalnɛ ɛsaal ɛsaal, livve-luwee vvenɛ lizum, ettuma vvenɛ ba ɛbɛlɛ lɛllaat, bwaanittuma vvenɛ baffaat ka libat baffu battɔ ka lisse. Lakke za libat vvenɛ lannyɛkɛ ɛfɛɛn ɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ.
40024030	Eleme ya ɛnaangnɛ isan ittɛ Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ule ka uffunɛ vvenɛ ɛtta ka libat. Ifɔɔn ɔkkpɛlɛ ya ilenɛ ka ɛkpansi vvenɛ ikkwa. Vvenɛ bayɛn Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ule ussi ka libat la ikkpálá lukpaaggbeede uffu la lakke la buppwolo bwa lɛbaang.
40024031	Iffi ya lɛbaang vvenɛ iwɔl. Vvenɛ ɔtɔɔm bayilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ ba bassinɛ ka lagook ɛkpansi azzɛ lanna, bamii bakkwɔɔ balɔɔt ba ulenɛbɛ lɛsanga ka ussinɛ ka lɛttɔ ɛkpansi za zzɔn umii ɔffɔ ka za zzɔn baffu baggba ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn.
40024032	“Afɔngɔ lɛsan a kɛssɛ likopolowɔyɔng kukele. Bɛbɔɔk a kɛssɛ bɛppwɔtnɛ, livva libil, kittenɛ kɛkkwɔlɔ a livva, asanbong attɛ usɔngɔ ɔkkɛtɛbong.
40024033	Kule ning baang. Ɛkɛtɛ ayɛnnɛ bɛfɛɛn mbyɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ, asan attɛ ɛkɛtɛ ɛffɔbong Uyini utii kɛtɛkɛtɛ.
40024034	Akkeyɔng tɛ! Bɛfɛɛn byɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ bɛnaang bong tɛ́ttɛ́ balɔɔt ba balenɛ ikokolo gedegede mung babbe ɔkkpɛlɛ.
40024035	Libat la ɛkpansi vvenɛ bɛsak bimii, ɔzzànga lɛmmwɔɔl anaam baala lɛsak.
40024036	“Nkkpa kɔnaang, ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsannɛ livve ’zɔng baang la ɛkɛtɛ yɔng baang ba ule. Gɔɔ bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka libat, gɔɔ Awaan: Abassɛ kɛyɔɔng ɔsannɛ.
40024037	Kiffu a Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ kile kɛtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɔlɔɔk kwa kɔdɔkɔnɛ kɔnaang ka ɛkɛtɛ a Noah.
40024038	Kule kɔtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɛtɔm mbyɔng bakang bya isimi ka ɛlɔlɔ ɛtakanɛ liffu; balɔɔt bazzinɛ lizzi, bavva kɛvva, bwaanbwalam batɔk la bwanavva tɔttɔt uffu ɔffɔ ka kɛtɔm sa Noah ɔmalnɛ ka akkpaat.
40024039	Basi lɛsan kwa kɔnaangnɛ ɔddɔkɔddɔkɔ ɛlɔlɔ effu ɛmɛɛlbɛ. Kule kɔtaa ning baang ka kɛtɔm sa Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ule uffu.
40024040	Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang, balɔɔt baffa balenɛ ka kɛnaang ka bɔtɔɔm, vvenɛ basam vvɔn bagbata, usseke vvɔn ɔtaa baang kɛyɔɔng.
40024041	Bwanavva baffa bale bale ka kikook a bɛfɛɛn. Vvenɛ basam vvɔn bagbata, usseke vvɔn.
40024042	Akatwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng ka ale asiyɔng lɛsan kɛtɔm sa Uyini annyɔɔng ule uffu.
40024043	Akkeyɔng tɛ! Bulenɛ ka uyini a ssala ɔsannɛ ɛkɛtɛ ya bassip bale baffu, nzang ɔtaa kkwetkkwet, baala uyila bassip babwɔɔtmɛ ggwoon bamal ka tɔkɔlɔ.
40024044	Kwakkwɛ baang annyɔɔng ɔgbaa ale abama akatyɔng ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ule uffu ka ɛkɛtɛ ya asinɛyɔng zzeen litele.
40024045	“Uwɔwɔng ulenɛ ɔsan-a-kɔlɔɔk a bɔɔyi ɔlɔɔt wa utelenɛ abbassɛ? Ammɛ ulenɛ wa abassɛ unnyimɛnɛ kizzi-lɛttɔ ibɔɔyi, ɔttɛ unnyibɛ kazzi ka ɛkɛtɛ ya bbwak.
40024046	Bɔɔyi ’wɔng baang vvenɛ uggele gaang gaang ka abassɛ ule ɔppyɛlɛ ɔyenmɛ ka ɔnaangnɛ kwa ɔttɛnɛ ɔnaang.
40024047	Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng ka lɔkkwɔɔn nttɛ abassɛ ammɛ vvenɛ ɔsam bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya ɔyanganɛ unnyimɛ kɛppyɛɛk.
40024048	Ɔzzànga ulenɛ bɔɔyi wa ɔbbɔlnɛ eleme vvenɛ uttina kɛyɔɔng ɔttɛ, ‘Dedde anaam baala ɔkka lɛppyɛlɛ’.
40024049	Vvenɛ ubee kitup a babbɛ. Uzzi kazzi, ɔvva batak la bavva-batak.
40024050	Abassɛ bɔɔyi ’wɔng baang ule ɔppyɛlɛ ka kɛtɔm sa usinɛ zzeen litele, usi littina utum.
40024051	Abassɛ vvenɛ ɔmmwangmɛ ikaal ka kkwɔɔt zɛkɛzɛkɛzɛkɛ ɔnaangmɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ banaangnɛ babbɔl a bɛnaang. Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang vvenɛ ɔkkwa, uzzi lasaal.
40025001	“Ka kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang, Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ile ile tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bwanabwanavva zzɔɔp, ba bakɔɔmnɛ itinika bamii kiddu uyini libbeel.
40025002	Ba kubbwɔɔk badɔkɔ bazingizingi, ba bassekenɛ basan a kɔlɔɔk.
40025003	Ba bazizinginɛ, basam itinika abbɛ usseke bannɛ basi lɛkɔɔm, bakeke kwa kɛsaal.
40025004	Ba basannɛ kɔlɔɔk bakɔɔm bannɛ bakeke kwa kɛsaal.
40025005	Uyini libbeel usi lɛkka liffu, bwaan a bwanavva ’bɔng baang, bilaa biyɛkɛlɛbɛ, balaa.
40025006	“Kɛtɔm kɛppwabong ka bappyeenɛ kibungu battɛ, ‘Uyini libbeel uffubong, affu awomomɛyɔng.’
40025007	Bwanabwanavva ’bɔng baang ba zzɔɔp bafungala bannyɛkɛ itinika abbɛ.
40025008	Ba bazizinginɛ balɔɔk la basannɛ kɔlɔɔk battɛ, ‘Anaangyɔng waan a bannɛ annyiyɔngyɛlɛ bɛɛ? Itinika ayyɔɔt ile ka izumnɛ.’ Bwanabwanavva ba basannɛ kɔlɔɔk bafim battɛ,
40025009	‘Maaye, bannɛ isi lɛkɔɔm ikkwoon kamma annyɔɔng. Amii alɛɛpyɔng ba annyɔɔng biini ka ggwoon-a-kappya’.
40025010	Ɔzzanga bazingizingi a bwanabwanavva ’bɔng baang bafeele bamii kɛlɛɛp a bannɛ. Bamiinɛ, uyini libbeel ɔffɔ. Bwanabwanavva ba kubbwɔɔk ba basannɛ kɔlɔɔk bamal ka ggwoon a libbeel la ammɛ, battulu lɛmma bafɛɛn.
40025011	“Ɔmmɛnɛ bwanabwanavva ’bɔng bakang ba bazingizinginɛ bappyɛlɛ baffu. Bakkwɔɔ battɛ, ‘Dedde, awongoloyɛlɛ lɛmma, imal.’
40025012	Ammɛ walam ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, ‘Wɔyɔng ba nsan ka lɔkkwɔɔn.’ ”
40025013	Jesus utele lɛttɔ ɔttɛ, “Akatwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng ka ussinɛ mung, ka ale asiyɔng livve ’zɔng baang ɔlɔk ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang lɛsan.”
40025014	“Ka kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang, Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ile ile tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt wa ule ka ɔgbatanɛ ka ssala umii kɔssɛ. Ɔkkwɔɔ ibɔɔyi ammɛ ɔsam bɛfɛɛn ammɛ usekelebɛ.
40025015	Unnyi ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔt tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ule ukkwoong ɔkɔɔm. Unnyi wa vvɔn innɔ-okkpoko zzɔɔppiffa la kufaak. Wa vvɔn unnyimɛ innɔ-okkpoko kubbwɔɔk. Wa ussekenɛ isimi unnyimɛ innɔ-okkpoko iffa la kufaak; ɔgbata, umii kɔssɛ.
40025016	Bɔɔyi ammɛ wa unnyimɛnɛ innɔ-okkpoko zzɔɔppiffa la kufaak ɔkɔɔmyɛ, ɔssɛ kappya, ɔsanga isak a innɔ-okkpoko zzɔɔppiffa la kufaak ɔgbaa.
40025017	Bɔɔyi ammɛ wa unnyimɛnɛ innɔ-okkpoko kubbwɔɔk ɔsanga isak a innɔ-okkpoko kubbwɔɔk ɔgbaa.
40025018	Bɔɔyi ammɛ wa unnyimɛnɛ innɔ-okkpoko iffa la kufaak ufeele umii ɔtɔɔk lubbe, ɔsam ikkpoko ’yɔng baang, ulli.
40025019	“Ulenɛ lɛsak lɛmmɛ, abassɛ ibɔɔyi ’yɔng baang ɔppyɛlɛ. Ɔkkwɔɔbɛ ɔbap isak ya balenɛ lɛyanga ka ikkpoko ya unnyinɛbɛ.
40025020	Bɔɔyi wa ɔtɔknɛ innɔ-okkpoko zzɔɔppiffa la kufaak, ɔmal ɔsam ikkpoko umii ukkpelemɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Adɔkɔ annyinɛ innɔ-okkpoko zzɔɔppiffa la kufaak tɛ dedde, ppyɛɛk innɔ-okkpoko ’yɔng zzɔɔppiffa la kufaak ilenɛ isak ya nsanganɛ.’
40025021	Abassɛ kɔkɛɛlɛmɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Anaang doddo, annɔ alenɛ bɔɔyi wa doddo. Ka akkwoongnɛ akɔɔm bwaan ikkpoko ’yɔng anaang ikkpoko ya lɛbaang, vvenɛ nnyiwɔ ikkpoko ya lɛbaang kɛppyɛɛk. Affu kaang ning ka tɔkɔlɔ, itul laggele anaam, iggele.’
40025022	Bɔɔyi ammɛ wa unnyimɛnɛ innɔ-okkpoko kubbwɔɔk ɔmal umii ɔttɛ, ‘Dedde anaam, annyinɛ innɔ-okkpoko kubbwɔɔk. Innɔ-okkpoko ya kubbwɔɔk ’yɔng ilenɛ ya nzzinɛ isak tɛ.’
40025023	Abassɛ abbɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Anaang doddo, annɔ bɔɔyi wa doddo. Ka akkwoongnɛ akɔɔm ikkpoko ya utiti anaang ikkpoko ya lɛbaang, vvenɛ nnyiwɔ ikkpoko ya lɛbaang kɛkɔɔm. Affu kaang ning ka tɔkɔlɔ, itul laggele anaam, iggele.’
40025024	Bɔɔyi ammɛ wa unnyimɛnɛ innɔ-okkpoko iffa la kufaak ɔmal, umii ɔttɛ, ‘Dedde anaam, nsan lɔsan nttɛ ale ɔlɔɔt wa akoolonɛ eleme. Ayaat liyaat ka ɛfɛɛn a asinɛ liwoop. Affa lakkpo-bɛssɛ ka ɛfɛɛn asinɛ lɛkɔɔn.
40025025	Ɔdɔkɔ ɔbbwɔpɔnɛ lɔbbwɔpɔ ɔzzánga nsam ikkpoko annɔ nlup ka lisse. Yɛn bɔfɛɛn annɔ.’
40025026	Ɔzzánga abassɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Ubbu bɔfɛɛn, ɔkpɛkkpɛlɛ bɔfɛɛn! Asan mung attɛ nyaat liyaat ka ɛfɛɛn a nsinɛ liwoop, nffa lakkpo-bɛssɛ ka ɛfɛɛn a nsinɛ lɛkɔɔn.
40025027	Kɔyyɛɛp. Tɛ nzang assɛɛn ikkpoko anaam ka bank. Nzang mung isak ittabong issɛɛnnɛ.
40025028	Tɔkyɔng ikkpoko ammɛ, annyiyɔng ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyanganɛ innɔ-okkpoko zzɔɔpiffa la kufaak.
40025029	Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ wa ɔyanganɛ bɔfɛɛn vvenɛ ɔyanga ɔgbaa, vvenɛ ɔyanga buddumɛ busseke. Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa usinɛ bulɔk lɛyanga, waan ezuku wa ɔyanganɛ vvenɛ bakup batɔk.
40025030	Kwa uzingizingi a bɔɔyi ’wɔng mung, asammɛ azzɔɔkyɔng ka kisul ka vveeng ɔtaa baang ɔkkwa ɔkɔɔm uzzi lasaal.’
40025031	“Ka ɛkɛtɛ ya Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ule uffu tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ubeet la bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ule ɔtaa-ɔtaa ka ugbaal a kibeet ammɛ.
40025032	Balɔɔt ɛkpansi ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ baggba ka lusso ammɛ. Vvenɛ ɔbɛngɛlɛbɛ lakup laffa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔkat-itɔɔn ɔssangnɛ itɔɔn usseke bakele-ibal.
40025033	Vvenɛ uloko itɔɔn ka kɔbɔɔk-ɛlaabɔɔk, bakele ibal ka ɛbyakɔm.
40025034	Ubeet ’wɔng baang vvenɛ ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt ba kɔbɔɔk-ɛlaabɔɔk ɔttɛ, ‘Annyɔɔng alenɛyɔng ba Dedde ulewɔnɛyɔng ppyɛɛ lɛnaang. Affu amal yɔng ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ya ulenɛ lɛggba lɛlɔngɔlɔ ulokowɔyɔng ka lutte a vveeng.
40025035	Buwɔɔng busaapnɛ; annyinɛyɔng kazzi nzzi. Bannyi basaapnɛ; annyinɛyɔng nvva. Ndɔkɔ ukekeen; atɔknɛyɔng ka laggele.
40025036	Ndɔkɔ kɛkɔɔ; akwulanɛyɔng ikkwa. Ka ɔffaaknɛnɛ; appyɛɛknɛyɔng. Ka nlenɛ ka igbakkɔpɔ; akoolonɛyɔng.’
40025037	Balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ kwa bbwak vvenɛ bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, ‘Uyini, ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔyɔng elenɛ ya iyɛnwɔnɛ ka buwɔɔng busaapwɔnɛ, innyiwɔ kazzi. Ɔlɔk ka bannyi basaapwɔnɛ, innyiwɔ bannyi avva?
40025038	Ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔyɔng elenɛ ya iyɛnwɔnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ukekeen, ittɔngwɔ, issɛɛn ka ssala. Ɔlɔk iyɛnwɔ kɛkɔɔ, innyiwɔ ikkwa, akwula?
40025039	Ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔyɔng elenɛ ya iyɛnwɔnɛ ka ngbakkɔpɔ ɔlɔk usiwɔ lɛppwa; iffu ikoolowɔ?’
40025040	Ubeet ’wɔng baang vvenɛ ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, ‘Ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ya anaangnɛyɔng lilɔɔk ’sɔng mung, annyiyɔng bakee-bwɔɔn; anaang annyinɛyɔng anaam.’
40025041	“Uvvenɛ; usikili, ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt ba kɔbɔɔk-ɛbyakɔm ɔttɛ, ‘Nsɔɔng amii assekenɛyɔng. Annyɔɔng alenɛyɔng ka nzɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛttɔ. Nsɔɔng amiiyɔng ka akama lɔkɔɔn gwa lɛbaang gwa babamanɛ baloko Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm a kuyeeng la bayilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ.
40025042	Ndɔkɔ buwɔɔng; kazzi asinɛyɔng linnyi. Bannyi basaapnɛ; afimnɛyɔng kinnyi, nvva.
40025043	Ndɔkɔ ukekeen; afimnɛyɔng kɛttɔng kɛssɛɛn ka ssala. Ndɔkɔ kɛkɔɔ, afimnɛyɔng ikkwa kikwula. Ndɔkɔ ka kisi lɛppwa, asinɛyɔng likoolo. Ndɔkɔ ka igbakkɔpɔ, asinɛyɔng likoolo.’
40025044	Vvenɛ bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, ‘Uyini, ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔyɔng elenɛ ya iyɛnwɔnɛ ka buwɔɔng busaapwonɛ ɔlɔk iyɛnwɔ ka bannyi basaapwɔnɛ, ɔlɔk iyɛnwɔ ka alenɛ ukekeen ɔlɔk kɛkɔɔ, ɔlɔk iyɛnwɔ ka usiwɔnɛ lɛppwa, ɔlɔk iyɛnwɔ ka tɔkɔlɔ ngbakkɔpɔ tɛ́ttɛ́ isiwɔ littele?’
40025045	Ubeet ’wɔng baang vvenɛ ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, ‘Ppyɛɛk nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng! Ka afimnɛyɔng bakee-bwɔɔn littele, afimnɛyɔng anaam kittele oo.’
40025046	Vvenɛ ɔggba balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bamii ka akama wa kɛfal a kɛfal. Balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ eleme ya doddo vvenɛ bataa ka kuddu yoyyoyyo.”
40026001	Jesus uvvenɛ bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ likopolo, ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ,
40026002	“Asanyɔng lɔsan attɛyɔng usseke bɛtɔm bɛffa Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ kassolo. Vvenɛ basam Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ bannyibɛ bakama bɛfɔl ka Cross.”
40026003	Ɔzzánga bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la bagɛlɛnya balɔɔt a Jews baffu badudda ka ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn ka ugala Caiaphas, Uzzilɛttɔ-luzɔɔm wa lɛbaang.
40026004	Batini tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bale banaang bakaa Jesus ka wɛɛk bamii bawwɔɔl.
40026005	Balɔɔk abbabbɛ battɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ inaangyɔngkwɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ kazzi; nzang balɔɔt vvenɛ bàllù.”
40026006	Ka Jesus ulenɛ ka ssala Simon wa ɔffaal ɔnaangmɛnɛ, wa ullunɛ ka Bethany,
40026007	wanavva ussi bakang la bilim a bannɛ ba bakkaamnɛ kappya uffu. Usikili ɔllɔt Jesus ka lɛttɔ, ka ulenɛ baang ka kazzi.
40026008	Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus bayɛnnɛ ning baang, kutunbɛ babap battɛ, “Mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ abɛpɛ bannɛ ’bɔng mung gbɔɔ ning baang?
40026009	Tɛ nzang asam bannɛ ’bɔng baang ataan ka ikkpoko ggbadam annyi balɔɔt ba ɔbbɔlnɛbɛ.”
40026010	Jesus uppyeenɛ ning baang, ɔttɛ, “Akatayɔng wanavva ’wɔng baang kɔlɔɔk kwabɔng? Ɔnaang kɔlɔɔk kwa doddo kwa kɔyyɛɛpnɛ lɔyyɛɛp bbit, unnyinɛ.
40026011	Ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng ale aleyɔng mung la balɔɔt ba ɔbbɔlnɛbɛ, ɔzzànga anaam la annyɔɔng baala nle ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
40026012	Kɛllɔt a bannɛ sa ɔllɔtnɛnɛ mung, ɔlɔngɔlɔnɛ kkwɔɔt ɔkat kɛtɔm-a-kullu anaam.
40026013	Akkeyɔng nkwɔng tɛ! Ɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ɛkpansi ya bale bakopolo lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, vvenɛ bakke kwa wanavva ’wɔng mung babwɔɔlɔ kwa ɔnaangnɛ.”
40026014	Ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ Jesus vvɔn wa ɔzzanganɛ Judas Iscariot ufeele umii ka ɛfɛɛn a bazzilɛttɔ-bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm.
40026015	Ɔttɛ, “Ale annyinɛyɔng ’bɔng usseke nkaa Jesus nfeewɔyɔng?” Ɔzzánga bakkwoon lɔlɔp la Naira zzɔɔp, batɔk bannyimɛ.
40026016	Judas ussi ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang ɔggyan ɛtɔk ya ɔfɛɛtnɛ Jesus unnyibɛ bakaa.
40026017	Ka ɔkɔɔm ɛtɔk a kɛtɔm sa banaangnɛ kazzi kwa basinɛ yeast lɛssɛɛn, balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus baffu babapmɛ battɛ, “Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ kwa annɔ ibama ilokowɔ ka yang!”
40026018	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Amiiyɔng ka tɔkɔlɔ a ssala, ka ssala ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ɔlɔk, abwɔɔlɔmɛyɔng attɛyɔng, ‘Ukopolo-lukopolo ɔttɛ, Ɛkɛtɛ ammɛ ɛffɔbong, balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ la ammɛ biini vvenɛ bazzi Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ ka ssala annɔ.’ ”
40026019	Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus banaang ning baang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔnɛbɛ. Banaang Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ ’kwɔng baang.
40026020	Kulele kɔnaangnɛ, Jesus la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ baffu bataa bazzi kazzi ’kwɔng baang.
40026021	Bale baang ka kazzi: Jesus ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ule mung wa ule ka uzzinɛ issɛ anaam.”
40026022	Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ luppyam lɔzzabɛ. Basikili babapmɛ la vvɔn la vvɔn battɛ, “Ka lɔkkwɔɔn anaam lissi ka akkwɔɔnɛ ɔɔ, Uyini?”
40026023	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt wa iddɔknɛ ulɔlɔ vvɔn la anaam, ule ka uzzinɛ issɛ anaam.
40026024	Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ ubbe tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ vvenɛ ubbe. Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa uzzinɛnɛ issɛ vvenɛ ɔyɛn akama wa ɔsaknɛ. Kɔdɔkɔ kɔyyɛɛp ka ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang businɛ kɛfal liffu!”
40026025	Judas, uzzi-issɛ a Jesus, ufeele ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Ka lɔkkwɔɔn akkwɔɔnɛ anaam ɔɔ Uyini?” Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Annɔ alɔɔknɛ ning.”
40026026	Badɔkɔ baang ka kizzi kazzi, Jesus ɔsam brɛɛd; ɔssɛɛn luzɔɔm a luwomo; ɔlɔmnɛ ɔbbɔk ɔtan balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Atɔk azziyɔng, ’wɔng ulenɛ ɛkkpakkwɔɔt anaam.”
40026027	Ɔsam ommonggo, ɔzɔnɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang, ɔsam unnyi balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Avvayɔng, ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng.
40026028	Uwɔng ulenɛ linnyi anaam sa lilenɛ kɛbɛtɛ-kɛnnɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Linnyi sa littanɛnɛ ka lɛttɔ kɛsɔɔk a bubbi balɔɔt ggbadam.
40026029	Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ batak ba nbɛlɛ lɛvva tɔttɔt ɔffɔ kɛtɔm sa nle nvva ufaa abbɛ la annyɔɔng ka Itutum a Dedde Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
40026030	Bavvenɛ basoom kisoom bagbata bamii ka libat a lɛttaal Olives.
40026031	Jesus ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Ka kɛtɔm sa mmwɔɔn, ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng vvenɛ amma akɔngɔnɛyɔng nsseke kɛyɔɔng. Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, ‘Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔwwɔɔl ɔkat-itɔɔn, itɔɔn ikyakyama.’
40026032	Ɔzzànga nlenɛ lifungala ka lubbe vvenɛ nkɔɔm ɛtɔk nmii Galilee.”
40026033	Peter ufeele ɔlɔɔk la Jesus ɔttɛ, “Baala nmma nkɔngɔwɔ, mkkpa balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ bamma!”
40026034	Jesus ɔlɔɔk la Peter ɔttɛ, “Akke tɛ! Bong tɛ́ttɛ́ balangkɔkɔ bakɔɔl kɛtɔm-a-mmwɔɔn, vvenɛ akalanɛ bikkpit bɛkkyaat; attɛ, nɛ ba asan.”
40026035	Peter ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Baala nttɛ wɔ ba nsan mkkpa ndɔk ule kibbe la annɔ.” Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ bassɛ balɔɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Peter ɔlɔɔknɛ.
40026036	Nkwɔng kɔsaalnɛ, Jesus ufeele la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ umii ka ɛfɛɛn ya ɛzzanganɛ Gethsemane. Ɔffɔnɛ bakang ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Ataayɔng mung; anaam nmii kang, nssɛɛn luzɔɔm.”
40026037	Ɔsam Peter la bwaan a Zebedee baffa, ɔkɔɔm umii. Bukee la akama bunaangmɛ.
40026038	Ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Bukee buttalanɛbong ka luppyam naanga buwwɔɔlnɛ. Abeeyɔng mung ikatyɔng.”
40026039	Uzuma ssup umii ka lusso, ɔmɛkɛlɛ ɔttɔ, ukun laddu, ugupu lusso ka lisse, ɔssɛɛn luzɔɔm ɔttɛ, “Dedde, kulenɛ bbwak, asam ommonggo ’wɔng mung assekenɛ, ɔzzànga ba nggyan nttɛ nnaang kwa anaam nggyannɛ, nggyan nttɛ nnaang kwa annɔ aggyannɛ.”
40026040	Uvvenɛ; ɔppyɛlɛ, uffu ukup balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ’bɔng baang bakkyaat, ɔyɛnbɛ ka bilaa. Ɔlɔɔk la Peter ɔttɛ, “Bɔng bunaangwɔnɛyɔng annyɔɔng balɔɔt bakkyaat asiyɔng likkwoong ataayɔng kwetkwet, akatyɔng akalangka vvɔn?
40026041	Akat, akɔɔm, azɔɔmyɔng, nkwaaning basi likkwoong bafɛɛtwɔyɔng bassɛɛn ka kɔlɔɔk. Luttina lulewɔyɔng baang; ɔzzànga kkwɔɔt limɛɛmwɔyɔngbong.”
40026042	Jesus ɔbbal lifeele umii luzɔɔm ka bikkpit bɛffa. Ɔzɔɔm ɔttɛ, “Dedde anaam, attɛnɛ, ommonggo ’wɔng baala asam assekenɛ ntakabong nvva ka ammɛ, nyilabong; kule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ alɔɔknɛ.”
40026043	Ɔppyɛlɛ ɔbbal liffu, ɔyɛn balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ka bilaa. Ba bakkwoong bataa kwetkwet.
40026044	Jesus ɔbbal lɛgbata, ɔkɔngɔbɛ; umii ɔzɔɔm ka bikkpit bɛkkyaat. Ɔzɔɔm kɛssanga ssɔn baang.
40026045	Ɔppyɛlɛ isimisimi umii ka ɛfɛɛn a balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ, ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Atiiyɔng ka bilaa ’pyɔng ɔɔ? Ppyɛɛkyɔng ɛkɛtɛ ɛffɔbong ya bale ka basamnɛ Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ; bamii, bannyi banaang-a-bubbi.
40026046	Afeele imiiyɔng, ɔlɔɔt wa ule ka uzzinɛ issɛ anaam utii mung.”
40026047	Jesus utii baang ka kɛlɔɔk; Judas, ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ vvɔn, utuma. Ɔdɔkɔ la kɛkaan a balɔɔt ggbadam. Badɔkɔ la iggɛ la ikkpong ka bakɔɔmnɛ. Bazzilɛttɔ-bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la bagɛlɛnya balɔɔt a Jews batɔɔmnɛbɛ.
40026048	Uzzi-issɛ ɔyɔɔbong kɛkaan ’sɔng baang eleme ya ule ɔnaang basan ɔlɔɔt wa baggyannɛ. Ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt wa nle ka ngbugbamɛnɛ ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa aggyannɛyɔng. Akaamɛyɔng!”
40026049	Judas utumanɛ, ɔsak ssɔng, umii ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus. Ugbugbamɛ, ɔttɛ, “Bɔkaat butaa la annɔ Ukopolo-lukopolo.”
40026050	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Ɔkkaamwɔ, ɛnngwa anaam.” Ɔzzánga baffu bakaa Jesus balɔmnɛ kkpɔk.
40026051	Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn wa ɔdɔkɔnɛ baang la Jesus uttulu ogge, ɔsanga, ɔkkwɛɛ kɔtɔɔk ubili wa Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm wa lɛbaang ɔzza.
40026052	Jesus ɔlɔɔk la ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Sam ogge annɔ assɛɛn ka uffɔ, ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ wa ɔkɔɔmnɛ ogge, ullu kullu, ule ubbe lubbe ogge.
40026053	Ba asan attɛ nkkwoong mung nkkwɔɔ Dedde nttɛ ɔyaamnɛ ɔɔ? Nkkwɔɔmɛnɛ nttɛ ɔyaamnɛ, vvenɛ ɔtɔɔm innɔ innɔ bayilabɔtɔɔm ufeenɛ ɔɔ?
40026054	Kulenɛ ning baang kule kɔnaang nang kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ vvenɛ kɔnaang ning baang.”
40026055	Jesus ɔlɔɔk ka kibbi ’sɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Akɔɔmyɔng igge la ikkpong affunɛyɔng kɛkaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ nlenɛ kɔlɔɔk lɛzzɔɔk ɔɔ? Kɛtɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ ntaa baang ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm nkopolo, ɔzzànga nɛyɔng ba akaayɔng.
40026056	Mbyɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ bɛnaang nkwaaning kwa bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bakkpɔknɛ ka Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn.” Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ bamma bakɔngɔmɛ.
40026057	Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bakaanɛ Jesus, basammɛ bamii ka ɛfɛɛn a Caiaphas, Uzzilɛttɔ-bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm wa lɛbaang, ka ɛfɛɛn a bakopolo-Lafɔɔ la bagɛlɛnya baggbanɛ ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn.
40026058	Peter ufeele ukup Jesus tɔttɔt ɔffɔ ka ɔdda kɛkaal ka ssala Uzzilɛttɔ-bassɛɛn-a-Luzɔɔm. Umii ɔtaa ka ssala kɛkaal la bakat-ɛfɛɛn; ɔttɛ ɔyɛn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kule kule.
40026059	Bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la ikkansulu ɔkkpɛlɛ babum kɛggyan ɛtɔk ya bale bakkala lɛlaak batum Jesus, nkwaaning bakaamɛ bamii bawwɔɔl.
40026060	Keem ɛtɔk basi lɛyɛn. Uvve balɔɔt ppwap bakkala lalaak batummɛ. Ka lakuma balɔɔt baffa batta babee ka lusso
40026061	battɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung ɔlɔɔkbong ɔttɛ ammɛ ukkwoong mung utut Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ’gwɔng mung ɔzzɔɔk, ɔzzànga ka bɛtɔm bɛkkyaat vvenɛ ɔppyɛlɛ ɔbɔɔkgwɛ lɔsaal.”
40026062	Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-Luzɔɔm wa lɛbaang ufeele ubee-ubee ɔlɔɔk la Jesus ɔttɛ, “Ayanga mung kɛppyɛlɛ kamma atum lilɔɔk sa balɔɔknɛ batumwɔ mung ɔɔ?”
40026063	Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔtaa zzum. Uzzilɛttɔ-bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm wa lɛbaang ufeele ɔbbal lɛlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Ka lɛkɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm-a-Kuddu, nggyan nttɛ ayim gedegede mung abwɔɔlɔyɛlɛ, annɔ alenɛ Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ ɔɔ?”
40026064	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Alɔɔkbong ning baang, ɔzzánga nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng, ka ussinɛ mmwɔɔn umii ka lusso, vvenɛ ayɛnyɔng Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ɔtaanɛ ka lufɔɔm ɛlaabɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, vvenɛ ɔppyɛlɛ uffu la ikkpálá ka libat.”
40026065	Nkwɔng kutun Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm wa lɛbaang ɔlɔm iwɔkɔlɔ ammɛ kɛyɔɔng ɔyaak ɔttɛ, “Jesus ɔkkalabong lɛlaak utum Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ittɛɛsɛ ilɔk ba ibɛlɛ lɛggyan ka lɔkkwɔɔn kɔttɛ appyeeyɔngbong babbu lammwɔɔl za ɔlɔɔknɛ baang.
40026066	Attinayɔng nang?” Abbɛ bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, “Iwwɔɔlmɛ kɔbbɔlmɛbong.”
40026067	Bakwula libaak ballɔtmɛ ka lusso, bakɔɔm batupmɛ. Balɔɔt ba batupmɛnɛ labut
40026068	balɔɔk la ammɛ battɛ, “Ayɛnyɛlɛ biyɛnɛ, Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ! Attina ɔlɔɔt wa utupwɔnɛ.”
40026069	Peter ɔdɔkɔ baang ka ɔtaanɛ ka vveeng ka ssala sa bakaalnɛ kɛkaal. Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang waanawanavva wa ulenɛ bɔɔyi Uzzilɛttɔ-luzɔɔm wa lɛbaang uffu ka ɛfɛɛn a Peter ɔttɛ, “Annɔ ɔgbaa assɛ ale la Jesus wa Galilee.”
40026070	Ɔzzánga Peter ɔkala ka lusso abbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔttɛ, “Anaam ba nsan bwa alɔɔknɛ atumyɔng.”
40026071	Ɔtta ɔssɛ umii ka lɛmma kikkwu. Wanawanavva ɔlɔk, wa ulenɛ bɔɔyi, ɔbbalmɛ lɛyɛn. Ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt ba babeenɛ baang ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng ɔdɔkɔ la Jesus wa ussinɛ Nazareth.”
40026072	Peter ɔbbal lɛkala ɔttɛ, “Nyimbong nttɛ, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ba nsan.”
40026073	Waan ɛkɛtɛ ssup ɔsaknɛ, balɔɔt ba babeenɛ baang baffu ka ɛfɛɛn a Peter, battɛ, “Mkkpa alɔɔk, alɔɔk gbɔɔ, isan lɔsan ittɛ annɔ ale ka likup. Kwa kɔnaangnɛ isan kussi ka ɛtɔk ya annyinɛ kamma kɛkaal annɔ.”
40026074	Ɔzzánga ɔbbal liyim ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyɔɔnɛ akama nsinɛ ka lɔkkwɔɔn lɛlɔɔk. Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ba nsan.” Eseese balangkɔkɔ bakɔɔl.
40026075	Peter ukke kwa Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛnɛ ɔttɛ, “Tɛ́ttɛ́ balangkɔkɔ bakɔɔl, vvenɛ akalanɛ bikkpit bɛkkyaat attɛ, nɛ ba asan.” Ɔzzánga Peter ɔtta ka vveeng ɔkkwa kɔssɔpmɛ.
40027001	Lɔfɔm a lɔfɔm, bazzilɛttɔ-bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la bagɛlɛnya balɔɔt a Jews banaang likup za kɛwwɔɔl a Jesus.
40027002	Bassɛɛnmɛ ikpɔkɔlɔ ka labɔɔk, basammɛ bamii ka ɛfɛɛn a Pilate, Uzzilɛttɔ a Rome.
40027003	Judas, wa uzzinɛ Jesus issɛ, ɔsannɛ ɔttɛ bazzabong kɛkaal a Jesus, battɛ ubbe, ɔnaang busannɛ. Ɔzzánga ɔsam lɔlɔp la Naira zzɔɔp, ufee bazzilɛttɔ-bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la bagɛlɛnya ɔttɛ,
40027004	“Nnaangbong bubbi ka nzzinɛ issɛ ɔlɔɔt wa usinɛkwɛ lɛsan, bale ka bawwɔɔlmɛnɛ.” Bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, “Ngkka ’kwɔng baang kule la ayyɔɔt ɔɔ? Uwɔng baang kɔlɔɔk annɔ”
40027005	Judas ɔsam ikkpoko ɔllɔt ka ɛfɛɛn a Labun-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔgbata ɔkɔngɔbɛ baang umii uzzenge.
40027006	Bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm battɔng ikkpoko ’yɔng baang battɛ, “Ikkpoko ’yɔng mung, ikkpoko-linnyi. Ɔzzànga mung ule lafɔɔ ka ayyɔɔt kɛsam ikkpoko ’yɔng mung kimii kɛssɛɛn ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn la ya ilenɛ ka libɔngɔlɔ ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
40027007	Balenɛ lɛlɔɔk kɔkaatbɛ, bakɔɔm ikkpoko ’yɔng baang balɛɛp ɛkpansi Ɔfaak-ikkpo ya bale balli ikanakana.
40027008	Kwakkwɛ baang bakkwɔɔnɛ ɛfɛɛn ’kwɔng baang “Ɛkpansi-Linnyi” pyip ka mmwɔɔn mung.
40027009	Kɔlɔɔk kwa uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔzzanganɛ Jeremiah ɔlɔɔknɛ kɔnaangbong ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Jeremiah ɔkkpɔk ɔttɛ, “Basam ikkpoko ’yɔng baang ya balɔɔt a Israel balenɛ kamma liyila battɛ vvenɛ bannyimɛ.
40027010	Bakɔɔmyɛ balɛɛp ɛkpansi Ɔfaak-ikkpo tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ebinukkpaapi ɛggyannɛ ɛttɛ nnaang.”
40027011	Jesus ubee ka lusso uzzilɛttɔ lusse; ɔbapmɛ ibap. Ɔbap Jesus ɔttɛ, “Annɔ alenɛ ubeet a Jews ɔɔ?” Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Annɔ alɔɔknɛ.”
40027012	Kɔlɔk usi lɛbɛlɛ lɛlɔɔk utum kibbi sa bazzilɛttɔ-bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la bagɛlɛnya bannyimɛnɛ. Ɔzzańga Pilate ɔlɔɔk la Jesus ɔttɛ,
40027013	“Appyee mung lilɔɔk ’sɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ sa bakatawɔnɛ ɔɔ?”
40027014	Jesus ufim lɛmmwɔɔl zzɔn gbɔɔ kɛzza. Uzzilɛttɔ lusse kɔkɛɛlɛmɛ.
40027015	Ka kɛtɔm a Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ la kkwɔn, uzzilɛttɔ lusse ɔyanga lakke za kɛsanga ɔlɔɔt duu wa kibbi kɛggyannɛ kɛttɛ ɔsangamɛ ka igbakkɔpɔ.
40027016	Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang ɔlɔɔt ɔdɔkɔ baang ka igbakkɔpɔ wa basanmɛnɛ gaang gaang. Ɔ̀zzànga Jesus Barabbas.
40027017	Keem balɔɔt baggbanɛ ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn, Pilate ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Aggyan attɛyɔng nsanga nyinɔɔng ka igbakkɔpɔ nnyiwɔyɔng; Jesus Barabbas faa Jesus wa bakkwɔɔmɛnɛ Christ?”
40027018	Ɔggba lɛsan ɔttɛ, bakɔɔm Jesus, bafeemɛ ka banaangnɛ Jesus luleep.
40027019	Ka ɛkɛtɛ ya Pilate ɔdɔkɔnɛ ka ɔdda kɛkaal ka ɔtaanɛ, wanavva ammɛ ɔtɔɔm ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛ ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ anaang kɔlɔɔk kɔlɔk la ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang tɛ. Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang kwɛ ba ɔsan tɛ. Nlakala kɛtɔm ka nyɛnnɛ akama gaang gaang ka lɛttɔ ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng wa usinɛkwɛ lɛsan.”
40027020	Bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la bagɛlɛnya badda kibbi ’sɔng baang battɛ babwɔɔlɔ Pilate ɔkkyaa Barabbas ka igbakkɔpɔ ɔfɔngɔ, bawwɔɔl Jesus.
40027021	Ɔzzánga uzzilɛttɔ ɛkpansi ’wɔng baang ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Mung kwa balɔɔt ba baffa ’bɔng bɛɛ, nyinɔɔng ulenɛ wa nle nsanga ka igbakkɔpɔ ee?” Abbɛ battɛ “Barabbas”.
40027022	Pilate ɔbapnɛbɛ ɔttɛ, “Ngkka nle nnaang nang la Jesus wa bakkwɔɔmɛnɛ Christ?” Bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, “Kamamɛ bɛfɔl, akaka ka Cross.”
40027023	Pilate ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Ule bɔkkakkwɛ lɛnaang kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ?” Abbɛ babungu bagaga battɛ, “Akamamɛ bɛfɔl, akaka ka Cross.”
40027024	Pilate, ɔyɛnnɛ ning baang, ɔttɛ ba kɔbɛlɛ lile kwa kɛbbal bɛkaal lɛtta, nzang vvenɛ kullu kɔttɔ kwa lɛbaang; ɔsam bannyi, uyila labɔɔk ka lusso kibbi ’sɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Kɔbɔɔk anaam ba kule ka kɛwwɔɔl ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng, nkwɔng baang kɔlɔɔk annyɔɔng.”
40027025	Kibbi ’sɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, “Afɔngɔ akama lubbe ammɛ ukupyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt la bwɔɔn ayyɔɔt!”
40027026	Pilate ɔsanga Barabbas ka igbakkɔpɔ. Ɔsam Jesus, unnyibɛ, batup, bamii bakama bɛfɔl, bakaka ka Cross.
40027027	Ɔzzánga isodya Pilate basam Jesus bamii, ka ugala Uzzilɛttɔ-lusse abbɛ. Ɔkkpɛlɛ kɛkaan ssɔn baang baggba bakkpitmɛ.
40027028	Baggbolomɛ iwɔkɔlɔ, basam ukolo-uwɔkɔlɔ bawɔkɔlɔmɛ.
40027029	Banaang kɛttɔpɔ bizze-bizze, battɔpɔmɛ ka lɛttɔ. Bazza lukut bassɛɛnmɛ ka kɔbɔɔkɛlaabɔɔk. Bakunmɛ laddu ka lusso, banyɔɔkamɛ battɛ, “Mgbeede, ubeet a Jews.”
40027030	Bakwula libbaak bavvoongmɛ ka lusso, batɔk lukut batupmɛ ka lɛttɔ.
40027031	Balemɛnɛ livve lɛnyɔɔka; balɔm uwɔkɔlɔ wa bawɔkɔlɔmɛnɛ, baggbolo. Basam iwɔkɔlɔ ya ammɛ biini bawɔkɔlɔmɛ. Basammɛ bamii kɛwwɔɔl ka Cross.
40027032	Ka balenɛ ka ɛtɔk a kimii, baduda ɔlɔɔt vvɔn wa ussinɛ Cyrene wa ɔzzanganɛ Simon. Batutmɛ battɛ ɔtɔkɔ Cross a Jesus.
40027033	Baffu baffɔ ka ɛfɛɛn ya bakkwwɔɔnɛyɛ Golgotha, ning baang ulenɛ “Ɛfɛɛn a Ukɔɔk-a-lɛttɔ.”
40027034	Baffɔnɛ baang bannyimɛ batak ba banɔknɛbɛ la bilɔlɔ battɛ ɔvva. Ɔllɛnɛ, ufim kɛvva.
40027035	Bakamamɛ bɛfɔl bakaka ka Cross. Basam iwɔkɔlɔ ammɛ batta illɔ babɛngɛlɛ abbabbɛ.
40027036	Balenɛ ’kwɔng baang livve bataa-ɔtaa bakatmɛ.
40027037	Bakkpɔk lilɔɔk sa babilimɛnɛ ka libat a lɛttɔ ammɛ battɛ: “Uwɔng ulenɛ Jesus, Ubeet a Jews.”
40027038	Bakama babbyap baffa baang ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn la Jesus. Vvɔn ka kufoom kwa ɛlaabɔɔk, wa vvɔn ka kufoom ɛbyakɔm.
40027039	Balɔɔt basaknɛ baang bammyang lattɔ banɔk Jesus battɛ,
40027040	“Attɛ annɔ vvenɛ atut Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, azzɔɔk, appyɛlɛgwɛ abɔɔk ka bɛtɔm bɛkkyaat! Akkwoongnɛ, akkalawɔ kɛyɔɔng tɛ! Alenɛ Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, asini ka libat a Cross!”
40027041	Bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la bakopolo-Lafɔɔ, la bagɛlɛnya bassɛ banyɔɔkamɛ battɛ,
40027042	“Ɔkkala balɔk, ɔzzànga ammɛ biini ba ukkwoong ɔkkala. Ammɛ lissi ulenɛ ubeet a Israel ɔɔ? Ukkwoongnɛ usini ka Cross gedegede mung, iyila kwa ammɛ.
40027043	Uyila kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛ ammɛ ulenɛ Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, kɔyyɛɛp mung, ifɔngɔ iyɛnyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule ka ɔkkalamɛnɛ gedegede mung!”
40027044	Gɔɔ babbyap ba bazzengenɛbɛ ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn la ammɛ bassɛ banyɔɔkamɛ ning baang.
40027045	Ɔffɔnɛ kikoon, ɛfɛɛn esikili kɛtɔm tɔttɔt uddum ikalangka ikkyaat.
40027046	Ɔffɔnɛ ikalangka ikkyaat, Jesus ɔfaka lɛmmwɔɔl a kullu ɔttɛ, “Ɛli, Ɛli, lama sabachthani?” Ning baang ulenɛ “Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm anaam, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm anaam, mbɔng ammanɛ akɔngɔnɛ?”
40027047	Balɔɔt balɔk ba babeenɛ baang bappyeemɛ ka ɔkkwanɛ battɛ, “Ule ka ɔkkwɔɔnɛ Elijah!”
40027048	Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ɔmmɛ eseese ɔsam okkokkya, ɔssɛɛn ka batak, ɔkpaka ka bissɛ, ububumɛ kinnyi ɔvva.
40027049	Balɔɔt balɔk, battɛ, “Afɔngɔyɔngbong iyɛnyɔng vvenɛ Elijah ule ka uffunɛ, ɔkkalamɛ nsan!”
40027050	Jesus ɔbbal lɛmmwɔɔl a kullu lɛfaka, lɛfɛkɛlɛ lɛzzamɛ.
40027051	Ɔzzánga ubba wa ulenɛ ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔfaka bɛfaak bɛffa ka ussinɛ ka libat ɔffɔ ka kuttɔɔk. Ɛkpansi ɛnnyɛkɛ, ikpana ibbum.
40027052	Lalli lawongolo, balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ggbadam ba baggbanɛ libbe, bafungala bappyɛlɛ bataa ka kuddu.
40027053	Bagbata basseke lalli. Jesus ufungalanɛ ka lubbe, bamii ka Jerusalem ka ɛfɛɛn a balɔɔt ggbadam bayɛnnɛbɛ.
40027054	Uzzilɛttɔ-isodya, la bakat-ɛfɛɛn ba bakatnɛ Jesus, bayɛnnɛ kɛnnyɛkɛ sa ɛkpansi ɛnnyɛkɛnɛ la bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya bɛnaangnɛ ɔbbwɔpɔbɛ gaang gaang battɛ, “Uwɔng Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka lɔkkwɔɔn!”
40027055	Bwanavva badɔkɔ baang ggbadam ka babeenɛ fulufulu bappyɛɛk. Abbɛ bassinɛ Galilee bakup Jesus bakɔɔm bayaammɛ.
40027056	Badɔkɔ Mary Magdalene, la Mary, abakka James la Joseph, la abakka bwaan a Zebedee.
40027057	Kulele kɔnaangnɛ, ɔbbɔssɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ussinɛ Arimathea uffu, ɔzzànga Joseph. Ammɛ ngbaa ɔdɔkɔ ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus.
40027058	Ɔzzánga umii ɔbap Pilate ɔttɛ ɔfɔngɔmɛ ɔsam Jesus, umii ulli. Keem Pilate unnyi kɔsap ɔttɛ; basam Jesus, bannyi Joseph ulli.
40027059	Ɔzzánga Joseph ɔsam Jesus, ɔgbbɔ ka ufaa ubba.
40027060	Ɔsam umii uloko ka lilli ammɛ sa ussumanɛ lɛtɔɔk ka lufoom akpana. Ɔssang lɛttaal, ugupu ka kamma lilli, ɔgbata ɔkɔngɔ.
40027061	Mary Magdalene la Mary wa vvɔn badɔkɔ baang ka bataanɛ bakat lilli.
40027062	Ɔffɔnɛ libbessolo Livve-kɛfɛkɛlɛ, bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la balɔɔt a Pharisees bamii ka ɛfɛɛn a Pilate
40027063	battɛ, “Dedde, ikkebong ka ɔkkala lɛlaak ’wɔng baang ɔlɔɔknɛ ka utiinɛ ikokolo, ɔttɛ, ‘Vvenɛ nfungala ka lubbe ka bɛtɔm bɛffa ka bɛkkyaat!’
40027064	Annyi lakke ɔlɔk lilli ’zɔng baang lile la kɛkat doddo tɔttɔt ɔffɔ bɛtɔm ’byɔng baang bɛffa ka bɛkkyaat; tɛ̀ttɛ́ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bamii bayipmɛ; battɛ ‘Ufungalabong ka lubbe.’ Nzang usseke-isimi lɛlaak ’zɔng mung vvenɛ lɛbbɔl lɛtta ɔkɔɔm-ɛtɔk.”
40027065	Pilate ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Amii akatyɔng lilli tɛ̀ttɛ̀ akkwoongnɛyɔng!”
40027066	Ɔzzánga bagbata bamii basal lilli doddo la lattaal; basanga bakat-ɛfɛɛn, bataa baang ɔkat.
40028001	Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ kilenɛ lɛsak, uffu ɔffɔ lɔfɔm a lɔfɔm a livve luzɔɔm, Mary Magdalene la Mary ɔlɔk, bafeele bamii kikoolo lilli.
40028002	Kitipili kitipili, ɛkpansi ɛnnyɛkɛ, uyilabɔtɔɔm-Ebinukkpaapi ussi ka libat uffu, utut lɛttaal, uloko kang. Kyɛk ɔtaa-ɔtaa ka libat azzɛ.
40028003	Ɔkkpɛlɛ ammɛ ule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ immwalang. Iwɔkɔlɔ ammɛ ilaat tɛ̀ttɛ̀ uwuu.
40028004	Bakat-ɛfɛɛn ɔbbwɔpɔbɛ gaang gaang, baffula, basseke tɛ̀ttɛ̀ babbu.
40028005	Uyilabɔtɔɔm ɔlɔɔk la bwanavva ’bɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔbbwɔpɔwɔyɔng! Nsan lɔsan nttɛ aleyɔng ka kɛggyan a Jesus wa bawwɔɔlnɛ ka Cross.
40028006	Mung ba ule; Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ufungalamɛbong tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ammɛ ɔlɔɔknɛ. Affu ayɛnyɔng ka ɛfɛɛn a umininɛ.
40028007	Azzuma amii abwɔɔlɔyɔng balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ attɛyɔng; ‘Ufungalabong ka lubbe ɔzzànga gedegede mung ule ka ɔkɔɔmnɛ ɛtɔk ɔssɛ umii Galilee. Ɔffɔnɛ bakang, vvenɛ ayɛnmɛyɔng!’ Akke kwa nlewɔnɛyɔng lɛbwɔɔlɔ tɛ.”
40028008	Ɔzzánga bagbata la lazzuma la lazzuma la bbwɔp la laggele, bamma bamii babwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus.
40028009	Kitipili kitipili Jesus ududabɛ ɔttɛ, “Bɔkaat butaa la annyɔɔng!” Ɔzzánga baffu ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ bakunmɛ laddu, balɔmmɛ ka bukkpɔ, banaangmɛ latele.
40028010	Jesus ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔbbwɔpɔwɔyɔng. Amii abwɔɔlɔyɔng ikpana anaam attɛyɔng; bamii Galilee, vvenɛ bayɛnnɛ bakang.”
40028011	Ka ɛkɛtɛ ya bwanavva ’bɔng baang bagbatanɛ bamii kufoom kwa abbɛ, bakat-ɛfɛɛn ba bakatnɛ lilli bappyɛlɛ isimisimi, bamii tɔkɔlɔ a ssala, babwɔɔlɔ bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-Luzɔɔm lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ sa lilenɛ lɛnaang.
40028012	Bazzilɛttɔ-luzɔɔm baduda la bagɛlɛnya, banaang likup, bannyi isodya ikkpoko ggbadam.
40028013	Battɛ, “Alɔɔk attɛyɔng balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ baffubong ka kasɛkɛ kɛtɔm, bayipmɛ ka ilenɛ ka bilaa.”
40028014	Ɔzzànga Uzzilɛttɔ-lusse uppyeenɛ ’kwɔng vvenɛ ilɔɔk ibutmɛ luttina. Kɔlɔɔk kɔlɔk kwa kule kɔnaangwɔyɔng, baala kule.”
40028015	Abbɛ bakat-ɛfɛɛn basam ikkpoko ’yɔng baang, bamii banaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ babwɔɔlɔnɛbɛ battɛ banaang. Balɔɔt a Jews batii ka balɔɔknɛ ning baang gbaak ka mmwɔɔn mung.
40028016	Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ba zzɔɔppavvɔn bamii ka libat ekpok ka Galilee ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus ulenɛbɛ lɛbwɔɔlɔ ɔttɛ vvenɛ bamii.
40028017	Bayɛnnɛ Jesus bakunmɛ laddu bannyimɛ latele, ɔzzànga balɔk badɔkɔ la ndeeta.
40028018	Jesus ɔttɔm ɔkkɛtɛ ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyinɛbong lakke ɔkkpɛlɛ ka libat la ɛkpansi.
40028019	Amiiyɔng ka balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ la ifɛɛn la ifɛɛn, anaangyɔngbɛ basseke balɔɔt a kɔssɛ anaam; anaangyɔngbɛ baptizim ka lɛkɔɔl a Dedde la Waan la Kuyeeng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
40028020	Akopoloyɔngbɛ, batele bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya nbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng. Akkeyɔng nle nle baang la annyɔɔng tɔttɔt ɛkpansi ekpeke.”
41001001	Uwɔng ulenɛ Kuttu-budoddo a Jesus Christ, Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
41001002	Kussi tɛ̀ttɛ̀ uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔzzanganɛ Isaiah ɔkkpɔknɛ, ɔttɛ: “Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛ, ‘Vvenɛ ntɔɔm ɔlɔɔt wa ule ɔlɔɔk kɔlɔɔk anaam, wa ule ɔkɔɔm ɔssɛ ɔkɔngɔwɔyɔng ɔkkɔɔnɛ ɔbama ɛtɔk ulokowɔ.’
41001003	Ɔlɔɔt ule baang ka kɛmat ka ɔgaganɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Alɔngɔlɔyɔng ɛtɔk alokoyɔng Uyini. Anaangyɔng ɛtɔk bit alokomɛyɔng ɔssɛ!’ ”
41001004	Ɔzzánga John utuma ka kɛmat ɔnaang balɔɔt baptizim la bannyi. Ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ bɔtɔɔm bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔɔmnɛ ɔttɛ, “Afanyɔng bubbi annyɔɔng isimi, banaangwɔyɔng baptizim. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔsɔɔkwɔyɔng bubbi annyɔɔng.”
41001005	Balɔɔt ggbadam ba bassinɛ Judea la ubeet a lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang za lɛzzanganɛ Jerusalem bamii bagɔpɔlɔ kɔlɔɔk kwa John ɔlɔɔknɛ. Bayila kamma bubbi abbɛ. Ammɛ ɔnaangbɛ baptizim ka lɔyɔngɔ a Jordan.
41001006	John ɔdɔkɔ ɔwɔkɔlɔ iwɔkɔlɔ ya banaangnɛyɛ la issɔp-ɛsɛɛn. Ɔggbɔ ɛkkpa ya banaangnɛyɛ la ɛkkpa-ɛsɛɛn ka kɛsan. Kazzi ammɛ ulenɛ ogelese la itɔngɔtɔngɔ.
41001007	Ɔyaam ɔbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt wa ule ka uffunɛ ukupnɛ ɔttanɛnɛ anaam liggbenge ka itɔk itɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ. Anaam gɔɔ ba nkkɔnɔ nakanaka wa nkkyaamɛnɛ ikkpabukkpɔ.
41001008	Anaam nnaangwɔyɔng baptizim la bannyi, ɔzzànga ammɛ ule ɔnaangwɔyɔng baptizim la Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
41001009	Usi lɛmmɛ, Jesus ussi Galilee ka lɛffɛ za lɛzzanganɛ Nazareth uffu. John ɔnaangmɛ baptizim baang ka lɔyɔngɔ a Jordan.
41001010	Eseese Jesus ɔttanɛ ka bannyi, ɔyɛn libat ka liwongolonɛ la Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka kusininɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lekkpelekete kuvvoongmɛ.
41001011	Lɛmmwɔɔl lissi ka libat lɛttɛ, “Annɔ alenɛ Waan a luppyam anaam, asaapnɛ gaang gaang.”
41001012	Usi lɛmmɛ, Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔmanamɛ, umii ka kɛmat.
41001013	Ɔtaa bakang ka lalɔp a bɛtɔm laffa. Satan ɔllɛmɛ. Isɛɛn a kɛmat idɔkɔ baang mgbaa. Keem bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm baffu battelemɛ.
41001014	Bassɛɛnnɛ John mgbakkɔpɔ, Jesus umii Galilee, ɔbwɔɔlɔ Kuttu-budoddo kwa kussinɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
41001015	Ɔttɛ, “Ɛkɛtɛ ya bbwak ɛffɔbong! Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm itii kɛtɛkɛtɛ. akkyaa bubbi annyɔɔng afɔngɔyɔng, appyɛɛ ayilayɔng kwa Kuttu-budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
41001016	Jesus ɔdɔkɔ baang ka ɔssɛnɛ ka lufoom a libbwe a Galilee, ɔyɛn balap a isɛɛnabannyi baffa, Simon la etele ammɛ Andrew, ka balenɛ ka kɛkaa isɛɛnabannyi la kuggbɔ.
41001017	Jesus ɔlɔɔk unnyibɛ ɔttɛ, “Akupnɛyɔng. Vvenɛ nkopolowɔyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ale akaayɔng balɔɔt afeeyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
41001018	Eseese, bakkyaa liggbɔ abbɛ bafɔngɔ, bakupmɛ.
41001019	Umiinɛ ssup ka lusso, ɔyɛn etele la etele, balɔɔt baffa, James la John, bwaan a Zebedee. Badɔkɔ ka kɛbama kuggbɔ kɛkat ka tɔkɔlɔ akkpaat wa abbɛ biini.
41001020	Jesus ɔyɛnbɛ ɛyɛn-ɛyɛn, ɔkkwɔɔbɛ. Bagbata bakɔngɔ abassɛ abbɛ, Zebedee, ka akkpaat la balɔɔt ammɛ, bamii bakup Jesus.
41001021	Jesus la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ baffu ka lɛffɛ za lɛzzanganɛ Capernaum. Ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ sa ibaala, Jesus umii ɔmal ka ggwoon a mitin, ubeebɛ kikopolo eseese.
41001022	Balɔɔt ba bappyeenɛ lukopolo ’gwɔng baang, kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ gaang gaang ka ukopolonɛ gbɔɔ bbwak bbwak. Usi tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bakopolo-Lafɔɔ likopolo. Lutini ’gwɔng, ɔdɔkɔ ɔkɔɔm lakke kizzi-lɛttɔ ammɛ biini ukopolo.
41001023	Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang, ɔlɔɔt ipiliza ɔmal ka ggwoon a mitin ’gwɔng baang. Ɔzzɔɔk kibungu ɔttɛ,
41001024	“Jesus, Waan a Nazareth, attina kɛnaangyɛlɛ nang? Mung affuyɛlɛ kɛbɛpɛ ɔɔ? Anaam nsanwɔ lɔsan; Annɔ alenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsɛlɛnɛ bubbi wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔɔmnɛ!”
41001025	Jesus ɔkkpa apiliza ’wɔng baang kiwele ɔttɛ, “Ataa zzum, atta asseke ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng!”
41001026	Apiliza ɔnaangmɛ uffula ɔkɔɔm ubungu gaang gaang tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔttamɛ ka kkwɔɔt.
41001027	Kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng baang kɔkɛɛlɛ balɔɔt gaang gaang. Bappyɛɛ basikili balɔɔk abbɛ abbɛ battɛ, “Uwɔng ulenɛ ’bɔng? Uwɔng ufaa lukopolo ɔɔ? Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung ɔyanga lakke za ɔlɔɔknɛ unnyi ipiliza, ipiliza innyimɛ latele!”
41001028	Ɔzzánga kuttu a Jesus kɔwaala ifɛɛn ifɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ɛkpansi a Galilee.
41001029	Jesus la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ, ɔbɛtɛ la James la John, bagbata ka ggwoon a mitin bamii ssɔng ssala Simon la Andrew.
41001030	Abakka wanavva Simon ɔdɔkɔ ka kisi-ɛppwa. Jesus ɔffɔnɛ, ɛffɔ ɛffɔ, batɔk ’kwɔng baang babwɔɔlɔmɛ.
41001031	Jesus umii ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ, ɔlɔmmɛ ka kɔbɔɔk ufeele. Ɔppwamɛ eseese, ɔnaang kazzi unnyibɛ.
41001032	Ɔffɔnɛ kulele ka livve lilenɛ lipiti, bakɔɔm balɔɔt iffaak ɔkkpɛlɛ la balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ ipiliza baffu ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus.
41001033	Balɔɔt a lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang baffu babbi ɔkkpɛlɛ ka lusso a ggwoon.
41001034	Jesus uttula balɔɔt ba ɔffaaknɛbɛ bɛssanga iffaak ’byɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔggba ipiliza ɔfɔngɔ kang. Gɔɔ usi ipiliza lɛfɔngɔ izza lɛmmwɔɔl ka ilemɛnɛ lɛkɔɔlɔ.
