41001035	Libbessolo, kɛtɔm-a-kɛtɔm, Jesus ufeele ɔtta ka ggwoon. Ɔgbata ka lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang umii ɔssɛɛn luzɔɔm ka ɛfɛɛn ɔlɔɔt usinɛ lile.
41001036	Ɔzzánga Simon la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bamiimɛ kɛggyan.
41001037	Bayɛnmɛnɛ, battɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn ulewɔ ka kɛggyan.”
41001038	Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Vvenɛ imiiyɔng lusso lusso ka laffɛ lalɔk za ballunɛ bakkpit mung. Nggyan kimii nkopolo ka laffɛ ’zɔng bakang ɔgbaa, mung nffu kwakkwɛ.”
41001039	Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔssɛ ukkpit ɛkpansi Galilee. Ukopolo ka idda mitin, ɔkɔɔm ɔggba ipiliza ɔfɔngɔ kang.
41001040	Ɔlɔɔt wa lassɔp za bbɔl bbɔl lanaangmɛnɛ uffu ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus. Ukun laddu ukkpenge Jesus ɔttɛ uttelemɛ. Ɔttɛ, “Kɔsaapwɔnɛ, anaangnɛ ɔppwanɛ.”
41001041	Bibbe Jesus lɛttɔ, ɔtɔnɔ kɔbɔɔk usingimɛ. Ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Kɔsaapnɛ mung, ɔppwawɔ.”
41001042	Ɔffaal ɔsaal ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang, ɔppwamɛ eseese.
41001043	Jesus ɔttamamɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ uvve tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔttɛmɛ ɔgbata ka ulemɛnɛ lɛbwɔɔlɔ ɔttɛ,
41001044	“Gɔpɔlɔ, tɛ̀ttɛ́ abwɔɔlɔ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk atum kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng tɛ. Ɔzzànga amii ssɔng ka ɛfɛɛn a ɔssɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkɔɔnɛ ɔppyɛɛkwɔ; anaang lɛtɔm za Moses ɔttɛnɛ anaangyɔng nkwaaning ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn ɔsan ɔttɛ ɔppwawɔbong baning.”
41001045	Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔgbatanɛ, ɔkɔɔm kuttu ’kwɔng baang umii ifɛɛn ifɛɛn. Ɔsak lɛbala, Jesus usi lɛbɛlɛ limii ka tɔkɔlɔ a ssala ka ɛfɛɛn a balɔɔt kkyaakkyaa. Lutini ’gwɔng ɔdɔkɔ ɔppyɛɛ ɔggyan ɛfɛɛn a kɛyɔɔng a kɛyɔɔng ɔtaa, balɔɔt bassi ifɛɛn ifɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ baffu bakupmɛ.
41002001	Bwaan a bɛtɔm biffu bɛsak, Jesus ɔppyɛlɛ umii Capernaum. Kuttu kwa ulenɛ ka ssala lile kumii eseese.
41002002	Balɔɔt baffu babbi baang ka tɔkɔlɔ a ggwoon ɛfɛɛn ɛsɛlɛ, gɔɔ kufuk ka lusso lɛmma ggwoon kusi lɛbɛlɛ lile. Jesus ɔdɔkɔbɛ ka kɛbwɔɔlɔ Kuttu-budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm,
41002003	ka balɔɔt banna ba batɔkɔnɛ ɔnnɔk-a-kikkwu baffu ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus baffɔnɛ.
41002004	Ka kibbi kilenɛ lɛsak lɛttala, basi likkwoong basak la ɔnnɔk-a-kikkwu ’wɔng baang ssɔng baffɔ ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus. Ɔzzánga battɔ lɛmma ka libat a ggwoon bbwak ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus ulenɛ. Lɛmma lilenɛ liggbenge, bassɛ baang basinimɛ bawulu ka ewula bbwak ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus.
41002005	Jesus ɔyɛnnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kiyila kɛttalanɛbɛ, ɔlɔɔk la ɔnnɔk-a-kikkwu ɔttɛ, “Waan anaam, nsɔɔkwɔbong bubbi annɔ.”
41002006	Bakopolo-Lafɔɔ ba bataanɛ baang battina ka tɔkɔlɔ abbɛ battɛ, “Ɔnaang nang tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔbbɔ lissa ning, ɔlɔɔk bbɔl bbɔl utum Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm?
41002007	Ɔlɔɔt wa ukkwoongnɛ ɔsɔɔk ɔlɔɔt bubbi ɔgbaa la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba ule.”
41002008	Eseese, Jesus ɔsan bwa battinanɛ, ɔlɔɔk unnyibɛ ɔttɛ, “Mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ attinayɔng ning baang?
41002009	Mung kɔtta bbwɛt lile kɛttɛ, ‘Ɔnnɔk-a-kikkwu, nsɔɔkwɔbong bubbi annɔ!’ faa kɛttɛ, ‘Afeele, asam ewula annɔ, assɛ!’?
41002010	Vvenɛ nyɔɔwɔyɔng ka lɔkkwɔɔn nttɛ, Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔyanga mung lakke ka ɛkpansi ’yɔng mung za kɛsɔɔk a bubbi.” Usikili ɔlɔɔk la ɔnnɔk-a-kikkwu ɔttɛ,
41002011	“Nbwɔɔlɔwɔ nttɛ, afeele asam ewula annɔ afula!”
41002012	Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ basseke ka bappyɛɛkmɛnɛ ggbeggbe, ɔnnɔk-a-kikkwu ’wɔng baang ufeele ɔsam ewula ammɛ uzzuma ɔgbata. Kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ gaang gaang babungu Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm battɛ, “Kɛssanga kɔlɔɔk ’sɔng ba itaka iyɛn kkpal!”
41002013	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛ isimisimi umii ka lufoom a libbwe a Galilee. Balɔɔt ggbadam baffu babbi baang, ammɛ uttebɛ kikopolo.
41002014	Ɔssɛnɛ umii ka lusso, ɔyɛn ɔtɔkinnamba, waan Alphaeus wa ɔzzanganɛ Levi, ka ɔtaanɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ a ggwoon a kɛnaang ammɛ. Jesus ɔlɔɔk unnyimɛ, ɔttɛ, “Afeele akupnɛ!” Ammɛ Levi ufeele ukupmɛ.
41002015	Jesus ɔdɔkɔ ka kazzi ka ssala Levi. Kɛkaan a batɔkinnamba la babɛpɛ-lafɔɔ kɛdɔkɔ baang ka kikupmɛnɛ. Balɔɔt a kɛkaan ’sɔng baang balɔk bamii batul kazzi la Jesus la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ, bazzi.
41002016	Bakopolo-Lafɔɔ balɔk ba bazzanganɛ Pharisees bayɛn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Jesus la babɛpɛ-lafɔɔ la batɔkinnamba batulnɛ kazzi bazzi. Ɔzzánga babap balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ battɛ, “Mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ uzzi kazzi la kɛssanga balɔɔt ’bɔng baang?”
41002017	Ɔzzánga Jesus uppyeenɛ, ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Balɔɔt ba ɔppwanɛbɛ, uttula-ittula ba baggyan, ba usinɛbɛ lɛppwa baggyan mung. Mung balɔɔt a latele ba nffu nkkwɔɔ, nffu kɛkkwɔɔ babɛpɛ-lafɔɔ.”
41002018	Ɛkɛtɛ ya nnyɔn ɛdɔkɔ baang, balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a John, Ɔnaang-a-baptizim, la balɔɔt a Pharisees bataanɛ buwɔɔng. Balɔɔt balɔk baffu babap Jesus battɛ, “Mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a John, Ɔnaang-a-baptizim, la ba Pharisees bataa buwɔɔng, usseke balɔɔt a kɔssɛ annɔ basi buwɔɔng lɛtaa?”
41002019	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Kɔsaapwɔyɔng mung ka balɔɔt ba baffunɛ libbeel bafulanɛ la buwɔɔng ɔɔ? Maaye! Walam a wanavva ka ulenɛ baang la abbɛ, ning baang baala kule.
41002020	Ɔzzànga ɛkɛtɛ ele ka ɛffɔnɛ ya bale basam walam a wanavva bagbata bassekebɛ. Ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang ɛffɔnɛ, vvenɛ bataa buwɔɔng.
41002021	“Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsamnɛ kɛfaak ubba sa ufaa ɔsal lɛmma ɔtɔm uwɔkɔlɔ ba ule. Ɔzzànga ɔkaangnɛ ning baang tɔttɔt, ufaa kɛfaak ubba vvenɛ ɔnaang lɛmma za ɔtɔm uwɔkɔlɔ lɛggbam lɛgbaa.
41002022	Gɔɔ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔssɛɛnnɛ ufaa batak ka ɔtɔm ɛssɔ ɛkkpa-ɛsɛɛn ba ule. Ɔssɛɛnnɛ ning baang, batak vvenɛ bafɔl bayaak ɛssɔ. Batak la ɛssɔ bɛbɛpɛ. Lutini ’gwɔng, ufaa batak bassɛɛn ka ufaa ɛssɔ ɛkkpa-ɛsɛɛn.”
41002023	Jesus ɔdɔkɔ baang ka ɔssɛnɛ ka kibwoto-isasa ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ. Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ badɔkɔ baang ka batɛngɛnɛ lasan-isasa bakkwɔlɔ ifɔɔk bassɛɛn ka eddu bazzi.
41002024	Ɔzzánga balɔɔt a Pharisees balɔɔk la Jesus battɛ, “Ppyɛɛk! Baang balɔɔt a kɔssɛ annɔ babɛpɛbong lafɔɔ ayyɔɔt ka banaangnɛ ning baang ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ tɛ!”
41002025	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Ɔzzánga ba ataka akkwɔɔyɔng kɔlɔɔk kwa David ɔnaangnɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang ya buwɔɔng busaapmɛnɛ ɔɔ? David la balɔɔt ammɛ badɔkɔ la kɛmɛɛm,
41002026	Ɔzzánga umii ɔmal ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsam brɛɛd wa balokonɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uzzi. Nkwɔng kɔnaang ka ɛkɛtɛ Abiathar ɔdɔkɔnɛ Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa lɛbaang. Ulenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Lafɔɔ ayyɔɔt lalɔɔknɛ, nzang bassɛɛn a luzɔɔm keem bazzinɛ brɛɛd ’wɔng baang kɔnaang bbwak. Ɔzzànga David uzzimɛ, gɔɔ ɔssɛ ɔbɛkɛ unnyi balɔɔt ammɛ.”
41002027	Jesus utele lɛttɔ ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaang Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ kwa budoddo ɔssɛbibit: Ɔssɛbibit kwa Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ ba ɔlɔɔm.
41002028	Ning ulenɛ kɛttɛ Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ulenɛ Uyini bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ gɔɔ gbaak la Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ.
41003001	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛ umii ka ggwoon a mitin. Ɔlɔɔt a ubbu-kɔbɔɔk ɔdɔkɔ baang.
41003002	Balɔɔt balɔk badɔkɔ baang ba battɛnɛ bannyi Jesus kibbi battɛ ɔnaangbong bbɔlbbɔl. Keem basseke ka bakatnɛ Jesus ggbeggbe battɛ ɔkkɔɔnɛ bayɛn vvenɛ uttula ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ nsan.
41003003	Jesus ɔlɔɔk la ɔlɔɔt wa ubbu-kɔbɔɔk ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Atta abee kaang ning ka lusso.”
41003004	Usikili ɔbap balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Mung Lafɔɔ ayyɔɔt lattɛ inaang ’bɔng ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ? Lattɛ ittele balɔɔt faa lattɛ iddopobɛ? Lattɛ ikkala ɔlɔɔt faa lattɛ iwwɔɔlmɛ?” Lɛmmwɔɔl gbɔɔ basi lɛzza.
41003005	Keem Jesus ɔppyɛɛkbɛ ssii, kutunmɛ. Ɔzzànga babbemɛ mung lɛttɔ ka basinɛ kɔlɔɔk ka kɔtɔɔk lippyee bale lɛsɛpɛ. Jesus ɔlɔɔk la ɔlɔɔt a ubbu-kɔbɔɔk ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Atɔnɔ kɔbɔɔk.” Ammɛ ɔtɔnɔkwɛ, ɔppwamɛ eseese.
41003006	Ɔzzánga balɔɔt a Pharisees bagbata ka ggwoon a mitin eseese bamii bakup balɔɔt a Herod banaang likup battɛ bawwɔɔl Jesus.
41003007	Jesus la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bagbata bamii ka libbwe a Galilee. Kɛkaan a balɔɔt kikupmɛ. Balɔɔt balɔk bassi Galilee, balɔk bassi Judea,
41003008	balɔk bassi Jerusalem, balɔk bassi ka ɛkpansi Idumea, balɔk bassi kukupa lɔyɔngɔ a Jordan gwa lɔppyɛɛknɛ lusso gwa livve-luwee lɛttanɛ, balɔk bassi ka ɛkpansi a Tyre la Sidon. Balɔɔt ’bɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ baffu ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus ka bappyeenɛ bɛfɛɛn bya ɔnaangnɛ.
41003009	Kibbi kilenɛ lɛsak lɛttala, Jesus ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ baggyan akkpaat babama balokomɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ balɔɔt ’bɔng baang baffu batungalamɛ bassɛɛn ka tɔkɔlɔ bannyi.
41003010	Uttulabong balɔɔt ggbadam ggbadam, keem balɔɔt iffaak ɔkkpɛlɛ batutala ɛtɔk ya kimii ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus, ɔkkɔɔnɛ basingimɛ.
41003011	Ɛkɛtɛ duu ya balɔɔt ipiliza bayɛnmɛnɛ, battɔ ka lisse babungu battɛ, “Annɔ alenɛ Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm!”
41003012	Jesus ubee bbwak ɔkamala ipiliza ’yɔng baang ɔttɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ inaang basanmɛ.
41003013	Jesus ubbwulu libat a lɛttaal, ɔkkwɔɔ balɔɔt ba ɔggyannɛ bakupmɛ. Baffunɛ bakupmɛ,
41003014	ɔsanga balɔɔt zzɔɔppabaffa ba ɔkɔlɔnɛbɛ bayilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ. Ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Nsangawɔyɔngbong nttɛ, ataayɔng la anaam. Vvenɛ ntɔɔmwɔyɔng amii akopoloyɔng lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm,
41003015	ayangayɔng lakke za kɛggba ipiliza afɔngɔyɔng kang ɔgbaa.”
41003016	Balɔɔt ba zzɔɔppabaffa ba ɔsanganɛ badɔkɔnɛ: Simon (wa Jesus ɔkɔlɔmɛnɛ Peter);
41003017	James la etele ammɛ John, bwaan a Zebedee, (Jesus ɔkɔlɔbɛ Boanerges, ifɛɛt ilenɛ “Bwaan Àkkpála”);
41003018	La Andrew, la Philip, la Batholomew, la Matthew, la Thomas, la James waan Alphaeus, la Thaddaeus, la Simon wa lɔkaan ammɛ lɔsaapmɛnɛ gaang,
41003019	la Judas Iscariot wa uzzinɛ issɛ a Jesus.
41003020	Jesus ufula. Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus la ammɛ biini basi kufuk lɛyɛn bazzi kazzi ɔssanga ka kibbi balɔɔt sa kɛbbalnɛ liffu kikkpitbe kilenɛ lɛsak lɛttala.
41003021	Ikpana ammɛ bappyeenɛ ning baang, bafeele bamiimɛ kɛkat, ka bappyeenɛ balɔɔt balɔk ka battɛnɛ, “Ɔttɔbong bikun!”
41003022	Bakopolo-Lafɔɔ balɔk ba bassinɛ Jerusalem battɛ, “Ɔyanga Beelzebul ka kkwɔɔt! Gɔɔ baang Beelzebul, ubeet a babbukangmgbe unnyimɛnɛ lakke za kɛggba ipiliza kɛfɔngɔ kang.”
41003023	Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔkkwɔɔbɛ ɔppyɛɛ utolo ka ifɛɛt ka ifɛɛt unnyibɛ: ɔttɛ, “Satan ule ɔnaang nang usikili ɔggba Satan?
41003024	Lɛffɛ za ballunɛ lakup lakup, lakup ’zɔng baang balenɛ ka lɛkɔɔng ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ nzang lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang lile ka libbwumnɛ.
41003025	Gɔɔ itutum ya itɔknɛyɛ kɛyɔɔng ibɛngɛlɛ, isseke ka kullu ɛkɛtɛ ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ nzang itutum ’yɔng baang ile ka ibbwumnɛ.
41003026	Ikɔɔlɔ ittɛ Itutum a Satan issekenɛ lakup lakup nzang baala ittumu, ile ka ibbwumnɛ ittɔ itaak.
41003027	“Ɔlɔɔt wa ukkwoongnɛ ɔmal ka ggwoon ɔgabwɔ uyipmɛ bɛfɛɛn ba ule. Ɔzzànga ɔkaanɛ ɔgabwɔ ’wɔng baang ɔggbɔ izzi, tɛ́ttɛ́ bɔk ukkwoong ɔmal ka ggwoon ɔssangmɛ bɛfɛɛn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɔsaapmɛnɛ.
41003028	“Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng kkpelegedee nttɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔsɔɔk balɔɔt bubbi abbɛ la lutini bubbi ɔkkpɛlɛ bwa ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔknɛ ka kamma.
41003029	Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔlɔɔknɛ bubbi utum Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm mɛ baala ɔsɔɔk kkpong kkpong, ka ulenɛ bubbi bwa kɛfal a kɛfal lɛnaang.”
41003030	(Jesus ɔlɔɔk ning mung ka balɔɔt balɔk battɛnɛ, “Ule la apiliza ka kkwɔɔt.”)
41003031	Abakka Jesus la itele ammɛ ya bwaanbwalam batuma. Badɔkɔ bakɔɔng ka vveeng babee batɔɔm battɛ bakkwɔɔ Jesus bannyibɛ.
41003032	Kibbi kɛdɔkɔ baang ka kɛtaanɛ kikkpit Jesus, ɔzzánga babwɔɔlɔmɛ battɛ, “Yɛn, Ssakawɔ la itele annɔ bakang ka vveeng ka babeenɛ, baggyan battɛ bayɛnwɔ.”
41003033	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Nnyinɔɔng ulenɛ Ɛnɛ? Babang balenɛ itele anaam?”
41003034	Uyeek ɔppyɛɛk balɔɔt ba bataanɛ baang bakkpitmɛ, ɔttɛ, “Yɛnyɔng Ɛnɛ la itele anaam mung!
41003035	Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔnaangnɛ kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyannɛ ulenɛ etele anaam, ule Ɛnɛ anaam.
41004001	Jesus ɔbbal likopolo ka lufoom a libbwe a Galilee. Kibbi sa kɛtaanɛ kikkpitmɛ kɛsaknɛ lɛttala, ukut ufula ka akkpaat ɔppyɛɛ ɔtaa bakang. Akkpaat ɔdɔkɔ ka bannyi, balɔɔt bataa ka likum ka imakkpa bannyi.
41004002	Ɔdɔkɔ ɔkɔɔm ifɛɛt ifɛɛt ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ lilɔɔk utum bɛfɛɛn ppwap, ɔttɛ:
41004003	“Agɔpɔlɔyɔng! Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ufeele umii kɛkɔɔn ifɔɔk a bɛfɛɛn.
41004004	Ɔmmyangnɛ ifɔɔk a bɛfɛɛn ’yɔng baang ka bɔtɔɔm, ifɔɔk ilɔk idɔkɔ ittɔ ka ɛtɔk. Bunɔɔn buttɔng ifɔɔk ’yɔng baang buzzi.
41004005	Ifɔɔk ilɔk ittɔ ka bɛfaak ikpana, ka ɛfɛɛn a lisse lilenɛ gbɔɔ wekeweke. Imeet, ka ɛkpansi esinɛ lɛddɔng,
41004006	luwee lɔsanganɛ, lɔfɔɔp lasan ’zɔng baang. Ka iffaat isinɛ likkwoong immala imii ka tɔkɔlɔ ka tɔkɔlɔ, lasan ’zɔng baang za laffɔnɛ lameet, labbe.
41004007	Ifɔɔk ilɔk idɔkɔ ittɔ ka lifaat sa bizze-bizze. Bizze bɛmmalanɛ bɛkɔm lasan ’zɔng baang za lalenɛ limeet, lasi lɛbɛlɛ likkwoong lawɔm.
41004008	Ifɔɔk ilɔk ittɔ ka ɛkpansi ya doddo. Imeet lasan lammala lanaang bizza. Bizza bɛlɔk lɔlɔp la ifɔɔk zzɔɔp, bɛlɔk lalɔp ifɔɔk lakkyaat, bɛlɔk lalɔp ifɔɔk kubbwɔɔk.”
41004009	Ammɛ Jesus utele lɛttɔ ɔttɛ, “Agɔpɔlɔyɔng, ayanganɛyɔng latɔɔk a kippyee kɔlɔɔk!”
41004010	Ɛkɛtɛ ɔdɔkɔnɛ kɛyɔɔng, balɔɔt balɔk ba balenɛ lɛgɔpɔlɔ bappyee kwa ɔlɔɔknɛ la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ baffu babapmɛ bwa ifɛɛt ya ɔssanɛ mung itumnɛ.
41004011	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Annyɔɔng babwɔɔlɔwɔyɔngbong likup Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Ɔzzánga balɔɔt ba basinɛ ba Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lile bale bakɔɔm ifɛɛt bappyee bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ,
41004012	Ɔkkɔɔnɛ, ‘Bappyɛɛk balɔngɔlɔ bappyɛɛk, ɔzzànga tɔttɔt ba bayɛn; Bagɔpɔlɔ balɔngɔlɔ bagɔpɔlɔ, ba bakkwoong bappyee. Bayɛnnɛ, bappyee bagbaa nzang ippyam abbɛ vvenɛ isikili bappyee kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, nzang Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔsɔɔkbɛ bubbi abbɛ.’ ”
41004013	Keem Jesus ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Ifɛɛt ’yɔng mung ba appyeeyɔng ɔɔ? Ngkka mung ale anaangyɔng nang vvenɛ appyeeyɔng ifɛɛt nnyɔn gbɔɔ?
41004014	Ɔkɔɔn-ifɔɔk a bɛfɛɛn ɔkɔɔn lɛmmwɔɔl-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
41004015	Balɔɔt balɔk bale tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ifɔɔk a bɛfɛɛn ya illɔtnɛ ɛtɔk ɛtɔk. Bappyeenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, eseese Satan umii ɔsamzɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ abbɛ.
41004016	Balɔɔt balɔk bale tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ifɔɔk a bɛfɛɛn ya illɔtnɛ ka bɛfaak ikpana. Bappyeenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, batɔkzɛ ka laggele eseese baang,
41004017	ɔzzànga ka tɔkɔlɔ doddo bɛ ba lɛmal, gɔɔ mmɛmmɛ ba bakkwoong balokozɛ. Ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn a kɔlɔɔk kuffunɛ, ɔlɔk bayɔɔ balɔɔt akama bakɔɔm bawwɔɔlbɛ kwa lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ’zɔng baang, bakalaze eseese.
41004018	Balɔɔt balɔk bale tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ifɔɔk a bɛfɛɛn ya ɔkɔɔnnɛ ka lifaat sa bizze bizze. Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bappyee mung lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm tɛ,
41004019	ɔzzànga bakeke kwa lafal abbɛ, la kusapa ikkpoko, la bɛssanga bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya baggyannɛ. Mbyɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ biffunɛ bigbepbɛ, basumala kwa lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔzzánga basibong lakkpo lɛwɔm.
41004020	Ɔzzànga balɔɔt balɔk bale bbwak tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ifɔɔk a bɛfɛɛn ya ɔkɔɔnnɛ ka ɛkpansi ya doddo. Bappyee lɛmmwɔɔl, bayila kwa azzɛ, bawɔm lakkpo: lɛsan lɛlɔk lɔlɔp la lakkpo zzɔɔp, lɛlɔk lalɔp a lakkpo lakkyaat, lɛlɔk lalɔp a lakkpo kubbwɔɔk.”
41004021	Jesus ɔbbalbɛ litolo unnyi ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ule baang wa uyengenɛ otinika ɔssɛɛn ka bɔfɛɛn bwa ddɔng ɔlɔk ɔsam ulup ka tɔkɔlɔ igolo ɔɔ? Lissi ka ɔsamnɛ ɔkpaka ka lɛkpaka otinika ɔɔ?
41004022	Bɔfɛɛn duu bwa balupnɛ, vvenɛ basangabwɛ batta ka vveeng. Gɔɔ bɔfɛɛn duu bwa bavvoongnɛ kpilikpip, vvenɛ bawongolobwɛ.
41004023	Ayanganɛyɔng latɔɔk, agɔpɔlɔyɔng!”
41004024	Ɔssɛ ɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng mung unnyibɛ ɔgbaa, ɔttɛ, “Agɔpɔlɔyɔng kɔlɔɔk duu kwa appyeenɛyɔng doddo! Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule ɔkɔɔm Lafɔɔ za akɔɔmnɛyɔng azzayɔng kɛkaal a balɔɔt balɔk, unnyiwɔyɔng kibbi, gɔɔ vvenɛ kule kɔttɔmɛ ammɛ litun.
41004025	Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyanganɛ bɔfɛɛn, vvenɛ bagbaamɛ, wa usinɛ nakanaka lɛyanga, gɔɔ waan ezuku ya ɔffɔnɛ ɔyanga, vvenɛ bakup baang bannaa.”
41004026	Jesus ɔbbalbɛ ifɛɛt ’yɔng lɛssa ɔttɛ, “Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ile tɛ̀ttɛ̀ nle ka nbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng mung. Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ufeele umii kɛmmyang ifɔɔk a bɛfɛɛn ka bɔtɔɔm.
41004027	Kɛtɔm, ɔlaa; kikoon, ssii ba ɔtaa. Ning baang ɔkkpɛlɛ ifɔɔk a bɛfɛɛn ’yɔng baang ile baang ka immalanɛ. Gɔɔ ammɛ biini ba ɔsan bwa bunaangnɛ ifɔɔk a bɛfɛɛn ’yɔng baang imeet tɛ́ttɛ́ immala.
41004028	Ɛkpansi biini ɛnaangnɛ lasan a bɛfɛɛn lammala, lawɔm lakkpo. Bimeetnɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, bɛfɔɔk, bɛwɔm lakkpo bɛnaang ifɔɔk.
41004029	Lakkpo lakootnɛ, ka ɛkɛtɛ liyaat uyini umii ɔffazɛ.”
41004030	Jesus ɔbap ɔttɛ, “Mung ile ilɔɔk ittɛ Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ile nang? Mung ile issa ifɛɛt ’yɔyɔng ya ile ibwɔɔlɔyɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ilenɛ.
41004031	Ile tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ale ka appyeenɛyɔng mung. Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ɔsam ɛfɔɔk a kɛssɛ ya ɛttanɛ lissup ɔkkpɛlɛ a vveengodde ɔkɔɔn ka lisse.
41004032	Ɔmmɛnɛ, ɛmmala, ɛppyɛɛ eggbenge ɛtta bɛssɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Bɛbɔɔk bɛtta biggbenge, bunɔɔn buffu bulɔɔk lakɔt baang ka bɔppwa.”
41004033	Jesus ɔkɔɔm ifɛɛt ppwap ppwap ukopolo balɔɔt lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ lutini bɔfɛɛn duu bwa bakkwoongɛ bappyee.
41004034	Usinɛ ifɛɛt lɛkɔɔm, bɛ ba utolo unnyi, ɔzzànga ɛkɛtɛ bassekenɛ kɛyɔɔng la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ, ubee bbwak ɔppyɛlɛ ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ppwool ppwool bappyee.
41004035	Kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang, kulele ning, Jesus ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Afeele ikum imiiyɔng kukupa libbwe ’kwɔng kang bɛɛ?”
41004036	Ɔzzánga bagbata bakɔngɔ kibbi ’sɔng baang; bamal bafula ka akkpaat wa Jesus ulenɛ lile ka tɔkɔlɔ ka ɔtaanɛ, bawaat bamii. Ikkpaat ilɔk idɔkɔ baang mgbaa.
41004037	Eseese, kɛffa sa lɛbaang kiffu. Ɔffa labba bannyi ɔssɛɛn ka akkpaat, gɔɔ usseke ssup nzang bannyi bayipi ka akkpaat.
41004038	Jesus ɔdɔkɔ ka isimi akkpaat ka umininɛ utele lɛttɔ ka lɛfat ɔlaa. Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bafungalamɛ, battɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo, ba attina ka ile ka itaaknɛ ɔɔ?”
41004039	Jesus ufeele ɔkkpa kɛffa kiwele ɔttɛ, “Zzum kwulak!” Usikili uggbe labba-bannyi ɔttɛ, “Beeyɔng ssii.” Kɛffa kɛtɛt, ɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ezum kwulak.
41004040	Jesus ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔbwɔpɔwɔyɔng kwa ’bɔng? Kiyila ba ayangayɔng ɔɔ?”
41004041	Abbɛ kaang ɔbbwɔpɔbongbɛ gaang gaang, basikili babapbɛ kɛyɔɔng battɛ, “Uwɔng bɔka ɔlɔɔt? Gɔɔ kɛffa la labba-bannyi binnyimɛ
41005001	Jesus la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ baffu ka lufoom a libbwe a Galilee kwa kkwɔn, ka ɛkpansi a Gerasa.
41005002	Jesus ɔttanɛ ka akkpaat, eseese waanwalam vvɔn ussi ka lalli uffu ukupmɛ. Waanwalam ’wɔng baang ɔyanga apiliza ka kkwɔɔt.
41005003	Ullu ka lalli. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔbbalnɛ likkwoong ɔssɛɛnmɛ ikpɔkɔlɔ ba ɔbɛlɛ lile.
41005004	Bassɛɛnnɛbong ikpɔkɔlɔ ka bukkpɔ la labɔɔk bikkpit bikkpit; ɔzzànga bassɛɛnmɛnɛ, ɔlɔm ikpɔkɔlɔ ɔbbɔk, ɔsam bɛfɔl using bukkpɔ ɔbɛpɛ. Ɔlɔɔt wa ukkwoongnɛ ɔbbwɔɔpmɛ uloko ba ɔbɛlɛ lile.
41005005	Kikoon la kɛtɔm, ɔssɛ baang ukkpit ka lalli, ubbwulu ikpok la kibungu la kibungu, ɔkɔɔm bɛfaak a lattaal ɔkkwɛɛmɛ kɛyɔɔng.
41005006	Ɔdɔkɔ utii fulufulu ka ɔyɛnnɛ Jesus, keem ɔmma umii ɔttɔ ukunmɛ laddu.
41005007	Ɔzzɔɔk kibungu la ɔkkpɔlɔngkkpɔ lɛmmwɔɔl ɔttɛ, “Jesus, Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm! mung aggyan ’bɔng la anaam? Nkkpengewɔ nttɛ attina kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, afɔngɔnɛ akama kɛyɔɔ!”
41005008	(Ɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng ka Jesus ulenɛ baang ka ɔttɛnɛ, “Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm a kuyeeng, tta asseke waanwalam ’wɔng!”)
41005009	Jesus ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ, “Azzanga nang?” Waanwalam ’wɔng baang ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Anaam nzzanga ‘Kɛkaan’, ile ggbadam ning!”
41005010	Ubee bbwak ukkpenge Jesus ɔttɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔggba banaang-a-kɛsɛɛm a liyeeng ka ɛkpansi ’yɔng baang.
41005011	Kɛkaan ikkumma sa lɛbaang kɛdɔkɔ baang ka kazzi kɛtɛkɛtɛ lufoom ekpok.
41005012	Ɔzzánga liyeeng ’sɔng baang likkpenge Jesus littɛ, “Aggbayɛlɛ afɔngɔ lusso gwa kɛkaan ikkumma ’sɔng baang nkwaaning ifulayɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ.”
41005013	Uyila ɔttɛ limii, ɔzzánga litta lisseke waanwalam ’wɔng baang limii limal ikkumma. Kɛkaan ikkumma ’sɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ, iggba-ɔggba innɔ ikkumma kubbwɔɔk, imma imii ka imakkpa libbwe, ifoto ittɔ ka tɔkɔlɔ, itaak kwɛɛnɛkwɛɛnɛ.
41005014	Balɔɔt ba bakɔɔmnɛ ikkumma ’yɔng baang bamma bamii babwɔɔlɔ kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng kwa kɔnaangnɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ a ssala basak batta ka lamma. Balɔɔt bamma bamii kɛyɛn kwa kulenɛ lɛnaang.
41005015	Baffunɛ ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus bayɛn ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang wa ɔtaanɛ ule la kɛkaan a banaang-a-kɛsɛɛm a liyeeng ka kkwɔɔt. Ɔdɔkɔ baang ka ɔtaanɛ kwetkwet la iwɔkɔlɔ ammɛ doddo; kɔbbwɔpɔbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
41005016	Balɔɔt ba balenɛ kkyɛk babwɔɔlɔ babbɛ kwa kɔnaangnɛ ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang wa ulenɛ la banaang-a-kɛsɛɛm a liyeeng ka kkwɔɔt la kwa ikkumma.
41005017	Ɔzzánga battɛ Jesus ɔgbata usseke ɛkpansi abbɛ.
41005018	Jesus ule ka akkpaat ning mung, waanwalam ’wɔng baang wa ɔdɔkɔnɛ la ipiliza ukkpengemɛ ɔttɛ, “Afɔngɔnɛ nkupwɔ bɛɛ!”
41005019	Jesus usimɛ lɛfɔngɔ ukupmɛ. Lutini ’gwɔng ɔdɔkɔ ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛ ɔttɛ, “Appyɛlɛ isimisimi afula, amii abwɔɔlɔ itutum annɔ kɔlɔɔk kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulewɔnɛ lɛnaang, la kibbe-lɛttɔ sa abbemɛnɛ.”
41005020	Waanwalam ’wɔng baang ɔgbata tɛ, ɔssɛ utuma ka Laffɛ-Zzɔɔp ɔkɔɔm kuttu kɔlɔɔk kwa Jesus ulemɛnɛ lɛnaang. Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba bappyeenɛkwɛ, kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ gaang gaang.
41005021	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛ isimisimi ukum kukupa libbwe kwa kkwɔn. Kibbi balɔɔt baffu bataa bakkpitmɛ baang ka lufoom a libbwe.
41005022	Akkala-mitin wa ɔzzanganɛ Jairus uffu ɔffɔ. Ɔyɛnnɛ Jesus, ɔsammɛ kɛyɔɔng ɔzzɔɔk-mɛ baang ka lataak,
41005023	ukkpengemɛ kɔbɛtɛmɛ. Ɔttɛ, “Waan anaam wa utiti wa wanavva ɔffaakmɛ gaang gaang. Nkkpee, affu atelemɛ labɔɔk ɔkkɔɔnɛ ɔppwamɛ, uddu!”
41005024	Jesus ufeele ukupmɛ bamii. Balɔɔt ggbadam bakup Jesus bamii. Basseke ka baggbepmɛnɛ ning lafoom laffa laffa.
41005025	Wanavva vvɔn ɔdɔkɔ baang wa ulenɛ likkpa zzɔɔppaliffa lɛffɔ ka ussinɛ ullut lɔnnyɔ.
41005026	Badibbya ggbadam battulamɛbong, ɔzzànga ntɔk a lɛttɔ ba ule. Ɔtakabong ikkobo gaang ka kɛssɛ, ɔzzànga lutini gwa buppwamɛnɛ, ɔppyɛɛ ɔkama-ɔkama ɔffaakmɛ.
41005027	Uppyeenɛ utum Jesus, ɔmal ka kibbi balɔɔt sa kikupmɛnɛ baang ɔssɛ ukup Jesus ka isimi.
41005028	Ɔkɔɔm utolo kɛyɔɔng kɛyɔɔng ɔttɛ, “Nkkpa nsingimɛ ka iwɔkɔlɔ baang keem, vvenɛ ɔppwanɛ.”
41005029	Usingi Jesus ka uwɔkɔlɔ, linnyi lizzamɛ eseese. Wanavva ’wɔng baang ɔkɔɔlɔ kɛyɔɔng ɔttɛ iffaak ammɛ isaalmɛbong.
41005030	Jesus ɔkɔɔlɔ ɔttɛ uttulabong ɔlɔɔt. Keem usikili ka tɔkɔlɔ kibbi baang ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Nyinɔɔng usinginɛnɛ ka iwɔkɔlɔ?”
41005031	Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, “Kɔttɛ ayɛnbong tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt baggbepwɔnɛ baang, mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ abbal lɛbap attɛ nnyinɔɔng usingiwɔnɛ?”
41005032	Jesus usesele tɔttɔt ɔggyan ɔttɛ ɔsan ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang.
41005033	Wanavva wɔng baang ɔkɔɔlɔbong bwa bulemɛnɛ lɛnaang; ɔzzánga ɔtta uffu la bbwɔp la bbwɔp, ukun laddu ka lataak a Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛ lɔkkwɔɔn.
41005034	Jesus utolo unnyimɛ ɔttɛ, “Waan anaam, kiyila annɔ kɛnaangwɔbong ɔppwawɔ. Ataa doddo, iffaak annɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ isaal.”
41005035	Jesus ɔdɔkɔ utii baang ka kɛlɔɔk, ka balɔɔt ba bassinɛ ka ssala Jairus baffunɛ babwɔɔlɔ Jairus battɛ, “Waan annɔ ubbebong. Ukopolo-lukopolo akama abbalmɛ ’bɔng lɛyɔɔ?”
41005036	Jesus usi kwa balɔɔknɛ baang lɛgɔpɔlɔ, ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛ ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔbbwɔpɔwɔ, ɔzzànga ayila attɛ nkkwoong mung.”
41005037	Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk usimɛ likup umii lusso lusso ɔgbaa la Peter la John, etele a James, la James biini.
41005038	Baffu baffɔ ka ssala Jairus, Jesus ɔyɛn ɛfɛɛn ning baang butubutubutu uppyee lammwɔɔl a kullu baang ka bakkwanɛ, gɔɔ balɔɔt balɔk bakkwabong battɔl layilili.
41005039	Ɔmal umii ka tɔkɔlɔ ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Abutubutubutu ’wɔng bɛɛ? akkwayɔng ’bɔng? Waantiti ba ɔtaka ubbe, ule ka bilaa!”
41005040	Abbɛ basɛɛkmɛ. Ammɛ ɔttɛbɛ batta ɔkkpɛlɛ. Abassɛ la abakka la balɔɔt-a-kɔssɛ ammɛ bakkyaat bamal bamii ka tɔkɔlɔ lɛnɔk za waantiti umininɛ.
41005041	Jesus ɔlɔmmɛ ka kɔbɔɔk ufeele, utolo unnyimɛ, ɔttɛ, “Talitha, koum.” Ning baang ulenɛ kɛttɛ, “Waanawanavva, nbwɔɔlɔwɔ nttɛ afeele, abee-lubee!”
41005042	Ufeele eseese ɔssɛ baang ukkpit. (Utiimɛ likkpa zzɔɔppaliffa.) Kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ gaang gaang ka ’kwɔng kɔnaangnɛ.
41005043	Jesus ɔttamabɛ ɔttɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ babwɔɔlɔ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk, ɔbbal lɛttɛ, “Annyimɛyɔng bwakuzzi uzzi.
41006001	Jesus ɔgbata ka ɛfɛɛn ’kwɔng baang, ɔppyɛlɛ isimisimi, ufula ka lɛffɛ ammɛ biini la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ka bakupmɛnɛ.
41006002	Ɔffɔnɛ Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ, utte kikopolo balɔɔt ka ggwoon-a-mitin. Balɔɔt ggbadam badɔkɔ baang. Bappyeenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ukopolonɛ, kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ kɔsak. Babap battɛ, “Mbyɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ bissimɛ ka yang? Uwɔng bɔka kukele kwa ɔsannɛ ning? Ɔnaang nang ukkwoong ɔnaang bɛmaanga?
41006003	Ammɛ lissi ulenɛ kapenta, waan a Mary ɔɔ, James la Joseph, la Judas, la Simon, itele ammɛ lissi ɔɔ? Itele ammɛ ya bwanavva lissi ballunɛ mung ɔɔ?” Ɔzzánga bafimmɛ tɛ.
41006004	Jesus ɔlɔɔk unnyibɛ ɔttɛ, “Uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bannyimɛ latele ifɛɛn ifɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ usseke ka lɛffɛ ammɛ biini ka ɛfɛɛn ikpana ammɛ la itutum ammɛ bale bafimmɛ.”
41006005	Bɛmaanga bɛlɔk usi likkwoong ɔnaang baang, ɔzzànga utele bwaan a balɔɔt ssup ning ba balenɛ la iffaak labɔɔk, ɔppwabɛ.
41006006	Kɔkɛɛlɛmɛ gaang gaang ka balɔɔt ’bɔng baang basɛlɛnɛ kiyila. Jesus ukopolo balɔɔt ukkpit laffɛ ’zɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ.
41006007	Ɔkkwɔɔ balɔɔt-a-kɔssɛ ammɛ uloko ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn. Tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔsangabɛ ɔtɔɔm ɔttamabɛ ɔttɛ bassɛ balɔɔt baffa baffa. Unnyibɛ lakke za kɛbɛtɛ banaang-a-kɛsɛɛm a liyeeng.
41006008	Ɔkamalabɛ ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akɔɔmyɔng bulɔk ɔgbaa la lukut ka ɛtɔk. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akɔɔmyɔng brɛɛd, la ɛssɔ lubbwoom, gɔɔ assɛɛnyɔng ikkobo ka issɔ.
41006009	Awɔkɔlɔyɔng ikkpabukkpɔ, ɔzzànga afɔngɔyɔng uwɔkɔlɔ wa gbɔɔ kɛkɔɔm.”
41006010	Ɔbbalbɛ lɛbwɔɔlɔ ɔttɛ, “Ɛfɛɛn duu ya batɔkwɔnɛyɔng ka laggele, ataayɔng ka ssala ssɔn ’sɔng baang tɔttɔt agbatayɔng ka killu ’sɔng baang.
41006011	Affɔnɛyɔng ka lɛffɛ za basiwɔnɛyɔng ka laggele lɛtɔk, ɔlɔk basi kwa alɔɔknɛyɔng lɛgɔpɔlɔ, akkwɔlɔyɔng ibut ka bukkpɔ annyɔɔng allɔtyɔng, agbatayɔng. Uwɔng ule ɔtaabɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kinnyi ntemele.”
41006012	Bamii bakopolo balɔɔt battɛ bakkyaa bubbi abbɛ bafɔngɔ.
41006013	Baggba ipiliza bafɔngɔ kang, banaang bannɛ-olive bapwɔɔng balɔɔt iffaak, ɔppwabɛ.
41006014	Ubeet Herod uppyee tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kuttu a Jesus kulenɛ lɛwaala ifɛɛn ifɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ. Balɔɔt balɔk banngwa battɛ, “John, Ɔnaang-a-baptizim, ɔppyɛlɛbong utii ka kuddu! Kwakkwɛ baang ɔyanganɛ lakke ’zɔng za ɔkɔɔmnɛ ɔnaang bɛmaanga.”
41006015	Balɔɔt balɔk battɛ, “Ammɛ ulenɛ Elijah.” Balɔk battɛ, “Baang uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm tɛ̀ttɛ̀ wa iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ.”
41006016	Herod uppyeenɛ, ɔttɛ, “Baang John, Ɔnaang-a-baptizim! Ndɔkɔbong nzzamɛ lɛttɔ, ɔzzànga mung ɔppyɛlɛbong utii ka kuddu!”
41006017	Herod biini ɔggbabɛ lɛkamala ɔttɛ bakaa John bannyimɛ ɔssɛɛn ngbakkɔpɔ. Herod ɔnaang ’kwɔng, kɔlɔɔk a Herodias, wa ɔtɔknɛ, mkkpandɔk ɔdɔkɔ ullu la Philip etele ammɛ.
41006018	John, Ɔnaang-a-baptizim, ɔbwɔɔlɔ Herod kkpɛtkkpɛt ɔttɛ, “Ba kɔyyɛɛp ka atɔknɛ wanavva etele annɔ!”
41006019	Herodias uloko John kisikɔng, ɔggyan ɛtɔk ya kɛwwɔɔlmɛ, ɔzzànga lɛttɔ usi lɛtɔk ka Herod ɔtakanɛ liyila.
41006020	John ɔbbwɔpɔ Herod gaang gaang, ka ɔsannɛ kkpelegedee ɔttɛ John ɔdɔkɔ ɔlɔɔt wa doddo, gɔɔ bubbi nakanaka usi lɛnaang. Kwakkwɛ baang ulokomɛnɛ ka kuddu. Kutolo a John kuggwoommɛ kɛgɔpɔlɔ kɔsak, nkkpandɔk kutunmɛ gaang gaang ɛkɛtɛ duu ya uppyeenɛ kutolo ammɛ.
41006021	Ka lakpeke, Herodias uffu ɔyanga kufuk. Ɔdɔkɔ ka livve ekokomele Herod. Herod ɔbwɔɔlɔ baggboggbo balɔɔt a kɛnaang a Government, la bazzilɛttɔ-isɔgya la bakɔɔm-ɛkpansi a Galilee.
41006022	Waan a Herodias wa wanavva ɔtta ɔtɔm, kuffi Herod gaang gaang la bakekeen ammɛ. Ɔzzánga ubeet Herod ɔlɔɔk la waanawanavva ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Mung aggyan attɛ ayanga ’bɔng? Bɔfɛɛn duu bwa aggyannɛ, vvenɛ nnyiwɔ.”
41006023	Uyim bikkpit bikkpit ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛ ɔttɛ, “Nyimbong nttɛ vvenɛ nnyiwɔ bɔfɛɛn duu bwa aggyannɛ, gɔɔ mkkpa ule kufaak ɛkpansi anaam!”
41006024	Waanawanavva ’wɔng baang ɔtta umii ɔbap abakka ɔttɛ, “Mung nle nlɔɔk nttɛ nggyan ’bɔng?” Abakka ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Lɛttɔ a John, Ɔnaang-a-baptizim.”
41006025	Waanawanavva ’wɔng ɔkɛnɛ ɔppyɛlɛ isimisimi umii ɔbwɔɔlɔ ubeet bwa ɔggyannɛ, ɔttɛ, “Assɛɛn lɛttɔ a John, Ɔnaang-a-baptizim, mung ka kɛkkpala annyinɛ gedegede mung!”
41006026	Ubeet uppyeenɛ ning baang, livve lɛbbɔlmɛ gaang gaang, ɔzzànga usi lɛbɛlɛ lɛsan tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ule ufim ka ulenɛ liyim ka lusso bakekeen ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
41006027	Ubeet ɔsanga ɔlɔɔt wa ɔkatmɛnɛ ɔtɔɔm ɔttɛ umii ɔzza lɛttɔ a John uffu. Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang umii ka tɔkɔlɔ a ggwoon igbakkɔpɔ, ɔzza John lɛttɔ.
41006028	Ɔsamzɛ ɔssɛɛn ka kɛkkpala ufee waanawanavva ’wɔng baang. Ammɛ ɔsamzɛ unnyi abakka.
41006029	Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a John bappyeenɛ ning baang, baffu basam kakku a John balli.
41006030	Bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus bappyɛlɛnɛ, baduda la Jesus, babwɔɔlɔmɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balenɛ likopolo la bɛfɛɛn bya balenɛ lɛnaang.
41006031	Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus la Jesus biini basi kufuk kwa kizzi kazzi lɛyɛn ɔssanga ka balɔɔt balenɛ gbɔɔ yɔngɔlɔ-yɔngɔlɔ-yɔngɔlɔ. Ɔzzánga ɔbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Afeele ibbɛyɔng mung imii iggyanyɔng ɛfɛɛn a kɛyɔɔng a kɛyɔɔng itaayɔng nkwaaning afɛkɛlɛyɔng.”
41006032	Ɔzzánga bafeele kɛyɔɔng abbɛ bamii ka ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn ya balɔɔt basinɛ lile.
41006033	Balɔɔt bayɛnbɛ ka bagbatanɛ bakɔɔlɔbɛ eseese. Ɔzzánga bagbata laffɛ abbɛ bakɔngɔ, bamma likum a likum bamii batte Jesus la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ lɛffɔ ka ɛfɛɛn ’kwɔng baang.
41006034	Jesus, ɔttanɛ ka akkpaat, ɔyɛn kibbi balɔɔt ning baang. Babbemɛ lɛttɔ gaang gaang, ka ɔyɛnnɛbɛ ning baang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ itɔɔn ya isɛlɛnɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔppyɛɛknɛyɛ. Ukopolobɛ bɛfɛɛn ggbadam.
41006035	Ɔmmɛnɛ, balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bamii babwɔɔlɔmɛ battɛ, “Ɛkɛtɛ emiibong tɛ, akke attɛ ile kɛyɔɔng a kɛyɔɔng ka ɛfɛɛn ’kwɔng mung tɛ.
41006036	Abwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt ’bɔng mung bagbata bamii ka itɔɔm la laffɛ za lakkɛtɛnɛ mung nkwaaning bayɛn kazzi balɛɛp bazzi bɛɛ.”
41006037	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Annyɔɔng aggyanyɔng kazzi annyiyɔngbɛ bazzi.” Babapmɛ battɛ, “Aggyan attɛ isam lalɔp Inaira lakkyaat imii ilɛɛp brɛɛd innyibɛ, bazzi ɔɔ?”
41006038	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛ ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Kkpɔɔ igɔngɔ a brɛɛd issekewɔyɔng ifang? Amii appyɛɛkyɔng ee?” Balenɛ lɛyɛn, baffu babwɔɔlɔmɛ battɛ, “Igɔngɔ kubbwɔɔk la isɛɛnabannyi iffa.”
41006039	Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt-a-kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ balɔɔkbɛ bataa lakup lakup baang ka lifaat.
41006040	Bataa ning baang ka likkwɔɔn lakup a lakup. Likup lɛlɔk lalɔp a balɔɔt kubbwɔɔk, lɛlɔk lalɔp a balɔɔt laffa la balɔɔt zzɔɔp.
41006041	Jesus ɔsam igɔngɔ a brɛɛd ’yɔng baang kubbwɔɔk la isɛɛnabannyi iffa, uyeek ɔppyɛɛk ka libat, uwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang. Ɔlɔm igɔngɔ a brɛɛd ’yɔng baang ɔbbɔk, unnyi balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ batan balɔɔt ’bɔng baang. Ɔssɛ ɔsam isɛɛnabannyi ya iffa ’yɔng baang ɔbɛngɛlɛbɛ.
41006042	Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔt uzzi uwukala.
41006043	Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ battɔng izuku a brɛɛd la izuku isɛɛnabannyi iyipi isangala zzɔɔppiffa.
41006044	Balɔɔt ba bazzinɛ kazzi ’kwɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ badɔkɔ innɔ zzɔɔppiffa la kufaak.
41006045	Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ bamal ka akkpaat eseese bakɔɔm bassɛ bakɔngɔmɛ ammɛ, bamii Bethsaida, ka kukupa libbwe kwa kkwɔn. Ammɛ ɔbwɔɔlɔ kibbi balɔɔt ’sɔng baang kɛkkyaap.
41006046	Uvvenɛ balɔɔt ’bɔng baang liteele, ɔgbata umii ɔssɛɛn luzɔɔm ka libat ekpok.
41006047	Kulele kɔnaangnɛ, akkpaat ɔffɔbong ka kasɛkɛ libbwe. Ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang Jesus usseke kɛyɔɔng ka likum.
41006048	Ɔyɛnnɛ ka balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ balenɛ libwum kɛffa kisibɛ lɛfɔngɔ bamii lusso lusso ka badudanɛsɛ laduda, ufeele ka bɛzzɔkɔ ikalangka ikkyaat la bwɔlaaning ya kibbessolo, ɔssɛ ka ɛkkpabannyi umii ka ɛfɛɛn abbɛ. Uffubongbɛ kikopo ning mung.
41006049	Ɔzzánga bayɛnmɛ ning baang ka ɔssɛnɛ ka ɛkkpabannyi, banngwa bakɔɔm babungu battɛ, “Baang ubbu-kɔwɔkɔlɔ!”
41006050	Ɔbbwɔpɔbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ka bayɛnmɛnɛ. Jesus ɔlɔɔk eseese unnyibɛ ɔttɛ, “Kkaamyɔng luppyɔm kkpɔk, anaam. Ɔfɔngɔwɔyɔng kɛbbwɔpɔ.”
41006051	Ɔmal umii ɔtaa ka akkpaat la abbɛ, kɛffa kɛtɛt. Kɔkɛɛlɛ balɔɔt-a-kɔssɛ ammɛ gaang gaang,
41006052	ka batakanɛ ifɛɛt a kinnyi innɔ balɔɔt zzɔɔppiffa la kufaak kazzi lɛsan; basi likkwoong battinakwɛ bakopo.
41006053	Bakum libbwe baffu ka ɛkpansi a Genesaret, ka ɛfɛɛn a basikinɛ akkpaat.
41006054	Balɔɔt bakɔɔlɔ Jesus eseese ka battanɛ ka akkpaat.
41006055	Bamma bakkpit ɛkpansi ’yɔng baang, batɔkɔ balɔɔt iffaak bamii bawulabɛ ka iwula ka ɛfɛɛn a bappyeenɛ battɛ Jesus ule baang.
41006056	Ɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ya Jesus umiinɛ, bakɔɔm balɔɔt iffaak bafeemɛ. Mkkpa umii ka laffɛ balɔɔt, ɔlɔk ɔppyɛɛ umii ka lamma, gɔɔ ɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ, batɔkɔ balɔɔt iffaak batta ka kappya bakkpengemɛ battɛ ɔfɔngɔ lɛwang-uwɔkɔlɔ ammɛ keem lisingibɛ. Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba lisinginɛbɛ, ɔppwabɛ.
41007001	Balɔɔt a Pharisees balɔk la bakopolo-Lafɔɔ ba bassinɛ Jerusalem bataa bakkpit Jesus.
41007002	Bayɛn balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus balɔk ka bakɔɔmnɛ labɔɔk za lasinɛ lɛkkwɔngɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lafɔɔ lalɔɔknɛ bazzi kazzi. Ning baang ulenɛ kɛttɛ basibong labɔɔk liyila tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt a Pharisees battɛnɛ balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ bayila.
41007003	(Balɔɔt a Pharisees la ba Jews bakup gwa bappyeenɛ ka balɔɔt iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ; basinɛ labɔɔk liyila tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lafɔɔ abbɛ lalɔɔknɛ, kazzi ba bazzi.
41007004	Gɔɔ bɔfɛɛn bwa bussinɛ ka kappya ba bazzi batakabong bazzaabwɛ. Bayanga lafɔɔ ggbadam tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛzzaa immonggo, la ikkpo, bɛkkpala, la igolo-kimini za bakupnɛ.)
41007005	Ɔzzánga balɔɔt a Pharisees la bakopolo-Lafɔɔ babap Jesus battɛ, “Mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ annɔ basi lukopolo balɔɔt ayyɔɔt ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ likup, bappyɛɛ basi labɔɔk liyila tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lafɔɔ lalɔɔknɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ bazzi kazzi?”
41007006	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Biyɛnɛ pya Isaiah ɔyɛnnɛ utumwɔyɔng bile bbwak ka lɔkkwɔɔn! Annyɔɔng bakkala lɛlaak ka lɔkkwɔɔn, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔkkpɔknɛ ɔttɛ; ’Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛ, Balɔɔt ’bɔng bannyinɛ latele ka kamma keem. Ɔzzànga ippyam abbɛ baloko fulufulu bassekenɛ.
41007007	Ba kɔyyɛɛp ka bazɔɔmnɛ bannyinɛ ka bakopolonɛ lafɔɔ za balɔɔt banaangnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm!’
41007008	“Lafɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba ateleyɔng; ateleyɔng lafɔɔ za balɔɔt bassɛɛnnɛ.”
41007009	Jesus utolo ɔgbaa ɔttɛ, “Asanyɔng lagban za akɔɔmnɛ afimyɔng Lafɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔkkɔɔnɛ lukopolo annyɔɔng lɔtta kuttu.
41007010	Kɔttɛ Moses ɔdɔkɔ ɔddawɔyɔng ɔttɛ, ‘Ateleyɔng ssaawɔ la ssakawɔ, ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔbbaatnɛ abakka ɔlɔk abassɛ ule wa kɛwwɔɔl.’
41007011	Ɔzzànga annyɔɔng akopoloyɔng balɔɔt attɛyɔng, ɔlɔɔt ɔyanganɛ bɔfɛɛn bwa ɔkɔɔmnɛ ɔyaam abassɛ la abakka; ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Corban’ (ning baang ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ bɔfɛɛn ’bwɔng baang busseke bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm);
41007012	ukkwoong mung ɔfɔngɔ abakka la abassɛ kɛyaam.
41007013	Lukopolo gwa akopolonɛyɔng balɔɔt lɔbɛpɛbong Lafɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Bɛfɛɛn bile ppwap bya anaangnɛyɔng ning mung.”
41007014	Jesus ɔbbal kibbi ’sɔng baang lɛkkwɔɔ, utolo unnyibɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng agɔpɔlɔ appyeeyɔng.
41007015	Bɔfɛɛn bwa bussinɛ ka vveeng bumal ɔlɔɔt ka tɔkɔlɔ lissi bule bunaangmɛ ule la bubbi. Bwa bussinɛ ɔlɔɔt ka tɔkɔlɔ bunaangmɛnɛ ɔnaang bubbi.
41007016	(Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyanganɛ latɔɔk za kippyee kɔlɔɔk, uppyee!)”
41007017	Ɔgbatanɛ ka kibbi ’sɔng baang umii ka ssala, balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ baffu babapmɛ battɛ ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ifɛɛt a kɔlɔɔk kwa ɔlɔɔknɛ baang.
41007018	Jesus ɔlɔɔk unnyibɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔzzánga annyɔɔng kɔlɔɔk ba abɛlɛyɔng lɛsan attayɔng balɔɔt balɔk ɔɔ, faa doddo ba appyeeyɔng? Bɔfɛɛn bwa bumalnɛ ɔlɔɔt ka tɔkɔlɔ bubbal likkwoong bunaang ɔlɔɔt ɔnaang bubbi ba bule,
41007019	ka busimɛnɛ ka luppyam limii, bufulamɛ ka lɛmmɛ, ulenɛ lɛmmɛ, ɔnnyabwɛ ɔzzɔɔk. (Ning mung, Jesus ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ izzi lutini kazzi ɔkkpɛlɛ).
41007020	Ɔbbal lɛlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Bɔfɛɛn bwa bussinɛ ɔlɔɔt ka tɔkɔlɔ bunaangnɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔnaang bubbi.
41007021	Babbu ittina ya idɛmnɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔnaang bubbi, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛssɛ-kɛzak, la ssip, la kɛwwɔɔl a balɔɔt,
41007022	la kikup wanavva ɔlɔɔt, la kuwɔnɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ, bissi ka tɔkɔlɔ luppyam ɔlɔɔt; gɔɔ lutini bubbi ɔkkpɛlɛ, ikkɔlɔ, kɛdɛm, kɔfɔk, lɛgbɛɛk, lɔbba, la bizingizingi.
41007023	Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbyɛ bissi ka tɔkɔlɔ ɔlɔɔt bɛnaangmɛ ɔnaang bubbi.”
41007024	Jesus ufeele umii ka ɛkpansi ɛlɔk bakang kɛtɛkɛtɛ a Tyre. Ɔmal ka tɔkɔlɔ a ggwoon gɔɔ usi lɛggyan ɔttɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔsan ɔttɛ ule baang, ɔzzànga usi likkwoong uddumu tɔttɔt.
41007025	Wanavva wa waan ammɛ ɔyanganɛ ipiliza uppyeenɛ kwa Jesus, uffu eseese ɛfɛɛn a Jesus. Ɔttɔ ukunmɛ laddu baang ka lataak.
41007026	Wa wanavva ’wɔng wa akanakana, bamaatmɛ ka ɛkpansi a Phoenicia ka Syria. Ukkpenge Jesus ɔttɛ ɔggba ipiliza ’yɔng baang usseke awaan.
41007027	Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Afɔngɔbong ssii: ittebong bwɔɔntiti kazzi linnyi. Ba kɔyyɛɛp ka isamnɛ kazzi a bwɔɔntiti, izzɔɔk ibbwa!”
41007028	Wanavva ’wɔng baang ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Dedde, gɔɔ ibbwa ittɔng mung bwaan izuku-kazzi bya bɛttɔnɛ bwɔɔntiti kuttɔɔk okkpokolo izzi!”
41007029	Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛ ɔttɛ, “Appyɛlɛ afula, kɛppyɛlɛ kamma annɔ kɛnaangbong ipiliza itta isseke waan annɔ.”
41007030	Wanavva ’wɔng baang ɔppyɛlɛ isimisimi ufula. Ɔyɛn waan ammɛ ka umininɛ. Ka lɔkkwɔɔn, ipiliza ɛttabong esseke waan ’wɔng baang.
41007031	Jesus ɔgbata ka Tyre ɔzza ka Sidon ɔtta ka libbwe a Galilee, ukup ɛtɔk a Laffɛ-Zzɔɔp.
41007032	Balɔɔt balɔk bakɔɔm ɔlɔɔt wa usinɛ ka latɔɔk lippyee usi kɛlɔɔk likkwoong, bakkpenge Jesus battɛ, ɔbɛtɛmɛ labɔɔk.
41007033	Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔsammɛ ɔgbata ka kibbi ’sɔng baang. Ɔsam bɛnnɔ ɔssɛɛnmɛ ka latɔɔk, ɔkkɔl libbaak ɔggbɔ ka kɛnnɔ usingimɛ ka lɛlaak.
41007034	Jesus uyeek ɔppyɛɛk ka libat, uffimi gaang gaang tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔlɔɔk unnyi ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Ephphatha,” ning baang ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Wongolo!”
41007035	Eseese, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ukkwoong uppyee. Utuulumɛbong lɛlaak, ɔlɔɔk ppwool ppwool ɔkkpɛlɛ, gɔɔ lɛkkɔ mɛ ba lɛbɛlɛ lisik.
41007036	Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔkamalabɛ ɔttɛ bafɔngɔkwɛ kɛsam babwɔɔlɔ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk. Ning baang ka bakamanɛ lɔkama bayaam kuttu akkwɛ.
41007037	Kɔkɛɛlɛ balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba bappyeenɛkwɛ gaang gaang. Babungumɛ battɛ, “Ɔnaang bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bɛyyɛɛp bɛffata. Ɔnaang bassi-latɔɔk bappyee. Ɔnaang basi-kɛlɔɔk likkwoong, bakkwoong ɔkkpɛlɛ.
41008001	Gɔɔ ba ɔtaka ɔmmɛ gbɔɔ, kibbi balɔɔt kɛlɔk kiffu kibbi baang. Kazzi kasaalnɛ balɔɔt ’bɔng baang, Jesus ɔkkwɔɔ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ,
41008002	“Balɔɔt ’bɔng mung babbenɛbong lɛttɔ gaang tɛ, bataabong mung la anaam ka bɛtɔm bɛkkyaat, mung kazzi kasaalbongbɛ.
41008003	Nttɛnɛbɛ bafula ka batakanɛ kazzi lizzi, vvenɛ balɔɔt balɔk ba bassinɛ fulufulu bannɔk ka ɛtɔk.”
41008004	Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ babapmɛ battɛ, “Mung ka akpelenene ’wɔng mung, kazzi ile iyɛn yang kwa kale kaddu kibbi balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ?”
41008005	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛ ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Baang ayangayɔng igɔngɔ a brɛɛd ifang?” Bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, “Igɔngɔ innamikkyaat.”
41008006	Ɔttɛ balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bataa baang ka lisse. Ɔsam igɔngɔ a brɛɛd ’yɔng baang innamikyaat uwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang, ɔbbɔk, ɔssɛɛn balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, batan kibbi ’sɔng baang. Abbɛ banaang ning baang.
41008007	Bwaan isɛɛnabannyi idɔkɔbɛ baang ɔgbaa. Jesus ɔsamyɛ, uwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ basamyɛ batanbɛ.
41008008	Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ uzzi, uwukala. Balɔɔt ba bazzinɛ kazzi ’kwɔng baang baggba-ɔggba innɔ zzɔɔp. Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ battɔng izuku ya issekenɛ, iyipi isangala ning innamikkyaat. Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔ kibbi ’sɔng baang kɛkkyaap,
41008010	bamal ka akkpaat la balɔɔt-a-kɔssɛ ammɛ bamii lɛffɛ za lɛzzanganɛ Dalmanutha.
41008011	Balɔɔt a Pharisees balɔk baffu ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus babee bbwak bakangalamɛ ikangala. Badɔkɔ baggyanmɛ kɛkaa, ɔzzánga battɛ ɔnaang bɛmaanga ɔyɔɔ ɔttɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ubeemɛ la isimi.
41008012	Jesus usini lifiki tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔttɛ, “Mbɔng balɔɔt a lizan baggyannɛ kɛyɛn a bɛmaanga ning? Maaye, nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔngbong! Ning baang baala nnaang nyɔɔ kɛssanga balɔɔt ’bɔng baang!”
41008013	Ɔgbata ɔkɔngɔbɛ, ɔmal ka akkpaat umii kukupa libbwe kwa kkwɔn.
41008014	Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ basumala kɛkɔɔm a brɛɛd doddo, badɔkɔ bayini ugɔngɔ a brɛɛd vvɔn keem ka akkpaat.
41008015	Jesus ɔkamalabɛ ɔttɛ, “Asan anaangyɔng tɛ, akatwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng assekeyɔng yeast a balɔɔt a Pharisees la yeast a Herod tɛ.”
41008016	Batolo abbɛ abbɛ battɛ, “Ɔlɔɔk ka isinɛ brɛɛd lɛyanga ka nakanaka tɛ.”
41008017	Jesus ɔkɔɔlɔ bwa balɔɔknɛ batum, ɔzzánga ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Mbɔng alɔɔknɛyɔng kwa kɛsɛlɛ a brɛɛd? Ɔzzánga ba ataka asan appyee affatayɔng ɔɔ? Akkpɛlɛyɔng kittina kɔlɔɔk ning ɔɔ?
41008018	Ayangayɔng zzeen, mung ba akkwoong ayɛnyɔng ɔɔ? Ayangayɔng latɔɔk, ba akkwoong appyeeyɔng ɔɔ? Ba akkeyɔng
41008019	ka nbbɔknɛ igɔngɔ a brɛɛd kubbwɔɔk nnyi innɔ balɔɔt zzɔɔppiffa la kufaak ɔɔ? Izuku ya issekenɛ idɔkɔ iyipi isangala ifang?” Bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, “Zzɔɔppiffa.”
41008020	“Ka nbbɔknɛ igɔngɔ a brɛɛd innamikkyaat nnyi innɔ balɔɔt zzɔɔp bɛɛ, izuku ya issekenɛ idɔkɔ iyipi isangala ifang?” Bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, “Innamikkyaat.”
41008021	Ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔzzánga ning bbɔk ba ataka asanyɔng ɔɔ?”
41008022	Baffu baffɔ ka Bethsaida ka ɛfɛɛn a balɔɔt bakɔɔmnɛ ussi-ifim bafee Jesus bakkpengemɛ battɛ usingi ussi-ifim ’wɔng baang.
41008023	Jesus ɔlɔmmɛ ka kɔbɔɔk ɔlɛkɛmɛ ɔgbata ka lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang. Jesus ulemɛnɛ libbaak lɛkkɔl ɔllɔt, ɔbɛtɛmɛ labɔɔk, ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ, “Akkwoongbong ayɛn bulɔk ɔɔ?”
41008024	Ussi-ifim ’wɔng baang uyeek ɔppyɛɛk ka libat, ɔttɛ, “Iii, nyɛn mung balɔɔt, ɔzzànga bale tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɛssɛ bɛssɛnɛ bikkpit mung.”
41008025	Jesus ɔbbal ussi-ifim ’wɔng baang labɔɔk ka zzeen litele. Kikkpit ’sɔng keem ɔppyɛɛk bit, ifim isaalmɛ, ɔppyɛlɛ ɔyɛn bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ppwool.
41008026	Jesus ɔttɛmɛ ufula, ɔkamalamɛ ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ appyɛlɛ amii ka lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang tɛ.”
41008027	Jesus la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bagbata bamii laffɛ za lakkɛtɛnɛ Caesarea Philippi. Baffɔnɛ ka ɛtɔk, Jesus ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Abwɔɔlɔnɛyɔng, mung balɔɔt battɛ anaam nnyinɔɔng?”
41008028	Bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, “Balɔɔt balɔk battɛ annɔ John, Ɔnaang-a-baptizim, balɔk battɛ annɔ Elijah, balɔk bappyɛɛ battɛ annɔ uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
41008029	Ɔbapbɛ abbɛ, ɔttɛ, “Ngkka annyɔɔng bɛɛ, attina attɛyɔng anaam nnyinɔɔng?” Peter ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Annɔ alenɛ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ.”
41008030	Keem Jesus ɔkamalabɛ ɔttɛ, “Afɔngɔyɔng ’kwɔng kɛsam abwɔɔlɔyɔng ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk tɛ.”
41008031	Jesus ukopolo balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ ɔyɛn akama ɔttala, gɔɔ bagɛlɛnya la bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm, la bakopolo-Lafɔɔ vvenɛ bakalamɛ. Vvenɛ bawwɔɔlmɛ; ɔzzànga ɔffɔnɛ bɛtɔm bɛkkyaat, vvenɛ ufungala ka lubbe ɔppyɛlɛ ɔtaa ka kuddu.”
41008032	Ɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng ppwool ppwool, ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ bappyee. Ɔzzánga Peter ɔkkwɔɔmɛ uloko kufɛngɛ ɔkangalamɛ.
41008033	Ammɛ Jesus usikili ɔppyɛɛk balɔɔt-a-kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔkangala Peter kutunmɛ, ɔttɛ la Peter, “Agbata assekenɛ, annɔ baang Satan, luttina annɔ gwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lissi, gwa ɔlɔɔt!”
41008034	Jesus ɔkkwɔɔ kibbi balɔɔt la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔggyannɛ ɔttɛ ukupnɛ, usumalamɛ kɛyɔɔng, ɔsam cross ukupnɛ.
41008035	Ɔlɔɔt wa ukekenɛ kwa lɛfal ammɛ, vvenɛ ɔtakazɛ; Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔtakanɛ lɛfal ammɛ kwa anaam ɔlɔk kwa Kuttu-budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, vvenɛ ɔkkalazɛ.
41008036	Ɔlɔɔt ɔyanga mung isak ka ɔyanganɛ bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ a vveengodde, ɔppyɛɛ ɔyɛn akama wa kɛfal a kɛfal ɔɔ? Ning ba kule kkpong kkpong!
41008037	Bwa ɔkɔɔmnɛ ukkwoong ɔkkala lɛfal ammɛ ba bule.
41008038	Anaam biini la lukopolo anaam bɛnaangnɛ ɔlɔɔt izzit ka gedegede mung wa basinɛ kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm liyila, basseke ka babbyapnɛ, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang vvenɛ ɔnaang Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ izzit ka ɛkɛtɛ ya uffunɛ ka lakke a Dedde la bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
41009001	Ɔbbal lɛlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ, balɔɔt balɔk bale mung ba bale basi libbebong tɛ́ttɛ́ bayɛn Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ile iffu la lakke.”
41009002	Ɔggbanɛ ka bɛtɔm ning bwɔlaaning bilenɛ lɛsak, Jesus ɔlɛkɛ Peter la James, la John, ubbwulu libat ekpok bakang ka ɛfɛɛn a bassekenɛ kɛyɔɔng a kɛyɔɔng. Badɔkɔ baang ka kɛppyɛɛk, Jesus ufoolo eseese.
41009003	Iwɔkɔlɔ ammɛ isseke ka inyanyanɛ ning, gɔɔ ɔlɔɔt wa ukkwoongnɛ ɔzzaa iwɔkɔlɔ illaat iffɔ ning baang ka vveeng mung ba ule.
41009004	Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ba bakkyaat baang bayɛn Elijah, la Moses ka kutolo la Jesus.
41009005	Peter ufeele ɔlɔɔk unnyi Jesus ɔttɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo, kɔyyɛɛp gaang gaang ka ilenɛyɔng mung! Vvenɛ inaang bwaan idda bɛkkyaat mung, vvɔn wa annɔ, vvɔn wa Moses, wa vvɔn wa Elijah.”
41009006	Ɔbbwɔpɔbɛ gaang gaang Peter usi lɛbɛlɛ lɛsan bwa ɔlɔɔknɛ.
41009007	Ìkkpála itta ka lukkpaaggbeede ivvoongbɛ kuyeeng. Lɛmmwɔɔl lɛtta ka tɔkɔlɔ ikkpála ’yɔng baang lɛttɛ, “Uwɔng ulenɛ Waan-a-luppyam anaam, agɔpɔlɔmɛyɔng!”
41009008	Basesele ɔkkpɛlɛ baduda, ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk basi lɛyɛn ɔgbaa la Jesus.
41009009	Basininɛ ka libat ekpok ’yɔng baang, Jesus ɔkamalabɛ ɔttɛ, “Afɔngɔyɔng ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk kɛbwɔɔlɔ kwa ayɛnnɛyɔng tɔttɔt ɔffɔ ka ɛkɛtɛ Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ufungalanɛ ka lubbe.”
41009010	Bappyee lɔkamala ’gwɔng baang, ɔzzánga batolo abbɛ abbɛ batum kɛssanga kɔlɔɔk ’sɔng baang battɛ, “Kifungala ka lubbe ’sɔng mung ɔbbwanɛ ’bɔng lile?”
41009011	Babap Jesus battɛ, “Mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ bakopolo-Lafɔɔ battɛ Elijah ule utte liffu?”
41009012	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Elijah ule utte liffu baning ɔkkɔɔnɛ ɔlɔngɔlɔ bɛfɛɛn, uloko ɔkkpɛlɛ bbwak bbwak. Ngkka ’bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ ɔyɛn akama gaang gaang; balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ bafimnɛ.
41009013	Ppyɛɛk nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng, Elijah ɔggba liffu bakang, balɔɔt bakaamɛ bayɔɔ akama tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɔsaapnɛbɛ bakup tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bakkpɔknɛ ka Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm batummɛ.”
41009014	Jesus la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ba bakkyaat bappyɛlɛnɛ baffu bakup balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ’bɔng kaang, bayɛn kibbi balɔɔt ka babbinɛ bakkpitbɛ. Bakopolo-Lafɔɔ balɔk badɔkɔ baang ka ikangala la abbɛ.
41009015	Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bayɛnnɛ Jesus, kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ gaang gaang, bamma bamii bawomomɛ.
41009016	Jesus ɔbap balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Baang akangalayɔng ’bɔng?”
41009017	Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ka kibbi ’sɔng baang ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo, nkɔɔm waan anaam nffu ka ɛfɛɛn annɔ ka ɔyanganɛ ipiliza, usi kɛlɔɔk likkwoong.
41009018	Ipiliza ’yɔng baang ifeelemɛnɛ, ɔttɔ ka lisse, iffuku ittamɛ ka kamma, ɔtɔɔp lasaal ɔkaka, ɔkkaam kkɔk. Nlɔɔkbong balɔɔt a kɔssɛ annɔ nttɛ baggba ipiliza ’yɔng baang, ɔzzànga basi lizzeme baggbayɛ.”
41009019	Jesus ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Annyɔɔng mung asɛlɛyɔngbong kiyila! Mung nle ntaa ɔmmɛ ɔffɔ nang la annyɔɔng? Mung nle nbbe-luppyam nang la annyɔɔng? Kɔɔm waan ’wɔng baang affu!”
41009020	Bakɔɔmmɛ baffu. Ipiliza iyɛnnɛ Jesus eseese, ifeelemɛ ɔttɔ ka lisse ɔssang, iffuku ikɔɔm ittamɛ ka kamma.
41009021	Jesus ɔbap abbasɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔmmɛbong ɔffɔ nang ka ussinɛ ɔffaakmɛ?” Abassɛ ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Ka bassinɛ bamaatmɛ!
41009022	Utii bikkpit bikkpit ka ipiliza ’yɔng baang ibwummɛnɛ kɛwwɔɔl, ɛkɛtɛ ɛlɔk isammɛ ning itɔɔp ka tɔkɔlɔ lɔkɔɔn ɔlɔk issɛɛnmɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ bannyi. Bibbewɔ lɛttɔ baang, ayaamyɛlɛ ulenɛ ka akkwoongnɛ!”
41009023	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Iii tɛ, annyɔɔng biini akkwoongnɛyɔng! Ulenɛ ka ɔlɔɔt ɔyanganɛ kiyila nzang kɔlɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ ba kukoolo.”
41009024	Abassɛ ubungu eseese ɔttɛ, “Nyanga mung kiyila, ɔzzanga kilenɛ ssup. Attelenɛ nyanga kiyila ngbaa!”
41009025	Jesus ɔyɛnnɛ ka kibbi kilebɛ ligbep, ɔkkpa ipiliza ’yɔng baang kiwele ɔttɛ, “Ussi-latɔɔk, usi kɛlɔɔk likkwoong ipiliza ’yɔng, nbwɔɔlɔwɔbong tta asseke waan ɔlɔɔt afɔngɔmɛ kɛbɛlɛ lɛmal kkpong kkpong!”
41009026	Ipiliza ’yɔng baang ibungu, ifeele waantiti tɛ́ttɛ́ itta issekemɛ. Waanwalam ’wɔng baang usseke tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ubbu mung, gɔɔ ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ uyila ka lɔkkwɔɔn ɔttɛ “Ubbebong!”
41009027	Jesus ɔlɔmmɛ ka kɔbɔɔk ufeele, ubee lubee.
41009028	Jesus ussekenɛ kɛyɔɔng la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ka ggwoon, abbɛ babapmɛ ka wɛɛk battɛ, “Mbɔng ayyɔɔt isinɛ likkwoong iggba ipiliza ’yɔng baang?”
41009029	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Bɔfɛɛn bulɔk bwa bukkwoongnɛ buggba kussanga ipiliza ’kwɔng ba bule, usinɛ luzɔɔm lile.”
41009030	Jesus la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bagbata ka ɛfɛɛn ’yɔng baang basak ka lɔkaan gwa lɔzzanganɛ Galilee. Jesus usi lɛggyan ɔttɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔsan ka ɛfɛɛn ulenɛ,
41009031	ka ulenɛ ka kikopolo balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ; “Vvenɛ basam Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ bannyi balɔɔt bawwɔɔl. Ɔzzànga mkkpa kɔnaang, ɔffɔnɛ bɛtɔm bɛkkyaat, ufungala ɔppyɛlɛ ɔtaa ka kuddu.”
41009032	Ifɛɛt a lukopolo ’gwɔng baang basi lɛsan, ɔzzànga basimɛ lɛbbɔ babap ka ɔbbwɔpɔnɛbɛ.
41009033	Baffu baffɔ ka Capernaum, balenɛ ka ggwoon lɛmal, Jesus ɔbap balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Mung adɔkɔ akangalayɔng ’bɔng ka ɛtɔk?”
41009034	Basi lɛggyan battɛ bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma, ka bakangalanɛ ka ɛtɔk batum ɔlɔɔt wa ɔttanɛ liggbenge.
41009035	Jesus ɔtaanɛ lɔtaa, ɔkkwɔɔ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ zzɔɔppabaffa utolo unnyibɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔggyannɛ ɔttɛ ammɛ ule ɔkɔɔm-ɛtɔk, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang usseke isimi, ɔppyɛɛ ule bɔɔyi balɔɔt ’bɔng kang ɔkkpɛlɛ.”
41009036	Ɔkkwɔɔ waantiti, ɔtta ubeebɛ ka lusso. Utelemɛ labɔɔk, ɔttɛ la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ,
41009037	“Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔtɔknɛ waantiti ning mung ka lɛkɔɔl anaam, nzang ɔtɔknɛbong anaam. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔppyɛɛnɛ ɔtɔknɛ anaam ka laggele, nzang ɔssɛbong ɔtɔkmɛ Ammɛ wa ɔtɔɔmnɛnɛ.”
41009038	John ɔlɔɔk unnyimɛ ɔttɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo, iyɛn ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ka ɔkɔɔmnɛ lɛkɔɔl annɔ ɔggba ipiliza. Ibwɔɔlɔmɛ ittɛ ɔfɔngɔ ka usinɛ ka kɛkaan ayyɔɔt lile.”
41009039	Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Afɔngɔmɛyɔng kitunu, ɔlɔɔt wa ɔkɔɔmnɛ lɛkɔɔl anaam ɔnaang bɛmaanga baala ukkwoong ɔlɔɔk bubbi utumnɛ keekeekee.
41009040	Ɔlɔɔt duu wa isimɛnɛ litun, ule wa ayyɔɔt.
41009041	Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng kpelegedee appyeeyɔng, ɔlɔɔt duu wa unnyiwɔnɛyɔng ommonggo bannyi ka alenɛyɔng ba anaam, vvenɛ ɔyanga ikipili ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
41009042	“Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔnaangnɛ waantiti vvɔn gbɔɔ wa uyilanɛ kɔlɔɔk anaam uttunmɛ, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang kɔyyɛɛp ka basikinɛ kukook bakɔnmɛ ka lukat, basammɛ bassɛɛn ka ubili lɔyɔngɔ.
41009043	Ulenɛ kɔbɔɔk annɔ kɔnaangwɔnɛ asɛlɛ kiyila, azzakwɛ azzɔɔk. Kɔyyɛɛp ka amalnɛ ka kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal la kɔbɔɔk kkwɔn lutini amiinɛ ka lɔkɔɔn gwa kɛfal a kɛfal la labɔɔk laffa.
41009044	[Ka ɛfɛɛn ’kwɔng baang, illɔɔng ya izzinɛbɛ ba ibbe, gɔɔ lɔkɔɔn gwa lɔfɔɔpnɛbɛ ba luzum ka nakanaka.]
41009045	Kikkpɔ annɔ kɛnaangwɔnɛ asɛlɛ kiyila, azzasɛ azzɔɔk! Kɔtta lɛyyɛɛp ka amalnɛ ka kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal la kikkpɔ ssɔn lutini gwa bale basamwɔ bassɛɛn ka lɔkɔɔn gwa kɛfal a kɛfal la bukkpɔ annɔ buffa.
41009046	[Bakang ka ɛfɛɛn ’kwɔng baang, illɔɔng ya izzinɛbɛ ba ibbe, gɔɔ lɔkɔɔn gwa lɔfɔɔpnɛbɛ ba luzum ka nakanaka.]
41009047	Zzeen annɔ lɛppyɛɛnɛ lɛnaangwɔ asɛlɛ kiyila, asangazɛ azzɔɔk! Kɔtta lɛyyɛɛp ka amalnɛ Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la zzeen zzɔn lutini gwa bale basamwɔ bassɛɛn ka lɔkɔɔn gwa kɛfal a kɛfal la zzeen laffa.
41009048	Bakang wa illɔɔng ya izzinɛbɛ isinɛ libbe, lɔkɔɔn gwa bakkɔmnɛ lusi lizum ka nakanaka.
41009049	“Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ ɔkkɔm ka lɔkɔɔn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bunɔk bukoolonɛ ka ɛsɛɛn.
41009050	Bunɔk buyyɛɛp gaang gaang; ɔzzanga buppyɛɛnɛ busi lɛbɛlɛ liggwoom, bule bunaang nang bubbal bunɔk lɛzzanga? “Annyɔɔng biini, ayangayɔng kɛsaap, ataayɔng ka bɔkaat ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng.
41010001	Jesus ɔgbata ka ɛfɛɛn ’yɔng baang umii ka ɛkpansi a Judea, ukum lɔyɔngɔ a Jordan. Bɛkaan a balɔɔt bɛbbal liffu bikupmɛ, ammɛ ubee bbwak ukopolobɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɛlɔm-ɛlɔm.
41010002	Balɔɔt a Pharisees balɔk baffu ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ babummɛ kɛssɛɛn ka kɔlɔɔk. Babapmɛ battɛ, “Abwɔɔlɔyɛlɛ, mung Lafɔɔ ayyɔɔt layila mung ɔlɔɔt ɔggba wanavva ammɛ ɔɔ?”
41010003	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma la lɔbap ɔttɛ, “Moses ɔdɔkɔ unnyiwɔyɔng lafɔɔ bɔka azzɛ?”
41010004	Ɔzzánga bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, “Moses uyila ɔttɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɔk luvva ɔbwɔɔlɔ wanavva ammɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔggbamɛ.”
41010005	Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Moses ɔkkpɔk lafɔɔ ’zɔng baang unnyiwɔyɔng ka akoolonɛyɔng kippyee kɔlɔɔk.
41010006	Ɔzzànga ka lutte bakang, ka ɛkɛtɛ a lɔlɔɔm, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔdɔkɔ ɔlɔɔmbɛ ning baang walam la wanavva, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ.
41010007	Kwakkwɛ baang waanwalam ule ɔgbata ɔkɔngɔ abassɛ la abakka umii batoolo bataa ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn la wanavva ammɛ.
41010008	Ɔzzánga abbɛ baffa basseke ɔlɔɔt vvɔn, buubuu ba bubɛlɛ lile.
41010009	Ɔlɔɔt tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔbɛngɛlɛ bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ lɛffɔ ɔsam utoolo ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn.”
41010010	Bappyɛlɛnɛ bamal ka ggwoon, balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus babapmɛ batumkwɛ.
41010011	Ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔggbanɛ wanavva ammɛ ɔtɔk ɔlɔk, ɔnaangbong wanavva ammɛ bubbi.
41010012	Gɔɔ wanavva wa ɔbbɛnɛ ɔkɔngɔ walam ammɛ umii ullu ɔlɔk ɔnaangbong walam ammɛ bubbi.”
41010013	Ɔzzánga balɔɔt balɔk bakɔɔm bwɔɔntiti bafee Jesus battɛ usingibɛ, keem balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ batunubɛ.
41010014	Jesus uppyeenɛ ning baang, kutunmɛ gaang gaang, ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Afɔngɔyɔng bwɔɔntiti baffu ka ɛfɛɛn anaam, tɛ̀ttɛ́ atunuyɔngbɛ, Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ile ya abbɛ baang.
41010015	Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng ppwool nttɛ, ɔlɔɔt wa usinɛ kɔlɔɔk Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛtɔk ɔssɛɛn ka luppyam tɛ̀ttɛ̀ waantiti utelenɛ zzeen ka abakka la abassɛ baala ukkwoong ɔmal ka tɔkɔlɔ annyɛ kkpong kkpong.”
41010016	Ɔlɔm bwɔɔntiti ka labɔɔk, utelebɛ labɔɔk la vvɔn la vvɔn, ɔnaangbɛ ppyɛɛ.
41010017	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbong utte kɔssɛ ammɛ ning mung, ɔlɔɔt ussi bakang ɔmma uffu ukunmɛ laddu, ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo wa doddo, nle nnaang nang tɛ́ttɛ́ nyanga kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal?”
41010018	Jesus ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ, “Mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ akkwɔɔnɛ ɔlɔɔt wa doddo? Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyyɛɛpnɛ ɔgbaa la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba ule.
41010019	Kɔttɛ asan mung Lafɔɔ: ‘Tɛ̀ttɛ́ awwɔɔl ɔlɔɔt, tɛ̀ttɛ́ akup wanavva ɔlɔɔt, tɛ̀ttɛ́ ayip ssip, tɛ̀ttɛ́ akkala lɛlaak atum ɔlɔɔt, tɛ̀ttɛ́ abunu ɔlɔɔt azzi, atele ssaawɔ la ssakawɔ.’ ”
41010020	Okolobya ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo, ka nssinɛ ssup nle baang nlokonɛ lafɔɔ ’zɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ.”
41010021	Ɔzzánga Jesus uyeek ɔppyɛɛkmɛ la kɛsaap, ɔttɛ, “Ussekewɔ kɔlɔɔk kkwɔn keem. Amii asam bɛfɛɛn annɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ bya ayanganɛ ataan, asam ikkpoko ’yɔng baang amii asɔɔk balɔɔt ba ɔbbɔlnɛbɛ, ɔkkɔɔnɛ ɔyyɛɛpwɔ ka libat; alenɛ ning baang lɛnaang, affu akupnɛ.”
41010022	Okolobya ’wɔng baang uppyeenɛ ning baang, lusso lɔbbɔlmɛ eseese, ɔgbata la bukee ka uttinanɛ ka ɔyanganɛ ikkpoko ggbadam.
41010023	Jesus ɔppyɛɛk balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ududa ɔttɛ, “Kukoolo-lukoolo kɔsak tɛ́ttɛ́ balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ ikkpoko bamal ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm!”
41010024	Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ka bappyeenɛ ning baang, ɔzzánga Jesus ɔbbal lɛlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Bwaan anaam, kukoolo lukoolo kɔsak tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔlɔɔt ɔmal ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
41010025	Gɔɔ kɔtta uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt likoolo kɛmal ka Itutum Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔtta kɛsam ɔgɔdɔ kɛwɔkɔlɔ ka lɛmma ɔnnya.”
41010026	Ɔlɔɔknɛ ning baang, kɔkama lɔkama kɔkɛɛlɛ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ, bayeek bappyɛɛkbɛ kɛyɔɔng battɛ, “Ngkka nnyinɔɔng ule uddu?”
41010027	Jesus ɔppyɛɛkbɛ ssii ɔttɛ, “Nkwɔng baang kukoolo ɔssɛbibit, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm mɛ ba kukoolo. Kɔlɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ibɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kule kkpɛkɛlɛm.”
41010028	Peter ufeele ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Ppyɛɛk, ibbɛbong bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ikɔngɔ iffu ikupwɔ.”
41010029	Jesus ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Eee, nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔgbatanɛ ɔkɔngɔ ssala ammɛ, la itele ammɛ ɔlɔk ɔgbata ɔkɔngɔ abassɛ la abakka, ɔlɔk bwɔɔntiti, ɔlɔk bɔtɔɔm ammɛ, kwa anaam la kwa kippyee lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm,
41010030	vvenɛ ɔyanga bɛfɛɛn ggbadam ka lɛfal ’zɔng mung. Vvenɛ ɔyanga issoon lalɔp lalɔp ɔgbaa, la itele ppwap la ibakka la bwɔɔntiti la itɔɔm. Vvenɛ ɔssɛ ɔyɛn akama ɔgbaa, ɔzzànga vvenɛ ɔyanga kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal.
41010031	Balɔɔt ba bakɔɔmnɛ ɛtɔk gedegede mung, vvenɛ bappyɛɛ basseke isimi. Balɔɔt ba ggbadam ba bassekenɛ isimi ka gedegede mung, vvenɛ bappyɛɛ bakɔɔm ɛtɔk.”
41010032	Jesus la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ badɔkɔ ka ɛtɔk a kimii a Jerusalem. Jesus ɔkɔɔmbong ɔssɛ ɔkɔngɔbɛ ka lilɔɔk lilenɛbɛ gaang lɛkɛɛlɛ. Balɔɔt ba bakupnɛbɛ ka isimi ɔssɛ ɔbbwɔpɔbɛ. Jesus ɔbbal balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ zzɔɔppabaffa lɛkkwɔɔ uloko kusɛngɛ ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ bɛfɛɛn bya bile ka bɛnaangmɛnɛ.
41010033	Ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Agɔpɔlɔyɔng, mung ile ka imiinɛyɔng Jerusalem ka ɛfɛɛn a bale basam Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ bannyi Bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm, la bakopolo-Lafɔɔ. Vvenɛ bazza kɛkaal ammɛ battɛ ubbe, tɛ́ttɛ́ basammɛ bannyi Ikanakana,
41010034	ba bale banaangmɛ bɛfɛɛn izzit, bakkɔl libbaak ballɔtmɛ, batupmɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ bawwɔɔlmɛ. Ɔzzànga ɔffɔnɛ bɛtɔm bɛkkyaat, vvenɛ ufungala ka lubbe ɔppyɛlɛ ɔtaa ka kuddu.”
41010035	Bwaan a Zebedee ba bazzanganɛ James la John baffu bakup Jesus, battɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo, bɔfɛɛn bule baang bwa iggyannɛ ittɛ anaang annyiyɛlɛ.”
41010036	Jesus ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Bɔka abbwɛ?”
41010037	Keem abbɛ battɛ, “Ɛkɛtɛ ya ale ataa ka ugbaal a kibeet Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, iggyan ittɛ itaa la annɔ, ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ɔtaawɔnɛ ka lufoom ɛlaabɔɔk, wa vvɔn ɔtaawɔ ka kwa ɛbyakɔm.”
41010038	Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Ba asanyɔng bwa alɔɔknɛyɔng. Vvenɛ abbɔ ayɛnyɔng akama tɛ̀ttɛ̀ anaam ɔɔ? Vvenɛ banaangwɔyɔng baptizim tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bale banaangnɛ anaam ɔɔ?”
41010039	Keem battɛ, “Ibbɔ mung.” Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Ka lɔkkwɔɔn, vvenɛ ayɛnyɔng akama tɛ̀ttɛ̀ anaam nle ka nyɛnnɛ. Gɔɔ vvenɛ banaangwɔyɔng baptizim tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bale banaangnɛ anaam.
41010040	Ɔzzànga lakke ba nyanga za kɛsanga balɔɔt ba bale bataanɛ ka lufoom ɛlaabɔɔk la ɛbyakɔm. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule ɔsam bɛtaa ’byɔng baang unnyi balɔɔt ba ɔbamanɛbyɛ ulokobɛ.”
41010041	Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus ba zzɔɔp bappyeenɛ ning baang, kutunbɛ kɔppyɛɛk James la John.
41010042	Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔkkwɔɔbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, uloko ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Asanyɔng mung attɛyɔng baggboggbo balɔɔt ka Ikanakana bayanga lakke battabɛ, bakɔɔm ɛkpansi biini bayanga lakke baffata.
41010043	Ning kkpong kkpong tɛ̀ttɛ́ kule la annyɔɔng. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔggyannɛ buggboggbo, ule bɔɔyi ba abbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
41010044	Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔggyannɛ kɛkɔɔm ɛtɔk ule ubili ba abbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
41010045	Gɔɔ Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ usi liffu ɔttɛ balɔɔt bataamɛ bubɔɔyi, ɔdɔkɔ uffu tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɔɔyi ɔlɔɔt, ubbe ɔttɛ nkwaaning ɔkkala balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ka bubbi abbɛ.”
41010046	Jesus la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ la kɛkaan a balɔɔt baffɔnɛ ka Jericho, battɛ basak bamii lusso lusso, ussi-ifim wa ɔzzanganɛ Barthimaeus, waan a Timaeus, wa ubbwoomnɛ lubbwoom, ɔdɔkɔ baang ka lufoom ɛtɔk ka ɔtaanɛ.
41010047	Uppyeenɛ ɔttɛ, baang Jesus waan a Nazareth, ammɛ ɔzzɔɔk kibungu eseese, ɔttɛ, “Jesus! Waan a David! Nbbewɔ lɛttɔ!”
41010048	Balɔɔt ppwap babummɛ kɛnaang ɔtaa zzum, ɔzzànga ɔdɔkɔ ɔppyɛɛ ɔkama-ɔkama ubungu, ɔttɛ, “Waan a David, Nbbewɔ lɛttɔ!”
41010049	Jesus ɔkɔɔng baang ubee ɔttɛ, “Akkwɔɔmɛyɔng.” Ɔzzánga bakkwɔɔ ussi-ifim ’wɔng baang tɛ, babwɔɔlɔmɛ battɛ, “Aggele, afeele amii, ɔkkwɔɔwɔbong.”
41010050	Ɔkkyaa ogbogbo ammɛ ɔzzɔɔk, ukut umii ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus.
41010051	Jesus ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ, “Mung aggyan attɛ nnaangwɔ ’bɔng?” Ussi-ifim ’wɔng baang ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo, nggyan nttɛ nppyɛlɛ nyɛn.”
41010052	Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛ ɔttɛ, “Amii, kiyila annɔ kɛnaangbong ɔppwawɔ.” Ukkwoong ɔyɛn eseese, ɔmma ukup Jesus ka ɛtɔk.
41011001	Baffɔnɛ kɛtɛkɛtɛ laffɛ za lazzanganɛ Bethphage la Bethany, ka bale ka baffɔnɛ Jerusalem, basak baffɔ ka lɛttaal Olives. Jesus ɔsanga balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ baffa ɔtɔɔm ɔttɛ bakɔɔm bassɛ,
41011002	ɔkamalabɛ ɔttɛ, “Amiiyɔng ka lɛffɛ za lusso baang. Alenɛyɔng bakang lɛffɔ, vvenɛ ayɛnyɔng waan eyim wa batakamɛnɛ kɛtɔm kɛlɔk littele ka basikinɛ baang. Akkyaayɔngyɛ affuyɔng.
41011003	Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔbapnɛ ɔttɛ, ning anaangyɔng kwa ’bɔng, bwɔɔlɔmɛyɔng attɛyɔng, ‘Uyini ɔttɛnɛ ikɔɔmyɛ imii, vvenɛ ɔppyɛlɛ ɔtɔɔmyɛ eseese.’ ”
41011004	Ɔzzánga bamiinɛ bayɛn waan-eyim ka basikinɛ ka lɛmma kikkwu ka lufoom ɛtɔk. Ka balenɛ baang ka kɛkkyaayɛ,
41011005	balɔɔt balɔk ba balenɛ baang ka bappyɛɛknɛbɛ babapbɛ battɛ, “Baang anaangyɔng ’bɔng, abumyɔng kɛkkyaa waan-eyim ’wɔng baang ɔɔ?”
41011006	Badɔkɔ bappyɛlɛbɛ kamma gbɔɔ bbwak tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Jesus ulenɛbɛ lɛkamala, abbɛ bafɔngɔbɛ bamii.
41011007	Bakɔɔm waan-eyim ’wɔng baang, bafee Jesus. Basam igbogbo abbɛ bavvoongyɛ ka kkwɔɔt, Jesus ukut utteleyɛ ka libat.
41011008	Balɔɔt ggbadam bayaala igbogbo abbɛ ballɔt ka ɛtɔk, balɔk babbɔk liteet bavvoong ka ɛtɔk.
41011009	Balɔɔt ba bakɔɔmnɛ ɛtɔk la bakupnɛbɛ ka isimi bazzɔɔk kibungu eseese battɛ, “Ibunguyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm! Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaang Ɔlɔɔt wa uffunɛ ka lɛkɔɔl Uyini ppyɛɛ!
41011010	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaang Itutum-a-Dedde ayyɔɔt Ubeet David ppyɛɛ! Ibunguyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm!”
41011011	Jesus ɔffɔnɛ Jerusalem, umii usesele bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ka ɛkɛtɛ elenɛ lɛsak ka kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang, bagbata bamii Bethany la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ zzɔɔppabaffa.
41011012	Ka libbessolo, Jesus buwɔɔng busaapmɛ ka bassinɛ Bethany bappyɛlɛ.
41011013	Ɔyɛn kɛssɛ sa bakkwɔɔnɛsɛ ‘Fig’ ka lusso bakang ka la livva ka kɛbbwɔtnɛ. Ammɛ umii ɔttɛ vvenɛ kɛwɔmbong nsan. Umiinɛ ɔdɔkɔ ule livva livva keem, ka ɛkɛtɛ kɛssɛ ’sɔng baang kɛwɔmnɛ ɛtakanɛ lɛffɔ.
41011014	Ɔzzànga Jesus ɔlɔɔk la lɛsan a kɛssɛ ’sɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt wa ule ɔbbal lakkpo annɔ lizzi ba ɔbɛlɛ lile!” Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bappyee.
41011015	Baffɔnɛ Jerusalem, Jesus umii ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggba balɔɔt ba bataanɛ bɛfɛɛn la ba balɛɛpnɛ lɔlɛɛp. Utut ikkpokolo ya bafoolo-ikkpoko, la igolo ya bataan-idugbɔɔnnyɛ, ɔzzɔɔk.
41011016	Gɔɔ usi lɛbɛlɛ lɛfɔngɔ ɔlɔɔt ɔtɔkɔ bɔfɛɛn ɔsak ka isingili ya Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
41011017	Ɔzzánga ukopolo balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Bakkpɔkbong ka Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm battɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛ, ’Ggwoon anaam lulenɛ ggwoon a luzɔɔm gwa balɔɔt ba bassinɛ ifɛɛn ifɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ’, mung asikiliyɔngbonggwɛ lusseke kiddumu bassip.”
41011018	Bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la bakopolo-Lafɔɔ bappyeenɛ ning baang, batini eseese baggyan ɛtɔk ya bale bawwɔɔl Jesus. Ɔbbwɔpɔbɛ gaang gaang, ka ulenɛ likopolo ɔkkpɛlɛ kɔkɛɛlɛ kibbi ’sɔng baang.
41011019	Kulele kɔnaangnɛ, Jesus la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bagbata ka lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang.
41011020	Ka libbessolo, lɔfɔm a lɔfɔm, ka balenɛ baang ka bassɛnɛ ɛtɔk ɛtɔk, bayɛn lɛsan a kɛssɛ ’zɔng baang za lɛzzanganɛ ‘Fig’. Libbebong ɔkkpɛlɛ gbaak la iffaat.
41011021	Peter ukkenɛ kwa kɔnaangnɛ, ɔlɔɔk la Jesus ɔttɛ, “Ppyɛɛk, Ukopolo-lukopolo, kɛssɛ sa azɔɔmnɛ afɔngɔ kibbebong!”
41011022	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Ayilayɔng kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
41011023	Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng ka lɔkkwɔɔn nttɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔttɛnɛ ekpok ’yɔng ɛsamyɛ kɛyɔɔng emii ɛssɛɛn ka lihu, ɔsɛlɛnɛ bɛkangala ka luppyam, uyila ka lɔkkwɔɔn ɔttɛ, kwa ɔlɔɔknɛ vvenɛ kɔnaang, vvenɛ kɔtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ulenɛ lɛlɔɔk baning.
41011024	Kwakkwɛ baang nbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng nttɛ: ɛkɛtɛ ya azɔɔmnɛyɔng aggyanyɔng bɔfɛɛn, ayila attɛyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyiwɔyɔngbongbwɛ, vvenɛ unnyiwɔyɔng bɔfɛɛn duu bwa abapmɛnɛyɔng.
41011025	Ale ka assɛɛnnɛ luzɔɔm, kɔlɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ kwa kutunwɔnɛ la ɔlɔɔt kɔsaalwɔ, nkwaaning ssaawɔ wa ulenɛ ka libat ɔsɔɔkwɔ bubbi bwa alenɛ lɛnaang.
41011026	[Asinɛ balɔɔt ba banaangwɔnɛ bubbi lɛsɔɔk, ssaawɔ wa ulenɛ ka libat wɔ baala ɔsɔɔk bubbi bwa alenɛ lɛnaang.”]
41011027	Ɔzzánga bappyɛlɛ baffu baffɔ ka Jerusalem. Bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la bakopolo-Lafɔɔ la bagɛlɛnya baffu babap Jesus ka ulenɛ baang ka ɔssɛnɛ ukkpit Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm battɛ,
41011028	“Bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ anaang kwa bɔng? Nnyinɔɔng unnyiwɔnɛ lakke?”
41011029	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Anaam vvenɛ nnyiwɔyɔng lɔbap ggwɔn keem, appyɛlɛnɛnɛyɔng kamma, nzang vvenɛ nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng lakke za nyanganɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ nnaang ning mung.
41011030	Abwɔɔlɔnɛyɔng, mung John nnyinɔɔng unnyimɛnɛ lakke za kɛnaang a baptizim; Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyimɛnɛ faa ɔssɛbibit?”
41011031	Bakangala abbɛ abbɛ baang battɛ, “Mung ile ɔlɔɔk nang? Ilɔɔknɛ ittɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyimɛnɛ lakke, vvenɛ ɔppyɛlɛ ɔbapyɛlɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Ngkka ’bɔng isinɛ kwa John liyila?’
41011032	Ippyɛɛnɛ ittɛ, ‘Ɔssɛbibit unnyimɛnɛ lakke …’ ” (Kibbi ’sɔng baang kɛbbwɔpɔnɛbɛ, ka ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn la vvɔn ɔttɛnɛ John ɔdɔkɔ uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.)
41011033	Ɔzzánga bappyɛlɛ Jesus kamma battɛ, “Ayyɔɔt ba isan.” Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Gɔɔ anaam baala nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng lakke za nkɔɔmnɛ nnaang bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung.
41012001	Ɔzzánga Jesus utolo ka ifɛɛt unnyibɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ɔdɔkɔ baang wa uwoopnɛ bɔtɔɔm ammɛ. Ɔbba kikoom ukkpitbwɛ, ɔkɔɔn bɛssɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ. Ɔtɔɔk lubbe gwa bale bassɛɛn bɔfɛɛn bwa bukaamnɛ lakkpo-bɛssɛ, banaang batak. Ɔnaang kakkpa uloko ɔlɔɔt wa ɔkatnɛ bɔtɔɔm ’bwɔng baang. Ɔsam bɔtɔɔm ammɛ unnyi balɔɔt bappyɛɛk. Ammɛ biini ɔbbɛ umii kɔssɛ.
41012002	Ɛkɛtɛ ɛffɔnɛ ya lakkpo-bɛssɛ lakootnɛ, ammɛ, Uyini-bɔtɔɔm, ɔtɔɔm ubili ammɛ ɔttɛ umii ɔtɔk etini ya ammɛ ka bappyɛɛk-a-bɔtɔɔm ammɛ.
41012003	Bappyɛɛk-a-bɔtɔɔm ammɛ bakaa ubili ’wɔng baang batup, baggbamɛ ɔppyɛlɛ ibɔɔk ibɔɔk.
41012004	Uyini-bɔtɔɔm ɔbbal ubili ɔlɔk lɛsanga ɔtɔɔm. Bappyɛɛk-a-bɔtɔɔm ’bɔng baang batupmɛ bafaka lɛttɔ, bɛnaangmɛ bɛfɛɛn izzit.
41012005	Uyini-bɔtɔɔm ɔbbal ubili ɔlɔk lɛtɔɔm. Abbɛ bakaamɛ bapyɛl bawwɔɔl. Banaang babili ggbadam ning baang, batup balɔk, bawwɔɔl bakang.
41012006	Ɔdɔkɔ usseke waan a luppyam ammɛ keem ka ule ɔtɔɔm. Ka lakuma, ɔsanga waan ammɛ ɔtɔɔm ka bappyɛɛk-a-bɔtɔɔm, ɔttɛ, ‘Nsan lɔsan nttɛ vvenɛ bannyi waan anaam latele.’
41012007	Ɔzzanga bappyɛɛk-a-bɔtɔɔm ’bɔng baang balɔɔk abbɛ abbɛ battɛ, ‘Uwɔng ulenɛ waan Uyini-bɔtɔɔm. Affu iwwɔɔlmɛyɔng nkwaaning isam bɔtɔɔm ilɛkɛ!’
41012008	Ɔzzànga bakaa waan ’wɔng baang bawwɔɔl. Basanga ubbu ammɛ bazzɔɔk kukupa kikoom a bɔtɔɔm.”
41012009	Keem Jesus ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Mung Uyini-bɔtɔɔm ule ɔnaang nang? Vvenɛ uffu ɔwwɔɔl bappyɛɛk-a-bɔtɔɔm ’bɔng baang, ɔsam bɔtɔɔm ammɛ unnyi balɔɔt balɔk bappyɛɛk.
41012010	Akkwɔɔyɔngbong ’kwɔng kkpal ka Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm baning? ‘Lɛttaal za babɔɔk-a-ggwoon basamnɛ bazzɔɔk ka lisinɛ ka kukkaam lile, Lɛppyɛlɛbong litii ka kukkaam gaang gaang;
41012011	Nkwɔng Uyini ɔnaangnɛ; Bɔka bikɛɛlɛ kɔlɔɔk ning!’ ”
41012012	Bakɔɔm-ɛkpansi a Jews babummɛ kɛkaa, ka bakɔɔlɔnɛ battɛ ifɛɛt ’yɔng baang Jesus ɔssa utumbɛ abbɛ. Ɔzzánga bamma kɛkaan ’sɔng baang, bagbata bakɔngɔmɛ bamii.
41012013	Batɔɔm balɔɔt a Pharisees balɔk la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Herod bamii ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus la ibap ppwap battɛ, nzang bassɛɛnmɛ ka kɔlɔɔk.
41012014	Baffɔnɛ ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus battɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo, isan lɔsan ittɛ annɔ gbisii alɔɔk lɔkkwɔɔn, gɔɔ kwa balɔɔt banngwanɛ ba abap. Ɔlɔɔt mkkpa uggbenge ka zzeen wɔ ba ule, ɔzzànga akopolo lɔkkwɔɔn gwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uttinanɛ la ɔssɛbibit. Abwɔɔlɔyɛlɛ, mung ibɛpɛbong Lafɔɔ ka innyinɛ Uzzilɛttɔ-a-Rome innamba ɔɔ? Ikkpelebɛ faa ifɔngɔ?”
41012015	Jesus ɔyɛnnɛ lagban za banaangnɛ baang ɔttɛ, “Abumnɛyɔng kɛssɛɛn ka kɔlɔɔk kwa ’bɔng? Asangayɔng siling affuyɔng nyɛn ee.”
41012016	Basanganɛ siling bafeemɛ ɔyɛn ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Mung lusso a nnyinɔɔng la lɛkɔɔl ammɛ?” Bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, “Lusso Uzzilɛttɔ-a-Rome la lɛkɔɔl ammɛ.’
41012017	Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔttɛ, “Kɔyyɛɛp! Annyiyɔng Uzzilɛttɔ-a-Rome bwa bulenɛ bwa ammɛ, annyiyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bwa bulenɛ bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.” Ɔzzánga kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ gaang gaang.
41012018	Balɔɔt a Sadducees, ba battɛnɛ balɔɔt ka lubbe baala bafungala, baffu balɔɔk la Jesus battɛ,
41012019	“Ukopolo-lukopolo, Moses ɔkkpɔknɛ lifɔɔ ’zɔng mung unnyiyɛlɛ ɔttɛ, ’Walam ubbenɛ ɔkɔngɔ wanavva ammɛ ka batakanɛ bwɔɔn lɛyanga, etele ammɛ ɔtɔk wanavva ubbu ’wɔng baang nkwaaning ɔfɔɔn bwɔɔn unnyi ubbu etele ammɛ.’
41012020	Ɛkɛtɛ nnyɔn, itele la itele balɔɔt bannambakkyaat batɔkbong bataa; Ɔkɔɔm-ɛtɔk ɔtɔk wanavva, ubbe ka ɔtakanɛ waan lɛfɔɔn.
41012021	Etele ammɛ wa vvɔn ɔtɔk wanavva ubbu ’wɔng baang. Ammɛ ɔgbaa ɔssɛ ubbe ka ɔtakanɛ waan lɛfɔɔn. Wa vvɔn ɔbbalmɛ lɛtɔk, kɔdɔkɔ kɔnaang ning baang,
41012022	tɔttɔt kɔnaangbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ. Itele la itele ’yɔng baang balɔɔt bannambakkyaat batɔk wanavva ’wɔng baang baduda. Babbe ning baang bakɔngɔmɛ, ɔlɔɔt wa ɔfɔɔnnɛ waan usi lile. Ɔddɔkɔddɔkɔ wanavva ’wɔng baang ɔssɛ ubbe.
41012023	Mung ɛkɛtɛ ya babbu ɔkkpɛlɛ bale bafungala ka kɛtɔm-a-kifungala ka lubbe, wanavva ’wɔng baang ule ule wa nnyinɔɔng ka ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ, balɔɔt bannambakkyaat balemɛnɛ lɛtɔk?
41012024	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Asɛpɛyɔngbong gaang gaang! Gɔɔ ba asanyɔng bwa nttɛnɛ asɛpɛyɔngbong ɔɔ? Ka asinɛyɔng Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛsan ɔlɔk lakke ammɛ.
41012025	Ɛkɛtɛ ya babbu bale bafungala bataa ka kuddu, basseke tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka libat, killu ba kɛbɛlɛ lile
41012026	Ilɔɔknɛ kwa babbu kifungala ka lubbe; ɔzzánga ba ataka akkwɔɔyɔng Luvva Moses ka ɛfɛɛn a bakkpɔknɛ batum waan a kɛssɛ wa ɔkkɔmnɛ ɔɔ? Bakkpɔk baang battɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔbwɔɔlɔ Moses ɔttɛ, ‘Anaam nlenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm a Abraham, nle Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm a Isaac, nle Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm a Jacob.’
41012027	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyanganɛ bukokolo la babbu. Asɛpɛyɔngbong gaang gaang!”
41012028	Ukopolo-Lafɔɔ ɔdɔkɔ baang ka ɔgɔpɔlɔnɛ lilɔɔk ’sɔng baang. Ɔyɛnnɛ ka Jesus ulenɛ balɔɔt a Sadducees kamma bbwak bbwak lɛppyɛlɛ, uffu ɔbap Jesus ɔttɛ, “Mung Lifɔɔ ’zɔzɔng lɛtta liggbenge ɔkkpɛlɛ?”
41012029	Keem Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Uwɔng ulenɛ lifɔɔ za littanɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ liggbenge, ‘Balɔɔt a Israel agɔpɔlɔyɔng! Uyini, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ayyɔɔt, ulenɛ Uyini keem.
41012030	Annyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Uyini ayyɔɔt, latele la luppyam annɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ, la lɛfɛkɛlɛ annɔ, la luttina annɔ, la likke annɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ!’
41012031	Uwɔng ulenɛ lifɔɔ za likupnɛ ’zɔng baang ka buggbenge; ‘Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔsaapwɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ annɔ biini asaapwɔnɛ kɛyɔɔng.’ Lafɔɔ lalɔk za laggbengenɛ latta za laffa ’zɔng mung ba labɛlɛ lile.”
41012032	Ukopolo-Lafɔɔ ’wɔng baang ɔlɔɔk la Jesus ɔttɛ, “Akemebong, Ukopolo-lukopolo! kule bbwak tɛ̀ttɛ̀ alɔɔknɛ attɛ Uyini ayyɔɔt ulenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔk ba ule ɔgbaa la ammɛ.
41012033	Kɔyyɛɛp ka ɔlɔɔt utelenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la luppyam ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, la lɛfɛkɛlɛ ammɛ, la likke ammɛ, ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔsaapmɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔsaapmɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng. Kɔtta lɛyyɛɛp ka atelenɛ lafɔɔ za laffa ’zɔng mung gaang gaang, lutini awwɔɔlnɛ lakɔmɔlɔ ɔlɔk anaang latɔm lalɔk annyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
41012034	Jesus uppyeenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛppyɛlɛ kamma ammɛ kilenɛ gbɔɔ bbwak, ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛ ɔttɛ, “Fulufulu ba ale asseke Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.” Nkwɔng baang kɔsaalnɛ, ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk wa ɔbbalnɛ lɛbbɔ unnyi Jesus lɔbap usi lɛbɛlɛ lile.
41012035	Jesus unnyibɛ lɔbap baang ka ulenɛ ka kikopolo ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔttɛ, “Anaang nang tɛ́ttɛ́ bakopolo-Lafɔɔ battɛ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ ule ule waan a David?
41012036	Kuyeeng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔnaangnɛ David ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, ‘Uyini, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔlɔɔk la Uyini anaam ɔttɛ: Taa mung ka kɔbɔɔk ɛlaabɔɔk anaam, ɔddɔkɔddɔkɔ nsam balɔɔt a kisikɔng annɔ nlokowɔ asing bukkpɔ.’
41012037	David biini ɔkkwɔɔnɛ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ Uyini, Ɔnaang nang tɛ́ttɛ́ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ ɔppyɛɛ ule waan a David?” Balɔɔt bayipi ka bataanɛ la lawaa bagɔpɔlɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Jesus ukopolonɛ.
41012038	Ka ɛkɛtɛ ukopolonɛ baang ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Akatwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng kwa bakopolo-Lafɔɔ ba bataanɛ bassɛ bakkpit la iwuulu abbɛ, baggyan battɛ balɔɔt banaangbɛ ‘Nggbeede’ ka lippya.
41012039	Bakkapa bɛtaa bya baggboggbo balɔɔt ka ssoon a mitin la ka ɛfɛɛn a bataanɛ bazzi kazzi bavva batak ka laggele.
41012040	Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang baloko bwanavva-babbu baang banaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɔsaapnɛbɛ, batɔkbɛ ssala, ballu ka lagabwɔ. Bayɔɔ buggboggbo ka kɛzɔɔm a luzɔɔm ggbɔlɔng. Akama wa abbɛ ule ɔtta lɛbbɔl!”
41012041	Jesus ɔtaa ɔkkɛtɛ ka ɛfɛɛn a bassɛɛnnɛ ikkobo ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔyɛn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt bassɛɛnnɛ ikkobo. Baggboggbo balɔɔt ggbadam bassɛɛn ikkobo baang ittala.
41012042	Ɔttɛ ɔnaang, ukeewaan a wanavva-ubbu uffu ɔssɛɛn idele iffa, ning baang ka lutini a kobbo.
41012043	Jesus ɔkkwɔɔ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ uloko ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn, ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Nbwɔɔlɔwɔng nttɛ ukeewaan a wanavva-ubbu ’wɔng mung ɔssɛɛnbong ikkpoko ka likulu-kɛssɛɛn-ikkpoko ’zɔng baang ɔtta balɔɔt ba bassinɛ bassɛɛn.
41012044	Mbɔng kang ɔkkpɛlɛ ka bayanganɛ ikkpoko ggbadam, badɔkɔ basanga gbɔɔ ssup baffu bannyi nkwaaning ikkpoko abbɛ itaabɛ ssii. Ɔzzànga wanavva ubbu ’wɔng mung, la bulɔk ffet ba ule. Ɔsambong ɔkkpɛlɛ uffu unnyi. Ɔsambong bwa ɔyanganɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ bwa ɔkɔɔmnɛ uddu, uffu unnyi.
41013001	Jesus ɔgbata ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ vvɔn ɔttɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo, ppyɛɛk bisse lattaal baang la ggwoon la ggwoon.”
41013002	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Kɔttɛ ayɛn mung ggwoon ’gwɔng mung tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɔttalanɛ? Gɔɔ lɛttaal zzɔn ning baala libee bbwak; vvenɛ babbum ɔkkpɛlɛ azzɛ baang ballɔt ka lisse.”
41013003	Jesus ɔdɔkɔ baang ka ɔtaanɛ ka lɛttaal Olives, ɔppyɛɛk ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔzzánga Peter la James, la John la Andrew baffu bakupmɛ ka wɛɛk.
41013004	Battɛ, “Abwɔɔlɔyɛlɛ ɛkɛtɛ a ’kwɔng kule kɔnaang la bwa bule buyɔɔyɛlɛ buttɛ bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ bɛnaang.”
41013005	Keem Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Akatwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng, tɛ̀ttɛ́ afɔngɔyɔng ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔddɛmwɔyɔng agbigbiniyɔng.
41013006	Balɔɔt ba bappwanɛ balɔɔk babee la anaam, vvenɛ baffu babwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng battɛ, ‘Anaam nlemɛnɛ ammɛ.’ Vvenɛ bakɔɔm ning baang bafɛɛt balɔɔt ggbadam.
41013007	Gɔɔ tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔbbwɔpɔwɔyɔng ka appyeenɛyɔng ka ballunɛ lɛkɔɔng kɛtɛkɛtɛ ɔlɔk ka appyeenɛyɔng kuttu lɛkɔɔng fulufulu. Bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ bɛnaang, ɔzzànga ba bɛnaang bɛttɛ baang ulenɛ lakpeke a vveeng.
41013008	Lɔkaan lɔlɔk vvenɛ ballu la gwakang. Itutum vvenɛ imii kullu la itutum ilɔk. Ɛkpansi vvenɛ ɛnnyɛkɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Buwɔɔng vvenɛ buttɔ gaang gaang. Bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ bile bile tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɔssɔp bwa kɛmaat a waan ikeeng.
41013009	“Annyɔɔng biini akatwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng. Vvenɛ bakaawɔyɔng bamii ka ɔdda kɛkaal. Vvenɛ batupwɔyɔng ka ssoon a mitin; Vvenɛ abeeyɔng ka lusso bazzilɛttɔ la babeet ka kɔlɔɔk anaam nkwaaning abwɔɔlɔyɔngbɛ Kuttu-budoddo.
41013010	Kuttu-budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔffɔbong ifɛɛn ifɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ ɛkɛtɛ lakpeke ɛffu.
41013011	Gɔɔ bakaawɔnɛyɔng bamii ka ɔdda kɛkaal, tɛ̀ttɛ́ luppyam lɔzzawɔyɔng ka asɛlɛnɛyɔng bwa ale atoloyɔng. Ɔffɔnɛ baang, alɔɔkyɔng lɛmmwɔɔl duu duu za liffuwɔnɛyɔng. Lɛmmwɔɔl duu za alɔɔknɛyɔng baang ka annyɔɔng ba lissi, Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kule kunnyiwɔyɔng.
41013012	Balɔɔt vvenɛ bakaa ikpana abbɛ bannyibɛ bawwɔɔl, gɔɔ ibassɛ balɔɔt vvenɛ bakaa bwaan abbɛ bannyibɛ bawwɔɔl. Bwɔɔntiti vvenɛ basikili bakaa ibakka la ibassɛ bannyibɛ bawwɔɔl.
41013013	Vvenɛ atunyɔng balɔɔt gaang gaang ka kɔlɔɔk anaam, ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa ɔkɔɔmnɛ kiyila ’sɔng baang tɔttɔt ɔffɔ ka lakpeke, vvenɛ uddu.
41013014	“Vvenɛ ayɛnyɔng ’Lakkpi za labbɔlnɛ’ ka lanaangnɛ ka ɛfɛɛn a businɛ lɛnaang.” (Ɔkkwɔɔ-ɔkkwɔɔ akke tɛ:) “Balɔɔt ba balenɛ Judea vvenɛ bamma babbwulu lɛttaal.
41013015	Ɔlɔɔt wa ulenɛ ka libat a ggwoon ammɛ ɔfɔngɔ liggbili kɛbɛpɛ za kɛmal ka ggwoon kɛsam bɔfɛɛn.
41013016	Ɔlɔɔt wa ulenɛ ka lɛmma, ɔfɔngɔ kɛppyɛlɛ umii ɔsam ugbogbo ka ssala.
41013017	Vvenɛ bwanavva zzɛɛm la ibakka bwɔɔntiti ba batiinɛ sɛkɛsɛkɛ bayɛn akama ka bɛtɔm a kule kɔnaang!
41013018	Azɔɔm annyiyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm nkwaaning lilɔɔk ’sɔng lisi ɛkɛtɛ lukook lɛnaang.
41013019	Lilɔɔk sa bɛtɔm a kule kɔnaang vvenɛ libbɔl gaang gaang litta sa lilenɛ lɛnaang ka vveeng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ussinɛ ɔlɔɔm vveengodde tɔttɔt uffu ɔffɔ ka gedegede mung. Akama wa ule ɔffɔ ning baang ba ɔbɛlɛ lile tɔttɔt vveeng ukpeke.
41013020	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔzzabong bɛtɔm ’byɔng baang ɔzzɔɔk, usinɛ ning lile, ɔlɔɔt wa ule uddu baala ule. Ɔzza bɛtɔm ’byɔng baang ɔzzɔɔk kwa balɔɔt ammɛ ba ɔsanganɛ.
41013021	“Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang, ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛ ɔttɛ, ’Yɛn Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ!’ ɔlɔk, ’Ppyɛɛkmɛ bakang!’ Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ayilamɛkwɛ.
41013022	Ɔffɔnɛ baang, bakkala lɛlaak vvenɛ batuma battɛ abbɛ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ, ɔlɔk abbɛ bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Vvenɛ banaang bɛmaanga la bikɛɛlɛ lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔkkɔɔnɛ bakkwoongnɛ banaang balɔɔt ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ bagbigbini.
41013023	Akatwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng! Mbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔngbong lilɔɔk ’sɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ ɛkɛtɛ ya lile linaang ɛffɔ.
41013024	“Ɛkɛtɛ ya lilɔɔk ’sɔng lilenɛ lɛsaal, livve-luwee vvenɛ lizum, ekwukwɔɔn vvenɛ ba ɛbɛlɛ lɛllaat.
41013025	Bwaannttuma vvenɛ bassi ka libat battɔ ka lisse. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔnnyɛkɛ lakke ɔkkpɛlɛ za lalenɛ ka libat.
41013026	Ɔffɔnɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang vvenɛ Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ utuma ka ikkpálá lukkpaagbeedde la likke la latele za lɛbaang.
41013027	Vvenɛ ɔtɔɔm bayilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, bakkwɔɔ balɔɔt ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ ka ifɛɛn ifɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ɛkpansi baloko ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn.
41013028	“Afɔngɔyɔng kɛssɛ kikopolowɔyɔng kɔlɔɔk. Kɛbbwɔtnɛ, livva liyaala, asan attɛyɔng eteep effubong.
41013029	Ayɛnnɛyɔng bɛfɛɛn bya mbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ ka bɛnaangnɛ, akɔɔlɔ attɛyɔng Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ utii kɛtɛkɛtɛ.
41013030	Akke attɛyɔng bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung bɛnaangbong ɔkkpɛlɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ balɔɔt ba balenɛ ka kuddu gedegede mung babbe.
41013031	Libat la ɛkpansi vvenɛ bɛsak; ɔzzanga lɛmmwɔɔl anaam baala lɛsak ka nakanaka.
41013032	“Ɔlɔɔt wa ule ɔsan kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang ɔlɔk ɛkɛtɛ, ba ule. Gɔɔ bayilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba balenɛ ka libat la Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ba basan. Ule Dedde keem ka ɔsannɛ.
41013033	Ateleyɔng zzeen akatyɔng, taayɔng kkwetkkwet appyɛɛkyɔng ka asinɛyɔng lɛsan ka ɛkɛtɛ kule kɔnaang.
41013034	Kule kɔtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt wa umiinɛ kɔssɛ ɔkɔngɔ ibɔɔyi ammɛ ka ssala ka ulenɛbɛ lɛkamala ɔttɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔt ɔnaang kɛnaang ammɛ. Ɔbwɔɔlɔ ɔkat-a-lɛmma-ggwoon ɔttɛ ɔkat doddo.
41013035	Atele zzeen akatyɔng tɛ, ba asanyɔng ɛkɛtɛ Uyini a ssala ule ɔppyɛlɛ tɛ, ule ɔppyɛlɛ kulele oo, ɔlɔk kɛtɔm oo, ɔlɔk ka libbessolo oo! ɔlɔk mung ule ɔppyɛlɛ ka livve lɛttanɛ nsan.
41013036	Ɔppyɛlɛnɛ, ɔfɔngɔ wɔyɔng ka bilaa kɛyɛn.
41013037	Kwa nlɔɔknɛ mung la annyɔɔng, nlɔɔk ning la balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ: ‘Akatyɔng tɛ!’
41014001	Usseke bɛtɔm bɛffa banaang Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ. Ka kazzi ’kwɔng baang, banaang brɛɛd wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa basinɛ yeast lɛssɛɛn. Bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la bakopolo-Lafɔɔ bakɔɔm lagban baggyan ɛtɔk ya bakaanɛ Jesus ka wɛɛk, bawwɔɔl.
41014002	Battɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ikaamɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang tɛ, nzang kullu vvenɛ kɔttɔ tɛ.”
41014003	Jesus ɔdɔkɔ baang ka ssala Simon wa ulenɛ la ɔffaal ka lɛffɛ za lɛzzanganɛ Bethany. Jesus ɔdɔkɔ baang ka kazzi, wanavva uffu ɔmal la bilim a bannɛ ba bakkaamnɛ kappya gaang, ba banaangnɛbɛ la bɔfɛɛn bwa bakkwɔɔnɛbwɛ ‘Nard’. Wanavva ’wɔng baang ɔsam bilim ’pyɔng baang ɔbwɔɔt, usikili bannɛ ’bɔng baang, ɔllɔt Jesus ka lɛttɔ.
41014004	Kutun balɔɔt balɔk ba badɔkɔnɛ baang balɔɔk abbɛ abbɛ battɛ, “Kɛbbwak a bannɛ ’sɔng gbɔɔ kilenɛ ’bɔng?
41014005	Nzang bataanbong bannɛ ’bɔng baang ka lalɔp inaara zzɔɔp ning, basam ikkpoko ’yɔng baang bannyi balɔɔt ba ɔbbɔlnɛbɛ.” Banyanga wanavva ’wɔng baang gaang gaang.
41014006	Ɔzzanga Jesus ɔttɛ, “Fɔngɔyɔng wanavva ɔlɔɔt! Anyangamɛyɔng kwa ’bɔng? Ɔnaangnɛbong kɔlɔɔk kwa doddo mung fet.
41014007	Balɔɔt ba ɔbbɔlnɛbɛ bale mung la annyɔɔng ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, kɔsaapwɔnɛyɔng akkwoong mung atteleyɔngbɛ. Anaam mung la annyɔɔng baala ntaa ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
41014008	Wanavva ’wɔng baang ɔnaangbong kwa ukkwoongnɛ; ɔllɔtnɛbong bannɛ ’bɔng baang ka kkwɔɔt, ɔbamanɛsɛ ɔkat kullu anaam ka lusso.
41014009	Mung nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ, ɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ka vveengodde ya babwɔɔlɔnɛ Kuttu-budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, vvenɛ babwɔɔlɔ kɔlɔɔk kwa wanavva ’wɔng mung ɔnaangnɛ nkwaaning bakkemɛ.”
41014010	Ɔzzánga Judas wa ɔdɔkɔnɛ ka kɛkaan a balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus ba zzɔɔppabaffa ufeele umii ukup bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm ɔttɛ ɔfɛɛt Jesus unnyibɛ.
41014011	Kɔsaapbɛ gaang gaang ka bappyeenɛ ning baang, bayilamɛ kinnyi ikkpoko. Ɔzzánga utte kɛggyan a kufuk kwa ule ɔfɛɛt Jesus unnyibɛ.
41014012	Kɛtɔm ikeeng sa bazzinɛ brɛɛd wa basinɛ yeast lɛssɛɛn, ka kɛtɔm sa bawwɔɔlnɛ bwaan-itɔɔn ba Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ, balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus babapmɛ battɛ, “Aggyan attɛ ibama Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ kwa annɔ, ilokowɔ ka yang?”
41014013	Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔsanga balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ baffa ɔtɔɔm, ɔkamalabɛ ɔttɛ, “Amiiyɔng ka lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang, waanwalam wa ɔtɔkɔnɛ bilim a bannyi vvenɛ ududawɔyɔng.
41014014	Kupmɛyɔng amiiyɔng ka ggwoon gwa ɔmalnɛ, abwɔɔlɔyɔng Uyini a ggwoon attɛyɔng; ‘Ukopolo-lukopolo ɔttɛ, lɛnɔk za ile itaa izzi Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ lile?’
41014015	Vvenɛ ɔyɔɔwɔyɔng lɛnɔk a ggwoon za lɛbaang ka libat. Bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bile baang, abamayɔngbyɛ akatyɔngyɛlɛ.”
41014016	Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ’bɔng baang bagbata bamii ka lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang. Bamiinɛ, bayɛn bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔnɛbɛ; abbɛ babama Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ baloko.
41014017	Kulele kɔnaangnɛ, Jesus baffu la balɔɔt ammɛ zzɔɔppabaffa.
41014018	Badɔkɔ baang ka okkpokolo ka kazzi, Jesus ɔttɛ, “Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng, ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ule mung wa ule ka uzzinɛnɛ issɛ. Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ile mung ka kazzi la anaam.”
41014019	Balɔɔt-a-kɔssɛ ammɛ livve lɛbbɔlbɛ, babapmɛ ɔlɔɔt vvɔn vvɔn battɛ, “Nsan lɔsan nttɛ anaam nɛ ba akkwɔɔ, faa nang?”
41014020	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Ule ule ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ka kɛkaan annyɔɔng, balɔɔt ba zzɔppabaffa mung, Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔddɔk brɛɛd ka ulɔlɔ vvɔn la anaam.
41014021	Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ubbe tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ vvenɛ ubbe! Ɔzzànga akama vvenɛ ɔttala ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang wa uzzinɛ issɛ ammɛ. Gɔɔ kɔdɔkɔ kɔtta lɛyyɛɛp ka batakamɛnɛ nakanaka lɛmaat!”
41014022	Ka balenɛ baang ka kazzi, Jesus ɔsam brɛɛd ɔzɔɔm uwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang, ɔtɔkmɛ ɔfaka unnyi balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ, ɔttɛ, “Atɔkyɔng, uwɔng ulenɛ ɛkkpakkwɔɔt anaam.”
41014023	Ɔbbal ommonggo lɛsam, uwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang, tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔsammɛ unnyibɛ; ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ bavva ka ommonggo ’wɔng baang.
41014024	“Mung linnyi anaam sa littanɛ ka lɛttɔ balɔɔt ggbadam; linnyi anaam sa linaangnɛ kɛbɛtɛ-kɛnnɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛkkaam.
41014025	Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ batak ’bɔng ba nbɛlɛ lɛvva ɔddɔkɔddɔkɔ ɔffɔ ka kɛtɔm sa nle ka nvvanɛ ufaa batak ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
41014026	Bazzɔɔk kisoom, bafeele bamii ka Lɛttaal-Olives.
41014027	Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng mung vvenɛ amma akɔngɔnɛyɔng, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, ‘Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔwwɔɔl ɔkat-itɔɔn, itɔɔn vvenɛ ikkyama!’
41014028	Ɛkɛtɛ ya nlenɛ lifungala ntaa kuddu, vvenɛ nkɔɔm ɛtɔk nssɛ nmii Galilee ka lusso annyɔɔng.”
41014029	Ɔzzánga Peter ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Anaam gɔɔ baala ngbata nkɔngɔwɔ, mkkpa ɔkkpɛlɛ bagbata.”
41014030	Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔlɔɔk la Peter ɔttɛ, “Balangkɔkɔ bakɔɔlnɛ bikkpit bɛffa kɛtɔm mung, akalabong bikkpit bɛkkyaat attɛ nɛ ba asan.”
41014031	Peter ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Anaam kkpong kkpong baala nlɔɔk ning baang, mkkpa bale ka bawwɔɔlnɛyɛlɛ la annɔ!” Balɔɔt-a-kɔssɛ a Jesus ’bɔng kang ɔkkpɛlɛ bassɛ balɔɔk ning baang.
41014032	Baffɔnɛ ka ɛfɛɛn ya ɛzzanganɛ Gethsemane, Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Taayɔng mung, nmii nssɛɛn luzɔɔm!”
41014033	Ɔkkwɔɔ Peter la James, la John bakupmɛ. Akama ɔnaangmɛ, ɔbɛtɛ la bukee.
41014034	Ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Bukee bwa bunaangnɛnɛ gedegede mung buggyannɛ kɛwwɔɔl fet. Ataayɔng mung agepeleyɔng.”
41014035	Utut umii ka lusso ssup ukun laddu, ɔzɔɔm ɔttɛ nkwaaning usi akama lɛyɛn ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang.
41014036	Ɔzɔɔm ɔttɛ, “Dedde, Dedde anaam! Lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ibɔɔk annɔ lile kkpɛkɛlɛm. Asam ommonggo akama ’wɔng assekenɛ. Ba nggyan nttɛ nnaang kwa kɔsaapnɛnɛ anaam, nggyan nttɛ nnaang kwa kɔsaapwɔnɛ annɔ.”
41014037	Ɔppyɛlɛnɛ uffu, ɔyɛn balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ba bakkyaat ka bilaa. Ɔlɔɔk la Peter ɔttɛ, “Simon, alaabong ɔɔ? Asibong likkwoong ataa kkwetkkwet ɛkalangaka nnyɔn gbɔɔ ɛsaal ɔɔ?”
41014038	Ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Agepeleyɔng akɔɔm assɛɛnyɔng luzɔɔm tɛ ɔkkɔɔnɛ asiyɔng ka bubbi lɛttɔ. Luppyam lɔtɔɔmwɔyɔng mung, ɔzzànga ɛkkpakkwɔɔt ba eyila.”
41014039	Jesus ɔgbata umii ɔssɛɛn luzɔɔm, ɔdɔkɔ ɔbbal ning baang lɛlɔɔk.
41014040	Ɔppyɛlɛ uffu ka ɛfɛɛn a balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ, ɔyɛnbɛ ka bilaa. Basi likkwoong bataa kkwetkkwet. Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bakingimɛnɛ basi lɛsan.
