41014041	Ɔppyɛlɛ uffu ka bikkpit bɛkkyaat, ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Atiiyɔng baang ka amininɛyɔng alaayɔng ɔɔ? Kuddubong! Ɛkɛtɛ ɛffɔbong! Ppyɛɛkyɔng! Basambong Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ bannyi lakke banaang-a-bubbi.
41014042	Afeele imiiyɔng. Ppyɛɛk ɔlɔɔt wa uzzinɛ issɛ anaam mung!”
41014043	Jesus ɔdɔkɔ utii ka kɛlɔɔk, ka Judas, wa ussinɛ ka kɛkaan a balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ba zzɔɔppabaffa uffunɛ. Judas ɔdɔkɔ la kɛkaan a balɔɔt la iggɛ la iggɛ balɔk la ikkpong ka bakupmɛnɛ. Bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la bakopolo-Lafɔɔ la bagɛlɛnya batɔɔmnɛbɛ.
41014044	Uzzi-issɛ ɔggba kɛkaan ’sɔng baang lɛbwɔɔlɔ ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt wa mgbugbamɛnɛ ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa aggyannɛyɔng tɛ. Aggbɔmɛ amiiyɔng, isɔgya bakɔɔm bakatmɛ.”
41014045	Judas ɔffɔnɛ ɛffɔ-ɛffɔ, umii ssɔng ukup Jesus ɔttɛ, “Ukopolo-Lukopolo!” ugbugbamɛ eseese.
41014046	Ɔzzánga balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bakaamɛ, baggbɔ izzi eseese.
41014047	Ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus vvɔn wa ulenɛ baang ka ubeenɛ, uttulu ogge ammɛ ɔsanga ɔkkwɛɛ kɔtɔɔk ubili Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm Wa Lɛbaang, ɔzza.
41014048	Ɔzzánga Jesus ufeele ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Affunɛyɔng kɛkaa la iggɛ la iggɛ, la ikkpong la ikkpong, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ nlenɛ ɔbɛpɛ-lafɔɔ ning ɔɔ?
41014049	Ndɔkɔ baang ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka nkopolonɛ la kɛtɔm la kɛtɔm gɔɔ asinɛyɔng lɛkaa. Ɔzzànga kwa Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ, vvenɛ kɔnaang ka lɔkkwɔɔn.”
41014050	Ɔttɛ ɔnaang, balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bamma bakɔngɔmɛ.
41014051	Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn wa uvvoongnɛ ulata-ubba ka kkwɔɔt ɔdɔkɔ baang ka ukupnɛ Jesus. Babummɛ kɛkaa.
41014052	Ɔzzánga ɔmma kɛkɔɔ ɔkɔngɔ ulata ubba ammɛ ka isimi.
41014053	Basam Jesus bamii ka ssala Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm Wa Lɛbaang, ka ɛfɛɛn a bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm, la bagɛlɛnya, la bakopolo-Lafɔɔ balenɛ lɛggba.
41014054	Peter ɔdɔkɔ baang ka ɔssɛnɛ fulufulu ukupmɛ ka isimi, umii ka isimi a ggwoon-a-kɛkaal ka ssala Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm Wa Lɛbaang. Ɔtaa bakang la bakat-a-balɔɔt uwupa lɔkɔɔn.
41014055	Bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ la balɔɔt a lusse baggyan tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bale balɔɔk babɛtɛ Jesus, nkwaaning bawwɔɔlmɛ. Lɛttɔ basi lɛtɔk tɔttɔt.
41014056	Keem ittɛɛsɛ ggbadam baffu bakkala lɛlaak babɛtɛ Jesus, ɔzzànga kutolo abbɛ bbwak bbwak ba kumii.
41014057	Ɔzzánga balɔɔt balɔk bafeele bakkala lɛlaak ’zɔng mung babɛtɛ Jesus battɛ,
41014058	“Ipyeebong ka ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Vvenɛ nbɛpɛ Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ’gwɔng mung gwa balɔɔt banaangnɛ. Ka bɛtɔm bɛkkyaat, vvenɛ nnaang lɔlɔk gwa usinɛ balɔɔt lile banaangnɛ.’ ”
41014059	Gɔɔ ittɛɛsɛ ’yɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ kamma kutolo abbɛ kkwɔn kasi lile.
41014060	Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm Wa Lɛbaang ufeele ubee ka lusso balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ unnyi Jesus lɔbap ɔttɛ, “Ɔzzánga ba akkwoong appyɛlɛ kamma ka balɔɔknɛ ning mung ɔkkpɛlɛ batumwɔ ɔɔ?”
41014061	Jesus ɔdɔkɔ ɔtaa zzum. Lɛmmwɔɔl ning usi lɛzza. Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm Wa Lɛbaang ’wɔng baang ɔbbal lɔbap linnyi, ɔttɛ, “Annɔ alenɛ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ ɔɔ? Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa balɔɔt batelenɛ ɔɔ?”
41014062	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Iii tɛ, anaam tɛ. Vvenɛ ayɛnyɔng Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ule ɔtaa ka kɔbɔɔk-ɛlaabɔɔk a Dedde ayyɔɔt, wa ɔttanɛ liggbenge ɔkkpɛlɛ. Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ uffu la ikkpála ya libat.”
41014063	Ɔzzánga Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm Wa Lɛbaang uppyeenɛ ning baang, ɔlɔm uwɔkɔlɔ ammɛ ɔyaak. Ɔttɛ, “Ittɛɛsɛ ilɔk ba ibɛlɛ lɛggyan!
41014064	Appyeeyɔngbong tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔkpɛnnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm baang ɔɔ? Annyɔɔng anngwayɔng nang?” Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ balɔɔk bubbi batummɛ, battɛ “Kɔbbɔlmɛbong, ule wa kɛwwɔɔl.”
41014065	Balɔɔt balɔk bakkɔl libbaak bavvoongmɛ. Baggbɔmɛ ubba ka lusso. Batupmɛ, battɛmɛ, “Attina, baang nnyinɔɔng utupwɔnɛ?” Isɔgya basammɛ batup labut.
41014066	Peter ɔdɔkɔ utii bakang ka isimi a ggwoon a kɛkaal ka ɔtaanɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya ubili Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm Wa Lɛbaang wa wanavva uffunɛ.
41014067	Ɔyɛnnɛ Peter ka uwupanɛ lɔkɔɔn, ɔppyɛɛkmɛ ssii ɔttɛ, “Annɔ mgbaa adɔkɔ la Jesus wa Nazareth.”
41014068	Ɔzzánga Peter ɔkala ɔttɛ, “Anaam mɛ ba nsan … Gɔɔ ba nsan bwa atolonɛ atum.” Ulemɛnɛ kamma ning baang lɛppyɛlɛ, ɔgbata umii ka lɛmma kikkwu. Eseese, ulangkɔkɔ ɔkɔɔl.
41014069	Ubili ’wɔng baang ɔyɛnmɛnɛ baang, ɔbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt ba gbɔɔ ba babeenɛ baang ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng, ɔlɔɔt ammɛ ɔgbaa!”
41014070	Peter ɔbbalkwɛ lɛkangala. Gɔɔ ba ɔtaka ɔmmɛ, balɔɔt ba gbɔɔ ’bɔng baang babbal Peter lɛkaa battɛ, “Ka abɛlɛ lɛkala attɛ annɔ la abbɛ ba assɛ, ka annɔ ɔgbaa alenɛ wa Galilee.”
41014071	Ɔzzánga Peter ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Nyimbong nttɛ nlɔɔk lɔkkwɔɔn! Nkkalanɛ lɛlaak, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyɔɔnɛ akama! Ɔlɔɔt wa alɔɔknɛ atumyɔng baang ba nsan.”
41014072	Eseese, ulangkɔkɔ ɔbbal lɛkɔɔl ka bikkpit bɛffa, ɔzzánga Peter ukke tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Jesus ɔlɔɔknɛ la ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Ulangkɔkɔ ɔkɔɔlnɛ bikkpit bɛffa, vvenɛ akala bikkpit bɛkkyaat attɛ nɛ ba asan!” Ɔzzánga Peter ɔzzɔɔk kullu eseese.
41015001	Ɔffɔnɛ lɔfɔm, bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm, bakkwɔɔ bagɛlɛnya la bakopolo-Lafɔɔ, la balɔɔt a lusse ɔkkpɛlɛ baloko ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn batini. Bakaa Jesus bassɛɛn ikpɔkɔlɔ, balɛkɛmɛ bamii bannyi Pilate.
41015002	Pilate ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ, “Annɔ alenɛ ubeet a Jews ɔɔ?” Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Kule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ alɔɔknɛ baang.”
41015003	Bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm bakatamɛ lilɔɔk ggbadam.
41015004	Keem Pilate ɔbbalmɛ lɛbap ɔttɛ, “Kamma baala appyɛlɛ ɔɔ? Agɔpɔlɔ appyee lilɔɔk sa bakatawɔnɛ baang.”
41015005	Jesus lɛmmwɔɔl ammɛ usi lɛzza. Kɔkɛɛlɛ Pilate gaang gaang.
41015006	Ɛkɛtɛ Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ, Pilate ɔkkyaa ɔlɔɔt vvɔn wa ɔsaapnɛ balɔɔt, ka igbakɔpɔ ɔfɔngɔ.
41015007	Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang, ɔlɔɔt ɔdɔkɔ baang ka igbakkɔpɔ wa ɔzzanganɛ Barabbas la baggyan-a-kɔlɔɔk ba bawwɔɔlnɛ balɔɔt ka kullu.
41015008	Balɔɔt babbinɛ, babwɔɔlɔ Pilate battɛ ɔnaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɛlɔm-ɛlɔm.
41015009	Keem Pilate ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Aggyan attɛyɔng nkkyaa ubeet a Jews nfɔngɔ ɔɔ?”
41015010	Pilate ɔkɔɔlɔbong kkpelegedee ɔttɛ bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm bàkàa Jesus bafeemɛ ka banaangmɛnɛ luleep.
41015011	Ɔzzánga bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm bafeele babwɔɔlɔ Pilate battɛ lutini ’gwɔng ɔkkyaa Barabbas afɔngɔ.
41015012	Pilate ɔbbal kibbi ’sɔng baang lɛbap ɔttɛ, “Ngkka ɔlɔɔt wa akkwɔɔnɛyɔng ubeet a Jews nle nnaangmɛ nang?”
41015013	Babungu babwɔɔlɔmɛ battɛ, “Azzengemɛ ka cross!”
41015014	Pilate ɔbbalbɛ lɛbap ɔttɛ, “Mung ule ’bɔng lɛnaang kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ?” Babungu tɛ̀ttɛ̀ likke lilenɛbɛ battɛ, “Azzengemɛ ka Cross!”
41015015	Pilate ɔdɔkɔ ɔggyan ɔttɛ ɔnaang kwa kɔsaapnɛ kibbi ’sɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔzzánga ɔkkyaa Barabbas ɔfɔngɔ. Ɔddabɛ ɔttɛ batup Jesus, balemɛnɛ livve litup, basammɛ bamii bazzenge ka cross.
41015016	Isɔgya basam Jesus bamii ka isimi a ggwoon a kɛkaal ka ssala uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt abbɛ, bakkwɔɔ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ abbɛ baggba ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn.
41015017	Basam ubili ubba-babeet baggbɔmɛ, banaang kɛttɔpɔ bizebize battɔpɔmɛ ka lɛttɔ.
41015018	Bawomomo battɛ: “Lɛttɔ lɛtaawɔ oo, ubeet a Jews!”
41015019	Bakɔɔm bisse batupmɛ ka lɛttɔ. Batak libbaak ballɔtmɛ, bakun laddu bawomomɛ.
41015020	Balemɛnɛ livve lɛnyɔɔka, bakkyaamɛ ubba-babeet ’wɔng baang, bappyɛlɛ iwɔkɔlɔ ya ammɛ biini bawɔkɔlɔmɛ. Basammɛ bamii kizzenge.
41015021	Baffɔnɛ ka ɛtɔk, bayɛn ɔlɔɔt wa ɔzzanganɛ Simon, ka ussinɛ ka kɛmat ule ka umiinɛ lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang. Ɔzzánga isɔgya bakaamɛ ka lɛgabwɔ battɛ uttele Jesus ɔtɔkɔ cross. (Simon ussi Cyrene, ammɛ ɔfɔɔnɛ Alexander la Rufus)
41015022	Basam Jesus bamii ka ɛfɛɛn ya bakkwɔɔnɛ Golgotha, ning baang bakkwɔɔ “Ɛfɛɛn a ukɔɔk-a-lɛttɔ.”
41015023	Baffɔnɛ baang, babum kinnyi a Jesus batak ba banɔknɛ la Myrrh, Jesus ufim kɛvva.
41015024	Bazzengemɛ. Basam ibba ammɛ babɛngɛlɛ, batta illɔ basan kɛfaak sa ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔt ule ɔsam.
41015025	Ɔdɔkɔ ikangala ɔsɛlɛzzɔɔp ya lɔfɔm ka bazzengemɛnɛ ka cross.
41015026	Bakkpɔk bɛfɛɛn bya bakatamɛnɛ bamat baang, battɛ “Uwɔng Ubeet a Jews.”
41015027	Bassɛ bazzenge babbyap baffa baang babɛtɛ la Jesus, vvɔn ka kɔbɔɔk ɛlaabɔɔk, wa vvɔn ka ɛbyakɔm.
41015028	[Ning mung ulenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɔlɔɔk kwa Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ kulenɛ lɛnaang ka lɔkkwɔɔn ka lɔttɛnɛ, “Ɔdɔkɔ utul akama la babbyap.”]
41015029	Balɔɔt ba basaknɛ ka ɛtɔk, bannyɛkɛ lattɔ, banyɔɔka Jesus battɛ, “Iyyaa! Adɔkɔ attɛ atut Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm azzɔɔk, appyɛlɛgwɛ abɔɔk ka bɛtɔm bɛkkyaat keem lɔsaal!
41015030	Asini ka Cross gedegede mung akkalawɔ kɛyɔɔng!”
41015031	Bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm bassɛ banyɔɔka Jesus ning baang, balɔɔk abbɛ abbɛ battɛ, “Ukkwoong kɛkkala balɔɔt balɔk, ba ukkwoongmɛ ɔkkalamɛ kɛyɔɔng!
41015032	Affu iyɛnyɔng Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ, ubeet a Israel ka ule ka usininɛ ka libat a cross uffu, nkwaaning iyila kwa ammɛ!” Babbyap ’bɔng baang ba bazzengenɛbɛ baang la Jesus bassɛ banyɔɔkamɛ.
41015033	Kikoon ɔggbaggba ning, usul ka ussinɛ ikalangka zzɔɔppiffa tɔttɔt ɔffɔ ikalangka ikkyaat.
41015034	Ɔffɔnɛ ikalangka ikkyaat ammɛ ubungu gaang gaang ɔttɛ, “Eloi, Eloi, lema sabachthani?” Ning baang ulenɛ “Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm anaam, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm anaam, mbɔng ammanɛ akɔngɔnɛ?”
41015035	Balɔɔt balɔk bapyeenɛ ka ɔlɔɔknɛ battɛ, “Agɔpɔlɔyɔng, ule ka kɛkkwɔɔ Elijah!”
41015036	Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ɔmma umii ɔsam okokkya ɔyan ka batak ba bangmanganɛ, ɔggbɔ ka lɛttɔ bissɛ. Uyeek okokkya ’wɔng baang umii ɔssɛɛn Jesus ka kamma ɔttɛ, “Afɔngɔyɔngbong ssii, itaa mung iyɛn vvenɛ Elijah uffu usinimɛ ka cross nsan!”
41015037	Jesus ɔfaka lɛmmwɔɔl a kullu, ubbe eseese.
41015038	Ɔzzánga ubba wa battanɛ bazza lɛnɔk ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyaak bwalatata bɛfaak bɛffa.
41015039	Uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt isogya ɔyɛnnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Jesus ubbenɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka lɔkkwɔɔn!”
41015040	Bwanavva balɔk badɔkɔ baang ka babeenɛ fulufulu bappyɛɛk. Mary Magdalene, la Mary, abakka James wa utiti la Joseph, la Salome badɔkɔ baang.
41015041	Bwanavva ’bɔng baang bakup Jesus ka ussinɛ Galilee bakɔɔm battelemɛ. Bwanavva balɔk badɔkɔ baang mgbaa ba bakupmɛnɛ baffu Jerusalem.
41015042	Kulele kɔnaangbong ning ka Joseph wa ussinɛ Arimathea uffunɛ. Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung ɔdɔkɔ ɔlɔɔt a latele ka lusse wa ɔkatnɛ ɛkɛtɛ Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ile iffu. Ɔdɔkɔ Kɛtɔm-ibama, (kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang kissolobong tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔffɔ Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ). Ɔzzánga Joseph ɔkkaam luppyam umii ɔbap Pilate ɔttɛ unnyimɛ ubbu a Jesus keem.
41015044	Kɔkɛɛlɛ Pilate ka uppyeenɛ ɔttɛ Jesus ubbebong fet. Ɔkkwɔɔ uzzilɛttɔ-isogya ɔttɛ ɔbapmɛ, ɔmmɛbong ka Jesus ubbenɛ nsan.
41015045	Upyyeenɛ ka uzzilɛttɔ-isogya ɔlɔɔknɛ ning baang, Pilate ɔbwɔɔlɔ Joseph ɔttɛ ɔsam ubbu a Jesus.
41015046	Joseph ɔlɛɛp ubba-babbu, usini ubbu, ɔggbɔ ka ubba ’wɔng baang, umii ulli ka lilli za batɔɔknɛ ka lattaal. Uvvenɛ, ɔssang lɛttaal za lɛbaang ugupu ka kamma lilli.
41015047	Mary Magdalene la Mary, abakka Joseph, badɔkɔ baang ka bappyɛɛknɛ nkwaaning bayɛn ɛfɛɛn a ballinɛ Jesus.
41016001	Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ kɛsaknɛ, Mary Magdalene, la Mary wa ɔmaatnɛ James, la Salome balɛɛp bannɛ ba bale ka bamiinɛ bappwɔɔng kkwɔɔt a Jesus.
41016002	Lɔfɔm a lɔfɔm a livve luzɔɔm, bafeele bamii ka lilli.
41016003	Baffɔnɛ ka ɛtɔk balɔɔk battɛ, “Nnyinɔɔng ule uttuluyɛlɛ lɛttaal ’zɔng baang usseke kamma lilli. (Lɛttaal liggbenge gaang gaang) Bayeeknɛ bappyɛɛk, bayɛn ka balenɛ lɛttaal ’zɔng baang littulu bappyɛlɛ isimisimi.
41016005	Ɔzzánga bamal ka tɔkɔlɔ lilli bayɛn waanwalam bakang ka ɔtaanɛ la balata iwɔkɔlɔ, luppyam lɔzzabɛ gaang gaang.
41016006	Ɔzzánga okolobya ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ luppyam lɔbɛlɛwɔyɔng lɛzza. Nsan lɔsan nttɛ aleyɔng ka kɛggyan a Jesus wa bazzengemɛnɛ ka cross. Mung ba ɔbɛlɛ lile, Ufungalabong ka lubbe! Ppyɛɛkyɔng ɛfɛɛn a bawulumɛnɛ mung.
41016007	Amii abwɔɔlɔyɔng balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔgbaa la Peter attɛyɔng: ‘Ɔkɔɔmbong ɔssɛ ɔkɔngɔwɔyɔng umii Galilee; vvenɛ ayɛnmɛyɔng bakang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔggbawɔnɛyɔng lɛbwɔɔlɔ.’ ”
41016008	Ɔzzánga batta ka tɔkɔlɔ lilli, bassi baang bamma la kiffula ka kɛtɔmnɛbɛ. Gɔɔ ɔlɔɔt vvɔn gbɔɔ basi lɛbwɔɔlɔ ɔssanga ka ɔbbwɔpɔnɛbɛ. ƆTƆM-ETUMULU LƐMMWƆƆL ƆLƆƆMƆLƆƆM ’ZƆNG
41016009	[Jesus ufungalanɛ ka lɔfɔm a lɔfɔm a Livve-luzɔɔm ’zɔng baang, ɔdɔkɔ utte Mary Magdalene wa ɔggbanɛ lippyem linnangikkyaat ussekemɛ liduda.
41016010	Umii ɔbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt-a-kɔssɛ a Jesus ba balenɛ ka kɛtaa lisɛɛm la kullu la kullu.
41016011	Bappyeenɛ ning baang ka ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔttɛ Jesus ufungalabong, gɔɔ ammɛ ɔyɛnmɛbong ka zzeen, bakangalamɛ.
41016012	Nkwɔng kɔsaknɛ, Jesus ufoolo kɔlɔk utuma ka ɛfɛɛn a balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ka balenɛ ka ɛtɔk a kimii ka kɛmat.
41016013	Abbɛ bappyɛlɛ isimisimi bamii babwɔɔlɔ ba abbɛ. Basi liyila tɔttɔt.
41016014	Kɔsak lɛttala, Jesus utuma ka ɛfɛɛn a balɔɔt a ammɛ zzɔɔppavvɔn ka balenɛ ka kazzi. Ɔwɔlɔbɛ ka basɛlɛnɛ kiyila, bakoolo kippyee kɔlɔɔk bagbaa. Akkwɛ baang kɔnaangnɛ bafim kwa balɔɔt ba balemɛnɛ lɛyɛn ikokolo babwɔɔlɔnɛbɛ.
41016015	Ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Amiiyɔng ka vveeng ’wɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ, akopoloyɔng lutini ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ Kuttu-budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
41016016	Ɔlɔɔt duu wa uyilanɛ kwa anaam, anaangmɛyɔng baptizim, vvenɛ uddu; wa ɔsɛlɛnɛ kiyila, vvenɛ ubbe.
41016017	Vvenɛ nnyi balɔɔt lakke za kɛnaang a bɛmaanga, vvenɛ bakkwoong bakɔɔm lɛkɔɔl anaam baggba lippyem; bakkwoong batolo bafaa likaan ɔkkpɛlɛ.
41016018	Mkkpa basam izzɔkɔ ka labɔɔk, ɔlɔk bavva bussi, kɔlɔk ning bɛ baala kɔnaang. Vvenɛ batele balɔɔt iffaak labɔɔk, ɔppwabɛ eseese.”
41016019	Jesus, Uyini, ulenɛ ning mung livve lɛlɔɔk la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ, basammɛ, umii ka libat, ɔtaa ka kɔbɔɔk ɛlaabɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
41016020	Balɔɔt-a-kɔssɛ a Jesus bafeele bamii bayaam Kuttu-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ifɛɛn ifɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ka vveeng. Uyini ayyɔɔt ɔdɔkɔ baang ka kɛnaang ’sɔng baang la abbɛ, ɔyɔɔ ɔttɛ lukopolo abbɛ lule ka lɔkkwɔɔn ka bɛmaanga bya banaangnɛ.] ETUMULU YA ƆTƆM YA NNYƆN [ (9) Bwanavva ’bɔng baang bamii babwɔɔlɔ Peter la inngwa ammɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔbwɔɔlɔnɛbɛ. (10) Nkwɔng kɔsaknɛ, Jesus biini ɔsanga balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔtɔɔm ifɛɛn ifɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔttɛ babwɔɔlɔ Kuttu-budoddo ’kwɔng kwa kusine likpeke kɛfal a kɛfal. ]
42001001	Nwomowɔbong Theophilus: Balɔɔt ppwap babumbong tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bakkwoongnɛ bakkpɔk lilɔɔk sa linaangnɛyɛlɛ mung ka bɛzzɔkɔ, bassɛɛn ka luvva.
42001002	Bakkpɔk kwa balɔɔt ba bayɛnnɛ lilɔɔk ’sɔng mung ka zzeen ka ussinɛ ka lutte assɛ babwɔɔlɔnɛyɛlɛ.
42001003	Dedde, ka nlenɛ luppyam libbe nkoop lilɔɔk ’sɔng mung ka lutte assɛ, nttina nttɛ kule kɔyyɛɛp ka nkkpɔknɛsɛ silididi, nnyiwɔ.
42001004	Nggyan nttɛ nkwaaning asan lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk a lilɔɔk ’sɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ sa balewɔnɛ likopolo.
42001005	Ka ɛkɛtɛ ya Herod ɔdɔkɔnɛ ubeet ka ɛkpansi Israel, ɔssɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm ɔdɔkɔ baang wa ɔzzanganɛ Zachariah wa ussinɛ ka kɛkaan a bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm sa Abijah. Avva ɔdɔkɔ ɔzzanga Elizabeth. Elizabeth ɔgbaa ɔdɔkɔ ussi ka itutum a ɔssɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm.
42001006	Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ baffa badɔkɔ balɔɔt ba doddo ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Batele lafɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ azzɛ.
42001007	Bwɔɔn basi lɛfɔɔn ka Elizabeth ɔdɔkɔnɛ ulleep. Ɔgbaa ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ bakkpɛɛmbong gaang gaang.
42001008	Kɛtɔm ssɔn, Zachariah ɔdɔkɔ ka kɛnaang a kɛssɛɛn a luzɔɔm ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ɔdɔkɔnɛ kɛbap sa ammɛ.
42001009	Ka eleme abbɛ, bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm badɔkɔ bakɔɔm illɔ, basangamɛ battɛ umii ɔfɔɔp bɛfɛɛn ka labun-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Keem umii ka tɔkɔlɔ a Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
42001010	Balɔɔt babbi ka vveeng, bazɔɔm ka ɛkɛtɛ kɛfɔɔp a bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng baang.
42001011	Uyilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm utuma ka ɛfɛɛn a Zachariah. Ɔkɔɔng baang ka kufoom ɛlaabɔɔk a labun-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm za bafɔɔpnɛ bɛfɛɛn, ubee.
42001012	Zachariah ɔyɛnmɛnɛ, tɔkɔlɔ ɔbbɔlmɛ, ɔbbwɔpɔmɛ.
42001013	Ɔzzánga uyilabɔtɔɔm ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Zachariah, tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔbbwɔpɔwɔ! Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uppyeewɔbong luzɔɔm. Wanavva annɔ vvenɛ ɔmaatwɔ waanawalam. Akɔlɔmɛ John.
42001014	Vvenɛ aggele gaang gaang ka bale bamaatmɛ. Balɔɔt ppwap vvenɛ bassɛ baggele gaang gaang ka bale bamaatmɛ!
42001015	Vvenɛ ule ule ɔlɔɔt wa lɛbaang ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔvva batak nakanaka. Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ kuvvoongmɛ ka ussinɛ ka kɛtɔm sa bale bamaatmɛ.
42001016	Vvenɛ ɔkɔɔm balɔɔt a Israel ppwap, ɔppyɛlɛ ufee Ebinukkpaapi, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm abbɛ.
42001017	Vvenɛ ɔkɔɔm ɛtɔk umii ka lusso la bɔkkaam la buggbenge tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Elijah uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Vvenɛ ɔnaang ibassɛ balɔɔt la bwɔɔn abbɛ bappyɛlɛ bataa ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn. Vvenɛ ɔnaang banaang-a-bubbi banaang ikɔlɔ, bakup ɛtɔk ya doddo. Vvenɛ ɔbama balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulokomɛ.”
42001018	Zachariah ɔlɔɔk la uyilabɔtɔɔm ɔttɛ, “Nle nnaang nang nsan nttɛ kɔlɔɔk kwa alɔɔknɛ mung kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn? Anaam ntii ukuku, wanavva anaam ɔgbaa ɔkkpɛɛmbong.”
42001019	Uyilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Anaam nlenɛ Gabriel wa ubeenɛ ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ammɛ ɔtɔɔmnɛnɛ, ɔttɛ nffu nbwɔɔlɔwɔ kuttu kwa doddo ’kwɔng mung.
42001020	Ɔzzànga mung asibong bɔtɔɔm bwa ɔtɔɔmnɛnɛ bwa bule bunaang ka ɛkɛtɛ ele ɛffɔ liyila. Ka alenɛ lifim liyila, vvenɛ nlakawɔ lɛkkɔ. Lɛmmwɔɔl vvenɛ ba abɛlɛ likkwoong azza tɔttɔt ɔffɔ ka kɛtɔm sa lilɔɔk sa nbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛ mung lile linaang ka lɔkkwɔɔn.”
42001021	Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ bale baang ka bataanɛ bakat Zachariah. Kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ ka ɔmmɛmɛnɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ a Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
42001022	Zachariah ɔttanɛ ka vveeng, kɛlɔɔk usi lɛbɛlɛ likkwoong. Abbɛ bakɔɔlɔ battɛ ɔyɛnbong biyɛnɛ ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Usseke ka ɔlɔɔknɛ ka bɛnnɔ. Lɛmmwɔɔl lisi lɛbɛlɛ lɛtta.
42001023	Ɛkɛtɛ kɛnaang ammɛ ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm elenɛ lɛsak, ɔppyɛlɛ ufula ka ssala ammɛ.
42001024	Ɔmmɛnɛ ssup wanavva ammɛ Elizabeth ɔyɛɛm. Usi ka ssala lɛgbata ka ittuma kubbwɔɔk. Ɔttɛ,
42001025	“Ebinukkpaapi ɛyɛnnɛbong kibbe-lɛttɔ, ɛyaammɛ, ɛsanganɛbong ka izzit ka lusso balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ.”
42001026	Elizabeth ulenɛ lɛyɛɛm, ɔffɔmɛ ittuma bwɔlaaning, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔɔm uyilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ Gabriel, ɔttɛ, umii ka lɛffɛ za lɛzzanganɛ Nazareth ka ɛkpansi a Galilee.
42001027	Ɔttɛ umii ɔbwɔɔlɔ waanawanavva wa ɔtakanɛ walam lɛsan, wa Joseph wa ussinɛ ka kikkwu a David ɔggyannɛ. Waanawanavva ’wɔng baang ɔzzanga Mary.
42001028	Uyilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm umii ka ɛfɛɛn a Mary ɔttɛ, “Bɔkaat butaa la annɔ! Ebinukkpaapi ele la annɔ! Ɛnaangwɔbong ppyɛɛ ɔttala!”
42001029	Mary luppyam lɔzzamɛ ka uppyeenɛ bɔtɔɔm bwa uyilabɔtɔɔm ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛnɛ. Kɔkɛɛlɛmɛ bwa ɔlɔɔknɛ utum.
42001030	Uyilabɔtɔɔm ɔlɔɔk la ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔbbwɔpɔwɔ Mary, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm asaapmɛ gaang.
42001031	Vvenɛ ayɛɛm, amaat waanawalam wa ale akɔlɔmɛ Jesus.
42001032	Vvenɛ uggbenge bakkwɔɔmɛ Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔnaangmɛ ɔzzanga ubeet tɛ̀ttɛ̀ abassɛ, David, wa iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ ɔdɔkɔnɛ.
42001033	Vvenɛ ɔzzanga ubeet ka kikkwu a Jacob. Kibeet ammɛ baala kikpeke yoyyoyyo.”
42001034	Mary ɔlɔɔk la uyilabɔtɔɔm ɔttɛ, “Anaam kaang ntii waanawanavva wa ɔtakanɛ la walam limini. Nkwɔng kule kɔnaang nang, vvenɛ kule ning baang?”
42001035	Uyilabɔtɔɔm ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ kuvvoongwɔ; lakke ammɛ vvenɛ lataa la annɔ. Ka kulenɛ ning baang, waan wa doddo ’wɔng baang vvenɛ bakkwɔɔmɛ Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
42001036	Akke attɛ ɔkpana annɔ Elizabeth wa ɔdɔkɔnɛ ulleep, gedegede mung utiimɛ ittuma bwɔlaaning ka ulenɛ la zzɛɛm la lɛkkpɛɛm ’zɔng baang tɛ.
42001037	Kɔlɔɔk kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usinɛ likkwoong ɔnaang ba kule.”
42001038	Mary ɔttɛ, “Anaam ubili a Ebinukkpaapi, kɔtaa ning baang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ alɔɔknɛ.” Ɔzzánga uyilabɔtɔɔm ɔgbata ussekemɛ.
42001039	Ka bɛtɔm ’byɔng baang Mary ufeele la lazzuma la lazzuma, umii ka killu sa kilenɛ ikpok-ikpok ka Judea.
42001040	Umii ka ssala Zachariah, uwomo Elizabeth.
42001041	Elizabeth uppyeenɛ ka Mary uwomomɛnɛ, ubbu ufeelemɛ ka lɛmmɛ. Ɔzzánga Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kuvvoongmɛ.
42001042	Elizabeth ɔlɔɔk ɔgaga ɔttɛ, “Ppyɛɛ ule wa annɔ ɔtta wa bwanavva ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ppyɛɛ ule wa waan annɔ wa ale amaat.
42001043	Mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ uggboggbo kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng kɔnaangnɛ ka abakka Uyini anaam uffunɛ ukoolonɛ?
42001044	Nppyeenɛ luwomo annɔ, eseese ubbu ufeelenɛ ka lɛmmɛ la laggele.
42001045	Ppyɛɛ ule wa annɔ wa ayilanɛ kwa Uyini ɔlɔɔknɛ unnyiwɔ.”
42001046	Mary ubungu Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛ, “Nbungubong Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka luppyam anaam.
42001047	Nggelebong kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm Ɔkkala-ikkala anaam,
42001048	ka ulenɛnɛ anaam ukee-waan, ubili ammɛ, likke. Ka ussinɛ mung umii ka lusso, balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ bakkwɔɔnɛ ɔlɔɔt a latele,
42001049	ka uggboggbo lilɔɔk ’sɔng sa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangnɛ unnyinɛ, lɛkɔɔl ammɛ, lɛkɔɔl a doddo.
42001050	Ɔyɔɔ kibbe-lɛttɔ la balɔɔt ba batelemɛnɛ la kɛkkpa la kɛkkpa.
42001051	Utuulu kɔbɔɔk ammɛ; ubbum balɔɔt ba baggbengenɛbɛ kɛyɔɔng la ittina abbɛ.
42001052	Ɔggba babeet ka kibeet abbɛ, ɔssanga bakee-bwɔɔn bazzanga babeet.
42001053	Unnyibong balɔɔt a buwɔɔng kazzi kwa doddo; ɔggba balɔɔt ba ɔyyɛɛpnɛbɛ bamii ibɔɔk ibɔɔk.
42001054	Ulokobong nsekele wa ɔnaangnɛ la balɔɔt iyɛddɛiyɛddɛ, ɔttɛ vvenɛ uffu uttele balɔɔt ammɛ Israel.
42001055	Ukkebong Abraham la kikkwu ammɛ, babbemɛ lɛttɔ kɛfal a kɛfal.”
42001056	Mary ɔtaa la Elizabeth ka ittuma ikkyaat tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔppyɛlɛ ufula ka ssala ammɛ.
42001057	Ɛkɛtɛ ɛffɔ Elizabeth ya kɛmaat, ɔzzánga ɔmaat waanawalam.
42001058	Bakulufal ammɛ la ikpana ammɛ bappyeenɛ kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ, ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ baggele ka budoddo bwa Ebinukkpaapi ɛnaangnɛ Elizabeth.
42001059	Waan ’wɔng baang liwaazɛ liffumɛnɛ, bakɔɔmnɛ baffu kɛzza lɛtaa. Badɔkɔ battɛ bakɔlɔmɛ Zachariah, lɛkɔɔl a abassɛ.
42001060	Ɔzzánga Mary, abakka, ɔttɛ “Maaye oo! ɔzzànga John.”
42001061	Balɔɔk la abakka battɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔzzanganɛ lɛkɔɔl ’zɔng ka itutum annɔ ba ule!”
42001062	Ɔzzánga balɔɔk ka bɛnnɔ, babap Zachariah, abassɛ waan, lɛkɔɔl za waan ammɛ ule ɔzzànga.
42001063	Zachariah ɔggyan luvva gwa kɛkkpɔk. Ɔkkpɔk ɔttɛ, “Lɛkɔɔl ammɛ ule ɔzzanga John.” Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ.
42001064	Ka ussinɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang, Zachariah ɔbbal kɛlɔɔk likkwoong. Ubungu Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
42001065	Bakulufal ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔbbwɔpɔbɛ. Ɔzzánga kuttu kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng kɔwaala ɔkkpɛlɛ ka billu bya ikpok-ikpok ka Judea.
42001066	Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ wa uppyeenɛ kuttu ’kwɔng baang uttina utumkwɛ. Ɔbap ɔttɛ, “Waan ’wɔng baang ule ule bɔng?” Baggba lɛsan battɛ likke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lile la ammɛ.
42001067	Kuyeeng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kuvvoong Zechariah, abassɛ a John, Zechariah ɔlɔɔk kwa bɔtɔɔm a Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛ,
42001068	“Affu ibunguyɔng Ebinukkpaapi, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm a Israel, ka ulenɛ liffu ɔkkala balɔɔt ammɛ.
42001069	Unnyibongyɛlɛ Ɔkkala-ikkala wa lɛbaang wa ussinɛ ka kikku waan ammɛ David.
42001070	Nkwɔng kulenɛ kɔlɔɔk kwa bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm baggbanɛ lɛlɔɔk bakɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
42001071	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uyila ɔttɛ vvenɛ ɔkkalayɛlɛ ka labɔɔk a balɔɔt a kɔfɔk ayyɔɔt la balɔɔt ba itunnɛbɛ.
42001072	Ɔttɛ vvenɛ ɔyɔɔ bagɛlɛnya ayyɔɔt ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ kibbe-lɛttɔ. vvenɛ ɔnaang nsekele ammɛ wa lɔkkwɔɔn.
42001073	Ɔnaang nsekele la Abraham, ɔgɛlɛnya ayyɔɔt wa iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ, uyim ɔttɛ vvenɛ ɔsangayɛlɛ ka labɔɔk a balɔɔt a kɔfɔk ayyɔɔt, ɔfɔngɔyɛlɛ iyilamɛ bɔtɔɔm ammɛ isɛlɛ bbwɔp ilokoyɛlɛ kɛyɔɔng doddo, inaang lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ sa liyyɛɛpnɛ ka lusso ammɛ tɔttɔt ikkpɛɛm ibbe.
42001076	“Annɔ waan anaam, bale bakkwɔɔwɔ uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa libat. Vvenɛ akɔɔm ɛtɔk amii alɔngɔlɔ ɛtɔk Uyini alokomɛ.
42001077	Vvenɛ abwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt ammɛ attɛ vvenɛ ɔkkalabɛ ka ule asɔɔkbɛ bubbi abbɛ.
42001078	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ayyɔɔt ibbemɛ lɛttɔ, ɔkɔɔmyɛlɛ doddo. Vvenɛ ɔnaang buppwolo kuddu, buppwolo ka ayyɔɔt.
42001079	Vvenɛ buppwolo ’bwɔng baang bussi ka libat buvvoong balɔɔt ba balenɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ kisul a ntɛm a lubbe, vvenɛ ɔkat lakaat ayyɔɔt, issɛ ka ɛtɔk a bɔkaat.”
42001080	Waantiti ɔmmala uggbenge ka kkwɔɔt la lɔtan, ullu ka kasɛkɛ atingating tɔttɔt ɔffɔ ka kɛtɔm sa ule ɔtta ka lusso balɔɔt a Israel.
42002001	Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang, ubeet Augustus ɔtɔɔm balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ la ifɛɛn la ifɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ka lɔkaan ammɛ ɔttɛ bassɛɛn lakɔɔl abbɛ ka luvva lukkwoon.
42002002	Ka lukkwoon gwa ikeeng, Quirinius ɔdɔkɔnɛ uzzilɛttɔ a Syria.
42002003	Ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔt umii ɔssɛɛn lɛkɔɔl ka lɛffɛ ammɛ.
42002004	Joseph ufeele ka lɛffɛ za lɛzzanganɛ Nazareth ka Galilee umii Judea ka lɛffɛ za lɛzzanganɛ Bethlehem ka ɛfɛɛn ya bamaatnɛ ubeet David. Joseph biini umii ka ussimɛ ka kikkwu ubeet David.
42002005	Umii ɔssɛɛn lɛkɔɔl ammɛ la za Mary wanavva iggyan ammɛ. Mary ɔdɔkɔ la zzɛɛm.
42002006	Baffɔnɛ Bethlehem, Mary ɔppwɔlɔ imala.
42002007	Ɔzzánga ɔmaat waan-ikeeng ammɛ, uvvoongmɛ ibba, ɔsammɛ uwula ka okolokpaaka wa bassɛɛnnɛ lakɔmɔlɔ kazzi, ka kufuk kusinɛ lile kwa bataanɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ a ggwoon.
42002008	Bakat-itɔɔn badɔkɔ baang ka bakkwununɛ la itɔɔn abbɛ ka kɛmat, ka lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang.
42002009	Uyilabɔtɔɔm-Ebinukkpaapi utuma ka ɛfɛɛn a balenɛ. Buppwolo-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm buppwolo bullɔtbɛ. Ɔzzánga bakat-itɔɔn ɔbbwɔpɔbɛ gaang gaang.
42002010	Uyilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔbbwɔpɔwɔyɔng. Nkɔɔm kuttu kwa doddo kwa kule kunnyi ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ laggele, nfeewɔyɔng.
42002011	Bamaatbong Ɔkkala-ikkala annyɔɔng ka kɛtɔm sa mmwɔɔn ka lɛffɛ a David. Ammɛ ulenɛ Christ, Uyini.
42002012	Nkwɔng kulenɛ kwa kule kɔnaang ayilayɔng: vvenɛ ayɛnyɔng waan-ufaa wa bavvoongmɛnɛ ibba, bawulu ka okolokpaaka.”
42002013	Kɛkaan a bayilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ppwap kissi ka libat kituma, kitipili la kisoom la kisoom kuffu kɛgbaa uyilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ikeeng, ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ babungu battɛ,
42002014	“Latele lale za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka libat, bɔkaat butaa la balɔɔt ba basaapmɛnɛ ka ɛkpansi.”
42002015	Bayilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bagbatanɛ bassekebɛ bappyɛlɛ bamii ka libat, bakat-itɔɔn balɔɔk abbabbɛ battɛ, “Feele, immiiyɔng Bethlehem. Imii iyɛnyɔng kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng kwa kulenɛ lɛnaang; Ebinukkpaapi eleyɛlɛ lɛbwɔɔlɔ.”
42002016	Ɔzzánga bazzuma bamii bayɛn Mary la Joseph la waantiti ka bawulunɛ ka okolokpaaka.
42002017	Bakat-itɔɔn bayɛnnɛ waantiti, babwɔɔlɔbɛ kɔlɔɔk kwa uyilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔknɛ utum waan ’wɔng mung.
42002018	Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ wa uppyeenɛ kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng baang kwa bakat-itɔɔn babwɔɔlɔnɛbɛ, kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ.
42002019	Mary ukke lilɔɔk ’sɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ, uttina gaang gaang utumsɛ.
42002020	Bakat-itɔɔn bappyɛlɛ isimisimi la kisoom la kisoom; babungu Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka lilɔɔk ’sɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ sa bappyeenɛ bale ka zzeen lɛyɛn; kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ uyilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔbwɔɔlɔnɛbɛ.
42002021	Bɛtɔm bɛnnambɛkkyaat ka bɛnnambɛnna bɛffɔnɛ bya bale ka bazzanɛ waantiti lɛtaa, bakɔlɔmɛ Jesus, lɛkɔɔl za uyilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkɔlɔmɛnɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya batakamɛnɛ lɛyɛɛm.
42002022	Ɛkɛtɛ ɛffɔnɛ ya Joseph la Mary bale ka banaangnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Lafɔɔ a Moses lalɔɔknɛ, bamii lɛtɔm a kɛzzaa laggbo. Ɔzzánga basam waantiti, bamii Jerusalem kikkpele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm,
42002023	tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bakkpɔknɛ ka Luvva-lafɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm battɛ, “Lutini ɔkɔɔm-ɛtɔk a waanawalam wa battenɛ lɛmaat, balokomɛ zzekep, bakɔɔmmɛ bafee Ebinukkpaapi.”
42002024	Abbɛ ɔgbaa bamii banaang lɛtɔm la lakkpelekete laffa ɔlɔk bitook idugbɔɔnnyɛ bɛffa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Lafɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lalɔɔknɛ.
42002025	Ɔlɔɔt ɔdɔkɔ baang wa ullunɛ Jerusalem, wa ɔzzanganɛ Simeon. Ule ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyyɛɛpnɛ bɛnaang, utele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔdɔkɔ ka kɛkat ɔttɛ balɔɔt a Israel batta ka kɔlɔɔk. Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔdɔkɔ la ammɛ.
42002026	Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔyɔɔmɛbong ɔsan ɔttɛ baala ubbe tɔttɔt ɔyɛn Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ lɛsanga.
42002027	Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔnaang Simeon umii ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ɛkɛtɛ ya abakka la abassɛ Jesus bakɔɔmmɛnɛ bamii ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm; banaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Lafɔɔ lalɔɔknɛ.
42002028	Simeon ɔsam waantiti ɔkɔɔm ka eddu, uwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang ɔttɛ,
42002029	“Dedde, alokobong nsekele annɔ; afɔngɔ ubili annɔ umii ka bɔkaat.
42002030	Nkɔɔmbong zzeen anaam nyɛn kuddu annɔ,
42002031	kwa alenɛ lɛnaang ka lusso ikaan ɔkkpɛlɛ:
42002032	Uwɔng ulenɛ buppwolo bwa buyɔɔnɛ Ikanakana ɛtɔk annɔ, bukɔɔm latele bufee balɔɔt annɔ Israel.”
42002033	Abassɛ a Jesus la abakka kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ ka lilɔɔk sa Simeon ɔlɔɔknɛ utum waantiti.
42002034	Simeon ɔnaangbɛ ppyɛɛ, ɔlɔɔk la Mary, abakka Jesus ɔttɛ, “Waan ’wɔng mung Ebinukkpaapi ɛsanganɛ ɛttɛ, ɔnaang balɔɔt ggbadam ka Israel battɔ; ɔnaang balɔɔt ggbadam bafeele. Uwɔng baang ulenɛ eleme ya essinɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ya balɔɔt ggbadam bale bafimyɛ,
42002035	bayɔɔ bwa battinanɛ. Akama vvenɛ ɔkɔmwɔ annɔ ka luppyam tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ogge ɔkɔmwɔnɛ.”
42002036	Wanavva vvɔn ule baang wa uppyeenɛ kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔzzanganɛ Anna, waan a Phanuel wa ussinɛ ka ɛsam a Asher. Ɔdɔkɔ ɔgɛlɛnya wanavva wa ulenɛ walam lillu ka likkpa linnangikkyaat.
42002037	Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang ɔtaabong lisse ulam ka lalɔp a likkpa lanna la likkpa linna. Kikoon gɔɔ kɛtɔm usi lɛgbata usseke Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔtaa baang ɔzɔɔm, ɛkɛtɛ ɛlɔk ɔzɔɔm buwɔɔng a buwɔɔng, unnyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
42002038	Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang bbwak ka uffunɛ ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm; uyeek, ɔppyɛɛk ka libat, uwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang. Ɔlɔɔk kɔlɔɔk a waantiti ’wɔng baang ɔbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba balenɛ baang ka kɛtaa kɛkat Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm battɛ uffu ɔkkala Jerusalem.
42002039	Balenɛ bɛfɛɛn bya lafɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm laggyannɛ livve lɛnaang, bappyɛlɛ bamii ka lɛffɛ abbɛ Nazareth, ka Galilee.
42002040	Ɔzzánga waantiti ɔmmala, ɔkkaam la kɛsan a kɔlɔɔk, ppyɛɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔdɔkɔ la ammɛ.
42002041	Kukkpa la kkwɔn, abassɛ a Jesus la abakka bamii Jerusalem ka Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ.
42002042	Ɔffɔnɛ ka Jesus ulenɛ likkpa zzɔɔppaliffa lɛffɔ bamii kazzi ’kwɔng baang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bataanɛ bamii.
42002043	Bɛtɔm a kazzi ’kwɔng baang bilenɛ lɛsaal, bappyɛlɛ isimisimi bamii ka ssala, bakɔngɔ Jesus ka Jerusalem. Abassɛ la abakka basi lɛsan battɛ Jesus utii ka isimi.
42002044	Badɔkɔ battina battɛ ule ka kɛkaan sa lusso. Batɔk kɛtɔm uwɔlɔlɔ, baggyan Jesus, babap ikpana abbɛ la inngwa abbɛ.
42002045	Basimɛ lɛyɛn. Bappyɛlɛ bamii isimisimi, baggyanmɛ ka Jerusalem.
42002046	Ɔggba ka bɛtɔm bɛkkyaat bayɛnmɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ a Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ɔtaanɛ la balɔɔt a Jews ba bakopolonɛ Lafɔɔ.
42002047	Ɔgɔpɔlɔ kwa balɔɔknɛ, kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ ka kɛppyɛlɛ kamma sa ɔppyɛlɛnɛbɛ la kɛsan a kɔlɔɔk sa ɔsannɛ.
42002048	Abakka la abassɛ bayɛnmɛnɛ kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ. Abakka ɔlɔɔk la ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Waan anaam, mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ anaangyɛlɛ ning ee? Anaam la ssaawɔ iggyanwɔbong likke lɛsaal!”
42002049	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Aggyannɛyɔng bɔng? Ba asan attɛyɔng ntii wa ntaanɛ ka ggwoon a Dedde anaam ɔɔ?”
42002050	Gɔɔ basi lɛsan kwa ɔlɔɔknɛ unnyibɛ.
42002051	Ɔzzánga Jesus ufeele ukupbɛ. Bappyɛlɛ isimisimi bamii Nazareth ka ulenɛ waan wa utelenɛbɛ. Abakka ɔsam lilɔɔk ’sɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔssɛɛn ka luppyɔm.
42002052	Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔmmala uggbenge la kɛsan a kɔlɔɔk. Ɔyanga latele ka Lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la Ɔssɛbibit.
42003001	Ɔdɔkɔ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya ubeet Tiberius ɔggbamɛnɛ likkpa zzil ka kɛkɔɔm ɛfɛɛn. Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang Pontius Pilate ɔdɔkɔ uzzilɛttɔ Judea; Herod ɔdɔkɔ uzzilɛttɔ Galilee; Philip, etele Herod, ɔdɔkɔ uzzilɛttɔ Iturea la Trachonitis; Lysanias ɔdɔkɔ uzzilɛttɔ Abilene.
42003002	Annas la Caiaphas badɔkɔ bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm ba labaang. Ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang elenɛ ya lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm liffunɛ likup John, waan a Zechariah ka kasɛkɛ kɛmat.
42003003	Ɔzzánga ufeele umii ukopolo ukkpit laffɛ za lakkpitnɛ lɔyɔngɔ a Jordan, ɔttɛ, “Afooloyɔng eleme annyɔɔng, anaangyɔng baptizim; Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔsɔɔkwɔyɔng bubbi annyɔɔng.”
42003004	Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Isaiah, uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ lɛkkpɔk ɔssɛɛn ka luvva ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ule bakang ning ka ɔgaganɛ ka kɛmat ɔttɛ, ‘Alɔngɔlɔyɔng ɛtɔk Uyini alokomɛyɔng. Anaangyɔngyɛ bit alokomɛyɔng, ɔssɛ.
42003005	Lutini inɔngɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ ya ilenɛ ka ɛtɔk a Uyini asalyɔngyɛ. Abutyɔng ikpok ɔkkpɛlɛ la lattaal. Itɔk ya ikokonɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, vvenɛ banaangyɛ ituulu. Lafoom za labbɔlnɛ, vvenɛ banaangzɛ lasɔnɔ.
42003006	Ɔssɛbibit ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ ɔyɛn kɛkkala ikkala sa kissinɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm’.”
42003007	Kɛkaan a balɔɔt ggbadam kiffu ka ɛfɛɛn a John, battɛ ɔnaangbɛ baptizim. John ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Annyɔɔng, Izzɔkɔ yɔng. Nyinɛ ɔbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng ɔttɛ akkwoong mung amma akɔngɔyɔng binyanga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm pya bile ka biffunɛ?
42003008	Anaangyɔng bɛnaang bya ɔlɔɔt ɔsannɛ ɔttɛ afoloyɔngbong ileme annyɔɔng. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ataayɔng baang attɛyɔng, ‘Abraham ulenɛ dedde ayyɔɔt wa iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ.’ Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ukkwoong mung ɔsam lattaal ’zɔng mung, ɔnaang lasikili bwɔɔn a kikkwu Abraham.
42003009	Ɛbwɔt etii ka kɛfɔk a kɛssɛ kɛzzɔɔk. Kɛssɛ duu sa kisinɛ lakkpo za doddo lɛwɔm, vvenɛ bafɔksɛ bazzɔɔk; babbɔksɛ bassɛɛn ka lɔkɔɔn kɛkkɔm.”
42003010	Balɔɔt babapmɛ battɛ, “Ngkka ile inaang nang?”
42003011	Ammɛ ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔyanga iwɔkɔlɔ iffa, ɔsanga vvɔn, unnyi ɔlɔɔt wa usinɛ lɛyanga. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔyanganɛ kazzi, ɔbɛngɛlɛkwɛ la ba abbɛ.”
42003012	Batɔk-innamba balɔk baffu kɛnaang a baptizim. Ɔzzánga babapmɛ battɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo, mung ile inaang nang?”
42003013	Ammɛ ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ atɔkyɔng innamba asakyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ battɛnɛ atɔkyɔng.”
42003014	Isodya ilɔk ɔgbaa babapmɛ battɛ, “Ngkka kwa ayyɔɔt bɛɛ, ile inaang nang?” Ammɛ ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ atɔkyɔng ikpoko balɔɔt ka lɛgabwɔ, ɔlɔk abbwa attɛyɔng bazzɔɔkbong kɔlɔɔk. Appyɛɛkyɔng kwa ikipili annyɔɔng keem.”
42003015	Ippyam balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ifeele, battina kɔlɔɔk a John battɛ, vvenɛ baang Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ tɛ!
42003016	Ɔzzánga ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔttɛ, “Anaam nnaangwɔyɔng baptizim la bannyi; ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa ɔttanɛnɛ anaam liggbenge ule ka uffunɛ, gɔɔ anaam ba nkkɔnɔ wa nkkyaanɛ ikkpa bukkpɔ ammɛ. Ule ɔnaangwɔyɔng baptizim la Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la lɔkɔɔn.
42003017	Ɔyanga uggul-a-bɛfɛɛn baang wa uggulnɛ bippwo, ɔllɔt. Ulenɛ livve liggul, uggumu ifɔɔk umii ubbi ka lɛnɔk, ɔppyɛlɛ uffu ɔttɔng lɔkɔɔn ɔssɛɛn bippwo. bɛkkɔm.”
42003018	John utut balɔɔt ka lilɔɔk ggbadam ka ɛkɛtɛ ya ulenɛbɛ ka kikopolo Kuttu-budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
42003019	Ɔlɔɔk utum uzzilɛttɔ, Herod, ka ɔtɔknɛ Herodias wanavva etele ammɛ. Ɔgbaa, Herod ɔbbal bɛfɛɛn bya bɛbbɔlnɛ ggbadam lɛnaang.
42003020	Ɔzzánga Herod ɔnaang kɔlɔɔk kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ kɔsak, ka ɔkaanɛ John ɔssɛɛn ka igbakkɔpɔ.
42003021	John ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ baptizim lɛnaang, ɔssɛ ɔnaang Jesus baptizim. Jesus ule baang ka ɔzɔɔmnɛ, libat liwongolo.
42003022	Ɔzzánga Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kuffu tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lekpelekete kuvvoongmɛ. Lɛmmwɔɔl lissi ka libat lɛttɛ, “Annɔ alenɛ Waan a luppyam anaam, asaapnɛ gaang.”
42003023	Jesus ka uttenɛ kɛnaang ammɛ, ɔdɔkɔ lɔlɔp la likkpa zzɔɔp. Balɔɔt battɛ Jesus ɔdɔkɔ waan a Joseph, Joseph wa ɔdɔkɔnɛ waan a Heli.
42003024	Heli, waan a Matthat. Matthat, waan a Levi. Levi, waan a Melchi. Melchi, waan a Jannai. Jannai, waan a Joseph.
42003025	Joseph, waan a Mattathias. Mattathias, waan a Amos. Amos, waan a Nahum. Nahum, waan a Esli. Esli, waan a Naggai.
42003026	Naggai, waan a Maath. Maath, waan a Mattathias. Mattathias, waan a Semein. Semein, waan a Josech. Josech, waan a Joda.
42003027	Joda, waan a Joanan. Joanan, waan a Rhesa. Rhesa, waan a Zerubbabel. Zerubbabel, waan a Shealtiel. Shealtiel, waan Neri.
42003028	Neri, waan a Melchi. Melchi, waan a Addi. Addi, waan a Cosam. Cosam, waan a Elmadam. Elmadam, waan a Er.
42003029	Er, waan a Joshua. Joshua, waan a Eliezer. Eliezer, waan a Jorim. Jorim, waan a Matthat. Matthat, waan a Levi.
42003030	Levi, waan a Simeon. Simeon, waan a Judah. Judah, waan a Joseph. Joseph, waan a Jonam. Jonam, waan a Eliakim.
42003031	Eliakim, waan a Melea. Melea, waan a Menna. Menna, waan a Mattatha. Mattatha, waan a Nathan. Nathan, waan a David.
42003032	David, waan a Jesse. Jesse, waan a Obed. Obed, waan a Boaz. Boaz, waan a Salmon. Salmon, waan a Nahshon.
42003033	Nahshon, waan a Amminadab. Amminadab, waan a Admin. Admin, waan a Arni. Arni, waan a Hezron. Hezron, waan a Perez. Perez, waan a Judah.
42003034	Judah, waan a Jacob. Jacob, waan a Isaac. Isaac, waan a Abraham. Abraham, waan a Terah. Terah, waan a Nahor.
42003035	Nahor, waan a Serug. Serug, waan a Reu. Reu, waan a Peleg. Peleg, waan a Eber. Eber, waan a Shelah.
42003036	Shelah, waan a Cainin. Cainin, waan a Arphaxad. Arphaxed, waan a Shem. Shem, waan a Noah. Noah, waan a Lamech.
42003037	Lamech, waan a Methuselah. Methuselah, waan a Enoch. Enoch, waan a Jared. Jared, waan a Mahalaleel. Mahalaleel, waan a Cainan.
42003038	Cainan, waan a Enos. Enos, waan a Seth. Seth, waan a Adam. Adam, waan a Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
42004001	Jesus ussi Jordan, ɔppyɛlɛ la Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka luppyam. Ɔzzánga Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔmanamɛ umii ka kasɛkɛ kɛmat.
42004002	Baang ulenɛ ka ɛfɛɛn a Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm-a-kuyeeng ɔllɛmɛnɛ ka lalɔp a bɛtɔm laffa. Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ, kazzi usi lizzi. Ulenɛ lɛsak lɛtaa, buwɔɔng busaapmɛ.
42004003	Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm-a-kuyeeng ’wɔng baang ɔlɔɔk la Jesus ɔttɛ, “Alenɛ Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, anaang lattaal ’zɔng mung lasikiliwɔ kazzi.”
42004004	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, ‘Ɔlɔɔt kwa kazzi kɛyɔɔng ba uddu!’ ”
42004005	Ɔzzánga Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm-a-kuyeeng ’wɔng baang ɔsammɛ, umii ɔyɔɔmɛ kibeet a vveengodde ka waan ɛkɛtɛ ssup.
42004006	Ɔttɛ, “Vvenɛ nsɔɔkwɔ kibeet ’sɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ nnyiwɔ lakke ngbaa. Baggbanɛ bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ linnyi. Nkkwoong mung nsam nsɔɔk ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ wa ɔsaapnɛnɛ.
42004007	Akunnɛnɛ laddu mung ka lusso, vvenɛ nsam bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ nsɔɔkwɔ.”
42004008	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, ‘Itele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛyɔɔng. Ammɛ kɛyɔɔng ulenɛ wa kinnyi latele!’ ”
42004009	Ɔzzánga Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm-a-kuyeeng ɔsammɛ umii ka Jerusalem, uttele ka ɛfɛɛn ya eggolonɛ gaang gaang ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔttɛ, “Alenɛ Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, akut attɔ ka lisse ee.
42004010	Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, ‘Vvenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔɔm bayilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ baffu bakatwɔ.’
42004011	Lɔbbal lɛttɛ, ‘Vvenɛ bakimiwɔ la labɔɔk abbɛ nkwaaning asi lɛttɔ, alip bukkpɔ ka lattaal!’ ”
42004012	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, ‘Tɛ̀ttɛ́ allɛ Ebinukkpaapi, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm annɔ’.”
42004013	Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm-a-kuyeeng ’wɔng baang uvvenɛ Jesus lɛllɛ, ɔgbata, ussekemɛ ka waan ɛkɛtɛ ssup.
42004014	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛ, umii Galilee. Lakke Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ladɔkɔ baang la ammɛ. Kuttu a Jesus kɔwaala ɔkkpɛlɛ ɛkpansi a Galilee.
42004015	Ukopolo ka idda-mitin abbɛ. Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ babungumɛ.
42004016	Ɔzzánga Jesus ufeele umii Nazareth, ka ɛfɛɛn ya ɔtaanɛ uggbenge. Ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ, ufeele umii ka ggwoon a mitin tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɛlɔmɛlɔm. Umii ɔkkwɔɔ Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
42004017	Basam luvva gwa Isaiah ɔkkpɔknɛ kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, bannyimɛ. Ɔzzánga ɔkkyaa luvva ’gwɔng baang, ɔyɛn ka ɛfɛɛn ya bakkpɔknɛ battɛ,
42004018	“Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kutii mung la anaam. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyinɛnɛ lakke, ɔttɛ nyaam Kuttu-Budoddo ammɛ, nbwɔɔlɔ bakee-bwɔɔn. Ɔtɔɔmnɛbong ɔttɛ nmii nyaam nbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba bakaanɛbɛ nttɛ battabong ka kɔlɔɔk; Nnaang bassi-ifim bayɛn. Nsanga balɔɔt ka akama,
42004019	nyaam nbwɔɔlɔ kukkpa kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule ɔkkala balɔɔt ammɛ.” Ɔkkwɔɔ kutolo ’kwɔng mung ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ.
42004020	Uvvenɛ, ɔppyɛlɛ luvva ɔkkɔt, ɔsam unnyibɛ, ɔtaa-ɔtaa. Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba balenɛ ka ɔdda-mitin ’wɔng baang bagbep Jesus lɛppyɛɛk.
42004021	Ammɛ ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng kwa Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ kɔnaangbong ka lɔkkwɔɔn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ appyeenɛyɔng.”
42004022	Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ baggele, kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ la bayyoyyo lammwɔɔl za ɔlɔɔknɛ. Babap battɛ, “Ɛtɛ! Mung waan a Joseph lissi ɔɔ?”
42004023	Jesus ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Nsan lɔsan nttɛ, vvenɛ assanɛyɔng ifɛɛt ’yɔng, ‘Uttula-ittula, attulawɔ kɛyɔɔng.’ Vvenɛ assɛ alɔɔkyɔng la anaam attɛyɔng, ‘Anaang kɛssanga kɔlɔɔk sa babwɔɔlɔnɛyɛlɛ ka anaangnɛ ka Capernaum mung ka ɛkpansi annɔ biini.’
42004024	Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ, Uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm latele ba ɔyanga ka lɔkaan ammɛ biini.
42004025	Gɔpɔlɔnɛyɔng! Kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn, bwanavva ba bwalam abbɛ babbenɛ bakɔngɔbɛ badɔkɔ ggbadam ka ɛkɛtɛ Elijah. Usi lɛbɛlɛ liteep ka likkpa likkyaat la kufaak; buwɔɔng buttɔ ka ɛkpansi ɔkkpɛlɛ.
42004026	Gɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm Elijah usi lɛtɔɔm umii ka ɔlɔɔt vvɔn gbɔɔ ka Israel. Ɔtɔɔmmɛ umii ka wanavva ubbu vvɔn wa ussinɛ Zarephat ka ɛkpansi Sidon.
42004027	Balɔɔt-ɔffaal badɔkɔ baang ggbadam ka Israel ka ɛkɛtɛ Elisha, uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Gɔɔ ɔlɔɔt vvɔn gbɔɔ ka Israel wa ɔppwamɛnɛ usi lile. Ɔdɔkɔ Naaman keem wa ussinɛ Syria ka ɔppwamɛnɛ.”
42004028	Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba badɔkɔnɛ ka ɔdda-mitin ’wɔng baang kutunbɛ ka bappyeenɛ ning baang.
42004029	Bafeele, battulu Jesus, batta ka lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang. Basammɛ bamii ka libat ekpok ka tɔkɔlɔ a ssala abbɛ, nkwaaning bassimɛ bassɛɛn ka ebutu, ɔttɔ ubbe.
42004030	Jesus ufeele ɔfaka kibbi ’sɔng baang, ɔsak, umii ka ɛfɛɛn a kɔsaapmɛnɛ.
42004031	Nkwɔng kɔsaknɛ, Jesus umii ka Capernaum ka Galilee ka ɛfɛɛn a ukopolonɛ balɔɔt ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ.
42004032	Ɔkkpɛlɛ kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ ka itɔk a lilɔɔk sa ukopolonɛbɛ. Lɛmmwɔɔl ammɛ lɛyanga lakke.
42004033	Ɔlɔɔt ɔdɔkɔ baang ka ɔdda wa ɔyanganɛ ipiliza. Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ubungu ɔgaga.
42004034	Ɔttɛ, “Kaang aggyanbɔng la ayyɔɔt, Jesus wa Nazareth, affuyɛlɛ kɛwwɔɔl ɔɔ? Nsan mung ɔlɔɔt wa alenɛ. Annɔ alenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa doddo wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔɔmnɛ.”
42004035	Jesus ɔkkpa ipiliza lɛmmwɔɔl ɔttɛ, “Taa zzum. Atta, assekemɛ!” Ipiliza izzɔɔk ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ka lusso balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ. Eseese igbata issekemɛ, bulɔk isimɛ lɛbɛlɛ lɛnaang.
42004036	Utini ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ kɔkɛɛlɛmɛ, balɔɔk abbabbɛ battɛ, “Kɛssanga lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng lissi yang? Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng ɔyanga lakke za ɔggbanɛ ipiliza, itta, isseke balɔɔt.”
42004037	Kuttu a Jesus kɔwaala ka ɛkpansi ’yɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ.
42004038	Jesus ɔtta ka ɔdda-mitin umii ka ssala Simon. Abakka wanavva Simon ɔdɔkɔ ka iffaak. Buyili bwa lɛbaang bunaangmɛnɛ. Ɔzzánga balɔɔk kɔlɔɔk a wanavva ’wɔng baang babwɔɔlɔ Jesus.
42004039	Ammɛ Jesus ufeele, umii ubee wanavva ’wɔng baang ka lufoom. Ɔlɔɔk la iffaak ’yɔng baang, ɔttɛ, itta issekemɛ. Buyila busaalmɛ eseese, ufeele unnyibɛ kazzi.
42004040	Kulele kɔnaangnɛ, balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba bayanganɛ inngwa ya ɔffaaknɛbɛ bɛssanga iffaak ɔkkpɛlɛ bakɔɔmbɛ baffu ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus. Jesus utelebɛ labɔɔk ka kkwɔɔt la ɔlɔɔt la ɔlɔɔt, ɔppwabɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
42004041	Balɔɔt ggbadam ba bassɛnɛ bayanga ipiliza badɔkɔ baang. Issɛ isaalbɛ la kibungu la kibungu ittɛ, “Annɔ alenɛ Waan Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm!” Jesus ɔkkpa ipiliza ’yɔng kiwele ɔttɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ izza lɛmmwɔɔl ka isannɛ ittɛ ammɛ ulenɛ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ.
42004042	Ussolonɛ, Jesus ɔgbata ka lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang, umii ɔtaa ka ɛfɛɛn a balɔɔt basinɛ lile. Keem balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ bassekemɛ ka kɛggyan. Bayɛnmɛnɛ, babum battɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔgbata ɔkɔngɔbɛ, ɔtaa ɛfɛɛn abbɛ.
42004043	Ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Mkkpa kɔnaang, vvenɛ nkopolo Kuttu-budoddo Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka lɛffɛ lɛlɔk ngbaa. Nkwɔng baang kulenɛ kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔɔmnɛnɛ ɔttɛ nnaang.”
42004044	Jesus ukopolo ka tɔkɔlɔ idda-mitin ka ɛkpansi ’yɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ.
42005001	Ɛkɛtɛ nnyɔn Jesus ɔdɔkɔ baang ka ubeenɛ ka lufoom a libbwe Gennesaret. Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ batutala ɛtɔk bamii ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ kɛgɔpɔlɔ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
42005002	Ɔyɛn ikkpaat iffa baang ka balokonɛ ka lufoom a libbwe. Balap a kulap a bannyi bagbatanɛ bakɔngɔ bamii kɛzzaa libbgɔ.
42005003	Jesus ɔmal ka tɔkɔlɔ akkpaat vvɔn wa ɔdɔkɔnɛ wa Simon. Ɔlɔɔk la Simon ɔttɛ utut akkpaat usseke lufoom a libbwe. Jesus ɔtaa ka tɔkɔlɔ akkpaat, ukopolo kɛkaan ’sɔng baang.
42005004	Uvvenɛ likopolo, ɔlɔɔk la Simon ɔttɛ, “Atut akkpaat amii ka ddɔng. Annɔ la balɔɔt annɔ asamyɔng liggbɔ atɔɔpyɔng ka bannyi akaayɔng isɛɛn.”
42005005	Simon ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛ ɔttɛ, “Dedde, ilapbong ka ussinɛ kɛtɔm, bulɔk ba ikaa. Ka alenɛ ning lɛlɔɔk, nle ka npyɛlɛnɛ liggbɔ ntɔɔp.”
42005006	Batɔɔpnɛ liggbɔ bakaa isɛɛn ggbadam. Iyipi, iggyan kɛyaak a liggbɔ.
42005007	Bakkwɔɔ babbɛ ka ikkpaat ilɔk battɛ baffu battelebɛ. Baffunɛ, bassang isɛɛn, bassɛɛn ikkpaat ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɛ iyipi. Usseke ssup nzang ikkpaat ipiti.
42005008	Simon Peter ɔyɛnnɛ ning baang, ukun Jesus laddu ɔttɛ, “Uyini! Amii assekenɛ, anaam ɔnaang-a-bubbi.”
42005009	Simon la babbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ ka isɛɛn ya bakaanɛ ilenɛ liyipi isak.
42005010	James la John, bwaan a Zebedee, kɔssɛ kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ mgbaa. Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang balenɛ ba banaangnɛ kɛnaang ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn la Simon. Jesus ɔlɔɔk la Simon ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔbbwɔpɔwɔyɔng, ka ussinɛ ka kɛtɔm sa mmwɔɔn asseke ka akkwɔɔnɛyɔng balɔɔt.”
42005011	Battulu ikkpaat bassik ka lufoom a libbwe. Bagbata bɛfɛɛn abbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ bakɔngɔ; bakup Jesus.
42005012	Lɛffɛ lɛlɔk lɛdɔkɔ baang za Jesus umiinɛ. Ɔlɔɔt-ɔffaal ɔdɔkɔ baang ka lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang. Ɔlɔɔt-ɔffaal ’wɔng baang ɔyɛnnɛ Jesus, ukun lusso ka lisse ukkpengemɛ ɔttɛ, “Mkkpee Dedde, kɔsaapwɔnɛ, attulanɛ ɔppwanɛ.”
42005013	Jesus utuulu kɔbɔɔk usingimɛ ɔttɛ, “Kɔsaapnɛ mung; nggyan nttɛ ɔppwawɔ.” Eseese ɔppwamɛ. Ɔffaal ɔsaalmɛ.
42005014	Jesus ɔkamalamɛ ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ abwɔɔlɔ ɔlɔɔt vvɔn gbɔɔ tɛ. Amii ssɔng ka ɛfɛɛn a ɔssɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm ɔppyɛɛkwɔ. Anaang lɛtɔm annyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Lafɔɔ a Moses lalɔɔknɛ, nkwaaning ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔsan ɔttɛ ɔppwawɔbɔng tɛ.”
42005015	Ɔzzánga kuttu ’kwɔng baang kufim kɔwaala ifɛɛn ifɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ. Bɛkaan a balɔɔt ggbadam biffu, bappyee kwa ɔlɔɔknɛ, ɔlɔk uttulabɛ ɔppwabɛ.
42005016	Ɔzzánga umii ka kasɛkɛ kɛmat, ɔtaa bakang ɔssɛɛn luzɔɔm.
42005017	Kɛtɔm ssɔn, Jesus ɔdɔkɔ baang ka ukopolonɛ. Balɔɔt a Pharisees balɔk la bakopolo-Lafɔɔ badɔkɔ baang ka bataanɛ. Bassi ifɛɛn-ifɛɛn ka ɛkpansi a Galilee la ɛkpansi a Judea. Balɔk bassi Jerusalem. Likke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛdɔkɔ la Jesus za ɔkɔɔmnɛ uttula balɔɔt iffaak.
42005018	Balɔɔt balɔk batɔkɔ ɔnnɔk-a-kikkwu ka iggolo baffu. Babum battɛ bamii ka tɔkɔlɔ a ggwoon, bawulumɛ ka lusso a Jesus,
42005019	keem kufuk kusinɛbɛ lile ka kibbi kilenɛ gaang lɛttala. Ɔzzánga battɔ lɛmma ka libat a ggwoon, bassɛ baang bawɔkɔlɔmɛ. Basinimɛ baloko ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus ulenɛ.
42005020	Jesus ɔyɛnnɛ ka kiyila balɔɔt ’bɔng baang kɛttalanɛ, ɔlɔɔk la ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Ɛnngwa anaam nsɔɔkwɔbong bubbi annɔ.”
42005021	Bakopolo-Lafɔɔ la balɔɔt a Pharisees balɔɔk abbɛ abbɛ battɛ, “Ɔnaang nang tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔbbɔ lissa, ɔlɔɔk ning baang utum Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔɔ? Ɔlɔɔt wa ukkwoongnɛ ɔsɔɔk ɔlɔɔt bubbi ba ule. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛyɔɔng ukkwoongnɛ.”
42005022	Jesus ɔsanbongbɛ ittina. Ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ attinayɔng bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng ning ka ippyam annyɔɔng!
42005023	Nkwɔkwɔng kulenɛ bwɛt; kɛlɔɔk kɛttɛ, ‘Nsɔɔkwɔbong bubbi annɔ!’ faa kɛlɔɔk kɛttɛ, ‘Afeele asam ewula annɔ assɛ!?’
42005024	Vvenɛ nnaangwɔyɔng asan attɛyɔng Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔyanga lakke za ɔsɔɔknɛ ɔlɔɔt bubbi ka ɛkpansi ’yɔng mung.” Ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔk la ɔnnɔk-a-kikkwu ɔttɛ, “Afeele, asam ewula annɔ afula!”
42005025	Eseese ɔsam ewula ammɛ ya umininɛ, ufula. Uwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang ɛtɔk ɛtɔk.
42005026	Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ, kɔkkpaakbɛ kamma. Babungu Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm battɛ, “Iyɛnbong bɛfɛɛn a bikɛɛlɛ mmwɔɔn!”
42005027	Nkwɔng kɔsaalnɛ, Jesus umii ɔyɛn Ɔtɔk-innamba wa ɔzzanganɛ Levi ka ɔtaanɛ ka ɛfɛɛn a kɛnaang ammɛ. Jesus ɔlɔɔk la ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Afeele, akupnɛ!”
42005028	Levi ufeele, ɔgbata bɛfɛɛn ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔkɔngɔ, umii ukup Jesus.
42005029	Ɔzzánga Levi ɔnaang kazzi kwa lɛbaang unnyi Jesus. Batɔk-innamba badɔkɔ ggbadam ka bataanɛ baang la ammɛ la balɔɔt balɔk ɔgbaa.
42005030	Balɔɔt a Pharisees la bakopolo-Lafɔɔ ba badɔkɔnɛ baang babap balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus battɛ, “Mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ atulyɔng kazzi ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn la batɔk-innamba la babbyap, azziyɔng?”
42005031	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Balɔɔt ba usinɛbɛ lɛppwa baggyannɛ uttula-ittula. Balɔɔt ba ɔppwanɛbɛ uttula-ittula ba baggyan.
42005032	Mung ba nffu kwa balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ budoddo, nffu kwa babbyap nttɛ bakkyaa kɛnaang a bubbi bafɔngɔ.”
42005033	Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang balɔɔk la Jesus battɛ, “Balɔɔt a John la balɔɔt a Pharisees ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ bataa buwɔɔng, bazɔɔm; ɔzzánga mung balɔɔt ba annɔ bale baang ka bazzinɛ kazzi, bavva litak ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.”
42005034	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Attina attɛ vvenɛ akkwoong anaangyɔng balɔɔt ba baffunɛ libbeel bataa buwɔɔng ka uyini-libbeel utiinɛ baang la abbɛ ɔɔ? Gɔɔ ning baang baala kule!
42005035	Ɔzzanga ɛkɛtɛ vvenɛ ɛffɔ ya bale basam uyini libbeel bagbata bassekebɛ. Ɔffɔnɛ ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang vvenɛ bafula buwɔɔng.”
42005036	Jesus ɔssabɛ ifɛɛt ’yɔng ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyaaknɛ ufaa uwɔkɔlɔ, ɔkɔɔm ɔsal lɛmma ɔtɔm uwɔkɔlɔ ba ule. Ɔsalnɛ ning baang, vvenɛ ufaa ɔyaak ɔtɔm ɔgbaa, Ɔgbaa ufaa kɛfaak ubba ka ɔtɔm uwɔkɔlɔ ba kɛkɔɔn.
42005037	Gɔɔ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsamnɛ ufaa batak ɔssɛɛn ka ɔtɔm ɛssɔ ɛkkpa-ɛsɛɛn ba ule.
42005038	Ufaa batak bassɛɛn ka ufaa ɛssɔ ɛkkpa-ɛsɛɛn.
42005039	Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔvvanɛ ɔtɔm a batak ɔbbal ufaa batak lɛggyan, ba ule. Vvenɛ ɔttɛ ɔtɔm a batak ɔttanɛ lɛyyɛɛp.”
42006001	Jesus ɔdɔkɔ baang ka ɔssɛnɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ bibwoto-isasa, ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ. Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ batɛngɛ lasan-isasa bakkwɔlɔ ifɔɔk, bassɛɛn ka labɔɔk, bazzi.
42006002	Balɔɔt a Pharisees balɔk babap battɛ, “Mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ anaangyɔng kɔlɔɔk kwa Lafɔɔ ayyɔɔt lattɛnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ inaang ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ?”
42006003	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Ɔzzánga ba ataka appyeeyɔng kwa David ɔnaangnɛ la balɔɔt ammɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya ɔmɛɛmnɛ ɔɔ?
42006004	Ufeele umii ka tɔkɔlɔ a Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔsam brɛɛd wa basɔɔknɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, uzzi, ɔbɛkɛ ɔssɛ unnyi balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bazzi. Ɔzzànga ule kɔlɔɔk a Lafɔɔ ka ayyɔɔt; ɔlɔɔt wa uzzinɛ kazzi ’kwɔng baang ba ule ɔgbaa la bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm.”
42006005	Jesus utele lɛttɔ ɔttɛ, “Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ulenɛ Uyini Kɛfɛkɛlɛ!”
42006006	Ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ sa ssɔn, Jesus umii ukopolo ka ɔdda-mitin. Ɔlɔɔt ɔdɔkɔ baang wa kɔbɔɔk-ɛlaabɔɔk kulemɛnɛ libbe.
42006007	Bakopolo-Lafɔɔ balɔk la balɔɔt a Pharisees baggyan ɛtɔk ya bale bassɛɛn Jesus ka kɔlɔɔk. Ɔzzánga basseke ka bakatmɛnɛ gbegbe, battɛ bayɛn uttula balɔɔt ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ.
42006008	Jesus ɔsanbong ittina abbɛ. Ɔlɔɔk la ɔlɔɔt ubbu-kɔbɔɔk ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Afeele affu abee kaang ka lusso!” Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ufeele uffu ubee tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Jesus ɔlɔɔknɛ.
42006009	Ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Nbapwɔyɔng annyɔɔng! Mung Lafɔɔ ayyɔɔt lattɛ inaang nang ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ? Iyaam faa iddopo? Ikkala lɛfal ɔlɔɔt faa ibɛpɛzɛ?”
42006010	Uyeek usesele ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ɔkkwɔɔ ɔlɔɔt ubbu-kɔbɔɔk ’wɔng baang, ɔttɛ, “Atuulu kɔbɔɔk!” Ammɛ ɔnaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Jesus ɔlɔɔknɛ. Eseese ɔppwamɛ.
42006011	Kutunbɛ gaang gaang; battina abbɛ-abbɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bale banaang la Jesus.
42006012	Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang, Jesus ufeele umii ɔtaa ka libat ekpok, ɔzɔɔm. Ɔtaa bakang, ɔzɔɔm unnyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang tɔttɔt ussolo.
42006013	Ulenɛ lissolo ɔkkwɔɔ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ, baffu. Ɔssang balɔɔt zzɔɔppabaffa ba ɔkkwɔɔnɛbɛ bayilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ.
42006014	Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba ɔssangnɛ bazzanga Simon, wa ɔkɔlɔmɛnɛ Peter, la etele ammɛ Andrew, la James la John la Philip la Bartholomew.
42006015	Matthew la Thomas la James, waan a Alphaeus, la Simon wa lɔkaan ammɛ lɔsaapmɛnɛ gaang.
42006016	Judas, waan a James, la Judas Iscariot wa uzzinɛ issɛ a Jesus.
42006017	Usininɛ ka ekpok la kɛkaan a balɔɔt ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, Jesus ubee ka ebutu la kɛkaan a bayilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ. Balɔɔt balɔk badɔkɔ baang ba bassinɛ ifɛɛnifɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ka Judea la Jerusalem. Balɔk bassi ka billu lufoom a lihu ka Tyre, la Sidon.
42006018	Baffu, bagɔpɔlɔ kɔlɔɔk ammɛ ɔlɔk uttulabɛ ɔgbaa. Balɔɔt ba uzuzukunɛbɛ ngbaa baffu, uttulabɛ.
42006019	Balɔɔt babum battɛ basingimɛ nkwaaning ɔppwabɛ; ka lakke kittula ittula lalenɛ baang ka lattamɛnɛ ka kkwɔɔt, ɔkɔɔm uttulabɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔppwabɛ.
42006020	Jesus uyeek ɔppyɛɛk balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ, ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Laggele lale za annyɔɔng bakee-bwɔɔn; Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ile ya annyɔɔng!
42006021	Laggele lale za annyɔɔng, balɔɔt ba buwɔɔng busaapwɔnɛyɔng gedegede mung; vvenɛ azzi awukalayɔng! Laggele lale za annyɔɔng ba akkwanɛyɔng gedegede mung; vvenɛ asɛɛkyɔng!
42006022	Laggele lale za annyɔɔng balɔɔt ba atunnɛyɔng balɔɔt, bafimwɔyɔng, battɛ annyɔɔng banaang-a-bubbi ka lɛttɔ Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ!
42006023	Aggeleyɔng ka ’kwɔng kɔnaangwɔnɛyɔng. Atɔmyɔng la bɔwaa ka lɛsɔɔk za lɛbaang lilenɛ bakang ka lɛkatwɔnɛyɔng ka libat. Balɔɔt abbɛ ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ badɔkɔ banaang ning baang bbwak la bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
42006024	“Akama ule wa annyɔɔng ba ɔyyɛɛpwɔnɛyɔng; azziyɔng vveeng gedegede mung!
42006025	“Akama ule wa annyɔɔng ba awukalanɛyɔng gedegede mung; vvenɛ ataayɔng buwɔɔng ka lusso! Akama ule wa annyɔɔng ba asɛɛknɛyɔng gedegede mung!; vvenɛ ataa akkwayɔng bukee ka lusso!
42006026	Akama ule wa annyɔɔng ka balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ balɔɔknɛ budoddo batumwɔyɔng. Balɔɔt abbɛ ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ badɔkɔ bassɛ balɔɔk ning baang batum balɔɔt ba babbwanɛ battɛ abbɛ bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
42006027	“Mung nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng annyɔɔng ba appyeenɛyɔng kwa anaam: Balɔɔt ba alenɛyɔng ka kɔfɔk la abbɛ basaapwɔyɔng. Anaangyɔng budoddo la balɔɔt ba atunnɛyɔngbɛ.
42006028	Anaangyɔng balɔɔt ba babbaatwɔnɛyɔng ppyɛɛ! Azɔɔm assɛɛnyɔng balɔɔt ba bayapwɔnɛyɔng akama.
42006029	Ɔlɔɔt wa utupwɔnɛyɔng kabut ka kugga, asikili kugga kwa kkwɔn alokomɛyɔng, ɔbbal litup ɔgbaa. Ɔlɔɔt ɔsamwɔnɛyɔng uwɔkɔlɔ vvɔn, afɔngɔmɛyɔng ɔbbal wa vvɔn lɛsam ɔgbaa.
42006030	Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ wa ɔbapwɔnɛyɔng bɔfɛɛn bwa ayanganɛyɔng, annyimɛyɔng. Ɔlɔɔt ɔsamnɛ bɔfɛɛn bwa annyɔɔng biini, tɛ̀ttɛ́ afimyɔng.
42006031	Bwa aggyannɛ attɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔnaangwɔyɔng annyɔɔng, annyɔɔng assɛ anaangmɛyɔngbwɛ.
42006032	“Ulenɛ ka balɔɔt ba annɔ asaapnɛbɛ keem, basapwɔnɛ; annɔ ale anaang atɔk ppyɛɛ? Nlɔɔk ka babbyap bassɛnɛ batele balɔɔt ba batelenɛbɛ abbɛ.
42006033	Anaangnɛ budoddo annyi balɔɔt ba banaangwɔnɛ annɔ budoddo, ale nang atɔk ppyɛɛ? Nlɔɔk ka babbyap bassɛnɛ banaang ning baang.
42006034	Balɔɔt ba attina attɛ bakkwoong mung bappyɛlɛ bɔfɛɛn annɔ bannyiwɔ keem baffuwɔnɛ lufolo ayila, ale anaang nang atɔk ppyɛɛ? Nlɔɔk ka babbyap ɔgbaa bafolonɛ ba abbɛ babbyap bɔfɛɛn ning baang, nkwaaning bappyɛlɛ bɔfɛɛn ’bwɔng baang silididi bannyibɛ.
42006035	Ning baang lissi! Balɔɔt a latun annyɔɔng basaapwɔyɔng, anaangyɔngbɛ budoddo. Annyinɛyɔng ɔlɔɔt bɔfɛɛn, afɔngɔyɔngbwɛ kɛbɛlɛ lɛppyɛlɛ atɔkyɔng. Vvenɛ ayangayɔng lɛsɔɔk agbaayɔng. Vvenɛ azzangayɔng bwaan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, wa ɔyyɛɛpnɛ la balɔɔt ba bɔfɛɛn businɛ liffi, gbaak la babbyap.
42006036	Ɔlɔɔt ubbewɔyɔng-lɛttɔ, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ssaawɔ annyɔɔng ɔlɔɔt ubbemɛnɛ lɛttɔ.
42006037	“Tɛ̀ttɛ́ annyi wa annyɔɔng kibbi gbɔɔgbɔɔ, nkwaaning Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usiwɔ annɔ kibbi linnyi. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akpɛn wa annyɔɔng. Akpɛnnɛ wa annyɔɔng, vvenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔssɛ ɔkpɛnwɔ annɔ. Asɔɔknɛ ɔlɔɔt bubbi bwa ɔnaangwɔnɛ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔssɛ ɔsɔɔkwɔ annɔ.
42006038	Anaangnɛ ɔlɔɔt lɛsɔɔk, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔssɛ ɔnaangwɔ annɔ lɛsɔɔk. Vvenɛ atɔk bwa buyipinɛ, buzza, bullɔt. Lɛsɔɔk a kiggwoom a kɔlɔɔk za bale bassɛɛnwɔ ka labulakaat, akɔɔm tɛ̀ttɛ̀ akkwoongɛ. Bɔfɛɛn a lɔlɔɔm bwa akɔɔmnɛ alɔɔm budoddo ɔlɔk bubbi, annyi wa annyɔɔng; abbwɛ bulenɛ bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule ɔkɔɔm ɔlɔɔm unnyiwɔ annɔ.”
42006039	Jesus ɔssabɛ ifɛɛt ’yɔng ɔttɛ, “Ussi-ifim, wabbɛ ɛtɔk ba ɔkɔɔm. Ɔkɔɔmnɛ wabbɛ ɛtɔk, ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ vvenɛ battɔ ka lubbe.
42006040	Waan wa ugbengenɛ ɔtta ɔlɔɔt wa ukopolomɛnɛ kɔlɔɔk, ba ule. Ɔzzànga ulenɛ livve likkoop vvenɛ ɔssɛ uggbenge tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt wa ukopolomɛnɛ.
42006041	“Mbɔng appyɛɛknɛ ezuku bɔfɛɛn ya elenɛ ka zzeen etele annɔ, asi lɛffɛ kɛssɛ za lilenɛ ka zzeen annɔ biini lɛyɛn?
42006042	Ale anaang nang amii avvoop etele annɔ attɛ, uloko awulmɛ bɔfɛɛn, ka bwa bulenɛ ka zzeen annɔ buttanɛ liggbenge? Annɔ Ɔnaang-a-lagban ’wɔng! asangabong bɔfɛɛn bwa zzeen annɔ tɛ́ttɛ́ ayɛn asanga bwa zzeen etele annɔ!
42006043	“Kɛssɛ sa doddo lakkpo za labbɔlnɛ ba kikkwoong kɛwɔm. Kɛssɛ sa kɛbbɔlnɛ lakkpo za doddo ba kɛssɛ kikkwoong kɛwɔm.
42006044	Kɛssɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ asansɛ ka lakkpo za kɛwɔmnɛ. Ɔlɔɔt umiinɛ kɛffa lakkpo a manggolo ka kɛsan a lɛlaak-ɛkkpɛ ba ule, ɔlɔk ɔffa lakkpo ogyigyal ka lɛsan ɛsam.
42006045	Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyyɛɛpnɛ, ɔnaang kɔlɔɔk kwa doddo, uttina bɛfɛɛn bwa bɛyyɛɛpnɛ ka luppyam gwa doddo. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔbbɔlnɛ, ɔnaang babbu lilɔɔk. Lilɔɔk ’sɔng baang lissimɛ ka ubbu luppyam. Kamma ɔlɔɔt kalɔɔk kwa ɔlɔɔt uttinanɛ ka luppyam.
42006046	“Mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ akkwɔɔnɛyɔng, ‘Uyini, Uyini’, asiyɔng kwa nttɛnɛ anaangyɔng lɛnaang?
42006047	Ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn wa uffunɛ ka ɛfɛɛn anaam ɔgɔpɔlɔ lɛmmwɔɔl, utelezɛ, vvenɛ nyɔɔwɔyɔng bwa ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ulenɛ.
42006048	Ule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔbɔɔk-a-ggwoon wa ɔtɔɔknɛ ogge a ggwoon ammɛ ka libat akpana. Lɔyɔngɔ lutumanɛ lusi likkwoong lɔzzɔɔk ggwoon ’gwɔng baang, ka balenɛgwɛ lɛbɔɔk lɔkkaam.
42006049	Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔgɔpɔlɔnɛ lɛmmwɔɔl anaam, usizɛ latele linnyi; ule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔbɔɔknɛ ggwoon gbɔɔ ka libat a kususuk usi ogge lɛfaka. Ɛkɛtɛ ya ɛlɔlɔ effunɛ vvenɛ essi ggwoon ’gwɔng baang ɛzzɔɔk lɔttɔ ɛttɔ ya ɛbbɔlnɛ!”
42007001	Jesus ulenɛ lilɔɔk ’sɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ lɛlɔɔk uvve, ufeele umii Capernaum.
42007002	Akkala wa ussinɛ Rome ɔdɔkɔ baang wa ɔyanganɛ bɔɔyi wa ɔsaapmɛnɛ gaang gaang. Bɔɔyi ’wɔng baang ɔffaakmɛ gaang gaang, ɔggyan lubbe.
42007003	Akkala ’wɔng baang uppyeenɛ kuttu a Jesus, ɔtɔɔm bagɛlɛnya Jews ɔttɛ bamii bakkwɔɔ Jesus uffu uttula bɔɔyi ammɛ.
42007004	Bagɛlɛnya ’bɔng baang bamii bakkpenge Jesus gaang gaang battɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung ka lɔkkwɔɔn ule wa buttelemɛnɛ tɛ.
42007005	Balɔɔt ayyɔɔt basaapmɛ gaang gaang; Ammɛ biini ɔbɔɔkbong ɔdda-mitin ulokoyɛlɛ.”
42007006	Jesus ukupbɛ. Ɔffɔnɛ kɛtɛkɛtɛ a ssala, Jesus ududa inngwa akkala ya baffunɛ babwɔɔlɔmɛ bɔtɔɔm bwa akkala ɔtɔɔmnɛbɛ. Ɔttɛ, “Dedde, tɛ̀ttɛ́ ayɔɔwɔ akama kɛyɔɔng. Anaam ba nkkɔnɔ wa affunɛ ssala anaam.
42007007	Gɔɔ ba nkkɔnɔ wa nffunɛ ka ɛfɛɛn annɔ. Nggyan nttɛ azza lɛmmwɔɔl annɔ azzɛ-azzɛ, usseke bɔɔyi anaam ɔppwamɛ.
42007008	Anaam mgbaa ikkala ile baang ya ittanɛnɛ anaam liggbenge. Anaam nyanga isɔdya ya nttanɛyɛ liggbenge. Nlɔɔknɛ la ’wɔng nttɛ umii, umii. Nlɔɔknɛ la ɔlɔk nttɛ uffu, uffu. Nlɔɔknɛ la ubili anaam nttɛ ɔnaang ’bwɔng, ɔnaangbwɛ.”
42007009	Jesus kɔkɛɛlɛmɛ ka uppyeenɛ kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng baang. Usikili ɔlɔɔk la kɛkaan sa kikupmɛnɛ baang ɔttɛ, “Kɛssanga ɔlɔɔt wa kiyila ammɛ kɛkkaamnɛ ning ba ntaka nyɛn ka ɛkpansi a Israel.”
42007010	Bayilabɔtɔɔm akkala ’wɔng bappyɛlɛ bamii ka ssala-akkala, bayɛn bɔɔyi akkala ka ulemɛnɛ lɛppwa.
42007011	Waan ɛkɛtɛ ssup ɔsaknɛ, Jesus ufeele umii ka lɛffɛ za lɛzzanganɛ Nain. Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ la kɛkaan a balɔɔt ggbadam bakupmɛ.
42007012	Jesus ɔffɔnɛ ka lɛttɔ kikkwu, ɔyɛn ulɛng a kɛkaan a balɔɔt ka batɔkɔnɛ ubbu, bamii kɛnaang a kullu. Wanavva ’wɔng baang ulemɛ waan vvɔn kɛyɔɔng ka ɔmaatnɛ. Ammɛ ɔdɔkɔ wanavva ubbu. Kɛkaan a balɔɔt ggbadam kɛdɔkɔ baang ka kikupmɛnɛ.
42007013	Uyini, ɔyɛnnɛ ning baang, bibbemɛ lɛttɔ gaang gaang. Ɔlɔɔk la wanavva ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ abɛlɛ lɛkkwa.”
42007014	Uzuma umii usingi likulu za bassɛɛnnɛ ubbu. Balɔɔt ba batɔkɔnɛ ubbu bakɔɔng baang, babee. Jesus ɔlɔɔk la ubbu ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Okolobya ɔlɔɔt, afeele! Nlɔɔk la annɔ.”
42007015	Ubbu ’wɔng baang ufungala, ufeele ɔppyɛlɛ ɔlɔɔk kɛlɔɔk. Jesus ɔtɔkmɛ, ɔssɛɛn abakka.
42007016	Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔbbwɔpɔbɛ gaang gaang. Ɔzzánga babungu Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang battɛ, “Uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa lɛbaang ɔttabongyɛlɛ ka bɛzzɔkɔ! Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uffubong ɔkkala balɔɔt ammɛ!”
42007017	Kuttu a Jesus ’kwɔng mung kɔwaala ɔkkpɛlɛ a Judea la ikaan ya ballunɛ bakkpit Judea ɔkkpɛlɛ.
42007018	Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ John babwɔɔlɔmɛ lilɔɔk ’sɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ɔzzánga John ɔkkwɔɔ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ baffa, baffu ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ.
42007019	Ɔtɔɔmbɛ ka Uyini ɔttɛ babapmɛ battɛ, “Annɔ alenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa John ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔttɛ vvenɛ uffu ɔɔ? Faa ikat ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk?”
42007020	Baffunɛ ka ɛfɛɛn Jesus, balɔɔk la ammɛ battɛ, “John, Ɔnaang-a-Baptizim, ɔtɔɔmnɛyɛlɛ ɔttɛ iffu ibapwɔ, ‘Annɔ alenɛ wa ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔttɛnɛ vvenɛ uffu ɔɔ, faa ikat ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk?’ ”
42007021	Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang Jesus uttula balɔɔt ggbadam ka bɛssanga iffaak bya ɔffaaknɛbɛ la balɔɔt ba ɔnaangnɛbɛ zukuzukuzuku. Ɔnaang bassi-ifim ggbadam bayɛn.
42007022	Ɔppyɛlɛ balɔɔt a John kamma ɔttɛ, “Appyɛlɛ amii abwɔɔlɔyɔng John kwa alenɛyɔng lɛyɛn, appyeeyɔng ka latɔɔk. Balɔɔt badɔkɔnɛ bassi-ifim, bayɛnbong. Basi kɔssɛ likkwoong, bakkwoongbong bassɛ. Balɔɔt ba bɔssɔngkolo, ɔppwabɛ. Bassi-latɔɔk, bappyee. Babbu bafungala. Bakee-bwɔɔn bappyee Kuttu-budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
42007023	Laggele za lɛbaang lale za ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsɛlɛnɛ ndeeta ka luppyam utummɛ!”
42007024	Bayilabɔtɔɔm a John ’bɔng baang balenɛ lɛgbata, Jesus ɔlɔɔk kɔlɔɔk a John; ɔbwɔɔlɔ kibbi ’sɔng baang, ɔttɛ, “Ɛkɛtɛ ya attanɛ, amiiyɔng ka ɛfɛɛn a John ka kɛsɛkɛ kɛmat, adɔkɔ attina attɛ ale ayɛnyɔng mbɔng? Attina attɛ ale ayɛnyɔng eggbe lɔfaat ka kɛffa kɛffanɛ kɛbbɛɛt ɔɔ?
42007025	Mung bakang amiiyɔng kɛyɛn a bɔng? Attina attɛ amii ayɛnyɔng ɔlɔɔt wa ɔnaangnɛ kitook ɔɔ? Ka lɔkkwɔɔn balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ kitook asaapbɛ kɛyɛn ka igala babeet!
42007026	Abwɔɔlɔnɛyɔng, aggyan attɛ ayɛnyɔng ’bɔng? Uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔɔ? Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng, ayɛnyɔngbong ɔlɔɔt wa ɔttanɛ uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm!
42007027	John ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa Luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, ‘Uwɔng ulenɛ uyilabɔtɔɔm anaam wa nle ntɔɔm, ɔkɔɔm ɛtɔk uffu ɔlɔngɔlɔ ɛtɔk ulokowɔ!’ ”
42007028	Jesus ɔbbal lɛttɛ, “John uggbenge ɔsak lutini ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ka vveeng ’wɔng, ɔzzànga ammɛ wa ɔttanɛ lissup ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttanɛ John liggbenge.”
42007029	Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ bappyeemɛ. Abbɛ la batɔk-innamba banaangbong kwa ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyannɛ; bayilamɛ kwɛ, John ɔnaangbongbɛ baptizim.
42007030	Balɔɔt a Pharisees la bakopolo-Lafɔɔ bafim kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uttinanɛ utumbɛ. Battɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ John ɔnaangbɛ Baptizim.
42007031	“Mung balɔɔt a bɛtɔm byɔng nle nlɔɔmbɛ la bɔng? Bale tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɔng?
42007032	Bale tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bwɔɔntiti ba bataanɛ ka ogyila-kappya. Likup a bwɔɔn nzakang libungu linnyi ba abbɛ battɛ, ‘Ikkpa ibin a libbeel, innyiwɔyɔng, ittɛ atɔmyɔng; afimyɔng kɛtɔm. Ikkwa ittɔl layilili; afimyɔng kɛkkwa.’
42007033	John, Ɔnaang-a-baptizim, uffu ɔtaa buwɔɔng, batak usi lɛvva, ɔzzànga attɛyɔng, ‘Ɔyanga ipiliza.’
42007034	Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ uffu, uzzi kazzi, ɔvva batak, ɔzzànga attɛyɔng, ‘Ppyɛɛk ɔwɔnɔwɔnɔ ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng, uzzi kazzi, ɔvva batak, ɔssɛ inngwa la batɔk innamba la babbyap!’
42007035	Balɔɔt ba batɔknɛ bikɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bayɔɔnɛpyɛ battɛ bile ka lɔkkwɔɔn.”
42007036	Ɔlɔɔt a Pharisees ɔkkwɔɔ Jesus kazzi-kikoon ka ssala ammɛ. Jesus ufeele umii uzzi kazzi ka ssala ɔlɔɔt a Pharisees ’wɔng baang.
42007037	Wanavva àkkpàlà ɔdɔkɔ baang ka lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang ka ullunɛ. Uppyeenɛ ɔttɛ Jesus ule ka kazzi ka ssala ɔlɔɔt a Pharisees, ɔkɔɔm bilim la bannɛ ba bayyɛɛpnɛ kizzoom ffiit ka tɔkɔlɔ uffu.
42007038	Umii ubee Jesus ka isimi, ɔkkwa liyyeen ɔllɔt Jesus ka bukkpɔ. Ɔkpɔkɔ ɔtɛngɛ lɛttɔ ɔkɔɔm bittulu ammɛ ɔkkpɔlɔ Jesus bukkpɔ. Ɔkɔɔm kamma ɔkɔn Jesus ka bukkpɔ. Ɔsam bilim ’pyɔng baang usikili bannɛ ba balenɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ ɔllɔt Jesus ka bukkpɔ.
42007039	Ɔlɔɔt a Pharisees ’wɔng baang wa ɔkkwɔɔnɛ Jesus kazzi ka ssala ammɛ ɔyɛnnɛ ning baang, ɔlɔɔk ka luppyam ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang bulenɛ ka ulenɛ uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka lɔkkwɔɔn, nzang vvenɛ ɔsan bwa wanavva wa usingimɛnɛ baang ulenɛ. Ule ɔnaang-a-bubbi!”
42007040	Jesus ufeele ɔlɔɔk la Simon ɔttɛ, “Simon, nyanga lɛkkɔ za nle ka nbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛ.” Ammɛ Simon ɔttɛ, “Iyyaa, ukopolo-lukopolo, abwɔɔlɔnɛ.”
42007041	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Balɔɔt baffa badɔkɔ baang ba bamiinɛ bafolo ikkpoko. Ɔkɔɔm-ɛtɔk, ufolo lalɔp inaara kubbwɔɔk. Wa vvɔn ufolo inaara zzɔɔp.
42007042	Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ukkwoongnɛ ɔtak ippwɔɔt ’yɔng baang usi lile. Ɔlɔɔt wa unnyinɛbɛ ikkpoko ’yɔng baang lufolo ɔtɔkyɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔsɔɔkbɛ. Uwɔwɔng ule ɔtta uyini ikkpoko ’yɔng baang litele?”
42007043	Ɔzzánga Simon ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Nttina nttɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ikkpoko ammɛ ittanɛ liyipi, ammɛ ule ɔttamɛ litele.” Jesus ɔlɔɔk la Simon ɔttɛ, “Kɛppyɛlɛ kamma annɔ kile bbwak.”
42007044	Usikili ɔppyɛɛk wanavva ’wɔng baang ɔlɔɔk la Simon ɔttɛ, “Ayɛn mung wanavva mung ɔɔ? Ka nffunɛ ka ssala annɔ, bannyi asinɛ linnyi nyila bukkpɔ. Ɔzzànga wanavva ’wɔng mung uyilanɛbong bukkpɔ la liyyeen ammɛ, ɔkɔɔm kittulu ammɛ ɔkkpɔlɔnɛbwɛ.
42007045	Ka nffunɛ mung, nbɛɛm asinɛ lɛnaang, gɔɔ asinɛ ligbugba. Ɔzzànga wanavva ’wɔng mung kɛmmal a bukkpɔ nɛ ba ɔtaka ɔkkyaa ɔfɔngɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ nssinɛ nffu mung.
42007046	Bannɛ balɔk asinɛ linnyi, ɔzzànga wanavva ’wɔng mung ɔllɔtnɛbong bannɛ ka bukkpɔ.
42007047	Nbwɔɔlɔwɔ nttɛ kɛsaap sa ɔyɔɔnɛ mung, ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔsanbong ɔttɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsɔɔkmɛbong bubbi ammɛ. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsɔɔkmɛnɛ bubbi ssup ɔyanga kɛsaap ssup la ammɛ.”
42007048	Jesus ɔlɔɔk la wanavva ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Nbwɔɔlɔwɔ nttɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsɔɔkwɔbong bubbi annɔ.”
42007049	Balɔɔt ba bataanɛ ka okkpokkolo battɛ, “Uwɔng ulenɛ bɔka ɔlɔɔt wa ukkwoongnɛ ɔsɔɔk balɔɔt bubbi?”
42007050	Jesus ɔlɔɔk la wa wanavva ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Kiyila annɔ kɛkkalawɔbong, amii ka bɔkaat.”
42008001	Ɛkɛtɛ esi lɛmmɛ, Jesus ɔssɛ ka lɛffɛ ka lɛffɛ, ukopolo Kuttu-budoddo Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ zzɔɔppabaffa bakupmɛ.
42008002	Bwanavva ba uttulanɛbɛ ipiliza la bɛssanga iffaak bɛlɔk bakupmɛ ɔgbaa la Mary Magdalene wa ɔggbanɛ lippyem linnangikkyaat ussekemɛ.
42008003	Joanna, wanavva Shuza wa ɔdɔkɔnɛ akkala ka ɔdda kɛkaal a Herod, la bwanavva balɔk ggbadam bakɔɔm bɛfɛɛn abbɛ battele Jesus la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ.
42008004	Balɔɔt bassi ka laffɛ ka laffɛ baffu ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus. Balɔɔt balenɛ ggbadam liffu babbi, Jesus ɔssabɛ ifɛɛt ’yɔng mung ɔttɛ,
42008005	“Ɔlɔɔt ufeele umii kɛmmyang a ifɔɔk a bɛfɛɛn. Ɔmmyangnɛ, ifɔɔk ilɔk ittɔ ka ɛtɔk. Balɔɔt basing bukkpɔ. Bunɔɔn buffu buttɔng buzzi.
42008006	Ifɔɔk ilɔk ittɔ ka akpana. Ifɔɔk yɔng baang imeetnɛ, ippyɛlɛ ibbe ka ɛkpansi ’yɔng baang ɛsɛlɛnɛ bɔdɔlɔ.
42008007	Ifɔɔk ilɔk ittɔ ka lifaat sa liyanganɛ billeep. Imeetnɛ immala la lifaat ’sɔng baang, billeep bɛnnaayɛ lakke.
42008008	Ifɔɔk ilɔk ittɔ ka ɛkpansi ya doddo imeet immala. Iwɔm ifɔɔk lalɔp kubbwɔɔk ka kizza ssɔn.” Jesus ɔbbal lɛttɛ, “Gɔpɔlɔyɔng tɛ! Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyanganɛ latɔɔk za kippyee kɔlɔɔk, uppyee tɛ!”
42008009	Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus babapmɛ bwa ifɛɛt ’yɔng mung itumnɛ.
42008010	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Annyɔɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔngbong likup a Itutum Ammɛ ppwool ppwool. Ɔzzànga balɔɔt balɔk bagɔpɔlɔzɛ ka ifɛɛt. Kwakkwɛ baang mkkpa bappyɛɛk, baala bayɛn; mkkpa bagɔpɔlɔ, baala bappyee.
42008011	“Nkwɔng kulenɛ kwa ifɛɛt ’yɔng itumnɛ: Ifɔɔk a bɛfɛɛn ’yɔng baang ilenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
42008012	Ifɔɔk ya ittɔnɛ ka ɛtɔk ilenɛ balɔɔt ba bappyeenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔzzànga Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm-a-Kuyeeng uffu ɔsambɛ lɛmmwɔɔl za bappyeenɛ bassɛɛn ka ippyam ɔgbata, ɔnaangbɛ basi kiyila sa kittelenɛbɛ lɛbɛlɛ lɛyanga.
42008013	Ifɔɔk ya ittɔnɛ ka akpana, ilenɛ balɔɔt ba bappyeenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, batɔkzɛ ka laggele. Ɔzzànga ba batɔkzɛ bassɛɛn ka ippyam. Bayanga kiyila ka waan a ɛkɛtɛ ssup. Ba ɔmmɛ bappyɛlɛ banaang bubbi ka ɛkɛtɛ bimana biffunɛ.
42008014	Ifɔɔk ya ittɔnɛ ka lifaat sa liyanganɛ billeep ilenɛ balɔɔt ba bappyeenɛ Lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔzzánga ittina la kɛggyan iyyɛɛp a vvengodde la laggele a ɛkpansi bɛnaangbɛ lakke kiyila basi lɛbɛlɛ lɛyanga.
42008015	Ifɔɔk ya ittɔnɛ ka ɛkpansi ya doddo ilenɛ balɔɔt ba bappyeenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, batelezɛ la ippyam ya doddo. Balokozɛ banaang budoddo tɔttɔt bakkpɛɛm babbe.
42008016	“Ɔlɔɔt wa uyengenɛ otinika ɔsam ɔssɛɛn ka tɔkɔlɔ ekkpo ɔlɔk ɔsam ulup ka tɔkɔlɔ igolo ba ule. Lutini ’gwɔng utelemɛ ka kkpelegedee, nkwaaning ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ wa ɔmalnɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ a ggwoon ɔyɛn buppwolo otinika ’wɔng baang.
42008017	Likup za ale abwɔɔp lisi ka vveeng lɛtta ba lile. Bɔfɛɛn bwa bavvoongnɛbɛ busi ka vveeng lɛtta ba bule.
42008018	“Zzɔɔkyɔng latɔɔk agɔpɔlɔyɔng doddo tɛ: Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyanganɛ bɔfɛɛn, vvenɛ ɔyanga ɔgbaa. Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyanganɛbwɛ ssup, vvenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ukupmɛbwɛ ɔtɔk.”
42008019	Abakka Jesus la itele ammɛ baffu kɛyɛn a Jesus. Ka kibbi kilenɛ lɛsak lɛttala, ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus basi lɛbɛlɛ lɛffɔ; bakɔɔng ka vveeng babee.
42008020	Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ɔlɔɔk la Jesus ɔttɛ, “Ssakawɔ la itele annɔ bale bakang ka babeenɛ ka vveeng, baggyan battɛ bayɛnwɔ tɛ.”
42008021	Jesus ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɛnɛ anaam la itele anaam balenɛ balɔɔt ba bappyeenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm batelezɛ.”
42008022	Kɛtɔm ssɔn Jesus ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Afeele imii imalyɔng ka akkpaat, imiiyɔng kukupa libbwe ’kwɔng kang.” Ɔzzánga bamal ka akkpaat bafeele bamii.
42008023	Bale baang ka kɛwaat akkpaat, Jesus ɔlaa ka tɔkɔlɔ. Ɔzzánga ɔffa kɛffa sa lɛbaang ukupa bannyi ɔssɛɛn ka akkpaat ɔggyan kiyipi. Ɔkkpɛlɛ batii ka ntɛm a lubbe.
42008024	Ɔzzánga balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus bafungalamɛ. Battɛ, “Dedde! Dedde! fungala, ile ka ibbenɛ tɛ!” Jesus ufeele ɔkkpa kɛffa kiwele. Eseese kɛffa kizum zzuum.
42008025	Ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Kiyila annyɔɔng kilewɔyɔng yang?” Ɔzzánga kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ, ɔbbwɔpɔbɛ, balɔɔk abbabbɛ battɛ, “Uwɔng ulenɛ bɔka ɔlɔɔt wa ɔlɔɔknɛ la kɛffa kippyeemɛ kinnyimɛ latele?”
42008026	Bawaat akkpaat bakum kukupa libbwe. Baffɔ ka ɛkpansi Gergesenes ka lufoom a libbwe a Galilee.
42008027	Jesus ɔtta ka akkpaat eseese, ɔyɛn ɔlɔɔt wa ussinɛ ka lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang wa ɔyanganɛ ipiliza. Ɔmmɛbong ka ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔssɛnɛ kɛkɔɔ. Ka ssala ba ɔbɛlɛ lɛtaa, usseke ka ukkwununɛ ka ilupu.
42008028	Ɔ́yɛnnɛ Jesus, ɔttɔ ka lisse, ubungu ɔgaga ɔttɛ, “Jesus, Waan Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, aggyan ’bɔng la anaam. Ellee nkkpengewɔ nttɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ ayɔɔnɛ akama!”
42008029	Ning baang ɔlɔɔk ka Jesus ulenɛ lɛttɛ ipiliza itta issekemɛ ka kkwɔɔt. Bikun ’pyɔng baang bizzɔɔkmɛbong bikkpit bikkpit mkkpa bassɛɛnmɛ ikpɔkɔlɔ ka labɔɔk la bukkpɔ. Ullunɛ, ibbɔk, isangamɛ ɔtta umii ka kasɛkɛ kɛmat.
42008030	Jesus ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ, “Azzanga nang?” Ammɛ ɔttɛ lɛkɔɔl anaam nzzanga ‘Kɛkaan’, ka bɛssanga ipiliza ggbadam bilemɛnɛ lɛnaang.
42008031	Keem ipiliza ikkpenge Jesus ittɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔggbayɛ umii ɔssɛɛn ka lubbe gwa lɔddɔngnɛ gaang gaang.
42008032	Ɔzzánga kɛkaan ikkuma kɛdɔkɔ baang ka kizzinɛ kazzi ka lufoom a lɛttaal. Ipiliza ikkpenge Jesus ittɛ ɔfɔngɔyɛ annyɛ imii ikup ikkuma. Jesus ɔfɔngɔyɛ imii.
42008033	Ipiliza ikkyaa ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ifɔngɔ, imii ikup ikkuma. Kɛkaan ikkumma ’sɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ kɛmma kimii kisini lɛttaal kɛttɔ ka bannyi, ɔkkpɛlɛ assɛ kɛtaak.
42008034	Balɔɔt ba bappyɛɛknɛ ikkuma ’yɔng baang, bayɛnnɛ ning baang, bamma bamii ka ssala la itɔɔm babwɔɔlɔ kuttu kwa ikkuma ilenɛ lɛtaak ka bannyi.
42008035	Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ bamma bamii bayɛn kwa kɔnaangnɛ. Bamiinɛ, bayɛn ɔlɔɔt wa ɔttɔnɛ bikun ka ɔtaanɛ kwetkwet ka lataak a Jesus la iwɔkɔlɔ ammɛ. Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔbbwɔpɔbɛ.
42008036	Balɔɔt ba balenɛ lɛyɛn babwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt balɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ulemɛnɛ lɛppwa.
42008037	Kɛkaan a balɔɔt ba ballunɛ bakkpit lɔkaan a Gergesenes babwɔɔlɔ Jesus battɛ ɔgbata usseke lɔkaan abbɛ ka ulenɛbɛ gaang lɛbbwɔpɔ. Jesus ɔmal ka akkpaat ɔwaat ɔppyɛlɛ isimisimi.
42008038	Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang wa ɔggbanɛ ipiliza itta issekemɛ, ukkpenge Jesus ɔttɛ, “Afɔngɔnɛ nffu nkupwɔ bɛɛ.” Jesus ufim ɔttɛ,
42008039	“Afula ka ssala annɔ. Vvenɛ abwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ lɛnaang unnyiwɔ.” Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔgbata usseke ka ɔssɛnɛ ukkpit lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang, ɔbwɔɔlɔ kuttu kɔlɔɔk kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ lɛnaang.
42008040	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛnɛ, kibbi balɔɔt kiwomomɛ ka baggbanɛ baang lile ka bataanɛ bakatmɛ.
42008041	Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔzzanganɛ Jairus uffu. Ɔdɔkɔ akkala ka ggwoon a mitin a balɔɔt a ssala. Ɔmɛkɛlɛ ɔttɔ ka lataak a Jesus ukkpengemɛ ɔttɛ umii ka ssala ammɛ,
42008042	waan ammɛ wa ulenɛ likkpa zzɔɔppaliffa lɛffɔ, ule ka ubbenɛ. Jesus ufeele umii, balɔɔt bagbepmɛ ning lafoom laffa laffa.
42008043	Wanavva vvɔn ɔdɔkɔ baang wa ullutnɛ lɔnnyɔ ka likkpa zzɔɔppaliffa. Ɔlɔɔt wa ukkwoongnɛ uttulamɛ ɔppwamɛ usi lile.
42008044	Ukkpit Jesus ka isimi usingimɛ ka uwɔkɔlɔ, eseese, ɔppwamɛ.
42008045	Jesus ɔbap ɔttɛ, “Nnyinɛ, usinginɛnɛ?” Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ bakangala battɛ abbɛ lissi. Ɔzzánga Peter ɔlɔɔk la ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Dedde, balɔɔt bayipibong ɔkkpɛlɛ bakkpitwɔ tɛ.”
42008046	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk usinginɛbong. Nsan ka lakke lattanɛnɛ ka kkwɔɔt.”
42008047	Wanavva ’wɔng baang ɔsannɛ ɔttɛ Jesus ɔkɔɔlɔbong; ɔtta, uffu ɔttɔ ka lisse ka lataak a Jesus ka lusso balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔbwɔɔlɔ Jesus bwa bunaangnɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ usingimɛ ulemɛ lɛppwa.
42008048	Jesus ɔlɔɔk la ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Waan anaam kiyila annɔ kɛnaangwɔbong ɔppwawɔ. Amii ka bɔkaat.”
42008049	Ka Jesus ulenɛ ka kɛlɔɔk ning baang, ɔlɔɔt ussi ka ssala akkala uffu ɔbwɔɔlɔ Jairus ɔttɛ, “Waan annɔ ubbebong tɛ! Ukopolo-lukopolo abbalmɛ ’bɔng lɛggyan?”
42008050	Jesus uppyeenɛ ning baang, ɔlɔɔk la Jairus ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔbbwɔpɔwɔ, ayanga kiyila, vvenɛ waan annɔ ɔppwamɛ.”
42008051	Ɔffɔnɛ ka ssala, usi liyila balɔɔt ggbadam bamal ka ggwoon. Ule Peter la James la John la abakka la abassɛ a waantiti kɛyɔɔng.
42008052	Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ badɔkɔ baang ka bakkwanɛ, battɔl layilili. Jesus ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ abɛlɛyɔng lɛkkwa; waantiti ba ɔtaka ubbe, ule ka bilaa!”
42008053	Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ banyɔɔka Jesus ka basannɛ battɛ ubbebong ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
42008054	Jesus ɔlɔm waantiti ka kɔbɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Waantiti afeele.”
42008055	Lɛfɛkɛlɛ a waantiti ’wɔng baang lɛppyɛlɛ, ufungala, ɔtaa ka kuddu. Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ bannyimɛ kazzi uzzi.
42008056	Ɔzzánga abakka la abassɛ kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ gaang gaang. Jesus ɔttamabɛ ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ abwɔɔlɔyɔng ɔlɔɔt kwa kulenɛ lɛnaang tɛ!”
42009001	Jesus ɔkkwɔɔ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ba zzɔɔppabaffa, uloko ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn, unnyibɛ lakke za kɛggba ipiliza la za kittula balɔɔt iffaak duu.
42009002	Ɔtɔɔmbɛ ɔttɛ bamii bakopolo kuttu Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, battula balɔɔt iffaak ɔgbaa.
42009003	Ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akɔɔmyɔng bɔfɛɛn bulɔk amiiyɔng kɔssɛ, gɔɔ lukut, gɔɔ ɛssɔ, gɔɔ kazzi. Gɔɔ tɛ̀ttɛ́ akɔɔmyɔng uwɔkɔlɔ ɔlɔk ɔgbaa la wa ayangayɔng ka kkwɔɔt.
42009004	Ɛfɛɛn duu ya batɔkwɔnɛyɔng ka latele, ataayɔng baang la abbɛ ɔddɔkɔddɔkɔ amiiyɔng ka ɛfɛɛn ɛlɔk.
42009005	Lɛffɛ za amiinɛyang basiwɔyɔng lɛtɔk ka latele, agbatayɔng ka lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang; ɔzzànga akkwɔlɔyɔng ibut ka bukkpɔ allɔtyɔng baang, ɔtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɔttama gwa attamanɛyɔngbɛ.”
42009006	Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bamii ka laffɛ ka laffɛ, bakopolo kuttu a Jesus, battula balɔɔt ka ɛfɛɛn duu ya bamiinɛ.
42009007	Herod, uzzilɛttɔ a Galilee, uppyeenɛ lilɔɔk ’sɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ sa linaangnɛ, luttina lubutmɛ kibut kɛsak, ka uppyeenɛ ka balɔɔt balɔɔknɛ battɛ, “John, Ɔnaang-a-Baptizim, ɔppyɛlɛbong ufungala ka lubbe!”
42009008	Balɔɔt balɔk battɛ Elijah uffubong; balɔk battɛ Uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ ufungalabong ka lubbe.
42009009	Herod ɔttɛ, “Nzzabong John lɛttɔ, baang bɔka ɔlɔɔt wa balɔɔknɛ lilɔɔk ’sɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ batum.” Ɔzzánga Herod ɔggyan ɔttɛ ɔyɛn Jesus.
42009010	Bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus bappyɛlɛ baffu babwɔɔlɔ Jesus bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya balenɛ lɛnaang. Jesus ɔsambɛ bamii ka lɛffɛ za lɛzzanganɛ Bethsaida. Baffɔnɛ bakang, basseke kɛyɔɔng.
42009011	Bɛkaan a balɔɔt ggbadam bappyeenɛ, ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ bafeele bakupmɛ, ɔtɔkbɛ ka laggele. Ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ lilɔɔk utum Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, uttula balɔɔt ba baggyannɛ battɛ uttulabɛ.
42009012	Livve likootnɛ, balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ baffu ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ ulenɛ battɛ, “Alɔɔk balɔɔt ’bɔng mung bamii ka tɔkɔlɔ a ssala la itɔɔm ya bikkpitnɛ mung, nkwaaning baggyan kazzi bazzi bɛɛ! Ɔgbaa ɛfɛɛn a kimini mung ka kasɛkɛ atingating ’kwɔng mung ba ele ya balɔɔt bale bakkwunu.”
42009013	Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔttɛ, “Annyɔɔng annyiyɔngbɛ kazzi bazzi.” Abbɛ battɛ, “Bwa iyanganɛ mung ɔkkpɛlɛ ule igɔngɔ a brɛɛd kubbwɔɔk la isɛɛn-a-bannyi iffa tɛ. Aggyan attɛ imii ilɛɛp kazzi, iffu innyi kibbi ’sɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔɔ?”
42009014	(Badɔkɔ innɔ a bwaanbwalam zzɔɔpiffa la kufaak). Jesus ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Alɔɔkyɔng balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ bataa-ɔtaa. Bataa lalɔp laffa la balɔɔt zzɔɔp ka likup.”
42009015	Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ banaang ning baang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Jesus ɔlɔɔknɛ. Balɔɔkbɛ bataa-ɔtaa.
42009016	Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔsam igɔngɔ a brɛɛd ’yɔng baang kubbwɔɔk la isɛɛn-a-bannyi iffa, uyeek ɔppyɛɛk ka libat, uwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang. Ɔsam, ɔbbɔk, unnyi balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ batan balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ.
42009017	Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bazzi kazzi ’kwɔng baang, bamɔk. Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus battɔng kazzi kwa kassekenɛ, kayipi isangala zzɔɔppiffa.
42009018	Ɛkɛtɛ nnyɔn ya Jesus ulenɛ baang ka kɛssɛɛn a luzɔɔm kɛyɔɔng, balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ baffu bakupmɛ. Jesus ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Bɛkaan balɔɔt ’byɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ battina battɛ anaam nnyinɛ?”
42009019	Ɔzzánga bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, “Balɔɔt balɔk battɛ annɔ John, Ɔnaang-a-baptizim.” Balɔk battɛ, annɔ Elijah, balɔk babbal lɛttɛ, baang Uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ ufungalabong ka lubbe.”
42009020	Ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Ngkka annyɔɔng bɛɛ, attina attɛyɔng anaam nnyinɛ?” Ɔzzánga Peter ɔttɛ, “Annɔ alenɛ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ.”
42009021	Jesus ɔttamabɛ gaang gaang ɔttɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ babwɔɔlɔ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk.
42009022	Ɔbbalbɛ lɛbwɔɔlɔ ɔttɛ, “Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ ɔyɛn akama gaang gaang. Bagɛlɛnya la bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la bakopolo-Lafɔɔ vvenɛ bafimmɛ. Vvenɛ bawwɔɔlmɛ. Ɔzzànga vvenɛ ufungala ka lubbe ka kɛtɔm bɛffa ka bɛkkyaat.”
42009023	Ɔlɔɔk ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ule ka ukupnɛnɛ usumalamɛ kɛyɔɔng, ɔsam Cross ammɛ kɛtɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ, ukupnɛ.
42009024	Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔggyannɛ ɔttɛ ɔkkala kɛfal ammɛ, vvenɛ ɔtakazɛ. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtakanɛ lɛfal ammɛ ka lɛttɔ anaam, vvenɛ ulokozɛ ka budoddo.
42009025	Isak ɔlɔɔt ilenɛ ’bɔng, ɔyanganɛ vveeng ’wɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ, ammɛ biini ɔtaak lɛkɔɔl? Isak mɛ ba ile.
42009026	Ɔlɔɔt wa nnaangmɛnɛ izzit ɔlɔk izzit inaangmɛ itum lukopolo anaam, Waan Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ izzit issɛ inaangmɛ ippyɛɛk Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ka ɛkɛtɛ ya ule ɔtaa ka igada kibeet ammɛ la lakke abassɛ la liyeeng sa liyilanɛ bɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
42009027	Akkeyɔng nkwɔng tɛ! Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ balɔɔt bale baang ba bale basi libbe tɔttɔt bayɛn Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
42009028	Liwaazɛ lɛsaknɛ ka Jesus ɔlɔɔknɛ lilɔɔk ’sɔng mung, ɔsam Peter la John la James, ɔbɛtɛmɛ kɛyɔɔng bamii ka libat ekpok bataa bakang bazɔɔm.
42009029	Jesus ule baang ka luzɔɔm, eseese lusso lufoolo, iwɔkɔlɔ illaatmɛ inyanya.
42009030	Kitipili-kitipili, bayɛn balɔɔt baffa baang ka kutolo la Jesus. Badɔkɔ Elijah la Moses.
42009031	Abbɛ baffunɛ la lakke libat, batolo kutolo la Jesus batum ɛkɛtɛ ya Jesus ule ubbe ka Jerusalem tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uttinanɛ.
42009032	Peter la babbɛ babbɛ badɔkɔ ka bilaa. Keem bafungala, bayɛn lakke a Jesus la balɔɔt ’bɔng baang baffa ba babeenɛ baang la ammɛ.
42009033	Peter ɔyɛnnɛ balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ka bale ka bagbatanɛ, ɔlɔɔk la Jesus ɔttɛ, “Dedde, kɔyyɛɛp gaang ka ilenɛ mung, vvenɛ inaang bwaan-idda bɛkkyaat, vvɔn wa annɔ, vvɔn wa Moses; vvɔn wa Elijah.” (Ka lɔkkwɔɔn Peter ba ɔsan bwa ɔlɔɔknɛ utum).
42009034	Utii baang ka kɛlɔɔk, ikkpálá-lukpaagbeede iffu ivvoongbɛ kuyeeng. Ɔzzánga balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔbbwɔpɔbɛ gaang gaang ka ikkpálá iffunɛ ivvoongbɛ.
42009035	Lɛmmwɔɔl lissi ka ikkpálá ’yɔng baang lɛlɔɔk lɛttɛ, “Uwɔng ulenɛ waan a luppyan anaam wa nsanganɛ; agɔpɔlɔmɛyɔng.”
42009036	Lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng baang lizumnɛ, Jesus usseke kɛyɔɔng. Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ basseke zzuum ka bataanɛ. Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang, kɔlɔɔk kɔlɔk basi lɛlɔɔk babwɔɔlɔ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk batum bwa bayɛnnɛ.
42009037	Ɔffɔnɛ libbessolo basini kuttɔɔk a lɛttaal. Ulɛng a kɛkaan a balɔɔt ukup Jesus.
42009038	Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ubungu ka kɛkaan ’sɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo, nkkpengewɔ ka kɔlɔɔk a waan anaam vvɔn keem!
42009039	Ipiliza ifeelemɛnɛ, ubungu kitipili-kitipili, izzɔɔkmɛ ka lisse iffuku itɔmmɛ ka kamma; umini baang inaangmɛ, ba iggyan ittɛ igbata issekemɛ!
42009040	Nkkpenge balɔɔt a kɔssɛ annɔ nttɛ baggba waan anaam ipiliza, keem basi likkwoong.”
42009041	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Bɔng asɛlɛnɛyɔng kiyila, anaangyɔng babbu lilɔɔk ning. Mung nle ntaa la annyɔɔng ɔmmɛ ɔffɔ nang? Nle nppyɛɛkwɔyɔng minak ammɛ ɔffɔ nang?” Ɔlɔɔk la ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Sam waan annɔ affu kaang.”
42009042	Waantiti ule ka kimii ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus, ipiliza izzɔɔkmɛ ka lisse ɔfɔksɛ eseese; Jesus ɔkkpayɛ kiwele, waantiti ɔppwamɛ eseese. Jesus ɔsammɛ unnyi abassɛ.
42009043	Lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lakɛɛlɛ balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ. Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ kɔdɔkɔ kutii ka kɔkɛɛlɛnɛbɛ ka bɛfɛɛn bya Jesus ɔnaangnɛ. Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ,
42009044	“Tɛ̀ttɛ́ asumalayɔng kɔlɔɔk kwa nle ka nbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng mung tɛ! Bale ka bakaanɛ Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ bannyi lakke balɔɔt.”
42009045	Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ basi lɛsan bwa Jesus ɔlɔɔknɛ utum. Kuddumu kussekebɛ ɔkkɔɔnɛ basikwɛ lɛsan. Basi lɛbbɔ babapmɛ.
42009046	Bɛkangala bɛttɔ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus abbabbɛ batum ɔlɔɔt wa ɔttanɛ liggbenge.
42009047	Jesus ɔsanbong bwa battinanɛ baang ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔzzánga ɔsam waantiti ubeemɛ ka lufoom.
42009048	Ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtɔknɛ waan ’wɔng mung ɔssɛɛn ka kkwɔɔt ka lɛkɔɔl anaam ɔtɔknɛbong anaam; ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtɔknɛnɛ anaam ɔtɔkbong ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtɔɔmnɛnɛ anaam ɔgbaa. Ɔlɔɔt wa usinɛ wa kɔlɔɔk lile ka bɛzzɔkɔ annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔttanɛ liggbenge.”
42009049	John ɔlɔɔk la Jesus ɔttɛ, “Dedde iyɛnbong ɔlɔɔt wa ɔggbanɛ ipiliza ka lɛkɔɔl annɔ, ɔzzánga ibwɔɔlɔmɛ ittɛ ɔfɔngɔ ka usinɛ ka kɛkaan ayyɔɔt lile.”
42009050	Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛ ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ abɛlɛmɛyɔng litunu. Ɔlɔɔt wa asimɛnɛyɔng litun ulenɛ wa annyɔɔng.”
42009051	Bɛtɔm bɛkkɛtɛnɛ bya bale ka basamnɛ Jesus bamii ka libat, Jesus ɔnaang luttina gwa kimii a Jerusalem.
42009052	Ɔtɔɔm balɔɔt ammɛ ɔttɛ bakɔɔm ɛtɔk bassɛ bamii ka killu a balɔɔt a Samaria, balɔngɔlɔ bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ balokomɛ.
42009053	Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bafim Jesus ka balenɛ lɛsan battɛ ule ka kimii a Jerusalem.
42009054	Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ, James la John, bayɛnnɛ ning baang battɛ, “Uyini, aggyan attɛ ikkwɔɔ lɔkɔɔn ka libat luffu lɔwwɔɔlbɛ ɔɔ?”
42009055	Ɔzzánga Jesus usikili ufimbɛkwɛ.
42009056	Bagbata baang bamii lɛffɛ lɛlɔk.
42009057	Ka balenɛ ka ɛtɔk a kimii, badudda ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ka ɛtɔk. Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔlɔɔk la Jesus ɔttɛ, “Vvenɛ nkupwɔ ka ɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ya amiinɛ.”
42009058	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Lifat liyanga ibbe ya illunɛ, bunɔɔn buyanga lakɔt za bukkwununɛ, ɔzzànga Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ɛfɛɛn a umininɛ ɔfɛkɛlɛ ba ɔyanga.”
42009059	Ɔlɔɔk la ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔttɛ, “Feele akupnɛ.” Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Dedde, afɔngɔbong ssii; nmii nlli dedde anaam.”
42009060	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Afɔngɔ babbu balli ba abbɛ babbu. Annɔ amii akopolo kuttu Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
42009061	Ɔlɔɔt wa vvɔn ɔttɛ, “Vvenɛ nkupwɔ, Dedde; ɔzzànga afɔngɔbong nmii nteele itutum anaam.”
42009062	Jesus ɔlɔɔk la ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔnaangnɛ kɛnaang ɔppyɛɛk ka isimi ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ka lukkwoon ba ule ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
42010001	Nkwɔng baang kɔsaknɛ, Uyini ɔssang lalɔp a balɔɔt lakkyaat la balɔɔt zzɔɔppabaffa; ɔbɛlɛngɛlɛbɛ balɔɔt baffa baffa ɔttɛ bakɔɔm bassɛ bamii ka laffɛ la ɛfɛɛn ya ammɛ bumiinɛ.
42010002	Ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Liyaat littalabong ɔzzànga bayaat-a-liyaat bale ssup. Azɔɔm assɛɛnyɔng uyini liyaat, nkwaaning ɔyanga balɔɔt a liyaat ggbadam bayaat liyaat ’sɔng baang.
