42010003	Amiiyɔng. Ntɔɔmwɔyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ itɔɔn ka bɛzzɔkɔ igɔɔt.
42010004	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akɔɔmyɔng issɔ, gɔɔ ɛssɔ-lubbwoom. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ assɛɛnyɔng ikkpabukkpɔ. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ abee awomoyɔng ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ka ɛtɔk.
42010005	Ssala duu sa affɔnɛyɔng akɔɔm ɛtɔk attɛyɔng, ‘Bɔkaat butaa la ssala ’sɔng.’
42010006	Ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa bɔkaat busaapmɛnɛ ullunɛ baang, bɔkaat ’bwɔng baang vvenɛ butaa la ammɛ. Ɔlɔɔt wa bɔkaat busaapmɛnɛ usinɛ baang lile, appyɛlɛ atɔkyɔng luwomo bɔkaat annyɔɔng.
42010007	Ataayɔng ka ssala ’sɔng baang sa ɔggyan-a-bɔkaat ullunɛ. Azziyɔng kazzi duu kwa bannyiwɔnɛyɔng, avvayɔng kɛvva duu sa bannyiwɔnɛyɔng. Ɔnaang-a-kɛnaang ule wa kinnyi ikipili. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ assɛyɔng ka ssala balɔɔt balɔk gbɔɔ gbɔɔ gbɔɔ.
42010008	Lɛffɛ duu za amiinɛyɔng batɔkwɔyɔng ka bɔwaa bannyiwɔyɔng kazzi, azziyɔng kazzi ’kwɔng baang kwa bannyiwɔnɛyɔng.
42010009	Attulayɔng balɔɔt ba ɔffaaknɛbɛ ka lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang, abwɔɔlɔyɔng balɔɔt ’bɔng baang attɛyɔng Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm itii kɛtɛkɛtɛ.
42010010	Amiinɛyɔng ka lɛffɛ za basiwɔnɛyɔng lɛtɔk, atta assɛyɔng ka ɛtɔk, alɔɔk attɛyɔng;
42010011	‘Gɔɔ ibut ya iggbɔnɛyɛlɛ ka bukkpɔ ya issinɛ ka lɛffɛ annyɔɔng, vvenɛ ikkwɔlɔyɛ illɔt ippyɛɛkwɔyɔng. Akkeyɔng tɛ! Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm itii kɛtɛkɛtɛ tɛ!’
42010012	Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ ka kɛtɔm-a-kɛkkaal Sodom vvenɛ ubbe Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛttɔ ɔtta lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang!
42010013	“Vvenɛ ayɛnyɔng akama wa lɛbaang annyɔɔng Chorazin la Bethsaida. Bɛmaanga bya nnaangnɛ ka annyɔɔng bunaangbyɛ ka Tyre la Sidon nzang balɔɔt ’bɔng baang baggba ka lisse lɛtaa, battɔng bissaka-ibba bakkwula, baggumu littɔɔng ballɔtbɛ kɛyɔɔng, bayɔɔ battɛ bakkyaabong kɛnaang a bubbi bafɔngɔ!
42010014	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔyɔɔ balɔɔt a Sidon la balɔɔt a Tyre kibbe-lɛttɔ ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛkaal ɔttawɔyɔng annyɔɔng.
42010015	Kwa annyɔɔng balɔɔt a Capernaum! Adɔkɔ aggyan attɛ asamwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng amiiyɔɔng ka libat ɔɔ? Vvenɛ basamwɔyɔng bassɛɛn ka ɛfɛɛn akama.”
42010016	Ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔgɔpɔlɔnɛ kwa annyɔɔng, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang agɔpɔlɔnɛbong anaam. Ɔlɔɔt wa ufimnɛ kwa annyɔɔng ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ufimbong kwa anaam. Ɔlɔɔt wa ufimnɛ kwa anaam, ufimbong kwa ammɛ wa ɔtɔɔmnɛnɛ.”
42010017	Lalɔp a balɔɔt ’zɔng baang lakkyaat la balɔɔt zzɔɔppabaffa bappyɛlɛ la laggele za lɛbaang. Balɔɔk battɛ, “Uyini gbaak la ipiliza iteleyɛlɛ lutele ka iggbanɛyɛ ka lɛkɔɔl annɔ.”
42010018	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Nyɛnbong Satan ka ussinɛ ka libat tɛ̀ttɛ̀ immwalang uffu ɔttɔ ka lisse.
42010019	Agɔpɔlɔyɔng tɛ, nnyiwɔyɔngbong lakke za asingnɛyɔng izzɔkɔ la ilaang isiwɔyɔng bulɔk lɛnaang, la lakke za ale abɛtɛyɔng Ɔlɔɔt-a-Kɔfɔk. Bulɔk bwa bule bunaangwɔyɔng ba bule.
42010020	Ɔzzànga tɛ̀ttɛ́ aggeleyɔng ka liyeeng sa linaangnɛ kɛsɛɛm litelewɔnɛyɔng. Lutini ’gwɔng aggeleyɔng ka balenɛ lakɔɔl annyɔɔng ka libat lɛssɛɛn.”
42010021	Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kunnyi Jesus laggele. Jesus ɔttɛ, “O Dedde, Uyini libat la ɛkpansi, nwomowɔbong kɛnaang ka ayɔɔnɛ balɔɔt ba batakanɛ likkoop kɔlɔɔk kwa alupnɛ asseke balɔɔt ba basannɛ kɔlɔɔk, la balɔɔt ba bakkoopnɛ lilɔɔk. Dedde, ’kwɔng mung anaang ka luttina annɔ biini, la bɔwaa.
42010022	“Dedde anaam unnyinɛbong bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsannɛ Awaan ba ule, ule Abassɛ keem. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsannɛ Abassɛ ba ule, ule Awaan kɛyɔɔng la balɔɔt ba Awaan ɔggyannɛ ɔttɛ basan.”
42010023	Jesus usikili ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ka wɛɛk ɔttɛ, “Ayyɛɛpyɔng lɔfɔm gaang gaang ka ayɛnnɛyɔng bɛfɛɛn bya ayɛnnyɔng mung!
42010024	Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng, bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la babeet ggbadam badɔkɔ baggyan battɛ bayɛn bɛfɛɛn bya ayɛnnɛyɔng, ɔzzànga basi likkwoong bayɛn. Baggyan battɛ bappyee, gɔɔ basi likkwoong bappyee.”
42010025	Ukopolo-Lafɔɔ vvɔn uffu ɔssɛlɛ Jesus la ibap ɔttɛ nzang ɔttɔnɛ ɔkaamɛ. Ɔbap Jesus ɔttɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo, mung nle nnaang nang tɛ́ttɛ́ nyanga kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal?”
42010026	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Mung Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔdɔkɔ lɔlɔɔk nang, adɔkɔ akkwɔɔ nang?”
42010027	Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Ale atele Ebinukkpaapi, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm annɔ, la luppyam annɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ, la lɔtan annɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ, la likke annɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ la luttina annɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Wa annyɔɔng ɔsaapwɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ asaapwɔnɛ kɛyɔɔng.”
42010028	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Kɛppyɛlɛ kamma annɔ kile bbwak. Anaangnɛ ning vvenɛ ataa ka kuddu.”
42010029	Ukopolo-Lafɔɔ ɔdɔkɔ ɔggyan ɔttɛ nzang ɔssɛ ka ɛtɔk ya bbwak, ɔzzánga ɔbap Jesus ɔttɛ, “Mung nnyinɛ ulenɛ wayyɔɔt?”
42010030	Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ɔdɔkɔ baang wa ussinɛ Jerusalem umii Jericho. Babbyap bakupmɛ umii ɔffɔ ka kasɛkɛ atingating batupmɛ, ɔmɛɛm; bagbata bakɔngɔmɛ kɛyɔɔng; umini baang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ulenɛ libbe.
42010031	Ɔttɛ ɔnaang, ɔssɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm uffu ɔsak ka ɛtɔk ’yɔng baang. Ɔyɛnnɛ ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang, ɔgbɛɛlɛ ka lufoom a ɛtɔk ɔsak ussekemɛ.
42010032	Ka ɛtɔk ’yɔng baang nnyɔn, ɔlɔɔt a itutum a Levi uffu ɔsak; ɔyɛnnɛ ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang, ɔgbɛɛlɛ ɔsak ussekemɛ.
42010033	Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn wa Samaria wa ɔssɛnɛ ka ɛtɔk ’yɔng baang uffunɛ, ɔyɛn ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ka umininɛ. Ɔzzánga bibbemɛ lɛttɔ gaang gaang.
42010034	Ɔttɔm ɔkkɛtɛmɛ, ɔllɔtmɛ batak la bannɛ ka biddopo. Ɔsam bɛfaak ibba ɔggbɔmɛ ka biddopo. Ɔsam ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang, uttele ka libat eyim, umii la ammɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ a ggwoon a kɛfɛkɛlɛ, ɔtaa baang ɔppyɛɛkmɛ.
42010035	Ussolonɛ libbessolo, ɔsanga ikkpoko unnyi ɔlɔɔt wa ɔppyɛɛknɛ ggwoon, ɔttɛ, ‘Appyɛɛkmɛ, ɛkɛtɛ ya Mppyɛlɛnɛ vvenɛ nnyiwɔ ikkpoko ɔkkpɛlɛ ya atakanɛ ka lɛttɔ ammɛ.’ ”
42010036	Ɔzzánga Jesus utele lɛttɔ ɔttɛ, “Attina attɛ balɔɔt ’bɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ bakkyaat nnyinɛ ule wabbɛ?”
42010037	Ukopolo-Lafɔɔ ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt wa bibbemɛnɛ lɛttɔ uttulamɛ, ammɛ ulenɛ wabbɛ.” Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Annɔ amii assɛ anaang ning baang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ammɛ ɔnaangnɛ.”
42010038	Jesus la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bagbata. Jesus uffu ka lɛffɛ zzɔn za wanavva wa ɔzzanganɛ Martha ɔtɔknɛ Jesus ka latele, ɔssɛɛn ka ssala.
42010039	Ɔyanga etele ya ɛzzanganɛ Mary wa ɔtaanɛ Jesus ka lataak, ɔgɔpɔlɔ lukopolo ammɛ.
42010040	Martha kutunmɛ ka kɛnaang kilenɛ uggboggbo sa kɔnaang. Ɔzzánga uffu ɔlɔɔk la Jesus ɔttɛ, “Uyini, asan attɛ etele anaam ɔgbatabong ɔkɔngɔnɛ kɛnaang ’sɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ kɛyɔɔng ɔɔ? Alɔɔkmɛ uffu uttelenɛ bɛɛ!”
42010041	Uyini ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Martha! Martha! Annɔ attina kwa bɛfɛɛn ppwap luttina lɔbbɔlwɔ.
42010042	Ɔzzànga kaang ule bɔfɛɛn bbwɔn keem bwa aggyannɛ. Mary ɔsangabong bɔfɛɛn bwa bbwak, ɔlɔɔt mɛ bwɛ ba ɔbɛlɛ likkwoong ɔtɔk.”
42011001	Ɛkɛtɛ nnyɔn Jesus ɔdɔkɔ baang ka ɔzɔɔmnɛ luzɔɔm. Ulenɛ livva lɛzɔɔm, ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Uyini, akopoloyɛlɛ luzɔɔm tɛ̀ttɛ̀ John ukopolonɛ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ.”
42011002	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Uwɔng ulenɛ luzɔɔm gwa ale azɔɔmyɔng: ‘Dedde: Ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt ikɔɔm lɛkɔɔl annɔ ka budoddo itelezɛ; Afɔngɔyɛlɛ ifula ka Itutum annɔ.
42011003	Annyiyɛlɛ bwakuzzi bwa iggyannɛ kɛtɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ.
42011004	Asɔɔkyɛlɛ bubbi ayyɔɔt ka ayyɔɔt isɔɔknɛ balɔɔt ba banaangnɛyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt bubbi. Afɔngɔyɛlɛ kɛllɛ gaang gaang!’ ”
42011005	Jesus ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn ɔlɔɔt vvɔn bumiinɛ ka ssala ɛnngwa ammɛ kɛtɔm, ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Ɛnngwa anaam, afolonɛ igɔngɔ a brɛɛd ikkyaat.
42011006	Ɛnngwa anaam vvɔn uffunɛbong ka ssala, bwa nnyimɛnɛ uzzi ba nyanga.’
42011007	Ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn a ɛnngwa annɔ ɔppyɛlɛwɔnɛ kamma ɔttɛ, ‘Fɔngɔnɛ la lɔsap, bassɛɛnbong ɔkpaka, ɔgbaa bwaan anaam la anaam biini itii ka kimini ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ba nbɛlɛ likkwoong nfeele nwongolo ggwoon nnyiwɔ bwa aggyannɛ.’
42011008	Ale anaang nang? Gɔɔ mkkpa budɔkɔ usi lifeele unnyiwɔ brɛɛd ka alenɛ ɛnngwa ammɛ, vvenɛ ufeele ka abapmɛnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ abapmɛnɛ baang.
42011009	Ɔzzànga nlɔɔk la annyɔɔng nttɛ: Abapnɛ, vvenɛ atɔkyɔngbwɛ. Aggyannɛyɔng, vvenɛ ayɛnyɔng. Alipnɛyɔng ka lɛmma ggwoon, vvenɛ liwongolo.
42011010	Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔbapnɛ vvenɛ ɔtɔkbwɛ. Wa ɔggyannɛ vvenɛ ɔyɛnbwɛ, wa ulipnɛ ka lɛmma ggwoon vvenɛ liwongolomɛ.
42011011	Waantiti ɔbapnɛ ɛsɛɛnabannyi, attina attɛyɔng abassɛ ’wɔwɔng ule ɔsam ɛzzɔkɔ unnyi awaan lutini ɛsɛɛnabannyi?
42011012	Ɔlɔk waantiti ɔbapnɛ lɛssɛlɛ, attina attɛ abassɛ ’wɔwɔng ule ɔsam ɔlaang unnyi awaan?
42011013	Annyɔɔng ba abbɔlnɛyɔng asannɛ annyiyɔng bwaan annyɔɔng bɛfɛɛn bya doddo, ba asan attɛyɔng abassɛ bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ unnyi ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ wa ɔggyannɛ Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔɔ!”
42011014	Jesus ɔdɔkɔ ka kɛggba ipiliza ya isinɛ kɛlɔɔk likkwoong. Ipiliza ’yɔng baang igbatanɛ issekemɛ, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ukkwoong kɛlɔɔk. Kibbi balɔɔt sa kɛdɔkɔnɛ baang kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ.
42011015	Balɔɔt balɔk battɛ, “Beelzebul, ubeet ubbukanggbe, unnyimɛnɛ lakke za ɔggbanɛ ipiliza.”
42011016	Balɔɔt balɔk baggyan battɛ bakaamɛ. Ɔzzánga battɛ ɔnaang bɛmaanga ɔyɔɔ nkwaaning basan battɛ ammɛ Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
42011017	Jesus ɔsanbong ittina abbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Lɔkaan gwa lɔbɛngɛlɛnɛgwɛ kɛyɔɔng babbu abbabbɛ, lɔkaan ’gwɔng baang baala luttumu, gɔɔ itutum ya ibɛngɛlɛnɛyɛ kɛyɔɔng, itutum ’yɔng baang vvenɛ ittɔ.
42011018	Ulenɛ ka itutum a Satan ibɛngɛlɛnɛyɛ kɛyɔɔng ka lakup ballu abbabbɛ, itutum ’yɔng baang ile inaang nang ittumu. Mung attɛyɔng Beelzebul unnyinɛnɛ lakke za kɛggba ipiliza.
42011019	Anaam nggba ipiliza ka lakke ubeet ubbukanggbe ngkka balɔɔt a kɔssɛ annyɔɔng baggba ipiliza ka lakke nyinɔɔng? Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ annyɔɔng bayɔɔwɔyɔngbong battɛ bbwak ba aleyɔng.
42011020	Maaye Oo! anaam nggba ipiliza ka lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Kwakkwɛ kɔnaangnɛ asan attɛyɔng likke Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm liffubong ka bɛzzɔkɔ annyɔɔng.
42011021	“Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔkkaamnɛ ɔbamanɛ bɛfɛɛn a kullu uloko ɔkat ssala ammɛ, vvenɛ ɔkkala bɛfɛɛn ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ uloko.
42011022	Ɔzzànga ka ɛkɛtɛ ya ɔlɔɔt wa ɔkkaamnɛ ɔttamɛ uffunɛ, vvenɛ utup uyini a ssala ɔnnaa bɛfɛɛn bya ɔkɔɔmnɛ ɔkat ssala ammɛ, ɔssang bɛfɛɛn bya bɛsaapmɛnɛ umii.
42011023	“Ɔlɔɔt duu wa usinɛ wa anaam lile, ka lɔkkwɔɔn ntunmɛ lutun. Ɔlɔɔt wa usinɛnɛ littele nbama ɛfɛɛn, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ka lɔkkwɔɔn ɔggyanbyɛ kɛbɛpɛ.
42011024	“Ubbu kuyeeng ’kwɔng baang kɔgbatanɛ usseke ɔlɔɔt ka kkwɔɔt, kɔssɛ ning bang kukkpit ka tɔkɔlɔ kɛmat sa bannyi basinɛ lile kɔggyan ɛfɛɛn ya kɔfɛkɛlɛnɛ. Kusinɛ ɛfɛɛn ya kɔfɛkɛlɛnɛ lɛyɛn, kɔlɔɔk la akkwɛ kɛyɔɔng kɔttɛ, ‘Vvenɛ nppyɛlɛ nmii ka ɔtɔm a ssala anaam sa mgbatanɛ nkɔngɔ.’
42011025	Kuyeeng ’kwɔng baang vvenɛ kɔppyɛlɛ isimisimi kumii ka ɔtɔm a ssala akkwɛ, kɔyɛnnɛ ssala yyɛɛpayyɛɛpa ka balenɛ lɛbama baloko.
42011026	Vvenɛ kɔtta kumii kɔkkwɔɔ liyeeng linnangikkyaat, sa libbɔlnɛ lisakkwɛ akkwɛ biini liffu litaa baang ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn. Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang utii ka akama wa lɛbaang ɔtta tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔdɔkɔmɛnɛ ubbu-kuyeeng kkwɔn ka tɔkɔlɔ.”
42011027	Jesus ɔlɔɔknɛ ning baang, wanavva vvɔn ubee bakang ka tɔkɔlɔ kibbi, ɔlɔɔk la Jesus ɔttɛ, “Laggele lale za wanavva ’wɔng baang wa ɔmaatkwɔnɛ unnyiwɔ libee.”
42011028	Ɔzzánga ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Laggele latta lile za balɔɔt ba bappyeenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm balokozɛ.”
42011029	Balɔɔt balenɛ liffu ning baang ggbadam bakkpit Jesus, Jesus ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Balɔɔt a bɛtɔm mbyɔng babbɔlbong gaang. Babap bɛmaanga battɛ bayɛn, ɔlɔk bayɛn lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔzzànga bɛmaanga bya bale bayɛn bile bikpeke bya Jonah kɛyɔɔng.
42011030	Kɛssanga ssɔn sa Uppyee-kutolo-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔzzanganɛ Jonah ɔdɔkɔnɛ ɔnaang ɔyɔɔ balɔɔt a Nineveh. Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ mgbaa vvenɛ ɔssɛ ɔnaang ɔyɔɔ balɔɔt ba bɛtɔm mbyɔng.
42011031	Ka Kɛtɔm-a-kɛkaal vvenɛ Ubeet-a-wanavva wa ussinɛ kutɔɔk a lɔfɔɔn ufeele ubee unnyi balɔɔt a bɛtɔm mbyɔng kibbi ka ulenɛ lɛssɛ kufoom ɛkpansi kkwɔn ududa ɔgɔpɔlɔ lukopolo kukele a Solomon. Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng, bɔfɛɛn bulɔk butii mung bwa buttanɛ Solomon.
42011032	Ka Kɛtɔm-a-kɛkaal, balɔɔt a Nineveh vvenɛ bannyiwɔyɔng kibbi ka balenɛ kɛfal abbɛ lifoolo ka bappyeenɛ lukopolo a Jonah. Ɔzzànga nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk utii mung wa uggbengenɛ ɔsak Jonah.
42011033	“Ɔlɔɔt wa uyengenɛ otinika ulup ka tɔkɔlɔ ɛssɔ ɔlɔk ulup ka kuttɔɔk igolo ba ule. Lutini gwɔng, uyengenɛ otinika utele ka kkpelegedee nkwaaning ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ wa ɔmalnɛ ɔyɛn ppwool.
42011034	Zzeen annyɔɔng lataa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ otinika ka kkwɔɔt annyɔɔng. Zzeen annyɔɔng lappwolonɛ, kkwɔɔt ɔgbaa lissɛ lippwolo. Ɔzzànga zzeen annyɔɔng labbɔlnɛ, kkwɔɔt annyɔɔng lisseke kisul.
42011035	Akatwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng asan attɛyɔng buppwolo annyɔɔng kisul lissi tɛ.
42011036	Ulenɛ ka kkwɔɔt annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ lippwolonɛ, kufoom kɔlɔk kusi ka kisul lile, ɔkkpɛlɛ assɛ lile lile ka kkpelegede tɛ̀ttɛ̀ abeenɛ ka buppwolo otinika wa uwongolonɛ gaang.”
42011037	Jesus ulenɛ livve lɛlɔɔk, ɔlɔɔt a Pharisees ɔkkwɔɔmɛ kazzi ka ssala ammɛ. Ɔzzánga Jesus ufeele umii kazzi.
42011038	Ɔlɔɔt a Pharisees ’wɔng baang kɔkɛɛlɛmɛ ka Jesus usinɛ eleme abbɛ ya bayilanɛbong ibɔɔk tɛ́ttɛ́ bazzi bɔfɛɛn liloko.
42011039	Uyini ɔlɔɔk la wa Pharisees ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Annyɔɔng balɔɔt a Pharisees azzaayɔng isimi bɛkkpala la immonggo keem usseke ka tɔkɔlɔ. Ɔzzànga ka tɔkɔlɔ kang ulewɔyɔng ibbyap la bubbi.
42011040	Bazingizingi bɛfɛɛn! Ebinukkpaapi ya ɛnaangnɛ ɛkkpakkwɔɔt annyɔɔng lissi ɛnaangnɛ tɔkɔlɔ annyɔɔng ɔɔ?
42011041	Aggyannɛ attɛ azzaawɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng allɔyɔng, asamyɔng bɛfɛɛn bya bilenɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ bɛkkpala annyɔɔng la immonggo asɔɔkyɔng balɔɔt a ibbɔl, usseke ayyɛɛpyɔng.
42011042	“Vvenɛ kɔbbɔlwɔyɔng gaang gaang annyɔɔng balɔɔt a Pharisees, ka annyinɛyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kufaak a bɛfɛɛn a liyaat annyɔɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ umakkpa la bukalafɔk, ɔzzànga lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk la kɛsaap Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba aggyanyɔng. Akkoopyɔng ’byɔng: Tɛ̀ttɛ́ afimyɔng bɛlɔk usseke bɛlɔk.
42011043	“Kɔbbɔlwɔyɔng gaang gaang kɔsak annyɔɔng, balɔɔt a Pharisees! Akkapayɔng bɛtaa bya bɛsaapwɔnɛyɔng, alokowɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng ka ssoon a mitin, aggyan attɛyɔng balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ banaangwɔyɔng mgbeede ka kappya duu kwa amiinɛyɔng.
42011044	Vvenɛ kɔbbɔlwɔyɔng gaang gaang! Aleyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lalli ukunukunu za balɔɔt bassɛnɛ ka libat basi lɛsan.”
42011045	Ukopolo-Lafɔɔ vvɔn ɔlɔɔk la Jesus ɔttɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo lilɔɔk sa alɔɔknɛ la balɔɔt a Pharisees baang ɔkkpɛlɛ, assɛɛnbongyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt ngbaa ka bɛnɔk tɛ!”
42011046	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Iii! Vvenɛ ayɛnyɔng akama gaang gaang annyɔɔng bakopolo-Lafɔɔ ɔgbaa. Asamyɔng latɔkɔ za lɛbaang afeekyɔng balɔɔt ka isimi, annyɔɔng biini gɔɔ kituulu kɛnnɔ kittelebɛ lissi.
42011047	Vvenɛ ayɛnyɔng akama gaang gaang! Alɔngɔyɔng lalli Bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ba balɔɔt annyɔɔng ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ bawwɔɔlnɛ layyɛɛp.
42011048	Annyɔɔng biini ayɔɔyɔngbong attɛyɔng kwa balɔɔt annyɔɔng banaangnɛ kɔsaapwɔyɔng lɔsaap. Abbɛ bawwɔɔlnɛ bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, annyɔɔng abɔɔkyɔng lalli lɔbɔɔk.
42011049	Kwakkwɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka bikɔɔm ammɛ ɔttɛnɛ, ‘Vvenɛ ntɔɔm bappyee-kutolo anaam la balɔɔt ba bale balɔɔk kɔlɔɔk anaam nfeebɛ; vvenɛ bawwɔɔl balɔk, bayɔɔ balɔk akama.’
42011050	Nkwaaning balɔɔt ba bɛtɔm mbyɔng bayɛn akama ka bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba balɔɔt abbɛ ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ bassinɛ bawwɔɔl ka vveeng ussinɛ utte,
42011051	ka ussinɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ bawwɔɔlnɛ Abel, uffu ɔffɔ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya bawwɔɔlnɛ Zachariah ka bɛzzɔkɔ labun Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ppyɛɛk nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng!, balɔɔt a bɛtɔm mbyɔng vvenɛ bayɛn akama ɔkkpɛlɛ ka lɛttɔ balɔɔt bɔng baang.
42011052	Vvenɛ ayɛnyɔng akama gaang gaang, annyɔɔng bakopolo-Lafɔɔ! Alupyɔngbong waan-ɛkpɔkɔlɔ wa kɛkɔɔm kiwongolo lɛmma-ggwoon a kukele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm; ɔzzànga annyɔɔng biini ka tɔkɔlɔ ba amalyɔng, atunuyɔng balɔɔt ba babumnɛ battɛ bamii ka tɔkɔlɔ!”
42011053	Jesus ɔgbatanɛ ka ɛfɛɛn yɔng baang, bakopolo-Lafɔɔ la balɔɔt a Pharisees bakkpaakmɛ ibap batum lilɔɔk ’sɔng baang.
42011054	Bakkin innya bakatmɛ battɛ ɔlɔk bakaamɛ ka lilɔɔk sa ule ɔlɔɔk ɔsɛpɛ.
42012001	Innɔ balɔɔt balenɛ libbi ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn, ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔt ɔkɔɔm using wabbɛ, Jesus ɔkɔɔm ɛtɔk ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Akatwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng assekeyɔng yeast a balɔɔt a Pharisees tɛ: nkkwɔɔ kɛkkala lɛlaak abbɛ.
42012002	Bɔfɛɛn duu bwa bulenɛ ka lalup; vvenɛ butta ka vveeng. Likup duu za babwɔɔpnɛ, vvenɛ lɛtta ka vveeng.
42012003	Kwakkwɛ nttɛnɛ kɔlɔɔk duu kwa alɔɔknɛyɔng kɛtɔm, vvenɛ bappyeekwɛ kikoon. Kɔlɔɔk duu kwa alɔɔknɛyɔng ka buzzaap ka lɛnɔk a ggwoon, vvenɛ bayaamkwɛ ka ogyila.
42012004	“Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng inngwa anaam! Tɛ̀ttɛ́ balɔɔt ba bassɛnɛ ggbɔɔ-ggbɔɔ-ggbɔɔ bawwɔɔl balɔɔt babbwɔpɔwɔyɔng. Kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ gaang ba bataka bakkwoong banaang.
42012005	Vvenɛ nyɔɔwɔyɔng ɔlɔɔt wa ule ɔbbwɔpɔwɔyɔng. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔbbwɔpɔwɔyɔng. Ammɛ ukkwoongnɛ ɔwwɔɔl ɔlɔɔt, vvenɛ ukkwoong ɔsammɛ ɔssɛɛn ka ɛfɛɛn a akama. Iii, nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔbbwɔpɔwɔyɔng!
42012006	“Buggwele kubbwɔɔk lissi ka bataanɛ ka ikkobo iffa ɔɔ? Ɔzzànga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ppyɔn ggbɔɔ ba ɔtaka usumala.
42012007	Gɔɔ gbaak la bittulu bya lɛttɔ annyɔɔng baang ukkwoonbongbyɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ kɔbbwɔpɔwɔyɔng, annyɔɔng attanɛyɔng buggwele ggbadam.
42012008	“Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng: Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔlɔɔknɛ ppwool ppwool ka lusso babbɛ ɔttɛ, ammɛ usseke wa anaam, vvenɛ Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔssɛ ɔnaang ning baang la ammɛ ka lusso bayilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
42012009	Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔkalanɛnɛ ɔttɛ, ammɛ wa anaam lissi, vvenɛ Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔssɛ ɔkala ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ka lusso bayilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
42012010	“Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔlɔɔknɛ bubbi utum Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ, bakkwoong mung basɔɔkmɛ bubbi ammɛ. Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa ɔlɔɔknɛ bubbi utum Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, mɛbwɛ baala basɔɔk.
42012011	“Ɛkɛtɛ ya bakɔɔmwɔnɛyɔng, bamii ka kɛkaal ka ssoon a imitin, ɔlɔk ka lusso bazzilɛttɔ ɛkpansi, tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔbbwɔpɔwɔyɔng. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ attina atumyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ale anaang akkalawɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng, ɔlɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ale alɔɔkyɔng.
42012012	Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ kukopolowɔyɔng kwa ale alɔɔkyɔng ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang.”
42012013	Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ka kibbi ’sɔng baang ɔlɔɔk la Jesus ɔttɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo, abwɔɔlɔ etele anaam, isam bɛfɛɛn bya dedde ɔgbatanɛ ɔkɔngɔyɛlɛ ibɛngɛlɛ.”
42012014	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Walam, mung nnyinɛ unnyinɛnɛ lakke za kɛkaal a kɛkaal, ɔlɔk za kɛbɛngɛlɛ bɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng kinnyiwɔyɔng?”
42012015	Ɔbbal litolo, unnyibɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔttɛ, “Akatwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng ggbeggbe assekeyɔng bɛssanga liwɔnɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ. Bɛfɛɛn bya ɔlɔɔt ɔyanganɛ lissi ulenɛ kuddu ɔlɔɔt, gɔɔ mkkpa ɔyyɛɛpmɛ.”
42012016	Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔssabɛ ifɛɛt yɔng ɔttɛ, “Uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ɔyanga ɛkpansi ya uwoopnɛ bɛfɛɛn bɛyyɛɛpmɛ.
42012017	Ɔtaa ssii uttina kɛyɔɔng ammɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Ɛfɛɛn ya nle nloko bɛfɛɛn byɔng mung ba nyanga. Mung nle nnaang nang?’
42012018	Ɔlɔɔk kɛyɔɔng kɛyɔɔng ɔttɛ, ‘Nkwɔng kulenɛ kwa nle nnaang. Vvenɛ nlɔp ukunu anaam nzzɔɔk, nppyɛlɛ ntte wa lɛbaang, ɔlɔk nloko bɛfɛɛn a liyaat anaam la bɛfɛɛn bɛlɔk ngbaa.
42012019	Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang vvenɛ nppyɛlɛnɛ kamma kɛyɔɔng nttɛ, ‘Ɔyyɛɛp a lɔfɔm, ayangabong bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya doddo bya aggyannɛ ka likkpa ggbadam. Akɔɔm lɛfal annɔ bɛtɛbɛtɛ. Azzi, avva ataa ka laggele.’
42012020	Ɔzzánga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛmɛ, ‘Ukun ɔlɔɔt, vvenɛ assɛɛn lɛttɔ ka kɛtɔm sa mmwɔɔn mung. Nnyinɛ ule ɔyanga bɛfɛɛn byɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ bya ulokomɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng?’ ”
42012021	Jesus utele lɛttɔ ɔttɛ, “Kule kule ning baang la balɔɔt ba bafaannɛ iyyɛɛp balokobɛ kɛyɔɔng, ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bɛ ba ɔyyɛɛp.”
42012022	Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang Jesus ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Nkwɔng kulenɛ kwa nbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng! Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akekeyɔng kwa kazzi kwa azzinɛ adduyɔng, ɔlɔk attinayɔng kwa ibba ya akwulanɛyɔng ka kkwɔɔt.
42012023	Kuddu kuggbenge kɔsak kazzi. Ɛkkpakkwɔɔt annɔ eggbengenɛ ɛsak ibba ya akkwulanɛ ka kkwɔɔt.
42012024	Ppyɛɛk bunɔɔn; bɔtɔɔm ba buyanga, ɔlɔk buyaat liyaat, gɔɔ ikwunu gbɔɔ ba buyanga ya bulokonɛ bɛfɛɛn abbwɛ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyinɛbwɛ kazzi. Annyɔɔng lissi attanɛyɔng bunɔɔn bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyinɛbwɛ kazzi ɔɔ?
42012025	Ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng baang nyinɛ ukkwoongnɛ ɔtaa ukeke, lavve lagbaamɛ ka kɛfal ammɛ?
42012026	Asinɛ likkwoong akɔɔm waan a bɔfɛɛn bwa ssup, anaang nang amii akeke kwa bɛfɛɛn bɛlɔk?
42012027	Ppyɛɛk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ idodo immalanɛ, kɛnaang ba inaang. Ibba ba ikwulu. Ɔzzànga nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ, Ubeet Solomon wa ɔdɔkɔnɛ ɔyyɛɛpmɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔyyɛɛpmɛnɛ lɔyyɛɛp baang, usi likkwoong ɔyanga ibba ya iyyɛɛpnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ idodo yɔng baang.
42012028	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ukwulanɛ lifaat ibba, lifaat sa lilenɛ mung mmwɔɔn vvenɛ likkɔm lufat, attina attɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm annyɔɔng ule ɔppyɛɛkwɔyɔng nang? Annyɔɔng bayanga kiyila ssup ’bɔng!
42012029	“Ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng tɛ̀ttɛ́ tɔkɔlɔ ɔbbɔlwɔyɔng kwa kazzi la bwa ale avvayɔng.
42012030	(Ɔssɛbibit wa vveeng ’wɔng mung ɔggyannɛ bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung;) Ssaawɔ annyɔɔng ɔsan lɔsan ɔttɛ aggyanyɔng bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ.
42012031	Akɔɔm ɛtɔk assɛɛnyɔngbong Itutum ammɛ ka luppyam, vvenɛ unnyiwɔyɔng bɛfɛɛn mbyɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ bya aggyannɛyɔng.”
42012032	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔbbwɔpɔwɔyɔng kɛkaan a bwaan itɔɔn. Ssaawɔ annyɔɔng kɔsaapmɛ lɔsaap kinnyiwɔyɔng Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
42012033	Ataanyɔng bɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ bya ayanganɛyɔng asam ikkpoko annyiyɔng balɔɔt ba ɔbbɔlnɛbɛ. Annyɔɔng biini anaangyɔng issɔ ya ile isi lillut, usseke abɔngɔlɔyɔng kibeet annyɔɔng ka libat, ka ɛfɛɛn ya kile kisi lɛssɔlɔ. Ussip ba ule wa ule ɔffɔ ka assɛ, ɔsamwɔ sɛ. Bɛfɛɛn baala bikkwoong bizziwɔyɔngsɛ.
42012034	Luppyam annyɔɔng lule lule ka ɛfɛɛn iyyɛɛp annyɔɔng ilenɛ.
42012035	Aggbɔyɔng innyɔ, lakɔɔmyɔng itinika, akatyɔng kwa kule kuffu.
42012036	Ataayɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ babili ba bakatnɛ abassɛ abbɛ battɛ ɔppyɛlɛ libbeel. Ɔppyɛlɛnɛ, ulipnɛ ka lɛmma ggwoon, vvenɛ bawongolomɛ lɛmma eseese.
42012037	Ppyɛɛ ule wa babili ’bɔng baang ba abassɛ abbɛ ɔppyɛlɛnɛ ukopobɛ kwetkwet ka bataanɛ bakatmɛ. Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng ka lɔkkwɔɔn nttɛ abassɛ abbɛ vvenɛ ɔsam ɛkkpa ɔggbɔ ka kɛsan ɔlɔɔkbɛ ɔttɛ bataa-lɔtaa, ammɛ ɔppyɛɛ unnyibɛ kazzi.
42012038	Ppyɛɛ ule wa babili ’bɔng baang ba abassɛ abbɛ ɔppyɛlɛnɛ ukopobɛ kwetkwet ka kɛkat. Gɔɔ mkkpa budɔkɔ ɔppyɛlɛ ka kasɛkɛ kɛtɔm, ɔlɔk ka ule ka ɔggyannɛ kissolo.
42012039	Akkeyɔng nkwɔng tɛ! Uyini a ssala ɔsannɛ ɛkɛtɛ ya ussip ule uffu, baala ɔfɔngɔ ussip ’wɔng baang ɔmal ka ggwoon ammɛ.
42012040	Annyɔɔng ngbaa akatyɔng! Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ule uffu ka ɛkɛtɛ ya asinɛyɔng littina attɛyɔng vvenɛ uffu.”
42012041	Peter ɔttɛ, “Uyini, mung ifɛɛt ’yɔng mung abwɔɔlɔyɛlɛ kɛyɔɔng faa alɔɔk abwɔɔlɔ ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ?”
42012042	Uyini ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Nnyinɛ ulenɛ bɔɔyi wa ɔyyɛɛpnɛ, ɔsan kɔlɔɔk? Ammɛ ulenɛ wa abassɛ ule unnyimɛ kɛppyɛɛk a ggwoon, unnyi ibbɔɔyi bakang etini kazzi kwa abbɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya bbwak.
42012043	Bɔɔyi ’wɔng baang vvenɛ uggele gaang gaang ka abassɛ ule ɔppyɛlɛ ɔyɛnmɛ ka ɔnaangnɛ bɛfɛɛn byɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ.
42012044	Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng ka lɔkkwɔɔn nttɛ, abassɛ ubili ’wɔng baang vvenɛ unnyimɛ kɛkat a bɛfɛɛn ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
42012045	Ɔzzànga ubili ’wɔng baang ɔlɔɔknɛ kɛyɔɔng ɔttɛ, ‘Ɛkɛtɛ etii ka ɛlɔmnɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ dedde anaam ɔppyɛlɛ’ utte kitup a ibɔɔyi ’yɔng kang bwanavva la bwaanbwalam, uzzi kazzi ɔvva litak ubimi,
42012046	abassɛ vvenɛ ɔppyɛlɛ kɛtɔm sa ubili ’wɔng baang usinɛ littina ɔttɛ vvenɛ ɔppyɛlɛ. Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang abassɛ vvenɛ ɔyɔɔmɛ akama ɔsan kɔlɔɔk a kisi ɔlɔɔt latele linnyi.
42012047	“Bɔɔyi wa ɔsannɛ bwa abassɛ ɔttɛnɛ ɔnaang usimɛ kɛyɔɔng lɛbama ɔkat, ɔnaang bwa abassɛ ɔggyannɛ ɔttɛ ɔnaang; vvenɛ bakɔɔm eloot ya lɛbaang batupmɛ.
42012048	Ɔzzànga bɔɔyi wa usinɛ bwa ɔttɛnɛ ɔnaang lɛsan, ɔnaang bwa ɔggyannɛ lɔkkpat vvenɛ bakɔɔm epyoko ya ssup batupmɛ. Ɔlɔɔt wa bannyimɛnɛ bwa lɛbaang bale bappyɛlɛ baggyan bwa lɛbaang a lɛbaang ka eddu ammɛ.
42012049	“Nffubong kɛssɛɛn ɛkpansi lɔkɔɔn. Buggbanɛ ɛkpansi lɔkɔɔn lɛssɛɛn, nzang kɔsaapnɛ kɔsak.
42012050	Nyanga baptizim wa bale ka banaangnɛnɛ. Akama vvenɛ ɔttalanɛ tɔttɔt ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang ɛtakabong ɛsak.
42012051	Mung attina attɛyɔng nkɔɔm bɔkaat nffu ka ɛkpansi ɔɔ? Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ bɔkaat lissi ka nkɔɔmnɛ nffu, nkɔɔm lɔnyaata.
42012052	Ka ussinɛ mung umii ka lusso, itutum a balɔɔt kubwɔɔk vvenɛ babɛngɛlɛbɛ kɛyɔɔng, kufaak kwakang bakkyaat, kwa kkwɔn baffa.
42012053	Ibassɛ balɔɔt vvenɛ bafim kwa ibbwɔɔn. Ibbwɔɔn vvenɛ bafim kwa ibbassɛ abbɛ. Ibakka ibbwɔɔn vvenɛ bafim kwa bwaan abbɛ, ibbwɔɔn vvenɛ bassɛ bafim kwa ibakka abbɛ. Bakka la bakka vvenɛ bafim kwa bakka abbɛ.”
42012054	Jesus ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Ayɛnnɛyɔng ka ufinginɛ attɛyɔng, ‘Ule ka uteepnɛ.’ Uteep baning.
42012055	Appyeenɛyɔng kɛffa ka kissinɛ ka libat a lɔfɔɔn kɛffa kiffu, attɛyɔng, ‘Usɔngɔ ule ka uffunɛ’. Usɔngɔ uffu baning.
42012056	Bakkala lalaak a balɔɔt! Akkwoongnɛ appyɛɛkyɔng ɛkpansi la libat abwɔɔlɔyɔng kwa kulenɛ, anaang nang asinɛyɔng lɛsan kwa kulenɛ gedegede mung?
42012057	“Bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ asiyɔng kɔlɔɔk kwa kɔyyɛɛpnɛ kɛnaang liffik kɛyɔɔng annyɔɔng?
42012058	Ɔlɔɔt ɔttɛnɛ attɔmɛbong ka lafɔɔ, ɔkaawɔ, ule ka umiinɛ la ka ɔdda kɛkaal; abum lakke annɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ atoloyɔng kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng baang annyɔɔng la ammɛ balɔɔt baffa kɔsaalwɔyɔng ka ɛtɔk, tɛ̀ttɛ́ uffu ɔkɔɔmwɔ ɔffɔ ka ɛfɛɛn a bakaal a kɛkaal. Nzang bakaal a kɛkaal vvenɛ, basamwɔ, bannyi ippoloosi, basamwɔ bassɛɛn ka iggbakkɔpɔ.
42012059	Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang, wɔ baala bayila atta ning ning annyi ikkpoko ya bazzawɔnɛ isaal.”
42013001	Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang, balɔɔt balɔk badɔkɔ baang ka babwɔɔlɔnɛ Jesus tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Pilate ɔwwɔɔlnɛ balɔɔt a Galilee ka badɔkɔnɛ ka kɛssɛɛn a luzɔɔm, kinnyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
42013002	Jesus ɔbapbɛ lɔbap ɔttɛ, “Mung attina attɛyɔng balɔɔt a Galilee ’bɔng baang ba bawwɔɔlnɛ ning baang battanɛ bubbi lɛnaang batta balɔɔt a Galilee balɔk ɔɔ?
42013003	Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ, asinɛyɔng kɛnaang a bubbi lɛkkyaa afɔngɔyɔng, vvenɛ abbeyɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ abbɛ babbenɛ.
42013004	Attina attɛyɔng balɔɔt ba zzillabakkyaat ba ɛnyɔng ɛttɔnɛ ɛwwɔɔlbɛ ka Siloam battanɛ lɛbbɔl batta balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba ballunɛ ka Jerusalem ɔɔ?
42013005	Maaye! Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ asinɛyɔng kɛnaang bubbi a lɛkkyaa afɔngɔyɔng, ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng vvenɛ abbeyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt ’bɔng baang babbenɛ.”
42013006	Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔssabɛ ifɛɛt ’yɔng ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ɔdɔkɔ baang wa ɔkɔɔnnɛ lɛsan a kɛssɛ ka bɔtɔɔm ammɛ. Umiinɛ ukoolo lɛsan a kɛssɛ ’zɔng baang, lakkpo usi lɛyɛn.
42013007	Ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔk la ɔkat-a-bɔtɔɔm ammɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Ppyɛɛk utii likkpa likkyaat ka nffunɛ nggyan lakkpo ka kɛssɛ ’sɔng mung likkpo gbɔɔ ba nyɛn. Zzasɛ azzɔɔk, ning baang gbɔɔ kibee kwabɔng?’
42013008	Ɔzzánga ɔkat a bɔtɔɔm ’wɔng baang ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, ‘Afɔngɔsɛ dedde, kibee baang ka kukkpa ’kwɔng mung kkwɔn, vvenɛ nyaat lubbe nkkpitsɛ, nssɛɛn kusuma.
42013009	Ulenɛ ka kɛwɔmnɛ lumaalɔk, kɔyyɛɛp kɔsak; kɛppyɛɛnɛ kisi kɛwɔm, vvenɛ nzzasɛ nzzɔɔk.’ ”
42013010	Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ ssɔn Jesus ɔdɔkɔ baang ka ukopolonɛ ka ɔdda mitin.
42013011	Wanavva vvɔn ɔdɔkɔ baang wa ɔyanganɛ ipiliza. Ipiliza ’yɔng inaangmɛbong iffaak ka likkpa zzil-la-likkyaat. Wanavva ’wɔng baang ɔdɔkɔ usseke kokkop ka ukokonɛ, bitbit ba ɔbɛlɛ likkwoong ɔssɛ.
42013012	Jesus ɔyɛnmɛnɛ ɔkkwɔɔmɛ, ɔttɛ, “Wanavva, iffaak annɔ isaalwɔbong.”
42013013	Jesus utelemɛ labɔɔk ka kkwɔɔt, eseese ɔppwa wanavva ’wɔng baang utuulu, usseke ka ɔssɛnɛ bitbit. Uwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang.
42013014	Uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt ka ɔdda mitin ’wɔng baang kutunmɛ ka Jesus uttulanɛ ɔlɔɔt ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ. Ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔttɛ, “Ule bɛtɔm bwɔlaaning ka inaangnɛ kɛnaang. Affuyɔng ittula ka bɛtɔm ’byɔng baang. Afɔngɔyɔng ittula ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ lɛbɛlɛ liffu.”
42013015	Uyini ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Annɔ ɔnaang-a-lagban ’wɔng! Annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ akkyaayɔng lakɔmɔlɔ annyɔɔng afɔngɔyɔng, akɔɔmyɔngzɛ lamii lavva bannyi ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ.
42013016	Attɛ nfɔngɔ waan itutum a Abraham ’wɔng mung wa Satan ulemɛnɛ ka bubili liloko ka likkpa zzil-la-likkyaat lɛsanga ka bubili ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ ɔɔ?”
42013017	Kɛppyɛlɛ kamma Jesus kɛnaang balɔɔt a kɔfɔk ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, izzit inaangbɛ. Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ baggele ka kɔlɔɔk a bikɛɛlɛ duu kwa Jesus ɔnaangnɛ.
42013018	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Mung Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ile nang? Mung nle nlɔɔmyɛ la bɔng?
42013019	Ile tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɛfɔɔk a lɛgɔm ya ɔlɔɔt ɔkɔɔnnɛ ka bɔtɔɔm ammɛ. Ɛfɔɔk a lɛgɔm ’yɔng baang emeet ɛmmala ɛzzanga lɛsan a kɛssɛ za lɛbaang, bunɔɔn buffu bulɔɔk lakɔt ka bɛbɔɔk assɛ.”
42013020	Jesus ɔbbal lɛbap ɔttɛ, “Mung Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm nle nlɔɔmyɛ la ’bɔng?
42013021	Ile tɛ̀ttɛ̀ yeast wa bakɔɔmnɛ, banaang ugɔngɔ a brɛɛd utum.”
42013022	Jesus ɔssɛ baang ukopolo balɔɔt ka laffɛ ka laffɛ, ɛtɔk ɛtɔk umii Jerusalem.
42013023	Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ɔbapmɛ lɔbap ɔttɛ, “Dedde mung Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule ɔkkala bwaan a balɔɔt ssup ɔɔ?”
42013024	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng! Abumyɔng la lakke annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ amalyɔng ka lɛmma a ggwoon za ppyep: balɔɔt ggbadam vvenɛ babum kɛmal ɔzzànga lɛttɔ baala batɔk.
42013025	“Uyini a ggwoon vvenɛ ufeele ɔfɛɛn lɛmma ggwoon. Affunɛ abeeyɔng ka vveeng attɛyɔng ‘Dedde awongoloyɛlɛ lɛmma ggwoon,’ vvenɛ ɔppyɛlɛwɔyɔng kamma ɔttɛ, ‘Ba nsan ɛfɛɛn a assinɛ affuyɔng.’
42013026	Vvenɛ appyɛlɛmɛyɔng kamma attɛyɔng, ‘Izzi, ivva la annyɔɔng, akopoloyɛlɛ ka ogyila ayyɔɔt.’
42013027	Vvenɛ ɔbbal lɛlɔɔk ɔttɛ, ‘Gɔɔ ba nsan ɛfɛɛn assinɛyɔng, agbata assekenɛyɔng; annyɔɔng baang banaang-a-bubbi balɔɔt.’
42013028	Vvenɛ akkwayɔng gaang gaang azziyɔng lasaal ka ɛkɛtɛ ya ale ayɛnyɔng Abraham la Isaac, la Jacob la bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka tɔkɔlɔ a ggwoon Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ussekewɔyɔng annyɔɔng akɔɔngyɔng ka vveeng.
42013029	Vvenɛ balɔɔt balɔk bassi ka lusso gwa livve-luwee lɔfɔm, balɔk bassi ka lusso gwa livve-luwee kulele, balɔk bassi kutɔɔk a lɔfɔɔn, balɔk bassi libat a lɔfɔɔn baffu bayanga kɛtaa ka ssala Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
42013030	Ka ussinɛ baang balɔɔt ba bakɔɔmnɛ ɛtɔk vvenɛ basseke isimi, balɔɔt ba bassekenɛ isimi vvenɛ bappyɛɛ bakɔɔm ɛtɔk.”
42013031	Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang nnyɔn, balɔɔt a Pharisees baffu ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus battɛ, “Agbata mung amii ɛfɛɛn ɛlɔk, Herod ɔggyanwɔ kɛwwɔɔl.”
42013032	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Amii abwɔɔlɔyɔng ugɛbɛ ’wɔng baang attɛyɔng: ‘Nle ka kɛggba ipiliza nttula balɔɔt mmwɔɔn la lufat ɔgbaa. Ɔffɔnɛ bɛtɔm bɛkkyaat nvve kɛnaang anaam.’
42013033	Ɔzzànga vvenɛ nfeele kɔssɛ mmwɔɔn la lufat la ussoonɛ. Ba kɔkkɔnɔ ka bale bawwɔɔl uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɛfɛɛn ɛlɔk ɔgbaa la Jerusalem.
42013034	“Oo Jerusalem, Jerusalem! Annɔ awwɔɔlnɛ bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, atɔɔp balɔɔt ba balɔɔknɛ kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔɔmnɛ ufeewɔ lattaal. Nbumbong nttɛ nkkwɔɔ balɔɔt annɔ nssɛɛn ka kkwɔɔt ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bikɔkɔ biwupnɛ bwɔɔn appyɛ, ɔzzànga ba ayilanɛ.
42013035	“Vvenɛ abbɛ ssala annɔ la Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm akɔngɔ lisseke ubbu a ssala. Nbwɔɔlɔwɔ nttɛ nɛ ba abɛlɛ lɛyɛn ɔddɔddɔkɔ ɔffɔ ɛkɛtɛ ya ale alɔɔk attɛ, ‘Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangmɛ ammɛ wa uffunɛ ka lɛkɔɔl Uyini Ppyɛɛ.’
42014001	Kɛtɔm ssɔn, ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ, Jesus umii uzzi kazzi ka ssala uzzilɛttɔ balɔɔt a Pharisees. Balɔɔt badɔkɔ baang ka babeenɛ bappyɛɛkmɛ gbegbe.
42014002	Ɔlɔɔt wa bukkpɔ la labɔɔk bɛbɔkmɛnɛ uffu ukup Jesus.
42014003	Ɔzzánga Jesus ufeele ɔbap bakopolo-Lafɔɔ la balɔɔt a Pharisees ɔttɛ, “Mung Lafɔɔ ayyɔɔt layila mung ittula ittula ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ, faa ba layila?”
42014004	Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang lɛmmwɔɔl basi lɛzza. Jesus ɔsam ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang uttula ɔttɛ ufula.
42014005	Jesus ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng baang, ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyanganɛ waan, ɔlɔk lɛkɔmɔlɔ limii lɛttɔ ka tɔkɔlɔ lubbe-bannyi ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ, baala ɔsangabwɛ ka ulenɛ Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ?”
42014006	Basi likkwoong bappyɛlɛ kamma kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng mung.
42014007	Jesus ɔsannɛ ɔttɛ bakekeen bale baang ka basanganɛ bɛtaa bya bɛttanɛ lɛyyɛɛp, ɔssabɛ ifɛɛt ’yɔng ɔttɛ,
42014008	“Ɔlɔɔt ɔbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛ libbeel, amiinɛ, tɛ̀ttɛ́ akɔɔm ɛtɔk ataa ka kɛtaa sa doddo. Ɔkkyamnɛ kɛtaa ’sɔng baang Uyini libbeel uloko ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk wa uggbengenɛ ɔttawɔ.
42014009	Ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang, vvenɛ ɔkɔɔm-a-libbeel uffu ufeelewɔ ɔttɛ, ‘Afeele asseke ɔlɔɔt wa uggbengenɛ ɔttawɔ.’ Vvenɛ izzit inaangwɔ la bannyɔɔng ka ale asseke ka ataanɛ ka likkpɔ-igolo.
42014010	Lutini ’gwɔng kɔyyɛɛp ka attenɛ ka likkpɔ-ogolo lɛtaa, ɔkkɔɔnɛ ɔkɔɔm-a-libbeel uffunɛ ɔyɔɔwɔ kɛtaa sa doddo. Ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang vvenɛ ayanga latele ka lusso bannyɔɔng.
42014011	Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ wa uttinanɛ ɔttɛ ammɛ uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt, vvenɛ usikili usook. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa uyilanɛ busook, vvenɛ ɔzzánga uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt.”
42014012	Jesus ɔlɔɔk la uyini a ssala ɔttɛ, “Ɛkɛtɛ ya annyinɛ balɔɔt kazzi, tɛ̀ttɛ́ abwɔɔlɔ inngwa annɔ, gɔɔ bakpana annɔ gɔɔ itele annɔ, gɔɔ bakulufal annɔ ba ɔyyɛɛpnɛbɛ. Akkwɔɔnɛbɛ, vvenɛ bassɛ bakkwɔɔwɔ kazzi ka ssala sa abbɛ. Azzinɛ kazzi ’kwɔng baang kwa bakkwɔɔwɔnɛ ɔtaabong tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balewɔnɛ kazzi annɔ lɛtak.
42014013	Alenɛ ka annyinɛ balɔɔt kazzi, akkwɔɔ balɔɔt ba ɔbbɔlnɛbɛ, la balɔɔt ba labɔɔk labbenɛbɛ, la bannɔk-a-kikkwu, la bassi-ifim.
42014014	Vvenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangwɔ ppyɛɛ, ka balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bale basi likkwoong batakwɔ kazzi ’kwɔng baang. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ukipiliwɔ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya balɔɔt ba doddo bale bafungala ka lubbe.”
42014015	Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn wa ɔdɔkɔnɛ baang ka okkpokolo ka ɔtaanɛ, uppyeenɛ ning baang ɔlɔɔk la Jesus ɔttɛ, “Balɔɔt ba bale bataa ka okkpoloko ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ baggele gaang gaang.”
42014016	Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ɔdɔkɔ baang wa ɔnaangnɛ kazzi kwa lɛbaang, unnyi balɔɔt ggbadam ba ɔbwɔɔlɔnɛbɛ bikekeen.
42014017	Ɛkɛtɛ kazzi ’kwɔng baang ɛffɔnɛ, ɔtɔɔm bɔɔyi ammɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Amii, abumala bakekeen ba nbwɔɔlɔnɛbɛ attɛ, ‘Affuyɔng, bavvebong bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ lɛbama.’
42014018	Ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn ubee kɛbwɔɔlɔ bwa bunaangmɛnɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ ule ka usinɛ limii. Ɔkɔɔm ɛtɔk ɔbwɔɔlɔ bɔɔyi ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, ‘Nlɛɛpbong ɛkpansi nle ka nmiinɛ nkooloyɛ, mkpee tɛ̀ttɛ́ kutunwɔ.’
42014019	Ɔlɔɔt wa vvɔn ɔbbal lɛttɛ, ‘Nlɛɛpbong igɔdɔ zzɔɔp, mung nle ka nmiinɛ nttuluyɛ, amii abwɔɔlɔmɛ mkkpee tɛ̀ttɛ́ kutunmɛ.’
42014020	Ɔlɔɔt wakang ɔbbal lɛttɛ, ‘Nssuma wanavva lɛtɔk, ntii ka ggwoon a libbeel, akkwɛ kɔnaangnɛ vvenɛ nsi liffu.’
42014021	Bɔɔyi ’wɔng baang ufula umii ɔbwɔɔlɔ abassɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ inngwa ammɛ balɔɔknɛ. Ɔzzánga uyini a ssala kutunmɛ, ɔbbal lɛlɔɔk la bɔɔyi ammɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Amii ka tɔkɔlɔ a ssala like-like, akkwɔɔ balɔɔt ba ɔbbɔlnɛbɛ, la babbe-labɔɔk, la bassi-ifim, la bannɔk-a-kikkwu.’
42014022	Bɔɔyi ’wɔng baang umii. ɔppyɛlɛ uffu ɔbwɔɔlɔ abassɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Bɔtɔɔm annɔ atɔɔmnɛnɛ nbwɔɔlɔbongbɛ tɛ, Dedde. Baffubong ggbadam biini, ɔzzànga kufuk kutii baang.’
42014023	Uyini a ssala ɔlɔɔk la bɔɔyi ammɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Amii itɔk itɔk abwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ baffu nkwaaning ggwoon anaam luyipi.
42014024	Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng ka lɔkkwɔɔn nttɛ balɔɔt ba nkɔɔmnɛ ɛtɔk nkkwɔɔbɛ kazzi, basi liffu, ɔlɔɔt wa ule uzzi kazzi anaam ba ɔbɛlɛ lile!’ ”
42014025	Uleng a kɛkaan a balɔɔt badɔkɔ baang ka bakupnɛ Jesus. Ɔzzánga Jesus usikili ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ɔttɛ,
42014026	“Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔggyannɛ ɔttɛ ɔzzanga ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ anaam baala ukkwoong usinɛ abassɛ la abakka lisumala, usi wanavva ammɛ la bwɔɔn ammɛ lisumala, usi itele ammɛ la ammɛ biini lisumala.
42014027	Ɔlɔɔt wa usinɛ Cross ammɛ lɛsam ukupnɛ ba ukkwoong ɔzzanga ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ anaam.
42014028	Ɔlɔɔt ulenɛ ka ule ka ɔbɔɔknɛ ɛnyɔng, ɔtaa-ɔtaa uttina tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ikkobo ile ittamɛ, usseke ɔsan ulenɛ ka ikkobo ile iffɔmɛ.
42014029	Usinɛ ning lile uttenɛ lutte ɛnyɔng ’yɔng baang baala ukkwoong uvve, ɛkɔɔng lɛffɛ. Balɔɔt ba basaknɛ ka ɛtɔk vvenɛ bakpɛnmɛ
42014030	battɛ, ‘Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng uttebong kɛbɔɔk a ggwoon, usigwɛ likkwoong uvve!’
42014031	Ubeet ufeelenɛ la lɔlɔp la innɔ balɔɔt kubbwɔɔk umii kullu la ubeet ɔlɔk, Ubeet ’wɔng bakang ɔkɔɔmnɛ lalɔp laffa la innɔ balɔɔt zzɔɔp, vvenɛ ɔtaabong uttina ɔsan ɔttɛ isɔdya ammɛ ikkaamɔkkaam, tɛ́ttɛ́ ulenɛ kullu umii.
42014032	Ɔsannɛ ɔttɛ ba uzzeme, vvenɛ ɔssang balɔɔt bamii bakkpenge ubeet ’wɔng bakang baggyan bɔkaat ka ɛkɛtɛ ɛtakanɛ lɛffɔ.”
42014033	Jesus utele lɛttɔ ka lɛkkɔ ’zɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng baang ɔlɔɔt wa ukkwoongnɛ ɔzzanga ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ anaam ba ule, usinɛ kwa bɛfɛɛn ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ bya ɔyanganɛ lisumala.”
42014034	“Bunɔk buyyɛɛp lɔyyɛɛp, ɔzzànga businɛ gɛnɛgɛnɛ lɛbɛlɛ liggwoom, ba abɛlɛ likkwoong anaangbwɛ buzzanga bunɔk.
42014035	Gɔɔ ba bubɛlɛ lɛyyɛɛp kɛnɔk ka lusse bɔtɔɔm, gɔɔ kɛnɔk ka kusuma. Busseke bwa kɛsam kɛzzɔɔk gbɔɔ.” Ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Agɔpɔlɔyɔng, ayanganɛyɔng latɔɔk.”
42015001	Ɛkɛtɛ nnyɔn ɛdɔkɔ baang ya batɔk-innamba la balɔɔt ba bafɛɛlɛnɛbɛ ssala baffunɛ bagɔpɔlɔ lɛmmwɔɔl a Jesus.
42015002	Balɔɔt a Pharisees la bakopolo-Lafɔɔ bazzɔ battɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng ɔtɔk balɔɔt ba bafɛɛlɛnɛbɛ ssala la batɔk-innamba ɔssɛɛn ka kkwɔɔt, uzzi kazzi ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn la abbɛ ffet.”
42015003	Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔssabɛ ifɛɛt ɔttɛ,
42015004	“Ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn ɔlɔɔt ɔyanganɛ lalɔp itɔɔn kubbwɔɔk, nnyɔn ɛfakalanɛ ɛtaak, ule ɔnaang nang? Vvenɛ ɔgbata ɔkɔngɔ lalɔp itɔɔn lanna la itɔɔn ɔsɛlɛ-lɔlɔp ka kazzi, umii ɔggyan ya ɛtaaknɛ ɔddɔkɔddɔkɔ ɔyɛnyɛ.
42015005	Ukoponɛyɛ ɔkaa, vvenɛ uggele gaang gaang, ɔsamyɛ la bɔwaa, utele ka lukat.
42015006	Ɔtɔkɔyɛ ufula. Ɔffɔnɛ ka ssala ɔkkwɔɔ inngwa ammɛ la bakulufal ammɛ uloko ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Attelenɛyɔng nggele oo! Nyɛnbong ɛtɔɔn anaam ya ɛtaaknɛ.’
42015007	Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng, kule kɛssanga ssɔn, laggele za lalenɛ ka libat, ka ɔnaang-a-bubbi vvɔn ɔnaangnɛ busannɛ ka bubbi ammɛ, latta laggele za kwa lalɔp a balɔɔt lanna la balɔɔt ɔsɛlɛ-lɔlɔp ba doddo.
42015008	“Ɔlɔk wanavva wa ɔyanganɛ isiling zzɔɔp, ulenɛ ka siling vvɔn ɔttanɛ ɔttɔ ɔtaak, attina attɛ, ule ɔnaang nang? Vvenɛ uyenge luggo ɔkkyaang kɛsana ggwoon ammɛ, ɔggyan ukkpit ning ning ɔttɔngmɛ.
42015009	Ɔttɔngnɛ, ɔkkwɔɔ inngwa ammɛ la bakulufal ammɛ, ubbi ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn ɔttɛ battelemɛ uggele, ka ulenɛ siling ammɛ lɛttɔng. Nbbalwɔyɔng lɛbwɔɔlɔ nttɛ
42015010	bayilabɔtɔɔm bassɛ baggele ning baang ka bayɛnnɛ ɔnaang-a-bubbi ka ɔnaangnɛ busannɛ ka bubbi bwa ɔnaangnɛ.”
42015011	Jesus ɔbbal lɛlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ɔdɔkɔ baang wa ɔfɔɔnnɛ bwɔɔn baffa.
42015012	Usseke-isimi ɔlɔɔk la abassɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Dedde, annyinɛ kazzi kullu kwa anaam!’ Ɔzzánga ɔsam bɛfɛɛn ammɛ bya ɔyanganɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔbɛngɛlɛ bwaan ammɛ ’bɔng baang baffa.
42015013	Bwaan a bɛtɔm ssup bɛsaknɛ usseke isimi a waan ammɛ ’wɔng baang, ɔttɔng etini kazzi kullu ya ammɛ, ɔtaan; ɔgbata umii ikaan la ikkpoko. Umiinɛ ka ikaan ya fulufulu, ɔsam ikkpoko ammɛ uzzi uvve.
42015014	Bɔfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bwa ɔyanganɛ uzzibong uvve. Uvvenɛ bɛfɛɛn ammɛ lizzi, buwɔɔng buttɔ ka lɔkaan ’gwɔng baang. Bulɔk bwa ɔbbalnɛ lɛyanga gbɔɔ ba bule.
42015015	Ɔzzánga ɔgbata umii ɔtaa la ɔlɔɔt a lɔkaan ’gwɔng baang. Ɔlɔɔt a lɔkaan ’gwɔng baang ɔsangamɛ ɔttɛ umii ɔppyɛɛk ikkumma ka bɔtɔɔm.
42015016	Umiinɛ, ɔkkɔlɔ kazzi kwa ikkumma izzinɛ. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔwɔkɔmɛnɛ gbɔɔ ba ule.
42015017	Ka lakuma ɔnaangmɛ ggbool, ɔttɛ, ‘Balɔɔt a kɛnaang a dedde ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ bazzi kazzi bakɔɔm batutulu, mung anaam nle ka nbbenɛ buwɔɔng.
42015018	Vvenɛ nfeele nmii ka ɛfɛɛn a dedde, nbwɔɔlɔmɛ nttɛ, “Dedde nnaangbong bubbi ntum Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la annɔ.
42015019	Anaam ba nbɛlɛ lɛkkɔnɔ kɛkkwɔɔnɛ waan annɔ. Appyɛɛ akɔɔmnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ akɔɔmnɛ illeebila annɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ.” ’
42015020	Ɔzzánga ufeele kɔssɛ kimii ka ɛfɛɛn abassɛ. “Utii ka utumanɛ fulufulu bakang, abassɛ ɔyɛnmɛ, bibbemɛ lɛttɔ, ɔmma umii, ugbugbamɛ.
42015021	Waan ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, ‘Dedde nnaangbong bubbi ntum Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la annɔ. Ba nbɛlɛ lɛkkɔnɔ kɛkkwɔɔnɛ waan annɔ.’
42015022	Ɔzzánga abassɛ ɔkkwɔɔ ibɔɔyi ammɛ, ɔttɛ, ‘Azzuma asamyɔng ewuulu ya ɛttanɛ lɛyyɛɛp, affu awɔkɔlɔmɛyɔng. Assɛɛnmɛyɔng waan-ella ka kɛnnɔ. Assɛɛnmɛyɔng ikkpa-bukkpɔ.
42015023	Usseke amii akaayɔng ufala ɔgɔdɔ wa ɔkkaamnɛ kappya, affu awwɔɔlyɔng, banaang kazzi kwa lɛbaang.
42015024	Waan anaam ’wɔng mung wa ɔdɔkɔnɛ ule libbe, gedegede nyɛnmɛbong ka kuddu. Ɔdɔkɔbong ɔtaak kkpal, mung idunamɛbong!’ Ɔzzánga batte kɛnaang a kazzi kwa lɛbaang eseese.
42015025	“Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang waan ammɛ wa ɔgɛlɛnya ule ka bɔtɔɔm. Usi lɛmmɛ waan ammɛ wa ɔgɛlɛnya ’wɔng baang ɔppyɛlɛ. Ɔppyɛlɛnɛ, uffu ɔffɔ kɛtɛkɛtɛ a ssala, uppyee ibin ka bakkpanɛ basoom batɔm.
42015026	Ɔkkwɔɔ bɔɔyi-abassɛ vvɔn ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Bakang bale ka ’bɔng?’
42015027	Ɔzzánga bɔɔyi ’wɔng baang ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Etele annɔ ɔppyɛlɛnɛ, kwakkwɛ ssaawɔ ɔwwɔɔlmɛnɛ ufala ɔgɔdɔ wa ɔkkaamnɛ kappya.’
42015028	Waan ’wɔng baang wa ɔgɛlɛnya kutunmɛ ssassa, gɔɔ kimii ka ssala kisimɛ lɛbɛlɛ lɛsaap. Ɔzzánga abassɛ umii ukkpengemɛ uffu ka ssala.
42015029	Ɔkɔɔm-ɛtɔk a waan ’wɔng baang ɔppyɛlɛ abassɛ kamma ɔttɛ, ‘Ka ussinɛ ka kukkpa kwa abɛngɛlɛnɛyɛlɛ bɛfɛɛn ɔffɔ ka mmwɔɔm, nle baang kkwɔk ka nnaangwɔnɛ kɛnaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ubili. Kɛtɔm ssɔn gbɔɔ lɛmmwɔɔl annɔ ba ntaka nkangala, ɔdɔkɔ alenɛ bɔng linnyi? Gɔɔ ɛbal mung gbɔɔ nɛ ba ataka annyi, nnaang kazzi, izzi la inngwa anaam.
42015030	Mung waan annɔ ɔtaanbong bɛfɛɛn annɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ; uzzi uvve la ikkpàlà; ɔppyɛlɛ, annɔ asam ɔgɔdɔ wa ɔkkaamnɛ kappya awwɔɔlmɛ.’
42015031	Abassɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Waan anaam, ale mung ka ssala anaam, bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya nyanganɛ bya annɔ.
42015032	Kɔyyɛɛp ka inaangnɛ kazzi iggele ka etele annɔ ɔdɔkɔnɛ ule libbe, mung ippyɛlɛ iyɛnmɛ ka kuddu; ɔdɔkɔbong ɔtaak, ɔzzànga mung idunamɛbong.’ ”
42016001	Jesus ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt ɔdɔkɔ baang wa ɔyanganɛ akkala wa kɔbɔɔk a kɔbɔɔk ammɛ. Ɔzzánga babwɔɔlɔmɛ battɛ akkala ’wɔng baang ɔbɛpɛbong ikkpoko ammɛ ka itɔk ya isinɛ lɛyyɛɛp.
42016002	Uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔkkwɔɔ akkala ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, ‘Kɔlɔɔk kwa nppyeenɛ ntumwɔ bɛɛ? Asam bɛfɛɛn bya alenɛnɛ la lɛkɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ, annyinɛ. Ba nbɛlɛwɔ lɛggyan ka bukkala.’
42016003	Akkala ’wɔng baang ɔlɔɔk kɛyɔɔng ɔttɛ, ‘Dedde ɔggyannɛ kɛsanga ka kɛnaang anaam, nle nnaang nang? Anaam kaang lakke ba bayanga wa nle ntɔɔk ibbe. Lubbwoom ba nkkwoong ka izzit ile inaangnɛ.
42016004	Kɔlɔɔk ba kule. Nttanɛ ka kɛnaang ’sɔng, vvenɛ nyanga inngwa ya bale batɔknɛ ka bukekeen ka ssala abbɛ.’
42016005	Ɔzzánga ɔkkwɔɔ balɔɔt ba balemɛnɛ la ippwoot. Ɔbap ɔkɔɔm ɛtɔk ɔttɛ, ‘Annɔ dedde adɔkɔnɛ la ippwoot nang?’
42016006	Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng ɔttɛ, ‘Lalɔp ikyamkyam a bannɛ kubbwɔɔk’ Akkala ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, ‘Uwɔng ulenɛ lɛkɔɔm annɔ; ataa-ɔtaa akkpɔk lalɔp ikyamkyam laffa la ikyamkyam zzɔɔp.’
42016007	Ɔbbal la ɔlɔɔt wa vvɔn lɛlɔɔk ɔttɛ, ‘Annɔ bɛɛ? Ale dedde la ippwoot nang?’ Ammɛ ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, ‘Ulenɛ lalɔp issɔ ilaasi kubbwɔɔk.’ Akkala ’wɔng baang ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Uwɔng ulenɛ lɛkɔɔm annɔ. Ataa-ɔtaa akkpɔk lalɔp issɔ lanna.’
42016008	Abassɛ ɔbbyap akkala ’wɔng baang ubungu akkala ammɛ ka eleme ya ɔnaangnɛ ukuma, ka balɔɔt a vveeng ’wɔng mung banaangnɛ lagban ka kɛnaang abbɛ batta balɔɔt ba balenɛ ka buppwolo.”
42016009	Jesus ɔbbal lɛlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Ɔzzànga mung nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng! Anaangyɔng ɛnngwa la iyyɛɛp a vveeng nkwaaning, isaalnɛ batɔkwɔyɔng ka doddo ka ssala sa kɛfal a kɛfal.
42016010	Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔyyɛɛpnɛ ka lilɔɔk sa ssup, ule ɔssɛ ɔyyɛɛp ning baang ka lilɔɔk sa lɛbaang. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔsɛlɛnɛ latele ka lilɔɔk sa ssup ule ɔssɛ ɔsɛlɛ latele ning baang ka lilɔɔk sa lɛbaang.
42016011	Asinɛ lɛyyɛɛp wa kɛkɔɔm a iyyɛɛp ɛkpansi, ale anaang nang akkɔnɔ wa kɛkɔɔm iyyɛɛp ya lɔkkwɔɔn?
42016012	Asinɛ likkwoong akɔɔm bɔfɛɛn ɔlɔɔt, ɔlɔɔt ule ɔnaang nang unnyiwɔ bwa bulenɛ bwa annɔ?
42016013	“Bɔɔyi vvɔn ba ukkwoong ɔzzanga ubili ibassɛ ammɛ iffa. Ɔyanganɛ ibassɛ iffa vvenɛ vvɔn utunmɛ wakang ɔttamɛ lɛsaap. Vvenɛ utele ɔlɔɔt vvɔn usseke wa vvɔn. Ba akkwoong atele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la ikkpoko ɛkɛtɛ nnyɔn.”
42016014	Balɔɔt a Pharisees bappyeenɛ ’kwɔng, banɔk Jesus ka balenɛ balɔɔt ba ikkpoko isaapnɛbɛ.
42016015	Jesus ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Annyɔɔng alenɛyɔng balɔɔt ba anaangwɔnɛyɔng kitook kɛyɔɔng, ɔlɔɔt ɔppyɛɛkwɔyɔng, akkɔnɔyɔng ka lusso balɔɔt. Ɔzzànga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanwɔyɔng ippyam lɔsan. Bɔfɛɛn bwa ɔlɔɔt uttinanɛ ɔttɛ bule ka kukkam gaang, bule bwa gbɔɔ ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
42016016	“Lafɔɔ-a-Moses la likkpɔk a Bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bittumu ning ning bɛffɔ ka ɛkɛtɛ John, Ɔnaang-a-Baptizim. Bassi ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang babwɔɔlɔ Kuttu-budoddo Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔt ututala kɛmal ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
42016017	Ɔzzànga kule kkpɛkɛlɛm ka libat la ɛkpansi bɛkkyaapnɛ, lutini kɛkkyaa waan a Lifɔɔ zzɔn gbɔɔ za utiti kɛzzɔɔk.
42016018	“Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔggbanɛ wanavva ammɛ ɔfɔngɔ kang, ɔtɔk ɔlɔk; ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔbɛpɛbong lafɔɔ kimini la wanavva ɔlɔk. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtɔknɛ wanavva wa ulam ɔggbamɛnɛ, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔbɛpɛbong lafɔɔ kimini la wanavva ɔlɔk.”
42016019	“Uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ɔdɔkɔ baang wa ɔwɔkɔlɔnɛ iwɔkɔlɔ ya ikkaamnɛ kappya gaang. Ɔnaang kitook lutini livve la zzɔn.
42016020	Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔdɔkɔ baang ɔgbaa wa ɔzzanganɛ Lazarus wa lassɔp lannaangmɛnɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ a kkwɔɔt. Ɔtaa baang ka lɛmma ggwoon a uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang,
42016021	ɔttɛ ɔlɔk ɔttɔng waan ezuku kazzi wa ɔffaatnɛ ɔttɔ ka lisse uzzi. Ɛkɛtɛ ɛlɔk ibbwa iffu immalmɛ lassɔp.
42016022	Ukee-waan, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ubbe. Ubbenɛ, bayilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm baffu basammɛ bamii ka ɛfɛɛn a Abraham ka kɛtɔm sa balenɛ ka kɛnaang a kazzi kwa lɛbaang ka libat. Uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔssɛ ubbe, ballimɛ.
42016023	Ɔdɔkɔ usseke ka akama wa lɛbaang ka Hades. Uyeek ɔppyɛɛk ka libat ɔyɛn Abraham fulufulu la Lazarus ka lufoom ammɛ.
42016024	Ɔzzánga ɔkkwɔɔ ɔgaga ɔttɛ, ‘Dedde, Abraham, nbbewɔ lɛttɔ, atɔɔm Lazarus ɔyan kɛnnɔ ka bannyi, ɔppwanɛ lɛlaak, nle ka akama wa usinɛ lɛyyɛɛp ka tɔkɔlɔ lɔkɔɔn ’gwɔng.’
42016025	Abraham ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, ‘Akke oo! Waan anaam, ka ɛkɛtɛ ya atiinɛ ka kuddu, bɛfɛɛn bya doddo ɔkkpɛlɛ annɔ ayanganɛ, Lazarus bulɔk bwa doddo usi lɛyanga. Gedegede mung utii ka vveeng wa doddo, annɔ baang asseke ka akama.
42016026	Gɔɔ nkwɔng baang keem lissi, ogge wa ɔddɔngɔnɛ uleyɛlɛ ka bɛzzɔkɔ, nkwaaning ɔlɔɔt wa uttinanɛ ɔttɛ ussi kaang ning ukum uffu bakang, baala ukkwoong. Gɔɔ ka ussinɛ ka ɛfɛɛn annɔ abeenɛ baang, ɔlɔɔt ba ukkwoong ussi bakang uffu kaang ning.’
42016027	Uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang, ɔttɛ, ‘Ɔɔ. Dedde, kɔyyɛɛp mung nkkpengewɔ nttɛ atɔɔm Lazarus ka ssala dedde anaam,
42016028	ka ɛfɛɛn a nyanganɛ itele kubbwɔɔk, umii ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ, nkwaaning abbabbɛ keem bafɔngɔ kiffu ka akama wa lɛbaang ’wɔng mung.’
42016029	Abraham ɔttɛ, ‘Itele annɔ bale bakang la Moses la bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, vvenɛ bakopolobɛ. Afɔngɔ itele annɔ bagɔpɔlɔ bappyee kwa bale balɔɔk bannyibɛ.’
42016030	Uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, ‘Nkwɔng baang kɛyɔɔng ba kuffi, Dedde Abraham!, bulenɛ ka ubbu ufungalanɛ ka lubbe, umii ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ nzang vvenɛ bakkyaa kɛnaang a bubbi bafɔngɔ.’
42016031	Abraham ɔttɛ, ‘Basinɛ kwa Moses la bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm liyila, kɛfal abbɛ baala bafoolo mkkpa ɔlɔɔt ufungala ka lubbe umii ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ.’ ”
42017001	Jesus ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Lilɔɔk sa linaangnɛ balɔɔt battɔ ka bubbi ule lilɔɔk sa linaangnɛ kpɛtkpɛt. Akama ule wa ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔdɛmnɛ lilɔɔk ’sɔng baang linaang.
42017002	Kɔtta lɛyyɛɛp ka asamnɛ okkili asiki ka kukkook kwa lɛbaang a lɛbaang, asam asikimɛ ka lukat atutmɛ assɛɛn ka lihu, ɔtaa bakang ɔvva bannyi ubbe, lutini gwa ule ɔnaang bwaan a balɔɔt ’bɔng mung battɔ ka bubbi.
42017003	Akatwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng! “Etele annɔ ɔnaangnɛ bubbi attamamɛ, ukkpengewɔnɛ, asɔɔkmɛ.
42017004	Ɔnaangnɛ bubbi bikongo bɛnnambɛkkyaat utumwɔ annɔ ka livve zzɔn lutini kikkpkit la ssɔn uffu ɔbwɔɔlɔwɔ ɔttɛ, ‘Mkkpee atɔk asɔɔknɛ,’ asɔɔkmɛ.”
42017005	Bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus balɔɔk la ammɛ battɛ, “Anaang kiyila ayyɔɔt kɛkkaam kɛgbaa.”
42017006	Uyini ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Bulenɛ ka ayanganɛyɔng kiyila kiggbenge kɛffɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɛfɔɔk-ɛsasa, nzang akkwoong mung alɔɔkyɔng la lɛsan a kɛssɛ za lɛbaang attɛyɔng, ‘Allɔpwɔ kɛyɔɔng la bɛbɔɔk, amii akɔɔnwɔ kɛyɔɔng ka lihu.’ Vvenɛ kitelewɔ, kimukasɛ kɛyɔɔng kimii.”
42017007	“Ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ka bɛzzɔkɔ annyɔɔng baang ɔyanganɛ bɔɔyi wa uwoopnɛ iwopowopo, ɔlɔk ɔkat itɔɔn, ussinɛ bakang ka bɔtɔɔm ɔppyɛlɛ, vvenɛ alɔɔkmɛ attɛ, ‘Azzuma like-like amii azzi kazzi annɔ’ ɔɔ?
42017008	Ning baang baala alɔɔk. Lutini ’gwɔng ule ɔlɔɔkmɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Awɔkɔlɔ iwɔkɔlɔ annɔ annyinɛ kazzi, akatnɛ. Nzzibong nvva tɛ́ttɛ́ assɛ azzi kwa annɔ.’
42017009	Bɔɔyi, ɔlɔɔt nzzɔɔn mɛ ba ɔnaang ka uppyeenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl abassɛ. Faa nang?
42017010	Kule kukku kkwɔn la annyɔɔng. Alenɛyɔng kwa babwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng lɛnaang avveyɔng, attɛyɔng, ‘Ayyɔɔt kɔttɛ ibɔɔyi, ivvebong kɛnaang ayyɔɔt.’ ”
42017011	Ka Jesus ɔdɔkɔnɛ ka ɛtɔk a kimii a Jerusalem, ɔdɔkɔ ɔssɛ ka bɛzzɔkɔ a Samaria la Galilee.
42017012	Ɔdɔkɔ ka kimii ka lɛffɛ lɛlɔk baang, ɔzzánga ududa balɔɔt ɔffaal zzɔɔp. Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bakɔɔng bakang ka lusso babee.
42017013	Babungu battɛ, “Jesus, Dedde ayyɔɔt, ibbewɔ lɛttɔ.”
42017014	Jesus ɔyɛnnɛbɛ, ɔttɛ, “Amii akupyɔng bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm bappyɛɛkwɔyɔng.” Bafeele battɛ bamii, ɔppwabɛ ka ɛtɔk.
42017015	Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ɔyɛnnɛ ɔsan ɔttɛ ɔppwamɛbong, ɔppyɛlɛ isimisimi umii ubungu Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang ɔgaga.
42017016	Ɔttɔ, ukun Jesus laddu ka lataak; ɔzɔnɔmɛ kɛnaang. Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔdɔkɔ wa Samaria.
42017017	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Badɔkɔ balɔɔt zzɔɔp ka nttulanɛbɛ, ɔppwabɛ. Balɔɔt ba ɔsɛlɛzzɔɔp bale?
42017018	Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba bakkwoong baffu bazɔnɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang ɔɔ?”
42017019	Ɔlɔɔk la ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Afeele, afula; kiyila annɔ kɛnaangwɔbong ɔppwawɔ.”
42017020	Balɔɔt a Pharisees balɔk babap Jesus ɛkɛtɛ ya Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ile iffu. Ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm baala iffu ɔlɔɔt ɔyɛnyɛ kkpelegedee.
42017021	Ɔlɔɔt wa ule ɔttɛ, ‘Yɛnyɛ mung’; ɔlɔk ɔttɛ, ‘Yɛnyɛ kang’ ba ule. Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ile ka lɔtan.”
42017022	Ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɛkɛtɛ vvenɛ ɛffɔ ya ale àkkɔ́lɔ attɛ ayɛnyɔng bɛtɔm a Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔzzànga ’yɔng byɛ baala ayɛnyɔng.
42017023	Balɔɔt balɔk bale baang ba bale balɔɔkwɔyɔng battɛ, ‘Ppyɛɛk kang’, ɔlɔk ‘Ppyɛɛk mung’. Ɔzzànga tɛ̀ttɛ́ atta amii appyɛɛkyɔng.
42017024	Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ule ule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ immwalang ya ɔttanɛ ɔfaka libat ka ussinɛ ka lɛttɔ za zzɔn umii ɔffɔ ka za zzɔn ka kɛtɔm ammɛ.
42017025	Ɔzzànga ka kɛkɔɔm ɛtɔk, vvenɛ ɔyɛn akama; balɔɔt ba bɛtɔm ’byɔng vvenɛ bafimmɛ.
42017026	Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɔdɔkɔnɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ a Noah, kule kule ning baang ka bɛtɔm a Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ.
42017027	Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ badɔkɔ ka lizzi, bavva litak, bwaanbwalam batɔk bwanavva, bwaanabwanavva ballu bwaanabwalam tɔttɔ ɔffɔ kɛtɔm sa Noah ɔmalnɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ akkpaat, ɛlɔlɔ etuma ɛwwɔɔlbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
42017028	Kule kule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɔdɔkɔnɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ Lot. Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ bale gbɔɔ ka bazzinɛ lizzi, bavva litak, bataan lɛtaan, balɛɛp lɛlɛɛp, bawoop iwopowopo, babɔɔk ssoon.
42017029	Ka kɛtɔm sa Lot ɔbbɛnɛ ka Sodom, lɔkɔɔn la ittoodele bissi ka libat bitteep, bɛllɔt ka lisse, bɛwwɔɔlbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
42017030	Kule kule ning baang ka kɛtɔm sa Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ule ɔyɔɔ bwa ulenɛ.
42017031	“Ɔlɔɔt wa ulenɛ ka libat a ggwoon ammɛ, ba ɔbɛlɛ lisini umii ɔllak bɛfɛɛn ammɛ. Ɔlɔɔt wa ulenɛ ka bɔtɔɔm, ba ɔbɛlɛ lɛppyɛlɛ, umii ka ssala.
42017032	Akkeyɔng kwa wanavva Lot!
42017033	Ɔlɔɔt wa ubumnɛ ɔttɛ ɔkkala kuddu ammɛ biini, vvenɛ ɔtakakwɛ. Ɔlɔɔt wa uttinanɛ ɔttɛ ɔtaka kuddu ammɛ, ammɛ ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ule uddu.
42017034	Ka kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang, nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng, balɔɔt bale bale baffa ka bamininɛ ka igolo nnyɔn, vvenɛ basanga vvɔn bagbata usseke vvɔn.
42017035	Bwanavva baffa bale bale ka kikook a bɛfɛɛn, vvenɛ basam vvɔn bagbata usseke vvɔn.
42017036	[Balɔɔt baffa bale bale ka bɔtɔɔm, vvenɛ basam vvɔn bagbata usseke vvɔn.]”
42017037	Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ babapmɛ battɛ, “Uyini ka yang?” Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Ka ɛfɛɛn a ubbu bɔfɛɛn ubbenɛ, umini; idɛlɛ iggba lattɔ baang.”
42018001	Jesus ɔssabɛ ifɛɛt ’yɔng ɔttɛ ukopolobɛ ɔlɔk nkwaaning bassɛɛn luzɔɔm ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, basɛlɛ bbwɔp ka luppyam.
42018002	Ɔttɛ, “Ɔkaal-a-kɛkaal vvɔn ɔdɔkɔ baang ka lɛffɛ zzɔn, wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usimɛnɛ lɛbbwɔpɔ, usi balɔɔt litele.
42018003	Wanavva wa ulam ubbenɛ ɔkɔngɔmɛ ule baang ka lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang ka ullunɛ. Umii ka ssala ɔkaal-a-kɛkaal ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, uttelemɛ. Ukkpengemɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Akaal kɛkaal ayyɔɔt la ɔlɔɔt wa kɔlɔɔk kɔttɔnɛyɛlɛ, abee la anaam ellee.’
42018004	Ɛkɛtɛ ɛmmɛ, ɔkaal-a-kɛkaal usi lɛggyan ɔttɛ, uttelemɛ. Ɔtaa uttina ɔlɔɔk kɛyɔɔng ɔttɛ, ‘Mkkpa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm nsinɛ lɛbbwɔpɔ, nsi ɔlɔɔt litele,
42018005	lilɔɔk ’sɔng sa wanavva ’wɔng mung ɔbwɔɔlɔnɛnɛ mung, vvenɛ nssɛɛnmɛ kɔbɔɔk nnaang bwa ɔggyannɛ; nzang vvenɛ kiffu ammɛ kɛdɛmnɛ nsɛlɛ.’ ”
42018006	Ɔzzánga Uyini ɔttɛ, “Gɔpɔlɔyɔng kɔlɔɔk kwa ɔbbyap-a-ɔkaal-a-kɛkaal ’wɔng baang ɔlɔɔknɛ.
42018007	Mung attina attɛyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm baala ɔkaal kɛkaal, ubee la balɔɔt ammɛ ba bakkwanɛ kikoon la kɛtɔm, battɛ uttelebɛ ɔɔ? Vvenɛ kɔnaangmɛ bɔkɔɔt a kittelebɛ ɔɔ?
42018008	Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ, vvenɛ ɔkaal kɛkaal like like, ubee la abbɛ. Ɔzzànga attina attɛyɔng Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ ɔyɛn ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ggbɔɔ wa ɔyanganɛ kiyila ka ɛkɛtɛ ya ule uffu ɔɔ?”
42018009	Jesus ɔssabɛ ifɛɛt ’yɔng mung la balɔɔt ba battinanɛ battɛ abbɛ battanɛ budoddo lɛnaang, bafim kwa babbɛ.
42018010	Ɔttɛ, “Balɔɔt baffa bamii ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, bamii kɛzɔɔm kinnyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ɔdɔkɔ wa Pharisees, wa vvɔn ɔdɔkɔ ɔtɔk-innamba.
42018011	Ɔlɔɔt-a-Pharisees ufeele ubee ɔzɔɔm ɔttɛ, ‘Nwomowɔbong kɛnaang Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Anaam ɔsaap-a-bɔfɛɛn-ɔlɔɔt lissi, anaam ukup a bwanavva-balɔɔt lissi, ɔlɔɔt ba nsi litele tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt balɔk, ɔlɔk vvenɛ nbbɔl tɔkɔlɔ la ba ayyɔɔt. Nwomowɔ kɛnaang ka nsinɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔtɔk-innamba ’wɔng mung lile.
42018012	Ntaa buwɔɔng bɛtɔm bɛffa ka liwaazɛ. Nsam bɛfɛɛn anaam nbɛngɛlɛ lakup zzɔɔp, nsanga kukupa kkwɔn nnyiwɔ.’
42018013	Ɔtɔk-innamba ɔkɔɔng ka lɛmma-ggwoon a luzɔɔm ubee, gɔɔ lusso gbɔɔ ka libat usi liyeek ɔppyɛɛk, utup labɔɔk ka luppyam ɔttɛ, ‘Ellee Ebinukkpaapi, nbbewɔ lɛttɔ, anaam ɔnaang-a-bubbi.’
42018014	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng, ɔlɔɔt wa ukumanɛ mung ɔnaangnɛ kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyannɛ wa ikeeng lissi. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa uggbengemɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng vvenɛ usikili usook ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtɔkmɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng ka busook ule uggbenge ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
42018015	Balɔɔt bakɔɔm bwɔɔntiti bafee Jesus battɛ utelebɛ labɔɔk. Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus bayɛnnɛ ning baang baggba balɔɔt ’bɔng baang battɛ bafete bwɔɔntiti lɛkɔɔm bamii.
42018016	Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔkkwɔɔ bwɔɔntiti ’bɔng baang ɔssɛɛn ka kkwɔɔt ɔttɛ, “Afɔngɔyɔng bwɔɔntiti battɔnɛ ka kkwɔɔt; tɛ̀ttɛ́ aggbayɔngbɛ. Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ile ya balɔɔt tɛ̀ttɛ̀ abbɛ mung.
42018017	Akke attɛyɔng ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ wa usinɛ kɔlɔɔk Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛtɔk ɔssɛɛn ka luppyam tɛ̀ttɛ̀ waantiti utelenɛ zzeen ka abakka la abassɛ, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang baala ufula ka annyɛ.”
42018018	Uzzilɛttɔ balɔɔt a Jews vvɔn ɔbap Jesus ɔttɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo wa doddo, mung nnaang nang tɛ́ttɛ́ vvenɛ nyanga kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal?”
42018019	Jesus ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ, “Mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ akkwɔɔnɛ Ukopolo-lukopolo wa Doddo? Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyyɛɛpnɛ ba ule ɔgbaa la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
42018020	Kɔttɛ asan mung lafɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm: ‘Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akup wanavva ɔlɔɔt; tɛ̀ttɛ́ awwɔɔl ɔlɔɔt; tɛ̀ttɛ́ ayip ssip; tɛ̀ttɛ́ akkala lalaak; atele ssaawɔ la ssakawɔ.’ ”
42018021	Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Ka ussinɛ ka ntiinɛ ssup, nle baang ka nlokonɛ lafɔɔ ’zɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ.”
42018022	Jesus uppyeenɛ ning baang, ɔlɔɔk la ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Atii ka ale anaang bɔfɛɛn bbwɔn agbaa. Ataan bɛfɛɛn annɔ bya ayanganɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ; asam ikkpoko, annyi balɔɔt ba ɔbbɔlnɛbɛ. Vvenɛ anaang kibeet ka libat. Alenɛ livve, afeele akupnɛ.”
42018023	Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang uppyeenɛ ning baang, livve lɛbbɔlmɛ ka ulenɛ uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt.
42018024	Jesus ɔyɛnnɛ ning baang ka ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang livve lɛbbɔlmɛnɛ, ɔttɛ, “Kukoolo-ukoolo tɛ́ttɛ́ uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt ɔmal ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
42018025	Ɔgɔdɔ kɛmal ka lɛmma ɔnnya, mɛ ba kikoolo tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kule kukoolo uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt kɛmal ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
42018026	Balɔɔt ba bappyeenɛ ka Jesus ɔlɔɔknɛ ning baang babapmɛ battɛ, “Nkkpa mung, nnyinɛ ule uddu?”
42018027	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Kɔlɔɔk kwa kukoolonɛ ɔlɔɔt kɛnaang, kule kpɛkɛlɛm ka labɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
42018028	Ɔzzánga Peter ɔttɛ, “Ppyɛɛk, igbatabong ssala ayyɔɔt ikɔngɔ, iffu ikupwɔ tɛ.”
42018029	Jesus ɔttɛbɛ, “Iii, Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng oo, ɔlɔɔt wa ɔgbatanɛ ɔkɔngɔ ssala ammɛ, ɔlɔk ɔgbata wanavva ammɛ ɔkɔngɔ, ɔlɔk itele ammɛ, ɔlɔk abassɛ la abakka, ɔlɔk bwaan ammɛ ka lɛttɔ Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm,
42018030	vvenɛ ɔyanga bya bɛttɔnɛ ’byɔng baang ɔgbaa la bwa ɔyanganɛ ka lɛfal ’zɔng, ɔbɛtɛmɛ la kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal ka vveeng wa ule uffu.”
42018031	Jesus ɔsam balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ba zzɔɔppabaffa, ubee ka kusɛngɛ. Ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Gɔpɔlɔyɔng! Mung ile ka imiinɛyɔng Jerusalem ka ɛfɛɛn ya lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ sa bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bakkpɔknɛ batum Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ, lile linaang ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
42018032	Vvenɛ basammɛ, bassɛɛn ikanakana ka labɔɔk, ba bale banyɔɔkamɛ bassɛɛnmɛ ka izzit. Vvenɛ bakwula libbaak, ballɔtmɛ.
42018033	Batupmɛ, bawwɔɔl. Ɔzzànga bɛtɔm bɛffa ka bɛkkyaat vvenɛ ufungala ka lubbe, ɔtaa ka kuddu.”
42018034	Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ basi kɔlɔɔk lɛsan ka lilɔɔk ’sɔng baang sa Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔnɛbɛ kkwɔn gbɔɔ. Ifɛɛt a lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng baang iddumubɛ, basi lɛsan bwa Jesus ɔlɔɔknɛ utum.
42018035	Jesus uffu ɔffɔ kɛtɛkɛtɛ Jericho. Ussi-ifim vvɔn ɔdɔkɔ baang ka ɔtaanɛ ubbwoom lubbwoom.
42018036	Uppyeenɛ kɛkaan-a-balɔɔt ka kɛsaknɛ, ɔbap ɔttɛ, “Kule nang?”
42018037	Ɔzzánga babwɔɔlɔmɛ battɛ, “Jesus wa Nazareth ɔsaknɛ.”
42018038	Ussi-ifim ’wɔng baang ɔkkwa ɔgaga ɔttɛ, “Jesus, Waan-a-David, nbbewɔ lɛttɔ.”
42018039	Balɔɔt ba lusso baggbamɛ battɛ, ɔtaa zzum. Ammɛ ɔkama-ɔkama ubungu ɔttɛ, “Waan-a-David, nbbewɔ lɛttɔ.”
42018040	Ɔzzánga Jesus ubee ɔttɛ bakɔɔm ussi-ifim ’wɔng baang bafeemɛ. Ussi-ifim ’wɔng baang ɔffɔnɛ kɛtɛkɛtɛ, Jesus ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ,
42018041	“Aggyan attɛ nnyiwɔ ’bɔng?” Ussi-ifim ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Dedde nggyan nttɛ nppyɛlɛ nyɛn.”
42018042	Jesus ɔlɔɔk la ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Ayɛn! Kiyila annɔ kɛnaangwɔbong ɔppwawɔ.”
42018043	Eseese ɔyɛn. Ɔzzánga ufeele umii ukup Jesus. Ɔzɔnɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang. Kɛkaan ’sɔng baang bayɛnnɛ ning baang, babungu Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
42019001	Jesus ɔsak umii Jericho, utii ka kimii ka kimii,
42019002	Uzzilɛttɔ batɔk-innamba vvɔn ɔdɔkɔ baang wa ɔzzanganɛ Zacchaeus, wa ɔyanganɛ ikkobo.
42019003	Zacchaeus uggele ɔttɛ ɔlɔk ɔyɛn ɔlɔɔt wa ɔzzanganɛ Jesus. Keem usi likkwoong ɔyɛnmɛ ka ɔbbwɛtnɛ, ɔgbaa kɛkaan kile lɛttala.
42019004	Ɔzzánga ɔmma ɔsak kibbi ’sɔng baang umii ka lusso. Ubbulu, uttele ka kɛssɛ. Ɔttɛ ɔkkɔɔnɛ ɔyɛn Jesus ka ule ka ɔsaknɛ baang.
42019005	Jesus ɔffɔnɛ baang, uyeek ɔppyɛɛk ka libat, ɔlɔɔk la Zacchaeus ɔttɛ, “Zacchaeus, assuma asini nle nkkwunu ssala annɔ mmwɔɔn.”
42019006	Zacchaeus uzzuma usini, uwomo Jesus la laggele za lɛbaang.
42019007	Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ bayɛnnɛ ning baang, bazzɔ battɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt awɔng mung umiibong bukekeen ka ssala ɔnaang-a-bubbi tɛ.”
42019008	Zacchaeus ufeele ubee, ɔlɔɔk la Uyini ɔttɛ, “Gɔpɔlɔ Dedde! Vvenɛ nfaka kufaak a bɛfɛɛn anaam ɔkkpɛlɛ, nnnyi balɔɔt-ibbɔl. Nlenɛ balɔɔt isak lizzi; vvenɛ ntakbɛ, nssɛɛnbɛ isak bikkpkit bɛnna.”
42019009	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal kuffubong ka ssala ’sɔng mmwɔɔn. Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng ngbaa ussi ka kikkwu Abraham.
42019010	Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ uffu ɔggyan balɔɔt ba bataaknɛ ɔttɛ ɔkkalabɛ.”
42019011	Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔssa ifɛɛt ’yɔng ka balenɛ baang ka kɛgɔpɔlɔ kwa ɔlɔɔknɛ. Usseke kɛtɛkɛtɛ ɔffɔ Jerusalem. Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ badɔkɔ battina battɛ Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ile ka iffunɛ.
42019012	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt ɔdɔkɔ baang wa ɔgbatanɛ umii kizzi kibeet ka lɔkaan fulufulu tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔppyɛlɛ uffu ka ssala.
42019013	Bong tɛ́ttɛ́ uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔgbata, ɔkkwɔɔ ibbɔɔyi ammɛ, balɔɔt zzɔɔp, unnyibɛ ikkpoko la vvɔn la vvɔn ududa. Ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Asan bwa ale akɔɔmyɔng ikkpoko ’yɔng baang, anaangyɔng asangayɔng isak ka nle nle lɛgbata.’
42019014	Keem balɔɔt ba lɔkaan ammɛ bɛ ba ɔsaap. Ɔzzánga batɔɔm babwɔɔlɔbɛ battɛ, ‘Ba iggyan ittɛ ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung ɔzzánga ubeet ka ayyɔɔt.’
42019015	Bakaa uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang kibeet, ɔppyɛlɛ isimisimi uffu ufula. Eseese ɔtɔɔm ɔkkwɔɔ ibɔɔyi ammɛ ’yɔng baang ɔttɛ baffu usseke ɔsan isak ya balenɛ lɛsanga.
42019016	Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn uffu ɔttɛ, ‘Dedde, nkɔɔmbong ikkpoko ’yɔng baang, nyanga naira zzɔɔp tɛ.’
42019017	Ammɛ uwomo ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang kɛnaang ɔttɛ, ‘Anaangbong gaang annɔ ɔlɔɔt wa doddo. Ka akkwoongnɛ akɔɔm bwaan a lilɔɔk sa utiti doddo, vvenɛ nnaangwɔ azzánga uzzilɛttɔ laffɛ zzɔɔp.’
42019018	Bɔɔyi wa vvɔn ɔbbal liffu ɔttɛ, ‘Dedde nkɔɔmbong naira wa anyinɛnɛ, nnaang naira kubbwɔɔk tɛ.’
42019019	Ɔlɔɔk la ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, ‘Vvenɛ azzánga uzzilɛttɔ laffɛ kubbwɔɔk.’
42019020	Bɔɔyi wakang ɔbbal liffu ɔttɛ, ‘Dedde, yɛn ikkpoko annɔ mung, ndɔkɔ nssɛɛnyɛ ka waan-ubbubba nllup.
42019021	Adɔkɔ ɔbbwɔpɔnɛ lɔbbwɔpɔ ka alenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa akoolonɛ eleme. Atɔk bɔfɛɛn bwa businɛ bwa annɔ lile, ayaat bwa atakanɛ liwoop.’
42019022	Ɔlɔɔk la bɔɔyi ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, ‘Annɔ ubbu a bɔɔyi ’wɔng! vvenɛ nkɔɔm lɛmmwɔɔl annɔ nbɛpɛwɔ. Asanbong attɛ anaam nkoolo elemɛ ntɔk bwa businɛ bwa anaam lile, nyaat bwa ntakanɛ liwoop,
42019023	ngkka ’bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ asi ikkpoko anaam ka bank lɛssɛn? Tɛ nzang ka nppyɛlɛnɛ mung nmiibong ntɔk ikkpoko ’yɔng baang la isak.’
42019024	Ubeet ’wɔng baang usikili, ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt ba babeenɛ baang ɔttɛ, ‘Tɔkyɔng ikkpoko ’yɔng baang agbaayɔng bɔɔyi wa ɔyanganɛ naira zzɔɔp tɛ.’
42019025	Bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, ‘Dedde, baang ulemɛ naira zzɔɔp tɛ.’
42019026	Ubeet ’wɔng baang ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, ‘Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng! Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ wa ɔyanganɛ uggboggbo, vvenɛ ɔyanga ɔgbaa; wa ɔyanganɛ ssup, gɔɔ waan-ezuku wa ɔfalanɛ ɔyanga vvenɛ nkup ntɔk.
42019027	Kwa balɔɔt a kɔfɔk anaam ’bɔng baang ba battɛnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ nzzanga ubeet abbɛ, kɔɔmyɔngbɛ, affu awwɔɔlyɔng mung ka lataak anaam.”
42019028	Jesus ɔlɔɔknɛ ning baang uvve, ɔkɔɔm ɛtɔk, ɔgbata, umii Jerusalem, ɔkɔngɔbɛ ka isimi.
42019029	Ɔffɔnɛ kɛtɛkɛtɛ Bethphage la Bethany ka lɛttaal Olives, ɔtɔɔm balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ baffa, bakɔɔm ɛtɔk.
42019030	Ɔttɛ, “Akɔɔm assɛ amiiyɔng ka lɛffɛ za lusso baang. Affɔnɛyɔng bakang, vvenɛ ayɛnyɔng kitook eyim sa batakanɛyɛ littele kkpaal ka basikinɛ. Akkyaayɔngyɛ, akɔɔm, affuyɔng mung.
42019031	Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔbapwɔnɛyɔng ɔttɛ, ‘Bɔng akkyaanɛyɔngyɛ?’ Abɔɔlɔmɛyɔng attɛyɔng, ‘Dedde ɔggyannɛyɛ.’ ”
42019032	Bafeele bamii bayɛnyɛ ning baang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Jesus ɔlɔɔknɛ.
42019033	Baleyɛ baang ka kɛkkyaa, bayini eyim ’yɔng baang babapbɛ battɛ, “Eyim ’yɔng baang akkyaayɔngyɛ kwa ’bɔng?”
42019034	Bappyɛlɛbɛ kamma battɛ, “Uyini ɔttɛnɛ ifeemɛ.”
42019035	Bakkyaa kitook eyim ’yɔng baang bafee Jesus. Bakkyaa igbogbo abbɛ bateleyɛ ka libat, battele Jesus ɔyaam uttele ka libat.
42019036	Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ulenɛ baang ka uttelenɛ, balɔɔt ggbadam bazzɔɔk igbogbo ka ɛtɔk.
42019037	Ɔffɔnɛ kɛtɛkɛtɛ a Jerusalem ka lufoom gwa kuttɔɔk a lɛttaal Olives, kɛkaan a balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bawomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang, babungumɛ kɛnaang ka uggboggbo bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ bya balenɛ lɛyɛn, battɛ,
42019038	“Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaang ubeet wa uffunɛ ka lɛkɔɔl Uyini ppyɛɛ! Bɔkaat ka libat, latele lale za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
42019039	Ɔzzánga balɔɔt a Pharisees bafeele ka kibbi balɔɔk bannyi Jesus, battɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo, abwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ annɔ bataa zzum.”
42019040	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Ppyɛɛk nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng, bataanɛ zzum lattaal vvenɛ labungu lagaga.”
42019041	Ɔffɔnɛ kɛtɛkɛtɛ a tɔkɔlɔ a ssala, ɔ́yɛnnɛsɛ, ɔkkwa unnyisɛ,
42019042	Ɔttɛ, “Asanbong bwa kɛkɔɔm kɛnaang bɔkaat mmwɔɔn! Ɔzzànga gedegede mung ba akkwoong ayɛnbwɛ!
42019043	Bɛtɔm bile ka biffɔnɛ bya balɔɔt a kɔfɔk annɔ bale bakkpitwɔ, bafɛɛnwɔ ka ifɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ.
42019044	Vvenɛ babɛpɛwɔ, bawwɔɔl balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba balewɔnɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ. Gɔɔ lattaal za lalenɛ baang zzɔn ning baala lisseke ka ɛfɛɛn a libeenɛ, ka asinɛ lɛkɔɔlɔ ɛkɛtɛ ya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uffuwɔnɛ kɛkkala!”
42019045	Jesus umii ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm; ɔggba bassɛ-kappya.
42019046	Ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Bakkpɔkbong ka Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm battɛ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛ, ‘Gwoon anaam bale bakkwɔɔgwɛ ggwoon a luzɔɔm’ mung annyɔɔng asikiliyɔngbonggwɛ, lusseke kiddumu bassip!”
42019047	Jesus ukopolo ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bɛtɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ. Bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la bakopolo-Lafɔɔ la bagɛlɛnya abbɛ baggyan Jesus kɛwwɔɔl.
42019048	Ɔzzánga basi lɛsan tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bale banaang, ka balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ badɔkɔnɛ ka kɛgɔpɔlɔ a Jesus, basi lɛggyan battɛ basi lɛkkɔ zzɔn gbɔɔ lippyee.
42020001	Livve zzɔn za Jesus ulenɛ baang ka kikopolo balɔɔt ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ Kuttu-Budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔgbaa. Bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la bakopolo-Lafɔɔ ɔgbaa la bagɛlɛnya baffu.
42020002	Balɔɔk Jesus battɛ, “Abwɔɔlɔyɛlɛ mung akɔɔm bɔka lakke, anaang bɛfɛɛn byɔng? Nnyinɔɔng unnyiwɔnɛ lakke ’zɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ?”
42020003	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Fɔngɔ ssii, nbapwɔyɔng lɔbap. Abwɔɔlɔnɛyɔng,
42020004	mung John lakke kɛnaang a baptizim lassimɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm faa ka ɔlɔɔt?”
42020005	Bazzɔɔk bɛkangala abbabbɛ battɛ, “Mung ile ilɔɔk nang? Ilɔɔknɛ ittɛ, ‘Lakke ’zɔng baang lassi ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm,’ vvenɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Ngkka ’bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ isiyɔng kwa John liyila.’
42020006	Ɔzzànga ilɔɔknɛ ittɛ, ‘Lassimɛ ka balɔɔt’, kibbi ’sɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ batɔɔpyɛlɛ lattaal bawwɔɔl ka balenɛ liyila battɛ, John ɔdɔkɔ uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
42020007	Ɔzzánga bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, “Ba isan ɛfɛɛn a lakke ’zɔng baang lassimɛnɛ.”
42020008	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Gɔɔ wɔyɔng baala nssɛ nbwɔɔlɔ ka ɛfɛɛn a lakke za nnaangnɛ bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng lassinɛnɛ.”
42020009	Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔssa balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ifɛɛt ’yɔng mung, ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn uwoop kibwoto lakkpo-bɛssɛ, ɔsam bɔtɔɔm ’bwɔng baang unnyi balɔɔt, ɔttɛ, bakat. Ammɛ biini ɔgbata umii ɛfɛɛn ya fulufulu, usi ppwaat ppwaat lɛppyɛlɛ.
42020010	Ɛkɛtɛ ɛffɔnɛ ya ɔffanɛ lakkpo, ɔtɔɔm ubili ammɛ ɔttɛ umii ka bakat a bɔtɔɔm, ɔtɔk etini lakkpo ya ammɛ, ufeemɛ. Umiinɛ, bakat a bɔtɔɔm bɔng baang batupmɛ, baggbamɛ, ufula; bulɔk bafimmɛ kinnyi.
42020011	Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔtɔɔm ubili ɔlɔk, ɔttɛ umii ɔtɔk etini lakkpo ya ammɛ ufeemɛ. Bakat a bɔtɔɔm ’bɔng baang batupmɛ lɔkpat lɔbɛtɛmɛ. Banaangmɛ bɛfɛɛn izzit, baggbamɛ, ufula; bulɔk bafimmɛ kinnyi.
42020012	Ɔbbal ubili ɔlɔk lɛtɔɔm, ɔnaang ka bikkpit bɛkkyaat. Bakat a bɔtɔɔm ’bɔng baang baddopomɛ, battulumɛ bazzɔɔk bakang.
42020013	Ɔzzánga uyini bɔtɔɔm ɔttɛ, ‘Nle nnaang nang? Vvenɛ ntɔɔm waan a luppyam anaam biini, vvenɛ basan batelemɛ.’
42020014	Bakat a bɔtɔɔm ’bɔng baang bayɛnmɛnɛ, balɔɔk abbabbɛ battɛ, ‘Uwɔng ulenɛ waan Uyini bɔtɔɔm. Iwwɔɔlmɛyɔng; usseke bɔtɔɔm busseke bwa ayyɔɔt.’
42020015	Ɔzzánga battulumɛ, batta ka bɔtɔɔm, basammɛ bawwɔɔl.” Jesus ɔbap ɔttɛ, “Mung uyini bɔtɔɔm ule ɔnaang bakat a bɔtɔɔm ’bɔng baang nang?
42020016	Vvenɛ uffu ɔwwɔɔl balɔɔt ’bɔng baang, ɔsam bɔtɔɔm ’bwɔng baang, unnyi balɔɔt balɔk, bakat.” Balɔɔt bappyeenɛ ning baang battɛ, “Ning lissi ffet.”
42020017	Jesus uyeek ɔppyɛɛkbɛ ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Mung luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔk nang ka lɔttɛnɛ; ‘Likkpo lɛttaal za ɔbɔɔk-a-ggwoon ɔttɛnɛ ba lɛyyɛɛp, lɛppyɛɛbong lisikili, lisseke lɛttaal za lɛttanɛ lɛyyɛɛp!’
42020018	Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ wa ɔttɔnɛ ka lɛttaal ’zɔng baang vvenɛ ɔbɔbɔlɔ usseke lakkpɔ lakkpɔ. Lɛttaal ’zɔng baang lɛppyɛɛnɛ lɛttɔ lɛbɛtɛ ɔlɔɔt, vvenɛ likookmɛ usikili ubut.”
42020019	Bakopolo-Lafɔɔ la bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm babum kɛkaa Jesus eseese baang, ka basannɛ battɛ ifɛɛt ’yɔng baang Jesus ɔssa utumbɛ abbɛ. Keem basi lɛbbɔ bakaamɛ bamma balɔɔt.
42020020	Basseke ka bakatnɛ kufuk kwa bbwak. Balup balɔɔt balɔk labbu battɛ babbwa battɛ abbɛ bale wa ammɛ. Batɔɔmbɛ battɛ bakɔɔm ibap bassɛɛnmɛ ka kɔlɔɔk, nkwaaning basammɛ bannyi lakke uzzilɛttɔ ɛkpansi abbɛ.
42020021	Banaang-a-lagban ’bɔng baang balɔɔk la Jesus battɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo, isan lɔsan ittɛ kwa alɔɔknɛ la kwa akopolonɛ kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Isan lɔsan ittɛ zzeen ba atele ka kwa ɔlɔɔt uttinanɛ. Ɔzzànga, akopolo lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk atum luttina Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uttinanɛ utum balɔɔt.
42020022	Abwɔɔlɔyɛlɛ, mung kule bbwak ka ikkpɛɛnɛ innamba ka Uzzilɛttɔ-a-Rome ɔɔ? Faa ifɔngɔ?”
42020023	Jesus ɔyɛnbongbɛ lagban ’zɔng baang. Ɔzzánga ɔttɛ,
42020024	“Ayɔɔnɛyɔng siling ee. Baang lusso ’gwɔng baang la lɛkɔɔl ’zɔng baang ka siling za nnyinɛ?”
42020025	Bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, “Bya Uzzilɛttɔ-a-Rome.” Jesus ɔttɛ, “Kɔyyɛɛppɔyyɛɛp, annyiyɔng Uzzilɛttɔ-a-Rome bwa bulenɛ bwa ammɛ, annyiyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bwa bulenɛ bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
42020026	Basi likkwoong bakaamɛ ka lɛkkɔ zzɔn gbɔɔ ka lusso balɔɔt, ɔzzánga bataa zzum kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ gaang gaang ka kɛppyɛlɛ kamma sa Jesus ɔppyɛlɛnɛbɛ.
42020027	Balɔɔt a Sadducees balɔk baffu ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus. Abbɛ balenɛ balɔɔt ba battɛnɛ balɔɔt baala bafungala ka lubbe. Keem babap Jesus battɛ,
42020028	“Ukopolo-lukopolo, Moses ɔkkpɔk Lifɔɔ ’zɔng unnyiyɛlɛ, ɔttɛ, ‘Ɔlɔɔt ubbenɛ ɔkɔngɔ wanavva ammɛ, wanavva ’wɔng baang ɔtakanɛ waan lɛmaat unnyimɛ, etele ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔbbal wanavva ’wɔng baang lɛtɔk, nkwaaning ɔfɔɔn waan ɔkɔɔl ubbu etele ammɛ.’
42020029	Ɔzzànga balɔɔt badɔkɔ baang, balɔɔt bannambakkyaat, itele la itele. Ɔkɔɔm-ɛtɔk abbɛ ɔtɔk wanavva. Wanavva ammɛ usi lɛmaat unnyimɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ ubbe ɔkɔngɔmɛ ka vveeng.
42020030	Ubbenɛ, etele ammɛ wa ukupmɛnɛ, ɔtɔk wanavva ’wɔng baang ullu.
42020031	Kɔbbal ning baang lile tɔttɔt batɔkmɛ baduda.
42020032	Kumii kuttele lɛttɔ ka wanavva ’wɔng baang ubbenɛ.
42020033	Mung ɔffɔnɛ ka babbu bale bafungala ka lubbe, wanavva ’wɔng baang ule ule wa nnyinɛ? Ka itele la itele ’yɔng baang innamikkyaat balemɛnɛ lɛtɔk?”
42020034	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Bwaanbwalam la bwanavva ba vveeng ’wɔng mung ballunɛ.
42020035	Bwaanbwalam la bwanavva ba bakkɔnɔnɛ kifungala ka lubbe bataa ka kuddu ka vveeng wa ule uffu, killu baala ballu.
42020036	Bataa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bayilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba babbe. Abbɛ balenɛ bwaan a Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka balenɛ ka lubbe lifungala.
42020037	Moses ɔbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng ppwool ɔttɛ vvenɛ babbu bafungala ka lubbe. Ka kutolo kwa kutumnɛ kɛzafɔk sa kɛkkɔmnɛ lɔkɔɔn, ɔlɔɔk utum Uyini ɔttɛ, ‘Uyini ulenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm a Abraham; ule Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm a Isaac la Jacob.’
42020038	Ning baang ulenɛ kɛttɛ ammɛ ulenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm a bakokolo la babbu ka ɔkkpɛlɛ batiinɛ ikokolo ka lusso ammɛ.”
42020039	Bakopolo-Lafɔɔ balɔk balɔɔk battɛ, “Kɛppyɛlɛ kamma annɔ kile bbwak, Ukopolo-lukopolo.”
42020040	Basi lɛbɛlɛ lɛbbɔ babap Jesus ibap ilɔk.
42020041	Jesus ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ attɛyɔng Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ ule ussi ka kikkwu a David ee?
42020042	Nlɔɔk ka David biini ɔlɔɔknɛ ka luvva Psalms ɔttɛ, ‘Ebinukkpaapi ɛlɔɔk la Uyini anaam ɛttɛ, Ataa mung ka kɔbɔɔk ɛlaabɔɔk anaam,
42020043	Ɔddɔkɔddɔkɔ nsam balɔɔt a kɔfɔk annɔ nlokowɔ asing bukkpɔ.’
42020044	David ɔkkwɔɔmɛnɛ ‘Uyini!’ Ɔnaang nang tɛ́ttɛ́ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ ule waan a David.”
42020045	Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ka balenɛ baang ka bagɔpɔlɔnɛ, Jesus ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ,
42020046	“Akatkwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng assekeyɔng bakopolo-Lafɔɔ tɛ. Baggyan kɛssɛ gbɔɔ gbɔɔ ning baang la iwuulu nkwaaning bawomobɛ la latele ka ogyila kappya. Baggyan bɛtaa bya balɔɔt a latele balokobɛ kɛyɔɔng ka idda mitin, la bɛtaa bya doddo ka bɛtaa kazzi tɛ.
42020047	Bazzi bwanavva babbu isak, bayipbɛ bɛfɛɛn ka ssala babbwa battɛ bamii bassɛɛn luzɔɔm bannyibɛ. Akama wa abbɛ ule ɔtta lɛbbɔl!”
42021001	Jesus uyeek ɔppyɛɛk ɔyɛn baggboggbo balɔɔt ka bannyinɛ lɛsɔɔk.
42021002	Ɔgbaa ɔyɛn ukee-waan a wanavva ubbu ka unnyinɛ ideli iffa.
42021003	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Wanavva ’wɔng baang unnyibong lɛsɔɔk za lɛttanɛ lasɔɔk ’zɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ,
42021004	ka balɔɔt ’bɔng bakang basanganɛ bwa bannyinɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ kibeet abbɛ, ɔzzànga wanavva ’wɔng mung wa ɔbbɔlmɛnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔbbɔlmɛnɛ lɔbbɔl baang, unnyibong bwa ɔkɔɔmnɛ uddu ɔkkpɛlɛ abbwɛ, usseke ka ɔtaanɛ ibɔɔk ibɔɔk.”
42021005	Balɔɔt balɔk badɔkɔ ka kɛlɔɔk kitum bɔllɛ a Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, la bɔllɛ lattaal ’zɔng baang, ɔbɛtɛ la lasɔɔk za bassɛɛnnɛ bannyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Jesus ɔttɛ,
42021006	“Mbyɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ bya ayɛnnɛyɔng baang, ɛkɛtɛ vvenɛ effɔ ya ale asiyɔng bulɔk lɛbɛlɛ lɛyɛn; gɔɔ lɛttaal zzɔn gbɔɔ vvenɛ babɛlɛyɔng lɛyɛn. Ɔkkpɛlɛ azzɛ baang vvenɛ labɔl lallɔt.”
42021007	Ɔzzánga babap Jesus battɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo, mung ’kwɔng kule kɔnaang ɛkɛtɛ nang? Ile ikɔɔm ’bɔng isan ɛkɛtɛ kule kɔnaang?”
42021008	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Akatyɔng, tɛ̀ttɛ́ badɛmwɔyɔng, agbigbiniyɔng tɛ. Balɔɔt ggbadam vvenɛ baffu ka lɛkɔɔl anaam battɛ, ‘Anaam nlemɛnɛ ammɛ, ɛkɛtɛ ɛffɔbong!’ ɔzzànga tɛ̀ttɛ́ akupyɔngbɛ.
42021009	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔbbwɔpɔwɔyɔng ka ale appyeeyɔng kwa lɛkɔɔng la lilɔɔk. Bɛfɛɛn bya ning baang vvenɛ bɛnaang. Ɔzzànga ba bɛnaang bɛttɛ lakpeke a vveeng lakkɛtɛbong.”
42021010	Ɔbbal lɛlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Lɔkaan ggwɔn vvenɛ ballu la gwakang; itutum nnyɔn vvenɛ illu la ilɔk.
42021011	Vvenɛ ɛkpansi ɛzza uggboggbo epiti, buwɔɔng la lilɔɔk sa lisinɛ lɛyyɛɛp vvenɛ bɛnaang ifɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ. Bɛfɛɛn a lakkpi vvenɛ bɛnaang, bɛmaanga bya lɛbaang vvenɛ bɛyɔɔ ka libat.
42021012	Bong tɛ́ttɛ́ bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ bɛnaang, vvenɛ bakaawɔyɔng, bayɔɔ akama. Vvenɛ bakɔɔmwɔyɔng bamii kɛkaal ka idda mitin, vvenɛ bassɛɛnwɔyɔng igbakkɔpɔ, vvenɛ bakɔɔmwɔyɔng bamii ka lusso babeet la bakɔɔm ɛkpansi ka lɛttɔ anaam.
42021013	Uwɔng baang ule ulewɔyɔng kufuk kwa kɛbwɔɔlɔ Kuttu-budoddo-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
42021014	Anaangyɔng ittina gedegede mung akatyɔng, tɛ̀ttɛ́ affu alɛlɛkɛyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ale anaang akkalawɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng ka ɛkɛtɛ ya kule kɔnaang.
42021015	Vvenɛ nnyiwɔyɔng lammwɔɔl la kukele kwa ɔlɔɔt wa ule ukkwoong ɔkangalawɔyɔng ule usi lile.
42021016	Vvenɛ issaawɔ annyɔɔng la issakawɔ annyɔɔng la itele annyɔɔng la ikpana annyɔɔng la inngwa annyɔɔng, bassɛ basamwɔyɔng bannyibɛ. Vvenɛ bafakala balɔɔt annyɔɔng balɔk bawwɔɔl.
42021017	Vvenɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ulokowɔyɔng kɔlɔɔk ka lɛttɔ anaam.
42021018	Ɔzzànga eggbe kittulu nnyɔn ka lɛttɔ annyɔɔng baala ɛlɔp ɛtaak.
42021019	Beeyɔng bbwak, ale anaangyɔng ning mung akkalawɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng.”
42021020	“Ɛkɛtɛ ayɛnnɛyɔng isɔgya ka ikkpitnɛ Jerusalem baduda, asan attɛyɔng ba ɔbɛlɛ lɛmmɛ Jerusalem ɔbɛpɛ ɔsaal.
42021021	Ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang balɔɔt ba balenɛ ka Judea vvenɛ bamma bamii ka libat ikpok. Balɔɔt ba balenɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ a ssala vvenɛ bagbata. Balɔɔt ba balenɛ ka billu a vveeng vvenɛ ba babɛlɛ tɔkɔlɔ a ssala limii.
42021022	Ka bɛtɔm ’byɔng baang bilenɛ ‘Bɛtɔm-Akama’ ɔkkɔɔnɛ kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ.
42021023	Bwanavva ba balenɛ la zzɛɛm la ba bwɔɔntiti ka eddu vvenɛ bayɛn akama. Akama wa lɛbaang wa ataanɛ attina kɔkɛɛlɛwɔ, vvenɛ uffu ka ɛkpansi ’yɔng. Binyanga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ bippyɛɛk balɔɔt ’bɔng baang.
42021024	Vvenɛ bawwɔɔl balɔk la igge, bakaa balɔk, bassɛɛn igbakkɔpɔ ka ikaan ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ikanakana vvenɛ basusuku Jerusalem tɔttɔt ɛkɛtɛ abbɛ ɛsak.
42021025	“Linaang vvenɛ linaang ka livve luwee, la ettuma la bwaanettuma. Ikaan ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ɛkpansi vvenɛ ɛkɔp ɛttɔbɛ bannyi. Vvenɛ ɔbbwɔpɔ balɔɔt ɛkpansi ɔkkpɛlɛ ka bale bappyee kɛ́wɔ̀l sa lihu la ɛlɔlɔ bile bɛ́wɔl.
42021026	Balɔɔt vvenɛ babbe bafungala ka ule ɔbbwɔpɔbɛ kɛtaa kɛkat kwa kule kɔnaang ka ɛkpansi ɔkkpɛlɛ. Lakke a vveengodde vvenɛ lakyakyama.
42021027	Bɔk tɛ́ttɛ́ Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ utuma la ikkpálá-lukpaaggbeede la lakke, ɔgbaa la latele.
42021028	Lilɔɔk ’sɔng lile ka littenɛ kɛnaang, afeele abeeyɔng lubee appyɛɛkyɔng ka libat, ɔkkala-ikkala annyɔɔng utii kɛtɛkɛtɛ.”
42021029	Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔssabɛ ifɛɛt ɔttɛ, “Akkeyɔng kwa lɛsan a kɛssɛ ’zɔng baang la bɛssɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ tɛ.
42021030	Ayɛnnɛyɔng ka livva abbyɛ lippwɔtnɛ, asanbong attɛyɔng eteep ɛkɛtɛbong.
42021031	Kɔssɛ kule ning baang, ayɛnnɛyɔng bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ ka bɛnaangnɛ, asan attɛyɔng Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm itii kɛtɛkɛtɛ ka ile ka iffunɛ.
42021032	Akkeyɔng tɛ, bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ bile bɛnaangbong tɛ́ttɛ́ balɔɔt ba balenɛ ka kuddu gedegede mung babbe.
42021033	Libat la ɛkpansi vvenɛ bɛsak bimii, ɔzzànga lɛmmwɔɔl anaam baala lɛsak.”
42021034	“Akatwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng! Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akeneyɔng kwa kazzi la batak ba bakkaamnɛ, la ittina lɛfal ’zɔng mung, nzang Kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang vvenɛ kissolo kitipili.
42021035	Kile kɛkaa balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ kitipili tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔ́nnya.
42021036	Akatwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng, assɛɛnyɔng luzɔɔm gaang gaang ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, nkwaaning ayangayɔng lakke asɛɛmyɔng ɛkɛtɛ lilɔɔk ’sɔng lile linaang, ɔlɔk abeeyɔng lusso Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ.”
42021037	Jesus ukopolobɛ la kɛtɔm la kɛtɔm ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔffɔnɛ ka kulele kɔnaangnɛ, umii ukkwunu ka lɛttaal a Olives.
42021038	Balɔɔt baggba lɔfɔm a lɔfɔm bamii ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bagɔpɔlɔ lukopolo gwa ukopolonɛ.
42022001	Ɛkɛtɛ Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ kwa bazzinɛ brɛɛd wa basinɛ yeast lɛssɛɛn ɛkkɛtɛnɛ,
42022002	bazilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la bakopolo-Lafɔɔ baggyan ɛtɔk ya bale banaang bawwɔɔl Jesus ka balɔɔt babbwɔpɔnɛbɛ.
42022003	Satan ɔmana Judas wa bakkwɔɔmɛnɛ Iscariot. Ɔdɔkɔ ka kɛkaan a balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus ba zzɔɔppabaffa.
42022004	Ɔzzánga ufeele umii ɔbwɔɔlɔ bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la bakat a Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ule ɔnaang ɔkaa Jesus ufeebɛ.
42022005	Baggele gaang gaang; bayilamɛ kinnyi ikkpoko.
42022006	Judas uyila kwa balɔɔknɛ, ɔggyan kufuk kwa bbwak, kwa ule ɔfɛɛt Jesus ufeebɛ bakaa, balɔɔt basi lɛsan.
42022007	Kɛtɔm a Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ kissolonɛ sa bale ka bawwɔɔlnɛ waan-itɔɔn banaang kazzi,
42022008	Jesus ɔtɔɔm Peter la John ɔttɛ, “Amii anaangyɔng Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ, alokoyɔng; iffu izziyɔng.”
42022009	Babapmɛ battɛ, “Aggyan attɛ ibamakwɛ iloko yang?”
42022010	Ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Gɔpɔlɔyɔng! Ka ale ka amiinɛyɔng ka tɔkɔlɔ a ssala vvenɛ adudayɔng ɔlɔɔt vvɔn wa ɔtɔkɔnɛ bilim a bannyi. Akupmɛyɔng ka ssala duu sa ule umii.
42022011	Alɔɔkyɔng la uyini a ssala ’wɔng baang attɛyɔng, ‘Ukopolo-lukopolo ɔttɛnɛ, Lɛnɔk za balɔɔt a kɔssɛ anaam la anaam biini ile itaa izzi Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ lile?’
42022012	Vvenɛ ɔyɔɔwɔyɔng lɛnɔk za doddo ka libat ɛnyɔng, ɛfɛɛn ale abamayɔng bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ alokoyɔng.”
42022013	Bafeelenɛ bamii, bayɛn bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Jesus ulenɛbɛ lɛbwɔɔlɔ. Babama Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ baloko baang.
42022014	Ɛkalangka ’yɔng baang ɛffɔnɛ, Jesus umii ɔtaa ka okkpokolo la bayilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ.
42022015	Ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Nbumbong gaang gaang nttɛ nzzi Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ ’kwɔng la annyɔɔng bong tɛ́ttɛ́ nyɛn akama!
42022016	Ppyɛɛk nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng! Kwɛ ba nbɛlɛ lizzi tɔttɔt bannyikwɛ ifɛɛt akkwɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
42022017	Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔsam ommonggo, uwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang ɔttɛ, “Atɔk batak ’bɔng, abɛngɛlɛwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng.
42022018	Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ, batak ’bɔng ba nbɛlɛ lɛvva, ka ussinɛ mung tɔttɔt umii ɔffɔ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ile iffu.”
42022019	Ɔzzánga ɔsam brɛɛd uwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang, ɔtɔkmɛ ɔbbɔk ɔttɛ, “Uwɔng ulenɛ ɛkkpakkwɔɔt anaam [ya nnyiwɔnɛyɔng, anaangyɔng ning mung akkenɛyɔng.”
42022020	Uvvenɛ kazzi, ɔbbalbɛ ommonggo lɛsam ning baang unnyi, ɔttɛ, “Ommonggo ’wɔng ulenɛ ufaa kɛbɛtɛ kɛnnɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, sa linnyi anaam sa lissinɛ libɛtɛnɛ linnyiwɔyɔng.]
42022021	“Ɔzzànga nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng! Ɔlɔɔt wa uzzinɛ issɛ anaam ule mung ka okkpokkolo la anaam.
42022022	Ɔzzànga Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ ubbe tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ litini uloko. Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang wa uzzinɛnɛ issɛ, vvenɛ ɔyɛn akama ɔttala.”
42022023	Babapbɛ abbabbɛ biini kɛyɔɔng battɛ nnyinɛ ulenɛ baang ka bɛzzɔkɔ abbɛ, wa ule ka ɔnaangnɛ kɔlɔɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ akkwɛ baang?
42022024	Bɛkangala bɛttɔ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus abbabbɛ batum ɔlɔɔt wa balɔɔt battinanɛ battɛ ammɛ ɔttanɛ liggbenge ka bɛzzɔkɔ abbɛ.
42022025	Jesus ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Babeet ba ɛkpansi ’yɔng mung bayanga lakke babɛtɛ balɔɔt abbɛ. Bazzilɛttɔ ɛkpansi bakkwɔɔbɛ kɛyɔɔng ‘Inngwa balɔɔt ’bɔng baang.’
42022026	Ɔzzànga ning ba kule la annyɔɔng. Lutini ’gwɔng uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt ka bɛzzɔkɔ annyɔɔng ule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ waan wa utiti. Uzzilɛttɔ usseke tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɔɔyi.
42022027	Mung nnyinɛ ɔttanɛ liggbenge: ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtaanɛ lɔtaa, uzzi kazzi, faa ɔlɔɔt wa unnyimɛnɛ kazzi? Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtaanɛ lɔtaa uzzi kazzi ɔttanɛ ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Ɔzzànga anaam nle ka bɛzzɔkɔ annyɔɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt wa unnyinɛ kazzi.
42022028	“Ataayɔngbong mung la anaam tɔttɔt illɛ ya ballɛnɛnɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ isaal.
42022029	Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Dedde unnyinɛnɛ anaam lakke za kɛkɔɔm ɛfɛɛn, anaam vvenɛ nssɛ nnaang ning baang la annyɔɔng.
42022030	Vvenɛ ataayɔng ka okkpokolo anaam azziyɔng kazzi, avvayɔng batak ka Itutum anaam. Vvenɛ ataayɔng ka igbaal a kibeet akaalyɔng kɛkaal ifɔɔn a Israel zzɔɔppiffa.”
42022031	“Simon, Simon! Gɔpɔlɔ! Satan ɔtɔkbong lakke za ule ka uffunɛ ɔllɛwɔyɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ uwoop-a-bɔtɔɔm uggwulnɛ bippwo ɔllɔt ussekemɛ ifɔɔk.
42022032	Simon! ɔzzànga anaam nssɛɛnbong luzɔɔm nnyiwɔ, kiyila annɔ sa ayanganɛ, baala kittun. Ɛkɛtɛ ya ale abbal lisikili appyɛɛknɛ vvenɛ anaang ikpana annɔ iyanga lakke.”
42022033	Peter ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Nbamabong kimii a ngbakkɔpɔ la annɔ, gɔɔ mkpa ule lubbe vvenɛ nssɛ la annɔ nbbe.”
42022034	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Nbwɔɔlɔwɔ, balangkɔkɔ baala bakɔɔl ka kɛtɔm-a-mmwɔɔn tɛ́ttɛ́ akala bikkpit bɛkkyaat attɛ nɛ ba asan.”
42022035	Jesus ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Ka ntɔɔmwɔnɛyɔng ibɔɔk ibɔɔk asiyɔng waanɛssɔ, la ɛssɔ ya lɛbaang, la ikkpa-bukkpɔ lɛkɔɔm, ’bɔng budɔkɔnɛ bubbyawɔyɔng?” Abbɛ bappyɛmɛ kamma battɛ, “Bulɔk busiyɛlɛ lɛbbya.”
42022036	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Ɔzzànga gedegede mung ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyanganɛ waanɛssɔ, ɔlɔk ɔyanga ɛssɔ ya lɛbaang, ɔsamyɛ. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsɛlɛnɛ ogge ɔtaan uwɔkɔlɔ ammɛ ɔlɛɛp ogge.
42022037	Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng! Luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm gwa lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, ‘Ɔdɔkɔ baang la bazzɔɔk-a-lilɔɔk’ vvenɛ kɔnaang ka lɔkkwɔɔn kutumnɛ. Kwa bakkpɔknɛ batumnɛ kule ka kɔnaangnɛ ka lɔkkwɔɔn.”
42022038	Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ balɔɔk battɛ, “Uyini ppyɛɛk! Yɛn igge iffa mung tɛ.” Ammɛ ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Iyɔng baang iyyɛɛpbong.”
42022039	Jesus ɔgbata ka tɔkɔlɔ a ssala, umii ka lɛttaal Olives tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɛlɔmɛlɔm. Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bakupmɛ.
42022040	Baffɔnɛ bakang, ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Azɔɔmyɔng, tɛ̀ttɛ́ affu attɔyɔng ka bubbi.”
42022041	Ɔgbata umii ubee fulufulu ukun laddu ɔzɔɔm.
42022042	Ɔttɛ, “Dedde, kɔsaapwɔnɛ, asam ommonggo akama ’wɔng, assekenɛ. Ɔzzànga kwa anaam lissi, kussi ka luttina annɔ biini.”
42022043	[Uyilabɔtɔɔm ussi ka libat uffu ɔgbaamɛ lakke,
42022044	la akama wa lɛbaang ka kkwɔɔt. Ɔzɔɔm kɔbɛtɛmɛ gaang gaang. Layungu ammɛ lattep lallɔt ka lisse tɛ̀ttɛ̀ linnyi.]
42022045	Uvvenɛ luzɔɔm, ufeele umii ka ɛfɛɛn a balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ. Ɔyɛnbɛ ka bilaa, baggwɔɔtbong ka kkwɔɔt ɔssanga akama.
42022046	Ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ alaayɔng? Afeele assɛɛnyɔng luzɔɔm tɛ́ttɛ́ affu attɔyɔng ka bubbi.”
42022047	Jesus ɔdɔkɔ utii ka kɛlɔɔk ka ɛkɛtɛ ya kibbi ’sɔng baang kiffunɛ. Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ka tɔkɔlɔ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus ba zzɔɔppabaffa wa ɔzzanganɛ Judas, ɔkɔɔmnɛbɛ ɛtɔk ɔsak ssɔng umii Jesus kigbugba.
42022048	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Judas, mung ale akɔɔm kigbugba, azzi issɛ Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔɔ?”
42022049	Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus ba badɔkɔnɛ baang, la ammɛ, bayɛnnɛ kwa kule ka kɔnaangnɛ, balɔɔk battɛ, “Uyini, isanga igge ayyɔɔt ka kiffɔ ɔɔ?”
