42022050	Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ɔkkwɛ kɔtɔɔk ɛlaabɔɔk kwa ubili Uzzilɛttɔ Bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm-wa-lɛbaang ɔzza.
42022051	Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Kuddubong!” Umii ɔsam kɔtɔɔk, ɔppyɛlɛ unengemɛ.
42022052	Jesus ɔlɔɔk la bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-Luzɔɔm, la bakat a Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la bagɛlɛnya ba baffumɛnɛ kɛkaa, ɔttɛ, “Mung affunɛyɔng kɛkaa la igge la ikkpong tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔzzɔɔk-a-kɔlɔɔk ɔɔ?
42022053	Ndɔkɔ baang la annyɔɔng kɛtɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, gɔɔ nɛyɔng ba akaa. Ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng mung elebong ya annyɔɔng ka lakke kisul!”
42022054	Bakaa Jesus, basammɛ bamii ka ssala Uzzilɛttɔ Bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm-wa-lɛbaang. Peter ɔssɛ fulufulu ukupmɛ ka isimi.
42022055	Lɔkɔɔn lɔdɔkɔ baang ka badodonɛ ka kɛsan a ssala ka lufoom ugala. Peter ɔssɛ umii ɔtaa baang la balɔɔt ’bɔng baang uwupa lɔkɔɔn.
42022056	Ubili vvɔn, waanawanavva, ɔyɛnnɛ Peter ka ɔtaanɛ baang ka lufoom a lɔkɔɔn, uyeek ɔppyɛɛkmɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung ɔdɔkɔ baang la ammɛ.”
42022057	Peter ɔkala ɔttɛ, “Wanavva, anaam mɛba nsan tɛ.”
42022058	Waan a ɛkɛtɛ ssup ɔsaknɛ, ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ɔkɔɔlɔ Peter, ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔkmɛ ɔttɛ, “Annɔ assɛ adɔkɔ baang la ammɛ ɔgbaa.” Peter ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Walam, anaam baang nsi lile la ammɛ tɛ.”
42022059	Ɛkalangka nnyɔn ɛbbalnɛ lɛsak, ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ɔbbal lɛlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Ikangala ilɔk ba ile, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔdɔkɔ baang la ammɛ, ammɛ ɔssɛ ule wa Galilee.”
42022060	Peter ɔppyɛlɛma kamma ɔttɛ, “Walam, ba nsan bwa alɔɔknɛ atum!” Utii ka kɛlɔɔk, eseese balangkɔkɔ bakɔɔl.
42022061	Uyini usikili ɔppyɛɛk Peter zzip. Ɔzzánga Peter ukke lɛmmwɔɔl Uyini ɔttɛnɛ, “Tɛ́ttɛ́ balangkɔkɔ bakɔɔl mmwɔɔn mung, vvenɛ akalanɛ bikkpit bɛkkyaat.”
42022062	Peter ɔtta, ubee ka vveeng ɔkkwa kɔssɔpmɛ.
42022063	Balɔɔt ba bakatnɛ Jesus banyɔɔkamɛ, bakɔɔm batupmɛ.
42022064	Baggbɔmɛ ubba ka lusso, babapmɛ battɛ, “Nnyinɛ utupwɔnɛ? Attina!”
42022065	Balɔɔk bɛfɛɛn a izzit ggbadam batummɛ.
42022066	Ussolonɛ, bagɛlɛnya balɔɔt a Jews la bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la bakopolo-Lafɔɔ, baduda ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn. Bakɔɔm Jesus uffu ubee baang ka lusso ikkansulu abbɛ.
42022067	Babapmɛ battɛ, “Annɔ alenɛ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ ɔɔ?” Ammɛ ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Nbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng mung kwa anaam, baala ayilayɔng!
42022068	Ɔzzànga nbapwɔnɛyɔng lɔbap, nɛyɔng baala ɔppyɛlɛyɔng!
42022069	Ka ussinɛ gedegede mung, Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ ɔtaa ka kɔbɔɔk ɛlaabɔɔk Ebinukkpaapi.”
42022070	Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ babapmɛ battɛ, “Oo attɛ annɔ alenɛ Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔɔ?” Ammɛ ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Alɔɔkyɔngbong attɛyɔng, anaam nlenɛ.”
42022071	Abbɛ balɔɔk battɛ, “Itɛɛsɛ ilɔk ba ibɛlɛ lɛggyan tɛ, ayyɔɔt biini ippyeebong lɛmmwɔɔl ammɛ!”
42023001	Kibbi ’sɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ bafeele basam Jesus bamii ka ɛfɛɛn a Pilate.
42023002	Babilimɛ lilɔɔk ggbadam battɛ, “Ikaa ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung ka ɔfɛɛtnɛ balɔɔt ayyɔɔt ɔttɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ bakkpɛɛ innamba, bannyi Uzzilɛttɔ a Rome. Ɔgbaa ɔttɛ ammɛ Christ, ubeet.”
42023003	Pilate ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ, “Mung annɔ alenɛ ubeet a Jews ɔɔ?” Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Annɔ alɔɔknɛ ning.”
42023004	Pilate ɔlɔɔk la bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la kibbi ’sɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Lɛttɔ za kɛzza kɛkaal ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung nttɛ ubbe, ba nyɛn.”
42023005	Balɔɔt balɔɔk kɔssɔpbɛ battɛ, “Uttebong kɛzzɔɔk a lɔnyaata la lukopolo ammɛ ukkpit Judea. Ɔdɔkɔ utte ka Galilee mung uffubong kaang.”
42023006	Pilate uppyeenɛ ning ɔbap ɔttɛ, “Mung ɔlɔɔt wa Galilee ɔɔ?”
42023007	Uppyeenɛ ɔttɛ Jesus ɔdɔkɔ ussi ka ɛkpansi ya Herod ulenɛ uzzilɛttɔ, ɔtɔɔmmɛ ufee Herod ka ɔdɔkɔnɛ ka Jerusalem ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang.
42023008	Herod uggele gaang gaang ka ɔyɛnnɛ Jesus, ka ulenɛ kuttu ammɛ lippyee, ɔgbaa ɔggyan ɔttɛ ɔyɛnmɛ. Utele zzeen ɔttɛ nzang ɔyɛn Jesus ka kɛnaang a bɛmaanga.
42023009	Herod ɔbap Jesus ibap ggbadam, Jesus usi lɛmmwɔɔl lɛzza.
42023010	Bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la bakopolo-Lafɔɔ battɔm bakkɛtɛ Jesus, babilimɛ lilɔɔk sa likkaamnɛ lɔkkaam.
42023011	Herod la isɔgya ammɛ banyɔɔka Jesus, banaangmɛ bɛfɛɛn izzit. Bassɛɛnmɛ oyyoyyo ewuulu batɔɔmmɛ bappyɛlɛ bafee Pilate.
42023012	Ussi ka kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang Herod la Pilate bassɛ ɛnngwa. Kisimi ka isimi badɔkɔ ka kɔwɔlɔ.
42023013	Pilate ɔkkwɔɔ bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la bazzilɛttɔ-ɛkpansi la balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ, uloko ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn.
42023014	Ɔttɛ, “Akɔɔmyɔngbong ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung affu attɛyɔng, ɔfɛɛtbong balɔɔt. Mung nbapmɛbong ka lusso annyɔɔng, kɔlɔk kwa kɔbbɔlmɛnɛ kkwɔn gbɔɔ ba kɔtaka kule ka lilɔɔk sa akaamɛnɛyɔng.
42023015	Gɔɔ Herod kɔlɔɔk kɔlɔk kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ usi lɛyɛn tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔtɔɔmmɛ ɔppyɛlɛ ufeeyɛlɛ. Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung bulɔk ba ɔtaka ɔnaang bwa bubbɔlnɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ vvenɛ ubbe ka akkwɛ.
42023016	Vvenɛ nsammɛ nnyibɛ, batupmɛ gbɔɔ nkkyaamɛ bafɔngɔ.”
42023017	[Lutini Kazzi-Kɛsak-kɛkɔngɔ la kkwɔn, Pilate ɔkkyaa ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ka igbakkɔpɔ ɔfɔngɔ.]
42023018	Ɔzzánga kibbi ’sɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ babungu battɛ, “Awwɔɔlmɛ! Asanga Barabbas annyiyɛlɛ.
42023019	(Barabbas ɔdɔkɔ ka mgbakkɔppɔ ka ɔwwɔɔlnɛ balɔɔt ka kullu kwa ballunɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ a ssala.)
42023020	Pilate ɔdɔkɔ ɔggyan kɛsanga Jesus, ɔzzánga ɔbbal kibbi lɛkkwɔɔ, ɔbap.
42023021	Babbal libungu battɛ, “Nsɔɔngyɔng la ammɛ ka cross! Nsɔɔngyɔng la ammɛ ka Cross!”
42023022	Pilate ɔbbalbɛ lɛkkwɔɔ ɔlɔɔk ka bikkpit bɛkkyaat ɔttɛ, “Mung ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung ɔdɔkɔ ule nang lɛnaang kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ? Ba nyɛn kwa ɔnaangnɛ kɔbbɔl ule wa kɛwwɔɔl. Vvenɛ nlɔɔkbɛ batupmɛ, bakkyaamɛ, bafɔngɔ.”
42023023	Ning ka bakamanɛ lɔkama babungu bagaga battɛ bakama Jesus ka Cross.
42023024	Ɔzzánga Pilate ɔttɛ basam Jesus, bamii bawwɔɔl tɛ̀ttɛ̀ baggyannɛ.
42023025	Ɔsanga ɔlɔɔt wa baggyannɛ battɛ ɔsangamɛ ka igbakkɔpɔ. ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang wa bassɛɛnmɛnɛ ka igbakkɔpɔ, ka ullunɛ kullu ɔwwɔɔl balɔɔt ɔgbaa. Ɔsam Jesus unnyibɛ banaangmɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɔsaapnɛbɛ.
42023026	Basam Jesus bagbata. Baffɔnɛ ka ɛtɔk baduda ɔlɔɔt wa ɔzzanganɛ Simon wa Cyrene wa ussinɛ killu a vveeng ule ka uffunɛ tɔkɔlɔ a ssala. Bakaamɛ basam Cross bafeekmɛ, ɔtɔkɔ ukup Jesus ka lɔnnyɔ.
42023027	Kɛkaan a balɔɔt ggbadam bakupmɛ. Bwanavva balɔk badɔkɔ baang ba bakupnɛ Jesus la kullu la kullu. Bakkwa battɔl layilili.
42023028	Jesus usikili ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Bwanavva Jerusalem, tɛ̀ttɛ́ akkwayɔng kwa anaam. Akkwayɔng kwa annyɔɔng biini la bwaan annyɔɔng.
42023029	Bɛtɔm bile ka biffunɛ bya balɔɔt bale balɔɔk battɛ, ‘Bwanavva ba batakanɛ bwɔɔn lɛmaat, bataka bwɔɔn lɛkɔɔm bappyɛɛpbong lɔfɔm basak!’
42023030	Ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang elenɛ ya balɔɔt bale balɔɔk la ikpok battɛ, ‘Ikpok attɔ abɛtɛyɔngyɛlɛ’ Babbal lɛttɛ ‘Lattaal alupyɔngyɛlɛ.’
42023031	Bɛfɛɛn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ abbyɛ baang bɛnaangnɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya kɛssɛ kɛppwɔtnɛ, kule kɔtaa nang ka ɛkɛtɛ ya kile kibbe?’ ”
42023032	Basam balɔɔt baffa bagbaa. Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bazzɔɔk-a-lilɔɔk baffa ba bale ka batoolonɛbɛ la Jesus bawwɔɔl.
42023033	Baffɔnɛ ka ɛfɛɛn ya bakkwɔɔnɛ “Ukɔɔk-a-lɛttɔ”, bakama Jesus baang ka Cross. Bakama balɔɔt ’bɔng baang baffa babɛtɛ la Jesus, vvɔn ka kɔbɔɔk a ɛlaabɔɔk wakang ka kɔbɔɔk a ɛbyaakɛm.
42023034	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Atɔk asɔɔkbɛ Dedde, ba basan kwa banaangnɛ.” Bakɔɔm iwɔkɔlɔ a Jesus batta illɔ basam babɛngɛlɛ abbabbɛ.
42023035	Balɔɔt ba balenɛ ka ɛfɛɛn ’yɔng baang bagbep lɛppyɛɛk ka ɛkɛtɛ ya bazzilɛttɔ-ɛkpansi a Jews banyɔɔkanɛ Jesus. Balɔɔk la Jesus battɛ, “Ɔkkala balɔɔt balɔk, ɔkkalamɛ kɛyɔɔng bɛɛ, ulenɛ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ.”
42023036	Isɔgya mgbaa banyɔɔka Jesus, bakɔɔm batak baffu bawɔkɔmɛ
42023037	Battɛ “Akkalawɔ kɛyɔɔng, attɛnɛ annɔ ubeet a Jews.”
42023038	Bakkpɔk lammwɔɔl ’zɔng ka libat a Cross battɛ, “Uwɔng ulenɛ Ubeet a Jews.”
42023039	Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn wa ɔdɔkɔnɛ ɔzzɔɔk kɔlɔɔk wa bakamamɛnɛ bakkɛtɛ Jesus ɔssɛ ɔnyɔɔkamɛ ɔttɛ, “Annɔ lissi alenɛ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ ɔɔ? Akkalawɔ kɛyɔɔng agbaa la ayyɔɔt bɛɛ!”
42023040	Ɔlɔɔt wa vvɔn ɔwɔlɔmɛ ɔttɛ, “Annɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ba ɔbbwɔpɔ ɔɔ? Ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt mung izziyɔng kibbi ssɔn.
42023041	Kibbi sa ayyɔɔt kile bbwak ka ilenɛ kɔlɔɔk lɛzzɔɔk ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Ammɛ bulɔk bwa bubbɔlnɛ ba ɔtaka ɔnaang.”
42023042	Ɔlɔɔk la Jesus ɔttɛ, “Jesus, akkenɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya ale affu tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ubeet!”
42023043	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Nbwɔɔlɔwɔ: Ka ussinɛ mmwɔɔn vvenɛ ataa la anaam ka libat ka ɛfɛɛn a laggele.”
42023044	Ɔdɔkɔ ikalangaka zzɔɔppiffa ka livve-luwee lizumnɛ, kisul kivvoong ɛkpansi ɔkkpɛlɛ tɔttɔt ɔffɔ ka ikalangka ikkyaat.
42023045	Ubba wa battanɛ ka ggwoon Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyaak bɛfaak bɛffa.
42023046	Jesus ɔfaka lɛmmwɔɔl a kullu ɔttɛ, “Dedde, nsambong kuyeeng anaam nssɛɛnwɔ ka eddu!” Ɔlɔɔknɛ ning baang uvve ubbe eseese.
42023047	Uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt isɔgya ɔyɛnnɛ ning baang, ubungu Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛ, “Ka lɔkkwɔɔn, ɔlɔɔt wa doddo!”
42023048	Balɔɔt ba babeenɛ baang, bagbep lɛppyɛɛk bayɛnnɛ kwa kulenɛ lɛnaang; batup labɔɔk ka ikwukwulu bagbata bafula.
42023049	Balɔɔt ba balenɛ Jesus kpelegedee lɛsan, ɔbɛtɛ la bwanavva ba badɔkɔnɛ bakupmɛ ka ussinɛ Galilee babee fulufulu bappyɛɛk battɛ bayɛn kwa kɔnaangnɛ.
42023050	Ɔlɔɔt ɔdɔkɔ baang wa ɔzzanganɛ Joseph wa ussinɛ Judea ka lɛffɛ balɔɔt a Jews za lɛzzanganɛ Arimathea. Ɔdɔkɔ ɔlɔɔt a latele wa doddo wa ɔkatnɛ kiffu Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔdɔkɔ ule ka kɛkaan ikkansulu ɔgbaa. Ammɛ usi liyila kwa balɔɔknɛ la kwa banaangnɛ.
42023052	Ufeele umii ka ɛfɛɛn a Pilate, ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ ɔfɔngɔmɛ ɔsam Jesus, umii ulli. Pilate uyila.
42023053	Ammɛ umii, usini ubbu ka libat. Ɔsammɛ, ɔgbbɔ ka balata ibba. Ɔsammɛ umii ɔssɛɛn ka lilli za batɔɔknɛ ka lɛttaal. Ubbu baang ba bataka balli ɛkɛtɛ ɛlɔk.
42023054	Ɔdɔkɔ kɛtɔm-a-Friday ka ule ka ussolonɛ Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ.
42023055	Bwanavva ba bakupnɛ Jesus ka ussinɛ Galilee, bakkuma la Joseph bamii bayɛn lilli, bayɛn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bawulunɛ Jesus ka tɔkɔlɔ lilli ɔgbaa.
42023056	Bappyɛlɛ isimisimi, bamii balɔngɔlɔ bɛfɛɛn la kɛssɛ sa kɛyyɛɛpnɛ kizoom bya bale bappwɔɔngmɛ. Bafɛkɛlɛ ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Lafɔɔ lalɔɔknɛ.
42024001	Lɔfɔm a lɔfɔm a livve luzɔɔm, bwanavva ’bɔng baang basam kɛssɛ sa kɛyyɛɛpnɛ kizoom sa balenɛ lɛnaang ɔkkpɛlɛ bakɔɔm bamii ka lilli.
42024002	Baffɔnɛ bakang, bayɛn lɛttaal ka lilenɛ liwongolo lisseke kamma lilli.
42024003	Bamal ka tɔkɔlɔ lilli ubbu a kwɔɔt a Jesus, Uyini, ba bayɛn.
42024004	Babee baang battina, eseese bayɛn balɔɔt baffa baang ka babeenɛ ka bɛzzɔkɔ abbɛ la balata iwɔkɔlɔ ya ilaatnɛ inyanya.
42024005	Bwanavva ’bɔng baang ɔbbwɔpɔbɛ gaang gaang, balli lattɔ ka lisse, ka balɔɔt ’bɔng baang balenɛbɛ ka kɛbwɔɔlɔ battɛ, “Bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ aggyanyɔng ukokolo ɔlɔɔt ka ɛfɛɛn a babbu?
42024006	Mung ba ule, ufungalabong, ɔtta ka lilli. Akkeyɔng kɔlɔɔk kwa ɔlɔɔknɛ la annyɔɔng ka ɛkɛtɛ ya alenɛyɔng ka Galilee ɔttɛ,
42024007	‘Vvenɛ basam Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ, bannyi banaang-a-bubbi, bakamamɛ bɛfɔl bakaka ka Cross. Vvenɛ ufungala ka bɛtɔm bɛffa ka bɛkkyaat.’ ”
42024008	Bwanavva ’bɔng baang bakke lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng baang.
42024009	Bagbata ka lilli, bafula, bamii babwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ Jesus ba zzɔɔppavvɔn la balɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ.
42024010	Bwanavva ’bɔng baang bazzanga Mary Magdalene la Joanna la Mary, abakka James. Abbɛ la bwanavva balɔk babwɔɔlɔnɛ bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus lilɔɔk ’sɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ.
42024011	Bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus ’bɔng baang badɔkɔ battina battɛ lilɔɔk ’sɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ sa babwɔɔlɔnɛbɛ bakkala lalaak. Basibɛ kwɛ liyila.
42024012	Peter kpakpalap ufeele umii ka lilli. Umiinɛ, uvvoop ka tɔkɔlɔ lilli kɛyɔɔng. Ɔyɛn balata ibba ya baggbɔmɛnɛ keem. Bɔfɛɛn bulɔk usi lɛyɛn. Ɔyɛnnɛ ning baang kɔkɛɛlɛmɛ; ufeele ufula.
42024013	Ka kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang ssɔn, abbɛ balɔɔt baffa badɔkɔ ka kimii ka lɛffɛ za lɛzzanganɛ Emmaus, ɔggyan kɛffɔ immaal innamikkyaat ka ussinɛ Jerusalem.
42024014	Badɔkɔ ka kutolo abbabbɛ batum lilɔɔk sa linaangnɛ.
42024015	Bale baang ka balɔɔknɛ, Jesus ɔttɔm ɔkkɛtɛbɛ, bakkuma.
42024016	Bayɛnmɛ ka bakkumanɛ la abbɛ ɔzzànga basimɛ lɛkɔɔlɔ.
42024017	Jesus ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Mung alɔɔkyɔng ’bɔng annyɔɔng annyɔɔng, appyɛlɛyɔng isimisimi, amiiyɔng lusso-lusso ka akkumanɛyɔng mung?” Bakɔɔng baang zzuum babee, livve lɛbbɔlbɛ.
42024018	Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn wa ɔzzanganɛ Cleopas ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ, “Annɔ kɛyɔɔng alenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ullunɛ ka Jerusalem wa usinɛ kwa kɔnaangnɛ iyaadɛ lɛsan ɔɔ?”
42024019	Jesus ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ, “Bɔka akkwɛ kɔnaangnɛ?” Bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, “Kɔlɔɔk kwa kɔnaangnɛ Jesus wa Nazareth. Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔdɔkɔ Uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ battɛnɛ uggbenge ɔgbaa la lɛmmwɔɔl a kamma la linaang.
42024020	Mung baggboggbo-balɔɔt ayyɔɔt la bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm bakaamɛbong, bazza kɛkaal, battɛ ubbe. Basammɛbong bakama bɛfɔl bakaka ka Cross.
42024021	Idɔkɔ ittina ittɛ nzang ammɛ ule ɔkkala Israel! Kwa kɔnaangnɛ kɔgbaa, mmwɔɔn ɔnaangnɛ ka bɛtɔm bɛkkyaat.
42024022	Bwanavva balɔk ba balenɛ ka kɔssɛ ayyɔɔt balɔɔk kɔlɔɔk kɔkɛɛlɛyɛlɛ ka bafeelenɛ bamii ka lilli.
42024023	Basi kkwɔɔt ammɛ lɛyɛn. Bappyɛlɛ isimisimi baffu babwɔɔlɔyɛlɛ battɛ bayɛnbong bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba babwɔɔlɔnɛbɛ battɛ ufungalabong ka lubbe.
42024024	Balɔɔt ayyɔɔt balɔk bafeele bamii bayɛn lilli. Kɔdɔkɔ ning baang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bwanavva ’bɔng baang babwɔɔlɔnɛ; basimɛ lɛyɛn.”
42024025	Jesus ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Mbɔng azizinginɛyɔng ning. Mbɔng akkpɛlɛnɛyɔng kippyee kɔlɔɔk kwa bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm balɔɔknɛ ning?
42024026	Bbwak kusi lile ka Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ ɔyɛnnɛ akama lilɔɔk ’sɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ umii ka kibeet ammɛ ɔɔ?”
42024027	Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔyaala lilɔɔk sa Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lutummɛ, ka ussinɛ ka livva Moses, la likkpɔk a bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
42024028	Baffɔnɛ kɛtɛkɛtɛ lɛffɛ za balenɛ ka kimii, Jesus ɔnaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ utiinɛ ka kimii lusso-lusso.
42024029	Balɔɔt ba bakkumanɛ, batunumɛ battɛ, “Akkunu la ayyɔɔt, ule ka usulnɛ.” Ɔzzánga ufeele umii ukkunu la abbɛ.
42024030	Ɔtaa ka okkpokolo kazzi, ɔsam brɛɛd, ɔnaangmɛ ppyɛɛ, ɔlɔmmɛ ɔbbɔk, unnyibɛ.
42024031	Ɔzzánga ɔnaangbɛ gbool baggɔggɔ bakɔɔlɔmɛ. Ammɛ ɔkkyaap, ɔkɔngɔbɛ.
42024032	Balɔɔk abbabbɛ battɛ, “Nttɛ mung ippyam idɔkɔ iggwoomyɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bunɔk la ɛkɛtɛ ya ɔlɔɔknɛ la ayyɔɔt ka ɛtɔk, utum kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ?”
42024033	Bafeele eseese bappyɛlɛ bamii Jerusalem. Bamiinɛ bayɛn balɔɔt a kɔssɛ Jesus ba zzɔɔppavvɔn ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn ka bataanɛ la balɔɔt balɔk.
42024034	Babwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt ’bɔng baang battɛ, “Ka lɔkkwɔɔn Uyini ufungalabong. Simon ɔyɛnmɛbong!”
42024035	Balɔɔt ba baffa babwɔɔlɔbɛ kwa kɔnaangnɛbɛ ka ɛtɔk tɛ́ttɛ́ bakɔɔlɔ Uyini ka ɛkɛtɛ ɔbbɔknɛ brɛɛd ɔbɛngɛlɛbɛ.
42024036	Bale baang ka kɛbwɔɔlɔ lilɔɔk ’sɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ, eseese Uyini biini utuma baang ka bɛzzɔkɔ abbɛ. Ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Bɔkaat butaa la annyɔɔng.”
42024037	Ɔbbwɔpɔbɛ kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ battɛ bayɛnbong ubbu.
42024038	Jesus ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Mung kɔkɛɛlɛwɔyɔng bɔng? Mbɔng bɛkangala mbyɔng biffuwɔnɛyɔng ka ittina?
42024039	Ppyɛɛknɛyɔng ka labɔɔk la bukkpɔ, asan attɛyɔng anaam ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Asinginɛyɔng, asan attɛyɔng anaam. Ubbu ɛkkpa-kkwɔɔt la bɛkɔp ba ɔyanga tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ayɛnnɛyɔng anaam ka nyanganɛ.”
42024040	Ɔlɔɔknɛ ning baang ɔyɔɔbɛ labɔɔk la bukkpɔ.
42024041	Gɔɔ basi liyila tɔttɔt badɔkɔ basseke ka laggele ka kɔnaangnɛbɛ bikɛɛlɛ. Ɔzzánga ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Ayangayɔng mung bwakuzzi mung ɔɔ?”
42024042	Abbɛ bannyimɛ waan a likkpɔ ɛsɛɛnabannyi ya balenɛ lɛyap.
42024043	Ɔtɔk waan a likkpɔ ɛsɛɛnabannyi ’wɔng baang; uzzi ka lusso abbɛ.
42024044	Ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Uwɔng ulenɛ lilɔɔk sa mbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng ka ɛkɛtɛ ya ndɔkɔnɛ la annyɔɔng. Lutini lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ sa bakkpɔknɛ batumnɛ ka Lafɔɔ a Moses la likkpɔk a bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la Psalms linaangbong ka lɔkkwɔɔn.”
42024045	Ɔzzánga uwongolobɛ ippyam basan Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
42024046	Ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Uwɔng ulenɛ kwa bakkpɔknɛ battɛ, ‘Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ vvenɛ ɔyɛn akama, bɛtɔm bɛffa ka bɛkkyaat vvenɛ ufungala ka lubbe.
42024047	Ɔzzànga bɔtɔɔm bwa butumnɛ kɛkkyaa bubbi kɛfɔngɔ la kɛsɔɔk a bubbi vvenɛ bule la kikopolo kikkpit ɛkpansi ɔkkpɛlɛ ka lɛkɔɔl ammɛ.
42024048	Annyɔɔng alenɛyɔng ittɛɛsɛ lilɔɔk ’sɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ.
42024049	Anaam biini vvenɛ ntɔɔmwɔyɔng bɔfɛɛn bwa Dedde anaam ulenɛ lɛttɛ vvenɛ ntɔɔm nfeewɔyɔng. Ɔzzànga ataayɔng ka tɔkɔlɔ a ssala, ning ning lakke lassi ka libat laffu lakupwɔyɔng kuttɔɔk.”
42024050	Ɔtɔɔbɛ, ɔtta ka tɔkɔlɔ a ssala tɔttɔt umii ɔffɔ Bethany ka ɛfɛɛn a uyeeknɛ labɔɔk ɔnaangbɛ ppyɛɛ.
42024051	Ule baang ka kɔnaangbɛ ppyɛɛ, ɔgbata ɔkɔngɔbɛ umii ka libat.
42024052	Bazɔɔm bannyimɛ, bappyɛlɛ isimisimi, bamii Jerusalem la laggele la laggele.
42024053	Bataa baang ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, bazɔnɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang.
43001001	Lɛmmwɔɔl lɛggba lissi lile ka ussinɛ ka lutte. Lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng baang lɛdɔkɔ la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, azzɛ lilenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
43001002	Lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng baang lɛdɔkɔ baang la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ussinɛ ka lutte.
43001003	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkɔɔmzɛ azzɛ ɔnaang bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ. Bɔfɛɛn bulɔk ka vveengodde ɔkkpɛlɛ ba bule bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usinɛ Lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng baang lɛkɔɔm ɔnaangbwɛ.
43001004	Lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng baang biini linnyinɛ kuddu. Kuddu kwa linnyinɛ kɔkɔɔmnɛ buppwolo kufee ɔssɛbitbit.
43001005	Buppwolo ’bwɔng baang buppwolo ka kisul, ɔzzànga kisul ba kɛtaka kizumbwɛ.
43001006	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔɔm uyilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ wa ɔzzanganɛ John
43001007	uffu ɔbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt kɔlɔɔk a buppwolo ’bwɔng baang ɔkkɔɔnɛ balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ bappyee bayila.
43001008	John biini lissi ulenɛ buppwolo ’bwɔng baang, uffu ɔbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt kɔlɔɔk a buppwolo.
43001009	Uwɔng ɔdɔkɔnɛ buppwolo biini bwa buffunɛ ka ɛkpansi buppwolo bullɔt ɔssɛbitbit ɔkkpɛlɛ.
43001010	Lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng baang lɛdɔkɔ mung ka ɛkpansi. Uvve Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkɔɔmzɛ azzɛ ɔnaang ɛkpansi ɔzzànga ɛkpansi esizɛ lɛsan.
43001011	Liffu ka lɔkaan azzɛ biini, balɔɔt a lɔkaan azzɛ bafimzɛ.
43001012	Balɔɔt a lɔkaan azzɛ balɔk batɔkzɛ linnyibɛ lakke za bassekenɛ bwɔɔn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
43001013	Bwɔɔn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm basi lɛzzanga ka ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔmaatnɛbɛ, bale bwɔɔn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm biini ulenɛ Abassɛ abbɛ.
43001014	Lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng baang lisikili ɔlɔɔt ɔtaa la ayyɔɔt ɔyanga kɛsaap la lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk ka tɔkɔlɔ lɔttala. Iyɛn latele za ɔtɔknɛ ka Abassɛ ka ulenɛ Waan Abassɛ kkeem.
43001015	John ɔlɔɔk utummɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ ɔyaam ɔbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt ɔttɛ, “Uwɔng ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa nlɔɔknɛ kɔlɔɔk ammɛ ka nttɛnɛ, ‘Ammɛ ule ka uffunɛ ukupnɛ anaam ɔzzànga ammɛ ɔttanɛnɛ anaam ka ɔdɔkɔnɛ baang ka vveeng ’wɔng mung tɛ́ttɛ́ bamaatnɛ anaam.’ ”
43001016	Kɛsaap sa ɔyanganɛ ka kilenɛ lɛsak lɛttala, ɔnaangbongyɛlɛ ppyɛɛ ɔbbal lɛnaang.
43001017	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔdɔkɔ ɔtɔɔm Moses Lafɔɔ ufee ɔssɛbitbit, ɔzzànga kɛsaap la lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk ɔtɔɔm Jesus Christ ufee ɔssɛbitbit.
43001018	Ɔlɔɔt wa ulenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛyɛn ba ule. Awaan wa ulenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Abassɛ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ulemɛnɛ lɛyɛn uleyɛlɛ lilɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ lɛbwɔɔlɔ, ɔdɛm isanmɛ.
43001019	Bazzilɛttɔ balɔɔt a Jews ka Jerusalem batɔɔm bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la balɔɔt a Levi battɛ bamii babap John battɛ, “Annɔ alenɛ nnyinɔɔng?”
43001020	John usi lifim kɛppyɛlɛbɛ kamma. Ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ppwool ɔttɛ, “Anaam lissi nlenɛ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ.”
43001021	Keem battɛ, “Ngkka annɔ alenɛ nnyinɛ? Annɔ alenɛ Elijah ɔɔ?” John ɔttɛ, “Anaam lissi.” Babal John lɛbap battɛ, “Annɔ alenɛ uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm aawɔng ɔɔ?” John ɔttɛ, “Maaye.”
43001022	Abbɛ battɛ, “Ngkka abwɔɔlɔyɛlɛ bwa alenɛ bɛɛ. Iggyan ittɛ ikɔɔm kɛppyɛlɛ kamma annɔ imii ibwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt ba batɔɔmnɛyɛlɛ. Alɔɔk nang atumwɔ kɛyɔɔng?”
43001023	John ɔkɔɔm kwa uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔzzanganɛ Isaiah ɔlɔɔknɛ, ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ: “ ‘Anaam nlenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl ɔlɔɔt za libungunɛ ka kɛmat: Anaangyɔng ɛtɔk bbit alokoyɔng Uyini,ɔssɛ!’ ”
43001024	Balɔɔt ba balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Pharisees batɔɔmnɛ
43001025	babap John battɛ, “Asinɛ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ lile, asi Elijah lile, asi uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm aawɔng lile, bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ anaang balɔɔt baptizim?”
43001026	John ɔttɛ, “Anaam nkɔɔm bannyi nnaang baptizim. Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa asimɛnɛyɔng lɛsan ulewɔyɔng baang ka bɛzzɔkɔ ka ubeenɛ.
43001027	Ule ka isimi ka ule ka uffunɛ. Gɔɔ anaam ba nkkɔnɔ kɛkkyaa ikkpabukkpɔ ammɛ ggbɔɔ mung.”
43001028	Nkwɔng mung kɔnaang ka Bethany ka kufoom a lɔyɔngɔ a Jordan kwa kɔppyɛɛknɛ livveluwee lɔfɔm, ka ɛfɛɛn a John ulenɛ ka kɛnaang a balɔɔt baptizim.
43001029	Ɔffɔnɛ libessolo, John ɔyɛn Jesus ka ulenɛ ka kimii ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ, ɔbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt ɔttɛ, “Yɛnyɔng Waanɛtɔɔn-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔtɔknɛ bubbi a vveengodde uzzenge!
43001030	Uwɔng ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa nlɔɔknɛ ntum ka nttɛnɛ, ‘Ɔlɔɔt ule ka isimi ka ule ka uffunɛ, ammɛ ɔttanɛnɛ anaam ka ɔdɔkɔnɛ baang ka vveeng ’wɔng mung tɛ́ttɛ́ bamaatnɛ anaam.’
43001031	Ndɔkɔ nsi lɛsan ɔlɔɔt wa ule ule. Ɔzzànga anaam nffu nnaang balɔɔt baptizim la bannyi ɔkkɔɔnɛ balɔɔt a Israel basanmɛ.”
43001032	John ɔbwɔɔlɔ bwa ɔsannɛ: “Nyɛn Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka kussinɛ ka libat tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lekkpelekete kuffu kuttelemɛ ka kkwɔɔt.
43001033	Gɔɔ tɔttɔt nsi lɛsan nttɛ ammɛ ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt aawɛ. Ɔzzànga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔtɔɔmnɛnɛ ɔttɛ nnaang baptizim la bannyi ɔggbanɛ lɛbwɔɔlɔ ɔttɛ, ‘Vvenɛ ayɛn Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka kule kussi ka libat kuffu kuttele ɔlɔɔt. Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ule ule ɔlɔɔt wa ule ɔkɔɔm Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaang balɔɔt baptizim.’
43001034	Nyɛnbongkwɛ. Ppyɛɛk nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ ammɛ ulenɛ Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
43001035	Ɔffɔnɛ libessolo, John ɔbbal baang lile la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ baffa ka ubeenɛ.
43001036	Ɔyɛnnɛ Jesus ɔttɛ, “Yɛnyɔng Waanɛtɔɔn-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bakang!”
43001037	Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a John ’bɔng baang baffa bappyee kwa John ɔlɔɔknɛ bamii bakup Jesus.
43001038	Jesus usikili ɔyɛnbɛ ka bakupmɛnɛ, ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Aggyanyɔng ’bɔng?” Abbɛ battɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo, allu yang?”
43001039	Ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Affu ayɛnyɔng ɛfɛɛn a nllunɛ.” (Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang ɔdɔkɔ ikalangka inna kulele.) Ɔzzánga bukupmɛ bamii bayɛn ɛfɛɛn a ullunɛ. Baddongo baang la ammɛ usul.
43001040	Andrew, etele a Simon Peter, ɔdɔkɔ baang.
43001041	Eseese ɔyɛn etele ammɛ Simon. Ɔzzánga ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛ ɔttɛ, “Iyɛnbong Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ aawɛ.” (Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ ulenɛ Christ.)
43001042	Ɔzzánga ufeele la Simon ufee Jesus. Jesus uyeek ɔppyɛɛk Simon ɔttɛ, “Azzanga Simon, waan a John, ɔzzànga bale bappyɛɛ bakkwɔɔwɔ Cephas” (Lɛkɔɔl ’zɔng lɛtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Peter. Ifɛɛt azzɛ ilenɛ “Akpana”)
43001043	Ɔffɔnɛ libbessolo, Jesus ɔnaang luttina kimii Galilee. Ɔyɛnnɛ Philip, ɔttɛ, “Akupnɛ imii!” (
43001044	Philip ussi Bethsaida ka ɛfɛɛn a Andrew la Peter ballunɛ.)
43001045	Philip ɔyɛnnɛ Nathanael, ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛ ɔttɛ, “Iyɛnbong ɔlɔɔt aawɛ wa Moses ɔkkpɔknɛ utummɛ ka luvva Lafɔɔ, bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔgbaa bassɛ bakpɔk batummɛ. Ammɛ ulenɛ Jesus, waan a Joseph, wa Nazareth.”
43001046	Nathanael ɔbap ɔttɛ, “Bɔfɛɛn bwa buyyɛɛpnɛ bulɔk bule baang bwa bussinɛ Nazareth ɔɔ?”
43001047	Jesus ɔyɛnnɛ Nathanael ka umiinɛ ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ, ɔttɛ, “Uwɔng ulenɛ wa Israel bbwak, ɔyyɛɛpbong ɔffata!”
43001048	Nathanael ɔbap Jesus ɔttɛ, “Anaang nang asannɛ?” Jesus ɔttɛ, “Ndɔkɔ nyɛnwɔ ka alenɛ ka lɛsan a kɛssɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ Philip ɔkkwɔɔwɔ.”
43001049	Nathanael ɔttɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo, annɔ alenɛ Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm! Annɔ alenɛ Ubeet a Israel!”
43001050	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Ayila ka nlewɔnɛ lɛffɔ nbwɔɔlɔ nttɛ nyɛnwɔ ka adɔkɔnɛ ka lɛsan a kɛssɛ ɔɔ? Vvenɛ ayɛn lilɔɔk sa littanɛ ’kwɔng!”
43001051	Ɔzzánga ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Mung nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk: Vvenɛ ayɛnyɔng libat ka liwongolonɛ, la bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka bamiinɛ ka libat, basini kuttɔɔk baffu ka ɛfɛɛn a Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ.”
43002001	Bɛtɔm bɛffa bɛsaknɛ, libbeel lissolo ka Cana ka Galilee. Abakka a Jesus ɔdɔkɔ baang ka libbeel.
43002002	Jesus la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ badɔkɔ baang ka babwɔɔlɔnɛbɛ libbeel.
43002003	Batak basɛlɛnɛ ka libbeel, abakka Jesus ɔlɔɔk la Jesus ɔttɛ, “Batak basaalbongbɛ tɛ.” Jesus ɔttɛ,
43002004	“Tɛ̀ttɛ́ addanɛ kwa nle nnaang, ɛkɛtɛ nɛ ba ɛtaka ɛffɔ.”
43002005	Abakka Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔ ibɔɔyi libbeel ’zɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Anaangyɔng duu kwa ɔttɛnɛ anaangyɔng.”
43002006	Balɔɔt a Jews bayanga eleme luzɔɔm ya kiyila bikkeep a kkwɔɔt, kwakkwɛ bulim bwɔlaaning bwa banaangbwɛ la lɛttaal budɔkɔnɛ baang. Bilim la ppyɔn bitɔk ɔlɔp la iggalɔn kubbwɔɔk.
43002007	Jesus ɔlɔɔk la ibɔɔyi ’yɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Ayipiyɔng bulim mbwɔng mung la bannyi.” Abbɛ bayipi bulim mbwɔng baang la bannyi batteme.
43002008	Ɔzzánga ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Akapyɔng bannyi baang amii annyiyɔng ɔkɔɔm-a-libbeel.” Abbɛ bakapbɛ bafeemɛ.
43002009	Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang bannyi ’bɔng baang basikilibong batak. Ammɛ, ɔkɔɔm-a-libbeel, ɔllɛbɛ. Usi lɛsan ka ɛfɛɛn a batak ’bɔng baang bassinɛ baffu. (Ibɔɔyi ’yɔng baang ya bakapnɛ bannyi bafeemɛ keem basannɛ.) Ɔzzánga ɔkkwɔɔ ɔtɔk-a-wanavva
43002010	ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔkɔɔm ɛtɔk unnyi batak ba doddo ka libbeel, balɔɔt balenɛ lɛvva bawukala, tɛ́ttɛ́ unnyi batak ba basinɛ lɛyyɛɛp. Ɔzzànga mung annɔ alokobong batak ba bayyɛɛpnɛ baffɔ ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng!”
43002011	Uwɔng ulenɛ bɛmaanga ikeeng bya Jesus ɔnaangnɛ ka Cana. Baang ulenɛ ɛfɛɛn a ɔyɔɔnɛ lakke ammɛ, balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bayila kwa ammɛ.
43002012	Nkwɔng kɔsaalnɛ, Jesus la abakka la itele ammɛ la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bafeele bamii Capernaum bakkwunu bɛtɔm ssup.
43002013	Ɛkɛtɛ Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ ɛkkɛtɛbong, ɔzzánga Jesus ufeele umii Jerusalem.
43002014	Ɔmalnɛ ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔyɛn balɔɔt ka kɛtaan a igɔdɔ la itɔɔn la idugbɔnnyɛ. Bafoolo-ikkpoko badɔkɔ baang ka bataanɛ ka ikkpokkolo abbɛ.
43002015	Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔttɔng bizzi ɔmmwɔɔl ɔkɔɔm ɔggba itɔɔn ’yɔng baang la igɔdɔ itta ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Usikili ikkpokkolo bafoolo-ikkpoko ugupu, ɔkyakyamabɛ ikkobo.
43002016	Ɔkkpa balɔɔt ba bataanɛ idugbɔnnyɛ kiwele ɔttɛ, “Samyɔngyɛ attayɔng mung! Ukpekewɔyɔng kɛsam a Ggwoon a Dedde kɛnaang ggwoon-a-kappya!”
43002017	Balɔɔt-a-kɔssɛ ammɛ bakke kwa Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛnɛ, “Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, kɛsaap sa ggwoon annɔ lɔsaapnɛnɛ kikutnɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɔkɔɔn.”
43002018	Bazzilɛttɔ balɔɔt a Jews bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma la lɔbap battɛ, “Ale anaang bɔka imaanga usseke isan ittɛ ayanga lakke za kɛnaang a ’kwɔng?”
43002019	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Kɔsaapwɔnɛyɔng, atutyɔng Ggwoon ’gwɔng mung azzɔɔkyɔng ɔzzànga vvenɛ nppyɛlɛgwɛ nbɔɔk lɔsaal ka bɛtɔm bɛkkyaat.”
43002020	Abbɛ battɛ, “Vvenɛ appyɛlɛ abɔɔkgwɛ lɔsaal ka bɛtɔm bɛkkyaat ɔɔ? Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ’gwɔng mung lɔtɔkbong lalɔp a likkpa laffa la likkpa bwɔlaaning tɛ́ttɛ́ lɔsaal!”
43002021	Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm gwa Jesus ɔkkwɔɔnɛ, ɔkkwɔɔ kkwɔɔt ammɛ.
43002022	Ɔzzánga ɔffɔnɛ ka Jesus ufungalanɛ ka lubbe, balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bakke battɛ Jesus ɔdɔkɔbong ɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng kkpal. Bayila kwa Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ ɔbɛtɛ la kwa Jesus ɔlɔɔknɛ.
43002023	Ka Jesus ɔdɔkɔnɛ ka Jerusalem ka ɛkɛtɛ Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ, balɔɔt ppwap bayila kwa ammɛ ka bayɛnnɛ imaanga ya ɔnaangnɛ.
43002024	Ɔzzànga Jesus usimɛ kɛyɔɔng ggbalang lɛkkyaa ɔfɔngɔbɛ ka ɔsannɛbɛ gbaak la ittina.
43002025	Kwa kɛttɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛ lissi, ka ammɛ biini ɔsannɛ kwa kulenɛbɛ ka ippyam.
43003001	Uzzilɛttɔ wa Jew ɔdɔkɔ baang wa ɔzzànganɛ Nicodemus. Ɔdɔkɔ ka kɔssɛ balɔɔt a Pharisees.
43003002	Kɛtɔm ssɔn, ufele kɛtɔm umii ukup Jesus ɔttɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo, isan lɔsan ittɛ annɔ alenɛ Ukopolo-lukopolo wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔɔmnɛ. Ɔlɔɔt wa ukkwoongnɛ ɔnaang imaanga ya annɔ anaangnɛ mung ba ule, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usinɛ la ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang libee.”
43003003	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Mung nbwɔɔlɔwɔ lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk: ɔlɔɔt wa ule ukkwoong ufula ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba ule basinɛ lɛppyɛlɛ bamaatmɛ.”
43003004	Nicodemus ɔbap Jesus ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ulenɛ liggbenge bale banaang nang bappyɛlɛ bamaatmɛ? Baala ukkwoong ɔmal abakka ka lɛmmɛ bappyɛlɛ bamaatmɛ ka bikkpit bɛffa!”
43003005	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Nbwɔɔlɔwɔ lɔkkwɔɔn nttɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ukkwoongnɛ ufula ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba ule, bannyi la Kuyeeng bisimɛnɛ lɛppyɛlɛ bɛmaat.
43003006	Ɛkkpakkwɔɔt ɛmaat ɛkkpakkwɔɔt, Kuyeeng kɔmaat kuyeeng.
43003007	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ kɔkɛɛlɛwɔ ka nbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛ nttɛ bappyɛlɛ babbalwɔ lɛmaat.
43003008	Kɛffa kɛ́ffà kimii ɛfɛɛn duu ya kɔsaapnɛsɛ. Appyee mung lɔsap gwa kɛnaangnɛ ɔzzànga ba asan ɛfɛɛn ya kissinɛ ɔlɔk ɛfɛɛn ya kimiinɛ. Kule ning baang la ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ wa Kuyeeng kɔmaatmɛnɛ.”
43003009	Nicodemus ɔttɛ, “Kule kɔnaang nang nkwɔng kule ning?”
43003010	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Annɔ wa alenɛ ukopolo-lukopolo wa lɛbaang ka Israel ’kwɔng ba asan ɔɔ?
43003011	Mung nbwɔɔlɔwɔ lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk: Ilɔɔk bwa isannɛ, ibwɔɔlɔ kwa iyɛnnɛ ɔzzànga annyɔɔng ɔlɔɔt vvɔn gbɔɔ wa uyilanɛ ɔtɔk lɛmmwɔɔl ayyɔɔt ba ule.
43003012	Ba ayila ka nbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛ lilɔɔk a vveeng ’wɔng, ale anaang nang ayila ka nle nbwɔɔlɔwɔ lilɔɔk sa libat?
43003013	Ɔlɔɔt wa ulenɛ ka libat limii ba ule ɔgbaa la Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ wa ussinɛ ka libat uffu.
43003014	“Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Moses ɔkɔɔmnɛ lukut uyeek ɛzzɔkɔ ya banaangnɛyɛ la lukkpi ka kɛmat, Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ bale bassɛ bayeekmɛ ning baang,
43003015	ɔkkɔɔnɛ ɔlɔɔt duu wa uyilanɛ kwa ammɛ uddu kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal.
43003016	Vveeng ’wɔng ɔsaapbong Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm gaang gaang ɔsanga Waan ammɛ vvɔn keem wa ɔyanganɛ, unnyi ɔttɛ nkwaaning ɔlɔɔt duu wa uyilanɛ kwa Awaan ’wɔng baang ɔfɔngɔ kibbe, uddu kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal.
43003017	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usi Awaan lɛtɔɔm ka vveeng ’wɔng ɔttɛ uffu unnyi ɛkpansi kibbi, ɔtɔɔmnɛ ɔttɛ uffu ɔzzánga ɔkkala-ɛkpansi.
43003018	“Ɔlɔɔt duu wa uyilanɛ kwa Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛkaal ammɛ baala bakaal. Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa usinɛ kwa ammɛ liyila vvenɛ ɔkaal ka ulenɛ kwa Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lifim kiyila.
43003019	Kɛkaal kitele lɛttɔ kɛttɛ: buppwolo buffubong ka ɛkpansi ɔzzànga balɔɔt kisul kɛsaapnɛbɛ kɛtta buppwolo ɔssanga babbu linaang abbɛ.
43003020	Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔnaangnɛ bubbi, buppwolo mɛ ba busaap. Ka busimɛnɛ lɛsaap, ka abbwɛ baala umii ka usinɛ lɛggyan ɔttɛ babbu linaang ammɛ batta ka vveeng.
43003021	Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔnaangnɛ kwa kɔyyɛɛpnɛ ɔtta ubee ka buppwolo ɔkkɔɔnɛ buppwolo buyɔɔ balɔɔt basan battɛ kwa ɔnaangnɛ kule ka latele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
43003022	Nkwɔng kɔsaalnɛ, Jesus la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bamii ka ɛkpansi a Judaea ka ɛfɛɛn ɔtaanɛ baang la abbɛ ɔnaangbɛ baptizim.
43003023	John ɔgbaa ɔdɔkɔ ka kɛnaang a balɔɔt baptizim ka Aenon, ka bannyi balenɛ ppwap ka Aenon. Aenon ba ufulu ka assinɛ Salim. Balɔɔt bale baang ka bamiinɛ ɔnaangbɛ baptizim. (
43003024	Nkwɔng kɔdɔkɔ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya John ɔtakanɛ ka igbakkɔpɔ lile)
43003025	Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a John balɔk babee ikangala la wa Jew batum lafɔɔ kiyila bikkeep a kkwɔɔt.
43003026	Ɔzzánga bamii ka ɛfɛɛn a John battɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo, akke mung ɔlɔɔt wa ɔdɔkɔnɛ la annɔ ka kufoom a Jordan kwa livveluwee lɔfɔm, wa alɔɔknɛ kɔlɔɔk a ammɛ ɔɔ? Mung usseke ka kɛnaang a balɔɔt baptizim gedegede mung. Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔppyɛɛ umii ka ammɛ!”
43003027	John ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt wa ukkwoongnɛ ɔyanga bɔfɛɛn usi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lile unnyimɛnɛ ba ule.
43003028	Annyɔɔng alenɛyɔng ittɛɛsɛ anaam ka nttɛnɛ ‘Anaam Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ lissi, ɔzzànga basanganɛ anaam nkɔɔm ɛtɔk.’
43003029	Uyini-libbeel ulenɛ ɔyanga wanavva-libbeel. Ɛnngwa uyini-libbeel ebee ka lufoom ɛgɔpɔlɔ, eggele ka eppyeenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl a uyini-libbeel. Anaam nggele nffɔ ning.
43003030	Ammɛ ule ka ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa lɛbaang, anaam nle ɔlɔɔt wa utiti.
43003031	“Ammɛ wa ussinɛ ka libat uffu ɔttanɛ liggbenge ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ɔlɔɔt wa ussinɛ ka ɛkpansi ule wa ɛkpansi, kɔlɔɔk ɔlɔɔk kwa lilɔɔk ɛkpansi. Ɔzzànga ammɛ wa ussinɛ ka libat uffu ɔttanɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
43003032	Ɔbwɔɔlɔ bwa ɔyɛnnɛ ka zzeen uppyee ka latɔɔk, ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa uyilanɛ lɛmmwɔɔl ammɛ ba ule.
43003033	Ɔlɔɔt wa uyilanɛ lɛmmwɔɔl ammɛ ɔkɔɔm kwɛ akkwɛ uyila ɔttɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛlaak ba ɔlɔɔk.
43003034	Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔɔmnɛ ɔ̀lɔ́ɔk lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uvvoongmɛnɛ Kuyeeng ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
43003035	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm Awaan ɔsaapmɛ gaang gaang kwakkwɛ ɔsamnɛ bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔssɛɛnmɛ ka eddu.
43003036	Ɔlɔɔt duu wa uyilanɛ kwa Awaan, uddu kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ufimnɛ kwa Awaan, kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal baala uddu, ule ɔkɔɔng ka akama wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule ɔyɔɔmɛ.”
43004001	Balɔɔt a Pharisees bappyee battɛ Jesus ɔyangabong balɔɔt ɔnaangbɛ baptizim ɔtta John. (
43004002	Ka kkpɔɔ Jesus usi ɔlɔɔt baptizim lɛnaang. Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ keem banaangnɛ balɔɔt baptizim.)
43004003	Ɔzzánga Jesus uppyeenɛ kwa balenɛ lɛlɔɔk, ɔgbata Judea umii Galilee.
43004004	Umiinɛ ɔdɔkɔ ɔssɛ ɔtta Samaria.
43004005	Ɔffɔnɛ Samaria, umii ka lɛffɛ za lɛzzanganɛ Sychar. Sychar ba ufulu ka ussinɛ ka ɛkpansi ya Jacob unnyinɛ awaan Joseph.
43004006	Wɛɛl a Jacob ɔdɔkɔ baang. Ɔzzánga Jesus kɔssɛ kɔkɔɔtmɛnɛ, ɔkɔɔng baang ka lufoom a wɛɛl ɔtaa. Ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang livve lile ka littelenɛ.
43004007	Wanavva wa Samaria uffu kɛkap a bannyi, ɔzzánga Jesus ɔttɛ, “Annyinɛ bannyi nvva bɛɛ.” (
43004008	Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bamiibong kɛlɛɛp a kazzi.)
43004009	Wanavva ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Annɔ wa Jew, anaam wa Samaria, anaang nang abapnɛ attɛ nnyiwɔ bannyi?” (Balɔɔt a Jew la balɔɔt a Samaria, ommonggo ba batul.)
43004010	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Bulenɛ ka asannɛ bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyinɛ asan ɔlɔɔt wa ɔbapwɔnɛ bannyi, nzang asikili abapmɛ attɛ unnyiwɔ bannyi ba bannyinɛ kuddu.”
43004011	Wanavva ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Dedde, pokkiti ba ayanga. Wɛɛl kaang ɔddɔng lɔddɔng. Bannyi ’bɔng baang ba bannyinɛ kuddu bale bassiwɔ ka iyang?
43004012	Jacob, dedde ayyɔɔt wa iyɛddɛ iyɛddɛ, unnyinɛyɛlɛ wɛɛl ’wɔng mung. Ammɛ la bwaan ammɛ la lakɔmɔlɔ ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ bannyi bavva mung. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ atɔkwɔ kɛyɔɔng attɛ annɔ attanɛ Jacob; attamɛ mung ɔɔ?”
43004013	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔvvanɛ bannyi ’bɔng mung, batii ka bale basaapmɛ.
43004014	Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa ɔvvanɛ bannyi ba nle nnyimɛ, mɛ baala babɛlɛ lɛsaap. Bannyi ba anaam nle nnyimɛ vvenɛ basikilimɛ ɛggbɔlɔ ka tɔkɔlɔ ya ele ennyimɛ bannyi ba bannyinɛ kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal.”
43004015	Wanavva ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Dedde, annyinɛ bannyi ’bɔng baang! Ɔkkɔɔnɛ bannyi basinɛ lɛbɛlɛ lɛsaap nsi mung lɛbɛlɛ liffu nkap bannyi.”
43004016	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Amii akkwɔɔ walam annɔ affuyɔng.”
43004017	Ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Walam ba ntaka nyanga.” Jesus ɔttɛ, “Ale bbwak ka attɛnɛ walam ba ataka ayanga.
43004018	Allubong bwalam kubbwɔɔk. Walam wa allunɛ gedegede mung walam annɔ bbwak lissi. Abwɔɔlɔnɛbong lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk.”
43004019	Wanavva ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Nyɛnwɔbong dedde. Annɔ baang uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
43004020	Idedde ayyɔɔt balɔɔt a Samaria ya iyɛddɛ iyɛddɛ bazɔɔm bakkwɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka lɛttaal ’zɔng mung. Ɔzzànga annyɔɔng, balɔɔt a Jews, attɛyɔng Jerusalem ulenɛ ɛfɛɛn ya bubeenɛ izɔɔm ikkwɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
43004021	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Wanavva, ayila kwa anaam. Ɛkɛtɛ vvenɛ ɛffɔ ya balɔɔt bale basi ka libat a lɛttaal ’zɔng mung libee gɔɔ ka Jerusalem bazɔɔm bakkwɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
43004022	Annyɔɔng balɔɔt a Samaria ba asanyɔng bwa azɔɔmnɛ akkwɔɔyɔng. Ayyɔɔt balɔɔt a Jew isannɛ bwa izɔɔmnɛ, ikkwɔɔ ka kuddu kussinɛ ka balɔɔt a Jew kuffu.
43004023	Ɛkɛtɛ vvenɛ ɛffɔ gɔɔ ɛffɔbong, ya balɔɔt bale bazɔɔm bakkwɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ulenɛ, ka lakke Kuyeeng ammɛ. Vvenɛ bazɔɔm bakkwɔɔmɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɔsaapmɛnɛ.
43004024	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule Kuyeeng, balɔɔt bakɔɔm lakke Kuyeeng ammɛ keem bazɔɔm bakkwɔɔmɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ulenɛ.”
43004025	Wanavva ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Nsan lɔsan nttɛ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ vvenɛ uffu. Ɛkɛtɛ uffunɛ, vvenɛ ɔbwɔɔlɔyɛlɛ lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ.”
43004026	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Anaam wa nlɔɔknɛ mung la annɔ nlemɛnɛ ammɛ.”
43004027	Eseese balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bappyɛlɛ. Kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ gaang gaang ka bayɛnnɛ Jesus ka kutolo la wanavva. Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa ɔzzanɛ wanavva ’wɔng baang lɛmmwɔɔl ɔttɛ, “Aggyan ’bɔng?” ɔlɔk ɔbap Jesus ɔttɛ, “Atoloyɔng bɔng?” usi lile.
43004028	Ɔzzánga wanavva ’wɔng baang ɔgbata ekkpo-bannyi ɔkɔngɔ baang umii ɔbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt a lɛffɛ ɔttɛ,
43004029	“Affu ayɛnyɔng ɔlɔɔt wa ɔbwɔɔlɔnɛnɛ lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ sa nssinɛ nnaang. Baang Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ ɔɔ?”
43004030	Ɔzzánga bafeele bamii ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus.
43004031	Ning balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus balemɛ ka lakkpenge battɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo, azzi bɔfɛɛn bɛɛ!”
43004032	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Nyanga kazzi kwa nle ka nzzinɛ kwa annyɔɔng asinɛyɔng lɛsan.”
43004033	Ɔzzánga balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ babapbɛ kɛyɔɔng battɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk unnyimɛbong kazzi ɔɔ?”
43004034	Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Kazzi anaam ulenɛ kɛnaang a kwa ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtɔɔmnɛnɛ ɔggyannɛ la kivve kɛnaang ammɛ.
43004035	Ayangayɔng ifɛɛt ya attɛnɛyɔng ‘Ittuma inna tɛ́ttɛ́ bayaat liyaat.’ Yeek appyɛɛkyɔng itɔɔm ayɛnyɔng; iwopowopo ilatbong itii ya kɛyaat!
43004036	Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyaatnɛ liyaat ɔlɔngɔlo bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng baang uloko ka kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal ɔyanga ikipili nkwaaning uwoopuwoop la ɔyaat-ɔyaat bataa ka laggele.
43004037	Ifɛɛt ya ittɛnɛ, ‘Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk uwoopnɛ luwoop, ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔyaat lɔyaat’ ile ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
43004038	Ntɔɔmwɔyɔngbong nttɛ amii ayaatyɔng liyaat ka bɔtɔɔm bwa atakanɛyɔng kɛnaang baang lɛnaang. Balɔɔt balɔk banaangnɛ kɛnaang baang, annyɔɔng azziyɔng isak a kɛnaang abbɛ.”
43004039	Balɔɔt a Samaria gbadam bayila lɛmmwɔɔl a Jesus ka wanavva ’wɔng baang ulenɛ lɛttɛ, “Ɔbwɔɔlɔnɛbong lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ sa nssinɛ nnaang.”
43004040	Ɔzzánga balɔɔt a Samaria baffunɛ, bakkpengemɛ battɛ ukkwunu la abbɛ. Ɔzzánga Jesus ukkwunu baang la abbɛ ka bɛtɔm bɛffa,
43004041	Balɔɔt balɔk ppwap bayila lɛmmwɔɔl ammɛ bagbaa ɔssanga kutolo kwa utolonɛ.
43004042	Babwɔɔlɔ wanavva ’wɔng baang battɛ, “Iyilabong. Ɔzzànga ba iyila issanga ka kwa annɔ abwɔɔlɔnɛyɛlɛ. Iyila ka ayyɔɔt biini ilenɛ lippyee. Isanbong ittɛ ammɛ ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔkkalanɛ ɛkpansi ka lɔkkwɔɔn.”
43004043	Ukkwununɛ baang ka bɛtɔm bɛffa, umii Galilee.
43004044	Ammɛ biini ɔlɔɔkbong ɔttɛ, “Uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm latele ka ɛkpansi ammɛ biini ba ɔyanga”
43004045	Ɔffɔnɛ Galilee, batɔkmɛ ka laggele ka balenɛ Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ ka Jerusalem limii bayɛn lilɔɔk sa ɔnaangnɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ kazzi ’kwɔng baang.
43004046	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛ isimi isimi umii Cana ka Galilee, ɛfɛɛn a usikilinɛ bannyi basseke batak. Ɔlɔɔt a kɛnaang a government ɔdɔkɔ baang wa awaan usimɛnɛ lɛppwa ka Capernaum.
43004047	Uppyeenɛ ɔttɛ Jesus ussibong Judea uffu Galilee, umii ukkpengemɛ ɔttɛ umii uttula awaan wa likke lile ka lɛsaalmɛnɛ ka Capernaum.
43004048	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt wa ule uyila baala ule atakabong ayɛnyɔng bɛmaanga la lilɔɔk sa likɛɛlɛnɛ.”
43004049	Akkala ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Dedde, affu imiibong tɛ́ttɛ́ waan anaam ubbe.”
43004050	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Amii, waan annɔ vvenɛ uddu!” Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang uyila lɛmmwɔɔl a Jesus, umii.
43004051	Ɔffɔnɛ ka ɛtɔk, ududa ibɔɔyi ammɛ babwɔɔlɔmɛ battɛ, “Waan annɔ vvenɛ uddu!”
43004052	Ɔbapbɛ ɛkɛtɛ ya ussinɛ ɔsɛɛlɛ awaan. Babwɔɔlɔmɛ battɛ, “Ɔdɔkɔ ka ɛkalangka nnyɔn lisee kikoon ka ussinɛ baang ɔsɛɛlɛmɛ.”
43004053	Ɔzzánga abassɛ ukke ɔttɛ ɔdɔkɔ ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang bbwak ka Jesus ɔttɛnɛ, “Waan annɔ vvenɛ uddu.” Ɔzzánga ammɛ la balɔɔt a ssala ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ bayila lɛmmwɔɔl a Jesus.
43004054	Uwɔng ɔdɔkɔnɛ bɛmaanga bya ibaala bya Jesus ɔnaangnɛ ka ussinɛ Judea umii Galilee.
43005001	Nkwɔng kɔsaalnɛ, Jesus umii kazzi balɔɔt a luzɔɔm a Jew ka Jerusalem.
43005002	Libbwe lile baang lɛkkɛtɛ Lɛmma-kikku Itɔɔn ka Jerusalem. Lɛyanga ikkɔlɔ kubbwɔɔk. Bakkwɔɔ libbwe ’zɔng baang ‘Bethzatha’ ka kukaan a Hebrew.
43005003	Kibbi balɔɔt iffaak kɛdɔkɔ baang ka ikkɔlɔ ’yɔng baang ka bamminnɛ. Bassi-ifim la bannɔk-a-kikkwu la balɔɔt a lɔkkpɛɛk badɔkɔ baang. [Bataa bakat battɛ bannyi baggbuku.
43005004	Ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔmal ka tɔkɔlɔ libbwe umii uggbuku bannyi. Ɔlɔɔt iffaak wa uttemɛnɛ ka bannyi lifula ka ɛkɛtɛ baggbukunɛ, ɔppwamɛ ka iffaak ya ɔyanganɛ.]
43005005	Ɔlɔɔt ɔdɔkɔ baang wa ulemɛnɛ lɛffaak ka lɔlɔp la likkpa zzil la likkyaat.
43005006	Jesus ɔyɛnmɛnɛ baang ka umininɛ, ɔsan ɔttɛ ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔffaakmɛbong ɛkɛtɛ ɛlɔm. Ɔzzánga ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ, “Aggyan attɛ ɔppwawɔ ɔɔ?”
43005007	Upyepyeme ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Dedde, ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk mung ba nyanga wa ule ɔsamnɛ ɔssɛɛn ka bannyi ka ɛkɛtɛ baggbukunɛ. Nlenɛ ka kititiki kimii, ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk utte bakang lɛffɔ.”
43005008	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Afeele asam ewula annɔ assɛ.”
43005009	Eseese ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔppwamɛ. Ɔsam ewula ammɛ utte kɔssɛ. Kɛtɔm sa kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng kɔnaangnɛ kɛdɔkɔ Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ.
43005010	Ɔzzánga bazzilɛttɔ balɔɔt a Jew babwɔɔlɔ ɔlɔɔt wa Jesus uttulanɛ battɛ, “Ifɔɔfɔɔ ka atɔkɔnɛ ewula annɔ mmwɔɔn Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ.”
43005011	Ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt wa uttulanɛnɛ ɔttɛnɛ nsam ewula anaam nfula.”
43005012	Babapmɛ battɛ, “Nyinɔɔng ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang wa ɔbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛ ɔttɛ anaang ’kwɔng?”
43005013	Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang wa Jesus uttulanɛ usi Jesus lɛsan ka kibbi kɛttalanɛ gaang, Jesus ɔgbaa ule lɛwɛlɛlɛ ɔgbata.
43005014	Ɔttɛ ɔnaang, Jesus ɔyɛnmɛ ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛ ɔttɛ, “Gɔpɔlɔ, Mung ɔppwawɔbong, kkyaa kɛnaang a bubbi afɔngɔ nzang kɔlɔɔk kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ kɔsak ’kwɔng vvenɛ kɔnaangwɔ.”
43005015	Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔgbata umii ɔbwɔɔlɔ bazzilɛttɔ balɔɔt a Jews ɔttɛ Jesus uttulamɛnɛ.
43005016	Ɔzzánga babum kɛssɛɛn a Jesus ka kɔlɔɔk ka uttulanɛ ittula ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ.
43005017	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Dedde anaam ule ka kɛnaang ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Anaam ɔgbaa vvenɛ nssɛ nnaang ning baang.”
43005018	Lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng lɛnaang bazzilɛttɔ balɔɔt a Jew bakama lɔkama battina Jesus kɛwwɔɔl; ka ulenɛ lifɔɔ Kɛfɛkɛlɛ keem lissi, ɔgbaa ka ulenɛ lɛttɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ Abassɛ. Ning baang ɔlɔɔkbong ɔttɛ ammɛ ule ikɛkɛlɛ la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
43005019	Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔttɛ, “Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk: bwa Awaan ɔnaangnɛ kɛyɔɔng ka lakke ammɛ ba bule. Ɔnaang bwa ɔyɛnnɛ Abassɛ ka ɔnaangnɛ keem. Bwa Abassɛ ɔnaangnɛ, Awaan ɔnaang bwɛ abbwɛ.
43005020	Abbassɛ ka utelenɛ Awaan, ɔyɔɔ Awaan bɔfɛɛn duu bwa ɔnaangnɛ. Vvenɛ ɔyɔɔ Awaan bɛfɛɛn bwa Awaan ule ɔnaang bya bɛttanɛ ’byɔng, vvenɛ kɔkɛɛlɛwɔyɔng.
43005021	Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Abassɛ ufungalanɛ babbu unnyibɛ kuddu, A Waan-Ɔssɛ unnyi balɔɔt ba basaapmɛnɛ kuddu ning baang.
43005022	Abassɛ kɛkaal ɔlɔɔt ba ɔkaal. Unnyibong Awaan lakke za bbwak za kɛkaal a kɛkaal
43005023	ɔkkɔɔnɛ balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ batele Awaan tɛ̀ttɛ̀ batelenɛ Abassɛ. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa usinɛ Awaan litele, usibong Abassɛ wa ɔtɔɔmnɛnɛ litele.
43005024	“Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk nttɛ ɔlɔɔt wa uppyeenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl anaam, uyila kwa ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtɔɔmnɛnɛ, vvenɛ uddu kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal. Kɛkaal baala ɔkaal. Ɔttabong ka lubbe utii ka kuddu.
43005025	Mung nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk: ɛkɛtɛ ele ka ɛffɔnɛ, gɔɔ ɛffɔbong, ya babbu bale bappyee lɛmmwɔɔl a Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Balɔɔt ba bappyeenɛzɛ vvenɛ baddu.
43005026	Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Abassɛ ulenɛ unnyi-kuddu, ɔssɛbong ɔnaang Awaan ule unnyi-kuddu.
43005027	Unnyibong Awaan lakke za kɛkaal a kɛkaal ka ulenɛ Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ.
43005028	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ kɔkɛɛlɛwɔyɔng. Ɛkɛtɛ vvenɛ ɛffɔ ya babbu bale bappyee lɛmmwɔɔl ammɛ
43005029	batta ka lalli. Balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ budoddo vvenɛ bafungala baddu. Balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ bubbi vvenɛ bafungala bayɛn akama.
43005030	“Kɔlɔɔk kwa nkwoongnɛ nnaang ka lakke anaam ba kule. Nkaal kɛkaal tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔbwɔɔlɔnɛnɛ. Kɛkaal sa nkaalnɛ kile bbwak ka nsinɛ kwa luppyam anaam kɛyɔɔng lɛkaal, nkaal tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ammɛ wa ɔtɔɔmnɛnɛ ɔggyannɛ.
43005031	“Nlɔɔknɛ kwa luppyam anaam kɛyɔɔng, nzang tɛ̀ttɛ́ atɔkyɔng kwa nlɔɔknɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk.
43005032	Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ule baang wa ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔkkalanɛ. Nsan lɔsan nttɛ kwa ɔlɔɔknɛ utumnɛ kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
43005033	John ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa atɔɔmnɛyɔng bayilabɔtɔɔm annyɔɔng ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ. Ɔlɔɔk ubee la lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk.
43005034	Ba kule kɛttɛ ppyip nyanga ɔlɔɔt wa ubeenɛnɛ tɛɛsɛ. Nlɔɔk ’kwɔng ɔkkɔɔnɛ ataayɔng ka kuddu.
43005035	John ɔdɔkɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ otinika. Ukut, uwongolo ayɛnyɔng buppwolo ɔwaawɔyɔng.
43005036	Ɔzzànga nyanga tɛɛsɛ wa ɔlɔɔknɛ kɔlɔɔk anaam ɔtta kwa John ɔlɔɔknɛ. Linaang anaam lilɔɔknɛ kɔlɔɔk anaam liyɔɔ littɛ Dedde ɔtɔɔmnɛbong.
43005037	Dedde wa ɔtɔɔmnɛnɛ ɔgbaa ɔssɛ ɔlɔɔk ubee la anaam. Lɛmmwɔɔl mɛ yɔng ba ataka appyeeyɔng, gɔɔ kɛyɛnmɛ ka zzeen.
43005038	Lɛmmwɔɔl za ɔbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng ka ippyam ba assɛɛnyɔng ka asinɛyɔng liyila kwa ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtɔɔmnɛ.
43005039	Akkoopyɔng Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka attinanɛ attɛyɔng vvenɛ ayangayɔng kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal ka aggwɛ. Ɔzzànga Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ’gwɔng baang lɔlɔɔk kɔlɔɔk anaam!
43005040	Ba aggyan attɛ affuyɔng ka ɛfɛɛn anaam ataayɔng ka kuddu.
43005041	“Kibungu ka kamma ɔssɛbibbit ba nggyan.
43005042	Nsan lɔsan kɛssanga balɔɔt sa alenɛyɔng. Nsan lɔsan nttɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wɔyɔng ba ɔsaap.
43005043	Nkɔɔmbong lakke Dedde nffu ɔzzànga afimnɛyɔngbong kɛtɔk. Ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk uffunɛ la lakke za ammɛ, atɔkmɛyɔng.
43005044	Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔggyan kibungu ka kamma wabbɛ ɔzzànga ba aggyan attɛ anaangyɔng kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ubunguwɔnɛyɔng. Ale anaang nang atɔknɛyɔng?
43005045	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ attina attɛyɔng anaam nle nkkwɔɔwɔyɔng kɛkaal ka lusso Dedde. Moses wa ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng kɔbɛtɛwɔnɛyɔng kwa ammɛ ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ule ɔkkwɔɔwɔyɔng kɛkaal.
43005046	Bulenɛ ka ayilanɛyɔng kwa Moses ka lɔkkwɔɔn, nzang ayilayɔng mung kwa anaam ka lilɔɔk sa Moses ɔkkpɔknɛ litumnɛnɛ anaam.
43005047	Ngkka ka asinɛyɔng kwa ɔkkpɔknɛ liyila, ale anaang nang ayilayɔng kwa nlɔɔknɛ?”
43006001	Nkwɔng kɔsaalnɛ, Jesus umii kukupa libbwɛ a Galilee (lɛzzanga Libbwɛ a Tiberias ɔgbaa).
43006002	Kɛkaan a balɔɔt kikupmɛ ka balenɛ ittula ya uttulanɛ ka bɛmaanga lɛyɛn.
43006003	Jesus ubbulu lɛttaal umii ɔtaa-ɔtaa la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ.
43006004	Ɛkɛtɛ Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ ɛkkɛtɛbong.
43006005	Jesus uyeeknɛ ɔppyɛɛk ɔyɛn ɔttɛ kɛkaan a balɔɔt kikupmɛbong, ɔbap Philip ɔttɛ, “Kazzi ile iyɛn ’yang ilɛɛp kaddu balɔɔt ’bɔng mung?” (
43006006	Ule Philip ka kɛllɛ. Ammɛ biini ɔggba lɛsan bwa ule ɔnaang.)
43006007	Philip ɔttɛ, “Iggyannɛ ittɛ ezuku ɛffɔ ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ, vvenɛ ikɔɔm bɔfɛɛn busak lalɔp naira laffa ilɛɛp brɛɛd wa ule uddu.”
43006008	Andrew, ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ wa vvɔn, wa ulenɛ etele a Simon Peter ɔttɛ,
43006009	“Waanwalam ule mung wa ɔyanganɛ igɔngɔ a brɛɛd kubbwɔɔk la isɛɛnabannyi iffa, ɔzzànga baala iddu balɔɔt ’bɔng mung ka naka-naka,”
43006010	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Alɔɔkyɔngbɛ bataa-ɔtaa.” (Lifaat littala ɔttala baang) Ɔzzánga balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bataa-ɔtaa baang. Badɔkɔ innɔ zzɔɔppiffa la lalɔp zzɔɔp.
43006011	Jesus ɔsam brɛɛd ’wɔng baang, uwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang, ɔtɔk ɔbɛngɛlɛbɛ. Ɔbbal isɛɛnabannyi lɛsam, ɔbbal Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang liwomo, ɔtɔk ɔbɛngɛlɛbɛ, bazzi bawukala.
43006012	Bawukalanɛ, ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Attɔngyɔng izuku ya issekenɛ, tɛ̀ttɛ́ ezuku ɛlɔk ɛbɛpɛ.”
43006013	Ɔzzánga battɔng izuku ya issekenɛ ya igɔngɔ a brɛɛd kubbwɔɔk ’yɔng baang bassɛɛn ka isangala zzɔɔppiffa iyipi.
43006014	Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bayɛnnɛ bɛmaanga bya Jesus ɔnaangnɛ, battɛ, “Uwɔng uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm aawɛ wa ulenɛ ka kiffu ka ɛkpansi ’yɔng ka lɔkkwɔɔn!”
43006015	Jesus ɔsannɛ ɔttɛ bale ka bakaamɛnɛ kibeet ka lagabwɔ, ɔgbata ubbulu lattaal kɛyɔɔng umii.
43006016	Kulele kɔnaangnɛ, balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus bafeele bamii ka libbwe.
43006017	Bamal ka akkpaat bawaat bappyɛlɛ isimisimi. Bale ka kɛzza libbwe kikum kimii Capernaum. Usulbɛ ka Jesus ɔtakanɛ ka ɛfɛɛn abbɛ lile.
43006018	Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang, kɛffa sa kɛkkaamnɛ kɛffa kiggbuku bannyi.
43006019	Bawaatnɛ akkpaat tɔttɔt bamii, bayɛn Jesus ka ɔssɛnɛ ka ɛkkpabannyi uffu kɛtɛkɛtɛ akkpaat. Ɔbbwɔpɔbɛ.
43006020	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔbbwɔpɔwɔyɔng, anaam tɛ!”
43006021	Ɔzzánga baggele gaang gaang basam Jesus bassɛɛn ka akkpaat eseese akkpaat ɔffɔ ka ɛkpansi ɛfɛɛn ya balenɛ ka kimii.
43006022	Ɔffɔnɛ libessolo, kibbi balɔɔt sa kɛtaanɛ ka kukupa libbwe kwa kkwɔn bakke battɛ akkpaat vvɔn keem ussekenɛ baang. Basan battɛ Jesus usi ka akkpaat lɛmal la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ, bagbatabong bakɔngɔmɛ ka isimi.
43006023	Ikkpaat ilɔk ya issinɛ Tiberias iffu ibee ka lɛgga kɛtɛkɛtɛ ɛfɛɛn ya balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bázzinɛ brɛɛd wa Uyini uwomonɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang tɛ́ttɛ́ bazzi.
43006024	Kibbi ’sɔng baang kɛkɔɔlɔnɛ battɛ Jesus baang ba ule, gɔɔ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ baang mgbaa ba bale, bamal ka ikkpaat ’yɔng baang bamii baggyanmɛ ka Capernaum.
43006025	Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bayɛnnɛ Jesus ka kukupa libbwe kwa kkwɔn, battɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo, kaang affɔ ɛkɛtɛ nang?”
43006026	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk: aggyannɛyɔng ka alenɛyɔng brɛɛd lizzi tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔyyɛɛpwɔnɛyɔng. Nɛyɔng ba aggyanyɔng ka asannɛyɔng ifɛɛt imaanga ya nnaangnɛ.
43006027	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ anaangyɔng kɛnaang kwa kazzi kwa kale kabɛpɛ. Lutini ’gwɔng, anaangyɔng kɛnaang kwa kazzi kwa kattumunɛ kɛfal a kɛfal. Uwɔng baang ulenɛ kazzi kwa Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ule unnyiwɔyɔng ka Abassɛ ulenɛ eleme kiyila kamma lɛnaang ka kkwɔɔt a Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-’wɔng baang.”
43006028	Ɔzzánga babap Jesus battɛ, “Ile inaang nang ikkwoong inaang kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛnɛ inaang?”
43006029	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyannɛ ɔttɛ anaangyɔng ulenɛ kiyila lɛmmwɔɔl a ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtɔɔmnɛ.”
43006030	Abbɛ battɛ, “Bɛmaanga bya ale anaang ayɔɔyɛlɛ iyɛn iyila lɛmmwɔɔl annɔ, bilenɛ bɔka abbyɛ? Ale anaang mbɔng?
43006031	Balɔɔt ayyɔɔt ba iyɛddɛ iyɛddɛ bazzi manna ka kkpelenene tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, ‘Unnyibɛ brɛɛd wa ussinɛ ka libat bazzi.’ ”
43006032	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk: kazzi kwa Moses unnyiwɔnɛyɔng azziyɔng, brɛɛd wa ussinɛ ka libat lissi. Dedde anaam unnyiwɔnɛyɔng brɛɛd wa ussinɛ ka libat ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
43006033	Brɛɛd wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyinɛ ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang wa ussinɛ ka libat uffu unnyi ɛkpansi kuddu.”
43006034	Babap Jesus battɛ, “Dedde, annyiyɛlɛ brɛɛd ’wɔng baang ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.”
43006035	Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Anaam nlenɛ brɛɛd a kuddu. Ɔlɔɔt wa ukupnɛnɛ baala ɔkkwa buwɔɔng. Ɔlɔɔt wa uyilanɛ kwa anaam, bannyi mɛ baala basaap.
43006036	Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔngbong kkpal nttɛ ayɛnnɛyɔngbong ɔzzànga baala ayilayɔng.
43006037	Ɔlɔɔt duu wa Dedde ulenɛnɛ linnyi vvenɛ ukupnɛ. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa uffunɛ ka ɛfɛɛn anaam, mɛ baala nfim,
43006038	ka nlenɛ ka libat lissi nffu nnaang kwa ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtɔɔmnɛnɛ ɔttɛnɛ nnaang, nsi kwa luppyam anaam lɛnaang.
43006039	Nkwɔng kulenɛ kwa ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtɔɔmnɛnɛ ɔttɛnɛ nnaang. Ɔttɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ ntaka ɔlɔɔt vvɔn gbɔɔ ka ɔkkpɛlɛ balɔɔt ba ulenɛnɛ linnyi. Nfungalabɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ka lubbe ka kɛtɔm-a-lakpeke.
43006040	Dedde ɔggyan ɔttɛ balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba bayɛnnɛ Awaan bayila lɛmmwɔɔl ammɛ, baddu kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal. Anaam vvenɛ nfungalabɛ ka lubbe ka kɛtɔm-a-lakpeke.”
43006041	Balɔɔt a Jew ’bɔng baang bazzɔ eseese ka ɔttɛnɛ, “Anaam nlenɛ brɛɛd wa ussinɛ ka libat uffu.”
43006042	Ɔzzánga battɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung Jesus, waan a Joseph, ammɛ lissi ɔɔ? Isan abakka la abassɛ lɔsan, ɔnaang nang ɔttɛ ammɛ ussi ka libat uffu.”
43006043	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ abɛlɛyɔng annyɔɔng annyɔɔng lɛzzɔ!
43006044	Ɔlɔɔt wa ukkwoongnɛ uffu ukupnɛ ba ule; Dedde wa ɔtɔɔmnɛnɛ usinɛ ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang littulu unnyinɛ. Vvenɛ nfungala ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ka lubbe ka kɛtɔm-a-lakpeke.
43006045	Bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bakkpɔk battɛ, ‘Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ukopolo ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ.’ Ɔlɔɔt duu wa uppyeenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl a Dedde ukkoop kɔlɔɔk ka ammɛ, ukupnɛnɛ anaam.
43006046	Ba kule kɛttɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔyɛnbong dedde, ammɛ wa ussinɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm keem ulenɛ Abassɛ lɛyɛn.
43006047	Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk: Ɔlɔɔt wa uyilanɛ, ɔyanga kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal.
43006048	Anaam nlenɛ brɛɛd a kuddu.
43006049	Idedde annyɔɔng ba iyɛddɛ iyɛddɛ bazzi manna ka kasɛkɛ kɛmat ɔzzànga balɔngɔlɔ babbe tɔttɔt.
43006050	Ɔzzànga brɛɛd wa ussinɛ ka libat uffu ule kɛssanga sa ɔlɔɔt duu wa uzzinɛsɛ ule usi lɛbɛlɛ libbe.
43006051	Anaam nlenɛ brɛɛd wa ulenɛ ka kuddu ussi ka libat uffu. Ɔlɔɔt wa uzzinɛ brɛɛd ’wɔng mung uddu kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal. Brɛɛd wa nle nnyimɛ ulenɛ ɛkkpakkwɔɔt anaam ya nsamnɛ nnyi ɔkkɔɔnɛ ɛkpansi ɛtaa ka kuddu.”
43006052	Nkwɔng kɔdɛm ikangala ya ikkaamnɛ ittɔbɛ ka bɛzzɔkɔ. Battɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng ulenɛ nyinɔɔng wa unnyinɛyɛlɛ ɛkkpakkwɔɔt ammɛ izzi.”
43006053	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk: asinɛyɔng ɛkkpakkwɔɔt a Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ lizzi, avvayɔng linnyi ammɛ, ka kuddu baala ataayɔng.
43006054	Ɔlɔɔt duu wa uzzinɛ ɛkkpakkwɔɔt anaam ɔvva linnyi anaam, vvenɛ uddu kɛfal a kɛfal, nfungalamɛ ɔtaa ka kuddu ka kɛtɔm-a-lakpeke.
43006055	Ɛkkpakkwɔɔt anaam elenɛ kazzi kwa lɔkkwɔɔn, linnyi anaam lile kɛvva sa lɔkkwɔɔn.
43006056	Ɔlɔɔt duu wa uzzinɛ ɛkkpakkwɔɔt anaam, ɔvva linnyi anaam ulenɛ ka luppyam anaam nle ka luppyam ammɛ.
43006057	Dedde wa usinɛ libbe ɔtɔɔmnɛnɛ, anaam nddu kwa ammɛ. Kɔssɛ kule ning baang: ɔlɔɔt duu wa uzzinɛnɛ vvenɛ uddu kwa anaam.
43006058	Uwɔng ulenɛ brɛɛd wa ussinɛ ka libat uffu. Brɛɛd ’wɔng ba ule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ brɛɛd wa balɔɔt annyɔɔng ba iyɛddɛ iyɛddɛ bazzinɛ balɔngɔlɔ babbe. Ɔlɔɔt wa uzzinɛ brɛɛd ’wɔng mung vvenɛ uddu kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal.”
43006059	Jesus ɔlɔɔk ’byɔng ka ɛkɛtɛ ulenɛ ka kikopolo ka ggwoon a mitin ka Capernaum.
43006060	Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ppwap bappyeenɛ ’kwɔng, battɛ, “Lukopolo ’gwɔng lukoolobong lɔsak, nyinɛ ule ukkwoong uppyeegwɛ?”
43006061	Gɔɔ mɛ ba bataka babwɔɔlɔ, Jesus ɔggba lɛsan kɛyɔɔng ɔttɛ bale ka kɛzzɔ batum lukopolo ’gwɔng baang. Ɔzzánga ɔttɛ, “Nkwɔng kule ka kɔnaangwɔnɛyɔng uttunwɔyɔng ɔɔ?
43006062	Ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn a ayɛnnɛyɔng Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ɔppyɛlɛnɛ umii ka ɛfɛɛn a ɔdɔkɔnɛ bɛɛ?
43006063	Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kunnyinɛ kuddu; lakke ɔlɔɔt baang ba kule kpong-kpong. Lɛmmwɔɔl za nlɔɔknɛ mung lɛkɔɔmnɛ Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kwa kunnyinɛ kuddu liffu,
43006064	ɔzzànga annyɔɔng balɔk ba ayilayɔng.” (Jesus ɔggba lɛsan balɔɔt ba bale basi liyila la ɔlɔɔt wa ule uzzi issɛ ammɛ.)
43006065	Ɔbbal lɛttɛ, “Ngkwɔng kulenɛ kwa nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ule ukkwoong ukupnɛ ba ule Dedde ɔtakabong uyila ɔttɛ ukupnɛ.”
43006066	Ngkwɔng kɔdɛm balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus ppwap basimɛ lɛbɛlɛ likup.
43006067	Ɔzzánga ɔbap bayilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ ba zzɔɔppabaffa ɔttɛ, “Annyɔɔng ɔgbaa vvenɛ agbatayɔng ɔɔ?”
43006068	Simon Peter ɔttɛ, “Uyini, ile igbata imii ikup nyinɔɔng? Annɔ ayanganɛ lɛmmwɔɔl za linnyinɛ kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal.
43006069	Iyilabong isan ittɛ annɔ alenɛ Usi-bubbi lɛnaang wa ussinɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
43006070	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Anaam nsangawɔnɛyɔng annyɔɔng ba zzɔɔppabaffa ’bɔng. Ning lissi ɔɔ? Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ule mung ka bɛzzɔkɔ annyɔɔng wa ulenɛ ɔbbyap!”
43006071	Ɔdɔkɔ ɔlɔɔk utum Judas, waan a Simon Iscariot. Uvve Judas ule ka kɛkaan a bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus ba zzɔɔppabaffa, ɔzzànga ule ka ɛtɔk a kizzi Jesus issɛ.
43007001	Ngkwɔng kɔsaalnɛ, ɔssɛ ukkpit Galilee. Usi lɛggyan ɔttɛ umii Judea ka bazzilɛttɔ a Jew ba balenɛ bakang baggyanmɛnɛ kɛwwɔɔl.
43007002	Ɛkɛtɛ Likkpɛɛ balɔɔt a Jew ɛkkɛtɛbong.
43007003	Ɔzzánga itele a Jesus battɛ, “Agbata amii Judea ɔkkɔɔnɛ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ annɔ bayɛn lilɔɔk sa anaangnɛ.
43007004	Ɔlɔɔt wa ulupnɛ kwa ɔnaangnɛ ba ule, ɔggyannɛ ɔttɛ balɔɔt basanmɛ. Ka alenɛ ka kɛnaang a bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung, kɔyyɛɛp ka ɛkpansi ɔkkpɛlɛ ɛsanwɔnɛ!” (
43007005	Gbaak la itele ammɛ ba bayila lɛmmwɔɔl ammɛ.)
43007006	Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɛkɛtɛ anaam ya bbwak ba ɛtaka ɛffɔ. Ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ elewɔyɔng annyɔɔng bbwak.
43007007	Annyɔɔng ba akkwoong atunyɔng ɛkpansi, anaam ntunnɛyɛ, ka nbwɔɔlɔnɛyɛ ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ nttɛ linaang annyɛ ba liyyɛɛp.
43007008	Annyɔɔng amiiyɔng likkpɛɛ, anaam baala nmii likkpɛɛ ’sɔng mung ka ɛkɛtɛ ya bbwak ɛtakanɛnɛ lɛffɔ.”
43007009	Ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ’kwɔng ɔkɔɔng ka Galilee ɔtaa.
43007010	Itele ammɛ balenɛ likkpɛɛ limii, Jesus ɔssɛ umii. Ɔzzànga kyaakyaa usi lɛssɛ umii, ɔdɔkɔ ɔbɔɔl lɔbɔɔl umii.
43007011	Bazzilɛttɔ balɔɔt a Jew badɔkɔmɛ ka kɛggyan ka likkpɛɛ. Babap, “Ule?”
43007012	Balɔɔt bazzaap ka kibbi ’sɔng baang gaang gaang batum Jesus battɛ, “Jesus, ɔlɔɔt wa doddo.” Balɔɔt balɔk attɛ, “Ihii, Jesus ɔlɔɔt wa doddo lissi, ule ka kɛfɛɛt a balɔɔt.”
43007013	Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa ɔlɔɔknɛ utummɛ ppwool ppwool ba ule ka ɔbbwɔpɔnɛbɛ kwa bazzilɛttɔ balɔɔt a Jew.
43007014	Likkpɛɛ lisseke ssup nzang lisaal ka Jesus umiinɛ ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ubee kikopolo.
43007015	Kɔkɛɛlɛ bazzilɛttɔ balɔɔt a Jew battɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng ɔnaang nang ɔsannɛ kɔlɔɔk ning ka ɔtakanɛ lukkoop ɛkɛtɛ ɛlɔk limii?”
43007016	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Lukopolo gwa nkopolonɛ mung ka anaam ba lussi, lussi ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔtɔɔmnɛnɛ.
43007017	Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔggyannɛ ɔttɛ ɔnaang kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛnɛ ɔnaang, vvenɛ ɔsan ulenɛ ka kwa nkopolonɛ kussinɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔk nlɔɔk luppyam anaam.
43007018	Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔlɔɔknɛ kwa luppyam ammɛ ule ka kɛggyan a latele za ammɛ. Ɔzzànga ammɛ wa ɔggyannɛ latele za ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtɔɔmnɛnɛ, ule ɔlɔɔt wa doddo. Bubbi ba ɔnaang.
43007019	Moses unnyiwɔnɛyɔng Lafɔɔ, ammɛ lissi ɔɔ? Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt vvɔn gbɔɔ Lafɔɔ ’zɔng baang usi liloko. Mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ abumnɛyɔng kɛwwɔɔl?”
43007020	Kibbi balɔɔt ’sɔng baang kɛttɛ, “Apiliza ilewɔ baang ka lɛttɔ. Attɛ nyinɛ ubumwɔnɛ kɛwwɔɔl?”
43007021	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Nnaangbong bɛmaanga bbyɔn mung ɔkkpɛlɛ kɔkɛɛlɛwɔyɔng.
43007022	Moses unnyiwɔyɔng lakke ɔttɛ azzayɔng bwɔɔn annyɔɔng lataa (kkpɔɔ Moses lissi, balɔɔt annyɔɔng ba iyɛddɛ iyɛddɛ battenɛkwɛ), azzayɔngbɛ lataa ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ.
43007023	Azzanɛ waanawalam lɛtaa ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ nkwaaning asi Lafɔɔ Moses lɛyyaa, kutunwɔyɔng mbɔng ka nttulanɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔppwamɛ kkwasak ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ?
43007024	Oggbe ukpekewɔyɔng kɛkɔɔm a lafɔɔ a vveeng kinnyi ɔlɔɔt kibbi. Akɔɔmyɔng lafɔɔ za lɔkkwɔɔn.”
43007025	Balɔɔt a Jerusalem balɔk battɛ, “Uwɔng ɔlɔɔt wa bazzilɛttɔ baggyannɛ kɛwwɔɔl lissi ɔɔ?
43007026	Ppyɛɛk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ubeenɛ ka kɛkaan utolo kutolo, ɔzzànga lɛmmwɔɔl lɛlɔk ba bazza batummɛ! Vvenɛ mung basan mung battɛ ammɛ ulenɛ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ ɔɔ?
43007027	Ɛkɛtɛ ya Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ ule uffu, ɔlɔɔt wa ule ɔsan ɛfɛɛn a ussinɛ ba ule. Ɔzzànga mung ayyɔɔt isan lɔsan ɛfɛɛn a ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung ussinɛ uffu.”
43007028	Jesus ka ulenɛ ka kikopolo ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔlɔɔk ɔgaga ɔttɛ, “Asannɛyɔng mung bbwak ɔbɛtɛ la ɛfɛɛn a nssinɛ ɔɔ? Ka lakke anaam biini lissi ka nffunɛ. Ammɛ wa ɔtɔɔmnɛnɛ lɛlaak ba ɔlɔɔk. Mɛ yɔng ba asanyɔng.
43007029	anaam nsanmɛnɛ ka nssinɛ ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ.”
43007030	Babummɛ kɛkaa kitup ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa usingimɛnɛ kɔbɔɔk usi lile ka ɛkɛtɛ ammɛ ɛtakanɛ lɛffɔ.
43007031	Balɔɔt ppwap ka kibbi balɔɔt ’sɔng baang bayila lɛmmwɔɔl ammɛ battɛ, “Ɛkɛtɛ ya Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ ule uffu vvenɛ ɔnaang bɛmaanga bɛsak bya ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung ɔnaangnɛ ɔɔ?”
43007032	Balɔɔt a Pharisees bappyeenɛ balɔɔt ka bazzaapnɛ ka kibbi ’sɔng baang batum Jesus, abbɛ la bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm batɔɔm ippoliisi battɛ bamii bakaa Jesus.
43007033	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Vvenɛ ntaa la annyɔɔng ka ɛkɛtɛ ssup tɛ́ttɛ́ nppyɛlɛ nmii ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ wa ɔtɔɔmnɛnɛ.
43007034	Vvenɛ aggyannɛyɔng ɔzzànga nɛ yɔng baala ayɛn, ka ale asi likkwoong affɔyɔng ka ɛfɛɛn ya nle nle.”
43007035	Bazzilɛttɔ a Jew battɛ, “Ɔttɛ ule ka umiinɛ ɛfɛɛn ’yɔyɔng ya ayyɔɔt ile isimɛ lɛyɛn? Ule ka umiinɛ ka billu a Greece ɛfɛɛn a balɔɔt ayyɔɔt bataanɛ ukopolo balɔɔt a Greece ɔɔ?
43007036	Ɔttɛ vvenɛ iggyanmɛ ɔzzànga me baala iyɛn. Ɔbbal lɛttɛ ba ikkwoong imii ka ɛfɛɛn ya ule ule. Ning baang ɔlɔɔk nang?”
43007037	Ɔffɔnɛ ka kɛtɔm-a-lakpeke likkpɛɛ sa kɛttanɛ ka kɔlɔɔk lile, Jesus ufeele ubee ɔlɔɔk gagaga ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt duu wa bannyi basaapmɛnɛ uffu ukupnɛ ɔvva bannyi.
43007038	Kule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, ‘Ɔlɔɔt duu wa uyilanɛ kwa anaam, bannyi ba bannyinɛ kuddu vvenɛ bassimɛ ka luppyam battɔl.’ ”
43007039	Jesus ɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng utum Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kwa balɔɔt ba bayilanɛ lɛmmwɔɔl ammɛ bale batɔk. Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la kinnyi ba kɔtaka kule ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtakanɛ Jesus lifungala ka lubbe ɔtaa ka budoddo.
43007040	Balɔɔt balɔk ka kibbi ’bɔng baang bappyeenɛ ka Jesus ɔlɔɔknɛ ning baang, battɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm aawɔng ka lɔkkwɔɔn!”
43007041	Balɔɔt balɔk battɛ, “Baang Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ!” Balɔɔt balɔk battɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ baala ule wa Galilee!
43007042	Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ ule ussi ka kikkwu Ubeet, David. Bale bamaatmɛ ka Bethlehem ka ɛfɛɛn a David ullunɛ.”
43007043	Ɔzzánga ikangala ittɔ ka kibbi ’sɔng baang ka kɔlɔɔk a Jesus.
43007044	Balɔɔt balɔk babubumɛ kɛkaa ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa usingimɛnɛ kɔbɔɔk usi lile.
43007045	Ippoliisi ’yɔng baang ippyɛlɛnɛ isimisimi, bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la bazzilɛttɔ balɔɔt a Pharisees babapbɛ, “Kule nang asimɛnɛyɔng lɛkɔɔm affuyɔng?”
43007046	Ippoliisi ittɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ba ɔtaka ule wa ɔlɔɔknɛ kɛlɔɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang!”
43007047	Balɔɔt a Pharisees babapbɛ battɛ, “Ɔnaangwɔyɔngbong annyɔɔng agbigbiniyɔng ɔgbaa ɔɔ?
43007048	Ka assinɛ afalyɔng, asanyɔngbong uzzilɛttɔ, ɔlɔk ɔlɔɔt a Pharisees wa uyilanɛ kwa ammɛ ɔɔ?
43007049	Kibbi ’sɔng baang Lafɔɔ a Moses ba basan. Bale ka ntɛm a nzɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm!”
43007050	Ɔlɔɔt a Pharisee wa vvɔn ɔdɔkɔ Nicodemus wa umiinɛ ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus kkpal. Ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ,
43007051	“Ulenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Lafɔɔ ayyɔɔt lalɔɔknɛ, ba ikkwoong izza kɛkaal ɔlɔɔt ittɛ kɛbbɔlmɛbong ka itakanɛ lippyee kamma kɛkaal ammɛ isan bwa ulenɛ lɛzzɔɔk.”
43007052	Battɛ, “Annɔ ɔgbaa assi Galilee ɔɔ? Akkoop luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, asan attɛ uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔk ba ɔtaka ussi Galilee.”
43008001	[Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ufeele ufula. Jesus ufeele umii ka Lɛttaal a Olives.
43008002	Ɔffɔnɛ lɔfɔm a lɔfɔm a libessolo, ɔppyɛlɛ umii ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Balɔɔt babbi bakkpitmɛ. Ammɛ ɔtaa-ɔtaa ukopolobɛ.
43008003	Bakopolo-Lafɔɔ la balɔɔt a Pharisees bakɔɔm wanavva wa bakaamɛnɛ la walam baffu, bamatmɛ baang ka lusso abbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
43008004	Balɔɔk la Jesus battɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo, ikaa wanavva ’wɔng mung ka ulenɛ ka kimini la walam.
43008005	Ka Lafɔɔ ayyɔɔt, Moses ɔttɛ itɔɔp kɛssanga wanavva sa ning mung lattaal iwwɔɔl. Ngkka annɔ alɔɔk nang?”
43008006	Baggyan battɛ bassɛɛn Jesus ka kɔlɔɔk ɔlɔk bakaamɛ. Keem Jesus ɔkpɔkɔ ɔkɔɔm kɛnnɔ ɔkkpɔk ka lisse.
43008007	Ka balenɛ baang ka babeenɛ babapmɛ ibap ’yɔng baang, ufeele ubee zzip ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ulenɛ baang ka bɛzzɔkɔ annyɔɔng wa ɔtakanɛ bubbi lɛnaang, ɔkɔɔm ɛtɔk ɔtɔɔp wanavva ’wɔng mung lɛttaal ikeeng.”
43008008	Ɔppyɛlɛ isimisimi umii ɔbbal ka lisse lɛkkpɔk.
43008009	Bappyeenɛ ning baang, ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔt ɔgbata. Batumalɔɔt bakɔɔmnɛ ɛtɔk bagbata. Usseke Jesus kɛyɔɔng la wanavva ’wɔng baang ka kibee.
43008010	Jesus ufeele ubee zzip ɔlɔɔk la wanavva ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Bale yang? Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk mung ba ɔbɛlɛ lile ɔwwɔɔlwɔ ɔɔ?”
43008011	Wanavva ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ba ɔbɛlɛ lile tɛ, Dedde.” Jesus ɔttɛ, “Kɔyyɛɛppɔyyɛɛp, gɔɔ anaam wɔ baala nwwɔɔl. Amii, tɛ̀ttɛ́ abɛlɛ bubbi lɛnaang.”]
43008012	Jesus ɔbbal la balɔɔt a Pharisees lɛlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Anaam nlenɛ buppwolo ɛkpansi. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ukupnɛnɛ vvenɛ ɔyanga buppwolo kuddu, ka kisul baala ɔssɛ.”
43008013	Balɔɔt a Pharisees battɛ, “Mung appyɛɛ alɔɔk abee la annɔ biini kɛyɔɔng tɛ. Bwa alɔɔknɛ baang alɔɔk gbɔɔ azzɔɔk tɛ.”
43008014	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Ning lissi. Nkkpandɔk nlɔɔk nbee la anaam kɛyɔɔng, kwa nlɔɔknɛ kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn, ka nsannɛ ɛfɛɛn ya nssinɛ la ɛfɛɛn ya nle ka nmiinɛ. Annyɔɔng ba asanyɔng ɛfɛɛn ya nssinɛ nffu, la ɛfɛɛn ya nle ka nmminɛ.
43008015	Akaalyɔng kɛkaal tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔssɛbitbit bakaalnɛ. Anaam ɔlɔɔt kibbi ba nnyi.
43008016	Bulenɛ wa nnyinɛ ɔlɔɔt kibbi, nzang kinnyi kibbi sa nle nnyi kile ka lɔkkwɔɔn, ka nsinɛ kɛyɔɔng ka ’kwɔng libee. Dedde wa ɔtɔɔmnɛnɛ ubee la anaam.
43008017	Bakkpɔk ka Lafɔɔ annyɔɔng battɛ ittɛɛsɛ iffa iyanganɛ kamma kɛkaal kkwɔn, kwa balɔɔknɛ kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
43008018	Anaam nlɔɔk kwa anaam biini. Dedde wa ɔtɔɔmnɛnɛ ɔssɛ ɔlɔɔk ubee la anaam.”
43008019	Babapmɛ battɛ, “Ssaawɔ ule yang?” Jesus ɔttɛ, “Anaam la Dedde anaam yɔngyɛlɛ ba asanyɔng. Busannɛnɛyɔng, nzang asanyɔng mung Dedde anaam ɔgbaa.”
43008020	Jesus ɔlɔɔk ’byɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ulenɛ ka kikopolo ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka tɔkɔlɔ lɛnɔk za balokonɛ likulu za bassɛɛnnɛ lɛsɔɔk. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔkaamɛnɛ usi lile ka ɛkɛtɛ ammɛ ɛtakanɛ lɛffɔ.
43008021	Jesus ɔbbal lɛttɛ, “Nle ka ngbatanɛ. Vvenɛ aggyannɛyɔng ɔzzànga vvenɛ abbeyɔng ka bubbi annyɔɔng. Ba akkwoong amiiyɔng ka ɛfɛɛn anaam nle ka nmiinɛ.”
43008022	Bazzilɛttɔ Jew battɛ, “Ɔttɛ ‘Ba ikkwoong imii ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ ule ka umiinɛ.’ Baang ulenɛ kɛttɛ vvenɛ ɔwwɔɔlmɛ kɛyɔɔng ɔɔ?”
43008023	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Annyɔɔng alenɛyɔng ba ɛkpansi ’yɔng mung kuttɔɔk, anaam nssi ka libat nffu. Annyɔɔng assiyɔng ka ɛkpansi ’yɔng. Anaam ka ɛkpansi ’yɔng ba nssi
43008024	kwakkwɛ nbwɔɔlwɔnɛyɔng nttɛ vvenɛ abbeyɔng ka bubbi annyɔɔng asinɛyɔng liyila attɛyɔng ‘Anaam Nlenɛ Wa Nlenɛ Mung!’ ”
43008025	Babapmɛ battɛ, “Annɔ alenɛ nnyinɛ?” Jesus ɔttɛ, “Bwa nggbawɔnɛyɔng lissi nbwɔɔlɔ ka lɔnnyɔ.
43008026	Lilɔɔk lilenɛ ppwap sa nle nlɔɔk ntumwɔyɔng. Lilɔɔk ’sɔng baang lile lissɛɛnwɔyɔng ka kɔlɔɔk. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtɔɔmnɛnɛ lɛlaak ba ɔlɔɔk. Anaam nbwɔɔlɔ ɛkpansi kɔlɔɔk kwa nppyeenɛ ka ammɛ keem.”
43008027	Basi lɛsan battɛ Jesus ulebɛ ka kɛbwɔɔlɔ kɔlɔɔk kitum Abassɛ.
43008028	Ɔttɛ, “Ɛkɛtɛ ya ale ayeekyɔng Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ka libat, vvenɛ asan attɛyɔng ‘Anaam Nlenɛ Wa Nlenɛ Mung’; vvenɛ asan attɛyɔng bwa nnaangnɛ ka lakke anaam biini ba bule. Nlɔɔk bwa Dedde ulenɛnɛ lɛdda ɔttɛ nlɔɔk.
43008029	Ammɛ wa ɔtɔɔmnɛnɛ ule la anaam ka ubeenɛ. Nɛ ba ɔtaka ɔgbata ɔkɔngɔ kɛyɔɔng ka nnaangnɛ kwa kɔsaapmɛnɛ ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.”
43008030	Balɔɔt ppwap ba bappyeenɛ Jesus ka ɔlɔɔknɛ kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng mung bayila lɛmmwɔɔl ammɛ.
43008031	Jesus ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt ba bayilanɛ lɛmmwɔɔl ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Ayilanɛyɔng kwa lukopolo anaam, nzang vvenɛ alenɛyɔng balɔɔt a kɔssɛ anaam ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
43008032	Vvenɛ asanyɔng lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk, lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk ’gwɔng baang vvenɛ lɔsangawɔyɔng ka bubili.”
43008033	Abbɛ battɛ, “Ayyɔɔt balɔɔt a kikkwu a Abraham. Babili ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ba itaka ile. Alɔɔk nang ka attɛnɛ, ‘Vvenɛ attayɔng ka bubili’?”
43008034	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Mung nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk: ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔnaangnɛ bubbi ulenɛ ubili bubbi.
43008035	Ubili wa itutum ba ule kɛfal a kɛfal. Waan itutum ulenɛ wa itutum kɛfal ɛ kɛfal.
43008036	Awaan-Ɔsangawɔnɛyɔng ka bubili, nzang vvenɛ attayɔng ka bubili ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
43008037	Nsan lɔsan nttɛ annyɔɔng balɔɔt a kikkwu Abraham, ɔzzànga mung alenɛyɔng ka kibum a kɛwwɔɔlnɛ ka ale asiyɔng lukopolo anaam liyila.
43008038	Nlɔɔk ntum bwa Dedde ulenɛnɛ lɛyɔɔ, ɔzzànga annyɔɔng anaangyɔng bwa Dedde annyɔɔng ɔbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng.”
43008039	Battɛ, “Dedde ayyɔɔt ulenɛ Abraham.” Jesus ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Alenɛyɔng bwɔɔn a Abraham ka lɔkkwɔɔn nzang anaangyɔng mung bwa ammɛ ɔnaangnɛ.
43008040	Bwa nssinɛ nnaang bulɔk ba butaka bule ɔgbaa la kɛbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk gwa nppyeenɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔzzànga atii baang ka aggyannɛnɛyɔng kɛwwɔɔl. Abraham kɔlɔɔk kɔlɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ akkwɛ mung usi lɛnaang!
43008041	Mung anaangyɔng kwa ssaawɔ annyɔɔng ɔnaangnɛ.” Abbɛ battɛ, “Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm biini ulenɛ Dedde wa iyanganɛ keem, ayyɔɔt ilenɛ bwɔɔn ammɛ ba lɔkkwɔɔn.”
43008042	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ Ssaawɔ annyɔɔng ka lɔkkwɔɔn, nzang nsaapwɔyɔng mung ka nssinɛ ka ɛfɛɛn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm nffu nle mung lile. Nsi liffu ka lakke anaam biini, nffu ka za ammɛ wa ɔtɔɔmnɛnɛ.
43008043	Mbɔng asinɛyɔng bwa nlɔɔknɛ lippyee? Asiyɔng lippyee ka ale asiyɔng lɛbbɔ agɔpɔlɔyɔng lɛmmwɔɔl anaam.
43008044	Annyɔɔng bwɔɔn a ssaawɔ annyɔɔng Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛn-a-kuyeeng. Aggyan attɛ akupyɔng bwa ssaawɔ annyɔɔng ɔkkɔlɔnɛ. Ɔggba lissi ka lutte ule ɔwwɔɔl-a-balɔɔt. Ka ɛtɔk a lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk ba ɔtaka ule ɔssanga ka ɔsɛlɛnɛ lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk ka tɔkɔlɔ. Ɔkkalanɛ lɛlaak, ɔkkala ka ulenɛ lɛfal ammɛ. Ammɛ ulenɛ ɔkkala-lɛlaak. Ammɛ ulenɛ abassɛ lalaak ɔkkpɛlɛ.
43008045	Ɔzzànga anaam nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk kwakkwɛ baang asinɛyɔng kwa anaam liyila.
43008046	Nyinɔɔng ka bɛzzɔkɔ annyɔɔng baang ukkwoongnɛ ɔyɔɔnɛ ɔttɛ nnaangbong bubbi? Nbwɔɔlɔnɛ lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk, mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ asinɛyɔngkwɛ liyila?
43008047	Ɔlɔɔt wa ussinɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔgɔpɔlɔ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Annyɔɔng ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba assiyɔng kwakkwɛ asinɛyɔng lɛgɔpɔlɔ.”
43008048	Babap Jesus battɛ, “Mung bbwak ba ile ka ittɛnɛ annɔ wa Samaria, ayanga apiliza ka lɛttɔ ɔɔ?”
43008049	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Ipiliza nɛ ba ile. Ntele Dedde anaam ɔzzànga annyɔɔng anaam nɛyɔng ba atele.
43008050	Mung latele anaam biini lissi ka nggyannɛ. Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt ule baang wa ɔggyannɛzɛ. Amme ɔkaalnɛ kɛkaal ubee la anaam.
43008051	Mung nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk: ɔlɔɔt duu wa uyilanɛ lukopolo anaam, baala ubbe.”
43008052	Battɛ, “Isanbong bɔk ittɛ ale la apiliza ka lɛttɔ! Abraham ubbe, bappyee-kkutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm babbe ɔzzànga attɛ ɔlɔɔt duu wa uyilanɛ kwa lukopolo annɔ baala ubbe.
43008053	Dedde ayyɔɔt Abraham ubbe. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ atɔkwɔ kɛyɔɔng attɛ annɔ attamɛnɛ. Attamɛ mung ɔɔ? Bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔgbaa bassɛ babbe. Attina attɛ annɔ alenɛ nyinɛ?”
43008054	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Bulenɛ ka nnyinɛnɛ latele kɛyɔɔng, nzang latele ’zɔng baang ka bulɔk ba laffɔ. Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang wa utelenɛnɛ ulenɛ Dedde anaam. Ammɛ ulenɛ wa attɛnɛyɔng ammɛ ulenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm annyɔɔng.
43008055	Mɛ yɔng ba ataka asanyɔng kɛtɔm kɛlɔk. Anaam nsanmɛnɛ. Bulenɛ ka nlɔɔknɛ nttɛ mɛ ba nsan, nzang nle ɔnaang-a-lɛlaak tɛ̀ttɛ̀ annyɔɔng. Ngkka kaang nsanmɛ lɔsan, ntele lɛmmwɔɔl ammɛ.
43008056	Ssaawɔ annyɔɔng Abraham uggele ɔttɛ uddu ɔffɔ ka ɛkɛtɛ nle nffu. Uddu ɔffɔ ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang uggele.”
43008057	Babwɔɔlɔmɛ battɛ, “Lalɔp laffa la likkpa zzɔɔp ba ataka affɔ, attɛ annɔ ayɛn Abraham ɔɔ?”
43008058	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk: tɛ́ttɛ́ bamaat Abraham, ‘Anaam Nle Mung.’ ”
43008059	Ɔzzánga battɔng lattaal battɛ batɔɔpmɛ. Keem Jesus ɔmma uddumu, ɔsɔsɔlɔ ɔgbata ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
43009001	Jesus ule baang ka ɔssɛnɛ, ɔyɛn ɔlɔɔt wa bamaatmɛnɛ la ifim.
43009002	Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ babapmɛ battɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo, bubbi a nnyinɔɔng budɛmnɛ bamaatmɛ la ifim? Bubbi bwa ammɛ biini ɔɔ? Faa bwa abakka la abbassɛ?”
43009003	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Ifim ammɛ ka bubbi ammɛ biini ba issi, gɔɔ ka bubbi abakka la abassɛ ba issi. Ussi ifim ɔkkɔɔnɛ balɔɔt bayɛn lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka kɛnaang ka kkwɔɔt ammɛ.
43009004	Ka ɔtakanɛ lisul, baala ikkyaa kɛnaang a kɛnaang ammɛ wa ɔtɔɔmnɛnɛ ifɔngɔ. Ùle ka usulnɛ, ɔlɔɔt usi kɛnaang lɛbɛlɛ likkwoong ɔnaang.
43009005	Ka ntiinɛ mung ka ɛkpansi, anaam nlenɛ buppwolo ɛkpansi.”
43009006	Uvvenɛ ’kwɔng lɛlɔɔk, ɔkkɔl libbaak ɔllɔt ka lisse ɔkɔɔmsɛ ɔnɔk waan a kɛbat. Ɔsam kɛbat ’sɔng baang ɔggbɔ ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ka zzeen
43009007	ɔttɛ, “Amii ayila lusso ka Libbwɛ Siloam.” (Siloam ulenɛ “Kɛtɔɔm”) Ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang umii uyila lusso, zzeen lawongolomɛ ɔyɛn ppwool.
43009008	Bakulufal ammɛ la balɔɔt ba bayɛnmɛnɛ ka ɔdɔkɔnɛ ka lubbwoom tɛ́ttɛ́ ’kwɔng kɔnaang, babap battɛ, “Uwɔng ɔlɔɔt wa ussinɛ ɔtaa mung ubbwoom lubbwoom lissi ɔɔ?”
43009009	Balɔɔt balɔk battɛ, “Ammɛ.” Balɔk battɛ, “Ammɛ lissi, ɔbalmɛ gbɔɔ.” Ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang biini ɔttɛ, “Anaam nlenɛ ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang tɛ.”
43009010	Babapmɛ battɛ, “Anaang nang ale lɛyɛn?”
43009011	Ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt wa bakkwɔɔmɛnɛ Jesus ɔnaangnɛ kɛbat ɔppwɔɔngnɛ ka zzeen ɔttɛ nmii nyila lusso ka libbwe Siloam. Ɔzzánga nmii. Nyilanɛ lusso, eseese nyɛn.”
43009012	Babap battɛ, “Ammɛ ule?” Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Ba nsan.”
43009013	Bakɔɔm ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang wa ɔdɔkɔnɛ la ifim bafee balɔɔt a Pharisees.
43009014	Kɛtɔm sa Jesus ɔkɔɔmnɛ kɛbat uttulamɛ ifim kɛdɔkɔ Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ.
43009015	Balɔɔt a Pharisees babbal ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang lɛbap tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔnaangnɛ ɔyɛn. Ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔnaang kɛbat ɔssɛɛnnɛ ka zzeen, nyila lusso, mung nkkwoongbong nyɛn.”
43009016	Balɔɔt a Pharisees balɔk battɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔnaangnɛ ’kwɔng ba ukkwoong ussi ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka usinɛ Lafɔɔ Kɛfɛkɛlɛ liloko.” Balɔɔt balɔk battɛ, “Ɔnaang-a-bubbi ɔnaang nang ukkwoong ɔnaang bɛmaanga tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ’byɔng?” Ɔzzánga babɛngɛlɛbɛ kɛyɔɔng basseke lakup laffa.
43009017	Balɔɔt a Pharisees babbal ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang lɛbap, “Attɛ ammɛ uttulawɔnɛ ifim, ngkkka mung alɔɔk nang atummɛ? Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
43009018	Bazzilɛttɔ balɔɔt a Jew basi liyila battɛ ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔdɔkɔbong ussi ifim kkpal, baang ɔppyɛlɛ ɔppyɛlɛ ɔyɛn. Bakkwɔɔ abakka la abassɛ
43009019	babap, “Uwɔng waan annyɔɔng ɔɔ? Attɛyɔng badɔkɔ bamaatmɛ la ifim, ɔnaang nang ɔyɛnnɛ gedegede mung?”
43009020	Abakka la abassɛ battɛ, “Isan lɔsan ittɛ baang waan ayyɔɔt, badɔkɔ bamaatmɛ la ifim.
43009021	Ɔzzànga ba isan tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔnaangnɛ ule lɛyɛn. Ɔlɔɔt wa uttulamɛnɛ ifim ba isan. Bapmɛyɔng ammɛ kɛyɔɔng ɔbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng, waan ba ɔbɛlɛ lile!”
43009022	Lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng baang bakingi ka bazzilɛttɔ balɔɔt a Jew babbwɔpɔnɛbɛ. Bazzilɛttɔ balɔɔt a Jew baggba liyila battɛ baggba ɔlɔɔt wa uyilanɛ ɔttɛ Jesus, Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ, ka ɔdda mitin.
43009023	Kwakkwɛ abakka la abassɛ battɛnɛ, “Waan ba ɔbɛlɛ lile, abapmɛyɔng ammɛ kɛyɔɔng!”
43009024	Babbal ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang wa bamaatmɛnɛ la ifim ka bikkpit bɛffa babap, “Ayim ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm attɛ vvenɛ alɔɔk lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk. Isan lɔsan ittɛ ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔnaang-a-bubbi.”
43009025	Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Ule ɔnaang-a-bubbi oo, bubbi ba ɔnaang oo, anaam ba nsan. Bwa nsannɛ, nsan ka ndɔkɔnɛ la ifim, mung nle lɛyɛn.”
43009026	Babapmɛ battɛ, “Ɔdɔkɔ ɔnaangwɔ nang? Ɔnaang nang uttulawɔ ifim?”
43009027	Ɔttɛ, “Nggbawɔyɔng lɛbwɔɔlɔ ɔzzànga ba agɔpɔlɔyɔng. Anaang nang ale ka aggyannɛ attɛ abbalyɔngkwɛ lippyee? Annyɔɔng ɔgbaa aggyan attɛ aleyɔng balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔɔ?”
43009028	Babbaatmɛ battɛ, “Annɔ baang alenɛ ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng; ayyɔɔt balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Moses.
43009029	Isan lɔsan ittɛ Ebinukkpaapi ɛdɔkɔnɛ ɛlɔɔk ennyi Moses, ɔzzànga ba isan ɛfɛɛn ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung ussinɛ!”
43009030	Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Uwɔng bɔka kɛssanga kɔlɔɔk! Ba asanyɔng ka ɛfɛɛn a ussinɛ uffu; ɔzzànga uttulanɛbong ifim ɔppwanɛ.
43009031	Isan lɔsan ittɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔlɔɔk a banaang-a-bubbi ba ɔgɔpɔlɔ. Ɔgɔpɔlɔ kɔlɔɔk a balɔɔt ba batelemɛnɛ, banaang kwa ɔttɛnɛ banaang.
43009032	Ka ussinɛ ka lutte, ɔlɔɔt ba ɔtaka uppyee ka ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔnaangnɛ ussi-ifim ɔppyɛlɛ ɔyɛn.
43009033	Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung usinɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lissi, ba ukkwoong ɔnaang kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng.”
43009034	Battɛ, “Bamaatwɔ la bubbi ammala la bubbi, mung ale ka abumnɛyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt kikopolo ɔɔ? Baggbamɛ ka ɔdda mitin.
43009035	Jesus uppyeenɛ ɔttɛ baggbabong ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ka ɔdda mitin, ɔyɛnnɛ ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔbapmɛ: “Ayila mung kwa Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔɔ?”
43009036	Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Dedde, abwɔɔlɔnɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ulenɛ Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔkkɔɔnɛ nyila kwa ammɛ!”
43009037	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Ayɛnmɛbong. Ammɛ ulenɛ wa utolonɛ la annɔ mung.”
43009038	Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ukun Jesus laddu ɔttɛ, “Uyini, nyilabong.”
43009039	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Nffu kɛkaal ka vveeng ’wɔng nttɛ ɔkkɔɔnɛ bassi-ifim bayɛn, balɔɔt ba basinɛ ifim lissi bassi ifim.”
43009040	Balɔɔt a Pharisees balɔk ba badɔkɔnɛ baang bappyee ka ɔlɔɔknɛ ’kwɔng, babapmɛ battɛ, “Attɛ ayyɔɔt issi ifim ɔgbaa ɔɔ?”
43009041	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Bulenɛ ka alenɛyɔng la ifim ka lɔkkwɔɔn, nzang kɔlɔɔk kɔlɔk ba kule. Ɔzzànga mung ka alenɛyɔng ɛtɔk lɛkɔɔm attɛ annyɔɔng ayɛnyɔng mung, azziyɔng kibbi kwakkwɛ.”
43010001	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng ka lɔkkwɔɔn nttɛ: ɔlɔɔt duu wa usinɛ ka lɛmma-ggwoon lɛssɛ ɔmal ka ggwoon itɔɔn, ɔppyɛɛ ɔssɛ ka ɛfɛɛn ɛlɔk ɔmal, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ussip la ɔbbyap.
43010002	Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔssɛnɛ ka lɛmma-ggwoon itɔɔn ssɔng ɔmal ulenɛ ɔkɔɔm-itɔɔn ’yɔng baang.
43010003	Ɔkat-a-lɛmma-ggwoon uwongolomɛnɛ lɛmma-ggwoon. Itɔɔn ippyee lɛmmwɔɔl ammɛ. Ɔkkwɔɔ itɔɔn ammɛ ka lɛkɔɔl ɔkɔɔmyɛ itta ka vveeng.
43010004	Ulenɛyɛ lɛkɔɔm ɔtta ka vveeng, ɔkɔɔmyɛ ɛtɔk annyɛ ikupnɛ ka ippyyeenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl ammɛ.
43010005	Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk baala ikup. Lutini ’gwɔng, ile imma ɔmma isseke kɛssanga ɔlɔɔt ’sɔng baang, ka isinɛ lɛmmwɔɔl ammɛ lɛkɔɔlɔ.”
43010006	Jesus ɔssabɛ ifɛɛt ’yɔng, ɔzzànga basi lɛsan bwa ɔssanɛyɛ utum.
43010007	Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔbbal lɛttɛ, “Mung nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk: anaam nlenɛ lɛmma-ggwoon itɔɔn ’yɔng baang.
43010008	Balɔɔt ba battenɛnɛ anaam liffu bassip la babbyap, ɔzzànga itɔɔn kwa abbɛ isi lɛgɔpɔlɔ.
43010009	Anaam nlenɛ lɛmma-ggwoon. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔssɛnɛ ka anaam ɔmal ka tɔkɔlɔ, vvenɛ ɔtaa ka kuddu. Vvenɛ ɔmal ka tɔkɔlɔ, ɔtta ka vveeng umii ɔyɛn kɔppwɔt.
43010010	Bassip baffu kwa kiyip la kɛwwɔɔl la kɛbɛpɛ bɛfɛɛn. Ɔzzànga anaam nffu nkwaaning ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ uddu kuddu kwa doddo.
43010011	“Anaam nlenɛ ɔkɔɔm-itɔɔn wa doddo, wa uyilanɛ lubbe ka lɛttɔ itɔɔn ammɛ.
43010012	Ɔlɔɔt wa afɛɛtnɛ attɛ ɔkɔɔmwɔ itɔɔn ɔyɛnnɛ ɛgɔɔt ka effunɛ ɔmma ɔkɔngɔ itɔɔn, ɛgɔɔt ɛkyakyamayɛ.
43010013	Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng ule ɔmma-ɔmma ka isinɛ ya ammɛ lile.
43010014	Anaam nlenɛ ɔkɔɔm-itɔɔn wa doddo. Nsan itɔɔn ya anaam lɔsan, annyɛ isannɛ anaam.
43010015	Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Dedde asannɛnɛ anaam, anaam nsan Dedde ning baang. Kwakkwɛ nssɛnɛ nsan itɔɔn anaam, annyɛ isannɛ anaam. Nyilabong kibbe kɛkkalayɛ.
43010016	Itɔɔn ilɔk ile baang ya ilenɛ ya anaam, ɔzzànga ka ggwoon-itɔɔn, mung ba ile. Vvenɛ nkɔɔmyɛ nffu nssɛɛn ka ggwoon ’gwɔng. Vvenɛ nssɛ nkɔɔmyɛ nffu. Vvenɛ ippyee lɛmmwɔɔl anaam isseke ka kɛkaan itɔɔn ssɔn la ɔkɔɔm-itɔɔn vvɔn.
43010017	“Nsaap Dedde ka nyilanɛ kɛsam a lɛfal anaam kinnyi nkwaaning nppyɛlɛ nyangasɛ.
43010018	Ɔlɔɔt wa ukkwoongnɛ ɔtaka lɛfal anaam ba ule. Kɔsaapnɛ anaam nsamzɛ nnyi. Nyanga lakke za kɛsamzɛ kinnyi la lakke za kɛppyɛlɛ kɛtɔkzɛ. Nkwɔng kulenɛ kwa Dedde ɔddanɛnɛ ɔttɛ nnaang.”
43010019	Ikangala ibbal balɔɔt ’bɔng baang lɛttɔ ɔssanga lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng mung.
43010020	Balɔɔt ppwap battɛ, “Ule la ipiliza ka lɛttɔ! Ɔttɔbong bikun! Agɔpɔlɔmɛyɔng kwa ’bɔng?”
43010021	Balɔɔt balɔk battɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt wa ulenɛ la ipiliza ka lɛttɔ kutolo ning ba ukkwoong utolo! Ukun ɔnaang nang ukkwoong uttula bassi-ifim?”
43010022	Ka ɛkɛtɛ kazzi kwa baggelenɛ Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka Jerusalem ɛffɔnɛ, ɔdɔkɔ ka lukook.
43010023	Jesus ɔdɔkɔ baang ka ɔssɛnɛ ukkpit Ikkɔlɔ a Solomon ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
43010024	Balɔɔt bakkpitmɛ babapmɛ battɛ, “Ale alokoyɛlɛ ɔmmɛ ɔffɔ nang ka kɛtaa kɛkat? Bwɔɔlɔyɛlɛ lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk: annɔ alenɛ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ aawɔng ɔɔ?”
43010025	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Nggbawɔyɔng lɛbwɔɔlɔ ɔzzànga nɛyɔng kwɛ ba ayilayɔng. Lilɔɔk sa nnaangnɛ ka lakke Dedde lilɔɔk libee la anaam,
43010026	Ɔzzànga ba ayilayɔng ka asinɛyɔng itɔɔn anaam lile.
43010027	Itɔɔn anaam ippyee lɛmmwɔɔl anaam. Nsanyɛ lɔsan, annyɛ ikupnɛnɛ.
43010028	Nnyiyɛ kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal kwa ile isi lɛbɛlɛ libbe. Ɔlɔɔt wa ukkwoongnɛ ɔnnaanɛyɛ ba ule.
43010029	Bwa Dedde ulenɛnɛ linnyi buttanɛ bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ɔlɔɔt wa ule ukkwoong ɔnnaabyɛ ka kɔkɔɔm a Dedde ba ule.
43010030	Dedde la anaam ile bɔfɛɛn bwɔn.”
43010031	Babbal lattaal lɛttɔng battɛ batɔɔpmɛ.
43010032	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Nnaangbong lilɔɔk sa doddo ppwap sa Dedde ɔttɛnɛ nnaang ka bɛzzɔkɔ annyɔɔng. Kɔlɔɔk kwa nnaangnɛ nbbɔl ka lilɔɔk ’sɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ kulenɛ ’kwɔkwɔng kwa ale ka atɔɔpnɛnɛyɔng lattaal?”
43010033	Battɛ, “Ba itɔɔpwɔ lattaal issanga budoddo bwa anaagnɛ, itɔɔpwɔ issanga ka akpɛnnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm! Annɔ ɔlɔɔt ɔzzànga aggyan attɛ annɔ asseke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm!”
43010034	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Bakkpɔk ka Lafɔɔ annyɔɔng biini battɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛ, ‘Annyɔɔng alenyɔng ibinukkpaapi.’
43010035	Isan lɔsan ittɛ kwa Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn yoyyoyyo. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkwɔɔ balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ibinukkpaapi. Abbɛ balenɛ balɔɔt ba ɔbwɔɔlɔnɛbɛ lɛmmwɔɔl ammɛ.
43010036	Ulenɛ kwa anaam, Dedde ɔsanganɛnɛ ɔtɔɔm ka ɛkpansi. Kɔssɛ nang attɛnɛyɔng nkpɛnbong Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka nttɛnɛ anaam Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm?
43010037	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ayilayɔng kwa anaam nsinɛ ka kɛnaang a kwa Dedde ɔttɛnɛ nnaang lile.
43010038	Ɔzzànga nppyɛɛnɛ nnaangkwɛ akkwɛ, nkkpa budɔkɔ asiyɔng kwa anaam liyila, ayilayɔng kwa kɛnaang sa nnaangnɛ, ɔkkɔɔnɛ asan attɛyɔng Dedde ule ka tɔkɔlɔ anaam, anaam nle ka tɔkɔlɔ ammɛ.”
43010039	Babbal Jesus lɔkkpat libubu, ufotobɛ ka labɔɔk ɔgbata.
43010040	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛ isimi isimi ukum Lɔyɔngɔ a Jordan ka ɛfɛɛn a John ɔnaangnɛ balɔɔt baptizim, ɔkɔɔng baang ɔtaa.
43010041	Balɔɔt ppwap baffu bakupmɛ battɛ, “John bɛmaanga bɛlɔk usi lɛnaang, ɔzzànga kɔlɔɔk duu kwa ɔlɔɔknɛ utum ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn.”
43010042	Balɔɔt ppwap ka ɛfɛɛn ’kwɔng baang bayila kwa ammɛ.
43011001	Ɔlɔɔt ɔdɔkɔ baang wa ɔzzanganɛ Lazarus wa ullunɛ ka Bethany. Ɔffaakmɛ. Bethany ulenɛ lɛffɛ za Mary la etele ammɛ Martha ballunɛ. (
43011002	Mary ’wɔng mung ulenɛ wa ɔllɔtnɛ Uyini bannɛ ba bakkaamnɛ kappya ka bukkpɔ ɔkɔɔm kittulu ɔkkpɔlɔmɛ. Etele ammɛ Lazarus ulenɛ ka kisi lɛppwa.)
43011003	Itele a Lazarus itɔɔm ka Jesus ittɛ: “Uyini, ɛnngwa luppyam annɔ ule ka kisi lɛppwa.”
43011004	Jesus uppyeenɛ ning baang ɔttɛ, “Lɛttɔ iffaak ’yɔng baala litele ka lubbe a Lazarus. Nkwɔng kɔnaang nkwaaning kɔkɔɔm latele kufee Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔgbaa vvenɛ kule ɛtɔk ya Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule ɔssɛ ɔtɔk latele.”
43011005	Martha la etele ammɛ la Lazarus basaap Jesus gaang gaang.
43011006	Ɔzzànga ka uppyeenɛ kuttu iffaak a Lazarus, ɔlɔngɔlɔ ɔtaa ka bɛtɔm bɛffa,
43011007	tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Afeele ippyɛlɛ imiiyɔng Judea.”
43011008	Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ battɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo, ba ɔtaka ɔmmɛ ka balɔɔt battɛnɛ batɔɔpwɔ lattaal ka ɛfɛɛn ’yɔng baang, mung attɛ ippyɛlɛ imiiyɔng baang ɔɔ?”
43011009	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Kikoon ssɔn kɛyanga ikkalangka zzɔɔppiffa. Ning ba ile ɔɔ? Kwakkwɛ baang ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔssɛnɛ kɔssɛ ka kasɛkɛ kikoon usinɛ lɛkkala ɔttɔ, ka ɔyɛnnɛ buppwolo ɛkpansi ’yɔng.
43011010	Ɔzzànga ɔssɛnɛ kɛtɔm vvenɛ ɔkkala ɔttɔ ka usinɛ buppwolo lɛyɛn.”
43011011	Ɔbbal lɛttɛ, “Ɛnngwa ayyɔɔt Lazarus ɔlaabong. Ɔzzànga nle ka nmiinɛ nfungalamɛ.”
43011012	Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ battɛ, “Uyini, ulenɛ ka bilaa, vvenɛ ɔppwamɛ.”
43011013	Jesus ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ Lazarus ubbebong. Abbɛ battina battɛ Jesus ɔkkwɔɔ bilaa pya gbɔɔ ’pyɔng kaang.
43011014	Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ppwool ɔttɛ, “Lazarus ubbebong.
43011015	Ɔzzànga ka lɛttɔ annyɔɔng, nggele gaang gaang ka ndɔkɔnɛ nsi ka ɛfɛɛn a Lazarus lile, nkwaaning ayilayɔng kɔlɔɔk anaam. Afeele imiiyɔng ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ.”
43011016	Thomas (wa bakkwɔɔmɛnɛ Ippɛlɛng) ɔlɔɔk la babbɛ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus ɔttɛ, “Afeele ɔkkpɛlɛ ikupnɛyɔng ɔkkɔɔnɛ ibbeyɔng la ammɛ!”
43011017	Jesus ɔffɔnɛ bakang, baggba Lazarus lilli ɔggba bɛtɔm bɛnna.
43011018	Ka assinɛ Bethany amii Jerusalem, mile ikkyaat ba ɔffɔ.
43011019	Balɔɔt a Judea badɔkɔ baang gbadam ka bamiinɛ bappyɛɛk Martha la Mary kullu, nkwaaning bakamabɛ luppyam ka etele abbɛ ubbenɛ.
43011020	Martha uppyeenɛ ɔttɛ Jesus ule ka uffunɛ, ɔtta umii ududamɛ. Mary ɔkɔɔng ka ggwoon ɔtaa.
43011021	Martha ɔlɔɔk la Jesus ɔttɛ, “Annɔ bulenɛ mung, Uyini, nzang etele anaam ba ubbe!
43011022	Ɔzzànga nsan lɔsan nttɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ukkwoong mung unnyiwɔ duu bwa aggyannɛ abapmɛ.”
43011023	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Etele annɔ vvenɛ ufungala, ɔtaa ka kuddu.”
43011024	Martha ɔttɛ, “Nsan lɔsan nttɛ vvenɛ ufungala ka lubbe ɔtaa ka kuddu ka kɛtɔm-a-lakpeke.”
43011025	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Anaam nlenɛ kifungala ka lubbe kɛtaa ka kuddu. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa uyilanɛ kwa anaam vvenɛ uddu mkkpa ubbe.
