43011026	Ɔlɔɔt duu, wa uyilanɛ kwa anaam ka ulenɛ ka kuddu baala ubbe. Ayila mung ’kwɔng ɔɔ?”
43011027	Martha ɔttɛ, “Iii, nyila mung nttɛ annɔ alenɛ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ, Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa battɛnɛ vvenɛ uffu ka vveeng ’wɔng.”
43011028	Martha ulenɛ ning baang livve lɛlɔɔk, ɔppyɛlɛ umii ɔkkwɔɔ etele ammɛ Mary ɔbwɔɔlɔ ka wɛɛk ɔttɛ, “Ukopolo-lukopolo utii mung tɛ! Ule mung ka ɔbapwɔnɛ.”
43011029	Mary uppyeenɛ ning baang, uzzuma umii ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus. (
43011030	Jesus ka tɔkɔlɔ a killu ba ɔtaka ɔffɔ. Utii ka ɛfɛɛn a Martha ududamɛnɛ.)
43011031	Balɔɔt ba balenɛ baang ka ggwoon ka bataanɛ bappyɛɛkmɛ kullu, bafeele bakupmɛ ka bayɛnmɛnɛ ka uzzumanɛ ɔtta ka vveeng. Badɔkɔ battina battɛ ule ka kimii kɛkkwa ka lilli.
43011032	Ɔffɔnɛ ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus, ɔmɛkɛlɛ ɔttɔmɛ ka lataak ɔttɛ, “Uyini, budɔkɔnɛ mung nzang etele anaam ba ubbe.”
43011033	Jesus ɔyɛnnɛ ning baang ka Mary ɔttɔnɛ ɔlak, ɔkɔɔm ɔkkwa, ɔyɛn balɔɔt ba balenɛ la Mary ka bakkwanɛ, kɔssɔpmɛ gaang gaang.
43011034	Ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Ngkka allimɛyɔng ’yang?” Battɛ, “Uyini, affu ayɛn.”
43011035	Jesus ɔkkwa.
43011036	Battɛ, “Ayɛn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Lazarus ɔsaapmɛnɛ.”
43011037	Balɔɔt balɔk battɛ, “Ammɛ uttulanɛ bassi-ifim. Ammɛ lissi ɔɔ? Attina attɛ nzang ba ukkwoong ɔkkala Lazarus ka lubbe ɔfɔngɔ ɔɔ?”
43011038	Kɔbbalnɛ Jesus gaang gaang lɛssɔp, ɔgbata umii ka lilli. Lilli ’sɔng baang bagupu lɛttaal ka kamma assɛ.
43011039	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Wongoloyɔng lɛttaal ’zɔng baang!” Martha, etele ubbu, ɔttɛ, “Ubbu vvenɛ uzzoombong gaang gaang tɛ! Uyini, baggbamɛ lilli utii bɛtɔm bɛnna tɛ!”
43011040	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Nsiwɔ lɛbwɔɔlɔ nttɛ vvenɛ ayɛn lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ayilanɛ ɔɔ?”
43011041	Batut lɛttaal bagbata ka lilli. Jesus uyeek ɔppyɛɛk ka libat ɔttɛ, “Nwomowɔbong kɛnaang Dedde, ka agɔpɔlɔnɛnɛ.
43011042	Nsan lɔsan nttɛ agɔpɔlɔnɛ ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Nlɔɔk ’kwɔng kwa balɔɔt ’bɔng mung, ɔkkɔɔnɛ basan battɛ annɔ atɔɔmnɛnɛ.”
43011043	Uvvenɛ lɛlɔɔk, ɔkkwɔɔ ɔgaga ɔttɛ, “Lazarus atta ka vveeng!”
43011044	Lazarus ɔtta ka lille, la ibba-babbu ka bukkpɔ la labɔɔk ka baggbɔmɛnɛ bakaka. Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Kyaamɛyɔngyɛ afɔngɔmɛyɔng umii.”
43011045	Balɔɔt balɔk ba baffunɛ kɛppyɛɛk a Mary kullu, bayɛn kwa Jesus ɔnaangnɛ bayila lɛmmwɔɔl ammɛ.
43011046	Balɔɔt balɔk bappyɛlɛ bamii babwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt a Pharisees kwa Jesus ɔnaangnɛ.
43011047	Ɔzzánga balɔɔt a Pharisees la bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-Luzɔɔm la Ikkansulu baduda battɛ, “Mung ile inaangyɔng nang la bɛmaanga bya ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung ɔnaangnɛ!
43011048	Ifɔngɔmɛnɛ ggwaat, ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ uyila lɛmmwɔɔl ammɛ. Balɔɔt a Rome vvenɛ babɛpɛ Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la ɛkpansi ayyɔɔt!”
43011049	Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn wa ɔzzanganɛ Caiaphas, wa ɔdɔkɔnɛ Uzzilɛttɔ Bassɛɛn-a-Luzɔɔm-Wa-Lɛbaang ka Ggwoon-ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ggwe ’gwɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Azizingiyɔngbong!
43011050	Ba asan attɛyɔng kɔtta lɛyyɛɛp ka afɔngɔnɛyɔng ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ubbe ka lɛttɔ balɔɔt lutini gwa babɛpɛnɛ lɔkaan ayyɔɔt ɔɔ?”
43011051	Nkwɔng kwa luppyam ammɛ biini ba ɔlɔɔk. Ka ulemɛnɛ ammɛ ɔdɔkɔnɛ Uzzilɛttɔ Bassɛɛn-a-Luzɔɔm-Wa-Lɛbaang ka Ggwoon-ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ggwe ’gwɔng baang, baang ɔyɛn biyɛnɛ ɔttɛ vvenɛ Jesus ubbe ka lɛttɔ balɔɔt a Jews.
43011052	Abbɛ keem lissi. Ɔgbaa vvenɛ ɔkɔɔm balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba balenɛ ka ifɛɛn ka ifɛɛn ka bamyamyanganɛ uffu uloko ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn basseke kkwɔɔt ssɔn.
43011053	Ussi kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang bazzilɛttɔ balɔɔt a Jews banaang likup a kɛwwɔɔl a Jesus.
43011054	Ɔzzánga Jesus usi kyaa-kyaa lɛbɛlɛ lɛssɛ ka Judea. Ɔgbata ka Judea umii Ephraim kɛtɛ-kɛtɛ kɛmat ɔtaa bakang la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ.
43011055	Ɛkɛtɛ Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ ele ka ɛffɔnɛ. Balɔɔt ppwap bassi ka billu bɛlɔk bamii Jerusalem bakup laggbo bafɔngɔ kang tɛ́ttɛ́ ɛkɛtɛ kazzi ’kwɔng baang ɛffɔ.
43011056	Badɔkɔ ka kɛggyan a Jesus. Bataanɛ ka Ggwoon-ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, babapbɛ abbɛ abbɛ battɛ, “Annɔ attina nang? Attina attɛ vvenɛ uffu Kazzi ’kwɔng ɔɔ? vvenɛ uffu ɔɔ?”
43011057	Bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la balɔɔt a Pharisees bannyibong kɔsap battɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsannɛ ɛfɛɛn a Jesus ulenɛ, ɔbwɔɔlɔ ɔlɔk bakaamɛ.
43012001	Usseke bɛtɔm bwɔlaaning Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ kaffɔ. Jesus umii Bethany, killu a Lazarus, wa ufungalamɛnɛ ka lubbe.
43012002	Banaangmɛ kazzi. Martha uttelebɛ banaangmɛ kazzi ’kwɔng baang. Lazarus ɔdɔkɔ baang ka ɔtaanɛ la balɔɔt balɔk ka okkpokkolo la Jesus.
43012003	Mary ɔsam bannɛ ba bayyɛɛpnɛ kizzoom gaang gaang ba banaangnɛbɛ la nard ɔllɔt Jesus ka bukkpɔ, ɔkɔɔm kittulu ɔkkpɔlɔmɛ. Kizzoom a bannɛ ’bɔng baang kɛwaala tɔkɔlɔ a ggwoon ɔkkpɛlɛ.
43012004	Ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus vvɔn wa ɔzzanganɛ Judas Iscariot wa ule ka uzzinɛ Jesus issɛ ɔttɛ,
43012005	“Bɔng bannɛ ’bɔng baang basinɛ bɛ kɔtaan lɔtaan ka lalɔp naira lakkyaat basam, ikkpoko bannyi balɔɔt ba ɔbbɔlnɛbɛ?”
43012006	Ba ɔlɔɔk ka ukekenɛ balɔɔt ba ɔbbɔlnɛbɛ gaang tɛ. Ɔlɔɔk ka ulenɛ ussip nkwaaning ɔsam ikkpoko ’yɔng baang umii uzzi, ka ulenɛ ɔbɔngɔlɔ-ikkpoko.
43012007	Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔttɛ, “Afɔngɔmɛ uloko bwa ɔyanganɛ ka kɛtɔm-a-kullu anaam.
43012008	Balɔɔt ba ɔbbɔlnɛbɛ bale bale mung la annɔ ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔzzànga anaam mung la annɔ baala nle.”
43012009	Balɔɔt ppwap bappyee battɛ Jesus ule Bethany. Ɔzzánga bafeele bamii. Kwa Jesus kɛyɔɔng lissi ka bamiinɛ bamii battɛ ɔlɔk bayɛn Lazarus wa Jesus ulenɛ ka lubbe lifungala.
43012010	Ɔzzánga bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm banaang likup za kɛwwɔɔl a Lazarus ɔgbaa.
43012011	Battɛ bawwɔɔlmɛ ka kussinɛ ka lɛttɔ ammɛ balɔɔt a Jews bale kwa bazzilɛttɔ abbɛ lifim bayila kwa Jesus.
43012012	Ɔffɔnɛ libessolo, kɛkaan a balɔɔt ba baffunɛ Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ bappyee battɛ Jesus ule ka uffunɛ Jerusalem.
43012013	Ɔzzánga battɔng liteet-uddi bakɔɔm ka labɔɔk bamii badudamɛ ka ɛtɔk. Babungu battɛ, “Ibunguyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm! Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaang ɔlɔɔt wa uffunɛ ka lɛkɔɔl Uyini ppyɛɛ! Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaang ubeet a Israel ppyɛɛ!”
43012014	Jesus, ɔyɛn eyim, ukut utteleyɛ ka libat tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ: lɔttɛ,
43012015	“Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔbbwɔpɔwɔ lɛffɛ a Zion! Ubeet annyɔɔng uffubong. Uttele ka kitook-eyim.”
43012016	Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ basi kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng baang lɛsan ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang. Ɔffɔnɛ ka Jesus ufungalanɛ ka lubbe, tɛ́ttɛ́ bɔk bakke battɛ luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔkbong ’kwɔng kkpal lutummɛ. Kwa banaangnɛ banaang bannyimɛ ammɛ.
43012017	Balɔɔt ba badɔkɔnɛ la Jesus ka ɔkkwɔɔnɛ Lazarus ka lilli ɔtta, ufungalamɛ ka lubbe, babwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ kwa kɔnaangnɛ.
43012018	Kwakkwɛ kibbi ’sɔng baang kibbinɛ ka bappyeenɛ battɛ ammɛ ɔnaangnɛ bɛmaanga ’byɔng baang.
43012019	Balɔɔt a Pharisees balɔɔk abbɛ abbɛ battɛ, “Ayɛnyɔngbong oo, ka ntɔkattɔ ɔlɔk ba ile ka nakanaka. Ppyɛɛk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɛkpansi ɔkkpɛlɛ ekupmɛnɛ!”
43012020	Balɔɔt a Greece badɔkɔ baang ka kɛkaan a balɔɔt ba bamiinɛ Jerusalem kɛssɛɛn a luzɔɔm ka ɛkɛtɛ kazzi ’kwɔng baang.
43012021	Bamii bakup Philip (Ussi Bethsaida ka Galilee) battɛ, “Dedde, iggyan ittɛ iyɛn Jesus.”
43012022	Philip umii ɔbwɔɔlɔ Andrew. Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ baffa bamii babwɔɔlɔ Jesus.
43012023	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Ɛkɛtɛ ya Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔtɔknɛ latele za lɛbaang ɛffɔbong.
43012024	Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng lɔkkwɔɔn nttɛ: ɛfɔɔk a bɔfɛɛn nnyɔn bulɔk baala ele ɛgbaa batakabong bakɔɔnyɛ ka lisse ebbe. Ebbenɛ, ɛwɔm ifɔɔk gbadam.
43012025	Ɔlɔɔt duu wa kɛfal ammɛ kɛsaapmɛnɛ, vvenɛ ɔtakasɛ. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa kɛfal ammɛ kitunmɛnɛ ka vveeng ’wɔng, vvenɛ ulokosɛ ka kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal.
43012026	Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔttɛnɛ vvenɛ uyilanɛ bɔtɔɔm, ukupnɛ nkwaaning uyilanɛ bɔtɔɔm ɔtaa la anaam ka ɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ya nlenɛ. Dedde anaam vvenɛ utele ɔlɔɔt duu wa uyilanɛnɛ bɔtɔɔm.
43012027	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Luppyam nɛ ba lɔyyɛɛp, nle nlɔɔk ’bɔng? La nlɔɔk nttɛ, ’Dedde tɛ̀ttɛ́ afɔngɔ ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng ɛffɔnɛ’ ɔɔ? Ɔzzànga kaang kuffu nffu kwa akkwɛ ɔkkɔɔnɛ nyɛn akama wa ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng ɔsaal.
43012028	Dedde akɔɔm latele afee lɛkɔɔl annɔ!” Lɛmmwɔɔl lissi ka libat lɛlɔɔk lɛttɛ, “Nkɔɔmbong latele nfeezɛ. Vvenɛ nbbal lɛkɔɔm nfeezɛ.”
43012029	Kibbi sa kibeenɛ baang kippyee lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng baang. Balɔɔt balɔk battɛ ɔtta àkkpálá. Balɔk battɛ, “Uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm utolonɛ unnyimɛ!”
43012030	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng ba lɛtta lizzenge luzzi anaam, lizzenge luzzi annyɔɔng.
43012031	Ɛkɛtɛ ɛffɔbong ya kɛkaal ɛkpansi kile ka kilenɛ la kɛkaal. Uzzilɛttɔ a vveeng ’wɔng vvenɛ ɔgbata.
43012032	Ɛkɛtɛ ya bale bayeeknɛ ka libat bakɔngɔ ɛkpansi, vvenɛ nttulu ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ukupnɛ. (
43012033	Ka ɔlɔɔknɛ ning mung, ɔyɔɔ kɛssanga lubbe sa ule ubbe.)
43012034	Kibbi ’sɔng baang battɛ, “Lafɔɔ ayyɔɔt labwɔɔlɔyɛlɛ lattɛ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ ule uddu kɛfal a kɛfal. Anaang nang appyɛɛnɛ attɛ vvenɛ bayeek Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ka libat? Nyinɛ ulenɛ Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-’wɔng baang?”
43012035	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Buppwolo vvenɛ butaa la annyɔɔng ɔmmɛ ssup. Ɔkkaamwɔyɔng ka ɛtɔk ya annyɔɔng ɔkkɔɔnɛ ayangayɔng lɔkɔɔn, kisul kisiwɔyɔng livvoong. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔssɛnɛ ka kisul ba ɔsan ɛfɛɛn a umiinɛ.
43012036	Ayilayɔng kwa buppwolo ka afalanɛ ayangayɔngbwɛ ɔkkɔɔnɛ aleyɔng balɔɔt a buppwolo.” Jesus uvvenɛ ’kwɔng lɛlɔɔk, ufeele umii uddumu ussekebɛ.
43012037	Uvve bɛmaanga ’byɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔnaang ka lusso abbɛ ɔzzànga lɛmmwɔɔl ammɛ ba bayila,
43012038	ɔkkɔɔnɛ kwa Isaiah, uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔlɔɔknɛ kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn: Isaiah ɔttɛ, “Uyini, nyinɔɔng uyilanɛ lɛmmwɔɔl za ilɔɔknɛ? Uyini lakke ammɛ ɔyɔɔ nyinɔɔng?”
43012039	Kwakkwɛ basinɛ liyila. Isaiah ɔbbal lɛttɛ,
43012040	“Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔɔpbongbɛ ifim ubutbɛ ittina, ɔkkɔɔnɛ zzeen abbɛ lasi lɛyɛn, basi kɔlɔɔk lɛbɛlɛ likkwoong battina, ɔzzànga ba baffu bakupnɛ nttulabɛ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔk ning!”
43012041	Isaiah ɔlɔɔk ka ɔyɛnnɛ latele a Jesus, ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔk utummɛ.
43012042	Uvve ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang bazzilɛttɔ balɔɔt a Jews ppwap bayilabong kwa Jesus. Balɔɔt a Pharisee banaangnɛbɛ basikwɛ ppwool ppwool lɛlɔɔk, tɛ̀ttɛ́ baffu baggbabɛ ka ɔdda mitin.
43012043	Baggyan battɛ banaang kwa kɔsaapnɛ ɔssɛbitbit, lutini gwa banaangnɛ kwa kɔsaapnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
43012044	Jesus ɔlɔɔk gagaga ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt duu wa uyilanɛ kwa anaam, kwa anaam keem lissi ka uyilanɛ. Uyila kwa ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtɔɔmnɛnɛ.
43012045	Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔyɛnnɛnɛ anaam, ɔyɛnbong ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtɔɔmnɛnɛ.
43012046	Nffubong ka vveng ’wɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ buppwolo ɔkkɔɔnɛ ɔlɔɔt duu wa uyilanɛ lɛmmwɔɔl anaam usi ka kisul lɛkɔɔng.
43012047	Ɔlɔɔt uppyeenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl anaam usizɛ litele, kibbi mɛ baala nnyi. Vvveeng kibbi mɛ ba nffu nnyi, nffumɛ kɛkkala.
43012048	Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ufimnɛnɛ, usi lɛmmwɔɔl anaam kiyila, ɔyanga ɔlɔɔt wa ule ɔkaal kɛkaal ammɛ. Lɛmmwɔɔl za nlenɛ lɛlɔɔk lile lile ɔkaal-a-kɛkaal ammɛ ka kɛtɔm-a-lakpeke!
43012049	Nkwɔng kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn, ka ntakanɛ kwa luppyam anaam litolo, ntolo kwa Dedde wa ɔtɔɔmnɛnɛ ɔddanɛnɛ ɔttɛ ntolo.
43012050	Nsan lɔsan nttɛ lɔdda ammɛ lɔkɔɔmnɛ kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal luffu. Bwa nlɔɔknɛ ulenɛ kwa Dedde ulenɛnɛ lɛbwɔɔlɔ ɔttɛ nlɔɔk.”
43013001	Usseke kɛtɔm ssɔn kɛtɔm a Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ kissolo. Jesus ɔsanbong ɔttɛ ɛkɛtɛ ya ule ka ɔgbatanɛ ka ɛkpansi ’yɔng, umii ka ɛfɛɛn a Abassɛ, ɛffɔbong. Utelebong balɔɔt ɛkpansi ɔkkpɛlɛ ba balenɛ ba ammɛ. Utelebɛ ɔffɔ ka lakpeke biini.
43013002	Jesus la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ badɔkɔ ka kazzi. Ubbu ɔggba Judas waan a Simon Iscariot luttina kizzi Jesus issɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ lɛssɛɛn.
43013003	Jesus ɔsan lɔsan ɔttɛ Abassɛ unnyimɛbong lakke. Ɔsan lɔsan ɔttɛ ussi ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uffu, vvenɛ ɔppyɛlɛ umii ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
43013004	Ɔzzánga ufeele ka okkpokkolo, ɔttyaa iwɔkɔlɔ ammɛ, ɔsam ogodogodo usiki ka kɛsan.
43013005	Ɔzza bannyi ɔssɛɛn ka kɛkkpala-ozzo uyila balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bukkpɔ, ɔkɔɔm ogodogodo ɔkkpɔlɔbɛ bannyi.
43013006	Uffu ɔffɔ ka Simon Peter, Simon Peter Ɔttɛ, “Uyini, attɛ ale ka ayilanɛnɛ bukkpɔ ɔɔ?”
43013007	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Ba asan bwa nnaangnɛ gedegede mung ɔzzànga vvenɛ asan ka ussoonɛ.”
43013008	Peter ɔttɛ, “Bukkpɔ bwa anaam baala ayila!” Jesus ɔttɛ, “Nsiwɔnɛ bukkpɔ liyila, ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ anaam ba abɛlɛ lile.”
43013009	Simon Peter ɔttɛ, “Uyini, ɔzzànga afɔngɔnɛ bukkpɔ keem kiyila, ayilanɛ labɔɔk la lɛttɔ ɔgbaa!”
43013010	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt wa ulenɛ bannyi ɔkkpɛlɛ a kkwɔɔt liyila ɔllɔbong, balɔk ba ɔbɛlɛ liyila, ɔppyɛɛ uyila bukkpɔ keem. Ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng aleyɔng kwɔngɔ-kwɔngɔ, ukpeke ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ka ɔkpɔtɔnɛ.” (
43013011	Jesus ɔggba ɔlɔɔt wa ule ka uzzimɛnɛ issɛ lɛsan. Kwakkwɛ ɔttɛnɛ, “Ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng aleyɔng kwɔngɔkwɔngɔ ukpeke ɔlɔɔt vvɔn keem ka ɔkpɔtɔnɛ.”)
43013012	Jesus uvvenɛbɛ bukkpɔ liyila, ɔsam uwɔkɔlɔ ammɛ ɔppyɛlɛ uwɔkɔlɔ umii ɔtaa ka okkpokkolo. Ɔbap balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Asanyɔng mung bwa nssumawɔnɛnɛyɔng lɛnaang mung ɔɔ?
43013013	Kule bbwak ka akkwɔɔnɛnɛyɔng Ukopolo-lukopolo la Uyini. Nzzanga ning baang!
43013014	Anaam nlenɛ Uyini annyɔɔng la Ukopolo-lukopolo annyɔɔng. Nssumawɔyɔng bukkpɔ liyila, annyɔɔng assɛ ayilayɔng bannyɔɔng ning baang.
43013015	Nnaangbong nyɔɔwɔyɔng nkwaaning assɛ anaangyɔng bbwak tɛ̀ttɛɛ̀ anaam nnaangnɛ la annyɔɔng.
43013016	Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk: ubili wa ɔttanɛ uyini ammɛ ba ule. Uyilabɔtɔɔm wa ɔttanɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtɔɔmmɛnɛ ba ule.
43013017	Ka alenɛyɔng lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk ’gwɔng lippyee, vvenɛ aggeleyɔng gaang gaang ulenɛ ka anaangnɛyɔng kwa alenɛyɔng lippyee!
43013018	“Kwa ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng ba ntolo. Nsan mung balɔɔt ba nlenɛ lɛssang. Ɔzzànga lɛmmwɔɔl a Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm za lɛlɔɔknɛ lɛttɛ, ‘Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang wa itulnɛ kazzi anaam la ammɛ izzi, usikili ɔppyɛɛ usseke ka kɔlɔɔk la anaam’ vvenɛ lɛnaang ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
43013019	Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔngbong ’kwɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ kɔnaang. Ɔkkɔɔnɛ ɛkɛtɛ kule kɔnaang, vvenɛ asan attɛyɔng ‘Anaam Nlenɛ Wa Nlenɛ Mung.’
43013020	Mung nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk: ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔtɔknɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ntɔɔmnɛ, ɔtɔknɛbong anaam. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔtɔknɛnɛ anaam, ɔtɔkbong ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtɔɔmnɛnɛ.”
43013021	Jesus uvvenɛ ’kwɔng lɛlɔɔk, livve lɛbbɔlmɛ ɔbwɔɔlɔ ppwool ɔttɛ, “Mung nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk: ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ka bɛzzɔkɔ annyɔɔng mung ule ka uzzinɛnɛ issɛ.”
43013022	Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bayeek bappyɛɛkbɛ kɛyɔɔng, kufulabɛ ka kkwɔɔt, ka basinɛ lɛsan ɔlɔɔt wa Jesus ɔkkwɔɔnɛ.
43013023	Ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ Jesus vvɔn wa ɔsaapnɛ Jesus gaang gaang ɔtaa ning ɔkaang Jesus.
43013024	Simon Peter ɔbap ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Abapmɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔkkwɔɔnɛ.”
43013025	Ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus ’wɔng baang ɔttɔm ɔkkɛtɛ Jesus ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ, “Uyini, akkwɔɔ nyinɛ?”
43013026	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt wa nle nddɔk brɛɛd ka bafook nnyimɛ ulemɛnɛ ammɛ.” Ɔzzánga ɔbɛkɛ ezuku a brɛɛd ɔddɔk ka bafook ɔsan unnyi Judas waan a Simon Iscariot.
43013027	Judas ɔtɔknɛ brɛɛd ’wɔng, Satan usikilimɛ luppyam eseese. Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔkkaamwɔ ka bwa alenɛ ka kɛnaang!”
43013028	Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn gbɔɔ usi lɛsan bwa bunaangnɛ Jesus ɔlɔɔk ning baang la Judas.
43013029	Judas ka ulenɛ ɔbɔngɔlɔ-ikkpoko, balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus battina battɛ Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔ Judas ɔttɛ umii ɔlɛɛp bwa bale ka bakɔɔmnɛ ka Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ, ɔlɔk baang ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛ ɔttɛ umii unnyi balɔɔt ba ɔbbɔlnɛbɛ bɔfɛɛn.
43013030	Judas ɔtɔknɛ brɛɛd, ɔgbata eseese. Ɔdɔkɔ kɛtɔm.
43013031	Judas ɔgbatanɛ, Jesus ɔttɛ, “Lakke Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ lattabong ka vveeng. Ɔkɔɔmbong lakke-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtta ka vveeng.
43013032	Lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lassɛnɛ ka ammɛ latta ka vveeng, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔsanga lakke Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔtta ka vveeng eseese.
43013033	Bwaan anaam, la annyɔɔng mmɛmmɛ baala ntaa. Vvenɛ aggyannɛyɔng. Ɔzzànga nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng bwa nbwɔɔlɔnɛ bazzilɛttɔ balɔɔt a Jews. ‘Ba akkwɔɔng amiiyɔng ka ɛfɛɛn anaam nle ka nmiinɛ.’
43013034	Atɔkyɔng ufaa lafɔɔ: wannyɔɔng ɔsaapwɔyɔng.
43013035	Wannyɔɔng ɔsaapwɔnɛyɔng, ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ ɔsan ɔttɛ annyɔɔng alenɛyɔng balɔɔt a kɔssɛ anaam.”
43013036	Simon Peter ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ, “Uyini, ale ka amiinɛ yang?” Jesus ɔttɛ, “Ba akkwoong akupnɛ ka ɛfɛɛn a nle ka nmiinɛ, ɔzzànga ulenɛ lɛnaang vvenɛ affu akupnɛ bakang.”
43013037	“Uyini, mbɔng nsiwɔnɛ gedegede mung likup? Nyilabong kibbe ka lɛttɔ annɔ!”
43013038	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Attɛ ayilabong kibbe ka lɛttɔ anaam ka lɔkkwɔɔn ɔɔ? Ppyɛɛk nbwɔɔlɔwɔ: tɛ́ttɛ́ balangkɔkɔ bakɔɔl lɛmmwɔɔl ikeeng, vvenɛ alɔɔk bikkpit ning bɛkkyaat attɛ nɛ ba asan.”
43014001	Ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ittina ibbɔlwɔyɔng, ɔlɔk kutunwɔyɔng. Ayilayɔng kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ayilayɔng kwa anaam ɔgbaa.
43014002	Lanɔk lale ppwap ka ggwoon a Dedde. Mung nle ka nmiinɛ nlɔngɔlɔ ɛfɛɛn nlokowɔyɔng. Kusinɛ ka lɔkkwɔɔn lile, nzang wɔyɔng ba nbwɔɔlɔ.
43014003	Nlenɛ ɛfɛɛn limii nlɔngɔlɔ, vvenɛ nppyɛlɛ nffu nsamwɔyɔng nmii nlokonɛ bakang ɔkkɔɔnɛ ataayɔng ka ɛfɛɛn anaam nlenɛ.
43014004	Asanyɔngbong ɛtɔk ya emiinɛ ka ɛfɛɛn a nle ka nmiinɛ.”
43014005	Thomas ɔttɛ, “Uyini, ba isan ɛfɛɛn ale ka amiinɛ? Inaang nang isan ɛtɔk ya ile issɛ iffɔ bakang?”
43014006	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Anaam nlenɛ ɛtɔk ’yɔng baang, la lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk, la kuddu. Ɔlɔɔt wa ukkwoongnɛ ɔffɔ ka ɛfɛɛn a Dedde ba ule usinɛ la anaam lɛssɛ.
43014007	Ka alenɛnɛyɔng anaam lɛsan, vvenɛ asanyɔng Dedde anaam. Asanmɛyɔngbong ka ussinɛ mung umii ka lusso, ayɛnmɛyɔng.”
43014008	Philip ɔttɛ, “Uyini, ayɔɔyɛlɛ Dedde ’wɔng baang, akkwɛ kulenɛ kwa iggyannɛ.”
43014009	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Ɔmmɛbong ka nlenɛ la annyɔɔng ɔzzánga nɛ ba asan ɔɔ, Philip? Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔyɛnnɛnɛ anaam ɔyɛnbong Dedde. Mbɔng abbalnɛ lɛttɛ, ‘Ayɔɔyɛlɛ Dedde ’wɔng baang’?
43014010	Philip, ba ayila attɛ anaam nle ka tɔkɔlɔ Dedde, Dedde ule ka tɔkɔlɔ anaam ɔɔ?” Ɔbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Lɛmmwɔɔl za nlɔɔknɛ nnyiwɔyɔng ka anaam ba lissi. Dedde wa ɔtaanɛnɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ ɔnaangnɛ kɛnaang ammɛ.
43014011	Ayila kwa anaam ka nbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛ nttɛ anaam nlenɛ luppyam a Dedde, Dedde ule luppyam anaam. Asinɛ ’kwɔng liyila, ayila assanga kwa bɛfɛɛn bya nnaangnɛ.
43014012	Nbwɔɔlɔwɔ lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk: Ɔlɔɔt duu wa uyilanɛ kɔlɔɔk anaam, vvenɛ ɔnaang kwa anaam nnaangnɛ. Vvenɛ ɔnaang bɛfɛɛn bɛsak bya anaam, ka anaam nle ka nmiinɛ ka ɛfɛɛn a Dedde.
43014013	Anaam vvenɛ nnaang bɔfɛɛn duu bwa abapnɛyɔng ka lɛkɔɔl anaam nkwaaning latele a Dedde lassɛ ka Awaan balɔɔt bayɛnzɛ.
43014014	Abapnɛyɔng bɔfɛɛn duu ka lɛkɔɔl anaam, vvenɛ nnaangbwɛ nnyiwɔyɔng.”
43014015	“Nsaapwɔnɛyɔng, alokoyɔng lafɔɔ anaam.
43014016	Vvenɛ nbap Dedde unnyiwɔyɔng ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk wa ule uttelewɔyɔng. Ammɛ vvenɛ ɔtaa la annyɔɔng kɛfal a kɛfal. Ammɛ ulenɛ Kuyeeng kwa kɔbwɔɔlɔnɛ lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk lutum Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
43014017	Ɛkpansi mɛ ba ekkwoong ɛtɔk ka esimɛnɛ likkwoong ɛyɛn, esimɛ likkwoong ɛsan. Annyɔɔng asanmɛyɔng lɔsan ka ɔtaanɛ la annyɔɔng, ulewɔyɔng ka tɔkɔlɔ.
43014018	“Ngbatanɛ, kɛyɔɔng baala assekeyɔng. Vvenɛ nppyɛlɛ nffu nkupwɔyɔng.
43014019	Usseke ssup vveeng ’wɔng nɛ ba ɔbɛlɛ lɛyɛn, ɔzzànga annyɔɔng vvenɛ ayɛnnɛyɔng. Anaam ka nlenɛ liddu, annyɔɔng vvenɛ assɛ adduyɔng.
43014020	Kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang kɛffɔnɛ, vvenɛ asan attɛyɔng nle Dedde ka luppyam tɛ̀ttɛ̀ annyɔɔng alenɛnɛyɔng anaam ka luppyam, anaam nlewɔyɔng annyɔɔng ka luppyam.
43014021	“Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔtɔknɛ lafɔɔ anaam utelezɛ, ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa nsaapmɛnɛ. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa nsaapmɛnɛ, vvenɛ ɔssɛ ɔsaap Dedde. Vvenɛ ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔssɛ ɔsaapnɛ anaam, nsamnɛ kɛyɔɔng nyɔɔmɛ.”
43014022	Judas (Judas Iscariot lissi) ɔttɛ, “Ale anaang nang ayɔɔyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt kɛyɔɔng bwa alenɛ usseke ɛkpansi?”
43014023	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt wa nsaapmɛnɛ uyilanɛ lukopolo anaam. Vvenɛ ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔsaap Dedde. Anaam la Dedde vvenɛ iffu itaa la ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang.
43014024	Ɔlɔɔt wa ntunmɛnɛ ufimnɛ lukopolo anaam. Lukopolo gwa appyeenɛnɛyɔng ka nkopolonɛ, gwa anaam lissi, lussinɛ ka Dedde wa ɔtɔɔmnɛnɛ.
43014025	“Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔngbong ’kwɔng ka ntiinɛ mung la annyɔɔng.
43014026	Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ule uttelewɔyɔng wa Dedde ɔtɔɔmnɛ ka lɛkɔɔl anaam. Vvenɛ kukopolowɔyɔng lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ, kɔnaangwɔyɔng akkeyɔng lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ sa nlewɔnɛyɔng lɛbwɔɔlɔ.
43014027	“Nbbɛbong bɔkaat nkɔngɔwɔyɔng. Nnyiwɔyɔng bɔkaat bwa anaam biini. Ba nnyiwɔyɔng bɔkaat tɛ̀ttɛ̀ vveeng unnyinɛ. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ittina ibbɔlwɔyɔng. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ kutunwɔyɔng, tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔbbwɔpɔwɔyɔng.
43014028	Appyeeyɔng ka nttɛnɛ, ‘Nle ka ngbatanɛ ɔzzànga vvenɛ nppyɛlɛ nffu nkupwɔyɔng.’ Nsaapwɔnɛyɔng, aggeleyɔng ka nle ka nmiinɛ ka ɛfɛɛn a Dedde wa ɔttanɛnɛ anaam.
43014029	Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔngbong ’kwɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ vvenɛ kɔnaang, ɔkkɔɔnɛ ɔffɔnɛ ka kɔnaangnɛ, ayilayɔng.
43014030	Baala nkkwoong ntolo kutolo la annyɔɔng mmɛmmɛ, Satan ule ka uffunɛ ɔzzànga lakke ba ɔyanga la anaam.
43014031	Ɔzzànga ɛkpansi vvenɛ ɛsan ɛttɛ Dedde ɔsaapnɛ lɔsaap kwakkwɛ nnaangnɛ lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ sa ɔddanɛnɛ ɔttɛ nnaang. “Feele igbatayɔng mung.”
43015001	“Anaam nlenɛ lɛsan-a-kɛssɛ biini, Dedde ule ɔlɔɔt wa ɔkɔɔnnɛsɛ lɔkɔɔn.
43015002	Kɛbɔɔk anaam duu sa kisinɛ lakkpo lɛwɔm, ɔzzasɛ ɔzzɔɔk, ɔlɔngɔlɔ kɛbɔɔk la ssɔn sa kɛwɔmnɛ lakkpo, ɔkkɔɔnɛ uppwolosɛ kɛwɔm lakkpo kɛgbaa.
43015003	Appyeeyɔngbong kkpelegedee ka ibwɔɔlɔ ya nbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng.
43015004	Ataayɔng ka bɔkaat la anaam, anaam vvenɛ ntaa ka bɔkaat la annyɔɔng. Kɛbɔɔk a kɛssɛ sa kikkwoongnɛ kɛwɔm lakkpo ka lakke assɛ ba kile kisinɛ ka lɛsan lɛmat. Kɔssɛ kule ning baang. Annyɔɔng asinɛyɔng ba anaam lile, lakkpo baala awɔmyɔng.
43015005	“Anaam nlenɛ lɛsan-a-kɛssɛ, annyɔɔng aleyɔng bɛbɔɔk assɛ. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ulenɛnɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ, anaam nle ka tɔkɔlɔ ammɛ, vvenɛ ɔwɔm lakkpo. Asinɛnɛ anaam lɛkɔɔm, bulɔk ba akkwoong anaang.
43015006	Ɔlɔɔt wa usinɛnɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ lile, vvenɛ basangamɛ bazzɔɔk kang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛbɔɔk a kɛssɛ ɔtaa bakang ubbe ukkoko. Battɔngsɛ assɛ imele bassɛɛn ka lɔkɔɔn kɛkkɔm.
43015007	Annyɔɔng alenɛnɛyɔng ka tɔkɔlɔ, assɛɛnyɔng lammwɔɔl anaam ka luppyam, vvenɛ ayangayɔng bɔfɛɛn duu bwa aggyannɛ abapnɛyɔng.
43015008	Kɛwɔm a lakkpo annyɔɔng kɛyɔɔnɛ bɔwaa Dedde. Anaangnɛyɔng ning, aleyɔng balɔɔt a kɔssɛ anaam.
43015009	Asaapnɛyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ anaam nsaapnɛ Dedde. Anaangyɔng kwa asaapnɛnɛyɔng ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
43015010	Ayilanɛyɔng lɛmmwɔɔl anaam vvenɛ asaapnɛyɔng kɛfal a kɛfal tɛ̀ttɛ̀ anaam nyilanɛ lɛmmwɔɔl a Dedde nsaapmɛ kɛfal a kɛfal.
43015011	“Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔngbong ’kwɔng ɔkkɔɔnɛ bɔwaa anaam bulewɔyɔng ka tɔkɔlɔ, ɔwaawɔyɔng ɔffata.
43015012	Uwɔng ulenɛ lifɔɔ za nnyiwɔnɛyɔng: ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn ɔsaapwɔyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ annyɔɔng asaapnɛnɛyɔng anaam.
43015013	Kɛsaap sa ɔlɔɔt ɔyɔɔnɛ inngwa ammɛ kɛtta bɛsaap ɔkkpɛlɛ ulenɛ kɛsam a lɛfal ammɛ kinnyibɛ.
43015014	Annyɔɔng alenɛyɔng inngwa anaam, anaangnɛyɔng kwa nbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng.
43015015	Ibɔɔyi wɔyɔng ba nbɛlɛ lɛkkwɔɔ ka bɔɔyi usinɛ kwa abassɛ ɔnaangnɛ lɛsan. Nppyɛɛ nkkwɔɔwɔyɔng inngwa anaam ka nlewɔnɛyɔng lɛbwɔɔlɔ lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ sa nppyeenɛ ka Dedde.
43015016	Annyɔɔng lissi asanganɛnɛyɔng, anaam nsangawɔnɛyɔng annyɔɔng nttɛ amii awɔmyɔng lakkpo za labbɔnɛ ppwap. Dedde vvenɛ unnyiwɔyɔng duu bwa abapmɛnɛyɔng ka lɛkɔɔl anaam.
43015017	Nkwɔng kulenɛ kwa nddawɔnɛyɔng: ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔsaapwɔyɔng.”
43015018	“Atunnɛyɔng vveeng ’wɔng, akke attɛyɔng anaam nttemɛnɛ litun.
43015019	Alenɛyɔng ba vveeng ’wɔng, vvenɛ asaapmɛyɔng ka alenɛyɔng ba ammɛ. Nsangawɔyɔng ka vveeng ’wɔng mung, ɔzzànga annyɔɔng ba vveeng ’wɔng lɛbɛlɛ lissi. Kwakkwɛ atunnɛyɔng vveeng ’wɔng.
43015020	Akkeyɔng kwa nbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng nttɛ, ‘Ubili wa ɔttanɛ uyini ammɛ ba ule.’ Bayɔɔnɛnɛ anaam akama, vvenɛ bassɛ bayɔɔwɔyɔng annyɔɔng. Bagɔpɔlɔnɛ lɛmmwɔɔl anaam, vvenɛ bassɛ bagɔpɔlɔ za annyɔɔng.
43015021	Vvenɛ banaangwɔyɔng bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ ka alenɛyɔng ba anaam, basi ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtɔɔmnɛnɛ lɛsan.
43015022	Anaam butakanɛ liffu, nbwɔɔlɔbɛ, nzang kibbi ka bubbi bwa banaangnɛ ba bazzi. Ngkka ka kulenɛ ning lile, luteele lɔlɔk ka bubbi bwa banaangnɛ ba lule.
43015023	Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ntunmɛnɛ, Dedde ɔssɛ utunmɛ ning baang.
43015024	Butakanɛ kɛnaang ’sɔng sa lɛbaang lɛnaang nyɔɔbɛ, sa ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔtakanɛ lɛnaang, nzang kibbi sa kɛnaang a bubbi ba bazzi. Mkkpa bale kwa nnaangnɛ lɛyɛn, anaam la Dedde itunbɛ tɔttɔt.
43015025	Nkwɔng kɔnaang nkwaaning kwa bakkpɔknɛ ka Lafɔɔ abbɛ battɛ, ‘Ntunbɛ gbɔɔ ning baang’ kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
43015026	Uttele-uttele vvenɛ uffu. Ammɛ ulenɛ Kuyeeng kwa kɔbwɔɔlɔnɛ lɔkkwɔɔn kutum Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ammɛ ussinɛ ka Dedde. Vvenɛ ussi ka Dedde ntɔɔmnɛ uffu ɔlɔɔk kɔlɔɔk utumnɛ.
43015027	Annyɔɔng ɔgbaa vvenɛ assɛ alɔɔkyɔng kɔlɔɔk anaam, ka alenɛyɔng la anaam ka ussinɛ ka lutte.
43016001	“Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔngbong ’kwɔng nkwaaning asiyɔng kiyila annyɔɔng lɛkkyaa azzɔɔkyɔng.
43016002	Vvenɛ baggbawɔyɔng ka idda mitin. Ɛkɛtɛ vvenɛ ɛffɔ ya ɔlɔɔt wa ule ɔwwɔɔlwɔyɔng ule uttina ɔttɛ ule ka kitele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
43016003	Balɔɔt vvenɛ banaangwɔyɔng lilɔɔk ’sɔng ka batakanɛ Dedde anaam la anaam biini lɛsan.
43016004	Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng ’kwɔng nttɛ nkwaaning ɛkɛtɛ ɛffɔnɛ ya banaangwɔnɛyɔng lilɔɔk ’sɔng akke attɛyɔng ndɔkɔ nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng. “Nsiwɔng ’kwɔng lɛbwɔɔlɔ ka lutte ka anaam biini ndɔkɔnɛ la annyɔɔng.
43016005	Mung ka nle ka nmiinɛ ka ɛfɛɛn ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtɔɔmnɛnɛ ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa ɔbapnɛnɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Amii ’yang?’ ba ule.
43016006	Mung ka nppyɛɛnɛ nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng mung, bukee buppyɛɛbong bunaangwɔyɔng.
43016007	Mung nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk: kɔttawɔyɔng lɛyyɛɛp ka ngbatanɛ. Nsinɛ lɛgbata nmii, ɔlɔɔt wa ule uttelewɔyɔng baala uffu. Ngbatanɛ nmii, vvenɛ ntɔɔmmɛ uffu ka ɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng.
43016008	Uffunɛ, vvenɛ ɔyɔɔ balɔɔt a vveeng ’wɔng mung ɔttɛ bbwak ba bale, basɛpɛbong ka ɛtɔk a bubbi. Vvenɛ ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ bwa bulenɛ bbwak ka kɛkaal Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
43016009	Basɛpɛbong ka ɛtɔk a bubbi ka basinɛ lɛmmwɔɔl anaam liyila.
43016010	Basɛpɛbong ka kɔlɔɔk kwa bbwak. Anaam nle ka nmiinɛ ka ɛfɛɛn a Dedde, nɛyɔng vvenɛ ba abɛlɛyɔng lɛyɛn.
43016011	Basɛpɛbong ka ɛtɔk a kɛkaal ka balenɛ kɛkaal ɔkɔɔm-ɛkpansi ’yɔng lɛzza.
43016012	“Lilɔɔk litii ppwap sa nle ka nbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng. Ɔzzànga gedegede mung liyipiwɔyɔngbong gaang kɛssɛɛn ka luppyɔm.
43016013	Ɛkɛtɛ Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kule kuffu, vvenɛ kukopolowɔyɔng lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ɔzzànga kwa akkwɛ biini lissi ka kule kukopolo. Kule kukopolo, kwa kuppyeenɛ. Vvenɛ kɔbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng lilɔɔk sa lusso.
43016014	Vvenɛ kunnyinɛ latele ka kule kɔsam kwa anaam nlɔɔknɛ kɔbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng.
43016015	Bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya Dedde ɔyanganɛ bile bya anaam, kwakkwɛ baang nttɛnɛ Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kule kɔtɔk kwa nbwɔɔlɔnɛkwɛ kɔbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng annyɔɔng.
43016016	“Usseke ssup nɛyɔng ba abɛlɛ lɛyɛn, ɔzzànga ɔmmɛnɛ ssup abbalnɛyɔng lɛyɛn.”
43016017	Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ balɔk babap battɛ, “Baang ɔlɔɔk nang? Ɔttɛ usseke ssup vvenɛ mɛ ba ibɛlɛ lɛyɛn. Ɔbbal lɛttɛ ɔzzànga ɔmmɛnɛ ssup vvenɛ iyɛnmɛ. Ɔbbal lɛttɛ, ‘Nlɔɔk ka nle ka nmiinɛ ka ɛfɛɛn a Dedde.’
43016018	‘Usseke ssup’ ulenɛ ’bɔng? Ba isan bwa ɔlɔɔknɛ utum!”
43016019	Jesus ɔkɔɔlɔ ɔttɛ bale ka babapmɛnɛ lɔbap, ɔzzánga ɔttɛ, “Nttɛ ‘Usseke ssup nɛyɔng ba abɛlɛ lɛyɛn, ɔzzànga ɔmmɛnɛ ssup abbalnɛyɔng lɛyɛn.’ Nkwɔng kulenɛ kwa abapwɔnɛyɔng kɛyɔɔng ɔɔ?
43016020	Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk: vvenɛ akkwa attɔlyɔng layilili ɔzzànga ɛkpansi ele ele ka laggele. Vvenɛ bukee bunaangwɔyɔng, ɔzzànga bukee annyɔɔng vvenɛ busikili laggele.
43016021	Wanavva ule ka ɔmaatnɛ, bukee bunaangmɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ kɛyɛn akama elemɛnɛ ɛffɔ. Ɔmaatnɛ uvve, usumala bɔssɔp bwa uppyeenɛ, ɔssanga laggele za ulenɛ waan lɛmaat uloko ka ɛkpansi.
43016022	Annyɔɔng kulewɔyɔng ning baang. Gedegede mung aleyɔng ka bukee ɔzzànga vvenɛ nbbalwɔyɔng lɛyɛn ippyam annyɔɔng iggele laggele za lɛbaang, za ɔlɔɔt ule usiwɔyɔngzɛ likkwoong ɔtɔk.
43016023	Kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang kɛffɔnɛ, bulɔk nɛyɔng baala abapyɔng. Mung nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk: Dedde vvenɛ unnyiwɔyɔng duu bwa abapmɛnɛyɔng ka lɛkɔɔl anaam.
43016024	Ka ussinɛ bakang uffu ɔffɔ mmwɔɔn, bulɔk ba ataka abapyɔng ka lɛkɔɔl anaam. Abapyɔng usseke ayangayɔng, nkwaaning aggeleyɔng gaang gaang.”
43016025	“Nkɔɔmbong ifɛɛt nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng lilɔɔk ggbadam ɔzzànga ɛkɛtɛ vvenɛ ɛffɔ ya nle nsi ifɛɛt lɛbɛlɛ lɛkɔɔm ntolo kutolo. Nle nppyɛɛ ntolo ppwool ppwool ntum Dedde nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng.
43016026	Kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang kɛffɔnɛ, vvenɛ abapmɛyɔng ka lɛkɔɔl anaam. Ba nlɔɔk nttɛ vvenɛ nbapmɛ nkkalawɔyɔng.
43016027	Dedde biini asaapmɛyɔng gaang gaang. Asaapmɛyɔng ka anaam nsaapwɔnɛyɔng, ayila attɛyɔng anaam nssi ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm nffu.
43016028	Nssi ka Dedde nffu ka vveeng ’wɔng, mung nle ka ngbatanɛ ka vveeng ’wɔng nppyɛlɛ nmii ka ɛfɛɛn a Dedde.”
43016029	Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ battɛ, “Asseke ka alɔɔknɛ kɔlɔɔk ppwool ppwool ifɛɛt ba abɛlɛ lɛkɔɔm.
43016030	Isanbong ittɛ asan lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ, ba kɔbɛlɛ lile kwa ɔlɔɔt ɔbapwɔnɛ ibap. Nkwɔng kɔnaangnɛyɛlɛ iyila ittɛ assi ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm affu.”
43016031	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Ayilayɔngbong bɔk ɔɔ?
43016032	Ɛkɛtɛ vvenɛ ɛffɔ, gɔɔ mung ɛffɔbong ya bale babbumwɔyɔng ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔt umii ka ssala ammɛ, anaam nsseke kɛyɔɔng. Ɔzzànga kɛyɔɔng ba nle ka lɔkkwɔɔn, ka Dedde ulenɛ la anaam.
43016033	Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng ’kwɔng nkwaaning luppyam lɔfɔngɔwɔyɔng kɛzza ka alenɛyɔng ka bɔkaat la anaam. Ɛkpansi vvenɛ ɛnaangwɔyɔng ayɛnyɔng akama ɔzzànga ɔkkaamwɔyɔng! Nbɛtɛbong ɛkpansi!”
43017001	Jesus ulenɛ ’kwɔng livve lɛlɔɔk, uyeek ɔppyɛɛk ka libat ɔttɛ, “Dedde, ɛkɛtɛ anaam ɛffɔbong. Annyi Waan annɔ lakke la latele usseke ɔnaangwɔ ɔwaawɔ.
43017002	Annɔ annyimɛnɛ lakke ɔtta ɔssɛbitbit ɔkkɔɔnɛ unnyi balɔɔt ba annyimɛnɛ kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal.
43017003	Kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal ulenɛ kɛsanwɔ, annɔ wa alenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa lɔkkwɔɔn, la kɛsan a Jesus Christ wa atɔɔmnɛ.
43017004	Nyɔɔbong lakke annɔ ka ɛkpansi. Nvvebong kɛnaang annɔ sa annyinɛnɛ attɛ nnaang.
43017005	Dedde! Annyinɛ lakke ka lusso annɔ gedegede mung. Lakke ’zɔng baang za iyanganɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ vveeng ule la kɛnaang.
43017006	“Nnaangbong balɔɔt ba asanganɛ ka ɛkpansi annyinɛ basanwɔ. Bale ba annɔ. Annɔ annyinɛnɛbɛ. Batelebong lɛmmwɔɔl annɔ.
43017007	Basanbong gedegede mung battɛ bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya annyinɛnɛ bissi ka annɔ.
43017008	Nbwɔɔlɔbongbɛ bɔtɔɔm bwa atɔɔmnɛnɛ batɔkbwɛ. Basan lɔsan battɛ kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn nssi ka annɔ nffu. Bayilabong battɛ annɔ atɔɔmnɛnɛ.
43017009	“Nzɔɔm nssɛɛnbɛ abbɛ, ɛkpansi lissi. Nzɔɔm nssɛɛn balɔɔt ba annyinɛnɛ ka balenɛ ba annɔ.
43017010	Bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya nyanganɛ bile bya annɔ. Bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya annɔ ayanganɛ bile bya anaam. Abbɛ bayɔɔnɛ lakke anaam.
43017011	Mung nle ka nffunɛ ka ɛfɛɛn annɔ. Mung ka ɛkpansi ba nbɛlɛ lile, ɔzzànga abbɛ batii mung. Dedde wa Doddo, alokobɛ ka bɔppwakkwɔɔt ka lakke lɛkɔɔl annɔ za annyinɛnɛ ɔkkɔɔnɛ basseke bɔfɛɛn bbwɔn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ayyɔɔt la annɔ ilenɛ.
43017012	Ka ndɔkɔnɛ la abbɛ, nlokobɛ ka bɔppwakkwɔɔt ka lakke lɛkɔɔl annɔ za annyinɛnɛ. Nkatbɛ ɔlɔɔt vvɔn gbɔɔ usi lɛtaak ɔgbaa la ɔlɔɔt wa ɔggbanɛ lissi ule wa kɛtaak, ɔkkɔɔnɛ kɔlɔɔk a luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
43017013	Mung nle ka nffunɛ ka ɛfɛɛn annɔ. Kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng mung nlɔɔk ka ɛkpansi ɔkkɔɔnɛ bayanga laggele ka luppyam lattala.
43017014	Nbwɔɔlɔbɛ bɔtɔɔm bwa atɔɔmnɛnɛ ngkka mung batunbong ɛkpansi.
43017015	Ba nlɔɔk nttɛ asambɛ agbata ka ɛkpansi, nlɔɔk nttɛ akatbɛ asseke Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm.
43017016	Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ anaam nsinɛ wa ɛkpansi lile, abbɛ wa ɛkpansi ba bassɛ bale.
43017017	Anaangbɛ basseke ba annɔ ka lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk.
43017018	Ntɔɔmbɛ ka vveeng ’wɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ annɔ atɔɔmnɛnɛ anaam.
43017019	Nzzenge luzzi abbɛ kwakkwɛ nsamnɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng nnyiwɔ ɔkkɔɔnɛ bale ba annɔ ka lɔkwɔɔn.
43017020	“Abbɛ kɛyɔɔng keem lissi ka nzɔɔmnɛ nssɛɛn. Nssɛ nzɔɔm nssɛɛn balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ kiyila ka bappyeenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl abbɛ ɔgbaa.
43017021	Nzɔɔm nttɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ bale bɔfɛɛn bbwɔn. Dedde! Nkkpee baleyɛlɛ ka luppyam tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ayyɔɔt la annɔ ilenɛyɛlɛ kɛyɔɔng ka ippyam. Nkkpenge nttɛ bale bɔfɛɛn bbwɔn nkwaaning vveeng ’wɔng ɔsan ɔttɛ annɔ atɔɔmnɛnɛ.
43017022	Nnyibongbɛ lakke za annyinɛnɛ ɔkkɔɔnɛ bale bɔfɛɛn bbwɔn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ayyɔɔt la annɔ ilenɛ bɔfɛɛn bbwɔn:
43017023	anaam nlebɛ ka luppyam, annɔ alenɛ anaam ka luppyam, ɔkkɔɔnɛ ɛkpansi ɛsan ɛttɛ annɔ atɔɔmnɛnɛ. Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ anaam nsaapwɔnɛ, abbɛ bassɛ basaapwɔ ning baang.
43017024	“Dedde! Asambongbɛ annyinɛ, nggyan nttɛ bataa la anaam ka ɛfɛɛn a nlenɛ ɔkkɔɔnɛ bayɛn lakke anaam za annyinɛnɛ. Nggba lissi nsaapwɔ tɛ́ttɛ́ ɛkpansi ele la kɛlɔɔm.
43017025	Dedde wa Doddo! Ɛkpansi wɔ ba ɛsan, anaam nsanwɔnɛ. Balɔɔt ’bɔng mung basan lɔsan battɛ annɔ atɔɔmnɛnɛ.
43017026	Anaam nnaangnɛ basanwɔ. Kɛnaang balɔɔt basanwɔ baala nkkyaa nfɔngɔ, ɔkkɔɔnɛ kɛsaap sa nsaapwɔnɛ kɛtaa ka ippyam abbɛ, anaam nssɛ ntaabɛ ka ippyam.”
43018001	Jesus ulenɛ livve lɛzɔɔm, ɔgbata la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bamii bakum lɔssa gwa lɔzzanganɛ Kidron. Bɔppwa-bɛssɛ bule baang ka ɛfɛɛn ’yɔng baang. Jesus la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bamii bataa baang.
43018002	Judas uzzi-issɛ ɔggba ɛfɛɛn ’kwɔng baang lɛsan ka Jesus la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bataanɛ baduda baang ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
43018003	Ɔzzánga Judas ɔkɔɔm kɛkaan a isogya a Rome, la bakat-a-Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la balɔɔt a Pharisees batɔɔmnɛ, umii ka bɔppwa ’bwɔng baang. Badɔkɔ la bɛfɛɛn a bussopo la itinika la ittɔɔssi.
43018004	Jesus ɔggba lɛsan kwa kule ka kɔnaangmɛnɛ. Ɔzzanga uzuma umii ka lusso ɔbapbɛ “Aggyanyɔng nyinɔɔng?”
43018005	Battɛ, “Jesus wa Nazareth.” Jesus ɔttɛ, “Anaam nlemɛnɛ ammɛ.” Judas uzzi-issɛ ɔdɔkɔ baang la abbɛ.
43018006	Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔnɛbɛ ɔttɛ, “Anaam nlemɛnɛ ammɛ,” battɔm bappyɛlɛ isimi isimi battɔ ka lisse.
43018007	Jesus ɔbbalbɛ lɛbap, “Aggyanyɔng nyinɔɔng?” Battɛ, “Jesus wa Nazareth.” Jesus ɔttɛ,
43018008	“Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔngbong nttɛ anaam nlemɛnɛ ammɛ. Attɛnɛ aggyannɛyɔng anaam, afɔngɔyɔng balɔɔt ’bɔng bamii.” (
43018009	Ɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng ɔkkɔɔnɛ kwa ɔggbanɛ lɛlɔɔk kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn ka ɔttɛnɛ, “Dedde, ɔlɔɔt vvɔn gbɔɔ ba ɔtaka ɔtaak ka balɔɔt ba annyinɛnɛ.”)
43018010	Simon Peter ɔdɔkɔ la ogge, ɔzzánga uttulumɛ ɔsanga ɔkkwɛɛ ubili Uzzilɛttɔ Bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm Wa Lɛbaang kɔtɔɔk ɛlaabɔɔk ɔzza. Ubili ’wɔng baang ɔzzanga Malchus.
43018011	Jesus ɔlɔɔk la Peter ɔttɛ, “Ppyɛlɛ ogge annɔ assɛɛn ka uffɔ! Attina attɛ nfɔngɔ akama wa Dedde unnyinɛnɛ kɛyɛn ɔɔ?”
43018012	Isogya Rome la uzzilɛttɔ abbɛ, la isogya Jew bakaa Jesus baggbɔ izzi.
43018013	Bakɔɔm ɛtɔk basammɛ bamii ka ɛfɛɛn a Annas, abassɛ wanavva Caiaphas wa ɔdɔkɔnɛ Uzzilɛttɔ Bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm Wa Lɛbaang ka kukkpa ’kwɔng baang.
43018014	Caiaphas ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔdɔkɔnɛ ɔbba bazzilɛttɔ balɔɔt a Jew bikɔɔm ɔttɛ kɔyyɛɛp ka ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ubbenɛ ka lɛttɔ balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ.
43018015	Simon Peter la ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus vvɔn bakup Jesus. Uzzilɛttɔ Bassɛɛn-a-Luzɔɔm Wa Lɛbaang ɔsan ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus wa vvɔn ’wɔng baang lɔsan gaang gaang. Ammɛ umii la Jesus ka ssala Uzzilɛttɔ Bassɛɛn-a-Luzɔɔm Wa Lɛbaang.
43018016	Peter ɔkɔɔng ka kikkwu ka vveeng ubee. Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang wa Uzzilɛttɔ Bassɛɛn-a-Luzɔɔm Wa Lɛbaang ɔsanmɛnɛ gaang ɔppyɛlɛ isimi isimi umii ɔlɔɔk la waanawanavva ka kikkwu. Uvvenɛ ɔkɔɔm Peter uffu ka tɔkɔlɔ.
43018017	Waanawanavva ’wɔng baang ɔbap Peter ɔttɛ, “Annɔ ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang lissi ɔɔ?” Peter ɔttɛ, “Ihii, anaam lissi.”
43018018	Buyili budɔkɔ ka kɛnaang. Keem ibɔɔyi Uzzilɛttɔ la bakat-ɛfɛɛn baddobong lɔkɔɔn la ibili, bale baang ka babeenɛ bakkpitgwɛ bawupa. Peter umii ubee baang la abbɛ uwupa lɔkɔɔn.
43018019	Uzzilɛttɔ Bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm Wa Lɛbaang ɔbap Jesus ibap utum balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ la lukopolo ammɛ.
43018020	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Kɔlɔɔk anaam nlɔɔk ppwool ppwool ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Kikopolo nkopolo ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la ssoon a mitin ka ɛfɛɛn a balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ baggbanɛ ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn. Kɔlɔɔk kɔlɔk ka lalup ba ntaka nlɔɔk.
43018021	Mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ abapnɛ lɔbap ’gwɔng ning? Abap balɔɔt ba bappyeenɛnɛ ka nlɔɔknɛ. Abapbɛ bwa nbwɔɔlɔnɛbɛ. Basan lɔsan.”
43018022	Jesus ɔlɔɔknɛ ning baang, ɔkat-ɛfɛɛn vvɔn utupmɛ kabut ɔttɛ, “Mbɔng bukkaamnɛ zzeen a kɛlɔɔk a kɔlɔɔk la Uzzilɛttɔ Bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm Wa Lɛbaang ning!”
43018023	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Nlenɛ kɔlɔɔk kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ lɛlɔɔk, abwɔɔlɔ ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ mung bwa nlɔɔknɛ. Ɔzzànga nlenɛ bbwak ka kwa nlɔɔknɛ, atupnɛ kwa ’bɔng?”
43018024	Annas ɔtɔɔm Jesus la izzi ning baang ufee Caiaphas Uzzilɛttɔ-luzɔɔm.
43018025	Peter ɔdɔkɔ utii baang ka ubeenɛ uwupa lɔkɔɔn. Ɔzzánga balɔɔt ’bɔng baang balɔɔk la Peter battɛ, “Annɔ ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔgbaa lissi ɔɔ?” Peter ɔkala ɔttɛ, “Ka yang, anaam lissi.”
43018026	Ubili Uzzilɛttɔ-luzɔɔm wa vvɔn wa balenɛ ka bukpana la ubili wa Peter ɔkkwɛɛnɛ ɔzza kɔtɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Annɔ lissi alenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa nyɛnwɔnɛ la ammɛ ka bɛssɛ ɔɔ?”
43018027	Peter ɔbbal lɛttɛ, “Ka yang, anaam lissi.” Eseese ulangkɔkɔ ɔkɔɔl.
43018028	Lɔfɔm a lɔfɔm kkpulup, basam Jesus ka ssala Caiaphas bamii ka ugala ubeet ɛkpansi ’yɔng baang. Bazzilɛttɔ balɔɔt a Jew basi ka tɔkɔlɔ ugala limii, ka basinɛ lɛggyan battɛ batɔkɔ làggbò ɔlɔk bale ka Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ.
43018029	Ɔzzánga Pilate ɔtta ka vveeng ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung ɔzzɔɔkwɔyɔng mbɔng akaamɛnɛyɔng?”
43018030	Battɛ, “Butakanɛ kɔlɔɔk lɛzzɔɔk, nzang ka ɛfɛɛn annɔ mɛ ba ikɔɔm iffu.”
43018031	Keem Pilate ɔttɛ, “Kulenɛ ning, annyɔɔng biini asammɛyɔng amii akaalyɔng kɛkaal ammɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lafɔɔ annyɔɔng lalɔɔknɛ.” Battɛ, “Ayyɔɔt lakke za kɛwwɔɔl ɔlɔɔt ba iyanga.” (
43018032	Nkwɔng kɔnaang nkwaaning lɛmmwɔɔl a Jesus lile ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Lɛmmwɔɔl za ɔlɔɔknɛ utum kɛssanga lubbe sa ule ubbe.)
43018033	Pilate ɔppyɛlɛ ɔmal ka ugala, ɔkkwɔɔ Jesus ɔbap, ɔttɛ “Annɔ alenɛ ubeet a Jews ɔɔ?”
43018034	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Lɔbap ’gwɔng baang lussiwɔ ka luppyam faa balɔɔt babwɔɔlɔwɔnɛ kɔlɔɔk anaam.”
43018035	Pilate ɔttɛ, “Attina attɛ anaam ɔlɔɔt a Jew ɔɔ? Balɔɔt annɔ la Uzzilɛttɔ Bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm Wa Lɛbaang basamwɔnɛ bassɛɛnnɛ ka kɔbɔɔk. Kkpɔɔ azzɔɔk bɔka kɔlɔɔk?”
43018036	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Itutum anaam ya vveeng ’wɔng mung lissi. Ilenɛ ya vveeng ’wɔng, nzang balɔɔt a kɔssɛ anaam ballubong kullu bakkalanɛ bafɔngɔ basinɛ lɛsam bannyi bazzilɛttɔ Jews. Itutum anaam ya mung lissi.”
43018037	Pilate ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ, “Annɔ ubeet ɔɔ?” Jesus ɔttɛ, “Annɔ attɛnɛ anaam ubeet. Bamaatnɛ bazzɔɔk ka ɛkpansi ’yɔng mung kwa kɛlɔɔk a lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ulenɛ wa lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk uppyeenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl anaam.”
43018038	Pilate ɔttɛ, “Lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk ulenɛ ’bɔng?” Pilate ɔtta umii ka ɛfɛɛn a balɔɔt ɔttɛ, “Kɔlɔɔk kɔlɔk kwa ulenɛ lɛnaang kwa nle nttɛ ubbe ba nsan.
43018039	Ka eleme annyɔɔng, nkkyaa ɔlɔɔt igbakkɔpɔ vvɔn nfɔngɔ ufula ka ɔffɔnɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ. Ngkka aggyan attɛyɔng nkkyaa Ubeet a balɔɔt a Jew nfɔngɔwɔyɔng ɔɔ?”
43018040	Abbɛ babungu battɛ, “Mmaaye, ammɛ lissi! Iggyan Barabbas!” (Barabbas ɔdɔkɔ ɔbbyap.)
43019001	Ɔzzánga Pilate ɔsam Jesus unnyi isogya batup.
43019002	Isogya balɔɔk kɛttɔpɔ bizze battɔpɔ Jesus, basam ewuulu babeet bawɔkɔlɔmɛ
43019003	bakunmɛ laddu battɛ, “Lɛttɔ lɛtaawɔ oo Ubeet a Jews!” Batupmɛ kabut.
43019004	Pilate ɔbbal ka vveeng lɛtta ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Nle ka nkɔɔmnɛnɛ ntta ka vveeng ɔkkɔɔnɛ asan attɛyɔng kɔlɔɔk kɔlɔk ba nyɛn kwa nle nttɛ ubbe.”
43019005	Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔtta ka vveeng la kɛttɔpɔ bizze la ewuulu babeet ka ɔwɔkɔlɔnɛ. Pilate ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Yɛnmɛyɔng tɛ!”
43019006	Bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la bakat-ɛfɛɛn bayɛnmɛnɛ, babungu “Zzengemɛyɔng! Zzengemɛyɔng!” Pilate ɔttɛ, “Annyɔɔng asamnɛyɔng amii azzengeyɔng. Lɛttɔ za nle nttɛ ubbe kwa akkwɛ ba nsan.”
43019007	Kɛkaan ’sɔng baang battɛ, “Iyanga lafɔɔ za lattɛnɛ ule wa kɛwwɔɔl ka ɔtɔkmɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng ɔttɛ ammɛ Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
43019008	Pilate uppyeenɛ ning baang ɔbbwɔpɔmɛ ɔgbaa.
43019009	Ɔppyɛlɛ umii ka tɔkɔlɔ ugala ɔbap Jesus ɔttɛ, “Mung annɔ wa bɔka lɔkaan?” Jesus lɛmmwɔɔl usi lɛzza.
43019010	Pilate ɔttɛ, “Lɛmmwɔɔl nɛ baala azza ɔɔ? Asan mung attɛ nyanga lakke za nkkyaawɔnɛ nfɔngɔ la lakke za nzzengewɔnɛ ɔɔ?”
43019011	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Ayanga lakke ka kkwɔɔt anaam ka ulenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyiwɔnɛzɛ. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsamnɛnɛ ɔssɛɛnwɔ ka kɔbɔɔk uzzibong kibbi bubbi bwa buttanɛ lɛbbɔl.”
43019012	Pilate uppyeenɛ ning baang, ɔggyan ɛtɔk ya ule ɔnaang ɔkkyaa Jesus ɔfɔngɔ. Kɛkaan ’sɔng baang kibungu, “Akkyaamɛnɛ afɔngɔ, nzang annɔ ɛnngwa Ubeet Caesar lissi! Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔttɛnɛ ammɛ ubeet ka lakke ammɛ biini, nzang ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔlɔɔt a kɔfɔk a Ubeet Caesar!”
43019013	Pilate uppyeenɛ ning baang, ɔsam Jesus ɔtta ka vveeng. Ammɛ umii ɔtaa ka ogolo kɛkaal. Ɛfɛɛn ’yɔng baang ɛzzanga “Kɛhanga.” (Ɛzzánga “Gabbatha” ka kukaan a Hebrew)
43019014	Usseke ssup livve littele ka kɛtɔm sa kissolonɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ kɛtɔm-a-Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ kissolo. Pilate ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Yɛnwɔyɔng ubeet annyɔɔng!”
43019015	Babungu battɛ, “Wwɔɔlmɛyɔng! Wwɔɔlmɛyɔng! Zzengemɛyɔng!” Pilate ɔttɛ, “Aggyan attɛyɔng nzzenge ubeet annyɔɔng ɔɔ?” Bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm battɛ, “Caesar ulenɛ ubeet ayyɔɔt wa iyanganɛ keem!”
43019016	Pilate ɔsam Jesus unnyibɛ ɔttɛ bamii bazzengemɛ. Ɔzzánga Jesus usseke wa labɔɔk abbɛ.
43019017	Umii ɔsam cross ɔtɔkɔ. Uffu ɔffɔ ka ɛfɛɛn ya ɛzzanganɛ ‘Ɛfɛɛn a Ukɔɔk-a-lɛttɔ (Ɛzzanga ‘Golgotha’ ka kukaan a Hebrew.)
43019018	Bazzengemɛ baang, la balɔɔt baffa. Vvɔn ka kɔbɔɔk ɛlaabɔɔk, vvɔn ka kɔbɔɔk ɛbyakɔm. Bamat Jesus ka kasɛkɛ.
43019019	Pilate ɔkkpɔk ka cross ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Jesus wa Nazareth, Ubeet a Jews.”
43019020	Balɔɔt ggbadam bakkwɔɔ likkpɔk ’sɔng baang ka ɛfɛɛn a bazzengemɛnɛ esinɛ lifulu esseke killu. Likkpɔk ’sɔng baang badɔkɔ bakkpɔksɛ ka kukaan a Hebrew la kukaan a Latin la kukaan a Greece.
43019021	Bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm balɔɔk la Pilate battɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akkpɔk attɛ ‘Ubeet a Jews’, akkpɔk attɛ, ‘Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng ɔttɛ ammɛ Ubeet a Jews.’ ”
43019022	Pilate ɔttɛ, “Bwa nlenɛ lɛkkpɔk butaa ning baang.”
43019023	Isogya ’yɔng baang balenɛ Jesus livve lɛkama ka cross, basam iwɔkɔlɔ ammɛ babɛngɛlɛbɛ kɛyɔɔng abbɛ balɔɔt banna. Basam ewuulu ya ɛsɛlɛnɛ likaang bagbaa.
43019024	Balɔɔk abbɛ abbɛ battɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ iyaakyɔngyɛ. Ikɔɔmyɔngyɛ itta illɔ iyɛn ɔlɔɔt wa ule uzzi.” Nkwɔng kɔnaang nkwaaning kɔlɔɔk kwa luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn: Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, “Basam iwɔkɔlɔ anaam babɛngɛlɛbɛ kɛyɔɔng, Batutala ewuulu anaam.” Uwɔng baang bbwak ulenɛ kwa isogya inaangnɛ.
43019025	Abakka Jesus la etele abakka la Mary wanavva Clopas la Mary Magdalene badɔkɔ baang ka babeenɛ bakkɛtɛ cross wa bazzengenɛ Jesus.
43019026	Jesus ɔyɛn abakka la ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ wa ɔsaapmɛnɛ ka babeenɛ baang, ɔzzánga ɔkkwɔɔ abakka ɔttɛ, “Wanavva, yɛn waan annɔ.”
43019027	Ɔkkwɔɔ ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Yɛn ssakawɔ annɔ baang.” Ka ussinɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang, ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ’wɔng baang ɔlɛkɛ abakka Jesus umii ɔtaa ka ssala ammɛ.
43019028	Jesus ɔsanbong ɔttɛ bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bɛggbabong ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang. Ka ɔggyannɛ ɔttɛ ɔnaang nkwaaning kɔlɔɔk kwa Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn, ɔttɛ, “Bannyi basaapnɛbong!”
43019029	Kɛfɔɔm kɛdɔkɔ baang la batak ba banngmanganɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ. Basam okkokya bayan ka batak ’bɔng baang basam bakpaka ka bisɛssɛ bayeek bassɛɛnmɛ ka kamma.
43019030	Uvvenɛ batak ’bɔng baang lɛvva ɔttɛ, “Kɔsaalbong!” Ɔtɛngɛ lɛttɔ ubbe eseese.
43019031	Bazzilɛttɔ balɔɔt a Jews babap Pilate battɛ ɔfɔngɔbɛ bannɔk bukkpɔ balɔɔt ba bazzengenɛbɛ baang, basinibɛ ka cross. Balɔɔk ka ulenɛ kɛtɔm-a-Friday, basi lɛggyan battɛ babbu bakɔɔng baang bataa ka cross ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ.
43019032	Ɔzzánga isogya bamii bannɔk bukkpɔ ɔlɔɔt wa ikeeng la wa ibaala ba bazzengenɛbɛ la Jesus.
43019033	Baffɔnɛ ka Jesus bayɛnmɛ ka ulenɛ libbe, ɔzzánga basimɛ bukkpɔ lɛnnɔk.
43019034	Wa sogya vvɔn ɔsanga ɔkpankyɔ uttele Jesus baang ka lufoom ɔkɔm, linnyi la bannyi bɛllɔt. (
43019035	Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyɛnnɛ ’kwɔng ka kɔnaangnɛ, ɔlɔɔknɛ utumkwɛ nkwaaning ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng ayilayɔng. Ɔsan lɔsan ɔttɛ ɔlɔɔk lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk.)
43019036	Nkwɔng kɔnaang nkwaaning kɔlɔɔk a Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn: Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, “Kɛkɔp ammɛ ssɔn baala kinuka.”
43019037	Lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛlɔk lile baang za lɛttɛnɛ, “Balɔɔt vvenɛ bappyɛɛk ɔlɔɔt wa bakɔmnɛ.”
43019038	Nkwɔng kulenɛ lɛsaal, Joseph wa ussinɛ Arimathea, umii ɔbap Pilate ɔttɛ ɔfɔngɔmɛ ammɛ ɔsam Jesus. (Joseph ɔdɔkɔ ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus ɔzzànga Jesus kyaakyaa usi likup ɔmma bazzilɛttɔ balɔɔt a Jews.) Pilate ɔttɛ ukkwoong mung ɔsam Jesus. Ɔzzánga Joseph umii ɔtɔkɔ Jesus.
43019039	Nicodemus wa ɔdɔkɔnɛ umii ukup Jesus kɛtɔm kkpal ukup Joseph bamii batɔkɔ Jesus. Ɔkɔɔm bɛfɛɛn bɛlɔk ɔbɛtɛ la myrrh la aloes.
43019040	Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang baffa basam Jesus baggbɔ ka balata ibba ɔbɛtɛ la linnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt a Jews ballinɛ ubbu.
43019041	Ulupu ɔdɔkɔ baang ka ɛfɛɛn a bawwɔɔlnɛ Jesus. Ufaa lilli wa batakanɛ ɔlɔɔt lilli ɔdɔkɔ baang.
43019042	Ka ussekenɛ ssup Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ kɛffɔ, lilli likkɛtɛ ɔgbaa, basam Jesus bawulu baang.
43020001	Lɔfɔm a lɔfɔm a livve luzɔɔm, gɔɔ utii zuulu-zuulu ning, Mary Magdalene ufeele umii ka lilli, ɔyɛn ka lɛttaal lilenɛ lɛttɔm lisseke kamma lilli.
43020002	Ɔmma eseese umii ɔbwɔɔlɔ Simon Peter la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus balɔk ba Jesus ɔsaapnɛbɛ gaang gaang ɔttɛ, “Basangabong Uyini ayyɔɔt ka lilli tɛ, mung ba isan ka ɛfɛɛn a balokomɛnɛ tɛ!”
43020003	Ɔlɔɔknɛ ning baang, Peter la ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus ɔlɔk bamma bamii ka lilli.
43020004	Badɔkɔ baffa ning baang ka bammanɛ, ɔzzanga ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus wa kang ɔmma ɔkɔngɔ Peter, umii utte ka lilli lɛffɔ.
43020005	Ɔkpɔkɔ uvvoop, ɔyɛn ibba baang ka tɔkɔlɔ lilli. Ammɛ biini ka tɔkɔlɔ usi lɛmal.
43020006	Simon Peter ɔdɔkɔ baang ka ukupmɛnɛ ka lɔnnyɔ, ɔffɔnɛ, ɔsak ssɔng umii ɔmal ka tɔkɔlɔ lilli. Ɔyɛn ibba ’yɔng baang
43020007	la ubba wa baggbɔnɛ Jesus ka lɛttɔ. Ubba ’wɔng baang ɔkkɔtbong kɛyɔɔng ammɛ ɔtaa zzekep usseke ibba ’yɔng kang ɔkkpɛlɛ.
43020008	Ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus wa uttenɛ ka lilli lɛffɔ, ɔssɛ umii ɔmal; ɔyɛn ka zzeen ammɛ, uyila. (
43020009	Gɔɔ tɔttɔt basi lippyee bakpala ka Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛnɛ, vvenɛ ufungala ka lubbe.)
43020010	Ɔzzánga balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus bappyɛlɛ bafula.
43020011	Mary ubee baang ka libat a lilli ɔkkwa. Ɔkkwanɛ, ɔkɔɔm ɔkpɔkɔ uvvoop ka tɔkɔlɔ lilli,
43020012	ɔyɛn bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm baffa baang ka bataanɛ ka ɛfɛɛn a bawulunɛ Jesus, vvɔn ka lɛttɔ wa vvɔn ka bukkpɔ.
43020013	Babapmɛ battɛ, “Wanavva, akkwa ’bɔng?” Ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Basambong Uyini anaam bagbata, mung ba nsan ka ɛfɛɛn a balokomɛnɛ!”
43020014	Ɔssanganɛ usikili ning mung, ɔyɛn Jesus bang ka ubeenɛ, ɔzzànga usimɛ lɛkɔɔlɔ.
43020015	Jesus ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ, “Wanavva, akkwa ’bɔng? Mung aggyan nnyinɔɔng?” Ammɛ wanavva ’wɔng baang uttina ɔttɛ baang ɔkat ɛfɛɛn ’yɔng baang, ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔk la ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Dedde, ulewɔnɛ annɔ asammɛnɛ abbɛ mung, abwɔɔlɔnɛ ka ɛfɛɛn alokomɛnɛ, nmii nsammɛ.”
43020016	Jesus ɔlɔɔk la ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Mary!” Ammɛ usikili ɔppyɛɛkmɛ ɔlɔɔk ka kukaan a Hebrews ɔttɛ, “Rabboni!” (Ning baang ulenɛ “Ukopolo-lukopolo.”)
43020017	Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛ ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ alɔmnɛ ka ntakanɛ ka ɛfɛɛn a Dedde lɛppyɛlɛ nmii. Ɔzzànga amii abwɔɔlɔ ikpana anaam attɛ nle ka nppyɛlɛnɛ nmii ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ wa ulenɛ Dedde ayyɔɔt la abbɛ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ayyɔɔt la abbɛ.”
43020018	Mary Magdalene umii ɔbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ ammɛ ɔyɛnbong Uyini, ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ bwa ɔlɔɔknɛ la ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
43020019	Kulele ka kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang, balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bammabong baddumu ka tɔkɔlɔ a ggwoon bafɛɛn lamma bassɛɛn ikpaka bakakabɛ kɛyɔɔng ka bazzilɛttɔ balɔɔt a Jews babbwɔpɔnɛbɛ. Jesus uffu ubeebɛ baang ka bɛzzɔkɔ ɔttɛ, “Ataayɔng ka bɔkaat.”
43020020	Ulenɛ ning baang livve lɛlɔɔk, ɔyɔɔbɛ labɔɔk la lufoom. Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ baggele gaang gaang ka bayɛnnɛ Uyini.
43020021	Jesus ɔbbal la abbɛ lɛlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Ataayɔng ka bɔkaat. Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Dedde ɔtɔɔmmɛnɛ anaam, annyɔɔng nle nssɛ ntɔɔmwɔyɔng ning baang.”
43020022	Ulenɛ livve lɛlɔɔk, ɔfɛkɛlɛ uvvoongbɛ, ɔttɛ, “Atɔkyɔng Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
43020023	Asɔɔknɛyɔng balɔɔt bubbi, vvenɛ bubbi abbɛ busaal; asinɛyɔngbɛ lɛsɔɔk, bubbi abbɛ bukɔɔngbɛ baang.”
43020024	Ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus vvɔn wa ɔzzanganɛ Thomas (Bakkwɔɔmɛ, Waan-ippɛlɛng) usi lile ka ɛkɛtɛ a Jesus uffunɛ.
43020025	Ɔzzánga balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus balɔk babwɔɔlɔmɛ battɛ, “Iyɛnbong Uyini.” Thomas ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Nsinɛ binuku bya bamatmɛnɛ bɛfɔl ka labɔɔk lɛyɛn, nsam kɛnnɔ anaam nwɔkɔlɔ baang, nsam kɔbɔɔk anaam nwɔkɔlɔmɛ ka lufoom ba nyila.”
43020026	Liwaazɛ liffunɛ, balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus babbal lɛggba ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn ka tɔkɔlɔ a ggwoon. Livve ’zɔng baang Thomas ɔdɔkɔ baang. Bafɛɛnbong lamma bassɛɛn ikpaka ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔzzánga Jesus ɔmal ubeebɛ ka bɛzzɔkɔ baang ɔttɛ, “Ataayɔng ka bɔkaat.”
43020027	Keem ɔlɔɔk la Thomas ɔttɛ, “Ppyɛɛk labulakaat anaam mung, awɔkɔlɔ kɛnnɔ annɔ, alenɛ livve atɔnɔ kɔbɔɔk awɔkɔlɔnɛ ka lufoom. Kkyaa ikangala annɔ afɔngɔ, ayila.”
43020028	Thomas ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Uyini anaam, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm anaam.”
43020029	Jesus ɔlɔɔk la ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Mung ayila ka alenɛnɛ lɛyɛn ɔɔ? Laggele lale za balɔɔt ba batakanɛnɛ lɛyɛn, ɔzzànga bayila tɔttɔt!”
43020030	Jesus ɔnaang bɛmaanga ggbadam ggbadam bya basinɛ lɛkkpɔk bassɛɛn ka luvva ’gwɔng mung ka bassɛnɛ la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ.
43020031	Nkkpɔk lilɔɔk ’sɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ nttɛ nkwaaning ayila attɛyɔng Jesus ulenɛ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ, Waan Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ayilanɛyɔng ning baang vvenɛ ayangayɔng kuddu.
43021001	Nkwɔng kulenɛ lɛsaal, Jesus utuma ka ɛfɛɛn a balɔɔt ammɛ ba bannambakkyaat ka libbwe za lɛzzanganɛ Tiberius. Kɔdɔkɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ale ka appyeenɛyɔng mung:
43021002	Simon Peter, la Thomas (Waan-ippɛlɛng), Nathanael (wa ussinɛ lɛffɛ za lɛzzanganɛ Cana ka Galilee) la bwaan a Zebedee la balɔɔt a Jesus ba baffa badɔkɔ ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn.
43021003	Simon Peter ufeele ɔlɔɔk la ba abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Nle ka nmiinɛ kulap isɛɛnabannyi.” Babwɔɔlɔmɛ battɛ, “Vvenɛ iffu ikupwɔ.” Bafeele bamal ka akkpaat bawaat bamii. Ɔzzànga kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ bulɔk ning basi lɛkaa.
43021004	Ɔffɔnɛ ka livve lɛttanɛ, Jesus ubee akang ka lufoom a bannyi, ɔzzánga balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ basi lɛkɔɔlɔ battɛ baang Jesus.
43021005	Ɔzzánga ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Bakolobya, bulɔk ba ataka akaayɔng ɔɔ?” Abbɛ bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, “Bulɔk ba itaka ikaa tɛ.”
43021006	Ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Atɔɔpyɔng kuggbɔ ka kufoom akkpaat kwa ɛlaabɔɔk, vvenɛ akaayɔng isɛɛn. Abbɛ basam kuggbɔ batɔɔp. Basi lɛbɛlɛ likkwoong battulu kuggbɔ batta ka tɔkɔlɔ bannyi ka isɛɛn ilenɛkwɛ liyipi.
43021007	Ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus wa ɔsaapmɛnɛ gaang gaang ɔlɔɔk la Peter ɔttɛ, “Baang Uyini tɛ!” Peter uppyeenɛ ning baang ɔttɛ baang Uyini, ɔsam ewuulu ammɛ ɔggbɔmɛ kɛyɔɔng, (ka ulenɛ lɛffɔ uggbolo iwɔkɔlɔ) ukut ɔssɛɛn ka bannyi.
43021008	Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ’bɔng baang batutulu kuggbɔ la isɛɛn ning baang batta ka likum ɔbɛtɛ la akkpaat. Ɛfɛɛn ya babeenɛ bakaa ifɛɛn ’yɔng baang ele lalɔp a bukkpɔ kubbwɔɔk keem kɛtɛkɛtɛ likum.
43021009	Baffɔnɛ ka likum, bayɛn isɛɛnabannyi ka lagyigyaal a lɔkɔɔn la brɛɛd.
43021010	Ɔzzánga Jesus ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Asangayɔng isɛɛnabannyi ya assumanɛyɔng lɛkaa mung affuyɔng ee.”
43021011	Simon Peter ɔmal ka akkpaat uttulu kuggbɔ ’kwɔng baang la isɛɛnabannyi ya labaang ka tɔkɔlɔ; ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɛ iggba-ɔggba lalɔp isɛɛnabannyi lannangakkyaat la isɛɛn zzɔɔppikkyaat. Gɔɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ iyipinɛ baang, kuggbɔ kɔlɔk kusi lɛnaang nakanaka.
43021012	Jesus ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Affu azziyɔng kazzi.” Ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ vvɔn gbɔɔ wa ɔbbɔnɛ ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ, “Annɔ nnyinɔɔng?” usi lile ka balenɛ lɛkɔɔlɔ battɛ Ammɛ ulenɛ Uyini.
43021013	Jesus ɔsam brɛɛd ’wɔng baang unnyibɛ, ɔbbal isɛɛnabannyi lɛsam unnyibɛ.
43021014	Baang ɔnaang ka bikkpit bɛkkyaat ka Jesus ɔyɔɔmɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng ka ɛfɛɛn a balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ussinɛ ufungala ka lubbe.
43021015	Balenɛ livve lizzi, Jesus ɔlɔɔk la Simon Peter ɔttɛ, “Simon, waan a John, mung nsaapwɔ mung ntta tɛ̀ttɛ̀ nsaapnɛ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ anaam ’bɔng kang ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔɔ?” Ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Iii, Uyini, asan lɔsan attɛ asaapnɛ gaang gaang.” Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛ ɔttɛ, “Appyɛɛk itɔɔn anaam!”
43021016	Ɔbbalmɛ lɛbap ka bikkpit bɛffa ɔttɛ, “Simon, waan a John, nsaapwɔ mung ɔɔ?” Ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Iii tɛ, Uyini, asan lɔsan attɛ asaapnɛ gaang gaang.” Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛ ɔttɛ, “Apyɛɛk itɔɔn anaam!”
43021017	Jesus ɔbbalmɛ lɛbap ka bikkpit bɛkkyaat ɔttɛ, “Simon, waan a John, nsaapwɔ mung ɔɔ?” Ɔzzanga ammɛ ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Uyini, annɔ asan bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ, asan lɔsan attɛ asaapnɛ gaang gaang!” Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛ ɔttɛ, “Appyɛɛk itɔɔn anaam.
43021018	Mbwɔɔlɔwɔ ka lɔkkwɔɔn nttɛ; ɛkɛtɛ atiinɛ okolobya, ataa afeele ning abama amii ɛfɛɛn a kɔsaapwɔnɛ: ɔzzànga ɛkɛtɛ ya akkpɛɛmnɛ, vvenɛ atɔnɔ labɔɔk aloko baggbɔwɔ basam bamii ka ɛfɛɛn a kusiwɔnɛ lɛsaap.”
43021019	(Ning mung Jesus ɔlɔɔk ɔyɔɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Peter ule ubbe ɔkɔɔm latele ufee Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.) Jesus Ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛ ɔttɛ, “Akupnɛ!”
43021020	Peter usikilinɛ ɔppyɛɛk, ɔyɛn ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus ’wɔng baang, wa ɔsaapnɛ Jesus gaang gaang, wa ɔffɛlɛnɛ Jesus kɛtɛkɛtɛ ning ɛkɛtɛ kazzi kulele ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ, “Uyini, mung attɛ nnyinɔɔng ule ka uzziwɔnɛ issɛ?”
43021021	Peter ɔyɛnmɛnɛ, ɔbap Jesus ɔttɛ, “Uyini, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung bɛɛ?”
43021022	Jesus ɔppyɛlɛmɛ ɔttɛ, “Nlɔɔknɛ nttɛ uddu tɔttɔt nffu, nkwɔng baang kɔnaangwɔ ’bɔng? Akupnɛ!”
43021023	Ɔzzánga balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus bappyee kuttu battɛ ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus ’wɔng baang baala ubbe. Jesus usi lɛlɔɔk ɔttɛ baala ubbe tɛ, ɔdɔkɔ ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Nlɔɔknɛ nttɛ uddu tɔttɔt nffu, nkwɔng baang kɔnaangwɔ ’bɔng?”
43021024	Ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus ’wɔng baang ulenɛ wa ɔlɔɔknɛ lilɔɔk ’sɔng mung, ammɛ biini ɔkkpɔknɛsɛ ɔssɛɛn ka luvva; ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt isan lɔsan ittɛ kwa ɔlɔɔknɛ kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
43021025	Jesus ɔnaang bɛfɛɛn bɛlɔk ggbadam ɔgbaa. Bakkpɔknɛ bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng baang la bbwɔn la bbwɔn bassɛɛn ka luvva, nttina nttɛ nzang ɔkkpɛlɛ ɛkpansi baala bakkwoong bakɔɔm livva sa bale bakkpɔk.
44001001	Nwomowɔbong Theophilus: Ka luvva anaam gwa ikeeng, nkkpɔk ntum bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya Jesus ɔnaangnɛ la lukopolo ammɛ, ka ussinɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya uttenɛ kɛnaang ammɛ,
44001002	uffu ɔffɔ kɛtɔm sa umiinɛ ka libat. Bong tɛ́ttɛ́ umii ka libat, ɔkɔɔm lakke Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkamala balɔɔt ba ulenɛ lɛssang ɔttɛ bazzanga bayilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ.
44001003	Ufungalanɛ ka lubbe ɔggba ka lalɔp a bɛtɔm laffa, ɔyɔɔmɛ kɛyɔɔng ka lusso balɔɔt ammɛ bikongo ggbadam. Ɔyɔɔbɛ ka ɛfɛɛn a basinɛ lɛbɛlɛ likkwoong bakangala. Bayila battɛ utii ka kuddu ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Bayɛnmɛ, ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ utum Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
44001004	Baggbanɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn, ɔkamalabɛ ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ agbatayɔng ka Jerusalem tɛ. Ataa akatyɔng lɛsɔɔk za nbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng kkpal nttɛ Dedde ɔttɛ vvenɛ unnyiwɔyɔng tɛ.
44001005	John ɔdɔkɔ ɔnaangwɔyɔng baptizim la bannyi, ɔzzànga bwaan a bɛtɔm bisseke ssɛk vvenɛ banaangwɔyɔng baptizim la Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
44001006	Bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus badudanɛ ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn la Jesus, babapmɛ battɛ, “Uyini, mung ɛkɛtɛ ɛffɔbong ya ale ka asanganɛ Israel ka bubili, annɔ asseke ubeet ayyɔɔt ɔɔ?”
44001007	Jesus ɔttɛ, “Kɔlɔɔk kwa ɛkɛtɛ la kɛtɔm sa bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng bile bɛnaang, Dedde anaam ɔsannɛ. Kwa annyɔɔng asannɛyɔng lissi.
44001008	Ɔzzànga vvenɛ ayangayɔng lakke Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ɛkɛtɛ ya kule kuffu kuvvoongwɔyɔng. Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang, vvenɛ abeenɛyɔng ittɛɛsɛ ka Jerusalem la Judea, la Samaria ɔkkpɛlɛ ning ning, uddum ka ɛfɛɛn a ɛkpansi ekpekenɛ.”
44001009	Uvvenɛ nkwɔng lɛlɔɔk umii ka libat ka balenɛ baang ka bappyɛɛkmɛnɛ tɔttɔt ikkpálá a lukpaaggbeede ifɛɛnmɛ, basimɛ lɛbɛlɛ lɛyɛn.
44001010	Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ badɔkɔ batii baang ka bagbepnɛ lɛppyɛɛk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Jesus umiinɛ ka libat. Eseese bayɛn balɔɔt baffa la balata iwɔkɔlɔ kitipili ka babeenɛbɛ ka bɛzzɔkɔ. Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang baffa battɛ,
44001011	“Bwaan a bwalam a Galilee, abee appyɛɛkyɔng ’bɔng ka libat a lukpaagbeede? Jesus ’wɔng baang wa basammɛnɛ bagbata umii ka libat, vvenɛ ɔppyɛlɛ ning baang uffu tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ayɛnmɛnɛyɔng baang ka umiinɛ ka libat.”
44001012	Bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus bappyɛlɛ isimisimi bamii Jerusalem. Ka ussinɛ ka lɛttaal a Olives ule kufaak mile uddum tɔkɔlɔ a ssala.
44001013	Bamal Jerusalem bamii ka libat a ɛnyɔng ka tɔkɔlɔ lɛnɔk za bataanɛ: Badɔkɔ Peter, John, James, la Andrew, Philip, Thomas, Bartholomew la Matthew, James waan Alphaeus, Simon wa lɔkaan ammɛ lɔsaapmɛnɛ gaang gaang, la Judas waan a James.
44001014	Ɔkkpɛlɛ baggba ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn; bassɛɛn luzɔɔm ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔbɛtɛ la wanavva ’wɔng haang la Mary, abakka Jesus, la itele a Jesus.
44001015	Bwaan a bɛtɔm bɛsaknɛ, bɔfɛɛn a lalɔp a balɔɔt ning bwɔlaaning ba bayanganɛ kiyila bataa mitin. Peter ufeele ɔlɔɔk lɛkkɔ ɔttɛ,
44001016	“Ikpana anaam, lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lilebong ka lɔkkwɔɔn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔnaangnɛ David ɔlɔɔk kɔlɔɔk utum Judas wa ɔkɔɔmnɛ balɔɔt ba bakaanɛ Jesus ɛtɔk.
44001017	Judas ɔdɔkɔ ɔlɔɔt wa kɔssɛ ayyɔɔt ka balemɛnɛ lɛsanga battɛ ɔyanga etini kɛnaang ka kɔssɛ ayyɔɔt.”
44001018	(Judas ɔkɔɔm ikkpoko ya ɔyanganɛ ka babbu bɛnaang ammɛ ɔlɛɛp ɛkpansi. Baang ulenɛ ɛfɛɛn a ɔttɔnɛ ubbe lɛmmɛ lɛssa, bɛfɛɛn a tɔkɔlɔ bɛtta bɛllɔt.
44001019	Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba ballunɛ Jerusalem bappyeekwɛ, ɔzzánga basseke ka bakkwɔɔnɛ ɛkpansi ’yɔng baang ‘Akeldama’, ka kukaan abbɛ ‘Ɛkpansi Linnyi’)
44001020	Bakkpɔk ka luvva Psalms battɛ, ‘Numa ggwoon ammɛ lɔtaa kippwo, Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ullu ka tɔkɔlɔ.’ Babbal lɛkkpɔk battɛ, ‘Numa ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔtɔk kɛtaa kɛnaang ammɛ.’
44001021	“Kwakkwɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ule ɔddɔlyɛlɛ, ubee ittɛɛsɛ kifungala sa Jesus, Uyini, ufungalanɛ ka lubbe. Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ule ule ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ ayyɔɔt, wa ɔggbanɛ lissi ule baang ka ɛkɛtɛ ya Uyini Jesus ɔkɔɔmyɛlɛ ɔssɛ ukkpit, ka ussinɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ a John ukopolonɛ kɔlɔɔk a kɛnaang a baptizim tɔttɔt uffu ɔffɔ ka kɛtɔm sa basamnɛ Jesus bamii ka libat.”
44001023	Ɔzzánga baddam bafɔngɔ balɔɔt baffa: Joseph, wa bakkwɔɔmɛnɛ Barsabbas (badɔkɔ bakkwɔɔmɛ Justus bagbaa), ɔbɛtɛ la Mathias.
44001024	Bavvenɛ lɛddam, bazɔɔm battɛ, “Uyini, annɔ asannɛ ippyam balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ. Uyini, ayɔɔyɛlɛ ka balɔɔt ba baffa ’bɔng mung, ɔlɔɔt wa alenɛ lɛsanga.
44001025	Ɔtɔk kufuk a kɛnaang a ’sɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ uyilabɔtɔɔm annɔ, ussila lɛttɔ a Judas wa ulenɛ lɛgbata umii ka ɛfɛɛn a ussinɛ.”
44001026	Bavvenɛ ning baang, bazzɔɔk iggo battɛ basanga lɛkɔɔl zzɔn ka lakɔɔl ’zɔng baang laffa. Keem iggo ittɔ, iffɛlɛ Mathias. Ɔzzánga basam Mathias batoolo la bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus ba zzɔɔppavvɔn.
44002001	Ɔffɔnɛ kɛtɔm-a-Pentecost, (lalɔp a bɛtɔm laffa la bɛtɔm zzɔɔp bɛsaknɛ ka ussinɛ ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ) kwa balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba bayanganɛ kiyila baggbanɛ ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn.
44002002	Eseese, bappyee lɔsap ka libat a lukpaaggbeede ka ludumnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛffa sa lɛbaang a lɛbaang. Lɔsap ’gwɔng baang lɔttala gaang gaang ka tɔkɔlɔ a ggwoon gwa bataanɛ.
44002003	Ɔzzánga bayɛn bɛfɛɛn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lalaak a lɔkɔɔn ka bitumanɛ. Lalaak a lɔkɔɔn ’zɔng baang lasingi ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ.
44002004	Lakke Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lafulabɛ ka kkwɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ, basseke ka balɔɔknɛ bafaa likaan sa Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kunnyinɛbɛ lakke kɔttɛ balɔɔk.
44002005	Balɔɔt a Jews badɔkɔ baang ka ballunɛ ka Jerusalem, badɔkɔ balɔɔt a luzɔɔm ba bassinɛ la ifɛɛn la ifɛɛn ka ɛkpansi ɔkkpɛlɛ baffu.
44002006	Bappyeenɛ lɔsap ’gwɔng baang kibbi kɛggba ka ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn. Ɔzzánga kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ka bappyeenɛ bayanga-kiyila ka ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔknɛ kukaan ammɛ.
44002007	Kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ gaang gaang balɔɔk abbabbɛ battɛ, “Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba balɔɔknɛ baang ɔkkpɛlɛ bassi Galilee!
44002008	Ɔnaang nang ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt ippyeenɛ bwa balɔɔknɛ ka likaan ayyɔɔt?
44002009	Uvve ayyɔɔt ba Parthia, la Media, la Elam; balɔk ba Mesopotamia la Judea, la Cappadocia; balɔk ba Pontus la Asia;
44002010	balɔk ba Phrygia la Pamphylia, balɔk ba Egypt la ɛkpansi Libya kɛtɛkɛtɛ Cyrene; ayyɔɔt balɔk issi Rome.
44002011	Balɔɔt a Jews la ikanakana ɔkkpɛlɛ badɔkɔ basikilibɛ ippyam basseke ba luzɔɔm a balɔɔt a Jews. Ayyɔɔt balɔk issi Crete la Arabia ɔzzànga ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt ippyeebɛ ka balɔɔknɛ ka likaan ayyɔɔt batum lilɔɔk sa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ lɛnaang!”
44002012	Kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ ittina ibubutubɛ; basseke ka babapnɛbɛ kɛyɔɔng battɛ, “Uwɔng ulenɛ ’bɔng?”
44002013	Balɔɔt balɔk banyɔɔka bayanga-kiyila battɛ, “Balɔɔt ’bɔng mung babimibong tɛ!”
44002014	Peter ufeele ubee la babbɛ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ Jesus ba zzɔɔppavvɔn. Ɔlɔɔk ɔgaga, unnyi kibbi ’sɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Bayyɔɔt a Jews la balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba ballunɛ Jerusalem, agɔpɔlɔnɛyɔng appyeeyɔng kwa nle ka nlɔɔknɛ ntum kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng mung.
44002015	Balɔɔt ’bɔng mung ba bataka babimi tɛ̀ttɛ̀ attinanɛyɔng, utii ikalangka ɔsɛlɛzzɔɔp ya lɔfɔm keem.
44002016	Uwɔng ulenɛ kɔlɔɔk kwa Joel, Uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔlɔɔknɛ utum.
44002017	‘Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛ, ‘Uwɔng ulenɛ kɔlɔɔk kwa nle nnaang ka bɛtɔm a lakpeke. Vvenɛ nvvoong ɔssɛbibit ɔkkpɛlɛ Kuyeeng anaam. Bwaan annyɔɔng vvenɛ balɔɔk kɔlɔɔk anaam. Bakolobya annyɔɔng vvenɛ bayɛn biyɛnɛ. Bagɛlɛnya annyɔɔng vvenɛ balakala ilakala.
44002018	Gɔɔ vvenɛ nvvoong babili anaam bwaanbwalam la bwanavva Kuyeeng anaam ka kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang. Vvenɛ balɔɔk kɔlɔɔk anaam kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang.
44002019	Vvenɛ nnaang bɛmaanga ka lukpaaggbeedde la kɔlɔɔk a bikɛɛlɛ ka ɛkpansi. Balɔɔt vvenɛ bayɛn linnyi la lɔkɔɔn la babili-isɔngɔ;
44002020	Livve-luwee vvenɛ lizum, ettuma vvenɛ ekoot tɛ̀ttɛ̀ linnyi, tɛ́ttɛ́ kɛtɔm-a-laggele Uyini sa lɛbaang ’sɔng baang kɛffɔ.
44002021	Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ wa ɔkkwɔɔnɛ lɛkɔɔl Uyini vvenɛ ɔtaa ka kuddu.’
44002022	“Agɔpɔlɔyɔng lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng, balɔɔt a Israel! Jesus wa Nazareth ɔdɔkɔ ɔlɔɔt a kɛnaang Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kkpelegede tɛ̀ttɛ̀ akkwoongnɛ ayɛnyɔng ka bɛmaanga la bikɛɛlɛ lilɔɔk bya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkɔɔmmɛnɛ ɔnaang. Annyɔɔng biini asanyɔng lɔsan ka kɔnaangnɛ ka zzeen annyɔɔng biini.
44002023	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka lɔtan gwa ammɛ la kɛsan a kɔlɔɔk, ɔggba litini ɔttɛ vvenɛ ɔsam Jesus unnyiwɔyɔng awwɔɔlyɔng, ka kɛfɔngɔ banaang-a-bubbi bakamamɛ bɛfɔl bakaka ka Cross.
44002024	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ufungalamɛ ka lubbe. Ɔkkalamɛ ɔfɔngɔ ka bɔssɔp a lubbe. Kukoolo ukoolo tɛ́ttɛ́ lubbe lukopomɛ ka mgbakkɔpɔ.
44002025	David ɔlɔɔk utummɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Nyɛn Uyini ka lusso anaam ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ulenɛ ka kɔbɔɔk a ɛlaabɔɔk nkwaaning nsinɛ lɛbbwɔpɔ.
44002026	Kwakkwɛ nggelenɛ ka luppyam. Lammwɔɔl anaam lale za bɔwaa. Ɔzzànga nkkpa nle wa nle nbbe, vvenɛ nfɛkɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luttina lɔbwɔɔlɔnɛnɛ.
44002027	Baala afɔngɔnɛ nkɔɔng ka babbu; Baala ayila ukee waan ubili annɔ ɔyɛn akama, ɔddɔlɔ.
44002028	Ayɔɔnɛbong ɛtɔk ya emiinɛ ka kuddu; Kile sa alenɛ la anaam, vvenɛ anaangnɛ ntaa ka laggele.’
44002029	“Ikpana anaam, vvenɛ nkpɔkɔlɔ nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nyaala ntum uzzilɛttɔ ayyɔɔt David. Ubbe ballimɛ. Lilli ammɛ litii mung la ayyɔɔt pitip pip gbɔng mung.
44002030	Ɔdɔkɔ uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔsannɛ bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uyilanɛ ɔttɛ vvenɛ ɔnaang unnyimɛ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uyim ɔttɛ, vvenɛ ɔkaa waan a David vvɔn kibeet tɛ̀ttɛ̀ David biini ɔdɔkɔnɛ.
44002031	David ɔyɛnnɛ bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule ka ɔnaangɛ, ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔk utum kifungala ka lubbe Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ, ka ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Usi lɛkɔɔng ka babbu; kkwɔɔt ammɛ lisi lɛddɔlɔ.’
44002032	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ufungala Jesus ’wɔng mung ka lubbe, ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt iyɛnyɔng ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
44002033	Ufungalabong umii kufoom a ɛlaabɔɔk a Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔtɔk Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm tɛ̀ttɛ̀ abassɛ ulenɛ lisekele. Bwa appyeenɛyɔng, ayɛnyɔng mung ulenɛ lɛsɔɔk ammɛ za usikilinɛ uvvoongyɛlɛ.
44002034	Gɔɔ David biini ka libat usi limii, ɔdɔkɔ ɔppyɛɛ ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, ‘Ebinukkpaapi ɛlɔɔk la Uyini anaam ɛttɛ, Ataanɛ mung ka lufoom ɛlaabɔɔk,
44002035	ning ning nnaang balɔɔt a kɔfɔk annɔ ataa asingbɛ bukkpɔ.’
44002036	“Balɔɔt a Israel ɔkkpɛlɛ asanyɔng ka lɔkkwɔɔn attɛyɔng mung Jesus awɔng tɛ, wa akamamɛnɛyɔng ka Cross. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangmɛbong ɔzzánga Uyini la Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ tɛ!”
44002037	Balɔɔt bappyeenɛ ning baang ɔnaangbɛ niit, balɔɔk la Peter la bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus battɛ, “Mung ile inaang nang, ikpana ayyɔɔt?”
44002038	Peter ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Akkyaayɔng kɛnaang a bubbi afɔngɔyɔng. Usseke banaangwɔyɔng baptizim ka lɛkɔɔl a Jesus Christ nkwaaning Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsɔɔkwɔyɔng bubbi annyɔɔng; atɔkyɔng lɛsɔɔk a Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
44002039	Nlɔɔk nloko wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangnɛ ɔdɔkɔ ɔnaang kwa annyɔɔng la bwaan annyɔɔng la balɔɔt balɔk ba ballunɛ fulufulu ba Ebinukkpaapi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ayyɔɔt ɔkkwɔɔnɛ, unnyimɛ kɛyɔɔng.”
44002040	Peter ukkpengebɛ, ututbɛ ɔgbaa ɔttɛ, “Akkalawɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng ka akama wa ule ka uffunɛ ukup banaang a bubbi balɔɔt ’bɔng.”
44002041	Balɔɔt ggbadam bayila lɛmmwɔɔl ammɛ, banaangbɛ baptizim. Bɔfɛɛn innɔ balɔɔt innamikkyaat la kufaak ka bafulanɛ ka kɛkaan ’sɔng baang ka kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang.
44002042	Batɔk ɛkɛtɛ abbɛ; bakkoop lilɔɔk ka bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus, bakup eleme ya banaangnɛ, bwakuzzi bazzi ning baang, gɔɔ luzɔɔm.
44002043	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkɔɔm bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus; ɔnaang bɛfɛɛn a bikɛɛlɛ, la bɛfɛɛn a bɛmaanga. Akkwɛ kɔnaangnɛ, ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔbbwɔpɔbɛ.
44002044	Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bayanganɛ kiyila bakama ɔkama basseke ka bɔkaat gaang gaang. Bɔfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bwa bayanganɛ batul ning baang bakɔɔm.
44002045	Bataan bɛfɛɛn bya bayanganɛ, ɔkkpɛlɛ babɛngɛlɛ ikkpoko ɔkkpɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔt ɔggyannɛ.
44002046	Kɛtɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ baduda ka kɛkaan abbɛ ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Bwakuzzi ka ssala bazzi ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn la laggele la luppyam gwa kɛsaap.
44002047	Babungu Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, baggele kɛsaap a balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ. Kɛtɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ Uyini ɔgbaa balɔɔt ba ulenɛbɛ lɛkkala ka kibbi abbɛ.
44003001	Kɛtɔm ssɔn, Peter la John bamii ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ikalangka ikkyaat kikoon, ɛkɛtɛ a luzɔɔm.
44003002	Ɔlɔɔt ɔdɔkɔ baang wa ɔnnɔknɛ kikkwu ka ussinɛ ɔfal, ka ɔtaanɛ ka ‘Ubeet a Kikkwu’ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bakkwɔɔnɛsɛ. Basammɛ kɛtɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ bamii baloko ka kikkwu ’sɔng baang. Ubbwoom ikkpoko ka balɔɔt ba basaknɛ bamii ka tɔkɔlɔ a Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
44003003	Ɔyɛnnɛ Peter la John ka bamiinɛ, ukkpengebɛ ɔttɛ bannyimɛ bɔfɛɛn.
44003004	Bappyɛɛkmɛ ssii, Peter ɔttɛ, “Ppyɛɛkyɛlɛ!”
44003005	Ɔzzánga ɔppyɛɛkbɛ, uttina ɔttɛ baang bale ka bannyimɛnɛ bɔfɛɛn.
44003006	Peter ɔttɛ, “Ikkpoko ba nyanga ya nnyiwɔnɛ, ɔzzànga vvenɛ nnyiwɔ bwa nyanganɛ: Ka lakke Jesus Christ wa ussinɛ Nazareth, nbwɔɔlɔwɔ nttɛ afeele, assɛ.”
44003007	Ɔlɔmmɛ ka kɔbɔɔk a ɛlaabɔɔk uttelemɛ ufeele ubee, eseese laluk lakkaammɛ.
44003008	Ukut, ɔppyɛlɛ ubee, ɔssɛ ukkpit, ukupbɛ, bamii ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm; ɔkɔɔm, ukut ubungu Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang.
44003009	Kibbi ’sɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ bayɛnmɛ ka ɔssɛnɛ, uwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang.
44003010	Bakɔɔlɔmɛ battɛ, ubbwoom a lubbwoom wa ɔtaanɛ ɔtaa ka “Ubeet a Kikkwu” a Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ ka kɔlɔɔk kwa kɔnaangmɛnɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ ukkwoong ɔssɛ.
44003011	Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ukupnɛ Peter la John ning baang, balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ. Bamma bakupbɛ ka Ikkɔlɔ a Solomon, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bakkwɔɔnɛyɛ.
44003012	Peter ɔyɛnnɛ balɔɔt ’bɔng baang, utolo unnyibɛ ɔttɛ, “Balɔɔt a Israel, ’bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng kɔkɛɛlɛwɔyɔng, bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ appyɛɛkyɔngyɛlɛ? Attina attɛyɔng, mung ikɔɔm likke za ayyɔɔt biini inaang ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung ɔssɛ ɔɔ?
44003013	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm a Abraham la Isaac la Jacob la balɔɔt ayyɔɔt ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ, unnyibong bɔɔyi ammɛ Jesus Christ likke ammɛ. Annyɔɔng asammɛnɛyɔng annyiyɔng bayanga-lakke ka ɛkpansi. Afimmɛyɔng ka lusso a Pilate, wa uttinanɛ ɔttɛ, nzang vvenɛ ɔkkyaamɛ ɔfɔngɔ.
44003014	Ɔdɔkɔ ɔlɔɔt wa doddo, ɔzzànga afimmɛyɔng. Attɛyɔng Pilate ɔkkyaa Barabas wa ɔwwɔɔlnɛ balɔɔt ɔfɔngɔ.
44003015	Ɔzzánga awwɔɔlyɔng Ɔkɔɔm-ɛtɔk a kuddu. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ufungalamɛbong ka lubbe. Ayyɔɔt ilenɛ ittɛɛsɛ kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng.
44003016	Likke ammɛ linaangnɛ ɔnnɔk a kikkwu ’wɔng ɔkkaam. Bwa ayɛnnɛyɔng, aleyɔng lɛsan mung ulenɛ kɛnaang sa kiyila ka lɛkɔɔl a Jesus kɛnaangnɛ. Kiyila ka lɛkɔɔl a Jesus kɛnaangmɛnɛ ɔppwamɛ ka lusso annyɔɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ.
44003017	“Ikpana anaam, nsan lɔsan nttɛ kwa annyɔɔng la bazzilɛttɔ annyɔɔng anaangnɛyɔng la Jesus, adɔkɔ anaangyɔng ka kisɛsan.
44003018	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggba bappyee-kutolo ammɛ lɛlɔɔk ɔssɛɛn ɔttɛ Ɔlɔɔt wa ammɛ ɔsanganɛ vvenɛ ɔyɛn akama. Ɔnaang kwɛ kɔnaang ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
44003019	Anaangyɔng busannɛ ka bubbi; akkpengeyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm nkwaaning ɔsɔɔkwɔyɔng.
44003020	Nkwaaning ɛkɛtɛ lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɛffɔnɛ, essi ka lusso Ebinukkpaapi, ɔlɔk ɔtɔɔm Jesus, wa ulenɛ Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔggbanɛ lɛsanga, unnyiwɔyɔng.
44003021	Vvenɛ ɔtaa bakang ka libat tɔttɔt ɔffɔ ɛkɛtɛ ya ule ufoolo bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bappyee-kutolo-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ balɔɔknɛ.
44003022	Moses ɔttɛ, ‘Ebinukkpaapi, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm annyɔɔng, vvenɛ ɛtɔɔm uppyee-kutolo-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm efeewɔyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɛtɔɔmnɛnɛ anaam mung. Ule ussi ka balɔɔt annyɔɔng. Agɔpɔlɔyɔng lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ sa ɔbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng.
44003023	Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ wa ule usi kɔlɔɔk kwa uppyee-kutolo-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ’kwɔng baang lɛgɔpɔlɔ, vvenɛ basangamɛ ka kɔssɛ balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bawwɔɔl.’
44003024	Bappyee-kutolo-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ɔbɛtɛnɛ la Samuel la ba bakupmɛnɛ ka isimi, ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ ba bayanganɛ kɔlɔɔk kwa kɛbwɔɔlɔ, babwɔɔlɔ kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng kwa kɔnaangnɛ ka bɛtɔm ’byɔng mung.
44003025	Nlɔɔk-nloko Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka labɔɔk a bappyee-kutolo ammɛ, ule wa annyɔɔng. Ayangayɔng etini ka kɛbɛtɛ-kɛnnɔ sa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔbɛtɛnɛ la balɔɔt annyɔɔng ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔknɛ la Abraham ɔttɛ, ‘Ka lɛttɔ bwaan annɔ vvenɛ nnaang balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ppyɛɛ ka ɛkpansi.’
44003026	Kwakkwɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkɔɔmnɛ ɛtɔk, ɔsanga bɔɔyi ammɛ, ɔtɔɔm ufeewɔyɔng ɔttɛ ɔnaangwɔyɔng ppyɛɛ ka ule ɔnaangwɔyɔng akkyaayɔng bubbi afɔngɔyɔng.”
44004001	Peter la John badɔkɔ batii ka kɛlɔɔk ’sɔng baang, ka bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt wa ɔppyɛɛknɛ balɔɔt ba bakatnɛ Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, la balɔɔt a Sadducees baffunɛ.
44004002	Kɔdɔkɔ kutunbɛ ka bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus baffa bakopolonɛ balɔɔt battɛ, ‘Jesus ufungalabong ka lubbe.’ Nkwɔng baang kɔyɔɔbong kɔttɛ babbu vvenɛ bafungala ka lubbe, bataa ka kuddu.
44004003	Ɔzzánga bakaabɛ bassɛɛn igbakkɔpɔ tɔttɔt ɔffɔ libbessolo ka ɛkɛtɛ ɛdɔkɔnɛ ele lɛsak.
44004004	Balɔɔt ggbadam ba bappyeenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng baang bayila. Balɔɔt ‘bɔng baang ba bayilanɛ baffɔ innɔ zzɔɔppiffa la kufaak.
44004005	Ka libessolo bazzilɛttɔ balɔɔt a Jews la bagɛlɛnya la bakopolo-Lafɔɔ baggba ka Jerusalem.
44004006	Baduda la Annas, Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm Wa Lɛbaang, la Caiaphas, la John, la Alexander la balɔɔt balɔk ba bassibɛ ka kikkwu uzzilɛttɔ wa ɔkɔɔmnɛ Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
44004007	Balɔɔk bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus, bafeele babeebɛ ka lusso, babapbɛ ibap battɛ, “Anaang nang anaangyɔng ’kwɔng? Ayangayɔng bɔkka lakke? Kɔkɔɔm akɔɔmyɔng lakke a nnyinɛ?”
44004008	Peter ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ka lakke Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛ, “Bakkwu-lusso balɔɔt la bagɛlɛnya:
44004009	Mmwɔɔn mung abapyɔngbongyɛlɛ ibap atumyɔng budoddo bwa inaangnɛ innyi ɔnnɔk-kikkwu, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ inaangmɛnɛ ɔppwamɛ.
44004010	Ɔzzànga ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng asanyɔng, balɔɔt a Israel bassɛ basan battɛ ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung wa ubeewɔnɛyɔng ka lusso mung ɔppwamɛbong ɔkkpɛlɛ ka likke Jesus Christ wa Nazareth wa awwɔɔlnɛyɔng; Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ufungalamɛ ka lubbe.
44004011	Jesus ulemɛnɛ ammɛ wa Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, ‘Lɛttaal za annɔ, ɔbɔɔk-a-ggwoon, alɔɔknɛ attɛ ba lɛyyɛɛp ffet ffet, lɛyyɛɛpbong lisikili lisseke lɛttaal za lɛttanɛ lɛyyɛɛp.’
44004012	Kuddu ayɛn ka kɔbɔɔk ammɛ keem. Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ba ule ɔgbaa la ammɛ ka vveengodde wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsamnɛ lɛkɔɔl ammɛ unnyi ɔttɛ balɔɔt bakɔɔmzɛ azzɛ baddu.”
44004013	Ikkansulu ’yɔng baang kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ka bayɛnnɛ kɛkkaam a zzeen sa Peter la John bakaamnɛ, uvve luvva ba basan. Ɔzzànga bakke basan battɛ badɔkɔ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus.
44004014	Bwa babbalnɛ lɛlɔɔk basi lɛsan ka balenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa battulanɛ lɛyɛn ka ubeenɛ ka ɛfɛɛn a Peter la John.
44004015	Ɔzzánga babwɔɔlɔ Peter la John battɛ bagbata basseke lɛnɔk a ggwoon a ikkansulu. Bagbatanɛ, ikkansulu basseke ka balɔɔknɛ abbɛ-abbɛ.
44004016	Babapbɛ kɛyɔɔng battɛ, “Mung ile inaang nang la balɔɔt ’bɔng? Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ wa ullunɛ ka Jerusalem ɔsan lɔsan ɔttɛ bɛmaanga bya banaangnɛ mung bile zzekep. Gɔɔ baala ikkwoong ikangalakwɛ.
44004017	Iggyannɛ ittɛ kuttu kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng kɔfɔngɔ kɛwaala balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ, bappyee, ittamabɛ, tɛ̀ttɛ́ babɛlɛ la balɔɔt balɔk lɛlɔɔk batum lɛkɔɔl a Jesus.”
44004018	Babbalbɛ lɛkkwɔɔ, baffu ka tɔkɔlɔ. Battamabɛ battɛ mkkpa kule tɛ́ttɛ́ kule, tɛ̀ttɛ́ babɛlɛ kpong kpong lɛlɔɔk kɔlɔɔk a Jesus ɔlɔk bakopolo batum lɛkɔɔl ammɛ.
44004019	Peter la John bappyɛlɛbɛ kamma battɛ, “Annyɔɔng biini akaalyɔngkwɛ kɔyyɛɛp ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ile itelewɔyɔng annyɔɔng faa itele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm?
44004020	Baala ikkwoong ikkyaa kɔlɔɔk kwa ayyɔɔt biini ilenɛ lɛyɛn, ippyee igbaa, ifɔngɔ.”
44004021	Ikkansulu ’yɔng baang battamabɛ gaang gaang bagbaa. Bafɔngɔbɛ; bamii. Ɛtɔk basi lɛyɛn ya bale bayɔɔbɛ akama, ka balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ balenɛ ka kibungu Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka kɔlɔɔk kwa kɔnaangnɛ.
44004022	Ɔlɔɔt wa battulamɛnɛ ka bɛmaanga ɔsakbong lalɔp a likkpa laffa ka ulenɛ lɛtaa ka vveeng ’wɔng.
44004023	Ikkansulu bakkyaanɛbɛ bafɔngɔ bagbata, Peter la John bappyɛlɛ bamii bakup inngwa abbɛ. Bamii babwɔɔlɔbɛ kwa bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-Luzɔɔm la bagɛlɛnya balɔɔknɛ.
44004024	Bappyeenɛ ning baang, ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ batoolo ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn bazɔɔm bannyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm battɛ, “Dedde wa Ɔlɔɔmnɛ libat la ɛkpansi la lihu la bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya billunɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ,
44004025	akɔɔm Kuyeeng annɔ amana David, ɔlɔɔt ayyɔɔt wa iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ, bɔɔyi annɔ, ka ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ ikanakana kutunbɛ? Bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔkka kɛwwɔɔl wa balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bakkanɛ ɔttɔ gbɔɔ ɔtaak?
44004026	Babeet ɛkpansi babamabɛ kɛyɔɔng, Bazzilɛttɔ baduda ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn, Bappyɛɛk Ebinukkpaapi la Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ.’
44004027	Kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn, Herod la Pontius Pilate baduda ka tɔkɔlɔ a ssala, ikanakana ilɔk la balɔɔt a Israel balɔɔk batum Jesus, Bɔɔyi annɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa asanganɛ.
44004028	Baduda banaang lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ sa annɔ alenɛ lakke annɔ lɛkɔɔm aggba litini attɛ vvenɛ linaang.
44004029	Ɔzzànga gedegede mung, Uyini, akke bubbi bwa balenɛ littina bafɔngɔyɛlɛ, usseke afɔngɔyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt ibɔɔyi annɔ ikkaam luppyam ibwɔɔlɔ lɛmmwɔɔl annɔ.
44004030	Atuulu kɔbɔɔk annɔ, attula balɔɔt; ayila attɛ inaang lilɔɔk a bikɛɛlɛ la bɛmaanga ka lɛkɔɔl a Bɔɔyi annɔ, Jesus.”
44004031	Bavvenɛ lɛzɔɔm, ɛfɛɛn ya badudanɛ ka mitin ɛnnyɛkɛ. Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kuffubɛ ka kkwɔɔt, bakkuma baang babwɔɔlɔ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la kɛkkaam a luppyam.
44004032	Kɛkaan a balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ kiyila ɔdɔkɔbɛ luttina ggwɔn la luppyam ggwɔn. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔttɛ bɛfɛɛn bile bya anaam kɛyɔɔng, usi lile. Lutini bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya bayanganɛ babɛngɛlɛ abbɛ abbɛ.
44004033	Bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus bakɔɔm lakke za lɛbaang babee tɛɛsɛ kifungala ka lubbe Uyini, Jesus. Ɔzzánga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangbɛ ppyɛɛ wa lɛbaang a lɛbaang.
44004034	Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ ka kibbi ’sɔng baang, ɔlɔɔt wa bɔfɛɛn bubbyamɛnɛ, usi lile. Balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ itɔɔm la ssoon, bataanbyɛ; bakɔɔm ikkpoko ya bataannɛ baffu.
44004035	Basam ikkpoko ’yɔng baang bannyi bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus. Basam ikkpoko ’yɔng, babɛngɛlɛ bannyi ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔt tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔggyannɛ.
44004036	Kwakkwɛ Joseph wa Levi wa bamaatmɛnɛ ka Cyprus, wa bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus bakkwɔɔmɛnɛ Barnabas, (ning baang ulenɛ “Ɔbba-bikɔɔm”),
44004037	ɔtaannɛ batɔɔm ammɛ ɔkɔɔm ikkpoko ufee bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus.
44005001	Keem ɔlɔɔt ɔdɔkɔ baang wa ɔzzanganɛ Ananias. Wanavva ammɛ ɔzzanga Sapphira. Ɔsam ɛkpansi ya elenɛ ya abbɛ, ɔtaan.
44005002	Ɔsanga ikkpoko ya ɔtaannɛ baang, ɔfaka kufaak, ulokomɛ kɛyɔɔng, avva ɔsan. Ɔsam kufaak kwa kussekenɛ, unnyi bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus.
44005003	Peter ɔlɔɔkmɛ ɔttɛ, “Ananias ’bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ ayila Satan ɔnnaawɔ lɔtan, ɔdɛmwɔ akkala Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛlaak ka afakanɛ kufaak ikkpoko ya ataannɛ ezzi-ɛkpansi annɔ, aloko; asi lɛbwɔɔlɔ.
44005004	Bong tɛ́ttɛ́ ataan ɛkpansi ’yɔng baang ɛdɔkɔ ya annɔ, ka ɛkɛtɛ ya ataannɛyɛ ikkpoko idɔkɔ ya annɔ. Bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ attina ka luppyam annɔ anaang kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng ning baang? Lalaak ’zɔng baang la balɔɔt ba akkala; akkala la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm!”
44005005	Ananias uppyeenɛ ning baang, eseese ɔttɔ ubbe bɛɛm. Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ wa uppyeenɛ kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng baang ɔbbwɔpɔmɛ.
44005006	Bakolobya bamal bamii basammɛ baggbɔ ibba basangamɛ batta ka vveeng bamii balli.
44005007	Ikalangka ikkyaat ilenɛ lɛsak, avva uffu ɔmal. Ɔzzánga kwa kɔnaangnɛ ba ɔtaka uppyee.
44005008	Peter ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ, “Abwɔɔlɔnɛ, mung ’wɔng ulenɛ ikkpoko ɔkkpɛlɛ ya annyɔɔng la walam annɔ ataannɛyɔng ɛkpansi ɔɔ?” Ɔppyɛlɛ Peter kamma ɔttɛ, “Iii, Uwɔng baang ulenɛ ikkpoko ɔkkpɛlɛ.”
44005009	Ɔzzanga Peter ɔttɛ, “’Bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ annyɔɔng la walam annɔ abumyɔng kɛllɛ Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm? Balɔɔt ba ballinɛ walam annɔ bale baang ka babeenɛ ka lɛmma ggwoon gedegede mung, vvenɛ bassɛ batɔkɔwɔ annɔ batta.”
44005010	Eseese ɔmɛkɛlɛ ɔttɔ Peter ka lataak baang ubbe. Ɔzzànga bakolobya ’bɔng baang bamalnɛ bayɛnmɛ ka ulenɛ libbe, basammɛ batta. Bamii ballimɛ ka lufoom ulam.
44005011	Balɔɔt a luzɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ la balɔɔt balɔk ba bappyeenɛ kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔbbwɔpɔbɛ gaang gaang.
44005012	Bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus banaang bɛmaanga la bɛfɛɛn a bikɛɛlɛ, balɔɔt bayɛn. Balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ kiyila baggba ka Ikkɔlɔ a Solomon.
44005013	Balɔɔt ba gbɔɔ basi lɛddɔl mkkpa balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bakɔɔmbɛ gaang gaang ka kamma.
44005014	Ɔzzànga balɔɔt ggbadam ggbadam bale baang ka bamalnɛ ka kɛkaan ’sɔng baang sa bwaanbwalam la bwanavva ba bayanganɛ kiyila ka Uyini.
44005015	Kɛnaang sa bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus banaangnɛ kɛdɛm balɔɔt batɔkɔ balɔɔt ba usinɛbɛ lɛppwa bawulu ka iwula la igolo ka lufoom ɛtɔk, nkwaaning ɛkɛtɛ ya Peter ɔsaknɛ, kuyeeng ammɛ kuvvoongbɛ ɔppwabɛ.
44005016	Bɛkaan a balɔɔt biffu la ifɛɛn la ifɛɛn ka billu bya bɛkaangnɛ Jerusalem. Bakɔɔm balɔɔt ba usinɛbɛ lɛppwa la balɔɔt ba ipiliza inaangnɛbɛ, baffu battulabɛ ɔppwabɛ.
44005017	Uzzilɛttɔ-Bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm Wa Lɛbaang la balɔɔt ammɛ, la balɔɔt a Sadducees banaang luleep gaang gaang, bappyɛɛk bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus. Ɔzzánga banaang likup battɛ vvenɛ bakaabɛ.
44005018	Bakaa bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus, bamii bassɛɛn ka ggwoon igbakkɔpɔ gwa izzit.
44005019	Kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang, Uyilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uffu uwongolo lɛmma ggwoon igbakkɔpɔ; bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus batta ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ɔlɔɔk la bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus ’bɔng baang ɔttɛ,
44005020	“Amii abeeyɔng ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, abwɔɔlɔyɔng balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ atumyɔng ufaa kuddu ’wɔng.”
44005021	Bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus batelemɛ. Lɔfɔm a lɔfɔm, batta, bamii bamal ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm babee kikopolo. Uzzilɛttɔ-Bassɛɛn-a-Luzɔɔm Wa Lɛbaang la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ bakkwɔɔ bagɛlɛnya balɔɔt a Jews battɛ bataa mitin ikkansulu. Ɔzzanga basanga bɔtɔɔm batɔɔm ka ggwoon igbakkɔpɔ battɛ, bakɔɔm bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus baffu.
44005022	Ikkɔɔttuma iffɔnɛ bakang bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus isi lɛyɛn ka tɔkɔlɔ igbakkɔpɔ. Ɔzzánga ippyɛlɛ, imii ibwɔɔlɔ baggboggbo balɔɔt ’bɔng baang battɛ,
44005023	“Iffɔnɛ ka ggwoon igbakkɔpɔ iyɛngwɛ la kɛfɛɛn, bakat a lɛmma badɔkɔ baang ka kɛkat. Iwongolonɛ lɛmma, ɔlɔɔt ka tɔkɔlɔ isi lɛyɛn.”
44005024	Uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyanganɛ balɔɔt ba bakatnɛ lɛmma la bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm bappyeenɛ ning baang, kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ, bwa bunaangnɛ bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus.
44005025	Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ɔmal ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Gɔpɔlɔyɔng! Balɔɔt ba bakaanɛ, assɛɛnyɔng igbakkɔpɔ bale bakang ka tɔkɔlɔ a Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka bakopolonɛ balɔɔt tɛ!”
44005026	Ɔzzánga uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ufeele la balɔɔt ammɛ, bamii bakaa bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus bappyɛlɛ baffu. Lagabbwɔ basi lɛkɔɔm; ɔbbwɔpɔbɛ battina battɛ, vvenɛ balɔɔt ’bɔng baang batɔɔpbɛ lattaal.
44005027	Bakɔɔm bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus ’bɔng baang baffu babee ka lusso ikkansulu. Uzzilɛttɔ Bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm Wa Lɛbaang ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ,
44005028	“Ittamawɔyɔng ittɛ, tɛ̀ttɛ́ abɛlɛyɔng likopolo ka lɛkɔɔl ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung, uwɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ anaangnɛyɔng ɔɔ! Lukopolo annyɔɔng lɔwaalabong ɔkkpɛlɛ a Jerusalem. Aggyan attɛyɔng lubbe ammɛ lule ka labɔɔk ayyɔɔt!”
44005029	Peter la bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus balɔk battɛ, “Mkkpa kule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kule, balɔɔt baala itele, itele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
44005030	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm idedde ayyɔɔt ufungalanɛ Jesus ka lubbe, ka alemɛnɛyɔng bɛfɔl lɛkama, akakayɔng ka Cross awwɔɔlyɔng.
44005031	“Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ufungalamɛ ɔsammɛ, umii ɔtaa ka lufoom a ɛlaabɔɔk ammɛ bakang ɔzzanga Uzzilɛttɔ la Ɔkkala-ikkala. Unnyi balɔɔt a Israel kufuk a kɛnaang a busannɛ ka bubbi abbɛ, usseke vvenɛ ɔsɔɔkbɛ.
44005032	Ayyɔɔt la Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, kwa kulenɛ lɛsɔɔk za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyinɛ balɔɔt ba batelemɛnɛ, ibeenɛ ittɛɛsɛ bɛfɛɛn byɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ.”
44005033	Ikkansulu bappyeenɛ ning baang, banyanga, battɛ, bawwɔɔl bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus.
44005034	Ɔlɔɔt abbɛ vvɔn wa ɔzzanganɛ Gamaliel, ukopolo-Lafɔɔ wa Pharisees, wa balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ batelemɛnɛ, ufeele ubee ka kibbi ikkansulu ɔttɛ basanga bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus batta.
44005035	Ɔlɔɔk la ikkansulu ɔttɛ, “Balɔɔt a Israel, asan anaangyɔng ka kɔlɔɔk kwa ale ka anaangnɛyɔng la balɔɔt ’bɔng mung.
44005036	Ɔmmɛbong ka Theudas utumanɛ, ɔtɔkmɛ kɛyɔɔng, ɔkkwɔɔ ɔlɔɔt wa lɛbaang. Bɔfɛɛn a nnɔ balɔɔt bakupmɛ. Bawwɔɔlmɛnɛ, balɔɔt ammɛ ’bɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ babbum, kɔssɛ ammɛ kɔtaak sukusuku.
44005037	Nkwɔng kɔsaknɛ, Judas wa Galilee utuma ka ɛkɛtɛ a kikkwoon a balɔɔt. Ammɛ ɔgbaa ɔssɛ ɔ̀yánga kɛkaan sa kikupmɛnɛ; bassɛ bawwɔɔlmɛ, balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ babbum.
44005038	Ka ’kwɔng mung nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng, tɛ̀ttɛ́ kutunwɔyɔng kɔppyɛɛk balɔɔt ’bɔng mung. Kyaayɔngbɛ afɔngɔyɔng. Luttina la kɛnaang abbɛ ulenɛ a kɛnaang ɔlɔɔt, vvenɛ kɛsaal.
44005039	Kussinɛbɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm baala akkwoong abɛtɛyɔngbɛ. Ale appyɛɛ ayɛnwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng ka ebbu la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm!” Ikkansulu ’yɔng baang bakup kɛbba-bikɔɔm a Gamaliel.
44005040	Bakkwɔɔ bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus, bamal ka tɔkɔlɔ. Batupbɛ, battamabɛ battɛ, kɛtɔm kɛlɔk tɛ̀ttɛ́ babɛlɛ kɔlɔɔk lɛlɔɔk ka lɛkɔɔl a Jesus. Bakkyaabɛ bafɔngɔ.
44005041	Bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus batta basseke Ikkansulu la laggele la laggele, battɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uttinabong ɔttɛ abbɛ bakkɔnɔ mung kɛyɛn akama ka lɛkɔɔl a Jesus.
44005042	Ɔzzánga ɔkkaambɛ bakopolo lutini livve ɔkkpɛlɛ ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la ssala balɔɔt. Babwɔɔlɔ Kuttu-budoddo a Jesus wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ.
44006001	Ɔmmɛnɛ ssup ka bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus balenɛ baang ka bayipinɛ bagbaa, kɔwɔlɔ kɔttɔ ka kasɛkɛ balɔɔt a Jews ba balɔɔknɛ Greek la bwaan ɛkpansi Jews. Balɔɔt a Jews ba balɔɔknɛ Greek battɛ, basumalabong bwanavva abbɛ ba bwalam abbɛ babbenɛ bakɔngɔbɛ ka kɛbɛngɛlɛ bɛfɛɛn bya babɛngɛlɛnɛ kɛtɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ.
44006002	Bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus ba zzɔɔppabaffa bakkwɔɔ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ Jesus, ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ baloko ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn. Babwɔɔlɔbɛ battɛ, “Ba kɔyyɛɛp ka isinɛ zzeen ka lukopolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛssɛɛn, ɔssanga kwa kɛbɛngɛlɛ bɛfɛɛn.
44006003	Ikpana ayyɔɔt, assangyɔng balɔɔt bannambakkyaat ba asannɛ attɛyɔng Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kule la abbɛ, basan kɔlɔɔk ɔgbaa. Abbɛ bazzanga batan a lɔtan.
44006004	Ayyɔɔt ippyɛɛ isseke ba kɛssɛɛn a luzɔɔm la kikopolo kuttu Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
44006005	Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ baggele, ɔwaabɛ la bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus. Ɔzzánga basanga Stephen, ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyanganɛ kiyila gaang gaang la Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Philip, Prochorus, Nicanor, Timon, Parmenas, Nicolaus, wa akanakana wa usinɛ wa Jews lile, ussi Antioch uffu ufulanɛ luzɔɔm a Jews.
44006006	Kibbi ’sɔng baang kɛsangabɛ, kɛyɔɔ bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus. Bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus bassɛɛn luzɔɔm, batelebɛ labɔɔk.
44006007	Ka ussinɛ baang, lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛkama-ɔkama lɛwaala. Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus ka Jerusalem bayipi ggbadam bagbaa. Bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm ggbadam bayanga kiyila.
