44006008	Stephen ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangmɛnɛ ppyɛɛ ɔttala, unnyimɛ lakke bɛmaanga bya lɛbaang bya bɛkɛɛlɛnɛ balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ.
44006009	Balɔɔt balɔk batunumɛ. Badɔkɔ balɔɔt a ɔdda mitin wa banaangnɛbɛ bazzanga Bwaan a Lusse (tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bakkwɔɔnɛbɛ). Balɔɔt a Jews ba bassinɛ Cyrenia la Alexandria bale ka mitin ’wɔng baang. Balɔɔt balɔk ba bassinɛ Cilicia la Asia, bazzɔɔk bakangala la Stephen.
44006010	Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kunnyi Stephen kɛsan a kɔlɔɔk sa ɔzzanganɛ ɔttɛ ɔlɔɔknɛ ba bakkwoong bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma.
44006011	Ɔzzanga balup balɔɔt balɔk libbwu, battɛ balɔɔk battɛ, “Ippyeemɛbong ka ɔlɔɔknɛ kɔlɔɔk bbɔl-bbɔl utum Moses la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
44006012	Kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng baang kutun balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ, bagɛlɛnya la bakopolo-Lafɔɔ. Bamii battulu Stephen, basammɛ bamii ka lusso Ikkansulu.
44006013	Bakɔɔm balɔɔt balɔk ba bakkalanɛ lɛlaak batummɛ, baffu babee baang battɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ule ka kɛlɔɔk a babbu lilɔɔk utum Ggwoon a latele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la Lafɔɔ a Moses.
44006014	Ippyeemɛ ka ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔttɛ, Jesus wa Nazareth vvenɛ ɔkkyama Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ufoolo Lafɔɔ za Moses unnyiyɛlɛ!”
44006015	Ikkansulu ’yɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ bamat Stephen lɛppyɛɛk. Bayɛnmɛ lusso ka lussekenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ gwa Uyilabɔtɔɔm a Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
44007001	Uzzilɛttɔ-Bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm Wa Lɛbaang ɔbap Stephen ɔttɛ, “Mung ka lɔkkwɔɔn kule ning baang ɔɔ?”
44007002	Stephen ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Ikpana anaam, la badedde, agɔpɔlɔnɛyɔng! Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm a latele utuma ka ɛfɛɛn Abraham, ɔlɔɔt ayyɔɔt wa iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ, ka ɛkɛtɛ ya ullunɛ ka Mesopotamia tɛ́ttɛ́ ufeele ufula Haran.
44007003	Ɔlɔɔk la Abraham ɔttɛ, ‘Agbata akɔngɔ itutum annɔ la lɔkaan annɔ, amii, allu ka ɛkpansi ya nle nyɔɔwɔ.’
44007004	Ɔzzánga ɔgbata ka ɛkpansi a Chaldea; umii, ullu ka Haran. Ɔffɔnɛ ka abassɛ Abraham ubbenɛ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangmɛ uffu ufula ka lɔkaan ’gwɔng mung gwa allunɛyɔng lullunɛ gedegede mung.
44007005	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usi Abraham kufoom ɛkpansi kɔlɔk linnyi ɔttɛ ɔlɛkɛ. Gɔɔ oboka usimɛ linnyi. Ɔzzànga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛ ɔttɛ, kɛmɛkɛmɛ vvenɛ ɔtɔkyɛ unnyimɛ esseke ya ammɛ la balɔɔt a kikku ammɛ. Ka ɛkɛtɛ ya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔknɛ kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng mung la Abraham, Abraham waan ba ɔtaka ɔfɔɔn.
44007006	Uwɔng ulenɛ kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔknɛ la ammɛ, ‘Bwɔɔn ba ale afɔɔn vvenɛ ballu ka lɔkaan lɔlɔk, ka ɛfɛɛn a bale bazzanga babili. Vvenɛ bayɛn akama gaang gaang ka nnɔ kukkpa.
44007007	Ɔzzànga vvenɛ nnyi balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba bayɔɔbɛ akama kibbi. Ulenɛ lɛnaang, vvenɛ bagbata ka lɔkaan ’gwɔng baang, bazɔɔm bannyinɛ ka ɛkpansi ’yɔng mung.’
44007008	Ɔzzánga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyi Abraham lakke za kɛbɛkɛ lataa ɔttɛ ɔtaa kɛtaa iyɔɔ kɛbɛtɛ-kɛnnɔ. Ɔzzanga Abraham ɔbɛkɛ Isaac lɛtaa ka liwaazɛ kɛmaat ammɛ lidudanɛ. Isaac ɔbɛkɛ waan ammɛ Jacob lɛtaa, Jacob ɔbɛkɛ bwaan ammɛ ba zzɔɔppabaffa lataa. Abbɛ bakɔɔmnɛ ifɔɔn a Israel zzɔɔppiffa.
44007009	“Bwaan ammɛ ’bɔng baang banaang Joseph kɔfɔk. Bakaamɛ bataan usseke ubili ka Egypt. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔdɔkɔ la ammɛ.
44007010	Ɔkkalamɛ ka lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ. Joseph ka ubeenɛ ka lusso a Pharaoh, ubeet a Egypt, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyimɛ bɔllɛ la kɛsan a kɔlɔɔk. Pharoah ɔnaang Joseph usseke uzzilɛttɔ ɛkpansi la ssala ammɛ biini.
44007011	Ɔttɛ ɔnaang, buwɔɔng buttɔ ka ɛkpansi Egypt la Canaan. Balɔɔt bayɛn akama gaang gaang. Balɔɔt ayyɔɔt ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ basi lɛsan ka ɛfɛɛn a baggyannɛ kazzi bappyɛlɛ.
44007012	Jacob uppyeenɛ ɔttɛ kazzi kale baang ka Egypt, ɔtɔɔm bwaan ammɛ, balɔɔt ayyɔɔt ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ, bamii ka ɔkɔɔm ɛtɔk a kimii Egypt.
44007013	Ɔggbanɛ ka bimii bɛffa, Joseph ɔnaang itele ammɛ bakɔɔlɔmɛ. Pharoah ussi baang ɔsan itutum a Joseph.
44007014	Joseph ɔtɔɔm ɔbwɔɔlɔ abassɛ Jacob ɔttɛ, ɔkkpɛlɛ itutum ammɛ baffu ka Egypt. Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ badɔkɔ lalɔp a balɔɔt lakkyaat la balɔɔt zzil.
44007015	Ɔzzánga Jacob ufeele umii Egypt, ka ɛfɛɛn ya ammɛ biini la bwaan ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ babbenɛ.
44007016	Batɔkɔ bɛkɔp abbɛ bamii Schechem. Baang ulenɛ ka ɛfɛɛn a ballinɛbɛ, ka lilli sa Abraham ɔlɛɛpnɛ ka labɔɔk a balɔɔt a lɔfɔɔn a Hamor ka ikkpoko.
44007017	“Ɔffɔnɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ele ka ɛkkɛtɛnɛ, ya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule ka ɔnaangnɛ kwa ɔlɔɔknɛ la Abraham, balɔɔt ayyɔɔt ka Egypt bayipibong ggbadam.
44007018	Ɔmmɛnɛ, bakaa ufaa ubeet ɔlɔk wa usinɛ Joseph lɛsan; ɔppyɛɛ ɔkɔɔm Egypt.
44007019	Ɔnaang balɔɔt ayyɔɔt ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ lagban. Ɔnaangbɛ bubbi, ututbɛ ɔttɛ basam bwɔɔn bamii bazzɔɔk bataa bakang babbe.
44007020	Ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang ɛdɔkɔnɛ ya bamaatnɛ Moses, waan a waantiti ɔyyɛɛp ɔsak. Bakɔɔmmɛ ka ssala ka ittuma ikkyaat.
44007021	Ɔffɔnɛ ka basammɛnɛ bagbata basseke ssala, waan a Pharoah wa wanavva ɔttɔngmɛ, ɔkɔɔm tɛ̀ttɛ̀ waan wa ammɛ biini.
44007022	Bakopolomɛ kɛsan a kɔlɔɔk a Egypt ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔzzanga uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt ka lɛmmwɔɔl, ɔbɛtɛ la linaang.
44007023	“Moses ɔffɔnɛ lalɔp a likkpa laffa, ɔnaang luttina kimii kikoolo babbɛ, balɔɔt a Israel ɔsan tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bakɔɔmnɛbɛ.
44007024	Ɔyɛn ɔlɔɔt a Egypt ka utupnɛ ɔlɔɔt a Israel. Ɔzzánga Moses ufeele umii ɔssɛɛn kɔbɔɔk, ɔwwɔɔl wa Egypt ɔkkala wa Israel.
44007025	(Uttina ɔttɛ balɔɔt ammɛ Israel vvenɛ basan battɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule ɔkɔɔmmɛ ammɛ ɔkkalabɛ. Keem basi lɛsan.)
44007026	Kɛtɔm sa ssɔn ɔyɛn balɔɔt a Israel baffa ka babbunɛ. Ubumbɛ kɛkanga; ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, ‘Gɔpɔlɔyɔng, annyɔɔng mung etele la etele, ’bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ ayapwɔyɔng akama kɛyɔɔng.’
44007027	Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔdɔkɔnɛ ka kɛyɔɔ wa vvɔn akama ussi Moses ɔfɔngɔ kang ɔttɛ, ‘Nnyinɛ unnyiwɔnɛ kizzilɛttɔ, ɔnaangwɔ ɔkaal a kɛkaal ayyɔɔt?
44007028	Mung aggyan attɛ awwɔɔlnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ awwɔɔlnɛ wa Egypt lisee ɔɔ?’
44007029	Moses uppyeenɛ ning baang ɔmma ka Egypt, ufula ɛkpansi a Midian. Ɔtaa bakang, ɔfɔɔn bwaan a bwaanbwalam baffa.
44007030	“Lalɔp a likkpa laffa lasaknɛ, uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm utuma ka lusso a Moses ka lalaak a lɔkɔɔn gwa waan a kɛssɛ ɔkkɔmnɛ ka kasɛkɛ kɛmat kɛtɛkɛtɛ lɛttaal Sinai.
44007031	Moses, ɔyɛnnɛ ning baang, kɔkɛɛlɛmɛ. Ɔttɔm ɔkkɛtɛ waan a kɛssɛ ’wɔng baang, nkwaaning ɔyɛn doddo. Ɔzzánga uppyee lɛmmwɔɔl Ebinukkpaapi.
44007032	Lɛttɛ, ‘Anaam nlenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm a balɔɔt annyɔɔng ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm a Abraham, la Isaac, la Jacob.’ Moses ɔbbwɔpɔmɛ gaang gaang uffula, usi lɛbɛlɛ lɛbbɔ ɔppyɛɛk.
44007033	Ebinukkpaapi ɛttɛ, ‘Aggbolo ikkpa bukkpɔ annɔ, ɛfɛɛn ya abeenɛ baang, ɛfɛɛn a lafɔɔ.
44007034	Nppyɛɛkbong nyɛn ɔkpɔlɔngkpɔ akama wa balɔɔt anaam bayɛnnɛ ka Egypt. Mppyeebong laffimi abbɛ, mung nffubong nkkalabɛ. Affu gedegede mung ntɔɔmwɔ Egypt.’
44007035	“Moses ɔdɔkɔnɛ ɔlɔɔt wa bafimmɛnɛ ka Israel. Ammɛ ulenɛ wa babapmɛnɛ battɛ, ‘Nnyinɛ ɔnaangwɔnɛ uzzilɛttɔ la ɔkaal a kɛkaal ayyɔɔt?’ Ammɛ ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔɔmmɛnɛ ɔttɛ, ɔzzanga uzzilɛttɔ abbɛ ɔsanga ka kɔlɔɔk ka lakke Uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔyɛnnɛ ka waan a kɛssɛ wa ɔkkɔmnɛ lɔkɔɔn.
44007036	Ɔkɔɔm balɔɔt ’bɔng, batta ka Egypt. Ɔnaang bɛmaanga la bɛfɛɛn a bikɛɛlɛ ka Egypt la Ukolo-lihu la ka kɛmat, ka lalɔp a likkpa laffa.
44007037	Moses ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔlɔɔknɛ la balɔɔt a Israel ɔttɛ, ‘Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔtɔɔm uppyee-kutolo ammɛ ufeewɔyɔng, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔtɔɔmmɛnɛ anaam mung. Ule ussi ka annyɔɔng.’
44007038	Ammɛ ɔdɔkɔnɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ulenɛ la balɔɔt a Israel ka ɛkɛtɛ ya baggbanɛ ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn ka kɛmat. Ɔdɔkɔ baang la balɔɔt ayyɔɔt ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ la uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔlɔɔknɛ unnyimɛ ka lɛttaal a Sinai. Ɔtɔk bɔtɔɔm a kuddu, uffu ɔbwɔɔlɔyɛlɛ.
44007039	“Ɔzzànga balɔɔt ayyɔɔt ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ bafimmɛ kitele, batutmɛ bafɔngɔ kang battɛ, nzang bappyɛlɛ bamii Egypt.
44007040	Ɔzzánga balɔɔk la Aaron battɛ, ‘Anaangyɛlɛ ibunukkpaapi ya ile ikkwuyɛlɛ lusso. Ba isan bwa bunaangnɛ Moses ’wɔng mung wa ɔsanganɛyɛlɛ ka ɛkpansi Egypt.’
44007041	Uwɔng baang ulenɛ ɛkɛtɛ ya banaangnɛ ɛlɔɔp tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔgɔdɔ. Balokoyɛ bazɔɔm. Banaang lizzi bazzi baggele bwa balenɛ lɛnaang.
44007042	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔssang isimi ɔsanbɛ. Ɔssangbɛ ippyam usikili basseke ka bazɔɔmnɛ bwaanettuma lukpaaggbeedde tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bakkpɔknɛ ka luvva bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm battɛ, ‘Balɔɔt a Israel! lakɔmɔlɔ za azɔɔmnɛyɔng akkwɛɛyɔng ka lalɔp a likkpa liffa ka kɛmat, anaam lissi ka annyinɛyɔng.
44007043	Ɔdɔkɔ ɔdda-ɛkkpalukpata ebinukkpaapi ya ɛzzanganɛ Moloch ka asamnɛyɔng. Ɔbɛtɛ la ɛlɔɔp a waanettuma Rephan, ebinukkpaapi annyɔɔng. Bɛdɔkɔ ilɔɔp ya annyɔɔng biini anaangnɛ aloko azɔɔmyɔng. Kwakkwɛ nle ka ntɔɔmwɔnɛyɔng amii ataayɔng lɔkaan lɔlɔk kukupa Babylon.’
44007044	“Balɔɔt ayyɔɔt ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ, bayanga Ɔdda-ɛkkpalukpata bbwak la abbɛ ka kɛmat. Banaangmɛbong tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔbwɔɔlɔnɛ Moses ɔttɛ banaang. Banaangmɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ulɔmɔ wa ɔyɔɔnɛ Moses.
44007045	Ɔmmɛnɛ ssup, balɔɔt ayyɔɔt ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ batɔk ɔdda-ɛkkpalukpata ’wɔng baang ka labɔɔk a ibassɛ abbɛ, bakɔɔm bassɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya bassɛnɛ la Joshua bamii batɔk ɛkpansi ya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggbanɛ ikaan ilɔk ka zzeen abbɛ. Ɔdda ɔtaa baang ning ning ɔffɔ ka ɛkɛtɛ a David.
44007046	David ɔsaap Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔzzánga ɔbap ɔttɛ ɔfɔngɔmɛ ɔbɔɔk ggwoon, uloko Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm a Jacob.
44007047	Ɔzzànga ɔdɔkɔ Solomon ɔppyɛɛnɛ ɔbɔɔk ggwoon ’gwɔng baang ulokomɛ.
44007048	“Ɔzzànga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa libat ka ssoon sa balɔɔt babɔɔknɛ ba ullu, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔknɛ.
44007049	Ebinukkpaapi ɛttɛ, ‘Libat lilenɛ ugbaal a kibeet anaam. Ɛkpansi ele ɛfɛɛn a ntelenɛ bukkpɔ. Mung ale abɔɔknɛ kɛssanga ggwoon nsɔsɔng? Nle nfɛkɛlɛ yang?
44007050	Anaam biini lissi nnaangnɛ bɛfɛɛn byɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔɔ?’ ”
44007051	Stephen ɔttɛ, “Bɔng assinɛyɔng latɔɔk ning? Mbɔng ippyam annyɔɔng isinɛ kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm littina. Latɔɔk biini assiyɔng bɔka azzɛ asinɛyɔng bɔtɔɔm bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔɔmnɛ lippyee! Aleyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt annyɔɔng ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ bbwak. Annyɔɔng ngbaa afimyɔng kwa Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ!
44007052	Uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔk ɔdɔkɔ baang wa balɔɔt annyɔɔng ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ basinɛ lɛwwɔɔl ɔɔ? Bawwɔɔl bayilabɔtɔɔm Ebinukkpaapi, ba baggbanɛ lɛyaam mmɛmmɛ bakang babwɔɔlɔ kiffu a Bɔɔyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa bbwak. Ɔzzànga mung azzimɛyɔngbong issɛ awwɔɔlmɛyɔng.
44007053	Annyɔɔng alenɛyɔng balɔɔt ba atɔknɛyɔng Lafɔɔ-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, za bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bakɔɔmnɛ baffu, ɔzzànga ba ateleyɔngzɛ tɔttɔt!”
44007054	Ikkansulu bappyeenɛ kwa Stephen ɔlɔɔknɛ kɔssɔpbɛ gaang gaang bazzi lasaal bappyɛɛkmɛ.
44007055	Stephen ka ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kulenɛ la ammɛ, uyeek ɔppyɛɛk ka libat ɔyɛn buppwolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la Jesus ka ubeenɛ baang ka lufoom ɛlaabɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
44007056	Ɔzzanga ɔttɛ, “Ppyɛɛkyɔng! nyɛnbong libat ka liwongolonɛ la Waan-Ɔssɛbibbit-Ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ubeenɛ ka kɔbɔɔk ɛlaabɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
44007057	Ɔkkpɛlɛ babungu gaang gaang bavvoong labɔɔk ka latɔɔk, bafeele bavvoongmɛ baang basam.
44007058	Basangamɛ batta ka tɔkɔlɔ a ssala, batɔɔpmɛ lattaal. Balɔɔt ba babeenɛ ittɛɛsɛ, basam iwuulu abbɛ bannyi waan a okolobya, wa ɔzzanganɛ Saul, kɛppyɛɛk.
44007059	Batɔɔp Stephen lattaal tɛ̀ttɛ̀ batɔɔpnɛ baang. Ammɛ ɔkkwɔɔ lɛkɔɔl Uyini, ɔttɛ, “Uyini, Jesus, atɔknɛ lɛfɛkɛlɛ.”
44007060	Ukun laddu ɔkkwa ɔgaga ɔttɛ, “Uyini Jesus, tɛ̀ttɛ́ akke bubbi ’bwɔng mung atumbɛ.” Ɔlɔɔknɛ ning baang lɔttɔmɛ. Saul kɔsaapmɛ kɔsak ka bawwɔɔlmɛnɛ.
44008001	Ka ussinɛ ka kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang, balɔɔt a luzɔɔm ka Jerusalem bassi baang, bayɛn akama wa lɛbaang. Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba bayanganɛ kiyila bakyakyama bakkpit Judea, la Samaria, usseke bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus kɛyɔɔng.
44008002	Balɔɔt ba bibbenɛbɛ lɛttɔ battɔng Stephen balli bataamɛ lisɛɛm la kullu la kullu.
44008003	Ɔzzànga Saul ɔggyan kɛbɛpɛ luzɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔssɛ la ssala la ssala, ɔssang balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ kiyila batum Jesus Christ, bwaanbwalam la bwanavva ɔssɛɛn ka igbakkɔpɔ.
44008004	Balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ kiyila ba bakyakyamanɛ, bamii la ifɛɛn la ifɛɛn, batteet bakang bamii babwɔɔlɔ bɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
44008005	Philip ufeele umii ka tɔkɔlɔ a ssala Samaria. Umii, ukopolo balɔɔt ’bɔng baang kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ.
44008006	Bappyee lilɔɔk sa Philip ɔlɔɔknɛ; bayɛn bɛmaanga bya ɔnaangnɛ.
44008007	Balɔɔt ggbadam ba bayanganɛ ipiliza, itta issekebɛ la kibungu la kibungu. Uttula bannɔk-a-kikku ggbadam, la balɔɔt ositta ɔppwabɛ.
44008008	Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ baggele ka Samaria, ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang.
44008009	Ka tɔkɔlɔ a ssala Samaria ’sɔng baang, ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ɔdɔkɔ baang wa ɔzzanganɛ Simon wa ɔkɔɔmnɛ lakke ubbu, ɔnaang bɛmaanga gaang gaang ɔyɔɔ balɔɔt a Samaria. Ɔtɔkmɛ kɛyɔɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt.
44008010	Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ka lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang, waan gɔɔ ɔgɛlɛnya, uppyee kwa ammɛ. Battɛ, “Ammɛ baang ulenɛ lakke Ebinukkpaapi ’zɔng baang za lazzanganɛ ‘Likke za lɛbaang’ ”
44008011	Ɔnaangbongbɛ bɛmaanga kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ ɔmmɛ. Kwakkwɛ bappyeenɛ kwa ammɛ.
44008012	Ɔzzánga bayilanɛ bɔtɔɔm bwa Philip ɔbwɔɔlɔnɛ utum Kuttu-budoddo-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, la lɛkɔɔl a Jesus Christ, banaangbɛ baptizim ɔkkpɛlɛ, bwanavva la bwaanbwalam.
44008013	Simon biini ɔgbaa ɔssɛ uyila. Balemɛnɛ baptizim lɛnaang, ɔttɔm ɔkkɛtɛ Philip, kɔkɛɛlɛmɛ ka ɔyɛnnɛ baggboggbo bɛmaanga la bɛfɛɛn a bikɛɛlɛ bya Philip ɔnaangnɛ.
44008014	Bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus ka Jerusalem bappyeenɛ battɛ balɔɔt a Samaria batɔkbong lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, batɔɔm Peter la John bafeebɛ.
44008015	Baffɔnɛ, bazɔɔm bassɛɛn balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ kiyila, battɛ nkwaaning batɔk Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
44008016	Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka kɔtakanɛ lisini kuffu kuttele ɔlɔɔt vvɔn gbɔɔ, batii ka banaangnɛbɛ baptizim kɛyɔɔng ka lɛkɔɔl Uyini, Jesus.
44008017	Peter la John batelebɛ labɔɔk, ɔzzanga batɔk Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
44008018	Simon ɔyɛn ning baang ɔttɛ Peter la John bannyibongbɛ Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ɛkɛtɛ ya batelenɛbɛ labɔɔk, uyilabɛ kinnyi ikkpoko,
44008019	ɔttɛ, “Assɛ annyiynɛyɔng lakke ’zɔng baang nkwaaning ntelenɛ ɔlɔɔt labɔɔk ɔtɔk Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
44008020	Peter ɔttɛ, “Annɔ la ikkpoko annɔ amiiyɔng ka lɔkɔɔn, bɔfɛɛn bwa attinanɛ attɛ akkwoong lukkwoong alɛɛp lɛsɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ikkpoko!
44008021	Kufuk, gɔɔ etini ba ayanga ka kɛnaang ayyɔɔt. Luppyam annɔ bbwak ba lule ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
44008022	Anaang busannɛ ka bubbi bwa attinanɛ; azɔɔm akkwɔɔ Uyini attɛ ɔsɔɔkwɔ ka ubbu luttina tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ammɛ mung.
44008023	Nyɛnbong nttɛ ayanga luleep gaang gaang ka tɔkɔlɔ. Baang asseke ubili bubbi.”
44008024	Simon ɔlɔɔk la Peter la John ɔttɛ, “Mkkpee, azɔɔm akkwɔɔyɔng Uyini, annyinɛyɔng nkwaaning lilɔɔk ’sɔng sa alɔɔknɛyɔng mung lisinɛ lɛnaang.”
44008025	Balenɛ bwa bazzanganɛ livve lɛbwɔɔlɔ ɔbɛtɛ la kɛbwɔɔlɔ kuttu Uyini, Peter la John bappyɛlɛ bamii Jerusalem. Bakopolo Kuttu-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɛtɔk-ɛtɔk ka billu balɔɔt a Samaria.
44008026	Uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔk la Philip ɔttɛ, “Abamawɔ kɛyɔɔng; usseke amii kuttɔɔk ka ɛtɔk ya essinɛ Jerusalem emii Gaza.” (Ɛtɔk ’yɔng baang yɛ ba babɛlɛ lɛssɛ.)
44008027	Ɔzzánga Philip ɔbama umii. Ɔlɔɔt a Ethiopia wa basangamɛnɛ idakɔp, ɔdɔkɔ ka ɛtɔk a kifula. Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔdɔkɔ uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt ɔkakala wa ɔbɔngɔlɔnɛ libɔngɔlɔ ubeet a Wanavva, ɔlɔk Candance ka Ethiopia. Umiibong Jerusalem kpal, ɔzɔɔm unnyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔdɔkɔ ka moto ammɛ wa eyim ettulunɛ. Ule baang ka ɔwaatnɛ, ɔkɔɔm ɔkkwɔɔ luvva uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔzzanganɛ Isaiah.
44008029	Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔlɔɔk la Philip kɔttɛ, “Amii abee akkɛtɛ moto ’wɔng baang.”
44008030	Philip ɔmma umii. Uppyeemɛ ka ɔkkwɔɔnɛ luvva uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔzzanganɛ Isaiah. ammɛ ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ, “Mung asan mung bwa akkwɔɔnɛ baang ɔɔ?”
44008031	Ammɛ uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt, ɔkakala ’wɔng baang, ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Nle nnaang nang nsan ɔlɔɔt usinɛnɛ lɛbwɔɔlɔ ɔyaala.” Ɔzzànga ɔttɛ Philip ubbulu ɔtaa ka kɛtaa-moto ammɛ.
44008032	Uwɔng ulenɛ kutolo kwa ɔkkwɔɔnɛ: “Ɔdɔkɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɛtɔɔn ya bakaanɛyɛ bamii bawwɔɔl, ɔdɔkɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɛtɔɔn ya esinɛ lɛmmwɔɔl lɛzza ka bakkpaatnɛyɛ issɔp; Lɛmmwɔɔl usi lɛzza.
44008033	Uyila busook, ɔzzànga kɛllɛ usi lizzi. Ɔlɔɔt wa ule ukkwoong ɔbwɔɔlɔ kɔlɔɔk utum balɔɔt a kikku ammɛ ba ule; ka kɛfal ammɛ ka ɛkpansi ’yɔng kilenɛ likpeke.”
44008034	Uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt, ɔkakala ’wɔng baang, ɔlɔɔk la Philip ɔttɛ, “Abwɔɔlɔnɛ, Uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ’wɔng mung ɔlɔɔk utum nnyinɛ? Mung ɔlɔɔk utum kwa ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk faa utummɛ ammɛ biini?”
44008035	Philip ubee kɛlɔɔk; ka ussinɛ ka lɛttɔ lɛkkɔ Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ’gwɔng mung, ɔbwɔɔlɔ Kuttu-budoddo a Jesus.
44008036	Ka balenɛ baang ka bamiinɛ ɛtɔk-ɛtɔk, baffɔ ka ɛfɛɛn ya ɛyanganɛ bannyi. Uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt ɔkakala ’wɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Yɛn bannyi mung, ’bɔng bule butununɛ kɛnaang a baptizim?”
44008037	Philip ɔttɛ, “Vvenɛ nnaangwɔ baptizim, ayanganɛ kiyila la luppyam annɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ.” Ɔppyɛlɛ Philip kamma ɔttɛ, “Nyanga mung kiyila. Nyilabong nttɛ Jesus Christ ulenɛ Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
44008038	Uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt ɔkakala ’wɔng baang ɔnaang moto ammɛ ubee; ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ baffa basini bamii ka tɔkɔlɔ bannyi. Philip ɔnaangmɛ baptizim.
44008039	Battanɛ ka likum, Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kuffu kɔsam Philip kumii. Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang usi Philip lɛbɛlɛ lɛyɛn. Ammɛ ɔgbata la lawaa la lawaa umii ka ɛfɛɛn a ule ka umiinɛ.
44008040	Philip ɔdɔkɔ usseke ka udunamɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng ka Ashdod. Ɔssɛ la lɛffɛ la lɛffɛ ukkpit, ukopolo Kuttu-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm tɔttɔt uffu ɔffɔ ka Caesarea.
44009001	Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang, Saul utii ka ɔyɔɔnɛ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ Jesus akama, ɔwwɔɔlbɛ. Umii ka Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm Wa Lɛbaang
44009002	ɔtɔk illɛta lussimi, ɔkɔɔm umii ka idda mitin a balɔɔt a Jews ka Damascus nkwaaning ɔyɛnnɛ balɔɔt ba bakupmɛ Ɛtɔk-Uyini bakang, ɔkaabɛ, ɔkɔɔm uffu ka Jerusalem mkkpa bale bwaanbwalam gɔɔ bwanavva.
44009003	Ka ulenɛ ka ɛtɔk a kimii Damascus, ɔffɔnɛ kɛtɛkɛtɛ Damascus, kitipili-kitipili ɔtta immwalang ka lukpaagbeedde uvvoongmɛ.
44009004	Ammɛ ɔmɛkɛlɛ ɔttɔ ka lisse. Uppyee lɛmmwɔɔl ka lɛlɔɔknɛ lɛttɛ, “Saul, Saul! ’bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ ayɔɔnɛ akama?”
44009005	Ammɛ ɔbap ɔttɛ, “Uyini, annɔ alenɛ nnyinɛ?” Lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng baang lɛttɛ, “Anaam nlenɛ Jesus wa ayɔɔnɛnɛ akama.
44009006	Afeele amii ka tɔkɔlɔ a ssala. Bakang ulenɛ ka ɛfɛɛn ale appyee bwa ale anaang.”
44009007	Balɔɔt ba bassɛnɛ la Saul bakɔɔng baang babee, gɔɔ lɛmmwɔɔl basi lɛzza. Bappyee lɛmmwɔɔl a lɛmmwɔɔl, ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt basi lɛyɛn.
44009008	Saul ufeele ka lisse uwongolo zzeen ɔzzànga usi lɛbɛlɛ lɛyɛn. Abbɛ bakɔɔmmɛ ka ka eddu ka eddu bamii Damascus.
44009009	Ka zzeen usi lɛbɛlɛ lɛyɛn ka bɛtɔm bɛkkyaat. Ka bɛtɔm ’byɔng baang bɛkkyaat, bwakuzzi usi lizzi gɔɔ bannyi usi lɛvva.
44009010	Ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus vvɔn ɔdɔkɔ baang ka Damascus wa ɔzzanganɛ Ananias. Ɔyɛn biyɛnɛ ka Uyini ɔlɔɔknɛ la ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Ananias!” Ananias ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Yɛnnɛ mung tɛ, Uyini.”
44009011	Uyini ɔttɛ, “Abama amii ka Ɛtɔk-ya-bbit, ka ggwoon a Judas. Affɔnɛ bakang, abap ɔlɔɔt wa ussinɛ Tarsus wa ɔzzanganɛ Saul. Ule ka luzɔɔm.
44009012	Ɔyɛnbong ɔlɔɔt wa ɔzzanganɛ Ananias ka biyɛnɛ ka uffunɛ utelemɛ labɔɔk ɔttɛ ɔlɔk ɔppyɛlɛ ɔyɛn.”
44009013	Ananias ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Uyini, balɔɔt ggbadam babalanɛbong ibala batum ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang, la lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ sa ɔnaangnɛ la balɔɔt annɔ ka Jerusalem.
44009014	Mung uffubong Damascus la lakke za bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm bannyimɛnɛ za kɛkaa balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ kiyila ka lɛkɔɔl annɔ.”
44009015	Uyini ɔlɔɔk la ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Nsɔɔng amii, nsangamɛbong nttɛ uyilanɛ bɔtɔɔm, ɔnaang balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba basinɛ ba Jews lile, la babeet, la balɔɔt a Israel basan lɛkɔɔl anaam.
44009016	Anaam biini vvenɛ nyɔɔmɛ akama wa ule ɔyɛn ka lɛttɔ anaam.”
44009017	Ɔ̀zzánga Ananias umii. Umiinɛ, ɔmal ka ggwoon. Uyeek labɔɔk, utele Saul ɔttɛ, “Ɔkpana anaam Saul, Uyini Jesus wa ayɛnnɛ ka ɛtɔk ka alenɛ ka kiffu mung ɔtɔɔmnɛnɛ. Ɔtɔɔmnɛ ɔttɛ nffu nkwaaning abbal lɛyɛn, atɔk Budoddo-Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
44009018	Ɔzzánga eseese bɔfɛɛn butta Saul ka zzeen tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kiggon ɛsɛɛnabannyi buttɔ, ukkwoong ɔyɛn, ufeele ubee ɔnaangmɛ baptizim.
44009019	Uvvenɛ kazzi lizzi, kkwɔɔt lippyɛlɛmɛ. Saul ɔtaa baang ka bɛtɔm ggbadam ka Damascus la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus.
44009020	Ufeele umii ssɔng ka idda mitin, ukopolo utum Jesus, ɔttɛ, “Jesus ulenɛ Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
44009021	Balɔɔt ba bappyeemɛnɛ kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ gaang gaang babap battɛ, “Mung ’wɔng ɔlɔɔt a Jerusalem wa ɔwwɔɔlnɛ balɔɔt ba bazɔɔmnɛ bannyi Jesus lissi ɔɔ? Mung kwakkwɛ lissi ka uffunɛ kɛkaa balɔɔt ufee bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm ɔɔ?”
44009022	Lukopolo a Saul lufeele lɔtta kuttu gaang gaang. Lɔnaang ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔsan ɔttɛ, Jesus ɔdɔkɔnɛ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ; lɔdɛm balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba ballunɛ Damascus bayila kamma basimɛ lɛbɛlɛ likkwoong bappyɛlɛ lɛmmwɔɔl.
44009023	Bɛtɔm ggbadam bilenɛ lɛsak, balɔɔt a Jews baduda banaang likup za kɛwwɔɔl a Saul.
44009024	Ɔzzánga uppyee ɔkka wa bakkamɛnɛ kɛwwɔɔl. Kikoon la kɛtɔm bale ka kɛkat a lamma bikku battɛ bawwɔɔlmɛ.
44009025	Kɛtɔm ssɔn, balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Saul basammɛ bassɛɛn ka tɔkɔlɔ ɛsangala la bizzi, basini baloko ka vveeng.
44009026	Saul ufeele umii Jerusalem ubum ɔttɛ ɔmal ka kɔssɛ balɔɔt a Jesus. Basi liyila battɛ Saul ufula ka kɔssɛ abbɛ. Ɔkkpɛlɛ bammamɛ lɔmma.
44009027	Ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔt wa ɔzzanganɛ Barnabas uffu uttelemɛ. Ɔsammɛ umii ka ɛfɛɛn a bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus. Ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Saul ɔyɛnnɛ Uyini ka ɛtɔk la kwa Uyini ulemɛnɛ lɛbwɔɔlɔ ɔgbaa. Ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Saul ɔbbɔnɛ ukopolo ka lɛkɔɔl a Jesus, ka Damascus.
44009028	Ɔzzánga Saul ɔtaa baang la abbɛ ukopolo ɔkkpɛlɛ ukkpit Jerusalem ka lɛkɔɔl Uyini.
44009029	Ɔgbaa utolo kutolo, ɔkangala ikangala la balɔɔt a Jews ba balɔɔknɛ Greek. Ɔzzanga babummɛ kɛwwɔɔl.
44009030	Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus basannɛ ning baang, basam Saul bamii ka ɛfɛɛn ya ɛzzanganɛ Caesarea, batɔɔmmɛ umii Tarsus.
44009031	Kɔdɔkɔ ning luzɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ a Judea, la Galilee la Samaria lɔyanga bɔkaat ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang. Lɔmat lɛsan, luyipi ka lakke Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, lɔtaa ka latele Uyini.
44009032	Peter ɔssɛ ukkpit ifɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ɛkɛtɛ nnyɔn ɔlap ukoolo balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba ballunɛ ka Lydda.
44009033	Baang ulenɛ ɛfɛɛn a ɔyɛnnɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔzzanganɛ Aeneas wa ositta ulemɛnɛ lɛnaang ka likkpa linnanginna, gɔɔ kifeele gbɔɔ ka igolo ya umininɛ ba ukkwoong.
44009034	Peter ɔlɔɔk la ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Aeneas, Jesus Christ ɔnaangwɔ ɔppwawɔ. Afeele alɔngɔlɔ igolo annɔ.” Eseese Aeneas ufeele.
44009035	Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba ballunɛ ka Lydda la Sharon bayɛnmɛ. Ɔzzánga bassang basikili bakup kwa Uyini.
44009036	Ka Joppa, wanavva ɔdɔkɔ baang wa ɔzzanganɛ Tabitha wa ɔdɔkɔnɛ ɔyanga kiyila. Lɛkɔɔl ammɛ ka kukaan a Greek ɔzzanga Dorcas (Ning baang bakkwɔɔ ɛlap). Ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔdɔkɔ ka kɛnaang a budoddo la kittele balɔɔt ba ɔbbɔlnɛbɛ.
44009037	Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang ɔffaakmɛ ubbe, basammɛ bayila bannyi. Bavvenɛ, basammɛ bamii bawulu ka lɛnɔk a ggwoon ka libat ɛnyɔng.
44009038	Ka ussinɛ Joppa umii Lydda ba ufulu. Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus ba balenɛ ka Joppa bappyeenɛ battɛ Peter utii ka Lydda, batɔɔm balɔɔt baffa bamii babwɔɔlɔmɛ battɛ, “Mkkpee, azzuma affu ka ayyɔɔt.”
44009039	Ɔzzánga Peter ɔbama ukkuma la abbɛ bamii. Baffɔnɛ bakang, basammɛ bamii ka tɔkɔlɔ lɛnɔk ’zɔng baang ka libat ɛnyɔng. Bwanavva ba bataanɛ lisɛɛm a bwalam abbɛ babbibong kkwulum bakkwa bakɔɔm bayɔɔ Peter iwɔkɔlɔ ya Dorcas ɔnaangnɛ ka utiinɛ ikokolo.
44009040	Peter ɔsangabɛ batta ka tɔkɔlɔ a ggwoon. Ammɛ biini ukun laddu ɔzɔɔm. Usikili ɔlɔɔk la ubbu ɔttɛ, “Tabitha afeele.” Ammɛ Dorcas uwongolo zzeen. Ɔyɛnnɛ Peter, ufeele ɔtaa-ɔtaa.
44009041	Peter uttelemɛ, ufeelemɛ ubee-ubee. Ɔkkwɔɔ balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ kiyila la bwanavva babbu baffu; ɔsam Dorcas unnyibɛ.
44009042	Kuttu kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng baang kɔwaala ɔkkpɛlɛ a Joppa. Balɔɔt ggbadam bayila kwa Uyini.
44009043	Peter ɔtaa baang ka Joppa ka bɛtɔm ggbadam la ɔlɔɔt wa ɔnaangnɛ kɛnaang ikkpa wa ɔzzanganɛ Simon.
44010001	Ɔlɔɔt ɔdɔkɔ baang ka Caesarea wa ɔzzanganɛ Cornelius, uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt ka isɔgya Rome. Kɛkaan isɔgya sa ulenɛ ka assɛ bakkwɔɔsɛ “Kɛkaan a balɔɔt Italy.”
44010002	Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔdɔkɔ ɔlɔɔt wa kɔlɔɔk a luzɔɔm kɔsaapmɛnɛ. Ammɛ biini la itutum ammɛ bazɔɔm bannyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔdɔkɔ ɔlɔɔt wa uttelenɛ balɔɔt a Jews ba ɔbbɔlnɛbɛ. Ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ule ka kɛzɔɔm kinnyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
44010003	Kɛtɔm ssɔn ka ikalangka ikkyaat kikoon ka ɔyɛnnɛ uyilabɔtɔɔm kpelegede wa uffunɛ utolo kutolo la ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Cornelius!”
44010004	Ɔppyɛɛk uyilabɔtɔɔm ɔbbwɔpɔmɛ ɔttɛ, “Kule nang Dedde?” Uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uppyeebong luzɔɔm annɔ, ɔyɛnwɔ kɛnaang a kibbe lɛttɔ, ukkewɔbong.
44010005	Atɔɔm balɔɔt balɔk gedegede mung bamii Joppa bakkwɔɔ ɔlɔɔt vvɔn wa ɔzzanganɛ Simon Peter.
44010006	Ule ka bukekeen ka ssala ɔlɔɔt wa ɔzzanganɛ Simon, ɔnaang-ikkpa, wa ullunɛ ka lufoom a lihu.”
44010007	Uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ’wɔng baang umii. Ɔzzánga Cornelius ɔkkwɔɔ ibɔɔyi ammɛ balɔɔt baffa la wa sɔgya wa ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt a luzɔɔm wa ɔtaanɛ la ammɛ biini baffu.
44010008	Ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ kwa kɔnaangɛ, ɔsangabɛ ɔtɔɔm Joppa.
44010009	Ɔffɔnɛ libbessolo ka balenɛ Joppa lɛkkɛtɛ, Peter ufeele umii ubbulu libat a ggwoon ɔttɛ umii ɔssɛɛn luzɔɔm.
44010010	Buwɔɔng busaapmɛ, ɔggyan kazzi. Bale ka kɛnaang a kazzi, Peter ɔyɛn biyɛnɛ.
44010011	Ɔyɛn ka libat liwongolonɛ, bɔfɛɛn bussi bakang busini buffu ka ɛkpansi. Bule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛkkpa bɔfɛɛn sa lɛbaang. Buyanga lagook lanna.
44010012	Bɛssanga isɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya bilenɛ ka lisse la bunɔɔn bile baang ka tɔkɔlɔ bɔfɛɛn ’bwɔng baang.
44010013	Lɛmmwɔɔl lɛttɛmɛ, “Peter, afeele awwɔɔl azzi.”
44010014	Ɔzzánga Peter ɔttɛ, “Uyini, ning baang baala kule, bɔfɛɛn bwa batakanɛbwɛ laggbo likup bafɔngɔ kang ba ntaka nzzi kɛtɔm kɛlɔk.”
44010015	Lɛmmwɔɔl lɛbbal lɛttɛmɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ayɛn bɔfɛɛn bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛbwɛ laggbo likup attɛ butii la laggbo.”
44010016	Nkwɔng kɔnaang bikkpit bɛkkyaat tɛ́ttɛ́ buppyɛlɛ isimisimi bumii ka libat.
44010017	Peter kɔkɛɛlɛmɛ kutum ifɛɛt a biyɛnɛ ’pyɔng baang pya ɔyɛnnɛ. Ɔttɛ ɔnaang, balɔɔt ba Cornelius ɔtɔɔmnɛ basanbong ssala Simon batii baang ka lusso kikku ka babeenɛ.
44010018	Bakkwɔɔ babap battɛ, “Ukekeen ɔlɔk ule mung wa ɔzzanganɛ Simon Peter ɔɔ?”
44010019	Peter ɔdɔkɔ ka kiffik a ifɛɛt a biyɛnɛ pyɔng baang. Ɔzzánga Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔttɛ, “Gɔpɔlɔ! balɔɔt bakkyaat bale mung ka baggyanwɔnɛ.
44010020	Abamawɔ kɛyɔɔng amiiyɔng eseese; anaam ntɔɔmnɛbɛ.”
44010021	Peter ufeele umii ɔbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ɔttɛ, “Anaam nlenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa aggyannɛyɔng, kulewɔyɔng nang?”
44010022	Abbɛ bappyɛlɛmɛ kamma battɛ, “Uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt ayyɔɔt, Cornelius, ɔtɔɔmnɛyɛlɛ tɛ. Ule ɔlɔɔt wa doddo ka ɔzɔɔmnɛ unnyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, balɔɔt a Jews ɔkkpɛlɛ batelemɛ lutele. Uyilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛnɛ ɔttɛ ɔkkwɔɔwɔ amii ka ssala ammɛ nkwaaning uppyee kɔlɔɔk kwa ale alɔɔk.”
44010023	Peter ɔkkwɔɔ balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bamii ka ssala Simon, ɔdɛmbɛ bakkwunu baang ka kɛtɔm ssɔn. Ɔffɔnɛ libbessolo, ɔlɔngɔlɔ bɛfɛɛn; bafeele bamii. Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ balɔk ba bassinɛ Joppa bakupmɛ bamii.
44010024	Ka libbessolo ɔffɔ Caesarea, ka ɛfɛɛn ya Cornelius ɔtaanɛ ɔkatmɛ la ikpana ammɛ la inngwa ammɛ ya ɔkkwɔɔnɛbɛ.
44010025	Peter ɔttɛ ɔmal ka tɔkɔlɔ, Cornelius ududamɛ ka lɛmma ggwoon; ɔttɔ ukunmɛ laddu ka lataak.
44010026	Ɔzzánga Peter ɔttɛ, “Afeele, anaam mung ɔlɔɔt a gbɔɔ.”
44010027	Peter utolo unnyi Cornelius ning baang tɔttɔt ɔmal ka ggwoon. Ɔyɛn balɔɔt ggbadam ka babbinɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ a ggwoon.
44010028	Utolo unnyibɛ ɔttɛ, “Annyɔɔng biini asanyɔngbong attɛyɔng luzɔɔm a balɔɔt a Jews ba luyila ɔlɔɔt a Jews ɔlap ukoolo wa akanakana, ɔlɔk ɔssɛmɛ ɛnngwa. Ɔzzànga Ebinukkpaapi ɛyɔɔnɛbong ɛttɛ, tɛ̀ttɛ́ nppyɛɛk ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk nttɛ baang ɔlɔɔt a laggbo ka kkwɔɔt.
44010029	Kwakkwɛ nsinɛ lifim ka atɔɔmnɛ attɛ nffu. Kkpɔɔ kule nang atɔɔmnɛ attɛ nffu?”
44010030	Cornelius ɔttɛ, “Ɔdɔkɔ liyaadɛ ussolo lisee ɛkɛtɛ ning bbwak ka nlenɛ ka kɛzɔɔm a luzɔɔm ka ggwoon anaam, ka ikalangka ikkyaat kikoon. Eseese nyɛn ɔlɔɔt la iwɔkɔlɔ ya illaatnɛ nyanya ka ubeenɛnɛ ka lusso.
44010031	Ɔttɛ, ‘Cornelius! Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uppyeewɔbong luzɔɔm ukke kɛnaang a budoddo annɔ.
44010032	Atɔɔm ɔlɔɔt umii Joppa, ɔkkwɔɔ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔzzanganɛ Simon Peter, wa ulenɛ ka bikekeen ka ssala Simon, ɔnaang-ikkpa wa ullunɛ ɔkkɛtɛ lihu.’
44010033	Ɔzzánga ntɔɔm eseese nkkwɔɔwɔ; alenɛ litele affu. Mung ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt ile mung ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka itaanɛ ikatwɔ ittɛ ippyee bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔddawɔnɛ ɔttɛ alɔɔk.”
44010034	Peter ɔttɛ, “Gedegede mung nsanbong nttɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkɔɔm ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ kɛssanga ssɔn.
44010035	Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔbbwɔpɔmɛnɛ, ɔnaang kwa bbwak vvenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔkmɛ, mkkpa ussi ɛfɛɛn duu.
44010036	Asanyɔngbong bɔtɔɔm bwa ɔtɔɔmnɛ Jesus, Uyini balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ, ufee balɔɔt a Israel, ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ Kuttu-bɔkaat.
44010037	Appyeeyɔngbong kɔlɔɔk kwa kɔnaangnɛ ka ɛkpansi Israel, kwa kuttenɛ ka Galilee ka ɛkɛtɛ a John uvvenɛ lukopolo a baptizim.
44010038	Appyeeyɔngbong kwa kutumnɛ Jesus wa Nazareth, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔɔmnɛ Kuyeeng ammɛ la lakke ufeemɛ, ufeele umii ɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔnaang budoddo. Uttula balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba badɔkɔnɛ ka labɔɔk a Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm-a-kuyeeng, ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ la ammɛ.
44010039	Ayyɔɔt ilenɛ ittɛɛsɛ lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ sa ɔnaangnɛ ka lɔkaan a Jews, la Jerusalem. Bakamamɛ bɛfɔl bakaka ka cross, ubbe.
44010040	Ɔzzànga bɛtɔm bɛffa bɛsaknɛ ka bɛkkyaat Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ufungalamɛ ka lubbe; ɔnaangmɛ ɔttɛ balɔɔt bayɛnmɛ.
44010041	Ka lusso balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ lissi ka utumanɛ, utuma ka lusso balɔɔt ba balenɛ ittɛɛsɛ ya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ lɛsanga. Izzi ivva la ammɛ ka ulenɛ ka lubbe lifungala.
44010042	Ɔddayɛlɛ ɔttɛ ikopolo kuttu budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ibwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ittɛ, uwɔng ulenɛ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ ɔttɛ ɔzzánga ɔkaal a kɛkaal a bakokolo la babbu.
44010043	Bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ balɔɔk batummɛ battɛ ɔlɔɔt wa uyilanɛ kwa ammɛ vvenɛ ɔsɔɔkmɛ bubbi ammɛ ka lakke lɛkɔɔl ammɛ.”
44010044	Peter ɔdɔkɔ baang ka kɛlɔɔk, Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kusini kuffu kuvvoong balɔɔt ba badɔkɔnɛ baang ka bagɔpɔlɔnɛ.
44010045	Balɔɔt a Jews ba bayanganɛ kiyila ba bassinɛ Joppa la Peter baffu, kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ gaang gaang ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔssɛnɛ ɔsɔɔk ikanakana Kuyeeng ammɛ
44010046	ka bappyeenɛbɛ ka balɔɔknɛ likaan lilɔk, bakɔɔm babungu lɛbaang Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Peter ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ,
44010047	“Balɔɔt ’bɔng mung batɔkbong Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ayyɔɔt itɔknɛ, ɔlɔɔt ule mung wa ule utunu balɔɔt ’bɔng mung kɛnaang a baptizim la bannyi ɔɔ?”
44010048	Ɔzzánga ɔddabɛ ɔttɛ, banaang baptizim ka lɛkɔɔl a Jesus Christ. Balɔɔkmɛ battɛ ukkunu la abbɛ ka bwaan a bɛtɔm ssup.
44011001	Bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus la bayanga kiyila ka Judea ɔkkpɛlɛ bappyee battɛ ikanakana ɔgbaa batɔkbong lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
44011002	Peter umiinɛ Jerusalem, balɔɔt ba battɛnɛ bazza ikanakana lataa banyɔɔkamɛ Peter battɛ,
44011003	“Adɔkɔ ka bikekeen ka ssala wa akanakana wa ɔtakanɛ lɛtaa lɛzza, atulyɔng kazzi azziyɔng la ammɛ. Bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ anaang ning baang?”
44011004	Ɔzzánga Peter ussi ka lutte ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ la ɛtɔk la ɛtɔk utum kwa kɔnaangnɛ, ɔttɛ;
44011005	“Ndɔkɔ ka kɛssɛɛn a luzɔɔm ka ogyila Joppa, ɔzzánga nyɛn biyɛnɛ. Nyɛn kɛfaak a bɔfɛɛn uggboggbo ning la lagook lanna ka bussinɛ ka libat buffu bukɔɔng kɛtɛkɛtɛ anaam bubee.
44011006	Nvvoop doddo ka tɔkɔlɔ, nyɛn isɛɛn a bukkpɔ bunna la isɛɛn ya ikkwukunɛ lukkwuku, la bunɔɔn ka kɛmat.
44011007	Nppyee lɛmmwɔɔl ka lɛttɛnɛ, ‘Peter afeele awwɔɔl azzi.’
44011008	Ɔzzanga nttɛ, ‘Ning baang baala kule, Uyini, kazzi kwa batakanɛkwɛ laggbo likup bafɔngɔ kang kɛtɔm kɛlɔk ka kamma anaam ba kataka kaffu.’
44011009	Mbbal lɛmmwɔɔl lippyee ka lissinɛ ka libat lɛttɛ, ‘Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ayɛn bɔfɛɛn bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛbwɛ laggbo likup, ɔfɔngɔ kang; attɛ butii la laggbo ka kkwɔɔt.’
44011010	Kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng baang kɔnaang ka bikkpit bɛkkyaat, ka lakpeke, buppyɛlɛ isimisimi bumii ka libat.
44011011	Ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang bbwak elenɛ ya balɔɔt ba batɔɔmnɛbɛ ka anaam ba bassinɛ Caesare baffɔnɛ ka ssala sa ndɔkɔnɛ ntaa.
44011012	Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔbwɔɔlɔnɛ kɔttɛ nkupbɛ nmii eseese, tɛ̀ttɛ́ ngɔp. Balɔɔt ayyɔɔt ba bwɔlaaning ba bassinɛ Joppa bakupnɛ imii Caesarea ka ssala Cornelius.
44011013	Cornelius ɔbwɔɔlɔyɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔyɛnnɛ uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ubeenɛ ka ggwoon ammɛ ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, ‘Atɔɔm ɔlɔɔt umii Joppa ɔkkwɔɔ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔzzanganɛ Simon Peter.
44011014	Vvenɛ ɔlɔɔk lɛmmwɔɔl unnyiwɔ za annɔ la itutum annɔ, ale ataayɔng ka kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal.’
44011015	Ka nlenɛ ka kutolo ka ssala Cornelius, Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kusini kuvoongbɛ, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɔnaangnɛ la ayyɔɔt ka lutte.
44011016	Ɔzzánga nkke kɔlɔɔk kwa Uyini ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔttɛ; ‘John ɔnaang baptizim la bannyi ɔzzànga annyɔɔng bale banaangwɔyɔng baptizim la Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm!’
44011017	Kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyi ikanakana lɛsɔɔk ’zɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ unnyiyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt ka ɛkɛtɛ ya iyilanɛ kɔlɔɔk a Jesus Christ. Anaam nlenɛ nnyinɛ wa nbumnɛ ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kitunu.”
44011018	Bappyeenɛ ning baang, bakkyaa kɛkpɛn a babbɛ bafɔngɔ babbungu Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm battɛ, “Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔssɛbong unnyi ikanakana kufuk kwa kɛnaang a busannɛ ka bubbi abbɛ bataa ka kuddu.”
44011019	Kɛyɔɔ akama sa bayɔɔnɛ luzɔɔm ka ɛkɛtɛ ya bawwɔɔlnɛ Stephen, kɛkkyama bayanga-kiyila. Balɔɔt balɔk bamii fulufulu baffɔ Phoenicia la Cyprus la Antioch babwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt a Jews keem Kuttu-budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
44011020	Ɔzzánga balɔɔt balɔk ba bayanganɛ kiyila ba bassinɛ Cyprus la Cyrene bassɛ bamii Antioch babwɔɔlɔ ikanakana kuttu lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Bakopolobɛ Kuttu-budoddo Uyini, Jesus.
44011021	Lakke Ebinukkpaapi ladɔkɔ la abbɛ. Kɛkaan a balɔɔt ppwap kiyila bakup Uyini.
44011022	Kuttu ’kwɔng baang kɔwaala tɔttɔt kɔffɔ luzɔɔm ka Jerusalem. Ɔzzánga batɔɔm Barnabas umii Antioch.
44011023	Ɔffɔnɛ bakang, ɔyɛn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangnɛ balɔɔt ppyɛɛ, ɔyanga laggele gaang gaang, ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔttɛ bayanga kiyila sa lɔkkwɔɔn batum Uyini la ippyam abbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
44011024	Barnabas ɔdɔkɔ ɔlɔɔt wa doddo. Ɔyanga Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la kiyila ka luppyam. Banaang balɔɔt ggbadam bayila kwa Uyini.
44011025	Ɔzzánga Barnabas umii Tarsus kɛggyan a Saul.
44011026	Ɔyɛnmɛnɛ, ɔkɔɔmmɛ uffu ka Antioch. Ka kukkpa ’kwɔng baang, abbɛ baffa la balɔɔt a luzɔɔm, bakopolo balɔɔt ggbadam. Ɔdɔkɔ ka Antioch ka battenɛ kɛkkwɔɔ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus ‘Bakup-a-Christ!’
44011027	Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang, bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm balɔk bafeele ka Jerusalem bamii Antioch.
44011028	Wa vvɔn wa ɔzzanganɛ Agabus, ufeele ubee ka lakke Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ buwɔɔng bwa lɛbaang bule ka buttɔnɛ ka ɛkpansi ɔkkpɛlɛ. (Buttɔ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya Claudius ɔdɔkɔnɛ uzzilɛttɔ a Rome.)
44011029	Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus batini tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔt ule unnyi bɛfɛɛn batɔɔm bafee ikpana abbɛ ba ballunɛ ka Judea.
44011030	Banaang ning baang ɔkkpɛlɛ basam ikkpoko, bannyi Barnabas la Saul battɛ bafee bagɛlɛnya luzɔɔm ka Judea.
44012001	Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang, ubeet Herod utte kɛyɔɔ balɔɔt a luzɔɔm akama.
44012002	Ɔkɔɔm ɔwwɔɔl James etele a John.
44012003	Ɔyɛnnɛ ka kɔsaapnɛ balɔɔt a Jews, ɔkama ɔkama. Ɔkaa Peter, ɔssɛɛn ka igbakkɔpɔ. (Nkwɔng kɔnaang ka ɛkɛtɛ kazzi brɛɛd wa basinɛ yeast lɛssɛɛn.)
44012004	Ulenɛ Peter lɛkaa ɔssɛɛn ka igbakkɔpɔ, lakup isɔgya lanna, za balɔɔt banna banna ka likup bakatmɛ. Herod ɔnngwa ɔttɛ vvenɛ ɔsangamɛ unnyi balɔɔt a Jews balenɛ Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ livve.
44012005	Ɔzzánga Peter ɔtaa baang ka igbakkɔpɔ. Balɔɔt a luzɔɔm bazɔɔm gaang gaang bannyimɛ battɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyaamɛ.
44012006	Usseke kɛtɔm ssɔn sa nzang Herod busangamɛnɛ ufee balɔɔt a Jews. Peter ɔdɔkɔ ka bilaa ka bɛzzɔkɔ bakat-ikata baffa. Badɔkɔ bassɛɛnmɛ ikpɔkɔlɔ ka labɔɔk la bukkpɔ. Bakat-ikata badɔkɔ baang ka kikkwu a ssala igbakkɔpɔ ka kɛkat.
44012007	Eseese ɔyɛn Uyilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ubeenɛ baang kitipili. Buppwolo bullɔt ka tɔkɔlɔ ggwoon a igbakkɔpɔ. Uyilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnnyɛkɛ Peter ka kɛ̀kɔ̀pɔ́kɔpɔ ɔttɛ, “Afeele, zzuma!” Eseese ikpɔkɔlɔ ikkyaa Peter ka labɔɔk la bukkpɔ ittɔ ka lisse.
44012008	Ɔzzánga Uyilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛ, “Aggbɔ ɛkkpa annɔ, asam ikkpa-bukkpɔ annɔ awɔkɔlɔ.” Ammɛ Peter ɔnaang ning baang, Uyilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛ, “Asam ewuulu annɔ awɔkɔlɔ, afeele akupnɛ.”
44012009	Peter ukupmɛ batta ka tɔkɔlɔ igbakkɔpɔ. Peter biini gɔɔ ba ɔsan kwa Uyilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangnɛ. Ɔnngwa ɔttɛ kɔlɔɔk a lɔlakala.
44012010	Basak ɛfɛɛn a kɛkat ya ikeeng tɔttɔt basak kibee sa ibaala, tɔttɔt baffɔ ka lukuma kikkwu sa bakɔɔmnɛ bɛfɔl a bɛfɔl banaang. Assɛ kilenɛ sa awongolonɛ affɔ ka tɔkɔlɔ a ssala. Baffɔnɛ baang, kikkwu kiwongolosɛ kɛyɔɔng bassɛ baang basak batta. Bassɛ bamii ɛtɔk ɛtɔk ɔzzánga Uyilabɔtɔɔm ɔgbata ɔkɔngɔ Peter kitipili.
44012011	Ɔzzánga Peter bɔk ɔsan kwa kɔnaangmɛnɛ, ukkuma baang ɔttɛ, “Nsanbong, Uyini ɔtɔɔmnɛ uyilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ ɔttɛ uffu ɔkkalanɛ. Ɔsanganɛ ka lakke a Herod la ɔkka wa balɔɔt a Jews bakkanɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.”
44012012	Ɔyɛnnɛ lilɔɔk ’sɔng ning baang ɔkkpɛlɛ, ufeele umii ka ssala Mary, abakka John Mark. Balɔɔt ggbadam badɔkɔ baang ka babbinɛ bazɔɔm luzɔɔm.
44012013	Peter ubee ka vveeng; ulip ka lɛmma ggwoon. Ɔzzánga waanawanavva wa ulenɛ ka bubɔɔyi, wa ɔzzanganɛ Rhoda, uffu ɔppyɛɛk bwa bulipnɛ ka lɛmma ggwoon.
44012014	Ɔkɔɔlɔnɛ lɛmmwɔɔl a Peter uggele gaang gaang, usumala kiwongolo lɛmma ggwoon. Ɔmma umii ɔbwɔɔlɔ babbɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ ɔttɛ, “Peter ule bakang ka vveeng ka ubeenɛ.”
44012015	Balɔɔk la waan ’wɔng baang battɛ, “Attɔbong bikun.” Ɔzzánga Rhoda ɔttɛ ammɛ ɔlɔɔk ka lɔkkwɔɔn tɛ. Abbɛ battɛ, “Baang ɔyɛnbong kuyeeng ammɛ tɛ.” Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ,
44012016	Peter ule baang ka ulipnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ulipnɛ baang. Abbɛ bamii bawongolo lɛmma. Bayɛnnɛ Peter, kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ gaang gaang.
44012017	Ɔkkpabɛ labɔɔk, ɔttɛ bataa zzum. Ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Uyini, Ebinukkpaapi, ɔsangamɛnɛ ka igbakkɔpɔ ɔttɛ, “Abwɔɔlɔyɔng James la ikpana ammɛ ning baang ɔkkpɛlɛ.” Ɔgbata umii ka ɛfɛɛn ɛlɔk.
44012018	Ussolonɛ lɔfɔm lububutu lɔttɔ bakat-ɔkat ka bɛzzɔkɔ. Peter ule?
44012019	Herod unnyibɛ lakke ɔttɛ, baggyanmɛ. Ɔzzánga baggyanmɛ basimɛ lɛyɛn. Herod unnyi bakat-ikata ’bɔng baang ibap. Ɔdda isɔgya ilɔk ɔttɛ bawwɔɔlbɛ. Nkwɔng kɔsaknɛ, Herod ussi Judea, umii ɔtaa ka Caesarea ka bwaan a bɛtɔm ssup.
44012020	Herod kutunmɛ gaang gaang la balɔɔt a Tyre la Sidon. Ɔzzánga bafeele ka kɛkaan, bamii ka ɛfɛɛn a Herod. Bakɔɔm ɛtɔk banaang Blastus uyila kwa abbɛ. Blastus ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔkatnɛ ssala ubeet. Bamii bakup Herod bakkpengemɛ battɛ bappyɛlɛ bataa ka bɔkaat. Bàyila lakkpenge ka Tyre la Sidon balɛɛpnɛ kazzi abbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ka lɔkaan ubeet ’wɔng baang.
44012021	Ka kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang sa bassɛɛnnɛ baloko, Herod ɔwɔkɔlɔ bɛfɛɛn a kibeet ɔtaa ka ugbaal a kibeet ammɛ. Ɔlɔɔk lɛmmwɔɔl, unnyi balɔɔt ’bɔng baang. Babungu battɛ,
44012022	“Ɔlɔɔt lissi ɔlɔɔknɛ, Ebinukkpaapi ɛlɔɔknɛ.”
44012023	Eseese Uyilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulip Herod ggwɔk ɔzzɔɔk ka usinɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm litele. Illɔɔng izzimɛ iwwɔɔl.
44012024	Lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛkama ɔkama lɛwaala.
44012025	Barnabas la Saul bavve kɛnaang abbɛ. Basam John Mark ka Jerusalem bakɔɔm bappyɛlɛ.
44013001	Bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la bakopolo-lukopolo badɔkɔ baang ka luzɔɔm gwa Antioch; Barnabas, Simon (wa bakkwɔɔmɛnɛ kibili), Lucius, (wa Cyrene) Manaen (wa ɔtaanɛ la Herod uggbenge), la Saul.
44013002	Badɔkɔ ka kɛtaa buwɔɔng bannyi Uyini, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔlɔɔkbɛ kɔttɛ, “Asangayɔng Barnabas la Saul alokoyɔng zzekep. Abbɛ bale banaang kɛnaang sa nkkwɔɔnɛbɛ nttɛ banaang.”
44013003	Bataa buwɔɔng, bazɔɔm bannyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Batelebɛ labɔɔk batɔɔmbɛ bamii.
44013004	Barnabas la Saul balenɛ limii ka Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔtɔɔmnɛbɛ baffɔ Seleucia, bamal akkpaat bamii Cyprus, lɔkaan gwa ballunɛ ka kasɛkɛ bannyi.
44013005	Baffɔnɛ ka Salamis, bakopolo balɔɔt a Jews lɛmmwɔɔl-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka idda mitin. John Mark ɔdɔkɔ baang la abbɛ ka uttelenɛbɛ banaang kɛnaang Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
44013006	Bassɛnɛ tɔttɔt basak ɛkpansi a Cyprus bamii baffɔ Paphos ka ɛfɛɛn a badudanɛ odibya wa ɔzzanganɛ Bar-Jesus, wa Jews, wa ɔtɔkmɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng ɔttɛ ammɛ uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
44013007	Bar-Jesus ɔdɔkɔ ɛnngwa Sergius Paulus, uzzilɛttɔ ɛkpansi ’yɔng baang. Sergius Paulus ɔkkwɔɔ Barnabas la Saul baffu ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ, ɔggyan ɔttɛ uppyee Lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
44013008	Ɔzzánga Elimas ɔnaang a bɛmaanga ’wɔng baang ɔkangalabɛ. (Elimas ulenɛ lɛkɔɔl a Bar-Jesus za Greek) Ubum gaang gaang ɔttɛ uzzilɛttɔ ɛkpansi ’wɔng baang tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔyanga kiyila utum Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
44013009	Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔdɔkɔ la Saul wa bakkwɔɔmɛnɛ Paul. Ɔzzánga Paul ɔppyɛɛk ɔnaang-a-bɛmaanga ’wɔng baang ssii,
44013010	ɔttɛ, “Annɔ waan a Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm a kuyeeng ’wɔng! Annɔ alenɛ kɔfɔk a bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya bɛyyɛɛpnɛ, ayanga lagban a kɛnaang a bubbi ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ aggyan attɛ asikili lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔzzanga lɛlaak.
44013011	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule ka usingwɔnɛ kɔbɔɔk gedegede mung assi ifim. Buppwolo kikoon vvenɛ ba abɛlɛ lɛyɛn ka ligbɛkɛ.” Eseese baang, Elimas ɔyɛn kisul ka kivvoongmɛnɛ ka zzeen, ɔssɛ ukpikpiti; ɔggyan ɔlɔɔt wa ule ɔlɔmmɛ ka kɔbɔɔk ɔkɔɔmnɛ ɛtɔk.
44013012	Sergius Paulus ɔyɛnnɛ ning baang, ɔyanga kiyila. Kɔkɛɛlɛmɛ gaang gaang ka lukopolo gwa bakopolonɛ batum Uyini.
44013013	Paul la balɔɔt ammɛ bamal akkpaat ka Paphos bamii Perga ka Pamphylia. John Mark ɔgbata ɔkɔngɔbɛ baang ɔppyɛlɛ isimisimi umii Jerusalem.
44013014	Bafeele ka Perga baffu Antioch ka Pisidia. Bafeele ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ bamii bataa ka idda mitin a balɔɔt a Jews.
44013015	Bavvenɛ luvva Lafɔɔ a Moses la gwa Bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛkkwɔɔ, Baggboggbo balɔɔt a mitin ’bɔng baang basanga bɔtɔɔm, battɛ, “Ikpana ayyɔɔt, iggyan ittɛ alɔɔkyɔng kɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt ayyɔɔt baang, ayanganɛyɔng kɛbba-bikɔɔm pya ale ka abbanɛyɔngbɛ.”
44013016	Paul ufeele ubee uwung labɔɔk utte kɛlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Bayyɔɔt a Israel, la balɔɔt ba balenɛ mung ba bazɔɔmnɛ bannyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, agɔpɔlɔnɛyɔng!
44013017	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm a balɔɔt ’bɔng mung Israel, ɔsanga balɔɔt ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ ɔnaangbɛ bazzanga lɔfɔɔn gwa lɛbaang ka ɛkɛtɛ ya balenɛ bakekeen ka Egypt. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkɔɔm lakke ammɛ ɔsangabɛ ka Egypt.
44013018	Ɔkɔɔmbɛ ka luppyam gwa doddo ka lalɔp a likkpa laffa ka kasɛkɛ kɛmat.
44013019	Ɔbɛpɛ ifɔɔn innamikkyaat ka ɛkpansi a Canaan. Ɔsam ɛkpansi unnyi balɔɔt ammɛ, bayanga,
44013020	ka nnɔ la lalɔp a likkpa laffa la likkpa zzɔɔp. “Nkwɔng kɔsaknɛ unnyibɛ bakaal-a-kɛkaal, bakaal kɛkaal abbɛ tɔttɔt uddum ka ɛkɛtɛ uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔzzanganɛ Samuel.
44013021	Babapnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm battɛ unnyibɛ ubeet, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyibɛ Saul, waan a Kish wa ussinɛ ka kikkwu a Benjamin, ɔttɛ ɔzzánga ubeet abbɛ ka lalɔp a likkpa laffa.
44013022	Ɔsanganɛ Saul ka kibeet, ɔbbal David, waan a Jesse, lɛsanga ɔzzangabɛ ubeet. Nkwɔng kɔdɔkɔnɛ kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔknɛ utummɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Nyɛnbong, nsan nttɛ David, waan a Jesse, ulenɛ kɛssanga ɔlɔɔt sa kɛsaapnɛnɛ; kɛssanga ɔlɔɔt wa ule ɔnaang kɔlɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ kwa nttɛnɛ ɔnaang.’
44013023	Jesus wa ussinɛ ka kikkwu a David ɔdɔkɔnɛ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ ɔtɔɔm ɔttɛ uffu ɔkkala balɔɔt a Israel, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔggbanɛ lɛlɔɔk uloko.
44013024	Bong tɛ́ttɛ́ Ɔkkala-ikkala wa ɔzzanganɛ Jesus utte kɛnaang ammɛ, John ɔggba balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ka Israel likopolo ɔttɛ bakkyaa kɛnaang a bubbi bafɔngɔ, banaang baptizim.
44013025	Ɔffɔnɛ ɛkɛtɛ a John ule ka uvvenɛ kɛnaang a luzɔɔm ammɛ, ɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ɔttɛ, ‘Attina attɛyɔng anaam nyinɔɔng? Anaam lissi nlenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa akatnɛyɔng. Ɔzzànga ppyɛɛkyɔng: ule ka uffunɛ ukupnɛ. Anaam gɔɔ ba nkkɔnɔ wa nkkyaamɛnɛ ikkpabukkpɔ.’
44013026	“Ikpana anaam, balɔɔt a kikkwu Abraham, ikanakana ba bazɔɔmnɛ bannyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm; Lɛmmwɔɔl a kuddu ’zɔng mung ɔtɔɔm ufeeyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt!
44013027	Balɔɔt ba ballunɛ ka Jerusalem la bazzilɛttɔ abbɛ, basi lɛsan battɛ ammɛ ulenɛ Ɔkkala-ikkala, gɔɔ basi lippyee lammwɔɔl a bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm za bakkwɔɔnɛ Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ la ssɔn. Balɔngɔlɔ banaang lɛmmwɔɔl a bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lile ka lɔkkwɔɔn ka bakaanɛ Jesus bawwɔɔl.
44013028	Jesus kɔlɔɔk usi lɛzzɔɔk kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ kule kwa kɛwwɔɔlmɛ, bakongo lukongo battɛ Pilate ɔwwɔɔlmɛ.
44013029	Balenɛ bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ livve lɛnaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lutummɛ, basinimɛ ka libat a cross, basam bamii balli.
44013030	Ɔzzànga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ufungalamɛ ka lubbe.
44013031	Ɔyɔɔmɛ kɛyɔɔng ka kɛtɔm ppwap, balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ba bakkumanɛ ka ussinɛ Galilee bamii Jerusalem bayɛnmɛ. Gedegede mung abbɛ balenɛ ittɛɛsɛ ammɛ ka lusso balɔɔt a Israel.
44013032	Mung ayyɔɔt ikɔɔmnɛ Kuttu-budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm iffu ibwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng. Akkwɛ kulenɛ kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔknɛ la balɔɔt ayyɔɔt ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ ɔttɛ vvenɛ ɔnaangkwɛ. Mung ɔnaangbongkwɛ unnyiyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt ba ilenɛ ba kikkwu abbɛ ka kifungala sa ufungalanɛ Jesus ka lubbe. Kule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bakkpɔknɛ ka Psalm lakkɔ laffa, battɛ ‘Annɔ alenɛ waan anaam, mmwɔɔn anaam nsseke ssaawɔ.’
44013034	Nkwɔng kulenɛ kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔknɛ utum kifungala Jesus ka lubbe ɔfɔngɔ kɛbɛlɛ libbe ɔttɛ, ‘Vvenɛ nnaangwɔ ppyɛɛ ka lɔkkwɔɔn wa nlɔɔknɛ nttɛ vvenɛ nnaang David’.
44013035	Kule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔknɛ ka ɛfɛɛn ɛlɔk ɔttɛ, ‘Baala afɔngɔ waan, ukeewaan annɔ, ɔyɛn akama ɔddɔlɔ.’
44013036	David utele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ɛkɛtɛ ammɛ. Ɔzzànga ka ubbenɛ, badɔkɔ ballimɛ ka ɛfɛɛn a ballinɛ balɔɔt ammɛ ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ ɔyɛn akama ɔddɔlɔ.
44013037	Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ufungalanɛ ka lubbe, akama usi lɛyɛn wa kɛddɔlɔ.
44013038	Ikpana anaam, ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng asanyɔng ka lɔkkwɔɔn attɛyɔng, kussi ka Jesus tɛ́ttɛ́ bakopolowɔyɔng bɔtɔɔm bwa butumnɛ kɛsɔɔk a bubbi. Ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng asan attɛyɔng ɔlɔɔt duu wa uyilanɛ kwa ammɛ vvenɛ ɔsangamɛ ka bubbi ɔkkpɛlɛ, bwa Lafɔɔ a Moses lasinɛ likkwoong lasangamɛ.
44013040	Asan anaangyɔng, tɛ̀ttɛ́ kwa bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm balɔɔknɛ kuffu kɔnaangwɔyɔng tɛ! ka battɛnɛ,
44013041	‘Ppyɛɛk, annyɔɔng bakpɛn a balɔɔt ’bɔng! Kɔkɛɛlɛwɔyɔng abbeyɔng! Kɛnaang sa nnaangnɛ mung ka lizan annyɔɔng kilebong kɛnaang sa ale asiyɔng liyila gɔɔ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng ifɛɛt assɛ!’ ”
44013042	Paul la Barnabas bale ka kɛtta kɛgbata ka ɔdda mitin, ɔzzánga balɔɔt balɔk bakkwɔɔbɛ. Babwɔɔlɔbɛ battɛ vvenɛ bappyɛlɛ baffu ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ kɛlɔk nkwaaning babbalbɛ lilɔɔk ’sɔng baang lɛbwɔɔlɔ.
44013043	Balɔɔt balenɛ ka ɔdda mitin lɛgbata, balɔɔt a Jews la ikanakana ggbadam ba balenɛ ka luzɔɔm a Jews bakup Paul la Barnabas. Bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus babbabɛ bikɔɔm battɛ bataa ssii baddu kuddu lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
44013044	Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ kɛlɔk kɛffɔnɛ, naanga ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ kwɛɛnɛ-kwɛɛnɛ baffu kippyee lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
44013045	Balɔɔt a Jews bayɛnnɛ balɔɔt ggbadam luleep lɔnaangbɛ gaang gaang, bakangala bwa Paul ɔdɔkɔnɛ ɔlɔɔk, bassɛɛnmɛ ka bɛnɔk.
44013046	Paul la Barnabas bakama ɔkama balɔɔk bagbaa battɛ, “Kɔdɔkɔ bbwak kɔsak ka ittenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl lɛlɔɔk ibwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng annyɔɔng. Ngkka ka alenɛyɔngzɛ lifim attɛ ba akkɔnɔyɔng ba kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal, ile ka igbatanɛ issekewɔyɔng imii ikup ikanakana.
44013047	Uwɔng ulenɛ lafɔɔ za Uyini, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛyɛlɛ linnyi: Ɔttɛ, ‘Nlokowɔyɔng nttɛ aleyɔng buppwolo ikanakana, aleyɔng ɛtɔk a kuddu ɛkpansi ɔkkpɛlɛ’ ”
44013048	Ikanakana bappyeenɛ ning baang, baggele babungu bɔtɔɔm bwa Uyini ɔtɔɔmnɛ. Balɔɔt ba ulenɛbɛ lɛssang ɔttɛ baddu kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal bayanga kiyila.
44013049	Lɛmmwɔɔl a Uyini lɛwaala ifɛɛn ifɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ɛkpansi ’yɔng baang.
44013050	Balɔɔt a Jews babum battɛ banaang bakkwu-lusso ɛkpansi ’yɔng baang la bwanavva Ikanakana ba bazɔɔmnɛ bannyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bayɔɔ a Paul la Barnabas akama. Baggbabɛ, bagbata ka ɛkpansi abbɛ.
44013051	Abbɛ bakkwɔlɔ ibut ka bukkpɔ abbɛ ballɔt bappyɛɛkbɛ. Bagbata bamii lɛffɛ za lɛzzanganɛ Iconium.
44013052	Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus ba balenɛ ka Antioch badɔkɔ ka laggele gaang gaang. Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔdɔkɔ la abbɛ.
44014001	Kɛssanga kɔlɔɔk ’sɔng baang kɛbbal lɛnaang ka Iconium. Paul la Barnabas bamii ka ɔdda mitin a balɔɔt a Jews. Bakopolo lukopolo lɔyyɛɛp. Lukopolo ’gwɔng baang lɔnaang Ikanakana la balɔɔt a Jews gbbadam bayanga kiyila.
44014002	Balɔɔt a Jews balɔk bafim kiyila babum kisikili Ikanakana ippyam kutunbɛ bappyɛɛk ikpana abbɛ.
44014003	Bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus bataa baang ɔmmɛ. Balɔɔk ppwool ppwool batum Uyini wa unnyinɛbɛ lakke kɛnaang a bɛmaanga la bɛfɛɛn a bikɛɛlɛ, ɔyɔɔ ɔttɛ lɛmmwɔɔl ammɛ za babwɔɔlɔnɛ batum kɛsaap ammɛ lile ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
44014004	Kibbi balɔɔt a lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang babɛngɛlɛ lakup laffa. Balɔɔt balɔk bayila kwa balɔɔt a Jews, balɔk bayila kwa bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus.
44014005	Ɔzzánga Ikanakana ilɔk la balɔɔt a Jews, la bazzilɛttɔ abbɛ battɛ bayɔɔ bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus akama, batɔɔpbɛ lattaal.
44014006	Bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus bappyeenɛ ning baang, bagbata bamii lɛffɛ a Lystra la Derbe ka ɛkpansi a Lycaonia la laffɛ za lallunɛ lakkpit ɛkpansi ’yɔng baang.
44014007	Bakopolo Kuttu-budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm baang.
44014008	Ɔlɔɔt ɔdɔkɔ baang ka Lystra wa ɔnnɔknɛ kikkwu. Kikkwu kissimɛ ka lɛfal. Kɛtɔm kɛlɔk ba ɔtaka ukkwoong ufeele ɔssɛ.
44014009	Ɔtaa baang ɔgɔpɔlɔ lukopolo a Paul. Paul ɔyɛnnɛ ɔsan ɔttɛ ɔyanga mung kiyila, uttulamɛnɛ vvenɛ ɔppwamɛ, ɔppyɛɛkmɛ ssii,
44014010	ɔlɔɔk gagaga ɔttɛ, “Afeele abee ubee bbit!” Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang utum ufeele ubee ubee utte kɔssɛ eseese ukkpit.
44014011	Kibbi ’sɔng baang bayɛnnɛ basan battɛ Paul uttulamɛnɛ, bafeele ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ babungu ka kukaan abbɛ battɛ, “Ibinukkpaapi isikilibong balɔɔt, iffu ka lɔkaan ayyɔɔt tɛ!”
44014012	Bakɔlɔ Barnabas Zeus; bakɔlɔ Paul Hermes ka ulenɛ ɔlɔɔk a kɛlɔɔk.
44014013	Ɔssɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm ebinukkpaapi abbɛ ya ɛzzanganɛ Zeus, ya bayanganɛ ɔdda annyɛ ka lufoom a lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang, ɔkɔɔm balam igɔdɔ la idodo uffu ubee ka lusso lɛmma kikkwu. Ammɛ la balɔɔt ba babbinɛ baang badɔkɔ battɛ bassɛɛn luzɔɔm bannyi Barnabas la Paul.
44014014	Barnabas la Paul bappyeenɛ kwa balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bale ka banaangnɛ, bayaak iwɔkɔlɔ abbɛ, bamma bamii ka tɔkɔlɔ kibbi ’sɔng baang la kibungu la kibungu battɛ,
44014015	“Bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ ale ka anaangnɛyɔng kwɔng? Ayyɔɔt balɔɔt gbɔɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ annyɔɔng. Kiffu sa iffunɛ mung, iffu ittɛ nkwaaning ibwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng Kuttu-budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔlɔk akkyaayɔng kɛnaang a bubbi afɔngɔyɔng, akupyɔng kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm a kuddu, wa ɔnaangnɛ libat la ɛkpansi, la lihu la bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya bilenɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ azzɛ.
44014016	Ka isimi ka isimi ɔkkyaa balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ gbɔɔ ɔfɔngɔ banaang kwa kɔsaapnɛbɛ.
44014017	Ɔzzànga ammɛ biini ɔyɔɔmɛbong kɛyɔɔng ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ la budoddo bwa ɔnaangnɛ. Ɔnaang bannyi bateep ballɔtwɔyɔng, unnyiwɔyɔng ikɔnɔ-kɔnɔ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya bbwak, unnyiwɔyɔng kazzi, ɔgbaa la laggele.”
44014018	Gɔɔ lɛmmwɔɔl za balɔɔknɛ baang lisi likkwoong litunu kibbi ’sɔng baang kɛkɔɔm a lɛkɔmɔlɔ kɛssɛɛn luzɔɔm kinnyi Barnabas la Paul.
44014019	Balɔɔt a Jews balɔk ba bassinɛ Antioch ka Pisidia la ba bassinɛ Iconium baffunɛ, battulubɛ baffu ka lufoom gwa abbɛ. Batɔɔp Paul lattaal battulumɛ batta ka lɛffɛ abbɛ battina battɛ ubbebong.
44014020	Ɔzzánga balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ kiyila, babbi bakkpitmɛ. Ammɛ ufeele ɔppyɛlɛ isimisimi umii ka lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang. Libbessolo, ammɛ la Barnabas bafeele bamii Derbe.
44014021	Paul la Barnabas bakopolo Kuttu-budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka Derbe, bayanga balɔɔt ba bayilanɛ kwa Jesus ggbadam. Bappyɛlɛ isimi isimi bamii Lystra, la Iconium, la Antioch ka Pisidia.
44014022	Banaang bayanga-kiyila bayanga lakke, bayanga-kiyila sa lɔkkwɔɔn. Bakopolobɛ battɛ, “Vvenɛ iyɛn akama gaang gaang tɛ́ttɛ́ imal ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
44014023	Ka luzɔɔm duu gwa bamiinɛ bassang bagɛlɛnya, bataa buwɔɔng, bassɛɛn luzɔɔm bannyi Uyini wa balenɛ kiyila lɛyanga batummɛ.
44014024	Balenɛ limii bakkpit ɛkpansi a Pisidia, bafeele bamii Pamphilia.
44014025	Bayaam lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm babwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt ka Perga tɛ́ttɛ́ bamii Attalia.
44014026	Bassi baang bamal akkpaat bappyɛlɛ isimi isimi bamii Antioch ka ɛfɛɛn a lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lale lappyɛɛkbɛ ka kɛnaang sa balenɛ livve.
44014027	Baffɔnɛ ka Antioch, bakkwɔɔ balɔɔt a luzɔɔm babbi ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn, babwɔɔlɔbɛ lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ sa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ lɛnaang la abbɛ. Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ likkwoong ɔnaang Ikanakana bayanga kiyila.
44014028	Bataa baang la balɔɔt ba balenɛ kiyila lɛyanga ɛkɛtɛ ɛlɔm.
44015001	Balɔɔt balɔk bassi ka Judea bamii Antioch bakopolo balɔɔt ba bayilanɛ kwa Jesus battɛ, “Bwa bule bunaang ayangayɔng kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal ba bule, asinɛyɔng lataa lɛzza tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Lafɔɔ a Moses lalɔɔknɛ.”
44015002	Paul la Barnabas bayanga ikangala gaang gaang la abbɛ batum kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng mung. Ɔzzánga basanga Paul la Barnabas la balɔɔt balɔk ba balenɛ ka Antioch battɛ bamii Jerusalem babap bayilabɔtɔɔm-a-Jesus la bagɛlɛnya-luzɔɔm lɔbap batum kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng baang.
44015003	Balɔɔt-a-luzɔɔm batɔɔmnɛbɛ. Keem ka bassɛnɛ Phoenicia la Samaria, babwɔɔlɔbɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ikanakana balenɛ kiyila lɛyanga batum Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Bayanga-kiyila bappyeenɛ kuttu ’kwɔng mung, baggele gaang gaang.
44015004	Paul la Barnabas baffɔnɛ Jerusalem, balɔɔt-a-luzɔɔm la bayilabɔtɔɔm-a-Jesus la bagɛlɛnya baggelebɛ gaang gaang ka bappyeenɛ lilɔɔk ’sɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ sa babwɔɔlɔnɛbɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangnɛ unnyibɛ.
44015005	Balɔɔt a Pharisees balɔk ba bayanganɛ kiyila bafeele balɔɔk battɛ, “Bale ba kɛzza lataa la kɛbwɔɔlɔbɛ kɛttɛ batele Lafɔɔ a Moses.”
44015006	Bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus baggba ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn banaang luttina la bagɛlɛnya batum lɔbap ’gwɔng baang.
44015007	Balenɛ lɛsak lɛlɔɔk, Peter ufeele ubee ɔttɛ, “Ikpana anaam asanyɔngbong ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggbanɛnɛ lɛsanga ka bɛzzɔkɔ annyɔɔng ɔttɛ nkopolo Ikanakana Kuttu-budoddo bɔtɔɔm ammɛ nkwaaning bappyee bayanga kiyila.
44015008	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔsannɛ ippyam a balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔyɔɔ ɔttɛ uyilabong kɛtɔk Ikanakana ka unnyinɛbɛ Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm tɛ̀ttɛ̀ unnyinɛyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt.
44015009	Bubuu-buu bulɔk usi lɛnaang ka bɛzzɔkɔ ayyɔɔt la abbɛ. Ɔsɔɔkbɛ bubbi abbɛ ka balenɛ kiyila lɛyanga.
44015010	Anaang nang tɛ́ttɛ́ aggyanyɔng kɛllɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka asamnɛyɔng latɔkɔ afeekyɔng balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ kiyila za balɔɔt ayyɔɔt ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ basinɛ likkwoong batɔkɔ, gɔɔ ayyɔɔt mung.
44015011	Maaye! Iyanganɛ kiyila, iddu ka lakke Uyini, Jesus Christ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ abbɛ.”
44015012	Kibbi ’sɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ basseke zzum ka bataanɛ ka bappyeenɛ Barnabas la Paul ka balenɛ ka kɛbwɔɔlɔ bɛmaanga la bɛfɛɛn a bikɛɛlɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ bya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkɔɔmnɛbɛ ɔnaang ɔyɔɔ Ikanakana.
44015013	Bavvenɛ lɛlɔɔk, James ufeele ɔttɛ, “Gɔpɔlɔnɛyɔng ikpana anaam!
44015014	Simon ussuma lɛbwɔɔlɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkɔɔmnɛ ɛtɔk ɔyɔɔ Ikanakana kibbe-lɛttɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ, ka ulenɛ balɔɔt lɛsanga ka bɛzzɔkɔ abbɛ, bazzanga balɔɔt ammɛ biini.
44015015	Lammwɔɔl a bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lale bbwak latum ’kwɔng mung tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ
44015016	‘Ebinukkpaapi ɛlɔɔk ɛttɛ, ‘Nkwɔng kɔsaalnɛ vvenɛ nppyɛlɛ. Vvenɛ nppyɛlɛ nfeele kikku a David sa kilenɛ lɛttɔ. Vvenɛ nppyɛlɛ bɛfɛɛn assɛ nloko, nppyɛlɛ nbɔɔk.
44015017	Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ baggyan Ebinukkpaapi, Ikanakana ɔkkpɛlɛ ya nlenɛ lɛkkwɔɔ nttɛ ya anaam biini.
44015018	Ebinukkpaapi ya ɛggbanɛ balɔɔt lɛnaang basan ’kwɔng ɛlɔɔknɛ.’
44015019	James ɔbbal lɛlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Ulenɛ ka luppyam anaam ifɔngɔ Ikanakana ba bale ka basikilinɛ bappyɛɛk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔlɔɔk lɛggyan.
44015020	Lutini ’gwɔng ikkpɔk luvva ibwɔɔlɔyɔngbɛ ittɛ, bafɔngɔ kazzi kwa balekwɛ lɛkɔɔm bazɔɔm ilat kizzi, tɛ̀ttɛ́ bassɛ kɛzak. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ bazzi ɛsɛɛn ya bazzengelenɛyɛ ɔlɔk bazzi linnyi.
44015021	Baggba Lafɔɔ-a-Moses lɛkkwɔɔ ka idda mitin a balɔɔt a Jews, Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ la ssɔn, bakopolo lɛmmwɔɔl ammɛ ka laffɛ ka laffɛ.”
44015022	Bayilabɔtɔɔm-a-Jesus la bagɛlɛnya, la balɔɔt-a-luzɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ bataa ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn batini battɛ basanga balɔɔt balɔk babɛtɛ Paul la Barnabas bamii Antioch. Ɔzzánga basanga Judas, wa bakkwɔɔmɛnɛ Barsabas, la Silas. Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang baffa balenɛ ba balɔɔt-a-Jesus batelenɛbɛ gaang gaang.
44015023	Batɔɔmbɛ lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng bamii: “Ayyɔɔt ikpana annyɔɔng, bayilabɔtɔɔm-a-Jesus la bagɛlɛnya, itɔɔmnɛ luwomo ifeewɔyɔng annyɔɔng ikpana ayyɔɔt ba alenɛyɔng Ikanakana ka Antioch la syria la Cilicia.
44015024	Ippyeebong ittɛ balɔɔt a kɛkaan ayyɔɔt balɔk bafeelebong baffu balɔɔk lilɔɔk sa litunwɔnɛyɔng. Ayyɔɔt kɔlɔɔk kɔlɔk bɛ ba itaka itɔɔm.
44015025	Keem idudabong itini; iyila kɛsanga balɔɔt itɔɔm ka annyɔɔng. Vvenɛ baffu la inngwa luppyam ayyɔɔt, Barnabas la Paul,
44015026	ba balenɛ liyila kɛtaka lɛfal abbɛ ka kɔlɔɔk Uyini ayyɔɔt Jesus Christ.
44015027	Itɔɔmbong Judas la Silas baffu. Vvenɛ bakɔɔm kamma abbɛ babwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung bya ikkpɔknɛ.
44015028	Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la ayyɔɔt iyilabong ittɛ bulɔk bwa bukoolonɛ baala innyiwɔyɔng ɔgbaa la lafɔɔ ’zɔng mung:
44015029	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ azziyɔng kazzi kwa balenɛ lɛkɔɔm bazɔɔm ɛlat; tɛ̀ttɛ́ azziyɔng linnyi; tɛ̀ttɛ́ azziyɔng ɛsɛɛn ya bazzengelenɛyɛ. Akɔɔmwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng assekeyɔng kɛssɛ-kɛzak. Vvenɛ aleyɔng balɔɔt ba doddo akkyaanɛyɔng bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ afɔngɔyɔng! Ataayɔng doddo.”
44015030	Bayilabɔtɔɔm bɔng baang bamii Antioch. Baffɔnɛ bakang, bakkwɔɔ kɛkaan a bayanga-kiyila, baloko ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn, bannyibɛ luvva ’gwɔng baang.
44015031	Bavvenɛ luvva lɛkkwɔɔ, baggele gaang gaang ka bɔtɔɔm bwa batɔɔmnɛ bafeebɛ bunnyinɛbɛ kɛkkaam a luppyam.
44015032	Judas la Silas, ba balenɛ bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, batolo kutolo la bayanga-kiyila ɛkɛtɛ ɛlɔm. Bannyibɛ lakke, babbabɛ bikɔɔm.
44015033	Balenɛ bakang lɛtaa ɔmmɛ, bayanga-kiyila batɔɔmbɛ ka bɔkaat bappyɛlɛ isimisimi bamii ka ɛfɛɛn a balɔɔt ba batɔɔmnɛbɛ. [
44015034	Ɔzzánga Silas ɔnaang lɔnngwa kɛtaa bakang.]
44015035	Paul la Barnabas bataa ka Antioch ɛkɛtɛ ɛmmɛ. Batoolo la balɔɔt balɔk ggbadam bakopolobɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Uyini.
44015036	Paul ɔlɔɔk la Barnabas ɔttɛ, “Feele ippyɛlɛ isimisimi imii ikoolo ikpana ayyɔɔt ka laffɛ za ilenɛbɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Uyini likopolo ɔlɔk isan tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balenɛ.”
44015037	Barnabas ɔdɔkɔ ɔggyan ɔttɛ nzang ɔsam John Mark bakɔɔm bassɛ.
44015038	Ɔzzánga Paul ufim kɛsammɛ bakɔɔm bamii ka ɔdɔkɔnɛ ɔgbata ɔkɔngɔbɛ ka Pamphylia, usi lɛtaa ɔffɔ ka lakpeke kɛnaang a luzɔɔm abbɛ.
44015039	Ɔzzánga bɛkangala bɛttɔbɛ abbɛ-abbɛ bafakala kɔssɛ. Barnabas ɔsam Mark umii Cyprus.
44015040	Ɔzzánga Paul ɔsanga Silas ɔgbata umii. Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ abbɛ bazɔɔm battɛ bassɛ doddo ka lakke Uyini.
44015041	Paul ɔssɛ ka Syria la Cilicia, ɔnaang izɔɔm ikkaam.
44016001	Paul umii Derbe la Lystra. Ɔyanga-kiyila wa ɔzzanganɛ Timothy ɔdɔkɔ ullu bakang. Abakka ammɛ ɔssɛ ɔyanga kiyila, ɔdɔkɔ wa Jews; abassɛ ammɛ wa Greek.
44016002	Ikpana ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ya issinɛ Lystra la Iconium balɔɔk budoddo batum Timothy.
44016003	Paul ɔnngwa kɛsam a Timothy ɔkɔɔm umii ɛfɛɛn duu ya ule ka umiinɛ, ɔzzánga ɔzzamɛ lɛtaa. Ɔzza Timothy lɛtaa ɔmma ka balɔɔt a Jews ba ballunɛ ka ɛfɛɛn ’kwɔng baang basannɛ battɛ abassɛ Timothy ussi Greek.
44016004	Lɛffɛ la zzɔn za bamiinɛ, babwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ kiyila lafɔɔ za bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus la bagɛlɛnya ka Jerusalem balenɛ lɛssɛɛn babwɔɔlɔbɛ battɛ batelezɛ.
44016005	Ɔzzánga banaang izɔɔm iggele la kiyila, balɔɔt baffu bagbaa kɛtɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ.
44016006	Bassɛ ka ɛkpansi a Phrygia la ɛkpansi a Galatia. Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kusibɛ lɛfɔngɔ babwɔɔlɔ Lɛmmwɔɔl-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ɛkpansi Asia.
44016007	Baffɔnɛ ka kimeen a Mysia, babum battɛ nzang bamii ka ɛkpansi a Bithynia, keem Kuyeeng-a-Jesus kufim.
44016008	Ɔzzánga bassɛ baang ssɔng basak ka ɛkpansi a Mysia bamii ka ɛkpansi a Troas.
44016009	Paul ɔyɛn biyɛnɛ kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang. Ɔyɛn ɔlɔɔt a Macedonia ka ubeenɛ ukkpengemɛ ɔttɛ, “Affu ka Macedonia atteleyɛlɛ!”
44016010	Paul ɔyɛnnɛ biyɛnɛ pyɔng mung uvve, eseese babama kimii Macedonia, ka ilenɛ liffik ittɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkwɔɔbongyɛlɛ ɔttɛ imii ikopolo balɔɔt ’bɔng baang Kuttu-budoddo ammɛ.
44016011	Ifeele imal ka akkpaat ka ussinɛ Troas imii ssɔng isak lɛffɛ za lɛzzanganɛ Samothrace. Libbessolo imii iddum Neapolis.
44016012	Issi baang imii Philippi, ogyila ’wɔng baang ɔdɔkɔnɛ ɔkɔɔm-a-ɛtɔk a ogyila ka ɛkpansi a Macedonia. Balɔɔt a Rome badɔkɔ ballu ka ɛkpansi ’yɔng baang ɔgbaa. Itaa baang bɛtɔm ggbadam.
44016013	Ɔffɔnɛ Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ, ifeele imii ka lufoom a lɔyɔngɔ, ka ɛkpansi ’yɔng baang, ka ɛfɛɛn a ittinanɛ ittɛ ɛfɛɛn ele baang ya balɔɔt a Jews bataanɛ bazɔɔm luzɔɔm. Itaa baang ilɔɔk la bwanavva ba babbinɛ baang.
44016014	Wanavva wa uppyeenɛ kwa ilɔɔknɛ ɔdɔkɔ ɔzzanga Lydia, wa ussinɛ Thyatira wa ɔdɔkɔnɛ ɔssɛ-kappya ibba ya doddo. Ɔdɔkɔ wanavva wa utelenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Uyini uwongolomɛ luppyam ɔgɔpɔlɔ kwa Paul ɔlɔɔknɛ.
44016015	Lydia la balɔɔt a ssala ammɛ banaang baptizim, ɔzzánga ɔbwɔɔlɔyɛlɛ ɔttɛ, “Affu itaayɔng ka ssala anaam, alenɛyɔng liffik attɛyɔng anaam ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyanganɛ kiyila ka Uyini.” Ɔzzánga imii.
44016016	Kɛtɔm ssɔn ka ilenɛ ka kimii ka ɛfɛɛn a luzɔɔm, iduda waanawanavva wa ulenɛ ubili; ɔyanga ipiliza ya inaangmɛnɛ ɔbɔɔk lɔbɔɔk. Ɔnaang ikkpoko gaang gaang unnyi balɔɔt ba bayangamɛnɛ.
44016017	Ufeele ukupyɛlɛ la kibungu la kibungu ɔttɛ, “Balɔɔt ’bɔng mung, babili Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm! Babwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ale adduyɔng!”
44016018	Ɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng mung ka bɛtɔm ggbadam ɔddɔkɔddɔkɔ luppyam lɔkkwɛɛt Paul usikili ɔlɔɔk la ipiliza ɔttɛ, “Nbwɔɔlɔwɔ ka lakke a Jesus Christ nttɛ atta asseke wanavva ’wɔng mung.” Eseese ipiliza itta issekemɛ.
44016019	Bayini a waanawanavva ’wɔng baang basannɛ battɛ kufuk a kɛnaang a ikkpoko abbɛ kɔsaalbong, bakaa Paul la Silas battulu bamii ka ɛfɛɛn a bazzilɛttɔ ogyila.
44016020	Bakɔɔmbɛ bamii ka ɛfɛɛn a ikkala balɔɔt a Rome, babwɔɔlɔbɛ battɛ, “Balɔɔt ’bɔng mung ba Jews. bale mung ka baggyannɛ kɔlɔɔk ka ɛkpansi ayyɔɔt.
44016021	Bale baang ka bakopolonɛ balɔɔt lilɔɔk sa lafɔɔ ayyɔɔt lasinɛ lɛggyan. Ayyɔɔt balɔɔt a Rome baala ikup lilɔɔk sa bakopolonɛ baang.”
44016022	Kibbi ’sɔng baang batoolo batul Paul la Silas. Ikkala balɔɔt a Rome bayaak Paul la Silas iwɔkɔlɔ, battɛ batupbɛ.
44016023	Balenɛbɛ lɔkkpat gwa lɛbaang litup, basambɛ bassɛɛn ka ikkbakkɔpɔ. Badda ɔlɔɔt wa ɔssɛɛnnɛ igbakkɔpɔ battɛ ɔkamabɛ kkpɔk.
44016024	Ɔssɛɛn-igbakkɔpɔ uppyeenɛ ning baang, ɔsambɛ umii ɔssɛɛn ka lɛnɔk za tɔkɔlɔ. Ɔsambɛ bukkpɔ ɔssɛɛn ka laffɛ bumele laffa, ɔkama ikpɔkɔlɔ ɔkaka.
44016025	Ɔffɔnɛ ka kɛtɔm kile ka kɛppwanɛ, Paul la Silas bazɔɔm, basoom kisoom, bannyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Balɔɔt igbakkɔpɔ balɔk ba badɔkɔnɛ baang basseke zzum ka bataanɛ bagɔpɔlɔbɛ.
44016026	Eseese bappyee ɛkpansi ka ɛnnyɛkɛnɛ. Ggwoon igbakkɔpɔ lɔnnyɛkɛ lɔffɔ ka lutte. Lamma ggwoon igbakkɔpɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ lawongolo. Ikpɔkɔlɔ ikkyaa balɔɔt ba balenɛ baang ɔkkpɛlɛ ittɔ.
44016027	Ɔssɛɛn-igbakkɔpɔ ufungalanɛ, ɔyɛn lamma ggwoon igbakkɔpɔ ka lalenɛ liwongolo, ammɛ ɔttɛ balɔɔt igbakkɔpɔ ’bɔng baang bammabong basaal. Ɔzzánga uttulu ogge ɔsanga ɔttɛ nzang ɔwwɔɔlmɛ kɛyɔɔng.
44016028	Ɔzzánga Paul ubungu ɔgaga ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ addopowɔ kɛyɔɔng! ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt ile mung!”
44016029	Ɔssɛɛn-igbakkɔpɔ ɔggyan lɔkɔɔn, uzzuma umii ka tɔkɔlɔ a ggwoon. Ɔffɔnɛ bakang, ɔttɔ Paul la Silas ka lataak.
44016030	Ɔsangabɛ ɔtta ka vveeng ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Badedde, nle nnaang nang nddu?”
44016031	Balɔɔk la ammɛ battɛ, “Ayila kwa Uyini, Jesus, vvenɛ adduyɔng la itutum annɔ.
44016032	Ɔzzánga bakopolomɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba badɔkɔnɛ ka ssala ammɛ.
44016033	Ka kasɛkɛ kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang, ɔssɛɛn-igbakkɔpɔ ɔsambɛ umii ɔzzaabɛ biddopo. Ammɛ la balɔɔt ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ banaang baptizim eseese.
44016034	Ɔlɛkɛ Paul la Silas umii ka ssala ammɛ; unnyibɛ kazzi, bazzi. Ammɛ la itutum ammɛ baggele gaang gaang ka balenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm liyila.
44016035	Ɔffɔnɛ lɔfɔm a lɔfɔm a libbessolo, bazzilɛttɔ a Rome batɔɔm ippoloosi battɛ, “Afɔngɔyɔng balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bafula.”
44016036	Ɔzzánga ɔssɛɛn-igbakkɔpɔ ɔbwɔɔlɔ Paul ɔttɛ, “Bazzilɛttɔ a Rome batɔɔmbong bɔtɔɔm battɛ isangawɔyɔng annyɔɔng la Silas ka igbakkɔpɔ. Agbata amiiyɔng ka bɔkaat.”
44016037	Ɔzzanga Paul ɔlɔɔk la ippoloosi ɔttɛ, “Kɔlɔɔk kɔlɔk ba itaka izzɔɔk kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ, ɔzzànga batupyɛlɛ ka lusso balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔzzànga ayyɔɔt bwaan a ɛkpansi a Rome! Basamyɛlɛ bassɛɛn igbakkɔpɔ. Ning ba kule ffet a ffet. Bazzilɛttɔ a Rome biini baffu mung basangayɛlɛ ka igbakkɔpɔ.”
44016038	Ippoloosi bamii babwɔɔlɔ bazzilɛttɔ a Rome ning baang. Bappyeenɛ battɛ Paul la Silas bwaan a Rome, ɔbbwɔpɔbɛ.
44016039	Ɔzzánga bamii bakkpengebɛ. Basangabɛ batta ka ggwoon igbakkɔpɔ. Babwɔɔlɔbɛ battɛ bagbata ka ɛkpansi ’yɔng baang.
44016040	Paul la silas bagbata ka ggwoon igbakkɔpɔ bamii ka ssala Lydia. Baffɔnɛ bakang, baduda la balɔɔt ba bayilanɛ kwa Jesus. Babbabɛ bikɔɔm a kɛkkaam a luppyam bagbata.
44017001	Bassɛ tɔttɔt basak Amphipolis la Apolonia baffu baffɔ Thessalonica ka ɛfɛɛn a ɔdda mitin a balɔɔt a Jews ulenɛ.
44017002	Paul ka ulenɛ eleme lɛfal ammɛ, umii ka ɔdda mitin ɔtaa baang ka Bɛtɔm-a-kɛfɛkɛlɛ bɛkkyaat, ɔkangala ikangala la balɔɔt utum Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
44017003	Ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ kɔlɔɔk a Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyaak. Ɔyɔɔbɛ ɔttɛ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ ɔyɛn akama, ufungala ka lubbe. Ɔttɛ, “Jesus ’wɔng mung wa nbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng kɔlɔɔk ammɛ ulenɛ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ.”
44017004	Balɔɔt balɔk bayila, bamal ka kɔssɛ a Paul la Silas. Kɛkaan a balɔɔt a Greek ba azɔɔmnɛ bannyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, la bagga bwanavva bassɛ bamal kɔssɛ a Paul la Silas.
44017005	Ɔzzánga luleep lɔnaang balɔɔt a Jews. Bakkwɔɔ ikkpollo balɔɔt ba balenɛ ka killu ’sɔng baang bassɛɛn ka kɛkaan abbɛ. Bazzɔɔk lɔnyaata ka lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang, babungu bamma bakkpit ssala Jason, babum kɛkaa Paul la Silas kɛkɔɔm kifee balɔɔt ’bɔng baang.
44017006	Basinɛ Paul la Silas lɛyɛn, battulu Jason la ikpana ammɛ ilɔk, bamii bafee balɔɔt a lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang. Babungu battɛ, “Balɔɔt ’bɔng mung bazzɔɔkbong lilɔɔk ɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ! Mung baffubong ka lɛffɛ ayyɔɔt.
44017007	Jason ɔtɔkbɛ ɔssɛɛn ka ssala. Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ babɛpɛbong lafɔɔ za uzzilɛttɔ a Rome unnyinɛyɛlɛ ka battɛnɛ ubeet ɔlɔk ule bakang wa ɔzzanganɛ Jesus.”
44017008	Lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng baang lɛnaang kibbi ’sɔng baang la bazzilɛttɔ ɛkpansi kutunbɛ gaang gaang.
44017009	Bazzilɛttɔ lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang bazza Jason la babbɛ bɔfɛɛn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ batininɛ bakkyaabɛ bafɔngɔ bamii.
44017010	Usulnɛ, ikpana ayyɔɔt ’yɔng baang batɔɔm Paul la Silas bamii Berea. Baffɔnɛ Berea, bamii ka ɔdda mitin.
44017011	Balɔɔt ba ballunɛ ka Berea bayyɛɛp eleme basak balɔɔt a Thessalonica. Bagɔpɔlɔ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm baang kɔbɛtɛbɛ. Bakkoop Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛtɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ battɛ bayɛn, ulenɛ ka kɔlɔɔk kwa Paul ɔlɔɔknɛ kulenɛ ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
44017012	Balɔɔt abbɛ ggbadam bayanga kiyila. Bwaan-a-zzeen a bwanavva a Greek la bwaanbwalam bayanga kiyila.
44017013	Balɔɔt a Jews ba ballunɛ ka Thessalonica bappyeenɛ battɛ Paul ukopolobong Kuttu-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka Berea ɔgbaa, bafeele bamii bazzɔɔk lɔnyaata.
44017014	Eseese ikpana ayyɔɔt ’yɔng baang batɔɔm Paul umii ka lufoom a lihu. Silas la Timothy bataa ka Berea.
44017015	Balɔɔt ba bakɔɔmnɛ Paul bamii baffɔ Athens bappyɛlɛ isimisimi bafula Berea, la lɔkamala gwa Paul ɔkamalanɛbɛ ɔttɛ babwɔɔlɔ Silas la Timothy bamii bakupmɛ ɔfɔngɔbɛ kɛmmɛ.
44017016	Ka ɛkɛtɛ ya Paul ɔtaanɛ ka Athens ɔkat Silas la Timothy, kutunmɛ gaang gaang ka ɔyɛnnɛ ilat ggbadam ka lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang.
44017017	Ɔzzánga ɔzzɔɔk bɛkangala ka tɔkɔlɔ ɔdda mitin la balɔɔt a Jews la Ikanakana ba bazɔɔmnɛ bannyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Umii ka ogyila bɛtɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔkangala la balɔɔt ba baffunɛ bagɔpɔlɔmɛ.
44017018	Balɔɔt ba bakopolonɛ ka isukuul a Epicurus la balɔɔt ba bakkwɔɔnɛbɛ Stoic battɔ ikangala la Paul. Balɔɔt balɔk battɛ, “Mung uzingizingi ’wɔng mung ubum ɔttɛ ɔlɔɔk ’bɔng?” Balɔɔt balɔk battɛ, “Ɔbal tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔknɛ kɔlɔɔk utum ilat ikaan ilɔk.” Balɔɔk ka Paul ulenɛ likopolo utum Jesus la kifungala ka lubbe.
44017019	Ɔzzánga balɔɔt balɔk bakɔɔm Paul bamii mitin ka Areopagus battɛ, “Iggyan ittɛ isan ufaa lukopolo ’wɔng wa alɔɔknɛ utum.
44017020	Bɛfɛɛn bɛlɔk bya ippyeenɛ bɛtaayɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ufaa kutolo. Iggyan ittɛ isan bwa alɔɔknɛ atum.” (
44017021	Balɔɔt Athens la bakekeen ɛfɛɛn ’yɔng baang basaap kɛtaa gbɔɔ kɛbala ibala la kippyee bafaa lilɔɔk.)
44017022	Paul ufeele ubee ka lusso kibbi balɔɔt a mitin a Areopogus, ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Balɔɔt Athens, nyɛnbong annyɔɔng balɔɔt a luzɔɔm ba lɔkkwɔɔn ka itɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ.
44017023	Ka nssɛnɛ nsak ka lɛffɛ annyɔɔng mung nyɛn ɛfɛɛn azɔɔmnɛyɔng luzɔɔm, nyɛn labun a luzɔɔm za akkpɔknɛyɔng, ‘Za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa isimɛnɛ lɛsan’. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ’wɔng baang wa azɔɔmnɛ annyimɛyɔng mung asimɛyɔng lɛsan ulenɛ wa nbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng kwa anaam nsannɛ ntummɛ.
44017024	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔnaangnɛ vveeng ’wɔng la bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya bilenɛ ka vveeng, ulenɛ uyini libat la ɛkpansi. Ka ssoon sa balɔɔt babɔɔknɛ ba ullu.
44017025	Gɔɔ bwa ammɛ ɔggyannɛ ka balɔɔt ba bule, ka ulemɛnɛ ammɛ unnyinɛ balɔɔt kuddu la lɛfɛkɛlɛ la bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ.
44017026	Ussi ka ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔlɔɔm balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔttɛ ballu bakkpit ɛkpansi. Ammɛ biini ɔkɔɔm ɛtɔk uloko ɛkɛtɛ bbwak la lakpeke ifɛɛn ya bale ballu.
44017027	Ɔnaang ’kwɔng mung nkwaaning baggyanmɛ, ɔlɔk mung bayɛnmɛ ka bale balɛlɛ bakkpit. Ɔzzànga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm fulu-fulu ba ule ussekeyɛlɛ;
44017028	tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ulenɛ lɛlɔɔk ɔttɛ, ‘Illu ka ammɛ, issɛ ka ammɛ, iddu ka ammɛ.’ Kule ning baang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bassa-ifɛɛt annyɔɔng balɔɔknɛ battɛ, ‘Ayyɔɔt ɔgbaa issɛ ile bwaan ammɛ.’
44017029	Ka ilenɛ bwaan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, tɛ̀ttɛ́ ittina ittɛ lɛfal Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lile tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɛlɔɔp ya banaangnɛyɛ la gold ɔlɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɛttaal za ɔlɔɔt ukoopnɛ ka bimmengka.
44017030	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔppyɛɛkbong lilɔɔk sa balɔɔt banaangnɛ ka isimi ka isimi ka batakanɛ lɛsan, ɔnaang ndaa. Ɔzzànga gedegede mung ɔbwɔɔlɔbong balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ la ifɛɛn la ifɛɛn ɔttɛ bakkyaa kɛnaang a bubbi bafɔngɔ.
44017031	Ɔssɛɛnbong kɛtɔm sa ule ɔkɔɔm Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsanganɛ ɔkaal kɛkaal a vveengodde bbwak bbwak. Ɔyɔɔbong ’kwɔng balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ bayɛn ka ufungalanɛ ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ka lubbe.”
44017032	Bappyeenɛ ka Paul ɔlɔɔknɛ utum kifungala ka lubbe, balɔɔt balɔk bakpɛnmɛ. Balɔk battɛ, “Iggyan ittɛ ibbal lippyee ka alɔɔknɛ atum ’kwɔng baang.”
44017033	Ɔzzánga Paul ɔgbata ka mitin.
44017034	Balɔɔt ba bayilanɛ kwa ammɛ badɔkɔ Dionysius wa ulenɛ ka mitin Areopagus la wanavva wa ɔzzanganɛ Damaris, la balɔɔt balɔk.
44018001	Nkwɔng kɔsaalnɛ, Paul ɔgbata ka Athens umii Corinth.
44018002	Baang ulenɛ ka ɛfɛɛn ududanɛ ɔlɔɔt a Jews wa ɔzzanganɛ Aquila, wa bamaatmɛnɛ ka Pontus. Ussuma Italy lissi uffu la wanavva ammɛ Priscila. Uffu Corinth ka Claudius, Uzzilɛttɔ a Rome, ɔttɛnɛ balɔɔt a Jews ɔkkpɛlɛ bagbata basseke Rome. Paul ufeele umii ɔyɛnbɛ.
44018003	Ɔtaa baang ɔnaang kɛnaang la abbɛ. Paul ɔdɔkɔ ɔkɔɔm kɛtta idda-ɛkkpalukpata uddu tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Aquila la Priscilla banaangnɛ.
44018004	Paul ɔtaa baang ka ggwoon a luzɔɔm ka Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ duu. Ɔkangala ikangala, ɔggyan ɔttɛ ɔnaang balɔɔt a Jews la ba Greek bayila kwa ammɛ.
44018005	Silas la Timothy bappyɛlɛnɛ Macedonia, Paul ɔkɔɔm ɛkɛtɛ ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ukopolo balɔɔt lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛ ɔnaang balɔɔt a Jews basan battɛ Jesus ulenɛ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ.
44018006	Bafimnɛnɛ kwɛ, balɔɔk lilɔɔk sa bbɔlbbɔl batummɛ, ɔkkwɔlɔ ibut ya ilemɛnɛ ka uwɔkɔlɔ ɔllɔt; ɔttɛ, “Ataaknɛyɔng, kizzi-kibbi kile sa annyɔɔng biini! kɔbɔɔk anaam baang ba kule. Ka ussinɛ mmwɔɔn nppyɛɛ nmii ka ɛfɛɛn Ikanakana.”
44018007	Ɔzzánga ɔgbata ɔkɔngɔbɛ, umii ɔtaa ka ssala wa lɔkaan lɔlɔk wa ɔzzanganɛ Titius Justus, wa ɔzɔɔmnɛ luzɔɔm unnyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ssala ammɛ likkɛtɛ ggwoon a luzɔɔm a balɔɔt a Jews.
44018008	Crispus, uzzilɛttɔ luzɔɔm ɔyanga kiyila utum Uyini. Ammɛ la itutum ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ la balɔɔt balɔk ba ballunɛ ka Corinth bappyee lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng baang bayila, banaang baptizim.
44018009	Kɛtɔm ssɔn, Paul ɔyɛn biyɛnɛ, ka Uyini ɔlɔɔknɛ la ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔbwɔpɔwɔ, ɔkkaamwɔ alɔɔk, tɛ̀ttɛ́ akkyaa kikopolo afɔngɔ.
44018010	Nlewɔ baang ka isimi, ɔlɔɔt wa ule ukkwoong ɔnaangwɔ kɔlɔk ba ule. Balɔɔt bale ggbadam ka lɛffɛ ’zɔng mung ba balenɛ ba anaam.”
44018011	Ɔzzánga Paul ɔtaa ka ɛfɛɛn ’kwɔng baang ka kukkpa la kufaak, ukopolo lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
44018012	Banaangnɛ Gallio uzzilɛttɔ a Rome ka Greece, balɔɔt a Jews baggba ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn bakaa Paul, basammɛ bamii ka ɔdda kɛkaal battɛ,
44018013	“Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung ule ka ubumnɛ kɛdɛm a balɔɔt basseke ka bazɔɔmnɛ bannyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ɛtɔk ya lafɔɔ ayyɔɔt lisinɛ lɛggyan tɛ!”
44018014	Paul ɔdɔkɔ ɔttɛ ɔzza lɛmmwɔɔl ka ɛkɛtɛ a Gallio ɔlɔɔknɛ la balɔɔt a Jews ɔttɛ, “Bulenɛ ka kulenɛ kɔlɔɔk kwa ɔlɔɔt ɔnaangnɛ kɔbbɔl, nzang kule bbwak a nyilanɛ kwa annyɔɔng.
44018015	Ngkka ka ulenɛ ikangala lammwɔɔl la lakɔɔl, la lafɔɔ annyɔɔng biini, ’kwɔng baang annyɔɔng akaalyɔng kwɛ. Anaam baala nzzanga ɔkalakala lilɔɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ assɛ baang.”
44018016	Ɔggbabɛ batta ka ɔdda kɛkaal.
44018017	Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ baggba bakaa Sosthehes, uzzilɛttɔ ɔdda mitin a balɔɔt a Jews, batupmɛ ka lusso ɔdda kɛkaal. Ɔzzànga ’kwɔng baang Gallio ttikip kusimɛ lɛnaang.
44018018	Paul ɔkɔɔng ka Corinth ɔtaa la bayanga-kiyila ka bɛtɔm ggbadam. Ɔgbata ɔkɔngɔbɛ baang ɔmal ka akkpaat la Priscilla la Aquila bamii Syria. Bong tɛ́ttɛ́ bawaat bagbata ka Cenchreae, Paul ɔtɔk kittulu ɔkkpaat ukup tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ulenɛ liyim.
44018019	Baffɔ Ephesus, ka ɛfɛɛn a Paul ɔgbatanɛ ɔkɔngɔ Priscilla la Aquila, umii ka ɔdda mitin a balɔɔt a Jews. Umii ɔkangala ikangala la abbɛ.
44018020	Balɔɔt a Jews balɔɔkmɛ battɛ ɔtaa baang la abbɛ ɔmmɛ. Paul ufim.
44018021	Ɔgbatanɛ ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ, “Ulenɛ ka kɔsaapnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, vvenɛ nppyɛlɛ nffu ntaa la annyɔɔng.” Ɔgbata ka Ephesus.
44018022	Ɔffɔnɛ ka Caesaraea, umii Jerusalem uwomo balɔɔt a luzɔɔm. Ɔsak umii Antioch.
44018023	Ɔtaanɛ baang ssup, ɔgbata umii ka ɛkpansi a Galatia la Phrygia, ɔssɛɛn balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ kiyila kɛkkaam a luppyam.
44018024	Ɔlɔɔt a Jews vvɔn, wa ɔzzanganɛ Apollos, wa bamaatmɛnɛ ka Alexandrea, uffu ka Ephesus. Ɔdɔkɔ ukkwoong a kɛlɔɔk, ɔsan kɔlɔɔk a Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔgbaa.
44018025	Bakopolomɛbong kɔlɔɔk a Ɛtɔk Uyini kkpal. Ammɛ ɔssɛ ɔbwɔɔlɔ kɔlɔɔk a Jesus bbwak la laggele. Ɔzzànga ɔdɔkɔ ɔsan kɛnaang a baptizim a John kɛyɔɔng.
44018026	Ubee kɛlɔɔk la kɛkkaam a luppyam ka ɔdda mitin. Priscilla la Aquila bappyeemɛnɛ ka utolonɛ ning baang, basammɛ bamii ka ssala abbɛ babwɔɔlɔmɛ doddo batum Ɛtɔk-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
44018027	Appollos ɔnaang luttina kimii a Greece. Ɔzzánga balɔɔt a Ephesus ba bayanganɛ kiyila bayaammɛ ka kɛkkpɔk a luvva kɛbwɔɔlɔ bayanga-kiyila ba Greece battɛ batɔkmɛ ka laggele. Ɔffɔnɛ bakang, uttele balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ kiyila ka latele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
44018028	Ɔkɔɔm kikkwoong bɛkangala ɔbɛtɛ balɔɔt a Jews ka bakangalanɛ ka kibbi. Ɔkɔɔm Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔyɔɔbɛ ɔttɛ Jesus ulenɛ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ.
44019001	Ka ɛkɛtɛ ya Apollos ɔdɔkɔnɛ ka Corinth, Paul ɔssɛ tɔkɔlɔ-tɔkɔlɔ lɔkaan ’gwɔng baang umii Ephesus. Ɔyɛn balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ balɔk ka Ephesus.
44019002	Ɔzzánga ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Adɔkɔ atɔkyɔng Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ɛkɛtɛ ayanganɛyɔng kiyila ɔɔ?” Battɛ, “Ba itaka ippyee ffet a ffet ittɛ Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kule baang.”
44019003	Paul ɔbapbɛ ɔttɛ, “Ngkka mung badɔkɔ banaangwɔyɔng bɔkka kɛssanga baptizim?” Abbɛ battɛ, “Baptizim wa John.”
44019004	Paul ɔttɛ, “Baptizim wa John ɔdɔkɔ wa balɔɔt ba bafoolonɛ lafal abbɛ. Ɔgbaa ɔbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt a Israel ɔttɛ bayila kwa ɔlɔɔt wa ule ka uffunɛ ukupmɛ, wa ɔzzanganɛ Jesus.”
44019005	Bappyeenɛ ning baang, banaang baptizim ka lɛkɔɔl Uyini, Jesus.
44019006	Paul utelebɛ labɔɔk, Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kusini kuffu kuttelebɛ, basseke ka balɔɔknɛ likaan buubuu. Bakopolo bɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bagbaa.
44019007	Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ badɔkɔ balɔɔt zzɔɔppabaffa.
44019008	Paul ufeele umii ka ɔdda mitin a balɔɔt a Jews. Ɔtaa baang ɔkangala ikangala la balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ka ittuma ikkyaat. Ubum ɔttɛ bayila kwa Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
44019009	Balɔɔt balɔk bassi-latɔɔk, bafim kiyila. Balɔɔk lilɔɔk sa libbɔlnɛ batum Ɛtɔk-Uyini ’yɔng baang ka lusso balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ. Paul ɔgbata ɔkɔngɔbɛ ɔsam balɔɔt a kɔssɛ Jesus ɔkɔɔm ɔssɛ. Lutini livve la zzɔn, Paul ɔyanga kutolo la abbɛ ka ɔdda lukopolo a Tyrannus.
44019010	Paul ɔnaang ’kwɔng ka likkpa liffa. Ɔzzánga balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba ballunɛ ka ɛkpansi Asia ɔbɛtɛ la balɔɔt a Jews la Ikanakana bappyee lɛmmwɔɔl Uyini.
44019011	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyi Paul lakke kɛnaang a bɛmaanga bya ɔtakanɛ lɛnaang kɛtɔm kɛlɔk.
44019012	Gɔɔ bappyɛɛ basam wanubba kɛkkpɔlɔ layungu la iwɔkɔlɔ ammɛ bafee balɔɔt ba usinɛbɛ lɛppwa, basingi ɔppwabɛ. Balɔɔt a ipiliza ɔppwabɛ ɔgbaa.
44019013	Balɔɔt balɔk ba bassɛnɛ ka laffɛ ka laffɛ baggba ipiliza basseke balɔɔt, babum kɛkɔɔm a lɛkɔɔl a Uyini Jesus kɛssɛ kɛnaang ning baang. Balɔɔk ipiliza ’yɔng baang battɛ, “Mggbawɔyɔng ka lɛkɔɔl a Jesus wa Paul ukopolonɛ utum.”
44019014	Ɔdɔkɔ bwaan a bwalam bannambakkyaat ba uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm wa lɛbaang wa balɔɔt a Jews wa ɔ̀zzànganɛ Sceva ɔfɔɔnnɛ ka banaangnɛ linaang ’sɔng.
44019015	Ɔzzánga ippiliza ’yɔng baang ilɔɔk la abbɛ ittɛ, “Isan mung Jesus, isan Paul ngkka annyɔɔng alenɛyɔng babang?”
44019016	Ɔlɔɔt wa ipiliza ilemɛnɛ ka kkwɔɔt ullubɛ kullu ɔbɛtɛbɛ. Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ bamma la biddopo ka kkwɔɔt basseke ssala ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang. Iwɔkɔlɔ abbɛ iyaak ɔkkpɛlɛ.
44019017	Balɔɔt a Jews ɔkkpɛlɛ la Ikanakana ba ballunɛ ka Ephesus bappyeenɛ ning baang, ɔbbwɔpɔbɛ gaang gaang bannyi lɛkɔɔl Uyini, Jesus, latele gaang gaang bagbaa.
44019018	Balɔɔt ggbadam ba bayanganɛ kiyila baffu ppwool ppwool babwɔɔlɔ kwa balenɛ lɛnaang.
44019019	Balɔɔt ggbadam ba balenɛ kɛnaang a bɛmaanga likkoop basam livva abbɛ baffu babbi ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn bassɛɛnsɛ lɔkɔɔn, likkɔm ka lusso balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ. Kappya livva ’sɔng baang kaffɔ innɔ okkpoko 50,000.
44019020	Lakke ’zɔng mung lanaang lɛmmwɔɔl Uyini lɛwaala la bɔkkaam.
44019021	Lilɔɔk ’sɔng lilenɛ lɛnaang, Paul ɔnaang luttina gwa kɛssɛ ka Macedonia la Greece ɔsak umii Jerusalem. Ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Vvenɛ nmii nyɛn Rome ɔgbaa.”
44019022	Ɔzzanga ɔtɔɔm Timothy la Erastus ba battelemɛnɛ ɔttɛ bamii Macedonia, ammɛ utii ka ɔtaanɛ mmɛmmɛ ka ɛkpansi a Asia.
44019023	Ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang bbwak ɛdɔkɔnɛ ya kɔlɔɔk kɔttɔnɛ ka Ephesus ka kɔlɔɔk a Ɛtɔk Uyini.
44019024	Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ɔdɔkɔ baang wa ɔzzanganɛ Demetrius wa ɔkɔɔmnɛ silver ɔsaak ilɔɔp. Ɔsaak ilɔɔp a ggwoon a luzɔɔm a umaat-ebinukkpaapi ya ɛzzanganɛ Artemis. Kɛnaang ammɛ kinnyi balɔɔt a kɛnaang ammɛ isak gaang gaang.
44019025	Ɔzzánga ɔkkwɔɔbɛ uloko ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn la balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ kɛnaang kɛssanga ssɔn la ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Bwaanbwalam, asanyɔng lɔsan attɛyɔng kibeet ayyɔɔt kissiyɛlɛ ka kɛnaang ’sɔng mung.
44019026	Akkwoong mung ayɛnyɔng, appyeeyɔng ka latɔɔk kɛyɔɔng kwa Paul ɔnaangnɛ. Ɔttɛ ibinukkpaapi ya ɔlɔɔt ɔnaangnɛ, Ebinukkpaapi lissi. Mung ɔtɔkbong lɛttɔ ka kɛnaang a balɔɔt ggbadam ba ballunɛ ka Ephesus la kufoom ɛkpansi Asia bayila kwa ammɛ.
44019027	Kɛzza luppyam kile kɛttɛ kɛnaang ayyɔɔt ’sɔng mung vvenɛ kɛyanga ubbu lɛkɔɔl. Nkwɔng baang kɛyɔɔng lissi, kɛzza luppyam kɛlɔk kile kɛttɛ, ggwoon a umaat Artemis lusseke bɔfɛɛn bwa gbɔɔ. Kuttu annyɛ vvenɛ kɔtaak. Luzɔɔm annyɛ gwa balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ bazɔɔmnɛ ka ɛkpansi Asia la vveengodde ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ lɔtaak!”
44019028	Kibbi ’sɔng baang bappyeenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng baang, kutunbɛ gaang gaang bazzɔɔk kibungu battɛ, “Buggboggbo bule bwa Artemis wa Ephesus.”
44019029	Kibungu ’sɔng baang kɛwaala ka ɛkpansi ’yɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ. Kɛkaan a balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bakaa Gaius la Aristarchus, balɔɔt a Macedonia baffa ba bassɛnɛ la Paul, bamii baloko ka ogyila.
44019030	Paul biini ɔdɔkɔ ɔttɛ ukup kibbi ’sɔng baang, keem balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ kiyila batunumɛ.
44019031	Baggboggbo balɔɔt ɛkpansi ’yɔng baang ba badɔkɔnɛ inngwa ammɛ batɔɔm bakpenge Paul battɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔtta kikkpɔ umii.
44019032	Ɔttɛ ɔnaang, kɛzɔk kɛttɔ ka mitin. Balɔɔt balɔk babungu bagaga kwa kɔlɔk: balɔk balɔɔk kɔlɔk, gɔɔ balɔɔt ggbadam ba basan bwa bamiinɛ baduda baang.
44019033	Balɔɔt balɔk batele lɛttɔ battɛ Alexander ɔsan tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔnaangnɛ bɔfɛɛn bwa balɔɔt a Jews basangamɛnɛ ammɛ bakkwu lusso. Ɔzzánga Alexander uwung labɔɔk, ɔttɛ ukingi lɛkkɔ ɔkkalamɛ kɛyɔɔng ka lusso kibbi.
44019034	Ɔzzánga bakɔɔlɔmɛnɛ battɛ baang wa Jews, ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ babungu tɛ̀ttɛ̀ baggbanɛ lissi babungu tɔttɔt ɛkɛtɛ ɛmmɛ ɛffɔ ikalangka iffa battɛ, “Buggboggbo bule bwa Artemis wa Ephesus.”
44019035	Tɔttɔt akkala lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang ɔnaang kibbi ’sɔng baang kɛtɛtɛ. Ɔttɛ, “Balɔɔt Ephesus! ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔsan lɔsan ɔttɛ balɔɔt a killu Ephesus balenɛ ba balokonɛ ggwoon a luzɔɔm Artemis la lɛttaal za latele, za lissinɛ ka libat liffu lɛttɔ ka lisse.
44019036	Ɔlɔɔt wa ule ukkwoong ɔkala ɔttɛ ning ba kule, ba ule. Afɛkɛlɛyɔng, tɛ̀ttɛ́ anaangyɔng kɔlɔɔk a bizingizingi.
44019037	Akɔɔmyɔngbong balɔɔt ’bɔng mung affuyɔng ɔzzànga ba bataka bayip ɔlɔk balɔɔk bubbi batum umaat-Artemis.
44019038	Ulenɛ ka Demetrius la balɔɔt a kɛnaang ammɛ bayanganɛ kamma-kɛkaal batum ɔlɔɔt, bamii ka ɔdda kɛkaal wa bakaalnɛ kɛkaal kɛtɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ. Bakaal-ɔkala bale baang, bakkwoong mung bakkwɔɔbɛ kɛkaal kɛyɔɔng bakang.
44019039	Kɔlɔɔk kɔlɔk kulenɛ bakang kwa aggyannɛyɔng kwa kɔsaknɛ ’kwɔng baang, vvenɛ bakaalkwɛ ka mitin a lusse.
44019040	Baang kɔlɔɔk a bbɔlbbɔl kɔtaanɛ baang. Bakkwoong mung battɛ izzɔɔkbong kullu ka kɔlɔɔk kwa kɔnaangnɛ mmwɔɔn mung. Lakkpenge ba lale ka lɔsap ’gwɔng mung. Ɔgbaa baala ikkwoong itele lɛttɔ kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng kɔyyɛɛp.”
44019041	Uvvenɛ lɛlɔɔk, uvvoong mitin.
44020001	Kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng baang kɔsaalnɛ, Paul ɔkkwɔɔ bayanga-kiyila uloko ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn, uteelebɛ la kɛbba-bikɔɔm sa doddo. Ɔzzanga ɔgbata umii ka ɛfɛɛn ya ɛzzánganɛ Macedonia.
44020002	Ɔssɛ bakang, ɔtaa ka laffɛ ka laffɛ, ɔbba balɔɔt bikɔɔm la lammwɔɔl ppwap. Uffu ɔffɔ Greece.
44020003	Baang ulenɛ ka ɛfɛɛn ɔtaanɛ ka ikwukwɔɔn ikkyaat. Ɔbamabong ɔkkpɛlɛ wa nzang bumiinɛ Syria, keem ɔsannɛ ɔttɛ balɔɔt a Jews ka Syria baggyanmɛ kɛwwɔɔl; ɔppyɛɛ ɔnaang luttina kɛssɛ ka Macedonia kɛppyɛlɛ.
44020004	Sopater, waan a Pyrrhus wa ussinɛ Berea, umii ukupmɛ. Aristarchus la Secundus, ba bassinɛ Thessalonica, Gaius wa ussinɛ Derbe, Timothy la Tychicus la Trophimus ba bassinɛ ka ɛkpansi Asia bassɛ bakupmɛ.
44020005	Bakɔɔm ɛtɔk bamii bakatyɛlɛ ka Troas.
44020006	Kɛtɔm-a-kizzi kazzi kwa asinɛ yeast ka brɛɛd lɛssɛɛn kasaknɛ, ayyɔɔt imal ka akkpaat ka ussinɛ Philippi. Bɛtɔm kubbwɔɔk bɛsaknɛ, imii ikupbɛ ka Troas, itaa baang ka liwaazɛ la abbɛ.
44020007	Kulele Kɛtɔm-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ, ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt iffu ibbi ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn ka kazzi. Paul ufeele ɔlɔɔk unnyi balɔɔt ’bɔng baang tɔttɔt kɛtɔm kɛppwa. Ning baang ɔlɔɔk ka ule ka ɔgbatanɛ ka libbessolo.
44020008	Ilɔɔkwu idɔkɔ baang ggbadam ka libat ɛnyɔng ka ɛfɛɛn a idudanɛ.
44020009	Okolobbya vvɔn wa ɔzzanganɛ Eutychus ɔdɔkɔ baang ka ɔtaanɛ ka windo. Paul ɔlɔɔknɛ usi lɛzza, Eutychus ɔlaa bilaa bizammɛ, ɔfata ka ussinɛ ka bɛsana bɛkkyaat ka libat ɛnyɔng ɔttɔ ka lisse. Basammɛnɛ, ubbebong.
44020010	Ɔzzánga Paul usini ka libat ɛnyɔng, uffu kuttɔɔk umii ɔttɔ ɔbwɔɔpmɛ, ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ attinayɔng, ba ɔtaka ubbe.”
44020011	Ɔzzanga ɔppyɛlɛ isimisimi ubbwulu libat ɛnyɔng. Umii ɔbɛkɛ brɛɛd uzzi. Ulenɛ lɛlɔɔk la abbɛ tɔttɔt livve-luwee lɛtta, Paul ɔgbata ussekebɛ.
44020012	Okolobbya ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ufungala, basammɛ bafula la laggele laggele.
