44020013	Ifeele ikɔɔm issɛ imii imal akkpaat imii Assos. Baang ulenɛ ka ɛfɛɛn a ile ka imiinɛ isam Paul. Ammɛ ɔttɛnɛ inaang ning baang ka ammɛ biini ule ka ɔssɛnɛ ka lisse.
44020014	Idudanɛ ka Assos, isammɛ issɛɛn ka akkpaat imii Mitylene.
44020015	Issi baang iwaat tɔttɔt imii iffɔ Chios ka libbessolo. Kɛtɔm ssɔn kɛsaknɛ, iffɔ Samos. Libbessolo iffɔ Miletus.
44020016	Paul ɔdɔkɔ uttina kɛwaat kɛssɛ Ephesus tɛ̀ttɛ́ uffu ɔmmɛmɛ ka ɛkpansi Asia. Ɔdɔkɔ ka lazzuma ɔttɛ ɔkka Jerusalem lɛffɔ. Ulenɛ ka ukkwoongnɛ ɔttɛ nzang ɔffɔ ka kɛtɔm-a-Pentecost (sa bakkenɛ ka Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kunnyinɛ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus lakke).
44020017	Paul ɔtɔɔm bɔtɔɔm ka Miletus ufee balɔɔt a Ephesus. Ɔttɛ bagɛlɛnya luzɔɔm ka Ephesus baffu bakupmɛ.
44020018	Bagɛlɛnya ’bɔng baang baffɔnɛ, ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Asanyɔng lɔsan tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ndɔkɔnɛ ntaa la annyɔɔng ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ussinɛ ka kɛtɔm ikeeng, sa nffɔnɛ ka ɛkpansi Asia.
44020019	Nnaang kɛnaang anaam nyila busook la akama wa lɛbaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ubili Ebinukkpaapi ɔnaangnɛ, ka ɛkɛtɛ ya balɔɔt a Jews baggyannɛnɛ kɛwwɔɔl.
44020020	Asanyɔng lɔsan attɛyɔng lukopolo gwa nkopolowɔnɛyɔng ka kibbi la gwa nkopolowɔnɛyɔng ka ssala annyɔɔng biini, bulɔk bwa bule buttelewɔyɔng ka lusso nsi lɛzza nlup.
44020021	Nttama balɔɔt ba balenɛ ba Jews la Ikanakana nttɛ bakkyaa kɛnaang a bubbi bafɔngɔ bakup Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, bayila kwa Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus.
44020022	Gedegede mung nle ka nmiinɛ Jerusalem ka latele Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ba ntaka nsan kwa kule kɔnaangnɛ bakang.
44020023	Kwa nsannɛ, nsan ka Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kulenɛnɛ lɛkamala kɔttɛ ka lɛffɛ duu za mmiinɛ, kɔlɔɔk la igbakkɔpɔ kule baang ka kɔkatnɛnɛ.
44020024	Ɔzzanga anaam biini ba nggyan nttɛ kɛfal anaam kɛtta ka kɔlɔɔk. Nggyan nttɛ nvve kɛnaang anaam sa Uyini Jesus unnyinɛnɛ ɔttɛ nnaang. Assɛ kilenɛ kɛbwɔɔlɔ Kuttu-budoddo latele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
44020025	“Nssɛ nkkpitwɔyɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ nkopolo kuttu Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Gedegede mung nsanbong nttɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ule ɔbbalnɛ lɛyɛn ba ɔbɛlɛ lile.
44020026	Mmwɔɔn mung nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng ppwool ppwool nttɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtaaknɛ kɔbɔɔk anaam baang ba kɔbɛlɛ lile.
44020027	Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔngbong kɔlɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ ntum Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, kɔlɔk kwa nssekenɛ nlup ba kule.
44020028	Akatwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng ɔbɛtɛ la balɔɔt ba Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kunnyiwɔnɛyɔng kɛppyɛɛk. Azzangayɔng bakat a luzɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm gwa ammɛ ɔkɔɔmnɛ lubbe awaan ɔnaang.
44020029	Nsan lɔsan nttɛ ɛkɛtɛ ya nle ngbata nkɔngɔwɔyɔng, babbyap igɔɔt vvenɛ iffu ikaawayɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔlɔɔt vvɔn gbɔɔ baala ifakala ifɔngɔ.
44020030	Ɛkɛtɛ vvenɛ ɛffɔ ya balɔɔt a kɛkaan annyɔɔng bale bakkala lalaak baggyan battɛ badɛm balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ kiyila uttunbɛ, bakeetbɛ abbɛ.
44020031	Akatyɔng tɛ, akke attɛyɔng nyɛn akama kikoon la kɛtɔm ka kikopolowɔyɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ la ɔlɔɔt la ɔlɔɔt ka likkpa likkyaat.
44020032	“Gedegede mung nsamwɔyɔngbong nnyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la bɔtɔɔm a lakke ammɛ kɛppyɛɛk. Ukkwoong ukkwoong ɔnaangwɔyɔng akkaamyɔng. Unnyiwɔyɔng ppyɛɛ wa ulokonɛ balɔɔt ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
44020033	Zzeen ba ntaka nkoot ka ikkpoko wa ayyɔɔt ɔlɔk ubba wa ayyɔɔt.
44020034	Annyɔɔng asanyɔng lɔsan attɛyɔng nkɔɔm labɔɔk za anaam biini nnaang bɔfɛɛn duu bwa anaam la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ anaam baggyannɛ.
44020035	Nyɔɔwɔyɔngbong ka bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ nttɛ anaangnɛ kɛnaang kɛbɛtɛwɔ ning mung, akkwoong attele balɔɔt ba basinɛ lɛkkaam. Akkeyɔng lɛmmwɔɔl za Uyini, Jesus, ɔlɔɔknɛ, ɔttɛ, ‘Laggele gaang gaang latta lile ka asɔɔknɛ ɔlɔɔt bɔfɛɛn, latta ka atɔknɛ lɔtɔk.’ ”
44020036	Paul ulenɛ livve lɛlɔɔk, bakun laddu ɔkkpɛlɛ bazɔɔm.
44020037	Bakaa Paul bagbugba bateelemɛ. Bakkwa ɔkkpɛlɛ.
44020038	Bukee bunaangbɛ gaang gaang ka lammwɔɔl za Paul ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔttɛ vvenɛ mɛ ba babɛlɛ lɛyɛn. Batɔɔ Paul bamii ka akkpaat.
44021001	Iteelebɛ ilɔp ka akkpaat. Ilenɛ ssɔng lɛwaat ikum lihu, iffɔ ka Cos. Ɔffɔnɛ libbessolo iffɔ Rhodes itteet bakang imii Patara.
44021002	Baang ulenɛ ka ɛfɛɛn iyɛnnɛ akkpaat wa umiinɛ Phoenicia; ɔzzánga imal baang, iwaat imii.
44021003	Iffu iffɔ ka ɛfɛɛn iyɛnnɛ Cyprus; ɔzzánga iwaat imii kuttɔɔk ɛkpansi Cyprus, imii Syria. Ikum ka likum ka Tyre, ka ɛfɛɛn a basanganɛ bɛfɛɛn ka akkpaat.
44021004	Iyɛn balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ kiyila baang. Ikɔɔng baang la abbɛ, itaa ka liwaazɛ. Bakɔɔm lakke Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm babwɔɔlɔ Paul battɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ umii Jerusalem.
44021005	Ɛkɛtɛ kɛtaa la abbɛ ɛsaknɛ, igbata imii kùddù kwa ayyɔɔt. Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ la bwanavva abbɛ, la bwɔɔn abbɛ bakupyɛlɛ tɔttɔt itta ka lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang. Ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt ikun laddu ka kususuk izɔɔm.
44021006	Iteeleyɛlɛ kɛyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ iduda. Ayyɔɔt ippyɛlɛ imal ka akkpaat imii kɔssɛ ayyɔɔt, abbɛ bappyɛlɛ bafula.
44021007	Ibee kɔssɛ ayyɔɔt ka ussinɛ Tyre imal akkpaat imii Ptolemais. Baang ulenɛ ka ɛfɛɛn iyɛnnɛ bakpana ayyɔɔt, iwomobɛ. Ikɔɔng baang la abbɛ itaa ka livve zzɔn.
44021008	Ɔffɔnɛ libbessolo, igbata imii iffɔ Caesarea. Iffɔnɛ bakang imii ka ssala ɔssɛɛn-a-luzzɔm wa ɔzzanganɛ Philip. Itaa baang la ammɛ. Ammɛ ɔssɛ ule ka kɛkaan a balɔɔt ba bannambakkyaat ba basanganɛ ka Jerusalem.
44021009	Ɔyanga bwaan a bwanavva banna ba batakanɛ bwalam lillu, ba bakopolonɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
44021010	Itaa baang ka bɛtɔm ggbadam ka uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔzzanganɛ Agabus ussinɛ Judea uffu.
44021011	Agabus uffunɛ ka ɛfɛɛn ayyɔɔt, ɔsam ɛkkpa ya Paul ukulanɛ ka kɛsan, ɔggbɔmɛ kɛyɔɔng ka bukkpɔ la labɔɔk, ɔttɛ, “Uwɔng ulenɛ kwa Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔlɔɔknɛ kɔttɛ, Uyini ɛkkpa ’yɔng mung, balɔɔt a Jews bale baggbɔmɛ ning baang ka Jerusalem basammɛ, bannyi Ikanakana.”
44021012	Ippyeenɛ ning mung, ayyɔɔt la balɔɔt balɔk ikkpenge Paul ittɛ, tɛ̀ttɛ́ umii Jerusalem.
44021013	Ammɛ ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Baang anaangyɔng ’bɔng? Bɔng akkwanɛyɔng adɛmyɔng luppyam lɔzzanɛ? Nbamabong gɔɔ kwa kɛggbɔnɛ izzi ka Jerusalem kɛyɔɔng lissi, vvenɛ nbbe ka lɛttɔ Uyini, Jesus.”
44021014	Ibum ittɛ nzang itunumɛ, ɔzzanga isi likkwoong. Ikkyaamɛ ifɔngɔ ittɛ, “Kɔnaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Uyini uttinanɛ.”
44021015	Itaanɛ baang ssup, ifeele ibama bɛfɛɛn, igbata imii Jerusalem.
44021016	Balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ balɔk ba bassinɛ Caesarea bassɛ bakupyɛlɛ. Basamyɛlɛ bamii ka ssala ɔlɔɔt wa ile ka itaanɛ la ammɛ. Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔzzanga Mnason wa ussinɛ Cyprus wa ɔggbanɛ lissi ɔyanga kiyila ka ussinɛ ka lɔnnyɔ.
44021017	Iffɔnɛ Jerusalem, ikpana ayyɔɔt baffu bawomoyɛlɛ gaang gaang.
44021018	Libbessolo Paul ufeele la ayyɔɔt imii kɛyɛn a James. Bagɛlɛnya balɔɔt a luzɔɔm badɔkɔ baang.
44021019	Paul uwomobɛ, ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ lutini bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ lɛnaang ka bɛzzɔkɔ Ikanakana ɔssanga kɛnaang sa ammɛ ɔnaangnɛ.
44021020	Bappyeenɛ kwa ɔlɔɔknɛ, ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ babungu Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Balɔɔk la Paul battɛ, “Akkwoong mung ayɛn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kulenɛ, ɔkpana ayyɔɔt. Innɔ innɔ balɔɔt a Jews ggbadam bayangabong kiyila. Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ bayangabong luttina batum Lafɔɔ-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
44021021	Baggbabɛ lɛbwɔɔlɔ kɔlɔɔk annɔ battɛ ale baang ka akopolonɛ balɔɔt a Jews ba balenɛ ka ikaan ilɔk attɛ bakkyaa Lafɔɔ a Moses bazzɔɔk. Abwɔɔlɔbɛ attɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ bazza bwaan abbɛ lataa, tɛ̀ttɛ́ bakup eleme balɔɔt a Jews.
44021022	Vvenɛ bappyee battɛ atii mung. Ngkka mung ile inaang nang?
44021023	Anaang kwa ibwɔɔlɔwɔnɛ. Balɔɔt banna bale mung ba balenɛ liyim.
44021024	Afeele amii akupbɛ ka lɛtɔm a kikup a laggbo. Annyi ikkpoko akkalabɛ nkwaaning bakkwoong bakkpaat lattɔ abbɛ. Ka ’kwɔng mung vvenɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ ɔsan ɔttɛ, lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk ka bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung bya balɔɔknɛ batumwɔ ba lule. Ɔzzánga annɔ biini anaang akup tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Lafɔɔ a Moses lalɔɔknɛ.
44021025	Ɔzzànga kwa Ikanakana ba bayanganɛ kiyila, itɔɔmbong luvva ibwɔɔlɔbɛ ittɛ itinibong ittɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ bazzi kazzi kwa balenɛkwɛ ka ɛlat lɛzɔɔm. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ bazzi linnyi gɔɔ ɛsɛɛn ya bazzengelenɛyɛ. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ bassɛ kɛzak.”
44021026	Ɔzzánga Paul ɔsam balɔɔt ’bɔng baang umii ɔnaang lɛtɔm a kikup a laggbo unnyibɛ. Ufeele umii ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ bɛtɔm bya bale bataa tɔttɔt uddum kɛtɔm-a-lakpeke lɛtɔm ’zɔng baang sa ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔt ule ɔzɔɔm unnyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
44021027	Ɔffɔnɛ ka bɛtɔm bya bɛnnambakkyaat ’byɔng baang bile ka bɛsaalnɛ, balɔɔt a Jews balɔk ba bassinɛ ka ɛkpansi a Asia, bayɛn Paul ka tɔkɔlɔ a Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Bazzɔɔk kullu ka kibbi ’sɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ bakaa Paul.
44021028	Babungu battɛ, “Balɔɔt a Israel! Atteleyɔngyɛlɛ! Uwɔng ɔlɔɔt wa umiinɛ ifɛɛn ifɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ukopolo ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ lalaak utum balɔɔt a Israel la Lafɔɔ a Moses la Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ’gwɔng mung. Gɔɔ gedegede mung ɔkɔɔmbong Ikanakana uffu ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyyaa lafɔɔ.”
44021029	(Balɔɔk ka bayɛnnɛ Trophimus wa ussinɛ Ephesus la Paul ka lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang. Battina battɛ baang vvenɛ Paul ɔsammɛbong umii ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.)
44021030	Lɔnyaata ’gwɔng baang lɔwaala ka lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ. Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ bamma baffu balɔm Paul, battulumɛ, batta ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Eseese lamma Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lafɛɛn.
44021031	Kɛkaan ’sɔng baang badɔkɔ battina kɛwwɔɔl a Paul. Keem kuttu ’kwɔng baang kɔffɔ Uzzilɛttɔ isɔgya a Rome battɛ lɔnyaata lɔttɔbong ka Jerusalem.
44021032	Uzzilɛttɔ ’wɔng baang ɔssang bakɔɔm-ɛtɔk isɔgya ya bagɛlɛnya, ɔbɛtɛmɛ kɛyɔɔng; bamma bamii ka ɛfɛɛn a lɔnyaata lɔttɔnɛ. Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bayɛnmɛnɛ la isɔgya ka uffunɛ, bakkyaa kitup a Paul bafɔngɔ.
44021033	Uzzilɛttɔ umii ssɔng ka ɛfɛɛn a Paul, ɔkaamɛ, ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ bakɔɔm iyɛɛgba iffa baggbɔmɛ. Uvvenɛ ning baang ɔbap ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung ulenɛ nnyinɛ, ule ’bɔng lɛnaang?”
44021034	Balɔɔt balɔk ka kibbi baang babungu batum kɔlɔɔk kɔlɔk, balɔk babungu kɔlɔk. Lɔnyaata lɔttɔbɛ ka bɛzzɔkɔ gaang gaang. Uzzilɛttɔ usi likkwoong ɔsan kwa kulenɛ lɛnaang ɔzzanga ɔlɔɔk balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ basam Paul bamii ka ɛfɛɛn a isɔgya bakatnɛ.
44021035	Baffu la ammɛ tɔttɔt baffɔ ka kɛtɛkɛtɛ likum ’zɔng baang ɔzzanga isɔgya bappyɛɛ basammɛ, ka kɛkaan ’sɔng baang kilenɛ gaang gaang lɛnyanga.
44021036	Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ badɔkɔ baang ka bakupmɛnɛ lɔnnyɔ lɔnnyɔ, balam imakkpa bakɔɔm babungu battɛ, “Wwɔɔlmɛyɔng!”
44021037	Bale ka kɛttɛ kɛsam Paul kimii ka lɛnɔk za bakat-ɔkat, ammɛ Paul ɔbap uzzilɛttɔ ɔttɛ, “Nkkwoong mung nlɔɔk kɔlɔɔk nnyiwɔ.” Uzzilɛttɔ ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ, “Alɔɔk mung Greek ɔɔ?
44021038	Ɔkkɛnɛ baang annɔ wa Egypt ’wɔng baang lissi, wa ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng bakang ning uttenɛ kɔssɛ ɔkɔɔm innɔ babbyap zzɔɔp la bɛfɛɛn a bussopo umii ka kɛmat ɔggyan kɛtɔk ɛkpansi kɛkɔɔm kɛyɔɔng.”
44021039	Paul ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔtɛ, “Anaam wa Jews tɛ. Bamaatnɛ ka Tarsus ka lɛffɛ za lɛbaang ka Cilicia. Mkkpee, afɔngɔnɛ nlɔɔk lɛkkɔ nnyi balɔɔt ’bɔng baang.”
44021040	Uzzilɛttɔ unnyimɛ lakke. Ɔzzánga Paul ufeele ubee ka kezeng, uwung labɔɔk ɔfɔngɔ balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ. Bazumnɛ, Paul ɔlɔɔk ka Hebrew unnyibɛ, ɔttɛ,
44022001	“Bwaanbwalam, ikpana anaam, badedde, agɔpɔlɔnɛyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ nle ka nkkalanɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng ka lusso annyɔɔng.”
44022002	Bappyeemɛnɛ ka ɔlɔɔknɛ unnyibɛ ka Hebrew, basseke zzum ka bataanɛ bagɔpɔlɔmɛ.
44022003	Ɔttɛ, “Anaam ɔlɔɔt a Jews. Bamaatnɛ ka Tarsus ka Cilicia. Ɔzzanga ntaa mung ka Jerusalem nmmala. Ndɔkɔ ukkoop a lilɔɔk ka labɔɔk a Gamaliel. Nkoop Lafɔɔ a balɔɔt ayyɔɔt ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ, nsammɛ kɛyɔɔng nnyi Ebinukkpaapi tɛ̀ttɛ̀ annyɔɔng mmwɔɔn mung.
44022004	Nyɔɔ balɔɔt ba bakupnɛ kwa Jesus akama wa lubbe lubbe. Nkaa bwaanbwalam la bwanavva nssɛɛn igbakkɔpɔ.
44022005	Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm Wa Lɛbaang la ikansulu ɔkkpɛlɛ bakkwoong mung babwɔɔlɔ battɛ kwa nlɔɔknɛ mung kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Bakkpɔk livva batɔɔmnɛ battɛ nfee balɔɔt a Jews ba balenɛ ka Damascus. Ɔzzánga nfeele nmii kɛkaa balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ nssɛɛn igbakkɔpɔ, nsambɛ nmii Jerusalem nttɛ bayɔɔbɛ akama.
44022006	Ndɔkɔ baang ka nssɛnɛ nkkɛtɛ Damascus ka kasɛkɛ kikoon, immwalang issi ka libat itta ivvoongnɛ.
44022007	Nttɔ ka lisse, nppyee lɛmmwɔɔl ka lɛttɛnɛ, ‘Saul, Saul! mbɔng ayɔɔnɛnɛ akama?’
44022008	Nbapnɛ nttɛ, ‘Annɔ alenɛ nnyinɛ ee, Uyini?’ Ammɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Anaam nlenɛ Jesus wa Nazareth wa ayɔɔnɛnɛ akama.’
44022009	Balɔɔt ba balenɛ baang bayɛn immwalang ’yɔng baang ɔzzanga lɛmmwɔɔl ɔlɔɔt wa ɔlɔɔknɛ baang unnyinɛ basi lippyee.
44022010	Nbapmɛ nttɛ, ‘Uyini nle nnaang nang?’ Ɔzzanga Uyini ɔbwɔɔlɔnɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Afeele amii Damascus. Affɔnɛ bakang vvenɛ babwɔɔlɔwɔ bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyannɛ ɔttɛ anaang.’
44022011	Immwalang inaangnɛ nssi ifim. Ɔzzànga balɔɔt a kɔssɛ anaam bakɔɔmmɛ keddu keddu bamii Damascus.
44022012	“Ɔlɔɔt a luzɔɔm vvɔn ɔdɔkɔ baang wa ɔzzanganɛ Ananias, wa ulokonɛ Lafɔɔ ayyɔɔt gaang. Balɔɔt a Jews ba ballunɛ Damascus batelemɛ gaang gaang.
44022013	Uffunɛ ubeenɛ ka lufoom, ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, ‘Ɔkpana anaam, Saul, appyɛlɛ ayɛn.’ Eseese nppyɛɛk, nyɛnmɛ.
44022014	Ɔttɛ, ‘Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm a balɔɔt ayyɔɔt ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ ɔsangawɔbong ɔttɛ asam luttina ammɛ, ayɛn Bɔɔyi ammɛ wa bbwak, appyeemɛ ka ɔlɔɔknɛ la lɛmmwɔɔl ammɛ biini.
44022015	Vvenɛ azzanga ttɛɛsɛ ammɛ wa ale ɔbwɔɔlɔ ɔssɛbibit ɔkkpɛlɛ bwa alenɛ lippyee ayɛn ka zzeen agbaa.
44022016	Abbal ’bɔng lɛkat, feele amii banaangwɔ baptizim, azzaa bubbi annɔ allɔt ka kɛkkwɔɔ lɛkɔɔl ammɛ.’
44022017	“Nppyɛlɛ isimisimi nmii Jerusalem. Nle baang ka kɛssɛɛn a luzɔɔm ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, nyɛn biyɛnɛ.
44022018	Ka biyɛnɛ ’byɔng baang, nyɛn Uyini ka ɔlɔɔknɛ la anaam ɔttɛ, ‘Azzuma likelike agbata asseke Jerusalem, balɔɔt ɛfɛɛn ’yɔng mung kɔlɔɔk a buttɛɛsɛ annɔ bwa butumnɛnɛ anaam baala bayila.’
44022019	Nppyɛlɛmɛ kamma nttɛ, ‘Uyini, basan lɔsan battɛ ndɔkɔ baang ka nmiinɛ ka idda mitin nkaa balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ kiyila batumwɔ ntup.
44022020	Ka ɛkɛtɛ ya bawwɔɔlnɛ Stephen, ttɛɛsɛ annɔ, anaam ndɔkɔ baang. Kɔsaapnɛ ka bawwɔɔlmɛnɛ, ntaa nppyɛɛk iwɔkɔlɔ balɔɔt ba bawwɔɔlmɛnɛ!’
44022021	Uyini ɔttɛ, ‘Nsɔɔng, vvenɛ ntɔɔmwɔ ka Ikanakana’ ”
44022022	Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ bagɔpɔlɔ Paul tɔttɔt ɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng, tɛ́ttɛ́ babungu gaang gaang bagaga battɛ, “Nsɔɔngyɔng la ammɛ! awwɔɔlmɛyɔng! ba ɔkkɔnɔ wa ɔtaanɛ ka kuddu!”
44022023	Balam imakkpa, bakɔɔm baggwulmɛ ibba abbɛ, bakap ibut ballɔt ka libat.
44022024	Uzzilɛttɔ isɔgya a Rome ɔttɛ basam Paul bamii ka ɛfɛɛn isɔgya ikatnɛ. Baffɔnɛ bakang, ɔttɛ batupmɛ nkwaaning basan bwa balɔɔt a Jews babungunɛ, bakɔɔm balam imakkpa bappyɛɛk Paul.
44022025	Ɔzzanga balemɛnɛ izzi lɛggbɔ, wa bale ka batupmɛnɛ, Paul ɔlɔɔk la uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt wa ubeenɛ baang ɔttɛ, “Mung lafɔɔ layila mung atup waan a Rome wa ɔtakanɛ kɛkaal ammɛ lɛkaal ɔɔ?”
44022026	Uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang uppyeenɛ ning baang, umii ɔbap Uzzilɛttɔ isɔgya ɔttɛ, “Baang anaangyɔng ’bɔng? Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang wa Rome tɛ,”
44022027	Ɔzzanga Uzzilɛttɔ isɔgya ufeele umii ɔbap Paul ɔttɛ, “Abwɔɔlɔnɛ, annɔ wa Rome ɔɔ?” Paul ɔttɛ, “Iii.”
44022028	Uzzilɛttɔ ɔttɛ, “Anaam ndɔkɔ nlɛɛp kile waan ɛkpansi a Rome ka ikkpoko uggboggbo.” Ɔzzánga Paul ɔppyɛlɛmɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Anaam bamaatnɛ ka Rome.”
44022029	Eseese balɔɔt ba bamiinɛ battɛ babap Paul ibap battɔm bappyɛlɛ isimisimi bassekemɛ. Uzzilɛttɔ ɔbbwɔpɔmɛ ka ɔsannɛ ɔttɛ ɔssɛɛnbong Paul waan a Rome ikpɔkɔlɔ.
44022030	Uzzilɛttɔ isɔgya ɔggyan ɔttɛ ɔsan bwa balɔɔt a Jews bakatanɛ Paul batum. Ɔffɔnɛ libbessolo, ɔsanga Paul ka igbakkɔpɔ. Ɔdda bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la ikkansulu ɔttɛ baduda. Badudanɛ, ɔsanga Paul ɔttɛ ubee baang ka lusso abbɛ.
44023001	Paul uyeek ɔppyɛɛk ikkansulu ɔttɛ, “Ikpana anaam, luppyam anaam lule kkpaladada lutum kɛfal anaam ɔkkpɛlɛ ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm tɔttɔt ɔffɔ kɛtɔm sa mmwɔɔn.”
44023002	Keem Uzzilɛttɔ Bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm wa Lɛbaang Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔzzanganɛ Ananias ɔdda balɔɔt ba babeenɛ bakkɛtɛ Paul ɔttɛ batupmɛ kabut baang ka kamma.
44023003	Paul ɔlɔɔk la Ananias ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔssɛ utupwɔ annɔ kabut. Annɔ ulata kɛbat a bɔfɛɛn ’wɔng. Ataa baang akaalnɛ kɛkaal attɛ annɔ akaal tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Lafɔɔ lalɔɔknɛ. Ɔzzànga mung annɔ biini abɛpɛbong Lafɔɔ ’zɔng baang ka attɛnɛ batupnɛ kabut.”
44023004	Balɔɔt ba bakkɛtɛnɛ Paul battɛ, “Anyɔɔka Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm wa Lɛbaang Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔɔ?”
44023005	Paul ɔppyɛlɛbɛ kamma ɔttɛ, “Ba nsan nttɛ baang Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm wa Lɛbaang Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm tɛ ikpana anaam! Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lutolo lɔttɛ, ‘Tɛ̀ttɛ́ alɔɔkyɔng kɔlɔɔk kwa bbɔbbɔl atumyɔng uzzilɛttɔ balɔɔt annyɔɔng.’ ”
44023006	Paul ɔsannɛ ɔttɛ kibbi sa ssɔn kɛdɔkɔ balɔɔt a Sadducees nsakang balɔɔt a Pharisees, ɔbwɔɔlɔ uzzilɛttɔ ɔttɛ, “Bakpana anaam, anaam wa Pharisees! Anaam waan wa Pharisees ɔfɔɔnnɛ. Mung bakaanɛ ka nlɔɔknɛ nttɛ ɔlɔɔt ubbenɛ vvenɛ ufungala ɔtaa ka kuddu.”
44023007	Ɔlɔɔknɛ ning baang, eseese balɔɔt a Pharisees la balɔɔt a Sadducees bawɔlɔ. Kibbi ’sɔng baang babɛngɛlɛbɛ kɛyɔɔng lifaak liffa.
44023008	(Balɔɔt a Sadducees battɛ ɔlɔɔt ubbenɛ ba ɔbɛlɛ lifungala. Babbal lɛttɛ bayilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm gɔɔ liyeeng ba lile. Ɔzzànga balɔɔt a Pharisees bayila battɛ ɔlɔɔt ubbenɛ utii ka ufungalanɛ, ɔppyɛlɛ ɔtaa ka kuddu. Babbal liyila battɛ liyeeng la bayilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lile baang.)
44023009	Lɔsap lɔttɔ gaang gaang. Bakopolo-Lafɔɔ ba babeenɛ la balɔɔt a Pharisees bafeele babee bbwak baggyan battɛ balɔɔt a Sadducees bayila kwa abbɛ. Balɔɔk battɛ, “Bulɔk bwa ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung ulenɛ lɛnaang bubbɔl, ba itaka iyɛn! Vvenɛ baang kuyeeng ɔlɔk uyilabɔtɔɔm utolobong unnyimɛ ka lɔkkwɔɔn!”
44023010	Kɔwɔlɔ ’kwɔng baang kɔsak lɛttala, uzzilɛttɔ isɔgya ɔbbwɔpɔmɛ, ɔttɛ vvenɛ bayaak Paul izɛkɛ-izɛkɛ. Ɔzzánga ɔdda isɔgya ɔttɛ bamii basanga Paul ka kibbi ’sɔng baang bamii ka ɛfɛɛn isɔgya ikatnɛ.
44023011	Ɔffɔnɛ libbessolo, Uyini ubee Paul ka lufoom ɔttɛ, “Akkaam luppyam kkpɔk, annɔ alenɛ tɛɛsɛ anaam mung ka Jerusalem. Vvenɛ assɛ abeenɛ tɛɛsɛ ning baang ka Rome.”
44023012	Ɔffɔnɛ lɔfɔm a lɔfɔm a libbessolo, balɔɔt a Jews balɔk baduda ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn, banaang likup, bayim battɛ basinɛ Paul lɛwwɔɔl, kazzi ba babɛlɛ lizzi, gɔɔ bannyi baala bavva.
44023013	Balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ likup ’zɔng baang baffɔ lalɔp laffa la kitele.
44023014	Ɔzzánga bafeele bamii ka bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la bagɛlɛnya, babwɔɔlɔbɛ battɛ, “Iyimbong ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt ittɛ isinɛ Paul lɛwwɔɔl, bulɔk bwa ile ka izzinɛ ba bubɛlɛ lile.
44023015	Annyɔɔng la ikkansulu atɔɔmyɔng bɔtɔɔm gedegede mung abwɔɔlɔyɔng isɔgya Rome, abbwa attɛyɔng bakɔɔm Paul bafeewɔyɔng, annyɔɔng aggyan attɛ appyeeyɔng lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk ka kamma ammɛ biini. Vvenɛ iwwɔɔlmɛ ka ɛtɔk tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔffɔ mung.”
44023016	Waanawalam, wa etele a Paul ɔmaatnɛ, uppyee likup ’zɔng baang. Ɔzzánga ufeele umii ɔbwɔɔlɔ Paul ka ɛfɛɛn a isɔgya bakatnɛ.
44023017	Ammɛ Paul ɔkkwɔɔ wa sɔgya vvɔn ɔttɛ, “Asam okolobya ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung amii ka ɛfɛɛn uzzilɛttɔ isɔgya. Ɔyanga kɔlɔɔk kwa ule ka ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛnɛ.”
44023018	Wa sɔgya ’wɔng baang ɔsammɛ umii ka ɛfɛɛn uzzilɛttɔ isɔgya, ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛ ɔttɛ, “Paul wa ulenɛ ka igbakkɔpɔ ɔkkwɔɔnɛnɛ ɔttɛ nsam okolobya ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung nffu ka ɛfɛɛn annɔ. Ɔyanga kɔlɔɔk baang kwa ule ka ɔbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛ tɛ.”
44023019	Uzzilɛttɔ isɔgya ’wɔng baang ɔlɔmmɛ ka kɔbɔɔk, ɔkɔɔmmɛ umii ubee kufɛngɛ ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ, “Attɛ ɔbwɔɔlɔnɛ ’bɔng?”
44023020	Ɔzzánga ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛ ɔttɛ, “Baggboggbo balɔɔt a Jews bayilabong battɛ vvenɛ babapwɔ lufat akɔɔm Paul afee ikkansulu. Babbwabong battɛ ikkansulu baggyan battɛ bappyee lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk kwa kutumnɛ Paul ka kamma ammɛ biini.
44023021	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ agɔpɔlɔ kwa abbɛ tɛ. Balɔɔt baggba lalɔp laffa la kitele ka bale baddumu ka ɛtɔk bakatmɛ. Bayimbong battɛ basinɛ Paul lɛwwɔɔl, bulɔk ba babɛlɛ lizzi gɔɔ baala bavva bannyi. Gedegede mung babamabong basseke ka bakatnɛ luttina annɔ.”
44023022	Uzzilɛttɔ isɔgya ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ abwɔɔlɔ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk attɛ abwɔɔlɔnɛbong kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng tɛ.” Ɔfɔngɔ okolobya ’wɔng baang umii.
44023023	Uzzilɛttɔ isɔgya ’wɔng baang ɔkkwɔɔ isɔgya ammɛ, balɔɔt baffa, ɔlɔɔkbɛ ɔttɛ, “Amii asangayɔng lalɔp isɔgya zzɔɔp babama bamii Caesarea ɔbɛtɛ la lalɔp a balɔɔt lakkyaat la balɔɔt zzɔɔp ba battelenɛ ka iyim, ɔbɛtɛ la lalɔp a balɔɔt zzɔɔp ba bakɔɔmnɛ ikpankyɔ la bufɔl. Abama, vvenɛ amiiyɔng ka ikalangka ɔsɛlɛzzɔɔp kɛtɔm.
44023024	Asangayɔng eyim ɛlɔk alokoyɔng Paul, vvenɛ uttele. Akatmɛyɔng ning ning ɔffɔ ka ssala Felix, uzzilɛttɔ.”
44023025	Ɔzzánga uzzilɛttɔ isɔgya ɔkkpɔk lɛta ɔttɛ:
44023026	“Anaam Claudius Lysias nkkpɔknɛ nfee dedde Uyini, Felix, uzzilɛttɔ: Nwomowɔbong!
44023027	Balɔɔt a Jews bakaanɛ ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung battɛ bawwɔɔl. Mung nppyeenɛ nttɛ ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung wa Rome, nfeele nmii la isɔgya anaam nkkalamɛ nfɔngɔ.
44023028	Ndɔkɔ nggyan nttɛ nsan bwa bakaamɛnɛ lɛttɔ batele. Ɔzzánga nsammɛ nfee ikkansulu abbɛ.
44023029	Nyɛn nsan nttɛ kɔlɔɔk kɔlɔk kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ ba ɔtaka ɔnaang kwa bale bawwɔɔlmɛ ɔlɔk bassɛɛnmɛ igbakkɔpɔ. Kɛkaa sa bakaamɛnɛ kitele lɛttɔ ka lafɔɔ abbɛ biini.
44023030	Babwɔɔlɔnɛnɛ battɛ balɔɔt balɔk batinibong battɛ bawwɔɔlmɛ, ɔzzánga nnaang luttina nttɛ ntɔɔmmɛ nfeewɔ. Nbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt ba bakaamɛnɛ nttɛ babwɔɔlɔ bwa ɔnaangnɛbɛ ka lusso annɔ.”
44023031	Isɔgya banaang kɛnaang abbɛ. Basam Paul bamii fulufulu bakang ka Antipatris.
44023032	Ɔffɔnɛ libbessolo, isɔgya ya bassɛnɛ ka lisse bappyɛlɛ isimisimi bamii ka ɛfɛɛn a bakatnɛ, usseke ya battelenɛ ka iyim bamii la ammɛ.
44023033	Basammɛ bamii Caesarea bannyi uzzilɛttɔ ɔbɛtɛ la luvva gwa uzzilɛttɔ isɔgya ɔkkpɔknɛ. Balɔm Paul bassɛɛnmɛ ka eddu.
44023034	Felix, uzzilɛttɔ, ɔkkwɔɔ luvva ’gwɔng baang, ɔbap Paul lɔfɔɔn gwa ussinɛ. Ɔzzánga ɔsannɛ ɔttɛ ussi Cilicia
44023035	ɔttɛ, “Vvenɛ nppyee lɛmmwɔɔl annɔ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya balɔɔt ba bakkwɔɔwɔnɛ kɛkaal bale baffu.” Ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ ɔttɛ bassɛɛn Paul ka ggwoon ka ssala ubeet Herod, bakatmɛ.
44024001	Bɛtɔm kubbwɔɔk bɛsaknɛ, Uzzilɛttɔ Bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm wa Lɛbaang wa ɔzzanganɛ Ananias ufeele umii Caesarea la bagɛlɛnya balɔk la lɔya wa ɔzzanganɛ Tertullus. Batuma ka lusso uzzilɛttɔ Felix. Bannyi kamma kɛkaal batum Paul.
44024002	Bakkwɔɔ Paul uffu, Tertullus ubee unnyi kamma kɛkaal utum Paul ɔttɛ, “Dedde! Kikkwoong a kɛkɔɔm ɛfɛɛn annɔ kɛnaangbongyɛlɛ itaa ka bɔkaat ɛkɛtɛ ɛlɔm. Alongɔlɔbong lilɔɔk ppwap sa lisinɛ lɛyyɛɛp, liyyɛɛp ka ɛkpansi ayyɔɔt.
44024003	Iggyan ning baang ka ɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ɔwaayɛlɛ gaang gaang kwa annɔ.
44024004	Ba nggyan nttɛ ntɔk ɛkɛtɛ annɔ nbɛpɛ gaang ɔzzànga nkkpengewɔ nttɛ agɔpɔlɔ kwa ile ka ilɔɔknɛ la luppyam gwa doddo.
44024005	Isanbong ittɛ linaang sa ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung ɔnaangnɛ vvenɛ kɔlɔɔk kɔbbɔl ka ussoonɛ. Ɔzzɔɔkbong lɔnyaata ka ɛfɛɛn a balɔɔt a Jews ɔkkpɛlɛ ukkpit ɛkpansi. Ammɛ ulenɛ uzzilɛttɔ kɔssɛ balɔɔt a Nazareth.
44024006	Ɔgbaa, ubum kɛyyaa Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔzzánga ikaamɛ. [Ittɛ nzang ikaal kɛkaal ammɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lafɔɔ ayyɔɔt lalɔɔknɛ.
44024007	Ɔzzánga Lysias, uzzilɛttɔ isɔgya, uffu ɔnnaayɛlɛwɛ ka lagabwɔ umii.
44024008	Ɔbwɔɔlɔ ɔttɛ balɔɔt ba bakaamɛnɛ baffu ka ɛfɛɛn annɔ.] Abapnɛ ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung ibap, annɔ biini vvenɛ asan bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya ikaamɛnɛ, itele lɛttɔ.”
44024009	Balɔɔt a Jews ɔgbaa bassɛ bayila kamma kɛkaal ’kwɔng baang battɛ lilɔɔk ’sɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ lile ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
44024010	Uzzilɛttɔ Felix ɔkkwɔɔ Paul ɔttɛ ɔlɔɔk. Ɔzzanga Paul ɔttɛ, “Nsan lɔsan nttɛ aggba lissi ale ɔkalakala ɛkpansi ’yɔng mung ka likkpa ggbadam. Nggele luggele nsak ka ntutalanɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng ka lusso annɔ.
44024011	Aggyannɛ attɛ asan, bɛtɔm zzɔɔppabɛffa ba bɛtaka bɛsak ka nfeelenɛ nmii Jerusalem nzɔɔm luzɔɔm, nnyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
44024012	Balɔɔt a Jews balɔk basinɛ lɛyɛn ka nkangalanɛ ikangala ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔlɔk vvenɛ nzzɔɔk lɔnyaata ka idda mitin, ɔlɔk ka ɛfɛɛn ɛlɔk gbɔɔ la lɛffɛ.
44024013	Gɔɔ vvenɛ ba bakkwoong babwɔɔlɔwɔ bwa bakaanɛnɛ lɛttɔ batele.
44024014	Nyila mung ka lusso annɔ nttɛ nzɔɔm nnyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa balɔɔt ayyɔɔt ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ ka nkupnɛ Ɛtɔk-a-kuddu ya balɔɔt a Jews ’bɔng mung battɛnɛ bbwak ba ele. Anaam nssɛ mung nyila lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ sa bakkpɔknɛ ka luvva Lafɔɔ a Moses, la Bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
44024015	Nyanga luttina ggwɔn ntum Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt ’bɔng mung bayanganɛ, battɛ ɔlɔɔt duu ka vveeng ’wɔng mung ayyɛɛp ɔlɔk abbɔl, abbenɛ vvenɛ afungala ka lubbe.
44024016	Nbumbong gaang gaang ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ nttɛ nyanga tɔkɔlɔ wa ppwool, nppyɛɛk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la balɔɔt.
44024017	“Likkpa ggbadam lilenɛ lɛsak ka ngbatanɛ Jerusalem, nppyɛlɛ isimisimi nsam ikkpoko nfee balɔɔt anaam. Nssɛɛn luzɔɔm ɔgbaa.
44024018	Badɔkɔ bayɛnnɛ ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ɛkɛtɛ nlenɛ kɛnaang a lɛtɔm a kikup a laggbo livve. Balɔɔt ggbadam la anaam basi lile, lɔsap lɔlɔk lusi lɛttɔ.
44024019	Ɔzzànga balɔɔt a Jews ba bassinɛ lɔfɔɔn a Asia badɔkɔ baang. Nzang abbɛ biini buffunɛ babee bannyi kamma kɛkaal abbɛ, bayanganɛ kɔlɔɔk kɔlɔk batumnɛ.
44024020	Ɔlɔk balɔɔt ’bɔng mung babwɔɔlɔ kɔlɔɔk kwa nlenɛ lɛnaang kɔbbɔl ka nbeenɛ ka lusso ikkansulu.
44024021	Ukpeke kɔlɔɔk kkwɔn kɛyɔɔng ka nlɔɔknɛ ka nbeenɛ ka lusso abbɛ. Nttɛ, ‘Mung mmwɔɔn bakkwɔɔnɛyɔngbong kɛkaal ka nyilanɛ nttɛ babbu vvenɛ bafungala bataa ka kuddu tɛ.’ ”
44024022	Felix, wa ulenɛ Ɛtɔk-a-Kuddu doddo lɛsan, uvvoong kɛkaal ɔttɛ, “Vvenɛ nkaal kɛkaal annyɔɔng ka ɛkɛtɛ Lysias, uzzilɛttɔ isɔgya, ule uffu.”
44024023	Ɔdda wa sɔgya wa ɔppyɛɛknɛ Paul ɔttɛ ɔkatmɛ. Ɔzzànga unnyimɛ kufuk ɔfɔngɔ inngwa ammɛ baffu bannyimɛ bwa ɔggyannɛ.
44024024	Bwaan a bɛtɔm bɛsaknɛ, Felix baffu la wanavva ammɛ, Drusilla, wa Jews. Ɔtɔɔm ɔkkwɔɔ Paul uffu ɔgɔpɔlɔmɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔknɛ utum kiyila kwa Jesus Christ.
44024025	Ka Paul ulenɛ baang ka ɔlɔɔknɛ utum budoddo la kɛkɔɔm-a-kɛyɔɔng, la Kɛtɔm-a-kɛkaal a vveengodde, Felix ɔbbwɔpɔmɛ ɔttɛ, “Akkwoong mung agbata amii. Vvenɛ nbbalwɔ lɛkkwɔɔ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya nle nyanga kufuk.”
44024026	Ɔdɔkɔ uttina ɔttɛ Paul vvenɛ ɔssɛɛnmɛ issɔ. Kwakkwɛ ɔkkwɔɔmɛnɛ ɛkɛtɛ duu uffu utolo kutolo la ammɛ.
44024027	Likkpa liffa lisaknɛ, Porcius Festus ɔtɔk kizzilɛttɔ ka Felix. Felix ɔdɔkɔ ɔggyan ɔttɛ ɔyyɛɛp bɛnaang la balɔɔt a Jews kwakkwɛ ɔgbatanɛ Paul ɔkɔngɔ ka igbakkɔpɔ.
44025001	Bɛtɔm bɛkkyaat bɛsaknɛ, Festus ussi Caesarea uffu Jerusalem ka ɛkpansi ’yɔng baang.
44025002	Ɔffɔnɛ bakang bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la bazzilɛttɔ balɔɔt a Jews baffu balɔɔk kwa Paul ɔnaangnɛbɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ bakaamɛ. Bakkpenge Festus battɛ uyila kwa abbɛ,
44025003	ɔfɔngɔ Paul uffu Jerusalem. Balɔɔk ka balenɛ likup lɛnaang za bale ka babeenɛ ka ɛtɔk bawwɔɔl Paul.
44025004	Festus ɔttɛ, “Paul ule ka igbakkɔpɔ ka Caesarea, ɔzzànga nle ka nppyɛlɛnɛ nmii bakang gedegede mung.
44025005	Afɔngɔyɔng bazzilɛttɔ annyɔɔng bamii Caesarea bakkwɔɔ Paul kɛkaal, ulenɛ kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ lɛnaang.”
44025006	Festus ukkwunu bɛtɔm zzɔɔp la abbɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ ufeele umii Caesarea. Ɔffɔnɛ libbessolo, umii ɔtaa ka ɔdda kɛkaal ɔttɛ bakɔɔm Paul bamii ka ɔdda kɛkaal ’wɔng baang.
44025007	Paul umii. Balɔɔt a Jews ba bassinɛ Jerusalem babee ggbii bakkpitmɛ. Bannyi imma kɛkaal ggbadam ya basinɛ likkwoong babwɔɔlɔ lɛttɔ annyɛ.
44025008	Paul ututalamɛ kɛyɔɔng ɔttɛ, “Kɔlɔɔk kɔlɔk kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ ba ntaka nnaang ntum Lafɔɔ balɔɔt a Jews, gɔɔ Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔlɔk nnaang kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ ntum Uzzilɛttɔ a Rome.”
44025009	Festus ɔdɔkɔ ɔggyan kɛyyɛɛp a bɛnaang la balɔɔt a Jews. Ɔzzánga ɔbap Paul ɔttɛ, “Vvenɛ kɔsaapwɔ amii Jerusalem bakaal kɛkaal annɔ bakang ka lusso anaam ɔɔ?”
44025010	Paul ɔttɛ, “Mung mbee ka lusso Uzzilɛttɔ a Rome, ka ɔdda kɛkaal ammɛ wa ulenɛ ɛfɛɛn ya bbwak ya bakaalnɛ kɛkaal anaam. Kɔlɔk kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ ba ntaka nnaang ntum balɔɔt a Jews tɛ̀ttɛ̀ annɔ biini asannɛkwɛ.
44025011	Bulenɛ lafɔɔ lɛbɛpɛ, ɔlɔk nnaang kɔlɔk kwa lɛttɔ anaam lile lɛssɛ, nzang baala nmma. Ɔzzànga lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk lusinɛ lile ka lilɔɔk sa bakaanɛnɛ, ɔlɔɔt wa ule ukkwoong ɔlɔmmɛ unnyibɛ ɔlɔk ba ule. Nkkpenge nttɛ Uzzilɛttɔ a Rome ɔkaal kɛkaal anaam.”
44025012	Festus ulenɛ likup la babba-bikɔɔm ammɛ livve lɛbwɔɔp, ɔppyɛlɛ Paul kamma ɔttɛ, “Ka alenɛ lɛlɔɔk attɛ Uzzilɛttɔ a Rome ɔkaal kɛkaal annɔ, vvenɛ bakɔɔmwɔ amii.”
44025013	Ɔttɛ ɔnaang, ubeet Agrippa la Bernice baffu Caesarea kikoolo a Festus.
44025014	Balenɛ likkwunu ka bwaan a bɛtɔm ssup, Festus ɔbwɔɔlɔ ubeet kɔlɔɔk a Paul ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ule mung wa Felix ɔgbatanɛ ɔkɔngɔ ka igbakkɔpɔ.
44025015	Nfeele nmii Jerusalem, bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm ba Jews ba bagɛlɛnya balɔɔk lilɔɔk sa Paul ɔnaangnɛ. Babwɔɔlɔnɛ battɛ nzang nnyibɛ lakke, bawwɔɔlmɛ.
44025016	Ɔzzánga nbwɔɔlɔbɛ nttɛ balɔɔt a Rome, ka eleme abbɛ, ba basam ɔlɔɔt wa bakaanɛ bannyi bawwɔɔl ka batakanɛ kɛkaal ammɛ lɛkaal ka lusso ɔlɔɔt wa ɔkaamɛnɛ. Ɔyanga lakke za ututalamɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng ɔgbaa.
44025017	Baffunɛ mung, ɛkɛtɛ nsi lɛbɛpɛ. Libbessolo ’zɔng baang nmii ntaa ka ɔdda kɛkaal. Ntɔɔm nttɛ bakɔɔm ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang, baffu.
44025018	Balɔɔt ba bakaamɛnɛ baffunɛ babee, basi kamma kɛkaal kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ linnyi tɛ̀ttɛ̀ nttinanɛ nttɛ vvenɛ bannyi batummɛ.
44025019	Kwa balɔɔknɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔdɔkɔ ikangala ya bakangalanɛ la ammɛ batum luzɔɔm la ɔlɔɔt bakkwɔɔmɛnɛ Jesus wa ulenɛ libbe, Paul ɔttɛ ufungalabong.
44025020	Ndɔkɔ nsi lɛsan tɛ̀ttɛ̀ nle nnaang nppyee kuttu lilɔɔk ’sɔng baang doddo. Ɔzzánga nbap Paul nttɛ vvenɛ kɔsaapmɛ umii kɛkaal ammɛ bakang ka Jerusalem ka lusso anaam nsan.
44025021	Ɔzzánga Paul ukkpenge ɔttɛ nfɔngɔmɛ ɔtaa mung ka igbakkɔpɔ; Uzzilɛttɔ a Rome ɔkaal kɛkaal ammɛ. Ɔzzánga nnyibɛ lakke nttɛ ɔtaa baang ka igbakkɔpɔ tɔttɔt nkɔɔmmɛ nfee Uzzilɛttɔ a Rome.”
44025022	Agrippa ɔlɔɔk la Festus ɔttɛ, “Anaam biini nggyan nttɛ nppyee kɔlɔɔk ammɛ kɛyɔɔng.” Festus ɔttɛ, “Vvenɛ appyeemɛ lufat.”
44025023	Ɔffɔnɛ libbessolo, Agrippa la Bernice baffu la lɛbaang abbɛ. Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ utelebɛ. Bamii bamal ka ɔdda-kɛkaal la bazzilɛttɔ isɔgya, la bazzilɛttɔ ɛkpansi ’yɔng baang. Festus ɔtɔɔm bakɔɔm Paul baffu ka tɔkɔlɔ ɔdda.
44025024	Festus ɔttɛ, “Ubeet Agrippa la balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba alenɛyɔng mung la ayyɔɔt: Ppyɛɛkyɔng ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung ulenɛ wa balɔɔt a Jews ɔkkpɛlɛ mung ka Caesarea ɔgbaa la Jerusalem balenɛnɛ lilɔɔk ppwap lɛbwɔɔlɔ batummɛ. Kɔssɔpbɛ balam imakkpa battɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔbɛlɛ liddu, bawwɔɔlmɛ.
44025025	Ɔzzànga anaam kɔlɔɔk kɔlɔk kwa ɔnaangnɛ kɔbbɔl kwa nle nzza kɛkaal ammɛ nttɛ ubbe, nsi lɛyɛn. Ammɛ biini ka ulenɛ likkpenge ɔttɛ Uzzilɛttɔ a Rome ɔkaal kɛkaal ammɛ, vvenɛ ntɔɔmmɛ, umii.
44025026	Kɔlɔɔk kwa bbwak kwa nle nkkpɔk ntummɛ nfee Uzzilɛttɔ a Rome ba ntaka nsan. Ɔzzánga nkɔɔmmɛbong nffu mung ka lusso annyɔɔng. Gaang gaang ka lusso annɔ Ubeet Agrippa, nkwaaning ilenɛ lɛttɔ kɛkaal ’sɔng lɛggyan iyɛn, tɛ́ttɛ́ bɔk nsan bwa nle nkkpɔk.
44025027	Ba kɔkkɔnɔ ka nsamnɛ ɔlɔɔt igbakkɔpɔ, nfee Uzzilɛttɔ a Rome nsimɛ lɛbwɔɔlɔ bwa bakaamɛnɛ lɛttɔ batele.”
44026001	Agrippa ɔlɔɔk la Paul ɔttɛ, “Ayangabong lakke za annyinɛ kamma kɛkaal annɔ kɛyɔɔng.” Paul ɔyaala labɔɔk ututalamɛ kɛyɔɔng ɔttɛ,
44026002	“Ubeet Agrippa! Nttina nttɛ nyyɛɛpbong lɔfɔm ka mmwɔɔn, ka nle ka ntutalanɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng ka lilɔɔk sa balɔɔt a Jews bakkwɔɔnɛnɛ kɛkaal ka lusso annɔ.
44026003	Nkwɔng kɔtta lɛyyɛɛp ka annɔ afalanɛ asan eleme balɔɔt a Jews. Nkkpengewɔ nttɛ abbe luppyam agɔpɔlɔ kwa nle ka nlɔɔknɛ.
44026004	“Balɔɔt a Jews ɔkkpɛlɛ basan eleme anaam lɔsan ka ussinɛ ka ntiinɛ ssup. Basan lɔsan ka ussinɛ ka isimi ka isimi tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɛfal anaam lilenɛ ka ntaanɛ la abbɛ ka ɛkpansi anaam biini la ɛkpansi a Jerusalem.
44026005	Abbɛ biini basan lɔsan, bakkwoong mung babwɔɔlɔ ka ussinɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya nmalnɛ kɔssɛ balɔɔt a luzɔɔm ba Pharisees.
44026006	Mung nbeebong ale ka akaalnɛyɔng kɛkaal anaam ka nlokonɛ luttina ka nsekele wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaagnɛ la balɔɔt ayyɔɔt ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ.
44026007	Nsekele ’wɔng baang ulenɛ wa isam ayyɔɔt zzɔɔppiffa battinanɛ battɛ batɔk ka balenɛ baang ka bazɔɔmnɛ bannyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kikoon la kɛtɔm. Luttina ’gwɔng baang lɔnaangnɛ tɛ, Uyini, tɛ́ttɛ́ balɔɔt a Jews bakaanɛ tɛ!
44026008	Bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ annyɔɔng asiyɔng liyila attɛyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ukkwoong mung ufungala ɔlɔɔt ka lubbe?
44026009	“Anaam biini ndɔkɔ nttina nttɛ nzang nnaang bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya nkkwoongnɛ ntum lɛkɔɔl a Jesus wa Nazareth.
44026010	Nkwɔng baang kulenɛ kwa nnaangnɛ ka Jerusalem, ntɔk lakke ka bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm, nkaa balɔɔt ba bayilanɛ kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm nssɛɛn ka igbakkɔppɔ. Ka ɛkɛtɛ ya battɛnɛ bawwɔɔlbɛ, nssɛ nyila nttɛ bawwɔɔlbɛ.
44026011	Nyɔɔbɛ akama bikkpit bikkpit ka idda mitin. Nbum nttɛ bafɔngɔ kɔlɔɔk a Jesus kɛbɛlɛ liyila. Kutunnɛ gaang gaang la abbɛ, nfeele nmii lɛffɛ Ikanakana, nyɔɔbɛ akama bakang mgbaa.
44026012	“Akkwɛ kɔdɔkɔnɛ kwa nfeelenɛ nmii Damascus la lakke la lɔdda gwa bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-Luzɔɔm baddanɛnɛ.
44026013	Uyini anaam, ɔdɔkɔ ka kasɛkɛ kikoon ka ɛtɔk ka nyɛnnɛ immwalang ka inyanyanɛ isak livve-luwee, ka issinɛ ka libat iffu ivvoongnɛ itoolo la balɔɔt ba ikkumanɛ la abbɛ.
44026014	Ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt ittɔ ka lisse, nppyee lɛmmwɔɔl ka kukaan a Hebrew ka lɛlɔɔknɛ la anaam lɛttɛ, ‘Saul! Saul! Bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ ayɔɔnɛ akama? Addopowɔ kɛyɔɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔgɔdɔ wa ulipnɛ lukut uyini ammɛ.’
44026015	Mbapmɛ nttɛ, ‘Annɔ nnyinɛ ee, Uyini?’ Ɔzzanga Uyini ɔlɔɔk la anaam ɔttɛ, ‘Anaam Jesus wa ayɔɔnɛnɛ akama;
44026016	Afeele abee-ubee, nffubong ka ɛfɛɛn annɔ, nsangawɔ, asseke bɔɔyi anaam. Amii abwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt balɔk ka alenɛnɛ lɛyɛn mmwɔɔn mung, la kwa nle nbwɔɔlɔwɔ ka ussoonɛ.
44026017	Vvenɛ nkkalawɔ ka labɔɔk a balɔɔt Israel la ikanakana ba nle ntɔɔmwɔ ka ɛfɛɛn abbɛ.
44026018	Amii awongolobɛ zzeen asangabɛ ka kisul bayɛn buppwolo. Asangabɛ ka labɔɔk a Satan annyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, nkwaaning bayanga kiyila batum Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usseke ɔsɔɔkbɛ bubbi abbɛ bayanga kɛtaa ka ɛfɛɛn a balɔɔt ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ.’
44026019	“Ubeet Agrippa, nsi kwa biyɛnɛ pyɔng baang pya nyɛnnɛ pya bissinɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛkangala.
44026020	Ntte kikopolo ka Damascus, la Jerusalem tɔttɔt nssɛ ɛkpansi a Judea nduda, ɔgbaa la ikaan ilɔk. Nkopolobɛ nttɛ banaang busannɛ ka bubbi abbɛ, basseke ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Banaang bɛnaang bya basannɛ battɛ banaangbong busannɛ ka bubbi abbɛ.
44026021	Kussi kwakkwɛ mung balɔɔt a Jews bakaanɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ a Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm babumnɛ kɛwwɔɔl.
44026022	Ɔzzànga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyaammɛbong tɔttɔt ɔffɔ ka mmwɔɔn mung. Kwakkwɛ nbeenɛ ittɛɛsɛ, nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng annyɔɔng balɔɔt ba uggboggbo la bassup lilɔɔk anaam ɔkkpɛlɛ. Kwa nlɔɔknɛ mung bbwak ulenɛ kɔlɔɔk kwa Bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la Moses balɔɔknɛ battɛ vvenɛ kɔnaang:
44026023	Battɛ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ vvenɛ ɔyɛn akama, ɔzzánga vvenɛ ɔkɔɔm ɛtɔk ufungala ka lubbe ɔyaam buppwolo kuddu ɔbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt a Jews la Ikanakana ɔkkpɛlɛ.”
44026024	Paul ututalamɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng ning mung, Festus uggbemɛ ɔttɛ, “Paul, attɔbong bikun! Lukkoop annɔ ’gwɔng baang lɔnaangwɔbong attɔ bikun!”
44026025	Paul ɔttɛ, “Dedde! Bikun ba ntaka nttɔ! lɛmmwɔɔl za nlɔɔknɛ mung ɔkkpɛlɛ lile ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
44026026	Ubeet Agrippa! Nkkwoong mung nlɔɔk la annɔ ppwool ppwool ka asannɛ lilɔɔk ’sɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ. Nsan lɔsan nttɛ appyeebong lilɔɔk ’sɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ. Lilɔɔk ’sɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ ka lalup basisɛ lɛnaang.
44026027	Ubeet Agrippa! Annɔ ayila mung kwa bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔɔ? Nsan lɔsan nttɛ ayila mung kwa abbɛ.”
44026028	Agrippa ɔlɔɔk la Paul ɔttɛ, “Attina attɛ vvenɛ anaangnɛ nsseke ɔlɔɔt wa uyilanɛ kwa Jesus eseese eseese mung ɔɔ?”
44026029	Paul ɔttɛ, “Ule gedegede mung ɔppyɛɛ ule ɛkɛtɛ ɛlɔk, luzɔɔm gwa nzɔɔmnɛ nnyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm nzɔɔm nttɛ, annɔ la ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng ba agɔpɔlɔnɛnɛyɔng mung ka kɛtɔm sa mmwɔɔn assɛ ataayɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ anaam mung, ɔzzànga bafɔngɔwɔyɔng ikpɔkɔlɔ kɛssɛɛn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bassɛɛnnɛnɛ anaam!”
44026030	Ɔzzanga Ubeet la bazzilɛttɔ ɛkpansi la Bernice, wanavva Agrippa, la balɔɔt balɔk bafeele ɔkkpɛlɛ
44026031	bamii likup. Bagbatanɛ, balɔɔk abbɛ-abbɛ battɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ ba ɔtaka ɔnaang kwa battɛnɛ bawwɔɔlmɛ ɔlɔk bassɛɛnmɛ igbakkɔpɔ.”
44026032	Ɔzzanga Agrippa ɔlɔɔk la Festus ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung butakanɛ Uzzilɛttɔ a Rome likkpenge ɔttɛ ɔkaal kɛkaal ammɛ, nzang ikkwoong mung ikkyaamɛ ifɔngɔ.”
44027001	Batininɛ battɛ issɛ ka akkpaat imii Italy, basanga Paul la balɔɔt igbakkɔpɔ balɔk batɔɔm bafee Julius, uzzilɛttɔ isɔgya wa ɔppyɛɛknɛ lalɔp isɔgya kubbwɔɔk, ya izzanganɛ ‘Isɔgya Uzzilɛttɔ a Rome.’
44027002	Imal ka akkpaat wa lɛbaang a lɛbaang wa ulenɛ ka kɛgbata ka Adramyttium kimii ka lagga za ɛkpansi a Asia iwaat imii. Aristarchus wa ussinɛ Thessalonica ka Macedonia ɔdɔkɔ baang la ayyɔɔt.
44027003	Ɔffɔnɛ libbessolo, iffɔ ka Sidon. Julius ɔyyɛɛp bɛnaang la Paul, ɔfɔngɔmɛ umii ɔyɛn inngwa ammɛ, bannyimɛ bwa ɔggyannɛ.
44027004	Ifeele ka ussinɛ baang iwaat, keem ka imiinɛ lusso gwa kɛffa kissinɛ ippyɛɛ isseke ka iwaatnɛ ka lufoom a Cyprus gwa kɛffa kisinɛ lɛkkaam.
44027005	Ikum lihu ka isaknɛ Cilicia la Pamphylia imii, iffɔ Myra ka ɛkpansi a Lycia.
44027006	Iffɔnɛ baang, uzzilɛttɔ isɔgya ɔyɛn akkpaat wa lɛbaang wa ussinɛ Alexandria ule ka kimii Italy, ɔzzánga ɔssɛɛnyɛlɛ ka akkpaat ’wɔng baang.
44027007	Iwaat bɛtɛ-bɛtɛ la akama la akama ka bɛtɔm ppwap tɔttɔt iffɔ ka asaknɛ lɛffɛ Cnidus, kɛffa kisiyɛlɛ lɛbɛlɛ liyila imii lusso lusso ’gwɔng baang. Ɔzzánga isseke ka iwaatnɛ kuttɔɔk ka lufoom a likkpɔ ɛkpansi za lɛzzanganɛ Crete, ka ɛfɛɛn a kɛffa kisinɛ lɛkkaam. Isak ka Lɛgga Salmone.
44027008	Iwaat lufoom lufoom ikkɛtɛ likum. Ilenɛ libum kɔbɛtɛyɛlɛ, iffu iffɔ ka ɛfɛɛn ya bakkwɔɔnɛyɛ Lɛgga Bɔppwa-kkwɔɔt. Ka ussinɛ baang umii killu a Lasea ba ufulu.
44027009	Itaa baang ɛkɛtɛ ɛlɔm, ɔddɔkɔddɔkɔ kɔbbɔl kɛwaat kimii lusso lusso, ka Kɛtɔm-a-laggele-kɛsɔɔk-a-bubbi kilenɛ lɛsak. Ɔzzánga Paul ɔbbabɛ bikɔɔm ɔttɛ,
44027010	“Bwaanbwalam, nyɛnbong nsan nttɛ, kɔssɛ ayyɔɔt vvenɛ kɔbbɔlyɛlɛ ka ussinɛ mung umii lusso lusso. Kɛbɛpɛ vvenɛ kɛttala ka lɛtɔkɔ la akkpaat biini, ɔbɛtɛ la lafal a balɔɔt.”
44027011	Ɔzzànga uzzilɛttɔ isɔgya ’wɔng baang ɔdɔkɔ uyila kwa uzzilɛttɔ akkpaat la ɔwaat akkpaat balɔɔknɛ, ufim kwa Paul.
44027012	Lɛgga ’zɔng baang ba lɛyyɛɛp za ɔlɔɔt ɔtaanɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ a lukook. Ɔzzànga balɔɔt ggbadam kɔdɔkɔ kɔsaapbɛ kɛwaat tɔttɔt kimii ɔlɔk bakkwoongnɛ baffɔ lɛgga za lɛzzanganɛ Phoenix. Phoenix ɔdɔkɔnɛ lɛgga za lilenɛ ka Crete za lɛppyɛɛknɛ lusso livve-luwee kulele. Bakkwoong mung bataa baang ka ɛkɛtɛ lukook.
44027013	Kɛffa za bɛtɛbɛtɛ kissi kuttɔɔk a lɔfɔɔn kɛffa kiffu, ɔzzánga balɔɔt ’bɔng baang battina kifeele kɔssɛ. Bakkyaa kizzi akkpaat bawaat lufoom lufoom bakkɛtɛ likum a Crete.
44027014	Usi lɛmmɛ, kɛffa sa lɛbaang a lɛbaang kissi libat a lɔfɔɔn ka lusso gwa livve-luwee lɔfɔm, kissi ka ukkpɔ ɛkpansi kɛffa kiffu.
44027015	Kilip akkpaat isi lɛbɛlɛ likkwoong iwaat imii lusso gwa lɛffa kissinɛ. Ɔzzánga ikkyaa kɛwaat ifɔngɔ, kɛffa kɛffamɛ kimii ka ɛfɛɛn a kɔsaapnɛsɛ.
44027016	Ɔzzánga iwaat lufoom a lufoom kuttɔɔk a lɔfɔɔn a likkpɔ ɛkpansi Cauda, ka ɛfɛɛn a kɛffa kisinɛ lɛkkaam. Ibumnɛ, izzeme iloko waan akkpaat wa utiti doddo.
44027017	Basangamɛ batele ka libat akkpaat wa lɛbaang. baggbɔmɛ bizzi bakaka. Ɔbwɔpɔbɛ battɛ vvenɛ ɔtɔkɔbɛ umii ka kususuk kwa likum za Libya. Ɔzzánga batɛt kɛwaat, bafɔngɔ kɛffa kitutmɛ bɛtɛbɛtɛ kimii.
44027018	Kɛffa bannyi sa lɛbaang ’sɔng baang kɛ̀ffá tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛffanɛ baang. Ɔzzánga ɔffɔnɛ libbessolo, bassang bɛfɛɛn ka tɔkɔlɔ bassɛɛn ka bannyi.
44027019	Ɔbbalnɛ libbessolo za zzɔn lɛffɔ, bassang bɛfɛɛn akkpaat ka labɔɔk abbɛ biini ballɔt.
44027020	Isi livve-luwee gɔɔ bwaanttuma lɛyɛn ka bɛtɔm ggbadam. Kɛffa bannyi ’sɔng baang sa lɛbaang kile baang ka kɛffanɛ gaang gaang. Ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt isumala kwa kuddu.
44027021	Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang balenɛ lɛwaat ɛkɛtɛ ɛlɔm, buwɔɔng a buwɔɔng, Paul ufeele ubeebɛ ka lusso ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Bwaanbwalam, bulenɛ ka ayilanɛyɔng kwa anaam, nzang gɔɔ ka Crete isi lissi iwaatyɔng. Nzang itunubong kɛbɛpɛ ’sɔng la kɛtaka lafal.
44027022	Ɔzzànga nkkpengewɔyɔng nttɛ akkaamyɔng luppyam!; ɔlɔɔt vvɔn gbɔɔ wa ule ɔtaka lɛfal ammɛ mung ba ule. Ukpeke akkpaat kɛyɔɔng ka ule ɔtaak.
44027023	Lisee kɛtɔm, uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ulenɛ wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa nzɔɔmnɛ nnyi, uffu ukupnɛ.
44027024	Ɔlɔɔk la anaam ɔttɛ, ‘Paul, tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔbbwɔpɔwɔ! Nkkpa kɔnaang vvenɛ abee ka lusso Uzzilɛttɔ a Rome. Ɔgbaa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la budoddo ammɛ, ɔsambong kuddu balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ ba alenɛyɔng ka akkpaat vvɔn la abbɛ unnyiwɔ’.
44027025	Kule ning tɛ bwaanbwalam, kkaamyɔng luppyam kkpɔk! Anaam nyanga kiyila ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm nttɛ vvenɛ kule ning baang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔbwɔɔlɔnɛnɛ.
44027026	Ɔzzànga vvenɛ ɔffayɛlɛ umii ufik ka likkpɔ ɛkpansi lɛlɔk.”
44027027	Ɔdɔkɔ kɛtɔm sa kɛnaangnɛ bɛtɔm ɔsɛlɛzzil ka kɛffa kɛffanɛyɛlɛ ka lihu za bakkwɔɔnɛzɛ Mediterrenean. Ɔffɔnɛ ka kasɛkɛ kɛtɔm, bawaat akkpaat battina battɛ ile ka iffɔnɛ kɛtɛkɛtɛ ɛkpansi.
44027028	Ɔzzánga basam okkili, basiki ka lɛttaal, basinimɛ bassɛɛn ka lihu basan tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔddɔngnɛ ɔffɔ. Bayɛn basan battɛ ule lalɔp a bukkpɔ bwalaaning ka bɔddɔng. Baffɔnɛ ka lusso babbal ning baang lɛnaang. Bakɔɔlɔ battɛ usseke lalɔp a bukkpɔ lanna la bukkpɔ zzɔɔp ka bɔddɔng.
44027029	Ɔbbwɔpɔbɛ ka banngwanɛ battɛ akkpaat ayyɔɔt vvenɛ umii ulip ka lattaal. Ɔzzánga basini ikkili inna ya ibwɔɔpnɛ akkpaat bassɛɛn ka bannyi ka isimi a akkpaat, babee baang bazɔɔm battɛ ussolo.
44027030	Bawaat-akkpaat babum kɛtta ka tɔkɔlɔ akkpaat kɛmma. Basini akkpaat wa utiti bassɛɛn ka bannyi, babbwa battɛ abbɛ bamii basiki ikkili ka akkpaat wa lɛbaang.
44027031	Ɔzzánga Paul ɔlɔɔk la uzzilɛttɔ ɔttɛ, “Bawaat-akkpaat ’bɔng mung basinɛ ka akkpaat lɛtaa baala baddu.”
44027032	Ɔzzánga isɔgya izza ikkili ’yɔng baang ya ilɔmnɛ akkpaat, bafɔngɔ akkpaat umii.
44027033	Ka ule ka ussolonɛ, Paul ukkpengebɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔttɛ bazzi kazzi. Ɔttɛ, “Ataabong akatyɔng ka bɛtɔm ɔsɛlɛzzil bulɔk ba azziyɔng.
44027034	Nkkpengewɔyɔng nttɛ azziyɔng kazzi, nkwaaning adduyɔng. Gɔɔ eggbe kittulu annyɔɔng nnyɔn gbɔɔ baala ɛtaak.”
44027035	Ulenɛ ’kwɔng livve lɛlɔɔk, Paul ɔsam brɛɛd, uwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang ka lusso abbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔbɛkɛ uzzi.
44027036	Bakkaam luppyam ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ bassɛ bazzi kazzi.
44027037	Idɔkɔ ile lalɔp a balɔɔt zzɔɔppalakkyaat la balɔɔt zzillavvɔn ka tɔkɔlɔ.
44027038	Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ulenɛ kazzi lizzi tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kaddumɛnɛ, banaang akkpaat uffeke ka basamnɛ issɔ kazzi bassɛɛn ka lihu.
44027039	Ussolonɛ, bawaat-akkpaat likum basi lɛbɛlɛ lɛkɔɔlɔ. Bayɛn kususuk, ɔzzánga battɛ kulenɛ lɛsak lɛttala bawaat akkpaat bamii ka kususuk ’kwɔng baang.
44027040	Ɔzzánga babbɔk bizzi akkpaat, usseke akkpaat upiti. Bakkyaa ikkili ya basikinɛ ka ifeet-akkpaat. Bafeele bamii bayaala ubba ka lusso akkpaat nkwaaning kɛffa kɛffa akkpaat kimii lusso gwa likum.
44027041	Keem akkpaat umii ulip ka likum za lilenɛ kususuk a kususuk. Lusso akkpaat lufula ka tɔkɔlɔ a kususuk, akkpaat usi lɛbɛlɛ likkwoong ɔssɛ. Ɔzzanga labba-bannyi latup lɔnnyɔ akkpaat labwɔɔt kyɛkɛkyɛkɛ.
44027042	Isɔgya banaang likup za kɛwwɔɔl a balɔɔt igbakkɔpɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔlɔɔt vvɔn gbɔɔ uffu uwook ukum ɔsɛɛm.
44027043	Keem uzzilɛttɔ isɔgya ɔggyan ɔttɛ akkala Paul. Ɔzzánga utunubɛ ɔttɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ banaang ning baang. Ɔppyɛɛ ɔdda balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba bakkwoongnɛ ewoko ɔttɛ bakɔɔm ɛtɔk bakut battɔ ka bannyi bawook bamii ka likum.
44027044	Ba bassekenɛ balɔm ka bɛfaak a bɛssɛ, ɔlɔk ka bɛfaak akkpaat bya bɛbɛpɛnɛ bakupbɛ. Nkwɔng kulenɛ kwa kɔnaangnɛ ikkwoong ikum bɛlɛng-bɛlɛng imii kukupa.
44028001	Ikumnɛ bɛlɛng-bɛlɛng ɔkkpɛlɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ bɔk isan ittɛ likkpɔ ɛkpansi ’zɔng baang bakkwɔɔzɛ Malta.
44028002	Balɔɔt a lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang bayyɛɛp bɛnaang la ayyɔɔt gaang gaang. Utte kiteep. Buyili bunaang, baddoyɛlɛ lɔkɔɔn iwupa, bazɔnɔyɛlɛ kɔssɛ.
44028003	Paul ɔttɔng kifat imele, ule ka kɛssɛɛn ka lɔkɔɔn, ɛzzɔkɔ ɛtta ka imele ka eppyeenɛ kɛfɔɔp a lɔkɔɔn ekkpitmɛ ka kɔbɔɔk.
44028004	Balɔɔt a lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang bayɛnnɛ ɛzzɔkɔ ka ekkpitnɛ Paul ka kɔbɔɔk, balɔɔk abbɛ-abbɛ battɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung ɔwwɔɔl-a-balɔɔt. Ebinukkpaapi baala eyilamɛ uddu, nkkpa ndɔk ule lɛsɛɛm ka lɔyɔngɔ.”
44028005	Ɔzzanga Paul ɔmmyang ɛzzɔkɔ ’yɔng baang ɔssɛɛn ka lɔkɔɔn. Bulɔk esimɛ lɛnaang.
44028006	Badɔkɔ bakat battɛ bayɛn ka kɔbɔɔk kule kɔbɔkmɛ, ɔlɔk ɔttɔ ubbe kitipili. Bakat ɔmmɛ, kɔlɔk basi lɛyɛn ka kɔnaangmɛnɛ. Bafoolo ittina abbɛ battɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung ebinukkpaapi!”
44028007	Ule kɛtɛkɛtɛ bɔtɔɔm a Publius, ubeet a likkpɔ ɛkpansi ’zɔng baang ɔtɔkyɛlɛ ɔssɛɛn ka ssala ka laggele. Izzanga bakekeen ammɛ ka bɛtɔm bɛkkyaat.
44028008	Abassɛ Publius ɔdɔkɔ ka igolo ka umininɛ ka usimɛnɛ lɛppwa. Ɔfaakmɛ buyili la kɛtak. Paul ufeele umii ukupmɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ a gwoon utelemɛ labɔɔk, ɔzɔɔm unnyimɛ ɔppwamɛ.
44028009	Nkwɔng kɔnaangnɛ, balɔɔt iffaak ɔkkpɛlɛ ka likkpɔ ɛkpansi ’zɔng baang baffu, Paul uttulabɛ ɔppwabɛ.
44028010	Basɔɔkyɛlɛ lasɔɔk ppwap. Ɔffɔnɛ ka ile ka igbatanɛ, bannyiyɛlɛ bɛfɛɛn ggbadam ikɔɔm imii kɔssɛ.
44028011	Ittuma ikkyaat isaknɛ, imal ka akkpaat wa bakɔlɔmɛnɛ, “Ibinukkpaapi ippɛlɛng” ka Alexandria. Akkpaat ’wɔng baang ɔggba baang lile ka uffunɛ ɔtaa ka ɛkɛtɛ lukook.
44028012	Iffɔnɛ Syracuse, itaa baang ka bɛtɔm bɛkkyaat.
44028013	Itteet baang iwaat imii iffɔ ka lɛffɛ za lɛzzanganɛ Rhegium. Ɔffɔnɛ libbessolo, kɛffa kissi kuttɔɔk a lɔfɔɔn kɛffa. Ɔggbanɛ bɛtɔm bɛffa, iffɔ ka lɛffɛ za lɛzzanganɛ Puteoli.
44028014	Iyɛn balɔɔt balɔk ba bayilanɛ kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm baang. Bakkpengeyɛlɛ battɛ itaa la abbɛ ka liwaazɛ. Ɔzzánga iffu iffɔ Rome.
44028015	Balɔɔt a luzɔɔm ayyɔɔt bappyeenɛ ning baang, baffu baffɔ ka kappya Appius, la ɛfɛɛn ya bakkwɔɔnɛyɛ Ssoon-a-Kɛfɛkɛlɛ-Likkyaat battɛ bassɛ badudayɛlɛ. Paul ɔyɛnnɛbɛ, uwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang, luppyam lɔppyɛlɛmɛ.
44028016	Iffɔnɛ Rome, bafɔngɔ Paul ɔtaa kɛyɔɔng la wa sɔgya ɔkatmɛ.
44028017	Bɛtɔm bɛkkyaat bɛsaknɛ, Paul ɔkkwɔɔ baggboggbo balɔɔt a Jews mitin. Baggbanɛ ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Ikpana anaam! Balɔɔt ayyɔɔt bulɔk bɛ ba ntaka nnaang ɔlɔk vvenɛ nyaa lafɔɔ za lassinɛyɛlɛ ka balɔɔt ayyɔɔt ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ. Bakaanɛ bassɛɛn igbakkɔpɔ ka Jerusalem, basikilinɛ bannyi balɔɔt a Rome.
44028018	Balɔɔt a Rome babapnɛ ibap baggyannɛ kɛsanga ka igbakkɔpɔ, ka basinɛ bulɔk bwa nnaangnɛ bubbɔl lɛsan.
44028019	Keem balɔɔt a Jews bafim ’kwɔng baang. Akkwɛ baang kɔnaangnɛnɛ nmii mkkpenge Uzzilɛttɔ a Rome nttɛ ɔkaal kɛkaal anaam, mkkpa nsɛlɛ bwa nkkwɔɔnɛ balɔɔt anaam kɛkaal ntum lɛttɔ.
44028020	Kwakkwɛ nggyannɛ nttɛ nyɛnwɔyɔng usseke nlɔɔk kɔlɔɔk la annyɔɔng. Ikpɔkɔlɔ ’yɔng mung bassɛɛnnɛ ka lɛttɔ ɔlɔɔt wa balɔɔt a Israel bakatnɛ battɛ vvenɛ uffu.”
44028021	Balɔɔk la ammɛ battɛ, “Luvva lɔlɔk gwa lussinɛ Judea lutumwɔ ba itaka iyɛn. Gɔɔ balɔɔt a lɔkaan ayyɔɔt ba bassinɛ bakang baffu kɔlɔɔk kɔlɔk yɛlɛ ba bataka babwɔɔlɔ batumwɔ, ɔlɔk balɔɔk kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ batumwɔ.
44028022	Ɔzzànga iggyan ittɛ ippyee luttina annɔ. Isan lɔsan ittɛ lutini bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ balɔɔk batum kɛkaan ’sɔng mung sa annɔ alenɛ ka assɛ.”
44028023	Ɔzzánga bassɛɛn livve la Paul baloko. Balɔɔt ggbadam baffu ka livve ’zɔng baang ka ɛfɛɛn a Paul ɔtaanɛ. Ussi lɔfɔm ukopolobɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm tɔttɔt usul. Ɔggyan ɔttɛ ɔkkwɔɔ Lafɔɔ a Moses la likkpɔk a bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm nkwaaning bayila kwa Jesus.
44028024	Balɔɔt balɔk bayila lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng baang, balɔk bafim kiyila.
44028025	a Ɔzzánga Paul ɔlɔɔk la abbɛ ɔttɛ, “Kɔlɔɔk kwa Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔtɔɔmnɛ Uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔzzanganɛ Isaiah ɔbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt annyɔɔng ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
44028026	Isaiah ɔttɛ, ‘Amii alɔɔk la balɔɔt ’bɔng baang attɛ: Vvenɛ agɔpɔlɔyɔng alɔngɔlɔ agɔpɔlɔyɔng, ɔzzànga baala appyeeyɔng; Vvenɛ appyɛɛkyɔng alɔngɔlɔ appyɛɛkyɔng, ɔzzanga baala ayɛnyɔng.
44028027	Lɔtan a balɔɔt ’bɔng mung lubutbongbɛ, balakabong latɔɔk bavvoong zzeen ɔgbaa. Usinɛ ning lile nzang zzeen abbɛ layɛn mung, Latɔɔk abbɛ lappyee lagbaa. Vvenɛ ippyam abbɛ isan, bayila kwa anaam, nttulabɛ. Ebinukkpaapi ɛlɔɔknɛ ning.’
44028028	Ɔzzánga Paul utele lɛttɔ ɔttɛ, “Asan attɛyɔng bɔtɔɔm a kuddu bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔɔmnɛ buffɔbong ikanakana. Vvenɛ bagɔpɔlɔ!” [
44028029	Paul ulenɛ ’kwɔng livve lɛlɔɔk, balɔɔt a Jews bagbata la kɔwɔlɔ la kɔwɔlɔ bamii.]
44028030	Paul ullu baang ka likkpa liffa ka ggwoon gwa ɔtɔknɛ umini ukkpele ikkpoko. Ɔtɔk balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba baffunɛ bayɛnmɛ ka laggele.
44028031	Ukopolo utum Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la lakke ammɛ. Ukopolo utum Uyini, Jesus Christ ɔlɔɔk kɔlɔɔk ppwool ppwool ɔkkyaamɛ.
45001001	Lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng lissi ka anaam Paul, bɔɔyi a Christ Jesus, Uyilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus, wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkwɔɔnɛnɛ ɔsanganɛ ɔttɛ nbwɔɔlɔ Kuttu-Budoddo ammɛ.
45001002	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggba balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ Kuttu-Budoddo ’kwɔng mung lisekele ɔttɛ bappyee-kutolo ammɛ bakkpɔk kwɛ ka Luvva ammɛ.
45001003	Kuttu ’kwɔng mung kutum Waan ammɛ, Uyini ayyɔɔt Jesus Christ: ka kɛfal ammɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt, badɔkɔ bamaatmɛ ka kikkwu a David.
45001004	Ka ulenɛ Ebinukkpaapi ɔsɛlɛ bubbi, ɔtta la lakke za lɛbaang ɔzzánga Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka kifungala sa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ufungalamɛnɛ ka lubbe.
45001005	Kussi ka lɛttɔ a Christ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyinɛ lakke za kɛzzanga uyilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ, nkwaaning nnaang Ikanakana ɔkkpɛlɛ bayila kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm batelemɛ.
45001006	Nkwɔng mung ɔgbaa kɔssɛ kule kwa annyɔɔng balɔɔt ba alenɛyɔng ka Rome, ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ lɛssang ɔttɛ aleyɔng balɔɔt a Jesus Christ.
45001007	Kwakkwɛ mung nkkpɔknɛ nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng ba alenɛyɔng ka Rome ba asaapnɛyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulewɔyɔng lɛkkwɔɔ ɔttɛ annyɔɔng balɔɔt ammɛ: Numa Dedde ayyɔɔt, Ebinukkpaapi, la Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, banaangwɔyɔng ppyɛɛ; bannyiwɔyɔng bɔkaat.
45001008	Ka kɛkɔɔm ɛtɔk, nssɛbong ka labɔɔk a Jesus Christ nwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang nnyiwɔyɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ, ka ɛkpansi ɔkkpɛlɛ elenɛ kiyila annyɔɔng lippyee.
45001009	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ukkwoong mung ɔyɔɔwɔyɔng asan attɛyɔng kwa nlɔɔknɛ kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Ammɛ ulenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ntelenɛ la luppyam anaam ɔkkpɛlɛ nbwɔɔlɔ Kuttu-Budoddo Waan Ammɛ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsan lɔsan ɔttɛ nkkewɔyɔng mung ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ya nssɛɛnnɛ luzɔɔm.
45001010	Nbap Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm nttɛ ka kiggwoom a kɔlɔɔk ammɛ, ɔnaangnɛ vvenɛ nffu nkoolowɔyɔng gedegede mung.
45001011	Nggyan nttɛ nyɛnwɔyɔng nkwaaning nnaangwɔyɔng assɛ ayangayɔng ppyɛɛ wa ussinɛ ka Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ule ɔnaangwɔyɔng akkaamyɔng.
45001012	Nlɔɔk nttɛ anaam la annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ itteleyɛlɛ kɛyɔɔng ɛkɛtɛ nnyɔn, kiyila annyɔɔng vvenɛ kittelenɛ anaam, sa anaam kittelewɔyɔng annyɔɔng.
45001013	Ikpana anaam nggyan nttɛ akkeyɔng nkwɔng tɛ: Bikkpit biyipibong bya nnaangnɛ luttina nttɛ nffu nkoolowɔyɔng. Ɔzzànga bɔfɛɛn bule baang bwa butununɛ kiffu. Nggyan nttɛ nyanga balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ kiyila ggbadam ka annyɔɔng ɔgbaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ nyanganɛ ka Ikanakana.
45001014	Kɔbɛtɛnɛ kwa balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ. Kwa balɔɔt ba bawongolonɛ zzeen la balɔɔt ba basinɛ kɔlɔɔk lɛsan. Kɔbɛtɛnɛ kwa balɔɔt ba basannɛ luvva la ba basinɛ luvva lɛsan.
45001015	Kwakkwɛ kɔbɛtɛnɛnɛ nttɛ nssɛ nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng balɔɔt ba alenɛyɔng ka Rome Kuttu-Budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
45001016	Nyanga kɛkkaam a luppyam sa lɛbaang ntum Kuttu-Budoddo a Jesus Christ. Akkwɛ kulenɛ lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm za lakkalanɛ balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba bayanganɛ kiyila. Ka kɛkɔɔm ɛtɔk, lakkala balɔɔt a Jews la Ikanakana ɔgbaa.
45001017	Kuttu-Budoddo kɔbwɔɔlɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔngɔlɔnɛ balɔɔt bataa bbwak la ammɛ. Ule kɛkɔɔm a kiyila keem ka ussinɛ ka lutte umii ɔffɔ ka lakpeke. Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyanganɛ kiyila Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangmɛ bbwak la ammɛ, vvenɛ uddu.”
45001018	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyɔɔbong binyanga ammɛ. Bissi ka libat biffu bivvoong balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba banaangnɛ bubbi, ba babbu linaang abbɛ livvoongnɛ lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk, balɔɔt basikwɛ lɛyɛn.
45001019	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyɔɔbongbɛ akama ka kɔlɔɔk ammɛ kwa balɔɔt busannɛ kulebɛ kpelegedee. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm biini ɔnaangnɛkwɛ ɔyɔɔbɛ kkpelegedee.
45001020	Ka ussinɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔmnɛ ɛkpansi, iggba ilemɛ ammɛ kkpelegedee lɛyɛn ya nzang businɛ likkwoong iyɛn, la lakke ammɛ za kɛfal a kɛfal ka ulenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Balɔɔt bakkwoong mung bakɔɔlɔyɛ ka bɛfɛɛn bya ulenɛ lɛnaang. Lakkpenge lalɔk ba bayanga ffet a ffet.
45001021	Basan Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔsan, ɔzzànga latele za bulenɛ za ammɛ, mɛ ba bannyi, gɔɔ vvenɛ bawomomɛ kɛnaang. Lutini ’gwɔng ittina abbɛ isseke bɔfɛɛn bwa gbɔɔ, kifoloko ippyam abbɛ isseke kisul a kisul.
45001022	Battɛ abbɛ basan kɔlɔɔk, nsakalakang bazingizingi.
45001023	Lutini gwa bazɔɔmnɛ bannyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa usinɛ libbe, bappyɛɛ bazɔɔm bwaan ilɔɔp bya banaangnɛbyɛ bɛbal ɔlɔɔt wa ule ubbe, ɔlɔk bunɔɔn, ɔlɔk isɛɛn a kɛmat ɔlɔk izzɔkɔ.
45001024	Balɔɔt ka balenɛ bazingizingi, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyibongbɛ babbu bɛfɛɛn bya ippyam abbɛ iggyannɛ ittɛ inaang. Basseke ka banaangnɛ bɛfɛɛn izzit abbɛ abbɛ.
45001025	Bafoolobong lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kusseke lɛlaak. Bappyɛɛ bazɔɔm bɛfɛɛn bya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔmnɛ lutini buzɔɔmnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm biini wa ulenɛ wa kibungu kɛfal a kɛfal! Kulening.
45001026	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsambong balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ ’kwɔng mung ɔssɛɛn ka akama wa izzit. Gɔɔ bwanavva basikilibong eleme kimini la bwalam, bappyɛɛ bamini abbɛ abbɛ.
45001027	Kule kɛssanga ssɔn. Bwaanbwalam bakkyaa kikup a bwanavva bafɔngɔ, bappyɛɛ bakup abbɛ abbɛ. Balɔɔt basseke ka banaangnɛ bɛfɛɛn izzit la ba abbɛ. Vvenɛ bayɛn akama wa baggyannɛ ka babbu linaang sa banaangnɛ baang.
45001028	Balɔɔt ka balenɛ lifim kɛssɛɛn a kɛsan a kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm sa bbwak ka luppyam, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsambong babbu ittina ɔssɛɛnbɛ ka ippyam nkwaaning banaang bɛfɛɛn bya businɛ lɛnaang.
45001029	Ussekebɛ ibbyap ibbyap ka ippyam ɔkkpɛlɛ. Kɛnaang a bubbi, kuwɔnɔk, izzit, basseke luleep a luleep. Bawwɔɔl balɔɔt, ballu kullu, bafɛɛt ifɛtɛ la latun, balɔɔk babbɛ ka isimi.
45001030	Balɔɔk kɔlɔɔk a bubbi batum balɔɔt. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bɛ ba ɔsaap. Bassɛɛn balɔɔt ka izzit, ɔkkyaabɛ banaang kamma. Battina itɔk ggbadam ya kɛnaang a bubbi. Ibassɛ abbɛ ba batele.
45001031	Luppyam lɔbbɔlbɛ, nsekele ba baloko. Kɔlɔɔk ba baggwoom la babbɛ. Ɔlɔɔt lɛttɔ bɛ ba ubbe.
45001032	Basan lɔsan battɛ Lafɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lattɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔnaangnɛ lilɔɔk ’sɔng vvenɛ ubbe. Ɔzzànga basi lɛttɛ ɔkɔɔngbɛ kɛnaang a bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng baang, babbal balɔɔt balɔk ba banaangnɛbyɛ libungu.
45002001	Inngwa anaam, annyɔɔng annyiyɔng mung balɔɔt balɔk kibbi ɔɔ? Lakkpenge ba ayangayɔng ffet a ffet mkkpa ale ɔlɔɔt wa ale wa ale. Bɔfɛɛn bwa annyinɛyɔng balɔɔt balɔk kibbi, annyɔɔng assɛ anaangyɔng kɛssanga kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng baang kkwɔn ka abbɛ banaangnɛ, awwɔɔlwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng.
45002002	Isan lɔsan ittɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule bbwak ka unnyinɛ balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ kɛssanga lilɔɔk ’sɔng mung kibbi.
45002003	Inngwa anaam, annyɔɔng biini anaangyɔng bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung bya annyinɛyɔng balɔɔt kibbi ka abbyɛ. Attina attɛ vvenɛ attayɔng ka kɛkaal Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔɔ?
45002004	Vvenɛ baang afimyɔng kiggwoom a kɔlɔɔk ammɛ la kɛbbwa ifim sa ɔbbwanɛ ɔppyɛɛkwɔyɔng ka kibbe luppyam nsan. Asanyɔng lɔsan ka lɔkkwɔɔn attɛyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uggwoom kɔlɔɔk ka ubumnɛ ɔttɛ ɔnaangwɔyɔng anaangyɔng busannɛ ka bubbi bwa anaangnɛyɔng.
45002005	Keem ayangayɔng kɛkkaam a luppyam sa asinɛyɔng kɔlɔɔk lippyee. Anaangyɔngbong akama wa annyɔɔng vvenɛ ɔtta liggbenge ka kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang sa binyanga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la kɛkaal ammɛ sa bbwak kile kissolo.
45002006	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule unnyi lutini ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn lɛsɔɔk ɔssanga bwa ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔt ulenɛ lɛnaang.
45002007	Balɔɔt balɔk banaang budoddo ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ baggyan budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la latele la kuddu kwa kusinɛ likpeke. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule unnyi balɔɔt ’bɔng baang kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal.
45002008	Balɔɔt balɔk bassɔp bɔfɛɛn. Bafim kwa kulenɛ bbwak, bakup kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ. Kwa abbɛ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔnyanga gaang gaang la abbɛ.
45002009	Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba banaangnɛ bubbi, vvenɛ bayɛn akama bappyee bɔssɔp. Balɔɔt a Jews vvenɛ bakɔɔm ɛtɔk bayɛn akama ’wɔng baang tɛ́ttɛ́ kɛbap kɛffɛlɛ Ikanakana.
45002010	Ɔzzànga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ unnyi balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba banaangnɛ lilɔɔk sa liyyɛɛpnɛ budoddo ammɛ, la latele la bɔkaat. Ule ɔkɔɔm ɛtɔk unnyi balɔɔt a Jews tɛ́ttɛ́ unnyi Ikanakana.
45002011	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule ɔkaal kɛkaal a balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ bbwak bbwak. Kilup a libbu ba kile.
45002012	Ikanakana Lafɔɔ a Moses ba bayanga, banaang bubbi bassɛ la abbwɛ, ɔzzànga kwa basinɛ Lafɔɔ a Moses liloko lissi. Balɔɔt a Jews bayanga Lafɔɔ a Moses, ka banaangnɛ bubbi bakɔɔm Lafɔɔ ’zɔng baang bakaal kɛkaal abbɛ.
45002013	Kippyee Lafɔɔ lissi kɛnaangnɛ balɔɔt bataa bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ule kɛnaang kwa Lafɔɔ lalɔɔknɛ.
45002014	Ikanakana Lafɔɔ ba bayanga, ɔzzànga ɛkɛtɛ ya kɔsaapnɛ luppyam abbɛ, banaang kwa Lafɔɔ lalɔɔknɛ. Abbɛ biini balenɛ lifɔɔ abbɛ mkkpa basi Lafɔɔ lɛyanga.
45002015	Linaang abbɛ liyɔɔnɛ isan ittɛ bakkpɔkbong bwa Lafɔɔ lalɔɔknɛ bassɛnbɛ ka ippyam. Ippyam abbɛ ɔgbaa iyɔɔyɛlɛ isan ittɛ nkwɔng kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn ka ittina abbɛ innyinɛbɛ kibbi ɛkɛtɛ ɛlɔk, ɛkɛtɛ ɛlɔk ibee la abbɛ.
45002016	Ka kulenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Kuttu-Budoddo kwa nbwɔɔlɔnɛ, kùlé kúlè ning baang ka kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang sa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule ɔkɔɔm Jesus Christ ɔkaal kɛkaal ittina lalup a balɔɔt.
45002017	Annɔ bɛɛ? Akkwɔɔwɔ kɛyɔɔng attɛ annɔ ɔlɔɔt a Jew; kɔbɛtɛwɔ kwa Lafɔɔ, anaang kamma kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm;
45002018	asan lɔsan bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyannɛ ɔttɛ anaang. Ɔgbaa, akkoopbong Lafɔɔ asan kwa kulenɛ bbwak.
45002019	Asan lɔsan kkpelegedee attɛ annɔ alenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔkɔɔmnɛ bassi-ifim ɛtɔk. Annɔ alenɛ buppwolo balɔɔt ba batiinɛ ka kisul.
45002020	Annɔ alenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔbbanɛ bazingizingi bikɔɔm, ale ɔlɔɔt wa ukopolonɛ bwɔɔntiti kɔlɔɔk. Ka ɛtɔk ya Lafɔɔ, luttina lulewɔ bɛlɛng attɛ asanbong ɔkkpɛlɛ azzɛ affata ɔbɛtɛ la lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk.
45002021	Akopolo balɔɔt balɔk, bɔng asiwɔnɛ kɛyɔɔng likopolo? Ka akopolonɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm attɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ayip.” Annɔ biini ayip mung ɔɔ?
45002022	Attɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akup wanavva ɔlɔɔt.” Annɔ akup mung wanavva ɔlɔɔt ɔɔ? Attɛ bwaan-ilɔɔp ɛlat ba bayɛɛp, ngkka alup bɔng alɛɛpbyɛ.
45002023	Anaang kamma ka ayanganɛ Lafɔɔ-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ngkka assɛɛn mung Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka izzit ka abɛpɛnɛ Lafɔɔ ammɛ ɔɔ?
45002024	Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔk lɔttɛ, “Kussi ka annyɔɔng balɔɔt a Jews, Ikanakana balɔɔk bubbi batum lɛkɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
45002025	Alokonɛ Lafɔɔ, kɛzza lɛtaa annɔ kɛyanga isak. Asinɛ Lafɔɔ liloko mkkpa ale lɛtaa lɛzza, atii tɛ̀ttɛ̀ atakanɛ lɛtaa lɛzza.
45002026	Ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn Ikanakana ba basinɛ lɛtaa lɛzza batelenɛ kwa Lafɔɔ lalɔɔknɛ, attina attɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm baala ɔtɔkbɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balenɛ lɛtaa lɛzza ɔɔ?
45002027	Ikanakana bassɛɛnwɔyɔngbong annyɔɔng balɔɔt a Jews ka kɔlɔɔk ka balokonɛ Lafɔɔ mkkpa basi lataa lɛzza; annyɔɔng abɛpɛnɛyɔng Lafɔɔ mkkpa ndɔk aleyɔngzɛ lɛkkpɔk, aleyɔng lataa lɛzza.
45002028	Kkpɔɔ wa Jew ’wɔwɔng ulenɛ lɛtaa lɛzza ka lɔkkwɔɔn? Ɔlɔɔt wa ulenɛ wa Jew ka zzeen lɛtaa ammɛ kile linaang a balɔɔt lissi ulenɛ wa Jew bbwak.
45002029	Ɔlɔɔt wa Jew bbwak ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ulenɛ wa Jew ka luppyam. Ammɛ ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa luppyam ammɛ lulenɛ lɛtaa lɛzza. Uwɔng kɛnaang a Kuyeeng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Kɛnaang a lafɔɔ za balenɛ lɛkkpɔk lissi. Ammɛ ’wɔng baang ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtɔknɛ ppyɛɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ka balɔɔt lissi.
45003001	Ɛtɔk ’yɔyɔng elenɛ ya balɔɔt a Jews battanɛ Ikanakana? Kkpɔɔ isak a kɛzza lɛtaa ilenɛ ka ’bɔng?
45003002	Ile gaang gaang ka itɔk itɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ! Ka kɛkɔɔm ɛtɔk, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔdɔkɔ usekele balɔɔt a Jews lɛmmwɔɔl ammɛ.
45003003	Ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn a balɔɔt balɔk basinɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm liyila, babɛpɛ nsekele wa banaangnɛ la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bɛɛ? Attina attɛyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔssɛ ɔbɛpɛ nsekele kwakkwɛ baang ɔɔ?
45003004	Ning ba kule! Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔk lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk gbisii mkkpa ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ule ɔkkala-lɛlaak. Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, “Bale bayɔɔwɔ asan attɛ kulewɔ bbwak ka ɛkɛtɛ ale alɔɔk; Ale asan attɛ kɛkaal vvenɛ kɛyyɛɛpwɔ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya alenɛ ka kɛkaal assɛ.”
45003005	Mung kule kɔtaa nang, ulenɛ ka babbu linaang ayyɔɔt lippyɛɛnɛ liyɔɔyɛlɛ kkpelegedee littɛ linaang Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lile bbwak? Ile ilɔɔk nang? Ile ittɛ Ebinukkpaapi bbwak ba ɛnaang ka ɛyɔɔyɛlɛ akama ka lɛttɔ bubbi ayyɔɔt ɔɔ? (Gedegede mung nlɔɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt balɔɔknɛ).
45003006	Ning baang kpong-kpong ba kule! Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usinɛ lɛyyɛɛp, ɔnaang nang ukkwoong ɔkaal kɛkaal a vveengodde?
45003007	Ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn a kɛkkala lalaak anaam kɛnaangnɛ lɔkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔtta kkpelegedee lɔgbaa bɛɛ? Mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔbbalnɛ akama lɛyɔɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔnaang-a-bubbi?
45003008	Kulenɛ ning, mbɔng isinɛ lɛlɔɔk ittɛ, “Inaang bubbi nkwaaning budoddo buffu?” Balɔɔt balɔk bassɛɛnnɛbong ka izzit ka bannyinɛnɛ kibbi ka nlɔɔknɛ kɛssanga kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng! Vvenɛ battɔ ka kɔlɔɔk ka kulebɛ bbwak a kɛttɔ ka akkwɛ.
45003009	Mung kwa ayyɔɔt balɔɔt a Jews kɔttanɛ kwa Ikanakana lɛyyɛɛp ɔɔ? Ning baang ba kule. Nggba lɛyɔɔ nttɛ lutini Ɔssɛbibit ɔkkpɛlɛ bale banaang-a-bubbi; mkkpa ule wa Jews ɔlɔk wa Ikanakana.
45003010	Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt wa bbwak ba ule,
45003011	Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn wa ɔsannɛ ba ule, gɔɔ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔggyannɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba ule.
45003012	Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ bammabong basseke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ bassɛɛpbong; Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔnaangnɛ kwa kɔyyɛɛpnɛ ba ule, gɔɔ ɔlɔɔt vvɔn gbɔɔ.
45003013	Imma abbɛ itaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lilli za lilenɛ ppwool. Ibbyap a lɛlaak isseke ka ittanɛbɛ ka kamma lusso ggwɔn. Babbu lammwɔɔl lasseke ka lattanɛbɛ ka bɛkkpa-kamma tɛ̀ttɛ̀ okke ɛzzɔkɔ.
45003014	Imma abbɛ isseke lifɔk a lifɔk sa libbɔlnɛ.
45003015	Ɛkɛtɛ ba batɔk, baddopo balɔɔt bawwɔɔlbɛ.
45003016	Ɛfɛɛn duu ya bamiinɛ bànàang kɔlɔɔk a kɛnnyama la akama.
45003017	Ɛtɔk a bɔkaat ba bataka basan.
45003018	Gɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka zzeen bɛ ba ule.”
45003019	Gedegede mung isan lɔsan ittɛ, bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya bilenɛ Lafɔɔ bile bya balɔɔt ba Lafɔɔ lakɔɔmnɛbɛ, nkwaaning batunu luteele ɔssɛbibit, bakɔɔm ɛkpansi ɔkkpɛlɛ baffu kɛkaal ka ɛfɛɛn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
45003020	Ɔlɔɔt wa ule ɔtaa bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ɔnaangnɛ bwa lafɔɔ lalɔɔknɛ ba ule. Bwa Lafɔɔ lanaangnɛ ule kwa lanaangnɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔsan ɔttɛ ɔnaangbong bubbi.
45003021	Gedegede mung Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyɔɔbongyɛlɛ ɛtɔk ya ile ikup itaa bbwak la ammɛ. Kɔlɔɔk a Lafɔɔ ka ɛtɔk ’yɔng baang ba kule. Lafɔɔ la Bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ bibee ittɛɛsɛ ɛtɔk ’yɔng baang.
45003022	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaang balɔɔt bataa bbwak la ammɛ ka bayilanɛ kwa Jesus Christ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangbong ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ wa uyilanɛ kwa Christ, ɔtaa bbwak la ammɛ ka bubuubuu bulɔk businɛ lile kpong-kpong.
45003023	Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ banaangbong bubbi; basɛlɛ ppyɛɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
45003024	Ɔzzànga ka lɛsɔɔk a ppyɛɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, bassɛbong ka labɔɔk a Christ Jesus wa ɔkkalanɛbɛ, bappyɛlɛ bataa bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
45003025	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyimɛ ammɛ ɔttɛ bawwɔɔl nkwaaning lubbe ammɛ lule ɛtɔk ya bubbi balɔɔt bùlé búlè la kɛsɔɔk, ulenɛ ka bayilanɛ kwa Jesus. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaang ’kwɔng nkwaaning ɔyɔɔ budoddo ammɛ. Ka isimi, ubbebong luppyam ɔfɔngɔ balɔɔt banaang bubbi.
45003026	Ɔzzànga gedegede mung ule ka ɔttɔngnɛ kɔlɔɔk a banaang-a-bubbi ɔssɛɛl usseke ɔyɔɔ bɔllɛ ammɛ ka ɛtɔk ’yɔng mung. Uwɔng ulenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyɔɔnɛyɛlɛ ɔttɛ ammɛ ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa bbwak. Ɔgbaa ɔnaang nkwaaning isan ittɛ ɔnaang ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ wa uyilanɛ kwa Jesus ɔtaa bbwak la ammɛ.
45003027	Ngkka mung kamma ile inaang itum ’bɔng? Bulɔk ba bule. Ifɛɛt a ’kwɔng ilenɛ ’bɔng? Mung ka itelenɛ Lafɔɔ ɔɔ? Maaye. Ule ka ile iyanga kiyila.
45003028	Itele lɛttɔ ittɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔ̀táà bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka kɛyanga kiyila, ka ɔnaangnɛ kwa Lafɔɔ laggyannɛ lissi.
45003029	Faa mung Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule wa balɔɔt a Jews keem ɔɔ? Ammɛ lissi ulenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm Ikanakana ɔɔ? Kwaabong, Ammɛ.
45003030	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule vvɔn. Vvenɛ uloko balɔɔt a Jews bbwak la ammɛ ka kiyila abbɛ. Vvenɛ ɔssɛ uloko Ikanakana bbwak la ammɛ biini ka kiyila abbɛ.
45003031	Mung ittina ittɛ ifimbong Lafɔɔ kwa kiyila ’sɔng ɔɔ? Maaye. Ning baang ba kule ffet a ffet. Lutini ’gwɔng iloko Lafɔɔ igbaa.
45004001	Ile ilɔɔkyɔng nang kwa Abraham, dedde lɔkaan ayyɔɔt balɔɔt a Jews, wa iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ? Bɔkka kɔlɔɔk kɔnaangmɛnɛ?
45004002	Abraham butaanɛ bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka bɛfɛɛn bya ɔnaangnɛ, nzang ɔyanga bɔfɛɛn bwa ɔnaangnɛ kamma utum. Ɔzzànga ba ukkwoong ɔnaang kamma ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
45004003	Luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, “Abraham uyila kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Kussi ka kiyila ammɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔkmɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt wa bbwak.”
45004004	Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔnaangnɛ kɛnaang, ɔyanga ikipili. Ikipili ammɛ baala batɔkyɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɛsɔɔk, batɔkyɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɔfɛɛn bwa ɔnaangnɛ.
45004005	Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa kɔbɛtɛmɛnɛ kwa kiyila ammɛ usseke kwa linaang, ɔzzánga uyila kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔttɛnɛ battɔ-ka-kɔlɔɔk battabong ka akkwɛ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uttina kwa kiyila sa ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔyanganɛ ɔnaangmɛ ɔtaa bbwak tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ammɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm biini ɔggyannɛ.
45004006	Nkwɔng kulenɛ kwa David ɔlɔɔknɛ ka kɔlɔɔk a laggele ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔknɛ ɔttɛ ule bbwak, usinɛ kwa bɛnaang bɛlɔk lile. Ɔttɛ,
45004007	“Laggele lale za balɔɔt ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ babbu linaang abbɛ lisumala, ule bubbi abbɛ livvoong!
45004008	Laggele lale za ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule usi bubbi ammɛ liffik!”
45004009	Laggele za David, ɔlɔɔknɛ ’zɔng mung lale za balɔɔt ba balenɛ lɛtaa lɛzza keem ɔɔ? Maaye. Lale za balɔɔt ba batakanɛ lɛtaa lɛzza ɔgbaa. Ka bakkpɔknɛ ka luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm battɛ, “Abraham uyila kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Kussi ka kiyila ammɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔkmɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt wa bbwak.”
45004010	Nkwɔng mung kɔdɔkɔ kɔnaang ka ɛkɛtɛ Abraham ɔzzanɛ lɛtaa ɔɔ? Faa ka ɔtakanɛ lɛtaa lɛzza? Kɔnaang ka ɔtakanɛ lɛtaa lɛzza, ka ulenɛ lɛtaa lɛzza lissi.
45004011	Abraham ɔdɔkɔ ɔzza lɛtaa ka ’kwɔng kulenɛ lɛnaang. Kɛzza lɛtaa ammɛ ulenɛ kɛyɔɔ kɛttɛ, ka Abraham ɔyanganɛ kiyila, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔkmɛbong ɔttɛ ɔlɔɔt wa bbwak tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔzza lɛtaa. Abraham ulenɛ abassɛ balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba bayilanɛ kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Kwakkwɛ baang Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔknɛbɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt ba bbwak la ammɛ mkkpa bataka lataa lɛzza.
45004012	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔgbaa ɔssɛ ule abassɛ balɔɔt ba balenɛ lataa lɛzza, ka kwa balenɛ lataa lɛzza keem lissi, bayanga kɛssanga lɛfal zzɔn ka kiyila sa dedde ayyɔɔt Abraham ɔyanganɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔzza lɛtaa.
45004013	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaang nsekele la Abraham la balɔɔt a kikkwu ammɛ ɔttɛ vveeng ’wɔng mung ule wa ammɛ. Nsekele ’wɔng mung kwa Abraham utelenɛ Lafɔɔ, ba ɔnaang; ɔnaang ka ɔyanganɛ kiyila keem, ɔtɔkmɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt wa bbwak ka ɛfɛɛn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
45004014	Ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn a basamnɛ nsekele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bannyi balɔɔt ba balokonɛ Lafɔɔ, ɔzzánga nzang kiyila bɔfɛɛn bwa gbɔɔ, nsekele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔssɛ bɔfɛɛn bwa gbɔɔ.
45004015	Lafɔɔ lanaangnɛ kɛkaal Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kiffu. Ɔzzànga ka ɛfɛɛn a Lafɔɔ lasinɛ lile, kɛbɛpɛ Lafɔɔ baala kile.
45004016	Nsekele ’wɔng baang ɔdɔkɔ ule ka kiyila, nkwaaning nlɔɔk-nloko ’wɔng baang ɔtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛbɛtɛ kɛnnɔ ka lɛsɔɔk za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyinɛ balɔɔt a kikkwu Abraham. Ba unnyi balɔɔt ’bɔng baang keem ba batelenɛ Lafɔɔ, unnyinɛzɛ balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba bayilanɛ kwa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Abraham uyilanɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ka Abraham ulenɛ abassɛ balɔɔt ayyɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba bayilanɛ.
45004017	Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, “Nnaangwɔbong abassɛ ifɔɔn ggbadam.” Ɔzzánga nsekele ’wɔng baang ɔyyɛɛp ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka Abraham ɔyanganɛ kiyila utum Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ufungalanɛ balɔɔt ka lubbe, bataa ka kuddu. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔkɔɔmnɛ lɛmmwɔɔl a kamma ɔnaang bɛfɛɛn bya bisinɛ lɛfal liffu biffu lɛfal.
45004018	Abraham ɔyanga kiyila, ɔtaa ɔkat ka ɛkɛtɛ ya usinɛ lɛbɛlɛ lile wa kɛfɔɔn a waan, ɔzzànga ɔppyɛɛ usseke “Abassɛ ifɔɔn ggbadam.” Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, “Balɔɔt a kikkwu annɔ bale bayipi ning mung tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bwaanittuma ka libat.”
45004019	Ɔdɔkɔ kɛtɛkɛtɛ lalɔp a likkpa kubbwɔɔk, ɔzzànga kiyila ammɛ kisi lɛmɛɛm ka uttinanɛ ka ulenɛ lɛkkpɛɛm, kkwɔɔt ammɛ lile lɛkpɛlɛ, avva Sarah ule ulleep.
45004020	Usi kiyila ammɛ lɛkkyaa ɔfɔngɔ. Ndeeta ka luppyam usi lɛyanga utum nsekele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Kiyila ammɛ kinnyimɛ lakke ubungu Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
45004021	Ɔsan bbwak ɔttɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ukkwoong ɔnaang kwa ɔlɔɔknɛ.
45004022	Kwakkwɛ baang kussinɛ ka kiyila sa Abraham ɔyanganɛ, “Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔkmɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt wa bbwak.”
45004023	Lɛmmwɔɔl za lɛttɛnɛ, “Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔkmɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt wa bbwak” basi lɛkkpɔk kwa ammɛ keem.
45004024	Badɔkɔ bakkpɔk kwa ayyɔɔt ɔgbaa ba ule ɔtɔkyɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt ba bbwak ba iyilanɛ kwa ammɛ wa ufungalanɛ Jesus, Uyini ayyɔɔt, ka lubbe.
45004025	Basammɛ bannyi battɛ ubbe ka bubbi ayyɔɔt, ufungalamɛ ɔtaa ka kuddu; nkwaaning kɛtaa kɛyyɛɛpyɛlɛ la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
45005001	Mung ka ilenɛ lɛssɛ ka Jesus Christ, itaa bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka kiyila ayyɔɔt issɛbong issɛ ka ammɛ, Uyini ayyɔɔt, iyanga bɔkaat.
45005002	Kɔssɛ ka kiyila sa iyanganɛ, ɔnaangyɛlɛ isan kibbe-lɛttɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm sa iddunɛ kwa assɛ. Issɛ iggele ka luttina gwa iyanganɛ lɔttɛ vvenɛ iyanga lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
45005003	Ayyɔɔt ɔgbaa issɛ iggele ka lilɔɔk ayyɔɔt ka isannɛ ittɛ assɛ linaangnɛyɛlɛ ibbɔ akama.
45005004	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangyɛlɛ ppyɛɛ ka kɛbbɔ akama ayyɔɔt. Ppyɛɛ wa ɔnaangnɛyɛlɛ unnyiyɛlɛ luttina.
45005005	Luttina ’gwɔng yɛlɛ ba lɔdɛm gbɔɔ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ Kuyeeng ammɛ lɛkɔɔm ɔssɛɛnyɛlɛ kɛsaap ammɛ ka ippyam ka lɛsɔɔk.
45005006	Ka ɛkɛtɛ ya isinɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ inaangnɛ lɛsan, Christ ubbe ka bubbi ayyɔɔt ka ɛkɛtɛ ya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔknɛ uloko.
45005007	Ɔlɔɔt kibbe ka lɛttɔ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔnaangnɛ kwa kɔsaapnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kukoolo-ukoolo. Usinɛkkyam ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔbbɔ mung ubbe ka lɛttɔ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔnaangnɛ budoddo.
45005008	Ɔzzànga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyɔɔbongyɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ isaapmɛnɛ iffɔ. Christ ɔdɔkɔ ubbe ɔkkalayɛlɛ ka itiinɛ ka bubbi!
45005009	Lubbe ammɛ lɔdɛmbongyɛlɛ itaa bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ule usseke ikkala ya ɔkkalanɛyɛlɛ ɔfɔngɔ ka kitun a kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔɔ?
45005010	Idɔkɔ balɔɔt a kɔfɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔzzànga mung lubbe Waan ammɛ lɔnaangbongyɛlɛ isseke inngwa ammɛ. Anngwa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ile isaapmɛ gedegede mung wa ilenɛ inngwa ammɛ!
45005011	Ɔzzànga ’kwɔng baang keem lissi. Issɛbong ka Jesus Christ wa ɔnaangnɛyɛlɛ inngwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm iggele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
45005012	Bubbi bwa buffunɛ ka vveeng ’wɔng mung, bussi ka lɛttɔ ɔlɔɔt vvɔn. Bubbi ammɛ bakɔɔmnɛ lubbe buffu. Kwakkwɛ baang lubbe lɔwaalanɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔssɛbibit, ka ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ulenɛ bubbi lɛnaang.
45005013	Bubbi budɔkɔ baang ka ɛkpansi tɛ́ttɛ́ bannyi balɔɔt Lafɔɔ; ɔzzànga ka ɛfɛɛn ya lafɔɔ lasinɛ lile, bubbi ba bakɔɔlɔ.
45005014	Lubbe lɔdɔkɔ lɔyanga likke ka ɛkpansi mung ka ussinɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ Uyya umii ɔffɔ ka ɛkɛtɛ a Moses. Ɔgbaa lɔyanga lakke la balɔɔt ba basinɛ bubbi lɛnaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Uyya ɔnaangnɛ ka ufimnɛ Lafɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kitele. Úyyá ɔdɔkɔ ɔtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔdɔkɔnɛ ka kiffu.
45005015	Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbyɛ bɛffa ba bɛbal, ka lɛsɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lisinɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bwa Uyya ɔnaangnɛ lile. Kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn, balɔɔt ppwap babbe ka lɛttɔ bubbi ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang vvɔn. Ɔ̀zzànga kibbe-lɛttɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛttanɛ. Kibbe-lɛttɔ sa unnyinɛ ɔssɛbibit ka ibɔɔk a Jesus kɛssɛ kɛttala ning baang.
45005016	Lɛsɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la bubbi ɔlɔɔt vvɔn bile buubuu. Bubbi ɔlɔɔt vvɔn budɛmnɛ “Kizzi Kibbi” kiffu. Ɔppyɛɛnɛ uffu ɔffɔ ka bubbi buttalanɛ, lɛsɔɔk za lisinɛyɛlɛ lɛkkɔnɔ liffu. Azzɛ lilenɛ “Kibbi ba Azzi!”
45005017	Kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Kussi ka bubbi ɔlɔɔt vvɔn, lubbe lusseke ka lɔkɔɔmnɛyɛlɛ ka lɛttɔ ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang vvɔn. Kwa ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang vvɔn Jesus Christ, ulenɛ lɛnaang unnyiyɛlɛ kɔttanɛ! Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyinɛbɛ lɛsɔɔk za kɛtaa la ammɛ bbwak, vvenɛ bassɛ ka Christ bakɔɔm ɛfɛɛn kɛfal a kɛfal.
45005018	Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bubbi ’bwɔng baang bbwɔn bulenɛ balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ lɛwwɔɔl; linaang ɔlɔɔt vvɔn wa doddo lisangabong balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ka kɔlɔɔk linnyibɛ kuddu.
45005019	Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt ggbadam battɔnɛ ka bubbi ka kɔlɔɔk ɔlɔɔt vvɔn usinɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm litele, vvenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔssɛ ɔnaang balɔɔt ggbadam bataa la ammɛ bbwak ɔssanga latele za ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ’wɔng baang utelemɛnɛ.
45005020	Banaang Lafɔɔ nkwaaning itɔk a kɛssɛɛp iyipi. Ɔzzànga ka ɛfɛɛn a bubbi buttalanɛ, lɛsɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ lɛssɛ lɛttala baang lɛsak.
45005021	Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bubbi budɔkɔnɛ bukɔɔm lubbe, bukɔɔm ɛkpansi; lɛsɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛssɛbong lɛkɔɔm kɛsɛlɛ bubbi, lɛkɔɔm ɛkpansi, lɛsamyɛlɛ imii ka kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal kwa itɔknɛ ka labɔɔk a Jesus Christ Uyini ayyɔɔt.
45006001	Ile ilɔɔk nang? La ilɔɔk ittɛ ikama-ɔkama inaang bubbi nkwaaning kibbe-lɛttɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kiggbenge kɛgbaa ɔɔ?
45006002	Ning baang ba kule. Ibbebong kwa bubbi; ile inaang nang ibbal lɛppyɛlɛ imii inaangbwɛ?
45006003	Asanyɔng mung ’kwɔng ittɛ: Ka inaangnɛ baptizim itaa ka bɔkaat la Christ Jesus, itulbong lubbe ggwɔn ibbe la ammɛ.
45006004	Ka banaangnɛyɛlɛ baptizim itúl lubbe ggwɔn la ammɛ ibbe, bassɛbong balliyɛlɛ la ammɛ. Ka ufungalanɛ ka lubbe ka lakke abassɛ, ayyɔɔt ɔgbaa vvenɛ issɛ iyanga ufaa kɛfal.
45006005	Ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn ayyɔɔt la ammɛ ilenɛ bɔfɛɛn bbwɔn ka lubbe ammɛ, vvenɛ issɛ ile bɔfɛɛn bbwɔn la ammɛ ka kifungala ka lubbe tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ammɛ ufungalanɛ.
45006006	Isan mung ’kwɔng: ittɛ bawwɔɔlbong ɔtɔm a lɛfal ayyɔɔt la Christ ka Cross, nkwaaning lakke bubbi lafal ayyɔɔt labɛpɛ, ɔlɔk ifɔngɔ babili bubbi kɛbɛlɛ lile.
45006007	Ɔlɔɔt ubbenɛ ɔttabong ka lakke bubbi.
45006008	Ilenɛ libbe la Christ, iyilabong ittɛ vvenɛ issɛ itaa la ammɛ ka kuddu.
45006009	Isanbong ittɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ufungalabong Christ ka lubbe, ba ɔbɛlɛ libbe. Lubbe lakke ba lɔbɛlɛ lɛyanga ka kkwɔɔt ammɛ.
45006010	Lubbe gwa ubbenɛ ɔdɔkɔ ubbe kwa bubbi. Ɔzzànga kuddu kwa uddunɛ gedegede mung uddu kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
45006011	Issɛ ittinayɛlɛ kɛyɔɔng ittɛ ibbebong kwa bubbi. Ɔzzànga iddubong kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ilenɛ ka bɔkaat la Christ Jesus.
45006012	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ bubbi bubɛlɛ kkwɔɔt annyɔɔng lɛkɔɔm, tɛ̀ttɛ́ affu anaangyɔng kwa luttina lafal annyɔɔng lɔlɔɔknɛ.
45006013	Gɔɔ tɛ̀ttɛ́ akkyaayɔng kikeep annyɔɔng kɛlɔk afɔngɔyɔng bubbi bukɔɔm bunaang ibbyap. Lutini ’gwɔng asamwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng annyiyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt ba balenɛbɛ ka lubbe lifungala bataa ka kuddu. Asamwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ annyimɛyɔng, ɔkɔɔmwɔyɔng ɔnaang kɔlɔɔk kwa bbwak.
45006014	Bubbi tɛ̀ttɛ́ bubɛlɛwɔyɔng lɛkɔɔm. Kwa Lafɔɔ ba adduyɔng; adduyɔng kwa kibbe-lɛttɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
45006015	Ile inaang nang? Inaang bubbi ka isinɛ ka Lafɔɔ lile, ile ka kibbe-lɛttɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔɔ? Ning lissi!
45006016	Asanyɔng lɔsan attɛyɔng asamwɔnɛyɔng kɛyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ assekeyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ babili ka kitele ɔlɔɔt, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang wa atelenɛyɔng ussekenɛ ssaawɔ annyɔɔng. Mkkpa ule wa bubbi, wa kitele lɛttɔ kilé kilè lubbe. Ɔlɔk wa latele, wa kitele lɛttɔ kile kile kɛtaa bbwak tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyannɛ.
45006017	Ɔzzànga luwomo lule gwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm! Ka ɛkɛtɛ nnyɔn adɔkɔyɔng babili bubbi, ɔzzànga ateleyɔng lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk gwa lulenɛ ka lukopolo gwa appyeenɛyɔng la ippyam annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ.
45006018	Basangawɔyɔng ka bubbi, assekɛyɔng babili kɛtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyannɛ.
45006019	(Nlɔɔk nnyiwɔyɔng ka lɛmmwɔɔl za ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ uppyeenɛ ka akoolonɛyɔng kippyee kɔlɔɔk.) Asamwɔyɔngbong kɛyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ kkpal annyiyɔng ka bubili babbu lilɔɔk la ibbyap ka ɛtɔk a bubbi. Assɛ asamwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng gedegede mung annyiyɔng ka bubili kɛtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyannɛ ka ɛtɔk a budoddo.
45006020	Ka adɔkɔnɛyɔng babili bubbi, luttina gwa kɛnaang kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyannɛ asiyɔng lɛyanga.
45006021	Isak annyɔɔng ɔdɔkɔnɛ bɔng, ka anaangnɛyɔng bɛfɛɛn bya bɛnaangwɔnɛyɔng izzit gedegede mung? Kitele lɛttɔ lilɔɔk ’sɔng baang ulenɛ lubbe!
45006022	Ɔzzànga gedegede mung ɔsangawɔyɔngbong ka bubbi, assekeyɔng babili Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Isak annyɔɔng ulenɛ lɛfal za asamnɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ azzɛ annyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ikipili a ’kwɔng ulenɛ kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal.
45006023	Ikipili bubbi ulenɛ lubbe, ɔzzànga lɛsɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal ka bɔkaat la Christ Jesus, Uyini ayyɔɔt.
45007001	Ikpana anaam asanyɔng lɔsan bwa nle ka nlɔɔknɛ ntum, ka ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng asannɛyɔng lafɔɔ. Lafɔɔ lakɔɔm ɔlɔɔt ka ɛkɛtɛ ulenɛ ka kuddu.
45007002	Lafɔɔ lalokonɛ wanavva ullu walam ɔddɔkɔddɔkɔ ulam ubbe. Ulam ubbenɛ, wanavva ɔttabong ka lafɔɔ ’zɔng baang, za lakɔɔmnɛ killu abbɛ la ammɛ.
45007003	Ɔzzànga ullunɛ walam ɔlɔk ka walam ammɛ utiinɛ ikokolo, vvenɛ bakkwɔɔmɛ, Umini-la-walam-ɔlɔk. Ɔzzànga walam ubbenɛ, usseke wanavva wa gbɔɔ ka lakke lafɔɔ. Ullunɛ walam ɔlɔk la bubbi ba ule.
45007004	Ikpana anaam, kule ning baang la annyɔɔng. Annyɔɔng ɔgbaa assɛbong abbeyɔng, ikupnɛ kwa Lafɔɔ, ka alenɛyɔng kikkeep a kkwɔɔt a Christ. Gedegede mung aleyɔng ba ammɛ ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ufungalanɛ ka lubbe, ɔttɛ nkwaaning ile balɔɔt ba doddo ka kɛnaang Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
45007005	Itaanɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lafal ayyɔɔt lalɔɔknɛ, Lafɔɔ lafeele babbu ittina ya ilenɛ ka kɛnaang ka kkwɔɔt ayyɔɔt isseke ba doddo ka kɛnaang a lubbe.
45007006	Ɔzzànga gedegede mung ittabong ka Lafɔɔ ka ibbenɛ innyizɛ azzɛ za ladɔkɔnɛ lakɔɔmyɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt igbakkɔpɔ. Gedegede mung ba ibɛlɛ lɛnaang ikup kwa Lafɔɔ za bakkpɔknɛ, isseke ka inaangnɛ ikup kwa ufaa ɛtɔk wa Kuyeeng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
45007007	Mung ile ilɔɔk nang? Ile ilɔɔk ittɛ Lafɔɔ biini lanaang bubbi ɔɔ? Ning baang lissi! ɔzzànga Lafɔɔ lanaangnɛnɛ nsan bwa bubbi bulenɛ. Lafɔɔ businɛ lɛttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akkɔlɔ ikkɔlɔ” nzang nsi lɛsan bwa ikkɔlɔ ilenɛ ka luppyam.
45007008	Bubbi bussɛ la Lafɔɔ buyɛn kufuk bufeelenɛ bɛssanga ikkɔlɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ ka luppyam. Bubbi bule bɔfɛɛn bwa nzang bulenɛ libbe, Lafɔɔ lasinɛ lile.
45007009	Anaam biini ntaabong ikokolo kkpal ka Lafɔɔ lasinɛ lile. Lafɔɔ laffunɛ, bubbi butum bufeele buffu lɛfal.
45007010	Anaam nbbe. Lafɔɔ za ladɔkɔnɛ za kɛkɔɔm a kuddu kiffu, ka kwa anaam ladɔkɔ lappyɛɛ lakɔɔm lubbe lafeenɛ.
45007011	Bubbi bussɛ la Lafɔɔ buyanga kufuk bufɛɛtnɛ, bukɔɔm Lafɔɔ ’zɔng baang buwwɔɔlnɛ.
45007012	Ka kulenɛ ning, Lafɔɔ biini bubbi ba layanga. Lafɔɔ layyɛɛp lɔyyɛɛp lale bbwak ɔgbaa.
45007013	Ngkka mung ulenɛ kɛttɛ bɔfɛɛn bwa buyyɛɛpnɛ bunaangnɛnɛ nbbe ɔɔ? Ning lissi ffet. Bubbi bunaangnɛ ning. Bukɔɔm bɔfɛɛn bwa buyyɛɛpnɛ bufɛɛtnɛ. Bubbi bukɔɔm lubbe bufeenɛ nkwaaning balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ basan lɛfal abbwɛ ka bulenɛ bubbi. Kwakkwɛ ikɔɔmnɛ Lafɔɔ isan ittɛ bubbi bule bɔfɛɛn bwa bubbɔlnɛ ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
45007014	Isan lɔsan ittɛ Lafɔɔ layyɛɛppɔyyɛɛp. Ɔzzànga anaam ɔlɔɔt wa basammɛnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ubili bataan bubbi.
45007015	Ba nsan bwa nnaangnɛ, ka nsinɛ lɛnaang bwa nggyannɛ nttɛ nnaang, nppyɛɛ nnaang kwa kusinɛnɛ lɛsaap.
45007016	Nnaangnɛ kwa nsinɛ lɛggyan nttɛ nnaang, ning baang nyilabong nttɛ Lafɔɔ lale bbwak.
45007017	Anaam biini lissi nnaangnɛ bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung, bubbi bwa bullunɛ ka kkwɔɔt anaam bunaangnɛ.
45007018	Nsan lɔsan nttɛ budoddo ka tɔkɔlɔ nɛ ba bukkwoong butaa ka lɛfal anaam ka nlenɛ ɔlɔɔt. Mkkpa luttina gwa kɛnaang a budoddo lulenɛ baang ka tɔkɔlɔ, ba nkkwoong nnaangbwɛ.
45007019	Budoddo bwa bunaangnɛ, ba nnaang, nppyɛɛ nnaang bubbi bwa nsinɛ lɛggyan nttɛ nnaang.
45007020	Nnaagnɛ bwa nsinɛ lɛggyan nttɛ nnaang, ning baang anaam lissi nlenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔnaangnɛbwɛ, bubbi bwa bulenɛnɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ ka butaanɛ bunaangnɛ.
45007021	Ɔzzánga nkɔɔlɔ nttɛ lafɔɔ lale ka kɛnaang: Ɛkɛtɛ ya nttɛnɛ nnaang kwa kɔyyɛɛpnɛ, kɛnaang a bubbi kɛppyɛɛnɛ kɛttanɛ lɛsaap.
45007022	Luttina anaam luggele kwa Lafɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
45007023	Ɔzzanga nppyɛɛ nyɛn kɛssanga lafɔɔ lalɔk ka kɛnaang ka kkwɔɔt anaam. Lafɔɔ ’zɔng baang lallu kullu la lafɔɔ za lasaapnɛ luppyam anaam. Lanaangnɛ nsseke ubili azzɛ za lalenɛ lafɔɔ bubbi.
45007024	Nsibong ɔlɔɔt wa ɔkkyaamɛnɛ lɛbɛlɛ lile! Nyinɔɔng ule ɔkkalanɛ ka kkwɔɔt ’sɔng mung lile ka lisammɛnɛ linnyi lubbe?
45007025	Nssɛbong ka Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, ɔkkala-ikkala, nwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang! Uwɔng ulenɛ kɛfal anaam: Anaam biini nkkwoong mung ntele Lafɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka luttina anaam keem, lɛfal anaam, ka nlenɛ ɔlɔɔt, litele lafɔɔ bubbi.
45008001	Balɔɔt ba balenɛ ka bɔkaat la Christ Jesus gedegede mung ba kɔwwɔɔl ba babɛlɛ lile.
45008002	Lafɔɔ za Kuyeeng za lannyinɛyɛlɛ kuddu ka Christ Jesus lasanganɛbong ka lafɔɔ bubbi la lubbe.
45008003	Bwa Lafɔɔ lasinɛ likkwoong lanaang ka lɛfal ɔlɔɔt lɛkkpɛlɛnɛ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaang, Ɔwwɔɔl bubbi ka lɛfal ɔlɔɔt ka ɔtɔɔmnɛ Waan ammɛ wa uffunɛ la lɛfal tɛ̀ttɛ̀ za ɔlɔɔt wa ɔnaangnɛ bubbi, ɔbɛtɛ bubbi.
45008004	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaang nkwɔng nkwaaning ayyɔɔt ba lafal ayyɔɔt lalenɛ za Kuyeeng, lasi za ɔssɛbibit lile ikkwoong inaang bwa Lafɔɔ za bbwak lalɔɔknɛ iffata.
45008005	Balɔɔt ba bataanɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɛfal abbɛ lɛbwɔɔlɔnɛbɛ, basambong ippyam abbɛ bannyi kwa lɛfal lɛggyannɛ. Balɔɔt ba bataanɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔbwɔɔlɔnɛbɛ, basambong ippyam abbɛ bannyi kwa Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔggyannɛ.
45008006	Asamnɛ luttina annɔ annyi kɛfal annɔ, kitele lɛttɔ akkwɛ ulenɛ lubbe. Asamnɛ luttina annɔ annyi Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, kitele lɛttɔ akkwɛ ulenɛ kɛyanga kuddu la bɔkaat.
45008007	Ɔlɔɔt ule ka kɔfɔk la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ɔsamnɛ luttina ammɛ unnyi kɛfal ammɛ. Lafɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba utele, gɔɔ usi likkwoong uteleze.
45008008	Balɔɔt ba batelenɛ lafal abbɛ ba bakkwoong banaang kwa kɔsaapnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
45008009	Ɔzzànga annyɔɔng ba ataanɛyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lafal annyɔɔng lattɛnɛ ataayɔng, ataayɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng, ulenɛ ka Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kulenɛ la annyɔɔng. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa usinɛ Kuyeeng a Christ lɛyanga, wa ammɛ ba ule.
45008010	Ɔzzanga Christ ɔtaanɛ la annyɔɔng, mkkpa kkwɔɔt annyɔɔng libbe ka bubbi annyɔɔng, Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kulenɛ kuddu annyɔɔng ka ataanɛyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyannɛ.
45008011	Ulenɛ ka Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kwa kufungalanɛ Jesus Christ ka lubbe kɔtaanɛ la annyɔɔng, nzang Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ufungalanɛ Christ ka lubbe, vvenɛ unnyiwɔyɔng kuddu kwa kkwɔɔt ka Kuyeeng ammɛ kulenɛ la annyɔɔng.
45008012	Ikpana anaam, iyangayɔng lafɔɔ, ɔzzanga tɛ̀ttɛ́ itaayɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lafal ayyɔɔt laggyannɛ lattɛ itaa.
45008013	Ataanɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɛfal annɔ lɛggyannɛ vvenɛ abbe. Ɔzzánga akɔɔmnɛ Kuyeeng awwɔɔl babbu linaang annɔ vvenɛ addu.
45008014	Balɔɔt ba bataanɛ la Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm balenɛ bwaan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
45008015	Kuyeeng kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulewɔnɛyɔng linnyi ba kɔnaangwɔyɔng azzangayɔng babili, ɔlɔk ɔbbwɔpɔwɔyɔng. Lutini ’gwɔng, kɔnaangwɔyɔng azzangayɔng bwaan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ikkwa ikkwɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka lakke Kuyeeng ittɛ, “Dedde! Dedde anaam!”
45008016	Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kutoolonɛ, la kwa ayyɔɔt, kɔyɔɔyɛlɛ kɔttɛ ayyɔɔt bwaan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
45008017	Ayyɔɔt ka ilenɛ bwaan ammɛ, vvenɛ itɔk ppyɛɛ wa ulokonɛ balɔɔt ammɛ. Vvenɛ itul bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulokonɛ la Christ. Iyɛnnɛ akama la Christ vvenɛ issɛ iggele la ammɛ.
45008018	Nttinanɛ akama wa iyɛnnɛ gedegede mung baala akkwoong asam akakala la laggele za ile iyɛn ka ussoonɛ.
45008019	Ɛkpansi ɔkkpɛlɛ ɛtaabong ɛkat ɛttɛ ɛyɛn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ule ɛyɔɔyɛ bwaan ammɛ.
45008020	Ɛkpansi ɔkkpɛlɛ ɛbɛpɛ esseke bɔfɛɛn bwa gbɔɔ, ka kɔsaapnɛ ɛkpansi lissi, ɔzzanga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛnɛ kɔtaa ning baang. Ɔzzanga luttina lutii baang
45008021	kɔttɛ kɛtɔm ssɔn vvenɛ ɔsanga ɛkpansi ɔkkpɛlɛ ka bubili lubbe batul laggele kɛtta ka bubili za bwaan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
45008022	Isan lɔsan ittɛ ka ussinɛ bakang uffu ɔffɔ ka gedegede mung, ɛkpansi ɔkkpɛlɛ effimibong ka eppyeenɛ bɔssɔp tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɔssɔp a lɛmaat.
45008023	Ɛkpansi keem lissi elenɛ ka kiffimi. Ayyɔɔt balɔɔt ba iyanganɛ Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɛsɔɔk ammɛ za kɛkɔɔm ɛtɔk, issɛ iffimi ning baang ittɛ ɔnaangyɛlɛ izzanga bwaan ammɛ; ɔsangayɛlɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ka bubili.
45008024	Kɛkkala ayyɔɔt kissi ka kwa ikkɔlɔnɛ. Iyɛnnɛ bwa ikkɔlɔnɛ, nzang baang ikkɔlɔ ssɔng lissi. Nyinɔɔng ɔkkɔlɔnɛ bɔfɛɛn bwa ulenɛ lɛyanga?
