45008025	Ikkɔlɔ bwa itakanɛ lɛyanga, ibbe luppyam itaa ikatbwɛ.
45008026	Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔssɛ kuffu kutteleyɛlɛ ning baang ka ilenɛ lɛkkpɛlɛ mung. Ba isan tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bussɛɛnnɛ luzɔɔm, Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kukkpenge Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kunnyiyɛlɛ, kukkpenge la akama wa asinɛ lɛmmwɔɔl likkwoong azza.
45008027	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔyɛnnɛ ippyam a balɔɔt ɔsan mung luttina Kuyeeng ka kukkpengenɛ ka lɛttɔ balɔɔt ammɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔggyannɛ.
45008028	Isan lɔsan ittɛ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkɔɔm bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔnaang budoddo la balɔɔt ba batelemɛnɛ. Abbɛ balenɛ ba ammɛ biini ulenɛ lɛkkwɔɔ ka luttina ammɛ.
45008029	Balɔɔt ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ lɛggba lɛsanga, ɔsangabongbɛ uloko zzekep basseke tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Waan ammɛ, nkwaaning ule ɔkɔɔm-ɛtɔk a ikpana ammɛ ggbadam.
45008030	Ɔzzánga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkwɔɔ balɔɔt ba ulenɛ lɛsanga uloko zzekep. Balɔɔt ba ulenɛ lɛkkwɔɔ ɔssɛ ulokobɛ bbwak la ammɛ biini. Ba ulokonɛbɛ la ammɛ biini bassɛ batul kibeet ammɛ.
45008031	Nkwɔng ka kulenɛ ning mung, ile ilɔɔk nang? Ulenɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ la ayyɔɔt, nnyinɔɔng ule ukkwoong ulokoyɛlɛ kɔfɔk?
45008032	Waan ammɛ ka isimi usi lɛsam uloko. Ɔsammɛ unnyi ka lɛttɔ ayyɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ka unnyinɛyɛlɛ Waan ammɛ, vvenɛ ɔssɛ unnyiyɛlɛ bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ka lɛsɔɔk ɔɔ?
45008033	Nyinɛ ule unnyi balɔɔt ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ kibbi? Ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm biini ɔttɛnɛ kibbi ba bataka bazzi!
45008034	Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ule baang wa ule ukkwoong ɔwwɔɔlbɛ ɔɔ? Christ Jesus ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ubbenɛ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ufungalamɛ ka lubbe, ɔtaa ka kuddu ka kɔbɔɔk ɛlaabɔɔk ammɛ. Ammɛ ukkpengenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyiyɛlɛ!
45008035	Mung nnyinɛ ule ukkwoong utunu kɛsaap a Christ ka kkwɔɔt ayyɔɔt? Kɛggyan a kɔlɔɔk kikkwoong mung ɔɔ? Faa akama? Faa buwɔɔng? Faa ibbɔl? Faa lubbe?
45008036	Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, “Ile ka akama lubbe ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ka lɛttɔ annɔ; Bayɔɔyɛlɛ akama tɛ̀ttɛ̀ itɔɔn ya bale ka bawwɔɔlnɛ.”
45008037	Ɔzzanga ning baang ba kule. Lilɔɔk ’sɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ ibɛtɛsɛ lɔbɛtɛ ka lakke Ammɛ wa isaapmɛnɛ.
45008038	Nsanbong nttɛ bɔfɛɛn bwa bukkwoongnɛ buggbayɛlɛ ka kɛsaap ammɛ ba bule; mkkpa ule lubbe gɔɔ kuddu; gɔɔ bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm; gɔɔ bakɔɔm ɛfɛɛn ka libat; gɔɔ lakke gɔɔ kɛkkpa kɛssɛ; mkkpa ule gedegede mung gɔɔ ussoonɛ;
45008039	Mkkpa ule vveeng wa libat gɔɔ wa kuttɔɔk. Bulɔk ba bule bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔmnɛ bwa bule bukkwoong butunuyɛlɛ ka kɛsaap Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm sa Christ Jesus, Uyini ayyɔɔt, unnyinɛyɛlɛ.
45009001	Kwa nlɔɔknɛ kulɛ ka lɔkkwɔɔn, anaam wa Christ, lɛlaak ba nkkala. Luttina anaam ka lulenɛ ka kɛkɔɔm a Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔnaangnɛnɛ nsan nttɛ lɛlaak ba nkkala.
45009002	Akama ɔttalanɛbong. Akama wa ule usinɛ lɛsaal ka luppyam
45009003	utum balɔɔt anaam. Abbɛ balenɛ ɛkkpa-kkwɔɔt la linnyi anaam! Ka lɛttɔ abbɛ, kɔsaapnɛ mung ka nzɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkaanɛnɛ nsi wa Christ lɛbɛlɛ lile.
45009004	Abbɛ balenɛ balɔɔt ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ. Ammɛ ɔnaangnɛbɛ basseke bwaan ammɛ batul laggele la kibeet ammɛ bazzi. Ɔbɛtɛ kɛnnɔ la abbɛ, unnyibɛ Lafɔɔ. Abbɛ bazɔɔmnɛ luzɔɔm gwa lɔkkwɔɔn. Batɔkbong bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usekelenɛ.
45009005	Bassi ka kikkwu ɔlɔɔt a latele. Christ ka ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔssɛ ussi ka kikkwu abbɛ. Numa kibungu sa kɛfal a kɛfal kile sa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔkɔɔmnɛ bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ! Kulening.
45009006	Ba nlɔɔk nttɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usibong nsekele wa ɔnaangnɛ liloko; ka usinɛ balɔɔt a Israel ɔkkpɛlɛ lile balenɛ balɔɔt ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ.
45009007	Gɔɔ balɔɔt a kikkwu Abraham ɔkkpɛlɛ lissi balenɛ bwɔɔn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔk la Abraham ɔttɛ, “Bwaan a kikkwu Isaac bale bakkwɔɔbɛ ba annɔ.”
45009008	Uwɔng ulenɛ kɛttɛ bwɔɔntiti ba bamaatnɛbɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bamaatnɛ bwɔɔntiti ɔkkpɛlɛ lissi balenɛ bwɔɔn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ba bamaatnɛbɛ ka nsekele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm balenɛ balɔɔt a kikkwu sa bbwak.
45009009	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm nsekele ɔdɔkɔ ɔnaang la lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng ɔttɛ, “Ka ɛkɛtɛ ya bbwak ya nle nppyɛlɛ nffu, Sarah vvenɛ ɔmaat waanawalam.”
45009010	Ɔzzànga nkwɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ akkwɛ lissi. Bwaan a Rebecca baffa bayanga abassɛ vvɔn wa ulenɛ Isaac, ɔgɛlɛnya ayyɔɔt wa iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ.
45009011	Ka kulenɛ kɛttɛ nkwaaning kɛsanga waan vvɔn kile kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyannɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔk la Rebecca ɔttɛ, “Utumalɔɔt vvenɛ ɔtaa bubɔɔyi ɔlɔɔt wa utiinɛ waan.” Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔkbong nkwɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ bamaatbɛ. Gɔɔ tɛ́ttɛ́ banaang ubbu-kɔlɔɔk la bɛllɛ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsangabɛ ka kɔsaapmɛnɛ usibɛ lɛsanga ɔssanga kwa abbɛ biini banaangnɛ.
45009013	Luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, “Jacob ɔsaapnɛnɛ, Esau utunnɛ.”
45009014	Ngkka mung ile ilɔɔk nang? Ile ilɔɔk ittɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba ɔyyɛɛp ɔɔ? Ning lissi.
45009015	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔk la Moses ɔttɛ, “Nle nsɔɔk ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsaapnɛnɛ la ɔlɔɔt wa ule ubbenɛ lɛttɔ.”
45009016	Kibbe-lɛttɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba kɛssanga ka bwa ɔlɔɔt ɔggyannɛ ɔlɔk ɔnaang, kule ka kɛsaap sa isaapnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
45009017	Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔk la Pharaoh lɔttɛ, “Nnaangwɔ ubeet ka kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng mung. Nttɛ nkɔɔmwɔ nyɔɔ lakke anaam. Nnaang basannɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ a vveengodde.”
45009018	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyanga kibbe-lɛttɔ la balɔɔt ba basaapmɛnɛ. Ɔnaang balɔɔt balɔk kwa kɔsaapmɛnɛ basi kɔlɔɔk lɛbɛlɛ lɛgɔpɔlɔ.
45009019	Ɔlɔɔt annyɔɔng ɔlɔk vvenɛ ɔlɔɔk la anaam ɔttɛ, “Nkwɔng kulenɛ ning mung, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaang nang unnyi balɔɔt kibbi? Nyinɛ ule ukkwoong utunu luttina Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm?”
45009020	Ɛnngwa anaam, annɔ alenɛ nnyinɛ wa ale appyɛlɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kamma. Ekpekele-kɛbat baala ekkwoong ɛbap ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsaaknɛyɛ ɛttɛ, “Anaang nang tɛ́ttɛ́ asaaknɛ ning mung?”
45009021	Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔnaangnɛ ekkpo ukkwoong mung ɔkɔɔm kɛbat-igbele ’sɔng baang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɔsaapmɛnɛ. Ukkwoong mung ɔkɔɔm likkpɔ-kɛbat zzɔn ɔnaang ikkpo iffa. Nnyɔn ka kɛtɔm lɛkkɔ za ning, ya nnyɔn bakɔɔmyɛ a gbɔɔ.
45009022	Kɔssɛ kule kɛssanga ssɔn ka lɔkkwɔɔn la kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangnɛ. Ɔggyan ɔttɛ ɔyɔɔ kitun a kɔlɔɔk ammɛ, ɔnaang basan lakke ammɛ. Ubbe luppyam la balɔɔt ba kɔlɔɔk kutunmɛnɛ la abbɛ, ule ka ɔwwɔɔlnɛbɛ.
45009023	Ɔggyan ɔttɛ iyɛn latele ammɛ za lɛbaang za ɔllɔtnɛyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt balɔɔt ba ibbemɛnɛ lɛttɔ, ile lɛbama.
45009024	Ayyɔɔt balɔɔt ba ɔkkwɔɔnɛ, ka balɔɔt a Jews keem lissi ka ɔkkwɔɔnɛ, ɔssɛ ɔkkwɔɔ ka Ikanakana ɔgbaa.
45009025	Nkwɔng kulenɛ kwa ɔlɔɔknɛ ka luvva Hosea ɔttɛ, “Balɔɔt ba badɔkɔnɛ basi ba anaam lile, vvenɛ nkkwɔɔbɛ ‘Balɔɔt-anaam.’ Lɔkaan gwa lɔdɔkɔnɛ lusi lɛsaap, vvenɛ nkkwɔɔgwɛ ‘Bɛsaap-anaam.’
45009026	Ka ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn ’yɔng baang ya babwɔɔlɔnɛbɛ battɛ, ‘Annyɔɔng balɔɔt anaam lissi.’ Baang ulenɛ ɛfɛɛn a bale bakkwɔɔbɛ bwaan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm-a-kuddu.”
45009027	Isaiah ɔlɔɔk kɔlɔɔk a Israel ppwool ɔttɛ, “Mkkpa balɔɔt a Israel bayipi tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kususuk ka lɔyɔngɔ, bwaan a balɔɔt ssup bale baddu.
45009028	Uyini ule ɔkka kɔlɔɔk ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ litini la vveengodde.”
45009029	Kule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Isaiah ulenɛ lɛlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Ulenɛ ka Uyini wa ɔyanganɛ lakke ɔkkpɛlɛ usinɛyɛlɛ balɔɔt a kikkwu balɔk liloko, nzang ile itaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Sodom la Gomorrah.”
45009030	Ile ilɔɔk ittɛ nang? Ile ilɔɔk ittɛ: balɔɔt ba basinɛ libum battɛ bataa ka budoddo la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔdɔkɔ ussi ka kiyila bataa bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
45009031	Balɔɔt ba basanganɛbɛ ba balenɛ ka kɛggyan a lafɔɔ za lale lalokobɛ bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, basizɛ lɛyɛn.
45009032	Mbɔng bunaangnɛ basizɛ lɛyɛn? Basizɛ lɛyɛn ka kwa banaangnɛ kutumnɛ linaang kusi kiyila litum. Basilibong ka lɛttaal za luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, “Pyɛɛk nlokobong lɛttaal ka Zion za lile lɛnaang balɔɔt basili, lɛttaal za lile lɛnaang balɔɔt battɔ. Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt duu wa uyilanɛ kwa anaam baala nfimmɛ.”
45010001	Ikpana anaam nkkɔlɔ ka luppyam gaang gaang nttɛ, balɔɔt anaam baddu. Nzɔɔm nnyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka lɛttɔ abbɛ.
45010002	Nkkwoong mung nbeebɛ ttɛɛsɛ ka batelenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm gaang gaang, ɔzzànga ba basan ɛtɔk ya ssɔng ya batelenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
45010003	Ba bataka basan ɛtɔk ya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulokonɛ balɔɔt bbwak la ammɛ biini. Babumbong kɛyanga ɛtɔk ya abbɛ, kwakkwɛ bafimnɛ ɛtɔk ya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulokonɛ balɔɔt bbwak la ammɛ.
45010004	Christ ɔkkpabong lattɔ Lafɔɔ, nkwaaning ɔlɔɔt duu wa uyilanɛ kwa ammɛ ɔtaa bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
45010005	Nkwɔng kulenɛ kwa Moses ɔkkpɔknɛ utum, kɛtaa bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka kiloko Lafɔɔ ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔnaangnɛ kwa Lafɔɔ lalɔɔknɛ vvenɛ uddu kwa azzɛ.”
45010006	Ɔzzànga nkwɔng kulenɛ kwa ɔlɔɔknɛ utum kɛtaa bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka kɛyanga kiyila. “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ alɔɔk attɛ ‘Nyinɛ ule umii ka libat?’ (NIng baang ulenɛ kisini Christ kiffu kuttɔɔk.)
45010007	Gɔɔ tɛ̀ttɛ́ alɔɔk attɛ, ‘Nyinɛ ule umii ka vveeng wa kuttɔɔk?’ ” (Ning baang ulenɛ kifungala Christ ka lubbe.)
45010008	Kwa kɔlɔɔknɛ ulenɛ, “Lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm litiiwɔ kɛtɛkɛtɛ ka bɛkkpa kamma la luppyam.” Uwɔng baang ulenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl a kiyila za ikopolonɛ.
45010009	Alɔɔknɛ ppwool ka kamma annɔ attɛ, “Jesus ulenɛ Uyini,” ayila ka luppyam annɔ attɛ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ufungalamɛnɛ ka lubbe, vvenɛ addu.
45010010	Iyanganɛ kiyila ka ippyam ayyɔɔt, itaa bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ilɔɔk pwool ka kamma ayyɔɔt, ile ba kɛkkala.
45010011	Luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt duu wa uyilanɛ kwa ammɛ, mɛ baala ufim.”
45010012	Nkwɔng mung kule kwa balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ka balɔɔt a Jews basinɛ buu lile la Ikanakana. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule Uyini wa ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ɔnaang balɔɔt ba bakupmɛnɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ppyɛɛ wa lɛbaang.
45010013	Luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔkkwɔɔnɛ lɛkɔɔl Uyini vvenɛ ule la kɛkkala.”
45010014	Ngkka mung bale banaang nang bakkwɔɔmɛ ka batakanɛ kiyila lɛyanga? Bale banaang nang bayanga kiyila ka batakanɛ lɛmmwɔɔl lippyee? Bale banaang nang bappyee basinɛbɛ lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng baang lɛbwɔɔlɔ?
45010015	Mung bale banaang nang babwɔɔlɔ lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng baang basinɛ bayilabɔtɔɔm lɛtɔɔm bamii ka vveeng babwɔɔlɔ? Luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, “Kiffu balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba bakɔɔmnɛ Kuttu-Budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm baffu kɛyyɛɛp gaang.”
45010016	Ɔzzànga kwa Kuttu-Budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ ba bataka bayila. Isaiah biini ɔttɛ, “Uyini, Nyinɔɔng uyilanɛ kwa lɛmmwɔɔl ayyɔɔt?”
45010017	Kiyila kissi ka kippyee lɛmmwɔɔl za ɔtɔɔmnɛ. Ɔzzànga lɛmmwɔɔl lissi ka lukopolo gwa bakopolonɛ batum Christ.
45010018	Ɔzzànga mbap nttɛ, “Mung kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn, lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng baang ba bataka bappyee ɔɔ?” Bappyeebong. Luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, “Lɛmmwɔɔl abbɛ lɛwaala ɔkkpɛlɛ ɛkpansi, Lammwɔɔl abbɛ lamii laddum ka lakpeke ɛkpansi.”
45010019	Nbbal lɛbap nttɛ, Balɔɔt a Israel basi lɛsan ɔɔ? Moses biini uttenɛ kamma lɛppyɛlɛ ɔttɛ, “Vvenɛ nnaangwɔyɔng anaangyɔng luleep la balɔɔt ba basinɛ ba lɔkaan ’gwɔng lile. Vvenɛ nnaangwɔyɔng kutunwɔyɔng la lɔkaan a bazingizingi.”
45010020	Isaiah ɔttanɛ luppyam lɛkkaam, ka ɔttɛnɛ, “Balɔɔt ba basinɛnɛ lɛggyan battɔngnɛnɛ Ntuma ka ɛfɛɛn a balɔɔt ba batakanɛnɛ lɛggyan.”
45010021	Ɔlɔɔk kwa kutumnɛ Israel ɔttɛ, “Ntɔnɔ labɔɔk anaam kɛtɔm uwɔlɔlɔ nkkwɔɔ, basi-kɔlɔɔk-lippyee la baggyan-a-kɔlɔɔk a balɔɔt ’bɔng baang.”
45011001	Nbap nttɛ: Mung Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ufim mung balɔɔt ammɛ ɔɔ? Usibɛ lifim! Anaam biini mung wa Israel, wa kikkwu Abraham, wa nssinɛ ka ɛsam a Benjamin.
45011002	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba ɔtaka usumala balɔɔt ammɛ ba ɔggbanɛ lɛsanga ka lutte. Asanyɔng lɔsan bwa luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ ka ɛfɛɛn a Elijah ukkpengenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka kɔlɔɔk a Israel.
45011003	Ɔttɛ, “Uyini, bawwɔɔlbong bappyee-kutolo annɔ, basam labun annɔ babɛpɛ. Ussekenɛ anaam kɛyɔɔng ka nssekenɛ, ɔzzànga mung babumnɛ kɛwwɔɔl.”
45011004	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kamma ɔdɔkɔ ɔppyɛlɛmɛ nang? “Nsangabong innɔ balɔɔt zzilliffa la kufaak ba batakanɛ lɛzɔɔm bannyi Baal nloko.”
45011005	Kɔssɛ kule ning baang gedegede mung: Bwaan a balɔɔt bale ssup ning ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ lɛsanga ka kibbe-lɛttɔ ammɛ.
45011006	Kɛsanga sa ɔsanganɛ kɔssɛ ka kibbe-lɛttɔ sa balɔɔt babbemɛnɛ, ka kwa balɔɔt banaangnɛ lissi. Ulenɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ balɔɔt ɔssanga ka kwa banaangnɛ, nzang kibbe-lɛttɔ ammɛ sa lɔkkwɔɔn lissi.
45011007	Bɔng bunaangnɛ? Balɔɔt a Israel basi lɛyɛn bwa baggyannɛ. Ɔdɔkɔ ule bwaan a balɔɔt ning ssup ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ lɛsanga ka bayɛnnɛ bwa baggyannɛ. Ba bassekenɛ bassi latɔɔk za kisi kɛkkwɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛbɛlɛ lippyee.
45011008	Kule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangbɛ bazɔɔlɔ ka ippyam la ittina tɔttɔt ɔffɔ ka kɛtɔm sa mmwɔɔn mung. Ka zzeen ba babɛlɛ lɛyɛn, gɔɔ kippyee ka latɔɔk.”
45011009	David ɔttɛ, “Numa bakaabɛ ka laggele abbɛ, numa battɔ, numa bayɔɔbɛ akama!
45011010	Numa zzeen abbɛ lavvoong nkwaaning basi lɛbɛlɛ lɛyɛn. Ɔnaangbɛ bassɛɛl lilɔɔk abbɛ ka ippyam ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.”
45011011	Nbap nttɛ: Ka ɛkɛtɛ balɔɔt a Jews battɔnɛ, battɔ bataak lɛkɔɔl ɔɔ? Ning kusi lile ffet a ffet! Kɛnaang a bubbi sa banaangnɛ kɛdɛmnɛ kuddu kuffu kukup Ikanakana nkwaaning luleep lɔnaang balɔɔt a Jews.
45011012	Bubbi balɔɔt a Jews bukɔɔmbong ppyɛɛ wa lɛbaang buffu ka vveeng. Ɔzzànga kɛttɔ sa battɔnɛ ka lakke kuyeeng kɛkɔɔmbong ppyɛɛ wa lɛbaang kifee ikaan ilɔk. Ppyɛɛ ’wɔng mung vvenɛ uggbenge ka ɛkɛtɛ ya balɔɔt a Jews ɔkkpɛlɛ bale bassɛ bale ka akkwɛ.
45011013	Gedegede mung nlɔɔk la annyɔɔng Ikanakana nttɛ: Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛnɛ anaam lɛtɔɔm ɔttɛ nffu nkopolowɔyɔng, vvenɛ ɔkkyaanɛ ka kɛnaang anaam.
45011014	Usinɛkkyam vvenɛ nnaang balɔɔt a lɔkaan anaam biini banaang luleep, nkwaaning nkkwoong nkkala balɔk.
45011015	Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang ya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ufimnɛ balɔɔt a Israel, ɔtɔk balɔɔt Ikanakana bazzanga inngwa ammɛ. Ka ɛkɛtɛ ya balɔɔt a Israel bale bappyɛlɛ baffu ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ, ɔtɔkbɛ; vvenɛ bayanga kuddu lutini lubbe.
45011016	Ulenɛ ka ezuku a brɛɛd ya ikeeng elenɛ ya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ugɔngɔ uwɔlɔlɔ ɔssɛ ule wa ammɛ ɔgbaa; ulenɛ ka basamnɛ bɛbɔɔk a bɛssɛ bya lisse bannyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, bɛbɔɔk bya libat bɛssɛ bile ammɛ ɔgbaa.
45011017	Bɛbɔɔk a kɛssɛ Olive wa ɔyyɛɛpnɛ bɛlɔk bya libat bɛyaakbong bɛttɔ. Basambong kɛbɔɔk Olive sa kisinɛ lɛyyɛɛp basingili baang. Annyɔɔng Ikanakana assɛ aleyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛssɛ Olive ’sɔng baang sa kisinɛ lɛyyɛɛp. Ɔzzànga gedegede mung atulyɔngbong lakke, la iyyɛɛp a kuddu balɔɔt a Jews ayangayɔng.
45011018	Ka kulenɛ ning, tɛ̀ttɛ́ attina attɛyɔng annyɔɔng attanɛyɔng balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba battɔnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɛbɔɔk a kɛssɛ. Ule ɔkkyaawɔyɔng kwa bɔng? Aleyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛbɔɔk a kɛssɛ sa libat. Ba akkwoong alɔmyɔng iffaat alokoyɔng. Ule iffaat keem ka ikkwoongnɛ ilɔmwɔyɔng annyɔɔng iloko.
45011019	Ɔzzànga vvenɛ alɔɔk attɛyɔng, “Iii bɛbɔɔk Olive ’byɔng baang bɛyaak bɛttɔ nkwaaning iyanga kufuk.”
45011020	Nkwɔng kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Bayaakbyɛ ballɔt ka basɛlɛnɛ kiyila. Bafɔngɔwɔyɔng annyɔɔng ataayɔng ka ayanganɛyɔng kiyila. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔkkyaawɔyɔng kwakkwɛ, lutini ’gwɔng ɔbbwɔpɔwɔyɔng.
45011021	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usi balɔɔt a Jews ba balenɛ bɛbɔɔk a kɛssɛ bya lɔkkwɔɔn lɛfakala ɔfɔngɔ, attina attɛyɔng vvenɛ ɔfakalawɔyɔng annyɔɔng ɔfɔngɔ ɔɔ?
45011022	Uwɔng ulenɛ ka ɛfɛɛn isannɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uggwoomnɛ kɔlɔɔk ɔssɔp kɔlɔɔk. Ɔssɔp kɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt ba balenɛ lɛttɔ, uggwoom kɔlɔɔk la annyɔɔng; alenɛ ka anaangnɛyɔng kwa uggwoomnɛ kɔlɔɔk la annyɔɔng tɔttɔt. Ɔzzànga asinɛyɔng lɛnaang kwa ule uggwoom kɔlɔɔk la annyɔɔng tɔttɔt, vvenɛ ɔssɛ ɔyaakwɔyɔng ɔzzɔɔk.
45011023	Balɔɔt a Jews bakkyaanɛ kɛsɛlɛ kiyila abbɛ bafɔngɔ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ulokobɛ ka ɛfɛɛn a badɔkɔnɛ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyanga lakke za kɛppyɛlɛbɛ kiloko ka ɛfɛɛn a badɔkɔnɛ.
45011024	Annyɔɔng Ikanakana aleyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛbɔɔk a kɛssɛ Olive sa kisinɛ lɛyyɛɛp basamsɛ basingili la sa kɛyyɛɛpnɛ ka lagabwɔ. Balɔɔt a Jews bale tɛ̀ttɛ̀ sa kɛyyɛɛpnɛ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm mɛ ba kukoolo kɛppyɛlɛ kisingili bɛbɔɔk bya bɛyaaknɛ bɛttɔ ka lasan abbyɛ.
45011025	Ikpana anaam, likup lile baang za lɔkkwɔɔn za nggyannɛ nttɛ asanyɔng. Vvenɛ lɛnaangwɔyɔng asiyɔng lɛbɛlɛ littina attɛ asanyɔng kɔlɔɔk. Uwɔng ulenɛzɛ azzɛ: Kissi latɔɔk a balɔɔt a Israel baala kittumu. Ɔzzanga vvenɛ kile kittumu baang tɔttɔt Ikanakana baffu ka ɛfɛɛn a Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm baggba ka lukkwoon.
45011026	Ɔzzànga uwɔng ulenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bale bakkala balɔɔt a Israel ɔkkpɛlɛ. Kule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, “Ɔkkala ikkala ule ussi ka Zion uffu, vvenɛ utunu bɛssanga ibbyap ɔkkpɛlɛ ka kikkwu a Jacob.
45011027	Vvenɛ ibɛtɛ kɛnnɔ la abbɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya nle nkkyaa bubbi abbɛ nfɔngɔ.”
45011028	Balɔɔt a Jews ka balenɛ Kuttu-Budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lifim, basseke ka kɔfɔk la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ka lɛttɔ annyɔɔng Ikanakana. Ɔzzànga ka kulenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛffɔ kɔsaap, basseke inngwa ammɛ ka lɛttɔ ibassɛ abbɛ ya iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ.
45011029	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm luttina ammɛ ba lufoolo ka balɔɔt ba ulenɛbɛ lɛsanga ɔnaangbɛ ppyɛɛ.
45011030	Kwa annyɔɔng Ikanakana, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm asiyɔng litele ka isimi ka isimi, ɔzzànga gedegede mung atɔkyɔngbong kibbe-lɛttɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ka balɔɔt a Jews bafimnɛnɛ kitele.
45011031	Ka kulenɛ ning mung, kibbe-lɛttɔ sa annyɔɔng alenɛyɔng lɛyanga kɛnaangbong balɔɔt a Jews bafim kitele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm battɛ ɔlɔk bassɛ bayanga kibbɛ-lɛttɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
45011032	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔssɛɛnbong balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba basimɛnɛ litele igbakkɔpɔ nkwaaning ɔyɔɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ kibbe-lɛttɔ ammɛ.
45011033	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyyɛɛp bɛnaang la balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsan a kɔlɔɔk wa lɔkkwɔɔn. Nyinɔɔng ukkwoongnɛ ɔbwɔɔlɔ lɔnngwa ammɛ! Nyinɔɔng ukkwoongnɛ ɔsan itɔk ammɛ!
45011034	Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, “Nyinɛ ɔsannɛ luppyam Uyini? Nyinɛ ukkwoongnɛ ɔbbamɛ bikɔɔm?
45011035	Nyinɔɔng ulemɛnɛ bɔfɛɛn linnyi kkpal bwa ammɛ ule ɔppyɛlɛ unnyi ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang?”
45011036	Ammɛ ɔlɔɔmnɛ bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ. Bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bɛyanga kuddu, ka lakke ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ bile bya ammɛ. Latele lale za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛfal a kɛfal! Kulening.
45012001	Ikpana anaam, nkkpengewɔyɔng ka kiggwoom a kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛttalanɛ nttɛ: Asamwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng anaangyɔng bigwugwulu annyiyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ataayɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔggyannɛ ɔttɛ ataanɛyɔng ning baang kɔsaapmɛ. Akkwɛ kulenɛ ɛtɔk ya bbwak ya kitele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
45012002	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akupyɔng ileme la linaang a vveengodde. Afɔngɔyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ufoolowɔyɔng ippyam ɔkkpɛlɛ, nkwaaning akkwoong asanyɔng luttina ammɛ, gwa lɔyyɛɛpnɛ, lɔsaapmɛ, lule bbwak ɔgbaa.
45012003	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ulenɛnɛ oyyoyyo lɛsɔɔk linnyi, nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ; Tɛ̀ttɛ́ atɔkwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng ka buggboggbo asakyɔng. Lutini ’gwɔng attinayɔng kwa kɔyyɛɛpnɛ, ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn uffikmɛ kɛyɔɔng ukup kiyila sa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulemɛnɛ linnyi.
45012004	Iyangayɔng bikkeep ggbadam ka kkwɔɔt ssɔn, ɔzzanga bikkeep ’byɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ bɛyanga bɛnaang buubuu.
45012005	Ka kulenɛ ning mung, mkkpa iyipiyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ iyipinɛ mung, iyangayɔng kkwɔɔt ssɔn la Christ. Ɔzzànga itoolobongyɛlɛ kɛyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɛssanga bikkeep a kkwɔɔt ssɔn.
45012006	Ikɔɔmyɔng bɛssanga ikkɔ́ ayyɔɔt buubuu tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛyɛlɛ linnyi. Íkkɔ́ ayyɔɔt ulenɛyɛlɛ ya kɛbwɔɔlɔ lɛmmwɔɔl, ibwɔɔlɔzɛ ka kiyila sa iyanganɛ.
45012007	Íkkɔ́ ayyɔɔt ilenɛ ya kittele balɔɔt, ittelebɛ. Ilenɛyɛlɛ ya lukopolo, ikopolobɛ.
45012008	Ilenɛ ya kɛbba balɔɔt bikɔɔm, ibbabɛ bikɔɔm. Ɔlɔɔt duu ɔbɛngɛlɛ bwa ɔyanganɛ la wabbɛ. Ɔbɛngɛlɛbwɛ ka kɛsaap la laggele. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa uzzinɛlɛttɔ, ɔnaang kɛnaang kɛbɛtɛmɛ. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa uggwoomnɛ kɔlɔɔk, uggwoom ning baang la laggele. Ɔyanga lakke ɔnaang kɛnaang ammɛ bbwak. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyanganɛ kibbe-lɛttɔ, ɔyangasɛ bbwak.
45012009	Kɛsaap kɛfɔngɔ sa ɛdda kile. Fim kɔlɔɔk kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ. Anaang kwa kɔyyɛɛpnɛ.
45012010	Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔsaapwɔyɔng ka alenɛyɔng ka bukpana ka Christ. Kɔbɛtɛwɔyɔng ka kitele waanyɔɔng.
45012011	Anaangyɔng kɛnaang kɔbɛtɛwɔyɔng. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akkpɛlɛyɔng. Assɛɛnyɔng luttina ka kɛnaang Uyini.
45012012	Ittina annyɔɔng ilokowɔyɔng ka laggele. Abbeyɔng luppyam ka lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ. Azɔɔmyɔng luzɔɔm ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
45012013	Abɛngɛlɛ bwa ayanganɛyɔng la ikpana annyɔɔng ya businɛbɛ lile. Atɔkyɔng ukekeen ɔlɔɔt assɛɛnyɔng ka ssala.
45012014	Akkpengeyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaang balɔɔt ba bayɔɔwɔnɛyɔng akama ppyɛɛ; iii, akkpengemɛyɔng ɔnaangbɛ ppyɛɛ, ɔfɔngɔbɛ nkpat kɛnaang.
45012015	Aggeleyɔng la balɔɔt ba baggelenɛ, akkwayɔng la balɔɔt ba bakkwanɛ.
45012016	Ayɔɔyɔng kɛssanga eleme ssɔn la balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ayɛnwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng. Ayilayɔng bukee. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ atɔkwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ basan a kɔlɔɔk.
45012017	Ɔlɔɔt ɔnaangwɔnɛyɔng bubbi, tɛ̀ttɛ́ apipilimɛyɔng. Abum anaangyɔng kwa ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ uttinanɛ ɔttɛ kule bbwak.
45012018	Annyɔɔng abum anaangyɔng bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya ale ataayɔng ka bɔkaat la balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ.
45012019	Inngwa anaam, tɛ̀ttɛ́ apipiliyɔng ipipili, lutini ’gwɔng afɔngɔyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm upipili ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛnɛ, “Ebinukkpaapi ɛttɛ, ‘Anaam vvenɛ npipili, vvenɛ nppyɛlɛ nnyi.’ ”
45012020	Anaangyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ. Lɔttɛ: “Buwɔɔng busaapnɛ ɔlɔɔt a kɔfɔk annɔ, annyimɛ kazzi uzzi. Bannyi basaapmɛnɛ, annyimɛ ɔvva. Ka anaangnɛ ning baang addomɛ a lɔkɔɔn ka lɛttɔ.”
45012021	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ afɔngɔyɔng bubbi bubɛtɛwɔyɔng. Lutini ’gwɔng annyɔɔng abɛtɛyɔng bubbi ka kɛnaang a budoddo.
45013001	Ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn utele bazzi-lɛttɔ ɛkpansi. Lakke ɔkkpɛlɛ lassi ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulokonɛ bazzi-lɛttɔ ɛkpansi ba iyɛnnɛ mung.
45013002	Ɔlɔɔt wa ufimnɛ kwa bazzilɛttɔ, ufimbong kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ litini. Ɔlɔɔt wa ufimnɛ ɔggyanbong kɛkaal unnyimɛ kɛyɔɔng.
45013003	Balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ budoddo, bazzi-lɛttɔ ɛkpansi bɛ ba babbwɔpɔ. Bazzi-lɛttɔ babbwɔpɔ balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ bubbi. Kɔsaapwɔyɔng mung ka uzzilɛttɔ ɔbbwɔpɔnɛyɔng ɔɔ? Kusiwɔnɛyɔng lɛsaap, anaangyɔng budoddo usseke ubunguwɔyɔng.
45013004	Ammɛ ulenɛ bɔɔyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔnaangnɛ kɛnaang ka budoddo annyɔɔng. Ɔzzànga anaangnɛyɔng bubbi, ɔbbwɔpɔwɔyɔng, lakke ammɛ za kɛyɔɔ ɔlɔɔt akama lale ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Ammɛ ulenɛ bɔɔyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔsamnɛ kitun a kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ufee balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba banaangnɛ bubbi.
45013005	Kwakkwɛ ale ateleyɔng bazzilɛttɔ ɛkpansi, ka kwa kitun kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lissi, ɔzzànga tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɔtan annyɔɔng lɔttɛnɛ ateleyɔngbɛ.
45013006	Bazzilɛttɔ ɛkpansi banaang kɛnaang bannyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, kwakkwɛ baang annyinɛyɔng innamba.
45013007	Atakbɛ bwa alenɛbɛ la ippwoot. Akkpɛɛyɔng innamba ya annyɔɔng la ya bɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng. Ɔzzànga annyiyɔngbɛ latele ɔkkpɛlɛ.
45013008	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ azziyɔng wannyɔɔng ippwoot. Ippwoot ya ayanganɛyɔng ulenɛ kɛyanga kɛsaap la wannyɔɔng. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa wabbɛ ɔsaapmɛnɛ, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ulokobong Lafɔɔ.
45013009	Lafɔɔ za lattɛnɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akup wanavva ɔlɔɔt; tɛ̀ttɛ́ awwɔɔl balɔɔt; tɛ̀ttɛ́ ayip ssip; tɛ̀ttɛ́ akkɔlɔ bɔfɛɛn a wannyɔɔng.” Ɔkkpɛlɛ azzɛ mung la lalɔk za latiinɛ bakang, lale ka lifɔɔ zzɔn za lɛttɛnɛ, “Wannyɔɔng ɔsaapwɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ asaapwɔnɛ kɛyɔɔng.”
45013010	Ɔlɔɔt duu wabbɛ ɔsaapmɛnɛ, bubbi mɛ baala ɔnaang. Kɛyanga kɛsaap la wannyɔɔng ulenɛ kiloko Lafɔɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
45013011	Anaangyɔng ’kwɔng mung ka asannɛyɔng liggbili. Liggbili lɛffɔbong za afungalanɛyɔng ka bulaa. Ka ɛkɛtɛ ya bale ka bakkalanɛyɛlɛ elenɛ lɛtta lɛkkɛtɛ ɛtta ɛkɛtɛ ya iggɔnɔggɔ iyanga kiyila.
45013012	Kisul kile ka kɛsaalnɛ. Kikoon kitii kɛtɛkɛtɛ mung. Ikkyaayɔng kɛnaang a bɛfɛɛn a kisul ifɔngɔyɔng, isam bɛfɛɛn a kullu illu ka buppwolo.
45013013	Ikɔɔmyɛlɛ kɛyɔɔng bbwak. Kikup a bwanavva kɛfɔngɔ kile, ɔlɔk kibimi. Ibbyap ifɔngɔ kile la kɛnaang a kɔlɔɔk kitum ɔlɔɔt. Kullu kɔfɔngɔ kile, gɔɔ luleep.
45013014	Akkimyɔng bɛfɛɛn a lɛkɔɔng a Uyini Jesus Christ afɔngɔyɔng kɛnaang a bubbi tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lafal annyɔɔng laggyannɛ.
45014001	Atɔkyɔng ɔlɔɔt duu assɛɛnyɔng ka bɛzzɔkɔ mkkpa kiyila ammɛ kisi lɛkkaam. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akangalayɔng ikangala la ammɛ atumyɔng kwa uttinanɛ.
45014002	Kiyila ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk kɛfɔngɔmɛ mung uzzi bɛfɛɛn duu, ɔzzanga ɔlɔɔt wa kiyila ammɛ kisinɛ lɛkkaam, uzzi livva keem.
45014003	Ɔlɔɔt wa uzzinɛ bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ, tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔkpɛn ɔlɔɔt wa usinɛ lizzi. Ɔlɔɔt wa uzzinɛ livva keem, tɛ̀ttɛ́ unnyi ɔlɔɔt wa uzzinɛ bɔfɛɛn duu kibbi, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔkmɛbong.
45014004	Annɔ alenɛ nyinɔɔng wa annyinɛ bɔɔyi ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk kibbi? Ule abassɛ ammɛ kɛyɔɔng ka ule utini ɔttɛ, ukumbong, ɔlɔk ɔttɔbong ka kɛkaal. Ɔzzánga vvenɛ ukum ka kɛkaal ka Uyini ukkwoongnɛ ɔnaangmɛ ukum.
45014005	Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn uttina ɔttɛ kɛtɔm kɛlɔk kile baang sa kɛttanɛ bɛtɔm bɛlɔk liggbenge. Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk uttina ɔttɛ bɛtɔm bile kɛssanga ssɔn. Ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn ɔnaang luttina gwa lɔkkaamnɛ.
45014006	Ɔlɔɔt wa uttinanɛ gaang gaang kwa kɛtɔm ssɔn, ɔnaang ning baang ka latele Uyini. Ɔlɔɔt wa uzzinɛ bɔfɛɛn duu, uzzibwɛ ka latele Uyini, ka uwomonɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang ka kazzi kwa uzzinɛ. Ɔlɔɔt wa ufimnɛ bɔfɛɛn ’bwɔng baang kizzi, ufim ka latele Uyini, uwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang ɔgbaa.
45014007	Ɔlɔɔt wa uddunɛ unnyimɛ kɛyɔɔng ba ule, ɔlɔɔt wa ubbenɛ kɛyɔɔng ba ule.
45014008	Iddunɛ, iddu kwa Christ. Ibbenɛ, ibbe kwa Christ. Mkkpa itaa ka kuddu ɔlɔk ibbe, ile ba Christ.
45014009	Christ ubbe, ufungala ka lubbe, ɔtaa ka kuddu, nkwaaning ule Uyini bakokolo la babbu.
45014010	Annyɔɔng wa azzinɛyɔng livva keem, mbɔng annyɔɔng annyinɛyɔng wannyɔɔng kibbi? Annyɔɔng wa azzinɛyɔng bɔfɛɛn duu, mbɔng attinanɛ attɛyɔng wannyɔɔng bɔfɛɛn bwa gbɔɔ? Ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt vvenɛ ibee ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkaalyɛlɛ kɛkaal.
45014011	Luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, “Uyini ɔttɛ, ‘Ka nlenɛ lule mung, ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn vvenɛ ukunnɛ laddu ka lusso, ɔbwɔɔlɔ ɔttɛ anaam nlenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.’ ”
45014012	Kwakkwɛ ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn ule ɔbwɔɔlɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔlɔɔk a lɛfal ammɛ biini.
45014013	Ka kulenɛ ning, ikkyaayɔng kinnyi balɔɔt kibbi ifɔngɔ. Lutini ’gwɔng inaang kɔlɔɔk kwa kule kusi waanyɔɔng lɛdɛm ɔnaang bubbi.
45014014	Bɔkaat anaam la Uyini Jesus bunaangnɛnɛ nsan ka lɔkkwɔɔn nttɛ, bɔfɛɛn a kazzi bwa businɛ lɛyyɛɛp kɛyɔɔng abbwɛ ba bule. Ɔzzanga ɔlɔɔt wa uttinanɛ ɔttɛ bɔfɛɛn ’bwɔng baang ba buyyɛɛp, mɛ baala buyyɛɛp.
45014015	Adɛmnɛ wannyɔɔng uddopo ɔssanga kwa bɛfɛɛn bwa azzinɛ, asibongkwɛ ka kɛsaap lɛnaang. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ayila kazzi kwa azzinɛ kɛnaang ɔlɔɔt wa Christ ubbenɛ ka lɛttɔ ammɛ ɔyɛn akama.
45014016	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ afɔngɔ bwa attinanɛ attɛ buyyɛɛp mung buyanga ubbu lɛkɔɔl.
45014017	Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kazzi la kɛvva lissi. Ile ka kɛsɛlɛ bubbi la kɛyanga bɔkaat, la laggele. Bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kunnyinɛ.
45014018	Ɔlɔɔt duu wa uttelenɛ Christ ka ɛtɔk ’yɔng, ɔtɔk laggele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la budoddo balɔɔt.
45014019	Ɔzzánga inaang luttina itum bɛfɛɛn bya bile bɛkɔɔm bɔkaat biffu bittele ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn ɔyanga lakke.
45014020	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ abɛpɛyɔng bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ lɛnaang kwa kazzi. Akkwoong mung azziyɔng lizzi ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔzzànga ba kɔyyɛɛp ka ale azziyɔng kazzi kwa kale kanaang wannyɔɔng ɔttɔ ka bubbi.
45014021	Kwa kule kɔyyɛɛp ule ka ale asiyɔng ɛsɛɛn lɛbɛlɛ lizzi, asiyɔng batak lɛbɛlɛ lɛvva, asiyɔng kɔlɔɔk duu lɛnaang, ulenɛ ka bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng bile bɛnaang wannyɔɔng ɔttɔ ka bubbi.
45014022	Alokoyɔng kwa ayanganɛ kiyila atumyɔng kɔlɔɔk nkwɔng mung ka bɛzzɔkɔ annyɔɔng la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Laggele lale za ɔlɔɔt wa usinɛ littina ɔttɛ ammɛ ubbu ɔlɔɔt ka ɔnaangnɛ kwa ɔsannɛ ɔttɛ kɔyyɛɛpmɛ mung!
45014023	Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa udeetanɛ kwa bwa uzzinɛ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔwwɔɔlmɛ uzzinɛbwɛ ka ɔsɛlɛnɛ kiyila ka linaang ammɛ. Bɔfɛɛn duu bwa anaangnɛ ka asɛlɛ kiyila, nzang baang bubbi.
45015001	Ayyɔɔt ba kiyila ayyɔɔt kɛkkaamnɛ ilenɛ ba buttelenɛ balɔɔt ba kiyila abbɛ kisinɛ lɛkkaam batɔkɔ latɔkɔ abbɛ. Ifɔngɔyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt biini kɛnaang ɔwaayɛlɛ.
45015002	Lutini ’gwɔng ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn ɔnaang wabbɛ ɔwaamɛ ka budoddo ammɛ biini nkwaaning ɔnaangmɛ ɔkkaam ka kiyila.
45015003	Christ usi lɛnaang ɔwaamɛ ammɛ biini. Lutini ’gwɔng ɔdɔkɔ ɔnaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, “Bɛnɔk bya balɔɔt banɔkwɔnɛyɔng bivvoongnɛbong anaam.”
45015004	Kɔlɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ kwa bakkpɔknɛ ka luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm badɔkɔ bakkpɔk battɛ bakopoloyɛlɛ, nkwaaning kussi ka kibbe-luppyam la bikɔɔm pya luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lunnyinɛyɛlɛ, iyanga luttina.
45015005	Numa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa unnyinɛ kibbe-luppyam la kɛbba-bikɔɔm ɔnaangwɔyɔng ayangayɔng luttina ggwɔn ka kikup a linaang a Jesus Christ,
45015006	nkwaaning ayangayɔng lɛmmwɔɔl zzɔn, abunguyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Abassɛ Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ.
45015007	Atɔkyɔng ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn ka latele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Christ ɔtɔkwɔnɛyɔng annyɔɔng.
45015008	Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ Christ ɔdɔkɔ bɔɔyi balɔɔt a Jews nkwaaning basan battɛ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bubbi ba ɔnaang, ɔlɔk ɔnaang nsekele wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangnɛ la balɔɔt ayyɔɔt ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ ule ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
45015009	Ɔgbaa nkwaaning ɔnaang balɔɔt Ikanakana bakkwoong babungu Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka kibbe lɛttɔ ammɛ. Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, “Ɔzzanga vvenɛ nwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang ɛfɛɛn a Ikanakana ilɔk, Vvenɛ nsoom kisoom nbungu lɛkɔɔl ammɛ.”
45015010	Lɔbbal lɛttɛ, “Ikanakana aggeleyɔng la balɔɔt ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ!”
45015011	Lɔbbal lɛttɛ, “Ikanakana ɔkkpɛlɛ abunguyɔng Ebinukkpaapi; Balɔɔt ikaan ɔkkpɛlɛ abungumɛyɔng!”
45015012	Isaiah ɔbbal lɛlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt a kikkwu a Jesse vvenɛ uffu; vvenɛ banaangmɛ uzzilɛttɔ Ikanakana, vvenɛ baloko ittina abbɛ ka ammɛ.”
45015013	Numa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa lɔnngwa lussinɛ ka ammɛ unnyiwɔyɔng laggele la bɔkaat ka kiyila sa ayanganɛ atummɛyɔng, nkwaaning ittina annyɔɔng immala ka lakke Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
45015014	Ikpana anaam, anaam biini nttina nttɛ luttina kɛnaang a budoddo lɔttalawɔyɔng lɔttala ka tɔkɔlɔ. Nttina nttɛ asanyɔngbong lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ sa ale akɔɔm akopoloyɔng ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn.
45015015	Ɔzzànga ka lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng mung, nkkaambong luppyam nkkpɔk ntum lilɔɔk sa nttinanɛ. Nkkaam luppyam ka budoddo bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛnɛ linnyi,
45015016	ka nlenɛ bɔɔyi a Jesus Christ ka nnaangnɛ kɛnaang ka Ikanakana. Nnaang kɛnaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔssɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm ka nkopolonɛ Kuttu-Budoddo kwa kussinɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, nkwaaning Ikanakana bale lɛsɔɔk za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔknɛ, za Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔnaangnɛ kunnyimɛ.
45015017	Ka ntaanɛ ka bɔkaat la Jesus Christ, nkkwoong mung nyanga bɔwaa ka kkwɔɔt ka nlenɛ ka kɛnaang a Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
45015018	Vvenɛ nkkaam luppyam nlɔɔk kɔlɔɔk kwa Christ ɔtɔɔmnɛnɛ ɔttɛ nnaang Ikanakana batele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Christ ɔnaang kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng ka lɛmmwɔɔl a kamma la linaang,
45015019	ka lakke kɛyɔɔ linaang la bɛmaanga, ka lakke Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔzzánga ka kɔssɛ kwa nssɛnɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ussinɛ Jerusalem umii Illyrium, nbwɔɔlɔ ufaa Kuttu-Budoddo kwa Christ pwool pwool.
45015020	Luttina anaam lulenɛ ka kɛbwɔɔlɔ Kuttu-Budoddo a Christ ka ifɛɛn ya batakanɛkwɛ lippyee, tɛ̀ttɛ́ nffu nkeele bwa ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ulenɛ litte.
45015021	Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, “Balɔɔt ba batakanɛbɛ kɔlɔɔk ammɛ lɛbwɔɔlɔ, vvenɛ bayɛn ka zzeen. Balɔɔt ba batakanɛkwɛ lippyee, vvenɛ basankwɛ.”
45015022	Kwakkwɛ mung kiffu ka ɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng kilenɛnɛ littun bikkpit ggbadam.
45015023	Ɔzzànga gedegede mung nvvebong kɛnaang anaam ka ifɛɛn ’yɔng mung, nle libum ka likkpa ggbadam nttɛ nffu nyɛnwɔyɔng,
45015024	nttinabong kiffu gedegede mung. Vvenɛ nbɛnɛ nnyɛnwɔyɔng ka nle ka nmiinɛ Spain, ɔlɔk ayaammɛyɔng nmii nlewɔnɛyɔng livve likoolo.
45015025	Gedegede mung nle ka nmiinɛ Jerusalem nnaang kɛnaang a balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bakang.
45015026	Izɔɔm ya Macedonia la Greece inaangbong luttina gwa kittele balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba ɔbbɔlnɛbɛ ka Jerusalem.
45015027	Abbɛ biini banaangnɛ luttina gwa kɛnaangkwɛ ka ulenɛ kɔlɔɔk kwa lɔkkwɔɔn, kule bbwak ka battelenɛ balɔɔt ’bɔng mung ba ɔbbɔlnɛbɛ. Balɔɔt a Jews batul ppyɛɛ Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm abbɛ la Ikanakana. Ikanakana bassɛ battele balɔɔt a Jews la bɛfɛɛn bya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛbɛ ppyɛɛ ka abbyɛ lɛnaang.
45015028	Nlenɛ kɛnaang ’sɔng livve, nnyibɛ ikkpoko ’yɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ ya bannyinɛbɛ, vvenɛ ngbata nmii Spain. Vvenɛ nkoolowɔyɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ɛtɔk a kimii bakang.
45015029	Ɛkɛtɛ ya nle nffu ka ɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng, nsan lɔsan nttɛ vvenɛ nffu la ppyɛɛ a Christ wa lɛbaang.
45015030	Ikpana anaam, nkɔɔmbong Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, la kɛsaap sa Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kunnyinɛnɛ nkkpengewɔyɔng nttɛ affu itoolo izɔɔmyɔng ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ innyiyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka lɛttɔ anaam.
45015031	Azɔɔmyɔng nkwaaning bulɔk businɛ lɛnaang ka ɛfɛɛn a balɔɔt ba basɛlɛnɛ kiyila ka Judea, nkwaaning balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bayila kɔlɔɔk a kɛnaang anaam bakang ka Jerusalem.
45015032	Ɔzzànga vvenɛ nffu ka ɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng nkoolowɔyɔng la laggele, kɔsaapnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
45015033	Numa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa bɔkaat bussinɛ ka ammɛ, ɔtaa la annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ. Kule ning.
45016001	Nsan mung Phoebe, akpana ayyɔɔt, la annyɔɔng. Ɔnaang kɛnaang a luzɔɔm ka Cenchreae.
45016002	Uffunɛ, atɔkmɛyɔng ka lɛkɔɔl Uyini assɛɛnyɔng ka kkwɔɔt, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm banaangnɛ. Attelemɛyɔng ka kɔlɔɔk duu kwa ɔbapwɔnɛyɔng. Ammɛ biini ule ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyyɛɛpnɛ bɛnaang la balɔɔt ggbadam ɔbɛtɛ la anaam.
45016003	Nwomobong Priscilla la Aquila bayyɔɔt a kɛnaang ba banaangnɛ kɛnaang a Christ Jesus.
45016004	Basam lafal abbɛ basɔɔk lubbe ka lɛttɔ anaam. Nzɔnɔbongbɛ kɛnaang gaang gaang. Anaam keem kɛyɔɔng lissi ka kuffinɛnɛ, kuffi izɔɔm ya ilenɛ ka ikaan ilɔk ɔgbaa.
45016005	Nwomobong luzɔɔm gwa lɔtaanɛ ka ssala abbɛ ɔgbaa. Nwomobong ɛnngwa anaam Epaenetus wa ɔkɔɔmnɛ ɛtɔk ɔyanga kiyila utum Christ Jesus ka ɛkpansi Asia.
45016006	Nwomobong Mary wa ulenɛ kɛnaang gaang gaang lɛnaang unnyiwɔyɔng.
45016007	Nwomobong Andronicus la Junias bayyɔɔt a Jews ba badɔkɔnɛ ka igbakkɔpɔ la anaam. Bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus basanbɛ gaang gaang. Abbɛ battenɛ Christ likup tɛ́ttɛ́ anaam nkupmɛ.
45016008	Nwomobong Ampliatus, ɛnngwa anaam, ya elenɛ ka kɛnaang a bɔkaat Uyini.
45016009	Nwomobong Urbanus wayyɔɔt, ɔlɔɔt a kɛnaang a Christ. Nwomobong ɛnngwa anaam Stachys.
45016010	Nwomobong Appelles wa ilenɛ latele ammɛ za utelenɛ Christ liyila. Nwomobong balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba balenɛ ka kɛkɔɔm a Aristobulus.
45016011	Nwomobong Herodion, wayyɔɔt a Jews ɔbɛtɛ la ikpana ayyɔɔt ba bakupnɛ Christ bale ka kɛkɔɔm a Narcissus.
45016012	Nwomobong Tryphaena la Tryphosa, ba banaangnɛ kɛnaang a Christ la ɛnngwa anaam Persis, wa ulenɛ kɛnaang gaang gaang lɛnaang unnyi Uyini.
45016013	Nwomobong Rufus, wa ɔnaangnɛ kɛnaang Uyini ɔtta balɔɔt balɔk, la abakka wa ɔtɔknɛnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ waan ammɛ.
45016014	Nwomobong Asyncritus la Phlegon la Hermes la Patrobas la Hermas, la ikpana anaam balɔɔt a Christ ɔkkpɛlɛ ba balenɛ la abbɛ.
45016015	Nwomobong Philologus la Julia, la Nereus la etele ammɛ la Olympus la balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ ba balenɛ la abbɛ.
45016016	Ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn uwomo wabbɛ, ugbugbamɛ kigbugba bukpana. Izɔɔm a Christ ɔkkpɛlɛ battɛ nwomowɔyɔng.
45016017	Ikpana anaam, nkkpengewɔyɔng nttɛ akatwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng assekeyɔng balɔɔt ba bassɛɛnnɛ balɔɔt lilɔɔk, banaangbɛ basi kiyila lɛbɛlɛ lɛyanga. Bafimnɛ lukopolo gwa alenɛyɔngbɛ likopolo, agbata assekeyɔngbɛ.
45016018	Balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ bɛssanga lilɔɔk ’sɔng baang, ba banaang bannyi Christ, Uyini ayyɔɔt. Banaang kwa kɔsaapnɛ luppyam abbɛ. Bakɔɔm babeet a lammwɔɔl la lɔggɔ basikili ippyam a balɔɔt ba basinɛ kwɛ lɛsan.
45016019	Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ uppyeebong kɔlɔɔk a latele za atelenɛyɔng Kuttu-Budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Akkwɛ kɔnaangnɛ nggele gaang gaang ntumwɔyɔng. Nggyan nttɛ asanyɔng kɔlɔɔk kwa kɔyyɛɛpnɛ afɔngɔyɔng babbu lilɔɔk.
45016020	Usseke ssup, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa bɔkaat bussinɛ ka ammɛ ususuku Satan ulokowɔyɔng asingyɔng bukkpɔ. Kɛsaap Uyini ayyɔɔt Jesus kɛtaa la annyɔɔng.
45016021	Timothy wa inaangnɛ kɛnaang la ammɛ ɔttɛ nwomowɔyɔng. Lucius la Jason, Sosipater, bayyɔɔt a Jews battɛ nwomowɔyɔng ɔgbaa.
45016022	Anaam Tertius ɔkkpɔk-a-lɛta a Paul ’wɔng mung, nwomowɔyɔngbong luwomo gwa lussinɛ ka Christ.
45016023	Uyini a ssala Gaius, wa luzɔɔm lududanɛ ka ssala ammɛ ɔttɛ nwomowɔyɔng. Erastus, wa ɔbɔngɔlɔnɛ ikkpoko lɛffɛ, la ɔkpana ayyɔɔt Quartus battɛ nwomowɔyɔng. [
45016024	Ppyɛɛ Uyini ayyɔɔt Jesus Christ ɔtaa la annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ. Kulening.]
45016025	Innyiyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm latele. Ukkwoong mung ɔnaangwɔyɔng akkaamyɔng kkɔk ka kiyila annyɔɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Kuttu-Budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kwa nkopolonɛ ntum lɛmmwɔɔl a Jesus Christ, ɔgbaa la kuttu kwa lalup kwa kuddumunɛ kusseke bɛkkpa bya isimi bya isimi.
45016026	Ɔzzànga gedegede mung likkpɔk a bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lisangabong lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk ’gwɔng baang litta ka pwool ka lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Banaangbong ɔssɛbibit ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔsankwɛ nkwaaning balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ bayanga kiyila batelekwɛ.
45016027	Nssɛbong ka Jesus Christ nnyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ulemɛnɛ ammɛ kɛyɔɔng ɔsannɛ lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ latele kɛfal a kɛfal. Kulening.
46001001	Anaam Paul wa kɔsaapnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ ɔttɛ nle Uyilabɔtɔɔm a Christ la ɔkpana anaam Sosthenes, ikkpɔknɛ.
46001002	Ikkpɔk lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng mung ifee balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka Corinth. Balɔɔt ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkwɔɔnɛbɛ balɔɔt ammɛ ba bbwak, ba balenɛ ba ammɛ ka bɔkaat la Christ Jesus, ɔgbaa balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba balenɛ la ifɛɛn la ifɛɛn, ba bazɔɔmnɛ bakkwɔɔ lɛkɔɔl Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, Uyini ayyɔɔt la abbɛ.
46001003	Dedde ayyɔɔt, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, la Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, bannyiwɔyɔng lakke la bɔkaat.
46001004	Ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ nwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang ka lɛttɔ annyɔɔng ka ppyɛɛ wa Christ Jesus ulewɔnɛyɔng lɛnaang.
46001005	Ɔyyɛɛpwɔyɔngbong ka lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ la bikɔɔm la kɛsan a kɔlɔɔk ka alenɛyɔng ka bɔkaat la Christ.
46001006	Lɛmmwɔɔl a Christ lɛkkaambong gaang ka ippyam annyɔɔng.
46001007	Gɔɔ ppyɛɛ ɔlɔk gbɔɔ ba ɔtaka ɔsɛlɛwɔyɔng ka alenɛyɔng ka kɛkat attɛ Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, uffu ɔkkpɛlɛ bayɛnmɛ.
46001008	Ammɛ vvenɛ ulokowɔyɔng bbwak asiyɔng kibbi lizzi tɔttɔt ɔffɔ ka Kɛtɔm-Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ.
46001009	Ebinukkpaapi elenɛ ya kitele. Ebinukkpaapi ’yɔng baang ya ɛkkwɔɔwɔnɛyɔng ɛssɛɛn ka kɔssɛ Waan Annyɛ Jesus Christ, Uyini ayyɔɔt.
46001010	Ikpana anaam nkkpengewɔyɔng ka lakke Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, nttɛ ayilayɔng kwa alɔɔknɛyɔng nkwaaning asiyɔng lɛwɔlɔ. Ikpana anaam, ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng ataayɔng ka bɔkaat ka luttina ggwɔn, la eleme nnyɔn.
46001011	Balɔɔt ba bassinɛ ka itutum Chloe babwɔɔlɔnɛ Paul battɛ kɔwɔlɔ kulewɔyɔng baang ka bɛzzɔkɔ.
46001012	Fɔngɔ ssii nlɔɔk kwɛ ning mung. Lutini ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn ɔlɔɔk buu buu. Vvɔn ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔttɛ, “Anaam nbee la Paul”, ɔlɔk ɔttɛ, “Anaam nbee la Apollos.” Wa vvɔn ɔttɛ, “Anaam nbee la Peter,” ɔlɔk ɔttɛ, “Anaam nbee la Christ.”
46001013	Babɛngɛlɛbong Christ baloko lakup lakup! Paul ubbenɛ ka Cross ka lɛttɔ annyɔɔng ɔɔ? Adɔkɔ anaangyɔng baptizim ka lakke a Paul ɔɔ?
46001014	Nwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang ka nsinɛ ɔlɔɔt annyɔɔng ɔlɔk baptizim lɛnaang ukpeke Crispus la Gaius.
46001015	Ɔlɔɔt wa ule ukkwoong ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ badɔkɔ banaangmɛ baptizim ka lakke anaam ba ule.
46001016	(Kule baning, anaam nnaangnɛ Stephanas la itutum ammɛ baptizim. Ɔzzànga ba nbɛlɛ likke nnaang ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk baptizim ngbaa nsan.)
46001017	Christ usinɛ lɛtɔɔm ɔttɛ nffu nnaang balɔɔt baptizim. Ɔtɔɔmnɛ ɔttɛ nffu nbwɔɔlɔ Kuttu-Budoddo ammɛ. Ɔzzànga nfɔngɔ kɛsan a kɔlɔɔk a balɔɔt kɛkɔɔm nbwɔɔlɔ, nkwaaning Christ usi ka Cross ka lɛsɔɔk libbe.
46001018	Bɔtɔɔm bwa butumnɛ lubbe a Christ ka Cross bule bɔfɛɛn bwa gbɔɔ ka balɔɔt ba balenɛ lɛtaak. Ɔzzànga kwa ayyɔɔt ba ulenɛyɛlɛ lɛkkala, bɔtɔɔm ’bwɔng baang lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
46001019	Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, “Vvenɛ nbɛpɛ bikɔɔm a bisana kɔlɔɔk, nloko kɛsan a kɔlɔɔk sa bakkoop a lukkoop zzekep.”
46001020	Mung nkwɔng kɔdɔkɔ kɔgbata kɔkɔngɔ basan a bisana la bakkoop a lukkoop, la bakkwoong ikangala vveeng ’wɔng mung ka yang? Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyɔɔbong ɔttɛ bisana pya vveeng ’wɔng mung bizingizingi.
46001021	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka kɛsan-a-kɔlɔɔk ammɛ ɔnaang kwa kukoolonɛ balɔɔt kɛkɔɔm kɛsan-a-kɔlɔɔk abbɛ basanmɛ. Lutini ’gwɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uttina kɛkkala balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ kiyila ka lukopolo gwa balɔɔt balɔk battɛnɛ ba lɔyyɛɛp.
46001022	Balɔɔt a Jew baggyan bɛmaanga battɛ basan lɔkkwɔɔn. Ɔzzànga balɔɔt a Greek baggyan bisana.
46001023	Kwa ayyɔɔt kaang, ibwɔɔlɔ kɔlɔɔk a lubbe a Christ ka Cross. Bɔtɔɔm bwa butunnɛ balɔɔt a Jew, bule bɔfɛɛn bwa gbɔɔ ka Ikanakana.
46001024	Ɔzzànga kwa balɔɔt ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛbɛ lɛkkwɔɔ, la balɔɔt a Jew la Ikanakana, bɔtɔɔm ’bwɔng mung ulenɛ Christ, wa ulenɛ lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la bisana Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
46001025	Kwa kɔbalnɛ bizingizingi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, kɔyyɛɛp-ɔyyɛɛp kɔsak kɛsan a kɔlɔɔk sa ɔssɛbibit. Kwa kkpɛkɛlɛm ka labɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔkkaam kɔsak lakke za ɔssɛbibit.
46001026	Ikpana anaam akkeyɔng bwa adɔkɔnɛ aleyɔng ka ɛkɛtɛ ya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkwɔɔwɔnɛyɔng tɛ. Annyɔɔng basan a kɔlɔɔk ɔlɔk ba bayanganɛyɔng lakke adɔkɔyɔng ssup, balɔɔt a latele ɔgbaa gɔɔ ba bayipi ka luttina ɔssɛbibit.
46001027	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ukongo-ukongo ɔsanga kwa vveengodde battinanɛ battɛ ba kɔyyɛɛp, nkwaaning ɔssɛɛn basan-kɔlɔɔk ka izzit; la vveengodde uttinanɛ ɔttɛ ba bukkaam nkwaaning ɔssɛɛn bayanga lakke ka izzit.
46001028	Ɔsanga bɔfɛɛn bwa bulenɛ bwa ikpɛnnɛ busi bwa kɔlɔɔk lile ka vveengodde, appyɛɛkbwɛ attina attɛ baang bɔfɛɛn lissi, nkwaaning ɔbɛpɛ bwa vveeng uttinanɛ ɔttɛ buyyɛɛp-ɔyyɛɛp.
46001029	Nkwɔng mung ulenɛ kɛttɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ukkwoong ɔnaang kamma ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba ule.
46001030	Ɔzzànga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangwɔyɔngbong akaatyɔng la Christ Jesus. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangbongyɛlɛ itaa ka bɔkaat la Christ Jesus, ɔnaangmɛ ule bikɔɔm ayyɔɔt. Kussi ka ammɛ itaa bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm isseke balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba doddo, uleyɛlɛ lɛkkala ka bubbi.
46001031	Kwakkwɛ luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ule ka ɔnaangnɛ kamma, ɔnaangkwɛ utum bwa Uyini, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔnaangnɛ.”
46002001	Ikpana anaam, ka nffunɛ ka ɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng nkopolowɔyɔng lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm za lɔkkwɔɔn za lalup, baggboggbo lammwɔɔl la kukele nsi lɛkɔɔm.
46002002	Nnaangnɛ luttina gwa kisumala bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya nlenɛ la annyɔɔng, usseke Jesus Christ kɛyɔɔng ka nsinɛ lisumala, gaang gaang lubbe gwa ubbenɛ ka Cross.
46002003	Ka nffunɛ ka ɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng, la lakke nsi liffu. Ndɔkɔ ukeewaan, nffula ɔkkpɛlɛ a kkwɔɔt la bbwɔp.
46002004	Ɔgbaa nsi kukele ɔssɛbibit lɛkɔɔm ka lukopolo anaam la bɔtɔɔm bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔɔmnɛnɛ. Ɔzzànga kɔdɔkɔ ka iyɔɔ lakke Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm za ladɛmnɛbɛ bayila.
46002005	Kiyila annyɔɔng ba kɛtaa la annyɔɔng kwa kɛsan a kɔlɔɔk ɔssɛbibit; kɛtaa ka lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
46002006	Ɔzzànga nlɔɔk mung kɔlɔɔk a bisana la balɔɔt ba balenɛ lɛkkpɛɛm ka kɛsan a lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔzzànga kɛsan a kɔlɔɔk sa kissinɛ ka vveeng mung lissi, ɔlɔk ka lakke za lakɔɔmnɛ vveeng ’wɔng lissi; ɔlɔk ka lakke za lalenɛ ka kɛtaka lakke azzɛ biini.
46002007	Bisana pya nlɔɔknɛ mung nlɔɔk kɔlɔɔk a bisana lalup Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm pya ulupnɛ usseke balɔɔt. Appyɛ bilenɛ bisana bya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ ɛtɔk lɛkɔɔm ɔsanga ka kibbe lɛttɔ ayyɔɔt, bong tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔnaang ɛkpansi.
46002008	Ɔssɛbibit vvɔn gbɔɔ wa ɔsannɛ bisana ’pyɔng mung usi lile. Balenɛ ka basannɛpyɛ, nzang basi Uyini-lakke ɔkkpɛlɛ lɛkama ka Cross.
46002009	Mkkpa kɔnaang, kule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lulenɛ lɛttɛ, “Kwa ɔlɔɔt ɔtakanɛ lɛyɛn, ɔlɔk ɔtaka lippyee, ɔlɔk uttina utum, kukkwoong mung kɔnaang. Kɛssanga kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng baang kulenɛ bɔfɛɛn bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangnɛ uloko balɔɔt ba batelemɛnɛ.”
46002010	Ɔzzànga kɔdɔkɔ kule kwa ayyɔɔt ka lakke Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lanaangnɛyɛlɛ isan kɔlɔɔk a lalup ammɛ. Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kuggbung kɔggyan bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔgbaa la kɔlɔɔk a lalup Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kwa ddɔng.
46002011	Ɔzzànga kulenɛ kwa ɔlɔɔt, kuyeeng ammɛ biini kɔsannɛ kɔlɔɔk kwa kutummɛnɛ ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Kule kɛssanga ssɔn, Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm keem kɔsannɛ kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ.
46002012	Ayyɔɔt eleme a vveengodde ’wɔng ba itaka itɔk. Ule Kuyeeng kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔɔmnɛ ufeeyɛlɛ keem ka itɔknɛ, nkwaaning isan bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛyɛlɛ linnyi.
46002013	Ɔzzànga ba ilɔɔk ka lammwɔɔl za bisana ɔssɛbibit bakopolonɛ, ilɔɔk ka lammwɔɔl za Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kukopolonɛ ka ibwɔɔlɔnɛ balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk a Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
46002014	Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa usinɛ Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛyanga, ba ukkwoong ɔtɔk lɛsɔɔk za lissinɛ ka Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm liffu ka usinɛzɛ lɛsan; ule bɔfɛɛn bwa gbɔɔ ka ammɛ. Akɔɔm Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm keem akkwoong abwɔɔlɔ linaang abbɛ.
46002015	Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyanganɛ Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ukkwoong mung ɔkaal kɛkaal a bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa ule ukkwoong ɔkaalmɛ ammɛ ba ule.
46002016	Kule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lulenɛ lɛlɔɔk lɔttɛ, “Nyinɔɔng ɔsannɛ luppyam Uyini? Nyinɔɔng ule ukkwoong ɔbbamɛ bikɔɔm?” Mkkpa kɔnaang ayyɔɔt iyanga luppyam a Christ.
46003001	Ka lɔkkwɔɔn, ikpana anaam, ba nkwoong nlɔɔk la annyɔɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ nlɔɔknɛ la balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Nle nlɔɔk la annyɔɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt ɛkpansi, ɔgbaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bwɔɔntiti ba bassumanɛ lɛfal liffu ka kɛkaan a balɔɔt a Christ.
46003002	Ndɔkɔ nnyiwɔyɔng libee, kilaam lissi ka asinɛyɔng lɛbama akatyɔngsɛ. Gɔɔ gedegede mung ba ataka abamayɔng,
46003003	ka atiinɛ ka anaangnɛyɔng linaang a balɔɔt ɛkpansi. Ayangayɔng luleep la bannyɔɔng, awɔlɔyɔng, ning baang ba asan attɛ atiiyɔng balɔɔt ɛkpansi ba bakupnɛ eleme ɛkpansi ɔɔ?
46003004	Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔttɛ, “Anaam nbee la Paul.” Ɔlɔk ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Anaam nbee la Apollos.” Baang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt ɛkpansi lissi ka anaangnɛyɔng ɔɔ?
46003005	Kkpɔɔ nyinɛ ulenɛ Apollos? Kkpɔɔ nyinɛ ulenɛ Paul? Ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt-a-baffa ibɔɔyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba ilewɔnɛyɔng lɛnaang ayangayɔng kiyila. Ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt, ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔt ɔnaang kɛnaang sa Uyini unnyimɛnɛ.
46003006	Anaam nkɔɔnnɛ ɛfɔɔk a bɛfɛɛn, Apollos ɔllɔtyɛ bannyi ɔttɛ ɛmmala. Ɔzzànga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangnɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ kɛssɛ ’sɔng baang kiddu.
46003007	Ɔkɔɔnɔkɔɔn la ɔllɔt-a-bannyi ka bulɔk ba bale. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛyɛlɛ ka kukkam kwa lɛbaang ka ɔnaangnɛ bɛssɛ biddu.
46003008	Ɔkɔɔnɔkɔɔn la ɔllɔt-a-bannyi buubuu ba bale. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule unnyi ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ lɛsɔɔk ɔssanga ka kɛnaang sa ɔnaangnɛ.
46003009	Ayyɔɔt itaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt ba inaangnɛ kɛnaang ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn innyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Annyɔɔng alenɛyɔng bɔtɔɔm ammɛ. Annyɔɔng ɔgbaa assɛnɛ aleyɔng ggwoon Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
46003010	Nkɔɔm lakke za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyinɛnɛ ntte lutte tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔbɛtɛnɛ ka kɛbɔɔk a ssoon. Mung ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ule baang ka ɔbɔɔknɛ ka lutte ’gwɔng baang. Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔsan tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔbɔɔknɛ.
46003011	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsambong Jesus uloko ka lutte. Ɔlɔɔt wa ule ɔbbal lutte lɔlɔk litte ba ɔbɛlɛ lile.
46003012	Balɔɔt balɔk bale bakɔɔm silver ɔlɔk gold ɔlɔk ifɔɔk ikpana batte lutte. Balɔk bakɔɔm bɛssɛ ɔlɔk lifɔɔk.
46003013	Bubbi la bɔllɛ kɛnaang ɔlɔɔt la duu vvenɛ butta ka vveeng ka ɛkɛtɛ Jesus ule uffu. Lɔkɔɔn a kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang vvenɛ lɔssanga innyɔ balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ. Vvenɛ lɔllɛ linaang abbɛ lɔyɛn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ liyyɛɛpnɛ liffɔ.
46003014	Ulenɛ ka linaang ɔlɔɔt lisinɛ lɔkɔɔn lippyee, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang vvenɛ ɔyanga lɛsɔɔk.
46003015	Ɔzzànga ɔppyɛɛnɛ ule bɔfɛɛn a linaang ɔlɔɔt likkɔmnɛ lɔkɔɔn, vvenɛ ɔsɛlɛsɛ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔkkala ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔfɔngɔ, ɔzzànga ule ule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔttanɛ ka lalaak a lɔkɔɔn.
46003016	Asan lɔsan attɛ annɔ alenɛ Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kule baang la annɔ ka kɔtaanɛ.
46003017	Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔbɛpɛnɛ Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔbɛpɛmɛ. Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lule gwa doddo, annyɔɔng biini alenɛyɔng ggwoon ammɛ.
46003018	Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔdɛmmɛ kɛyɔɔng ugbigbini. Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ka bɛzzɔkɔ annyɔɔng uttinamɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng ɔttɛ ɔsan kɔlɔɔk a vveeng ’wɔng, kkwɔɔmɛyɔng ukun ɔkkɔɔnɛ ɔsan kɔlɔɔk.
46003019	Bɔfɛɛn bwa ɛkpansi ’yɔng ettinanɛ ɛttɛ baang kɛsan a kɔlɔɔk, bule bwa ggbɔɔ ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule ɔkaa balɔɔt ba battinanɛ battɛ abbɛ basan a kɔlɔɔk ka lagban abbɛ.”
46003020	Lɔbbal lɛlɔɔk lɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsan lɔsan ɔttɛ ittina basan-a-kɔlɔɔk ile ya ggbɔɔ, ka bulɔk ba iffɔ.”
46003021	Ɔlɔɔt tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔnaang kamma utum bɔfɛɛn bwa ɔssɛbibit ukkwoongnɛ ɔnaang. Uvve bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bile bya annyɔɔng.
46003022	Paul, Apollos la Peter, vveengodde, kuddu la lubbe, kɔlɔɔk kwa gedegede mung la kwa lusso, ɔkkpɛlɛ abbyɛ bile bya annyɔɔng.
46003023	Annyɔɔng ba Christ, Christ wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
46004001	Atɔkyɔngyɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ibɔɔyi ya Christ. Ulenɛ lilɔɔk a lalup Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm sa lɔkkwɔɔn lɛsam ɔssɛɛnyɛlɛ ka labɔɔk.
46004002	Bɔfɛɛn bwa ɔlɔɔt ɔggyannɛ ka ibɔɔk a bɔɔyi ammɛ ulenɛ kitele lɛmmwɔɔl ammɛ, ɔnaang bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya ɔttɛnɛ ɔnaang.
46004003	Ba nffik nttɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔlɔɔt unnyinɛ kibbi, gɔɔ ka ɛtɔk duu. Anaam kibbi kɛyɔɔng nɛ ba nnyi.
46004004	Luttina anaam lule ppwool. Ɔzzànga ’kwɔng ba kukkwoong kɔyɔɔ kɔttɛ bubbi ba ntaka nnaang. Uyini ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔkaalnɛ kɛkaal anaam.
46004005	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ annyi ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk kibbi bong tɛ́ttɛ́ ɛkɛtɛ kɛkaal ammɛ ɛffɔ. Uyini uffubong tɛ́ttɛ́ kɛkaal sa lakpeke lɛffɔ. Uffunɛ, vvenɛ ɔsanga lilɔɔk sa balɔɔt balɔɔknɛ ka lalup ɔtta ka vveeng. Vvenɛ ɔsanga kwa ɔlɔɔt ulupnɛ ka luppyam ɔtta ka vveeng. Ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang vvenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ubungu ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔt tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔnaangnɛ ɔffɔ.
46004006	Ikpana anaam, ka lɛttɔ annyɔɔng, nkɔɔmbongyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt la Apollos nyɔɔwɔyɔng ɛtɔk ya ale akupyɔng ɔlɔk akkoopyɔng bwa bassanɛ ifɛɛt battɛ, “Atele Lafɔɔ za doddo.” Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ɔsaapwɔ usseke wa vvɔn.
46004007	Nyinɛ ɔnaangwɔnɛyɔng ɔyɛnwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng attayɔng balɔɔt balɔk? Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lissi unnyiwɔnɛyɔng bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya ayanganɛyɔng ɔɔ? Ammɛ lissi unnyiwɔnɛyɔng ɔɔ? Mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔkkyaawɔyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng baang bisinɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lissi?
46004008	Gedegede mung ayangayɔngbong bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya aggyannɛyɔng ɔɔ? Atiiyɔng babeet, mkkpa ayyɔɔt isi babeet lile ɔɔ? Kɔyyɛɛp-ɔyyɛɛp. Nggele gaang gaang bulenɛyɔng babeet ka lɔkkwɔɔn nkwaaning ayyɔɔt issɛ ile babeet la annyɔɔng.
46004009	Kɔtaanɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt, bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus, usseke isimi kɛtaa linnyi tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt ba bazzanɛ kɛkaal abbɛ battɛ babbe bayɔɔ bayilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔm la ɔssɛbibit.
46004010	Bakkwɔɔbongyɛlɛ bazingizingi ka lɛttɔ a Christ. Ɔzzànga annyɔɔng asannɛyɔng kɔlɔɔk ka akupnɛyɔng Christ. Ayyɔɔt ba ikkaam ɔzzànga annyɔɔng akkaamyɔng lɔkkaam. Ayyɔɔt balɔɔt yɛlɛ ba batele; ɔzzànga annyɔɔng batelewɔyɔng lutele.
46004011	Ka lɛmmwɔɔl a kamma mung ile ka buwɔɔng a bannyi la buwɔɔng a kazzi. Iwɔkɔlɔ babbu bɛssaka ibba. Lɔkkpat batupyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt. Issɛ gbɔɔgbɔɔgbɔɔ ikpikpiti.
46004012	Inaang kɛnaang imɛɛm issuma tɛ́ttɛ́ iyɛn bwa izzinɛ. Ɛkɛtɛ ya babbaatnɛyɛlɛ elenɛ ɛkɛtɛ ya inaangnɛbɛ ppyɛɛ. Bayɔɔnɛyɛlɛ akama, ning baang ulenɛ ka ikamanɛ lɔkama ibbɔmɛ.
46004013	Babbaatnɛyɛlɛ, ippyɛlɛbɛ kamma la lammwɔɔl za doddo. Ippyɛlɛ ile tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɛfɛɛn bya kɛsam kɛzzɔɔk. Isseke ititiban ka ɛkpansi ka lɛmmwɔɔl a kamma mung.
46004014	Nkkpɔk ’kwɔng gbɔɔ nnyiwɔyɔng ka alenɛyɔng bwaan a luppyam anaam. Nsi lɛggyan nttɛ izzit inaangwɔyɔng.
46004015	Mkkpa ayangayɔng balɔɔt baffɔwɔyɔng innɔ innɔ ba bakopolowɔnɛyɔng kɔlɔɔk ka lɛfal annyɔɔng ka Christ, ssaawɔ ulewɔyɔng vvɔn keem. Ka lɛfal annyɔɔng ka Christ anaam nsseke dedde annyɔɔng ka nkɔɔmnɛ Kuttu kwa Doddo nfeewɔyɔng.
46004016	Nkkpengewɔyɔng nttɛ akupyɔng eleme anaam.
46004017	Akkwɛ kɔnaangnɛ nle ka ntɔɔmnɛ Timothy nfeewɔyɔng. Ammɛ, ulenɛ waan a luppyam anaam ka kkwɔɔt Uyini. Vvenɛ ukkewɔyɔng itɔk a lilɔɔk ya bbwak ya nkupnɛ ka ufaa lɛfal wa nkupnɛ Jesus Christ, la kwa nkopolonɛ ka idda izɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ.
46004018	Balɔɔt balɔk ɔkkyaawɔyɔngbong ɔsak. Ba abɛlɛ littina attɛyɔng ntii ka nffunɛ nkoolowɔyɔng.
46004019	Kɔsaapnɛ Uyini, nle nkka liffu ka annyɔɔng. Anaam biini vvenɛ nyɛn bwa balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba ɔkkyaanɛbɛ banaangnɛ. Bwa bakkwoongnɛ balɔɔk ka kamma keem lissi.
46004020	Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka kɛlɔɔk a lɛmmwɔɔl keem ba ile, ile ka lakke ɔgbaa.
46004021	Mung ɔllɛwɔyɔng ’bɔng? Ɔllɛ ka nffunɛ la bipyoko faa la luppyam gwa bɛtɛbɛtɛ?
46005001	Nppyeebong ka battɛnɛ asseke ka akupnɛyɔng bwanavva gbɔɔgbɔɔgbɔɔ. Gɔɔ balɔɔt ba basɛlɛnɛ kiyila kɛssanga kɔlɔɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ assɛ baang ba banaang. Nppyeebong ka babwɔɔlɔnɛnɛ battɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔtɔkbong wanavva abassɛ ammɛ.
46005002	Ngkka mung ɔkkyaawɔyɔng ’bɔng? Kɔyyɛɛp ka ataanɛyɔng bukee bunaangwɔyɔng. Aggbayɔng ɔlɔɔt wa ɔnaangnɛ kɛssanga kɔlɔɔk ’sɔng baang ka kɛkaan annyɔɔng.
46005003	Mkkpa nle fulufulu nssekewɔyɔng ka ɛkkpakkwɔɔt, luppyam anaam lule baang la annyɔɔng. Nnyibong ɔlɔɔt wa ɔnaangnɛ kɛssanga kɔlɔɔk ’sɔng baang kibbi eseese ka lakke Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bulenɛ baang la annyɔɔng. Aggbanɛyɔng ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn, anaam nle baang la annyɔɔng ka lakke Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus, za lalenɛ mung la ayyɔɔt.
46005005	Asamyɔng ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang annyiyɔng Satan umii ɔbɛpɛ kkwɔɔt ammɛ nkwaaning ɔkkala lɛfɛkɛlɛ ammɛ ka Kɛtɔm-Uyini.
46005006	Ba kɔyyɛɛp ka anaangnɛyɔng bizzeen. Asanyɔng lɔsan ifɛɛt ya battɛnɛ, “Bwaan izuku a yeast ssup ning bɛnaangnɛ ugɔngɔ a brɛɛd ɔkkpɛlɛ ammɛ utum.”
46005007	Vvenɛ asangayɔng ɔtɔm a yeast a bubbi ’bwɔng mung ɔkkɔɔnɛ ayyɛɛp affatayɔng. Assekeyɔng ufaa ugɔngɔ a brɛɛd wa ɔsɛlɛnɛ yeast. Nsan lɔsan nttɛ aleyɔng ning baang ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Ɛkɛtɛ Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ ayyɔɔt ɛbbalbong lɛffɔ ka balenɛ Christ wa ulenɛ Waan-ɛtɔɔn a Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ lɛsam bawwɔɔl.
46005008	Ka kulenɛ ning lile, izziyɔng kazzi ayyɔɔt la brɛɛd wa ɔsɛlɛnɛ yeast wa ulenɛ brɛɛd a bɔllɛ-luppyam la lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk. Ifɔngɔyɔng brɛɛd wa ɔyanganɛ ɔtɔm a yeast a bubbi la ibbyap lizzi.
46005009	Ka lɛmmwɔɔl za nkkpɔknɛ, nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ assɛyɔng la balɔɔt ba bakupnɛ bwanavva balɔɔt.
46005010	Mung ba nlɔɔk ntum basɛlɛ kiyila ba balenɛ balɔɔt ba bbɔlbbɔl ɔlɔk ba bawɔnɔnɛ, ɔlɔk la bassip, gɔɔ la bazɔɔm ilat tɛ. Asinɛ la balɔɔt ’bɔng mung lɛssɛ ɔllɛwɔ ka asinɛ wa ɛkpansi lɛbɛlɛ lile.
46005011	Bwa nlɔɔknɛ mung nlɔɔk nttɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ assɛyɔng la ɔlɔɔt wa ɔbbwanɛ ɔttɛ ammɛ ɔkpana annɔ ka Christ ɔppyɛɛ ule ukup a bwanavva gbɔɔgbɔɔgbɔɔ, ɔlɔk ule ɔwɔnɔwɔnɔ, ɔlɔk ɔzɔɔm-ilat ɔlɔk ɔbbɔl a bɛlɔɔk la balɔɔt, ɔlɔk ɔvva-batak, ɔlɔk uyip ssip. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ataa ɔtaa gbɔɔ azziyɔng kazzi la kɛssanga ɔlɔɔt ’sɔng baang.
46005012	Uvve kaang ’wɔng baang kɛnaang anaam lissi wa nle nkaal kɛkaal a balɔɔt ba basinɛ ka kɛkaan ayyɔɔt lile. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule ɔkaal kɛkaal abbɛ. Ɔzzànga mung annyɔɔng kɛkaal a bannyɔɔng a kɔssɛ baala akaalyɔng ɔɔ?
46005013	Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, “Aggbayɔng ɔnaang-a-bubbi ka kɛkaan annyɔɔng.”
46006001	Ulenɛ ka ɔlɔɔt ɔyanganɛ kɔwɔlɔ la wabbɛ, ɔyanga-kiyila ule ɔnaang nang umii ubee ka lusso balɔɔt ba basɛlɛnɛ kiyila, ɔkaal kɛkaal usi lɛfɔngɔ balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bakaal kɛkaal ’sɔng baang?
46006002	Ba asan attɛyɔng balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ bakaal vveeng ’wɔng ɔɔ? Akkwoongnɛ akaalyɔng kɛkaal a vveeng ’wɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ, ule usseke lilɔɔk sa sɛkɛsɛkɛ asiyɔng likkwoong akaalyɔng ɔɔ?
46006003	Ba asan attɛyɔng vvenɛ ikaal kɛkaal a bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔɔ? Ikaalnɛ kɛkaal a bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ule usseke bɛfɛɛn a vveeng ’wɔng mung isi kɛkaal abbyɛ lɛkaal ɔɔ?
46006004	Lilɔɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ assɛ baang littɔnɛ, vvenɛ asamyɔng kwɛ afeeyɔng balɔɔt ba basinɛ ka luzɔɔm lile bakaalwɔyɔng kwɛ ɔɔ?
46006005	Nlɔɔk ’kwɔng nttɛ nkwaaning izzit inaangwɔyɔng. Ɔlɔɔt ka bɛzzɔkɔ annyɔɔng ba ɔsɛlɛ wa ɔsannɛ kɔlɔɔk, ukkwoong ɔkaal kɛkaal Ɔyanga-kiyila la wabbɛ ɔɔ?
46006006	Lutini gwa ɔyanga-kiyila ɔkkwɔɔnɛ wabbɛ kɛkaal ka lusso basɛlɛ-kiyila.
46006007	Kɛkkwɔɔ bɛkaal bya akkwɔɔwɔnɛyɔng annyɔɔng annyɔɔng kɛyɔɔbong kɛttɛ asiyɔngbong lizzeme ka kikup a Christ ka naka-naka. Ba kɔtta lɛyyɛɛp ka ɔlɔɔt ɔnaangwɔnɛyɔng annyɔɔng bubbi ɔɔ? Ba kɔtta lɛyyɛɛp ka bayipwɔnɛyɔng bɛfɛɛn ɔɔ?
46006008	Annyɔɔng appyɛɛ anaangwɔyɔng annyɔɔng annyɔɔng bubbi, ayipwɔyɔng annyɔɔng annyɔɔng!
46006009	Kule kule asanyɔng mung attɛyɔng banaang-a-bubbi Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm baala bayɛn ɔɔ? Tɛ̀ttɛ́ afɛɛtwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng. Balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ linaang sa bbɔlbbɔl bazɔɔm ilat, bakup bwanavva balɔɔt, basam bɛfɛɛn a balɔɔt, bazak babbɛ bwaanbwalam
46006010	ɔlɔk bannaa bɛfɛɛn a balɔɔt ka lakke, ɔlɔk bayip, bavva batak; gɔɔ ɔgbɛɛk a lɔgbɛɛk; ɔlɔɔt wa ɔnaangnɛ ’byɔng, Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka zzeen baala ɔyɛn.
46006011	Annyɔɔng balɔɔt balɔk adɔkɔyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ abbɛ baang. Ɔzzànga attayɔngbong ka bubbi, basamwɔyɔngbong bannyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kulokowɔyɔngbong bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka lakke a Jesus Christ Uyini.
46006012	Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk vvenɛ ɔttɛ, “Bayila mung battɛ nnaang bɔfɛɛn la duu.” Kule baning, ɔzzànga bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ lissi bɛyyɛɛpwɔnɛ. Anaam nkkwoong mung nttɛ bayilabong battɛ nnaang bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ɔzzànga baala nfɔngɔ bɔfɛɛn bulɔk butɔknɛ ka bubili.
46006013	Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk vvenɛ ɔttɛ, “Kazzi kale kwa lɛmmɛ, lɛmmɛ lile za kazzi.” Kule baning, ɔ̀zzàngà Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔnaang bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng baang bɛffa bikpeke. Ba kɔyyɛɛp ka akɔɔmnɛ kkwɔɔt annɔ ka ɛtɔk a kɛssɛ-kɛzak. Kkwɔɔt lile sa Uyini, Uyini unnyinɛsɛ kuddu.
46006014	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ufungalanɛ Uyini ka lubbe, Vvenɛ ɔssɛ ufungalyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt ning baang ka lakke ammɛ.
46006015	Asanyɔng lɔsan attɛyɔng kkwɔɔt annyɔɔng lilenɛ bikkeep a Christ. Nsam kikkeep a Christ nnaang kikkeep a kkwɔɔt a wa àkkpàlà ɔɔ? Ba kɔyyɛɛp.
46006016	Faa ba asan attɛyɔng ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsamnɛ kkwɔɔt ammɛ utoolo la sa wa àkkpàlà usseke bɔfɛɛn bwɔn la ammɛ ɔɔ? Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔk ppwool ppwool lɔttɛ, “Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang baffa basseke kkwɔɔt ssɔn.”
46006017	Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsammɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng utoolo la Uyini usseke bɔfɛɛn bwɔn la ammɛ ka Lakke Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
46006018	Akkyaayɔng kɛssɛ-kɛzak afɔngɔyɔng. Bubbi bulɔk bwa ɔlɔɔt ɔnaang bubɛpɛ kkwɔɔt ammɛ ɔgbaa la kɛssɛ-kɛsak ba bule. Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt ka ɔbɛpɛnɛ lafɔɔ, ka umininɛ la wanavva, ɔnaangbong bubbi utum kkwɔɔt ammɛ biini.
46006019	Ba asan attɛyɔng kkwɔɔt annyɔɔng lile ggwoon a Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ullunɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ annyɔɔng ɔɔ? Kɛyɔɔng wɔyɔng ba ayangayɔng. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyangawɔnɛyɔng.
46006020	Ɔlɛɛpwɔyɔngbong ukkpele kappya. Ɔzzànga akɔɔmyɔng kkwɔɔt annyɔɔng ka latele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
46007001	Gedegede mung ile ka inngwanɛ kɔlɔɔk kwa akkpɔknɛ atumyɔng. Ɔlɔɔt ɔnaang bbwak ka usinɛ wanavva lɛtɔk.
46007002	Kɛssɛ-kɛzak ka kilenɛ lɛsak lɛttala, ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔtɔk wanavva wa ammɛ. Wanavva la vvɔn ɔyanga walam wa ammɛ biini.
46007003	Waanwalam ɔnaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔtɔk-a-wanavva, wanavva ɔnaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ullu-walam. Ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn ɔnaang kwa wabbɛ ɔggyannɛ ɔttɛ ɔnaang.
46007004	Wanavva lissi ulenɛ uyini a kkwɔɔt ammɛ biini. Kkwɔɔt ammɛ lile sa walam ammɛ. Kɔssɛ kule kɛssanga ssɔn: waanwalam lissi ulenɛ uyini a kkwɔɔt ammɛ biini. Kkwɔɔt ammɛ lile sa wanavva ammɛ.
46007005	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ afimwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng. Akkwoong mung anaangyɔng likup, anaangyɔng ning baang ka waan ɛkɛtɛ ssup nkwaaning ayangayɔng liggbili za kɛssɛɛn a luzɔɔm. Ɔzzànga appyɛlɛ ataayɔng ka bɔkaat tɛ̀ttɛ̀ walam la wanavva. Ataayɔng ka bɔkaat ɔkkɔɔnɛ Satan usi likkwoong ɔllɛwɔyɔng, ka ale asi likkwoong akɔɔmwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng.
46007006	Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔngbong ’kwɔng mung, ɔzzànga tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lafɔɔ lissi, kule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛbba bikɔɔm.
46007007	Kkpɔɔ ndɔkɔ nngwa nttɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ataayɔng buyya tɛ̀ttɛ̀ anaam. Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔt ɔyanga lɛsɔɔk za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyimɛnɛ. Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ɔyanganɛ lɛsɔɔk ’zɔng; wa vvɔn ɔyanga lɛlɔk.
46007008	Gedegede mung nlɔɔk ’kwɔng la balɔɔt ba batakanɛ bwanavva lɛtɔk la ba batakanɛ bwalam lillu, la ba bwalam abbɛ babbenɛ bakɔngɔbɛ. Nzang kule kɔtta lɛyyɛɛp ka ataanɛyɔng kɛyɔɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ anaam mung.
46007009	Ɔzzànga asinɛyɔng likkwoong akkaamyɔng ippyam, atɔkyɔng bwanavva. Bwanavva bamii ballu bwalam. Kɔtta lɛyyɛɛp ka atɔknɛyɔng bwanavva; bwanavva ballu bwalam; lutini ataanɛyɔng la ikama ka ippyam.
46007010	Kwa balɔɔt ba balenɛ bwanavva lɛtɔk la ba balenɛ bwalam lillu, nyanga lɔttama. Gwa anaam biini lissi, ɔzzànga gwa Uyini. Wanavva tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔgbata ɔkɔngɔ walam ammɛ.
46007011	Ɔnaangnɛ ning baang ule ɔppyɛɛ ɔtaa kɛyɔɔng ɔlɔk nzang ɔppyɛlɛ umii bataa ka bɔkaat la walam ammɛ. Waanwalam ɔgbaa tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔggba wanavva ammɛ.
46007012	Nlɔɔk kwa balɔɔt balɔk. Anaam nlɔɔknɛ, Uyini lissi. Ɔlɔɔt wa uyilanɛ kwa luzɔɔm ɔtɔknɛ wanavva wa ɔsɛlɛnɛ kiyila, wanavva uyilanɛ ɔttɛ vvenɛ ullumɛ, tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔggbamɛ.
46007013	Wanavva wa uyilanɛ kwa luzɔɔm ullunɛ walam wa usinɛ kiyila lɛyanga, waanwalam uyilanɛ ɔttɛ vvenɛ ɔtɔkmɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ wanavva ammɛ, wanavva tɛ̀ttɛ́ ufim walam ’wɔng baang.
46007014	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔk mung waanwalam wa ɔsɛlɛnɛ kiyila ulenɛ ka ɔtɔknɛ wanavva wa ɔyanganɛ kiyila. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔk mung wanavva wa ɔsɛlɛnɛ kiyila ulenɛ ka ullunɛ la walam wa ɔyanganɛ kiyila ka Christ. Kusinɛ ning lile, bwɔɔn abbɛ bale bale tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ba balɔɔt ba batakanɛ baptizim lɛnaang. Ɔzzànga ka kulenɛ ning mung Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔk mung bɛ.
46007015	Ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsɛlɛnɛ kiyila ɔttɛnɛ vvenɛ ɔgbata ɔkɔngɔ ɔlɔɔt wa uyilanɛ kwa luzɔɔm, ɔfɔngɔmɛ ɔgbata. Kulenɛ ka ɛtɔk ’yɔng baang ɔlɔɔt wa uyilanɛ kwa luzɔɔm, ule wanavva ɔlɔk waanwalam ukkwoong mung ɔnaang kwa uttinanɛ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkwɔɔwɔyɔngbong ɔttɛ ataayɔng ka bɔkaat.
46007016	Wanavva wa ukupnɛ kwa Jesus! Ale anaang nang asan bentee attɛ baala akkwoong akkala walam annɔ? Waanwalam wa uyilanɛ kwa Jesus ale anaang nang asan attɛ baala akkwoong akkala wanavva annɔ?
46007017	Ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn ɔnaang kwa lɛsɔɔk za Uyini unnyimɛnɛ. Ɔtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔggbanɛ lissi ule ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkwɔɔmɛnɛ. Nkwɔng kulenɛ ɛtɔk ya nkopolonɛ ka izɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ.
46007018	Ɔlɔɔt wa ulenɛ lɛtaa lɛzza ulenɛ kɛkkwɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm liyila, tɛ̀ttɛ́ ubum ɔttɛ ammɛ lɛtaa ba ɔtaka ɔzza. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtakanɛ lɛtaa lɛzza ulenɛ kɛkkwɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm liyila, tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔzza lɛtaa.
46007019	Kɛzza lɛtaa la kisi lɛtaa lɛzza kɔlɔɔk gaang lissi. Kwa kɔttanɛ ulenɛ kitele Lafɔɔ-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
46007020	Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔggbanɛ lissi ule ka ɛkɛtɛ ya uyilanɛ kɛkkwɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
46007021	Adɔkɔ ubili ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkwɔɔwɔnɛ ɔɔ? Kɔyyɛɛp mung. Ɔzzànga akkwoongnɛ ayanga kufuk kwa ale anaang atta ka bubili, akɔɔmkwɛ doddo.
46007022	Ubili wa Uyini, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulemɛnɛ lɛkkwɔɔ ammɛ ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa Uyini, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usimɛnɛ ubili lɛbɛlɛ lɛkkwɔɔ. Ɔlɔɔt wa usinɛ ka bubili lile, Christ ɔkkwɔɔmɛnɛ, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang usseke ubili a Christ.
46007023	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɛɛpwɔyɔngbong, Tɛ̀ttɛ́ abbalyɔng ka bubili balɔɔt balɔk lile.
46007024	Ikpana anaam, ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn ɔtaa ka bɔkaat la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔdɔkɔnɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkwɔɔmɛnɛ.
46007025	Nkwɔng kutum kɔlɔɔk kwa akkpɔknɛ atumyɔng bwanavva ba batakanɛ bwalam lillu la bwaanbwalam ba batakanɛ bwanavva lɛtɔk: Nsi lɔdda ka Uyini lɛtɔk. Ɔzzànga nlɔɔk kwa luttina anaam biini ka nlenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa nlenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛttɔ libbe ulenɛ lakke linnyi.
46007026	Ittinanɛ kwa akama wa gedegede mung, nttina nttɛ kɔtta lɛyyɛɛp ka ɔlɔɔt ɔtaanɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ulenɛ.
46007027	Ayangabong wanavva ɔɔ? Ulewɔnɛ baang, tɛ̀ttɛ́ asimɛ doddo lɛkɔɔm. Wanavva ba ayanga ɔɔ? Asinɛ lɛyanga tɛ̀ttɛ́ atɔk wanavva.
46007028	Ɔzzànga atɔknɛ wanavva, bubbi ba ataka anaang. Wanavva wa ɔtakanɛ walam lillu, ullunɛ walam, bubbi ba ɔtaka ɔnaang. Ɔzzànga vvenɛ nkkalawayɔng ka lilɔɔk sa kɛtɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ sa balɔɔt ba batɔknɛ bwanavva bale bayanga.
46007029	Ikpana anaam, nkwɔng kulenɛ kwa nttinanɛ; ɛkɛtɛ gaang ba ɛbɛlɛ lɛlɔm. Ɔzzànga ka ussinɛ mung umii ka lusso, batɔk-a-bwanavva bataa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ batakanɛ bwanavva lɛtɔk.
46007030	Balɔɔt ba bakkwanɛ, bataa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balenɛ ka laggele. Ba basɛɛknɛ bataa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balenɛ ka lakpimili. Balɔɔt ba balɛɛpnɛ lɛlɛɛp bataa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt ba basinɛbɛ bwa balɛɛpnɛ linnyi.
46007031	Balɔɔt ba battinanɛ kwa iyyɛɛp a vveengodde, batɔk iyyɛɛp tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ubbu kɔlɔɔk. Ɛkpansi ’yɔng mung tɛ̀ttɛ̀ elenɛ lule gedegede mung baala ettumu mmɛmmɛ.
46007032	Nggyan nttɛ luppyam lɔfɔngɔwɔyɔng kɛbɛlɛ lɛzza. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtakanɛ wanavva lɛtɔk, ubee bbwak ka kɛnaang Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔggyannɛ ɔttɛ ɔnaang kwa kɔsaapnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
46007033	Ɔlɔɔt wa ulenɛ wanavva lɛtɔk, ubee bbwak ka bɛfɛɛn a vveengodde, ɔggyannɛ ɔttɛ ɔnaang kwa kɔsaapnɛ wanavva ammɛ.
46007034	Ɔzzànga ning baang lilɔɔk ’sɔng baang littuluwɔbong lafoom laffa-laffa. Wanavva wa ɔtakanɛ walam lillu ɔlɔk wanavva wa ɔtakanɛ la walam limini ɔsam kkwɔɔt ammɛ biini unnyi ka kɛnaang Uyini, ɔggyannɛ ppyɛɛ a kkwɔɔt ammɛ la kuyeeng ammɛ. Ɔzzànga wanavva wa ulenɛ walam lillu usseke ka uttinanɛ kwa iyyɛɛp a vveengodde ka ɔggyannɛ ɔttɛ ɔnaang kwa kɔsaapnɛ ulam.
46007035	Nlɔɔk ’kwɔng ka nggyannɛ nttɛ nttelewɔyɔng. Ba nggyan nttɛ ntunuwɔyɔng ka lilɔɔk annyɔɔng. Lutini ’gwɔng, nggyan nttɛ anaangyɔng kɔlɔɔk kwa kɔyyɛɛpnɛ kule bbwak. Asamwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ annyiyɔng ka kɛnaang Uyini tɛ̀ttɛ́ kufoom kɔlɔk kusseke.
46007036	Ulenɛ iggyan ya wanavva la walam balenɛ litini battɛ baala ballu, waanwalam ɔsannɛ ɔttɛ ɔfafakabong avva ɔzzànga utii ka ɔsaapmɛnɛ kɛtɔk, bakkwoong mung ballu, bubbi ka ’kwɔng baang ba bule.
46007037	Ɔzzànga ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn ɔlɔɔt wa basimɛnɛ kutut litut, ule littina kɛyɔɔng ɔttɛ wanavva baala ɔtɔk, ulenɛ likkwoong ɔkɔɔm luttina ammɛ kkpɔk, ɔnaang bbwak ka usinɛ wanavva lɛtɔk.
46007038	Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtɔknɛ wanavva ɔnaang doddo. Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa usinɛ wanavva lɛtɔk ɔttanɛ bbwak lɛnaang.
46007039	Wanavva wa ullunɛ walam, gbɔɔgbɔɔgbɔɔ baala ɔssɛ ka utiinɛ ka ssala walam. Ɔzzànga walam ammɛ ubbenɛ, ukkwoong mung umii ullu walam ɔlɔk wa ɔsaapmɛnɛ. Ɔzzànga ullu ɔlɔɔt wa ukupnɛ kwa Jesus keem.
46007040	Wanavva ’wɔng baang mkkpa kɔnaang vvenɛ uggele ulenɛ ka ɔtaanɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɛlɔm-ɛlɔm. Uwɔng mung ulenɛ luttina anaam. Ɔzzànga nttina nttɛ anaam ɔgbaa nyanga Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
46008001	Nle ka nlɔɔknɛ kɔlɔɔk a kazzi kwa bannyinɛ ilɔɔp. Ka lɔkkwɔɔn kule bbwak, “Ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt iyanga kukele.”; tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bakkwoongnɛ balɔɔk. Ɔzzànga kɛssanga kukele ’sɔng baang kɛnaangnɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔkkyaamɛ. Mɛ ba kɛnaang ule ɔlɔɔt wa doddo. Kɛ́saap kɛlɔngɔlɔmɛnɛ.
46008002	Ɔlɔɔt wa uttinanɛ ɔttɛ ɔsan kɔlɔɔk, ba ɔsan tɛ̀ttɛ̀ uttinanɛ ɔttɛ ɔsan mung ɔffɔ.
46008003	Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa utelenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanmɛ lɔsan.
46008004	Kɔlɔɔk a kizzi kazzi kwa bannyinɛ ilɔɔp. Isan lɔsan ittɛ ɛlɔɔp ɛtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɔfɛɛn bwa busɛlɛnɛ kuddu ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Isan lɔsan ittɛ ule Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ’wɔng baang vvɔn keem.
46008005	Gɔɔ mkkpa bakkwɔɔyɛ “ibunukkpaapi” ka libat ɔlɔk ka ɛkpansi, gɔɔ mkkpa “ibinukkpaapi” ’yɔng mung iyipi, “bayini” bayipi bagbaa,
46008006	ulenɛyɛlɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvɔn keem wa ulenɛ Dedde ayyɔɔt, wa ɔnaangnɛ bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ, wa iddunɛ kwa ammɛ. Ɔzzànga ule Uyini vvɔn keem, Jesus Christ, wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkɔɔmmɛnɛ ɔlɔɔm bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ la wa iddunɛ kwa ammɛ.
46008007	Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ lissi ɔsannɛ lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng. Balɔɔt balɔk kwa ilɔɔp kɔgbɔnɔbongbɛ. Gɔɔ ka mmwɔɔn mung bazzinɛ kazzi ’kwɔng baang batii ka battinanɛ battɛ kazzi ’kwɔng baang kwa ilɔɔp. Ittina abbɛ ba ikkaam. Battina battɛ kazzi ’kwɔng baang vvenɛ kadɛmbɛ babbɔl ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
46008008	Kazzi gɔɔ ba kakkwoong kakɔɔmyɛlɛ kamii ka ɛfɛɛn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Mkkpa isi lizzi ɔlɔk izzi.
46008009	Akatwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng, tɛ̀ttɛ́ afɔngɔyɔng linaang annyɔɔng linaang balɔɔt ba basinɛ kiyila sa kɛkkaamnɛ lɛyanga battɔ ka bubbi.
46008010	Ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn a ɔlɔɔt wa luttina ammɛ lusinɛ lɛkkaam ka kɔlɔɔk ɔyɛnwɔnɛ annɔ wa “asannɛ kɔlɔɔk” ka azzinɛ kazzi ka labun ilat; Nkwɔng baang mɛ baala kɔnaang uzzi kazzi kwa bannyinɛ ilɔɔp ɔɔ?
46008011	Ɔzzánga ɔttɛ ɔkpana annɔ ’wɔng mung wa luttina ammɛ lusinɛ lɛkkaam, wa Christ ubbenɛ ka lɛttɔ ammɛ vvenɛ ɔtaak ka “kɛsan a kɔlɔɔk annɔ”!
46008012	Ning baang anaangbong bubbi atum Christ ka anaangnɛ bubbi la ikpana annɔ, bayanga-kiyila. Abɛpɛbong ittina abbɛ ya isinɛ lɛkkaam.
46008013	Kazzi kanaangnɛ ɔkpana anaam ɔttɔ ka bubbi, ɛsɛɛn ba nbɛlɛ lizzi kɛfal a kɛfal, tɛ̀ttɛ́ nffu nnaang ɔkpana anaam ɔttɔ ka bubbi.
46009001	Anaam wa nlenɛ ka bubili lɛtta lissi ɔɔ? Anaam uyilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus lissi ɔɔ? Anaam Jesus, Uyini ayyɔɔt, ba ntaka nyɛn ɔɔ? Annyɔɔng lissi alenɛyɔng balɔɔt ba nkkwɔɔnɛ nnyi Uyini ɔɔ?
46009002	Mkkpa balɔɔt balɔk basinɛ lɛtɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ uyilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus, annyɔɔng atɔknɛyɔng lɔtɔk! Kuddu annyɔɔng, ka kulenɛ ka bɔkaat la Uyini, kɔyɔɔbong kɔttɛ anaam uyilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus.
46009003	Balɔɔt bakpɛnnɛnɛ, uwɔng ulenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ nkkalanɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng.
46009004	Bbwak nɛ ba kule ka bannyinɛnɛ kazzi la batak ka kɛnaang anaam ɔɔ?
46009005	Mung lakke ba nyanga za ntɔknɛ wanavva-luzɔɔm nsam nmii kɔssɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus balɔk la ikpana Uyini la Peter banaangnɛ ɔɔ?
46009006	Barnabas la anaam keem ilenɛ balɔɔt ba inaangnɛ kɛnaang iggyan kuddu ayyɔɔt keem ɔɔ?
46009007	Bɔka wa sɔgya ukkpelemɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng ka busɔgya? Bɔka uwoop-a-bɔtɔɔm usinɛ bwa uwoopnɛ ka bɔtɔɔm ammɛ lizzi? Bɔka ɔkɔɔm-igɔdɔ usinɛ libee za lissinɛ ka igɔdɔ ammɛ lɛvva?
46009008	Baala nkɔɔng ka kɛkɔɔm a bɛfɛɛn bya ippyeenɛ la kɛtɔm la kɛtɔm ntolo kutolo ka Lafɔɔ lassɛnɛ lalɔɔk ning baang.
46009009	Ikkwɔɔ la Lafɔɔ a Moses za lattɛnɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ aggbɔ ɔgɔdɔ kamma ka ɛkɛtɛ ya ɔssalwɔnɛ bɛfɛɛn.” Ngkka mung Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔbɛtɛmɛ kwa igɔdɔ ɔɔ?
46009010	Anngwa attɛyɔng ayyɔɔt lissi ka ɔkkwɔɔnɛ ɔɔ? Ka lɔkkwɔɔn, nkwɔng badɔkɔ bakkpɔk kwa ayyɔɔt. Ɔlɔɔt wa uwoopnɛ bɔtɔɔm la ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyaatnɛ liyaat banaang kɛnaang battina kwa bale bassɛ bayanga etini ka kɛnaang sa banaangnɛ.
46009011	Ikɔɔmbong lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ifeewɔyɔng. Ɔzzánga ba kɔyyɛɛp ka iyanganɛ lɛsɔɔk ɔɔ?
46009012	Balɔɔt balɔk bayanganɛ lakke za kɛggyan a bɔfɛɛn ka labɔɔk annyɔɔng, ba anngwa attɛyɔng lakke za ayyɔɔt laggbenge latta za abbɛ ɔɔ? Ɔzzànga lakke ’zɔng mung ba itaka iyɔɔ. Lutini ’gwɔng, inaangbong lutini kɔlɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ nkwaaning bɔfɛɛn bulɔk busi lile bwa butununɛ Kuttu-Budoddo a Christ.
46009013	Asanyɔng lɔsan attɛyɔng balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ kɛnaang ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, kazzi abbɛ kassi baang ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ lɛtɔm ka labun Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bayanga etini abbɛ ka labun Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
46009014	Kɔssɛ kule kɛssanga ssɔn. Uyini ɔlɔɔkbong ɔttɛ balɔɔt ba bakopolonɛ Kuttu-Budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bale bayanga kazzi abbɛ baang.
46009015	Ɔzzànga ba ntaka nbap kwa etini anaam, ɔlɔk vvenɛ nkkpɔk lilɔɔk ’sɔng mung nggyan etini anaam biini. Lutini ’gwɔng nkɔɔm ɛtɔk nbbe. Ɔlɔɔt ba ule wa ule ukkwoong usikili lɔbba anaam gwa bbwak usseke babbu lammwɔɔl.
46009016	Lakke ba nyanga za kɛnaang a libba ka nlenɛ lɛffɔ nkopolo Kuttu-budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Kkpɔɔ Uyini ɔttɛnɛ nkopolo Kuttu-budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Nzang vvenɛ nyɛn akama nsak businɛ Kuttu-budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm likopolo.
46009017	Nlenɛ ka nnaangnɛ kɛnaang anaam tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛnaang sa nsanganɛ gbɔɔ, nzang vvenɛ nggyan ikipili. Ɔzzànga ntɔkbongsɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛnaang anaam ka ulenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛnɛ lɛkpaka ɔttɛ nnaang.
46009018	Ikipili anaam ulenɛ ’bɔng? Ikipili ya nyanganɛ ulenɛ kikopolo kuttu budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, sa nkopolonɛ nsi kappya lɛbɛkɛ. Kikkpele ba ntɔk ka nkopolonɛ Kuttu-budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
46009019	Anaam ubili lissi. Ka bubili kɔbɔɔk ɔlɔɔt ba nle. Nllɔllɔ nsammɛ kɛyɔɔng nsseke ubili ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ nttɛ nkwaaning nyanga balɔɔt ggbadam tɛ̀ttɛ̀ nkkwoongnɛ.
46009020	Ka ɛkɛtɛ ya nnaangnɛ kɛnaang la balɔɔt a Jews, nkup eleme balɔɔt a Jews nkwaaning bayila kwa anaam. Anaam ɔlɔɔt a Lafɔɔ a Moses lissi, ɔzzànga nnaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt a Jews nkwaaning bayila kwa anaam.
46009021	Kɔssɛ kule kɛssanga ssɔn, ka ɛkɛtɛ ya nlenɛ la Ikanakana nnaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ wakanakana wa usinɛ ka Lafɔɔ balɔɔt a Jews lile nkwaaning Ikanakana bayila kwa anaam. Nkwɔng baang lissi kule kɔnaang nsi Lafɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm litele. Anaam ka lɔkkwɔɔn nle ka tɔkɔlɔ lafɔɔ a Christ.
46009022	Nffɔnɛ ka ɛfɛɛn a balɔɔt ba basɛlɛnɛ kiyila sa kɛkkaamnɛ, nsikili tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt abbɛ vvɔn nkwaaning bayila kwa anaam. Nsikili bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ɛfɛɛn a balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ nkwaaning nkkala balɔɔt balɔk ka ɛtɔk duu ya nkkwoongnɛ.
46009023	Nkwɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ nnaang ka lɛttɔ Kuttu-budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm nkwaaning nyanga etini ka ppyɛɛ ’wɔng baang.
46009024	Asanyɔng lɔsan attɛyɔng balɔɔt ggbadam bammanɛ lɔfat, ule ɔlɔɔt vvɔn keem ka ule ɔbɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ammayɔng ning baang nkwaaning abɛtɛyɔng ayangayɔng lɛsɔɔk.
46009025	Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ukkoopnɛ kɛmma lɔfat utele lafɔɔ lɔfat. Ɔnaang ning baang nkwaaning ɔttɔpɔ ododo wa ule usi lɛbbɔ. Ɔzzánga ayyɔɔt inaang kwa ododo wa ule ɔbbɔ kɛfal a kɛfal.
46009026	Kwakkwɛ baang nmmanɛ ssɔng nmii ka lɔkkwɔɔn gwa lulenɛ ka lakpeke. Kwakkwɛ baang nlenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔtɔɔp-iddu wa usinɛ iddu ammɛ gbɔɔgbɔɔ lɛtɔɔp.
46009027	Nkkaam ka iddu ya batɔɔpnɛnɛ. Nkat kkwɔɔt anaam doddo, tɛ̀ttɛ́ baffu babɛtɛnɛ ka nlenɛ balɔɔt balɔk lɛkkwɔɔ nttɛ baffu ikanga.
46010001	Ikpana anaam, nggyan nttɛ asanyɔng kwa kɔnaangnɛ bagɛlɛnya ayyɔɔt ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ ba bakupnɛ Moses. Ìkkpálá-lukpaaggbeede ikatnɛbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ bakum Ukolo-lɔyɔngɔ, bulɔk busibɛ lɛnaang.
46010002	Banaangbɛ baptizim ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ikkpálá-lukpaaggbeede la lɔyɔngɔ basseke bakup-a-Moses.
46010003	Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ bazzi kazzi kwa kassinɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
46010004	Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ bavva bannyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ’bɔng baang bbɔn. Bavva bannyi ka akpana wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyinɛbɛ. Akpana ’wɔng baang wa umiinɛ la abbɛ, ɔdɔkɔnɛ Christ biini.
46010005	Gɔɔ ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang balɔɔt ggbadam basi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛsaap. Ɔzzánga babbe bammin gbɔ́ɔgbɔ̀ɔgbɔ́ɔ ka kasɛkɛ kɛmat.
46010006	Bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ bɛnaang bɛyɔɔyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt. Bɛttamayɛlɛ bɛttɛ ifɔngɔ kɔlɔɔk a bubbi kɛbɛlɛ lɛnaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ abbɛ banaangnɛ.
46010007	Ɔlɔk izɔɔm innyi ilɔɔp tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt balɔk banaangnɛ. Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, “Balɔɔt badɔkɔ bataa-ɔtaa bazzi kazzi bavva batak, bafeele batɔm.”
46010008	Ifɔngɔyɔng kikup a bwanavva tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt balɔk banaangnɛ. Balɔɔt balɔk banaangbong ning baang lalɔp innɔ balɔɔt laffa la innɔ zzilliffa battɔ babbe basaal ka kɛtɔm ssɔn.
46010009	Ifɔngɔ Uyini kɛllɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt balɔk banaangnɛ, izzɔkɔ iwwɔɔlbɛ.
46010010	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ikkwoongyɔng ibwɔɔlɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt balɔk babwɔɔlɔnɛ, Uyilabɔtɔɔm-a-Lubbe ɔwwɔɔlbɛ.
46010011	Bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ bɛnaangbɛ nkwaaning balɔɔt balɔk bayɛn bakkpɔkbyɛ ka luvva, bɛtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɔttama gwa bɛttamanɛyɛlɛ ka ilenɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya lakpeke lale ka laffɔnɛ.
46010012	Ɔlɔɔt duu wa uttinanɛ ɔttɛ ule ka kibee, ɔsan ɔnaang nkwaaning usi lɛttɔ.
46010013	Lutini illɛ duu ya iffunɛ ka ɛfɛɛn annɔ ule kɛssanga illɛ sa kɛtaanɛ kiffu ka balɔɔt. Ɔzzànga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uloko nsekele ammɛ. Baala ɔfɔngɔ ballɛwɔyɔng basak lakke annyɔɔng. Ka ɛkɛtɛ ya balɛwɔnɛyɔng, vvenɛ unnyiwɔyɔng lakke za ale abɛtɛyɔng ɔyɔɔwɔyɔng ɛtɔk assɛ attayɔng.
46010014	Inngwa anaam ya lɔkkwɔɔn, akkyaayɔng kɛzɔɔm ilɔɔp afɔngɔyɔng.
46010015	Nlɔɔk la annyɔɔng ka alenɛyɔng basan-a-kɔlɔɔk. Attinayɔng kɛyɔɔng kwa nlɔɔknɛ.
46010016	Ivvanɛ ka ommonggo wa ikɔɔmnɛ ka kazzi Uyini iwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang, itulbong linnyi a Christ ivva. Izzinɛ kazzi kwa ibbɔknɛ mung iyangabong etini ka ɛkkpa-kkwɔɔt a Christ.
46010017	Ugɔngɔ a brɛɛd ka ulenɛ vvɔn, ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt mkkpa iyipi, ile kkwɔɔt ssɔn ka ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt itulnɛ ugɔngɔ a brɛɛd ’wɔng baang vvɔn.
46010018	Attinayɔng kwa balɔɔt a Israel ba bazzinɛ kazzi kwa bakɔɔmnɛ bazɔɔm ka labun Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, batulbong bazɔɔm bannyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
46010019	Mung nle nlɔɔk nang? Ilɔɔp la kazzi kwa banaangnɛ bannyi ilɔɔp kaffɔ mung ka kɔlɔɔk ɔɔ?
46010020	Maaye. Kwa nlɔɔknɛ nlɔɔk nttɛ bɔfɛɛn bwa bazɔɔmnɛ bannyi ilat bule bwa ilat bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lissi. Ba nggyan nttɛ aleyɔng balɔɔt ilat.
46010021	Ba akkwoong avvayɔng ka ommonggo Uyini abbalyɔng ka ommonggo ilat lɛvva. Ba akkwoong azziyɔng kazzi Uyini abbalyɔng kwa ilat lizzi.
46010022	Mung iggyan ittɛ inaang Uyini luleep ɔɔ? Faa ittina ittɛ ayyɔɔt ittamɛnɛ lɛkkaam?
46010023	Ɔzzànga kaang battɛ, “Bayila mungyɛlɛ inaang bɔfɛɛn duu.” Kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn, ɔzzànga kɔlɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ lissi kɔyyɛɛpnɛ. “Bayila mungyɛlɛ inaang bɔfɛɛn duu.” Ɔzzànga kɔlɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ lissi kuttelenɛ ɔlɔɔt.
46010024	Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn gbɔɔ tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔppyɛɛk kwa isak ya ammɛ biini. Ɔzzànga ɔppyɛɛk kwa kɔyyɛɛpnɛ ɔnaang la balɔɔt balɔk.
46010025	Akkwoong mung azzi bɔfɛɛn duu bwa bataanɛ ka kappya-isɛɛn. Mkkpa asi lɛbap, ɔssanga luttina annɔ.
46010026	Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, “Ɛkpansi la bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya bilenɛ ka annyɛ bile bya Uyini.”
46010027	Ɔlɔɔt wa usinɛ wa luzɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lile ɔkkwɔɔwɔnɛ kazzi, alenɛ luttina lɛnaang gwa kimii, azzi bwa ɔtɔkɔwɔnɛ. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ayanga lɔbap kwa lɔngwa annɔ.
46010028	Wannyɔɔng ɔbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛ ɔttɛ, “Bakɔɔmbong kazzi ’kwɔng bazɔɔm bannyi ilɔɔp.” Tɛ̀ttɛ́ abɛlɛkwɛ lizzi azzenge luzzi ammɛ ka ulenɛ lɛffɔ ɔlɔɔk ning baang, ɔlɔk ɔwaamɛ.
46010029	Kwa luttina gwa annɔ lissi. Kule kwa luttina gwa ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang. Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔbap ɔttɛ, “Kulenɛ ning, mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ luttina ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk lɔzzanɛ lakke za kɛnaang a bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ?
46010030	Nwomonɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang ka kazzi anaam, ɔlɔɔt ɔkpɛnnɛ kwa ’bɔng la kazzi ’kwɔng baang.”
46010031	Kɔyyɛɛp mung. Duu bwa anaangnɛ, ule kazzi kwa azzinɛ ɔlɔk kɛvva sa avvanɛ, anaangbyɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ka latele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
46010032	Ataa kɛtaa sa ale asi kɔlɔɔk lɛggyan la balɔɔt a Jews ɔlɔk la Ikanakana, ɔlɔk la balɔɔt a luzɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
46010033	Ɔzzànga anaangyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ anaam nnaangnɛ, nbum ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn ɔwaamɛ ka linaang sa nnaangnɛ. Nsi budoddo bwa anaam biini lɛggyan, nggyan budoddo bwa balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ nkwaaning baddu.
46011001	Akeetnɛyɔng anaam, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ anaam nkeetnɛ Christ.
46011002	Nbunguwɔyɔngbong ka akkenɛnɛyɔng ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ la kikup a lukopolo anaam gwa nkopolowɔnɛyɔng.
46011003	Ɔzzànga nggyan nttɛ asan attɛyɔng Christ ulenɛ uzzilɛttɔ lutini ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ. Waanwalam ulenɛ uzzilɛttɔ wanavva ammɛ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule uzzilɛttɔ a Christ.
46011004	Waanwalam wa ɔssɛɛnnɛ luzɔɔm, ɔlɔk ɔbwɔɔlɔ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka kibbi balɔɔt la bɔfɛɛn ka uvvoongnɛ ka lɛttɔ, waanwalam ’wɔng baang ɔssɛɛn Christ ka izzit.
46011005	Wanavva duu wa ɔssɛɛnnɛ luzɔɔm, ɔlɔk ɔbwɔɔlɔ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka kibbi ɔsɛlɛ bɔfɛɛn ka lɛttɔ ka uvvoongnɛ, wanavva ’wɔng baang ɔssɛɛn ulam ka izzit. Ning baang buu ba ule la wanavva wa balemɛnɛ kittulu lɛkkpaat.
46011006	Wanavva usinɛ lɛttɔ livvoong ɔllɛ ka ɔkkpaatnɛ kittulu ɔllɔt. Kɛkkpaat a kittulu la kɛzza kittulu ka bilenɛ kɔlɔɔk izzit ka kkwɔɔt a wanavva, kɔyyɛɛp ka uvvoongnɛ lɛttɔ.
46011007	Ba kɔyyɛɛp ka waanwalam uvvoongnɛ lɛttɔ. Waanwalam ɔbal Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, wanavva ɔbal ɔlɔɔt.
46011008	Waanwalam ka wanavva ba ussi, wanavva ussinɛ ka waanwalam.
46011009	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba ɔnaang waanwalam kwa wanavva, ɔnaang wanavva kwa waanwalam.
46011010	Ulenɛ kwa bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, battɛ kɔyyɛɛp ka wanavva uvvoongnɛ lɛttɔ ammɛ ɔyɔɔ basan battɛ ule ka kɛkɔɔm a walam ammɛ.
46011011	Ka lɛfal ayyɔɔt la Uyini, mkkpa kɔnaang, wanavva tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ waanwalam lissi ɔyangamɛnɛ, ɔlɔk waanwalam ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ wanavva lissi ɔyangamɛnɛ ammɛ.
46011012	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ɔkɔɔmnɛ waanwalam ɔnaang wanavva, kule kɛssanga ssɔn, waanwalam, wanavva ɔmaatnɛ. Ɔzzànga ɔkkpɛlɛ abbyɛ bissi ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm biffu.
46011013	Attinayɔng ’kwɔng kɛyɔɔng. Mung kɔyyɛɛp mung ka wanavva ɔssɛɛnnɛ luzɔɔm ka kibbi balɔɔt usi bɔfɛɛn ka lɛttɔ livvoong ɔɔ?
46011014	Lɛfal annɔ biini likopolowɔ lɛttɛ waanwalam kiloko kittulu ka lɛttɔ kɛlɔm, kɔlɔɔk izzit.
46011015	Kittulu sa kɛlɔmnɛ ka lɛttɔ a wanavva, bɔfɛɛn a bɔllɛ. Kittulu ka kɛlɔmmɛnɛ ning baang bannyimɛ battɛ kɛtaamɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ubba wa uvvoongnɛ ka lɛttɔ.
46011016	Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ubumnɛ kɛkangala utumkwɛ, kwa nle nlɔɔk kule kɔttɛ ayyɔɔt, ɔlɔk izɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm eleme ɛlɔk ba iyanga ya kɛssɛɛn a luzɔɔm.
46011017	Ka lɔkamala gwa lule ka luffunɛ mung, annyɔɔng lissi ka nbungunɛ. Mitin a luzɔɔm annyɔɔng ɔnaang lilɔɔk sa libbɔlnɛ litta sa liyyɛɛpnɛ.
46011018	Ka kɛkɔɔm ɛtɔk, babwɔɔlɔnɛbong battɛ, ka mitin a luzɔɔm annyɔɔng lakup a balɔɔt lalɔk lale baang ba lalenɛ ka bɛkangala. Kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn nsan.
46011019	(Kule bbwak ka akangalanɛyɔng nkwaaning balɔɔt ba balenɛ ka lufoom gwa bbwak bayɛnbɛ kkpelegedee.)
46011020	Ka adudanɛyɔng ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn, kazzi Uyini lissi ka azzinɛyɔng.
46011021	Ka azzinɛyɔng, ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔt ututala ɔsam kwa ammɛ ɔmma umii, ɔlɔk balɔɔt balɔk bakɔɔng buwɔɔng, balɔk bazzi, bavva babimi.
46011022	Ssala sa annyɔɔng biini ba ayangayɔng sa azzinɛyɔng kazzi avvayɔng batak ɔɔ? Vvenɛ afimyɔng luzɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm asamyɔng balɔɔt ba ɔbbɔlnɛbɛ appyɛɛ assɛɛnyɔng ka izzit ɔɔ? Attina attɛyɔng nle nlɔɔk nang la annyɔɔng ntum ’kwɔng? Nbunguwɔyɔng ɔɔ? Maaye, baala nbunguwɔyɔng.
46011023	Lukopolo gwa nkopolowɔnɛyɔng mung lussinɛ ka Uyini. Nttɛ Uyini, Jesus, ka kɛtɔm sa bazzimɛnɛ issɛ ɔsam brɛɛd,
46011024	uwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang, ɔsamnɛ ɔbɛkɛ unnyibɛ ɔttɛ, “Uwɔng ulenɛ ɛkkpakkwɔɔt anaam ya elenɛ ya annyɔɔng. Anaangyɔng ning nkwaaning akkenɛyɔng.”
46011025	Balenɛ kazzi livve, ɔbbal ommonggo lɛsam, ɔttɛ, “Ommonggo ’wɔng mung ulenɛ ufaa kɛbɛtɛ kɛnnɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ussinɛ ka linnyi anaam. Ɛkɛtɛ duu ya avvanɛyɔng ka ammɛ, anaangyang ning baang nkwaaning akkenɛyɔng.”
46011026	Ɛkɛtɛ duu ya azzinɛyɔng brɛɛd ’wɔng mung, avvayɔng ka ommonggo ’wɔng, abwɔɔlɔyɔng kɔlɔɔk a lubbe ammɛ tɔttɔt Uyini ɔppyɛlɛ uffu.
46011027	Nkwɔng kɔbbal likup: ɔlɔɔt wa uzzinɛ kazzi Uyini, ɔlɔk ɔvva ka ommonggo ammɛ ka ɛtɔk ya kusinɛ Uyini lɛsaap, ɔnaangbong bubbi utum kkwɔɔt Uyini la linnyi ammɛ.
46011028	Ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn uttinamɛ kɛyɔɔng ka kɛkɔɔm ɛtɔk, tɛ́ttɛ́ uzzi kazzi ’kwɔng mung ɔvva ka ommonggo ’wɔng.
46011029	Ɔlɔɔt wa usinɛ ifɛɛt a kkwɔɔt Uyini lɛsan, ɛkɛtɛ ya uzzinɛ kazzi Uyini ɔvva ka ommonggo ammɛ ɔwwɔɔlmɛbong kɛyɔɔng.
46011030	Kwakkwɛ baang annyɔɔng balɔk ɔffaakwɔnɛyɔng, akkpɛlɛyɔng, balɔk bassɛ la babbe.
46011031	Ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn ikɔɔmnɛ ɛtɔk ittinayɛlɛ kɛyɔɔng, nzang ka kɛkaal Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm baala ittɔ.
46011032	Ɔzzànga Uyini ka ɔkaalnɛ kɛkaal ayyɔɔt ɔbbayɛlɛ bikɔɔm, nkwaaning basiyɛlɛ lɛwwɔɔl batoolo la ’vveeng wɔng.
46011033	Ikpana anaam, ɛkɛtɛ duu ya aggbanɛyɔng ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn attɛ azziyɔng kazzi Uyini, ataa akatyɔng bannyɔɔng azziyɔng kɛttɛlɛ kɛttɛlɛ.
46011034	Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa buwɔɔng bulemɛnɛ lɛsaap, uzzi kazzi ka ssala nkwaaning Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usiwɔ kibbi linnyi ka alenɛyɔng ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn liduda. Lilɔɔk sa lissekenɛ, vvenɛ nkaalsɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya nle nffu.
46012001	Gedegede mung nle ka nlɔɔknɛ kwa lasɔɔk za lassinɛ ka Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Nggyan nttɛ asanyɔng lɔkkwɔɔn atumyɔngzɛ, ikpana anaam.
46012002	Asanyɔng lɔsan attɛyɔng ka ɛkɛtɛ ya atiinɛyɔng ba ilat, atiiyɔng ka eddu ilɔɔp, ya itaanɛ ikɔɔmwɔyɔng amiiyɔng ka ɛfɛɛn ya ɛbbɔlnɛ.
46012003	Asan attɛyɔng ɔlɔɔt wa ulenɛ la Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba ule wa ule ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Jesus, ubbu ɔlɔɔt.” Gɔɔ ɔlɔɔt ba ule wa ule ɔbwɔɔlɔ ɔttɛ, “Jesus ulenɛ Uyini” Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kusinɛ la ammɛ lile.
46012004	Lasɔɔk za Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔsɔɔknɛ lale bɛssanga bɛssanga. Ɔzzànga Kuyeeng ’kwɔng baang kkwɔn kɔsɔɔknɛ.
46012005	Itɔk ile ggbadam ya atelenɛ Uyini, ɔzzànga itɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ itele Uyini ’wɔng baang vvɔn keem.
46012006	Bɛssanga lakke bile ggbadam bya anaangnɛ bɛfɛɛn, ɔzzànga Ebinukkpaapi ’yɔng baang nnyɔn ennyinɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ lakke za kɛnaangbyɛ.
46012007	Kuyeeng ’kwɔng baang kɔkɔɔm itɔk buubuu kɔyɔɔwɔyɔng kɔttɛ kule baang la annyɔɔng kwa budoddo ayyɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ.
46012008	Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ’kwɔng baang kunnyinɛ ɔlɔɔt kukele. Akkwɛ kkwɔn baang kunnyinɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk bikɔɔm.
46012009	Kuyeeng ’kwɔng baang kkwɔn kunnyinɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk kiyila. Akkwɛ kkwɔn baang kunnyinɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk lakke za kittula ittula.
46012010	Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kunnyi ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk lakke za kɛnaang a bɛmaanga. Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk kunnyimɛ lɛsɔɔk za kɛbwɔɔlɔ lɛmmwɔɔl Ebinukkpaapi. Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk kunnyimɛ lakke za kɛsan a lɛsɔɔk za lissinɛ ka Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la lɛsɔɔk za lisinɛ ka Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lissi. Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk kunnyimɛ lakke za kikkwoong a kitolo likaan.
