Ɔlɔk kunnyimɛ lakke ukkwoong ɔbwɔɔlɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔknɛ.
46012011	Ɔzzànga Kuyeeng ’kwɔng baang kkwɔn kɔnaangnɛ bɛssanga lilɔɔk ’sɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ. Kunnyi ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔt kɛssanga lɛsɔɔk za ammɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɔsaapnɛkwɛ.
46012012	Christ ule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt vvɔn la bikkeep ggbadam. Ɔzzànga ule kkwɔɔt ssɔn mkkpa ndɔk bikkeep bile buubuu.
46012013	Ka ɛtɔk nnyɔn, ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt, balɔɔt a Jews la Ikanakana, babili la balɔɔt ba basinɛ babili lile, Kuyeeng ’kwɔng baang kɔnaangbonyɛlɛ baptizim isseke ba kkwɔɔt ssɔn. Ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt bannyibongyɛlɛ Kuyeeng ’kwɔng baang kkwɔn battɛ ivva.
46012014	Kkwɔɔt biini kikkeep ssɔn ba liyanga. Bikkeep bilesɛ ggbadam.
46012015	Ulenɛ ka kikkpɔ kɛlɔɔknɛ kɛttɛ, “Anaam ka nsinɛ kɔbɔɔk lile, anaam wa kkwɔɔt lissi.” Nkwɔng baang lissi kule kɔnaang kikkpɔ kisi kikkeep a kkwɔɔt lile.
46012016	Ulenɛ ka kɔtɔɔk kɔlɔɔknɛ kɔttɛ, “Anaam ka nsinɛ zzeen lile, anaam wa kkwɔɔt lissi.” Nkwɔng baang lissi kule kɔnaang kɔtɔɔk kusi kikkeep a kkwɔɔt lile.
46012017	Ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn a kkwɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ lisikilinɛ zzeen, lile linaang nang lippyee? Ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn a kkwɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ lilenɛ kɔtɔɔk keem, lile linaang nang lippyee kizzoom?
46012018	Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kulenɛ mung, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔssɛɛn ɔlɔɔt bikkeep ka kkwɔɔt buubuu tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɔsaapmɛnɛ.
46012019	Kkwɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ lilenɛ kikkeep ssɔn, nzang kkwɔɔt lisibong lile.
46012020	Ka kulenɛ ning, bikkeep a kkwɔɔt bile ggbadam, ɔzzànga kkwɔɔt lile ssɔn.
46012021	Kwakkwɛ zzeen lisinɛ likkwoong lɛlɔɔk la kɔbɔɔk lɛttɛ, “Annɔ wɔ ba ngyan.” Gɔɔ lɛttɔ ba likkwoong lɛlɔɔk la bukkpɔ lɛttɛ, “Anaam wɔ ba nggyan.”
46012022	Ɔzzànga kaang ning kɔlɔk ba ikkwoong inaang bikkeep a kkwɔɔt ’byɔng baang bya bɛkpɛlɛnɛ bisinɛyɛlɛ lile.
46012023	Ɔzzànga bikkeep ’byɔng baang bya ittinanɛ ittɛ abbyɛ bya kɔlɔɔk gaang ba bile, abbyɛ bilenɛ bya ikɔɔmnɛ byɛ doddo. Bikkeep a kkwɔɔt bya bisinɛ lɛyyɛɛp, bɛppyɛɛnɛ bile bya latele.
46012024	Ɔzzanga bikkeep ’byɔng baang bilenɛ bya bikkeep a kkwɔɔt ayyɔɔt bya bɛttanɛ lɛyyɛɛp bisinɛ lɛggyan. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm biini ɔlɔɔmbong kkwɔɔt kɛlɔɔm sa utelenɛ bikkeep a kkwɔɔt bya bɛsɛlɛnɛ latele.
46012025	Akkwɛ kɔnaangnɛ kkwɔɔt lile ssɔn. Bikkeep a kkwɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ abbyɛ bɛyanga kɛssanga kɛnaang ssɔn la ba abbɛ.
46012026	Kikkeep a kkwɔɔt ssɔn kɛyɛnnɛ akama, bikkeep ’byɔng bakang ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ bɛssɛ bɛyɛn akama. Babungunɛ kikkeep ssɔn, bikkeep ’byɔng kaang ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ bɛssɛ bɛyanga laggele.
46012027	Ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng alenɛyɔng kkwɔɔt a Christ. Ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn ulenɛ kikkeep a kkwɔɔt ammɛ.
46012028	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsambongyɛlɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ uloko ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn ka luzɔɔm. Ka kɛkɔɔm ɛtɔk, uloko bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus, ka ɔssɛ-ɔttɛlɛ bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ka bikpit bɛkkyaat, uloko bakopolo-ukopolo ɔbɛtɛ la balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ bɛmaanga la balɔɔt ba unnyinɛbɛ lakke za kittula ittula, ɔlɔk battele ba abbɛ ɔlɔk bakɔɔmbɛ, ɔlɔk batolo bafaa likaan.
46012029	Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ lissi balenɛ bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus la bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔlɔk bakopolo lukopolo. Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ lissi bayanganɛ lakke za kɛnaang a bɛmaanga,
46012030	ɔlɔk kittula ittula, ɔlɔk kitolo ufaa kukaan, ɔlɔk kɛbwɔɔlɔ kwa balɔɔknɛ.
46012031	Asam ippyam annyɔɔng alokoyɔng ka lasɔɔk ’zɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ, za lattanɛ lɛyyɛɛp. Ɔzzanga nle ka nbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng lɛsɔɔk za lattanɛ lasɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ.
46013001	Nkkwoongnɛ nlɔɔk likaan ɔkkpɛlɛ la sa bayilabɔtɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, kɛsaap kisinɛnɛ lile ka luppyam, lɛmmwɔɔl anaam lɛtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɔsap a kippwo ɔkyamkyam, ɔlɔk okeleng.
46013002	Nyanganɛ lakke za kɛyɛn a biyɛnɛ, nsannɛ lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ ngbaa la kɔlɔɔk a lalup Ebinukkpaapi, nyanganɛ kiyila sa nkkwoongnɛ nlɔɔk ikpok immɔk, ɔzzanga nsɛlɛnɛ kɛsaap, nle bɔfɛɛn bwa gbɔɔ.
46013003	Mkkpa nsam bɛfɛɛn anaam ɔkkpɛlɛ nnyi balɔɔt ba ɔbbɔlnɛbɛ, ɔlɔk nsam kkwɔɔt anaam nnyibɛ bassɛɛn ka lɔkɔɔn, likkɔm nsɛlɛnɛ kɛsaap isak nɛ ba ile.
46013004	Kɛsaap ulenɛ kibbe luppyam la kɛyyɛɛp a bɛnaang, kɛsaap kɔfɔk lissi, gɔɔ ikkɔlɔ iyyɛɛp a wa annyɔɔng lissi. Kɛsaap bisese lissi.
46013005	Kɛsaap kɛbbɔl eleme lissi, Kɛsaap kitun a kɔlɔɔk la wa annyɔɔng ba kɛyanga.
46013006	Kɛsaap bubbi ba kɛggyan, kɛggyan lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk.
46013007	Kɛsaap ba kɛsaal. Kiyila la luttina la kibbe-luppyam-assɛ ba bɛsaal.
46013008	Kɛsaap ba kikpeke. Buyɛnɛ bule baang, ɔzzànga vvenɛ bukpeke. Lasɔɔk za kitolo likaan lale baang, ɔzzànga vvenɛ lasaal. Kɛsan a kɔlɔɔk kile baang, ɔzzànga vvenɛ kɛsaal.
46013009	Kɔlɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ ba itaka isan. Biyɛnɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ba itaka iyɛn.
46013010	Ɔzzànga ɛkɛtɛ vveeng ule ukpeke kufaak a kɛsan a kɔlɔɔk la biyɛnɛ vvenɛ baala kule. Ule usseke uwɔlɔlɔ.
46013011	Ka ɛkɛtɛ ya ntiinɛ waantiti, nlɔɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ waantiti. Nsan kɔlɔɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ waantiti. Nttina luttina tɛ̀ttɛ̀ waantiti. Ɔzzànga gedegede mung ka nlenɛ utumalɔɔt lile, nzzɔɔkbong biwaan ɔkkpɛlɛ.
46013012	Bwa nyɛnnɛ gedegede mung butaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɔfɛɛn bwa nyɛnnɛ ka kiyenge ka kisinɛ lɛyyɛɛp. Ɛkɛtɛ lakpeke ɛffɔnɛ, vvenɛ ibee ippyɛɛk ka isso. Bwa nsannɛ gedegede mung, doddo bwɛ ba nsan. Ɔzzànga vvenɛ nsanbyɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ebinukkpaapi ɛsanɛnɛ anaam.
46013013	Bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng bɛkkyaat bilenɛ kɔlɔɔk: kiyila, luttina, la kɛsaap. Ɔzzánga kɛsaap kɛttanɛbyɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ liggbenge.
46014001	Kɛsaap ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn bwa abumnɛ gaang gaang attɛ ayanga. Asam ippyam annyɔɔng alokoyɔng ka lɛsɔɔk za Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kunnyiwɔnɛyɔng, gaang gaang lɛsɔɔk za kɛbwɔɔlɔ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
46014002	Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔlɔɔknɛ bafaa likaan, ba ɔlɔɔk unnyi balɔɔt. Ɔlɔɔk la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔlɔɔknɛ kɔlɔɔk a lalup a lɔkkwɔɔn ka lakke Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, balɔɔt baala bappyee.
46014003	Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa ɔbwɔɔlɔnɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔlɔɔk ɔbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt, uttelebɛ, ɔnaangbɛ bakkaam luppyam, ɔnaangbɛ ɔwaabɛ ɔgbaa.
46014004	Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔlɔɔknɛ bafaa likaan uttelemɛ kɛyɔɔng keem. Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa ɔbwɔɔlɔnɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uttele luzɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ.
46014005	Kɔsaapnɛ mung ka ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng alɔɔknɛ yɔng bafaa likaan, ɔzzànga kɔttanɛ lɛsaap ka ayanganɛyɔng lɛsɔɔk za kɛbwɔɔlɔ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔbwɔɔlɔnɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa lɛbaang ɔtta ɔlɔɔt wa ɔlɔɔknɛ bafaa likaan. Kwa ɔlɔɔknɛ luzɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ baala kɔyaam, ɔlɔɔt usinɛ baang lile ɔbwɔɔlɔ bwa ɔlɔɔknɛ.
46014006	Ikpana anaam, ka nffunɛ ka ɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng mung, nlɔɔknɛ ufaa kukaan kwa asinɛyɔng lippyee, attina attɛyɔng baang nle ntaawɔyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɔng? Bulɔk ba bule ntakabong nkɔɔm lɛmmwɔɔl za lissinɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔlɔk kukele, ɔlɔk bɔtɔɔm bwa ɔtɔɔmnɛ, ɔlɔk lukopolo lɔlɔk nfeewɔyɔng.
46014007	Gɔɔ ibin ya isɛlɛnɛ kuddu tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luppet la biggɔ, ɔlɔɔt ule ɔnaang nang uppyee doddo tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɛkkpanɛ, usinɛ lɛmmwɔɔl zzɔn zzɔn lɛgɔpɔlɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɛttanɛ?
46014008	Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔwɔlnɛ luffi lɛkɔɔng usinɛ doddo lɛwɔl, nnyinɔɔng ule uppyee ɔnaang ibama lɛkɔɔng?
46014009	Kɔssɛ kule kɛssanga ssɔn. Ɔlɔɔt ule ɔnaang nang uppyee kwa alɔɔknɛ atum, abwɔɔlɔmɛnɛ lɛmmwɔɔl annɔ ka ufaa kukaan kwa ɔlɔɔt ule usi lippyee? Kɔtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ alɔɔknɛ annyi kɛffa.
46014010	Likaan lile ggbadam buubuu ka vveeng ’wɔng mung, ɔzzánga kukaan kkwɔn gbɔɔ kwa kɔsɛlɛnɛ ifɛɛt ba kule.
46014011	Ɔzzànga nsinɛ kukaan kwa balɔɔknɛ lippyee, ɔlɔɔt wa ɔlɔɔknɛkwɛ ulenɛ anaam wa akanakana. Anaam nssɛ nlemɛ ammɛ wa Akanakana.
46014012	Ka alenɛyɔng baang ka abumnɛ attɛ ayangayɔng lɛsɔɔk a Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm attayɔng bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ, abumyɔng gaang gaang anaangyɔng bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng baang bya bile bɛyaam luzɔɔm lɔmmala.
46014013	Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔlɔɔknɛ bafaa likaan, ubum ɔssɛɛn luzɔɔm unnyi Uyini ɔgbaamɛ lɛsɔɔk za kɛbwɔɔlɔ kwa ɔlɔɔknɛ.
46014014	Ulenɛ ka nzɔɔmnɛ ka kukaan kwa nsinɛ lippyee, kuyeeng anaam vvenɛ kɔssɛ kɔzɔɔm ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Ɔzzanga luttina anaam baang baala lule.
46014015	Nle nnaang nang? Nle nzɔɔm la kuyeeng anaam, nzɔɔm la luttina anaam ɔgbaa. Nsoom la kuyeeng anaam, nsoom ka luttina anaam ɔgbaa.
46014016	Awomonɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang ka kukaan kwa balɔɔt ba basinɛ lippyee, ɔlɔɔt wa gbɔɔ wa ulenɛ baang ka mitin ule ɔnaang nang ɔsan ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Kule baning,” ka luzɔɔm annɔ gwa azɔɔmnɛ? Baala ɔsan bwa alɔɔknɛ.
46014017	Mkkpa luzɔɔm a kiwomo kɛnaang annɔ gwa azɔɔmnɛ annyi Ebinukkpaapi lɔyyɛɛp, ɔlɔɔt wakang baala lɔyaam.
46014018	Nwomobong Ebinukkpaapi kɛnaang ka nlɔɔknɛ bafaa lammwɔɔl ba atakanɛyɔng kɛtɔm kɛlɔk lippyee nttawɔyɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ.
46014019	Ɔzzànga ka kɛssɛɛn a luzɔɔm, ntolo lakkɔ kubbwɔɔk kkeem za ɔlɔɔt ule uppyee, nkwaaning nkopolo balɔɔt balɔk kɔlɔɔk, lutini nle nlɔɔk innɔ-innɔ lammwɔɔl ka likaan sa basinɛ lippyee.
46014020	Ikpana anaam, tɛ̀ttɛ́ aleyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bwɔɔntiti ka ittina. Ataayɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bwɔɔntiti ka ɛtɔk a kɛnaang a bubbi. Ɔzzànga assɛɛnyɔng bugɛlɛnya ka ittina.
46014021	Ka luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bakkpɔk battɛ; “Ebinukkpaapi ɛttɛ, vvenɛ nssɛ la balɔɔt ba balɔɔknɛ likaan ntolo kutolo nnyi balɔɔt ’bɔng. Vvenɛ ntolo ka kamma balɔɔt ikaan ilɔk, ɔzzanga nɛ baala bagɔpɔlɔ!”
46014022	Lɛsɔɔk za kitolo ufaa kukaan ulenɛ iyɔɔ ya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyɔɔnɛ balɔɔt ba basinɛ kiyila lɛyanga. Lɛsɔɔk za bayanga kiyila lissi. Ule lɛsɔɔk za kɛbwɔɔlɔ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm keem ka ulenɛ iyɔɔ ya bayanga-kiyila.
46014023	Ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn a luzɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ lubbinɛ ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn, ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ utolo ufaa kukaan, balɔɔt balɔk, ɔlɔk ɔsɛlɛ-kiyila uffunɛ, vvenɛ balɔɔk battɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng attɔyɔngbong bikun.
46014024	Ɔzzanga ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔbwɔɔlɔnɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, balɔɔt balɔk, ɔlɔk ɔsɛlɛ-kiyila uffunɛ vvenɛ ɔkkyaa kɛnaang a bubbi ɔfɔngɔ ka ule uppyee kwa alɔɔknɛ. Vvenɛ uttina utum kwa uppyeenɛ.
46014025	Ittina ammɛ ya ulupnɛ vvenɛ itta ka vveeng. Vvenɛ ukun laddu ɔzɔɔm ɔttɛ, “Ka lɔkkwɔɔn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule mung la annyɔɔng!”
46014026	Ikpana anaam, nlɔɔk nttɛ ka adudanɛyɔng ka luzɔɔm, ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔyanga kisoom, wa vvɔn ɔyanga lukopolo. Ɔlɔk ɔbwɔɔlɔ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔyɛn biyɛnɛ. Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔbwɔɔlɔ kwa ɔyɛn-a-biyɛnɛ ɔlɔɔknɛ. Lutini bɔfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ búlé bwa buyaamnɛ luzɔɔm.
46014027	Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔlɔɔknɛ ka ufaa kukaan, balɔɔt baffa ɔlɔk bakkyaat balɔɔk, ɔlɔɔt vvɔn vvɔn. Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔbwɔɔlɔ bwa balɔɔknɛ.
46014028	Ɔzzanga ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk usinɛ baang lile wa ukkwoongnɛ ɔbwɔɔlɔ kwa likaan ’sɔng baang lilɔɔknɛ, ɔlɔɔknɛ-a-likaan ’sɔng baang ɔtaa zzum ka ɔdda mitin. Ɔppyɛɛ ɔlɔɔk unnyimɛ kɛyɔɔng la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
46014029	Balɔɔt baffa ɔlɔk bakkyaat ba bayanganɛ bɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm balɔɔk. Balɔk bataa battina bwa balɔɔt ’bɔng baang balɔɔknɛ.
46014030	Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ulenɛ baang ka ɔdda mitin wa ɔyanganɛ bɔtɔɔm bwa bussinɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔlɔɔt wa ulenɛ ka kɛlɔɔk uzum.
46014031	Ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng ɔlɔɔt vvɔn vvɔn ukkwoong mung ɔbwɔɔlɔ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm nkwaaning ɔkkpɛlɛ bakkoop bayanga kɛkkaam a luppyam.
46014032	Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyanganɛ lɛsɔɔk za kɛbwɔɔlɔ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔkɔɔmzɛ doddo ka kamma ammɛ.
46014033	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba ɔggyan ɔttɛ inaang tɔkɔtɔkɔtɔkɔ, ɔggyan ɔttɛ itaa ka bɔkaat. Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kulenɛ ka izɔɔm a balɔɔt ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ,
46014034	bwanavva bataa zzum ka mitin a luzɔɔm. Kufuk ba bayanga kwa kɛlɔɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Lafɔɔ balɔɔt a Jews lalɔɔknɛ lattɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ bale ka kizzi lɛttɔ.
46014035	Bayanganɛ lɔbap, babap bwalam abbɛ ka bale baffɔ ka ssala. Ule kɔlɔɔk izzit ka wanavva ɔzzanɛ lɛmmwɔɔl ka mitin a luzɔɔm.
46014036	Lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lissi ka annyɔɔng liffu ɔɔ? Faa annyɔɔng keem alenɛyɔng ba liffunɛ kwa annyɔɔng?
46014037	Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ulenɛ baang wa ɔttɛnɛ ammɛ ɔlɔɔk kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔlɔk ammɛ ɔyanganɛ lɛsɔɔk za lissinɛ ka Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, vvenɛ ɔkɔɔlɔ ɔttɛ bwa nkkpɔknɛ nnyiwɔyɔng mung bussi ka lakke Uyini.
46014038	Ɔzzanga usinɛ ’kwɔng doddo lɛgɔpɔlɔ, tɛ̀ttɛ́ agɔpɔlɔmɛyɔng ammɛ.
46014039	Ikpana anaam, alokoyɔng ippyam annyɔɔng ka kɛbwɔɔlɔ bɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔzzànga tɛ̀ttɛ́ kitolo likaan kittunwɔyɔng.
46014040	Anaangyɔng lutini bɔfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ doddo.
46015001	Ikpana anaam, nggyan nttɛ nkkewɔyɔng kɔlɔɔk a Kuttu-Budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kwa nkopolowɔnɛyɔng, kwa atɔknɛyɔng kiyila annyɔɔng kɛkkaam.
46015002	Uwɔng baang ule lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la bɔtɔɔm bwa nkopolowɔnɛyɔng. Lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lile lɛkkalawɔyɔng, akɔɔmnɛyɔngzɛ kkpɔk. Asinɛyɔngzɛ kkpɔk lɛkɔɔm, nzang kiyila asiyɔngbong lɛyanga.
46015003	Anaam nnyiwɔyɔng bwa ntɔknɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Abbwɛ bulenɛ bwa buttanɛ lɛyyɛɛp. Bule buttɛ: Christ ubbe ka bubbi ayyɔɔt, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bakkpɔknɛ ka Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
46015004	Ballimɛ. Bɛtɔm bɛffa ka bɛkkyaat, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ufungalamɛ ka lubbe ɔtaa ka kuddu tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ.
46015005	Ufungalanɛ, ɔyɔɔmɛ kɛyɔɔng ka ɛfɛɛn a Peter. Ɔttɛ ɔnaang, ɔbbalmɛ kɛyɔɔng lɛyɔɔ ka ɛfɛɛn a bayilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ ba zzɔɔppabaffa.
46015006	Ɔttɛ ɔbbal lɛnaang, ɔbbalmɛ kɛyɔɔng lɛyɔɔ ka ɛfɛɛn a kibbi balɔɔt ammɛ sa kɛsaknɛ nnɔ la lalɔp kubbwɔɔk ka balenɛ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ. Balɔk babbebong ɔzzànga balɔk badɔkɔ batii ikokolo.
46015007	Utuma ka ɛfɛɛn a James, ɔbbal lituma ka ɛfɛɛn a bayilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
46015008	Ka lakuma, utuma ka ɛfɛɛn anaam, mkkpandɔk nle ɔlɔɔt wa basimɛnɛ ka bbwak lɛmaat.
46015009	Anaam nttanɛ lɛbbɔl ntta bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ba nkkɔnɔ kɛkkwɔɔnɛ uyilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus ka nyɔɔnɛ luzɔɔm akama gaang gaang.
46015010	Latele za unnyinɛnɛ lanaangnɛ nle wa nlenɛ gedegede mung. Nnaangbong kɛnaang gaang gaang ntta bayilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ka lakke anaam biini lissi ka nnaangnɛ, nnaang ka lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔnaangnɛnɛ ppyɛɛ.
46015011	Ɔzzànga mkkpa kussi ka anaam kuffu ɔlɔk ka abbɛ, nkwɔng kulenɛ kwa ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt ikopolonɛ, annyɔɔng ayilayɔng.
46015012	Gedegede mung ka bɔtɔɔm bwa ɔtɔɔmnɛyɛlɛ bulenɛ buttɛ Christ ufungalabong ka lubbe, ’bɔng tɛ́ttƐ́ annyɔɔng balɔɔt balɔk attɛyɔng babbu baala bafungala ka lubbe bataa ka kuddu?
46015013	Kwa alɔɔknɛyɔng baang kulenɛ ka lɔkkwɔɔn, ɔzzànga ɔ̀ttɛ́ Christ usi lifungala ka lubbe.
46015014	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm butakanɛ Christ lifungala ka lubbe, nzang bulɔk ba iyanga bwa ikopolonɛ. Gɔɔ annyɔɔng bulɔk ba bule bwa ale ayilayɔng.
46015015	Gɔɔ nzang bayɔɔbongyɛlɛ battɛ ikkala lɛlaak itum Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ka ilɔɔknɛ ittɛ ufungalabong Christ ka lubbe; nzang kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn babbu ka lubbe baala bafungala bataa ka kuddu.
46015016	Babbu batakanɛ lifungala, nzang Christ ba ɔtaka ufungala.
46015017	Christ ɔtakanɛ lifungala nzang kiyila annyɔɔng kile bɔfɛɛn bwa gbɔɔ. Atiiyɔng ka bubbi.
46015018	Ɔgbaa nzang balɔɔt ba bayilanɛ kwa Christ bale libbe, bataakbong.
46015019	Ulenɛ ka kiyila ayyɔɔt ka Christ kɛyyɛɛpnɛ ka lɛfal ’zɔng keem ka ɛkpansi, kɔlɔk kusi lɛbɛlɛ lile, nzang nzɔɔn ɔtta wa ayyɔɔt lile ɔtta wa balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ka vveeng ’wɔng.
46015020	Ka lɔkkwɔɔn Christ ufungalabong ka lubbe. Ning baang ulenɛ kɛttɛ balɔɔt ba babbenɛ vvenɛ bafungala ka lubbe ɔgbaa.
46015021	Lubbe ka lussinɛ ka ɔlɔɔt vvɔn luffu ka ɛkpansi, kifungala ka lubbe kɛssɛ kissi ning baang ka ɔlɔɔt vvɔn kiffu ka ɛkpansi.
46015022	Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ka babbenɛ ka bɔkaat abbɛ la Adam (Uyya), bɔkaat abbɛ la Christ vvenɛ bussɛ bufungalabɛ ka lubbe bataa ka kuddu.
46015023	Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn ule ule ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ ya bbwak: Christ ɔkɔɔm ɛtɔk, balɔɔt ba balenɛ ba Christ bakupmɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ kiffu ammɛ.
46015024	Nkwɔng kɔsaknɛ, lakpeke laffu. Christ vvenɛ ɔbɛpɛ liyeeng ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔgbaa la lakke la lagabwɔ, tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔsam vveengodde unnyi abassɛ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
46015025	Christ vvenɛ ɔkɔɔm vveengodde tɔttɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔbɛtɛ lifɔk ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔsambɛ uloko using bukkpɔ.
46015026	Kɔfɔk ammɛ kwa ule ɔbɛtɛ ka lakpeke ulenɛ lubbe.
46015027	Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsam bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ uloko using bukkpɔ.” Kule ppwool ka lɔkkwɔɔn, lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng za “Bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ” ba liffik Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔsamnɛ bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ unnyi Christ lɛssɛɛn.
46015028	Ka bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bìlénɛ bya Christ lile, ammɛ biini, Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, vvenɛ ɔsammɛ kɛyɔɔng la bɛfɛɛn unnyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔppyɛɛ ɔkɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ.
46015029	Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba balenɛ baptizim lɛnaang kwa babbu bɛɛ? Badɔkɔ battɛ isak abbɛ ulenɛ ’bɔng? Kulenɛ ka lɔkkwɔɔn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔknɛ battɛ babbu ba babɛlɛ lifungala bataa ka kuddu; ’bɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ balɔɔt ballɔt bannyi kwa babbu?
46015030	Mbɔng ayyɔɔt isinɛ lubbe lɛmma?
46015031	Ikpana anaam nyɛn lubbe ka zzeen ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Bɔwaa bwa nyanganɛ ka lafal ayyɔɔt la annyɔɔng ka Christ Jesus, Uyini ayyɔɔt, bunaangnɛnɛ nlɔɔk ’kwɔng:
46015032	Kulenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɔdɔkɔnɛ ka nllunɛ kullu la isɛɛn-a-kɛmat ka Ephesus ka lagabwɔ, mung isak ilenɛnɛ ka ’bɔng? Ulenɛ ka babbu basinɛ lifungala bappyɛlɛ bataa ka kuddu, afɔngɔ izziyɔng, ivva iggeleyɔng ka lufat ile ibbe; ikupnɛ imma balɔɔt.
46015033	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ayila ɔlɔɔt ɔdɛmwɔyɔng, ɛnngwa ya ɛbbɔlnɛ ɛbɛpɛ eleme ɔlɔɔt.
46015034	Appyɛlɛ anaangyɔng ittina ya bbwak. Akkyaayɔng kɛnaang a bubbi afɔngɔyɔng. Izzit inaangwɔyɔng ka annyɔɔng balɔk asinɛyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛsan.
46015035	Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk vvenɛ ɔbap ɔttɛ, “Mung ɔnaang nang vvenɛ babbu bafungala ka lubbe. Bale bayanga bɔkka kɛssanga kkwɔɔt?”
46015036	Ukun! akɔɔnnɛ ɛfɔɔk a bɛfɛɛn ka lisse, ebbebong tɛ̀ttɛ̀ emeet.
46015037	Ka akɔɔnnɛyɛ ka lisse, ele ɛfɔɔk a bɛfɛɛn keem, ɔlɔk ɛfɔɔk a alaasi, ɔlɔk ɛfɔɔk a bɛfɛɛn ɛlɔk. Lɛsan biini lissi ka limeetnɛ.
46015038	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyinɛ ɛfɔɔk a bɛfɛɛn ’yɔng baang kkwɔɔt tɛ̀ttɛ̀ uttinanɛ. Unnyi ɛfɔɔk la nnyɔn kkwɔɔt sa likkɔnɔnɛyɛ.
46015039	Ekkpakkwɔɔt a bɛfɛɛn bya bɛyanganɛ kuddu kɛssanga ssɔn ba ele. Ɔlɔɔt ule ka kkwɔɔt sa ammɛ zzekep. Isɛɛn a kɛmat ile ka kkwɔɔt sa annyɛ zzekep. Bunɔɔn bule ka kkwɔɔt sa abbwɛ zzekep. Isɛɛnabannyi ile ka kkwɔɔt sa annyɛ zzekep.
46015040	Bɛfɛɛn bya libat bile bakang ka libat. Bya ɛkpansi bile mung ka ɛkpansi. Bɔllɛ bwa bɛfɛɛn bya libat bule buu la bɔllɛ bwa bɛfɛɛn bya ɛkpansi.
46015041	Livve luwee lɛyanga bɔllɛ bwa azzɛ. Ettuma ɛyanga kɛssanga bɔllɛ bulɔk. Bwaanttuma bayanga bɔllɛ bwa abbɛ zzekep. Bwaanttuma balɔk bale baang ba bɔllɛ bwa abbɛ bubbalnɛ zzekep lile.
46015042	Kule kule ning mung ka ɛkɛtɛ ya babbu bale bafungala ka lubbe bappyɛlɛ bataa ka kuddu. Basamnɛ ɔlɔɔt balli, ubbebong. Ɛkɛtɛ ya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ufungalamɛnɛ ka lubbe, ba ɔbɛlɛ libbe kɛfal a kɛfal.
46015043	Ka lilli, ale ubbu bɔfɛɛn wa wikiwiki. Ɔzzanga ɛkɛtɛ ya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ufungalawɔnɛ vvenɛ ayanga bɔllɛ bwa lɔkkwɔɔn la bɔkkaam.
46015044	Ka lilli ale la kkwɔɔt ’sɔng kaang. Ɛkɛtɛ ya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ufungalawɔnɛ, asseke la kkwɔɔt sa kuyeeng ammɛ. Kule baning, kkwɔɔt sa iyɛnnɛ mung lile baang, Kwakkwɛ baang kkwɔɔt a kuyeeng lissɛnɛ lile baang.
46015045	Luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔdɔkɔ ɔnaang Adam, ɔkɔɔm-ɛtɔk ɔlɔɔt, ɔttɛ ɔyanga kuddu.” Ɔzzanga usseke-isimi-Adam ulenɛ Kuyeeng kwa kunnyinɛ kuddu.
46015046	Lɛfal za kuyeeng lissi littenɛ liffu. Lɛfal za gbɔɔ littenɛ liffu tɛ́ttɛ́ za kuyeeng liffu.
46015047	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔdɔkɔ ɔbɛkɛ kɛbat ɛkpansi ɔnaang Adam wa ɔkɔɔmnɛ ɛtɔk. Adam wa ɔbbalnɛ liffu mung ussi ka libat uffu.
46015048	Balɔɔt ba balenɛ ba ɛkpansi bale tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt wa bakɔɔmnɛ kɛbat banaangmɛ. Ba balenɛ ba libat, bale tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt wa ussinɛ ka libat uffu.
46015049	Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ayyɔɔt ibalnɛ ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔmnɛ ile issɛ ibal Ɔlɔɔt wa ussinɛ ka libat uffu ning baang.
46015050	Ikpana anaam, kwa nlɔɔknɛ, nlɔɔk nttɛ bɔfɛɛn bwa banaangnɛbwɛ la ɛkkpakkwɔɔt la linnyi ba bukkwoong bumii ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Bɔfɛɛn bwa bubbenɛ ba bukkwoong buyanga etini businɛ libbe.
46015051	Agɔpɔlɔyɔng lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk a lalup ’kwɔng: Ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt baala ibbe. Ɔzzanga ɔffɔnɛ ka luffi gwa lakuma lɔttanɛ, ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt vvenɛ ifoolo eseese. Ka ɛkɛtɛ lɛmmwɔɔl usseke-isimi luffi lile lɛtta, babbu vvenɛ bafungala ka lubbe baddu kuddu, tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt ifoolo.
46015053	Bɔfɛɛn bwa bubbenɛ vvenɛ busam bwa businɛ libbe buvvoongbwɛ kɛyɔɔng. Bɔfɛɛn bwa buddɔlɔnɛ, vvenɛ busam bɔfɛɛn bwa businɛ lɛddɔlɔ buvvoongbwɛ kɛyɔɔng.
46015054	Bɔfɛɛn bwa bubbenɛ bulenɛ bwa businɛ libbe lɛsam buvvoongbwɛ kɛyɔɔng, bwa buddɔlɔnɛ bule bwa businɛ lɛddɔlɔ lɛsam buvvoongbwɛ kɛyɔɔng, lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk a luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ luffu bɔk ka lɔttɛnɛ, “Vvenɛ ɔbɛpɛ lubbe, ɔbɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.”
46015055	“Lubbe, annɔ abɛtɛ nang? Lakke za kɛwwɔɔl lalewɔ yang?”
46015056	Lubbe lɔtɔk lakke kɛwwɔɔl ka bubbi. Bubbi butɔk lakke ka Lafɔɔ.
46015057	Nzɔɔn kɛnaang ule wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa unnyinɛyɛlɛ Jesus Christ wa ulenɛ lakke kɛbɛtɛ lubbe.
46015058	Ikpana anaam, abeeyɔng kibee annyɔɔng kɛkkaamwɔyɔng. Anaangyɔng kɛnaang a Uyini ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Duu bwa anaangnɛ annyiyɔng Uyini busɛlɛ isak ba bule.
46016001	Kwa akkpɔknɛ atumyɔng kissi ikkpoko ya kɛyaam a balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka Judea, anaangyɔng kwa nbwɔɔlɔnɛ balɔɔt a izɔɔm ka Galatia nttɛ banaang.
46016002	Kɛtɔm-a-luzɔɔm la ssɔn, ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔt unnyi ikkpoko tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔyanganɛ nkwaaning kussi kɔlɔk kusi lile ka ɛkɛtɛ ya nle nffu.
46016003	Nlenɛ liffu vvenɛ ntɔɔm balɔɔt ba asanganɛyɔng la ileta ibwɔɔlɔ, basam lasɔɔk annyɔɔng bamii Jerusalem.
46016004	Kɔyyɛɛpnɛ ka anaam nssɛnɛ nmii, vvenɛ ikkuma la abbɛ imii.
46016005	Vvenɛ nsak ka Macedonia nffu ka ɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng.
46016006	Usinɛ lɛkkyam vvenɛ ntaa ka waan ɛkɛtɛ la annyɔɔng, ɔlɔk ntaa la annyɔɔng lukook lɔsaal. Ɔlɔk attelenɛyɔng ka kɔssɛ anaam, ɛfɛɛn duu ya nle nbbal limii.
46016007	Ba nggyan nttɛ nyɛnwɔyɔng la lazzuma. Nttina kɛtaa la annyɔɔng mmɛmmɛ ulenɛ ka Uyini ule ɔfɔngɔnɛ.
46016008	Ɔzzànga vvenɛ ntaa mung ka Ephesus tɔttɔt ɔffɔ kɛtɔm-a-Pentecost.
46016009	Kufuk a kɛnaang a kɛnaang sa bbwak sa doddo kule baang, mkkpa kusi balɔɔt balɔk lɛsaap.
46016010	Timothy uffunɛ ɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng, atɔkmɛyɔng ka latele tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔbbwɔpɔmɛ, ɔnaangnɛ kɛnaang Uyini tɛ̀ttɛ̀ anaam nnaangnɛ.
46016011	Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔkkpɛnmɛ. Attelemɛyɔng ka kɔssɛ ammɛ ka bɔkaat nkwaaning ɔppyɛlɛ uffu ka ɛfɛɛn anaam; ka nlenɛ baang ka nkatnɛ kɛppyɛlɛ ammɛ la ikpana ammɛ.
46016012	Kwa Apollos, ɔkpana ayyɔɔt: nle baang nlɔɔknɛ nttɛ ukoolowɔyɔng la ikpana ayyɔɔt ilɔk, ɔzzànga ba ɔtaka uyila gedegede mung ɔttɛ vvenɛ umii. Ɛkɛtɛ ya ɔyanganɛ kufuk mkkpa kɔnaang vvenɛ umii.
46016013	Akatyɔng, abeeyɔng kkpɔk ka kiyila annyɔɔng. Akwulayɔng, akkaamyɔng.
46016014	Anaangyɔng kɛnaang annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ ka kɛsaap.
46016015	Asanyɔng mung kwa Stephanas la itutum ammɛ ɔɔ? Abbɛ balenɛ bakɔɔm-ɛtɔk a balɔɔt a luzɔɔm ka Greece. Basambongbɛ kɛyɔɔng bannyi ka kɛnaang Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ikpana anaam, nkkpengewɔyɔng lukkpenge,
46016016	nttɛ akupyɔng linaang a kizzilɛttɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ sa balɔɔt ’bɔng mung, la ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk duu wa ɔnaangnɛ kɛnaang la abbɛ ɔlɔk ɔtaa la abbɛ.
46016017	Nggelebong ka kiffu sa Stephanas la Fortunatus, la Achaicus baffunɛ. Baffubong batɔk kɛtaa annɔ ka asinɛ lile.
46016018	Banaangnɛbong nggele tɛ̀ttɛ̀ banaangwɔnɛ annɔ. Kɛssanga balɔɔt tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ’sɔng bale ba kɛssɛɛn ka luppyam.
46016019	Izɔɔm ya ilenɛ ka ɛkpansi a Asia battɛ nwomowɔyɔng: Aquila la Priscilla la balɔɔt a luzɔɔm ba bataanɛ ka ssala abbɛ batɔɔmnɛ luwomo tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt a luzɔɔm battɛ nwomowɔyɔng.
46016020	Ikpana ayyɔɔt ya ilenɛ mung ɔkkpɛlɛ itɔɔm luwomo ifeewɔyɔng. Awomoyɔng ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn la kigbugba tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔkpana annyɔɔng.
46016021	Anaam Paul nkɔɔmnɛ kɔbɔɔk anaam nkkpɔk ’kwɔng: “Nwomowɔyɔngbong ɔkkpɛlɛ.”
46016022	Ɔlɔɔt duu wa usinɛ Uyini litele nzɔɔm ɔkaamɛ ammɛ! Marana tha— ning baang ulenɛ Uyini, affu.
46016023	Lakke Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, lataa annyɔɔng.
46016024	Kɛsaap anaam kɛtaa la annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ ka Christ Jesus.
47001001	Paul, uyilabɔtɔɔm a Christ Jesus, wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsangamɛnɛ la ɔkpana ayyɔɔt Timothy, bakkpɔknɛ lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng bafee balɔɔt a luzɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ ka Corinth; la Greece ɔkkpɛlɛ.
47001002	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Dedde ayyɔɔt, la Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, unnyiwɔyɔng lakke la bɔkaat.
47001003	Iwomoyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Abassɛ Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, uggwoom a kɔlɔɔk a Dedde, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa kɛyaam ɔkkpɛlɛ kissinɛ ka ammɛ kiffu.
47001004	Ɔyaamyɛlɛ ka lilɔɔk ayyɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ, nkwaaning ikkwoong iyaam balɔɔt balɔk ba bayanganɛ bɛssanga lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ. Iyaambɛ ka kɛssanga kɛyaam ’sɔng baang ssɔn sa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyaamnɛyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt.
47001005	Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ iyanganɛ etini ka akama wa Christ ɔyɛnnɛ, ile issɛ ka Christ iyanga etini ka kɛyaam ammɛ sa lɛbaang ɔgbaa.
47001006	Iyɛnnɛ akama, iyɛn kwa kɛyaamwɔyɔng la kwa kuddu annyɔɔng. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyaamnɛyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt, vvenɛ ɔssɛ ɔyaamwɔyɔng annyɔɔng. Ɔgbaa, unnyiwɔyɔng lakke za kɛbbɔ akama la kibbe luppyam ɔgbaa la kɛssanga kɛbbɔ akama sa ayyɔɔt ibbɔnɛ.
47001007	Luttina ayyɔɔt ka annyɔɔng ba lɔgbata. Isan lɔsan ittɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ayanganɛyɔng etini ka akama ayyɔɔt, assɛ ayangayɔng etini ning baang ka kɛyaam sa ayaamnɛyɔngyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt.
47001008	Ikpana ayyɔɔt, iggyan ittɛ ikkewɔyɔng lilɔɔk sa linaangnɛyɛlɛ ka ɛkpansi a Asia. Lilɔɔk sa babɛtɛnɛyɛlɛ lisak lɛttala isam zzeen a kuddu.
47001009	Ittina ittɛ baang bazzabong kɛkaal ayyɔɔt battɛ ibbe. Nkwɔng kɔnaang nkwaaning ɔkkaamyɛlɛ kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm keem wa ufungalanɛ babbu, kwa ayyɔɔt biini lissi.
47001010	Ka ussinɛ ka akama lubbe ɔkkalayɛlɛ, vvenɛ ɔkkalayɛlɛ. Isambong ittina ayyɔɔt iloko ka ammɛ ittɛ vvenɛ abbalyɛlɛ lɛkkala,
47001011	tɛ̀ttɛ̀ annyɔɔng attelenɛyɔngyɛlɛ ka luzɔɔm gwa azɔɔmnɛ assɛɛnyɔngyɛlɛ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ uppyee luzɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ gwa bazɔɔmnɛ bassɛɛnyɛlɛ. Vvenɛ ɔnaangyɛlɛ ppyɛɛ. Balɔɔt ggbadam vvenɛ bayeek lɛmmwɔɔl abbɛ bawomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang bannyiyɛlɛ.
47001012	Nkwɔng kulenɛ kwa ɔkkyaanɛyɛlɛ. Luttina ayyɔɔt lɔbwɔɔlɔbongyɛlɛ lɔttɛ lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la kɛsaap sa ɔyɔɔnɛyɛlɛ bɛkɔɔmnɛ lafal ayyɔɔt ka vveeng ’wɔng. Gaang gaang lassi ayyɔɔt la annyɔɔng. Kibbe-lɛttɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, bisana a vveengodde lissi.
47001013	Ikkpɔk bwa ale akkwoong akkwɔɔyɔng ifeewɔyɔng. Nttina nttɛ vvenɛ asanyɔngkwɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ka lakpeke.
47001014	Kippyee kɔlɔɔk ayyɔɔt sa appyeenɛyɔng gedegede mung kile ssup, nttina nttɛ vvenɛ appyeeyɔng doddo affatayɔng nkwaaning ɔkkyaawɔyɔng ka Kɛtɔm-Uyini Jesus kwa ayyɔɔt tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ayyɔɔt ule ɔkkyaayɛlɛ kwa annyɔɔng.
47001015	Ndɔkɔ nggba ’byɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ lɛsan, kwakkwɛ nnaangnɛ luttina ka ikeeng gwa kikoolowɔyɔng nkwaaning ayangayɔng ppyɛɛ ka bikkpit bɛffa.
47001016	Nnaang luttina gwa kikoolowɔyɔng ka ɛkɛtɛ nle ka nmiinɛ Macedonia la ɛkɛtɛ nle nppyɛlɛ, nkwaaning attelenɛyɔng ka nle ka nmiinɛ Judea.
47001017	Ka nttinanɛ ’kwɔng ndɔkɔ nfoolo luttina ɔɔ? Ka nnaangnɛ ’gwɔng, nnaang gwɛ la kɛssɔp a bɔfɛɛn ɔɔ? Mbama nlɔɔk nttɛ, “Iii, Iii,” la “Maaye, Maaye” ka ɛkɛtɛ nnyɔn ɔɔ?
47001018	Ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk, nlɔɔk-nloko anaam la annyɔɔng usi lile wa “Iii” la “Maaye”.
47001019	Jesus Christ, Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, wa Silas la Timothy la anaam, Paul, biini ibwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng kɔlɔɔk ammɛ lissi ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa “Iii” la “Maaye”. Ka kkpɔɔ ammɛ ulenɛ “Iii” Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
47001020	Ammɛ ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa “Iii” ka nsekele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ. Uwɔng ulenɛ ifɛɛt ya issɛnɛ ka Jesus Christ inaang “Kule ning” ka latele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
47001021	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm biini ɔnaangnɛyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt la annyɔɔng isan ka lɔkkwɔɔn ittɛ iddubong ka ilenɛ ka bɔkaat la Christ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm biini ɔsanganɛyɛlɛ uloko zzekep.
47001022	Ammɛ ɔnaangnɛyɛlɛ eleme ɔttɛ ammɛ ulenɛ Uyini ayyɔɔt. Ammɛ ɔssɛɛnnɛyɛlɛ Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ippyam tɛ̀ttɛ̀ nlɔɔk-nloko wa ɔnaangnɛ la ayyɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔttɛ vvenɛ unnyiyɛlɛ bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya ɔbɔngɔlɔnɛyɛlɛ.
47001023	Nkkwɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ttɛɛsɛ anaam, Ammɛ ɔsannɛ luppyam anaam. Ndɔkɔ nttina kɛkkalawɔyɔng kwakkwɛ baang nnaangnɛ luttina nsi Corinth limii.
47001024	Mung ba ibum ittɛ ibwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng bwa ale ayilayɔng. Isan lɔsan ittɛ aleyɔng kkpɔk ka kiyila ka abeenɛyɔng. Lutini ’gwɔng mung inaang kɛnaang la annyɔɔng la annyɔɔng iggyan budoddo annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ.
47002001	Ɔzzánga nnaangbong luttina ka kwɔng nttɛ ba nbɛlɛ liffu naangwɔyɔng ataayɔng bukee.
47002002	Ulenɛ ka nnaangnɛ bukee bunaangwɔyɔng, nnyinɛ ule usseke, wa ule ɔnaangnɛ anaam ɔwaanɛ. Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ba ule ɔgbaa la annyɔɔng ba nnaangwɔnɛyɔng bukee bunaangwɔyɔng.
47002003	Kwakkwɛ nkkpɔknɛ leta ’wɔng mung nfeewɔyɔng. Nsi lɛggyan nttɛ nffu ka ɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng bukee bunaangnɛ ka alenɛyɔng balɔɔt ba bunaangnɛnɛ nggele. Nsanbong nttɛ nggelenɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng vvenɛ assɛ aggeleyɔng.
47002004	Nkkpɔkwɔyɔng leta ’wɔng mung la lilɔɔk sa lɛbaang la akama ka luppyam ɔbɛtɛ la liyeen ka zzeen. Ɔzzanga nsi lɛttɛ bukee bunaangwɔyɔng. Nnaang nttɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng asan attɛyɔng asaapnɛyɔng gaang gaang.
47002005	Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk úlenɛ wabbɛ lɛnaang tɔkɔlɔ ɔbbɔlmɛ, la anaam lissi ka ɔnaangnɛ, ɔnaang la annyɔɔng, ɔlɔk la balɔɔt balɔk. (Nsi lɛggyan nttɛ nnaang lilɔɔk likoolomɛ kɛnaang.)
47002006	Kwa ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang, kɔyyɛɛpbong ka akama wa alemɛnɛyɔng lɛyɔɔ ka ɛtɔk ’yɔng.
47002007	Mkkpa kɔnaang, asɔɔkmɛyɔng ka kwa ɔnaangnɛ. Anaangmɛyɔng bukee bufɔngɔmɛ kɛnaang tɛ̀ttɛ́ uffu ɔkkyaa kiyila kwa lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔfɔngɔ.
47002008	Mkkpee! Anaangmɛyɔng ning baang ɔsan ɔttɛ ɔsaapwɔyɔng gaang gaang.
47002009	Nkkpɔkwɔyɔng leta ’wɔng kwakkwɛ mung. Nggyan nttɛ nsan tɛ̀ttɛ̀ abbɔnɛyɔng illɛ, ɔlɔk ayilanɛyɔng lɔttama anaam nsan.
47002010	Asɔɔknɛ ɔlɔɔt ka kɔlɔɔk kwa ulenɛ lɛnaang, anaam ɔgbaa nssɛbong nsɔɔkmɛ. Nsɔɔknɛ ka lɔkkwɔɔn nle nsɔɔk lutini bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ, nttina kwa annyɔɔng ka lusso a Christ,
47002011	nkwaaning Satan usiyɛlɛ lɛbɛlɛ lɛbɛtɛ ka ilenɛ luttina ammɛ lɛsan.
47002012	Nffɔnɛ Troas kikopolo Kuttu-Budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kwa kutumnɛ Christ, nsan nttɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uwongolobong ɛtɔk a kɛnaang baang.
47002013	Ɔzzànga akama ɔnaangnɛ gaang gaang ka nsinɛ ɔkpana ayyɔɔt, Titus, lɛyɛn. Nteele balɔɔt ba balenɛ baang ngbata nmii Macedonia.
47002014	Ɔzzànga nzɔɔn-kɛnaang ule wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ka ilenɛ ka bɔkaat la Christ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkɔɔmyɛlɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt igbakkɔpɔ ka kɔssɛ kwa issɛnɛ ka Christ ulenɛ lɛbɛtɛ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkɔɔmyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt ɔnaang ibwɔɔlɔ kɔlɔɔk a Christ iwaala ka ifɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kizzoom sa kiggwoomnɛ.
47002015	Ayyɔɔt itaayɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɛfɛɛn bya bɛyyɛɛpnɛ kizzoom, bya Christ ɔkɔɔmnɛ ɔzɔɔm unnyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bɛwaala bivvoong balɔɔt ba balenɛ ba Christ, ulebɛ lɛkkala ɔfɔngɔ, la balɔɔt ba balenɛ lɛtaak.
47002016	Lakkwɛɛnga kizzoom ’sɔng mung kɛtaa balɔɔt ba balenɛ lɛtaak tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bussi. Balɔɔt ba Christ ulenɛbɛ lɛkkala kɛtaabɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kizzoom sa kɛkɔɔmnɛ kuddu kifee balɔɔt. Nyinɛ ule ɔkkɔnɔ kɛnaang a kɛnaang ’sɔng.
47002017	Ayyɔɔt ba ile tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt ba bakɔɔmnɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Ebinukkpaapi kpɛɛlɛ-kpɛɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɔfɛɛn bwa businɛ kappya lɛkkaam. Ɔzzànga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ulenɛyɛlɛ lɛtɔɔm, vvenɛ ilɔɔk lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk ka lusso ammɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ibɔɔyi a Christ.
47003001	Nkwɔng mung kɔtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ibbalnɛ kamma lɛnaang itumyɛlɛ kɛyɔɔng ɔɔ? Kukkwoong mung kule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt balɔk, kɛttɛ itɔk lakke ifeewɔyɔng, ɔlɔk itɔkzɛ ka annyɔɔng ɔɔ?
47003002	Annyɔɔng alenɛyɔng leta wa ilenɛ lɛkkpɔk ka ippyam ayyɔɔt ittɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔsan, ukkwoong ɔkkwɔɔ.
47003003	Kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Christ biini ɔkkpɔknɛ leta ’wɔng mung ɔtɔɔmyɛlɛ. Ɛbbanga lissi ka ɔkɔɔmnɛ ɔkkpɔk ka lɛttaal, ɔzzanga ɔkkpɔk ka ippyam ɔssɛbibit la Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔyanganɛ kuddu.
47003004	Ilɔɔk ka iyanganɛ lakke za kɛnaang a ’kwɔng mung ka Christ ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
47003005	Bulɔk ka tɔkɔlɔ yɛlɛ ba bule bwa bufɔngɔyɛlɛ ittina ittɛ ikkwoong mung inaang kɛnaang ’sɔng. Bwa ikkwoongnɛ inaang ɔkkpɛlɛ bussi ka labɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
47003006	Ammɛ ɔnaangyɛlɛ ikkwoong inaang kɛnaang ufaa kɛbɛtɛ-kɛnnɔ. Kɛbɛtɛ-kɛnnɔ ’sɔng kwa Lafɔɔ a Moses lissi; kile sa Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Lafɔɔ za bakkpɔknɛ lannyiyɛlɛ lubbe, ɔzzànga Kuyeeng kunnyiyɛlɛ kuddu.
47003007	Lafɔɔ ’zɔng baang badɔkɔ bakkpɔkzɛ ka lɛttaal. Ɔzzánga lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm latuma baang ka ɛkɛtɛ Moses ɔtɔknɛzɛ. Mkkpa buppwolo bwa lusso a Moses buppwolonɛ budɔkɔ buzum, budɔkɔ bukkaam gaang gaang. Balɔɔt a Israel basi zzeen lɛbbɔ bayeek bappyɛɛkmɛ. Ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn a Lafɔɔ za bukɔɔmnɛ lubbe laffu lappyɛɛnɛ laffu la buppwolo ’bwɔng baang,
47003008	attina attɛ latele za lassinɛ ka Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm laffu lale laggbenge nang?
47003009	Kɛssanga linaang sa kɛkɔɔmnɛ lubbe kifee balɔɔt kɛyanganɛ latele, attina attɛ linaang sa likɔɔmnɛ kuddu lifee balɔɔt lile liyanga latele nang?
47003010	Ikkwoong mung ilɔɔk ittɛ buppwolo bwa buppwolonɛ gedegede mung ka bulenɛ lɛsak lɛttala, ɔbal tɛ̀ttɛ̀ buppwolo bwa buppwolonɛ ka isimi ka isimi bulenɛ lizum.
47003011	Bɔfɛɛn bwa bummɛnɛ ssup buyanganɛ buppwolo, bɔfɛɛn bwa bubbɔnɛ kɛfal a kɛfal bule buyanga nang?
47003012	Ikkaam luppyam ka iyanganɛ luttina ’gwɔng mung ggwɔn.
47003013	Ayyɔɔt tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Moses ba ile, wa ɔsamnɛ ubba uvvoongmɛ kɛyɔɔng ka lusso ɔttɛ nkwaaning balɔɔt a Israel basi buppwolo ’bwɔng baang lɛyɛn ka buvvoongnɛ, bukkyaap.
47003014	Ippyam abbɛ ivvoongbong ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Gɔɔ ka bɛtɔm bya mmwɔɔn mung bavvoongbong ippyam abbɛ la ubba tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bakkwɔɔnɛ ka luvva ɔtɔm a lafɔɔ. Ubba ’wɔng baang uweele ka ɛkɛtɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔsammɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng utoolo la Christ.
47003015	Gɔɔ ka mmwɔɔn mung, ɛkɛtɛ duu ya balɔɔt bakkwɔɔnɛ Lafɔɔ a Moses, ubba utii baang ka uvvoongnɛbɛ ka ippyam.
47003016	Ɔzzanga vvenɛ ubba ’wɔng baang uweele tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ, “Ubba Moses ’wɔng baang ɔdɔkɔ uweelemɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya ɔppyɛlɛnɛ uyila kwa Uyini.”
47003017	“Uyini”, Ka tɔkɔlɔ ’kwɔng mung ulenɛ Kuyeeng. Ka ɛfɛɛn a Kuyeeng-Uyini kulenɛ, kuddu kule baang.
47003018	Isso ayyɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ iwongolonɛ, balɔɔt bayɛn buppwolo Uyini tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bayɛnnɛ kiyenge. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ufoolonɛyɛlɛ isseke bwa bayɛnnɛ baang, ikama-lɔkama iwongolo. Uwɔng kɛnaang Uyini wa ulenɛ Kuyeeng.
47004001	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka kibbe lɛttɔ ammɛ, unnyibongyɛlɛ kɛnaang ’sɔng, tɔkɔlɔ ɔfɔngɔyɛlɛ kɛbɛpɛ.
47004002	Ikkyaa kɛnaang a bɛfɛɛn a lalup la bɛfɛɛn izzit ifɔngɔ. Kɔdɛm ba idɛm, ɔlɔk vvenɛ ikkala lɛlaak ka lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Itaa ka buppwolo lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Inaang kɔlɔɔk la duu iyɔɔ ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luttina ayyɔɔt lɔyyɛɛpnɛ ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
47004003	Ulenɛ ka Kuttu-Budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kwa ikopolonɛ kusinɛ balɔɔt ka latɔɔk lɛmal, kusi balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba balenɛ lɛtaak keem lɛmal.
47004004	Kiyila ba bayanga ka Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm a kuyeeng a vveeng ’wɔng mung ulenɛ ippyam abbɛ lɛsam uloko ka kisul. Ulokobɛ ɔttɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ babɛlɛ buppwolo lɛyɛn ka buppwolonɛ bullɔtbɛ. Abbwɛ bulenɛ buppwolo bwa bussinɛ ka Kuttu-Budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm buffu ka lakke a Christ, wa ulenɛ Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
47004005	Kwa ayyɔɔt biini lissi ka ikopolonɛ. Ikopolo kwa Jesus Christ ka ulenɛ Uyini. La kwa ayyɔɔt ibɔɔyi annyɔɔng ka lɛttɔ a Christ.
47004006	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔttɛnɛ, “Vvenɛ buppwolo butta ka tɔkɔlɔ kisul.” Ulenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ’wɔng baang vvɔn wa ɔnaangnɛ buppwolo, buppwolo bullɔtyɛlɛ ka ippyam. Ɔkɔɔm buppwolo kɛsan a kɔlɔɔk a lakke ammɛ bwa buppwolonɛ ka lusso a Christ ufeeleyɛlɛ.
47004007	Ɔzzànga ayyɔɔt, balɔɔt ba libɔngɔlɔ Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ’zɔng bayanganɛ, ile tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ikkpo ya banaangnɛyɛ ka kɛbat. Uwɔng ulenɛ kɛyɔɔ kɛttɛ lakke za lɛbaang lale za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm keem, za ayyɔɔt lissi.
47004008	Luppyam lɔbbɔl mung yɛlɛ ɛkɛtɛ ɛlɔk, ɔzzànga akama lissi. Ɛkɛtɛ ɛlɔk ittɔ mung bɛkangala, ɔzzànga ittina ayyɔɔt ba ibut.
47004009	Balɔɔt a kɔfɔk bale ggbadam, ɔzzànga ayyɔɔt ɛnngwa ba isɛlɛ. Ɛkɛtɛ ɛlɔk baddopoyɛlɛ, ɔzzànga yɛlɛ ba bawwɔɔl.
47004010	Ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ isam lubbe a Christ issɛɛn ka kkwɔɔt sa ayyɔɔt sa lile libbe, nkwaaning bassɛ bayɛn kuddu ammɛ ka kkwɔɔt ayyɔɔt.
47004011	Ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ka lɛfal ayyɔɔt ile ka ntɛm a lubbe ka lɛttɔ a Jesus, nkwaaning bayɛn kuddu ammɛ ka kkwɔɔt ayyɔɔt ’sɔng mung sa lile libbe.
47004012	Ning baang ulenɛ kɛttɛ lubbe lule ka kɛnaang ka kkwɔɔt ayyɔɔt, kuddu kule ka kɛnaang ka kkwɔɔt annyɔɔng.
47004013	Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, “Nlɔɔk ka nyanganɛ kiyila.” Ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt issɛ ilɔɔk ning baang ka kɛssanga luppyam a kiyila ssɔn.
47004014	Isan lɔsan ittɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ufungalanɛ Jesus, Uyini ’wɔng baang ɔtaa ka kuddu, vvenɛ ɔssɛ ufungalayɛlɛ ayyɔɔt ɔgbaa la Jesus. Ɔkɔɔmyɛlɛ umii uloko ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn la ammɛ.
47004015	Mbyɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ bile kwa lɛttɔ annyɔɔng. Latele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lalenɛ baang ka laffunɛ balɔɔt, balɔɔt ggbadam ggbadam, vvenɛ bawomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang gaang gaang la luzɔɔm ka lɛsɔɔk za ɔsɔɔknɛbɛ.
47004016	Kwakkwɛ baang itakanɛ ntɛtɛ lɛkkyaa ifɔngɔ mkkpa kkwɔɔt ayyɔɔt likpɛlɛ, kuyeeng ayyɔɔt kule baang ka kufoolonɛ la kɛtɔm la kɛtɔm.
47004017	Waan akama ’wɔng mung wa iyɛnnɛ ka liggbili ssup vvenɛ unnyiyɛlɛ uggboggbo latele la lakke ning za kɛfal a kɛfal. Latele la lakke vvenɛ bɛtta akama gaang gaang.
47004018	Ayyɔɔt zzeen ka bɛfɛɛn bya iyɛnnɛ ba itele. Itele zzeen ka bɛfɛɛn bya isinɛ lɛyɛn. Bwa iyɛnnɛ bútaa ka waan ɛkɛtɛ ssup ba iggyan. Iggyan bwa isinɛ ka zzeen lɛyɛn buttumu kɛfal a kɛfal.
47005001	Isan lɔsan ittɛ ggwoon gwa illunɛ mung, (kkwɔɔt ayyɔɔt ka ɛkpansi ’yɔng mung) lulenɛ lɛttɔ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔyanga ggwoon ka libat unnyiyɛlɛ illu. Ssala sa ammɛ biini ɔnaangnɛ, sa lile littumu kɛfal a kɛfal.
47005002	Isinibong lifiki ka luttina gwa kɛyanga ssala ka libat sa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangnɛ ulokoyɛlɛ luggbengenɛyɛlɛ gaang gaang.
47005003	Ka uvvoongnɛyɛlɛ la assɛ, vvenɛ iyanga ufaa kkwɔɔt.
47005004	Ka illunɛ ka ɛkpansi ’yɔng mung, iffimi la luttina akama. Ɔzzanga isi lɛttɛ ile ka isamnɛ kkwɔɔt ayyɔɔt sa ɛkpansi ’yɔng mung izzɔɔk. Iggyan ittɛ ssala sa lissinɛ ka libat livvoongyɛlɛ, nkwaaning kuddu kɔmɛɛl bwa bule bubbe.
47005005	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ wa ulenɛyɛlɛ lɛbama ɔkat kifoolo ’sɔng mung. Unnyiyɛlɛ Kuyeeng ammɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ nlɔɔk-nloko wa ulenɛ lɛnaang la ayyɔɔt ɔttɛ vvenɛ iyanga lɛsɔɔk.
47005006	ƐKɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ iyanga kɛkkaam a luppyam. Isan lɔsan ittɛ ka itaanɛ ka ssala kkwɔɔt ’sɔng mung, ning baang igbatabong ikɔngɔ ssala Uyini.
47005007	Kuddu ayyɔɔt kule ka kiyila. Ka kɛyɛn ka zzeen lissi.
47005008	Iyanga kɛkkaam a luppyam gaang gaang. Kule kɔttayɛlɛ lɛsaap ka ile igbata ssala ayyɔɔt ikɔngɔ ka kkwɔɔt ’sɔng mung imii itaa ka ssala Uyini.
47005009	Kwa kɔttanɛ bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ, iggyan ittɛ inaang kwa kule kɔsaap Uyini, mkkpa ile ka ssala ayyɔɔt mung ɔlɔk ka ssala Uyini.
47005010	Ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt vvenɛ ibee ka lusso a Christ, ɔkaal kɛkaal ayyɔɔt. Ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn vvenɛ ɔtɔk bwa bulemɛnɛ bbwak ka kɔlɔɔk kwa ulenɛ lɛnaang ka kɛfal ammɛ mkkpa kɔyyɛɛp, kɔbbɔl.
47005011	Isan mung bwa ’kwɔng kulenɛ. Kule kɔttɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔbbwɔpɔyɛlɛ lɔbbwɔpɔ. Kwakkwɛ baang ibumnɛ ittɛ balɔɔt bayanga kiyila. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanyɛlɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ bbwak. Nttina nttɛ ka ippyam annyɔɔng assɛ mung asannɛyɔng anaam ɔgbaa.
47005012	Ba ibɛlɛ libum ittɛ isamyɛlɛ kɛyɔɔng ibbalwɔyɔng linnyi. Isseke ka ibumnɛ ittɛ ibwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng ifɛɛt ya ule ɔkkyaawɔyɔng kwa ayyɔɔt. Nkwaaning balɔɔt ba babungunɛ ɔlɔɔt lɛfal basimɛ eleme libungu balɔɔknɛ, akkwoong appyɛlɛyɔngbɛ kamma.
47005013	Mung ittɔbong bikun ka lɔkkwɔɔn ɔɔ? Ittɔnɛ bikun ittɔ ka lɛttɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Faa bikun ba itaka ittɔ. Itakanɛ lɛttɔ, itaka lɛttɔ kwa lɛttɔ annyɔɔng.
47005014	Kɛsaap sa isaapnɛ Christ kɛkɔɔmnɛyɛlɛ. Gedegede mung isanbong ittɛ ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ubbenɛ ka lɛttɔ balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ, ning baang ulenɛ kɛttɛ, balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ bayanga etini ka lubbe ammɛ.
47005015	Ubbe ka lɛttɔ balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ nkwaaning balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba balenɛ ka kuddu, basi kwa abbɛ kɛyɔɔng lɛbɛlɛ liddu. Bappyɛɛ baddu kwa ammɛ keem wa ubbenɛ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ufungalamɛ ɔtaa ka kuddu ka lɛttɔ abbɛ.
47005016	Lɔnngwa ɔssɛbibit ba ibɛlɛ lɛkɔɔm ikaal kɛkaal ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk, mkkpa ndɔk ile kɛkaal a Christ lɛkaal la lɔnngwa ɔssɛbibit kpal. Ning baang ba ibɛlɛ lɛnaang ɛkɛtɛ ɛlɔk.
47005017	Ɔlɔɔt duu wa utoolomɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng la Christ utii ka ufaa kɛfal. Ɔtɔm a kɛfal umiibong, usseke ufaa kɛfal uffu.
47005018	Mbyɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangnɛ. Ɔkɔɔm Christ usikiliyɛlɛ isseke inngwa ammɛ, isi balɔɔt a kɔfɔk ammɛ lɛbɛlɛ lile. Unnyiyɛlɛ kɛnaang sa inaangnɛ balɔɔt balɔk bazzanga inngwa ammɛ ɔgbaa.
47005019	Bɔtɔɔm bwa ɔtɔɔmnɛyɛlɛ, ibwɔɔlɔ ittɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔdɔkɔ ka kɛkɔɔm a Christ kɛnaang ɛnngwa la balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usi bubbi abbɛ lɛbɛlɛ liffik. Ɔtɔɔmbongyɛlɛ ɔttɛ ibwɔɔlɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔssɛnɛ ɛnngwa la abbɛ.
47005020	Mung ilɔɔk ikkala Christ, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm biini ulenɛ mung ka ɔssɛnɛ la ayyɔɔt ɔlɔɔk unnyiwɔyɔng. Ka lɛttɔ a Christ, ikkpengewɔyɔngbong ittɛ afɔngɔyɔng Ebinukkpaapi esikiliwɔyɔng ippyam afɔngɔyɔng balɔɔt a kɔfɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛbɛlɛ lile, assekeyɔng inngwa ammɛ.
47005021	Christ usi bubbi lɛnaang. Ɔzzanga kɛ lɛttɔ ayyɔɔt, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangmɛ utul bubbi ayyɔɔt nkwaaning ka ilenɛ ka bɔkaat la ammɛ, itul budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm itaa bbwak tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyannɛ.
47006001	Ka ilenɛyɔng ka kɛnaang la Ebinukkpaapi, ikkpengewɔyɔng ittɛ ka alenɛyɔng lɛsɔɔk Ebinukkpaapi lɛtɔk, tɛ̀ttɛ́ asamyɔngzɛ abɛpɛyɔng.
47006002	Appyeeyɔng kwa Ebinukkpaapi ɛlɔɔknɛ ɛttɛ, “Ɛkɛtɛ ɛffɔnɛ ya nle ka nyɔɔwɔnɛ kibbe-lɛttɔ nppyee nzɔɔm annɔ; Kɛtɔm sa nle nkkwɔɔwɔ kissolonɛ, vvenɛ nttelewɔ.” Gɔpɔlɔyɔng! Uwɔng ulenɛ ɛkɛtɛ ya kibbe-lɛttɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Mmwɔɔn ulenɛ kɛtɔm sa ule ɔkkalawɔyɔng.
47006003	Ba iggyan ittɛ inaang kɔlɔɔk kwa ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ule ɔttɛ ba kɔyyɛɛp. Ɔgbaa, ayyɔɔt ɔgbangala ka ɛtɔk ɔlɔɔt baala iloko.
47006004	Lutini ’gwɔng iyɔɔ ittɛ ayyɔɔt bwɔɔn Ebinukkpaapi. Ibbe luppyam ka kɛyɛn akama ka kippyee bukoolo, la bɛssanga lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ.
47006005	Batupbongyɛlɛ, bassɛɛnyɛlɛ igbakkɔpɔ. Banaangyɛlɛ bɛfɛɛn izzit. Inaang kɛnaang ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ gbaak kɛtɔm. Ɛkɛtɛ ba iyanga ya ilaanɛ bilaa ɔlɔk izzi kazzi.
47006006	Luppyam ayyɔɔt ka lulenɛ ppwool la kɛsan a kɔlɔɔk, la kibbe luppyam la kiggwoom a kɔlɔɔk, iyɔɔwɔyɔngbong ittɛ ayyɔɔt bwɔɔn Ebinukkpaapi ka likke kuyeeng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔbɛtɛ la kɛsaap ayyɔɔt sa lɔkkwɔɔn,
47006007	la lakke ibwɔɔlɔ lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk ya ibwɔɔlɔnɛ, ɔbɛtɛ la lakke Ebinukkpaapi. Kisi bubbi lɛyanga kilenɛ bɛfɛɛn a lɛkɔɔng ayyɔɔt bya ikɔɔmnɛ illu kullu ikatyɛlɛ kɛyɔɔng.
47006008	Bateleyɛlɛ, banaangyɛlɛ bɛfɛɛn izzit bagbaa. Babbaatyɛlɛ, babunguyɛlɛ bagbaa. Batɔkyɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bakkaal-a-lalaak ɔzzànga ile baang ka ilɔɔknɛ lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk.
47006009	Battɛ yɛlɛ ba basan, ɔzzànga basanbongyɛlɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Battɛ ibbebong, ɔzzànga mung ile baang ka kuddu. Bayɔɔyɛlɛ akama, ɔzzànga yɛlɛ ba bawwɔɔl.
47006010	Mkkpa banaangyɛlɛ kwa livve lɛbbɔlnɛyɛlɛ, iggele tɔttɔt. Ippyɛɛk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt ba ɔbbɔlnɛbɛ, ɔzzànga inaang balɔɔt ppwap ɔyyɛɛpbɛ. Ɔtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ isɛlɛnɛ bulɔk, ɔzzànga ippyɛɛ iyanga bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ.
47006011	Inngwa anaam ya luppyam ka Corinth. Ilɔɔkbong ppwool ibwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng. Iwongolobong ippyam ayyɔɔt ppwool, innyiwɔyɔng.
47006012	Ittina ayyɔɔt ba itaka isam issekewɔyɔng. Annyɔɔng asamnɛyɔng ittina annyɔɔng assekeyɔngyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt.
47006013	Gedegede mung, nlɔɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ alenɛyɔng bwaan anaam. Ayɔɔyɔngyɛlɛ kɛssanga luttina ’sɔng baang sa ayyɔɔt ittinanɛ itumwɔyɔng annyɔɔng. Awongoloyɔng ippyam annyɔɔng ppwool annyiyɔngyɛlɛ.
47006014	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ abum attɛ atul anaangyɔng kɛnaang la balɔɔt ba basɛlɛnɛ kiyila tɛ̀ttɛ̀ alenɛyɔng ikɛlɛlɛ. Ning baang ba kule. Budoddo la bubbi bile bɛnaang nang bɛtaa ka bɔkaat? Buppwolo la kisul bile bɛnaang nang bɛtaa ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn?
47006015	Christ la Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm a kuyeeng bale banaang nang bakaat? Mung ɔsɛlɛ-kiyila la ɔyanga-kiyila bale kɛssanga ssɔn ɔɔ?
47006016	Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lule lɔnaang nang lɔtaa ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn la ilɔɔp-ilat? Ayyɔɔt ilenɛ ggwoon Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm gwa lɔyanganɛ kuddu, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm biini ɔlɔɔknɛ. Ɔttɛ, “Vvenɛ nnaang ssala anaam ka ɛfɛɛn a balɔɔt anaam, nllu baang la abbɛ. Anaam vvenɛ nle Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm abbɛ, abbɛ bale balɔɔt anaam.”
47006017	Ɔzzanga Ebinukkpaapi ya ɛyanganɛ lakke ɔkkpɛlɛ ɛttɛ, “Akkyaayɔngbɛ afɔngɔyɔng. Agbata assekeyɔngbɛ. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akkɛtɛyɔng bɔfɛɛn bwa bubbɔlnɛ. Anaam vvenɛ ntɔkwɔyɔng.
47006018	Anaam vvenɛ nle ssaawɔ annyɔɔng; annyɔɔng alenɛyɔng bwɔɔn anaam.”
47007001	Inngwa anaam, nsekele ’wɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ Ebinukkpaapi ɛnaang ennyiyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt. Ikkyaa bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya bɛnaangnɛ kkwɔɔt ɔlɔɔt la lɛfal ammɛ bɛbbɔl ifɔngɔ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔbwɔɔlɔyɛlɛ ɔttɛ ikkyaa kɛnaang a bubbi ifɔngɔ.
47007002	Assɛɛnyɔngyɛlɛ ka ippyam annyɔɔng. Kɔlɔɔk kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ la ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ba itaka inaang. Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ba itaka ittina kɛwwɔɔl gɔɔ vvenɛ inaang ɔlɔɔt bɛbɛtɛ.
47007003	Nsi lɛlɔɔk ’kwɔng nttɛ nkkpɛnwɔyɔng. Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ nlenɛ lɛlɔɔk kkpal, aleyɔngyɛlɛ ka luppyam gaang gaang ka ilenɛyɔng ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, mkkpa iddu-uddu ɔlɔk ibbe-ubbe.
47007004	Luppyam kwa annyɔɔng nɛ ba lɔzza. Ɔwaanɛ kwa annyɔɔng ka lilɔɔk ayyɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ntii baang ka nkkaamnɛ luppyam. Nggele gaang gaang.
47007005	Gɔɔ ka iffɔnɛ Macedonia isi lɛfɛkɛlɛ. Ɔdɔkɔ lilɔɔk a lilɔɔk ka ɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ. Balɔɔt balɔk bakɔɔm bawɔlɔ. Ɔbbwɔpɔyɛlɛ.
47007006	Ɔzzànga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔnaangnɛ balɔɔt bakkaam luppyam, ɔnaangyɛlɛ ikkaam luppyam la kiffu a Titus.
47007007	Kiffu ammɛ keem lissi. Ibwɔɔlɔ ya attelemɛnɛyɔng inaangnɛyɛlɛ ikkaam luppyam igbaa. Ɔbwɔɔlɔyɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ aggyannɛ attɛ ayɛnyɔngyɛlɛ gaang gaang, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ akama ɔnaangwɔyɔng ka isinɛ liffu, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ alenɛyɔng libum attɛ akkalanɛyɔng, nggelebong gaang gaang.
47007008	Gɔɔ mkkpa leta anaam ɔnaangwɔyɔng bukee, akama nɛ ba ɔnaang, anaam nkkpɔknɛ. Nzang bukee bunaangnɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya nyɛnnɛ ka leta anaam ɔnaangwɔnɛyɔng bukee ka ɛkɛtɛ ssup.
47007009	Gedegede mung nggelebong. Ba nggele ka nnaangnɛ bukee bunaangwɔyɔng. Nggele ka bukee annyɔɔng bunaangwɔnɛyɔng afooloyɔng linaang. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkɔɔmnɛ bukee ’bwɔng baang uffu. Kɔlɔɔk kɔlɔk kwa bbɔlbbɔl isiwɔyɔng lɛnaang.
47007010	Bukee bwa bussinɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bufoolo luppyam ɔlɔɔt, bunaangwɔ assɛ ka ɛtɔk a kuddu. Busannɛ baang ba bule. Bukee a vveengodde bunnyinɛ lubbe.
47007011	Ayɛnyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangnɛ la bukee annyɔɔng. Bunaangwɔyɔngbong kɔbɛtɛwɔyɔng. Bunaangwɔyɔngbong ayɔɔyɔng kisi-lɛsan annyɔɔng. Akama ’wɔng baang, ittina ’yɔng baang, luzɔɔm ’gwɔng baang, la ibama ’yɔng baang ya kɛyɔɔ banaang a bubbi akama. Ayɔɔyɔngbongyɛlɛ attɛyɔng kibbi ba ataka azziyɔng ka kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ.
47007012	Ka nkkpɔknɛ leta ’wɔng, nsi lɛkkpɔk kwa ɔlɔɔt wa usinɛ doddo lɛnaang, ɔlɔk ka kwa ɔlɔɔt wa banaangmɛnɛ bbɔlbbɔl. Nkkpɔk nttɛ kɔnaangwɔyɔng ppwool ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, asanyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɔbɛtɛwɔnɛyɔng kwa ayyɔɔt.
47007013	Kwakkwɛ baang iyanganɛ kɛkkaam a luppyam. Kwa kɛkaam a luppyam keem lissi. Ɔgbaa Titus ɔnaangnɛyɛlɛ iggele la ammɛ ka ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng aggelemɛnɛyɔng.
47007014	Nbbabong lɔbba ntumwɔyɔng nbwɔɔlɔmɛ. Ɔzzánga nɛ ba ataka afɛɛtyɔng. Ilɔɔk lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ la annyɔɔng. Kule kɛssanga ssɔn, lɔbba gwa nbbanɛ la Titus lulebong ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
47007015	Kɛsaap sa asaapmɛnɛyɔng kɛmmala gaang gaang la bɔkkaam ɛkɛtɛ duu ya ukkenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng alenɛyɔng lɛbama kitelemɛ. Atɔkmɛyɔng assɛɛnyɔng ka kkwɔɔt la kiffula.
47007016	Nggele gaang gaang ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Luppyam lɔkkaamnɛ kwa annyɔɔng.
47008001	Ikpana ayyɔɔt, iggyan ittɛ asanyɔng bwa lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lalenɛ lɛnaang ka izɔɔm ya ilenɛ ka Macedonia.
47008002	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔllɛbongbɛ gaang gaang la akama wa balenɛ lɛyɛn. Ɔzzànga mkkpa ndɔk ɔbbɔlbɛ, bayanga laggele gaang gaag, baggwoom kɔlɔɔk basak.
47008003	Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ bànnyi bɛfɛɛn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bakkwoongnɛ. Gɔɔ bannyi basak tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bukkwoongnɛ.
47008004	Bakkpengeyɛlɛ bapiiti battɛ bassɛ bayanga kufuk kwa kittele balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba balenɛ ka Judea.
47008005	Banaang batta kwa ayyɔɔt buttinanɛ. Ka ikeeng, basambɛ kɛyɔɔng bannyi Uyini. Ɔttɛ ɔnaang, ka kɔsaapnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, basambɛ kɛyɔɔng bannyiyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt ɔgbaa.
47008006	Ɔzzánga issɛɛn Titus wa uttenɛ kɛnaang ’sɔng ittɛ ɔkkaammɛ la assɛ usseke uttelewɔyɔng avveyɔng kɛnaang a kɛsaap ’sɔng.
47008007	Ɔyyɛɛpwɔyɔng gaang gaang ka bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya ayanganɛyɔng ka kiyila: kɔlɔɔk a lɛmmwɔɔl, la bisana, ka luttina kɛyaam a balɔɔt, la kɛsaap sa isaapwɔnɛyɔng. Ɔzzànga iggyan ittɛ aggwoomyɔng kɔlɔɔk agbaayɔng la kɛsaap ’sɔng.
47008008	Lafɔɔ lissi ka innyiwɔnɛyɔng. Ɔzzànga iyɔɔwɔyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt balɔk baggyannɛ kɛyaam a ba abbɛ. Nggyan nttɛ nsan, kɛsaap annyɔɔng kilenɛ sa bbwak ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
47008009	Asanyɔng lɔsan kɛsaap sa Jesus Christ ɔyanganɛ. Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔdɔkɔnɛ uggbenge baang, ɔnaangmɛ kɛyɔɔng usseke ukee-waan ka lɛttɔ ayyɔɔt. Ɔggyan ɔttɛ akɔɔmyɔng ibbɔl ammɛ ɔyyɛɛpwɔyɔng.
47008010	Uwɔng ulenɛ luttina gwa anaam nttinanɛ ntum kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng mung: Kɔtta lɛyyɛɛp ka avvenɛyɔng gedegede mung bwa atteneyɔng lummwemmwem. Annyɔɔng akɔɔmnɛyɔng ɛtɔk, ka linaang keem lissi, ɔgbaa la luttina kɛnaang a kɛnaang gwa attinanɛyɔng.
47008011	Ɔkkaamwɔyɔng la assɛ. Avveyɔngsɛ. Assɛɛnyɔng luttina kivvesɛ, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ attinanɛyɔng kɛnaangsɛ. Anaangyɔngsɛ la bɔfɛɛn duu bwa ayanganɛyɔng.
47008012	Asɔɔknɛyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ayanganɛyɔng, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔtɔk lɛsɔɔk annyɔɔng. Bwa asinɛyɔng lɛyanga ba ɔggyan.
47008013	Ba nggyan nttɛ ayɛnyɔng akama ka kɛyaam a balɔɔt balɔk. Ɔzzànga ka ayanganɛyɔng bɛfɛɛn ggbadam, kɔyyɛɛp ka attelenɛyɔng balɔɔt ba basinɛ lɛyanga. Ɛkɛtɛ busɛlɛwɔnɛyɔng annyɔɔng, abbɛ bayanganɛ vvenɛ bassɛ bayaamwɔyɔng. Anaangnɛyɔng ning baang, ɔlɔɔt wa ule ubunu wabbɛ uzzi baala ule.
47008015	Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyanganɛ ggbadam baala ɔyanga ɔsak. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyanganɛ ssup baala ɔyanga bussup busak.
47008016	Iwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang, ka ɔnaangnɛ Titus ubum tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ayyɔɔt ibumnɛ ittɛ iyaamwɔyɔng!
47008017	Kwa ayyɔɔt ibapnɛ keem lissi ka ɔtɔknɛ, ɔdɔkɔ ubum gaang gaang ɔttɛ ɔyaam balɔɔt ka luttina gwa ammɛ biini, kwakkwɛ ɔnaangnɛ littina gwa kiffu ka ɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng.
47008018	Ile ka itɔɔmnɛ ɔkpana ayyɔɔt wa ɔyanganɛ latele gaang gaang ka kɛnaang a kikopolo kuttu-budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bakkuma la Titus baffu.
47008019	Ɔgbaa basangamɛbong ka izɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ battɛ ɔssɛ la ayyɔɔt ka ilenɛ baang ka inaangnɛ kɛnaang a kɛsaap ka latele Uyini iyɔɔ ittɛ iggyan kittele balɔɔt.
47008020	Itɔɔmbong ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng mung uffu nkwaaning ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk usi lɔzzɔ lɛssɛ ka kɛkɔɔm sa ile ka ikɔɔmnɛ lɛsɔɔk ’zɔng mung.
47008021	Bwa ittinanɛ kɛnaang ka ippyam ayyɔɔt ittina kɛnaang kwa bbwak. Ka lusso Uyini keem lissi ka iggyannɛ kɛnaang kwa bbwak, iggyan kɛnaang kwa bbwak ka lusso ɔssɛbibit ɔgbaa.
47008022	Ile ka itɔɔmnɛ ɔkpana ayyɔɔt ɔssɛ la abbɛ uffu. Illɛmɛbong bikkpit ggbadam, iyɛn ka kɛyaam a balɔɔt kɛsaapmɛnɛ. Ɔyanga luttina gaang gaang ka annyɔɔng, ule ka ubumnɛ kɛyaamwɔyɔng ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
47008023	Ulenɛ kwa Titus, ammɛ ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ anaam. Ɔnaang kɛnaang la anaam ɔttɛ uttelewɔyɔng. Kwa ikpana ayyɔɔt ilɔk ba bassɛnɛ la ammɛ, abbɛ batɔknɛ lɛttɔ izɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ bakɔɔm latele bafee Christ.
47008024	Ayɔɔyɔngbɛ kɛsaap annyɔɔng, nkwaaning izɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ isan ittɛ ile bbwak ka inaangnɛ kamma itumwɔyɔng.
47009001	Gɔɔ ba nbɛlɛ lɛggyan nttɛ nkkpɔk ntum kɛyaam sa bayaamnɛ balɔɔt a luzɔɔm ka Judaea.
47009002	Nsan lɔsan nttɛ annyɔɔng attinanɛyɔng kɛyaam a balɔɔt. Nnaangbong kamma la balɔɔt a Macedonia ntumwɔyɔng. Nttɛ “Ikpana ayyɔɔt ya ilenɛ ka Greece, baggba luttina lɛnaang lummwemmwem gwa kɛyaam a balɔɔt” Lubum annyɔɔng lufungalabong balɔɔt ggbadam.
47009003	Nle ka ntɔɔmnɛ ikpana ayyɔɔt ’yɔng mung baffa nkwaaning kamma kwa inaangnɛ itumwɔyɔng ka kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng mung kasi gbɔɔ lɛttɔ kataak. Ɔzzánga kulenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ nlɔɔknɛ, vvenɛ abamayɔng bwa ale akɔɔm ayaamyɔngbɛ akatyɔng.
47009004	Nzang balɔɔt a Macedonia baffunɛ la anaam basan battɛ ba ataka abamayɔng, vvenɛ izzit inaangyɔngyɛlɛ gaang gaang, ka balenɛ littina gaang gaang kwa annyɔɔng.
47009005	Nttina nttɛ kɔyyɛɛp ka nddanɛ ikpana ayyɔɔt bakɔɔm bassɛ bakɔngɔnɛ bamii babama lɛsɔɔk za attɛnɛ vvenɛ annyiyɔngbɛ baloko eseese. Ɔkkɔɔnɛ ɛkɛtɛ nkyaalanɛ, abamayɔngbong ɔkkpɛlɛ alokoyɔng. Ning baang vvenɛ ikɔɔlɔ ittɛ annyiyɔng ka kussiwɔnɛyɔng ka luppyam, kɛttɛ annyiyɔng ka battɛnɛ annyiyɔng lissi.
47009006	Akkeyɔng ’kwɔng tɛ! Ɔlɔɔt wa uwoopnɛ waan a bɔtɔɔm ssup, ule ɔyaat ssup. Ɔlɔɔt wa uwoopnɛ uggboggbo ule ɔyaat uggboggbo.
47009007	Ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn unnyi tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luttina lɔtɔɔmmɛnɛ. Ɔfɔngɔ la akama kinnyi, uttina ɔttɛ baang kɛnaang ammɛ lissi. Ɔlɔɔt wa unnyinɛ bɔfɛɛn ka bɔwaa ɔsaapnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
47009008	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ukkwoong mung unnyiwɔ ɔsak tɛ̀ttɛ̀ aggyannɛ, nkwaaning ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ayanga bwa aggyannɛ kɛyɔɔng, gɔɔ ayanga asak ka kɔlɔɔk duu kwa anaangnɛ kɔyyɛɛp.
47009009	Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, “Uggwoom a kɔlɔɔk unnyi balɔɔt ba ɔbbɔlnɛbɛ bɛfɛɛn ka luppyam gwa doddo. Kiggwoom a kɔlɔɔk ammɛ kittumu kɛfal a kɛfal.”
47009010	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa unnyinɛ ɔkɔɔn ikɔnɔ-kɔnɔ ifɔɔk a bɛfɛɛn la kazzi, vvenɛ ɔssɛ unnyiwɔyɔng ifɔɔk a bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ya aggyannɛyɔng, ɔnaangyɛ immala, usseke ayaatyɔng liyaat littala ka kiggwoom a kɔlɔɔk annyɔɔng.
47009011	Vvenɛ ɔnaangwɔyɔng ɔyyɛɛpwɔyɔng ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ka kɛyyɛɛp a kɛnaang annyɔɔng nkwaaning balɔɔt ggbadam bawomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang ka lɛsɔɔk annyɔɔng za batɔknɛ ka ayyɔɔt.
47009012	Kɛnaang sa anaangnɛyɔng mung, ba kinnyi bwa balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm baggyannɛ keem, ɔgbaa kɛdɛmbong nzɔɔn-kɛnaang ule wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
47009013	Ka iyɔɔ ya kɛnaang annyɔɔng mung, balɔɔt ggbadam vvenɛ batele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka kikopolo kuttu budoddo Christ kwa akopolonɛyɔng la kiggwoom a kɔlɔɔk annyɔɔng la balɔɔt balɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ.
47009014	Vvenɛ bazɔɔm bannyiwɔyɔng ka kɛsaap ka lakke za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyɔɔwɔnɛyɔng.
47009015	Iwomoyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang ka lɛsɔɔk za ɔsɔɔknɛyɛlɛ.
47010001	Anaam Paul nkkpengewɔnɛyɔng. Anaam wa balɔɔknɛ battɛ nle ɔlɔɔt a latele la kiggwoom a kɔlɔɔk ka ɛkɛtɛ ya nlenɛ la annyɔɔng. Nnyanga ka ɛkɛtɛ ngbatanɛ nkɔngɔwɔyɔng. Nkkpengewɔyɔng ka budoddo ka kɛyyɛɛp a kɛnaang a Christ,
47010002	nttɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ atutnɛyɔng nnyanga ka ɛkɛtɛ nle nffu ka ɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng. Nsan lɔsan bɛlɛng nttɛ nkkwoong mung nnyanga la balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba balɔɔknɛ battɛ ayyɔɔt inaang kwa vveeng ’wɔng ɔddanɛyɛlɛ.
47010003	Kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Ayyɔɔt illu ka vveeng ’wɔng mung. Ɔzzànga kullu tɛ̀ttɛ̀ vveeng ’wɔng mung ullunɛ ba illu.
47010004	Bɛfɛɛn a kullu bya ikɔɔmnɛ illu kullu bya vveeng ’wɔng lissi. Bile bya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Bɛkkaam lɔkkaam bɛsak. Ikɔɔmbyɛ abbyɛ ibɛpɛ lakke la babbu ikangala ɔkkpɛlɛ.
47010005	Vvenɛ ibɛpɛ bisese ɔkkpɛlɛ bya bisinɛ kɛsan a kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛggyan. Vvenɛ inaang ittina ya ile innaa ippyam ɔkkpɛlɛ itele Christ.
47010006	Alenɛyɔng latele annyɔɔng linnyi laggba, vvenɛ iyɔɔ balɔɔt ba basɛlɛnɛ latele akama.
47010007	Appyɛɛkyɔng bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung gbɔɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ayɛnnɛyɔngbyɛ. Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ule baang wa ɔttɛnɛ ammɛ ule wa Christ ɔɔ? Kɔyyɛɛp-ɔyyɛɛp! Ɔbbalmɛ kɛyɔɔng liffik ɔgbaa ɔsan ɔttɛ ayyɔɔt ɔgbaa issɛ ile ba Christ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ammɛ.
47010008	Gɔɔ izzit nɛ ba inaang mkkpa nle kamma lɛnaang ntum lakke za Uyini unnyinɛyɛlɛ. Lakke za lanaangwɔnɛyɔng aggbengeyɔng, za latutwɔnɛyɔng lazzɔɔk lissi.
47010009	Ba nggyan nttɛ kɔtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ anaam nbumwɔnɛyɔng kɛdal la illeta ya nkkpɔknɛ.
47010010	Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk vvenɛ ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Illeta Paul ɔkkpɔknɛ ile ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Ikkaam lɔkkaam. Ɔzzànga ka ɛkɛtɛ ya ulenɛ la ayyɔɔt ba ɔkkaam, lammwɔɔl ammɛ ba lassɔp.”
47010011	Kɛssanga ɔlɔɔt ’sɔng baang kɔsan kɛttɛ duu bwa ilenɛ ka lammwɔɔl illeta ayyɔɔt ka isinɛ ka ɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng lile, ile ile ning baang ka linaang ayyɔɔt, ka ɛkɛtɛ ile ile baang la annyɔɔng.
47010012	Kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn, baala ibbɔ ibunguyɛlɛ kɛyɔɔng, ɔlɔk issayɛlɛ kɛyɔɔng la balɔɔt ba battɛnɛ abbɛ baggboggbo balɔɔt. Abbɛ baang bazingizingi. Battina kwa abbɛ bazza kɛkaal abbɛ kɛyɔɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɛfal abbɛ laggyannɛ.
47010013	Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kwa ayyɔɔt mung, mkkpa kɔnaang, kɛnaang a kamma ayyɔɔt baala kɛsak kimeen. Kile kɛtaa baang ka kimeen sa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛyɛlɛ linnyi utoolo la kɛnaang ayyɔɔt ka ɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng.
47010014	Ɔzzànga annyɔɔng ka alenɛyɔng ka tɔkɔlɔ kimeen ’sɔng baang, isi lɛnaang isak ka ɛkɛtɛ ya ikɔɔmnɛ Kuttu-Budoddo kwa kutumnɛ Christ ifeewɔyɔng.
47010015	Kamma ba itaka inaang itum kɛnaang sa balɔɔt balɔk banaangnɛ basak kimeen sa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulokonɛyɛlɛ. Lutini ’gwɔng ittina ittɛ kiyila annyɔɔng kɛmmala nkwaaning ikkwoong inaang kɛnaang kiggbenge kɛgbaa ka ɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng ka tɔkɔlɔ kimeen sa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛyɛlɛ liloko.
47010016	Nkwaaning ikkwoong ikopolo Kuttu-Budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ikaan ilɔk ɔgbaa. Gɔɔ baala inaang kwa kɛnaang sa balɔɔt balɔk balenɛ lɛggba lɛnaang ka ɛkpansi abbɛ.
47010017	Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔggyannɛ ɔttɛ ɔnaang kamma, ɔnaang kamma kwa bwa Uyini ulenɛ lɛnaang.”
47010018	Ɔlɔɔt ɔyɛn budoddo ka Uyini, ka ɛkɛtɛ Uyini biini uttinanɛ budoddo utum ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang, kwa ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang uttinanɛ utummɛ kɛyɔɔng lissi.
47011001	Nngwa nttɛ vvenɛ afɔngɔnɛyɔng ka ɛkɛtɛ ya nnaangnɛ kikun. Nkkpeeyɔng.
47011002	Anaam la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔgbaa iggyan ittɛ ataayɔng bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Aleyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ waanawanavva wa ɔtakanɛ la walam limini, wa nlenɛ lɛlɔɔk nttɛ vvenɛ nsammɛ nnyi ɔlɔɔt vvɔn killu keem. Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ulenɛ Christ.
47011003	Ɔbbwɔpɔnɛ nttina nttɛ vvenɛ ippyam annyɔɔng isikili, asamyɔng luttina annyɔɔng assekeyɔng Christ; tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɛzzɔkɔ ɛdɔkɔnɛ ɛkɔɔm ɛfɛɛt Eve (Uzoo).
47011004	Atɔkyɔng ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk la laggele uffu ukopolowɔyɔng kɔlɔɔk a Jesus ɔlɔk, usi kwa Jesus wa ayyɔɔt ikopolonɛ lile. Atɔkyɔng kuyeeng la kuttu budoddo kwa kusinɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kwa ayyɔɔt kwa kussinɛyɛlɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lile.
47011005	Ba nttina nttɛ “bayilabɔtɔɔm” annyɔɔng battanɛnɛ anaam liggbenge.
47011006	Vvenɛ ɔtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ntiinɛ ka kikkoop a kutolo. Ɔzzànga ka kɛsan a kɔlɔɔk lissi. Ibwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng ’kwɔng mung ppwool bikkpit bikkpit ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
47011007	Nsiwɔyɔng kappya lɛbɛkɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ nkopolowɔnɛyɔng Kuttu-Budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ntɔknɛ anaam biini ka bikee waan nttɛ nkwaaning àzzángayɔng balɔɔt. Nkwɔng baang bbwak kusi lile ɔɔ?
47011008	Ka ɛkɛtɛ inaangnɛ kɛnaang la annyɔɔng, izɔɔm ilɔk ikkpelenɛnɛ. Ntɔkbɛ kussi nttɛ nyaamwɔyɔng annyɔɔng.
47011009	Ka ɛkɛtɛ ndɔkɔnɛ la annyɔɔng, lɔsap nsiwɔyɔng lɛkkpa nttɛ attelenɛyɔng ka ɛkɛtɛ ya nggyannɛ ikkpoko. Ikpana ayyɔɔt ya issinɛ Macedonia iffu, bakɔɔmnɛ bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya nggyannɛ bafeenɛ. Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kulenɛ ka isimi, kule kule ning baang ka ussoonɛ. Lɔsap wɔyɔng baala nkkpa.
47011010	Lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk a Christ ka lulenɛnɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ, nlɔɔkbong nsekele nttɛ kɛnaang a kamma anaam ’sɔng baala kizum ka ɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ka Greece.
47011011	Mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ nlɔɔk ning? Nlɔɔk ka asinɛnɛyɔng lɛsaap ɔɔ? Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsan lɔsan ɔttɛ asaapnɛyɔng lɛsaap!
47011012	Nle ntii baang ka nnaangnɛ kwa nggbanɛ lissi nnaang, nkwaaning nsi balɔɔt balɔk kufuk linnyi kwa kɛnaang a kamma kɛttɛ abbɛ banaang kɛnaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ayyɔɔt inaangnɛ.
47011013	Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus ba lɔkkwɔɔn lissi. Abbɛ balenɛ bakkala-lalaak ba battɛnɛ abbɛ bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus. Bakkala lalaak batum kɛnaang abbɛ, babbwa bataa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus ba lɔkkwɔɔn.
47011014	Kwakkwɛ baang Satan ukkwoongnɛ usikilimɛ kɛyɔɔng ɔbal uyilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
47011015	Kwakkwɛ kusinɛ gaang lɛttala, ibɔɔyi a Satan basikilinɛbɛ kɛyɔɔng babal ibɔɔyi ya doddo. Ka lakkpeke, vvenɛ babwɔɔlɔ bwa bukkɔnɔnɛbɛ ka kɛnaang sa banaangnɛ.
47011016	Nbbal lɛlɔɔk tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk uttinanɛ ɔttɛ anaam uzingizingi. Ɔzzànga kulenɛ ning, atɔknɛnɛyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ uzingizingi gwaat gwaat, nkwaaning nyanga bwa nle nnaang kamma ntum ssup.
47011017	Kwa nlɔɔknɛ mung ba kule kwa Uyini ule ɔttɛ nlɔɔk. Ka lɔbba ’gwɔng mung, nlɔɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ uzingizingi ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
47011018	Ɔzzànga ka balɔɔt balɔk balenɛ baang ggbadam ba babbanɛ lɔbba gbɔɔgbɔɔgbɔɔ batum lilɔɔk a balɔɔt, vvenɛ nssɛ nbba ning baang.
47011019	Annyɔɔng biini asanyɔng kɔlɔɔk gaang gaang ayilayɔng bazingizingi banaang kwa kɔsaapnɛbɛ.
47011020	Ayilayɔng balɔɔt banaangwɔyɔng lilɔɔk akama. Batɔkwɔyɔng iyyɛɛp, ɔlɔk bassɛɛnwɔyɔng ka kɔlɔɔk. Bappyɛɛkwɔyɔng bbɔl-bbɔl, batupwɔyɔng labut ka lusso.
47011021	Kɔnaang izzit kiyila kɛttɛ bbwɔp linaangnɛyɛlɛ inaang lilɔɔk ’sɔng baang. Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔbbɔnɛ ɔnaang kamma utum bɔfɛɛn, anaam vvenɛ nnaang nsakmɛ. Ɔzzànga mung nlɔɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ uzingizingi.
47011022	Abbɛ balɔɔt a Hebrew ɔɔ? Anaam wa Hebrew. Abbɛ balɔɔt a Israel ɔɔ? Anaam nssɛ nle wa Israel ɔgbaa. Abbɛ balɔɔt a kikkwu Abraham ɔɔ? Anaam wa kikkwu ammɛ ɔgbaa.
47011023	Mung abbɛ ibɔɔyi a Christ ɔɔ? Appyeenɛ attɛ anaam ukun, nsakalakang anaam nlenɛ bɔɔyi wa doddo nttabɛ abbɛ. Nnaangbong kɛnaang nttabɛ abbɛ. Ntaabong ka ngbakkɔpɔ nttabɛ abbɛ. Batupnɛbong battabɛ abbɛ. Nkkɛtɛ lubbe ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ nttabɛ abbɛ.
47011024	Utii bikkpit ning kubbwɔɔk ka balɔɔt a Jews batupnɛnɛ lɔlɔp la bupyoko ɔsɛlɔlɔp.
47011025	Balɔɔt a Rome batupnɛ bikkpit bɛkkyaat. Batɔɔpnɛ lattaal kikkpit ssɔn. Ikkpaat ikkyaat issɛɛnbong la anaam ka tɔkɔlɔ. Ka kikkpit sa ssɔn ntaa kɛtɔm uwɔlɔlɔ ka tɔkɔlɔ bannyi.
47011026	Ka kɔssɛ anaam naanga ntaak ka tɔkɔlɔ ɛlɔlɔ. Bassip baggyannɛ kɛwwɔɔl. Balɔɔt a Jews la Ikanakana baggyannɛ kɛwwɔɔl. Nyɛn lubbe ka zzeen ka laffɛ, ka laffɛ. Nyɛngwɛ ka bannyi. Nyɛngwɛ ka kɛmat. Nyɛngwɛ ka bakkala-lalaak inngwa anaam ɔgbaa.
47011027	Nnaangbong kɛnaang la akama. Ntaa kwet-kwet nsi bilaa lɛlaa ka bɛtɔm ppwap. Ntaabong buwwɔɔng a bannyi la kazzi likke lɛsaal. Ɛkɛtɛ ɛlɔk bwakuzzi bwa doddo ba nyɛn nzzi. Ɛfɛɛn a kilup a lɛttɔ ba nyɛn, gɔɔ uwɔkɔlɔ wa kɛwɔkɔlɔ ka kkwɔɔt.
47011028	Ba kule kwa kɛttaal bɛfɛɛn bɛlɔk kɛgbaa. Kɛtɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ nle baang ka nnaangnɛ kɛnaang izɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ sa ɔlɔɔt usinɛnɛ kɔdda lɛdda ɔttɛ nnaang.
47011029	Ɛkɔp ɛmɛɛmnɛ ɔlɔɔt, ɛssɛ ɛmɛɛmnɛ anaam. Ɔlɔɔt ɔttɔnɛ ka bubbi, anaam ntaanɛ la akama.
47011030	Nlenɛ ka nnaangnɛ kamma, nle nnaang kamma la bɛfɛɛn bya bɛyɔɔnɛnɛ bɛttɛ nkkpɛlɛ lɔkkpɛlɛ.
47011031	Ppyɛɛ ule wa lɛkɔɔl ammɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ulenɛ abassɛ Jesus Uyini, kɛfal a kɛfal. Ammɛ ɔsannɛ ɔttɛ anaam lɛlaak ba nnaang.
47011032	Ɛkɛtɛ ndɔkɔnɛ Damascus, uzzilɛttɔ ɛkpansi wa ɔtaanɛ ubeet Aretas ka kɔtaak, uloko balɔɔt ka lamma bikkwu lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang ɔttɛ bakaanɛ.
47011033	Ɔzzánga badɔkɔ basammɛ bassɛɛn ka tɔkɔlɔ ɛsangala la kizzi, bassɛ ka lɛmma za lilenɛ ka kɛbat basininɛ baloko ka lissɛ, nmma nsɛɛm.
47012001	Vvenɛ nnaang kamma mkkpa kasi likkwoong kanaang kɔlɔk. Ɔzzànga nle nlɔɔk kwa biyɛnɛ la kɛyaala lilɔɔk sa Uyini ulenɛnɛ linnyi.
47012002	Ntii ka nkkenɛ ka ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ a Jesus Christ vvɔn ɔkaanɛ gbɔɔ gbɔɔ ɔkkyaap umii ka libat. Utii likkpa ɔsɛlɛzzil ka kɔnaangnɛ. (Ba nsan bbwak ntumkwɛ. Kɔnaang oo! kusi lɛnaang oo! Ɔdɔkɔ biyɛnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm oo! ba nsan. Ebinukkpaapi keem ɛsannɛ).
47012003	Nbbal lɛlɔɔk. Nsan lɔsan nttɛ ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔdɔkɔ ɔkkyaap umii Paradise. (Ɔzzànga ba nsan bbwak. Kɔnaangbong oo, faa biyɛnɛ Ebinukkpaapi oo, ba nsan. Annyɛ keem ɛsannɛ.)
47012004	Uppyee Lɛmmwɔɔl bakang za basinɛzɛ likkwoong bakkpɔk. Uppyee lilɔɔk sa ɔssɛbibit usinɛ likkwoong utolo.
47012005	Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ulenɛ wa nle nnaang kamma ntum. Baala nnaang kamma ntumnɛ anaam biini. Nle nnaang kamma ntum bɛfɛɛn bya bɛyɔɔnɛnɛ bɛttɛ nkkpɛlɛbong.
47012006	Nnaangnɛ kamma, anaam uzingizingi lissi, ka nle nbwɔɔlɔ lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk. Ɔzzànga kamma baala nnaang ka nsinɛ lɛggyan nttɛ ɔlɔɔt vvɔn gbɔɔ ɔyanga luttina ɔttɛ nyyɛɛp linaang, ka likkpɔk ntta tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔyɛnnɛnɛ ka zzeen uppyeenɛ ka latɔɔk.
47012007	Ebinukkpaapi ka ettinanɛ ɛttɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ nffu nnaang bisese ka bɛfɛɛn bya nlenɛ lɛyɛn, ematnɛbong kizze ka kkwɔɔt kɛtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ uyilabɔtɔɔm a Satan. Kizze ’sɔng baang kimmeepnɛ ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Nɛ ba kɛfɔngɔ ɔkkyaanɛ.
47012008	Nzɔɔm bikkpit bɛkkyaat nnyi Uyini ntum kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng. Nbwɔɔlɔmɛ nttɛ ɔnaang bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng bɛgbata bissekenɛ.
47012009	Kɛppyɛlɛ kamma ammɛ kɛdɔkɔ kile kɛttɛ, “Ppyɛɛ anaam ulenɛ bwa aggyannɛ. Lakke anaam lattanɛ lɛkkaam ka ɛkɛtɛ ya likke lɛsaalwɔnɛ.” Nggele gaang gaang ka nkpɛlɛnɛ ɔkkɔɔnɛ nsan ikkala a Christ ka kkwɔɔt anaam.
47012010	Luppyam lulenɛ bɛɛm la izzit anaam, la kɛkpɛlɛ sa nkpɛlɛnɛ la lifɔk, akama, lubbe, la bɔfɔɔp a kkwɔɔt ka lɛttɔ a Jesus. Ɛkɛtɛ ya nkpɛlɛnɛ baang ulenɛ ya nkkaamnɛ.
47012011	Nsseke ka nlɔɔknɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ukun ka lɛttɔ annyɔɔng. Annyɔɔng alenɛyɔng ba bubungunɛnɛyɔng kɛnaang. Gɔɔ mkkpa nsi bulɔk lile, bulɔk ba nsi lile ka lusso “bayilabɔtɔɔm” annyɔɔng ’bɔng baang.
47012012	Bɛmaanga bya bɛnaangnɛ bɛyɔɔ bɛttɛ anaam uyilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus, bɛdɔkɔ bɛnaang ka bɛzzɔkɔ annyɔɔng la kibbe luppyam.
47012013	Bɛnaang babbɔlwɔyɔng nang bɛtta izɔɔm ilɔk? Ka nsiwɔnɛyɔng lɛbap nttɛ ayaamnɛyɔng ɔɔ? Ellee, asɔɔknɛyɔng ka babbu linaang ’sɔng.
47012014	Uwɔng ɔnaangnɛ ka bikkpit bɛkkyaat ka nbamanɛ kiffu kikoolowɔyɔng. Ɔzzànga bulɔk wɔyɔng baala nggyan nbap. Bwɔɔntiti lissi bale bannyi ibassɛ la ibakka bwa baggyannɛ: Ibasse la ibakka bannyinɛ bwɔɔntiti bɔfɛɛn duu bwa baggyannɛ.
47012015	Vvenɛ nggele gaang gaang ntakanɛ bwa nyanganɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔgbaa la anaam biini, nkwaaning nttelewɔyɔng. Vvenɛ anaam baala nsaapwɔyɔng ka annyɔɔng asaapnɛnɛyɔng anaam gaang ɔɔ?
47012016	Vvenɛ ayila attɛyɔng akama lissi ka nyɔɔwɔnɛyɔng ɔɔ? Ɔzzànga vvenɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔttɛ nkɔɔm lagban la lalaak nfɛɛtwɔyɔng.
47012017	Nfɛɛtwɔyɔng nang? Attina attɛyɔng nlɔɔk ’kwɔng ɔkkaamnɛnɛ kwa bayilabɔtɔɔm ba ntɔɔmnɛ ɔɔ?
47012018	Nkkpenge Titus nttɛ umii. Ntɔɔmmɛ la ɔkpana ayyɔɔt wa ulenɛ bannyi lɛllɔt nttɛ bamii la ammɛ. Mung alɔɔk attɛyɔng Titus ɔkkaamnɛ kwa annyɔɔng ɔɔ? Anaam la ammɛ eleme nnyɔn la lɔtan ggwɔn lissi ka iyanganɛ ɔɔ?
47012019	Vvenɛ ale attina attɛyɔng ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ileyɛlɛ kɛyɔɔng ka kɛkkala ka lusso annyɔɔng. Ning lissi, ilɔɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Christ ulenɛyɛlɛ likke lɛssɛɛn ɔttɛ ilɔɔk ka lusso Ebinukkpaapi. Kɔlɔɔk duu kwa inaangnɛ iggyan ittɛ budoddo butaa la annyɔɔng inngwa ayyɔɔt.
47012020	Ɔbbwɔpɔnɛ lɔbbwɔpɔ nttɛ nffunɛ bakang vvenɛ nyɛnwɔyɔng ka babbu linaang ba nsinɛ lɛggyan. Annyɔɔng ɔgbaa vvenɛ ayɛnnɛyɔng la linaang sa asinɛyɔng lɛggyan. Ɔbbwɔpɔnɛ nttɛ vvenɛ nyɛn balɔɔt a kɔfɔk la banaang a luleep, la bassɔp-a-luppyam, la bassɔp a bɔfɛɛn, la babbaat a lifɔk, bassɛ lɔzzɔ, lɔbba la babbu linaang ɔkkpɛlɛ.
47012021	Ɔbbwɔpɔnɛ lɔbbwɔpɔ nttina nttɛ nffunɛ Ebinukkpaapi vvenɛ ɛnaang izzit inaangnɛ ka lusso annyɔɔng. Vvenɛ nkkwa nnyi banaang-a-bubbi ba baggbanɛ bubbi lɛnaang, bale kikup a bwanavva la babbu ikkɔlɔ lɛkkyaa bafɔngɔ.
47013001	Mung ɔnaangnɛnɛ bikkpit bɛkkyaat ka nlenɛ liffu nkoolowɔyɔng. Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, “Kɛkaal duu kɛzza kwa kamma kɛkaal ittɛɛsɛ iffa ɔlɔk ikkyaat”.
47013002	Nle ka nbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng annyɔɔng ba alenɛyɔng bubbi lɛnaang ka isimi ka isimi la balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ. Nlɔɔk kkpal ntumkwɛ ka nffunɛ nkoolowɔyɔng ka ɔssɛ-ɔttɛlɛ kiffu. Ɔzzànga vvenɛ nbbalkwɛ lɛlɔɔk ka nle nffu. Ɛkɛtɛ ya nle nppyɛlɛ nffu ɔlɔɔt wa ule ɔsɛɛm ka akama wa nle nkɔɔm nffu baala ule.
47013003	Vvenɛ ayɛnyɔng iyɔɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ ya aggyannɛyɔng ɔlɔk balɔɔt basan battɛ Christ ɔkɔɔmnɛ anaam ɔlɔɔk kɔlɔɔk. Kwa ɔnaangnɛ la annyɔɔng kɔkkpɛlɛ lissi ka ɔkkpɛlɛnɛ, ɔyɔɔ lakke ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ka kkwɔɔt annyɔɔng.
47013004	Gɔɔ mkkpa ɔdɔkɔ ule kiyila kɛbɛtɛ kɛnaangmɛnɛ bawwɔɔlmɛ ka Cross, uddubong ka lakke Ebinukkpaapi. Ayɔɔt ɔgbaa issɛ iyila kɛbɛtɛ ning baang ka ilenɛ la ammɛ. Ka ilenɛ bɔfɛɛn bbwɔn la annyɔɔng, vvenɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ issɛ iyanga kuddu ka lakke Ebinukkpaapi.
47013005	Allɛwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng, annyiwɔyɔng kibbi kɛyɔɔng, ɔlɔk asanyɔng ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn alenɛyɔng la kiyila. Asanyɔng mung attɛyɔng Christ Jesus ule baang ka tɔkɔlɔ annyɔɔng ɔɔ? Asanyɔng mung, atakanɛyɔng ka nakanaka lisi lizzeme.
47013006	Nttina nttɛ asanyɔng mung attɛyɔng ayyɔɔt ikumbong ka illɛ ’yɔng baang.
47013007	Izɔɔm innyi Ebinukkpaapi ittɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔfɔngɔ bubbi kɛnaang, nkwaaning balɔɔt bayɛn battɛ ikemebong. Kɔyyɛɛp ka anaangnɛyɔng kwa kɔyyɛɛpnɛ mkkpa balɔɔt battina battɛ ittɔbong ka illɛ.
47013008	Baala ikkwoong itunu lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk. Ile inaang kwa kɔyaamnɛgwɛ keem.
47013009	Iggele uggele ka ikpɛlɛnɛ, annyɔɔng akkaamyɔng. Issɛ ɔssɛ izɔɔm ittɛ ɔlɔk labɔɔk annyɔɔng lataa kpaladadaa.
47013010	Kwakkwɛ nlewɔnɛ luvva ’gwɔng lɛkkpɔk tɛ́ttɛ́ nffu ntaa la annyɔɔng nkwaaning ka ɛkɛtɛ ya nffunɛ ka ɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng, baala nyɔɔwɔyɔng akama. Uyini unnyinɛbong lakke za nnaangwɔnɛyɔng akkaamyɔng ɔlɔk nnyiwɔyɔng kibbi.
47013011	Ikpana anaam ataayɔng doddo. Agɔpɔlɔyɔng lakkpenge anaam ataayɔng bbwak. Ataayɔng ka bɔkaat la ba annyɔɔng. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa unnyinɛ bɔkaat la kɛsaap vvenɛ ɔtaa la annyɔɔng.
47013012	Awomowɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng la kigbugba bukpana. Balɔɔt Ebinukkpaapi ɔkkpɛlɛ bawomowɔyɔngbong.
47013013	Kiggwoom a kɔlɔɔk a Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, la kɛsaap Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la bɔkaat a Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ammɛ bibee la annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ.
48001001	Lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng lissi ka Paul wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkwɔɔmɛnɛ ɔttɛ ɔ̀zzánga uyilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus Christ. Kɛkkwɔɔ ammɛ ka ɔlɔɔt ba kissi, gɔɔ ɔlɔɔt lissi ɔnaangnɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔkkwɔɔmɛ. Ɔzzànga kissi ka Jesus Christ la abassɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ufungalamɛnɛ ka lubbe.
48001002	Ikpana ayyɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ya ilenɛ mung la anaam batoolobong la anaam itɔɔm luwomo ifee izɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ ya ilenɛ ka Galatia.
48001003	Numa Dedde ayyɔɔt, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, la Jesus Christ, Uyini, bannyiwɔyɔng lakke la bɔkaat.
48001004	Christ ɔsammɛbong kɛyɔɔng unnyi ka bubbi ayyɔɔt, ka latele a Dedde ayyɔɔt, Ebinukkpaapi, ɔttɛ nkwaaning itta ka bubbi bɛtɔm ’byɔng mung.
48001005	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ wa latele kɛfal a kɛfal. Kule ning.
48001006	Akɛɛlɛnɛ yɔng gaang gaang! Appyɛɛ agbatayɔng like like ning assekemɛyɔng ammɛ wa ɔkkwɔɔwɔnɛyɔng ka likke a Christ appyɛɛ amii akupyɔng kuttu budoddo kɔlɔk.
48001007	Ka lɔkkwɔɔn, kuttu budoddo kɔlɔk ba kule. Ɔzzànga nlɔɔk ’kwɔng ka balɔɔt balɔk balenɛ baang ba babumnɛ kisikiliwɔyɔng ippyam, babum kifoolo kuttu budoddo a Christ bagbaa.
48001008	Gɔɔ mkkpa uleyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt mung, ɔ̀ppyɛ́ɛ ule uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ussinɛ ka libat, ukopolowɔnɛyɔng kuttu budoddo kwa kulenɛ zzekep la kwa ayyɔɔt ikopolowɔnɛyɔng, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ule wa kɛfɔɔp ka lɔkɔɔn.
48001009	Ilɔɔkbongkwɛ kkpal tɛ, ɔzzanga gedegede mung nle ka nbbalnɛkwɛ lɛlɔɔk. Ɔlɔt ɔlɔk ukopolowɔnɛyɔng kuttu budoddo kwa kulenɛ zzekep la kwa ayyɔɔt ilewɔnɛyɔng likopolo, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ule wa kɛfɔɔp ka lɔkɔɔn.
48001010	Mung nkwɔng kɔbal mung tɛ̀ttɛ̀ nlenɛ ka lubum nttɛ kɔsaap balɔɔt ɔɔ? Maaye kpongkpong! Nggyan nttɛ kɔsaap Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Mung nle ka kibum nttɛ balɔɔt basannɛ ɔɔ? Butiinɛ ka nbumnɛ nttɛ balɔɔt basannɛ nzang bɔɔyi a Christ ba nle.
48001011	Fɔngɔyɔngbong ssii nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng ikpana anaam; Kuttu-Budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kwa nkopolowɔnɛyɔng mung ka ɔlɔɔt ba kussi.
48001012	Nsikwɛ lɛtɔk ka ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk. Gɔɔ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk usinɛ kwɛ likopolo. Jesus Christ biini uwongolonɛkwɛ pwool ɔyɔɔnɛ.
48001013	Babwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ nyɔɔnɛ luzɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm akama lusinɛ lɛttɔ libbe. Nbum gaang gaang nttɛ ntakagwɛ.
48001014	Ndɔkɔ nyanga kiyila gaang gaang ka eleme balɔɔt ayyɔɔt ba iyɛddɛ iyɛddɛ ntta bayyɔɔt-uggba.
48001015	Ɔzzànga ka kiggwoom a kɔlɔɔk ammɛ la lakke, ɔsanganɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ bamaatnɛ ɔttɛ nnaang kɛnaang ammɛ. Ka ɛkɛtɛ ya ɔnaangnɛ luttina
48001016	ɔttɛ ɔnaangnɛ nsan waan ammɛ nkwaaning nkopolo Kuttu-Budoddo ammɛ nbwɔɔlɔ Ikanakana, nsi ka ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk limii ɔbbanɛ bikɔɔm.
48001017	Gɔɔ Jerusalem nsi limii kɛyɛn a balɔɔt ba baggbanɛ bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus lile tɛ́ttɛ́ anaam nle. Lutini ’gwɔng nfeele eseese nmii Arabia, nppyɛlɛnɛ nmii Damascus.
48001018	Likkpa likkyaat lisaknɛ nmii Jerusalem kippyee kɔlɔɔk ka kamma Peter. Ntaa la ammɛ ka bɛtɔm ɔsɛlɛzzil.
48001019	Uyilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus ɔlɔk nsi lɛyɛn ɔgbaa la James, ɔkpana Uyini.
48001020	Kwa nkkpɔknɛ kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsan lɔsan ɔttɛ lɛlaak ba nkkala.
48001021	Ɔttɛ ɔnaang nmii ka ifɛɛn ya ilenɛ ka Syria la Cilicia.
48001022	Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang, balɔɔt a luzɔɔm ba balenɛ ka izɔɔm ka Judaea basinɛ anaam biini lɛsan.
48001023	Basan kwa balɔɔt balɔk balɔɔknɛ keem battɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtaanɛ ɔyɔɔyɛlɛ akama, gedegede mung ammɛ ussekenɛ ka ukopolonɛyɛlɛ utum kiyila sa ubumnɛ kɛbɛpɛ!”
48001024	Keem babungu Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kwa anaam.
48002001	Likkpa ɔsɛlɛzzil lisaknɛ, nppyɛlɛ nmii Jerusalem la Barnabas, Titus ɔssɛ umii la anaam ɔgbaa.
48002002	Nmii ka Ebinukkpaapi ɛttɛnɛ nmii. Nbwɔɔlɔbɛ ka likup la bazzilɛttɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ nkopolonɛ Ikanakana kuttu-budoddo. Nsi lɛggyan nttɛ kɛnaang anaam ka kissinɛ ka isimi ka isimi la gedegede mung kɛttɔ gbɔɔ kɛtaak.
48002003	Ɛnngwa anaam ya ɛzzanganɛ Titus nkkpa ndɔk ule wa Greek, basimɛ litut kɛzza lɛtaa.
48002004	Balɔɔt Balɔk badɔkɔ baggyan battɛ ɔzzazɛ. Abbɛ balenɛ ba babɔɔlnɛ bafula ka kɛkaan ayyɔɔt basseke bagbɛɛk-a-lɔgbɛɛk babbwa battɛ abbɛ bassɛ bayanga kiyila tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ayyɔɔt. Ning banaang nkwaaning bakɔɔlɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔkkyaanɛyɛlɛ ɔffɔ ka ilenɛ ka bɔkaat la Christ Jesus. Badɔkɔ baggyan battɛ bakɔɔmyɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ babili.
48002005	Isibɛ lɛfɔngɔ babɛtɛyɛlɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ nnyɔn gbɔɔ ffet. Inaang ning baang ɔkkɔɔnɛ lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk a kuttu-budoddo a Jesus Christ lɔtaawɔyɔng.
48002006	Ɔzzànga kwa balɔɔt ba bappyɛɛknɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bazzilɛttɔ—Nlɔɔk ka nsinɛ kifoolo linaang kɛlɔk lɛyɛn. Ebinukkpaapi linaang ɔlɔɔt ba effik. — Bazzilɛttɔ ’bɔng baang luttina lɔlɔk basimɛ linnyi.
48002007	Ɔzzànga kɔyɛn bayɛnbong basan battɛ Ebinukkpaapi ennyinɛbong kikopolo Ikanakana kuttu-budoddo a Christ, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɛnnyinɛ Peter lakke za kikopolo balɔɔt a Jews lɛmmwɔɔl annyɛ.
48002008	Kussi ka lakke Ebinukkpaapi tɛ́ttɛ́ nzzanga Uyilabɔtɔɔm wa Jesus ɔtɔɔmnɛ ufee Ikanakana tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Peter ɔdɔkɔnɛ wa balɔɔt a Jews.
48002009	James, Peter la John ba badɔkɔnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bazzilɛttɔ, basan lɔsan battɛ Ebinukkpaapi ennyinɛbong likke ’zɔng baan zzekep. Ɔzzángá batɔkyɛlɛ labɔɔk la Barnabas ka ilenɛ balɔɔt a kɔssɛ kkwɔn. Ayyɔɔt iyila kamma kɛnaang a kɛnaang ka Ikanakana. Abbɛ bayila kamma kɛnaang a kɛnaang ka ɛfɛɛn a balɔɔt a Jews.
48002010	Bwa babapnɛ ɔdɔkɔ kɛttɛ ikke balɔɔt ba ɔbbɔlnɛbɛ ka kɛkaan abbɛ. Akkwɛ kulenɛ kwa nggbanɛ lissi nbum kɛnaang ka isimi ka isimi.
48002011	Ɔzzánga Peter uffunɛ ka Antioch, nfim kwa utolonɛ ka lusso balɔɔt ka usinɛ bbwak lile.
48002012	Peter ɔdɔkɔ ka kazzi la ikpana ayyɔɔt Ikanakana, ka balɔɔt ba James ɔtɔɔmnɛ baffɔnɛ. Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang baffɔnɛ, ammɛ Peter kazzi kattunmɛ la Ikanakana. Ɔttɔm ɔppyɛlɛ isimi-simi. Ɔbbwɔpɔmɛ ka ɔyɛnnɛ balɔɔt ba bayilanɛ battɛ Ikanakana babɛkɛ lɛtaa.
48002013	Ikpana ayyɔɔt balɔk ba Jews basseke ka banaangnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ babbwɔp gbaak la Peter. Gɔɔ Barnabas ɔssɛ ukupbɛ ka linaang a bbwɔp abbɛ.
48002014	Nyɛnnɛ nttɛ bbwak ba bassɛ bakup lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk a lukopolo kuttu budoddo, nlɔɔk la Peter ka lusso abbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ nttɛ, “Annɔ wa Jews, ɔzzànga anaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ wa akanakana, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ wa Jews ba anaang. Mung ale anaang nang vvenɛ anaang Ikanakana bataa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt a Jews?”
48002015	Kule kule ayyɔɔt balɔɔt a Jews pputup, ayyɔɔt “Ikanakana banaang a bubbi” tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bakkwɔɔnɛbɛ lissi.
48002016	Ɔzzànga isan mung ittɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔtaa bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka kiyila kwa Awaan, Jesus Christ, kɛnaang a kwa Lafɔɔ laggyannɛ lissi. Ayyɔɔt ɔgbaa iyangabong kiyila itum Christ Jesus nkwaaning itaa bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Kwa kɛnaang kwa Lafɔɔ laggyannɛ lissi. Ɔlɔɔt wa ukkwoongnɛ ɔtaa bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ɔnaangnɛ kwa Lafɔɔ laggyannɛ ba ule.
48002017	Bayɛnnɛ battɛ ayyɔɔt issɛ ile banaang-a-bubbi tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ikanakana ka ilenɛ ka kɛggyan a ɛtɔk a kɛtaa bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka kiyila kwa Awaan Jesus Christ, vvenɛ kule kɔttɛ Christ uyilabɔtɔɔm a bubbi ɔɔ? Ning lissi kpong kpong!
48002018	Nppyɛlɛnɛ nlɔngɔlɔ kɛssanga lafɔɔ za nlenɛ lɛbɛpɛ, nzang nyɔɔnɛbong kɛyɔɔng nttɛ anaam nlenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔbɛpɛnɛzɛ.
48002019	Ka ulenɛ kɔlɔɔk a Lafɔɔ, nbbebong. Lafɔɔ biini lawwɔɔlnɛnɛ ɔkkɔɔnɛ nnaang kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyannɛ. Bawwɔɔlnɛbong batoolo la Christ ka Cross,
48002020	ɔkkɔɔnɛ usinɛ anaam lile nddunɛ mung. Usseke Christ ka ulenɛ ka kuddu ka tɔkɔlɔ anaam. Kuddu kwa nddunɛ mung, nddu ka nyilanɛ kwa Waan Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa nsaapmɛnɛ ɔsam lɛfal ammɛ unnyi kwa anaam.
48002021	Lɛsɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba nfim. Ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn a kussinɛ ka Lafɔɔ ɔlɔɔt ɔtaa bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔzzànga nzang lubbe a Christ ubbebong gbɔɔ.
48003001	Annyɔɔng bazingizingi balɔɔt a Galatia ’bɔng! Nyinɛ ɔmanawɔnɛyɔng? Ayɛnyɔngbong Jesus Christ kkpelegedee ka zzeen annyɔɔng ka ubbenɛ ka Cross!
48003002	Abwɔɔlɔnɛyɔng kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng mung kkwɔn. Adɔkɔ atɔkyɔng Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka anaangnɛyɔng bwa Lafɔɔ laggyannɛ faa ka appyeenɛyɔng, ayilayɔng kwa kuttu-budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔlɔɔknɛ?
48003003	Anaang nang anaangnɛyɔng kizingizingi ning! Adɔkɔ atteyɔng la Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, mung aggyan attɛ appyɛɛ akɔɔmyɔng lakke za annyɔɔng akeeleyɔng ɔɔ?
48003004	Kwa alenɛyɔng lɛsan ɔkkpɛlɛ mung ka bulɔk ba kɔffɔ ɔɔ? Ka lɔkkwɔɔn, kɔffɔ mung.
48003005	Mung Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyiwɔyɔng Kuyeeng ammɛ, ɔnaang bɛmaanga ka annyɔɔng ka anaangnɛyɔng kwa Lafɔɔ laggyannɛ faa ka appyeenɛyɔng, ayilayɔng kuttu-budoddo ammɛ?
48003006	Attinayɔng kwa luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lutum Abraham. Lɔttɛ, “Uyila kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Kussi kwakkwɛ baang Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔkmɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt wa bbwak.”
48003007	Asan attɛyɔng balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ kiyila balenɛ balɔɔt ba kikkwu Abraham ba lɔkkwɔɔn.
48003008	Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔggba lɛyɛn lɔlɔɔk lɔttɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ uloko Ikanakana bbwak la ammɛ biini ka kiyila. Kwakkwɛ luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔggbanɛ Abraham Kuttu-Budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛbwɔɔlɔ tɛ́ttɛ́ ɛkɛtɛ ɛffɔ. Lɔttɛ, “Kule kussi ka lɛttɔ annɔ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaang Ɔssɛbibit ɔkkpɛlɛ ppyɛɛ.”
48003009	Abraham uyila kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangmɛ ppyɛɛ. Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ bayilanɛ kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, vvenɛ ɔssɛ ɔnaangbɛ ppyɛɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Abraham.
48003010	Balɔɔt ba kɔbɛtɛnɛbɛ ka kitele lafɔɔ bale ka akama. Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt duu wa usinɛ kwa bakkpɔknɛ ka luvva Lafɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm litele vvenɛ ɔyɛn akama.”
48003011	Kutii ppwool, Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtaanɛ bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ulokonɛ Lafɔɔ ba ule. Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔkbong lɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔtaanɛ bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ɔyanganɛ kiyila vvenɛ uddu.”
48003012	Ɔzzànga Lafɔɔ ka kiyila ba lale. Lutini ’gwɔng lale tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔnaangnɛ duu bwa Lafɔɔ lalɔɔknɛ ule uddu kwa azzɛ.”
48003013	Ɔzzànga Christ ɔsangabongyɛlɛ ka nzɔɔm wa Lafɔɔ lafeenɛyɛlɛ (ka ɔyɛnnɛ akama ka lɛttɔ ayyɔɔt) tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt wa bazzengemɛnɛ ka kɛssɛ ɔttɔbong ka nzɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
48003014	Christ ɔnaang ’kwɔng nkwaaning ppyɛɛ wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛnɛ vvenɛ ɔnaang Abraham, ɔssɛ ɔnaang Ikanakana ka lɛttɔ a Jesus Christ, nkwaaning ikɔɔm kiyila iyanga Kuyeeng kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usekelenɛ.
48003015	Ikpana anaam nle ka nkɔɔmnɛ kɔlɔɔk kwa kɔnaangnɛ la kɛtɔm la kɛtɔm nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng. Balɔɔt baffa bayilanɛ ka kɔlɔɔk, babɛtɛ kɛnnɔ, ɔlɔɔt wa ukkwoongnɛ ɔbɛpɛ kɛbɛtɛ kɛnnɔ ’sɔng baang ba ɔbɛlɛ lile, gɔɔ kɛgbaa bɔfɛɛn ka assɛ.
48003016	Ebinukkpaapi ɛnaang nsekele la Abraham la ɔlɔɔt a kikkwu ammɛ. Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba lɔlɔɔk lɔttɛ, “Balɔɔt a kikkwu annɔ.” Ning baang ulenɛ kɛttɛ la balɔɔt ggbadam. Lɔlɔɔk lɔttɛ, “La ɔlɔɔt a kikkwu annɔ” ning baang ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt vvɔn keem; ammɛ ulenɛ Christ.
48003017	Kwa nlɔɔknɛ ulenɛ ’kwɔng: Ebinukkpaapi ɛbɛtɛ kɛnnɔ la Abraham ɛttɛ vvenɛ ɛnaang kwa ɛlɔɔknɛ. Lafɔɔ za lassinɛ ka nnɔ la lɔlɔp la likkpa zzɔɔp baala lakkwong labɛpɛ kɛbɛtɛ-kɛnnɔ sa Ebinukkpaapi elenɛ lɛbɛtɛ.
48003018	Bɔfɛɛn bwa Ebinukkpaapi ennyinɛ bussinɛ ka Lafɔɔ, busibong ka nsekele Ebinukkpaapi lɛbɛlɛ lissi. Kɔdɔkɔ ning baang Ebinukkpaapi ɛnaang nsekele ’wɔng baang ɛtɔk ennyi Abraham.
48003019	Lafɔɔ ladɔkɔ laggyan ’bɔng? Bassɛɛn Lafɔɔ nkwaaning basan kɔlɔɔk kwa kulenɛ ubbu kɔlɔɔk. Bassɛɛn battɛ lataa Lafɔɔ ka ɛkɛtɛ ɔlɔɔt a kikkwu Abraham wa Ebinukkpaapi ɛnaangnɛ nsekele kwa ammɛ ule uffu. Ebinukkpaapi ɛsam Lafɔɔ ennyi bayilabɔtɔɔm annyɛ. Bayilabɔtɔɔm Ebinukkpaapi basamzɛ bafee Moses kuttɔɔk. Ammɛ ɔtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔssɛ-bukkpɔ.
48003020	Ɔzzànga ɔssɛ-bukkpɔ baala ka kinnyi nsekele ka ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt vvɔn, Ebinukkpaapi ele nnyɔn keem.
48003021	Baang attina attɛ Lafɔɔ kutunzɛ lutun ka nsekele wa Ebinukkpaapi ɛnaangnɛ ɔɔ? Maaye! Ning baang lissi. Ɔssɛbibit butɔknɛ lifɔɔ za likɔɔmnɛ kuddu liffu nzang ɔlɔɔt ukkwoong mung ɔtaa bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka utelenɛ Lafɔɔ.
48003022	Ɔzzàngà luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔkbong lɔttɛ ɛkpansi ɔkkpɛlɛ esseke ya lakke bubbi, nkwaaning lɛsɔɔk za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usekelenɛ kinnyi balɔɔt kwa Jesus Christ, basam bannyi balɔɔt ba bayilanɛ kwa Jesus Christ.
48003023	Bong tɛ́ttɛ́ ɛkɛtɛ kiyila effu, idɔkɔ itii ka Lafɔɔ lasamnɛyɛlɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ lassɛɛn ka ggwoon tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt a igbakkɔpɔ tɔttɔt kɔlɔɔk a kiyila sa kile ka kiffunɛ kutuma.
48003024	Ɔzzánga idɔkɔ ile ba Lafɔɔ lakɔɔmnɛyɛlɛ tɔttɔt Christ uffu nkwaaning itaa bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka kɛyanga kiyila.
48003025	Gedegede mung ɛkɛtɛ kiyila etii mung. Lafɔɔ lakke ba labɛlɛ lɛyanga la ayyɔɔt.
48003026	Kussi ka kiyila ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng azzangayɔng bwaan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka bɔkaat annyɔɔng la Christ Jesus.
48003027	Adɔkɔ anaangyɔng baptizim ka bɔkaat la Christ. Mung atɔkyɔngbong ileme ammɛ ayangayɔng.
48003028	Ɔzzànga balɔɔt a Jews buubuu ba babɛlɛ lile la Ikanakana. Babili buu ba babɛlɛ lile la balɔɔt ba basinɛ babili lile. Bwaanbwalam buu ba babɛlɛ lile la bwanavva. Ɔkkpɛlɛ assekeyɔng ikɛlɛlɛ ka bɔkaat la Jesus.
48003029	Alenɛyɔng ba Christ, ɔzzànga nzang aleyɔng balɔɔt a kikkwu Abraham. Vvenɛ ayangayɔng etini ka bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ lisekele.
48004001	Nttɛ waanawalam duu wa ule uzzi kazzi kullu bɛfɛɛn abassɛ, bale bakɔɔmmɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ubili ka utiinɛ waan, mkkpa bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bile bya ammɛ.
48004002	Ka utiinɛ waan, balɔɔt bale baang ba bappyɛɛkmɛnɛ, banaang bɛfɛɛn bakkalamɛ ɔddɔkɔddɔkɔ ɔffɔ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya abassɛ ɔlɔɔknɛ uloko.
48004003	Ayyɔɔt ɔgbaa idɔkɔ ile babili ilat ikɔɔmnɛ ka vveengodde, tɛ́ttɛ́ uffu ɔffɔ ka ɛkɛtɛ isannɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka bbwak.
48004004	Ɔzzánga ɛkɛtɛ ya bbwak ɛffɔnɛ, Ebinukkpaapi ɛtɔɔm Waan annyɛ uffu tɛ̀ttɛ̀ waan wa ɔlɔɔt ɔmaatnɛ, ɔtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Lafɔɔ balɔɔt a Jews lalɔɔknɛ.
48004005	Lattɛ uffu ɔttɛ ɔkkala balɔɔt ba balenɛ ka Lafɔɔ lɛttɔ, nkwaaning ɔkkpɛlɛ izzangayɔng bwaan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
48004006	Ka ɛggyannɛ ɛttɛ isan ittɛ annyɔɔng bwaan annyɛ, Ebinukkpaapi ɛtɔɔm Kuyeeng a Waan annyɛ gwa lɔkkwanɛ lɔttɛ, “Dedde, Dedde anaam” luffu ka ippyam ayyɔɔt.
48004007	Kwakkwɛ baang asinɛyɔng babili lɛbɛlɛ lile, assekeyɔng bwaan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ka alenɛyɔng bwaan annyɛ, Ebinukkpaapi vvenɛ ennyiwɔyɔng bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya ɛyanganɛ eloko bwɔɔn annyɛ.
48004008	Ka isimi ka isimi, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba asanyɔng. Kwakkwɛ adɔkɔnɛyɔng ka bubili bɛfɛɛn bya bisinɛ bya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lile.
48004009	Ngkka gedegede mung ka alenɛyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛsan (Nlɔɔk nttɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulewɔnɛyɔng lɛsan) mbɔng ale ka appyɛɛnɛ anaangwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng babili a iwikiwiki liyeeng ’sɔng baang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ adɔkɔnɛ aleyɔng? Bubili assɛ abbalyɔng mbɔng lɛggyan?
48004010	Ateleyɔng zzeen ka bɛtɔm la ittina la laggbeel a kukkpa la likkpa biini.
48004011	Luppyam lɔzzanɛ lɔzza lɔsak kwa annyɔɔng. Ɔzzánga kɛnaang anaam nnaangnɛ kɛttɔbong gbɔɔ kɛtaak ɔɔ?
48004012	Nkkpengewɔyɔng lukkpenge, ikpana anaam, anaangyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ anaam nnaangnɛ. Uvve kaang anaam nle tɛ̀ttɛ̀ annyɔɔng. Bulɔk bwa bubbɔlnɛ ba ataka anaangyɔng.
48004013	Akke asan attɛyɔng ɔdɔkɔ iffaak inaangnɛnɛ nkopolowɔyɔng kuttu-budoddo ka ikeeng ikeeng tɛ!
48004014	Ɔzzànga asinɛyɔng lɛggba, gɔɔ kɛwɔlɔnɛ gbɔɔ mkkpa iffaak anaam idɔkɔ ile ya ballɛwɔnɛyɔng. Lutini ’gwɔng atɔknɛyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ butɔknɛ uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Atɔknɛyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ butɔknɛyɔng Christ Jesus.
