48004015	Adɔkɔ aleyɔng ka laggele gaang gaang, ’bɔng bunaangnɛ? Nkkwoong mung nlɔɔk nttɛ bukkwoongnɛ asangayɔng zzeen annyɔɔng nzang asangayɔngbong annyinɛyɔng.
48004016	Ngkka mung ba ntaka nsseke ɔlɔɔt kɔfɔk annyɔɔng ka nbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk ɔɔ?
48004017	Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bayɔɔ kɛsaap gaang gaang ka kkwɔɔt annyɔɔng. Ɔzzànga ittina abbɛ ba iyyɛɛp. Baggyan battɛ basamwɔyɔng bagbata bassekenɛ, ɔkkɔɔnɛ kɔssɛ kɔbɛtɛwɔyɔng kwa abbɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ abbɛ kɔbɛtɛnɛbɛ kwa annyɔɔng.
48004018	Kɔyyɛɛp mung ka ayanganɛyɔng ittina ya doddo atumyɔng kɔlɔɔk kwa kɔyyɛɛpnɛ. Nkwɔng mung kulenɛ bbwak kɔ̀yyɛ́ɛ̀p ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ɛkɛtɛ ya nlenɛ la annyɔɔng keem lissi.
48004019	Bwaan anaam! Assɔpnɛyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔssɔpnɛ wanavva wa ulenɛ ka kɛppwɔlɔ imala. Gedegede mung nttina uttina ntumwɔyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ abakka ɔlɔɔt uttinanɛ utum waan ammɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ lɛmaat. Akama ɔnaangnɛ gaang ntumwɔyɔng tɔttɔt ɔffɔ ɛkɛtɛ atɔknɛyɔng lɛfal a Christ assɛɛnyɔng ka luppyam.
48004020	Bɔng baang nsinɛ la annyɔɔng lile gedegede mung ɔlɔk nfoolo eleme ɛlɔk nppyɛɛkwɔyɔng. Nttina kwa annyɔɔng gaang gaang.
48004021	Fɔngɔbong nbapwɔyɔng annyɔɔng ba attɛnɛ aleyɔng ba Lafɔɔ: Ba ataka appyeeyɔng bwa Lafɔɔ lalɔɔknɛ ɔɔ?
48004022	Lafɔɔ lalɔɔk lattɛ Abraham ɔyanga bwɔɔn baffa. Vvɔn ubili ammɛ wa wanavva ɔmaatnɛ. Wa vvɔn wanavva ammɛ wa usinɛ ubili lile ɔmaatnɛ.
48004023	Waan ammɛ wa ubili ɔmaatnɛ bamaatmɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bamaatnɛ bwɔɔn ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ɔzzànga waan ammɛ wa wanavva ammɛ wa usinɛ ubili lile ɔmaatnɛ, bamaatmɛ ka nsekele wa Ebinukkpaapi elene lɛnaang.
48004024	Nkwɔng mung kulenɛ ifɛɛt: Bwanavva ’bɔng baang baffa balenɛ isekele iffa. Wanavva wa ulenɛ ubili ɔmaat bwɔɔn ulenɛ Hagar. Ammɛ ɔtaanɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛbɛtɛ-kɛnnɔ sa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔbɛtɛnɛ ka lɛttaal a Sinai.
48004025	Hagar, wa ɔtaanɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɛttaal a Sinai za ka Arabia, ulenɛ lɛffɛ a Jerusalem gedegede mung. Kwakkwɛ lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ balenɛ babili.
48004026	Ɔzzànga Jerusalem wa ulenɛ ka libat ka bubili ba ule. Ammɛ ulenɛ ɛnɛ ayyɔɔt.
48004027	Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, “Wanavva wa ɔtakanɛ bwɔɔn lɛmaat uggele. Abungu la laggele ka atakanɛ bɔssɔp a lɛmaat lippyee. Wanavva wa ulenɛ buyya vvenɛ ɔmaat bwɔɔn ɔgbaa ɔtta wanavva wa ulenɛ ka ssala walam ka ullenɛ.”
48004028	Gedegede mung, ikpana anaam, assekeyɔng bwɔɔn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Isaac ɔdɔkɔnɛ, ɔssanga ka nsekele wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ lɛnaang.
48004029	Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang, waan wa badɔkɔnɛ bamaat tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bamaatnɛ bwɔɔn ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔyɔɔ wa bamaatnɛ ka Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm akama. Kule kɛssanga ssɔn gedegede mung.
48004030	Mung luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔk nang? Lɔlɔɔk lɔttɛ, “Asamyɔng ubili wa wanavva la waan ammɛ azzɔɔkyɔng. Waan wa ubili wa ulenɛ wanavva ɔmaatnɛ, bɛfɛɛn abassɛ baala utul uzzi la waan wa abakka ammɛ usinɛ ubili lile.”
48004031	Ikpana anaam, ayyɔɔt bwɔɔn a wanavva ubili ba ile. Wanavva wa usinɛ ubili lile ɔmaatnɛyɛlɛ.
48005001	Kɛtta ka kɔlɔɔk ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn bwa iyanganɛ. Christ ɔsangabongyɛlɛ ka kɔlɔɔk. Abeeyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt ba balenɛ ka kɔlɔɔk lɛtta, tɛ̀ttɛ́ abɛlɛwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng lɛfɔngɔ abbalyɔng babili lile.
48005002	Gɔpɔlɔyɔng! Anaam Paul nbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng ’kwɔng: Afɔngɔnɛ babɛkɛwɔyɔng lataa, nzang Christ ka bulɔk mɛyɔng ba atɔkyɔng kpong-kpong.
48005003	Nbbalwɔyɔng lɛttama! Ɔlɔɔt duu wa batutmɛnɛ uyila ɔzza lɛtaa usseke wa utelenɛ Lafɔɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
48005004	Annyɔɔng balɔɔt balɔk ba abumnɛ attɛ ataayɔng bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka atelenɛyɔng Lafɔɔ, azzawɔyɔngbong kɛyɔɔng assekeyɔng Christ, attayɔng ka ppyɛɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
48005005	Ka kwa ayyɔɔt, luttina ayyɔɔt lule lɔttɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ulokoyɛlɛ bbwak la ammɛ. Uwɔng mung ulenɛ bwa ikatnɛ ka lakke Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm za lalenɛ ka kɛnaang ka kiyila ayyɔɔt.
48005006	Ka ilenɛ ka bɔkaat la Christ Jesus, kɛbɛkɛ lɛtaa la kisi lɛtaa lɛbɛkɛ buubuu ba bile. Kwa kɔttanɛ ulenɛ kiyila sa kɛssɛnɛ la kɛsaap.
48005007	Adɔkɔ anaangyɔng doddo. Nnyinɔɔng ɔnaangwɔnɛyɔng asiyɔng lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk lɛbɛlɛ litele? Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔdɔkɔ ɔfɛɛtwɔyɔng nang?
48005008	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔkkwɔɔwɔnɛyɔng lissi ɔnaangnɛ kwɛ.
48005009	Kɔtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔknɛ battɛ, “Bwaan-izuku a yeast ssup ning bɛnaangnɛ ugɔngɔ a brɛɛd ɔkkpɛlɛ ammɛ utum.”
48005010	Ɔzzànga ntii baang ka nttinanɛ ntumwɔyɔng. Bɔkaat ayyɔɔt la Christ bunaangnɛnɛ nyanga kiyila nttɛ baala asikiliyɔng luttina. Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang wa ɔggyanwɔnɛyɔng kisikili luttina, mkkpa ule ɔlɔɔt wa ule, wa ule vvenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyɔɔmɛ akama.
48005011	Ikpana anaam, ka kwa anaam, ntiinɛ baang ka nbwɔɔlɔnɛ nttɛ kɛzza lɛtaa kɛyyɛɛppɔyyɛɛp, akama bayɔɔnɛ kwa ’bɔng? Nkwɔng baang budɔkɔnɛ ka lɔkkwɔɔn, nzang lukopolo anaam gwa lutumnɛ Cross a Christ kɔlɔɔk baala lɔggyan.
48005012	Nggyan nttɛ balɔɔt ba baggyanwɔnɛyɔng kɛbɛpɛ ippyam baang ɔkkaambɛ. Battɛnɛ bale ka bafaatnɛ idakɔp ya abbɛ kɛyɔɔng, bafaat.
48005013	Ikpana anaam ka kwa annyɔɔng, badɔkɔ bakkwɔɔwɔyɔng battɛ attayɔng ka kɔlɔɔk. Ɔzzànga tɛ̀ttɛ́ afɔngɔyɔng kɛtta ka kɔlɔɔk ’sɔng mung kile bɔfɛɛn a luteele gwa afɔngɔnɛyɔng iyyɛɛp a vveeng ikkwɔɔwɔyɔng. Lutini ’gwɔng afɔngɔyɔng kɛsaap kɛnaangwɔyɔng ateleyɔng wannyɔɔng.
48005014	Lafɔɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ azzɛ lale ka tɔkɔlɔ lifɔɔ zzɔn za lɛttɛnɛ, “Wannyɔɔng ɔsaapwɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ asaapwɔnɛ kɛyɔɔng.”
48005015	Ɔzzànga anaangnɛyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ isɛɛn ka kɛmat, addopoyɔng bannyɔɔng, akatyɔng nzang vvenɛ awwɔɔlyɔng ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn ɔkkpɛlɛ.
48005016	Nkwɔng kulenɛ kwa nlɔɔknɛ nttɛ afɔngɔyɔng Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔkɔɔm lafal annyɔɔng. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ anaangyɔng bɛfɛɛn bya lafal annyɔɔng laggyannɛ.
48005017	Kwa lɛfal ɔlɔɔt lɛggyannɛ, Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba kɔggyan. Kwa Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔggyannɛ, lɛfal ɔlɔɔt ba lɛggyan. Bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng baang bɛffa bile ka kɔfɔk. Ning ulenɛ kɛttɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ anaangyɔng bwa lɛfal annyɔɔng laggyannɛ lɛttɛ anaangyɔng.
48005018	Ulenɛ Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔkɔɔmwɔnɛyɔng, nzang annyɔɔng babili Lafɔɔ lissi.
48005019	Kɔlɔɔk kwa lɛfal ɔlɔɔt lɛnaangnɛ kule kkpelegedee, lɛyɔɔzɛ kɛyɔɔng ka ɛtɔk a kɛssɛ-kɛzak la linaang a isɛɛn a kɛmat.
48005020	Lɛyɔɔzɛ kɛyɔɔng ka ɛtɔk a kɛzɔɔm kinnyi ilat la litaan. Balɔɔt basseke lifɔk a lifɔk. Bakɔɔm ballu, banaang babbɛ ileep, kɔkɔɔm kutunbɛ la kɛnaang a lilɔɔk ka lakke. Babɛngɛlɛbɛ kɛyɔɔng basseke lakup lakup.
48005021	Bale banaang-a-luleep. bavva batak babimi. Bamini la bwanavva kyaakyaa. Ɔzzànga gedegede mung nbbalwɔyɔngbong lɛttama tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ndɔkɔnɛ nttamawɔyɔng. Balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng baang ba Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm basibong lile.
48005022	Ɔzzànga Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kunnyiyɛlɛ kɛsaap la laggele la bɔkaat, la kibbe luppyam, la kibbe lɛttɔ, la budoddo kɛyyɛɛp a bɛnaang.
48005023	La bukee-waan ɔbɛtɛ la kɛkɔɔm a kɛyɔɔng. Lafɔɔ za lattɛnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ anaang bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng bya Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kunnyinɛ ba lale.
48005024	Balɔɔt ba balenɛ ba Christ Jesus basambong lafal abbɛ la ittina abbɛ ya ibbɔlnɛ bannyi lubbe.
48005025	Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kunnyibongyɛlɛ lafal. Mkkpa kɔnaang vvenɛ kɔkɔɔm lafal ayyɔɔt.
48005026	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ inaang bisese ka nakanaka, ɔlɔk vvenɛ inaang kwa kɔssɔpnɛ wayyɔɔt, ɔlɔk vvenɛ inaang wayyɔɔt luleep.
48006001	Ikpana anaam, bakaanɛ ɔlɔɔt ka ɔnaangnɛ kɛssanga kɔlɔɔk sa kisinɛ lɛyyɛɛp, annyɔɔng ’bɔng baang ba alenɛyɔng ba Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ale abbamɛyɔng bikɔɔm ka kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng baang. Ɔzzànga anaangyɔngkwɛ ka latele. Akatwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng tɛ̀ttɛ́ affu assɛ attɔyɔng ka kɔlɔɔk ɔgbaa.
48006002	Attele wannyɔɔng ɔtɔkɔ lɛtɔkɔ ammɛ. Anaangnɛ ning baang ka ɛtɔk ’yɔng, atelebong lafɔɔ a Christ.
48006003	Ɔlɔɔt uttinamɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng ɔttɛ ammɛ ɔlɔɔt ka lɔkkwɔɔn ka usinɛ bulɔk lile, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔkpɛnmɛ kɛyɔɔng.
48006004	Ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn uffik linaang ammɛ kɛyɔɔng. Ulenɛ ka linaang ammɛ liyyɛɛpnɛ ɔkkyaamɛ ka kwa ammɛ biini. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔsam ɔkakala la linaang sa ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔnaangnɛ, vvenɛ ɔttɛ sa ammɛ biini littanɛ lɛyyɛɛp.
48006005	Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ule ɔtɔkɔ lɛtɔkɔ za lilenɛ za ammɛ.
48006006	Ɔlɔɔt wa balemɛnɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm likopolo uzzi bɔfɛɛn duu bwa ɔyanganɛ ɔbɛkɛ unnyi ɔlɔɔt wa ukopolomɛnɛ.
48006007	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ afɛɛtwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng ɔlɔk vvenɛ atɔkwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng ka kikun. Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔt ule ɔyaat bwa uwoopnɛ.
48006008	Ɔlɔɔt uwoopnɛ bɔfɛɛn ka ikkɔlɔ a vveengodde, bwa ule ɔyaat ulenɛ lubbe. Ɔlɔɔt wa uwoopnɛ bɔtɔɔm ammɛ ka Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, vvenɛ ɔyaat kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal.
48006009	Ɔfɔngɔyɛlɛ kikoolo ka kɛnaang a budoddo. Inaang budoddo tɔttɔt, ɛkɛtɛ vvenɛ effu ya ile iyaat budoddo.
48006010	Inaang budoddo la lutini ɔlɔɔt ɛkɛtɛ duu ya ikkwoongnɛ. Gaang gaang la balɔɔt ba balenɛ ka itutum ayyɔɔt ka kiyila.
48006011	Yɛnyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ nnaangnɛ illeta iggbenge ka nkɔɔmnɛ kɔbɔɔk anaam biini nkkpɔk nnyiwɔyɔng.
48006012	Balɔɔt ba babumwɔnɛyɔng kitut battɛ azzayɔng lataa, balenɛ balɔɔt ba baggyannɛ kɛnaang a bisese la kamma kitum lilɔɔk a vveengodde. Banaang ’kwɔng baang nkwaaning basibɛ akama lɛyɔɔ kwa Cross a Jesus.
48006013	Gɔɔ lɔkaan gwa bazzanɛ lataa, Lafɔɔ ba batele. Baggyan battɛ annyɔɔng azzayang lataa nkwaaning banaang kamma la annyɔɔng battɛ àyilayɔng kwa kɛnaang a latɔm a vveengodde.
48006014	Ulenɛ la anaam, mkkpa kɔnaang nle nnaang kamma ntum Cross a Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, keem wa kussinɛ kwa ammɛ vveeng ubbe kwa anaam, anaam nbbe kwa vveeng.
48006015	Kɔlɔɔk kɔlɔk ba kule mkkpa azza lɛtaa appyɛɛ asi lɛtaa lɛzza. Kwa kulenɛ kɔlɔɔk ulenɛ kisseke ufaa bɔfɛɛn bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔmnɛ.
48006016	Bɔkaat la kibbe lɛttɔ bɛtaa la balɔɔt ba bakupnɛ itɔk ’yɔng mung ka kɛfal abbɛ, bɛtaa la abbɛ ɔbɛtɛ la balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ.
48006017	Kitele lɛttɔ! Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔbbalnɛ kɔlɔɔk kɔlɔk lɛkpaka. Binuku bya nyanganɛ ka kkwɔɔt bɛyɔɔbong bɛttɛ anaam ubili a Jesus.
48006018	Ikpana anaam, ppyɛɛ Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, ɔtaa la annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ. Kulening.
49001001	Lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng Paul wa kɔsaapnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangmɛ ɔ̀zzánga uyilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus Christ, ɔkkpɔknɛ ufee balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba balenɛ ka Ephesus; ba bayanganɛ kiyila ka bɔkaat abbɛ la Christ Jesus.
49001002	Dedde ayyɔɔt, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, la Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, banaangwɔyɔng ppyɛɛ bannyiwɔyɔng bɔkaat.
49001003	Affu iwomoyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Abassɛ Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, kɛnaang ka ulenɛyɛlɛ ppyɛɛ lɛnaang ka bɔkaat ayyɔɔt la Christ. Ka ulenɛyɛlɛ linnyi lutini lɛsɔɔk a Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ za vveeng wa libat.
49001004	Bong tɛ́ttɛ́ ɛkpansi ele la kɔnaang, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggbayɛlɛ lɛsanga ɔttɛ ile ba ammɛ ka Christ nkwaaning ile ba doddo isɛlɛ bubbi ka lusso Ammɛ. Kɛsaap sa isaapnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm
49001005	kɛnaangbong Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggba luttina lɛnaang ɔttɛ vvenɛ issɛ la Jesus Christ ɔkɔɔmyɛlɛ umii ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ isseke bwaan ammɛ. Uwɔng ulenɛ laggele ammɛ la luttina ammɛ.
49001006	Ibunguyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka kiggwoom a kɔlɔɔk ammɛ sa lɛbaang ka lɛsɔɔk za ulenɛyɛlɛ linnyi ka Waan ammɛ wa luppyam.
49001007	Lubbe gwa Christ ubbenɛ ɔnaangbonyɛlɛ itta ka kɔlɔɔk. Kwakkwɛ bubbi ayyɔɔt bulenɛ la kɛsɔɔk lile. Uwɔng baang ulenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyɔɔnɛyɛlɛ kiggwoom a kɔlɔɔk ammɛ.
49001008	Unnyibongyɛlɛ bɔfɛɛn bwa lɛbaang ka bisana ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ la kwa uttinanɛ.
49001009	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔdɔkɔ ɔnaang kwa uttinanɛ. Ɔnaangyɛlɛ isan kɔlɔɔk a lalup kwa ɔggbanɛ littina ɔttɛ vvenɛ ɔnaangkwɛ kɔsaal ka ɛkɛtɛ ule ɔtɔɔm Christ uffu.
49001010	Lutini gwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ litini ɔttɛ vvenɛ ɔnaanggwɛ lɔsaal ka ɛkɛtɛ ya bbwak, ule kɛttɛ vvenɛ ɔsam bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya ulenɛ lɛlɔɔm uloko ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn. Christ ule uzzilɛttɔ lutini bɔfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bwa bulenɛ ka libat la bwa bulenɛ ka ɛkpansi.
49001011	Bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bɛnaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uttinanɛ. Ɔzzànga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsangayɛlɛ ɔttɛ ile balɔɔt ammɛ biini ka bɔkaat ayyɔɔt la Christ. Nkwɔng kulenɛ kwa uttinanɛ kɛnaang ka ussinɛ ka lutte.
49001012	Ɔzzànga, ayyɔɔt ba ikɔɔmnɛ ɛtɔk ittina kwa Christ, ibunguyɔng lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
49001013	Kɔssɛ kule ning baang la annyɔɔng ɔgbaa: Ka ɛkɛtɛ appyeenɛyɔng bɔtɔɔm bwa lɔkkwɔɔn, bwa bulenɛ Kuttu-Budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kwa kɔkɔɔmnɛ ikkala kufeewɔyɔng, ayilayɔng kwa Christ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangwɔyɔng eleme ka kkwɔɔt ɔttɛ ammɛ ulenɛ uyini annyɔɔng ka kinnyiwɔyɔng Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kwa ulenɛ lisekele.
49001014	Kuyeeng kulenɛ iyɔɔ kɛttɛ vvenɛ itɔk bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ liloko ɔttɛ vvenɛ unnyi balɔɔt ammɛ. Kɔnaangyɛlɛ isan ittɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ unnyi balɔɔt ammɛ lakke bassɛ ɔkkyaabɛ. Ibunguyɔng lakke ammɛ.
49001015	Ka ’kwɔng mung, nggba lippyee kiyila sa ayanganɛyɔng ka Uyini, Jesus, la kɛsaap sa balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm basaapwɔnɛyɔng.
49001016	Kiwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm nkkalawɔyɔng ba ntaka nkkyaa nfɔngɔ. Nle baang ka nkkewɔnɛyɔng ka luzɔɔm anaam.
49001017	Nbap Ebinukkpaapi ya ɛyanganɛ Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, Dedde lakke ɔkkpɛlɛ, nttɛ unnyiwɔyɔng Kuyeeng ammɛ, kwa kule kɔnaangwɔyɔng asanmɛyɔng.
49001018	Nkkpenge Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm nttɛ zzeen annyɔɔng lawongolo ayɛnyɔng buppwolo ammɛ nkwaaning asanyɔng bwa luttina ammɛ gwa ɔkkwɔɔwɔnɛyɔng kwakkwɛ lulenɛ. Nkwaaning asanyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ppyɛɛ ammɛ wa bikɛɛlɛ, wa ulenɛ balɔɔt ammɛ lisekele uggbengenɛ.
49001019	Nkwaaning asanyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lakke ammɛ za lalenɛ ka kɛnaang ka kkwɔɔt ayyɔɔt balɔɔt ba iyanganɛ kiyila laggbengenɛ laffɔ. Lakke za lalenɛ ka kkwɔɔt ayyɔɔt mung lale ikɛlɛlɛ la lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
49001020	Uwɔng ulenɛ lakke za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkɔɔmnɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya ufungalanɛ Jesus Christ ka lubbe, ɔnaangmɛ ɔtaa ka kɔbɔɔk ɛlaabɔɔk ammɛ ka libat.
49001021	Christ ɔkɔɔmnɛ bazzilɛttɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ, ba libat la ɛkpansi, la lakke bayini. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyimɛbong lɛkɔɔl za lɛttanɛ lakɔɔl ɔkkpɛlɛ ka vveeng mung la vveeng wa ule uffu.
49001022	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsam bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ uloko Christ using bukkpɔ, ɔsammɛ unnyi luzɔɔm ɔttɛ ule uzzilɛttɔ la Uyini bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ.
49001023	Luzɔɔm lulenɛ kkwɔɔt a Christ. Aggwɛ lulenɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ammɛ wa ɔnaangnɛ bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ifɛɛn ka ifɛɛn.
49002001	Ka isimi ka isimi, adɔkɔyɔng babbu ka kɛnaang a bubbi la kɛsɛlɛ latele.
49002002	Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang, akupyɔng babbu linaang a vveengodde. Ateleyɔng balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ lakke ilat. Azzɛ lakke ’zɔng baang lakɔɔmnɛ balɔɔt ba basinɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm litele gedegede mung.
49002003	Kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn, ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt idɔkɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ abbɛ. Itaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lafal ayyɔɔt laggyannɛ. Inaang bwa busaapnɛ kkwɔɔt ayyɔɔt la ittina ayyɔɔt. Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ, ayyɔɔt ɔgbaa idɔkɔ wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bussɛnɛ ɔnyanga la ayyɔɔt.
49002004	Ɔzzànga kiggwoom a kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kiggbengebong gaang ka kkwɔɔt ayyɔɔt, ɔgbaa kɛsaap ammɛ la ayyɔɔt kɛttalabong kɛsak.
49002005	Kwakkwɛ ɛkɛtɛ idɔkɔnɛ babbu ka bubbi ayyɔɔt, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsangayɛlɛ a kɔlɔɔk Ammɛ.
49002006	Ka ilenɛ ka bɔkaat la Christ Jesus, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ufungalayɛlɛ la Christ ikɔɔm vveeng wa libat la ammɛ.
49002007	Ɔnaang ’kwɔng ɔyɔɔyɛlɛ ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔttɛ nkwaaning iyɛn kiggwoom a kɔlɔɔk sa lɛbaang sa kilenɛ ka Christ Jesus.
49002008	Kule ka kiggwoom a kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kwakkwɛ addunɛyɔng ka kɛyanga kiyila, kwa linaang annyɔɔng lissi, ule lɛsɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
49002009	Bulɔk ba bule bwa ale anaangyɔng kamma atumyɔng ka asinɛyɔng lakke annyɔɔng lɛkɔɔm anaangyɔng kwɛ.
49002010	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ wa ɔlɔɔmnɛyɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ilenɛ mung. Ka ilenɛ ka bɔkaat la Christ Jesus, ɔlɔɔmbongyɛlɛ kwa kuddu kwa kɛnaang a budoddo bwa ulenɛyɛlɛ lɛggba likoko ɔttɛ inaang.
49002011	Annyɔɔng Ikanakana ka lɛfal ba balɔɔt a Jews bakkwɔɔwɔyɔng “Basi lɛtaa lɛzza” bakkwɔɔbɛ abbɛ kɛyɔɔng “Bazza lɛtaa” (Kɛzza lɛtaa ule iyɔɔ ya balɔɔt banaangnɛ ka kkwɔɔt abbɛ biini.) Akkeyɔng bwa ɔdɔkɔnɛ aleyɔng tɛ.
49002012	Ka ɛkɛtɛ ya atakanɛyɔng Christ lɛkkɛtɛ, adɔkɔyɔng Ikanakana. Asiyɔng balɔɔt ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ lile. Etini asiyɔng lɛyanga ka kɛbɛtɛ-kɛnnɔ sa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔbɛtɛnɛ ka nsekele wa ɔnaangnɛ la balɔɔt ammɛ. Ataayɔng ka vveeng ’wɔng mung gbɔɔ, luttina asiyɔng lɛyanga, gɔɔ Ebinukkpaapi asiyɔng lɛyanga.
49002013	Ɔzzànga gedegede mung, ka bɔkaat annyɔɔng la Christ Jesus, annyɔɔng ba alenɛyɔng fulufulu assekeyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, akkɛtɛmɛyɔng ka lubbe a Christ.
49002014	Christ biini ɔkɔɔmbong bɔkaat ufeeyɛlɛ ka utoolonɛ balɔɔt a Jews la Ikanakana basseke ɔlɔɔt vvɔn. Ɔkɔɔm kkwɔɔt ammɛ ɔbɔl kɛbat sa kɛbɛngɛlɛnɛbɛ bataa zzekep basi ka bɔkaat lile.
49002015	Utunu Lafɔɔ balɔɔt a Jews la nsekele azzɛ, nkwaaning ɔlɔɔm kɛssanga balɔɔt ’bɔng baang baffa basseke ufaa ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ka bɔkaat la ammɛ biini. Ɔnaang bɔkaat ka ɛtɔk ’yɔng.
49002016	Christ ɔbɛpɛbong kɔfɔk ka lubbe ammɛ ka cross. Ɔkɔɔm cross utoolo balɔɔt ’bɔng baang baffa basseke kkwɔɔt ssɔn, ɔkɔɔmbɛ uffu ka ɛfɛɛn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
49002017	Ɔzzánga Christ uffu ukopolo ikaan ɔkkpɛlɛ Kuttu-Budoddo bɔkaat. Ukopolowɔyɔng annyɔɔng Ikanakana ba adɔkɔnɛyɔng fulufulu assekeyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, la balɔɔt a Jews ba balenɛ kɛtɛkɛtɛ ammɛ.
49002018	Kussi ka Christ tɛ́ttɛ́ ayyɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ, balɔɔt a Jews la Ikanakana, ikkwoong iffu ka Kuyeeng kkwɔn ka lusso Dedde Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
49002019	Annyɔɔng Ikanakana bakekeen ba abɛlɛyɔng lile. Assekeyɔng bɔfɛɛn bbwɔn la balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Atiiyɔng ka itutum nnyɔn la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
49002020	Annyɔɔng ɔgbaa babɔɔkwɔyɔng ka libat a lutte gwa bayilabɔtɔɔm la bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm battenɛ. Lutte biini lulenɛ Christ Jesus.
49002021	Ammɛ ulenɛ wa ɔkɔɔmmɛ ggwoon ɔkkpɛlɛ aggwɛ kkɔk. Ɔnaang gwɛ lɔmmala lule Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
49002022	Ka alenɛyɔng ka bɔkaat la ammɛ, annyɔɔng ɔgbaa batoolowɔyɔngbong la balɔɔt balɔk babɔɔk ɛfɛɛn ya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtaanɛ ka Kuyeeng ammɛ.
49003001	Ka ɛtɔk ’yɔng, anaam Paul, ɔlɔɔt a ngbakkɔpɔ a Christ Jesus ka lɛttɔ annyɔɔng Ikanakana, nzɔɔm nnyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
49003002	Kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn appyeeyɔngbong attɛyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ka kiggwoom a kɔlɔɔk ammɛ, unnyinɛbong kɛnaang ’sɔng ɔttɛ nnaang kwa budoddo annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ.
49003003	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyɔɔ ittina ammɛ ya lalup, ɔnaangnɛ nsanyɛ. (Nkkpɔkbong ’kwɔng mung bwɛt.
49003004	Ɔzzànga akkwɔɔnɛyɔng bwa nlenɛ lɛkkpɔk vvenɛ asanyɔng bwa anaam nsannɛ ntum kɔlɔɔk a lalup a Christ.)
49003005	Ka isimi ka isimi, ɔssɛbibit usi kɔlɔɔk a lalup ’kwɔng mung lippyee. Ɔzzànga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkɔɔmbong Kuyeeng ammɛ ɔyɔɔ bayilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ ba doddo la bappyee-kutolo ammɛ kɔlɔɔk a lalup ’kwɔng mung.
49003006	Kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng baang kule kɔttɛ; Ka kɔlɔɔk a lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Ikanakana bayangabong etini a ppyɛɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt a Jews. Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ basseke bikkeep a kkwɔɔt ssɔn. Batulbong nsekele wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangnɛ ka labɔɔk a Christ Jesus.
49003007	Ndɔkɔ nzzanga bɔɔyi kɛbwɔɔlɔ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka lɛsɔɔk za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsɔɔknɛnɛ ka lakke kɛnaang ammɛ.
49003008	Nssup lussup ntta balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔzzànga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyinɛ lakke za kɛkɔɔm a Kuttu-Budoddo budoddo a Christ bwa businɛ lɛsaal, nfee Ikanakana
49003009	nkwaaning nnaang balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ basan tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ile ikɔɔm kɔlɔɔk a lalup Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm doddo. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ulenɛ Ɔlɔɔm-a-bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ulup kɔlɔɔk a lalup ammɛ usseke bɛkkpa bya isimi bya isimi.
49003010	Nkwaaning gedegede mung, ka kɔlɔɔk a luzɔɔm, liyeeng sa likɔɔmnɛ libat la lakke a vveeng lisan kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la kɛssanga la kɛssanga.
49003011	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaang ukup tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ulenɛ Jesus Christ, Uyini ayyɔɔt, lɛkɔɔm ɔnaang kwa ɔggbanɛ lissi uttina.
49003012	Ka ilenɛ ka bɔkaat la Christ ka kiyila sa iyanganɛ itummɛ, iyangabong lakke za kɛtaa ka ɛfɛɛn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usiyɛlɛ lɛllɛk ɔkkpɛlɛ.
49003013	Elleeyɔng, tɛ̀ttɛ́ akkyaayɔng ntɛtɛ afɔngɔyɔng ka nlenɛ mung ka nyɛnnɛ akama ka lɛttɔ annyɔɔng. Akama anaam ɔkkpɛlɛ nyɛn kwa budoddo annyɔɔng.
49003014	Ka ɛtɔk ’yɔng mung, nkunbong Dedde, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, laddu.
49003015	Ammɛ wa unnyinɛ itutum ɔkkpɛlɛ ka libat la ɛkpansi lɛkɔɔl annyɛ za bbwak.
49003016	Nkkpenge Dedde, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, nttɛ lakke ammɛ lassɛ la Kuyeeng ufeewɔyɔng usseke ayangayɔng lakke ka tɔkɔlɔ annyɔɔng.
49003017	Ɔkkɔɔnɛ Christ ɔnaang ssala ammmɛ ka ippyam annyɔɔng ka kɛyanga kiyila. Nzɔɔm nttɛ ayangayɔng lutte la iffaat ka kɛsaap,
49003018	nkwaaning annyɔɔng la balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ ayangayɔng lakke za kɛsan a bɔggbam la bɔlɔm, la buggolo, la bɔddɔng a kɛsaap Christ.
49003019	Iii, butɔk asanyɔng kɛsaap ammɛ. Baala akkwoong asanyɔngsɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔzzànga vvenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ubee la annyɔɔng gaang gaang. Vvenɛ lɔtan ammɛ luyipi tɔkɔlɔ annyɔɔng.
49003020	Ammɛ ukkwoongnɛ ɔnaang ɔsak tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ibapmɛnɛ, gɔɔ bwa ittinanɛ, ka lakke za lalenɛ ka kɛnaang ka kkwɔɔt ayyɔɔt.
49003021	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ wa latele ka luzɔɔm la Christ Jesus ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, ka kɛfal a kɛfal; Kulening.
49004001	Anaam wa nlenɛ ɔlɔɔt a ngbakkɔpɔ ka nnaangnɛ kɛnaang Uyini nttɛnɛ: Anaanyɔng linaang liyyɛɛp liffɔ la sa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛnɛ anaangyɔng ka ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkwɔɔwɔnɛyɔng.
49004002	Anaangyɔng linaang a bukee, la linaang sa bɛtɛbɛtɛ la kibbe luppyam ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ayɔɔyɔng kɛsaap annyɔɔng ka kittele ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn.
49004003	Abumyɔng gaang gaang alokoyɔng bɔkaat bwa Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kunnyiwɔnɛyɔng, ka kilokowɔyɔng ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn doddo.
49004004	Kkwɔɔt lile ssɔn, Kuyeeng kule kkwɔn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkwɔɔwɔnɛyɔng kwa kɔlɔɔk kkwɔn keem.
49004005	Uyini ule vvɔn, kiyila kile ssɔn, baptizim ule vvɔn.
49004006	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule vvɔn, Dedde balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ammɛ ulenɛ Uyini bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ule ka tɔkɔlɔ bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ɔssɛ la abbyɛ ɔnaang kɛnaang.
49004007	Ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn ɔyanga lɛsɔɔk za ammɛ ikɛlɛlɛ la kɛssanga sa Christ ulenɛ linnyi.
49004008	Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ, lɔttɛ, “Ka umiinɛ ka ggologgolo, Ɔkɔɔm balɔɔt igbakkɔpɔ ggbadam ɔbɛtɛ la ammɛ umii. Ɔsɔɔk balɔɔt lasɔɔk.”
49004009	Mung “ùmii ka libat” ulenɛ ’bɔng? Ning baang ulenɛ kɛttɛ ka ikeeng ikeeng uffu ka kuttɔɔk ɛkpansi.
49004010	Ammɛ wa uffunɛ ka ɛkpansi ulemɛnɛ ammɛ vvɔn baang wa umiinɛ ka libat. Ɔsak umii fulu fulu ka libat, nkwaaning uyipi ɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ka vveengodde.
49004011	Ɔdɔkɔmɛ ammɛ wa “unnyinɛ ɔssɛbibit lɛsɔɔk”. Ɔssang balɔɔt balɔk bale bayilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ, balɔk bappyee-kutolo ammɛ, balɔk bakopolo-luzɔɔm, balɔk bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm la bakopolo-lukopolo.
49004012	Jesus ɔnaang ’kwɔng nkwaaning ɔbama balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ kwa kɛnaang a luzɔɔm, nkwaaning kkwɔɔt a Christ limmala.
49004013	Ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt vvenɛ iggba ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn isseke ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ka kiyila ayyɔɔt la bisana pya bitumnɛ Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Vvenɛ ile balɔɔt ba balenɛ kɔlɔɔk lɛsan baffɔ ka ennenggele kɛfal a Christ.
49004014	Ɛkɛtɛ ’kwɔng baang, bwɔɔn ba ibɛlɛ lile; ba babɛlɛyɛlɛ lɛkɔɔm bawuwungu tɔkɔtɔkɔtɔkɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛffa kɛffanɛ bɛfɛɛn kɛssanga bakkala lalaak ba bakɔɔmnɛ lagban banaang babbɛ battɔ ka bubbi.
49004015	Ɔzzànga ilɔɔknɛ lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk ka kɛsaap, vvenɛ immala ka itɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ innyi Christ wa ulenɛ uzzilɛttɔ.
49004016	Ka ilenɛ ka kɛkɔɔm ammɛ, bikkeep a balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ bitoolobong ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn. Bikkeep bɛbwɔɔpnɛ kkwɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ biloko ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn. Nkwaaning kikkeep la ssɔn kɛnaangnɛ kwa kɔyyɛɛpnɛ, kkwɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ limmala ka kɛsaap.
49004017	Ka lɛkɔɔl Uyini, nttamawɔyɔng nttɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ abɛlɛyɔng lɛtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt ɛkpansi ba basinɛ kwa doddo littina.
49004018	Ittina abbɛ ile ka kisul. Etini ba bayanga ka lɛfal za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyinɛ, ka basinɛ kwɛ lɛsan basi kɔlɔɔk lippyee.
49004019	Luttina gwa izzit bɛ ba lɔbɛlɛ lile. Basambongbɛ kɛyɔɔng bannyi kɛssɛ-kɛzak. Banaang bɛssanga bɛfɛɛn bya bisinɛ lɛyyɛɛp, bafim kɛkkyaa kɛfɔngɔ.
49004020	Nkwɔng baang lissi ulenɛ kwa akkoopnɛ atumyɔng Christ.
49004021	Ka lɔkkwɔɔn appyeeyɔng kɔlɔɔk ammɛ. Ka alenɛyɔng balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ, bakopolowɔyɔng lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk a Jesus.
49004022	Akkyaayɔng linaang annyɔɔng sa iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ sa linaangwɔnɛyɔng ataayɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ aggbanɛ lissi aleyɔng afɔngɔyɔng, linaang sa babbu ikkɔlɔ annyɔɔng lilenɛ lɛtɔk libɛpɛ.
49004023	Ippyam la itan annyɔɔng ippyɛlɛ ka bufaa ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɛ.
49004024	Vvenɛ ayangayɔng ufaa luttina gwa Ebinukkpaapi ɛnaangnɛ tɛttɛ gwa annyɛ. Ufaa luttina ’gwɔng baang ɛyɔɔgwɛ kɛyɔɔng ka kɛfal sa lɔkkwɔɔn, sa kilenɛ bbwak, kɛyyɛɛp.
49004025	Kɛkkala lɛlaak kɛlɔk kɛfɔngɔ lile. Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔlɔɔk lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk la wabbɛ wa ɔyanganɛ kiyila: ka ilenɛyɔng bikkeep a Christ, Uyini ayyɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ.
49004026	Gɔɔ mkkpa kɔlɔɔk kutunwɔ, tɛ̀ttɛ́ kɔdɛmwɔ anaang bubbi. Gɔɔ tɛ̀ttɛ́ kutunwɔ kɛtɔm uwɔlɔlɔ.
49004027	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ annyi Satan kufuk.
49004028	Ɔlɔɔt wa ussinɛ uyip, ɔkkyaa ssip ɔfɔngɔ. Ɔnaang kɛnaang ɔkkɔɔnɛ ukkwoong ɔtaa ka kuddu kwa latele, usseke uttele balɔɔt ba ɔbbɔlnɛbɛ.
49004029	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akɔɔm babbu lammwɔɔl ka kutolo. Akɔɔm lammwɔɔl za layaamnɛ keem. Lammwɔɔl za labɔɔknɛ, lakkwoong mung lanaang ayanga bwa aggyannɛ, nkwaaning kwa alɔɔknɛ kɔyaam balɔɔt ba bagɔpɔlɔwɔnɛkwɛ.
49004030	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ anaang kwa kule kɔnaang Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bukee. Kuyeeng kulenɛ lɛmwang za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangwɔnɛ ɔyɔɔ ɔttɛ ammɛ ɔyangawɔnɛ. Uwɔng baang ulenɛ nsekele wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangnɛ ɔttɛ vvenɛ ɔsangawɔyɔng ka bubili.
49004031	Akkyaayɔng kɛbbɔl ippyam la ibbyap la kitun a kɔlɔɔk afɔngɔyɔng. Kivvoko la kɛnaang a kɔfɔk kɛfɔngɔ lɛbɛlɛ lile. Latun ɔkkpɛlɛ lasaal.
49004032	Lutini ’gwɔng, aggwoomyɔng kɔlɔɔk la luppyam gwa kɛyaam a bannyɔɔng. Asɔɔkyɔng ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn bubbi bwa ɔnaangnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulewɔnɛyɔng annyɔɔng lɛsɔɔk ka Christ.
49005001	Ka alenɛyɔng bwaan a luppyam Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, abum anaangyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ammɛ biini.
49005002	Kɛsaap kɛkɔɔm lɛfal annyɔɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ayyɔɔt isaapnɛ Christ ɔsam kɛfal ammɛ unnyi kwa ayyɔɔt tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɔfɛɛn bwa buggwoomnɛ kizzoom bakɔɔm banaang lɛtɔm za lɛsaapnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
49005003	Ka alenɛyɔng balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ba kɔyyɛɛp kɛtala lilɔɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛssɛ-kɛzak, ɔlɔk kisi luppyam kkpaladada liloko, ɔlɔk kɛsaap a bɔfɛɛn ka bɛzzɔkɔ annyɔɔng.
49005004	Ba kɔyyɛɛp ka anaangnɛyɔng ibbyap, ɔlɔk anaangyɔng kikun, alɔɔkyɔng babbu lammwɔɔl. Lutini ’gwɔng, awomoyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang, ka bwa unnyiwɔnɛyɔng.
49005005	Asanyɔng lɔsan attɛyɔng Itutum a Christ la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ya ɔlɔɔt wa ɔssɛnɛ kɛzak, ɔlɔk ɔsaap bɔfɛɛn ba ile ka lɔkkwɔɔn. (Ɔsaap-a-bɔfɛɛn ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔnaangnɛ ilat, ɔyanga kɛsaap ɔzɔɔm unnyi iyyɛɛp a kɛfal ka vveengodde ɔtta Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.)
49005006	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ afɔngɔyɔng ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔkɔɔm babbu lammwɔɔl uffu ɔfɛɛtwɔyɔng; kussi ka bɛfɛɛn bya ning mung Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔyɔɔ balɔɔt ba basimɛnɛ litele akama.
49005007	Ɔzzànga tɛ̀ttɛ́ aleyɔng ka kɔlɔɔk kɔlɔk la kɛssanga balɔɔt ’sɔng baang.
49005008	Annyɔɔng biini adɔkɔ aleyɔng ka kisul, ɔzzànga ka alenɛyɔng balɔɔt Uyini lile assekeyɔng balɔɔt a buppwolo. Ka assekenɛyɔng balɔɔt a buppwolo, abum anaangyɔng linaang a balɔɔt a buppwolo.
49005009	Buppwolo bukɔɔmnɛ bɛssanga iyyɛɛp a liyaat ɔkkpɛlɛ buffu la budoddo linaang sa bbwak, la lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk.
49005010	Abum akkoopyɔng kwa kɔsaapnɛ Uyini.
49005011	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ayangayɔng luttina ka babbu bɛfɛɛn bya balɔɔt banaangnɛ bya bilenɛ ka kisul. Lutini ’gwɔng asamyɔng byɛ attayɔng ka buppwolo.
49005012	(Kɔnaang izzit ffet kɛlɔɔk kitum bɛfɛɛn bya banaangnɛ ka lalup).
49005013	Ɔ̀zzànga bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bɛ́ttanɛ́ ka ppwool, vvenɛ bɛyɔɔ lafal abbyɛ za lɔkkwɔɔn kkpelegedee.
49005014	Bɔfɛɛn duu bwa buyɔɔnɛbwɛ kɛyɔɔng ppwool busseke buppwolo. Kwakkwɛ baang balɔɔknɛ battɛ, “Fungala, Ɔlaa-bilaa. Afungala ka lubbe! Buppwolo a Christ vvenɛ buppwolo bullɔtwɔ.”
49005015	Ɔzzànga asan tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ataanɛyɔng. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ataayɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bazingizingi. Ataayɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ basan a kɔlɔɔk.
49005016	Asan akɔɔm ɛkɛtɛ annɔ doddo, vveeng ɔbbɔlbong.
49005017	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ azizingiyɔng, ɔzzànga abum asanyɔng bwa Uyini ɔggyannɛ ɔttɛ anaangyɔng.
49005018	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ avvayɔng batak ba babɛpɛwɔnɛyɔng abimiyɔng. Lutini ’gwɔng afɔngɔyɔng Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔtɔkwɔyɔng kɔyanga.
49005019	Akɔɔmyɔng lammwɔɔl a Psalm la bisoom bya bɛllɔtnɛ buyila atoloyɔng kutolo la bannyɔɔng. Asoomyɔng bisoom atoloyɔng lammwɔɔl annyiyɔng Uyini, akɔɔm abungumɛyɔng ka ippyam.
49005020	Ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ awomoyɔng Dedde, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, kɛnaang ka bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ka lɛkɔɔl Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ.
49005021	Asamwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng annyiwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng. Anaangyɔng ning baang ka latele a Christ.
49005022	Bwanavva, asamwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng annyiyɔng bwalam annyɔɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ annyinɛyɔng Uyini.
49005023	Waanwalam ɔyanga lakke ɔtta wanavva ammɛ, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Christ ɔyanganɛ lakke ka luzɔɔm. Christ biini ulenɛ ɔkkala-ikkala luzɔɔm gwa lulenɛ kkwɔɔt ammɛ.
49005024	Bwanavva, assɛ asamwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ annyiyɔng bwalam annyɔɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luzɔɔm lɔsamnɛ gwɛ kɛyɔɔng lunnyi Christ.
49005025	Bwalam, bwanavva annyɔɔng basaapwɔyɔng, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Christ luzɔɔm lɔsaapmɛnɛ, ɔsam kɛfal ammɛ unnyigwɛ.
49005026	Ɔnaang ’kwɔng nkwaaning ɔkɔɔm lɛmmwɔɔl ammɛ za ulenɛzɛ lɛzzaa ka bannyi lɛllaat, ɔzɔɔm luzɔɔm unnyi Ebinukkpaapi,
49005027	ɔkkɔɔnɛ ɔsam luzɔɔm ka bɔllɛ aggwɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ unnyimɛ ammɛ biini kɛyɔɔng, lule kkpaladada, lɔsɛlɛ kɔlɔɔk a lɛlaak, lɔsɛlɛ lɛggba la lilɔɔk lilɔk sa lisinɛ lɛyyɛɛp.
49005028	Bwaanbwalam nzang bwanavva abbɛ basaapbɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ basaapnɛbɛ kɛyɔɔng, batele kkwɔɔt abbɛ. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsaapmɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng, wanavva ammɛ ɔssɛ ɔsaapmɛ ning baang.
49005029	(Ɔlɔɔt wa kkwɔɔt ammɛ litunmɛnɛ ba ule. Lutini ’gwɔng uzzi kazzi ɔssɛɛnsɛ ɔkɔɔm kkwɔɔt ammɛ doddo, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Christ ɔnaangnɛ la luzɔɔm bbwak,
49005030	ka ayyɔɔt ilenɛ bikkeep a kkwɔɔt ammɛ.)
49005031	Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, “Ka ’kwɔng mung, waanwalam vvenɛ ɔgbata ɔkɔngɔ abassɛ la abakka bataa la wanavva ammɛ, ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ basseke ɔlɔɔt vvɔn.”
49005032	Luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ’gwɔng mung lɔbwɔɔlɔyɛlɛ lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk gwa ddɔng, anaam nsangwɛ nttɛ lutum Christ la luzɔɔm.
49005033	Ɔzzànga lutumwɔyɔng annyɔɔng ɔgbaa. Waanwalam ɔkkpɛlɛ utele wanavva ammɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ulemɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng. Wanavva ɔkkpɛlɛ unnyi walam ammɛ latele.
49006001	Bwɔɔntiti, kɛnaang annyɔɔng, bakup-a-Christ, ulenɛ kitele ssakawɔ la ssaawɔ annyɔɔng. Uwɔng ulenɛ kɔlɔɔk kwa kulenɛ bbwak a kɛnaang.
49006002	“Atele ssaawɔ la ssakawɔ.” Ulenɛ lifɔɔ za kɛkɔɔm a ɛtɔk za lɛyanganɛ nsekele lɛgbaa lɛttɛ,
49006003	“nkwaaning ataa ka budoddo ka ɛkpansi.”
49006004	Ibassɛ la ibakka bwɔɔntiti, tɛ̀ttɛ́ akɔɔmyɔng bwɔɔn annyɔɔng ka ɛtɔk ya kule kutunbɛ. Lutini ’gwɔng akɔɔmyɔngbɛ la linaang a bakup-a-Christ, akatyɔngbɛ, ayɔɔyɔngbɛ ɛtɔk ya doddo tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Uyini ɔnaangnɛ.
49006005	Babili, ateleyɔng issaawɔ annyɔɔng ya vveeng ’wɔng gaang gaang. Anaangyɔng ning baang la luppyam gwa doddo tɛ̀ttɛ̀ alenɛ ka atelenɛyɔng Christ.
49006006	Afɔngɔyɔng ɛdda kɛnaang ɔlɔk nkwaaning babunguwɔyɔng. Anaangyɔng kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyannɛ la luppyam annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ babili a Christ.
49006007	Anaangyɔng kɛnaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ babili la laggele, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ alenɛyɔng ka kɛnaang Uyini, usi kɛnaang a balɔɔt ba gbɔɔ lile.
49006008	Akke attɛyɔng Uyini vvenɛ ukipili ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ, ale ubili, appyɛɛ asi ubili lile, ka kɛnaang duu sa anaangnɛ kɛyyɛɛp tɛ!
49006009	Bayini babili, akɔɔmyɔng babili annyɔɔng kɛssanga ssɔn. Afɔngɔyɔng ibbyap kɛkɔɔm. Akke attɛyɔng annyɔɔng la babili annyɔɔng aleyɔng ba Uyini vvɔn ka libat wa ɔkaalnɛ kɛkaal ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn kɛssanga ssɔn.
49006010	Ka lakpeke, akɔɔmyɔng lakke Uyini akɔɔmwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng kpɔk ka bɔkaat annyɔɔng la ammɛ.
49006011	Assɛɛnyɔng uwɔkɔlɔ-lɛkɔɔng annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulewɔnɛyɔng linnyi nkwaaning abeeyɔng kkpɔk alluyɔng ubbu kullu la lagban Ɔnaang-a-Kɛsɛɛm a Kuyeeng.
49006012	Mung kullu la balɔɔt ba illu. Illu la babbu liyeeng sa lilenɛ ka vveengodde, la bakɔɔm ɛfɛɛn, la lakke la babbyap a bazzilɛttɔ ɛkpansi ’yɔng.
49006013	Awɔkɔlɔyɔng iwɔkɔlɔ lɛkɔɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm gedegede mung nkwaaning kɛtɔm sa kɛbbɔlnɛ kiffunɛ akkwoong abeeyɔng bbwak alluyɔng kɔfɔk annyɔɔng kullu. Alenɛyɔng lillu affɔyɔng ka lakpeke, ale atiiyɔng baang ka abeenɛyɔng kkpɔk.
49006014	Abeeyɔng kkpɔk akatyɔng. Akɔɔmyɔng lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɛkkpa ya aggbɔnɛyɔng ka kɛsan. Akɔɔmyɔng budoddo akupuwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng ka ikukulu tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛfaak a kɛkkpala.
49006015	Bukkpakkpa bwa kɛbwɔɔlɔ Kuttu-Budoddo bɔkaat butaawɔyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ikkpa-bukkpɔ ya assɛɛnnɛyɔng ka bukkpɔ.
49006016	Ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ akɔɔmyɔng kiyila annyɔɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛbba sa ale akɔɔm afɛɛnyɔng bɛfɛɛn-ibɔk bya Satan ule ɔtta,
49006017	Atɔkyɔng ikkala ya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkalawɔnɛyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛttɔpɔ sa avvoongnɛyɔng ka lɛttɔ. Atɔkyɔng lɛmmwɔɔl-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ogge wa Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kunnyiwɔnɛyɔng.
49006018	Anaangyɔng ’kwɔng ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ la luzɔɔm. Abapyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm attɛ ɔkkalawɔyɔng. Ɔzɔɔmyɔng ka kɔlɔɔk duu tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng. Ka ’kwɔng mung, abeeyɔng kkpɔk, tɛ̀ttɛ́ ayilayɔng kɛbɛtɛ, azɔɔmyɔng ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, annyiyɔng balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
49006019	Azɔɔm annyinɛyɔng anaam ɔgbaa, attɛyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔɔmmɛ bɔtɔɔm, ɛkɛtɛ ya nle nbwɔɔlɔ bwa ɔtɔɔmmɛnɛ, nbwɔɔlɔ la kɛkkaam a luppyam, nnaang balɔɔt basan kɔlɔɔk a lalup a lɛmmwɔɔl-Ammɛ.
49006020	Anaam nlenɛ uyilabɔtɔɔm ka kɔlɔɔk a lɛmmwɔɔl-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ’zɔng mung. Ɔzzànga gedegede mung nle ka igbakkɔpɔ. Azɔɔm attɛyɔng nkkaam luppyam ntolo kutolo ntumzɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ nggyannɛ.
49006021	Ɔkpana ayyɔɔt Tychicus, bɔɔyi a Christ wa ɔyanganɛ kiyila ka kɛnaang Uyini vvenɛ ɔbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng kɔlɔɔk anaam ɔkkpɛlɛ; nkwaaning asanyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ nlenɛ baang ka nnaangnɛ.
49006022	Kwakkwɛ baang ntɔɔmmɛnɛ nfeewɔyɔng nkwaaning ɔbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt ilenɛ baang ka inaangnɛ ɔlɔk ɔssɛɛnwɔyɔng bittele.
49006023	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Dedde ayyɔɔt, la Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, unnyiwɔyɔng annyɔɔng la ikpana ayyɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ka kiyila, bɔkaat la kɛsaap.
49006024	Numa ppyɛɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtaa la balɔɔt ba batelenɛ Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, la kɛsaap sa kisinɛ lɛsaal.
50001001	Paul la Timothy, babili a Christ Jesus, bakkpɔknɛ lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng bafee balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba ballunɛ ka Philippi, ba balenɛ ka bɔkaat la Christ Jesus, la bazzilɛttɔ luzɔɔm, la balɔɔt ba battelenɛbɛ.
50001002	Dedde ayyɔɔt, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, la Jesus Christ, Uyini ayyɔɔt, bannyiwɔyɔng lakke la bɔkaat.
50001003	Nwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm anaam kɛnaang kwa annyɔɔng, ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ya nttinanɛ ntumwɔyɔng.
50001004	Ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ya nzɔɔmnɛ nnyiwɔyɔng, nzɔɔm la laggele,
50001005	ka attelenɛnɛyɔng ka kɛnaang a kuttu-budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ussinɛ kɛtɔm ikeeng uffu ɔffɔ gedegede mung.
50001006	Nsanbong nttɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa uttenɛ oyyoyyo kɛnaang ’sɔng la annyɔɔng vvenɛ ɔkɔɔm ning baang tɔttɔt kɛsaal ka Kɛtɔm-a-Christ Jesus.
50001007	Alenɛyɔng ka luppyam ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Kule bbwak ka nttinanɛ ntumwɔyɔng, ka ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng alenɛyɔng etini la anaam lɛyanga ka kufuk ’kwɔng mung kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛnɛ linnyi. Attelenɛyɔngbong gbaak ka gedegede mung ka nlenɛ ka igbakkɔpɔ, la ɛkɛtɛ ya ntakanɛ ka igbakkɔpɔ lile nkkala Kuttu-Budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm nmatkwɛ lɛsan kɔkkaam.
50001008	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsan lɔsan ɔttɛ nlɔɔk lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk ka nttɛnɛ luttina anaam gwa nttinanɛ ntumwɔyɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ lussinɛ ka luppyam a Christ Jesus biini.
50001009	Nzɔɔm nttɛ kɛsaap annyɔɔng kɛmmala kɛgbaa ɔbɛtɛ la kɛsan a kɔlɔɔk a lɔkkwɔɔn,
50001010	nkwaaning asanyɔng bwa bulenɛ bwa bbwak. Ɔlɔk attayɔng ka babbu lilɔɔk asiyɔng kibbi lizzi ka kɛtɔm-a-Christ.
50001011	Lafal annyɔɔng vvenɛ layanga kuddu kwa doddo kwa Jesus Christ kɛyɔng ukkwoongnɛ ɔnaang nkwaaning balɔɔt bayɔɔ lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, babungumɛ ɔgbaa.
50001012	Ikpana anaam, nggyan nttɛ asan attɛyɔng bɛfɛɛn bya bilenɛnɛ lɛnaang bittelebong kuttu-budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔmmala.
50001013	Bakat-a-ssala Ubeet la balɔɔt balɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ ba balenɛ mung basan lɔsan battɛ nle ka igbakkɔpɔ ka nlenɛ bɔɔyi a Christ.
50001014	Ɔzzànga kile sa nlenɛ ka igbakkɔpɔ kinnyibong ikpana ayyɔɔt ilɔk kɛkkaam a luppyam ka Uyini. Bammala la kɛkkaam a luppyam ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, bakopolonɛ bɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm basɛlɛ bbwɔp ka luppyam.
50001015	Kule baning, balɔɔt balɔk bakopolo kuttu-budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka bayanganɛ luleep, bakkwoong kɔwɔlɔ. Ɔzzànga balɔɔt balɔk bakopolo lɛmmwɔɔl ammɛ la luppyam gwa doddo.
50001016	Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang banaang ning baang ka kɛsaap ka basannɛ battɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyinɛbɛ kɛnaang sa kɛkkala kuttu-budoddo ammɛ.
50001017	Balɔɔt balɔk ba bakopolonɛ kuttu-budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔyyɛɛp ɔssanga luleep battina, battɛ bagbaanɛ akama ka igbakkɔpɔ.
50001018	Ɔzzànga kɔlɔɔk duu kwa babbu ittina abbɛ inaangnɛbɛ banaangkwɛ, mkkpa kɔyyɛɛp kɔbbɔl, nggele ka balenɛ kuttu-budoddo a Christ likopolo.
50001019	Nsan lɔsan nttɛ luzɔɔm annyɔɔng la kittele sa kissinɛ ka Kuyeeng a Jesus Christ kiffu vvenɛ kɛsanganɛ ka kɔlɔɔk.
50001020	Ka luttina anaam, nttina nttɛ kɛnaang anaam baala nfɔngɔ kɛbɛpɛ. Ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, gɔɔ gaang gaang gedegede mung, vvenɛ nyanga kɛkkaam a luppyam, nkwaaning nkɔɔm latele nfee Christ ka lɛfal anaam ɔkkpɛlɛ mkkpa nbbe ɔlɔk nppyɛɛ ntaa ka kuddu.
50001021	Kuddu kulenɛ ’bɔng? Anaam kuddu kulenɛnɛ Christ, lubbe lulenɛ isak.
50001022	Ɔzzànga ulenɛ ka nkkwoongnɛ nnang kɛnaang sa doddo ngbaa ka ntiinɛ ka kuddu, ba nsan bwa nle nsanga.
50001023	Ɔlɛlɛkɛnɛbong: nbum gaang gaang nttɛ ngbata nsseke vveeng ’wɔng mung, nmii ntaa la Christ ka akkwɛ kɔttanɛ lɛyyɛɛp kɔsak.
50001024	Ɔzzànga kaang ning, kɔbbal lɔbbal lɛyyɛɛp ka ntaanɛ ka kuddu nzzenge luzzi annyɔɔng.
50001025	Nsan lɔsan nttɛ vvenɛ ntaa ka kuddu, ntaa la annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ nttelewɔyɔng ka lubum annyɔɔng ngbaawɔyɔng laggele ka kiyila.
50001026	Ɛkɛtɛ ya nle nbbal la annyɔɔng lɛtaa, vvenɛ ayangayɔng ifɛɛt ya ule ɔkkyaawɔyɔng ɔgbaa kwa anaam ka lɛfal annyɔɔng ka Christ Jesus.
50001027	Gedegede mung kɔlɔɔk kwa kɔttanɛ liggbenge ulenɛ eleme. Eleme annyɔɔng ele ya Kuttu-Budoddo a Christ kɔggyannɛ nkwaaning mkkpa usinɛ anaam lile nle nffu nyɛnwɔyɔng, vvenɛ nppyee ka battɛnɛ abeeyɔng kkpɔk la luttina ggwɔn, alluyɔng kullu ka kɔlɔɔk a kiyila kwa Kuttu-Budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
50001028	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ balɔɔt a kɔfɔk annyɔɔng babbwɔpɔwɔyng. Akkaamyɔng luppyam ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Nkwɔng kule kɔyɔɔbɛ basan battɛ baala babɛtɛwɔyɔng. Annyɔɔng ale abɛtɛyɔngbɛ abbɛ ka ulenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyiwɔnɛyɔng lakke za kɛbɛtɛ.
50001029	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyiwɔyɔngbong kufuk kwa kɛnaang a kɛnaang a Christ. Ka kiyila kwa ammɛ ka kamma keem lissi, kule ka kɛyɛn akama ka lɛttɔ ammɛ agbaa.
50001030	Gedegede mung akkwoong mung affu attelenɛyɔng nllu kullu. Utii kullu ’kwɔng baang kkwɔn kwa ayɛnnɛnɛyɔng ka nllunɛ, utii kwɛ akkwɛ ’kwɔng baang ka ntiinɛ ka nllunɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ appyeenɛyɔng.
50002001	Mung kuddu annyɔɔng ka Christ kɔnaangwɔyɔng mung akkaamyɔng ɔɔ? Kɛsaap ammɛ kɛyaamwɔyɔng mung ɔɔ? Atulyɔng mung kɔssɛ la Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔɔ? Attinayɔng mung kwa kiggwoom a kɔlɔɔk la kibbe lɛttɔ la wannyɔɔng ɔɔ?
50002002	Ɔzzànga ntutwɔyɔng nttɛ anaangnɛyɔng nggele gaang gaang ka ale ayangayɔng luttina ’ggwɔn, ayangayɔng kɛsaap ssɔn, aleyɔng bɔfɛɛn bbwɔn ka luppyam la lɔnngwa.
50002003	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ anaangyɔng bɔfɛɛn bulɔk ka kɛssɔp-a-bɔfɛɛn, ɔlɔk anaangyɔng kwa kusinɛ likoolo kwa kɛnaang a kamma; ɔzzànga ayangayɔng kibbe lɛttɔ la wannyɔɔng, afɔngɔ kittina attɛyɔng annyɔɔng attanɛyɔng bannyɔɔng balɔk.
50002004	Attinayɔng kwa bannyɔɔng ɔgbaa. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akekeyɔng kwa annyɔɔng biini keem.
50002005	Eleme annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ ele tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ya Christ ɔyanganɛ.
50002006	Ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, Christ ɔyanga eleme Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔzzànga usi littina ɔttɛ vvenɛ ɔkɔɔm lagabwɔ bataa ikɛlɛ la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
50002007	Lutini ’gwɔng ɔkkyaa bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ bya ɔyanganɛ ɔfɔngɔ ɔppyɛɛ ɔsam eleme ubili usseke tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt, uffu ka vveeng ’wɔng.
50002008	Ɔdɔkɔ ɔtɔkmɛ kɛyɔɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ukee-waan. Ɔssɛ ka ɛtɔk a latele tɔttɔt ubbe ka Cross.
50002009	Kwakkwɛ baang Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyimɛnɛ latele gaang gaang. Ɔkɔlɔmɛ lɛkɔɔl za lɛttanɛ lakɔɔl ɔkkpɛlɛ.
50002010	Bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya bilenɛ ka libat la ɛkpansi la bya bilenɛ ka vveng wa kuttɔɔk, vvenɛ bikun Jesus laddu.
50002011	Lɛlaak la zzɔn ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ lɛlɔɔk ppwool ppwool lɛbwɔɔlɔ lɛttɛ Jesus Christ ulenɛ Uyini ka latele Abassɛ, Ebinukkpaapi.
50002012	Inngwa anaam, kɔyyɛɛp mung ka assɛnɛ atelenɛyɔng gedede mung ka nsinɛ la annyɔɔng lile tɛ̀ttɛ̀ atelenɛnɛyɔng ka ndɔkɔnɛ la annyɔɔng. Ɔkkaamwɔyɔng anaangyɔng kɛnaang ikkala annyɔɔng gaang gaang la kiffula la bwɔp.
50002013	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule baang ka ɔnaangwɔnɛyɔng ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ayilayɔng ɔgbaa akkwoong ateleyɔng bwa ɔggyannɛ.
50002014	Anaangyɔng bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ, afɔngɔyɔng lɔzzɔ la ikangala,
50002015	nkwaaning asiyɔngkwɛ lɛsan aleyɔng kpaladada tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bwaan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba doddo ba balenɛ ka ɛkpansi ibbyap la balɔɔt a bubbi. Appwoloyɔng ka bɛzzɔkɔ abbɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bwaan-ettuma bappwolonɛ ka lukpaaggbeede,
50002016	ka abwɔɔlɔnɛyɔngbɛ bɔtɔɔm a kuddu. Anaangnɛyɔng ning baang vvenɛ iyanga kitele lɛttɔ ka nle nggele kwa annyɔɔng ka Kɛtɔm-a-Christ kile kɛyɔɔ kɛttɛ lubum anaam ɔkkpɛlɛ la kɛnaang anaam kisibong lɛttɔ kɛtaak.
50002017	Usinɛkkyam linnyi kuddu anaam lilenɛ luzzi gwa kiyila annyɔɔng kɛsanganɛ ka lɛtɔm za anaangnɛ annyiyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Kulenɛ ning, anaam nggele uggele ntul laggele anaam la annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ.
50002018	Annyɔɔng ɔgbaa vvenɛ assɛ atul aggeleyɔng la anaam.
50002019	Nttina nttɛ ka lakke Jesus Uyini, vvenɛ nkkwoong ntɔɔm Timothy like-like nfeewɔyɔng nkwaaning nkama luppyam ka nle nppyee kuttu annyɔɔng.
50002020	Ammɛ keem ulenɛ la luttina tɛ̀ttɛ̀ gwa anaam, kɔbɛtɛmɛ kwa annyɔɔng ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
50002021	Ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn kɔppyɛɛ kɔbɛtɛmɛ kwa kɔlɔɔk ammɛ biini, kwa kɛnaang a Jesus Christ lissi.
50002022	Annyɔɔng biini asanyɔng lɔsan tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ulenɛ lɛyɔɔ budoddo ammɛ. Ayyɔɔt la ammɛ inaangbong kɛnaang ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ waan la abassɛ ka kɔlɔɔk a Kuttu-Budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
50002023	Vvenɛ ntɔɔmmɛ nfeewɔyɔng nlenɛ lɛsan tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lilɔɔk lilé lile.
50002024	Ka lakke Uyini nttina nttɛ vvenɛ nffu ka ɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng ssuma ssuma mung.
50002025	Nttinabong nttɛ kɔyyɛɛp mung kɛtɔɔm ɔkpana ayyɔɔt Epaphroditus kɛppyɛlɛ kifeewɔyɔng. Ɔnaang kɛnaang, ullu kullu ka kufoom kwa anaam. Uttelenɛbong nnaang kɛnaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ uyilabɔtɔɔm annyɔɔng wa annyinɛnɛyɔng ka ɛkɛtɛ nggyannɛ kɛyaam.
50002026	Uggele gaang gaang ɔttɛ ɔyɛnwɔyɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ɔgbaa luppyam lusimɛ lɛyyɛɛp ka uppyeenɛ ɔttɛ appyeeyɔngbong iffaak ammɛ.
50002027	Ka lɔkkwɔɔn ɔffaakmɛ naanga ubbe. Ɔzzànga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyɔɔmɛ kibbe-lɛttɔ. Kibbe-lɛttɔ la ammɛ keem lissi ka ɔyɔɔnɛ, ɔyɔɔ gbaak la anaam ka ɔsanganɛnɛ ka kɛbbɔl a lavve sa nzang bulenɛ.
50002028	Nyanga luttina gaang gaang nttɛ ntɔɔmmɛ nfeewɔyɔng, nkwaaning aggeleyɔng ka ale abalmɛyɔng lɛyɛn, ɔlɔk kɛbbɔl a lavve sa anaam kɛsaal.
50002029	Atɔkmɛyɔng ka laggele, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔkpana annyɔɔng ka itutum Uyini. Annyiyɔng kɛssanga balɔɔt tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ammɛ baang latele.
50002030	Ɔsam kuddu ammɛ unnyi lubbe, usseke ssup nzang ubbe ka lɛttɔ kɛnaang a Christ ɔttɛ nkwaaning ɔyaamnɛ kɛyaam sa annyɔɔng ale asinɛyɔng likkwoong ayaamyɔng.
50003001	Ikpana anaam, ntele lɛttɔ nttɛ Uyini unnyiwɔyɔng laggele za lɛbaang. Gɔɔ nɛ ba kukoolo kɛppyɛlɛ kɛlɔɔk kwa nlenɛ lɛkkpɔk kkpal ka kule kɔgbaawɔyɔng kɛkat a kɛyɔɔng.
50003002	Akatyɔng kwa ibbwa ’yɔng baang ya banaangnɛ babbu bɛfɛɛn kɔbɛtɛbɛ kwa kɛmmwang a bilee ka kkwɔɔt tɛ.
50003003	Ayyɔɔt ilenɛ balɔɔt ba batɔknɛ kɛzza lɛtaa sa lɔkkwɔɔn. Kɛzza lɛtaa sa ayyɔɔt ulenɛ kɛzɔɔm kinnyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka Kuyeeng Ammɛ. Ayyɔɔt ɔwaayɛlɛ kwa lafal ayyɔɔt ka Christ Jesus, abbɛ lissi. Ayyɔɔt kwa lɛtɔm a kɛzza lataa ba ittina itum. Isan kwa kuddu ayyɔɔt ka kiyila kwa Christ Jesus.
50003004	Kukkwoong mung kɔbɛtɛnɛ kwa bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng baang. Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk uttina ɔttɛ kukkwoong mung kɔbɛtɛmɛ ammɛ kwa kɛzza lɛtaa, anaam nttanɛ ifɛɛt lɛyanga ya kɔbɛtɛnɛnɛ kwa kɛzza lɛtaa.
50003005	Badɔkɔ bamaatnɛ ka Israel ka kikkwu a Bɛnjamin. Wa Hebrew ɔmaatnɛnɛ unnyi wa Hebrew ɔfɔɔn. Ɔggbanɛnɛ liwaazɛ, babɛkɛnɛ lɛtaa. Ka liloko Lafɔɔ a balɔɔt Jews, ndɔkɔ wa Pharisees.
50003006	Nsaknɛ lafɔɔ Balɔɔt a Jews litele nsseke ka nyɔɔnɛ balɔɔt a luzɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm akama. Ka kulenɛ kɔttɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔyyɛɛp ka ɔnaangnɛ kwa Lafɔɔ lalɔɔknɛ, kibbi nsi lizzi.
50003007	Ɔzzànga bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ bya ndɔkɔnɛ nttɛ isak anaam ka iyaadɛ, gedegede mung nsanbong ka lɛttɔ a Christ nttɛ isak lissi.
50003008	Bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng keem lissi. Nsumalabong bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bɛsaal ka kɔlɔɔk kwa kɔttanɛ kwa doddo lile. Ka kɔlɔɔk a Jesus, Uyini, anaam nsambong bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ nzzɔɔk kang. Nfimbong babbu bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ nkwaaning nyanga Christ.
50003009	Nnaang ’kwɔng nttɛ nkwaaning ntaa ka bɔkaat la ammɛ. Kɛtaa bbwak sa anaam biini sa kilenɛnɛ isak ka kitele Lafɔɔ ba nbɛlɛ lɛyanga. Gedegede mung nyanga kɛtaa bbwak sa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyinɛnɛ ka kɛyanga kiyila ka Christ. Kɛtaa bbwak ’sɔng kissi ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kiffu. Ɔzzànga kile ka kiyila.
50003010	Kwa nggyannɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ule kɛsan a Christ, la lakke kifungala ammɛ ka lubbe, ɔkkɔɔnɛ nssɛ nyɛn akama tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ammɛ usseke nbbe lubbe ammɛ.
50003011	Uwɔng ulenɛ ɛtɔk ya nttinanɛ nttɛ vvenɛ nkkwoong nfungala ka lubbe nppyɛlɛ ntaa ka kuddu.
50003012	Ba ntaka nttina nttɛ anaam nbɛtɛbong ɔlɔk nttina nttɛ anaam nttabong doddo lɛnaang. Nle baang ka nbumnɛ nttɛ nzang anaam nbɛtɛ nyanga lɛsɔɔk ka kɛbɛtɛ sa Christ Jesus ulenɛ lɛggba lɛbɛtɛ ɔyanganɛ.
50003013	Ikpana anaam, kule kule ba ntaka nttina ka lɔkkwɔɔn nttɛ, nbɛtɛbong. Ɔzzànga bɔfɛɛn bbwɔn bwa nnaangnɛ, ule kisumala bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya bilenɛnɛ ka isimi. Nbum gaang gaang nttɛ nffɔ ka bya bilenɛ ka lusso.
50003014	Kwakkwɛ baang nmmanɛ ssɔng nmii ka lakpeke nkwaaning ntɔk lɛsɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm za lilenɛ kɛkkwɔɔ sa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkɔɔmnɛ Jesus ɔkkwɔɔnɛ unnyinɛ lɛfal za libat.
50003015	Ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt ba ilenɛ bagɛlɛnya ka kɛyanga kiyila, lile iyangayɔng kɛssanga linaang ssɔn. Annyɔɔng balɔk ayanganɛyɔng linaang buu buu, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔnaangwɔyɔng asanyɔng ’kwɔng ppwool.
50003016	Mkkpa kɔnaang, kule kule ning baang. Afɔngɔ ikupyɔng ɛtɔk ’yɔng baang ya iggbanɛ lissi ikupyɔng tɔttɔt uffu ɔffɔ ka mmwɔɔn mung.
50003017	Akeetnɛyɔng anaam tɔttɔt, ikpana anaam. Ɔzzànga appyeeyɔng kwa balɔɔt ba bakupnɛ eleme ’yɔng baang ya iyɔɔnɛbɛ.
50003018	Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔngbong ’kwɔng kkpal bikkpit ggbadam, ɔzzànga gedegede mung nbbalwɔyɔngbong lɛbwɔɔlɔ la liyyeen ka zzeen nttɛ: Balɔɔt bale ggbadam ba linaang abbɛ linaangnɛbɛ bale balɔɔt a kɔfɔk a lubbe a Christ.
50003019	Lafal abbɛ lale lakpeke ka lɔkɔɔn, ka ebinukkpaapi abbɛ elenɛ bɛfɛɛn bya bɛsaapnɛbɛ. Bakɔɔm babbu linaang battele kippe. Battina kwa bɛfɛɛn bya bilenɛ ka vveeng ’wɔng keem.
50003020	Ayyɔɔt ilenɛyɔng balɔɔt Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Mung itaa ikatyɔng kiffu ɔkkala-ikkala wa ussinɛ ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ammɛ ulenɛ Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ.
50003021	Vvenɛ ufooloyɛlɛ kkwɔɔt sa lilenɛ libbe ɔnaangyɛlɛsɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ sa ammɛ. Ule ɔkɔɔm likke ’zɔng baang za ɔbɛtɛnɛ bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔ̀zzánga uzzilɛttɔ ɛkpansi.
50004001	Ikpana anaam, alenɛyɔng ka luppyam gaang gaang. Nɛ ba kɔsaap ka ngbatanɛ nssekewɔyɔng. Anaangnɛyɔng nggele gaang gaang, ɔkkyaanɛ kwa annyɔɔng. Ikpana anaam ka luppyam. Uwɔng ulenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ale abeeyɔng kkpɔk ka lafal annyɔɔng ka Uyini.
50004002	Nkkpenge Euodia la Syntyche nttɛ, ellee, babum bataa ka bɔkaat ka balenɛ ba Uyini.
50004003	Annɔ ɔgbaa, ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ anaam, nggyan nttɛ ayaamyɔng bwanavva ’bɔng baang. Banaangbong kɛnaang gaang gaang la anaam battɛ bakɔɔm lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bawaala ɔbɛtɛ la Clement la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ anaam ba lakɔɔl abbɛ lalenɛ ka luvva kuddu lile.
50004004	Aggeleyɔng ka alenɛyɔng ka bɔkaat la Jesus. Nbbal lɛlɔɔk: aggeleyɔng!
50004005	Aggeleyɔng! Ayyɛɛpyɔng linaang la balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ, Uyini ule ɔkka liffu.
50004006	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ attinayɔng kwa bɔfɛɛn bulɔk, ɔzzànga ɛkɛtɛ duu ya azɔɔmnɛ abapyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bwa aggyannɛyɔng, abapmɛyɔng la luppyam gwa doddo ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
50004007	Bɔkaat Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bwa buttanɛ lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔssɛbibit usibwɛ lɛsan, bulokowɔyɔng ippyam la ittina bbɛɛm ka Christ Jesus.
50004008	Ka kitele lɛttɔ, ikpana anaam, assɛɛnyɔng bɛfɛɛn bya bɛyyɛɛpnɛ bya balɔɔt bale babunguwɔyɔng ka ittina. Abbyɛ bilenɛ bɛfɛɛn bya lɔkkwɔɔn, bɛyyɛɛp bile bbwak, bɛyyɛɛp lɛppyɛɛk bɛyanga latele.
50004009	Anaangyɔng kwa alenɛyɔng lippyee ka nlɔɔknɛ, alenɛyɔng lɛyɛn ka zzeen kwa nnaangnɛ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa unnyinɛyɛlɛ bɔkaat vvenɛ ubee la annyɔɔng.
50004010	Nggele gaang gaang ka kuddu kwa nyanganɛ ka Uyini. Ɔmmɛbong ka appyɛɛknɛnɛyɔng. Mung abbalyɔngbong kufuk lɛyanga kwa kɛppyɛɛknɛ. Ba nlɔɔk nttɛ nɛ yɔng ba abɛlɛyɔng lɛppyɛɛk, ɔ̀zzànga adɔkɔ asiyɔng kufuk lɛyanga kwa kɛppyɛɛknɛ.
50004011	Ning ba nlɔɔk ka nttinanɛ nttɛ asumalanɛyɔngbong. Anaam ɔgbɔnɔnɛbong. Bwa nyanganɛ, abbwɛ baang buyyɛɛpnɛbong.
50004012	Nsan mung kwa kulenɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ aggyannɛ bɔfɛɛn, la kwa kulenɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ayanganɛ bɔfɛɛn asak. Nkkoopbong kɔlɔɔk a lalup ’kwɔng nkwaaning nle la liwukala ɛfɛɛn duu, ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔlɔk nppyɛɛ nle la buwɔɔng, ɔlɔk nyanga bɛfɛɛn ggbadam ɔlɔk nsi bulɔk lɛyanga, kulenɛ ppyɔk.
50004013	Nyanga lakke za Christ unnyinɛnɛ, za kibee kkpɔk ka lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ.
50004014	Ɔzzànga ayyɛɛpyɔng bɛnaang asakyɔng ka atelenɛnɛyɔng ka lilɔɔk.
50004015	Annyɔɔng balɔɔt a Philippi biini asanyɔng lɔsan attɛyɔng ka ngbatanɛ ka Macedonia, ka ɛkɛtɛ nttenɛ kikopolo Kuttu-Budoddo, annyɔɔng alenɛyɔng luzɔɔm gwa attelenɛnɛyɔng. Annyɔɔng alenɛyɔng balɔɔt ba itulnɛ isak anaam la ibbɔl anaam izziyɔng.
50004016	Bikkpit ning bɛffa ka nggyannɛ kɛyaam ka Thessalonica, ayaamnɛyɔng.
50004017	Kɛttɛ nggyan kɛtɔk a lɛsɔɔk gbɔɔ lissi, lutini ’gwɔng, iggyan ittɛ iyɛn isak ka igbaanɛ ka luffik a lɛfal annyɔɔng.
50004018	Uwɔng ulenɛ kɛbwɔɔlɔ kɛttɛ nyɛnbong bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya annyinɛnɛyɔng ka Epaphroditus ulenɛ lɛtɔɔm ufeenɛ bɛttalabong bɛsak. Nyangabong bwa nggyannɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung bɛtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɛfɛɛn bya bɛyyɛɛpnɛ kizoom bya bannyinɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔk ka lɛtɔm za lɛsaapmɛnɛ.
50004019	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm anaam la iyyɛɛp ammɛ ya lɛbaang ka Christ Jesus, vvenɛ ɔssɛ unnyiwɔyɔng bwa aggyannɛyɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ.
50004020	Latele lale za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Dedde ayyɔɔt, ka kɛfal a kɛfal kulening.
50004021	Nwomobong balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ ba balenɛ ba Christ Jesus. Ikpana ayyɔɔt ya balenɛ mung la anaam battɛ nwomowɔyɔng.
50004022	Balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba balenɛ mung ɔkkpɛlɛ, gaang gaang balɔɔt ba balenɛ ssala Ubeet battɛ nwomowɔyɔng.
50004023	Numa Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, ɔnaangwɔyɔng ppyɛɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
51001001	Paul, wa kɔsaapnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangmɛ ɔttɛ ɔ̀zzánga Uyilabɔtɔɔm a Christ Jesus, ɔkkpɔknɛ lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng la ɔkpana ayyɔɔt Timothy
51001002	ifee balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba balenɛ ka Colossae bale ikpana ayyɔɔt ka kiyila ka Christ Jesus. Dedde ayyɔɔt, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔnaangwɔyɔng ppyɛɛ unnyiwɔyɔng bɔkaat.
51001003	Iwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Abassɛ Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, kɛnaang ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ya izɔɔmnɛ issɛɛnwɔyɔng.
51001004	Ippyeebong kwa kiyila annyɔɔng ka Christ Jesus la kɛsaap sa balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ basaapwɔnɛyɔng.
51001005	Ka ɛkɛtɛ ya lɛmwɔɔl za lɔkkwɔɔn za lilenɛ Kuttu-Budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm littenɛ liffu, appyeeyɔng luttina gwa lɛssɛɛnnɛ. Kwakkwɛ kiyila annyɔɔng la kɛsaap bilenɛ ka kwa attinanɛ atumyɔng. Akkwɛ kulenɛ kwa bale babɔngɔlɔwɔyɔng kwɛ ka budoddo ka libat.
51001006	Kuttu-budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔkɔɔm ppyɛɛ kufeewɔyɔng. Kule baang ka kɔwaalanɛ ɛkpansi tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɔnaangnɛ la annyɔɔng ka ussinɛ ka kɛtɔm sa appyeenɛyɔng kwɛ asanyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kulenɛ ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
51001007	Akkoopyɔngbong kɔlɔɔk a ppyɛɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka Epaphras wayyɔɔt a bɔɔyi wa ɔnaangnɛ kɛnaang doddo unnyi Christ ka lɛttɔ ayyɔɔt.
51001008	Ɔbwɔɔlɔyɛlɛ kɔlɔɔk a kɛsaap sa Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kulewɔnɛyɔng linnyi.
51001009	Kwakkwɛ baang izɔɔmnɛ ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ issɛɛnwɔyɔng ka issinɛ ippyee kɔlɔɔk annyɔɔng. Ibap Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ittɛ unnyiwɔyɔng bikɔɔm la kɛsan a kɛnaang ammɛ, la bɛfɛɛn bya Kuyeeng kunnyinɛ.
51001010	Ning vvenɛ ataayɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Uyini ɔggyannɛ, anaangyɔng kwa kɔsaapmɛnɛ ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Lafal annyɔɔng vvenɛ layyɛɛp ka utini linaang sa doddo ɔkkpɛlɛ. Vvenɛ ammalayɔng ka kɛsan a kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
51001011	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangwɔyɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng akkaamyɔng, la lakke ɔkkpɛlɛ za lassinɛ ka ammɛ, nkwaaning akkwoong abbɔyɔng akama la kibbe luppyam.
51001012	Awomoyɔng Dedde Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang la laggele. Ɔnaangwɔyɔng akkɔnɔyɔng kitul a bɛfɛɛn bya ɔbɔngɔlɔnɛ balɔɔt ammɛ ka ɛsam a buppwolo.
51001013	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkalabongyɛlɛ ka labɔɔk a lakke bubbi, ɔkɔɔmyɛlɛ la bɔppwa kkwɔɔt uffu ka ɛsam a Waan ammɛ wa luppyam wa ɔsanganɛ ka kɔlɔɔk. Kɛsanga ka kɔlɔɔk ulenɛ kɛttɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsɔɔkbongyɛlɛ bubbi ayyɔɔt.
51001015	Christ ulenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa iyɛnnɛ isan Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa isinɛ lɛyɛn. Ammɛ ulenɛ Waan wa battenɛ lɛmaat. Ammɛ ɔttanɛ bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔmnɛ.
51001016	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkɔɔmmɛ ammɛ ɔlɔɔm bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ka libat la ɛkpansi, bya iyɛnnɛ la bya isinɛ lɛyɛn, liyeeng, bakɔɔm-ɛfɛɛn la bazzilɛttɔ.
51001017	Ammɛ uttenɛ bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ lɛfal liffu. Bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bɛtaanɛ ka bɔkaat la ammɛ, bɛyanga kɛtaa abbyɛ sa bbwak.
51001018	Ammɛ ulenɛ lɛttɔ a kkwɔɔt ammɛ, sa lilenɛ luzɔɔm. Kuddu a kkwɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ kussi ka ammɛ. Ammɛ ulenɛ ɔkɔɔm-ɛtɔk, Awaan wa ufungalanɛ ka lubbe, nkwaaning ammɛ kɛyɔɔng ɔkɔɔm ɛtɔk ɔyanga bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ.
51001019	Kɔdɔkɔ ka luttina Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm biini tɛ́ttɛ́ Awaan ɔyanga lɛfal za lɔkkwɔɔn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ za ammɛ biini.
51001020	Kussi ka lubbe Awaan, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaang weengodde la balɔɔt ka ussinɛ ka lubbe Awaan ka Cross, ɔppyɛlɛ ɔtɔk bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ɛkpansi ɔbɛtɛ la libat ɔyanga.
51001021	Ka iyaadɛ, adɔkɔyɔng fulufulu assekeyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Adɔkɔyɔng balɔɔt a kɔfɔk ammɛ ka babbu bɛfɛɛn bya anaangnɛyɔng la bya attinanɛyɔng.
51001022	Ɔzzànga mung, ka ussinɛ ka lubbe gwa kkwɔɔt Awaan ammɛ libbenɛ ka lagabwɔ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangwɔyɔngbong ɛnngwa, nkwaaning ɔsamwɔyɔng bbwak, kpaladada, la kɛsɛlɛ bubbi umii ka lusso ammɛ.
51001023	Ka lɔkkwɔɔn, akɔɔmyɔng kiyila annyɔɔng bbwak, ka lutte gwa lɔkkaamnɛ. Afɔngɔyɔng kɛnnyɛkɛ ka kiyila sa alenɛyɔng lɛyanga ka appyeenɛyɔng kuttu-budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Kussi ka kuttu-budoddo ’kwɔng mung anaam Paul nzzanga bɔɔyi. Kuttu-budoddo ’kwɔng mung kulenɛ kwa balenɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ lɛbwɔɔlɔ ka ɛkpansi.
51001024	Ɔzzánga gedegede mung, nggele uggele nsak ka akama wa nyɛnnɛ nnyiwɔyɔng. Ka kɛyɛn akama anaam, nvvebong akama wa bussekenɛ wa Christ buyɛnnɛ ka lɛttɔ a kkwɔɔt ammɛ sa lilenɛ luzɔɔm.
51001025	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛbong ɔttɛ nsseke bɔɔyi luzɔɔm. Ammɛ unnyinɛnɛ ’kwɔng ɔttɛ nnaang ka budoddo annyɔɔng. Nkwɔng kulenɛ bɔtɔɔm ammɛ bwa ɔttɛnɛ nbwɔɔlɔ ppwool.
51001026	Akkwɛ kulenɛ kɔlɔɔk a lalup kwa ulupnɛ usseke ɔssɛbibit iyɛddɛ iyɛddɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ɔzzànga gedegede mung ɔbwɔɔlɔbong balɔɔt ammɛ kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng baang.
51001027	Kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uttinanɛ ulenɛ ’kwɔng: Ɔttɛ ɔnaang balɔɔt basan kɔlɔɔk a lalup ammɛ. Akkwɛ kulenɛ iyyɛɛp ’yɔng ya lɛbaang la latele za ɔyanganɛ la ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ. Kɔlɔɔk a lalup ’kwɔng baang ulenɛ ’kwɔng: Christ ule la annyɔɔng. Ning baang ulenɛ kɛttɛ vvenɛ ayangayɔng etini ka laggele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
51001028	Ibwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ kɔlɔɔk a Christ. Ittamabɛ, ikopolobɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ la bisana pya iyanganɛ nkwaaning ikɔɔm ɔlɔɔt la duu imii ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt wa ulenɛ kɔlɔɔk lɛsan ka bɔkaat ammɛ la Christ.
51001029	Ka nggyannɛ nttɛ nnaang ’kwɔng, nkɔɔm lakke za Christ unnyinɛnɛ za lalenɛ ka kɛnaang ka kkwɔɔt anaam nbum nnaang kɛnaang.
51002001	Ssiibong nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ nlenɛ kɛnaang lɛnaang ka lɛttɔ balɔɔt a Laodicea ɔbɛtɛ la balɔɔt ba batakanɛnɛ ka zzeen lɛyɛn.
51002002	Nkwɔng mung nnaang nkwaaning bakkaam luppyam, ɔlɔk baffu bataa ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn ka kɛsaap, bayanga iyyɛɛp ya lɔkkwɔɔn ya kɛsan a kɔlɔɔk sa bbwak kile kɛkɔɔm kiffu. Vvenɛ basan Christ biini, wa ulenɛ bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulupnɛ.
51002003	Ammɛ ulenɛ ɛkpɔkɔlɔ ya ewongolonɛ libɔngɔ iyyɛɛp la bisana, la kukele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ.
51002004	Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ afɔngɔyɔng ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔkɔɔmwɔyɔng ugbigbini ka kɛyyɛɛp a kamma.
51002005	Mkkpa nsi lile la annyɔɔng ka ɛkkpa-kkwɔɔt nle baang la annyɔɔng ka kuyeeng. Nggele ngbaa ka nyɛnwɔnɛyɔng kkpɔk ka abeenɛyɔng ka kiyila annyɔɔng ka Christ.
51002006	Ataayɔng ka bɔkaat la Christ Jesus ka alemɛnɛyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Uyini annyɔɔng lɛtɔk.
51002007	Iffaat annyɔɔng imal ddɔng ka kkwɔɔt a Christ. Abɔɔkyɔng lɛfal annyɔɔng ka libat ammɛ. Assekeyɔng kkɔk ka akkaamnɛyɔng ka kɛnaang ammɛ la kiyila tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bakopolowɔnɛyɔng. Kiwomo kɛnaang kɛttalawɔyɔng ka ippyam.
51002008	Asanyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔlɔɔt uffu ɔkɔɔm kɛsan a kukele sa vveeng ’wɔng mung ɔdɛmwɔyɔng. Kɛsan a kɔlɔɔk ’sɔng kissi ka lukopolo gwa ɔssɛbibit la liyeeng ɛkpansi likopolonɛ, ka Christ ba kissi.
51002009	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ ammɛ ullu ka Christ ka lɛfal ammɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt.
51002010	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyiwɔyɔngbong kuddu kwa bbwak ka bɔkaat annyɔɔng la Christ. Ammɛ ɔttanɛ lutini lakke ɔssɛbibit ɔkkpɛlɛ ka vveeng ’wɔng mung.
51002011	Ussi ka bɔkaat bwa ayanganɛyɔng la Christ tɛ́ttɛ́ bazzawɔyɔng lataa. Kɛzza lɛtaa sa balɔɔt bazzanɛ lissi, sa Christ biini ɔzzanɛ. Assɛ kilenɛ, kɛ̀ttá ka lakke bubbi a kkwɔɔt ’sɔng.
51002012	Ka banaangwɔnɛyɔng baptizim, balliwɔyɔngbong la Christ. Ka baptizim ’wɔng baang ɔgbaa, assɛbong afungalayɔng ka lubbe la Christ ka kiyila sa ayanganɛ atumyɔng lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ufungalanɛ Christ ka lubbe.
51002013	Ɛkɛtɛ ɛdɔkɔ baang ya abbenɛyɔng ka ittina annyɔɔng ɔssanga bubbi bwa anaangnɛyɔng. Ɔgbaa ka alenɛyɔng Ikanakana asɛlɛyɔng Lifɔɔ. Ɔzzànga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ufungalawɔyɔngbong ka lubbe assekeyɔng ka kuddu la Christ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsɔɔkbongyɛlɛ bubbi ayyɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ.
51002014	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔmbong luffik a bubbi annyɔɔng ubbum la lafɔɔ abbwɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ususukubong ippwoot a bubbi ayyɔɔt ’yɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ɔsamnɛyɛ ɔkama bɛfɔl ɔkaka ka Cross.
51002015	Christ ɔssɛ la Cross ’wɔng baang ɔtta ka labɔɔk a bakɔɔm-a-liyeeng, la bayanga-lakke ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ɔnaangbɛ basseke bɔfɛɛn a lɛppyɛɛk ka battulunɛ bɛkaan bakupmɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ battɔ-ka-kɔlɔɔk ɛkɛtɛ ɔbɛtɛnɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
51002016	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk unnyiwɔyɔng lafɔɔ utum kazzi ɔlɔk kɛvva. Gɔɔ tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔssɛɛnzɛ utum lavve za kiloko ɔlɔk lɛtɔm Ufaa Ettuma, ɔlɔk Kɛfɛkɛlɛ.
51002017	Bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ bilenɛ kuyeeng a bɛfɛɛn bya bile bɛnaang ka lusso; Christ ulenɛkwɛ akkwɛ ssɔng.
51002018	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ afɔngɔyɔng ɔlɔɔt wa uffikmɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng ɔttɛ ammɛ uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt utum biyɛnɛ bya ɔyɛnnɛ ɔnaangwɔyɔng attɔyɔng ka ubbu kɔlɔɔk. Ɔzzanga ɔttɛ bukkengga ammɛ butum ka kɛnaang ɛnngwa la Uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Kɛssanga ɔlɔɔt sa ning baang kile ukun wa gbɔɔ ka babbu ittina ammɛ la linaang.
51002019	Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔkkyaabong kiloko luttina ka Christ wa ulenɛ lɛttɔ a kkwɔɔt ɔfɔngɔ. Ka ilenɛ ka kɛkɔɔm a Christ kkwɔɔt lileyɛlɛ fulɛfulɛ. Lagbeel la bɛffaat bɛnaangsɛ likkaam, limmala tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyannɛ.
51002020	Abbeyɔngbong la Christ, bakkyaawɔyɔngbong ka lilɔɔk a vveeng ’wɔng bafɔngɔ. Mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ atiiyɔng baang ka anaangnɛyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ alenɛyɔng ba vveeng ’wɔng? Mbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ ateleyɔng lafɔɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ’zɔng:
51002021	“Tɛ̀ttɛ́ asingiyɔng mbwɔng”, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ allɛyɔng mbwɔng kang,” “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ asingiyɔng mbbwakang.”?
51002022	Bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ balenɛ lɛffɔ bakɔɔmbyɛ, bisseke bya kɛzzɔɔk. Uwɔng baang lafɔɔ ɔlɔɔt ɔnaangnɛ, ɔkɔɔm ukopolo.
51002023	Ɔzzánga ka ayɛnnɛbɛ bataa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ basannɛ kɔlɔɔk ka kɛzɔɔm kinnyi bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la kɛbbwa bukee-waan, la kɛnaang a bɛfɛɛn a bɔssɔp ka kkwɔɔt ɔlɔɔt; kwa kɛkat a kkwɔɔt abbɛ ba battina. Ɔzzànga isak ya lɔkkwɔɔn ba bayanga ka bayɛnnɛ akama kkwɔɔt ’wɔng.
51003001	Afungalayɔngbong ka lubbe la Christ. Appyɛɛ asam ippyam annyɔɔng annyiyɔng bɛfɛɛn bya bilenɛ ka libat, ka ɛfɛɛn a Christ ɔtaanɛ ka kɔbɔɔk ɛlaabɔɔk Abassɛ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
51003002	Asam ittina annyɔɔng alokoyɔng ka bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng bakang, tɛ̀ttɛ́ alokoyɔngyɛ ka bɛfɛɛn bya ɛkpansi mung.
51003003	Abbeyɔngbong, ɔzzànga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔkbong kuddu annyɔɔng la kwa Christ ulup ka kkwɔɔt ammɛ.
51003004	Kuddu annyɔɔng biini ulenɛ Christ. Ɛkɛtɛ ya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule ɔnaang Christ wa ulenɛ kuddu annyɔɔng ɔtta ka vveeng, annyɔɔng ɔgbaa vvenɛ assɛ attayɔng ayangayɔng etini ka lakke la latele ammɛ.
51003005	Awwɔɔlyɔng kɛsaap a bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ bya bilewɔnɛyɔng ka kkwɔɔt. Abbyɛ bilenɛ kɛssɛ-kɛzak, kɛbbɔl a tɔkɔlɔ, babbu linaang, ikkɔlɔ, ubbu luttina. (Kuwɔnɔk kɔtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛzɔɔm ɛlat)
51003006	Ka bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔnyanga la balɔɔt ba bafimmɛnɛ kitele.
51003007	Annyɔɔng ɔgbaa ɛkɛtɛ ɛdɔkɔ baang ya akupnɛyɔng babbu linaang ’sɔng baang ka ɛkɛtɛ lafal annyɔɔng latiinɛ ka kɔkɔɔm a bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng baang.
51003008	Ɔzzànga gedegede mung ɔllɛ ka akkyaanɛyɔng bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ afɔngɔyɔng: Kitun a kɔlɔɔk, kɛssɔp a luppyam la luttina kɛnaang a kɔfɔk. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ babbu lilɔɔk sa libbɔlnɛ libɛlɛwɔyɔng ka kamma lɛtta.
51003009	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akkala wannyɔɔng lɛlaak ka alenɛyɔng ɔtɔm a lafal lɛkkyaa azzɔɔkyɔng la babbu linaang assɛ,
51003010	aleyɔng ufaa lɛyanga. Uwɔng ulenɛ ufaa ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔm assɛ, ulenɛ baang ka ɔnaangnɛsɛ ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ liyyɛɛp tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ammɛ. Ɔnaang ning mung nkwaaning asanmɛyɔng gaang gaang.
51003011	Kwakkwɛ baang Wakanakana usinɛ lile, wa Jews usi lile, bazza lataa la basi lataa lɛzza basi lile. Batolo babbu likaan ba babɛlɛ lile. Babbyap ba bale. Babili ba babɛlɛ lile. Basi babili lile ba babɛlɛ lile. Christ ulenɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ. Ulebɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
51003012	Annyɔɔng, balɔɔt-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, asaapmɛyɔng lɔsaap tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔsangawɔyɔng ɔttɛ aleyɔng ba ammɛ. Ka kulenɛ ning lile, ɔllɛ ka ɔlɔɔt ubbewɔnɛyɔng lɛttɔ. Aggwoomyɔng kɔlɔɔk, ateleyɔng ɔlɔɔt, abbeyɔng luppyam ka kɔlɔɔk, akɔɔmwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng ɔgbaa.
51003013	Ayaamyɔng wannyɔɔng. Asɔɔkyɔng wannyɔɔng bubbi bwa ɔnaangnɛ la annyɔɔng. Ule ɔllɛ ka asɔɔknɛyɔng wannyɔɔng bubbi tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Uyini ulewɔnɛyɔng annyɔɔng lɛsɔɔk.
51003014	Asamyɔng kɛsaap anɔkyɔng baang la abbyɛ, usseke kɛggbɔbyɛ kiloko ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn ka bɔkaat bwa lɔkkwɔɔn.
51003015	Bɔkaat bwa Christ unnyinɛ butaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ikata ka ippyam annyɔɔng. Kussi ka bɔkaat ’bwɔng mung Christ ulokowɔyng ka kkwɔɔt ssɔn. Aggeleyɔng gaang gaang ka akkwɛ mung.
51003016	Lɛmmwɔɔl a Christ ɔkkpɛlɛ azzɛ lɛtaa la annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ippyam. Akopolowɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng ka itɔk a lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ ya bisana. Asoomyɔng kisoom a kutolo a David, la bisoom bya bɛllɔtnɛ buyili annyiyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la kiwomo kɛnaang ka ippyam.
51003017	Kɔlɔɔk duu kwa anaangnɛyɔng, ɔlɔk alɔɔkyɔng kɔ̀ppyɛ́ɛ̀ kutum Jesus Uyini, ka assɛnɛyɔng ka ammɛ awomoyɔng abassɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang.
51003018	Bwanavva ssala bwalam, ateleyɔng bwalam annyɔɔng, ka ulenɛ kukkam a kɔlɔɔk kwa kɛnaang ka alenɛyɔng balɔɔt a kɔssɛ Uyini.
51003019	Batɔk a bwanavva, bwanavva annyɔɔng basaapwɔyɔng, tɛ̀ttɛ́ anyangayɔngbɛ.
51003020	Bwɔɔntiti ateleyɔng issakawɔ la issaawɔ annyɔɔng. Uwɔng baang ulenɛ kɛnaang annyɔɔng balɔɔt a kɔssɛ Uyini. Nkwɔng kulenɛ kwa kɔsaapnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
51003021	Ibassɛ a bwɔɔn, tɛ̀ttɛ́ anaangyɔng bwaan annyɔɔng kɔlɔɔk kwa kutunnɛbɛ, vvenɛ bási kwa ssɔng lɛbɛlɛ lɛnaang.
51003022	Annyɔɔng babili ateleyɔng issaawɔ annyɔɔng ya ɛkpansi ka itɔk a lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ anaangyɔng kwa ɛdda ɔlɔk babunguwɔyɔng. Ɔllɛ ka anaangnɛyɔng kwa ka kɛyyɛɛp a luppyam ka alenɛyɔng ba Uyini.
51003023	Bɔfɛɛn duu bwa anaangnɛyɔng, anaangyɔngbwɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ anaangnɛ annyiyɔng Uyini. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ anaangyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ anaangnɛ annyiyɔng balɔɔt ɛkpansi.
51003024	Akke asan attɛyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔsɔɔkwɔyɔng bwa ulenɛ balɔɔt ammɛ liloko. Christ ulenɛ ssaawɔ annyɔɔng wa anaangnɛyɔng kɛnaang ammɛ.
51003025	Ɔnaang-a-bubbi duu vvenɛ ɔssɛ ɔyanga ikipili ɔssanga kɛssanga kɔlɔɔk kwa ɔnaangnɛ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkaal kɛkaal ɔssɛbibit ɔkkpɛlɛ la kamma kɛkaal kkwɔn.
51004001	Ibassɛ babili, akɔɔmyɔng babili annyɔɔng doddo. Akke attɛyɔng annyɔɔng assɛ ayangayɔng ssaawɔ wa annyɔɔng ka libat.
51004002	Assɛɛnyɔng luzɔɔm ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Agepeleyɔng ka azɔɔmnɛ annyiyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la kiwomo kɛnaang.
51004003	Ka ɛkɛtɛ nnyɔn ’yɔng baang assɛ azɔɔm annyiyɔngyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt, nkwaaning Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyiyɛlɛ kufuk kwa kikopolo lɛmmwɔɔl ammɛ la kɛbwɔɔlɔ kɔlɔɔk a lalup a Christ. Akkwɛ baang kulenɛ kwa nlenɛ ka igbakkɔpɔ.
51004004	Azɔɔmyɔng nkwaaning nlɔɔk ppwool ppwool tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kulenɛ bbwak.
51004005	Akɔɔmyɔng kɛsan a kɔlɔɔk ataayɔng la balɔɔt ba basinɛ kiyila lɛyanga. Waan a kufuk duu kwa ayanganɛyɔng, akɔɔmnɛyɔng doddo.
51004006	Kutolo annyɔɔng kɔyyɛɛp, kuggwoom ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɛkɛtɛ duu. Asanyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ appyɛlɛnɛyɔng kamma kayyɛɛp ka lɔbap gwa ɔlɔɔt ɔbapnɛ.
51004007	Tichycus, ɔkpana ayyɔɔt wa luppyam, wayyɔɔt a bɔɔyi, wa ulokonɛ luttina ka kɛnaang Uyini, vvenɛ ɔbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng kɔlɔɔk anaam ɔkkpɛlɛ.
51004008	Kwakkwɛ nle ka ntɔɔmmɛnɛ uffu ɔnaangwɔyɔng aggeleyɔng, ka ule ɔbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt ilenɛ baang ka inaangnɛ.
51004009	Ammɛ la Onesimus, ɔkpana ayyɔɔt wa luppyam wa ulenɛ ka likup annyɔɔng ɔssɛ ule utele a zzeen ka kɛnaang Uyini vvenɛ baffu. Baffunɛ, vvenɛ babwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng kwa kɔnaangnɛ kaang ɔkkpɛlɛ.
51004010	Aristarchus wa ulenɛ ka igbakkɔpɔ mung la anaam ɔttɛ nwomowɔyɔng. Mark, waan etele a abassɛ a Barnabas ɔgbaa ɔttɛ nwomowɔyɔng. (Aggbayɔng lippyee bwa ale anaangyɔng ɛkɛtɛ duu ya ule uffu ka ɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng.)
51004011	Joshua, wa bakkwɔɔmɛnɛ Justus, ɔttɛ nwomowɔyɔng. Balɔɔt ba bakkyaat ’bɔng mung balenɛ balɔɔt a Jews ba ittina ilenɛbɛ lisikili bakupnɛ, banaang kɛnaang la anaam ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Abbɛ balenɛ balɔɔt ba battelenɛnɛ gaang gaang.
51004012	Epaphras, bɔɔyi a Christ, wa ɔssɛnɛ ule ka likup annyɔɔng ɔttɛ nwomowɔyɔng. Ɔzɔɔm ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ unnyiwɔyɔng ɔbap Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛ ɔnaangwɔyɔng ayangayɔng kiyila sa kɛkkaamnɛ, kiggbenge. Asikiliyɔng ippyam annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ atelemɛyɔng ka kɛnaang ammɛ.
51004013	Anaam biini nkkwoong mung nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng nttɛ ɔnaang kɛnaang gaang gaang unnyiwɔyɔng, annyɔɔng la balɔɔt a Laodicea la balɔɔt a Hierapolis.
51004014	Luke, dongkitta ayyɔɔt wa luppyam, la Demas battɛ nwomowɔyɔng.
51004015	Awomoyɔng ikpana ayyɔɔt ba balenɛ ka Laodicea, la Nympha la luzɔɔm gwa lɔtaanɛ ka ssala ammɛ.
51004016	Alenɛyɔng lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng mung livve lɛkkwɔɔ, assɛ akkwɔɔyɔngzɛ abwɔɔlɔyɔng luzɔɔm gwa Laodicea. Assɛ akkwɔɔyɔng lɛmmwɔɔl za balɔɔt a Laodicea bale bannyiwɔyɔng.
51004017	Abwɔɔlɔyɔng Archippus attɛyɔng, “Asan attɛ vvenɛ avve kɛnaang sa bannyiwɔnɛ battɛ anaang annyi Uyini tɛ.”
51004018	Anaam nkɔɔmnɛ kɔbɔɔk anaam nkkpɔk ’kwɔng: Anaam Paul nwomowɔyɔngbong. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ asumalayɔng ikpɔkɔlɔ ya ilenɛnɛ ka labɔɔk. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangwɔyɔng ppyɛɛ.
52001001	Anaam Paul, la Silas, la Timothy ikkpɔknɛ lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng mung ifeewɔyɔng annyɔɔng balɔɔt a luzɔɔm ka Thessalonica ba balenɛ ba Dedde Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la Jesus Christ, Uyini. Ppyɛɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la bɔkaat ammɛ butaa la annyɔɔng.
52001002	Iwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang ɛkɛtɛ duu innyiwɔyɔng. Italawɔyɔng ɛkɛtɛ duu ya issɛɛnnɛ luzɔɔm ayyɔɔt.
52001003	Ikkebong ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Dedde ayyɔɔt, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ayɔɔnɛyɔng kiyila annyɔɔng ka linaang, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛsaap annyɔɔng kɛnaangwɔnɛyɔng anaangyɔng kɛnaang gaang gaang. Ibbalwɔyɔng likke ka luttina annyɔɔng lɔkkaamnɛ lutum Jesus.
52001004	Ikpana anaam, isan lɔsan ittɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm asaapmɛyɔng lɔsaap, kwakkwɛ ɔsangawɔnɛyɔng ɔttɛ aleyɔng ba ammɛ.
52001005	Ka ikɔɔmnɛ Kuttu-Budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ifeewɔyɔng, ka lɛmmwɔɔl keem lissi ka ikɔɔmnɛ iffu. Idɔkɔ ikɔɔmkwɛ la lakke ɔbɛtɛ la Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, la lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ. Akkeyɔng mung tɛ̀ttɛ̀ idɔkɔnɛ itaa la annyɔɔng, ɔdɔkɔ kwa budoddo annyɔɔng.
52001006	Akeetyɔngbongyɛlɛ la Uyini, ɔzzànga mkkpa ayɛnyɔng akama, atɔkyɔngbong lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng mung za lissinɛ ka Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka laggele.
52001007	Ataayɔngbong tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt iyɔɔ ka lusso balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ kiyila ka Macedonia la Greece.
52001008	Kuttu kwa kussinɛ ka annyɔɔng kumii Macedonia la Greece baang keem kusi likpeke. Kumiibong ifɛɛn ifɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ. Bulɔk ba bubɛlɛ lile bwa ibbalnɛ lɛlɔɔk.
52001009	Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ balɔɔk kɔlɔɔk annyɔɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ akɔɔmnɛyɔngyɛlɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya iffunɛ ikoolowɔyɔng. Balɔɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ alenɛyɔng ilat annyɔɔng lɛsam azzɔɔkyɔng asseke ka akupnɛyɔng ɛtɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, atelenɛyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm a kuddu wa lɔkkwɔɔn.
52001010	Ataa akatyɔng Waan ammɛ ka ule ussi ka libat uffu. Waan ammɛ, Jesus, wa ufungalanɛ ka lubbe ɔkkalayɛlɛ ka binyanga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm pya bile biffu.
52002001	Ikpana anaam, annyɔɔng biini asanyɔng lɔsan attɛyɔng kikoolo sa iffunɛ ikoolowɔyɔng, ggbɔɔ kisi lɛttɔ kɛtaak.
52002002	Aggbayɔng lippyee tɛ̀ttɛ̀ banaangnɛyɛlɛ babbu bɛfɛɛn, banyɔɔkayɛlɛ ka Philippi, tɛ́ttɛ́ iffu ka ɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng mung ka Thessalonica. Ɔzzànga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyiyɛlɛ kɛkkaam a luppyam ɔttɛ ibwɔɔlɔ Kuttu-Budoddo ammɛ mkkpa ndɔk ikàngálá ittala.
52002003	Kɛkkwɔɔ sa ikkwɔɔwɔnɛyɔng kisi sa kɛbbɔlnɛ lile ɔlɔk ittina kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ ippyɛɛkwɔyɔng, tɛ́ttɛ́ vvenɛ iyanga luttina gwa kɛfɛɛt ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk.
52002004	Lutini ’gwɔng, ilɔɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛnɛyɛlɛ ilɔɔk ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ulenɛyɛlɛ lɛbwɔɔlɔ, ɔsam Kuttu-Budoddo ammɛ unnyiyɛlɛ. Ba ibum ittɛ inaang kwa kɔsaapnɛ balɔɔt, ibum ittɛ inaang kwa kule kɔsaap Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔllɛnɛ ileme ayyɔɔt.
52002005	Asanyɔng lɔsan ka lɔkkwɔɔn attɛyɔng kutolo kwa kɛkkala lɛlaak isi lɛkɔɔm iffu ka ɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng ɔlɔk vvenɛ ikɔɔm kɛyyɛɛp a kamma ivvoong kuwɔnɔk. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ tɛɛsɛ ayyɔɔt.
52002006	Isi lɛnaang ittɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ubunguyɛlɛ, gɔɔ annyɔɔng ɔlɔk balɔɔt balɔk.
52002007	Nzang ikkwoong mung ibapwɔyɔng bɛfɛɛn ka ilenɛ bayilabɔtɔɔm a Christ. Ɔzzànga idɔkɔ ikɔɔmwɔyɔng doddo ka idɔkɔnɛ la annyɔɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔmaat-a-bwɔɔn ɔkɔɔmnɛ bwaan ammɛ.
52002008	Kɛsaap sa asaapnɛyɔngyɛlɛ kɛnaangbong iyila kinnyiwɔyɔng lafal ayyɔɔt ɔgbaa la Kuttu-Budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Aleyɔngyɛlɛ ka ippyam gaang gaang.
52002009	Ikpana anaam, kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn, akkeyɔng mung tɛ̀ttɛ̀ inaangnɛ kɛnaang la annyɔɔng ka latele. Inaang kɛnaang kikoon la kɛtɔm nkwaaning isi kɔlɔɔk kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ lɛnaang ka ikopolowɔnɛyɔng Kuttu-Budoddo kwa kussinɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
52002010	Annyɔɔng alenɛyɔng ittɛɛsɛ ayyɔɔt tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ. Linaang ayyɔɔt ka kkwɔɔt annyɔɔng balɔɔt ba ayilayɔng kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lidɔkɔ lile sa bbwak. La kɔlɔɔk kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ lisi lile.
52002011	Asan lɔsan attɛyɔng idɔkɔ ikɔɔm ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔfɔɔn-a-bwɔɔn ɔkɔɔmnɛ bwɔɔn ammɛ.
52002012	Issɛɛnwɔyɔng kɛkkaam a luppyam, inaangwɔyɔng ɔwaawɔyɔng. Iddawɔyɔng ittɛ ataayɔng kɛtaa sa kɛsaapnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔkkwɔɔwɔnɛyɔng ɔttɛ affu ayangayɔng etini ka Itutum ammɛ ɔbɛtɛ la ppyɛɛ ammɛ.
52002013	Ifɛɛt ilɔk ile baang ya iwomonɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, ka kuttu budoddo kwa ikɔɔmnɛ ifeewɔyɔng. Appyeeyɔngkwɛ atɔkyɔngkwɛ. Ɔzzànga asiyɔngkwɛ lɛtɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɔtɔɔm bwa ɔlɔɔt ɔtɔɔmnɛ, adɔkɔ atɔkyɔngkwɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɛmmwɔɔl za lɔkkwɔɔn za lissinɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm; kɔdɔkɔ ning ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ ka kɛnaang ka kkwɔɔt annyɔɔng, balɔɔt ba ayilanɛyɔng kwa ammɛ.
52002014	Ikpana anaam, kɛssanga kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng kɛnaangwɔyɔngbong tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛnaangnɛ balɔɔt a luzɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka Judaea la balɔɔt a Christ Jesus ba balenɛ baang. Ayɛnyɔngbong kɛssanga akama ssɔn la abbɛ ka kɔlɔɔk a balɔɔt a lɔkaan annyɔɔng, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ abbɛ bayɛnnɛ ka labɔɔk a balɔɔt a Jews.
52002015	Kɛssanga balɔɔt ’sɔng baang kɛwwɔɔlnɛ Jesus, Uyini, la Bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Bayɔɔyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt akama. Batun Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lutun basak. Bàbbyap la ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ.
52002016	Gɔɔ babumyɛlɛ kitunu battɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ ikopolo Ikanakana bɔtɔɔm bwa bule bukɔɔmbɛ bumii ka buppwolo. Uwɔng ulenɛ lakuma bubbi bwa banaangnɛ. Gedegede mung Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kutunmɛbong la abbɛ kukuma.
52002017	Ikpana anaam, ka ɛkɛtɛ igbatanɛ ikɔngɔwɔyɔng ka waan ɛkɛtɛ ssup, ittina ayyɔɔt lissi igbatanɛ ka kkwɔɔt annyɔɔng. Kkwɔɔt ayyɔɔt keem ligbatanɛ. Ittina gaang gaang itumwɔyɔng. Ibum ittɛ ibbalwɔyɔng liffu iyɛn.
52002018	Iggyan ittɛ nzang ippyɛlɛ isimisimi iffu ka ɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng. Anaam Paul nbum kɛppyɛlɛ kiffu bikkpit bikkpit, ɔzzànga Satan usiyɛlɛ lɛfɔngɔ iffu.
52002019	Mkkpa kɔnaang luppyam luleyɛlɛ bbɛɛm ka ulewɔnɛyɔng annyɔɔng ba asinɛyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt balɔk lɛbɛlɛ lile. Annyɔɔng alenɛyɔng luppyam ayyɔɔt la laggele ayyɔɔt. Ka inaangnɛ kamma ittɛ vvenɛ ibɛtɛ ka lusso Uyini, ka ule ɔppyɛlɛ uffu, ittinawɔyɔng annyɔɔng.
52002020	Annyɔɔng alenɛyɔng balɔɔt ba inaangnɛ kamma itum. Annyɔɔng alenɛyɔng laggele ayyɔɔt za lɔkkwɔɔn.
52003001	Kɔsak lɛttala isikwɛ ka luppyam lɛbɛlɛ likkwoong ibwɔɔp. Ɔzzànga ippyɛɛ iyanga luttina gwa kiffu kɛtaa kɛyɔɔng mung ka Athens.
52003002	Ippyɛɛ itɔɔm Timothy, ɔkpana ayyɔɔt, wa ɔnaangnɛ kɛnaang ka kɛbwɔɔlɔ Kuttu-Budoddo a Christ la Ayyɔɔt. Ittɛ uffu ɔnaangwɔyɔng akkaamyɔng ka kiyila
52003003	nkwaaning ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ka bɛzzɔkɔ annyɔɔng usi isimisimi lɛppyɛlɛ ka ale ayɛnyɔng kɛyɔɔ akama sa bayɔɔnɛ balɔɔt mung. Annyɔɔng biini asanyɔng lɔsan attɛyɔng kɛwwɔɔl a balɔɔt ’sɔng ule kɔlɔɔk kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm biini ɔttɛnɛ kɔnaang.
52003004	Ka idɔkɔnɛ la annyɔɔng, ibwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng ittɛ ggboo ka lusso vvenɛ iyɛnyɔng akama ’wɔng mung tɛ. Ka asanɛyɔngkwɛ lɔsan, mung akkwɛ kulenɛ lɛnaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ilɔɔknɛ tɛ.
52003005	Akkwɛ kɔnaangnɛ ntɔɔm Timothy. Nsikwɛ lɛbɛlɛ likkwoong nbwɔɔp ka luppyam. Ntɔɔmmɛ nttɛ ɔlɔk ɔsan tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ippyam annyɔɔng ilenɛ. Nsan lɔsan nttɛ baala kɔtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔzzanganɛ ɔttɛ Satan ɔllɛwɔnɛyɔngbong ɔ̀zzánga ɔttɛ kɛnaang ayyɔɔt kɛttɔbong gbɔɔ kɛtaak.
52003006	Mung Timothy ussibong bakang ka ɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng ɔppyɛlɛ. Ɔkɔɔmbong kuttu kwa iggelenɛ ufeeyɛlɛ. Akkwɛ kulenɛ kwa kutumnɛ kiyila la kɛsaap. Ɔbwɔɔlɔbongyɛlɛ ɔttɛ annyɔɔng attinayɔng mung kwa ayyɔɔt ɛkɛtɛ ɛlɔk. Ɔttɛ aggyanyɔngyɛlɛ kɛyɛn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ayyɔɔt issɛnɛ iggyanwɔyɔng annyɔɔng kɛyɛn.
52003007	Ka lilɔɔk ayyɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ la akama, ile baang la luttina ggwɔn keem itumwɔyɔng annyɔɔng ikpana ayyɔɔt. Kiyila annyɔɔng kɛnaangnɛyɛlɛ ikkaam luppyam.
52003008	Isanbong ittɛ vvenɛ iddu, ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn abeenɛyɔng kkpɔk ka kɔlɔɔk Uyini.
52003009	Gedegede mung ikkwoong mung iwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang innyiwɔyɔng. Iwomomɛ la laggele za iyanganɛ ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ayyɔɔt kwa annyɔɔng.
52003010	Kikoon la kɛtɔm, ile baang ka ittinanɛ ittɛ iyɛnwɔyɔng ka zzeen ɔlɔk isan bwa ile inaang kiyila annyɔɔng kɛkkaam.
52003011	Dedde ayyɔɔt la Uyini ayyɔɔt, Christ, biini ɔbama ɛtɔk bbwak ulokoyɛlɛ issɛ iffu ka ɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng.
52003012	Numa Uyini ɔnaang kɛsaap sa ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔsaapwɔnɛyɔng kɛmmala, kiggbenge tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛsaap sa annyɔɔng asaapnɛyɔngyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt.
52003013	Anaangnɛyɔng ning mung vvenɛ ippyam annyɔɔng ikkaam, ataayɔng bbwak ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Dedde ayyɔɔt, ka ɛkɛtɛ Jesus Christ ule ɔppyɛlɛ uffu la balɔɔt ba balenɛ ba ammɛ.
52004001	Ikpana anaam, akkoopyɔngbong ka ayyɔɔt tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ale akɔɔmyɔng lafal annyɔɔng kɔsaap Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Nsan lɔsan nttɛ ’wɔng ulenɛ ɛtɔk ya aggbanɛ lissi anaangyɔng. Ɔzzànga gedegede mung ikkpengewɔyɔng lukkpenge ka lakke Jesus Uyini, itutwɔyɔng ɔgbaa ittɛ anaangyɔng gaang gaang agbaayɔng.
52004002	Asanyɔng lɔsan attɛyɔng lukopolo gwa ikopolowɔnɛyɔng idɔkɔ ikopolowɔyɔng ka lakke Jesus, Uyini.
52004003	Nkwɔng mung kulenɛ kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uttinanɛ utumwɔyɔng annyɔɔng. Ɔggyan ɔttɛ ataayɔng ka budoddo ɔkkpɛlɛ, afɔngɔyɔng kikup a bwanavva balɔɔt gbɔɔ-gbɔɔ-gbɔɔ.
52004004	Annyɔɔng bwaanbwalam, asanyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ akɔɔmnɛyɔng bwanavva annyɔɔng doddo atɔkyɔngbɛ ka latele.
52004005	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ateleyɔng zzeen ka bwanavva balɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt ba bazɔɔmnɛ ilat basi kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛsan, banaangnɛ.
52004006	Ka kulenɛ ning, ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔnaang kɔlɔɔk kɔlɔk kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ la wabbɛ, ɔlɔk vvenɛ ɔnaangmɛ kɛbɛtɛ. Ibwɔɔlɔwɔyɔngbong kkpal, ittamawɔyɔng ittɛ Uyini vvenɛ ɔyɔɔ balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ babbu lilɔɔk ’sɔng baang akama.
52004007	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usiyɛlɛ lɛkkwɔɔ ɔttɛ ifal lɛfal a kɛssɛ?-?kɛzak. Ɔkkwɔɔyɛlɛ ɔttɛ ifal lɛfal za doddo.
52004008	Kwakkwɛ ɔlɔɔt duu wa ufimnɛ lukopolo ’gwɔng mung, ukopolo?-?lukopolo lissi ka ufimnɛ, ufim Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa unnyiwɔnɛyɔng Kuyeeng ammɛ.
52004009	Kɔlɔɔk kɔlɔk ba kɔbɛlɛ lile kwa nle nbbal lɛkkpɔk ntum, ɔgbaa la kɛttɛ annyɔɔng bayanga-kiyila ka Uyini asaapwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng; Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ukopolowɔyɔngbong tɛ̀ttɛ̀ wannyɔɔng ule ɔsaapwɔyɔng.
52004010	Akɔɔmyɔngbong eleme ’yɔng mung ka lɔkkwɔɔn la ikpana annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ ka Macedonia. Ikpana ayyɔɔt, ikkpengewɔyɔng lukkpenge ittɛ anaangyɔng gaang gaang agbaayɔng.
52004011	Kɔbɛtɛwɔyɔng kwa buzum. Appyɛɛkyɔng ɛtɔk ya annyɔɔng ssɔng, akɔɔmwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng ɔlɔk ataayɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ iggbawɔnɛyɔng lɛbwɔɔlɔ.
52004012	Anaangnɛyɔng ning, vvenɛ balɔɔt ba basɛlɛnɛ kiyila batelewɔyɔng. Baala aggyanyɔng bɔfɛɛn bulɔk abapyɔng ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk.
52004013	Ikpana ayyɔɔt, iggyan ittɛ asanyɔng lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk atumyɔng balɔɔt ba balenɛ libbe nkwaaning tɔkɔlɔ usiwɔyɔng lɛbbɔl tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔbbɔlnɛ balɔɔt ba basinɛ kwa lufat littina.
52004014	Ìyila ittɛ Jesus ubbe, ɔppyɛlɛ ufungala ka lubbe. Kwakkwɛ iyilanɛ ittɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ufungala balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ kiyila batum Jesus bale libbe tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Jesus.
52004015	Uwɔng mung ulenɛ lukopolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm gwa ibwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng. Ayyɔɔt ba ilenɛ ikokolo mung baala ikɔngɔ balɔɔt ba balenɛ libbe ka kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang sa Uyini ule uffu.
52004016	Vvenɛ ippyee lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔkɔɔm-a-lakke, lɛmmwɔɔl Uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, lɛmmwɔɔl a luffi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, tɛ́ttɛ́ Uyini ussi ka libat uffu kuttɔɔk. Balɔɔt ba bayilanɛ kwa Christ bale libbe, vvenɛ bakɔɔm ɛtɔk bafungala ka lubbe,
52004017	tɛ́ttɛ́ bɔk ayyɔɔt ba ile itii ka kuddu, ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang babbiyɛlɛ ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn ɔkkpɛlɛ ifeele ka kɛkaan, ka ikkpala imii ikup Uyini ka libat. Itaa bakang la ammɛ ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
52004018	Ka alenɛyɔng ning lippyee, akɔɔmyɔng lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng anaangyɔng ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn ɔwaamɛ.
52005001	Ikpana anaam, kɔlɔɔk kɔlɔk kwa nle nkkpɔk nfeewɔyɔng ntum kɔlɔɔk a kiffu Christ la ɛkɛtɛ ya bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung bile bɛnaang ba kule.
52005002	Annyɔɔng biini asanyɔng lɔsan attɛyɔng Kɛtɔm-Uyini kile kiffu tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ussip uffunɛ kɛtɔm.
52005003	Ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang éle èle ya balɔɔt battɛnɛ, “Bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bile zzum ka kuddu.” Eseese vvenɛ kɛbɛpɛ kɛffɔbɛ ka kkwɔɔt. Ɔlɔɔt wa ule ɔsɛɛm baala ule. Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ uppyee bɔssɔp bwa wanavva uppyeenɛ ka ɔppwɔlɔnɛ imala.
52005004	Annyɔɔng ka kisul ba aleyɔng. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ kissolo kikopowɔyɔng kitipili, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ussip ukoponɛ ɔlɔɔt.
52005005	Ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng aleyɔng balɔɔt ba buppwolo, aleyɔng ba kikoon. Ayyɔɔt ba kɛtɔm ba ile, gɔɔ vvenɛ ba ile ba kisul.
52005006	Kwakkwɛ nttɛnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ ilaa isumalayɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt balɔk. Itaayɔng kwetkwet ikatyɔng.
52005007	Ule ule kɛtɔm sa balɔɔt balenɛ ka bulaa, ɔlɔk bale ka kibimi.
52005008	Ɔzzànga ayyɔɔt ka ilenɛ ba kikoon, itaayɔng kwetkwet ikatyɔng. Iwɔkɔlɔyɔng kiyila la kɛsaap tɛ̀ttɛ̀ iwɔkɔlɔnɛ kɛfaak a kɛkkpala ivvoongyɔng ukukulu. Ittɔpɔ luttina ayyɔɔt tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛttɔpɔ ka lɛttɔ.
52005009	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usiyɛlɛ lɛsanga ɔttɛ iyɛn akama binyanga ammɛ. Ɔsangayɛlɛ ɔttɛ iyanga kuddu ka labɔɔk Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ,
52005010	wa ubbenɛ kwa ayyɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ nkwaaning iddu la ammɛ mkkpa ile ka kuddu ɔlɔk ile libbe, ka ɛkɛtɛ ya ule uffu.
52005011	Ka ’kwɔng kulenɛ ning, anaangyɔng ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn ɔkkaam luppyam: Atteleyɔng ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ anaangnɛyɔng gedegede mung.
52005012	Ikpana ayyɔɔt, ikkpengewɔyɔng ittɛ ateleyɔng balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ kɛnaang la annyɔɔng gaang gaang. Uyini ɔsangabongbɛ ɔttɛ bakatwɔyɔng, bakɔɔm bakopolowɔyɔng.
52005013	Akɔɔmyɔngbɛ ka latele la kɛsaap sa lɛbaang ka kɛnaang sa banaangnɛ. Annyɔɔng biini átaayɔng ka bɔkaat.
52005014	Ikpana ayyɔɔt, ibbawɔyɔng bikɔɔm ittɛ attamayɔng balɔɔt ba bataanɛ gbɔɔ yɔɔbuu basi bulɔk lɛnaang. Anaangyɔng balɔɔt ba babbwɔpɔnɛ bakkaam luppyam. Atteleyɔng balɔɔt ba bakkpɛlɛ. Abbeyɔng luppyam ka kɔlɔɔk duu la ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ.
52005015	Akatyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk upipili ipipili. Ayyɛɛpyɔng eleme la bannyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɛkɛtɛ duu.
52005016	Ataayɔng ka laggele ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
52005017	Azɔɔmyɔng luzɔɔm ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
52005018	Awomoyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ka bɛssanga lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ. Uwɔng ulenɛ kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyannɛ ka kuddu annyɔɔng ka Christ Jesus.
52005019	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ afimyɔng Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
52005020	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ afimyɔng lɛmmwɔɔl Uyini.
52005021	Allɛyɔng bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ, alokoyɔng bwa buyyɛɛpnɛ.
52005022	Afimyɔng kɛnaang a babbu lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ.
52005023	Numa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa unnyinɛyɛlɛ bɔkaat ubee la annyɔɔng ka itɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ, ulokowɔyɔng kkwɔɔt la luppyam la kuyeeng ka budoddo ɔlɔk afɔngɔyɔng ka kɛkaal lɛttɔ ka Kɛtɔm Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, ule uffu.
52005024	Ammɛ wa ɔkkwɔɔwɔnɛyɔng vvenɛ ɔnaangkwɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔknɛ ka ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa usinɛ lɛlaak lɛkkala.
52005025	Ikpana ayyɔɔt, azɔɔm assɛɛnyɔngyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt ɔgbaa.
52005026	Awomoyɔng ikpana ayyɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ la kigbugba bukpana.
52005027	Nbbawɔyɔng bikɔɔm ka lakke Uyini nttɛ akkwɔɔyɔng lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng mung abwɔɔlɔyɔng ikpana ayyɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ.
52005028	Ppyɛɛ Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, ɔtaa la annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ.
53001001	Anaam Paul La Silas la Timothy ikkpɔknɛ lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng mung ifeewɔyɔng annyɔɔng balɔɔt a luzɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka Thessalonica ba alenɛyɔng ba Dedde ayyɔɔt, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, la Jesus Christ, Uyini.
53001002	Dedde ayyɔɔt, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, la Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, banaangwɔyɔng ppyɛɛ, bannyiwɔyɔng bɔkaat.
53001003	Ikpana ayyɔɔt, iwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ka kɔlɔɔk annyɔɔng. Kuleyɛlɛ bbwak ka inaangnɛ ning baang ka kiyila annyɔɔng kilenɛ baang ka kɛmmalanɛ la kɛtɔm la kɛtɔm. Ɔgbaa kɛsaap sa ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ɔyanganɛ la wabbɛ kile baang ka kiggbengenɛ kiffu.
53001004	Kwakkwɛ baang inaangnɛ kamma kwa annyɔɔng ba izɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Inaang kamma ka atiinɛyɔng baang ka ataanɛyɔng la kiyila la akama ɔkkpɛlɛ wa alenɛyɔng lɛyɛn, la kɛwwɔɔl sa bawwɔɔlnɛ balɔɔt ba bayilanɛ kwa Uyini.
53001005	Mung ulenɛ iyɔɔ bɔllɛ kɛkaal Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Kule kussi ka akkwɛ mung ale yɔng ba bbwak ka Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ya ayɛnnɛyɔng akama kwa annyɛ.
53001006	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔnaang kwa bbwak. Vvenɛ ɔkɔɔm akama ufee balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba banaangwɔnɛyɔng ayɛnyɔng akama,
53001007	Ɔzzánga vvenɛ ɔkkalawɔyɔng annyɔɔng ba ayɛnnɛyɔng akama. Vvenɛ ɔssɛ ɔkkalayɛlɛ ayyɔɔt ɔgbaa. Ule ɔnaang ’kwɔng ka ɛkɛtɛ ya Jesus Christ ule ussi ka libat uffu la Bayilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ ba lɛbaang.
53001008	Vvenɛ uffu la lalaak-a-lɔkɔɔn ɔyɔɔ balɔɔt ba basinɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛsan akama la balɔɔt ba basinɛ Kuttu-Budoddo Jesus, Uyini, litele.
53001009	Vvenɛ bayɛn akama kɛbɛpɛ sa kɛfal a kɛfal. Vvenɛ bagbata ka ɛfɛɛn Uyini la lakke ammɛ.
53001010	Ka ule uffu ka Kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang, vvenɛ ɔtɔk latele ka labɔɔk a balɔɔt ba bayilanɛ kwa ammɛ. Annyɔɔng ɔgbaa ale assɛ aleyɔng baang la abbɛ, ka alenɛyɔng liyila kwa bɔtɔɔm bwa ibwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng.
53001011	Kwakkwɛ izɔɔmnɛ ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ innyiwɔyɔng, ibap Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ayyɔɔt ittɛ unnyiwɔyɔng kuddu kwa doddo kwa ɔkkwɔɔwɔnɛyɔng ɔttɛ ataayɔng la ammɛ. Numa ɔkɔɔm lakke ammɛ ɔnaangwɔyɔng ayɛnyɔng budoddo duu bwa akkɔlɔnɛyɔng usseke avveyɔng kɛnaang a kiyila annyɔɔng.
53001012	Nkwaaning lɛkɔɔl Uyini ayyɔɔt Jesus lɛtɔk latele ka annyɔɔng. Annyɔɔng assɛ atɔkyɔng latele ka lakke a ppyɛɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ayyɔɔt la Jesus Christ, Uyini.
53002001	Kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng kutum kiffu Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus, la kiduda ayyɔɔt ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn la ammɛ.
