53002002	Nkkpengewɔyɔng lukkpenge, ikpana anaam, tɛ̀ttɛ́ afɔngɔyɔng ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔfɛɛtwɔyɔng ɔlɔk banaang ippyam izzawɔyɔng ka bale bakkala lalaak battɛ Kɛtɔm-Uyini kiffubong. Usinɛkkyam ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔyɛn ka biyɛnɛ ɔlɔk ɔlɔɔk ka kɛbwɔɔlɔ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔlɔk vvenɛ bale battɛ ayyɔɔt ikkpɔknɛ ka lɛmmwɔɔl za itɔɔmnɛ.
53002003	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ afɔngɔyɔng ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔfɛɛtwɔyɔng ka ɛtɔk ɛlɔk. Kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang baala kiffu ɔddɔkɔddɔkɔ kullu kwa lakpeke kɔttɔ. Ɔbbyap vvenɛ ɔtta ka vveeng ufula ka lɔkɔɔn.
53002004	Ɔbbyap ’wɔng baang vvenɛ ufim bɛfɛɛn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bya balɔɔt batelenɛ la bya battinanɛ battɛ bɛyyɛɛpɔyyɛɛp. Vvenɛ ɔtɔkmɛ kɛyɔɔng ka buzzilɛttɔ abbyɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Gɔɔ vvenɛ umii ɔtaa ka Labun Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkala lalaak ɔttɛ ammɛ ulenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
53002005	Ba abɛlɛyɔng likke ka nbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng ’byɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ndɔkɔnɛ la annyɔɔng ɔɔ?
53002006	Ɔzzànga bɔfɛɛn bule baang bwa businɛ liyila ’kwɔng kɔnaang ka gedegede mung. Asanyɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ bwa bulenɛ. Ɛkɛtɛ ɛffɔnɛ ya bbwak, Ɔbbyap vvenɛ ɔtta ka vveeng.
53002007	Ibbyap ukunukunu itii baang ka kɛnaang. Ɔzzànga kwa kule ka kɔnaangnɛ baala kɔnaang ɔddɔkɔddɔkɔ basam ɔlɔɔt wa ɔbwɔɔpnɛkwɛ uloko ɔttɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ kɔnaang bagbata ka ɛtɔk.
53002008	Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɔk Ɔbbyap ɔtta ka vveeng, Jesus, Uyini vvenɛ ɔkɔɔm lɛfɛkɛlɛ kamma ammɛ ɔwwɔɔlmɛ. Kiffu Uyini vvenɛ kisusukumɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
53002009	Ɔbbyap vvenɛ ɔtta ka vveeng uffu ɔnaang bɛmaanga la bɛfɛɛn a bikɛɛlɛ ka lakke a Satan ka kɛkkaala lɛlaak.
53002010	Vvenɛ ɔkɔɔm lutini ibbyap ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔfɛɛt balɔɔt bɔng baang ba bale bataak. Bale bataak ka basinɛ lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk lɛtɔk ka kɛsaap, nkwaaning baddu.
53002011	Ka ’kwɔng mung, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔɔm lakke za kisi kɔlɔɔk lɛsan ufeebɛ nkwaaning batɔk kwa kulenɛ lɛlaak gbisii.
53002012	Kitele lɛttɔ kile kɛttɛ balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba basinɛ lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk liyila, bale ibbyap lɛkɔɔm battele kippe, vvenɛ babbe.
53002013	Iwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ innyiwɔyɔng ikpana ayyɔɔt, ba asaapnɛyɔng Uyini. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsangawɔyɔnbong annyɔɔng aleyɔng ba ule utte lɛkkala. Ɔnaangwɔyɔngbong balɔɔt ka lakke Kuyeeng ammɛ ɔbɛtɛ la kiyila sa ayanganɛyɔng ka lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk.
53002014	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkwɔɔwɔyɔng la Kuttu-Budoddo kwa ibwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng. Ɔkkwɔɔwɔyɔng ɔttɛ affu atɔkyɔng etini lakke annyɔɔng ka Uyini, Jesus Christ.
53002015	Ikpana anaam abeeyɔng kkpɔk. Akɔɔmyɔng lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk gwa ikopolowɔnɛyɔng ka lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka kamma. Akɔɔmyɔng lɛmmwɔɔl za ikkpɔknɛ ifeewɔyɔng kkpɔk.
53002016	Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, la Dedde ayyɔɔt, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, biini wa isaapmɛnɛ bibbemɛ-lɛttɔ unnyiyɛlɛ kɛkkaam a luppyam la luttina gwa doddo gwa kɛfal a kɛfal.
53002017	Ɔssɛɛnwɔyɔng kɛkkaam a luppyam ka ippyam kɛttala ɔnaangwɔyɔng akkaamyɔng anaangyɔng kwa kɔyyɛɛpnɛ, alɔɔkyɔng kwa kɔyyɛɛpnɛ ɔgbaa.
53003001	Ka kitele lɛttɔ, ikpana anaam, iggyan ittɛ azɔɔm assɛɛnyɔngyɛlɛ nkwaaning lɛmmwɔɔl Uyini lɛkama-ɔkama lɛwaala likelike lɛtɔk lakke tɛ̀ttɛ̀ annyɔɔng atɔknɛyɔng.
53003002	Assɛ azɔɔm attɛyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkalayɛlɛ ka labɔɔk a babbyap. Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ lissi bayilanɛ bɔtɔɔm bwa ibwɔɔlɔnɛ.
53003003	Uyini, ɔlɔɔt wa doddo, vvenɛ ɔnaangwɔyɔng akkaamyɔng, ɔkkalawɔyɔng ka labɔɔk a Ɔnaang-a-bubbi.
53003004	Uyini unnyibongyɛlɛ kibbe luppyam ka annyɔɔng. Isan lɔsan ittɛ ale baang ka anaangnɛyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ikopolowɔnɛyɔng.
53003005	Uyini usikiliwɔyɔng ippyam ɔfɔngɔ ka kusapa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la kɛbbɔ akama sa Christ unnyinɛ.
53003006	Ka lakke Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, ibwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng ittɛ agbata assekeyɔng ikpana ayyɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ya inaangnɛ bɔkɔɔt isi lɔttama ayyɔɔt lippyee.
53003007	Annyɔɔng biini asanyɔng lɔsan attɛyɔng kɔyyɛɛp ka anaangnɛyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ayyɔɔt inaangnɛ. Bɔkɔɔt ffet ka kɔlɔɔk isi lɛnaang ka idɔkɔnɛ la annyɔɔng.
53003008	Isi ɔlɔɔt lɛfɔngɔ ɔyaamyɛlɛ ggbɔɔ isimɛ lɛssɛ iyaam. Lutini ’gwɔng inaang kɛnaang kikoon la kɛtɔm ittɛ nkwaaning asiyɔng akama lɛyɛn, wa kikkpeleyɛlɛ.
53003009	Ning isi lɛnaang ka ɔ̀zzánganɛ ɔttɛ lakke ba iyanga za kɛbap a kɛyaam ka labɔɔk annyɔɔng. Inaang ittɛ iyɔɔwɔyɔng usseke akeetyɔngyɛlɛ.
53003010	Ka idɔkɔnɛ la annyɔɔng, ibwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng ittɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt duu wa usinɛ lɛggyan ɔttɛ ɔnaang kɛnaang, tɛ̀ttɛ́ uzzi kazzi.”
53003011	Ilɔɔk ’kwɔng ka ippyeenɛ battɛ balɔɔt balɔk bale baang la annyɔɔng ba bakongonɛ lukongo bakkpɛlɛ basi lɛggyan battɛ banaang kɛnaang. Bulɔk ba banaang basan kɛbbaka ka kɔlɔɔk ɔlɔɔt baggyan bwa bassɔpnɛ bassɛɛn ka kamma.
53003012	Ka lakke Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, ibwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng ittɛ attamayɔng balɔɔt ’bɔng baang. Bakɔɔm lafal abbɛ doddo banaang kɛnaang bakɔɔmbɛ kɛyɔɔng.
53003013	Ɔzzànga annyɔɔng ikpana ayyɔɔt, tɛ̀ttɛ́ bɔkɔɔt bunaangwɔyɔng ka kɛnaang a budoddo.
53003014	Ɔlɔɔt úle ulè baang ka bɛzzɔkɔ annyɔɔng wa usinɛ bɔtɔɔm bwa itɔɔmnɛ ifeewɔyɔng ka lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng mung litele. Ulenɛ baang, azzɔɔkmɛyɔng zzeen. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ aleyɔng ka kɔlɔɔk la ammɛ ɔkkɔɔnɛ izzit inaangmɛ.
53003015	Ɔzzanga tɛ̀ttɛ́ anaangmɛyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt a kɔfɔk annyɔɔng. Lutini ’gwɔng, attamamɛyɔng lɔttama ka ulenɛ ɔkpana annyɔɔng.
53003016	Numa Uyini, wa bɔkaat bussinɛ ka ammɛ, unnyiwɔyɔng bɔkaat ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ka itɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ. Uyini ubee la annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ.
53003017	Anaam Paul nkɔɔmnɛ kɔbɔɔk anaam nkkpɔk ’kwɔng: Nwomowɔyɔngbong ɔkkpɛlɛ. Uwɔng ulenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ nbɛtɛnɛ kɛnnɔ ka lammwɔɔl ɔkkpɛlɛ za ntɔɔmnɛ. Uwɔng ulenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ nkkpɔknɛ.
53003018	Numa ppyɛɛ Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, ule la annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ.
54001001	Lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng lissi ka anaam Paul, uyilabɔtɔɔm a Christ Jesus. Nkkpɔk ka lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Ɔkkala ikkala ayyɔɔt, la Christ Jesus wa ulenɛ luttina ayyɔɔt,
54001002	nfee Timothy, waan anaam wa lɔkkwɔɔn ka kiyila. Dedde, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, la Christ Jesus, Uyini ayyɔɔt, banaangwɔ ppyɛɛ, abbebɛ lɛttɔ, bannyiwɔ bɔkaat.
54001003	Nggyan nttɛ ataa ka Ephesus tɛ̀ttɛ̀ nddawɔnɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ nlenɛ ka kimii Macedonia. Balɔɔt balɔk bale baang ka bakopolonɛ lukopolo gwa lusinɛ bbwak lile. Abwɔɔlɔbɛ bakkyaa lukopolo ’gwɔng baang bafɔngɔ.
54001004	Abwɔɔlɔbɛ bakkyaa lilɔɔk sa lisinɛ ka lɔkkwɔɔn lile bafɔngɔ la uggbɔng a lakɔɔl a balɔɔt iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ. Lilɔɔk ’sɔng liggyan ikangala keem. Ba banaang kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyannɛ. Akkwɛ asankwɛ ka kiyila.
54001005	Lɔdda ’gwɔng mung lɔggyan lɔttɛ kɛsaap kissiwɔ ka luppyam gwa doddo, la luttina gwa ppwool la kiyila sa kissiwɔnɛ ka luppyam.
54001006	Balɔɔt balɔk bafimbong ’kwɔng mung bassɛɛp ɛtɔk ka kikun a kutolo.
54001007	Baggyan battɛ bale bakopolo lafɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔzzànga ba basan bwa abbɛ biini balɔɔknɛ ɔlɔk vvenɛ basan lɛkkɔ za batolonɛ. Ɔzzànga batolo la kibbe luppyam ɔkkpɛlɛ.
54001008	Isan lɔsan ittɛ Lafɔɔ layyɛɛpɔyyɛɛp ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn a akɔɔmnɛzɛ bbwak.
54001009	Ikke isan ittɛyɔng lafɔɔ ba bassɛɛn kwa banaang a budoddo. Bassɛɛn lafɔɔ kwa balɔɔt ba babɛpɛnɛ lafɔɔ la bazzɔɔk a kɔlɔɔk, la balɔɔt ba basinɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛsan, la banaang a bubbi, la balɔɔt ba basinɛ bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lile, la balɔɔt ba bawwɔɔlnɛ ibakka la ibassɛ, la bawwɔɔl a balɔɔt,
54001010	la bassɛ kɛzak, la bwaanbwalam ba bazaknɛ abbɛ abbɛ, la balɔɔt ba bakaanɛ balɔɔt ka itɔk, la bakkala-lalaak, la balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ kwa kusinɛ bbwak la lukopolo gwa lɔkkwɔɔn lile.
54001011	Lukopolo ’gwɔng mung gwa lulenɛ gwa lɔkkwɔɔn lule ka Kuttu-Budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyinɛnɛ ɔttɛ nbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt. Akkwɛ kussinɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm a lakke la latele.
54001012	Nwomo Christ Jesus, Uyini ayyɔɔt, wa ulenɛnɛ lakke linnyi ka kɛnaang anaam. Nzɔnɔmɛ kɛnaang ka uttinanɛ ɔttɛ nle wa bbwak tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔsanganɛ ɔttɛ nnaang kɛnaang ammɛ.
54001013	Mkkpa ndɔk nsi budoddo lɛlɔɔk ntummɛ ka iyaadɛ. Nyɔɔ balɔɔt ammɛ akama. Nyɔɔkamɛ ammɛ biini. Ɔzzànga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm nbbemɛbong lɛttɔ ka nsinɛ kiyila lɛyanga ndɔkɔ nsi lɛsan bwa nnaangnɛ.
54001014	Ɔzzànga Uyini ayyɔɔt ɔnaangnɛ bong ppyɛɛ ɔttala. Unnyinɛ kiyila la kɛsaap. Abbyɛ bilenɛ bya ayyɔɔt la Christ Jesus ka bɔkaat.
54001015	Uwɔng kɔlɔɔk a lɔkkwɔɔn kwa atɔknɛkwɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ akkwɛ ayila kwa akkwɛ. Christ Jesus uffu ka vveeng ’wɔng kɛkkala banaang a bubbi. Anaam nttanɛ banaang a bubbi ɔkkpɛlɛ lɛbbɔl.
54001016	Keem nbbe Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛttɔ nkwaaning Christ Jesus ɔyɔɔ kibbe luppyam ammɛ la anaam wa nttanɛ bubbi lɛnaang. Kɔtaa kɛtaa iyɔɔ ya ɔyɔɔnɛ balɔɔt ba bale bayila kwa ammɛ baddu kuddu kɛfal a kɛfal.
54001017	Lakke la latele lale za Ubeet a Kɛfal a kɛfal, wa usinɛ libbe, isimɛ lɛyɛn, ule Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa kɛfal a kɛfal! Kulening.
54001018	Timothy, waan anaam, nsekelewɔbong lakke ’zɔng. Kule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɛmmwɔɔl a biyɛnɛ za baggbanɛ lɛlɔɔk batumwɔ. Akɔɔm lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng baang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɛfɛɛn a kullu ɔkkɔɔnɛ allu kullu kɔyyɛɛp.
54001019	Akɔɔm kiyila annɔ kkpɔk la luttina gwa doddo. Balɔɔt balɔk bale baang ba batakanɛ kwa luttina abbɛ lɛgɔpɔlɔ, kiyila abbɛ kile lɛbɛpɛ.
54001020	Abbɛ balenɛ Hymenaeus la Alexander la balɔɔt balɔk ba nlenɛbɛ lɛtɔk nssɛɛn Satan ka kɔbɔɔk, nkwaaning oggbe ukpekebɛ kɛlɔɔk a babbu lilɔɔk kitum Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
54002001	Ka kɛkɔɔm ɛtɔk a kɔlɔɔk, nggyan nttɛ lakkpenge la luzɔɔm la kɛbap a bɛfɛɛn la kiwomo kɛnaang ɔkkpɛlɛ bile bya ibapnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm innyi
54002002	babeet la bayanga lakke la ɔssɛbibit ɔkkpɛlɛ, nkwaaning itaa kɛtaa sa bbɛɛm ka bɔkaat, inaang linaang sa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyannɛ ɔttɛ inaang.
54002003	Nkwɔng kɔyyɛɛpnɛ kɔsaap Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkala ikkala ayyɔɔt.
54002004	Ammɛ wa ɔggyannɛ ɔttɛ baddu kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal ɔkkɔɔnɛ basan lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk.
54002005	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule vvɔn keem, ɔlɔɔt ule vvɔn keem wa ulokonɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la balɔɔt ka bɔkaat. Ammɛ ulenɛ Christ Jesus,
54002006	wa ɔsammɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng unnyi nkwaaning ɔsanga balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ka kɔlɔɔk. Uwɔng baang ɔ̀dɔkɔ̀nɛ́ iyɔɔ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya bbwak ittɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyan ɔttɛ ɔkkala ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ.
54002007	Kwakkwɛ baang batɔɔmmɛnɛ battɛ nzzanga Uyilabɔtɔɔm Jesus wa Ikanakana la ukopolo-lukopolo abbɛ. Nbwɔɔlɔbɛ lɛmmwɔɔl a kiyila la lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk. Lɛlaak ba nkkala, nlɔɔk lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk.
54002008	Nggyan nttɛ bwaanbwalam ka ifɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ keem bazɔɔm ka luzɔɔm la ggwɔn. Abbɛ ba balenɛbɛ kɛyɔɔng lɛsam bannyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bakkwoong bayeek labɔɔk abbɛ ka libat bassɛɛn luzɔɔm, kutun a kɔlɔɔk la ikangala bisi lile.
54002009	Ɔgbaa nggyan nttɛ bwanavva basan kɛssanga iwɔkɔlɔ ya bawɔkɔlɔnɛ. Bawɔkɔlɔyɛ doddo. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ banaang kittulu kitook basak. Tɛ̀ttƐ́ bawɔkɔlɔ bɛfɛɛn bya banaanɛbyɛ la gold, ɔlɔk ifɔɔk akpana. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ bawɔkɔlɔ iwɔkɔlɔ ya iyyɛɛpnɛ isak ɔlɔk ikkaam kappya,
54002010	banaang linaang sa doddo sa bbwak sa wanavva wa uttinamɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng ɔttɛ ule wa luzɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangnɛ.
54002011	Bwanavva bakkoop kɔlɔɔk zzum zzum ka luzɔɔm la luppyam gwa latele.
54002012	Ba nyila bwanavva bakopolo ɔlɔk bayanga lakke basak bwaanbwalam. Bataa zzum kulak.
54002013	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔdɔkɔ uteem Uyya (Adam) lɛlɔɔm tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔlɔɔm Uzoo (Eve).
54002014	Uyya lissi ɔdɔkɔnɛ wa Satan ɔfɛɛtmɛnɛ. Ɔdɔkɔ Uzoo ka Satan ɔfɛɛtnɛ ɔbɛpɛ lafɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
54002015	Ɔzzànga vvenɛ ule wa kɛkkala ɔyanganɛ bbwɔɔn, ukkwoong ɔkɔɔm kiyila ammɛ kkpɔk, ɔyanga kɛsaap ka luppyam la bɔllɛ lɛfal ɔbɛtɛ la kɛsan a kɔlɔɔk.
54003001	Mung kɔlɔɔk a lɔkkwɔɔn: Ɔlɔɔt kɔbɛtɛmɛnɛ ɔttɛ ule ɔgga ka luzɔɔm, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔkkɔlɔbong kɛnaang sa kɛttanɛ bɛnaang ɔkkpɛlɛ lɛyyɛɛp.
54003002	Ɔlɔɔt wa uzzinɛ bugga luzɔɔm, ule ɔlɔɔt wa usinɛ tɔkɔtɔkɔtɔkɔ lɛnaang. Ɔtɔk wanavva vvɔn keem. Ule ɔlɔɔt wa ukkwoongnɛ uttina kɔlɔɔk. Ukkwoong ɔbwɔɔp luppyam ammɛ kɛyɔɔng. Ukekeen ɔsaapmɛ, ukkwoong lukopolo.
54003003	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔvva batak ubimi. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ule ɔnyanga-binyanga. Ɔnaang kɔlɔɔk bɛtɛbɛtɛ, bɔkaat busaapmɛ. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ule ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsaapnɛ ikkpoko.
54003004	Ukkwoong ɔkɔɔm wanavva ammɛ la bwɔɔntiti doddo. Ɔnaang bwɔɔn ammɛ batelemɛ.
54003005	Ɔlɔɔt usinɛ likkwoong ɔkɔɔm kɛsana-ssala ammɛ, ule ɔnaang nang ukkwoong ɔkɔɔm luzɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm?
54003006	Ɔfɔngɔ ɔlɔɔt wa ussumanɛ ka luzɔɔm lɛmal lile. Nzang vvenɛ ɔkkyaamɛ ɔttɔ ka kɔlɔɔk a Satan.
54003007	Ule ɔlɔɔt wa balɔɔt ba basinɛ ka luzɔɔm lile batelemɛnɛ bagbaa, nkwaaning basimɛ kɔlɔɔk izzit lɛnaang badɛmmɛ umii ɔttɔ ka ɔnnya Satan.
54003008	Balɔɔt ba bayaamnɛ ka kɛnaang a luzɔɔm bassɛ bale balɔɔt ba bayyɛɛpnɛ eleme. Kɔlɔɔk a luzɔɔm kulebɛ ka luppyam. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ bavva batak basak. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ikkpoko isaapmɛ gaang isak.
54003009	Bakɔɔm iyɔɔ kiyila kkpɔk ka luppyam gwa doddo.
54003010	Eleme balɔɔt ’bɔng baang èlébong la kɛllɛ. Bàsákbong illɛ ’yɔng baang tɛ́ttɛ́ banaang kɛnaang.
54003011	Bwanavva abbɛ bale la ileme ya doddo. Bafɔngɔ kɛlɔɔk a balɔɔt ka isimi. Bakkwoong battina kɔlɔɔk bafɔngɔ kɛkkaala lɛlaak.
54003012	Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyaamnɛ ka kɛnaang a luzɔɔm ɔtɔk wanavva vvɔn keem. Ukkwoong ɔkɔɔm kɛsana-ssala ammɛ doddo.
54003013	Balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ doddo bayanga kibee sa bbwak sa babbɔnɛ balɔɔk kɔlɔɔk batum kiyila abbɛ ka Jesus Christ.
54003014	Nkkpɔk lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng mung nfeewɔyɔng, nttina nttɛ baala ɔmmɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ nffu nkoolowɔyɔng.
54003015	Ɔzzànga nsinɛ lɛkka liffu, asanyɔng ka lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng mung tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ile ikɔɔmyɛlɛ kɛyɔɔng ka kɛkaan a balɔɔt a ssala Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Abbɛ balenɛ luzɔɔm a Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm a kuddu gwa lulenɛ likoop la ufik-a-lɔkkwɔɔn-a-kɔlɔɔk.
54003016	Ɔlɔɔt wa ukkwoongnɛ ɔkala bɔttala kɔlɔɔk a lalup a luzɔɔm ayyɔɔt ba ule: Ɔtta ka vveeng la Ɛkkpakkwɔɔt ɔlɔɔt, Kuyeeng kɔyɔɔ ɛkpansi kɔttɛ ule bbwak. Bayilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bayɛnmɛ. Bakopolo kɔlɔɔk ammɛ ka ikaan ɔkkpɛlɛ, bayila kɔlɔɔk ammɛ ka ɛkpansi ɔkkpɛlɛ, Basammɛ umii ka libat.
54004001	Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔlɔɔkbong ppwool kɔttɛ ulenɛ lɛnaang, balɔɔt balɔk vvenɛ bakkyaa kiyila bazzɔɔk. Vvenɛ bappyɛɛ bayila kwa bakkala lɛlaak a liyeeng, bakup lukopolo ubbu.
54004002	Lukopolo ’gwɔng mung lussi ka bakkala lalaak a balɔɔt. Abbɛ balenɛ ba ittina abbɛ ilenɛ libbe, ayɛnnɛ attɛ bakkɔm ka ukolo kɛfɔl a lɔkɔɔn.
54004003	Abbɛ balenɛ balɔɔt ba bakopolonɛ battɛ bbwak ba kule ka ɔlɔɔt ɔtɔknɛ wanavva, ɔlɔk azzi kɛssanga kazzi ’sɔng ɔlɔk ’sɔng kang. Ɔzzànga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔmnɛ bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔttɛ bile bya kuzzi, ka àlenɛ́ lɛzɔɔm awomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang ka unnyiwɔnɛbyɛ. Balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ kiyila bale lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk lɛsan banaang ning.
54004004	Bɔfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ lɛlɔɔm buyyɛɛpɔyyɛɛp. Bwa kifim ba bule. Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbyɛ bile bya kɛtɔk la kiwomo kɛnaang.
54004005	Lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la nzɔɔm bɛnaangnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔk bɔfɛɛn.
54004006	Abwɔɔlɔnɛyɔng ikpana ayyɔɔt lilɔɔk ’sɔng mung nzang vvenɛ aleyɔng ibɔɔyi a Christ Jesus ya doddo ka annyiwɔnɛyɔng kɛyɔɔng kazzi Kuyeeng la lɛmmwɔɔl a lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk kwa alenɛyɔng likup.
54004007	Agbata assekeyɔng kɛkkala lɛlaak ibala ’sɔng baang sa kisinɛ kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛsan. Ibala ’yɔng baang ba ile ya kɛzza lɛmmwɔɔl kitum ka nakanaka. Alokoyɔng lafal annyɔɔng ka lukkoop a kɔlɔɔk kwa kɔsaapnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
54004008	Kɛggwɔkɔ a kkwɔɔt kɛyanga isak ka ɛtɔk ya assɛ. Ɔzzànga kɛnaang kwa Kuyeeng kɔggyannɛ kɛyanga isak ka itɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ, ka kinnyinɛyɛlɛ kuddu kwa gedegede mung la kwa lusso.
54004009	Mung kɔlɔɔk a lɔkkwɔɔn kwa Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ule ɔtɔk kwɛ.
54004010	Kwakkwɛ baang ibumnɛ inaang kɛnaang gaang gaang ka ilenɛ ittina ayyɔɔt lɛsam iloko ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm a kuddu wa ulenɛ Ɔkkala-ikkala balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ. Gaang gaang balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba bayilanɛ kwa ammɛ.
54004011	Akopolo, abwɔɔlɔbɛ bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ.
54004012	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ afɔngɔ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔtɔkwɔ ka ikpɛnɛ ka alenɛ lɛffɔ ale waan. Ataa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ iyɔɔ bayanga-kiyila ka bikingi annɔ, la linaang, la kɛsaap sa ayanganɛ, la kiyila sa ayanganɛ la bɔllɛ eleme.
54004013	Asam ɛkɛtɛ annɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ la lakke za ayanganɛ annyi ka kɛkkwɔɔ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛbwɔɔlɔ ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ la kɛbwɔɔlɔ lɛmmwɔɔl, la lukopolo ɔddɔkɔddɔkɔ nffu.
54004014	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akkyaa lɛsɔɔk ’zɔng baang za Kuyeeng kulewɔnɛ linnyi azzɔɔk. Azzɛ lilenɛ za Kuyeeng kunnyiwɔnɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la bagɛlɛnya batolonɛ basam labɔɔk batelewɔ.
54004015	Akkoop bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung asamwɔ kɛyɔɔng annyibyɛ, ɔkkɔɔnɛ balɔɔt bayɛn lɛmmala kɛnaang annɔ.
54004016	Akatwɔ kɛyɔɔng. Asan tɛ̀ttɛ̀ akopolonɛ. Ɔkkaamwɔ ning baang. Anaang ning, vvenɛ akkalawɔ kɛyɔɔng ɔgbaa la balɔɔt ba bagɔpɔlɔwɔnɛ.
54005001	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ awɔlɔ ɔgɛlɛnya ɔlɔɔt, ɔzzànga abapmɛ kɔlɔɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ulenɛ ssaawɔ. Akɔɔm bakolobya ɔkkpɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ikpana annɔ.
54005002	Akɔɔm bagɛlɛnya bwanavva tɛ̀ttɛ̀ issakawɔ annɔ. Akɔɔm bazozo tɛ̀ttɛ̀ itele annɔ la luppyam gwa doddo.
54005003	Atele bwanavva ba bwalam abbɛ babbenɛ bakɔngɔbɛ basɛlɛ uttele-uttele.
54005004	Ɔzzànga wanavva ubbu ɔyanganɛ bwɔɔn balenɛ bagɛlɛnya lɛnaang, bakɔɔm ɛtɔk bakkoopbong kɔlɔɔk a luzɔɔm basan tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bale bakkwoong bakɔɔm abakka abbɛ. Banaang ning mung batak ippwoot a kɛkɔɔm sa ibakka la ibassɛ la bagɛlɛnya bakɔɔmnɛbɛ abbɛ. Nkwɔng kulenɛ kwa kɔsaapnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm gaang gaang.
54005005	Wanavva wa ulenɛ wanavva-ubbu ka lɔkkwɔɔn ɔsɛlɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔkɔɔmmɛnɛ, ɔsam luttina ammɛ uloko ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔzɔɔm ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔbapmɛ ɔttɛ uttelemɛ kikoon la kɛtɔm.
54005006	Ɔzzànga wanavva-ubbu wa ɔsamnɛ luttina ammɛ unnyi kizzi kuddu la bwaanbwalam, wanavva ’wɔng baang ɔggba libbe mkkpa ndɔk utii ka kuddu.
54005007	Attamabɛ nkwaaning basi kibbi lizzi, balɔɔt balɔɔkbɛ.
54005008	Ɔlɔɔt usinɛ inaaka likkwoon ɔppyɛɛk doddo, gaang gaang balɔɔt a kɛsana ssala ammɛ biini, usibong kiyila lɛyanga. Ammɛ ɔppyɛɛbong ɔtta lɛbbɔl ɔsak ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsɛlɛnɛ kiyila.
54005009	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ asam lɛkɔɔl a wanavva ubbu ɔlɔk agbaa la lakɔɔl a bwanavva babbu balɔk, wanavva ’wɔng baang ɔtakabong ɔkkpɛɛm, ɔggbamɛ lalɔp a likkpa lakkyaat la kitele. Ɔgbaa utiimɛ walam vvɔn keem ka ullunɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ubbe ɔkɔngɔmɛ.
54005010	Ule wanavva wa ɔyyɛɛpnɛ eleme, ɔkɔɔm bwaan ammɛ doddo. Ukkwoong ukeke ukekeen. Ɔnaang bɛfɛɛn a latele unnyi babbɛ bayanga kiyila. Uttele balɔɔt ba battɔnɛ ka kɔlɔɔk, kɔbɛtɛmɛ ka kɛnaang a budoddo ka itɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ.
54005011	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ assɛɛn lakɔɔl a bwanavva babbu ba batiinɛ bazozo. Ba ippyam abbɛ ile idɛmbɛ baggyan killu bwalam balɔk, bakkyaa kwa Christ bafɔngɔ.
54005012	Balɔɔt vvenɛ bakpɛnbɛ ka balenɛ ka kɔlɔɔk lɛttɔ ka babɛpɛnɛ nsekele abbɛ wa battenɛ lɛnaang la luzɔɔm ka ikeeng.
54005013	Ɔgbaa vvenɛ babɛpɛ ɛkɛtɛ ka kɛssɛ kikkpit kɛmal ka ggwoon ’gwɔng kɛtta ka gwakang. Vvenɛ bakama-ɔkama babbɔl ka bale bakkoop kɛlɔɔk a balɔɔt ka isimi kɔbɛtɛbɛ ka kɛnaang a balɔɔt balɔk. Bassɛ gbɔɔgbɔɔgbɔɔ balɔɔk lilɔɔk sa businɛ lɛlɔɔk.
54005014	Kwakkwɛ nttinanɛ nttɛ kule kɔtta lɛyyɛɛp ka bazozo ba bwalam abbɛ babbenɛ bakɔngɔbɛ ballunɛ bwalam balɔk ɔlɔk bamaat bwɔɔn, bakkwoong bakɔɔm ssala abbɛ doddo nkwaaning basi balɔɔt a kɔfɔk ayyɔɔt kufuk linnyi kwa kɛlɔɔk a bubbi kitumyɛlɛ.
54005015	Bwanavva babbu balɔk bassangbong basikili basseke ka bakupnɛ Satan.
54005016	Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa ukupnɛ Jesus ɔyanganɛ bwanavva ba bwalam abbɛ babbenɛ bakɔngɔbɛ ka itutum ammɛ, ɔkɔɔmbɛ doddo. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔsam lɛtɔkɔ ’zɔng baang ufeek luzɔɔm, nkwaaning luzɔɔm lukkwoong lɔkɔɔm bwanavva babbu ba basɛlɛnɛ ɔkɔɔm-ɔkɔɔm.
54005017	Bagɛlɛnya ba banaangnɛ kɛnaang sa doddo tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bazzilɛttɔ bale ba batɔknɛ ikipili ya lɛbaang a lɛbaang, gaang gaang bagɛlɛnya ba banaangnɛ kɛnaang kɔbɛtɛbɛ ka kɛbwɔɔlɔ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, la lukopolo.
54005018	Luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛnɛ, “Tɛttɛ aggbɔ ɔgɔdɔ kamma ka ɛkɛtɛ ya ulenɛ ka kitup alaasi.” “Uyilabɔtɔɔm uzzi labɔɔk isapala.”
54005019	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ agɔpɔlɔ kɔlɔɔk kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ kwa ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔknɛ utum ɔgɛlɛnya atakabong appyeekwɛ ka kamma ittɛɛsɛ iffa ɔlɔk ikkyaat.
54005020	Awɔlɔ balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ bubbi ppwool ppwool ka lusso balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ, nkwaaning ba bassekenɛ ɔbbwɔpɔbɛ.
54005021	Ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la Christ Jesus, la bayilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, nkkwɔɔwɔ ka luzɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm nttɛ atele lɔttama ’gwɔng, afɔngɔ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsaapwɔnɛ keem kitele ka kɔlɔɔk duu kwa anaangnɛ.
54005022	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ azzuma asam labɔɔk annɔ atele ɔlɔɔt, anaangmɛ ppyɛɛ attɛ ɔnaang kɛnaang Uyini. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ atɔk bubbi balɔɔt balɔk azzenge; ataa zzekep assekebɛ.
54005023	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ avva bannyi keem. Avva waan a batak ssup agbaa wa ule uttelewɔ lɛmmɛ lɛnaangwɔ ppwool; ka alenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔffaakwɔnɛ gbɔɔgbɔɔ.
54005024	Bubbi balɔɔt balɔk kɛyɛn ba bukoolo. Bubbi abbɛ bukɔɔmnɛ ɛtɔk bumii kɛkaal bukɔngɔbɛ abbɛ biini. Ɔzzànga bubbi bwa balɔɔt balɔk bummɛbong tɛ́ttɛ́ ayɛnbwɛ.
54005025	Kule kɛssanga ssɔn, linaang sa doddo ayɛnsɛ kkpelegedee, gɔɔ linaang sa lisinɛ sa doddo lile ba likkwoong liddumu.
54006001	Ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng ba alenɛyɔng babili, atɔkyɔng issaawɔ annyɔɔng ka latele, nkwaaning ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk usi lɛlɔɔk bubbi utum lɛkɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la lukopolo ayyɔɔt.
54006002	Babili ba ibassɛ abbɛ ikupnɛ Jesus, tɛ̀ttɛ́ batɔk ibassɛ abbɛ ka isɛɛkɛ. Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ bale ikpana la ikpana. Lutini ’gwɔng batelebɛ gaang gaang bagbaa, ka balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba bayanganɛ isak ka kɛnaang abbɛ balenɛ bayanga kiyila ba basaapnɛbɛ. Akopolo balɔɔt bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng:
54006003	Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ukopolonɛ luzɔɔm gwa lulenɛ zzekep usi lɛmmwɔɔl Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, za lilenɛ lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk la lukopolo luzɔɔm ammɛ liyila, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang
54006004	ɔyɛnmɛbong kɛyɔɔng ɔsak usseke uzingizingi. Ɔkɔɔm tɔkɔlɔ wa bbɔlbbɔl, ɔkangala ikangala la kɔwɔlɔ. Bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng binnyinɛ ɔlɔɔt luleep, kɔwɔlɔ, izzit, la lɛppyɛɛk za lɛbbɔlnɛ,
54006005	la kɛkangala ikangala ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng bissi ka balɔɔt ba ippyam abbɛ isini bbwak lile, basi lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk ka tɔkɔlɔ lɛyanga. Battina battɛ luzɔɔm lulenɛ ɛtɔk ya ɔlɔɔt ɔssɛnɛ ɔyyɛɛpmɛ.
54006006	Kule kule luzɔɔm lɔnaang mung ɔlɔɔt ɔyyɛɛpmɛ, ulenɛ ka bwa ɔyanganɛ bufimmɛnɛ.
54006007	Idɔkɔ ikɔɔm ’bɔng iffu ka vveeng ’wɔng? Bulɔk ba bule! Ngkka ile isam ’bɔng igbata ka vveeng ’wɔng?
54006008	Ka kulenɛ ning, ilenɛ ibba la kazzi lɛyanga, ifɔngɔ bulɔk lɛbɛlɛ lɛggyan.
54006009	Balɔɔt ba baggyannɛ iyyɛɛp battɔ ka bubbi bakaabɛ ka ɔnnya bizingizingi ikkɔlɔ. Ɔnnya ’wɔng baang uttulunɛbɛ ɔzzɔɔk bataak lɛkɔɔl.
54006010	Bubbi ɔkkpɛlɛ bussi ka kusapa ikkpoko. Balɔɔt balɔk bakɔɔngbong ka kɛggyan ikkpoko basɛlɛ kiyila, bakɔɔng ka kɛbbɔl livve.
54006011	Ɔzzànga annɔ, ɔlɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng bitunwɔ. Lutini ’gwɔng, abum kɔbɛtɛwɔ aggyan kuddu: Atele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ayanga kiyila. Wannyɔɔng ɔsaapwɔ. Abbɔ akama. Akɔɔm bɛtɛbɛtɛ.
54006012	Kɔbɛtɛwɔ gaang gaang ka ɛtɔk a kiyila ɔlɔk ayanga kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkwɔɔwɔ ɔttɛ afal ning mung ka abwɔɔlɔmɛnɛ bwa ayilanɛ ka lusso ittɛɛsɛ ggbadam.
54006013	Nbwɔɔlɔwɔ ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa unnyinɛ bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ kuddu, la ka lusso a Christ Jesus, wa ubeenɛ ittɛɛsɛ lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk ka lusso a Pontius Pilate nttɛ,
54006014	atele lafɔɔ alokozɛ doddo afɔngɔ kɛttɔ ka azzɛ, ɔddɔkɔddɔkɔ ɔffɔ Kɛtɔm sa Uyini ayyɔɔt Jesus Christ ule uffu.
54006015	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn a latele, Ɔkɔɔm-ɛfɛɛn keem, Ubeet a babeet ɔkkpɛlɛ, Uyini bayini ɔkkpɛlɛ, ule ɔkɔɔm Jesus uffu ka ɛkɛtɛ ya bbwak.
54006016	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛyɔɔng usinɛ libbe. Ullu ka buppwolo bwa ɔlɔɔt usinɛ likkwoong ɔwɔkɔ lusso. Ɔlɔɔt wa ulemɛnɛ lɛyɛn ba ule. Ɔlɔɔt wa ule ukkwoong ɔyɛnmɛ baala ule. Latele la lakke lale za ammɛ kɛfal a kɛfal. Kulening.
54006017	Abwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba ɔyyɛɛpnɛbɛ la bɛfɛɛn a vveeng ’wɔng mung attɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔkkyaabɛ battɛ iyyɛɛp vvenɛ innyibɛ duu bwa baggyannɛ. Lutini ’gwɔng baloko ittina abbɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ammɛ wa uggwoomnɛ kɔlɔɔk, unnyi ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ bɔfɛɛn bwa ɔggyannɛ.
54006018	Abwɔɔlɔbɛ banaang budoddo. Banaang budoddo gaang gaang, baggwoom kɔlɔɔk. Bazzi bɛfɛɛn bya bayanganɛ babɛkɛ bannyi balɔɔt balɔk ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
54006019	Banaangnɛ ning vvenɛ baloko libɔngɔlɔ iyyɛɛp ya ile isi lɛbɛpɛ ka ussoonɛ. Tɛttɛ bɔk bakkwoong bayanga kuddu kwa kulenɛ kwa bbwak.
54006020	Timothy, aloko bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulewɔnɛ linnyi kɛppyɛɛk doddo. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ alɔɔk kɛlɔɔk sa kɛbbɔlnɛ, ɔlɔk vvenɛ akangala ikangala ya isinɛ lɛyyɛɛp ya bazingizingi bakkwɔɔnɛyɛ “Bisana.”
54006021	Balɔɔt balɔk battina battɛ basan kɔlɔɔk, kwakkwɛ balenɛ ɛtɔk a kiyila lɛssɛɛp. Ppyɛɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ubee la annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ.
55001001	Lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng lissi ka anaam Paul wa kɔsaapnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔ́naangnɛ ɔttɛ nzzanga Uyilabɔtɔɔm a Christ Jesus, ɔ̀tɔ́ɔmmɛ ɔttɛ nffu nbwɔɔlɔ kɔlɔɔk a kuddu kwa ɔggbanɛ lɛlɔɔk usekele ɔttɛ iyangakwɛ ka itaanɛ ka bɔkaat la Christ Jesus.
55001002	Timothy, waan anaam ka luppyam, Dedde Ebinukkpaapi la Christ Jesus, Uyini ayyɔɔt, banaangwɔ ppyɛɛ, abbebɛ lɛttɔ, bannyiwɔ bɔkaat.
55001003	Nwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa nzɔɔmnɛ nnyimɛ la luppyam gwa doddo kɛnaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt anaam ba iyɛddɛ iyɛddɛ banaangnɛ. Nwomomɛ kɛnaang ka nzɔɔmnɛ nssɛɛnwɔ ka luzɔɔm anaam ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, kikoon gɔɔ kɛtɔm.
55001004	Nkkebong liyeen annɔ, nggyan nttɛ nyɛnwɔ gaang gaang nkwaaning nyanga laggele ka luppyam.
55001005	Nkke kwa kiyila annɔ sa lɔkkwɔɔn, ka ayanganɛ kɛssanga kiyila sa Lois, ssakawɔ wa ɔgɛlɛnya, la Eunice, ssakawɔ wa ɔmaatwɔnɛ, bayanganɛ. Nsan lɔsan annɔ assɛ mung ayangasɛ ɔgbaa.
55001006	Ka ’kwɔng mung nkkewɔ nttɛ aloko lɛsɔɔk za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyiwɔnɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya ntelewɔnɛ labɔɔk anaam ka kkwɔɔt doddo.
55001007	Kuyeeng kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyinɛyɛlɛ ba kɔnaangyɛlɛ ibbwɔpɔ, lutini ’gwɔng kunnyiyɛlɛ kɛkkaam a luppyam la kɛsaap, la kɛyyɛɛp a luppyam.
55001008	Izzit tɛ̀ttɛ́ inaangwɔ kibee attɛɛsɛ Uyini ayyɔɔt, ɔlɔk vvenɛ izzit inaangwɔ kwa anaam, ɔlɔɔt igbakkɔpɔ ammɛ. Lutini ’gwɔng ayɛn akama ggwaat-ggwaat ka kufoom kwa annɔ ka kɔlɔɔk a Kuttu-Budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ulewɔnɛ lakke linnyi kwa akkwɛ.
55001009	Ɔkkalayɛlɛ, ɔkkwɔɔyɛlɛ ɔttɛ izzanga balɔɔt ammɛ biini, ka kwa ilenɛ lɛnaang lissi, ɔzzanga ka kwa luttina ammɛ biini gwa ɔyanganɛ ɔttɛ vvenɛ ɔnaangyɛlɛ ppyɛɛ. Ɔ̀tɔɔm Christ Jesus ppyɛɛ ’wɔng mung bong tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔlɔɔm ɛkpansi.
55001010	Ɔzzanga gedegede mung Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyɔɔbongyɛlɛkwɛ ka kiffu sa Jesus, ɔkkala ikkala ayyɔɔt, uffunɛ. Ɔwwɔɔlbong lubbe, iyɛn kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal ka kuttu budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kwa ulenɛyɛlɛ lɛbwɔɔlɔ.
55001011	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛbong ɔttɛ nbwɔɔlɔ Kuttu-Budoddo ammɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ uyilabɔtɔɔm la ukopolo-lukopolo.
55001012	Kwakkwɛ mung nyɛnnɛ akama ka lilɔɔk ’sɔng mung. Ɔzzanga ntii baang la luttina anaam bbwak, ka nsannɛ ɔlɔɔt wa nlokonɛ luttina anaam ka ammɛ. Nsan lɔsan nttɛ vvenɛ uloko bwa ulenɛnɛ linnyi ka budoddo tɔttɔt ɔffɔ ka Kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang.
55001013	Akɔɔm lɛmmwɔɔl za nkopolowɔnɛ kkpɔk, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ iyɔɔ ya ale akup. Ataa ka kiyila la kɛsaap. Abbyɛ bilenɛ bɛfɛɛn ayyɔɔt ka bɔkaat la Christ Jesus.
55001014	Aloko bɛfɛɛn bya lakke Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm za lalenɛyɛlɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ lannyiwɔnɛ doddo.
55001015	Asan lɔsan attɛ ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn ka ɛkpansi Asia bammabong bakɔngɔnɛ gbaak la Phygelus la Hermogenes.
55001016	Nkkpenge Uyini nttɛ ɔyɔɔ itutum a Onesiphorus kibbe-lɛttɔ ka ɔnaangnɛnɛ nggele bikkpit ggbadam, izzit isimɛ lɛnaang ka nlenɛ ɔlɔɔt igbakkɔpɔ.
55001017	Ɔ́ffɔ́nɛ̀ Rome ɛffɔ ɛffɔ uttenɛ kɛggyan eseese ɔddɔkɔddɔkɔ ɔyɛnnɛ.
55001018	Numa ubbe Uyini lɛttɔ ka Kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang. Asan lɔsan ka lɔkkwɔɔn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔkɔɔmnɛnɛ ka Ephesus.
55002001	Ka kwa annɔ, waan anaam, akɔɔm ppyɛɛ wa ulenɛ wa ayyɔɔt ka bɔkaat ayyɔɔt la Christ Jesus akkaam.
55002002	Atɔk lɛmmwɔɔl za appyeenɛnɛ ka nkopolonɛ ka lusso ittɛɛsɛ ggbadam annyi balɔɔt ba basaapwɔnɛ ba bale bakkwoong bakopolo balɔɔt balɔk.
55002003	Assɛ ayɛn akama, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ wa sɔgya Christ Jesus wa lɔkkwɔɔn.
55002004	Wa sɔgya wa ɔnaangnɛ kɛnaang, ɔggyan ɔttɛ ɔnaang kɛsaap uzzilɛttɔ ammɛ. Ba utotolo linaang ammɛ la balɔɔt a ssala.
55002005	Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔmmanɛ lɔfat ka ikanga, ba ukkwoong ɔbɛtɛ usinɛ lafɔɔ lɔfat liloko.
55002006	Uwoop-a-bɔtɔɔm wa ɔnaangnɛ kɛnaang gaang gaang kɔbɛtɛmɛ, ɔkɔɔmbong ɛtɔk ɔsanga lutini isak a kɛnaang ’sɔng baang.
55002007	Affik kɔlɔɔk kwa nlɔɔknɛ mung asan attɛ Uyini vvenɛ ɔnaangwɔ appyeekwɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
55002008	Akke Jesus Christ wa ufungalanɛ ka lubbe, ule ɔlɔɔt a kikkwu a David, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔknɛ ka Kuttu-Budoddo kwa nkopolonɛ.
55002009	Nyɛn akama bassɛɛnnɛ ikpɔkɔlɔ ka labɔɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔzzɔɔk-a-kɔlɔɔk ka nbwɔɔlɔnɛ Kuttu-Budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔzzánga lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ikpɔkɔlɔ ba lile.
55002010	Kwakkwɛ baang nbbɔnɛ akama ɔkkpɛlɛ nzzenge-luzzi balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm nkwaaning abbɛ ɔgbaa bayanga kuddu kwa kussinɛ ka labɔɔk a Christ Jesus, la iyyɛɛp ya kɛfal a kɛfal.
55002011	Uwɔng ulenɛ kɔlɔɔk a lɔkkwɔɔn: “Ilenɛ libbe la ammɛ, nzang vvenɛ issɛ iddu la ammɛ ɔgbaa.
55002012	Ibbɔnɛ akama tɔttɔt, vvenɛ issɛ iyanga lakke ikɔɔm ɛfɛɛn la ammɛ. Ikalamɛnɛ, vvenɛ ɔssɛ ɔkalayɛlɛ ayyɔɔt.
55002013	Ayyɔɔt isinɛ balɔɔt ba doddo lile, Ammɛ ule ɔlɔɔt wa doddo gbisii, ka ule usi likkwoong ɔkalamɛ kɛyɔɔng.”
55002014	Akke balɔɔt annɔ ’kwɔng, attamabɛ doddo ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm attɛ bafɔngɔ babbu ikangala. Ikangala budoddo bulɔk ba inaang ɔgbaa la kɛbɛpɛ balɔɔt ba bagɔpɔlɔnɛyɛ.
55002015	Kɔbɛtɛwɔ ayanga budoddo ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔnaang-a-kɛnaang wa izzit isimɛnɛ lɛnaang ka kɛnaang ammɛ, ukopolo bɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bwa lɔkkwɔɔn.
55002016	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ale ka kutolo kwa kusinɛ kwa latele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lile. Kɔggba balɔɔt kusseke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
55002017	Kɛssanga kikopolo ’sɔng baang kɛtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɔssɔp bwa budɔlɔnɛ busseke ppwool. Balɔɔt ba bálenɛ kɛssanga bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng likopolo balenɛ Hymenaeus la Philetus.
55002018	Bakkyaabong kɛ́ssɛ ka ɛtɔk a lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk bafɔngɔ basseke ka banaangnɛ ittina balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ kiyila ibbɔl, ka battɛnɛ kifungala ayyɔɔt ka lubbe kɛggba lɛsak.
55002019	Ɔzzànga akkɔkɔlɔm a lutte gwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ litte ba bakkwoong bannyɛkɛgwɛ. Bakkpɔkbong lammwɔɔl ka libat a lutte ’gwɔng baang battɛ, “Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsan mung balɔɔt ba balenɛ ba ammɛ. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔttɛnɛ ammɛ wa Uyini, ɔkkyaa babbu linaang ɔfɔngɔ.”
55002020	Bɛssanga bɛkkpala la ilɔlɔ bile ggbadam ka ggwoon gwa lɛbaang. Bɛlɔk banaangbyɛ la silver, bɛlɔk la gold, bɛlɔk banaangbyɛ la kɛssɛ. Bɛlɔk la kɛbat igbele. Bɛlɔk bakɔɔmbyɛ ka kɛtɔm-a-lɛtɔm, bɛlɔk bakɔɔmbyɛ gbɔɔgbɔɔgbɔɔ.
55002021	Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔkɔɔmmɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng usseke bɛfɛɛn bya bisinɛ lɛyyɛɛp vvenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkɔɔmmɛ ɔnaang kɛnaang sa lɔkkwɔɔn ka ulemɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng lɛsam unnyi abassɛ ammɛ. Ɔbamamɛbong kɛyɔɔng ɔkat kɛnaang a kɛnaang sa doddo.
55002022	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akup ikkɔlɔ kɛkkpa annyɔɔng. Kɔbɛtɛwɔ ka kwa kɔsaapnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔbɛtɛ la kiyila, la kɛsaap. Ataa ka bɔkaat la balɔɔt ba balenɛ la ippyam ya doddo, bale Uyini lɛkkwɔɔ battɛ ɔkkalabɛ.
55002023	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akup babbu ikangala ya bizingizingi. Asan lɔsan attɛ bile bikpeke ka kɔwɔlɔ.
55002024	Bɔɔyi Uyini, kɔwɔlɔ ba ɔwɔlɔ. Uggwoom kɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ, ule ukopolo-lukopolo wa ɔyyɛɛpnɛ, ɔppwa luppyam.
55002025	Ule ɔlɔɔt wa ɔkɔɔmnɛ luppyam gwa doddo ɔyɔɔ balɔɔt a kɔfɔk, ɛtɔk ya bbwak. Usinɛkkyam Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ unnyibɛ kufuk kwa kɛkkyaa kɛnaang a bubbi kɛfɔngɔ, bappyɛlɛ baffu bakup lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk.
55002026	vvenɛ bappyɛlɛ basan kɔlɔɔk batta ka ɔnnya Ubbu, wa ulenɛbɛ lɛkaa ɔnaangbɛ bayila kummɛ.
55003001	Akke asan attɛ vvenɛ ɛkɛtɛ ɛkɔɔt balɔɔt ka bɛtɔm a lakpeke.
55003002	Balɔɔt vvenɛ bassɔp bɔfɛɛn, vvenɛ bawɔlɔ, banaang kamma, baggbengebɛ kɛyɔɔng, banaang bɛfɛɛn izzit. Ibassɛ abbɛ baala batele. Kɔlɔɔk vvenɛ baala kuffibɛ. Vvenɛ bafim kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
55003003	Vvenɛ babbɔl eleme. Ɔlɔɔt lɛttɔ bɛ baala ubbe. Vvenɛ bakkala lalaak babɛtɛ balɔɔt, vvenɛ baggyan kɔlɔɔk, vvenɛ babbyap gaang gaang. Balɔɔt bakɔɔm ifɛtɛ banaang balɔɔt bubbi.
55003004	Balɔɔt vvenɛ bassi latɔɔk, vvenɛ bagɔgɔlɔ basak, vvenɛ iyyɛɛp a vveengodde isaapbɛ itta Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
55003005	Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang batɔk luzɔɔm tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bayɛnnɛgwɛ. Kwa lakke aggwɛ ba bayila. Ataa zzekep asseke kɛssanga balɔɔt ’bɔng baang.
55003006	Balɔɔt balɔk bamal ka ggwoon a balɔɔt balɔk bakup bwanavva ba bubbi abbɛ bulenɛ lɛsak lɛttala basseke ka bakkɔlɔnɛ ikkɔlɔ tɔkɔtɔkɔtɔkɔ.
55003007	Abbɛ balenɛ bwanavva ba babumnɛ kikkoop a kɔlɔɔk, ɔzzànga baala basan lɔkkwɔɔn akkwɛ.
55003008	Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Jannes la Jambres bafimnɛ kwa Moses, balɔɔt ’bɔng mung ɔgbaa bassɛ bafim kwa lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk ning baang. Abbɛ balenɛ balɔɔt ba ippyam abbɛ isinɛ lɛyyɛɛp bale kiyila lisi lɛyanga.
55003009	Ɔzzànga fulufulu baala baffɔ, ka balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ bale bayɛn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bazizinginɛ. Vvenɛ kɔnaangbɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɔnaangnɛ Jannes la Jambres.
55003010	Ɔ̀zzànga annɔ akupbong lukopolo anaam, la linaang anaam, la luttina anaam, la kɛyyɛɛp a luppyam anaam, la kɛsaap anaam, la kɛbbɔ akama anaam,
55003011	la kɛyɛn sa nyɛnnɛ. Asan lɔsan bɛfɛɛn bya bɛnaangnɛnɛ ka Antioch la Iconium, la Lystra. Uggboggbo akama wa nbbɔnɛ baang. Ɔzzanga Uyini ɔkkalanɛ ka abbyɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔfɔngɔ.
55003012	Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔggyannɛ kɛtaa ka kuddu kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka bɔkaat la Christ Jesus vvenɛ ɔyɛn akama.
55003013	Ɔzzànga banaang-a-bubbi la bakkala-lɛlaak vvenɛ bakam-ɔkama banaang bubbi, bakkala lɛlaak. Vvenɛ bafɛɛt balɔɔt ɔgbaa, la kɛfɛɛt sa bafɛɛtnɛbɛ abbɛ biini.
55003014	Ɔzzànga annɔ akup kɔlɔɔk kwa bakopolowɔnɛ, ayanga kiyila kɛkkaam lɔkkaam. Asan lɔsan balɔɔt ba badɔkɔnɛ ittikya annɔ.
55003015	Ɔgbaa akke attɛ assi ssup ka buwaan asan kɔlɔɔk a livva lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ka kukkwoongnɛ kunnyiwɔ bisana pya bile bikɔɔmwɔ bimii ka kuddu kwa kɛyanga kiyila kitum Christ Jesus.
55003016	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔssɛɛnnɛ balɔɔt ba bakkpɔknɛ lɛmmwɔɔl ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ luttina bakkpɔk kɔlɔɔk ammɛ. Kɔlɔɔk ammɛ kɔyyɛɛp gaang gaang ka kɛkɔɔm kikopolo lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk, la kifim a kɔlɔɔk kwa kusinɛ bbwak lile, la kɛlɔngɔlɔ kwa kusinɛ bbwak lile, la kikopolo lukopolo gwa linaang sa bbwak,
55003017	nkwaaning ɔlɔɔt wa ɔnaangnɛ kɛnaang Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkɔnɔ, ɔyanga bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya ɔggyannɛ, ɔkɔɔm ɔnaang lutini kɛnaang duu sa kɛyyɛɛpnɛ.
55004001	Nttamawɔ ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la Christ Jesus wa ule ɔkaal kɛkaal ɔssɛbibit ɔkkpɛlɛ, bakokolo la babbu, ammɛ wa ule ka uffunɛ ɔkɔɔm vveengodde. Nttɛ,
55004002	akopolo lɛmmwɔɔl ammɛ kɔbɛtɛwɔ, mkkpa ɛkɛtɛ ele bbwak, ɔlɔk esi bbwak lile. Asikili balɔɔt ippyam, akamabɛ ippyam, abbabɛ bikɔɔm, akopolobɛ la kibbe-luppyam.
55004003	Ɛkɛtɛ vvenɛ effu ya balɔɔt bale basi lukopolo gwa lɔkkwɔɔn lɛbɛlɛ lɛgɔpɔlɔ. Vvenɛ bappyɛɛ banaang kwa battinanɛ ka ippyam abbɛ biini. Vvenɛ bassɛ bakkpit baggyan bakopolo-lukopolo ggbadam ba bale bakopolobɛ bwa abbɛ biini baggyannɛ battɛ bappyee.
55004004	Vvenɛ bafim lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk bappyɛɛ basam ittina abbɛ baloko ka lissa.
55004005	Ɔzzànga annɔ akɔɔmwɔ kɛyɔɔng ka utini lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ. Abbɔ akama, anaang kɛnaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt wa ukopolonɛ Kuttu-Budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Anaang kɛnaang annɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɔɔyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
55004006	Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kwa anaam mung, ɛkɛtɛ ɛffɔbong ya bale ka bawwɔɔlnɛnɛ. Ɛkɛtɛ ɛffɔbong ya nle ka ngbatanɛ nssekewɔyɔng ka vveeng ’wɔng mung.
55004007	Nllubong kullu kɔyyɛɛp. Numa nffɔ ka lakuma. Nkɔɔmbong kiyila anaam kkpɔk.
55004008	Ɔzzànga gedegede mung lɛsɔɔk za nyanganɛ ka nlenɛ lɛbɛtɛ lilenɛ bakang ka lɛkatnɛnɛ. Azzɛ lilenɛ kɛ̀ttɔ̀pɔ́ ododo kɛtaa bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa Uyini, Ɔkaal-a-kɛkaal wa bbwak, ule unnyinɛ ka Kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang. Ɔzzànga anaam keem lissi ka ule unnyinɛ, ule unnyi ɔtta la balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ ba bale bataa la kɛsaap bakatmɛ ɛkɛtɛ uffunɛ.
55004009	Abum gaang gaang akka liffu ka ɛfɛɛn anaam gedegede mung.
55004010	Demas vveeng wa gedegede mung ɔsaapmɛbong ɔsak. Ɔgbatabong ɔkɔngɔnɛ umii Thessalonica. Crescens umiibong Galatia, Titus umiibong Dalmatia.
55004011	Usseke Luke kɛyɔɔng ka ulenɛ mung la anaam. Akɔɔm Mark affuyɔng la ammɛ la ammɛ. Ammɛ ukkwoongnɛ ɔyaamnɛ ka kɛnaang anaam.
55004012	Ntɔɔmbong Tychicus umii Ephesus.
55004013	Ɛkɛtɛ ya ale ka affunɛ, asam uwɔkɔlɔ wa ngbatanɛ nkɔngɔ ka Troas ka ssala Carpus akɔɔm affu. Asam livva ɔgbaa akɔɔm affu, gaang gaang livva sa banaangnɛsɛ la ɛkkpa ɛsɛɛn.
55004014	Alexander, ɔsal-a-bɛkkpala ɔnaangnɛ ubbu kɔlɔɔk kɔttala. Uyini vvenɛ ukipilimɛ ka kwa ulenɛ lɛnaang.
55004015	Akatwɔ kɛyɔɔng assekemɛ. Ɔkɔɔm lɛgabwɔ ufim lɛmmwɔɔl za ibwɔɔlɔnɛ.
55004016	Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn gbɔɔ wa ubeenɛ la anaam ka kɛkaal usi lile. Nbeenɛ lafeet kɛyɔɔng; Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ bamma bakɔngɔnɛ. Nkkpenge Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm nttɛ kɔfɔngɔmɛ kitun kɔppyɛɛkbɛ.
55004017	Ɔzzanga Uyini ubee la anaam unnyinɛ lakke nkkwoong nbwɔɔlɔ Ikanakana bɔtɔɔm ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ busaal bappyee. Ɔkkalanɛ ka kamma ugɛpɛ ɔfɔngɔ.
55004018	Uyini vvenɛ ɔkkalanɛ ka bubbi ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔsamnɛ ka budoddo umii ka Itutum ammɛ ka libat. Kibungu kile sa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛfal a kɛfal! Kulening.
55004019	Awomo Priscilla la Aquila la balɔɔt a ssala Onesiphorus.
55004020	Erastus ule ka Corinth ka ɔtaanɛ. Ngbata Trophimus nkɔngɔ ka Miletus ka usimɛnɛ lɛppwa.
55004021	Abum affu tɛ́ttɛ́ lukook lɔffa. Eubulus la Prudens la Linus, ɔbɛtɛ la Claudia la ikpana ayyɔɔt ilɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ battɛ nwomowɔ.
55004022	Uyini ubee la kuyeeng annɔ. Ppyɛɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtaa la annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ.
56001001	Lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng lissi ka anaam Paul, bɔɔyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Uyilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus Christ. Ɔsanganɛ ɔtɔɔm ɔttɛ nffu nnaang kiyila balɔɔt ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ kɛkkaam. Ɔttɛ nyɔɔbɛ ɛtɔk a lukopolo gwa lɔkkwɔɔn ka luzɔɔm ayyɔɔt.
56001002	Akkwɛ kulenɛ ka ikkala kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa usinɛ lɛlaak lɛlɔɔk ɔdɔkɔ usekeleyɛlɛ kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal ’kwɔng mung, tɛ́ttɛ́ ɛkɛtɛ ya ɔlɔɔmnɛ ɛkpansi ɛffɔ.
56001003	Ɔyɔɔ nsekele ammɛ ka bbwak ka bɔtɔɔm bwa ɔtɔɔmnɛ. Nkwɔng ɔdɔkɔ ɔssɛɛnnɛ anaam ka kɔbɔɔk, nbwɔɔlɔkwɛ ka lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔkkala ikkala ayyɔɔt.
56001004	Nkkpɔk nfeewɔ annɔ Titus, waan anaam ka lɔkkwɔɔn ka kiyila sa iyanganɛ la annɔ. Numa Dedde Ebinukkpaapi, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ayyɔɔt, la Christ Jesus, ɔkkala ikkala ayyɔɔt banaangwɔ ppyɛɛ, bassɛɛnwɔ bɔkaat ka luppyam.
56001005	Ngbata nkɔngɔwɔ ka Crete nttɛ ɔkkɔɔnɛ alɔngɔlɔ lilɔɔk sa litiinɛ sa kɛlɔngɔlɔ. Assang balɔɔt ba balenɛ bagɛlɛnya luzɔɔm ka lɛffɛ la zzɔn. Akke lɔttama anaam.
56001006	Ɔgɛlɛnya luzɔɔm úle ɔlɔɔt wa usinɛ kibbi ka kɔlɔɔk lizzi. Ule ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtɔknɛ wanavva vvɔn keem. Bwaan ammɛ bale bwɔɔn ba bayanganɛ kiyila. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ule ɔlɔɔt wa ɔbbyapnɛ. Ule ɔlɔɔt wa babbɛ batelemɛnɛ.
56001007	Ka ulenɛ uzzilɛttɔ luzɔɔm, tɛ̀ttɛ́ ule ɔlɔɔt wa ɔnaangnɛ lɛlaak. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ule ɔlɔɔt wa ɔkkyaamɛnɛ ɔsak ɔnaang kamma la balɔɔt. Ɔfɔngɔ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyanganɛ ubbu luppyam kile, ɔlɔk ɔvva-batak, ɔlɔk ɔggyan-a-kɔlɔɔk, ɔlɔk ɔwɔnɔ.
56001008	Ulé ɔlɔɔt wa uggwoomnɛ kɔlɔɔk, kɔlɔɔk kwa kɔyyɛɛpnɛ kɔsaapmɛ. Ule ɔlɔɔt wa ɔkɔɔmmɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng. Ule ɔlɔɔt wa bbwak. Utele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ule ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsannɛ kɔlɔɔk.
56001009	Ule ɔlɔɔt wa ubeenɛ bbwak ka bɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bwa bulenɛ kɔlɔɔk a lɔkkwɔɔn, bule bbwak la lukopolo luzɔɔm ’gwɔng baang. Ning vvenɛ ukkwoong ɔkɔɔm lukopolo gwa lɔkkwɔɔn, ɔbba balɔɔt bikɔɔm, ɔgbaa ɔyɔɔ kɛsɛpɛ balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba bafimnɛkwɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ basɛpɛnɛ.
56001010	Balɔɔt bakɔɔng lɔkɔɔng, gaang gaang balɔɔt ba badɔkɔnɛ bakup luzɔɔm gwa balɔɔt a Jews kkpal, mung basseke ka bakupnɛ Christ. Abbɛ bafimnɛ kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, bafɛɛt balɔɔt la babbu ittina abbɛ.
56001011	Kɔyyɛɛp ka atununɛbɛ. Asinɛbɛ litunu, vvenɛ babbum itutum ɔkkpɛlɛ ka kikopolo lukopolo gwa búsinɛ̀ likopolo. ɔssanga ubbu luttina kɛnaang ikkpoko.
56001012	Ɔdɔkɔ ule ɔlɔɔt a Crete biini wa uppyeenɛ kutolo ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔttɛ, “Balɔɔt a Crete bakkala lɛlaak ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Bale tɛ̀ttɛ̀ babbyap isɛɛn ka kɛmat. Bakpɛkkpɛlɛ balɔɔt ba basinɛ kɔlɔk lɛsan ɔgbaa la kizzi kazzi.”
56001013	Kwa ɔlɔɔknɛ, kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Kwakkwɛ baang ale attamabɛ gaang gaang nkwaaning bayanga kiyila sa doddo,
56001014	ɔlɔk kusibɛ lɛbɛtɛ ka lissa balɔɔt a Jews la lafɔɔ za lassinɛ ka balɔɔt ba balenɛ lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk lifim.
56001015	Bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bɛyyɛɛp-ɔyyɛɛp ka labɔɔk a balɔɔt ba tɔkɔlɔ abbɛ ulenɛ kpaladada. Ɔzzànga bɔfɛɛn bwa buyyɛɛpnɛ la balɔɔt ’bɔng baang, ba babbɔlnɛ tɔkɔlɔ basɛlɛ kiyila ba bule, ka ippyam abbɛ la ittina abbɛ isinɛ lɛyyɛɛp.
56001016	Babbwa battɛ abbɛ basan Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔsan, ɔzzànga linaang abbɛ ba liyɔɔ littɛ basan mung Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Bayanga latun ka ippyam. Ɔlɔɔt ba batele. Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba bakkɔnɔ kɛnaang a budoddo kinnyibɛ.
56002001	Ɔzzànga annɔ akopolo kɛssanga ssɔn la lukopolo gwa lulenɛ bbwak.
56002002	Abwɔɔlɔ bagɛlɛnya bakɔɔmbɛ kɛyɔɔng, basan kɔlɔɔk, bakatbɛ kɛyɔɔng, bayanga kiyila sa bbwak, la kɛsaap la kɛbbɔ akama.
56002003	Assɛ abwɔɔlɔ bagelenya bwanavva attɛ banaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bwanavva ba bafalnɛ lafal a kitele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm banaangnɛ. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ bale babwɔɔlɔ-ibwɔɔlɔ. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ bale babili-batak. Bakopolo kwa kɔyyɛɛpnɛ,
56002004	nkwaaning bakopolo bwaanabwanavva tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bale batele bwalam abbɛ la bwaan abbɛ.
56002005	Bakɔɔmbɛ kɛyɔɔng, basɛlɛ bubbi ka kkwɔɔt. Bale bwanavva ba badoddo ka ssala bwalam abbɛ, nkwaaning ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk usi bubbi lɛlɔɔk utum lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
56002006	Assɛ abwɔɔlɔ bakolobbya attɛ bakɔɔmbɛ kɛyɔɔng.
56002007	Annɔ biini anaang budoddo ka itɔk-itɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ ayɔɔ balɔɔt. Alɔɔk lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk, kɔbɛtɛwɔ ka lukopolo annɔ.
56002008	Atolo kutolo kwa bale basiwɔ lɛkpɛn, nkwaaning izzit inaang balɔɔt a kɔfɔk annɔ ka bale basɛlɛ ubbu kɔlɔɔk wa bale balɔɔk batumyɛlɛ.
56002009	Babili batele ibassɛ abbɛ. Banaang kwa kɔsaapnɛbɛ itɔk itɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ka lilɔɔk, tɛ̀ttɛ́ bappyɛlɛbɛ kamma kwa kusinɛ lɛyyɛɛp,
56002010	ɔlɔk vvenɛ la bàzzi ikkpoko gɔɔ bɛfɛɛn ibassɛ abbɛ. Lutini ’gwɔng bayɔɔbɛ kɛyɔɔng ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ battɛ abbɛ bale balɔɔt ba doddo, nkwaaning bagbaa kuttu lukopolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkala ikkala ayyɔɔt ka bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya banaangnɛ.
56002011	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyɔɔbong ppyɛɛ ammɛ wa kuddu ka balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ.
56002012	Ppyɛɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ’wɔng baang ukopoloyɛlɛ ɔttɛ ikkyaa lɛfal za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usinɛ lɛggyan la kusapa bɛfɛɛn a vveengodde ifɔngɔ. Iddu kuddu kwa kɛkɔɔmyɛlɛ kɛyɔɔng la kɛtaa bbwak, iddu kwa kɔsaapnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka vveeng ’wɔng.
56002013	Ka ilenɛ ka kɛtaa kɛkat Kɛtɔm-a-ppyɛɛ sa ilenɛ baang ka ittinanɛ ifɔngɔsɛ. Assɛ kilenɛ sa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ayyɔɔt la ɔkkala-ikkala ayyɔɔt Jesus Christ bale baffu.
56002014	Ɔsammɛ kɛyɔɔng unnyiyɛlɛ ɔttɛ ɔkkalayɛlɛ ka lilɔɔk ibbyap ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ɔnaangyɛlɛ izzanga balɔɔt ba doddo. Ile balɔɔt ammɛ kɛyɔɔng ba baggyannɛ kɛnaang a budoddo.
56002015	Akopolo bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung. Akɔɔm lakke annɔ ka ale assɛɛn balɔɔt ba ba gɔpɔlɔwɔnɛ luttina la ɛkɛtɛ ale attamabɛ. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ayila ɔlɔɔt vvɔn gbɔɔ ɔtɔkwɔ ka biwaan.
56003001	Akke balɔɔt annɔ batele bakɔɔm-ɛfɛɛn la bazzilɛttɔ, babama banaang kɔlɔɔk duu kwa kɔyyɛɛpnɛ.
56003002	Abwɔɔlɔbɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ balɔɔk bubbi batum ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk. Bataa ka bɔkaat la bunngwa. Bakɔɔm luppyam gwa doddo battele balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ.
56003003	Ayyɔɔt biini idɔkɔ bazingizingi kpal. Ɔlɔɔt ba itele. Inaang lilɔɔk sa libbɔlnɛ. Idɔkɔ babili a kkwɔɔt la bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya bɛsaapnɛyɛlɛ. Ibɛpɛ kuddu ayyɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ibbyap la kɛnaang a luleep. Itun balɔɔt balɔk, abbɛ bassɛ batunyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt.
56003004	Ɔzzánga kiggwoom a kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la kɛsaap ammɛ kiffunɛ,
56003005	ɔkkalayɛlɛ. Kwa bɔllɛ kɛnaang ayyɔɔt sa inaangnɛ lissi, ɔzzànga kiggwoom a kɔlɔɔk ammɛ kɛnaangnɛ ɔkkalayɛlɛ ka kɛzzaa sa Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔnaangnɛyɛlɛ, kɔppyɛlɛ kɔmaatyɛlɛ ka ufaa lɛfal.
56003006	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uvvoongyɛlɛ Kuyeeng ammɛ kɔttala. Kussiyɛlɛ ka labɔɔk a Christ wa ɔkkalanɛyɛlɛ
56003007	nkwaaning ka lakke ammɛ, ippyɛlɛ itaa bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, itul kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal kwa iggyannɛ ittɛ iddu.
56003008	Uwɔng kɔlɔɔk a lɔkkwɔɔn. Nggyan nttɛ ateleyɔng zzeen ka kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng mung nkwaaning balɔɔt ba bayilanɛ kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm basan bakɔɔm ɛkɛtɛ abbɛ ka kɛnaang sa doddo. Bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng bɛyyɛɛp-ɔyyɛɛp. Bɛyaam balɔɔt ɔgbaa.
56003009	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ agɔpɔlɔ ikangala bazingizingi, la kɛttaal a lakɔɔl a balɔɔt ayyɔɔt ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ agɔpɔlɔ liwɔlɔ la lillu kitum Lafɔɔ. Bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ ba bɛyyɛɛp, ka bulɔk ba bɛffɔ.
56003010	Attama ɔlɔɔt wa ɔggyannɛ kɛbɛngɛlɛ kibbi bikkpit ning bɛffa. Alenɛ ning baang lɛnaang, bulɔk kabɛlɛ lɛnaang la ammɛ.
56003011	Asan lɔsan attɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ning baang ɔ́naang-a-bubbi. Bubbi ammɛ buyɔɔbong buttɛ bbwak mɛ ba kule.
56003012	Ɛkɛtɛ ya nle ntɔɔm Artemas ɔlɔk Tychicus nfeewɔ, abum kɔbɛtɛwɔ affu ka ɛfɛɛn anaam ka Nicopolis. Nngwabong nttɛ nle ntaa bakang ka ɛkɛtɛ lukook.
56003013	Abum kɔbɛtɛwɔ attele lɔya Zenas la Apollos bamii kɔssɛ abbɛ. Abum bayanga bɔfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bwa baggyannɛ.
56003014	Anaang balɔɔt ayyɔɔt bakkoop kɛkɔɔm ɛkɛtɛ abbɛ ka kɛnaang a budoddo, nkwaaning bayanga bwa balɔɔt baggyannɛ bbwak. Bafɔngɔ kɛtaa la babbu linaang ka lafal ’zɔng baang.
56003015	Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba balenɛ mung la anaam battɛ nwomowɔyɔng. Awomo inngwa ayyɔɔt ka kiyila annyiyɛlɛ. Ppyɛɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtaa la annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ.
57001001	Lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng lissi ka anaam Paul, ɔlɔɔt igbakkɔpɔ ka lɛttɔ a Christ Jesus la za lissinɛ ka Timothy ɔkpana ayyɔɔt, nkkpɔk nfee Philemon, ɔlɔɔt a kɛnaang ayyɔɔt, ɛnngwa ayyɔɔt wa luppyam ɔgbaa,
57001002	la luzɔɔm gwa idudanɛ ka ssala annɔ, la ɔkpana ayyɔɔt wa wanavva wa ɔzzanganɛ Apphia la wa ayyɔɔt a sɔgya Archippus;
57001003	Numa Dedde Ebinukkpaapi ayyɔɔt la Christ Jesus, banaangwɔ ppyɛɛ bannyiwɔ bɔkaat.
57001004	Ɔkpana anaam Philemon, ɛkɛtɛ duu ya nzɔɔmnɛ ntalawɔ annɔ, nwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang.
57001005	Nppyeebong kɛsaap sa ayanganɛ la balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ la kiyila sa ayanganɛ ka Christ Jesus.
57001006	Luzɔɔm anaam lùlè lɔttɛ ɛnngwa ayyɔɔt la annɔ ka ilenɛ balɔɔt a kiyila, vvenɛ ɛkɔɔmyɛlɛ emii ka bɔddɔng a kɛsan kɔlɔɔk a ppyɛɛ wa iyanganɛ ka kuddu ayyɔɔt ka bɔkaat la Christ.
57001007	Ɔkpana anaam wa luppyam, kɛsaap annɔ kɛkɔɔmbong laggele za lɛbaang kifeenɛ, ɔbɛtɛ la kɛkkaam a luppyam sa lɛbaang a lɛbaang! Afeelebong ippyam a balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ itaa ka lawaa.
57001008	Ka kulenɛ ning, vvenɛ nkkaam luppyam kkpɔk nlɔɔk kɔkkɔlɔm ka bukpana ayyɔɔt la annɔ ka Christ Jesus nttɛ, anaang duu kwa kulenɛ bbwak a kɛnaang.
57001009	Ɔzzànga ka asaapnɛnɛ gaang vvenɛ nppyɛɛ nbapwɔ kɔlɔɔk, nkkpa ulenɛ anaam Paul nlenɛ Uyilabɔtɔɔm a Christ, gedegede mung nbbal lile ka igbakkɔpɔ ka lɛttɔ ammɛ.
57001010	Nbapwɔ kɔlɔɔk nnyi Onesimus, wa ulenɛ waan anaam biini ka Christ; ka ɛkɛtɛ nlenɛ ka igbakkɔpɔ nsikili dedde ammɛ ka kuyeeng.
57001011	Ɛkɛtɛ nnyɔn ɔdɔkɔ usiwɔ ka kukkam lile. Ɔzzanga gedegede mung utiiyɛlɛ ka kukkam.
57001012	Nle ka ntɔɔmmɛnɛ ɔppyɛlɛ isimisimi uffu ka ɛfɛɛn annɔ. Luppyam anaam lule lumii la ammɛ la ammɛ.
57001013	Kɔdɔkɔ kɔsaapnɛ ka ɔtaanɛ mung la anaam ka nlenɛ ka igbakkɔpɔ ka kɔlɔɔk a kuttu budoddo a Christ, nkwaaning uttelenɛ ɔkkalawɔ.
57001014	Ɔzzànga nkkpa kɔnaang, ba nggyan nttɛ ntutwɔ attelenɛ. Lutini ’gwɔng kule kɔsaapnɛ ka anaangnɛ kwɛ ka kɔsaapwɔnɛ. Kɔlɔɔk kɔlɔk baala nnaang kusiwɔnɛ lɛsaap.
57001015	Baang kɛgbata sa Onesimus ɔgbatanɛ ussekewɔ ka waan ɛkɛtɛ ssup kɛdɔkɔ ning baang nkwaaning ɔppyɛlɛ atɔkmɛ ɔtaa la annɔ ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
57001016	Gedegede mung tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ubili keem ba ɔbɛlɛ lile. Ɔttanɛbong ubili liggbenge! Ule ɔkpana ayyɔɔt wa lɔkkwɔɔn ka Christ. Ɔsaapnɛ gaang gaang. Ule ɔttawɔ annɔ ka luppyam lile ɔgbaa ka ulenɛ ubili, ibbal ka bukpana lile ka Uyini.
57001017	Attinanɛ kwa anaam tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ annɔ, atɔkmɛ assɛɛn ka kkwɔɔt tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ale atɔknɛ anaam.
57001018	Ulenɛ kɔlɔɔk kɔlɔk lɛnaang kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ, ɔlɔk ulewɔ la ippwoot, affikbyɛ assɛɛn kwa ippwoot ya anaam.
57001019	Vvenɛ nkkpɔk ’kwɔng ka kɔbɔɔk kwa anaam biini. Anaam Paul vvenɛ ntakwɔ ippwoot ’yɔng baang. (Ba nggyan nttɛ nkkewɔ asan attɛ kuddu annɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ kulenɛ ippwoot anaam.)
57001020	Mkkpee ɔkpana anaam, anaangnɛ budoddo ’bwɔng ka lɛttɔ Uyini. Anaangnɛ nggele ka nlenɛ ɔkpana annɔ ka Christ.
57001021	Nsan lɔsan nttɛ ka nkkpɔknɛ lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng mung vvenɛ anaang bwa nbapwɔnɛ nttɛ anaang. Nsan lɔsan nttɛ gɔɔ vvenɛ anaang asak ning baang.
57001022	Ɔgbaa, aggyan lɛnɔk a ggwoon abamazɛ alokonɛ. Nttina nttɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ uppyee luzɔɔm annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔsamnɛ ɔppyɛlɛ unnyiwɔyɔng.
57001023	Epaphras, wa ulenɛ ka igbakkɔpɔ mung la anaam ka lɛttɔ a Christ ɔttɛ nwomowɔyɔng.
57001024	Mark, Aristarcus, la Demas la Luke ba inaangnɛ kɛnaang la abbɛ, battɛ nwomowɔyɔng.
57001025	Ppyɛɛ Uyini, Jesus Christ, ubee la annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ.
58001001	Ka isimi ka isimi, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔssɛ la bappyee-kutolo ammɛ utolo kutolo unnyi idedde ayyɔɔt ya iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ bikkpit ggbadam ka itɔk ppwap.
58001002	Ɔzzanga ka bɛtɔm a lakpeke ’byɔng mung Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔssɛbong la Awaan ɔlɔɔk unnyiyɛlɛ. Ammɛ ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkɔɔmnɛ ɔlɔɔm vveengodde. Ammɛ ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ lɛsanga ɔttɛ ɔtɔk bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔyanga ka lakpeke.
58001003	Uwongolo la buppwolo lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm biini bbwak. Lakke lɛmmwɔɔl ammɛ labwɔɔpnɛ vveengodde laloko. Ulenɛ balɔɔt bubbi abbɛ lɛkkpɔlɔ, umii ɔtaa ka libat ka kɔbɔɔk-ɛlaabɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔttanɛ lakke ɔkkpɛlɛ.
58001004	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkwɔɔ Awaan ɔttɛ ɔtta Bayilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ liggbenge, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɛkɔɔl sa unnyimɛnɛ lɛttanɛ za abbɛ.
58001005	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba ɔtaka ɔlɔɔk la uyilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ ɔlɔk ɔttɛ, “Annɔ Waan anaam, mmwɔɔn anaam nssekenɛ Ssaawɔ.” Gɔɔ vvenɛ ule la uyilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ ɔlɔk lɛlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Vvenɛ nle Abassɛ ammɛ, ammɛ ule Waan anaam.”
58001006	Ka ɛkɛtɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uttinanɛ kɛtɔɔm Awaan uffu ka vveengodde, ɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng ɔgbaa, ɔttɛ, “Bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ bazɔɔm bannyi Awaan ’wɔng baang.”
58001007	Uwɔng ulenɛ kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔknɛ utum bayilabɔtɔɔm Ammɛ, ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaang bayilabɔtɔɔm Ammɛ bataa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛffa, Ɔnaang ibɔɔyi Ammɛ itaa tɛ́ttɛ́ lalaak a lɔkɔɔn.”
58001008	Ka kwa kutumnɛ Awaan, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛ; “Mkkpa kɔnaang, Oo Dedde Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, kibeet annɔ vvenɛ kittumu ka kɛfal a kɛfal. Akɔɔmbong itutum annɔ doddo.
58001009	Kɔlɔɔk kwa doddo kɔsaapwɔnɛ, kwa bbɔl bbɔl wɔba kɔsaap. Kwakkwɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm annɔ ɔsangawɔnɛ unnyi laggele za latele ɔtta bannyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ.”
58001010	Ɔbbal lɛlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Uyini, annɔ alɔɔmnɛ ɛkpansi ka ussinɛ ka lutte. Akɔɔm labɔɔk annɔ anaang libat.
58001011	Vvenɛ bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ bɛtaak ussekewɔ annɔ ataa. Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbyɛ vvenɛ bɛkkpɛɛm tɛ̀ttɛ̀ iwɔkɔlɔ.
58001012	Vvenɛ akkɔtbyɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ uwɔkɔlɔ. Vvenɛ bifoolo tɛ̀ttɛ̀ iwɔkɔlɔ. Ɔzzànga annɔ keem baala afoolo. Baala akkpɛɛm.”
58001013	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba ɔtaka ɔlɔɔk la Uyilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ ɔlɔk ɔttɛ, “Taa mung ka kɔbɔɔk ɛlaabɔɔk anaam, ɔddɔkɔddɔkɔ nloko balɔɔt a kɔfɔk annɔ bassekewɔ utele-bukkpɔ.”
58001014	Babang balenɛ bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm? Abbɛ balenɛ liyeeng sa litelenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔtɔɔmsɛ ɔttɛ liffu littele balɔɔt ba bale ka batɔknɛ kuddu ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
58002001	Kwakkwɛ ile ilɔm lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk kwa ilenɛ lippyee kkpɔk, nkwaaning basiyɛlɛ lɛfɛɛt bassɛɛn ka kɔlɔɔk.
58002002	Bɔtɔɔm bwa bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm babwɔɔlɔnɛ idedde ayyɔɔt ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ bule ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Akkwɛ kɔnaangnɛ ɔlɔɔt duu wa usinɛbwɛ likup ɔlɔk utelebwɛ vvenɛ ɔyɛn akama wa ɔggyannɛ.
58002003	Ngkka mung ile inaang nang isɛɛm akama ’wɔng, isinɛ lɛgɔpɔlɔ kwa kuddu kwa lɛbaang ’kwɔng. Uyini biini ɔkɔɔmbong ɛtɔk ɔbwɔɔlɔyɛlɛ kwa kuddu ’kwɔng baang. Balɔɔt ba bappyeemɛnɛ babwɔɔlɔyɛlɛ battɛ kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
58002004	Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang nnyɔn, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔgbaabɛ buttɛɛsɛ ammɛ la bɛfɛɛn a bikɛɛlɛ la bɛmaanga lakke ammɛ ggbadam. Ɔgbaa unnyiyɛlɛ lasɔɔk a Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔm tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɔsaapmɛnɛ.
58002005	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usi bayilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ lɛsanga ɔttɛ bale bazzilɛttɔ a vveeng ’wɔng wa ɔttɛnɛ ule ka ɔnaangnɛ. Ammɛ ulenɛ vveeng wa ilɔɔknɛ itum mung.
58002006	Kule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔknɛ ka ɛfɛɛn ɛlɔk ka Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm battɛ, “Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔlɔɔt ulenɛ ’bɔng wa attinanɛ kwa ammɛ, ɔlɔɔt gbɔɔ mung ulenɛ wa appyɛɛkmɛnɛ ɔɔ?
58002007	Anaangmɛ ka waan ɛkɛtɛ ssup ussup ɔtta bayilabɔtɔɔm annɔ; Ɔzzanga attɔpɔmɛ ododo lakke la latele,
58002008	Anaangmɛ uzzilɛttɔ bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ.” Luvva ’gwɔng lɔlɔɔk lɔttɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaang ɔlɔɔt “Uzzilɛttɔ Bɛfɛɛn Ɔkkpɛlɛ.” Nkwɔng kugupu bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Ɔzzànga gedegede mung ɔlɔɔt ba iyɛn ka uzzinɛ lɛttɔ bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ.
58002009	Ɔzzànga iyɛn mung Jesus wa ɔnaangmɛnɛ ussup ɔtta bayilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ ka waan a liggbili ssup. Kussi ka kibbelɛttɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ubbe ka lɛttɔ balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ. Gedegede mung iyɛnmɛ ka battɔpɔmɛnɛ ododo la lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la latele ka kɔlɔɔk a lubbe la akama wa ɔyɛnnɛ.
58002010	Kɔdɔkɔ kule bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm keem wa ɔlɔɔmnɛ bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ulokobyɛ ule ɔnaang Jesus ɔtaa ka budoddo ka ussinɛ ka akama wa ɔyɛnnɛ nkwaaning ɔkɔɔm balɔɔt bamii batul laggele ka Jesus ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔkɔɔmnɛbɛ uffu ka kuddu.
58002011	Ɔzzaa balɔɔt bubbi abbɛ busaal. Ammɛ la balɔɔt ba ɔzzaanɛ bubbi abbɛ, ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ bayanga Abassɛ vvɔn. Kwakkwɛ baang Jesus izzit isimɛnɛ lɛnaang kɛkkwɔɔbɛ ikpana ammɛ.
58002012	Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔknɛ la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛ, “Vvenɛ nlɔɔk ntum bwa alenɛ lɛnaang nbwɔɔlɔ ikpana anaam, Vvenɛ nbunguwɔ ka lusso kibbi ɔkkpɛlɛ.”
58002013	Ɔbbal lɛlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Vvenɛ nsam luppyam anaam nloko ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.” Ɔbbal lɛttɛ, “Yɛnnɛ mung la bwɔɔntiti ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛnɛ linnyi.”
58002014	Bwɔɔntiti, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Jesus ukkwoongnɛ ɔkkwɔɔbɛ, ka bayanganɛ ɛkkpa kkwɔɔt la linnyi, Jesus biini ɔssɛ ule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ abbɛ, ɔyanga kuddu tɛ̀ttɛ̀ abbɛ. Ɔnaang ning baang nkwaaning ɔkɔɔm lubbe ammɛ ɔbɛpɛ likke Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm a kuyeeng, wa ɔyanganɛ lakke lubbe,
58002015	ɔkkɔɔnɛ ɔkkyaa balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba badɔkɔnɛ babili ɔkkpɛlɛ ka lafal abbɛ bafɔngɔ ka lubbe lɔbbwɔpɔnɛbɛ.
58002016	Kule kpelegedee, bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lissi ka uttelenɛ. Lutini ’gwɔng “Uttele balɔɔt a kikkwu Abraham.” tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ.
58002017	Uwɔng ulenɛ kɛttɛ ule ɔtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ikpana ammɛ ka linaang ɔkkpɛlɛ la itɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ nkwaaning ule Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm wa lɛbaang wa ɔyyɛɛpnɛ bɛnaang, ɔlɔɔt ubbemɛ lɛttɔ ka kɛnaang ammɛ sa ɔnaangnɛ unnyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔlɔk bubbi balɔɔt bule la kɛsɔɔk.
58002018	Gedegede mung, ukkwoong mung uttele balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba ballɛnɛbɛ, ka ammɛ biini balemɛnɛ lɛssɛ ballɛ ɔyɛn akama.
58003001	Ikpana anaam, annyɔɔng balɔɔt ba ayilanɛyɔng kwa Jesus, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulewɔyɔng lɛssɛ ɔkkwɔɔ, attinayɔng kwa Jesus wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔɔmmɛnɛ ɔttɛ uffu ɔzzánga Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm wa lɛbaang ka kiyila sa ibwɔɔlɔnɛ.
58003002	Utele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔsangamɛnɛ ɔttɛ uffu ɔnaang kɛnaang ’sɔng, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Moses utelenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka kɛnaang ammɛ ka ggwoon Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ.
58003003	Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔbɔɔknɛ ggwoon ɔyanga latele ɔtta ggwoon biini. Kɔssɛ kule kɛssanga ssɔn, Jesus ɔttanɛ wa latele lile ɔtta Moses.
58003004	Ggwoon duu ɔlɔɔt ɔbɔɔknɛ; ɔzzànga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangnɛ bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ.
58003005	Moses ɔdɔkɔ ɔlɔɔt wa doddo, ka ɔdɔkɔnɛ bɔɔyi ka ssala Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ɔlɔɔk kɔlɔɔk a bɛfɛɛn bya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule ɔlɔɔk ka ussoonɛ.
58003006	Ɔzzànga Christ ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa doddo ka ulenɛ Waan wa uzzinɛ lɛttɔ ka ssala Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ayyɔɔt ilenɛ ssala ammɛ, ulenɛ ka ilokonɛ kɛkkaam a luppyam ayyɔɔt la kiyila ka bɛfɛɛn bya iggyannɛ.
58003007	Kule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔlɔɔknɛ kɔttɛ, “Appyeenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm mmwɔɔn,
58003008	tɛ̀ttɛ́ afim kɛgɔpɔlɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt annyɔɔng ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ banaangnɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya bafimnɛ kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ adɔkɔnɛyɔng ka kɛtɔm sa allɛmɛnɛyɔng ka kasɛkɛ kɛmat.”
58003009	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛ, “Baang ulenɛ ɛfɛɛn a balɔɔt annyɔɔng ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ ballɛnɛnɛ, gɔɔ mkkpa bale lɛyɛn bwa nnaangnɛ, ka lalɔp a likkpa laffa.
58003010	Akkwɛ baang kɔnaangnɛ kutunnɛ la balɔɔt ¿(tm)bɔng baang ning nttɛ, ‘Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ nɛ ba batele. Ba bakup kwa nbwɔɔlɔnɛbɛ.’
58003011	Kutunnɛ nyim nttɛ, ‘Baala baffu bafɛkɛlɛ la anaam.’ ”
58003012	Ikpana anaam, akatwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng, tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ka kɛkaan annyɔɔng uffu ɔyanga ubbu luppyam wa ɔsɛlɛnɛ kiyila usi lɛsan ɔttɛ baang ɔgbatabong ɔkɔngɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm a kuddu.
58003013	Aggyannɛ attɛyɔng ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔfɔngɔ ka ifɛtɛ bubbi kɛttɔ usi kɔlɔɔk lɛbɛlɛ lippyee, atteleyɔng waanyɔɔng kɛtɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ ka “Kɛtɔm-a-mmwɔɔn” ka luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lutumyɛlɛ ayyɔɔt.
58003014	Ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt ile bɔfɛɛn bbwɔn la Christ, ulenɛ ka ikɔɔmnɛ kiyila sa iyanganɛ ka ikeeng kkpɔk ɔffɔ ka lakpeke.
58003015	Uwɔng ulenɛ kwa luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ: “Appyeenɛyɔng lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm mmwɔɔn, tɛ̀ttɛ́ asiyɔngzɛ lɛgɔpɔlɔ, tɛ̀ttɛ́ anaangnɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya anaangnɛyɔng bubbi atumyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
58003016	Babang bappyeenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm basizɛ lɛgɔpɔlɔ? Balɔɔt ba Moses ɔsanganɛbɛ ka Egypt ɔkkpɛlɛ.
58003017	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔdɔkɔ kutunmɛ la babang ka lalɔp a likkpa laffa? Kɔdɔkɔ kutunmɛ la balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ bubbi, battɔ ka kasɛkɛ kɛmat babbe.
58003018	Ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangnɛ nsekele ammɛ wa ɔkkaamnɛ ɔttɛ, “Baala baffu bafɛkɛlɛ la anaam.” Ɔdɔkɔ ɔlɔɔk unnyi babang? Unnyi balɔɔt ba basinɛ kwa ammɛ lɛgɔpɔlɔ.
58003019	Iyɛnbong ittɛ baala bakkwoong bamal ka ɛkpansi ’yɔng baang ka basɛlɛnɛ kiyila.
58004001	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangbong nsekele la ayyɔɔt. Ammɛ ulenɛ wa ile imii ifɛkɛlɛ bakang la ammɛ. Ɔzzànga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔbbwɔpɔwɔyɔngyɛlɛ nkwaaning ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng, ɔlɔɔt vvɔn gbɔɔ usi lisseke ka kimii kɛfɛkɛlɛ ’sɔng baang.
58004002	Ayyɔɔt ippyeebong Kuttu-Budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm tɛ̀ttɛ̀ abbɛ bappyeenɛ. Bappyee bɔtɔɔm ’bwɔng baang ɔzzànga budoddo bulɔk busibɛ linnyi ka bappyeenɛbwɛ basibwɛ lɛtɔk bassɛɛn ka luppyam.
58004003	Ayyɔɔt ba iyilanɛ imiinɛ ifɛkɛlɛ la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Kule gbɔɔ bbwak tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔttɛ, “Kɔdɔkɔ kutunnɛ nyim ka lɔkkwɔɔn nttɛ, ‘Baala baffu bafɛkɛlɛ la anaam.’ ” Ɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng mung tɔttɔt mkkpa kɛnaang ammɛ kile lɛsaal ka ussinɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ɔnaangnɛ vveeng.
58004004	Ɛfɛɛn ele baang ka Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ya ɛlɔɔknɛ ’kwɔng etum kɛtɔm sa bɛnnambɛkkyaat, “Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaang kɛnaang ammɛ uvve ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔfɛkɛlɛ ka kɛtɔm sa bɛnnambɛkkyaat.”
58004005	Kɛssanga kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng mung kɛbbal baang lile ka ɔlɔɔknɛ, “Baala baffu bafɛkɛlɛ la anaam.”
58004006	Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba bakɔɔmnɛ ɛtɔk bappyee Kuttu-budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm basi ka tɔkɔlɔ lɛmal bamii bataa la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bafɛkɛlɛ ka basinɛ kwa bappyeenɛ liyila. Balɔɔt balɔk bale baang ba bale bafɔngɔbɛ bamii ka tɔkɔlɔ bataa bafɛkɛlɛ la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
58004007	Nkwɔng mung kɔyɔɔkwɛ kɛyɔɔng ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ kɛtɔm kɛlɔk sa kɛzzanganɛ “Mmwɔɔn” lɛsanga. Ɔmmɛbong ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔssɛnɛ la David ɔlɔɔk lɛmmwɔɔl ammɛ za baggbanɛ lɛkkpɔk battɛ, “Appyeenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm mmwɔɔn tɛ̀ttɛ́ asizɛ lɛgɔpɔlɔ.”
58004008	Joshua bukɔɔmnɛ balɔɔt umii ka ɛfɛɛn a kɛfɛkɛlɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, nzang Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usi lissum ɔppyɛlɛ ɔlɔɔk kwa kɛtɔm kɛlɔk.
58004009	Ka kulenɛ ning, mkkpa kɔnaang, kɛfɛkɛlɛ kitii baang sa balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bale bafɛkɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔfɛkɛlɛnɛ ka kɛtɔm sa bɛnnambɛkkyaat.
58004010	Ɔlɔɔt duu wa umiinɛ ɔfɛkɛlɛ la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔssɛ ɔfɛkɛlɛ kɛ kɛnaang ammɛ biini tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔfɛkɛlɛnɛ ka sa ammɛ.
58004011	Ɔzzànga ibum kɔbɛtɛyɔngyɛlɛ imii ifɛkɛlɛyɔng ka ssala Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ifɔngɔyɔng kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛnɛ inaang kifim tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt ’bɔng baang banaangnɛ basi kɛfɛkɛlɛ ka ssala Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm limii.
58004012	Lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lile ikokolo ka kɛnaang. Ogge lafoom laffa wa ɔlamnɛ ɔffɔ la azzɛ ba ule. Lɛzza dduk lɛffɔ ka laduda lɛfɛkɛlɛ la kuyeeng la ka laduda ulɔl a kɛkɔp la bɛkɔp. Lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng baang liffiknɛ ikkɔlɔ balɔɔt la ittina abbɛ.
58004013	Bwa ale akkwoong alup assekeyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba bule. Bɛfɛɛn bya ɔlɔɔmnɛ bile kkpelegedee ka bɛtaanɛ ka lusso ammɛ. Ammɛ ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ile ibwɔɔlɔ lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ sa inaangnɛ.
58004014	Ibwɔɔpyɔng kiyila sa ibwɔɔlɔnɛ kkpɔk. Iyangabong Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm wa lɛbaang a lɛbaang, wa ulenɛ ka lataak Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm biini lɛffɔ. Ammɛ ulenɛ Jesus, Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
58004015	Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm ayyɔɔt wa lɛbaang, ɔlɔɔt wa usinɛyɛlɛ nzɔɔn lɛnaang ka likke lɛsaalnɛyɛlɛ lissi. Ka isimi kukele, iyanga Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm wa lɛbaang wa balemɛnɛ lɛllɛ ka itɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ ya ayyɔɔt ilenɛ ka annyɛ, ɔzzanga bubbi usi lɛnaang.
58004016	Ikkaamyɔng luppyam iffuyɔng ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ɛfɛɛn a kiggwoon a kɔlɔɔk kilenɛ, vvenɛ kibbe-lɛttɔ sa iggyannɛ bakang la kiggwoom a kɔlɔɔk kitteleyɔngyɛlɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya iggyannɛsɛ.
58005001	Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa lɛbaang la vvɔn basangamɛ ka kɛkaan a babbɛ battɛ ɔnaang kɛnaang unnyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkalabɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ɔzɔɔm unnyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsɔɔk lasɔɔk ɔnaang latɔm unnyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kwa bubbi.
58005002	Ammɛ biini ka ɔkkpɛlɛnɛ ka itɔk gbadam, ukkwoong mung ɔkɔɔmmɛ kɛyɔɔng la ba abbɛ ba basinɛ kwɛ lɛsan banaang basɛpɛ.
58005003	Ammɛ biini ka ulenɛ lakkpɛlɛ liyila, baala ɔzɔɔm ɔssɛɛn balɔɔt ka bubbi abbɛ keem, vvenɛ ɔzɔɔm ɔssɛɛnmɛ ammɛ kɛyɔɔng ka bubbi bwa ammɛ ɔgbaa.
58005004	Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsangamɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng ɔttɛ ɔzzanga uzzilɛttɔ-luzɔɔm ba ule. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm utininɛ unnyiwɔ ɔttɛ azzanga uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm Wa Lɛbaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ utininɛ unnyi Aaron.
58005005	Kɔssɛ kule ning baang la Christ. Christ usi lɛsam latele za kile uzzilɛttɔ-luzɔɔm unnyimɛ kɛyɔɔng. Lutini ’gwɔng, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔdɔkɔnɛ ɔlɔɔk la ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Annɔ alenɛ Waan anaam, mmwɔɔn anaam nssekenɛ Ssaawɔ.”
58005006	Ɔbbal lɛlɔɔk ka ɛfɛɛn ɛlɔk ɔttɛ, “Vvenɛ ale ɔssɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm ka kɛfal a kɛfal, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Melchizedek ɔdɔkɔnɛ.”
58005007	Jesus ka kɛfal ammɛ ka ɛkpansi ɔdɔkɔ ɔzɔɔm luzɔɔm ammɛ ɔkɔɔm ɔkkwa la liyeen ɔgaga ɔbap Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bwa ɔggyannɛ ka ulemɛnɛ ammɛ ukkwoongnɛ ɔkkalamɛ ka lubbe. Ɔdɔkɔ Ukee-waan, utele zzeen ka kɛnaang ammɛ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uppyeemɛ luzɔɔm.
58005008	Ɔdɔkɔ Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ffet, ɔzzanga ubum utele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka kɛyɛn akama sa ɔyɛnnɛ.
58005009	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔn ɔnaangmɛnɛ ɔyyɛɛp ɔffata usikili ɔppyɛɛ ɔzzánga ɛtɔk a kuddu balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba batelemɛnɛ.
58005010	Ɔzzánga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛ ɔttɛ ɔzzánga Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm wa lɛbaang ka kikkwu Melchizedek, ɔssɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm.
58005011	Kɔlɔɔk kɔttala lɔttala kwa ile ilɔɔk itum kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng mung. Ɔzzanga kukoolo kɛbwɔɔlɔ kkpelegedee ka annyɔɔng akoolonɛyɔng kippyee kɔlɔɔk.
58005012	Ɛkɛtɛ ɛmmɛbong gaang gaang wa bulenɛyɔng bakopolo-lukopolo lɛzzanga, ɔzzanga atiiyɔng baang ka akatnɛ attɛyɔng ɔlɔɔt ukopolowɔyɔng lakkɔ za ikeeng ka bɔtɔɔm bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔɔmnɛ. Lutini gwa bulenɛyɔng kazzi kwa kɔkɔlɔm lizzi tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bagɛlɛnya, atiiyɔng baang ka kɛvva libee.
58005013	Ɔlɔɔt duu wa utiinɛ ka ɔvvanɛ libee, utii waan. Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ba ɔtaka ɔsan kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ la kwa kɔyyɛɛpnɛ.
58005014	Kazzi kwa kakkaamnɛ kale kwa bagɛlɛnya, ba balenɛ likkoop basan kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ la kwa kɔyyɛɛpnɛ.
58006001	Imiiyɔng lusso lusso la lukopolo bigɛlɛnya, kɔfɔngɔyɛlɛ kɛbɛtɛ kwa lakkɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm za ikeeng. Ifɔngɔyɔng kɛppyɛlɛ itteyɔng lutte kɛkkyaa babbu linaang kɛfɔngɔ kikup kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm,
58006002	la lukopolo gwa lutumnɛ kɛzzaa bɛfɛɛn la kitele labɔɔk, la kifungala babbu ka lubbe la kɛkaal sa kɛfal a kɛfal.
58006003	Imiiyɔng lusso lusso, ɔzzanga ’kwɔng kulenɛ kwa ile inaang, ulenɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔfɔngɔnɛyɛlɛ:
58006004	Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba balenɛ lɛttɔ bale banaang nang akama ɔnaangbɛ ka bubbi abbɛ? Badɔkɔ bale ka buppwolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ballɛ lɛsɔɔk za lissinɛ ka libat. Batɔk etini abbɛ ka Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
58006005	Basanbong ka ippyam abbɛ battɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule bɔfɛɛn bwa buyyɛɛpnɛ, battina batum lakke za lale ka laffunɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ Christ ule uffu.
58006006	Ɔzzànga balɔngɔlɔbong bakkyaa kiyila bafɔngɔ! Ba babɛlɛ likkwoong bappyɛlɛ isimisimi babbal akama lɛkkwa ka balenɛ ka kɛkama Christ bakaka ka Cross ka kikkpit sa ibaala, bassɛɛnmɛ ka izzit ka lusso balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ.
58006007	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangnɛ ɛkpansi ya ɛmɛɛlnɛ bannyi ba uteepnɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔnaangyɛ ppyɛɛ ɔttɛ iwopowopo immala iyyɛɛp innyi balɔɔt ba bawoopnɛyɛ.
58006008	Ɔzzànga ɛkpansi ’yɔng baang ɛppyɛɛnɛ emeet isam la iboong-a-laddi, nzang elebong bwa gbɔɔ, ele ka akama wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule ɔbbaatyɛ ɛkkɔm lɔkɔɔn.
58006009	Inngwa anaam, gɔɔ mkkpa ilɔɔk kwɛ ning mung, ɔnaangyɛlɛ ssik kwa annyɔɔng. Isan lɔsan ittɛ ayangayɔng ppyɛɛ wa ɔyyɛɛpnɛ ule kuddu annyɔɔng.
58006010	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba ɔbbɔl. Baala usumala kɛnaang sa anaangnɛyɔng. Ɔlɔk kɛsaap sa ayɔɔnɛyɔng ka kittele sa attelenɛyɔng ikpana annyɔɔng ka Christ.
58006011	Bwa iggyannɛ gaang gaang ulenɛ kɛttɛ, ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn ɔkɔɔm laggele za ɔyanganɛ ka luppyam ɔffɔ ka lakpeke, nkwaaning kɔlɔɔk kwa attinanɛyɔng kɛnaang, kɔnaang ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
58006012	Ba iggyan ittɛ akkpɛlɛyɔng, ɔzzànga ayilayɔng kɛbɛtɛ, abbeyɔng luppyam ka kɔlɔɔk ka alenɛyɔng balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ kiyila ka Christ, nkwaaning atɔkyɔng bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ liloko ɔttɛ vvenɛ unnyiwɔyɔng.
58006013	Ka ɛkɛtɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangnɛ nsekele la Abraham, uyim ɔttɛ vvenɛ ɔnaang kwa ulenɛ lɛlɔɔk ɔttɛ vvenɛ ɔnaang. Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ka usinɛ lile wa uggbengenɛ ɔttamɛ ammɛ, ɔdɔkɔ uyimmɛ ammɛ biini kɛyɔɔng.
58006014	Ɔttɛ, “Nyilabong nttɛ vvenɛ nnaangwɔ ppyɛɛ, nnyiwɔ bikkwu itutum ggbadam.”
58006015	Abraham ubbe luppyam, ɔtɔk bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulemɛnɛ liloko.
58006016	Ɔlɔɔt uyimnɛ ka kɔlɔɔk, ɔkɔɔm lɛkɔɔl ɔlɔɔt wa ɔttamɛnɛ ammɛ biini liggbenge uyim, kiyim ’sɔng baang kɛzza ikangala ɔkkpɛlɛ.
58006017	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔdɔkɔ ɔggyan ɔttɛ ɔnaang kwɛ kkpelegedee usseke balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba butɔknɛ bwa ulenɛbɛ liloko basan battɛ baala ufoolo luttina. Kwakkwɛ uyimnɛ ɔgbaa ka nsekele wa ɔnaangnɛ.
58006018	Bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng baang bɛffa bile bisi lifoolo. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛlaak ba ɔnaang. Ɔzzanga ayyɔɔt ba ilenɛ kuddu ka ammɛ lɛyɛn, iyangabong kɛkkaam a luppyam sa lɛbaang a lɛbaang ibwɔɔp kkpɔk ka luttina gwa balenɛyɛlɛ lɛssɛɛn mung.
58006019	Luttina ’gwɔng lulenɛ kiddumu ippyam ayyɔɔt. Aggwɛ lule ka budoddo, lule ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Aggwɛ baang lukkwoongnɛ lɔsak ubba wa bafɛɛnnɛ ka lɛmma ggwoon Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka libat lumii ka tɔkɔlɔ labun Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bbwak.
58006020	Jesus uttebongyɛlɛ limii ka tɔkɔlɔ ɔkkalayɛlɛ. Mung ammɛ ussekenɛ Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm wa lɛbaang kɛfal a kɛfal tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Melchizedek.
58007001	Melchizedek ’wɔng mung ɔdɔkɔnɛ ubeet a Salem. Ɔdɔkɔ Ɔssɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔttanɛ lakke ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ka Abraham ussinɛ lɛkɔɔng za ɔwwɔɔlnɛ babeet banna ɔppyɛlɛ, Melchizedek ududamɛ ɔnaangmɛ ppyɛɛ.
58007002	Abraham ɔbɛngɛlɛ bɛfɛɛn bya ɔyanganɛ uloko lakup zzɔɔp, ɔsanga likup zzɔn unnyimɛ. (Ɔkɔɔm ɛtɔk a ifɛɛt a lɛkɔɔl a Melchizedek ulenɛ “Ubeet wa Bbwak.” Ka ulenɛ ubeet wa Salem, ifɛɛt a lakɔɔl ammɛ ilɔk ilenɛ “Ubeet a Bɔkaat.”)
58007003	Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsannɛ lussimi abassɛ ɔlɔk abakka Melchizedek ba ule, ɔlɔk balɔɔt a kikkwu ammɛ ba ule. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsannɛ ɛkɛtɛ bamaatmɛnɛ la ɛkɛtɛ ubbenɛ ba ule. Ule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Ule Ɔssɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛfal a kɛfal.
58007004	Ayɛnyɔngbong tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔyanganɛ lakke baang ɔɔ? Abraham, Uyini itutum, ɔsanga likup a bɛfɛɛn zzɔn ka lakup a bɛfɛɛn za zzɔɔp za ɔkɔɔmnɛ ka lɛkɔɔng ɔppyɛlɛ unnyimɛ.
58007005	Balɔɔt a kikkwu a Levi ba balenɛ bassɛɛn-a-luzzɔm bassɛɛnbong Lafɔɔ battɛ balɔɔt a Israel babɛngɛlɛ bɛfɛɛn abbɛ ka lakup zzɔɔp, basanga likup zzɔn bannyi. Ning baang ulenɛ kɛttɛ itɔk ka balɔɔt a lɔkaan abbɛ, mkkpa abbɛ ɔgbaa bale balɔɔt a kikkwu Abraham.
58007006	Melchizedek ka kikkwu a Levi ba ussi. Ɔzzanga ɔtɔk likup zzɔn ka Abraham, ɔnaangmɛ ammɛ wa ɔtɔknɛ nsekele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ppyɛɛ.
58007007	Bɛkangala bɛlɔk ba bile, ɔlɔɔt wa ɔnaangnɛ ppyɛɛ ɔttanɛ libbgenge ɔtta ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtɔknɛ ppyɛɛ.
58007008	Ka kɔlɔɔk kwa bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm, likup za zzɔɔp balɔɔt ba bale babbe batɔknɛ, ɔzzànga ka kwa Melchizedek, likup za zzɔɔp ɔlɔɔt wa ikokolo ɔtɔknɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ.
58007009	Ɔzzànga kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn ka Abraham unnyinɛ likup za zzɔɔp, Ɔlɔɔt a Levi (wa balɔɔt a kikkwu ammɛ batɔknɛ likup za zzɔɔp) ɔssɛ unnyi.
58007010	Levi mɛ ba bataka bamaat, ɔzzanga ka lɔkkwɔɔn ɔdɔkɔ ka kkwɔɔt Abraham uyini kikkwu ammɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya Melchizedek ududanɛ Abraham.
58007011	Ɔdɔkɔ eleme balɔɔt a Levi, bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm, kwakkwɛ bannyinɛ balɔɔt a Israel Lafɔɔ. Bulenɛ ka kɛnaang a bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm a itutum a Levi kɛyyɛɛpnɛ, nzang ɔssɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm ɔlɔk usi lɛbɛlɛ lɛggyan, wa ussinɛ ka bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm ba itutum a Melchizedek, usi ka Aeron lissi.
58007012	Bafoolonɛ itutum a bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm, vvenɛ bassɛ bafoolo lafɔɔ.
58007013	Ɔzzànga Uyini ayyɔɔt wa balɔɔknɛ lilɔɔk ’sɔng batum, ussi ka kikkwu kɛlɔk. Ɔlɔɔt a kikkwu ammɛ ɔlɔk ba ɔtaka ɔzzánga ɔssɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm.
58007014	Basanbong ppwool battɛ bamaatmɛ ka kikkwu a Judah. Ɔzzanga Moses usi kikkwu ’sɔng baang lɛtala ka ɔlɔɔknɛ kɔlɔɔk a bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm.
58007015	Kɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng baang kɔdɔkɔ ppwool; Ɔzsɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm ɔlɔk ɔttabong, wa ulenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Melchizedek.
58007016	Ɔssɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm usi lɛzzanga kwa lafɔɔ za balɔɔt banaangnɛ, ɔzzanga ka lakke kuddu kwa kɔsɛlɛnɛ lakpeke.
58007017	Luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, “Vvenɛ ale ɔssɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm ka kɛfal a kɛfal, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Melchizedek ɔdɔkɔnɛ.”
58007018	Basambong batɔm a lafɔɔ baloko ka lasinɛ lɛkkaam, lale bɔfɛɛn bwa gbɔɔ.
58007019	Lafɔɔ a Moses bulɔk ba lakkwoong lanaang buyyɛɛp. Ɔzzanga gedegede mung luttina gwa doddo, gwa ile issɛ ka aggwɛ ikkɛtɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, luffubong.
58007020	Ka kɔgbaanɛ la ’kwɔng, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uyim. Kɛssanga kiyim ’sɔng kisi lile ka banaangnɛ balɔɔt balɔk bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm.
58007021	Ɔzzanga Jesus ɔzzanga Ɔssɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm ka kiyim sa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uyimnɛ la ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Ebinukkpaapi eyimbong, luttina ba ɛbɛlɛ lifoolo. Vvenɛ azzánga Ɔssɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm kɛfal a kɛfal.’ ”
58007022	Bubuubuu ’bwɔng buyɔɔnɛ Jesus budoddo a nlɔɔk-nloko a nsekele wa ɔttanɛ lɛyyɛɛp.
58007023	Bubuubuu bulɔk bule baang. Bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm ’bɔng bakang badɔkɔ bayipi uyipi ɔzzanga babbe, basi lɛbɛlɛ likkwoong banaang kɛnaang abbɛ.
58007024	Ɔzzanga Jesus uddu kɛfal a kɛfal, ɔnaang kɛnaang ammɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔssɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm. Basimɛsɛ lɛsam bannyi ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk.
58007025	Ukkwoong mung gedegede mung gɔɔ ɛkɛtɛ duu ɔkkala balɔɔt ba bassɛnɛ ka ammɛ bamii ka ɛfɛɛn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ka ule uddu kɛfal a kɛfal, ukkpenge Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyibɛ.
58007026	Jesus ulenɛ Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm wa lɛbaang wa iggyannɛ. Ammɛ ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa doddo. Kɔlɔɔk ba ɔggyan, ammɛ ɔyyɛɛpnɛ ɔffata. Basammɛbong baloko zzekep ka libat basseke banaang a bubbi.
58007027	Ammɛ ba ule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm ba labaang balɔk, lɛtɔm ba utte lɛnaang kɛtɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ kwa bubbi ammɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔnaang kwa bubbi balɔɔt balɔk. Ɔnaang lɛtɔm zzɔn kɔsaal ka ɔsammɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng unnyi ɔttɛ banaang bigwugwulu.
58007028	Lafɔɔ a Moses lassang balɔɔt ba basinɛ badoddo lile, bazzanga Bazzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm ba labaang. Ɔzzànga nsekele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la kiyim sa uyimnɛ ka lafɔɔ lalenɛ liffu kɛsanganɛ Awaan, wa ulenɛ lɛnaang ɔyyɛɛp ɔffata kɛfal a kɛfal.
58008001	Mung ulenɛ ɛtɔk a kɔlɔɔk ya ilɔɔknɛ ittɛ iyanga Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm wa lɛbaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ’wɔng mung, wa ɔtaanɛ ka kɔbɔɔk ɛlaabɔɔk ugbaal a kibeet Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka libat.
58008002	Ɔnaang kɛnaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔssɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm wa lɛbaang ka Labun-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm Bbwak ka tɔkɔlɔ Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm gwa usinɛ balɔɔt lile banaangnɛ, ule Ebinukkpaapi ɛnaangnɛ.
58008003	Lutini Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm wa lɛbaang la vvɔn basangamɛ battɛ ɔkɔɔm lɛkɔmɔlɔ ɔnaang lɛsɔɔk unnyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔzzànga Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm Wa Lɛbaang ayyɔɔt vvenɛ ɔssɛ ɔyanga bɔfɛɛn bwa ule ɔkɔɔm ɔnaang lɛsɔɔk unnyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
58008004	Ulenɛ ka ulenɛ ka ɛkpansi nzang ɔssɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm baala ɔzzanga ffet a ffet, ka bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm balɔk balenɛ baang ka banaangnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lasɔɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Lafɔɔ a balɔɔt Jews lalɔɔknɛ.
58008005	Kɛnaang sa banaangnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm kile ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Kule ikete la kuyeeng a kɔlɔɔk kwa kulenɛ ka libat. Kule kɛssanga ssɔn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɔdɔkɔnɛ la Moses. Ɛkɛtɛ ya ɔdɔkɔnɛ ɔttɛ ɔbɔɔk Ggwoon, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔbwɔɔlɔmɛ ɔttɛ, “Asan anaang bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ kɛssanga ssɔn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bya nyɔɔwɔnɛ ka libat a lɛttaal.”
58008006	Ɔzzanga tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kulenɛ mung, Jesus bannyimɛbong kɛnaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ uzzilɛttɔ-luzɔɔm sa kɛttanɛ sa abbɛ liggbenge, ɔtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛbɛtɛ-kɛnnɔ sa ɔbɛtɛnɛ ka kɔlɔɔk ɔlɔɔt la Ebinukkpaapi sa kilenɛ sa doddo kitum nsekele wa bɛfɛɛn bya doddo.
58008007	Bulɔk búsinɛ̀ lɛnaang la kɛbɛtɛ-kɛnnɔ sa ikeeng ikeeng nzang kɛbɛtɛ-kɛnnɔ kɛlɔk isi lɛbɛlɛ lɛggyan.
58008008	Ɔzzànga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyɛn kwa balɔɔt ammɛ banaangnɛ kɔbbɔl ka ɛkɛtɛ ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔttɛ, “Bɛtɔm bile ka biffunɛ, vvenɛ nnaang ufaa kɛbɛtɛ-kɛnnɔ la balɔɔt a Israel la kikkwu Judah.
58008009	Vvenɛ baala kule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛbɛtɛ-kɛnnɔ sa nnaangnɛ la balɔɔt abbɛ ba iyɛddɛ iyɛddɛ ka kɛtɔm sa nsanganɛbɛ bagbata ka ɛkpansi Egypt. Basi lɛnaang kwa kɛbɛtɛ-kɛnnɔ sa nnaangnɛ la abbɛ kɛlɔɔknɛ. Ɔzzánga Ebinukkpaapi ɛlɔɔk ɛttɛ, Kwa abbɛ nsi lɛgɔpɔlɔ.”
58008010	Uyini ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Gedegede mung uwɔng ulenɛ kɛbɛtɛ-kɛnnɔ sa nle ka nbɛtɛnɛ la balɔɔt Israel, Ka ussoonɛ vvenɛ nnaang Lafɔɔ nssɛɛnbɛ ka ittina, nkkpɔkzɛ ka ippyam abbɛ, Vvenɛ nzzanga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm abbɛ. Abbɛ bazzanga balɔɔt anaam.
58008011	Ɔlɔɔt ba ule wa ule ukopolo ɔlɔɔt a lɛffɛ ammɛ, ɔlɔk ɔbwɔɔlɔ ɔlɔɔt a lɔkaan ammɛ ɔttɛ, ‘Asan Uyini.’ Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ vvenɛ basannɛ ka ussinɛ ka bwɔɔn ba sɛkɛsɛkɛ umii ɔffɔ ka ba labaang.
58008012	Vvenɛ babbenɛ-lɛttɔ ka akama abbɛ. Bubbi abbɛ vvenɛ ba nbɛlɛ likke ɛkɛtɛ ɛlɔk.”
58008013	Ilɔɔknɛ kwa ufaa kɛbɛtɛ-kɛnnɔ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangbong kɛbɛtɛ-kɛnnɔ sa ikeeng kisseke ɔtɔm a bɔfɛɛn. Bɔfɛɛn la bbwɔn bwa bukkpɛɛmnɛ busi lɛbɛlɛ lɛyyɛɛp, vvenɛ butaak lɛkɔɔl.
58009001	Kɛbɛtɛ-kɛnnɔ sa ikeeng-ikeeng kɛyanga eleme ya kɛzɔɔm a luzɔɔm. Ɔlɔɔt ɔnaangnɛ ɛfɛɛn a kɛssɛɛn a luzɔɔm ɔgbaa.
58009002	Banaang Ɔdda-ɛkkpalukpata Labun-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Tɔkɔlɔ ammɛ, otinika ule baang la okkpokolo la kazzi kwa bannyinɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
58009003	Ka tɔkɔlɔ Ɔdda-ɛkkpalukpata ’wɔng baang, ubba ule baang ka battanɛ bazza. Ka isimi ubba ’wɔng baang, Ɔdda-ɛkkpalukpata ɔlɔk ule baang wa bakkwɔɔmɛnɛ Labun-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm Bbwak.
58009004	Ka tɔkɔlɔ azzɛ, okkpokolo wa banaagnmɛnɛ la gold ule baang wa kɛfɔɔp a bɛfɛɛn. Likulu kɛbɛtɛ-kɛnnɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ azzɛ lile gold a gold ka bavvoongnɛzɛ. Ka likulu ’zɔng baang bilim a gold bile baang ka tɔkɔlɔ azzɛ la Manna ka tɔkɔlɔ, la lukut Aaron gwa lulenɛ lɛppwɔɔt, la lattaal laffa la Lafɔɔ ka bakkpɔknɛ ka kkwɔɔt azzɛ.
58009005	Ka libat a likulu ’zɔng baang, ilɔɔp iffa ile baang ka banaangnɛyɛ la biyekele iyaala ivvoong ka ɛfɛɛn a bataanɛ basɔɔk balɔɔt bubbi tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ebinukkpaapi abbɛ. Gedegede mung ɛkɛtɛ bbwak ba ele ya kɛbwɔɔlɔ kɔlɔɔk la kkwɔn kɔsaal.
58009006	Uwɔng ulenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ banaangnɛ bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung. Bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm batta ka ssala kɛtɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ bamii banaang kɛnaang abbɛ ka Labun-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
58009007	Ɔzzànga ule Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm wa lɛbaang keem ka umiinɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ a ggwoon a luzɔɔm ɔssɛɛn luzɔɔm. Ɔzzànga umii kimii ssɔn ka kukkpa. Ɔsam linnyi ɔkɔɔm ɔzɔɔm unnyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka labun-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bbwak ka lutini bubbi ammɛ biini la bubbi bwa balɔɔt banaangnɛ basi lɛsan.
58009008	Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kukopolo ppwool ppwool kutum lilɔɔk ’sɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ za balenɛ litini, kɔttɛ ɛtɔk ya emiinɛ ka ɛfɛɛn a Labun-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bbwak ba ɛtaka ewongolo ka labun za vveeng latiinɛ baang ka labeenɛ.
58009009	Uwɔng ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn bwa butaanɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɔlɔɔk kwa gedegede mung. Kule kɔttɛ lasɔɔk za bakɔɔmnɛ lakɔmɔlɔ banaang latɔm bannyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ba lakkwoong lanaang ippyam a balɔɔt ba bazɔɔmnɛ luzɔɔm bannyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm iyyɛɛp.
58009010	Lasɔɔk ’zɔng baang la kɛkɔɔm a lakɔmɔlɔ kɛnaang latɔm kɔbɛtɛbyɛ kwa kazzi, la kɛvva la kikup-a-laggbo. Uwɔng lafɔɔ a vveeng. Bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng bɛtaa bɛkat ɛkɛtɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule ɔlɔngɔlɔbyɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
58009011	Ɔzzànga Christ uffubong ɔ̀zzángá Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm wa lɛbaang ka bɛfɛɛn bya doddo bya bɛggbanɛ mung lissi bile. Ggwoon gwa ɔnaangnɛ kɛnaang lule gwa lɛbaang, lɔyyɛɛp lɔsak, ɔlɔɔt lissi ɔnaangnɛ gwɛ; gɔɔ ka vveeng ’wɔng mung lissi.
58009012	Christ ka ɔmalnɛ Ɔdda-ɛkkpalukpata umii ka ɛfɛɛn a Labun-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm Bbwak ka kikkpit ssɔn kɔsaal. Linnyi ɛbal ɔlɔk linnyi ɔgɔdɔ usi lɛkɔɔm umii ɔnaang lɛtɔm unnyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔdɔkɔ ɔkɔɔm linnyi ammɛ biini ɔtɔk kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal unnyiyɛlɛ.
58009013	Ballɔtnɛ balɔɔt a laggbo ka kkwɔɔt linnyi ɛbal la linnyi ulam ɔgɔdɔ la littɔɔng a bitook ɔgɔdɔ, laggbo lakkpɔlɔbɛ ka kkwɔɔt, bappyɛlɛ bayyɛɛp.
58009014	Nkwɔng ka kɔggbanɛ lissi kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn, linnyi a Christ vvenɛ likkaam lisak ning baang. Ka lakke Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔsammɛ kɛyɔɔng ɔsɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɛtɔm za bbwak. Linnyi ammɛ vvenɛ linaang ippyam ayyɔɔt igbata isseke babbu linaang, ippyɛɛ innyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm a kuddu latele.
58009015	Kwakkwɛ Christ ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa utininɛ kwa Ufaa kɛbɛtɛ-kɛnnɔ, nkwaaning balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛbɛ lɛkkwɔɔ batɔk ppyɛɛ wa kɛfal a kɛfal wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ lisekele. Nkwɔng kule kɔnaang ka lubbe lulenɛ baang lile gwa lɔkkalanɛ balɔɔt ka babbu lilɔɔk sa banaangnɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya batiinɛ ka kɛbɛtɛ-kɛnnɔ sa ikeeng.
58009016	Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɔknɛ lɛkɔɔl ɔlɔɔt wa ule uzzi bɛfɛɛn ammɛ ka ule ubbe, babɛtɛ-kɛnnɔ batakabong basan battɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔkkpɔknɛ ubbebong, bɛfɛɛn ba basam bannyi ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang.
58009017	Luvva ’gwɔng baag ka kukkaam ba lule ɔtakabong ɔffɔ ka ɛkɛtɛ ya ɔlɔɔt wa ɔkkpɔknɛgwɛ ubbenɛ. Ka ɛkɛtɛ ya utiinɛ ikokolo ɔlɔɔt ba ule wa ule ukkwoong ɔkɔɔmgwɛ ɔyanga bɛfɛɛn bya ulenɛ lisekele.
58009018	Kwakkwɛ kɛbɛtɛ-kɛnnɔ sa ikeeng kɛyyɛɛpnɛ ka bakɔɔmnɛ linnyi babɛtɛsɛ.
58009019	Ka ikeeng, Moses ɔbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt Lafɔɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lalenɛ. Ɔsam linnyi kitook-ɔgɔdɔ utoolo la bannyi ɔsam kɛzafɔk a kɛssɛ la kɛfaak ubba ɔyan ka linnyi ’sɔng baang ɔmmyang balɔɔt.
58009020	Ɔttɛ, “Uwɔng ulenɛ linnyi sa linaangnɛ kɛbɛtɛ-kɛnnɔ sa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ lɛlɔɔk ɔttɛ ateleyɔng kɛyyɛɛp.”
58009021	Kɔssɛ kule ning baang. Moses ɔgbaa ɔssɛ ɔnaang linnyi ɔllɔt ka ggwoon la bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya bakɔɔmnɛ bassɛɛn luzɔɔm.
58009022	Kulenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lafɔɔ lalɔɔknɛ, utini bɔfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bakɔɔm linnyi banaangbwɛ buyyɛɛp; bubbi bule ka kɛsɔɔk ka linnyi lillɔtnɛ.
58009023	Bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng bya bilenɛ ikete bɛfɛɛn bya libat bale banaang byɛ bɛyyɛɛp ka ɛtɔk ’yɔng. Ɔzzànga bɛfɛɛn bya libat biini bɛggyan lɛtɔm za lɛttanɛ lɛyyɛɛp.
58009024	Christ usi limii ka Labun-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm za balɔɔt banaangnɛ. Za balɔɔt banaangnɛ lalenɛ ikete Labun za bbwak. Umii ka libat biini ka ɛfɛɛn a ubeenɛ ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkalayɛlɛ.
58009025	Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm a balɔɔt a Jews wa lɛbaang umii ka labun Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kikkpit ssɔn ka kukkpa la linnyi ɛsɛɛn. Ɔzzànga Christ usi limii ka tɔkɔlɔ ɔsammɛ kɛyɔɔng unnyi ka kikkpit ggbadam.
58009026	Nzang vvenɛ ɔyɛn akama bikkpit ggbadam ka ussinɛ ka lutte a vveeng ’wɔng. Lutini ’gwɔng uffubong kikkpit ssɔn kɔsaal ka ɛkɛtɛ bɛkkpa ɔkkpɛlɛ bile ka bɛkkɛtɛnɛ lakpeke. Vvenɛ ɔkɔɔm kɛyɛn akama ammɛ ɔkkpɔlɔ bubbi balɔɔt.
58009027	Lutini ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn vvenɛ ubbe kikkpit ssɔn tɛ́ttɛ́ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkaal kɛkaal ammɛ.
58009028	Christ ɔgbaa bassɛ basammɛ banaang lɛtɔm ka kikkpit ssɔn nkwaaning ɔkkpɔlɔ bubbi balɔɔt ggbadam. Vvenɛ ɔbbal kikkpit kɛlɔk liffu, ɔzzànga kwa kɔlɔɔk a bubbi ba uffu, uffu kwa kɛkkala balɔɔt ba bataanɛ bakatmɛ.
58010001	Lafɔɔ balɔɔt a Jews lissi lalenɛ iyɔɔ bɛfɛɛn bya bbwak. Ule gbɔɔ kɛyɔɔ bɛfɛɛn bya bile bɛnaang ka lusso. Banaang kɛssanga lɛtɔm ’zɔng baang zzɔn la kukkpa la kukkpa yoyyoyyo. Lafɔɔ lale lanaang nang lakɔɔm latɔm lanaang balɔɔt ba baffunɛ ka ɛfɛɛn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bayyɛɛp baffata?
58010002	Balɔɔt ba batelenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bulenɛ lɛyyɛɛp nzang bɛ ba ɔwwɛɛk kwa bubbi bwa banaangnɛ. Gɔɔ nzang kɛnaang a latɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ kittun.
58010003	Nkkpa kɔnaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kulenɛ baang, latɔm ’zɔng baang ule kikke balɔɔt bubbi abbɛ la kukkpa la kukkpa.
58010004	Linnyi igɔdɔ la sa ibal ba likkwoong likkpɔlɔ ɔlɔɔt bubbi bwa ɔnaangnɛ.
58010005	Kwakkwɛ baang Christ ɔlɔɔknɛ la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ɛkɛtɛ ule ka uffunɛ ka vveeng ɔttɛ, “Annɔ ba aggyan kɛnaang a latɔm la bigwugwulu, Ɔzzànga alɔngɔlɔbong kkwɔɔt annyinɛ.
58010006	Wɔ ba kɔsaap ka bafɔɔpnɛ uwɔlɔlɔ ɛsɛɛn ka labun a luzɔɔm. Gɔɔ bigwugwulu bya banaangnɛ bɛzzaa bubbi wa ba bɛsaap.
58010007	Ɔzzánga nlɔɔk nttɛ, ‘Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm yɛnnɛ mung ka nbeenɛ nttɛ nnaang bwa aggyannɛ attɛ nnaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balenɛ lɛkkpɔk ka luvva Lafɔɔ tɛ.’ ”
58010008	Ɔlɔɔk ka ikeeng ɔttɛ, “Bigwugwulu la latɔm wɔ ba bɛsaap, gɔɔ kɛfɔɔp isɛɛn ka labun a luzɔɔm la bigwugwulu bya bɛzzaanɛ bubbi.” Ɔlɔɔk ’kwɔng mung tɔttɔt mkkpa ɔsan ɔttɛ bigwugwulu bya banaangnɛ, banaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Lafɔɔ lalɔɔknɛ.
58010009	Ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, yɛnnɛ mung, nle ka nnaangnɛ bwa aggyannɛ attɛ nnaang tɛ.” Ɔzzánga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsam batɔm a latɔm ɔzzɔɔk, ɔsam ufaa lɛtɔm wa Christ ɔppyɛlɛ uloko ka ɛfɛɛn a za ɔtɔm.
58010010	Jesus ka ɔnaangnɛ kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyanmɛnɛ ɔttɛ ɔnaang, ɔzzaabong bubbi ayyɔɔt ka bigwugwulu bya ɔnaangnɛ la linnyi ammɛ unnyiyɛlɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ɛkɛtɛ nnyɔn kɔsaal.
58010011	Ɔssɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm a balɔɔt a Jews la vvɔn ɔnaang kɛnaang ’sɔng mung la bigwugwulu ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ la kɛtɔm la kɛtɔm. Ɔzzànga bigwugwulu ’byɔng baang ba bikkwoong bikkpɔlɔ bubbi bwa ɔlɔɔt ɔnaangnɛ.
58010012	Christ ɔdɔkɔ ɔnaang bigwugwulu bubbi kikkpit ssɔn kɔsaal, bɛyyɛɛp yoyyoyyo, ammɛ umii ɔtaa ka kɔbɔɔk ɛlaabɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
58010013	Bakang ulenɛ ɛfɛɛn a ɔtaanɛ ɔkat ɔddɔkɔddɔkɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsam balɔɔt a kɔfɔk ammɛ ulokomɛ ɔtaa using bukkpɔ.
58010014	Ka bigwugwulu ’byɔng baang bbyɔn, ɔnaangbong balɔɔt ba balenɛ bubbi abbɛ lɛkkpɔlɔ bayyɛɛp baffata kɛfal a kɛfal.
58010015	Kuyeeng ɔgbaa kɔlɔɔk kubee la Christ. Ka kɛkɔɔm ɛtɔk, kɔttɛ,
58010016	“Uwɔng ulenɛ kɛbɛtɛ-kɛnnɔ sa nle nnaang la abbɛ ka ussoonɛ, Vvenɛ nssɛɛnbɛ lafɔɔ anaam ka ippyam, nkkpɔkbɛzɛ ka ittina.”
58010017	Ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ “Ba nbɛlɛ likke bubbi abbɛ la babbu linaang abbɛ ɛkɛtɛ ɛlɔk.”
58010018	Ulenɛbɛ ’kwɔng lɛsɔɔk, bigwugwulu bya bile bɛkkpɔlɔ balɔɔt bubbi bwa banaangnɛ ba babɛlɛ lɛggyan.
58010019	Ikpana anaam, iyangayɔngbong kufuk kwa kɛmal ka Labun-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm Bbwak ka ussinɛ ka lubbe gwa Christ ubbenɛ.
58010020	Uwongolobong ufaa ɛtɔk ulokoyɛlɛ, ɛtɔk a kuddu ya ɛsaknɛ ubba lusso Labun-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm Bbwak. Ɛtɔk ’yɔng baang elenɛ kkwɔɔt ammɛ.
58010021	Iyangayɔngbong ɔssɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm wa lɛbaang wa ulenɛ ka kizzi lɛttɔ ka Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
58010022	Ittɔm ikkɛtɛyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la luppyam gwa doddo la kiyila, la luttina gwa ilenɛ ka kɔlɔɔk lɛtta, la kkwɔɔt sa balenɛyɛlɛsɛ lɛzzaa ka bannyi Lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
58010023	Ikɔɔm kiyila sa iyanganɛ kkpɔk ka kwa ikopolonɛ, ka isannɛ ittɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ uloko nsekele ammɛ.
58010024	Ittinayɔng kwa ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn, iyaamyɔng ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn, iyɔɔyɔng kɛsaap ka kɛnaang a budoddo.
58010025	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ikkyaayɔng eleme ya kiduda ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ifɔngɔyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt balɔk balenɛ lɛnaang. Lutini ’gwɔng ibba ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn bikɔɔm, gaang gaang ka asannɛ attɛyɔng Kɛtɔm-Uyini ule ka uffunɛ kɛkkɛtɛbong.
58010026	Bigwugwulu bɛlɔk ba babɛlɛ lile bya bile bɛkkpɔlɔ bubbi ayyɔɔt, ikongonɛ lukongo inaang bubbi ka balenɛyɛlɛ lɔkkwɔɔn lɛbwɔɔlɔ.
58010027	Lutini ’gwɔng, kwa kussekenɛ ule ka kwa kule kɔnaang kɔbwɔpɔnɛyɛlɛ: Akkwɛ kulenɛ kwa kɛkaal la lɔkɔɔn gwa lɔbbɔlnɛ, gwa lule lɔbɛpɛ balɔɔt ba bafimnɛ kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
58010028	Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ufimnɛ kwa lafɔɔ Moses vvenɛ ubbe, kibbe-lɛttɔ ba kile, balɔɔt baffa ɔlɔk bakkyaat ba balenɛ ittɛɛsɛ annɔ, balenɛ lɛttɛ kɔbbɔlwɔbong.
