58010029	Ɔlɔɔt wa ufimnɛ Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kule kɔbbɔlmɛ nang? Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtɔknɛ linnyi kɛbɛtɛ kɛnnɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɔfɛɛn bwa gbɔɔ bɛɛ? Kule kɔbbɔlmɛ nang? Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔkpɛnnɛ Kuyeeng kwa kɔsɔɔknɛ bubbi bɛɛ? Kule kɔbbɔlmɛ nang? Attina kɛssanga akama wa ule ɔyɛn.
58010030	Isan mung ɔlɔɔt wa ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔttɛ, “Vvenɛ npipili, vvenɛ nppyɛlɛbɛ.” la ɔlɔɔt wa ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔttɛ, “Uyini vvenɛ ɔkaal kɛkaal a balɔɔt ammɛ.”
58010031	Ule kɔlɔɔk kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ lɔbbɔl kɔsak ka attɔnɛ ka kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm a kuddu.
58010032	Akke tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɔdɔkɔnɛ kɔnaangwɔyɔng ka isimi. Ka bɛtɔm bya isimi ka buppwolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bulenɛ lippwolo buvvoongwɔyɔng, ayɛnyɔng akama ka lilɔɔk ggbadam, ɔzzànga gɔɔ akama ’wɔng baang usiwɔyɔng lɛbɛtɛ.
58010033	Bakpɛnwɔyɔng ɛkɛtɛ ɛlɔk kkpal ka lusso balɔɔt, banaangwɔyɔng bɛfɛɛn bya bbɔlbbɔl. Ɔzzànga abamayɔng kɛmal tɔttɔt ka kɛkaan a balɔɔt ba bakɔɔmnɛbɛ bbɔlbbɔl.
58010034	Atulyɔng akama balɔɔt igbakkɔpɔ ayɛnyɔng. Ka bannaawɔnɛyɔng bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ, ayɛnyɔng akama la laggele ka asannɛ attɛyɔng atii ka ale ayangayɔng bɔfɛɛn bwa buttanɛ lɛyyɛɛp kɛfal a kɛfal.
58010035	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akkyaayɔng ntɛtɛ afɔngɔyɔng. Kɔbɛtɛwɔyɔng, lɛsɔɔk za lɛbaang lile baang ka akkwɛ.
58010036	Abbeyɔng luppyam anaangyɔng kɛnaang Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, nkwaaning atɔkyɔng bwa ulenɛ lisekele.
58010037	Luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, “Ɛkɛtɛ ɛmmɛnɛ ssup, ammɛ wa ulenɛ ka kiffu, ɛkɛtɛ baala ɔbɛpɛ.
58010038	Balɔɔt anaam ba doddo vvenɛ bayanga kiyila baddu, ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔbbalnɛ kiyila lisi lɛyanga baala kɔsaapnɛ la ammɛ.”
58010039	Ayyɔɔt balɔɔt ba iyanganɛ kiyila kkpal ikkyaa ifɔngɔ ile lɛtaak lissi, lutini ’gwɔng ikɔɔm kiyila kkpɔk kɛkkalayɛlɛ.
58011001	Kɛyanga kiyila ulenɛ kɛssɛɛn a kɔlɔɔk kwa ittinanɛ itum ka luppyam mkkpa isikwɛ ka zzeen lɛyɛn.
58011002	Balɔɔt iyɛddɛ iyɛddɛ bakɔɔm kiyila bayanga kɛsaap Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
58011003	Ikɔɔm kiyila isan ittɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkɔɔm lɛmmwɔɔl ɔnaang ɛkpansi. Bɛfɛɛn bya iyɛnnɛ mung ɔkɔɔm bɔfɛɛn bwa isinɛ ka zzeen lɛyɛn ɔnaang.
58011004	Kiyila kɛnaangnɛ Abel ɔnaang lɛtɔm za doddo unnyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtta Cain. Ka ussinɛ ka kiyila ammɛ ɔsaap Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt wa bbwak ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ lɛsɔɔk ammɛ lɛtɔk. Abel ka ɔyanganɛ kiyila, utii baang ka ɔlɔɔknɛ mkkpa ule libbe.
58011005	Kiyila kɛnaangnɛ Enoch usi libbe. Lutini ’gwɔng, badɔkɔ basammɛ bafee Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyɛnnɛ kkwɔɔt ammɛ usi lile, ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulemɛnɛ lɛsam umii ka libat. Luvva lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsam Enoch umii ka libat, Enoch ɔdɔkɔ ɔnaang kwa kɔsaapnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
58011006	Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔnaangnɛ kwa kɔsaapnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ɔsɛlɛnɛ kiyila ba ule. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa uffunɛ ka ɛfɛɛn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔyanga kiyila ɔttɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule baang, ɔsɔɔk balɔɔt ba baggyanmɛnɛ bɛfɛɛn.
58011007	Kiyila kɛnaangnɛ Noah ɔgɔpɔlɔ nttama Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm utum bɛfɛɛn bya bile bɛnaang ka lusso ɔtakabyɛ lɛyɛn. Utele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔnaang akkpaat wa ammɛ la itutum ammɛ bamalnɛ bataa ka kuddu. Ka ɛtɔk ’yɔng mung unnyi vveeng kibbi. Ɔtɔk budoddo ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bwa bussinɛ ka kiyila.
58011008	Kiyila kɛnaangnɛ Abraham utele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ɔkkwɔɔmɛnɛ ɔttɛ umii ka ɛkpansi ya ammɛ ulenɛ lɛttɛ vvenɛ unnyimɛ. Ɔgbata lɔkaan ammɛ ɔkɔngɔ umii ka ɛfɛɛn a usinɛ lɛsan.
58011009	Ɔtaa ka ɛkpansi ya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ lɛttɛ vvenɛ unnyimɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ukekeen ka kiyila ammɛ. Ɔtaa ka bwaan a ssoon la Isaac la Jacob ba bassɛnɛ batɔk nsekele wa ussinɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
58011010	Abraham ɔdɔkɔ ɔkat lɛffɛ za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ lɛnaang lɛyyɛɛp. Azzɛ za lilenɛ la lutte gwa kɛfal a kɛfal.
58011011	Kiyila kɛnaangnɛ Abraham ɔfɔɔn waan ɔ̀zzánga abassɛ waan ammɛ, mkkpa ndɔk ule lɛkkpɛɛm, avva Sarah usi wa lɛmaat lɛbɛlɛ lile. Uyila ɔttɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ uloko nsekele ammɛ.
58011012	Mkkpandɔk ɔdɔkɔ ule lɛkkpɛɛm gaang gaang, ka ussinɛ ka ammɛ, ɔlɔɔt vvɔn, balɔɔt itutum ammɛ bayipi tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bwaan ittuma ka lukpaaggbeede. Bayipi tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kususuk kwa isinɛ likkwoong ikkwoon ka lɔyɔngɔ.
58011013	Balɔɔt ’bɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ badɔkɔ babbe la kiyila. Basi lɛtɔk bɔfɛɛn bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usekelenɛ. Ɔzzànga babee fulufulu bayɛn bakang. Bawomobyɛ, babwɔɔlɔ ppwool ppwool battɛ abbɛ bakekeen la bamma-lilɔɔk baffu ka vveeng ’wɔng.
58011014	Balɔɔt ba batolonɛ lilɔɔk ’sɔng mung babwɔɔlɔ ppwool battɛ badɔkɔ ka kɛggyan a lɔkaan gwa abbɛ biini.
58011015	Basi lɛbɛlɛ littina batum lɛffɛ za bagbatanɛ ka azzɛ, battinanɛ batumzɛ nzang vvenɛ bappyɛlɛ isimisimi.
58011016	Badɔkɔ baggyan lɔkaan gwa doddo, lɔkaan gwa lulenɛ ka libat. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm izzit isimɛ lɛnaang ka bakkwɔɔmɛnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm abbɛ, ka ulenɛ killu lɛnaang ulokobɛ.
58011017	Kiyila kɛnaangnɛ Abraham ɔttɛ ɔsam waan ammɛ Isaac ɔnaang bigwugwulu ka ɛkɛtɛ ya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔllɛmɛnɛ. Abraham ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔssɛɛnnɛ nsekele la ammɛ, ɔzzánga ɔbama ɔsam waan ammɛ ɔttɛ ɔnaang bigwugwulu.
58011018	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔkbong la ammɛ ɔttɛ, “Ale akɔɔm Isaac ayanga balɔɔt ka kikkwu annɔ.”
58011019	Abraham ɔsan ɔttɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ukkwoong mung ufungala Isaac ka lubbe. Ka lɔkkwɔɔn, Abraham ɔppyɛlɛ ɔtɔk Isaac ka lùbbe.
58011020	Kiyila kɛnaangnɛ Isaac uyila kamma ɔttɛ vvenɛ ɔnaang Jacob la Esau ppyɛɛ.
58011021	Kiyila kɛnaangnɛ Jacob ɔnaang waan a Joseph la vvɔn ppyɛɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ ubbe. Ubee ning utele lɛttɔ ka lukut ammɛ ɔzɔɔm unnyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
58011022	Kiyila kɛnaangnɛ Joseph ɔlɔɔk utum kɛgbata balɔɔt a Israel ka Egypt. Ɔbwɔɔlɔbɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bale banaang la bɛkɔp ammɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ ubbe.
58011023	Kiyila kɛnaangnɛ abassɛ a Moses la abakka basammɛ balup ka ittuma ikkyaat ka ɛkɛtɛ bamaatmɛnɛ. Bayɛnnɛ battɛ ule waan wa ɔyyɛɛpnɛ, basi kɛbɛpɛ lafɔɔ ubeet lɛmma.
58011024	Kiyila kɛnaangnɛ Moses ufim ɔttɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ bakkwɔɔmɛ batum ka waan a Pharoah wa wanavva ka ɛkɛtɛ ulenɛ liggbenge.
58011025	Kɛyɛn akama la balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛsaapmɛ kɛtta kɛkɔɔm a bubbi kittele kippe ka waan ɛkɛtɛ ssup.
58011026	Ɔsan ɔttɛ kɛyɛn akama la izzit ka lɛttɔ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ kɛttanɛ lɛyyɛɛp kɛtta iyyɛɛp a balɔɔt a Egypt ka utelenɛ zzeen ka lɛsɔɔk za lusso.
58011027	Kiyila kɛnaangnɛ Moses ɔgbata ka Egypt usi lɛmma kwa kutunnɛ ubeet. Ka isimi usi lɛppyɛɛk, ayɛnnɛ attɛ ɔyɛn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa asinɛ ka zzeen lɛyɛn.
58011028	Kiyila kɛnaangmɛnɛ utte Kazzi-Kɛsak-Kɛkɔngɔ, ɔttɛ balɔɔt bammyɔng linnyi ka ikkpelekku-lamma ssoon, nkwaaning Uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usi bakɔɔm-ɛtɔk a bwɔɔn ba balɔɔt a Israel bafɔɔnnɛ lɛwwɔɔl.
58011029	Kiyila kɛnaangnɛ balɔɔt a Israel bakum Ukolo-lɔyɔngɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bassɛnɛ ka lisse sa gbɔɔ. Balɔɔt Egypt battɛ baffu bakum, bannyi bamɛɛlbɛ.
58011030	Ɔdɔkɔ kiyila kɛnaangnɛ kɛbat a Jericho kɛttɔ ka balɔɔt a Israel balenɛ lɛssɛ bakkpitsɛ ka bɛtɔm bɛnnambɛkkyaat.
58011031	Kiyila kɛkkalanɛ Rahab wa àkkpàlà basimɛ lɛssɛ bawwɔɔl la balɔɔt ba basinɛ kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm liyila, ka ɔtɔknɛ bakoolo-ɛfɛɛn ɔssɛɛn ka ssala.
58011032	Nlɔɔk tɔttɔt ɔɔ? Ɛkɛtɛ ba ɛbɛlɛ lile ya nle nlɔɔk ntum Gideon, Barak, Samson, Jephthah, David, Samuel la bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
58011033	Bakɔɔm kiyila ballu la lɔkaan uwɔlɔlɔ babɛtɛ. Banaang kwa bbwak batɔk bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ lisekele. Bavvoong kamma lanngwing.
58011034	Bazum lɔkɔɔn gwa lɔfɔɔpnɛ gaang gaang. Basɛɛm lubbe ogge. Badɔkɔ bakkpɛlɛ tɛ́ttɛ́ bakkaam; bakkaam ka lɛkɔɔng, babɛtɛ isɔgya ikaan ilɔk.
58011035	Ka kiyila sa bwanavva bayanganɛ, bafungala babbu abbɛ bappyɛlɛ bataa ka kuddu. Balɔk ba bafimnɛ ikkala babbe nkwaaning bafungala bataa ka kuddu kwa doddo.
58011036	Batup balɔk, banaang balɔk bɛfɛɛn izzit, baggbɔ balɔk izzi, basambɛ bassɛɛn ka igbakkɔpɔ.
58011037	Batɔɔpbɛ lattaal, bafakabɛ bɛfaak bɛffa, bawwɔɔlbɛ la ogge. Bakwula ikkpa-isɛɛn la ikkpa-itɔɔn bassɛ bakkpit, ɔbbɔlbɛ, bayɛn akama basibɛ doddo lɛppyɛɛk.
58011038	Ɛkpansi esibɛ doddo lɛsaap. Bassɛ bakkpit tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt ba bammanɛ lɛkɔɔng ka kasɛkɛ atingating la libat a lɛttaal, ballu ka lihuk la ibbe ka tɔkɔlɔ lisse.
58011039	Ɔzzànga balɔɔt ’bɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ bayila kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, banaang kwa kɔsaapmɛnɛ. Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtɔknɛ bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usekelenɛ usi lile.
58011040	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm utinibong ɛtɔk ya ɛttanɛ lɛyyɛɛp ulokoyɛlɛ, luttina ammɛ lulemɛ lɔttɛ vvenɛ ɔnaangbɛ bayyɛɛp la ayyɔɔt.
58012001	Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kwa ayyɔɔt mung, iyanga kibbi ittɛɛsɛ ka kikkpitnɛyɛlɛ. Ikkyaayɔng bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya bile bitunuyɛlɛ ifɔngɔ, la bubbi bwa bunnengenɛyɛlɛ ka kkwɔɔt ilaa zzeen immayɔng lɔfat gwa ilenɛ ka aggwɛ mung.
58012002	Iteleyɔng zzeen ka Jesus, wa iyanganɛ kiyila itummɛ ka ussinɛ ka lutte ɔffɔ ka lakpeke. Usi kɔlɔɔk a Cross lɛmma. Usi kwa izzit ya kibbe ka Cross littina. Ka isimi kukele, bɔwaa bwa bulenɛ bakang ka butaanɛ bukatmɛ budɛmnɛ usi littina kwa izzit ya kibbe ka cross. Gedegede mung ule ka kɔbɔɔk ɛlaabɔɔk Ugbaal a kibeet Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ka ɔtaanɛ.
58012003	Attinayɔng akama wa ɔyɛnnɛ. Attinayɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔtaanɛ ka bɛzzɔkɔ latun a banaang a bubbi. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ uttunwɔyɔng, ɔlɔk akkyaayɔng kiyila annyɔɔng afɔngɔyɔng.
58012004	Ka lubum gwa alenɛyɔng baang ka abumnɛ atumyɔng bubbi, ba ataka alluyɔng kullu aggyanyɔng lubbe.
58012005	Asumalayɔngbong lɛmmwɔɔl a lɔttama za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔknɛ la annyɔɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bwaan ammɛ ɔɔ? Ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Waan anaam, agɔpɔlɔ ka ɛkɛtɛ Ebinukkpaapi ɛbbawɔnɛ bikɔɔm tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔkkpɛpwɔ ka luppyam ka ule ɔlɔɔkwɔ kkɔkɔlɔm.
58012006	Ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn wa ɔsaapnɛ Ebinukkpaapi, Ebinukkpaapi ɛyɔɔmɛ akama. Ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn wa ɛtɔkmɛnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ awaan vvenɛ ɛyɔɔmɛ akama.”
58012007	Akkaam luppyam ka akama wa ayɛnnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ulenɛ akama wa ssaawɔ ɔyɔɔwɔnɛ. Kɛyɛn akama annyɔɔng kɛyɔɔnɛ kɛttɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkɔɔmwɔyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bwaan ammɛ. Waan ule baang wa abassɛ ɔtakamɛnɛ akama lɛyɔɔ ɔɔ?
58012008	Usiwɔnɛyɔng akama lɛyɔɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔyɔɔnɛ bwaan ammɛ, ba bbwak assiyɔngbong lile, annyɔɔng basɛlɛ ibassɛ balɔɔt.
58012009	Idedde ayyɔɔt ba vveeng kaang bayɔɔyɛlɛ akama ilɔngɔlɔ itelebɛ, ba attina attɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ulenɛ Dedde ayyɔɔt wa libat vvenɛ itelemɛ gaang gaang ɔlɔk iddu ɔɔ?
58012010	Idedde ayyɔɔt iyɔɔyɛlɛ akama ka waan ɛkɛtɛ ssup, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɔsaapnɛbɛ, kulebɛ bbwak. Ɔzzànga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangkwɛ ka budoddo ayyɔɔt biini, nkwaaning iyanga etini budoddo ammɛ.
58012011	Bayɔɔnɛyɛlɛ akama, ɔbalyɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ulenɛ kɔlɔɔk kwa kɔnaangnɛyɛlɛ bukee usiyɛlɛ lɛwaa. Ɔ̀zzànga ulenɛ lɛnaang balɔɔt ba bakɔɔmnɛ kɛyɔɔ akama bakopolobɛ kɔlɔɔk, vvenɛ bayanga lɛsɔɔk a bɔllɛ lɛfal ffɛngɛm.
58012012	Atɔnɔyɔng inɛngɛnɛngɛ labɔɔk annyɔɔng ka libat annyiyɔng igbeke-gbeke laddu annyɔɔng lakke.
58012013	Ɔkkaamwɔyɔng assɛyɔng ka ɛtɔk ya bit, nkwaaning ubbu-kikkpɔ annɔ usi kinuka linuka, ɔppwasɛ.
58012014	Abum ataayɔng ka bɔkaat la balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ. Abum ataayɔng ka kuddu kwa doddo. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsɛlɛnɛkwɛ, Uyini baala ɔyɛn.
58012015	Asan anaangyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔgbata usseke ppyɛɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Asan anaangyɔng, afɔngɔyɔng kɛtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɛsan a kɛssɛ za lɛkkpannɛ, lɛkɔɔm bussi azzɛ lɛggyan kɔlɔɔk la balɔɔt ggbadam.
58012016	Asan anaangyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk uffu ɔnaang kɔlɔɔk kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ ɔlɔk ɔsɛlɛ luttina tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Esau wa ɔsammɛ bigɛlɛnya ammɛ ufoolo la kazzi.
58012017	Asanyɔng lɔsan attɛyɔng gaang gaang ɔdɔkɔ ɔggyan ɔttɛ abassɛ ɔnaangmɛ ppyɛɛ, ɔzzànga ppyɛɛ usimɛ lɛbɛlɛ lile, ka usinɛ lɛsan bwa ule ukkwoong ɔkɔɔm ufoolo kwa ulenɛ lɛnaang, mkkpandɔk ɔkɔɔm liyyeen ɔggyan ppyɛɛ.
58012018	Asiyɔngbong liffu ka kwa attinanɛ atumyɔng lɛttaal a Sinai la lalaak a lɔkɔɔn azzɛ, la kisul la bukee, la kɛffa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt a Israel baffunɛ
58012019	la lɔsap gwa luffi lɔttanɛ la lɛmmwɔɔl a bɛfɛɛn. Balɔɔt ba bappyeenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng baang ka lɛttanɛ, bakkpenge battɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ babɛlɛ lɛmmwɔɔl lɛlɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ azzɛ baang lippyee.
58012020	Ka basinɛ lɛbbɔ babee ɔssanga nttama wa ɔttɛnɛ, “Gɔɔ ɛsɛɛn ka kɛmat esinginɛ lɛttaal ’zɔng baang, batɔɔpyɛ lattaal bawwɔɔl.”
58012021	Biyɛnɛ bisak lɛttala, Moses ɔttɛ, “Abbwɔpɔnɛbong kiffula kɛtɔmmɛ.”
58012022	Ɔzzànga annyɔɔng affuyɔngbong ka lɛttaal a Zion, ka lɛffɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm a kuddu. Azzɛ lilenɛ Jerusalem wa libat la innɔ bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka tɔkɔlɔ.
58012023	Affuyɔngbong ka laggele kuddu bwaan-ikeeng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba balenɛ lakɔɔl abbɛ lɛkkpɔk ka libat. Affuyɔngbong ka ɛfɛɛn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ulenɛ ɔkaal a kɛkaal ɔssɛbibit ɔkkpɛlɛ, la liyeeng a banaang a budoddo.
58012024	Affuyɔngbong ka ɛfɛɛn a Jesus wa utininɛ lutini ufaa kɛbɛtɛ-kɛnnɔ la kɛllɔt a linnyi ammɛ sa libwɔɔlɔnɛ bɛfɛɛn bya bɛttanɛ lɛyyɛɛp bɛtta kwa linnyi Abel.
58012025	Asan anaangyɔng, afɔngɔyɔng kwa ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔknɛ unnyiwɔyɔng kisi lɛgɔpɔlɔ. Balɔɔt ba bafimnɛ kɛgɔpɔlɔ kwa ɔlɔɔt wa unnyinɛ ɔssɛbibit kuttu kwa doddo, basi lɛsɛɛm ka lubbe. Ayyɔɔt ile inaang nang itta ka akkwɛ ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn isinɛ lɛgɔpɔlɔ kwa ɔlɔɔt wa ussinɛ ka libat ɔlɔɔknɛ.
58012026	Lɛmmwɔɔl ammɛ vvenɛ lɛnnyɛkɛ ɛkpansi ka ɛkɛtɛ yɔng baang. Ɔnaangbong nsekele ɔttɛ, “Vvenɛ nbbal ɛkpansi lɛnnyɛkɛ. Annyɛ keem lissi, vvenɛ nssɛ lɛnnyɛkɛ libat.”
58012027	Lɛmmwɔɔl za lɛttɛnɛ, “Nbbal.” ɔkkpɛlɛ lɛyɔɔnɛ ppwool ppwool lɛttɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔnnyɛkɛ bɛfɛɛn bya ɔlɔɔmnɛ nkwaaning bɛfɛɛn bya bisinɛ lɛnnyɛkɛ bɛtaa.
58012028	Iwomomɛyɔng kɛnaang ka ilenɛ itutum lɛyanga ya isinɛ lɛnnyɛkɛ. Ɔwaayɔngyɛlɛ izɔɔm innyiyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ɛtɔk ya kule kɔsaapmɛ la latele za lɛbaang a lɛbaang. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔbbwɔpɔyɛlɛ.
58012029	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ayyɔɔt ulenɛ lɔkɔɔn gwa lɔbɛpɛnɛ ɛfɛɛn ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
58013001	Ateleyɔng ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bakpana ba bakupnɛ Christ.
58013002	Akke atɔkyɔng bakekeen assɛɛnyɔng ka ssala. Balɔɔt balɔk banaangbong ning kkpal batɔk bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bassɛɛn ka ssala basi lɛsan.
58013003	Akkeyɔng balɔɔt ba balenɛ ka igbakkɔpɔ, ɔtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ annyɔɔng bulenɛyɔng ka igbakkɔpɔ la abbɛ. Akkeyɔng balɔɔt ba balenɛ ka akama tɛ̀ttɛ̀ annyɔɔng assɛnɛ aleyɔng ka akama wa bayɛnnɛ.
58013004	Killu a wanavva la ulam kile bɔfɛɛn bwa balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ batelenɛ. Bwaanbwalam la bwanavva abbɛ bayanga kiyila batumbɛ kɛyɔɔng. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔkaal kɛkaal a bassɛ-kɛzak la bakup a bwanavva balɔɔt.
58013005	Akatyɔng kɛfal annyɔɔng, ikkpoko ifɔngɔwɔyɔng gaang kɛsaap. Bwa alenɛyɔng lɛyanga buffiwɔyɔng. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔkbong ɔttɛ, “Baala ngbata nkɔngɔwɔyɔng; baala nkkyaawɔyɔng nfɔngɔ.”
58013006	Ikkaamyɔng luppyam ilɔɔk ittɛyɔng, “Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ Ɔkkala-ikkala anaam, Nɛ baala ɔbbwɔpɔ. Ɔlɔɔt ule ukkwoong ɔnaangnɛ ’bɔng?”
58013007	Akkeyɔng bazzilɛttɔ annyɔɔng ba isimi, ba babwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng bɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Attinayɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bataanɛ, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ babbenɛ, usseke akeetyɔng kiyila abbɛ.
58013008	Jesus Christ ule kɛssanga ssɔn, lisee, mmwɔɔn, gɔɔ yoyyoyyo.
58013009	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ afɔngɔyɔng ufaa lukopolo ɔnaangwɔyɔng agbatayɔng ka ɛtɔk ya bbwak. Kɔyyɛɛp ka ikkaamnɛ luppyam ka lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ba kɔyyɛɛp ka itelenɛ lafɔɔ kazzi. Balɔɔt ba batelenɛ lafɔɔ kazzi bɛ ba lataka lattele.
58013010	Bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm ba banaangnɛ kɛnaang ka ggwoon a luzɔɔm a balɔɔt a Jews ba babɛlɛ lɔkkɔnɔ ba bazzinɛ kazzi kwa banaangnɛ bigwugwulu ka Labun-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
58013011	Uzzilɛttɔ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm a balɔɔt a Jews wa lɛbaang ɔkɔɔm linnyi umii ka ɛfɛɛn a lafɔɔ ɔnaang bigwugwulu bya kɛkkpɔlɔ bubbi, ɔ̀zzànga isɛɛn biini bafɔɔp ka isimi a ssala.
58013012	Kwakkwɛ baang, Jesus ɔdɔkɔnɛ ɔssɛ ubbe ka kɛmat nkwaaning ɔkkpɔlɔ bubbi balɔɔt la linnyi ammɛ.
58013013	Ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt itta imii ka vveeng itaayɔng ka izzit la ammɛ.
58013014	Lɛffɛ za ile itaa ka kɛfal a kɛfal, yɛlɛ ba lile mung ka ɛkpansi, iggyan lɛffɛ za lile ka liffunɛ.
58013015	Ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt ibunguyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔtaayɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bigwugwulu bya issɛnɛ ka Jesus inaang ka lɛmmwɔɔl a kamma za lɛttɛnɛ ammɛ ulenɛ Uyini.
58013016	Afɔngɔyɔng kisumala kɛnaang budoddo la kittele ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ. Uwɔng baang ulenɛ bigwugwulu bya bɛsaapnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
58013017	Ateleyɔng bazzilɛttɔ annyɔɔng, akupyɔng lafɔɔ abbɛ. Bakat ippyam annyɔɔng ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ gɔɔ ba bafɛkɛlɛ, ka bale bakkpele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang abbɛ. Atelenɛyɔngbɛ, vvenɛ banaang kɛnaang abbɛ la laggele. Usinɛ ning baang lile, bale banaangsɛ la bukee, ning baang baala ayangayɔng kɛyaam.
58013018	Azɔɔm annyiyɔngyɛlɛ. Isan lɔsan ittɛ iyanga luppyam gwa doddo ka iggyannɛ ittɛ inaang kɔlɔɔk kwa doddo ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
58013019	Nkpengewɔyɔngbong gaang gaang nttɛ azɔɔm annyinɛyɔng nkwaaning nppyɛlɛ nffu nkupwɔyɔng like like.
58013020	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ufungalabong Uyini ayyɔɔt, wa ulenɛ ɔkat-itɔɔn wa lɛbaang, ka lubbe gwa ubbenɛ ule kɛbɛtɛ-kɛnnɔ kɛfal a kɛfal lɛbɛtɛ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm a bɔkaat unnyiwɔyɔng utini bɔfɛɛn duu bwa buyyɛɛpnɛ bwa aggyannɛyɔng nkwaaning anaangyɔng kɛnaang ammɛ. Ɔzzànga ikpenge ittɛ ka lakke Jesus Christ ɔnaang duu bwa busaapmɛnɛ la ayyɔɔt. Latele lataa la Christ yoyyoyyo. Kulening.
58013022	Ikpana anaam, nkpengewɔyɔng nttɛ abbeyɔng luppyam agɔpɔlɔyɔng bɔtɔɔm bwa bule bunnyiwɔyɔng kɛkkaam a luppyam. Lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng za nkkpɔknɛ nfeewɔyɔng mung gaang ba lɛlɔm.
58013023	Nggyan nttɛ asan attɛyɔng basangabong ɔkpana ayyɔɔt Timothy ka igbakkɔpɔ. Ɔkkanɛ liffu vvenɛ nkɔɔmmɛ nffu ka ɛkɛtɛ nle nffu nyɛnwɔyɔng.
58013024	Awomoyɔng bazzilɛttɔ annyɔɔng, la balɔɔt Ebinukkpaapi ɔkkpɛlɛ annyiyɔngyɛlɛ. Ikpana ayyɔɔt ba bassinɛ Italy bawomowɔyɔngbong.
58013025	Numa lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lataa la annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ.
59001001	Lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng lissi ka James, bɔɔyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la Jesus Christ, Uyini: Nwomobong isam a balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm zzɔɔppiffa ya ikyakyamanɛ imii ifɛɛn ifɛɛn ka ɛkpansi ɔkkpɛlɛ.
59001002	Ikpana anaam, atɔkwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng ka kɛyyɛɛp a lɔfɔm ka ɛkɛtɛ ya bɛssanga illɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ bile biffu ka kkwɔɔt annyɔɔng.
59001003	Asan lɔsan attɛyɔng kiyila annyɔɔng kɛbɛtɛnɛ bɛssanga illɛ ’byɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ, vvenɛ ayangayɔng lakke kɛbbɔ akama.
59001004	Ɔzzànga asan attɛ ale abbɔyɔng akama ning baang tɔttɔt ɔffɔ ka lakpeke. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ammayɔng akama nkwaaning ayyɛɛp asaalyɔng bulɔk asiyɔng lɛggyan.
59001005	Ɔlɔɔt annyɔɔng ɔlɔk ɔsɛlɛnɛ bikɔɔm, ɔzɔɔm ɔkkwɔɔyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ule ɔnaangmɛ ppyɛɛ. Ammɛ ɔsɔɔknɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ lɛsɔɔk ka kɛsaap usi ka isimi lɛppyɛɛk.
59001006	Ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng ayangayɔng kiyila ka assɛɛnnɛyɔng luzɔɔm, tɛ̀ttɛ́ ayangayɔng ndeeta ka luppyam. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔyanganɛ ndeeta ka luppyam ule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɛbba-bannyi za kɛffa kɛffanɛzɛ kikkpit ka tɔkɔlɔ lihu.
59001007	Kɛssanga ɔlɔɔt wa ning baang ɔzzànga ɔkkala-lɛlaak. Luttina ggwɔn ba ɔyanga ka kɔlɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ kwa ɔnaangnɛ. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ uttina uttina ɔttɛ vvenɛ ɔyanga lɛsɔɔk lɛlɔk za lissinɛ ka Uyini.
59001009	Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔbbɔlmɛnɛ vvenɛ uggele ka ɛkɛtɛ ya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule ɔnaangmɛ uggbenge.
59001010	Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyyɛɛpmɛnɛ ɔssɛ uggele ka ɛkɛtɛ ya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule ɔnaangmɛ ɔbbɔlmɛ ka iyyɛɛp ile isaal tɛ̀ttɛ̀ idodo ya iyaalanɛ ka bɛssɛ ka kɛmat.
59001011	Livve-luwee lɛttanɛ la kɛfɔɔp azzɛ, luwee lutup bɛssɛ ’byɔng baang, idodo abbyɛ ikkpɛɛ ittɔ. Ɔzzánga bɔllɛ abbyɛ bubɛpɛbong. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyyɛɛpmɛnɛ ule ɔssɛ ubbe ning baang ka ɛkɛtɛ kɔbɛtɛmɛnɛ ka kɛnaang iyyɛɛp ammɛ.
59001012	Laggele lale za ɔlɔɔt wa usinɛ kiyila lɛkkyaa ɔzzɔɔk ka ɛkɛtɛ ya ulenɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ kɔlɔɔk. Uggele ka ɔ̀zzànganɛ ɔttɛ ukumnɛ ka illɛ ’yɔng baang vvenɛ ɔyanga ikipili ya ilenɛ lɛsɔɔk za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛnɛ vvenɛ unnyi balɔɔt ammɛ ba ɔsaapnɛbɛ.
59001013	Ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn a ballɛnɛ ɔlɔɔt la kɛssanga illɛ la duu, tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔttɛ “Illɛ ’yɔng mung issi ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm iffu.” Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bubbi mɛ ba bukkwoong bullɛ. Ammɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ba ɔllɛ.
59001014	Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn ikkɔlɔ ubbu luppyam ammɛ idɛmmɛnɛ issɛɛn ka kɔlɔɔk.
59001015	Babbu linaang ammɛ liyɛɛmnɛ limaat bubbi. Bubbi buggbengenɛ, bumaat lubbe.
59001016	Ikpana anaam, tɛ̀ttɛ́ badɛmwɔyɔng attɔyɔng ka kɔlɔɔk.
59001017	Lɛsɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ za lissinɛ ka libat lile bɔfɛɛn bwa doddo. Lissi ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔlɔɔmnɛ vveengodde. Eleme ammɛ ba efoolo ezuku ning.
59001018	Kussimɛ ka luppyam ɔkɔɔm lɛmmwɔɔl a lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk ɔlɔɔmyɛlɛ, nkwaaning ile bazzilɛttɔ bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya ɔlɔɔmnɛ.
59001019	Ikpana anaam, ikkeyɔng ’kwɔng tɛ! Ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn ɔyanga luttina gwa kɛkka kɔlɔɔk lippyee. Ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn uttina doddo tɛ́ttɛ́ ukingi kɔlɔɔk. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ kɔlɔɔk kɔkkamɛ litun.
59001020	Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyanganɛ kitun a kɔlɔɔk ka luppyam, baala ukkwoong ɔnaang bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyannɛ ɔttɛ ɔnaang.
59001021	Akkyaayɔng babbu linaang la ibbyap ɔkkpɛlɛ afɔngɔyɔng, asamwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng annyiyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ayilayɔng lɛmmwɔɔl ammɛ za ulewɔnɛyɔng ka luppyam lɛssɛɛn. Azzɛ lɛyanganɛ lakke za likkwoongnɛ lɛkkalawɔyɔng.
59001022	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ addawɔyɔng kikun kɛyɔɔng ka kɛgɔpɔlɔ lɛmmwɔɔl ammɛ gbɔɔ. Anaangyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɛlɔɔknɛ.
59001023	Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔgɔpɔlɔnɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm gbɔɔ usi lɛnaang kwa lɛlɔɔknɛ, ule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔppyɛɛkmɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng ka kiyenge.
59001024	Ɔsamnɛ lɛppyɛɛk ka kiyenge, usumala eseese tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ulenɛ.
59001025	Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa ɔppyɛɛknɛ gbegbe kwa lifɔɔ za likkalanɛ balɔɔt, ulokozɛ doddo, usizɛ lisumala, ɔnaang kwa lifɔɔ ’zɔng baang lilɔɔknɛ, Ebinukkpaapi vvenɛ ɛnaang ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ppyɛɛ ka itɔk a lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ.
59001026	Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ule baang wa uttinanɛ ɔttɛ ammɛ ɔlɔɔt a luzɔɔm wa doddo ɔɔ? Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang usinɛ lɛlaak ammɛ lɛkat, kile ka luzɔɔm sa ulenɛ kile bɔfɛɛn bwa gbɔɔ, ɔddamɛ bikun kɛyɔɔng.
59001027	Nkwɔng kulenɛ kwa Dedde, Ebinukkpaapi, ettinanɛ ɛttɛ akkwɛ kulenɛ luzɔɔm ka lɔkkwɔɔn: Appyɛɛk bwɔɔntiti ba basɛlɛnɛ ibassɛ la ibakka, la bwanavva ba bwalam babbenɛ bakɔngɔ bale ka akama; Asan akɔɔmwɔ kɛyɔɔng tɛ̀ttɛ́ bɛfɛɛn a vveengodde bɛnaangwɔ abbɔl.
59002001	Ikpana anaam, ka alenɛyɔng balɔɔt a kiyila ka Uyini ayyɔɔt Jesus Christ, wa ulenɛ Uyini lakke, tɛ̀ttɛ́ akɔɔmyɔng balɔɔt buubuu akupyɔng linaang abbɛ.
59002002	Uggboggbo ɔlɔɔt ɔwɔkɔlɔnɛ iwɔkɔlɔ ya doddo, ɔssɛɛn waan-ɛlla gold ka kɛnnɔ uffu ka mitin annyɔɔng, ɔlɔɔt wa ɔbbɔlmɛnɛ ɔssɛ uffu la bissaka iwɔkɔlɔ.
59002003	Attanɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔwɔkɔlɔnɛ iwɔkɔlɔ ya doddo latele linnyi, attɛ, “Ataa mung ka kɛtaa sa doddo,” alɔɔk la ɔlɔɔt wa ɔwɔkɔlɔnɛ bissaka iwɔkɔlɔ attɛ, “Afeele abee-lubee,” ɔlɔk attɛ “Ataa mung ka lisse ka lataak anaam.”
59002004	Ning baang azzibong kibbi ka alenɛ bubuubuu litte ka bɛzzɔkɔ annyɔɔng ɔgbaa ka alenɛ ubbu luppyam lɛkɔɔm akaal kɛkaal.
59002005	Gɔpɔlɔyɔng, Ikpana anaam! Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔssang balɔɔt ba ɔbbɔlnɛbɛ ka vveeng ’wɔng mung ɔnaangbɛ baggbenge ka kiyila, batɔk Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bayanga. Annyɛ ya ulenɛ lisekele ɔttɛ vvenɛ unnyi balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba batelemɛnɛ.
59002006	Ɔzzànga asiyɔng balɔɔt ba ɔbbɔlnɛbɛ latele linnyi! Babang bayɔɔwɔnɛyɔng akama, battuluwɔyɔng bamii ka idda kɛkaal? Balɔɔt ba ɔyyɛɛpnɛbɛ!
59002007	Abbɛ baang balenɛ balɔɔt ba balɔɔknɛ bubbi batum ubeet a lɛkɔɔl ’zɔng baang za balewɔnɛyɔng linnyi.
59002008	Vvenɛ anaangyɔng kwa kulenɛ bbwak ulenɛ ka atelenɛ lifɔɔ Itutum-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, za ayɛnnɛyɔng ka luvva lafɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm za lattɛnɛ, “Wa annyɔɔng ɔsaapwɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ asaapwɔnɛ kɛyɔɔng.”
59002009	Ulenɛ ka akɔɔmnɛ balɔɔt tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ayɛnnɛ linaang abbɛ, azzibong kibbi. Lafɔɔ vvenɛ lannyiwɔ kibbi ka alenɛ ɔbɛpɛ-lafɔɔ.
59002010	Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔbɛpɛnɛ lifɔɔ zzɔn ɔbɛpɛbong lafɔɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
59002011	Ka ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akup wanavva ɔlɔɔt.” ɔbbal lɛttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ awwɔɔl balɔɔt.” Gɔɔ mkkpa asi wanavva ɔlɔɔt likup, alenɛ ɔlɔɔt lɛwwɔɔl azzangabong ɔbɛpɛ-lafɔɔ.
59002012	Atoloyɔng kutolo, anaangyɔng linaang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt ba lafɔɔ za lasanganɛyɛlɛ ka kɔlɔɔk lale lakaal kɛkaal abbɛ.
59002013	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kibbe-lɛttɔ baala ɔyanga ka kɛkaal ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsɛlɛnɛ kibbe-lɛttɔ. Ɔzzànga kaang kibbe-lɛttɔ kɛbɛtɛnɛ kɛkaal.
59002014	Ikpana anaam, budoddo bulenɛ bɔkka abbwɛ ka ɔlɔɔt ɔttɛnɛ ammɛ ɔyanga kiyila, linaang ammɛ lisi kiyila ’sɔng baang lɛyɔɔ? Kiyila ’sɔng baang vvenɛ kikkwoong kɛkkalamɛ ɔɔ?
59002015	Ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn ikpana annyɔɔng baggyannɛ iwɔkɔlɔ ɔbɛtɛ la kazzi bɛɛ?
59002016	Bɔkka budoddo bwa alenɛbɛ lɛnaang ka kɛttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaangwɔyɔng ppyɛɛ! Ataayɔng bbwak azziyɔng budoddo!” –asinɛbɛ bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya kuddu abbɛ kɔggyannɛ linnyi.
59002017	Kule ning baang la kiyila, Kiyila kilenɛ kɛyɔɔng kɛsɛlɛ linaang, nzang kibbebong.
59002018	Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk vvenɛ ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt vvɔn ɔyanga kiyila, wa vvɔn ɔyanga linaang.” Kɛppyɛlɛ kamma anaam kile kɛttɛ, “Ayɔɔnɛyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt ɔyanganɛ kiyila ɔsɛlɛ linaang. Vvenɛ anaam nyɔɔwɔyɔng kiyila anaam ka linaang anaam.
59002019	Ayilayɔng mung attɛyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule vvɔn keem ɔɔ? Kɔyyɛɛp mung! Babbu liyeeng lissɛ liffula ning liyila littɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule vvɔn.
59002020	Annyɔɔng bakun ’bɔng. Aggyan attɛ bayɔɔwɔyɔng battɛ kiyila sa kɛsɛlɛnɛ linaang ba kɛyyɛɛp ɔɔ?
59002021	Mung ɔgɛlɛnya ayyɔɔt Abraham ɔdɔkɔ ɔtaa bbwak nang la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm? Ɔdɔkɔ ka linaang ammɛ ka ɔttɛnɛ ɔsam awaan Isaac ɔnaang bigwugwulu unnyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
59002022	Ba ayɛnyɔng ɔɔ? Kiyila ammɛ la linaang bɛnaangnɛ kɛnaang ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn. Kiyila ammɛ kɛdɔkɔ kile bbwak ka ussinɛ ka linaang ammɛ.
59002023	Luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔk ka lɔkkwɔɔn ka lɔttɛnɛ, “Abraham uyila kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ka kiyila ammɛ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔkmɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt wa bbwak.” Kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn, kussi ning baang bakkwɔɔ Abraham ɛnngwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
59002024	Asan attɛyɔng linaang linaangnɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔtaa bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, kwa ɔyanganɛ kiyila utum Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm keem lissi kɔnaangmɛnɛ.
59002025	Kɔdɔkɔ kɛssanga ssɔn la Rahab, wa àkkpàla; Linaang ammɛ lidɛmmɛnɛ ɔtaa bbwak la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ka ɔtɔknɛ balɔɔt a Israel ba batɔɔmnɛbɛ battɛ bamii bakoolo ɛfɛɛn, ɔssɛɛn ka ssala uttelebɛ bassɛ ka ɛtɔk ɛlɔk bamma basɛɛm.
59002026	Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kkwɔɔt sa lisɛlɛnɛ kuyeeng libbenɛ, kiyila sa kɛsɛlɛnɛ linaang kɛssɛbong kibbe ning baang.
59003001	Ikpana anaam, tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng azzangayɔng bakopolo-lukopolo. Asanyɔng lɔsan attɛyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule ɔtta kɛkaal sa ayyɔɔt, bakopolo-lukopolo, lɛssɛɛn ɔtta sa balɔɔt balɔk.
59003002	Ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt itaa-lɔtaa isɛpɛ ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ɔlɔɔt ɔtakanɛ lɛsɛpɛ ka kɔlɔɔk kwa ɔlɔɔknɛ, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔlɔɔt wa doddo, ukkwoong lukkwoong ɔkɔɔm lɛfal ammɛ.
59003003	Issɛɛn eyim luzzi ka kamma nkwaaning eteleyɛlɛ, ikkwoong inaangyɛ emii ka ɛfɛɛn iggyannɛ ittɛ emii.
59003004	Attina kwa akkpaat wa lɛbaang: Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ uggbengenɛ baang, kɛffa kikkwoong mung kɛffamɛ. Akkwoong mung asikilimɛ la waan a bissɛ ning umii ka ɛfɛɛn ya ɔwaat-ɔwaat ɔggyannɛ ɔttɛ umii.
59003005	Kule ning baang la lɛlaak, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lissupnɛ baang, likkwoong mung lɛnaang kamma litum bɛfɛɛn bya lɛbaang. Attina tɛ̀ttɛ̀ waan a lɛlaak a lɔkɔɔn ssup ning ukkwoongnɛ ɔssɛɛn lɛkɔɔt za lɛbaang a lɛbaang lɛkkɔm!
59003006	Lɛlaak lile tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɔkɔɔn. Azzɛ lilenɛ ɛkpansi bubbi ya elenɛyɛlɛ ka kkwɔɔt, ɛnaang bubbi buwaala kkwɔɔt ayyɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ. Lɛkɔɔm lɔkɔɔn gwa lussinɛ ka Hell biini luffu lukupzɛ lɛssɛɛn kɛfal ayyɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ lɛkkɔm.
59003007	Ɔlɔɔt ukkwoong mung ɔbɛtɛ bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔmnɛ. Ɔbɛtɛbong isɛɛn ka kɛmat la bunɔɔn la izzɔkɔ ɔbɛtɛ la isɛɛnabannyi.
59003008	Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa ukkwoongnɛ ɔbɛtɛ lɛlaak ba ule. Lɛyanga ibbyap. Ɔlɔɔt wa ukkwoong ɔkatzɛ ba ule. Lɛyanga bussi lubbe lubbe.
59003009	Ikɔɔmzɛ azzɛ iwomo Dedde Uyini Ayyɔɔt kɛnaang. Ikɔɔmzɛ azzɛ ɔgbaa izɔɔm wayyɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔmmɛnɛ ɔbalmɛ ammɛ biini.
59003010	Lɛmmwɔɔl za kiwomo kɛnaang la lɛmmwɔɔl za kɛzɔɔm wannyɔɔng bissi ka kamma kkwɔn. Ikpana anaam, tɛ̀ttɛ́ afɔngɔyɔng ’kwɔng kɔnaang.
59003011	Lubbebannyi gwa lussinɛ bannyi ba baggwoomnɛ la bannyi ba bakkpannɛ ka lɛmma zzɔn ba lule.
59003012	Ikpana anaam, ɛkɔɔng ya ɛwɔmnɛ lakkpo manggolo ba ele. Manggolo wa ɔwɔmnɛ lakkpo ɛkɔɔng ba ule. Lubbe-bunɔk bannyi ba doddo ba lukkwoong lussi.
59003013	Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ule baang ka bɛzzɔkɔ annyɔɔng wa ɔsannɛ kɔlɔɔk, ukkwoong uppyeekwɛ doddo ɔɔ? Ulenɛ baang, ɔyɔɔ kɛsan-a-kɔlɔɔk ammɛ ka lɛfal ammɛ za doddo, ka linaang a bukee-waan la kɛsan-a-kɔlɔɔk.
59003014	Ɔzzànga ayanganɛ luleep la kitun-a-kɔlɔɔk, la kɛssɔp-a-bɔfɛɛn ka luppyam annɔ, ɔfɔngɔ kɛkkyaa anaang kamma atum lɔkkwɔɔn-a-kɔlɔɔk.
59003015	Kɛsan-a-kɔlɔɔk ’sɔng mung ka libat mɛ ba kissi, kile sa ɛkpansi, sa Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lissi, sa ubbu.
59003016	Ɛfɛɛn a luleep ɔlɔk kɛssɔp a bɔfɛɛn kilenɛ, kɔwɔlɔ la bubbi bussɛ bule baang.
59003017	Ɔzzànga bisana pya bissinɛ ka libat biyyɛɛppɔyyɛɛp bisak. Ka kɛkɔɔm ɛtɔk, biyanga bɔkaat ɔgbaa la kibbe-luppyam la bunngwa, bile akama akama ɔzzànga appyɛ bimaatnɛ linaang sa doddo. Lɔgbɛɛk ba lule la kɛkkala-lɛlaak.
59003018	Budoddo bulenɛ liyaat ayyɔɔt sa lissinɛ ka ifɔɔk a bɛfɛɛn ya baggyan a bɔkaat bakɔɔnnɛ.
59004001	Kullu la kɔwɔlɔ ’kwɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ ka bɛzzɔkɔ annyɔɔng bissi yang? Bissi ka kusapa ladoddo za lalenɛ baang ka kullu ka kkwɔɔt annyɔɔng ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
59004002	Aggyanyɔng bɛfɛɛn ɔzzànga ba akkwoong ayangayɔngbwɛ, kwakkwɛ assekenɛ ka aggyannɛyɔng kɛwwɔɔl. Bɛfɛɛn bɛsaapwɔyɔng ɔ̀zzànga ba ayɛnyɔngbyɛ, ɔ̀zzánga awɔlɔyɔng akɔɔm alluyɔng. Baala ayangayɔng bwa aggyannɛyɔng ka asinɛyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛbap.
59004003	Abapnɛyɔng, baala ayɛnyɔng bwɛ, ka linaang annyɔɔng libbɔlnɛ. Abapyɔng kwa bɛfɛɛn bya binnyiwɔnɛyɔng laggele.
59004004	Basɛlɛ kiyila balɔɔt ’bɔng! Ba asan attɛyɔng alenɛyɔng ɛnngwa vveeng ’wɔng, aleyɔng balɔɔt a kɔfɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔɔ? Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ulenɛ ɛnngwa vveengodde, ɔnaangmɛbong kɛyɔɔng ɔlɔɔt a kɔfɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm tɛ.
59004005	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ attina attɛyɔng luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔkkwɔɔn ba lɔlɔɔk ka lɔttɛnɛ, “Luppyam gwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔssɛɛnnɛyɛlɛ ka kkwɔɔt lɔyanga kusapa kwa lɛbaang.”
59004006	Ɔzzànga lakke za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyinɛyɛlɛ lattanɛ lɛkkaam. Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ufim balɔɔt ba basaapnɛbɛ kɛyɔɔng, ɔnaang balɔɔt ba batɔknɛbɛ kɛyɔɔng ka bukeewaan ppyɛɛ.”
59004007	Kule ning baang ayilayɔng kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Afimnɛyɔng kwa Ubbu, vvenɛ ɔmma ussekewɔyɔng.
59004008	Attɔm akkɛtɛyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ammɛ vvenɛ ɔssɛ ɔttɔm ɔkkɛtɛwɔyɔng. Ayilayɔng labɔɔk, annyɔɔng banaang-a-bubbi. Azzaayɔng ippyam annyɔɔng, annyɔɔng banaang-a-lalaak.
59004009	Bukee bunaangwɔyɔng, akɔɔm akkwayɔng, amanyɔng, asikiliyɔng kɛsɛɛk annyɔɔng usseke kullu, laggele annyɔɔng lasseke bukee.
59004010	Akunyɔng laddu ka lusso Uyini, vvenɛ ɔlɔmwɔyɔng ufeele.
59004011	Ikpana anaam, tɛ̀ttɛ́ akpɛnyɔng ba annyɔɔng. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔkpɛnnɛ ɔkpana wa ukupnɛ Christ ɔlɔk unnyimɛ kibbi, ɔkpɛnbong Lafɔɔ unnyizɛ kibbi ɔgbaa. Annyinɛ Lafɔɔ kibbi nzang asibong ɔlɔɔt wa utelenɛzɛ lile, asseke ɔlɔɔt wa unnyinɛzɛ kibbi.
59004012	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa unnyinɛ lafɔɔ ɔbbal ɔkaal-a-kɛkaal lile. Ammɛ kɛyɔɔng ukkwoongnɛ ɔkkala ɔfɔngɔ, ukkwoong ɔbɛpɛ. Attina attɛ annɔ alenɛ nnyinɔɔng wa annyinɛ wannyɔɔng ɔlɔɔt kibbi?
59004013	Agɔpɔlɔnɛyɔng gedegede mung, annyɔɔng ba alɔɔknɛ attɛyɔng, “Mmwɔɔn ɔlɔk lufat vvenɛ imii ka lɛffɛ lɛlɔk, ka ɛfɛɛn ile itaa ka kukkpa, inaang kɛnaang, iyanga ikkpoko ggbadam.”
59004014	Ba asanyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɛfal annyɔɔng lile lile lufat. Ale yɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kibut sa ayɛnnɛyɔng lɔfɔm, kikoon kisi lɛbɛlɛ lile.
59004015	Kwa ale alɔɔkyɔng ulenɛ ’kwɔng! “Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔsaapmɛnɛ vvenɛ iddu inaang ’bwɔng ɔlɔk ’bwɔng kang.”
59004016	Gedegede mung ɔkkyaawɔyɔng lɔkkyaa, anaangyɔng kamma, Kɛnaang a kamma ’sɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ bbwak ba kile.
59004017	Kule ning baang, ɔlɔɔt wa usinɛ lɛnaang kwa ɔsannɛ ɔttɛ ɔnaangnɛ kɔyyɛɛp mung, ɔnaangbong bubbi.
59005001	Balɔɔt iyyɛɛp, gɔpɔlɔyɔng! Akkwa attɔlyɔng layilili ka akama wa ale ka ayɛnnɛyɔng.
59005002	Iyyɛɛp annyɔɔng iddɔlɔbong isaal. Bisili bizzibong ibba annyɔɔng bivve.
59005003	Gold annyɔɔng la silver bittelebong itilikɔɔt. Itilikɔɔt ’yɔng baang vvenɛ ibee ittɛɛsɛ ittɛ issɛɛnwɔyɔng ka kɔlɔɔk. Vvenɛ ibee bbwak izziwɔyɔng ɛkkpakkwɔɔt tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɔkɔɔn. Afaanyɔngbong iyyɛɛp ka bɛtɔm a lakpeke ’byɔng mung.
59005004	Ba ataka akipiliyɔng balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ kɛnaang ka itɔɔm annyɔng. Agɔpɔlɔyɔng ibwɔɔlɔ ya babwɔɔlɔnɛ. Kullu kwa balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba banaangnɛ kɛnaang ka itɔɔm annyɔɔng bakkwanɛ kɔffɔbong Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Uyini wa ɔyanganɛ lakke ɔkkpɛlɛ.
59005005	Lafal annyɔɔng ka ɛkpansi laggba lissi lale za kizzi ladoddo la kɛtaa ka laggele. Azzibong aggbengeyɔng ka kɛtɔm sa bale bawwɔɔlwɔyɔng.
59005006	Annyiyɔng balɔɔt ba basinɛ kwɛ lɛsan kibbi, awwɔɔlyɔngbɛ. Ɔzzànga wɔyɔng ba bapipili.
59005007	Ikpana anaam, abbeyɔng luppyam tɔttɔt Uyini uffu. Ayɛnyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ uwoop-a-bɔtɔɔm ubbenɛ luppyam ɔtaa ɔkat ɛkpansi ammɛ ya uwoopnɛ bɔtɔɔm ennyimɛ liyaat sa doddo. Ubbe luppyam bɛɛm ɔkat ɛkɛtɛ ya uteepnɛ.
59005008	Annyɔɔng ɔgbaa assɛ abbeyɔng luppyam. Alokoyɔng ittina annyɔɔng kkpɔk ka Kɛtɔm-a-kiffu Uyini kilenɛ lɛkkɛtɛ.
59005009	Ikpana anaam, tɛ̀ttɛ́ assɛyɔng lɔzzɔ kɔlɔɔk kɔlɔk atumyɔng wannyɔɔng nkwaaning Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usiwɔyɔng kibbi linnyi. Ɔkaal-a-kɛkaal utii kɛtɛkɛtɛ, ɔbamabong, ule ka uffunɛ.
59005010	Ikpana anaam, akkeyɔng kwa bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ba balɔɔknɛ kɔlɔɔk ka lakke Uyini. Atɔkyɔngbɛ ka iyɔɔ kibbe luppyam la kɛbbɔ akama.
59005011	Ikkwɔɔbɛ balɔɔt a laggele ka babbɔnɛ akama. Appyeeyɔngbong kibbe luppyam a Job. Asanyɔng bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyimɛnɛ ka lakuma. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ uyini kibbelɛttɔ la kɛyyɛɛp eleme.
59005012	Ikpana anaam, kwa kɔttanɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, tɛ̀ttɛ́ ayimyɔng ka ɛkɛtɛ ya anaangnɛyɔng nsekele. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ayimyɔng libat ɔlɔk ɛkpansi ɔlɔk bɔfɛɛn duu. Attɛnɛyɔng “Iii” ɔkɔɔngwɔyɔng “Iii” ’wɔng baang. Attɛnɛyɔng “Mmaaye”, ɔkɔɔngwɔyɔng “Mmaaye” ’wɔng baang nkwaaning asiyɔng ka kɛkaal a Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lile.
59005013	Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ulewɔyɔng baang ka bɛzzɔkɔ wa ulenɛ ka kɔlɔɔk lɛttɔ ɔɔ? Ulenɛ baang, ɔssɛɛn luzɔɔm. Ɔlɔɔt annyɔɔng ɔlɔk ule baang wa ulenɛ ka laggele ɔɔ? Ulenɛ baang, usoom ubungu Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
59005014	Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ule baang wa usimɛnɛ lɛppwa ɔɔ? Ulenɛ baang, ɔkkwɔɔ bagɛlɛnya-luzɔɔm baffu bazɔɔm bassɛɛnmɛ, bappwɔɔngmɛ bannɛ ka lɛkɔɔl a Jesus.
59005015	Luzɔɔm ’gwɔng gwa azɔɔmnɛ la kiyila ka tɔkɔlɔ vvenɛ lɔnaang ɔlɔɔt iffaak ɔppwamɛ, Uyini ɔnaangmɛ ɔppwamɛ, ɔsɔɔkmɛ bubbi bwa ulenɛ lɛnaang.
59005016	Ɔ̀zzànga abwɔɔlɔyɔng bubbi annyɔɔng annyɔɔng azɔɔm assɛɛnwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng nkwaaning ɔppwawɔyɔng. Luzɔɔm Ɔlɔɔt wa doddo lɔnaang kɛnaang kɛttala.
59005017	Elijah ɔdɔkɔ kɛssanga ɔlɔɔt tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ayyɔɔt mung. Ɔzɔɔm ɔttɛ ɔfɔngɔ kiteep. Usi liteep ka lɔkkwɔɔn ka likkpa liffa la kufaak.
59005018	Ɔbbal lɛzɔɔm ɔttɛ uteep. Uteep ka lɔkkwɔɔn ɔllɔt ka ɛkpansi iwopowopo iyyɛɛp.
59005019	Ikpana anaam, ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn ɔlɔɔt ɔgbatanɛ ka bɛzzɔkɔ annyɔɔng usseke lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk, ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔnaangmɛnɛ ɔppyɛlɛ uffu,
59005020	akke attɛyɔng ɔlɔɔt duu wa ukkwoongnɛ ɔnaang ɔnaang-a-bubbi ɔkkyaa kɛnaang a bubbi ɔfɔngɔ, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔkkalabong lɛfɛkɛlɛ ɔnaang-a-bubbi ’wɔng baang, ɔnaang kɛsɔɔk a bubbi ppwap kile.
60001001	Lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng lissi ka Peter, uyilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus Christ. Ɔtɔɔm ufee balɔɔt ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ, ba bammanɛ lɛkɔɔng bamii ɛkpansi a Pontus, la Galatia la Cappadocia la Asia ɔbɛtɛ la Bithynia.
60001002	Dedde ayyɔɔt, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔdɔkɔ ɔsangawɔyɔng ɔssanga bwa uttinanɛ la annyɔɔng, Kuyeeng ammɛ kɔnaangwɔyɔng azzangayɔng balɔɔt ba doddo kɔttɛ ateleyɔng Jesus Christ usseke linnyi ammɛ likkpɔlɔyɛlɛ laggbo. Numa lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la bɔkaat bile bya annyɔɔng bɛttala-ɔttala.
60001003	Iwomoyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ayyɔɔt, abassɛ Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, kɛnaang! Unnyiyɛlɛ ufaa kɛfal ka kibbelɛttɔ ammɛ ka ufungalanɛ Jesus Christ ka lubbe. Nkwɔng kunnyinɛyɛlɛ luttina gwa doddo.
60001004	Ile baang ka ikatnɛ kɛtɔk a ppyɛɛ wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulokonɛ balɔɔt ammɛ. Ulokobɛ ka libat ka ɛfɛɛn a ule usi lɛddɔlɔ, usi lɛbɛpɛ, usi bannyi libbe.
60001005	Ppyɛɛ ule wa annyɔɔng, balɔɔt ba ussinɛ ka kiyila, lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lakkalawɔyɔng kwa kuddu kwa kulenɛ ka lakpeke.
60001006	Aggeleyɔng mkkpandɔk asan attɛyɔng kule bbwak ka illɛ ya ayɛnnɛyɔng akama ka annyɛ mung.
60001007	Akama annyɔɔng ulenɛ kɛyɔɔ kɛttɛ kiyila annyɔɔng kile sa lɔkkwɔɔn. Bakɔɔm lɔkɔɔn ballɛ gold wa ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn bwa bubɛpɛnɛ. Kwakkwɛ bale ballɛ kiyila annyɔɔng sa kɛttanɛ gold nkwaaning kɛbbɔ; atɔkyɔng kuttu la lakke la latele ka Kɛtɔm sa Jesus Christ ule uffu.
60001008	Atelemɛyɔng, ɔzzàngà mɛ ba ataka ayɛnyɔng. Ayilayɔng kwa ammɛ, ɔzzàngà mɛ ba ataka ayɛnyɔng. Ɔzzànga ɔwaawɔyɔng gaang gaang ɔsak kɛlɔɔk ka kamma,
60001009	ka alenɛyɔng ka kɛtɔk a kuddu lɛfɛkɛlɛ annyɔɔng. Nkwɔng kulenɛ kwa kiyila annɔ kɛnaangnɛ.
60001010	Kwa bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm babbenɛ luppyam baggyan kɔdɔkɔ kutum kuddu ’kwɔng mung. Babwɔɔlɔ lilɔɔk batum lɛsɔɔk ’zɔng baang za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule unnyiwɔyɔng.
60001011	Babum battɛ basan ɛkɛtɛ kule kule la tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kule kuffu. Uwɔng ɔdɔkɔnɛ ɛkɛtɛ ya Kuyeeng a Christ kwa kɔdɔkɔnɛbɛ ka kkwɔɔt kɔbwɔɔlɔnɛ ka babwɔɔlɔnɛ akama wa Christ ule ɔyɛn la latele za ule ɔyanga.
60001012	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyɔɔ bappyee-kutolo ammɛ ’bɔng baang ɔttɛ kɛnaang abbɛ ba banaang ka budoddo bwa abbɛ biini, banaang kwa annyɔɔng ka balɔɔknɛ batum bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng baang bya alenɛyɔng lippyee gedegede mung ka babwɔɔlɔ Kuttu-Budoddo ka lakke Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kwa kussinɛ ka libat. Uwɔng ulenɛ bɛfɛɛn bya bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm baggyannɛ kɛsan bagbaa.
60001013	Abama ippyam annyɔɔng akatyɔng linaang. Agepeleyɔng ppyɛɛ wa ale ayangayɔng ka ɛkɛtɛ ya Jesus ule uffu.
60001014	Ateleyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ afɔngɔyɔng bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng baang bya bɛsaapwɔnɛyɔng ka ɛkɛtɛ ya atakanɛyɔng kɔlɔɔk lɛsan bɛkɔɔm lafal annyɔɔng.
60001015	Lutini ’gwɔng ataayɔng ka budoddo tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔkkwɔɔwɔnɛ ulenɛ doddo.
60001016	Luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛ, “Ataa ka budoddo, ka anaam nlenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa doddo.”
60001017	Ka azɔɔmnɛyɔng luzɔɔm annyiyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔkaalnɛ kɛkaal ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔssanga bwa ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔt ulenɛ lɛnaang, akkwɔɔmɛyɔng Dedde. Ka kulenɛ ning baang akɔɔmyɔng ɛkɛtɛ kuddu annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ ɛkpansi ka kwa kɔsaapmɛnɛ.
60001018	Asanyɔng lɔsan bɔfɛɛn bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkɔɔmnɛ ɔkkalawɔyɔng ka babbu linaang ba bassinɛwɔnɛyɔng ka bagɛlɛnya annyɔɔng ba iyɛddɛ-iyɛddɛ. Ba ule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɔfɛɛn bwa akkwoongnɛ abɛpɛbwɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ silver ɔlɔk gold.
60001019	Bigwugwulu bya bakɔɔmnɛ bɛdɔkɔ Christ wa ɔdɔkɔnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ waan ɛtɔɔn wa ɔyyɛɛpnɛ ɔsɛlɛ lɛggba banaang bɛsangawɔnɛyɔng ka kɔlɔɔk.
60001020	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsangamɛbong tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔlɔɔm vveeng. Ɔzzanga uffubong ka bɛtɔm a lakpeke ’byɔng mung uzzenge luzzi annyɔɔng.
60001021	Kussi kwa ammɛ ayilayɔng kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, wa ufungalamɛnɛ ka lubbe unnyimɛ latele. Kwakkwɛ alokonɛyɔng kiyila la luttina annyɔɔng ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
60001022	Gedegede mung ka alenɛyɔng lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk litele, azzaawɔyɔngbong kɛyɔɔng ayangayɔng kɛsaap sa lɔkkwɔɔn la bannyɔɔng a bayanga-kiyila, atele wannyɔɔng la vvɔn la luppyam gwa doddo.
60001023	Ka lakke lɛmmwɔɔl a kuddu Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm za kɛfal a kɛfal bappyɛlɛbong bamaatwɔyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bwɔɔn ɔlɔɔt ba ibakka abbɛ la ibassɛ bale babbe basi eggwu lɛkɔɔng.
60001024	Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, “Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ bale tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lifaat ka kɛmat, Lakke abbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ lale tɛ̀ttɛ̀ idodo, lifaat libbenɛ, idodo ikkpɛɛ ittɔ.
60001025	Ɔzz̀ang̀a lɛmmwɔɔl Uyini lɛtaa ka kɛfal a kɛfal.” Uwɔng ulenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl za Kuttu-Budoddo kɔkɔɔmnɛ kufeewɔyɔng.
60002001	Akkyaayɔng bubbi annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ azzɔɔkyɔng, kɛkkala lɛlaak ba kɛbɛlɛ lile, ɔlɔk kɛnaang a lagban, ɔlɔk luleep, ɔlɔk ɔbbaatyɔng lifɔk.
60002002	Ataayɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bwɔɔn ba bassumanɛ lɛmaat, aggyanyɔng libee za doddo avvayɔng la ɛkɛtɛ la ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkɔɔnɛ ka avvanɛyɔngzɛ ammalayɔng aleyɔng ba kɛkkala.
60002003	Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, “Allɛyɔngbong kiggwoom a kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
60002004	Affuyɔng ka ɛfɛɛn Uyini, lɛttaal-a-kuddu za balɔɔt bafimnɛzɛ battɛ bɔfɛɛn bwa gbɔɔ, ɔzzànga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛzɛ azzɛ ɔttɛ, lile bɔfɛɛn a kukkam.
60002005	Affuyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lakkpɔ lattaal-a-kuddu, afɔngɔ bakɔɔmwɔyɔng annyɔɔng biini babɔɔk ggwoon a Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ka ɛfɛɛn ale assɛɛnyɔng luzɔɔm tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm ba bbwak ka Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, la lɛtɔm za bale banaang bannyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka labɔɔk a Jesus Christ.
60002006	Luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔttɛ, “Nsangabong lɛttaal a kukkam ntte lutte kɛbat a ggwoon Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka Zion ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt duu wa uyilanɛ kwa azzɛ baala usi lɛyɛn bwa ɔggyannɛ.”
60002007	Lɛttaal ’zɔng mung lile lɛttaal a kukkam za lɛbaang ka ggwoon Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kwa annyɔɔng balɔɔt ba ayilanɛyɔng. Ɔzzanga kwa balɔɔt ba basinɛ liyila, “Lɛttaal ’zɔng baang za babɔɔk a ssoon bafimnɛ lɛppyɛɛbong lɛzzánga lɛttaal za doddo.”
60002008	Lɛmmwɔɔl lɛlɔk lɛttɛ, “Lɛttaal ’zɔng mung lile lɛnaang balɔɔt bavvun battɔ”. Bavvun ka basinɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm liyila. Uwɔng ulenɛ kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uttinanɛ utumbɛ.
60002009	Ɔzzànga annyɔɔng alenɛyɔng balɔɔt ba balewɔnɛyɔng lɛsanga. Bassɛɛn a luzɔɔm Ubeet Ebinukkpaapi, lɔfɔɔn gwa latele, balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm biini, ba ɔsangawɔnɛyɔng ɔttɛ abwɔɔlɔyɔng linaang a bikɛɛlɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔkkwɔɔwɔnɛyɔng ka tɔkɔlɔ kisul uffu ka buppwolo bikɛɛlɛ ammɛ biini.
60002010	Ka ɛkɛtɛ nnyɔn, annyɔɔng balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm adɔkɔ asiyɔng lile, ɔzzànga gedegede mung atiiyɔng ba ammɛ. Ka ɛkɛtɛ nnyɔn, kibbelɛttɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm adɔkɔ asiyɔng lɛsan ɔzzàngà mung atɔkyɔngbong kibbelɛttɔ ammɛ.
60002011	Inngwa anaam, nkkpengewɔyɔng annyɔɔng ba alenɛyɔng bakekeen la bamma-lɛkɔɔng ka ɛkpansi ’yɔng nttɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ asamwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng annyiyɔng bɛfɛɛn bya billeknɛ kkwɔɔt annyɔɔng. Gbisii bile ka lɛkɔɔng la luppyam.
60002012	Akɔɔmyɔng ileme ya doddo ateleyɔng ikpana annyɔɔng ya itakanɛ kɔlɔɔk Ebinukkpaapi lɛsan, nkwaaning ɛkɛtɛ ya bakaawɔnɛyɔng basan budoddo annyɔɔng; nkwaaning babungu Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka Kɛtɔm sa ule uffu.
60002013	Ateleyɔng ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ attinayɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm: Ateleyɔng Ubeet wa uzzinɛ lɛttɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ,
60002014	la bakɔɔm ɛkpansi ba ɔtɔɔmnɛbɛ ɔttɛ bayɔɔ balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ bubbi akama, babungu balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ doddo.
60002015	Nkwɔng kulenɛ kwa Ebinukkpaapi ɛttɛnɛ anaangyɔng. Anaangyɔng budoddo, balɔɔt ba basinɛ kɔlɔɔk lɛsan bataa zzum.
60002016	Ataayɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ batta ka kɔlɔɔk, ɔzzanga tɛ̀ttɛ́ akɔɔmyɔng lakke annyɔɔng alupyɔng bubbi bwa anaangnɛyɔng. Ataayɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ babili Ebinukkpaapi.
60002017	Ateleyɔng balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ, balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ kiyila tɛ̀ttɛ̀ annyɔɔng basaapwɔyɔng. Ebinukkpaapi ɛbbwɔpɔwɔyɔng, ateleyɔng Uzzilɛttɔ.
60002018	Annyɔɔng ibɔɔyi, asamwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng annyiyɔng issaawɔ annyɔɔng, annyiyɔngbɛ latele za lɔkkwɔɔn. Balɔɔt ba baggwoomnɛ kɔlɔɔk, ɔlɔɔt ubbebɛ lɛttɔ keem lissi ka ale ateleyɔng. Balɔɔt ba banyangawɔnɛyɔng ɔgbaa assɛ annyiyɔngbɛ latele.
60002019	Ebinukkpaapi vvenɛ ɛnaangwɔyɔng ppyɛɛ ka ’kwɔng alenɛyɔng baang ka appyeenɛyɔng bɔssɔp gbɔɔ ka lɛsɔɔk ka alenɛyɔng bwa ɔttɛnɛ anaangyɔng lɛsan.
60002020	Isak ilewɔnɛyɔng ka ’bɔng abbɔnɛyɔng akama ka battupwɔnɛyɔng ka asinɛyɔng bbwak lɛnaang. Ɔzzànga appyɛɛnɛ abbɔyɔng akama ka anaangnɛyɔng budoddo, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔnaangwɔyɔng ppyɛɛ ka akkwɛ.
60002021	Kɔdɔkɔ ka ’kwɔng ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkwɔɔwɔnɛyɔng, ka Christ biini ɔyɛnnɛ akama ka lɛttɔ annyɔɔng ɔ̀zzánga ɔtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ iyɔɔ ɔkkɔɔnɛ akeetmɛyɔng.
60002022	Bubbi usi lɛnaang, ɔlɔɔt vvɔn gbɔɔ wa ulenɛ lippyee ka ɔnaangnɛ lɛlaak ba ule.
60002023	Ka ɛkɛtɛ babbaatmɛnɛ, kamma usi lɛppyɛlɛ la lifɔk. Ɛkɛtɛ ɔyɛnnɛ akama, kusimɛ lɛssɔp. Ɔzzanga luttina ammɛ lulemɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Ɔkaal-a-kɛkaal wa Bbwak.
60002024	Christ biini ɔsamnɛ bubbi ayyɔɔt uzzenge ka kkwɔɔt ubbe ka Cross, nkwaaning ibbe innyi bubbi, iddu kuddu kwa budoddo. Ka bidopo ammɛ uttulabongyɛlɛ.
60002025	Adɔkɔ aleyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ itɔɔn ya itaaknɛ, ɔzzànga gedegede mung, bakɔɔmwɔyɔngbong bappyɛlɛ isimi-simi affuyɔng akupyɔng Ɔkat-itɔɔn la Ɔkat-a-kuddu annyɔɔng.
60003001	Bwanavva, asamwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng annyiyɔng bwalam annyɔɔng, nkwaaning linaang annyɔɔng lidɛm bwaanbwalam balɔk ba basinɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm liyila bassɛ baang bayila. Gɔɔ lɛmmwɔɔl baala azza atum kwɛ,
60003002	ka bale bayɛn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ linaang annyɔɔng liyyɛɛpnɛ liyanga latele liffɔ.
60003003	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akɔɔmyɔng bɛfɛɛn bya vveeng kaang ning, anaang ɔkkɔɔnɛ akwɛnyɔng, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ alokonɛyɔng kittulu annyɔɔng, ɔlɔk bɛfɛɛn a gold bya akwulanɛyɔng ka lukat, ɔlɔk iwɔkɔlɔ ya awɔkɔlɔnɛyɔng ka kkwɔɔt.
60003004	Lutini ’gwɔng bɔllɛ annyɔɔng bule bɔllɛ luppyam. Bɔllɛ bwa businɛ likpeke la latele, la kuyeeng kwa zzum. Akkwɛ kulenɛ kwa lɛbaang ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
60003005	Bwanavva ba iyɛddɛ iyɛddɛ ba basamnɛbɛ kɛyɔɔng bannyi ka luzɔɔm, ba battinanɛ kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, banaangbɛ abbɛ biini kɛyɔɔng bayyɛɛp ka ɛtɔk ’yɔng, ka basamnɛbɛ kɛyɔɔng bannyi bwalam abbɛ.
60003006	Sarah ɔdɔkɔ ule ning baang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bwanavva ’bɔng baang, utele Abraham, ɔkkwɔɔmɛ “Dedde anaam.” Gedegede mung annyɔɔng bwaan ammɛ ba bwanavva, ulenɛ ka anaangnɛyɔng budoddo, kɔlɔɔk kɔlɔk kusiwɔyɔng lɛbbwɔpɔ.
60003007	Annyɔɔng bwalam ɔgbaa ka allunɛyɔng la bwanavva annyɔɔng, akɔɔlɔyɔng asan attɛyɔng abbɛ balenɛ kukup a balɔɔt ba basɔɔnɛ. Akɔɔmyɔngbɛ ka latele. Ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng vvenɛ atɔkyɔng lɛsɔɔk a kuddu Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Anaangyɔng ’kwɔng nkwaaning bulɔk busi luzɔɔm annyɔɔng lɛnaang.
60003008	Kitele lɛttɔ ulenɛ kɛttɛ, vvenɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng ayangayɔng luttina la kɛssanga linaang ssɔn. Wannyɔɔng ɔsaapwɔyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ikpana annyɔɔng; ayyɛɛpyɔng bɛnaang la lutini ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ɔzzanga atɔkwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng ka bukee.
60003009	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ apipili wannyɔɔng wa ɔnaangwɔnɛ bubbi, ɔlɔk abbaat wannyɔɔng wa ɔbbaatwɔnɛ. Lutini ’gwɔng anaangmɛ ppyɛɛ, ka ppyɛɛ ulenɛ nsekele wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyiwɔnɛyɔng ka ɛkɛtɛ ya ɔkkwɔɔwɔnɛyɔng.
60003010	Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔggyannɛ ɔttɛ ɔtaa ka laggele ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ka lɛfal ammɛ, ɔkkyaa kɛlɔɔk a lilɔɔk sa libbɔlnɛ ɔfɔngɔ, ɔkkyaa kɛnaang a lɛlaak ɔfɔngɔ.
60003011	Ɔkkyaa lilɔɔk a bubbi ɔfɔngɔ ɔppyɛɛ ɔnaang budoddo. Vvenɛ kɔbɛtɛmɛ kwa bɔkaat.
60003012	Uyini ɔppyɛɛk balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ kwa bbwak ɔgɔpɔlɔ luzɔɔm abbɛ ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Kɔlɔɔk kutunmɛ la balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ bubbi.”
60003013	Nnyinɔɔng ule uddopowɔ ka aggyannɛ attɛ anaang kɔlɔɔk kwa kɔyyɛɛpnɛ?
60003014	Ɔzzànga mkkpa ayɛn akama ka aggyannɛ attɛ anaang kwa bbwak, ale aggele nang? Tɛ̀ttɛ́ balɔɔt babbwɔpɔwɔyɔng, tɛ̀ttɛ́ ittina ibbɔlwɔyɔng.
60003015	Ɔzzànga asam Christ assɛɛnwɔ kɛyɔɔng ka luppyam. Atelemɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Uyini annɔ. Abama ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, appyɛlɛ ɔlɔɔt duu kamma wa ule ɔbapwɔ ɔttɛ abwɔɔlɔmɛ luttina gwa ayanganɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ.
60003016	Anaangkwɛ bɛtɛbɛtɛ la latele. Aloko luttina annɔ kkpaladada, nkwaaning ɛkɛtɛ ya banyɔɔkawɔnɛ, balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba balɔɔknɛ bubbi batum kɛyyɛɛp a linaang annɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt ba bakupnɛ Christ, battɔ ka izzit ka lukopolo abbɛ.
60003017	Kɔtta lɛyyɛɛp ka ɔlɔɔt ɔyɛnnɛ akama ka kɛnaang a budoddo, kulenɛ kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyannɛ, lutini kɛnaang a ubbu kɔlɔɔk.
60003018	Christ biini ubbe ka lɛttɔ ayɔɔt kikkpit ssɔn kɔsaal. Ubbe ffet kwa banaang a bubbi. Ɔlɔɔt wa doddo ubbe ɔkkala lɛttɔ babbu balɔɔt ba basinɛ lɛyyɛɛp, ɔggyan ɔttɛ ɔkɔɔmwɔyɔng umii ka ɛfɛɛn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Bawwɔɔlmɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bawwɔɔlnɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔppyɛlɛ ufungala ka lakke Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtaa ka kuddu.
60003019	Ɛkɛtɛ ya ulenɛ ka kuddu tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kuyeeng, umii ukopolo liyeeng sa lilenɛ ka igbakkɔpɔ.
60003020	Uwɔng ulenɛ liyeeng a balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba basinɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm litele. Ka ubbenɛ luppyam bɛɛm ɔtaa ɔkat bɛtɔm a Noah ɔdɔkɔnɛ ka kɛnaang akkpaat. Bwaan a balɔɔt badɔkɔ ssup ning ba balenɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ akkpaat, ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ bale balɔɔt bannambanna ka bannyi basinɛbɛ lɛmmɛɛl.
60003021	Baang ɔdɔkɔ iyɔɔ ya kɛnaang a baptizim, ya ikkalawɔnɛyɔng gedegede mung. Kwa kɛzzaa bɔkkpɔtɔ a kkwɔɔt lissi. Ule kwa nsekele wa ɔnaangnɛ la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ussinɛ ka luppyam gwa doddo. Kɔkkalawɔyɔng ka kifungala ka lubbe sa Jesus Christ ufungalanɛ.
60003022	Ammɛ wa ulenɛ ka libat limii ɔzzánga ùlé ka kɔbɔɔk ɛlaabɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ammɛ ulenɛ uzzilɛttɔ bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la lakke libat ɔkkpɛlɛ.
60004001	Ka Christ ɔyɛnnɛ akama ka kkwɔɔt ammɛ biini, annyɔɔng ɔgbaa assɛ attinayɔng ɛtɔk ’yɔng baang. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔyɛnnɛ akama ka kkwɔɔt ammɛ baala ɔttɔ ka bubbi.
60004002	Ka ussinɛ gedegede mung umii ka lusso, akkyaayɔng lafal annyɔɔng ka vveeng ’wɔng mung afɔngɔyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkɔɔm, afɔngɔyɔng kɛtaa la luttina gwa ɔssɛbibit.
60004003	Ka isimi ka isimi aleyɔng baang ka anaangnɛyɔng bɛfɛɛn bya balɔɔt ba basinɛ kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm liyila banaangnɛ. Adɔkɔyɔng la babbu ittina, la lɔgbɛɛk, la kɛvva batak, la kɛnaang a bɛfɛɛn izzit, la lakup a kɛvva la lakup ilat.
60004004	Gedegede mung balɔɔt ba basinɛ kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm liyila kɔkɛɛlɛbongbɛ ka basiwɔnɛyɔng lɛbɛlɛ lɛyɛn ka atulnɛyɔng la abbɛ anaangyɔng babbu lilɔɔk, kwakkwɛ babbaatwɔnɛyɔng.
60004005	Vvenɛ babwɔɔlɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔkaalnɛ bakokolo la babbu kɔlɔɔk duu kwa balenɛ lɛnaang.
60004006	Kwakkwɛ bakopolonɛ babbu lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔgbaa la balɔɔt ba balenɛbɛ lɛkaal ka linaang abbɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bakaalnɛ ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ, bakopolobɛ nkwaaning bataa ka lafal abbɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyannɛ.
60004007	Lakpeke bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ lakkɛtɛbong. Akatwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng, abeeyɔng kkpɔk akkwoong assɛɛnyɔng luzɔɔm.
60004008	Kwa kɔttanɛ liggbenge ulenɛ kɛttɛ, bannyɔɔng basaapwɔyɔng gaang gaang. Kɛsaap kɛbɛtɛnɛ bubbi ppwap.
60004009	Awongoloyɔng ssala annyɔɔng alokoyɔng balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ, afɔngɔyɔng lɔzzɔ kɛssɛ.
60004010	Ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn ule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt wa ukkwoongnɛ ɔkɔɔm lɛsɔɔk za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyimɛnɛ. Vvenɛ ɔkɔɔm lɛsɔɔk ammɛ ’zɔng baang za lissimɛnɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uttele babbɛ balɔɔt balɔk.
60004011	Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔbwɔɔlɔnɛ ibwɔɔlɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule ɔbwɔɔlɔ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔnaangnɛ kɛnaang ɔkɔɔm lakke za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyimɛnɛ ɔnaang, nkwaaning ka utini bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ibunguyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ussinɛ ka Jesus Christ, wa latele la lakke lalenɛ za ammɛ ka kɛfal a kɛfal. Kulening.
60004012	Inngwa anaam ka luppyam, tɛ̀ttɛ́ kɔkɛɛlɛwɔyɔng ka akama wa ayɛnnɛyɔng, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɔfɛɛn bwa butakawɔnɛ kkpal lɛnaang.
60004013	Lutini ’gwɔng aggeleyɔng attɛyɔng ayɛnyɔng akama la Christ, nkwaaning aggeleyɔng gaang gaang ɛkɛtɛ ule ɔyɔɔ lakke ammɛ.
60004014	Laggele lale za annyɔɔng balɔɔt ba banaangwɔnɛyɔng bɛfɛɛn izzit ka akupnɛyɔng Christ. Uwɔng ulenɛ kɛttɛ lakke Kuyeeng kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kule baang la annyɔɔng.
60004015	Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔyɛn akama ammɛ ulenɛ ɔwwɔɔl a balɔɔt, ɔlɔk ussip, ɔlɔk ɔttɔ-ka-lafɔɔ, ɔlɔk ubum kɛtɔk a kɛnaang a balɔɔt.
60004016	Ɔzzànga ayɛnnɛ akama ka alenɛ ɔlɔɔt a Christ tɛ̀ttɛ́ izzit inaangwɔ, awomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛnaang alenɛ la lɛkɔɔl a Christ.
60004017	Ɛkɛtɛ ɛffɔbong ya kɛkaal kile ka kittenɛ, Balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm balenɛ balɔɔt ba bale batte lɛkaal kɛkaal abbɛ. Kittenɛ ka ayyɔɔt kile kikpeke nang la balɔɔt ba basinɛ kiyila lɛyanga batum kuttu budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm?
60004018	Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ lɔttɛ, “Kɔkɔɔt lɔkɔɔt tɛ́ttɛ́ bakkala balɔɔt ba doddo, nkka kule kɔtaa nang la balɔɔt ba basinɛ ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lile la banaang a bubbi?”
60004019	Kule ning baang la balɔɔt ba bayɛnnɛ akama ka kɔlɔɔk a Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, batelebɛ kɛyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ bannyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka budoddo kɛnaang abbɛ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ulokonɛ nsekele ammɛ ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
60005001	Nkkpenge batumalɔɔt a luzɔɔm ka bɛzzɔkɔ annyɔɔng, anaam biini wa nssɛnɛ nle utumalɔɔt ka luzɔɔm. Anaam nlenɛ ttɛɛsɛ kɛyɛn akama Christ. Ɔzzànga vvenɛ nyanga etini ka ppyɛɛ wa ule uffu. Nkkpengewɔyɔng lukkpenge.
60005002	Azzangayɔng bakat-itɔɔn ya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyiwɔnɛyɔng, appyɛɛkyɔngyɛ annyɛ ka luppyam gwa doddo, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyannɛ ɔttɛ anaangyɔng. Ɔzzànga ka luppyam gwa bbɔl bbɔl lissi. Anaangyɔng kɛnaang afɔngɔyɔng kwa kikkpele kiffik, ɔzzàngà kussiwɔyɔng ka luppyam annyɔɔng anaangyɔng.
60005003	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ abum attɛ annyɔɔng azzangayɔng bazzilɛttɔ balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba balewɔnɛyɔng linnyi battɛ appyɛɛkyɔngbɛ. Ɔzzànga ataa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ iyɔɔ ka kɛkaan ’sɔng baang.
60005004	Ɛkɛtɛ ya Uzzilɛttɔ kɛkat-itɔɔn utumanɛ, vvenɛ ɔttɔpɔwɔyɔng ododo wa unnyiwɔnɛyɔng lakke za lale lasi lɛbɛlɛ lɛsaal.
60005005	Kɔssɛ kule ning baang la annyɔɔng. Ɔgbaa, annyɔɔng bakolobya annyiyɔng batumalɔɔt latele. Ɔzzànga ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng ayɔɔyɔng linaang annyɔɔng sa doddo kkpelegedee, abum atelewɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔknɛ, lɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔkaal kɛkaal a balɔɔt ba ɔkkyaanɛbɛ, unnyi bakee-bwɔɔn latele.”
60005006	Atɔkwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng ka bukee-waan. Ɔzzànga ataayɔng ka lakke labɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, nkwaaning ɔsamwɔyɔng uyeek ka libat ka ɛkɛtɛ ya ammɛ biini ya bbwak.
60005007	Asamyɔng lilɔɔk annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ annyimɛyɔng ka ulemɛnɛ ammɛ ɔkatwɔnɛyɔng.
60005008	Asan anaangyɔng, akatyɔng! Ɔlɔɔt a kɔfɔk annyɔɔng, Ɔnaanga-a-kɛsɛɛm-a-kuyeeng, ule baang ka ɔssɛnɛ ukkpit ɔkɔɔm ubungu tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ugɛbɛ ulenɛ ka kɛggyan a bɔfɛɛn bwa ɔkaanɛ uzzi.
60005009	Kiyila annyɔɔng kɛkkaam lɔkkaam, tɛ̀ttɛ́ afɔngɔ ɔbɛtɛwɔyɔng ka asannɛ attɛ balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ɛkpansi ba bayanganɛ kiyila bassɛ bayɛn akama kɛssanga ssɔn.
60005010	Ɔzzǹga alenɛyɔng akama lɛyɛn ka waan ɛkɛtɛ ssup ning, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔyanganɛ lakke ɔkkpɛlɛ, wa ɔkkwɔɔwɔnɛyɔng ɔttɛ affu ayangayɔng etini ka lakke ammɛ za kɛfal a kɛfal ka bɔkaat la Christ, ammɛ biini vvenɛ ɔnaangwɔyɔng aleyɔng bbwak, unnyiwɔyɔng bɔkkaam la lagabwɔ, ka lutte gwa lɔkkwɔɔn.
60005011	Lakke za kɛfal a kɛfal lale ka ammɛ. Kule ning.
60005012	Silas uttelenɛbong nkkpɔkwɔyɔng waan a lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng mung. Ammɛ ulenɛ wa nttinanɛ nttɛ ule ɔkpana ayyɔɔt wa ɔyanganɛ kiyila. Nggyan nttɛ nttamawɔyɔng ka lafɔɔ za nle ka nnyiwɔnɛyɔng za lalenɛ lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Abeeyɔng bbwak ka azzɛ.
60005013	Ikpana annyɔɔng ya ilenɛ ka Babylon ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛbɛ lɛssang ɔgbaa, batɔɔm luwomo bafeewɔyɔng. Waan anaam Mark ɔssɛ uwomowɔyɔng.
60005014	Awomoyɔng bannyɔɔng la kigbugba kɛsaap a balɔɔt a Christ. Bɔkaat butaa la annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ ba alenɛyɔng ba Christ.
61001001	Lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng lissi ka Simon Peter, Uyilabɔtɔɔm la bɔɔyi a Jesus Christ, ɔtɔɔm ufee balɔɔt ba budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la ɔkkala ikkala ayyɔɔt Jesus Christ, bunnyinɛbɛ kiyila sa lɔkkwɔɔn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ sa ayyɔɔt.
61001002	Latele la bɔkaat bɛtaa la annyɔɔng ka ussinɛ ka kɛsan sa asannɛyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la Jesus, Uyini ayyɔɔt.
61001003	Lakke ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lannyibongyɛlɛ utini bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya iggyannɛ ittɛ ikɔɔm iddu tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyannɛ ka ussinɛ ka kɛsan sa isannɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔttɛnɛ itul latele ammɛ, la budoddo ammɛ.
61001004	Ka ɛtɔk ’yɔng unnyibongyɛlɛ lɛsɔɔk za lɛbaang a lɛbaang za lɔkkwɔɔn za ɔggbanɛ lisekele, nkwaaning ka ussinɛ ka lɛsɔɔk ’zɔng baang amma akɔngɔyɔng kɛbɛpɛ la ibbyap ya ilenɛ ka vveeng, amii atulyɔng kɛfal Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
61001005	Ka ’kwɔng, abum anaangyɔng budoddo agbaayɔng la kiyila annyɔɔng. Agbaayɔng bisana ka budoddo annyɔɔng.
61001006	Abum ayangayɔng kɛkat a kɛyɔɔng agbaayɔng la bisana annyɔɔng. Abum ayangayɔng kibbe-luppyam agbaayɔng la kɛkat a kɛyɔɔng. Abum ataayɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm agbaayɔng la kibbe-luppyam.
61001007	Abum ayangayɔng kɛsaap sa bukpana tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ayangayɔng kɛsaap Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm agbaayɔng la kɛsaap sa bukpana.
61001008	Uwɔng ulenɛ ileme ya buyanganɛyɔng. Ayanganɛyɔngyɛ ggbadam vvenɛ inaangwɔyɔng akkaamyɔng akkwoongyɔng kɛnaang ka bisana annyɔɔng pya bitumnɛ Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ.
61001009	Ɔlɔɔt duu wa usinɛbyɛ lɛyanga nzang fulu fulu ba ɔyɛn, usseke ssup ussi ifim. Usumalabong Jesus Christ wa ɔkkpɔlɔmɛnɛ bubbi bwa ɔggbanɛ lɛnaang.
61001010	Ikpana anaam, abumyɔng gaang gaang anaangyɔng kɛkkwɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la kɛsanga sa ɔsangawɔnɛyɔng kile kɔlɔɔk kwa alenɛyɔng lɛsan. Anaangnɛyɔng ning mung, isimi-simi baala appyɛlɛyɔng.
61001011	Anaangnɛyɔng ning, vvenɛ ayangayɔng lakke za bbwak, za kɛmal ka Itutum-Uyini, Ɔkkala-ikkala ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, ya kɛfal a kɛfal.
61001012	Kwakkwɛ baang nkkewɔnɛyɔng ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ka lilɔɔk ’sɔng baang mkkpa aleyɔngsɛ lɛsan, bilewɔyɔng, ka ippyam lile ka assɛɛnnɛyɔng ka lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk gwa alenɛyɔng lɛtɔk.
61001013	Nttina nttɛ kulenɛ bbwak ka nfeelewɔnɛyɔng ittina ka lilɔɔk ’sɔng mung ka ntiinɛ ikokolo.
61001014	Nsan lɔsan nttɛ usseke ssup nzzɔɔk kkwɔɔt ’sɔng mung sa lile libbe tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, ulenɛ lɛbwɔɔlɔ pwool.
61001015	Vvenɛ nbum nnaang ɛtɔk nlokowɔyɔng ya ale akkeyɔng lilɔɔk ’sɔng mung ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ka nle nle libbe.
61001016	Ba kɔtaka kɔbɛtɛyɛlɛ kwa lissa ka ibwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng uggboggbo kiffu Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ. Iyɛn lakke ammɛ ka zzeen ayyɔɔt biini.
61001017	Idɔkɔ baang ka Dedde Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyimɛnɛ lakke la latele. Ippyee ka lɛmmwɔɔl lissinɛ ka ammɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔyanganɛ lakke za lɛbaang lɛttɛ, “Uwɔng ulenɛ waan a luppyam anaam, ɔsaapnɛ gaang gaang.”
61001018	Ayyɔɔt biini ippyee lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng baang ka lissinɛ ka libat liffu ka ɛkɛtɛ ya idɔkɔnɛ la ammɛ ka libat a lɛttaal a budoddo.
61001019	Ɔbbalyɛlɛ ssik lɛnaang ka bɔtɔɔm bwa bappyee-kutolo-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm babwɔɔlɔnɛ. Kɔyyɛɛp mung ka ale agɔpɔlɔyɔngkwɛ doddo. Kɔ̀táa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ otinika wa uppwolonɛ ka kisul ɔddɔkɔddɔkɔ ussolo. Buppwolo Ubbele-ettuma buppwolo buvvoongwɔyɔng ka ippyam.
61001020	Kwa kɔttanɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, akke attɛyɔng ɔbwɔɔlɔ kɔlɔɔk ɔlɔɔt wa ukkwoongnɛ ubee kɛyɔɔng ɔbwɔɔlɔ kwa bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bakkpɔknɛ ba ule.
61001021	Lɛmmwɔɔl a Bappyee-kutolo ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm za lissinɛ ka lakke ɔlɔɔt ba lile. Balɔɔt ka balɔɔknɛ kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kunnyinɛbɛ lakke.
61002001	Bakkala-lɛlaak ba battɛnɛ abbɛ bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm batuma ka ɛkɛtɛ iyɛddɛ iyɛddɛ ka bɛzzɔkɔ annyɔɔng, kùlé kúlè kɛssanga ssɔn; bakkala-lɛlaak bakopolo-ukopolo vvenɛ batuma ka ɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng. Vvenɛ bakɔɔm kɛbɛpɛ baffu, la lukopolo gwa lusinɛ ka lɔkkwɔɔn lile. Vvenɛ bakala Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔkkalanɛbɛ, basambɛ kɛyɔɔng bassɛɛn ka kɛbɛpɛ sa kitipili.
61002002	Balɔɔt ggbadam vvenɛ bakup itɔk ya ibbɔlnɛ, ka linaang sa banaangnɛ, balɔɔt balɔk vvenɛ balɔɔk bubbi batum lɔkkwɔɔn.
61002003	Ittikkya ’yɔng baang bazzi isak ka ibala ya balɔɔt babalanɛ ka kuwɔnɔk abbɛ. Ɔmmɛbong ka Ɔkaal a kɛkaal ɔbamanɛ, Ɔlɔɔt wa ule ɔbɛpɛbɛ utii kwetkwet.
61002004	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usi bayilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ ba banaangnɛ bubbi lɛbɔngɔlɔ. Ɔsambɛ ɔssɛɛn ka lɔkɔɔn ka ɛfɛɛn a bassɛɛnnɛbɛ ikpɔkɔlɔ bataa baang ka kisul bakat Kɛtɔm-a-kɛkaal.
61002005	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm usi ɛkpansi ya iyɛddɛ iyɛddɛ lɛbɔngɔlɔ. Ɔkɔɔm ɛlɔlɔ uffu ka ɛkpansi balɔɔt ba basinɛ ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lile. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔbɔngɔlɔnɛ ɔdɔkɔ Noah wa ukopolonɛ kwa bbwak la balɔɔt balɔk bannambakkyaat.
61002006	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔbɛpɛ laffɛ Sodom la Gomorrah la lɔkɔɔn. Ɔyɔɔ kwa kule kɔnaang la balɔɔt ba basinɛ ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lile.
61002007	Ɔkkala Lot, ɔlɔɔt wa doddo, wa balɔɔt ba babbyapnɛ basi lafɔɔ litele banaangnɛ kɔlɔɔk kwa kusimɛnɛ lɛsaap.
61002008	Ɔlɔɔt wa doddo ’wɔng baang ɔtaa baang ka bɛzzɔkɔ abbɛ, la kɛtɔm la kɛtɔm ɔyɛn, ɔkɔɔm uppyee bɛfɛɛn bya luppyam gwa doddo lusinɛ lɛggyan.
61002009	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsan lɔsan tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔkkalanɛ balɔɔt ammɛ ka lubum abbɛ, ɔsan tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ulokonɛ balɔɔt ba babbɔlnɛ bɛnaang ka akama tɔttɔt ɔffɔ ka Kɛtɔm-a-kɛkaal.
61002010	Kpongkpong balɔɔt ba bakupnɛ kwa kkwɔɔt abbɛ, banaang bubbi bakpɛn lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Bakkala-lalaak ittikkya ’yɔng baang banaang biggboggbo la kɛkkaam a luppyam, latele ba bayanga ka lakke za libat, lutini ’gwɔng bakpɛnbɛ lɔkpɛn.
61002011	Gɔɔ bayilabɔtɔɔm ba bakkaamnɛ baggbenge-uggbenge batta ittikkya yɔng mung, basibɛ kibbi linnyi, ɔlɔk banaangbɛ bɛfɛɛn izzit ka lusso Uyini.
61002012	Balɔɔt ’bɔng mung basɛlɛ luttina, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ isɛɛn a kɛmat ya bamaatnɛ battɛ ikaa iwwɔɔl izzi. Bakpɛn bɛfɛɛn bya basinɛ lɛsan. Vvenɛ bawwɔɔlbɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ isɛɛn a kɛmat.
61002013	Vvenɛ bapipilibɛ la akama ka baggyannɛ akama. Laggele za abbɛ lale ka banaangnɛ bɛfɛɛn bya kkwɔɔt abbɛ liggyannɛ ka kpelegedee. Bale ka izzit la bɛnnyɔɔka ka batulnɛ kazzi la annyɔɔng, baggele ka babbu lalaak abbɛ.
61002014	Bulɔk ba bappyɛɛk ɔgbaa la bwanavva ba bassɛnɛ kɛzak. Kusapa kɛnaang a bubbi bɛ kɔsaal. Bakɔɔm balɔɔt ba kiyila abbɛ kisinɛbɛ lɛkkaam bamii battɔ ka ɔnnya. Ippyam abbɛ iwɔnɔ-wɔnɔ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔbbaatbongbɛ.
61002015	Bagbatabong ɛtɔk ya zzip bakɔngɔ bamii bassɛɛp ɛtɔk ya Balaam, waan a Bosor, ukupnɛ, wa ikkpoko ya ɔyanganɛ ka kɛnaang a bubbi isaapmɛnɛ.
61002016	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔwɔlɔmɛ ka bubbi ammɛ. Eyim ya esinɛ kɛlɔɔk likkwoong ɛlɔɔk ka lɛmmwɔɔl ɔlɔɔt etunu bizingizingi ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang wa ɔttɛnɛ ammɛ uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
61002017	Balɔɔt ’bɔng mung bale tɛ̀ttɛ̀ issa ya ilenɛ lɛkaan, bale tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ikkpala ya kɛffa sa lɛbaang kɛffanɛyɛ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulokobongbɛ ɛfɛɛn ka kisul sa lɛbaang a lɛbaang.
61002018	Ɔkkyaabɛ la babbu lammwɔɔl, bakɔɔm babbu ibbyap a kkwɔɔt abbɛ bakaa balɔɔt ba babumnɛ kɛmma kɛgbata ka bɛzzɔkɔ balɔɔt ba basinɛ bbwak lɛnaang.
61002019	Banaangbong nsekele battɛ, vvenɛ bakkalabɛ ka bubbi abbɛ, uvve abbɛ biini kang bappyɛɛ bale babili kɛbɛpɛ ka ileme abbɛ. Ɔlɔɔt ule ubili bɔfɛɛn duu bwa buttamɛnɛ lakke.
61002020	Balɔɔt balenɛ lɛtta ka ibbyap ɛkpansi ka kɛsan sa basannɛ Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, ba babbalnɛbɛ lɛkaa bannyi balɔɔt ’bɔng baang vvenɛ bayɛn akama ka lakpeke batta tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bayɛnnɛ ka lutte.
61002021	Kɔdɔkɔ kɔtta lɛyyɛɛp ka basinɛ kwa bbwak lɛsan nakanaka, lutini basannɛ bappyɛɛ bassang basikili basi lɔttama gwa doddo gwa bannyinɛbɛ lɛtɔk.
61002022	Kwa kɔnaangnɛbɛ kɔyɔɔbong kɔttɛ ifɛɛt ya bassanɛ ile ka lɔkkwɔɔn, “Ɛbbwa ɛppyɛlɛ emii ka bɔfɛɛn bwa ɛkkwɔɔknɛ.” “Ɔkkumma wa balemɛnɛ lɛzzaa ɔppyɛlɛ umii umini ka kɛbat ɔlak.”
61003001	Inngwa anaam, ’wɔng mung ulenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl za nbbalwɔnɛyɔng lɛkkpɔk. Ka lammwɔɔl ɔkkpɛlɛ azzɛ laffa, nbumbong nttɛ nzang nssɛɛnwɔyɔng ittina ya bbwak ka ippyam annyɔɔng ka nkkewɔnɛyɔng kwa bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung.
61003002	Nggyan nttɛ akkeyɔng lammwɔɔl za Bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba doddo baggbanɛ lɛlɔɔk bakang mmɛmmɛ, la lɔdda gwa lussinɛ ka Uyini la Ɔkkala-ikkala wa bayilabɔtɔɔm annyɔɔng badɔkɔnɛ bannyiwɔyɔng.
61003003	Ka kɛkɔɔm ɛtɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ, vvenɛ asan attɛyɔng balɔɔt balɔk ba lafal abbɛ lale lakup kuwɔnɔk abbɛ vvenɛ batta ka vveeng ka kɛtɔm-a-lakpeke. Vvenɛ bakpɛnwɔyɔng
61003004	battɛ, “Usekele ɔttɛ vvenɛ uffu, ning usi lisekele ɔɔ? Ngkka ule yang? Idedde ayyɔɔt baggba libbe bakang, ɔzzànga bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bitii kɛssanga ssɔn, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ussinɛ ɔnaang ɛkpansi!”
61003005	Bakongo lukongo bafim lɔkkwɔɔn gwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggbanɛ lɛlɔɔk, ɔzzànga ɔnaang libat la ɛkpansi. Ɛkpansi ɔdɔkɔ ɔlɔɔmyɛ la bannyi, ka bannyi.
61003006	Kɔdɔkɔ ka bannyi ɔgbaa, bannyi ɛlɔlɔ, ba babɛpɛnɛ ɛkpansi ya iyɛddɛ iyɛddɛ.
61003007	Ɔzzànga libat la ɛkpansi ya elenɛ lulenɛ gedegede mung, lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛkɔɔmnɛ ka kɛbɛpɛyɛ la lɔkɔɔn. Basambongbɛ baloko ka kɛtɔm sa bale bakaal kɛkaal a balɔɔt ba basinɛ ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lile. Basambɛ bawwɔɔl.
61003008	Inngwa luppyam anaam, tɛ̀ttɛ́ asumalayɔng bɔfɛɛn bwɔng mung bbwɔn! kwa kulenɛ zzekep ba kule ka lusso Uyini ka kɛtɔm ssɔn gɔɔ ka innɔ likkpa. Innɔ likkpa ulemɛ kɛtɔm ssɔn. Ka ammɛ bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung bɛffa bile kɛssanga ssɔn.
61003009	Uyini bɛtɛbɛtɛ ba ɔnaang ka kwa ulenɛ lisekele ɔttɛ vvenɛ ɔnaang, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt balɔk battinanɛ. Lutini ’gwɔng ɔyanga kibbe-luppyam la annyɔɔng ka usinɛ lɛggyan ɔttɛ ɔbɛpɛ ɔlɔɔt vvɔn gbɔɔ ɔggyan ɔttɛ bakkyaa bubbi abbɛ bafɔngɔ.
61003010	Kɛtɔm Uyini kile kiffu tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ussip. Kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang libat likkyaap la lɔsap gwa lɛbaang, bɛfɛɛn bya bilenɛ ka libat vvenɛ bɛkkɔm bɛbɛpɛ. Ɛkpansi la bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya bilenɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ annyɛ vvenɛ bɛkkyaap.
61003011	Bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung bilenɛ ka bɛbɛpɛnɛ ning mung, annyɔɔng ale aleyɔng bɔka kɛssanga balɔɔt? Lafal annyɔɔng lale za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, asamwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng annyiyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔgbaa.
61003012	Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ataanɛyɔng akatyɔng Kɛtɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm abumyɔng likke lɛsaal ɔkkɔɔnɛ kɛkka liffu. Assɛ kilenɛ sa libat lile likkɔm libɛpɛ, bɛfɛɛn bya bilenɛ ka libat vvenɛ bɛyɛtɛ ka kɛfɔɔp.
61003013	Ɔzzànga itaa ikat kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ lisekele. Ufaa libat la ufaa ɛkpansi, ka ɛfɛɛn a lilɔɔk sa bbwak lile lile ka ssala.
61003014	Inngwa anaam, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ataanɛ akatyɔng Kɛtɔm ’sɔng baang, abum ataayɔng kpaladada ka tɔkɔlɔ annyɔɔng ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, asɛlɛyɔng kɔlɔɔk kwa azzinɛyɔng bubbi nkwaaning ataayɔng ka bɔkaat la ammɛ.
61003015	Appyɛɛkyɔng kibbe luppyam Uyini ayyɔɔt tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kufuk kwa ulewɔnɛyɔng linnyi ɔttɛ ayangayɔng ikkala. Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔkpana ayyɔɔt Paul ulewɔnɛyɔng lɛkkpɔk, ka ɔkɔɔmnɛ kɛsana kɔlɔɔk sa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulemɛnɛ linnyi.
61003016	Nkwɔng kulenɛ kwa ɔlɔɔknɛ ka lammwɔɔl ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ, ka ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɔknɛ utum lilɔɔk ’sɔng mung. Bɛfɛɛn bɛlɔk bile baang bya bikoolonɛ ka lammwɔɔl ammɛ. Bɛfɛɛn bɛlɔk bile baang bya balɔɔt ba basinɛbyɛ lɛsan, la balɔɔt ba basinɛ luppyam libbe, basinɛbyɛ bbwak lɛbwɔɔlɔ, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ banaangnɛ ka kufoom kɔlɔk ka luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔzzànga ning baang bakɔɔmbong kɛbɛpɛ sa abbɛ biini bafeebɛ kɛyɔɔng.
61003017	Inngwa anaam, ɔzzànga annyɔɔng aggbayɔng ’kwɔng lɛsan. Akatwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng, nkwaaning balɔɔt ba basinɛ lafɔɔ litele basiwɔyɔng lɛnaang attɔyɔng, vvenɛ agbata assekeyɔng ɛfɛɛn a alenɛyɔng ka kuddu.
61003018	Ɔkkaamwɔyɔng ammalayɔng ka lakke la kɛsan a kɔlɔɔk Uyini ayyɔɔt, Ɔkkala-ikkala ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ. Lakke lataa la ammɛ gedegede mung ka kɛfal a kɛfal, kulening.
62001001	Ikkpɔk kɔlɔɔk a lɛmmwɔɔl a kuddu za lɛggbanɛ lissi ka lutte ifeewɔyɔng: Ippyeebongzɛ, iyɛnbongzɛ ka zzeen ayyɔɔt. Iii, ikɔɔlɔbongzɛ, isingizɛ ka labɔɔk.
62001002	Iyɛn kuddu ’kwɔng ka kɔttanɛ ka vveeng. Ɔzzánga ilɔɔk kɔlɔɔk akkwɛ. Ibwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal kwa kulenɛ la Dedde, ulenɛyɛlɛ lɛnaang isankwɛ.
62001003	Ɔgbaa ibwɔɔlɔwɔyɔngbong bwa iyɛnnɛ ile lippyee nkwaaning atooloyɔng la ayyɔɔt ka kɔssɛ kwa iyanganɛ la Dedde la Awaan, Jesus Christ.
62001004	Ikkpɔk ’kwɔng nkwaaning laggele ayyɔɔt lattala.
62001005	Uwɔng ulenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl za ippyeenɛ ka Waan ammɛ ɔbwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng: Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ buppwolo, kisul ba kile la ammɛ.
62001006	Ittɛnɛ ayyɔɔt ile ka kɔssɛ la ammɛ, ilɔngɔlɔ ibbal ka kisul lɛtaa, nzang ikkalabong lɛlaak ka lɛmmwɔɔl la linaang ɔgbaa.
62001007	Ɔzzànga ayyɔɔt itaanɛ ka buppwolo tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ammɛ ulenɛ ka buppwolo, nzang iyanga bɔkaat la ba ayyɔɔt, linnyi Waan ammɛ, Jesus, linaangbongyɛlɛ itta ka bubbi.
62001008	Ittɛnɛ ayyɔɔt bubbi ba inaang, ibbwa-lɔbbwa, idɛmyɛlɛ kɛyɔɔng, lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk ka ayyɔɔt ba lule.
62001009	Ɔzzànga ibwɔɔlɔnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bubbi ayyɔɔt, vvenɛ ɔnaang kwa ɔttɛnɛ vvenɛ ɔnaang: Vvenɛ ɔsɔɔkyɛlɛ bubbi ayyɔɔt, ɔsangayɛlɛ ka lilɔɔk sa linaangyɛlɛ ibbɔl.
62001010	Ittɛnɛ bubbi ba itaka inaang, nzang ikkwɔɔbong Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkala-lɛlaak. Lɛmmwɔɔl ammɛ ka luppyam yɛlɛ ba lile.
62002001	Bwaan anaam, nkkpɔk ’kwɔng nfeewɔyɔng nkwaaning asiyɔng bubbi lɛnaang. Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔnaangnɛ bubbi, iyanga Jesus Christ wa ulenɛ bbwak, ukkwoong ukkpenge abassɛ unnyiyɛlɛ.
62002002	Christ biini ulenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa kussinɛ ka ammɛ basɔɔkyɛlɛ bubbi ayyɔɔt. Gɔɔ bubbi ayyɔɔt keem lissi, bubbi balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔgbaa.
62002003	Itelenɛ lafɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, nzang isanmɛ mung.
62002004	Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔttɛnɛ ɔsan mung Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, usi lafɔɔ ammɛ litele, kɛssanga ɔlɔɔt ’sɔng baang ɔkkala-lɛlaak, ɔgbaa lɔkkwɔɔn ka ammɛ ba lule.
62002005	Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt duu wa utelenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl ammɛ, Ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ulenɛ wa ɔyanganɛ kɛsaap Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm sa lɔkkwɔɔn. Uwɔng ulenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ isannɛ ittɛ ile ka bɔkaat bwa lɔkkwɔɔn la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
62002006	Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔttɛnɛ ammɛ uddu ɔggyan bɔkaat bwa lɔkkwɔɔn la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Jesus Christ ɔtaanɛ.
62002007	Inngwa anaam ya luppyam, lifɔɔ za nkkpɔkwɔnɛyɔng mung ufaa lissi; lile ɔtɔm a lifɔɔ za aggbanɛ lissi ayangayɔng ka ussinɛ ka lutte. Ɔtɔm a lifɔɔ ulenɛ kuttu kwa aggbanɛyɔng lippyee.
62002008	Ɔzzànga mkkpa kɔnaang, lifɔɔ za nkkpɔkwɔnɛyɔng mung ufaa, lɔkkwɔɔn azzɛ ayɛnyɔng ka Christ la annyɔɔng. Kisul kile ka kɛsaknɛ, buppwolo biini butii ka kippwolo.
62002009	Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔttɛnɛ ammɛ utii ka buppwolo, ɔkpana ammɛ utunmɛ, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang utii ka kisul tɔttɔt ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang.
62002010	Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔttɛnɛ ɔkpana ammɛ ɔsaapmɛ lɔsaap, ule ka buppwolo. Bulɔk mɛ ba bule bwa bule bunaang ɔkpana ammɛ ɔttɔ ka bubbi.
62002011	Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔkpana ammɛ utunmɛnɛ, ule ka kisul. Ɔssɛ ka ɔssɛnɛ baang, ba ɔsan ka ɛfɛɛn umiinɛ ka kisul kilemɛnɛ lɛnaang ussi ifim.
62002012	Bwaan anaam, nkkpɔk nfeewɔyɔng annyɔɔng ka balewɔnɛyɔng bubbi annyɔɔng lɛsɔɔk ka lɛkɔɔl a Jesus Christ.
62002013	Nkkpɔk nfeewɔyɔng annyɔɔng idedde, asanmɛyɔng lɔsan, ammɛ wa ɔggbanɛ lissi ule ka lutte. Nkkpɔk nfeewɔyɔng annyɔɔng bakolobya ka alenɛyɔng Ubbu lɛbɛtɛ.
62002014	Bwaan anaam, nkkpɔk nfeewɔyɔng annyɔɔng, ka asannɛyɔng Dedde. Nkkpɔk nfeewɔyɔng annyɔɔng idedde, ka asannɛyɔng ɔlɔɔt wa ɔggbanɛ lissi ule ka lutte. Nkkpɔk nfeewɔyɔng annyɔɔng bakolobya ka akkaamnɛyɔng. Lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛtaa la annyɔɔng. Abɛtɛyɔngbong Ɔlɔɔt-wa-ɔbbɔlnɛ bɛnaang.
62002015	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ vveeng ’wɔng ɔsaapwɔyɔng, gɔɔ bɔfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bwa bulenɛ ka vveeng ’wɔng, nzang kɛsaap ba ayangayɔng atumyɔng Ssaawɔ annyɔɔng.
62002016	Bɔfɛɛn duu bwa bulenɛ ka vveeng ’wɔng, bwa kkwɔɔt ɔnaang-a-bubbi liggyannɛ, balɔɔt bayɛnnɛ baggyanbwɛ kɛyanga la bɔfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bwa balɔɔt ɔkkyaanɛbɛ kwa abbwɛ. Nbyɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ ka Dedde ba bissi, ɔkkpɛlɛ abbyɛ bissi ka ɛkpansi.
62002017	Vveeng la bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya bɛsaapnɛ balɔɔt vvenɛ bɛsak. Ɔzzanga ɔlɔɔt wa ɔnaangnɛ bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔggyannɛ, ule ɔtaa ka kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal.
62002018	Bwaan anaam, lakpeke lakkɛtɛbong. Babwɔɔlɔwɔyɔngbong battɛ Ɔlɔɔt-a-kɔfɔk a Christ vvenɛ uffu, gedegede mung balɔɔt-a-kɔfɔk a Christ ggbadam batumabong, kwakkwɛ baang isannɛ ittɛ lakpeke lakkɛtɛbong.
62002019	Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ka likup ayyɔɔt ba bale ka lɔkkwɔɔn, kwakkwɛ baang bagbatanɛ bakɔngɔyɛlɛ. Balenɛ ka balenɛ ka likup ayyɔɔt, nzang bataa la ayyɔɔt. Ɔzzànga bagbata nkwaaning kɔnaang ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ppwool isan ittɛ ka lɔkkwɔɔn ka likup ayyɔɔt ba bale.
62002020	Ɔzzànga ayangayɔngbong Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kwa Christ unnyiwɔnɛyɔng, ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng asanyɔng mung lɔkkwɔɔn.
62002021	Ɔzzànga ba nkkpɔk nfeewɔyɔng ka asinɛyɔng lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk lɛsan, nkkpɔk nfeewɔyɔng ka asannɛyɔng lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk. Asanyɔng lɔsan attɛyɔng lɛlaak ka lɔkkwɔɔn ba lissi.
62002022	Nggka nnyinɛ ulenɛ ɔkkala-lɛlaak? Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔttɛnɛ Jesus lissi ulenɛ Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ. Kɛssanga ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang kilenɛ ɔlɔɔt-a-kɔfɔk a Christ, ufim Abassɛ la Waan ammɛ.
62002023	Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ufimnɛ Awaan, ɔssɛbong ufim Abassɛ ɔgbaa. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa uyilanɛ kwa Awaan-Ɔssɛbong uyila kwa Abassɛ ɔgbaa.
62002024	Asan ka lɔkkwɔɔn attɛ alokobong bɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka luppyam annɔ bwa appyeenɛ ka ussinɛ ka lutte. Alokonɛ kwa appyeenɛ ka ussinɛ ka lutte, vvenɛ ataa ka bɔkaat la Abassɛ la Awaan ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
62002025	Ɔzzànga Christ biini usekelebong ɔttɛ vvenɛ unnyiyɛlɛ kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal.
62002026	Nkkpɔkwɔyɔng ’kwɔng ntum kwa balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba babumwɔnɛyɔng kɛfɛɛt.
62002027	Kwa annyɔɔng mung, Christ ɔtɔɔmbong Kuyeeng ammɛ ufeewɔyɔng. Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Kuyeeng kule kɔtaa la annyɔɔng, ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ba ɔbɛlɛ lɛggyan ɔttɛ uffu ukupolowɔyɔng. Kuyeeng ammɛ kukopolowɔyɔngbong kutum bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ. Kwa kukopolonɛ, kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn, lɛlaak lissi. Atele lukopolo Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ataayɔng ka bɔkaat la Christ.
62002028	Iii, bwaan anaam ataayɔng la ammɛ nkwaaning ayangayɔng kɛkkaam a luppyam ka ɛkɛtɛ ya utumanɛ, ifɔngɔ kɛmma iddumu la izzit ka Kɛtɔm sa ule uffu.
62002029	Asanyɔng lɔsan attɛyɔng Christ ule wa bbwak; asan attɛyɔng ɔlɔɔt wa ɔnaangnɛ kwa bbwak, ammɛ Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
62003001	Ayɛnyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ isaapnɛ Dedde. Utelebongyɛlɛ bul ɔsak ɔppyɛɛ ɔkkwɔɔyɛlɛ bwɔɔn ammɛ. Izzangayɔng bwɔɔn ammɛ ka lɔkkwɔɔn, kwakkwɛ vveeng ’wɔng mung usinɛyɛlɛ lɛsan ka usinɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛssɛ ɔsan.
62003002	Inngwa luppyam anaam, gedegede mung itii bwaan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔzzànga ba itaka isan doddo bwa ile ile. Isan lɔsan ittɛ ka Christ ule utuma, vvenɛ ile isseke tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ammɛ ka ile iyɛnmɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ulenɛ.
62003003	Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔyanganɛ luttina ’gwɔng ka Christ, ɔkatmɛ kɛyɔɔng usseke bubbi. Ɔtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Christ ɔtaanɛ ɔsɛlɛ bubbi.
62003004	Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔnaangnɛ bubbi, ɔttɔbong ka kɔlɔɔk, ka ɔbɛpɛnɛ lifɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm; ka bubbi bulenɛ lɛbɛpɛ lifɔɔ.
62003005	Asanyɔng lɔsan attɛyɔng Christ utuma ka vveeng ’wɔng mung nkwaaning ɔsam bubbi ɔssɛbibbit. Ammɛ bubbi mɛ ba bule.
62003006	Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ulenɛ ka bɔkaat la Christ bubbi ba ɔbɛlɛ lɛnaang. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔnaangnɛ bubbi ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ mɛ ba ɔtaka ɔyɛn, ɔlɔk ɔsanmɛ.
62003007	Bwaan anaam, tɛ̀ttɛ́ afɔngɔyɔng ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔfɛɛtwɔyɔng. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔnaangnɛ kwa bbwak, ule wa bbwak, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Christ ulenɛ bbwak.
62003008	Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔnaangnɛ bubbi ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ule wa Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm-a-kuyeeng, ka ɔggbanɛ bubbi lɛnaang ka ussinɛ ka lutte. Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uffu ka ’kwɔng mung. Uffu kɛbɛpɛ kɛnaang a Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm-a-kuyeeng.
62003009	Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ulenɛ waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bubbi ba ɔbɛlɛ lɛnaang, ka lɛfal Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lilenɛ ka ammɛ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ Abassɛ ammɛ, bubbi ba ɔbɛlɛ likkwoong ɔnaang ɛkɛtɛ ɛlɔk.
62003010	Nggyan nttɛ nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng ppwool kwa bwaan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la bwaan a Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm-a-kuyeeng balenɛ buubuu. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa usinɛ kwa bbwak lɛnaang, ɔlɔk ɔkpana ammɛ usimɛ lɛsaap, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lissi.
62003011	Bɔtɔɔm bwa appyeenɛyɔng ka ussinɛ ka lutte ulenɛ kɛttɛ: itele wayyɔɔt tɛ̀ttɛ̀ itelenɛyɛlɛ kɛyɔɔng.
62003012	Baala ile tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Cain, wa ussinɛ ka kikkwu Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm-a-kuyeeng, ka ɔwwɔɔlnɛ etele ammɛ, Abel. Nbɔng tɛ́ttɛ́ Cain ɔwwɔɔl etele ammɛ Abel? Ka bɛfɛɛn bya Cain ɔnaangnɛ bisinɛ bbwak lile, bya Abel ɔnaangnɛ bile bbwak.
62003013	Ikpana anaam, tɛ̀ttɛ́ kɔkɛɛlɛwɔyɔng, atunnɛyɔng balɔɔt a vveeng ’wɔng.
62003014	Isan lɔsan ittɛ igbatabong ikɔngɔ lubbe, iffu ka tɔkɔlɔ kuddu. Isan kwa ikpana ayyɔɔt isaapnɛyɛlɛ; ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔsɛlɛnɛ kɛsaap utii ka lubbe.
62003015	Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔkpana ammɛ utunmɛnɛ, ammɛ ulenɛ ɔwwɔɔl-a-balɔɔt. Asanyɔng lɔsan attɛyɔng ɔwwɔɔl-a-balɔɔt kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal kwa ammɛ ba kule.
62003016	Nkwɔng kulenɛ kwa isannɛ bwa kɛsaap kilenɛ. Christ ɔsam kuddu ammɛ unnyiyɛlɛ. Ayyɔɔt ɔgbaa issɛ isam kuddu ayyɔɔt innyi ikpana ayyɔɔt.
62003017	Ulenɛ ka ɔyanga-bɔfɛɛn ɔyɛnnɛ ɔkpana ammɛ ka ulenɛ ka kɛggyan a bɔfɛɛn, ɔkkaamnɛ luppyam ufim ɔkpana ammɛ bɔfɛɛn bwa ɔggyannɛ kinnyi, ule ɔnaang nang ɔttɛ ammɛ unnyi mung Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm latele?
62003018	Bwaan anaam, kɛsaap ayyɔɔt kɛfɔngɔ kile tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lammwɔɔl za ilɔɔknɛ ka kamma, kɛtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ sa lɔkkwɔɔn, sa kɛyɔɔnɛsɛ kɛyɔɔng ka linaang.
62003019	Nkwɔng kulenɛ kwa ile isan ittɛ ayyɔɔt ile ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa lɔkkwɔɔn. Nkwɔng kulenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ippyam ayyɔɔt ile iyanga kɛkkaam a luppyam ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
62003020	Ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn ippyam ibɛpɛnɛyɔngyɛlɛ isanbong ittɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttanɛ ippyam ayyɔɔt liggbenge; ɔsan bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ.
62003021	Inngwa anaam, ulenɛ bɔfɛɛn ippyam ayyɔɔt isinɛyɛlɛ lɛbɛpɛ, iyanga kɛkkaam a luppyam ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
62003022	Bɔfɛɛn duu bwa ibapnɛ ka ammɛ vvenɛ itɔkbwɛ ka itelenɛ lafɔɔ ammɛ, inaang kwa kɔsaapmɛnɛ.
62003023	Nkwɔng kulenɛ kwa ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔttɛ, iyanga kiyila ka lɛkɔɔl a Waan ammɛ, Jesus Christ. Wayyɔɔt ɔsaapyɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Christ ɔbwɔɔlɔnɛyɛlɛ.
62003024	Ɔlɔɔt duu wa utelenɛ lafɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ule wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔssɛ ule wa ammɛ. Nkwɔng kulenɛ kwa isannɛ ittɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ullu ka tɔkɔlɔ ayyɔɔt ka ulenɛyɛlɛ Kuyeeng ammɛ linnyi.
62004001	Inngwa luppyam anaam, Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ayila akupyɔng balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba battɛnɛ bayanga mung Kuyeeng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔzzànga allɛbɛ ɔkkɔɔnɛ ulenɛ ka kuyeeng kwa bayanganɛ kussinɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, asan. Bakkala-lalaak, ba battɛnɛ abbɛ bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ggbadam batii ifɛɛn ifɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ.
62004002	Uwɔng ulenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ale asan Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔttɛnɛ Jesus Christ ɔdɔkɔ uffu tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt ɔyanga Kuyeeng kwa kussinɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kuffu.
62004003	Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔkalanɛ ’kwɔng utum Jesus, Kuyeeng kwa kussinɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba ɔyanga. Kuyeeng ’kwɔng baang kussi ka Ɔlɔɔt-a-kɔfɔk a Christ. Appyeebong attɛyɔng vvenɛ kuffu, gɔɔ gedegede mung kutii ka vveengodde.
62004004	Ɔzzànga, bwaan anaam, aleyɔng ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Abɛtɛyɔngbong bakkala-lɛlaak ba battɛnɛ abbɛ bappyee kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ka Kuyeeng kwa kulenɛ ka annyɔɔng kɔttanɛ liggbenge kɔtta kuyeeng kwa balɔɔt ba balenɛ ka vveengodde.
62004005	Litolo abbɛ litum lilɔɔk a vveengodde, vveengodde ɔgɔpɔlɔsɛ ka lilenɛ lilɔɔk sa ammɛ.
62004006	Ɔzzànga ayyɔɔt ile ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔsannɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔgɔpɔlɔ kwa ayyɔɔt. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa usinɛ wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lile kwa ayyɔɔt ba ɔgɔpɔlɔ. Ɔzzànga ’wɔng ulenɛ ɛtɔk ya ikkwoongnɛ ibwɔɔlɔ bubuubuu Kuyeeng kwa lɔkkwɔɔn la kuyeeng kwa kusinɛ kwa lɔkkwɔɔn lile.
62004007	Inngwa anaam, isaapyɛlɛ kɛyɔɔng, ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔfɔngɔwɔyɔng kitun ka kɛsaap kissinɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔyanganɛ kɛsaap la balɔɔt ule Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ɔsan Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
62004008	Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔsɛlɛnɛ kɛsaap, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm baala ɔsan ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ kɛsaap.
62004009	Nkwɔng kulenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyɔɔnɛyɛlɛ kɛsaap ammɛ. Ɔtɔɔm waan ammɛ wa ɔyanganɛ keem, uffu ka vveeng ’wɔng nkwaaning iyanga kuddu kwa kussinɛ ka ammɛ.
62004010	Kɛsaap kile ning mung; Kɛttɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsaap mung yɛlɛ lissi. Ɔzzànga ayyɔɔt isaapnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔtɔɔm waan ammɛ uffu nkwaaning ule ɛtɔk a kɛsɔɔk a bubbi ayyɔɔt.
62004011	Inngwa anaam, ulenɛ ka isaapnɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ning mung, nzang wayyɔɔt ɔ́saapyɛlɛ.
62004012	Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk wa ulenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka zzeen lɛyɛn ba ule. Ulenɛ ka wayyɔɔt ɔsaapnɛyɛlɛ nzang Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtaa ka bɔkaat la ayyɔɔt. Ɔnaang kɛsaap ammɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ ayyɔɔt kile sa doddo ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
62004013	Nkwɔng kulenɛ kwa kɔnaangnɛ isan ka lɔkkwɔɔn ittɛ ile ka bɔkaat la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ammɛ ɔssɛ ule ka bɔkaat la ayyɔɔt ka ulenɛyɛlɛ Kuyeeng ammɛ linnyi.
62004014	Ɔzzànga iyɛnbong isan, ibwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt balɔk ittɛ Abassɛ ɔtɔɔmnɛ Waan ammɛ ɔttɛ uffu ɔzzánga Ɔkkala-ikkala vveeng ’wɔng.
62004015	Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔbwɔɔlɔnɛ ppwool ɔttɛ Jesus ulenɛ Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule la ammɛ, ammɛ ɔssɛ ule la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
62004016	Ayyɔɔt biini isan, iyila kwa kɛsaap sa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyanganɛ la ayyɔɔt. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ kɛsaap, ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔtaanɛ ka kɛsaap, ɔtaa ka bɔkaat la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔssɛ ɔtaa ka bɔkaat la ammɛ.
62004017	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔnaang kɛsaap kigbengeyɛlɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ ɔkkɔɔnɛ iyanga kɛkkaam a luppyam ka kɛtɔm-a-kɛkaal. Ɔzzànga vvenɛ iyangasɛ ka kuddu ayyɔɔt ka vveeng ’wɔng kulenɛ kɛssanga ssɔn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kwa Christ.
62004018	Bbwɔp ka kɛsaap ba lile. Kɛsaap sa lɔkkwɔɔn kɛggba lilɔɔk a bbwɔp ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ɔzzànga ka kulenɛ ning mung, kɛsaap sa doddo ba kile ka luppyam ɔbbwɔp ka bbwɔp lissɛnɛ ka kɛyɛn akama.
62004019	Iyanga kɛsaap, ka ayyɔɔt ittenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛsaap.
62004020	Ulenɛ ka ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔttɛ, “Ntele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm”, wabbɛ utunmɛ, ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang ɔkkala-lɛlaak. Ba ukkwoong utele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔtakamɛnɛ lɛyɛn ka zzeen ka usinɛ wabbɛ wa ulemɛnɛ ka zzeen lɛyɛn litele.
62004021	Uwɔng ulenɛ lafɔɔ za Christ unnyinɛyɛlɛ. Ɔlɔɔt wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsaapmɛnɛ wabbɛ ɔssɛ ɔsaapmɛ ɔgbaa.
62005001	Ɔlɔɔt duu wa uyilanɛ ɔttɛ Jesus ulenɛ Ɔlɔɔt-wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanganɛ, ulenɛ waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa utelenɛ abassɛ ɔlɔɔt, ɔssɛbong utele awaan ɔgbaa.
62005002	Nkwɔng kɔnaangnɛ isan ittɛ bwaan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm basaapyɛlɛ lɔsaap; Kule ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule ɔsaapyɛlɛ, itele lafɔɔ ammɛ.
62005003	Ifɛɛt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsaapnɛyɛlɛ ilenɛ ka ile itele lafɔɔ ammɛ. Lafɔɔ ammɛ gaang yɛlɛ ba lakoolo.
62005004	Waan ɔkkpɛlɛ wa ulenɛ wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ukkwoong lukkwoong ɔbɛtɛ vveengodde. Uwɔng ulenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ inaangnɛ ikkwoong ibɛtɛ vveeng ’wɔng mung ka kiyila ayyɔɔt.
62005005	Nyinɔɔng ukkwoongnɛ ɔbɛtɛ vveeng ’wɔng? Ɔlɔɔt wa uyilanɛ ɔttɛ Jesus ulenɛ Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm keem kɛyɔɔng ukkwoongnɛ.
62005006	Jesus Christ uffu la bannyi baptizim ammɛ la linnyi lubbe ammɛ. Bannyi ’bɔng baang keem lissi ka ɔkɔɔmnɛ uffu, ɔkɔɔm bannyi la linnyi uffu. Kuyeeng biini kɔbwɔɔlɔ kɔttɛ kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn, ka Kuyeeng kulenɛ lɔkkwɔɔn.
62005007	Ittɛɛsɛ ile ikkyaat.
62005008	Kuyeeng la bannyi la linnyi. Ɔkkpɛlɛ abbyɛ bɛlɔɔk kɛssanga ssɔn.
62005009	Iyilanɛ kwa ittɛɛsɛ ya ɔssɛbibit ubeenɛ, ɔzzànga ittɛɛsɛ ya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyinyɛlɛ ittanɛ lɛkkaam. Ittɛɛsɛ ’yɔng ilenɛ ya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyinɛ utum Awaan.
62005010	Ɔlɔɔt duu wa uyilanɛ kwa Awaan ɔyanga ittɛɛsɛ ’yɔng baang ka luppyam ammɛ biini. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa usinɛ liyila kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔkkwɔɔbong Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkala-lɛlaak ka ufimnɛ kiyila kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔknɛ utum Waan ammɛ.
62005011	Ɔzzànga ’kwɔng kulenɛ ittɛɛsɛ: Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyibongyɛlɛ kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal. Kuddu ’kwɔng kussi ka Awaan.
62005012	Ɔlɔɔt duu wa balenɛ ka bɔkaat la Awaan, ɔyanga kuddu ’kwɔng baang. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa usinɛ ka bɔkaat la Waan Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lile, kuddu ba ɔyanga.
62005013	Nkkpɔk ’wɔng nfeewɔyɔng nkwaaning asan attɛyɔng ayangayɔng kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal, annyɔɔng ba ayanganɛyɔng kiyila atumyɔng Waan Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
62005014	Iyanga kɛkkaam a luppyam ka isannɛ ittɛ ibapmɛnɛ bɔfɛɛn duu bwa ammɛ uffiknɛ, bule bbwak, vvenɛ ɔgɔpɔlɔ uppyee.
62005015	Uppyeeyɛlɛ luppyee ɛkɛtɛ duu ya ibapmɛnɛ, ka isannɛ ittɛ ’kwɔng kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn, ɔgbaa isan lɔsan ittɛ unnyi mung yɛlɛ bwa ibapmɛnɛ.
62005016	Ayɛnnɛ ɔkpana annɔ ka ɔnaangnɛ bubbi bwa bule busimɛ lɛwwɔɔl, azɔɔm annyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, wa ule unnyimɛ kuddu. Nkwɔng mung kule kwa balɔɔt ba bubbi abbɛ bule busi bɛ lɛwwɔɔl. Ɔzzànga bubbi bule baang bwa buwwɔɔlnɛ ɔlɔɔt, ba nlɔɔk nttɛ azɔɔm annyiyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ’kwɔng baang.
62005017	Kɛnaang a lilɔɔk sa libbɔlnɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ bubbi, ɔzzànga bubbi bule baang bwa businɛ ɔlɔɔt lɛwwɔɔl.
62005018	Isan mung ittɛ waan Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm duu wa ɔnaangnɛ bubbi kkpɛt kkpɛt ba ule, ka Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkatmɛnɛ; Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm-a-kuyeeng ba ukkwoong uddopomɛ.
62005019	Isan lɔsan ittɛ ile ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm mkkpa vveeng ɔkkpɛlɛ ule ka kɔkɔɔm Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm-a-kuyeeng.
62005020	Isan lɔsan ittɛ Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uffubong. Unnyiyɛlɛ kippyee kɔlɔɔk nkwaaning isan Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa lɔkkwɔɔn. Itaa ka bɔkaat la Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa lɔkkwɔɔn, itaa ka bɔkaat la Jesus Christ, Waan Ammɛ. Uwɔng ulenɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa lɔkkwɔɔn. Uwɔng ulenɛ kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal.
62005021	Bwaan anaam, akatwɔyɔng kɛyɔɔng assekeyɔng ilat!
63001001	Lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng lissi ka Ɔgɛlɛnya– Nfee waanawanavva luppyam anaam la bwɔɔn ammɛ ba basaapnɛnɛ ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Anaam kɛyɔɔng keem lissi ka asaapnɛnɛ, assɛ asaap balɔɔt balɔk ba basannɛ lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk.
63001002	Lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk lɔtaa la ayyɔɔt lule gwa ayyɔɔt ka kɛfal a kɛfal.
63001003	Numa Dedde ayyɔɔt, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Abassɛ Jesus, la Jesus Christ biini bannyiwɔyɔng kɛsaap, la kibbelɛttɔ, la bɔkaat! Numa bile bya ayyɔɔt ka lɔkkwɔɔn ka kɛsaap.
63001004	Ndɔkɔ nggele gaang gaang ka nsannɛ nttɛ bwɔɔn annyɔɔng bayanga lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk ka tɔkɔlɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Dedde ɔbwɔɔlɔnɛyɛlɛ.
63001005	Kwakkwɛ nkkpengewɔnɛ waanawanavva luppyam anaam, nttɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt isaapyɛlɛ kɛyɔɔng. Uwɔng mung ufaa lifɔɔ lissi ka ikkpɔknɛ ifeewɔyɔng, ule lifɔɔ za liggbanɛ lissi lile ka lutte.
63001006	Kɛsaap sa nlɔɔknɛ ntum mung ulenɛ kɛtaa ka bɔkaat tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔssɛɛnnɛ lifɔɔ. Lifɔɔ ’zɔng za aggbanɛyɔng lippyee ka lutte lɛttɛnɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ayyɔɔt itaa ka kɛsaap.
