63001007	Bafɛɛt-ifɛtɛ ggbadam baffubong ka vveeng. Abbɛ balenɛ balɔɔt ba basinɛ liyila battɛ Jesus Christ uffu tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt. Kɛssanga ɔlɔɔt wa ning baang ulenɛ ɔfɛɛt-ifɛtɛ, ule ɔlɔɔt-a-kɔfɔk a Christ ɔgbaa.
63001008	Akatwɔ kɛyɔɔng nkwaaning asi bwa ayanganɛ lɛtaka, ɔlɔk atɔk lɛsɔɔk annɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
63001009	Ɔlɔɔt duu wa usinɛ lukopolo a Christ ka luppyam lɛssɛɛn, ɔnaang ɔsak, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka kkwɔɔt mɛ ba ule. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔssɛɛnnɛ lukopolo ’gwɔng baang ka luppyam, ɔyanga Abassɛ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, la Awaan ka kkwɔɔt.
63001010	Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk uffunɛ ka ɛfɛɛn annɔ, usi ’kwɔng likopolo, tɛ̀ttɛ́ atɔkmɛ assɛɛn ka ssala, gɔɔ tɛ̀ttɛ́ attɛ, “Bɔkaat butaa la annɔ.”
63001011	Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔttɛnɛ bɔkaat butaa la ammɛ usseke ɔlɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ka babbu linaang sa ɔnaangnɛ.
63001012	Nyanga bɛfɛɛn ggbadam bya nle nbwɔɔlɔwɔ. Ndɔkɔ nttɛ gɔɔ baala nkkpɔkkwɛ ka ɛbbanga; lutini ’gwɔng nttinawɔ kiffu kɛbwɔɔlɔ ɔlɔk nlɔɔk la annɔ biini, nkwaaning iggele gaang gaang.
63001013	Bwɔɔn a etele annɔ ya luppyam battɛ nwomowɔ.
64001001	Lɛmmwɔɔl ’zɔng lissi ka Ɔgɛlɛnga– Nfee Gaius wa ɔsaapnɛnɛ ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
64001002	Ɛnngwa anaam, Gaius, nzɔɔm nttɛ kɔlɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ kɔfɔngɔwɔ kikoolo, ɔzzànga vvenɛ ataa ka buppwolo a kkwɔɔt tɛ̀ttɛ̀ nsannɛ nttɛ aggba mung la kuyeeng.
64001003	Ndɔkɔ nggele gaang ka ikpana anaam ilɔk baffunɛ babwɔɔlɔnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ayanganɛ kiyila ka lɔkkwɔɔn, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ aggbanɛ lissi ataa ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
64001004	Bulɔk bwa bunaangnɛnɛ nggele gaang ba bule ɔgbaa la kwa nppyeenɛ nttɛ bwaan anaam bale ka lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk.
64001005	Ɛnngwa anaam ya luppyam, àyàngà kiyila gaang gaang ka kɛnaang sa anaangnɛ annyi ikpana annɔ, ɔgbaa la ɛkɛtɛ ya batiinɛ bakekeen.
64001006	Balɔɔkbong kɔlɔɔk a kɛsaap annɔ babwɔɔlɔ luzɔɔm. Ellee, attelebɛ ka kɔssɛ abbɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kule kɔsaap Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
64001007	Ka bafeelenɛ kɔssɛ abbɛ bamii kɛnaang a Christ, basi lɛggyan battɛ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsɛlɛnɛ kiyila uttelebɛ.
64001008	Ayyɔɔt balɔɔt a luzɔɔm ittele balɔɔt ’bɔng mung nkwaaning itul lɔkkwɔɔn a kɛnaang abbɛ iyanga.
64001009	Nkkpɔk waan a lɛmmwɔɔl bbwɛt ning nfee luzɔɔm, ɔzzànga Diotrephes, wa ɔggyannɛ ɔttɛ ule ɔkɔɔm-ɛtɔk abbɛ, baala ɔgɔpɔlɔ kwa nlɔɔknɛ.
64001010	Ɛkɛtɛ ya nle nffu, vvenɛ nssɛɛl bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya ulenɛ lɛnaang. Babbu lilɔɔk sa ɔlɔɔknɛ utumyɛlɛ, la lalaak za ɔkkalanɛ utumyɛlɛ. Ɔzzànga ’kwɔng baang keem ba kɔtaka kɔyyɛɛpmɛ, baala ɔtɔk ikpana ammɛ ka laggele ka ɛkɛtɛ ya bale baffu, gɔɔ vvenɛ utunu balɔɔt ba battɛnɛ nzang batɔkbɛ. Gɔɔ ɔggyanbɛ kɛggba batta basseke ggwoon a luzɔɔm.
64001011	Ɛnngwa anaam ya luppyam, tɛ̀ttɛ́ akeet kɔlɔɔk kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ, ɔzzànga akeet kwa kɔyyɛɛpnɛ. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔnaangnɛ kwa kɔyyɛɛpnɛ nzang ammɛ wa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔnaangnɛ kwa kɔbbɔlnɛ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba ɔtaka ɔyɛn.
64001012	Ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔlɔɔk budoddo utum Demetrius, lɔkkwɔɔn biini lɔlɔɔk kɔlɔɔk a budoddo lutummɛ. Ayyɔɔt ɔgbaa, igbaa buttɛɛsɛ ayyɔɔt, ɔsan ɔttɛ kwa ilɔɔknɛ kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
64001013	Nyanga lilɔɔk ggbadam sa bubwɔɔlɔwɔnɛ, ɔzzànga ba nggyan nttɛ nkkpɔk ka luvva nbwɔɔlɔwɔ.
64001014	Nggyanwɔ kɛyɛn ssuma ssuma mung nkwaaning ilɔɔk ka isso ka isso.
64001015	Bɔkaat butaa la annɔ. Inngwa annɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ bawomowɔbong. Akɔɔm kamma annɔ awomo inngwa ayyɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ.
65001001	Lissi ka Jude, bɔɔyi a Jesus Christ, etele a James– Ɔtɔɔm ufee balɔɔt ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛbɛ lɛkkwɔɔ, bataa ka kɛsaap a Dedde, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, la ikata Jesus Christ.
65001002	Ayangayɔng kibbelɛttɔ la bɔkaat, la kɛsaap uggboggbo.
65001003	Inngwa anaam ka luppyam, ndɔkɔ nbum nttɛ nkkpɔk ntum kɔlɔɔk a kuddu kwa itulnɛ itɔkyɔng gedegede mung. Mung nkkpɔk nbbawɔyɔng bikɔɔm nttɛ abum ayangayɔng kiyila sa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ balɔɔt ammɛ linnyi ukpeke.
65001004	Balɔɔt balɔk ba basinɛ kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm liyila bamalbongyɛlɛ ka bɛzzɔkɔ ba isan. Abbɛ bassangnɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ayyɔɔt basikili ɔlɔk lɛtaa bbwak la babbu linaang abbɛ. Bafimbong Jesus Christ, Dedde ayyɔɔt la Uyini ayyɔɔt, ka isimi ka isimi. Luvva Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔlɔɔkbong lutum lubbe gwa balenɛ lɛtɔk.
65001005	Mkkpandɔk aleyɔng ’byɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ lɛsan, nggyan nttɛ nkkewɔyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Uyini ɔkkalanɛ balɔɔt a Israel ka ɛkpansi Egypt ɔppyɛɛ ɔwwɔɔl balɔɔt ba basɛlɛnɛ kiyila.
65001006	Akkeyɔng bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba basinɛ lakke za bannyinɛbɛ lɛkɔɔm bakpeke ka ɛfɛɛn a battɛnɛ bakpeke, bappyɛɛ bamma basseke ssala abbɛ. Bassɛɛnbongbɛ ikpɔkɔlɔ ya kɛfal a kɛfal ka kisul kuttɔɔk, ka ɛfɛɛn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulokonɛbɛ ɔkat Kɛtɔm-a-lakpeke za ule ɔwwɔɔlbɛ.
65001007	Akkeyɔng Sodom la Gomorrah, la laffɛ za lakkɛtɛnɛbɛ. Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang badɔkɔ banaang kɛbɛpɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ’bɔng baang. Bakup bwanavva balɔɔt, banaang bɛfɛɛn a lakkpi, vvenɛ bayɛn akama ka lɔkɔɔn gwa kɛfal a kɛfal tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɔttama wa ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ.
65001008	Kɔssɛ kule kɛssanga ssɔn. Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba bayɛnnɛ buyɛnɛ bwa budɛmnɛbɛ banaang bubbi batum kkwɔɔt abbɛ. Bafim lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, bassɛɛn balɔɔt a latele ba libat ka izzit.
65001009	Gɔɔ Michael, ubeet a bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ’kwɔng usi lɛnaang ka ɛkɛtɛ kɔwɔlɔ abbɛ la Ubbu-kuyeeng ka ɛkɛtɛ batutalanɛ kkwɔɔt a Moses. Michael usi Ubbu-kuyeeng lɛkpɛn la lammwɔɔl za labbɔlnɛ. Ɔdɔkɔ ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Uyini ɔnaangwɔ mkpatamkpat.”
65001010	Ɔzzànga balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bakpɛn bɛfɛɛn bya basinɛ lɛsan, la bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng baang bya bɛnaangwɔnɛ ka luppyam tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɛsɛɛn a kɛmat. Abbyɛ bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng baang bɛwwɔɔlnɛbɛ.
65001011	Vvenɛ kɔbbɔl kɔsak la balɔɔt ba bakupnɛ ɛtɔk ya Cain ɔssɛnɛ. Basambongbɛ kɛyɔɔng bannyi kɛsɛpɛ sa Balaam ɔsɛpɛnɛ bakup kusapa ikkpoko. Bafimbong lakke ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Korah ufimnɛ. Mung bawwɔɔlbongbɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ammɛ.
65001012	Bale tɛ̀ttɛ̀ labil za lalenɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ kazzi kɛkaan; izzit ba basan. Bassɛ gbɔɔgbɔɔgbɔɔ bavva batak babimi, bazzi lizzi. Kɔbɛtɛbɛ kwa abbɛ biini kɛyɔɔng. Bale tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ikkpálá ya isɛlɛnɛ bannyi ka kɛffa kɛffanɛyɛ. Bale tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɛssɛ bya bisinɛ lakkpɔ lɛwɔm ka ɛkɛtɛ ya buwɔmnɛ. Bale tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɛssɛ bya balenɛbyɛ lɛmmɔk. Babbebong ɔkkpɛlɛ.
65001013	Bataa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ labba bannyi ka lihu. Bɛfɛɛn izzit bya banaangnɛ bɛfɔl bɛ̀tɔ̀kɔ̀ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ iffuku. Bataa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bwaan-ittuma ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛbɛ ɛfɛɛn liloko ka kisul sa lɛbaang a lɛbaang basseke ka bassɛnɛ gbɔɔ bakkpit.
65001014	Ɔdɔkɔ Enoch wa ɔnaangnɛ ka balɔɔt bwɔlaaning ba bassinɛ ka kikkwu Adam bbwak, ka ɔyɛnnɛ biyɛnɛ utumbɛ ka isimi ka isimi ɔttɛ, “Ppyɛɛk, Uyini vvenɛ uffu la innɔ innɔ bayilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ ba doddo.
65001015	Vvenɛ uffu ɔkaal kɛkaal ɔlɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔwwɔɔl balɔɔt ba banaangnɛ bubbi basi ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lile ka babbu linaang sa banaangnɛ, la babbu lammwɔɔl za balɔɔknɛ batum Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm!”
65001016	Ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ balɔɔt ’bɔng mung batutala lututala bakɔɔm bannyi babbɛ kibbi bakup kuwɔnɔk abbɛ biini. Banaang kamma abbɛ biini. Bakɔɔm kɛyyɛɛp a kamma baggyan ɛtɔk a budoddo ya abbɛ.
65001017	Akkeyɔng tɛ, inngwa anaam. Akkeyɔng kwa bayilabɔtɔɔm Uyini ayyɔɔt, Jesus Christ, babwɔɔlɔwɔnɛyɔng tɛ!
65001018	Babwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng battɛ, “Ɔffɔnɛ ka bɛtɔm a lakpeke, balɔɔt vvenɛ baffu ba bakkalanɛ lalaak la annyɔɔng. Mbɔng baang bakkɔlɔnɛ bɛfɛɛn bya bisinɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛsaap.”
65001019	Abbɛ balenɛ balɔɔt ba bazzɔɔknɛ nyakala ka kɔlɔɔk, bakup kuwɔnɔk abbɛ biini. Abbɛ balenɛ ba basɛlɛnɛ Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
65001020	Ɔzzànga annyɔɔng inngwa anaam, akɔɔmyɔng ning baang, ka kiyila annyɔɔng sa lɔkkwɔɔn. Azɔɔmyɔng ka lakke Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
65001021	Ataayɔng ka kɛsaap Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ka alenɛyɔng ka kɛkat a Jesus wa ule unnyiwɔyɔng kuddu kwa kɛfal a kɛfal ka kibbe lɛttɔ sa abbemɛnɛyɔng.
65001022	Balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ ikangala ka luppyam babbewɔyɔng lɛttɔ.
65001023	Akkalayɔngbɛ, asangayɔngbɛ ka lɔkɔɔn. Babbewɔyɔng lɛttɔ ɔgbaa. Ɔzzànga babwɔpɔwɔyɔng kinnyi kibbi, ka linaang abbɛ lilenɛ lɛbbɔl ka kusapa bubbi abbɛ.
65001024	Abungumɛyɔng ammɛ wa ukkwoongnɛ ɔnaangwɔyɔng asiyɔng lɛttɔ. Ukkwoong utunu babbu lilɔɔk ka kkwɔɔt annyɔɔng, ataayɔng ka laggele ka lusso ammɛ.
65001025	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Ɔkkala-ikkala, ayyɔɔt keem. Latele la Mgbeede la kizzi lɛttɔ ka ussinɛ ka bɛkkpa bya isimi la bya gedegede mung, bɛssɛ ka Christ, Uyini ayyɔɔt bɛffɔmɛ kɛfal a kɛfal. Kulening.
66001001	Luvva ’gwɔng mung lutum kɔlɔɔk kwa Jesus Christ ɔyɔɔnɛ, kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyimɛnɛ ɔttɛ ɔyɔɔ ibɔɔyi ammɛ kwa kule kɔnaang gedegede mung. Christ ɔtɔɔm uyilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ umii ɔnaang bɔɔyi ammɛ, John, ɔyɛn lilɔɔk ’sɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ.
66001002	John ɔbwɔɔlɔ bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ bya ulenɛ lɛyɛn. Uwɔng ulenɛ ibwɔɔlɔ bɔtɔɔm bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔtɔɔmnɛ la lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk kwa Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔnɛ.
66001003	Laggele lale za balɔɔt ba bakkwɔɔnɛ luvva ’gwɔng. Laggele lale za balɔɔt ba bagɔpɔlɔnɛ lammwɔɔl a bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, batele bwa bakkpɔknɛ ka luvva ’gwɔng. Ɛkɛtɛ ɛkkɛtɛbong ya bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ bile bɛnaang.
66001004	Kussi ka John ufee izɔɔm ya innaammikkyaat ya ilenɛ ka ɛkpansi Asia. Ppyɛɛ la bɔkaat bwa bussinɛ ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm butaa la annyɔɔng. Ammɛ wa ulenɛ gedegede mung, ɔdɔkɔ, wa ule uffu la liyeeng linnangikkyaat ka lusso ugbaal a kibeet ammɛ.
66001005	Ɔbɛtɛ la ppyɛɛ wa ussinɛ ka Jesus Christ, ttɛɛsɛ ammɛ wa doddo. Waan ikeeng wa ufungalanɛ ka lubbe ule uzzilɛttɔ babeet ɛkpansi. Isaapmɛ gaang gaang. Ɔsangayɛlɛ ka bubbi ka lubbe gwa ubbenɛ.
66001006	Ɔnaangyɛlɛ itutum a bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm ɔttɛ itele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ammɛ la Abassɛ ammɛ. Latele la lakke lale za Jesus Christ kɛfal a kɛfal. Kulening.
66001007	Ppyɛɛkmɛ ka ule ka uffunɛ la ikkpálá. Ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn vvenɛ ɔyɛnmɛ, ngbaa la balɔɔt ba bakɔmmɛnɛ kɛfɔl. Balɔɔt ɛkpansi ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ bataamɛ kullu. Kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Kulening.
66001008	“Anaam nlenɛ Alpha nle Omega.” Uyini ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔyanganɛ lakke ka lɔkkwɔɔn ɔlɔɔknɛ. Ammɛ wa ulenɛ gedegede mung wa ɔdɔkɔnɛ ule, la wa ule ka uffunɛ.
66001009	Anaam nlenɛ John, ɔkpana annyɔɔng wa nlenɛ la Jesus ka kɛyɛn akama, la ka Itutum ammɛ ka kɛbbɔ akama. Badɔkɔ balokonɛ ka likkpɔ ɛkpansi za lɛzzanganɛ Patmos ka tɔkɔlɔ ɛkpansi ya bannyi bakkpitnɛyɛ, ka nbwɔɔlɔnɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk gwa Jesus ɔyɔɔnɛ.
66001010	Ka Kɛtɔm-Uyini, Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔtɔknɛ kɔyanga. Nppyee lɛmmwɔɔl ka lɛttanɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luffi, lɛlɔɔk likupnɛ ka isimi.
66001011	Lɛttɛ, “Akkpɔk bwa ayɛnnɛ, atɔɔm luvva ’gwɔng baang afee izɔɔm ’yɔng mung innammikkyaat: Ephesus, Smyrna, Pergamum, Thyatira, Sardis, Philadelphia, la Laodicea.
66001012	Nssang nsikili nttɛ nyɛn ɔlɔɔt wa utolonɛ unnyinɛ. Nppyɛɛknɛ nyɛn ikkandul innammikkyaat ya gold baang ka ibeenɛ.
66001013	Bɔfɛɛn bubee ka bɛzzɔkɔ annyɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt la uwɔkɔlɔ ka buwɔkɔlɔnɛ ɔffɔbwɛ ka bukkpɔ, la ɛkkpa ya banaangnɛyɛ la gold ka buggbɔnɛ ka ukwukwulu.
66001014	Kittulu abbwɛ kɛllaat tɛ̀ttɛ̀ uwuu. Zzeen abbwɛ lɛnyanga tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɔkɔɔn.
66001015	Bukkpɔ abbwɛ bukoot tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lukkpi ka tɔkɔlɔ lɛkam a lɔkɔɔn. Lɛmmwɔɔl abbwɛ lile tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛttɔl sa lɛbaang.
66001016	Ɔkɔɔm bwaanttuma bannambakkyaat ka kɔbɔɔk ɛlaabɔɔk, ogge lafoom laffa ɔttabwɛ ka kamma. Lusso abbwɛ luwongolo tɛ̀ttɛ̀ livve luwee lɛnyanyanɛ ka kikoon ɔggbɔggba.
66001017	Nyɛnnɛbwɛ, nttɔ ka lataak ammɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ubbu ɔlɔɔt. Utelenɛ kɔbɔɔk ɛlaabɔɔk ammɛ ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔbbwɔpɔwɔ! Anaam nlenɛ lutte la lakpeke.
66001018	Anaam nlemɛnɛ ammɛ wa ulenɛ ka kuddu. Ndɔkɔbong nbbe. Ɔzzanga ppyɛɛk, ntii ka kuddu ka kɛfal a kɛfal. Nyangabong lakke ntta lubbe la ɛkpansi babbu.
66001019	Ɔzzànga akkpɔk bɛfɛɛn bya alenɛ lɛyɛn, bya bilenɛ gedegede mung la bya bile bɛnaang ka lusso.
66001020	Mung ulenɛ ifɛɛt a bwaannttuma ba ayɛnnɛyɔng ka kɔbɔɔk ɛlaabɔɔk anaam, la ikkandul ya innammikkyaat; Bwaannttuma ba bannambakkyaat ulenɛ bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka izɔɔm ’yɔng baang innammikkyaat. Ikkandul ’yɔng baang innammikkyaat ilenɛ izɔɔm ’yɔng baang innammikkyaat.
66002001	“Akkpɔk afee uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ulenɛ ka Ephesus: “Bɔtɔɔm ’bwɔng bulenɛ bwa bussinɛ ka ɔlɔɔt vvɔn wa ɔkɔɔmnɛ bwaannttuma bannambakkyaat ka kɔbɔɔk ɛlaabɔɔk ammɛ, wa ɔssɛnɛ ka bɛzzɔkɔ ikkandul ’yɔng baang innammikkyaat ya gold.
66002002	Nsan lɔsan bwa alenɛyɔng lɛnaang. Nsan lɔsan tɛ̀ttɛ̀ alenɛyɔng kɛnaang gaang lɛnaang la kibbe luppyam sa alenɛyɔng libbe. Nsan lɔsan nttɛ kwa banaang-a-bubbi baala ayilayɔng. Nttina nttɛ, allɛyɔngbong balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba battɛnɛ abbɛ bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus Christ, ɔzzànga usibɛ abbɛ lile. Asanyɔngbong attɛyɔng balɔɔt ’bɔng baang bakkala-lalaak.
66002003	Abbeyɔngbong luppyam ayɛnyɔng akama ka lɛttɔ anaam, ɔzzànga ba ataka akkyaa afɔngɔyɔng.
66002004	Ɔzzànga ’kwɔng kulenɛ kwa nfimwɔnɛyɔng kwɛ: Nɛ yɔng ba abɛlɛyɔng litele tɛ̀ttɛ̀ adɔkɔnɛ atelenɛyɔng ka ikeeng.
66002005	Akkeyɔng bufulu bwa alenɛyɔng lɛttɔ. Akkyaa bubbi annyɔɔng afɔngɔyɔng, appyɛlɛ anaangyɔng kwa agbanɛyɔng lissi anaangyɔng ka kɛkɔɔm ɛtɔk. Asinɛyɔng bubbi annyɔɔng lɛkkyaa afɔngɔyɔng, vvenɛ nffu nsam ikkandul ’yɔng ka kibee annyɛ ngbata ka ɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng.
66002006	Ɔzzànga mung ulenɛ bwa bubeenɛ la annyɔɔng: Lilɔɔk sa balɔɔt a Nicolaitan banaangnɛ litunwɔyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ litunnɛnɛ anaam.
66002007	“Ayanganɛyɔng latɔɔk, agɔpɔlɔyɔng kwa Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔlɔɔknɛ la izɔɔm. “Vvenɛ nnyi balɔɔt bɔng baang ba balenɛ lɛbɛtɛ lakke za kizzi likkpo lɛsan a kɛssɛ kuddu za libeenɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ bɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
66002008	“Akkpɔk afee uyilabɔtɔɔm wa ulenɛ ka luzɔɔm ka Smyrna attɛ: “Uwɔng ulenɛ bɔtɔɔm bwa bussinɛ ka ɔlɔɔt vvɔn wa ulenɛ ɔkɔɔm-ɛtɔk la lakpeke, wa ubbenɛ, ɔppyɛlɛ ufungala ɔtaa ka kuddu.
66002009	Nsan lilɔɔk annyɔɔng lɔsan. Nsan lɔsan nttɛ annyɔɔng ɔbbɔlwɔyɔng lɔbbɔl; ɔzzànga ka lɔkkwɔɔn ɔyyɛɛpwɔyɔng lɔyyɛɛp. Nsan babbu lilɔɔk sa balɔɔt ba babbwanɛ battɛ abbɛ balɔɔt a Jews balɔɔknɛ batumwɔyɔng. Abbɛ balenɛ kukup a balɔɔt ba balenɛ ba Satan.
66002010	Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akama wa ale ayɛnyɔng ɔbbwɔpɔwɔyɔng. Gɔpɔlɔyɔng! Satan vvenɛ ɔllɛwɔyɔng ka ule ɔssang balɔɔt balɔk ɔssɛɛn igbakkɔpɔ. Lilɔɔk annyɔɔng litaa littumu ka bɛtɔm zzɔɔp. Ayangayɔng kiyila ka anaam, gɔɔ mkkpa ule lubbe, vvenɛ nnyiwɔyɔng ododo-kuddu.
66002011	“Ayanganɛyɔng latɔɔk, agɔpɔlɔyɔng kwa Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔlɔɔknɛ kunnyi izɔɔm. Balɔɔt ba babɛtɛnɛ baala bayɛn akama ka lubbe gwa lule lɔbbal liffu.”
66002012	“Akkpɔk afee uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka luzɔɔm a Pergamum attɛ: “Bɔtɔɔm ’bwɔng mung bussi ka ɔlɔɔt vvɔn wa ɔyanganɛ ogge wa ɔlamnɛ lafoom laffa laffa.
66002013	Nsan lɔsan ka ɛfɛɛn allunɛyɔng. Alluyɔng ka ɛfɛɛn a Satan ayanganɛ ugbaal a kibeet ammɛ. Alenɛyɔng balɔɔt anaam ba lɔkkwɔɔn. Luppyam annyɔɔng asiyɔng lɛsam ka kkwɔɔt anaam gɔɔ gbaak ka ɛkɛtɛ ya badɔkɔnɛ bawwɔɔl Antipas, ttɛɛsɛ anaam ka ɛfɛɛn a Satan ullunɛ.
66002014	Ɔzzànga bwaan a lilɔɔk lile mung sa nlɔɔknɛ ntumwɔyɔng. Balɔɔt balɔk bale baang ka ɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng ba bakupnɛ lukopolo a Balaam. Ammɛ ukopolonɛ Balak tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ule ɔnaang balɔɔt a Israel banaang bubbi ka bazzinɛ kazzi kwa balenɛ ilat likkpele, la kikup a bwanavva.
66002015	Ɔgbaa assɛ ayangayɔng balɔɔt ba ning baang ka bɛzzɔkɔ annyɔɔng ba bakupnɛ lukopolo balɔɔt a Nicolaitan.
66002016	Akkyaa bubbi annyɔɔng afɔngɔyɔng. Nzang asinɛyɔng lɛkkyaa afɔngɔyɔng, nle ka nkɔɔmnɛ ogge wa ɔttanɛnɛ ka kamma gedegede mung nffu ka ɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng nllu kullu la balɔɔt ’bɔng baang.
66002017	“Ayanganɛyɔng latɔɔk, agɔpɔlɔyɔng kwa Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔlɔɔknɛ kunnyi izɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ! “Vvenɛ balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba balenɛ lɛbɛtɛ bazzi kazzi lalup kwa kazzanganɛ manna. Vvenɛ nnyi ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn ulata lɛttaal za balenɛ ufaa lɛkɔɔl lɛkkpɔk; za balɔɔt balɔk bale basi lɛsan, ukpeke ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang keem wa ɔyanganɛzɛ ka ule ɔsan.”
66002018	“Akkpɔk afee Uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ulenɛ ka luzɔɔm ka Thyatira attɛ: “Uwɔng ulenɛ bɔtɔɔm bwa bussinɛ ka Waan-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, wa zzeen ammɛ lappwolonɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lalaak a lɔkɔɔn, bukkpɔ ammɛ bullaat tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lukkpi gwa balenɛ gwɛ lɛkkpɔlɔ.
66002019	Nsan lɔsan bwa anaangnɛyɔng. Nsan mung kɛsaap annyɔɔng, la kiyila annyɔɔng, la kinnyi latele annyɔɔng la kibbe-lɛttɔ. Nsan lɔsan nttɛ anaangyɔngbong gaang gaang gedegede mung attayɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɛlɔmɛlɔm.
66002020	Ɔzzànga mung ulenɛ kɔlɔɔk kwa nyanganɛ ntumwɔyɔng: Ayilayɔngbong kwa wanavva ’wɔng baang wa ɔzzanganɛ Jezebel, wa ɔkkwɔɔmɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng Uyilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ukopolo ɔdɛm ibɔɔyi anaam ippyɛlɛ ifula ka kɛnaang a babbu lilɔɔk, bazzi lizzi sa bazɔɔmnɛ bannyi ilat.
66002021	Nnyimɛbong ɛkɛtɛ nttɛ ɔkkyaa kɛnaang a bubbi ɔfɔngɔ, ɔzzànga ba ɔggyan ɔttɛ ɔkkyaa kɛssɛ kɛzak ɔfɔngɔ.
66002022	Ɔzzànga vvenɛ nsammɛ nwulu ka igolo, ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ la balɔɔt ba bamininɛ la ammɛ bale bayɛn akama wa lɛbaang. Vvenɛ nkka ’kwɔng lɛnaang, ɔzzànga bakkyaanɛ kɛnaang a bɛfɛɛn izzit bafɔngɔ, vvenɛ nkkyaa nfongo.
66002023	Vvenɛ nwwɔɔl balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ɔgbaa, nkwaaning izɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ isan ittɛ anaam nlenɛ ɔlɔɔt wa nsannɛ ippyam a balɔɔt la ittina abbɛ. Vvenɛ nkipili ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn nssanga tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ulenɛ lɛnaang ɔffɔ.
66002024	“Ɔzzànga annyɔɔng balɔɔt balɔk ba alenɛyɔng ka Thyatira ba ataka akupyɔng ubbu lukopolo ’wɔng. Ba ataka akkoopyɔng kwa balɔɔt balɔk bakkwɔɔnɛ, ’kɔlɔɔk a lalup a Satan kwa ddɔng’. Nbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng, baala ngbaawɔyɔng akama ɔlɔk.
66002025	Ɔzzànga akɔɔmyɔng bwa bulewɔnɛyɔng ka eddu kkpɔk tɔttɔt nppyɛlɛ nffu.
66002026	Kwa balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba babɛtɛnɛ, batiinɛ baang ka banaangnɛ kwa nggyannɛ nttɛ banaang tɔttɔt ɔffɔ ka lakpeke, vvenɛ nnyibɛ kɛssanga lakke za ntɔknɛ ka Dedde anaam. Vvenɛ nnyibɛ lakke za kɛkɔɔm ɛkpansi ɔkkpɛlɛ la lɛgabwɔ. Babɔlbɛ sukusuku tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɛfaak ikkpo. Vvenɛ nnyibɛ ubbele-ettuma wa ɔttanɛ lɔfɔm.
66002029	“Ayanganɛyɔng latɔɔk, agɔpɔlɔyɔng kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔknɛ la izɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ!”
66003001	“Akkpɔk afee uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm a luzɔɔm a Sardis attɛ: “Uwɔng ulenɛ bɔtɔɔm bwa bussinɛ ka ɔlɔɔt wa ɔyanganɛ liyeeng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm linnangkkyaat, la bwaannttuma bannambakkyaat. Nsan mung bwa anaangnɛ. Nsan mung nttɛ balɔɔt battɛ ale ka kuddu mkkpa ale libbe.
66003002	Afeele kkpalap, alɔm bwa ayanganɛ kkpɔk, tɛ̀ttɛ́ bubbe busal ɔkkpɛlɛ. Nsanbong nttɛ bwa anaangnɛyɔng ba butaka buyyɛɛp buffata ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm anaam.
66003003	Akke kwa appyeenɛyɔng la kwa bakopolowɔnɛyɔng, ateleyɔngkwɛ; afɔngɔyɔng kɛnaang a bubbi. Asinɛyɔng lɛkkyaa afɔngɔyɔng, vvenɛ nffu ka ɛfɛɛn annyɔɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ussip. Gɔɔ ligbɛkɛ baala asanyɔng za nle nffu.
66003004	Ɔzzànga annyɔɔng balɔk ka Sardis alokoyɔngbong iwɔkɔlɔ annyɔɔng kpaladada. Vvenɛ assɛyɔng la anaam la balata iwɔkɔlɔ ka akkɔnɔnɛyɔng.
66003005	Balɔɔt ba babɛtɛnɛ bale bayanga balata iwɔkɔlɔ ning mung ka kkwɔɔt. Baala nkkpɔlɔ lakɔɔl abbɛ ka kɛkpaka luvva balɔɔt a kuddu. Vvenɛ nbwɔɔlɔ kpelegedee ka lusso a Dedde la bayilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ nttɛ abbɛ balɔɔt anaam bbwak.
66003006	“Ayanganɛyɔng latɔɔk za kippyee kɔlɔɔk, agɔpɔlɔ appyeeyɔng kwa Kuyeeng kɔlɔɔknɛ kunnyi izɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ!”
66003007	“Akkpɔk afee uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa luzɔɔm a Philadelphia attɛ: “Uwɔng ulenɛ bɔtɔɔm bwa bussinɛ ka ɔlɔɔt wa doddo, ammɛ ulenɛ lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk, wa ɔkɔɔmnɛ ɛkpɔkɔlɔ a David, wa uwongolonɛ, ɔlɔɔt usi likkwoong ɔfɛɛn; wa ɔfɛɛnnɛ, ɔlɔɔt usi likkwoong uwongolo.
66003008	Nsan mung bwa anaangnɛyɔng. Nsan mung nttɛ likke lilewɔyɔng ssup. Akupyɔngbong lukopolo anaam, anaangyɔng bwa nggyannɛ. Nwongolobong lɛmma nlokowɔyɔng, za ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ule usi likkwoong ɔfɛɛn.
66003009	Agɔpɔlɔyɔng! Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kwa likup a balɔɔt a Satan, bakkala-lalaak ’bɔng baang ba battɛnɛ abbɛ balɔɔt a Jews ka basinɛ ba Jews lile, vvenɛ nnaangbɛ baffu bakunwɔyɔng laddu ka lataak. Vvenɛ basan battɛ asaapnɛyɔng lɔsaap.
66003010	Ka alenɛyɔng lɔttama anaam liloko ka kibbe luppyam, vvenɛ nkkalawɔyɔng ka kɔlɔɔk kwa kule kuffu ka vveengodde ɔkkpɛlɛ kɔllɛ balɔɔt ɛkpansi.
66003011	Nle nkka liffu. Akɔɔmyɔng bwa ayanganɛyɔng kkpɔk. Tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk uffu ɔnnaawɔyɔng lɛsɔɔk ’zɔng baang za basɔɔkwɔnɛyɔng.
66003012	Vvenɛ nnaang ɔlɔɔt wa ɔbɛtɛnɛ ɔtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ likoop a ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm anaam. Bwa bule bunaang ɔbbal lɛgbata ussekegwɛ ba bule. Vvenɛ nkkpɔk lɛkɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm anaam ka kkwɔɔt ammɛ la lɛkɔɔl a killu Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm anaam sa kɛzzanganɛ ufaa Jerusalem, sa kile kɛtta ka libat ka ɛfɛɛn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm anaam kiffu. Vvenɛ nkkpɔkmɛ ufaa lɛkɔɔl anaam ka kkwɔɔt ɔgbaa.
66003013	“Ayanganɛyɔng latɔɔk, agɔpɔlɔyɔng kwa Kuyeeng kɔlɔɔknɛ kunnyi izɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ!”
66003014	“Akkpɔk afee uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa luzɔɔm a Laodicea attɛ: “Uwɔng bɔtɔɔm bwa bussinɛ ka ammɛ wa ɔzzanganɛ ‘Kulening’, wa ɔyanganɛ kiyila la buttɛɛsɛ bwa lɔkkwɔɔn, ulenɛ lutte bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔmnɛ.
66003015	Nsan mung bwa alenɛyɔng lɛnaang. Nsan lɔsan nttɛ ttuttu ba aleyɔng gɔɔ bɛmɛbɛmɛ ba aleyɔng. Buttɛnɛ adɔkɔyɔng ’bwɔng ɔlɔk bbwakang nzang kɔyyɛɛp!
66003016	Ɔzzànga mung ka alenɛyɔng bekebeke, asiyɔng ttuttu ɔlɔk bɛmɛbɛmɛ lile, vvenɛ nkkwɔɔkwɔyɔng nzzɔɔk.
66003017	Attɛyɔng, ‘Ɔyyɛɛpnɛ lɔyyɛɛp, nyanga bɔfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bwa nggyannɛ,’ ɔzzànga ba asan attɛyɔng aleyɔng ba akama gaang la kibbe-lɛttɔ. Ɔbbɔlwɔyɔng lɔbbɔl ɔkkpɛlɛ. Aleyɔng kɛkɔɔ, assiyɔng afim agbaayɔng.
66003018	Nbbawɔyɔng bikɔɔm nttɛ alɛɛpyɔng gold biini, nkwaaning ɔyyɛɛpwɔyɔng. Alɛɛpyɔng balata ibba akulayɔng, kɛkɔɔ kɛnaang izzit. Alɛɛpyɔng kɛssɛ ɔgbaa assɛɛnyɔng ka zzeen, nkwaaning ayɛnyɔng.
66003019	Nwɔlɔ balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba basaapnɛnɛ, nyɔɔbɛ akama. Kɔbɛtɛwɔyɔng, akkyaayɔng kɛnaang a bubbi afɔngɔyɔng.
66003020	Gɔpɔlɔyɔng! Nbee ka lɛmma ggwoon nlip nttɛ ɔlɔɔt wa uppyeenɛ lɛmmwɔɔl anaam uwongolonɛ lɛmma, vvenɛ nmal ka ggwoon ammɛ itul kazzi izzi.
66003021	Vvenɛ nnyi balɔɔt ba babɛtɛnɛ lakke za bataanɛnɛ ka lufoom ka ugbaal a kibeet anaam, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ anaam nlenɛ lɛbɛtɛ nle ka lufoom a Dedde ka ugbaal a kibeet ammɛ ka ntaanɛ.
66003022	“Ayanganɛyɔng latɔɔk, agɔpɔlɔ kwa kuyeeng kɔlɔɔknɛ kunnyi izɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ.!”
66004001	Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng nbbal biyɛnɛ bilɔk lɛyɛn ka lɛmma ggwoon liwongolonɛ ka libat. Lɛmmwɔɔl za nlenɛzɛ kkpal lippyee lɛtta tɛ̀ttɛ̀ luffi, lɛlɔɔk la anaam lɛttɛ, “Affu kaang ning, vvenɛ nyɔɔwɔ kwa kule kɔnaang ’kwɔng kulenɛ lɛsaal.”
66004002	Eseese, Kuyeeng kɔtɔknɛ kɔyanga. Ugbaal a kibeet ule bakang ka libat la ɔlɔɔt baang ka ɔtaanɛ ka ammɛ.
66004003	Lusso ammɛ luwongolo tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɛttaal za lɛzzanganɛ Jasper la Carnelian. Egwugwulu ɛtta ekkpit ugbaal a kibeet la ubili buppwolo bwa ititiban-ititiban.
66004004	Lɔlɔp la igbaal a kibeet inna itaa ligbolo ikkpit ugbaal a kibeet ’wɔng baang. Lɔlɔp la bagɛlɛnya banna bale baang la balata iwɔkɔlɔ ka bawɔkɔlɔnɛ la bɛttɔpɔ a gold ka bataanɛ.
66004005	Ìkkpálá la immwalang la latumu bɛtta baang ka ɛfɛɛn a kibeet ’sɔng baang. Ikɔɔn innammikkyaat ile baang ka ikutnɛ ka lusso kibeet ’sɔng baang. Ikɔɔn ’yɔng baang ilenɛ liyeeng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm sa linnaangikkyaat.
66004006	Bɔfɛɛn budɔkɔ baang ka lusso kibeet bwa bubalnɛ kibboko kiyenge sa kitiinɛ bannyi bannyi, kɛllaat gaang gaang. Isɛɛn inna ibee ikkpit ugbaal a kibeet la zzeen ka lusso la zzeen ka isimi.
66004007	Ɛsɛɛn ya ikeeng ɛbal lɛnngwing. Ya nnyɔn ɛbal ɔgɔdɔ, ka ikkyaat lusso annyɛ lɔbal gwa ɔlɔɔt. ka inna ɛbal ekkpo-lubat.
66004008	Ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɛ inna iyanga bifekele bwɔlaaning bwɔlaaning. Bifekele ɔkkpɛlɛ abbyɛ bile zzeen a zzeen ɔgbaa la tɔkɔlɔ. Ba ifɛkɛlɛ kisoom, kikoon la kɛtɔm. Ibungu Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ittɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt a doddo, ɔlɔɔt a doddo, ɔlɔɔt a doddo, ulenɛ Uyini, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔyanganɛ lakke ɔkkpɛlɛ, wa ɔdɔkɔnɛ, wa ulenɛ lule, wa ule uffu.”
66004009	Isɛɛn ’yɔng baang inna isoom kisoom a latele la laggele la liwomo ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtaanɛ ka kibeet kɛnaang. Ammɛ wa uddunɛ ka kɛfal a kɛfal. Inaangnɛ ning baang,
66004010	lɔlɔp la bagɛlɛnya banna ba bataanɛ baang bakpɔkɔ banaang ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtaanɛ baang ka ugbaal a kibeet mgbeede. Ammɛ wa uddunɛ kɛfal a kɛfal. Bakkpɛɛ bɛttɔpɔ abbɛ bazzɔɔk ka lusso ugbaal a kibeet battɛ,
66004011	“Uyini,Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ayyɔɔt annɔ akkɔnɔnɛ wa atɔknɛ budoddo, la lakke ka ulewɔnɛ annɔ alɔɔmnɛ bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ. Kɔsaapwɔ annɔ annyibyɛ kuddu.”
66005001	Nyɛn luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka kɔbɔɔk ɛlaabɔɔk ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtaanɛ ka ugbaal a kibeet, lɔdɔkɔ la likkpɔk lafoom azzɛ laffa laffa. Bassɛɛngwɛ ikpɔkɔlɔ innaammikkyaat.
66005002	Nyɛn uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa lɛbaang ka ɔzɔɔmnɛ ɔttɛ, “Nnyinɛ ɔkkɔnɔnɛ wa ule uwongolo ikpɔkɔlɔ luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm?”
66005003	Gɔɔ ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk usi lile ka libat, gɔɔ ka ɛkpansi, gɔɔ ka ɛkpansi ya kuttɔɔk, wa ukkwoongnɛ uwongolo luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔppyɛɛk ka tɔkɔlɔ.
66005004	Nkkwa gaang gaang ka ɔlɔɔt ɔkkɔnɔnɛ usinɛ lile wa ukkwoongnɛ uwongolo luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔppyɛɛk ka tɔkɔlɔ.
66005005	Ɔgɛlɛnya vvɔn ɔlɔɔk la anaam ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akkwa, ppyɛɛk Lenngwing za lissinɛ ka lɔkaan a Judah, ɔlɔɔt a kikkwu a David wa lɛbaang ɔbɛtɛbong. Ukkwoong mung ɔkkyaa ikpɔkɔlɔ ’yɔng banng innammikkyaat ka luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
66005006	Nyɛn Waan-ɛtɔɔn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ubeenɛ ka kasɛkɛ ugbaal a kibeet, isɛɛn ya inna la bagɛlɛnya babee bakkpitmɛ. Waan-ɛtɔɔn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔppyɛɛk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balemɛnɛ lɛwwɔɔl. Ɔyanga iffi innammikkyaat la zzeen lannangakkyaat za lalenɛ liyeeng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm sa linnangikkyaat sa balenɛsɛ lɛtɔɔm liffu ka ɛkpansi ɔkkpɛlɛ.
66005007	Waan-ɛtɔɔn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ufeele umii ɔsam luvva ka kɔbɔɔk ɛlaabɔɔk ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtaanɛ ka ugbaal a kibeet.
66005008	Ɔsamnɛgwɛ ning baang, isɛɛn ya inna ’yɔng baang la bagɛlɛnya lɔlɔp la balɔɔt banna ba bataanɛ baang ka kibeet, battɔ ka lusso Waan-ɛtɔɔn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn ɔyanga biggɔ la kɛkkpala sa ɔssɛɛnnɛ bɛfɛɛn bya bɛyyɛɛpnɛ kizoom, bya bilenɛ luzɔɔm a balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
66005009	Basoom ufaa lɔssa battɛ, “Akkɔnɔ-lɔkkɔnɔ kɛsam luvva-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm akkyaa ikpɔkɔlɔ aggwɛ. Badɔkɔ bawwɔɔlwɔ. Lubbe annɔ lɔkɔɔmbong balɔɔt a kikkwu, lɔkaan duu, lɔfɔɔn duu la kɛkkpa duu lufee Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
66005010	Anaangbongbɛ bazzanga itutum a bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm ya ile itele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ayyɔɔt, vvenɛ bayanga lakke ka ɛkpansi.”
66005011	Nbbal lɛppyɛɛk, nyɛn bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm innɔ npuku ka babeenɛ bakkpit ugbaal a kibeet, la isɛɛn ya inna la bagɛlɛnya.
66005012	Nppyeebɛ ka basoomnɛ bagaga battɛ, “Waan-ɛtɔɔn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa bawwɔɔlnɛ ɔkkɔnɔnɛ ka ɔyanganɛ lakke, la iyyɛɛp, la bisana, la lɛgabwɔ, la latele, la bɔkaat la kɛsaap.”
66005013	Nppyee isɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ka libat la ɛkpansi, la ɛkpansi ya kuttɔɔk la isɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ka bannyi. Isɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ka vveengodde idɔkɔ ka kisoom. “Itelemɛ ammɛ wa ɔtaanɛ ka kibeet la Waan-ɛtɔɔn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ibungumɛ ammɛ wa ɔyanganɛ lakke la lɛgabwɔ za kɛfal a kɛfal!”
66005014	Isɛɛn ’yɔng baang inna iyila ittɛ, “Kulening.” Bagɛlɛnya battɔ ka lisse bazɔɔm bannyimɛ.
66006001	Keem nyɛn Waan-ɛtɔɔn ka ɔlɔmnɛ ɛkpɔkɔlɔ ya ikeeng ɔkkyaa. Ɔ̀zzánga nppyee lɛmmwɔɔl ɛsɛɛn nnyɔn ka kɛkaan isɛɛn inna ’yɔng baang ka lɛlɔɔknɛ lɛgaga tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔttanɛ àkkpálá lɛttɛ, “Affu.”
66006002	Nppyɛɛknɛ, ulata eyim ɔdɔkɔ baang. Ɔlɔɔt wa uttelenɛyɛ ɔdɔkɔ ɔkɔɔm kubɔk, bannyimɛ ododo. Ufeele umii ka vveeng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔlɔɔt wa ullunɛ lɛkɔɔng ɔbɛtɛ. Umii kɛbɛtɛ balɔɔt.
66006003	Ɔzzánga Waan-ɛtɔɔn ɔbbal ɛkpɔkɔlɔ ya nnyɔn liwongolo. Nbbal ɛsɛɛn ya nnyɔn lippyee ka ɛttɛnɛ, “Affu.”
66006004	Eyim ya nyyɔn ɛbbal lɛtta effu, ɛdɔkɔ ukolo ukolo. Uttele annyɛ bannyimɛbong lakke za kɛkɔɔm lɛkɔɔng kiffu ka ɛkpansi, nkwaaning balɔɔt bawwɔɔl ba abbɛ. Bannyimɛ ogge wa lɛbaang.
66006005	Waan-ɛtɔɔn ɔbbal ɛkpɔkɔlɔ ya nnyɔn lɛkkyaa ka bikkpit bɛkkyaat. Ɔzzánga nppyee ɛsɛɛn ɛlɔk ka ɛbbalnɛ lɛttɛ, “Affu.” Ɔ̀zzánga nppyɛɛk nyɛn ubili eyim. Uttele-uttele ɔkɔɔm bɔfɛɛn bwa balɔɔmnɛ kazzi ka kɔbɔɔk.
66006006	Nppyee bɔfɛɛn ka busanganɛ lɛmmwɔɔl ka bɛzzɔkɔ isɛɛn ya inna ’yɔng baang buttɛ, “Kɔɔp-alaasi vvɔn ka ikipili kɛnaang a kɛtɔm uwɔlɔlɔ. Ikkɔɔp igwugwulu ikkyaat ka ikipili kɛnaang a kɛtɔm uwɔlɔlɔ. Ɔzzànga tɛ̀ttɛ́ abɛpɛyɔng bannɛ la batak.”
66006007	Waan-ɛtɔɔn ɔbbal ɛkpɔkɔlɔ ya nnyɔn lɛkkyaa ka ikpɔkɔlɔ inna. Nppyee ɛsɛɛn ya ɛnaangnɛ ka isɛɛn inna ka ɛttɛnɛ “Affu.”
66006008	Nppyɛɛknɛ, eyim ɛdɔkɔ baang ya elenɛ yengeyenge. Ɔlɔɔt wa uttelenɛyɛ bakkwɔɔmɛ “Lubbe”. Ssala-lubbe lidɔkɔ lile baang ka likupnɛgwɛ ka isimi. Bannyibɛ lakke za kɛkɔɔm a lɛkɔɔng la buwɔɔng, la iffaak la isɛɛn a kɛmat, kɛwwɔɔl kufaak ɛkpansi kkwɔn keem ka tɔkɔlɔ lifaak linna.
66006009	Ɔzzángá Waan-ɛtɔɔn ɔbbal ɛkpɔkɔlɔ ɛlɔk lɛkkyaa, ɔnaang ka ikpɔkɔlɔ kubbwɔɔk. Nppyɛɛknɛ, kuttɔɔk a labun Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm nyɛn ippyam a balɔɔt ba bawwɔɔlnɛbɛ ka babwɔɔlɔnɛ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, babee ittɛɛsɛ azzɛ bbwak.
66006010	Babungu bagaga battɛ, “Uyini wa ɔnaangnɛ lakke ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔlɔɔt wa doddo, ɔlɔɔt a lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk, mung ule ɔmmɛ ɔffɔ nang tɛ́ttɛ́ akaal kɛkaal a balɔɔt ɛkpansi apipilibɛ ka kɛwwɔɔl sa bawwɔɔlnɛyɛlɛ ee?”
66006011	Bannyi kuyeeng la kkwɔn ulata ewuulu battɛ kɔwɔkɔlɔ. Babwɔɔlɔsɛ battɛ likeele lɛtaa ɔmmɛ ssup ɔddɔkɔ-ddɔkɔ liyeeng a babbɛ ibɔɔyi la ikpana abbɛ ba bawwɔɔlnɛbɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ abbɛ liggba.
66006012	Nyɛn Waan-ɛtɔɔn ka ɔbbalnɛ ɛkpɔkɔlɔ ya nnyɔn lɛkkyaa, ɔnaang ka ikpɔkɔlɔ bwɔlaaning. Ɛkpansi ɛnnyɛkɛ, livve luwee lisikili lɛppyɛɛ libil lubil tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kibili ubba. Ɛttuma esikili ikoot tɛ̀ttɛ̀ linnyi.
66006013	Bwaanettuma baffaat ka libat a lukkpagbeede baffu battɔ ka ɛkpansi tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lakkpo bɛssɛ za latakanɛ lɛlak lattɔnɛ ka ɔffanɛ kɛffa sa lɛbaang.
66006014	Lukkpaagbeede lɔkkyaap tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bakkɔtnɛ ewula basam bagbata, lɛttaal la zzɔn la lakkpɔ ɛkpansi ka bannyi bɛgbata ka ɛfɛɛn a baggbanɛ lissi bibee.
66006015	Babeet ɛkpansi la bakɔɔm ɛkpansi la bazzilɛttɔ isɔgya, balɔɔt ba ɔyyɛɛpnɛbɛ la ba baggbengenɛ la balɔɔt balɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ, babili la ba basinɛ babili lile, bamma bamii baddumu ka ibbe la lihuk ikpana ka libat a lɛttaal.
66006016	Babungu bakkwɔɔ lattaal la ikpana battɛ, “Attɔ abɛtɛyɔngyɛlɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ iffu iyɛn lusso ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtaanɛ ka ugbaal a kibeet la kitun a kɔlɔɔk Waan-ɛtɔɔn ’wɔng baang.
66006017	Kɛtɔm-a-kɔlɔɔk kutunnɛbɛ kitii mung. Nyinɔɔng ule ɔbbɔ ufeele ubee ufimkwɛ?”
66007001	Nkwɔng kulenɛ lɛsak. Nyɛn bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm banna ka babeenɛ ka laggook a ɛkpansi lanna babwɔɔp bɛssanga bɛffa bɛnna baloko nkwaaning bisi ɛkpansi la lihu ɔlɔk kɛssɛ lɛbɛlɛ lɛffa.
66007002	Nyɛn uyilabɔtɔɔm ɔlɔk ka ussinɛ ka lusso gwa livve luwee lɔfɔm la bɔfɛɛn a kuddu ka ɔkɔɔmnɛ ɔnaang eleme ka bɔfɛɛn. Ɔkkwɔɔ bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba banna ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛbɛ lakke za kɛbɛpɛ ɛkpansi la lihu linnyi ɔgaga.
66007003	Uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ abɛpɛ ɛkpansi gɔɔ lihu, gɔɔ kɛssɛ kɛlɔk ɔddɔkɔddɔkɔ inaang ibbɔɔyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm eleme ka lɛttɔ lusso.”
66007004	Babwɔɔlɔnɛ buyipi balɔɔt ba banaangnɛbɛ eleme Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka lɛttɔ lusso. Badɔkɔ lalɔp innɔ zzillalakkyaat. Abbɛ badɔkɔnɛ isam Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ya Israel, ya zzɔɔppiffa.
66007005	Balɔɔt ba bassinɛ ka kikkwu a Judah badɔkɔ lɔlɔp la innɔ zzɔɔp. Ba bassinɛ ka kikkwu a Reuben badɔkɔ lɔlɔp la innɔ zzɔɔp. Ba Gad badɔkɔ lɔlɔp ka ubbɔ zzɔɔp.
66007006	Balɔɔt ba bassinɛ ka kikkwu a Asher badɔkɔ lɔlɔp la innɔ zzɔɔp. Ba bassinɛ ka kikkwu a Naphtali badɔkɔ lɔlɔp la innɔ zzɔɔp. Ba bassinɛ ka kikkwu a Manasseh badɔkɔ lɔlɔp la innɔ zzɔɔp.
66007007	Balɔɔt ba bassinɛ ka kikkwu a Simeon badɔkɔ lɔlɔp la innɔ zzɔɔp. Ba bassinɛ ka kikkwu a Levi badɔkɔ lɔlɔp la innɔ zzɔɔp. Ba bassinɛ ka kikkwu a Issachar badɔkɔ lɔlɔp la innɔ zzɔɔp.
66007008	Balɔɔt ba bassinɛ ka kikkwu a Zebulun badɔkɔ lɔlɔp la innɔ zzɔɔp. Ba bassinɛ ka kikkwu a Joseph badɔkɔ lɔlɔp la innɔ zzɔɔp. Ba bassinɛ ka kikkwu a Benjamin badɔkɔ lɔlɔp la innɔ zzɔɔp.
66007009	Nkwɔng kɔsaknɛ, nyɛn kibbi sa lɛbaang. Ɔlɔɔt wa ukkwoongnɛ ukkwoon balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ ba ule. Badɔkɔ bassi ka kikkwu la ssɔn ka ɛkpansi. Ɔzzánga babee ka lusso ugbaal a kibeet ’sɔng baang la balata iwuulu ka bawɔkɔlɔnɛ, bakɔɔm litteet ka labɔɔk.
66007010	Bakkwɔɔ bagaga battɛ, “Kuddu ayyɔɔt kussi ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ayyɔɔt, la Waan-ɛtɔɔn ammɛ, wa ɔtaanɛ ka ugbaal a kibeet.”
66007011	Bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ babee bakkpit ugbaal a kibeet la bagɛlɛnya la isɛɛn ’yɔng baang inna. Battɔ ka lisse bakun lusso bazɔɔm bannyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm battɛ,
66007012	“Kulening! Kibungu, lakke, bisana, kiwomo kɛnaang, latele, lagabwɔ la lakke ɔkkpɛlɛ lale za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ayyɔɔt kɛfal a kɛfal, kulening.”
66007013	Ɔgɛlɛnya vvɔn ɔbapnɛ ɔttɛ, “Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba bawɔkɔlɔnɛ balata iwuulu babang? Bassi yang baffu?”
66007014	Nppyɛlɛmɛ kamma nttɛ, “Ba nsan nttɛ, Dedde. Annɔ asannɛ.” Ɔlɔɔk la anaam ɔttɛ, “Uwɔng ulenɛ balɔɔt ba battanɛ ka akama kɔlɔɔk a Christ. Bakɔɔmbong linnyi Waan-ɛtɔɔn ’wɔng baang bazzaa iwɔkɔlɔ abbɛ. Kwakkwɛ illaatnɛ ning baang.
66007015	Kwakkwɛ babeenɛ ka lusso Ugbaal a kibeet Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kikoon la kɛtɔm batelemɛ ka labun ammɛ. Ammɛ wa ɔtaanɛ ka kibeet vvenɛ ɔkatbɛ ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
66007016	Buwɔɔng gɔɔ bannyi baala busaapbɛ. Luwee gɔɔ lɔkɔɔn baala lutupbɛ.
66007017	Ka Waan-ɛtɔɔn wa ulenɛ ka kasɛkɛ kibeet ule usseke ɔlɔɔt wa ɔkatnɛbɛ, vvenɛ ɔkɔɔmbɛ umii ka ɛggbɔlɔ kuddu. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔkkpɔlɔbɛ liyyeen.”
66008001	Waan-ɛtɔɔn ’wɔng baang ɔkkyaa ɛkpɔkɔlɔ ya innammikkyaat, libat lizum kulak ka kufaak ɛkalangka.
66008002	Ɔzzánga nyɛn bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bannambakkyaat ka babeenɛ ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la iffi innammikkyaat. Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔɔt la luffi ggwɔn ggwɔn.
66008003	Uyilabɔtɔɔm wa vvɔn ɔkɔɔm ettotto ya banaangnɛyɛ la gold la bannɛ ba bayyɛɛpnɛ kizoom ka tɔkɔlɔ. Uffu ubee ka lusso labun Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Bagbaayɛ bannɛ ba bayyɛɛpnɛ kizoom battɛ ɛgbaa ka luzoom a balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ la bigugulu bya banaangnɛ ka labun Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, za banaagnnɛzɛ la gold labee ka lusso ugbaal a kibeet Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
66008004	Isɔngɔ ya issinɛ ka bannɛ ’bɔng baang la luzɔɔm a balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm itukulu ka labɔɔk uyilabɔtɔɔm wa ubeenɛ baang ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
66008005	Uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsam ettotto ’yɔng baang ttɔng lɔkɔɔn ka labun Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm baang eseese ɛssɛɛnyɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ ɔsam ɔtɔɔp ka ɛkpansi. Eseese utum, immwalang inaang, àkkpálá ɔtta, ɛkpansi ɛnnyɛkɛ.
66008006	Bayilabɔtɔɔm bannambakkyaat batte kɛwɔl iffi ’yɔng baang innammikkyaat.
66008007	Ɔkɔɔm-ɛtɔk ɔwɔl luffi gwa ammɛ, lattaal la lɔkɔɔn bitoolo la linnyi bissi ka libat bɛllɔt ka ɛkpansi. Kufaak ɛkpansi kkwɔn ka tɔkɔlɔ lifaak likkyaat, kɔkkɔm kɔssal gbaak la bɛssɛ la lifaak ɔkkpɛlɛ.
66008008	Ɔssɛ-ɔttɛlɛ ɔbbal luffi gwa ammɛ lɛwɔl. Bɔfɛɛn bwa bubalnɛ lɛttaal za lɛbaang bussi ka libat la lalaak a lɔkɔɔn ka kkwɔɔt buttɔ ka tɔkɔlɔ lihu. Kufaak a lihu kkwɔn, ka tɔkɔlɔ lifaak likkyaat kusikili kusseke linnyi linnyi.
66008009	Kukup isɛɛn kkwɔn ka tɔkɔlɔ lakup lakkyaat ibbe kwɛɛnɛ kwɛɛnɛ isaal. Kukup ikkpaat kkwɔn ka tɔkɔlɔ lakup lakkyaat ibɛpɛ isaal ka tɔkɔlɔ lihu.
66008010	Úkup-ɔssɛ-ɔttɛlɛ ɔbbal lɛwɔl, waannttuma wa lɛbaang a lɛbaang wa ukutnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lalaak a lɔkɔɔn mung, ɔffaat ka libat a lukkpaagbeede uffu ɔttɔ ka lafoom iyɔngɔ la bwaan iggbɔlɔ.
66008011	(Lɛkɔɔl a waannttuma ’wɔng baang ulenɛ “Bɔkkpan”.) Kufoom a bannyi ’kwɔng baang kusikili kusseke ka kɔkkpannɛ lɔkkpan. Ɔzzánga balɔɔt ggbadam babbe ka bavvanɛ bannyi ’bɔng baang ba balenɛ lɛkkpan.
66008012	Uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔnaangnɛ ka banna ɔbbal luffi gwa ammɛ lɛwɔl. Kufaak a livve-luwee kkwɔn ka tɔkɔlɔ lifaak likkyaat kɔbɛpɛ. Ettuma la bwaannttuma ɔkkpɛlɛ bɛssɛ bɛyanga kɛbɛpɛ. Kwakkwɛ bɛtakanɛ kufoom a buppwolo abbyɛ kkwɔn kɛtɔm, kwa kkwɔn kikoon.
66008013	Nppyɛɛknɛ, nyɛn ekkpolobat ka ekutnɛ ka libat ɛlɔɔk ɛttɛ, “Wololo oo! wololo oo! wololo oo! akama. Balɔɔt ɛkpansi vvenɛ bayɛn akama wa ɔsaknɛ, bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba bakkyaat bakeelenɛ iffi ya abbɛ lɛwɔl.”
66009001	Uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔnaangnɛ ka kubbwɔɔk ɔwɔl luffi ammɛ. Nyɛn waannttuma wa ussinɛ ka libat ule lɛttɔ ka ɛkpansi. Bannyimɛ waanɛkpɔkɔlɔ wa kiwongolo lubbe gwa lɔddɔngnɛ.
66009002	Waannttuma ’wɔng baang uwongolo lubbe ’gwɔng baang isɔngɔ itta tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ittanɛ ka lɛkam a lɔkɔɔn. Isɔngɔ ya ittanɛ ka lubbe ’gwɔng baang inaang luwee la kɛffa bibil.
66009003	Ogelese ussi ka isɔngɔ ’yɔng baang usini uffu ka ɛkpansi. Bannyimɛ lakke ’zɔng baang tɛ̀ttɛ̀ za ɛlaang.
66009004	Babwɔɔlɔ ogelese battɛ tɛ̀ttɛ́ ɔbɛpɛ lifaat, gɔɔ kɛssɛ, gɔɔ lɛsan a kɛssɛ kɛlɔk. Ɔzzànga ɔwwɔɔl balɔɔt ba basinɛ eleme Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛyanga ka lɛttɔ lusso.
66009005	Basi liyila ogelese ɔwwɔɔl balɔɔt ’bɔng baang, ɔzzànga ɔdɔkɔ ɔyɔɔbɛ akama ka ittuma kubbwɔɔk. Bɔssɔp bwa bappyeenɛ ka akama ’wɔng baang bule tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɔssɔp bwa ɔlɔɔt uppyeenɛ ka ɛlaang ɛtɔɔpmɛnɛ.
66009006	Ka ittuma ’yɔng baang kubbwɔɔk, balɔɔt ’bɔng baang vvenɛ baggyan lubbe, ɔzzànga baala babbe. Vvenɛ baggyan battɛ lubbe lɔtɔkbɛ ɔzzànga vvenɛ lufimbɛ.
66009007	Ogelese ’wɔng baang ɔbal iyim ya ikatnɛ killu lɛkɔɔng. Ɔyanga bɔfɛɛn bwa bubalnɛ kɛttɔpɔ a gold ka lɛttɔ ammɛ. Lusso ammɛ lɔbal lusso balɔɔt.
66009008	Bittulu ammɛ bɛbal bittulu a bwanavva. Lasaal ammɛ lale tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lasaal a lenngwing.
66009009	Ogelese ’wɔng baang ugupu bɔfɛɛn bwa bubalnɛ ɛllɛlla ka ukukulu. Lɔsap gwa bifekele ammɛ bɛnaangnɛ, lɔtaa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɔsap gwa iyim inaangnɛ ka ilenɛ ka lɔkkwɔɔn a kimii lɛkɔɔng la lakulu ka ittulunɛ ka lisse.
66009010	Ɔyanga busɛɛl la bugɔmɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɛlaang, bwa ɔkɔɔmnɛ ɔtɔɔp balɔɔt ka ittuma kubbwɔɔk.
66009011	Ogelese ’wɔng bang ɔyanga ubeet wa ɔkɔɔmnɛbɛ. Ammɛ ulenɛ uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔkatnɛ lúbbé ’gwɔng baang. Lɛkɔɔl ammɛ ka Hebrew ɔ̀zzànga Abaddon, ka Greek ɔ̀zzànga Appolyon (ifɛɛt ilenɛ “Ɔbɛpɛ-ɔbɛpɛ”).
66009012	Akama wa ikeeng ikeeng ɔsaalbong. Usseke ikama iffa ka ’kwɔng kulenɛ lɛsaal.
66009013	Uyilabɔtɔɔm wa ɔnaangnɛ ka bwɔlaaning, ɔwɔl luffi gwa ammɛ. Nppyee lɛmmwɔɔl ka lɛttanɛ ka lusso a gold a labun Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
66009014	Lɛmmwɔɔl lɛlɔɔk la Uyilabɔtɔɔm ’wɔng baang wa bwɔlaaning lɛttɛ, “Akkyaayɔng bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba banna ba bakɔnnɛ ka lɔyɔngɔ Euphrates afɔngɔyɔng.”
66009015	Bakkyaa bayilabɔtɔɔm ba banna ’bɔng baang bafɔngɔ. Baggbabɛ lɛbama baloko ka kɛtɔm ’sɔng mung la ettuma ’yɔng mung la kukkpa ’kwɔng mung battɛ bawwɔɔl kukup a balɔɔt kkwɔn ka lakup ɔssɛbibit ɔkkpɛlɛ lakkyaat.
66009016	Babwɔɔlɔnɛ battɛ kɛkaan a ballu kullu ’kwɔng baang kɛdɔkɔ 200,000,000.
66009017	Ka biyɛnɛ anaam, nyɛn iyim ’yɔng baang la battele-uttele, bayanga bɛfaak a bɛkkpala bya bagupunɛ ka luppyam, bya bikootnɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɔkɔɔn. Bibil tɛ̀ttɛ̀ akpana, bikoot lɛgɔk a lɛgɔk. Lattɔ iyim ’zɔng baang lale tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lattɔ lannwing, lɔkɔɔn lɔ̀ttáyɛ ka kamma, la isɔngɔ la bɛggbansukulu.
66009018	Bawwɔɔl kukup a balɔɔt ka tɔkɔlɔ lakup za lakkyaat ba bakɔɔmnɛ ɛtɔk ka lɛmaat abbɛ, ka ɛkɛtɛ lilɔɔk ’sɔng baang sa likkyaat, lɔkɔɔn, la isɔngɔ, la bɛggbansukulu bɛttanɛ ka kamma iyim.
66009019	Lakke iyim lale ka kamma la lasɛɛl. Lasɛɛl annyɛ lale tɛ̀ttɛ̀ izzɔkɔ la lattɔ, bakɔɔmbyɛ abbyɛ baddopo balɔɔt.
66009020	Ɔssɛbibit ɔkkpɛlɛ wa ɔtakanɛ libbe ka lilɔɔk ’sɔng mung, basi lɛkkyaa kɛnaang a bɛfɛɛn bya abbɛ biini banaangnɛ bafɔngɔ. Basi kɛzɔɔm a babbu la ilat lɛkkyaa bafɔngɔ, gɔɔ bwaanilɔɔp a gold la bronze la lattaal la bumele bya bisinɛ likkwoong bɛyɛn, bippyee, bɛssɛ.
66009021	Gɔɔ balɔɔt ’bɔng baang akama usibɛ lɛnaang ka kɛwwɔɔl sa bawwɔɔlnɛ ba abbɛ, gɔɔ ilat gɔɔ babbu linaang abbɛ, gɔɔ ssip abbɛ.
66010001	Nyɛn uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔk wa lɛbaang ka ussinɛ ka libat. Ɔdɔkɔ ule ka tɔkɔlɔ ikkpálá, la egugulu ka ekkpitmɛnɛ ka lɛttɔ, lusso ammɛ lɔdɔkɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ livve-luwee, bukkpɔ ammɛ budɔkɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lalaak a lɔkɔɔn.
66010002	Ɔyanga waan a luvva wa ulenɛ ppwool ka kɔbɔɔk ammɛ. Ɔyan kikkpɔ ammɛ sa ɛlaabɔɔk ka lihu, sa ɛbyakɔm ka likum.
66010003	Ɔkkwɔɔ ɔgaga tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lanngwing. Ulenɛ livve lɛkkwɔɔ, ikkpálá ya innammikkyaat ikeetmɛ.
66010004	Ìkkpálá ilɔɔknɛ ɛlɔɔk ɛlɔɔk ivve, nttɛ nffu nkkpɔk, ɔzzánga nppyee lɛmmwɔɔl ka lissinɛ ka libat lɛlɔɔk lɛttɛ, “Aloko kɔlɔɔk kwa ikkpálá ya innammikkyaat ilɔɔknɛ ka lalup, tɛ̀ttɛ́ akkpɔkkwɛ.”
66010005	Ɔzzánga uyilabɔtɔɔm wa nyɛnnɛ ka ubeenɛ ka lihu la likum, uyeek kɔbɔɔk ɛlaabɔɔk ammɛ ka libat.
66010006	Uyilabɔtɔɔm ’wɔng baang uyim Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa uddunɛ ka kɛfal a kɛfal, wa ɔlɔɔmnɛ libat la befɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya bilenɛ ka azzɛ, wa ɔlɔɔmnɛ ɛkpansi la bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya bilenɛ ka annyɛ, ɔlɔɔm lihu la bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya bilenɛ ka azzɛ. Ɔlɔɔk ɛttɛ, “Kɔlɔɔk kwa kɛtaa kɛkat ba kɔbɛlɛ lile.
66010007	Uyilabɔtɔɔm wa innammikkyaat ɔwɔlnɛ luffi ammɛ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ uvve kɛnaang a lalup ammɛ sa ulenɛ littina, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔyaamnɛ ɔbwɔɔlɔ ibbɔɔyi ammɛ, bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
66010008	Lɛmmwɔɔl za nppyeenɛ ka lɛlɔɔknɛ la anaam ka libat lɛbbal lɛttɛ, “Amii atɔk luvva gwa ppwool ’gwɔng baang ka kɔbɔɔk uyilabɔtɔɔm wa ubeenɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ lihu la likum.”
66010009	Nmii nkup uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ’wɔng baang, nbapmɛ nttɛ unnyinɛ waan a luvva ’wɔng baang. Ɔlɔɔk la anaam ɔttɛ, “Atɔkgwɛ azzi, vvenɛ lusikili lɔkkpanwɔ ka tɔkɔlɔ lɛmmɛ, ɔzzànga vvenɛ luggwoomwɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ itɔngɔtɔngɔ ka kamma.”
66010010	Ntɔk waan a luvva ’wɔng baang ka eddu ammɛ nzzi. Luggwoommɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ itɔngɔtɔngɔ ka kamma. Nmɛɛlnɛ lusikili lɔkkpannɛ ka lɛmmɛ.
66010011	Ɔzzánga ɔbwɔɔlɔnɛ ɔttɛ, “Vvenɛ abwɔɔlɔ bɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bwa butumnɛ ifɔɔn ggbadam, la ikaan la ikaan la babeet.”
66011001	Unnyinɛ bissɛ pya lɔlɔɔm tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lukut, ɔbwɔɔlɔnɛ ɔttɛ, “Afeele amii alɔɔm ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la labun-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Akkwoon balɔɔt ba balenɛ baang ka luzɔɔm ka tɔkɔlɔ ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
66011002	Afɔngɔ kɛsana ssala a ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɛlɔɔm. Basambongsɛ bannyi balɔɔt ba bafimnɛ kwa Jesus, ba bale basing ubeet-a-lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang bukkpɔ ka likkpa likkyaat la ittuma bwɔlaaning.
66011003	Vvenɛ ntɔɔm ittɛɛsɛ anaam iffa la bissaka iwɔkɔlɔ ka bawɔkɔlɔnɛ. Vvenɛ bayaam babwɔɔlɔ kuttu Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka likkpa ’sɔng baang likkyaat la ittuma bwɔlaaning.”
66011004	Ittɛɛsɛ ’yɔng baang iffa ilenɛ lasan-a-olive laffa la itinika iffa ya ibeenɛ ka lusso Uyini ɛkpansi.
66011005	Ɔlɔɔt wa ubumnɛ ɔttɛ ɔbɛpɛyɛ, lɔkɔɔn lɔttayɛ ka kamma luffu lɔbɛpɛ balɔɔt a kɔfɔk abbɛ ning baang. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ubumnɛbyɛ kɛbɛpɛ, vvenɛ bɛwwɔɔlmɛ.
66011006	Ittɛɛsɛ ’yɔng mung iyanga lakke za itununɛ lukpaggbeede kiteep a bannyi, ka ɛkɛtɛ ya ilenɛ ka kɛ̀yaam a kuttu bɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Iyanga lakke ka iggbɔlɔ bannyi ɔgbaa, lakke kisikili bannyi ka iggbɔlɔ basseke linnyi. Iyanga lakke za inaangnɛ ɛkpansi esseke iffaak iffaak tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɔsaapnɛyɛ.
66011007	Ivvenɛ bɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛyaam ibwɔɔlɔ, ɛsɛɛn ya essinɛ ka lubbe gwa ddɔng ’gwɔng baang vvenɛ ɛtta effu elluyɛ kullu. Vvenɛ ɛbɛtɛbɛ, ɛwwɔɔlbɛ.
66011008	Babbu ittɛɛsɛ ’yɔng baang vvenɛ limini ka ɛtɔk a laffɛ za lɛbaang a lɛbaang ka ɛfɛɛn a bakamanɛ Uyini abbɛ bakaka ka Cross. Ifɛɛt a lɛkɔɔl a lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang ulenɛ Sodom ɔlɔk Egypt.
66011009	Balɔɔt ifɔɔn la ikaan ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ɛkpansi vvenɛ bappyɛɛk babbu ’bɔng baang ka bɛtɔm bɛkkyaat la kufaak. Baala bayila basambɛ bamii balli.
66011010	Balɔɔt ɛkpansi vvenɛ baggele gaang gaang ka lubbe balɔɔt ’bɔng mung baffa. Vvenɛ banaang lawaa, batɔɔm lasɔɔk bafee ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn ka ulenɛ bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ’bɔng baang baffa bakɔɔmnɛ akama bafee balɔɔt ɛkpansi.
66011011	Bɛtɔm bɛkkyaat la kufaak bɛ́saknɛ, lɛfɛkɛlɛ kuddu lissi ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm liffu lɛmalbɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ, ɔzzánga bafeele babee ubee. Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba bayɛnnɛbɛ ɔbbwɔpɔbɛ gaang gaang.
66011012	Bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ’bɔng baang baffa bappyee lɛmmwɔɔl ka lissinɛ ka libat lɛlɔɔk la abbɛ lɛttɛ, “Affuyɔng mung.” Tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt a kɔfɔk abbɛ balenɛ baang ka babeenɛ bappyɛɛkbɛ, bamii ka libat ka ikkpala lukkpaaggbeede.
66011013	Ka ɛkɛtɛ ’yɔng baang bbwak ɛkpansi ɛnnyɛkɛ. Kufaak a lɛffɛ kkwɔn ka tɔkɔlɔ lifaak zzɔɔp sa linaangnɛ lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang kɔbɛpɛ. Innɔ balɔɔt zilliffa la kufaak babbe ɔssanga kɛnnyɛkɛ ɛkpansi ’sɔng baang. Balɔɔt ba bassekenɛ ɔbbwɔpɔbɛ gaang gaang, babungu bakkpenge Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka libat.
66011014	Akama wa ibaala ɔsakbong, ɔzzànga ppyɛɛk! wa ukupnɛ wa ibaala ba ɔbɛlɛ lɛmmɛ uffu.
66011015	Uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔnaangnɛ ka bannambakkyaat ɔwɔlnɛ luffi gwa ammɛ, lammwɔɔl lagaga ka libat lattɛ, “Lakke za kɛkɔɔm a vveeng ’wɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ lasseke za Uyini ayyɔɔt gedegede mung la Ɔlɔɔt wa Ammɛ biini ɔsanganɛ. Vvenɛ ɔkɔɔm vveeng ’wɔng kɛfal a kɛfal.”
66011016	Lɔlɔp la bagɛlɛnya banna ba bataanɛ ka igbaal a kibeet abbɛ ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm balli lattɔ, bazɔɔm bannyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
66011017	Battɛ, “Uyini, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, wa ɔyanganɛ lakke ɔkkpɛlɛ, wa ulenɛ lule mung, ɔ́ggba lissi ule. Iwomowɔ kɛnaang ka alenɛ lakke annɔ za lɛbaang a lɛbaang lɛkɔɔm atte kɛkɔɔm a vveeng ɔkkpɛlɛ.
66011018	Balɔɔt ba basinɛ kwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛsan banyanga gaang gaang ka ɛkɛtɛ kitun a kɔlɔɔk annɔ elenɛ lɛffɔ, kɛkaal a babbu kile la kɔzza. Ɛkɛtɛ ɛffɔbong ya kikipili ibɔɔyi annɔ, bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, la balɔɔt annɔ ɔkkpɛlɛ ba batelewɔnɛ, ba baggbengenɛ la ba bassupnɛ. Ɛkɛtɛ ɛffɔbong ya ale ka awwɔɔlnɛ balɔɔt ba babɛpɛnɛ Ɛkpansi!”
66011019	Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka libat luwongolo. Iyɛn Likulu a nsekele ka tɔkɔlɔ immwalang, utum, ɔtta ikkpálá, ɛkpansi ɛnnyɛkɛ, ɔffa kɛffa sa lɛbaang.
66012001	Bɛmaanga bya lɛbaang bituma ka lukkpaaggbeede. Wanavva ɔdɔkɔ baang wa uwɔkɔlɔ ammɛ ɔdɔkɔnɛ livve-luwee. Bukkpɔ utele ka ettuma, la kɛttɔpɔ bwaannttuma zzɔɔppabaffa ka lɛttɔ.
66012002	Ɔdɔkɔ ka kɛppwɔlɔ imala. Bɔssɔp la akama lɛmaat bɛnaangmɛ ɔkkwa.
66012003	Bɛmaanga bɛlɔk bya bɛkɛɛlɛnɛ gaang gaang bɛnaang ka lukkpaaggbeede. Uggboggbo ukolo ɛsɛɛn ya ɛ̀zzànganɛ “Dragon” ɛdɔkɔ baang. Ɛyanga lattɔ lannangakkyaat la iffi zzɔɔp la ododo ka lɛttɔ la zzɔn.
66012004	Ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang ɛkɔɔm lɛsɛɛl annyɛ ɛkpakala kukup a bwaannttuma ka tɔkɔlɔ lakup lakkyaat ɛzzɔɔk ka ɛkpansi. Emii ebee ka lusso wanavva wa ɔppwɔlɔnɛ imala ’wɔng baang nkwaaning ɔmaatnɛ ɛmaat ɛmaat, ɛsam waan ammɛ ezzi.
66012005	Wanavva ’wɔng baang ɔmaat waanawalam, wa ule ɔkɔɔm ɛkpansi ka lakke. Bannaa waan ’wɔng baang bakɔɔm bafee Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ugbaal a kibeet ammɛ.
66012006	Wanavva ’wɔng baang ɔmma ɔssɛɛn ka tɔkɔlɔ kɛmat ka ɛfɛɛn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ lɛlɔngɔ ulokomɛ. Ɛfɛɛn ’yɔng baang elenɛ ya Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ule ɔppyɛɛkmɛ ka lavve 1,260 (Likkpa likkyaat la ittuma bwɔlaaning).
66012007	Ɔzzánga lɛkɔɔng lɛttɔ ka libat. Michael la bayilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ ballu kullu la ɔbbyap-ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang. Ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang la bayilabɔtɔɔm annyɛ esikili ebee bbwak ellubɛ kullu.
66012008	Ɔzzánga babɛtɛ ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang. Basiyɛ lɛfɔngɔ ɛtaa ka libat.
66012009	Basamyɛ bazzɔɔk ka vveeng. Annyɛ elenɛ Ɔgɛlɛnya ɛzzɔkɔ ya ikkwɔɔnɛyɛ Ubbu ɔlɔk Satan, ya ɛfɛɛtnɛ ɛkpansi ɔkkpɛlɛ. Basamyɛ bazzɔɔk ka ɛkpansi la bayilabɔtɔɔm annyi ɔkkpɛlɛ.
66012010	Ɔzzánga nppyee lɛmmwɔɔl ka lɛgaganɛ ka libat lɛttɛ, “Gedegede mung ikkala Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm iffubong! Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyɔɔbong lakke ammɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Ubeet. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsanganɛ ɔyɔɔbong kizzi lɛttɔ ammɛ. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔkatanɛ ikpana ayyɔɔt kɔlɔɔk, wa ubeenɛ ka lusso Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkatabɛ kɔlɔɔk kikoon la kɛtɔm basangamɛbong ka libat bazzɔɔk.
66012011	Ikpana ayyɔɔt ikɔɔm linnyi Waan-ɛtɔɔn la lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk kwa bakopolonɛ battamɛ likke. Badɔkɔ bayila lubbe.
66012012	Ɔkkpɛlɛ annyɔɔng ba alenɛyɔng ka libat, killu kilewɔyɔng bakang, aggeleyɔng. Akama vvenɛ ɔttala ka ɛkpansi la lihu. Ubbu usinibong uffu ukupwɔyɔng la kitun a kɔlɔɔk ka luppyam, ka ɔsannɛ ɔttɛ ɛkɛtɛ essekemɛ ssup.”
66012013	Ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang elenɛ lɛsan ɛttɛ basangabongyɛ bazzɔɔk ka ɛkpansi, esikili ɛggba wanavva wa ɔmaatnɛ waanawalam ’wɔng baang.
66012014	Ɔzzánga bannyi wanavva ’wɔng baang bifekele ekkpolubat ya lɛbaang a lɛbaang, ɔkkɔɔnɛ ukut umii ka ɛfɛɛn a ɔtaanɛ ka kɛmat bakatmɛ ka likkpa likkyaat la kufaak, ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang esimɛ lɛkaa.
66012015	Ɔzzánga ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang ɛkkwɔɔk ɛlɔlɔ ɛttɛ ezzi wanavva ’wɔng baang.
66012016	Ɛkpansi ettele wanavva ’wɔng baang. Ewongolo kamma ɛwɔpɔlɔ ɛlɔlɔ ’yɔng baang ya ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang ɛkkwɔɔknɛ.
66012017	Ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang kutunyɛ la wanavva ’wɔng baang ɛgbata emii ellu kullu la balɔɔt a kikkwu a wanavva ’wɔng baang, la balɔɔt ba batelenɛ lafɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bayanga kiyila batum lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk kwa Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔnɛ.
66012018	Ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang ɛkɔɔng ka likum a lihu ebee.
66013001	Nyɛn ɛsɛɛn a likum ka tɔkɔlɔ lihu. Ɛyanga iffi zzɔɔp la lattɔ lannangakkyaat, la kɛttɔpɔ ododo ka luffi la ggwɔn. Lɛkɔɔl ibbyap lileyɛ baang ka bakkpɔknɛyɛ ka lɛttɔ.
66013002	Ɛsɛɛn ya nyɛnnɛ ɛbal ɛgɔɔt, la bukkpɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bwa bikkwɛɛ; la kamma tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kamma lenngwing. Dragon ’wɔng baang unnyi ɛsɛɛn a kɛmat ’yɔng baang lakke ammɛ biini, la kibeet ammɛ, la kizzilɛttɔ ammɛ sa lɛbaang.
66013003	Lɛttɔ ɛsɛɛn zzɔn ɔbal tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lilenɛ la kiddopo sa lɛbaang. Ɔzzànga bɔssɔp ’bwɔng baang busaalbong. Ɛkpansi ɔkkpɛlɛ kɔkɛɛlɛyɛ bakup ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang.
66013004	Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ batele ɛsɛɛn ya bakkwɔɔnɛyɛ ‘dragon’ ka elenɛ lakke annyɛ lɛsam ennyi ɛsɛɛn a kɛmat. Batele ɛsɛɛn a kɛmat ’yɔng baang balɔɔk battɛ, “Nnyinɛ ulenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɛsɛɛn a kɛmat ’yɔng? Nnyinɛ ukkwoongnɛ ulluyɛ kullu?”
66013005	Bafɔngɔ ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang ɛlɔɔk babbu lilɔɔk, ɛyanga lakke ka likkpa likkyaat la ittuma iffa.
66013006	Ɛbbaat Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɛbbaat lɛkɔɔl ammɛ la ɛfɛɛn ya ullunɛ, la balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba balenɛ la ammɛ.
66013007	Bafɔngɔyɛ ellu balɔɔt-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kullu ɛttabɛ lakke. Bannyiyɛ kizzilɛttɔ la ɛsam la ɛsam, lɔfɔɔn la duu la ikaan, la kɛkkpa la duu.
66013008	Balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba balenɛ ka ɛkpansi vvenɛ bateleyɛ, balɔɔt ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba ɔtakanɛ lakɔɔl abbɛ lɛkkpɔk ɔssɛɛn ka luvva-kuddu tɛ́ttɛ́ ɔlɔɔmnɛ vveeng ’wɔng mung. Luvva ’gwɔng lule gwa Waan-ɛtɔɔn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa balemɛnɛ lɛwwɔɔl.
66013009	“Gɔpɔlɔyɔng! ayanganɛyɔng latɔɔk za kippyee kɔlɔɔk.
66013010	Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ulenɛ wa kɛkaa, vvenɛ bakaamɛ. Ɔlɔɔt wa ulenɛ wa kɛwwɔɔl la ogge, vvenɛ bakɔɔm ogge bawwɔɔlmɛ. Nkwɔng kɔggyan kɛbbɔ akama la kɛyanga kiyila ka lufoom a balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
66013011	Ɔzzánga nyɛn ɛsɛɛn ɛlɔk ka ɛttanɛ ka ɛkpansi. Ɛyanga iffi iffa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ya waan-ɛtɔɔn. Ɛlɔɔk tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔbbyap ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang.
66013012	Ɛkɔɔm lakke za ɔkɔɔm ɛtɔk ɛsɛɛn a kɛmat ka lusso annyɛ. Ɛbɛtɛ ɛkpansi la balɔɔt ba ballunɛ ka annyɛ ɛttɛ batele ɛsɛɛn ya ikeeng, ya kiddopo annyɛ sa lubbe kilenɛ libbe.
66013013	Ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang ya ibaala ɛnaáng bɛmaanga bya lɛbaang. Ɛnaang lɔkɔɔn lussi ka libat lɔttɔ ka ɛkpansi ka lusso balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ.
66013014	Ɛkɔɔm bɛmaanga bya bayilanɛyɛ battɛ ɛnaang ka lusso ɛsɛɛn ya ikeeng, ɛfɛɛt balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba balenɛ ka ɛkpansi. Ɛbwɔɔlɔ balɔɔt ɛkpansi ɔkkpɛlɛ ɛttɛ babɔɔk ɛlɔɔp ka latele ɛsɛɛn ya ɛddoponɛ ka ɔgge etii ka kuddu.
66013015	Bafɔngɔ ɛsɛɛn ya ibaala ɛfɛkɛlɛ kuddu ɛssɛɛn ɛlɔɔp ’yɔng baang, nkwaaning ɛlɔɔp ’yɔng baang ɛlɔɔk kɛlɔɔk ɛwwɔɔl balɔɔt ba bale basiyɛ litele.
66013016	Ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang etut balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba lɛbaang la ba utiti, ba ɔyyɛɛpnɛbɛ la ba ɔbbɔlnɛbɛ, babili la ba basinɛ babili lile, Ɛttɛ banaang eleme kɛyɔɔng ka kɔbɔɔk ɛlaabɔɔk la lɛttɔ-lusso.
66013017	Ɔlɔɔt wa ule ɔbbal bɔfɛɛn lɛtaan ɔlɔk ɔlɛɛp ba ɔbɛlɛ lile, usinɛ eleme ’yɔng baang ya ɛtaanɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lɛkɔɔl ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang lɛyanga ka ɔkkpɔknɛ.
66013018	Akɔɔm bikɔɔm ka ’kwɔng. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔsannɛ kɔlɔɔk, ukkwoong mung ɔbwɔɔlɔ bwa eleme ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang elenɛ. Annyɛ ebeenɛ ka etini ya ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang. Eleme lɛkɔɔl annyɛ ele 666.
66014001	Ɔzzánga nppyɛɛknɛ nyɛn Waan-ɛtɔɔn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ubeenɛ ka lɛttaal a Zion. Ka ɛfɛɛn a ubeenɛ, lalɔp innɔ balɔɔt zzillalakkyaat badɔkɔ baang ba bayanganɛ lakɔɔl ammɛ la za Abassɛ ammɛ ka lɛttɔ-lusso ka bakkpɔknɛ.
66014002	Nppyee lɛmmwɔɔl ka lɛttanɛ ka libat, lɛfɔl tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛttɔl a bannyi. Lɛ̀bál lɔsap ìkkpálá. Ɛkɛtɛ ɛlɔk appyeenɛ attɛ bánaang-ibin bakkpanɛ buggɔ.
66014003	Lalɔp innɔ balɔɔt ’bɔng baang zzillalakkyaat babee bappyɛɛk ugbaal a kibeet Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la isɛɛn ’yɔng baang inna la bagɛlɛnya. Basoom ufaa kisoom sa abbɛ batta-ka-kɔlɔɔk kɛyɔɔng bakkwoongnɛ bakkoop. Ule balɔɔt ’bɔng baang keem ba Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkalabɛ.
66014004	Abbɛ balenɛ balɔɔt ba balenɛbɛ kɛyɔɔng doddo liloko ka basinɛ bwanavva likup. Bale tɛ̀ttɛ̀ balɔɔt ba batakanɛ kwa kimini la ɔlɔɔt lɛsan. Abbɛ bakupnɛ Waan-ɛtɔɔn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ ya umiinɛ. Bakkalabongbɛ ka bɛzzɔkɔ ɔssɛbibit ɔkkpɛlɛ. Abbɛ balenɛ ɔkɔɔm ɛtɔk a lakkpele za Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la Waan-ɛtɔɔn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
66014005	Lɛlaak ba bataka bakkala; kwɛ ba basan.
66014006	Ɔzzánga nyɛn uyilabɔtɔɔm-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔk ka ukutnɛ fulufulufulu ka libat. Ɔbwɔɔlɔ ikaan ɔkkpɛlɛ la ifɔɔn ɔkkpɛlɛ la isam ɔkkpɛlɛ Kuttu-budoddo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kwa kɛfal a kɛfal.
66014007	Ɔgaga ɔttɛ, “Ebinukkpaapi ɛbbwɔpɔwɔyɔng. Abunguyɔng lakke annyɛ. Ɛkɛtɛ ɛffɔmɛbong ya ele ka ɛkaalnɛ kɛkaal ɔssɛbibit ɔkkpɛlɛ. Azɔɔm annyimɛyɔng ammɛ wa ɔnaangnɛ libat la ɛkpansi, la lihu la iggbɔlɔ.”
66014008	Uyilabɔtɔɔm wa ibaala ukup wa ɔkɔɔmnɛ ɛtɔk, ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Ɛttɔbong! Ɛkpansi a Babylon ya lɛbaang ɛttɔbong. Ennyibong balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ batak a Kɛssɛ-kɛzak annyɛ bavva.”
66014009	Uyilabɔtɔɔm wa ussekenɛ isimi ukup ba baffa ba bakɔɔmnɛ ɛtɔk, ɔgaga ɔttɛ, “Ɔlɔɔt duu wa utelenɛ ɛsɛɛn ya ikeeng la ɛlɔɔp annyɛ, ɔyanga eleme ka lɛttɔ-lusso ɔlɔk ka isimi kɔbɔɔk,
66014010	vvenɛ ɔvva batak a binyanga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba ulenɛ lɛsam ɔssɛɛn la lagabwɔ ka ommonggo batak a binyanga ’wɔng baang. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa utelenɛ ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang, vvenɛ ɔyɛn akama ka lɔkɔɔn a ndegeledum ka lusso bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la Waan-ɛtɔɔn ammɛ.
66014011	Isɔngɔ lɔkɔɔn gwa lɔyɔɔnɛbɛ akama imiibong ka libat kɛfal a kɛfal. Balɔɔt ba batelenɛ ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang la ɛlɔɔp annyɛ, bayanga lɛkɔɔl annyɛ ka bakkpɔknɛ, ka akama baala batta kikoon la kɛtɔm.
66014012	Nkwɔng kɔggyan kɛbbɔ akama ka kufoom kwa balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, ba batelenɛ lafɔɔ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, bayanga kiyila batum Jesus.
66014013	Ɔzzánga nppyee lɛmmwɔɔl ka lɛlɔɔknɛ ka libat lɛttɛ, “Akkpɔk ’kwɔng: Laggele lale za balɔɔt ba bale babbe kwa Uyini ka ussinɛ mung umii ka lusso.” Kuyeeng kɔttɛ, “Kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn. Akama kɛnaang abbɛ vvenɛ ɔnaangbɛ bayanga kɛfɛkɛlɛ ka budoddo linaang abbɛ bule ka buppyɛlɛnɛ bukupbɛ.”
66014014	Nppyɛɛknɛ, nyɛn balata ìkkpálá lukkpaaggbeede. Ka ìkkpálá ’yɔng baang, bɔfɛɛn budɔkɔ baang ka butaanɛ la kɛttɔpɔ sa banaangnɛsɛ la gold la ɛggɛ ya ɛlamnɛ ka kɔbɔɔk ka bukɔɔmnɛ
66014015	Ɔzzánga Uyilabɔtɔɔm ɔlɔk ɔgbata ka labun, ubungu ɔgaga unnyi ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtaanɛ ka ìkkpálá lukkpaaggbeede ɔttɛ, “Akɔɔm ɛggɛ annɔ ayaat liyaat. Ɛkɛtɛ liyaat ɛkpansi ɛffɔbong.”
66014016	Ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔt ’wɔng baang wa ɔtaanɛ ka ìkkpálá lukkpaaggbeede, uwung ogge ammɛ ɔfɔngɔ kuttɔɔk, liyaat ɛkpansi lìlé la kɔyaat.
66014017	Nbbal uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔk lɛyɛn ka ɔttanɛ ka libat. Ammɛ ɔgbaa ɔyanga ɛggɛ ya ɛlamnɛ.
66014018	Uyilabɔtɔɔm ɔlɔk wa ɔkatnɛ lɔkɔɔn utuma ka labun a Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka libat ɔtta. Ubungu ɔgaga unnyi uyilabɔtɔɔm wa ɔyanganɛ ɛggɛ ya ɛlamnɛ ɔttɛ, “Akɔɔm ɛggɛ annɔ abbɔk lakkpobɛssɛ ka bɔtɔɔm ɛkpansi, lalakbong.”
66014019	Ɔzzánga uyilabɔtɔɔm ’wɔng baang uwung ɛggɛ ammɛ ɔfɔngɔ ɛkpansi. Ɔbbɔk lakkpobɛssɛ ka bɛbɔɔk ɔsam ɔssɛɛn ka ɛfɛɛn a kɛnaang a batak a binyanga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
66014020	Bakaam lakkpobɛssɛ ’zɔng baang bassɛɛn ka ɛfɛɛn a banaangnɛ batak ka killu a vveeng. Linnyi litta ka ɛfɛɛn a kɛnaang a batak littɔl tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɛlɔlɔ. Ele lalɔp imal zzɔɔp ka bɔlɔm. Ele bukkpɔ kubbwɔɔk ka bɔddɔng.
66015001	Nbbal kɔlɔɔk a bikɛɛlɛ kɔlɔk lɛyɛn ka libat a lukkpaaggbeedde kuggbenge-uggbenge kɔkɛɛlɛ kɔgbaa. Bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm badɔkɔ bannambakkyaat la lilɔɔk akama sa linnangikkyaat, sa lilenɛ sa lakpeke. Assɛ lilenɛ lakuma ìyɔ́ɔ kitun a kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
66015002	Ɔzzánga nppyɛɛk, nyɛn bɔfɛɛn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ libbwe kiyenge ka utoolonɛ la lɔkɔɔn. Nssɛ nyɛn balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba babɛtɛnɛ ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang la ɛlɔɔp. Ɔbɛtɛ la ɔlɔɔt wa bannyimɛnɛ lɛkɔɔl ka lukkwoon. Badɔkɔ bale ka kibee ka libbwe kiyenge, bakɔɔm buggɔ bwa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyinɛbɛ.
66015003	Badɔkɔ basoom kisoom a Moses, bɔɔyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la kisoom a Waan-ɛtɔɔn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm battɛ, “Uyini, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔyanganɛ lakke ɔkkpɛlɛ, linaang annɔ liggbenge, likɛɛlɛ. Ubeet a vveengodde ɔkkpɛlɛ, itɔk annɔ ile ya bbwak ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
66015004	Uyini, nyinɔɔng ulenɛ wa annɔ ale asimɛ lɛbbwɔpɔ? Nnyinɔɔng ule usi lɛbwɔɔlɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ aggbengenɛ affɔ? Annɔ keem appyɛɛnɛ asɛlɛ bubbi. Vveengodde ɔkkpɛlɛ vvenɛ baffu babee ka lusso annɔ bazɔɔm bannyiwɔ ka linaang annɔ lilenɛ sa bbwak, balésɛ lɛyɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ.”
66015005	Nkwɔng kulenɛ lɛsaal, nyɛn ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka libat ka luwongolonɛ la Ugala Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka tɔkɔlɔ aggwɛ.
66015006	Bayilabɔtɔɔm bannambakkyaat ba bayanganɛ ikama innammikkyaat batta ka tɔkɔlɔ a Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm baffu. Badɔkɔ bawɔkɔlɔ iwɔkɔlɔ ya illaatnɛ inyanya. Bayanga gold ka baggbɔnɛ bakkpit ka ikukulu.
66015007	Ɛsɛɛn nnyɔn ɛfakala ka isɛɛn a kuddu ya inna ennyi bayilabɔtɔɔm ba bannambakkyaat bɛfɔɔm bɛnnammbɛkkyaat bya banaangnɛbyɛ la gold la kitun a kɔlɔɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔtaanɛ ka kuddu kɛfal a kɛfal ffit ka tɔkɔlɔ annyɛ.
66015008	Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɔdɔkɔ lusseke isɔngɔ isɔngɔ ka tɔkɔlɔ ya issinɛ ka latele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la lakke ammɛ. Ɔlɔɔt wa ule umii ka tɔkɔlɔ a ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm baala ule ɔddɔkɔddɔkɔ ikama lilɔɔk sa linnaangikkyaat sa bayilabɔtɔɔm bannambakkyaat bakɔɔmnɛ baffu lisaal.
66016001	Nppyee lɛmmwɔɔl ka lissinɛ ka labun Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛlɔɔk la bayilabɔtɔɔm wa bannammikkyaat lɛttɛ, “Amii asikiliyɔng binyanga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm allɔtyɔng ka ɛkpansi.”
66016002	Uyilabɔtɔɔm wa ikeeng umii usikili binyanga Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ulɔlɔ wa ammɛ ɔllɔt ka lisse. Lassɔp la akama wa lɛbaang bɛtta bikup balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ eleme ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang ka kkwɔɔt, la balɔɔt ba balenɛ lɛzɔɔm bannyi ɛlɔɔp annyɛ.
66016003	Uyilabɔtɔɔm wa ibaala usikili kɛfɔɔm sa ammɛ ɔssɛɛn ka lihu. Bannyi basikili basseke tɛ̀ttɛ̀ linnyi ubbu ɔlɔɔt. Bɔfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bwa bulenɛ ka lihu bwa buyanganɛ kuddu, bubbe.
66016004	Wa ikkyaat usikili kɛfɔɔm sa ammɛ ɔssɛɛn ka issa la iggbɔlɔ. Ɔzzánga bannyi basikili linnyi.
66016005	Nppyee uyilabɔtɔɔm wa ɔkatnɛ bannyi ka ɔlɔɔknɛ ɔttɛ, “Ale bbwak ka kɛkaal sa akaalnɛ, annɔ ɔlɔɔt wa doddo, wa ulenɛ lule mung la wa ɔdɔkɔnɛ.
66016006	Abbɛ banaangnɛ balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm linnyi lissibɛ. Kwakkwɛ bannyinɛbɛ linnyi bavva. Bayɛnbong bwa baggyannɛ.”
66016007	Nppyee lɛmmwɔɔl ka lɛlɔɔknɛ ka labun lɛttɛ, “Uyini, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔyanganɛ lakke ɔkkpɛlɛ, kɛkaal annɔ kile ka lɔkkwɔɔn bbwak.”
66016008	Uyilabɔtɔɔm wa inna ’wɔng baang usikili kɛfɔɔm sa ammɛ ɔllɔt ka livve-luwee. Bafɔngɔ kɛfɔɔp azzɛ sa lɛbaang kitup balɔɔt.
66016009	Ɔzzánga balɔɔt bakkɔm ka kɛfɔɔp a livve-luwee, babbaat Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔyanganɛ lakke ɔtta ikama ’yɔng baang. Basi bubbi abbɛ lɛkkyaa bafɔngɔ babungu lakke ammɛ.
66016010	Uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa kubbwɔɔk usikili kɛfɔɔm sa ammɛ ɔllɔt ka kɛtaa kibeet ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang. Kisul kɛttɔ ka itutum annyɛ, balɔɔt bazzi lasaal ka ɔssɔpnɛbɛ.
66016011	Babbaat Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka libat ka akama wa bayɛnnɛ la bɔssɔp bwa bappyeenɛ. Ɔzzànga kɛnaang a bubbi basi lɛkkyaa bafɔngɔ.
66016012	Uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa bwɔlaaning usikili kɛfɔɔm sa ammɛ ɔllɔt ka lɔyɔngɔ Euphrates. Lɔyɔngɔ lɔkkaam luloko babeet ɛtɔk ba bassinɛ ka lusso gwa livve-luwee lɔfɔm ɛtɔk bassɛ.
66016013	Ɔzzánga nyɛn liyeeng sa lisinɛ lɛyyɛɛp likkyaat, lile tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ibubwaak ka littanɛ ka kamma ɛzzɔkɔ la ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang la ɔkkala-lɛlaak wa ɔttɛnɛ ammɛ uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
66016014	Assɛ lilenɛ liyeeng a banaang-a-kɛsɛɛm sa linaangnɛ bɛmaanga. Liyeeng ’sɔng mung limiinɛ likup babeet ka ɛkpansi ɔkkpɛlɛ likkwɔɔbɛ baffu lɛkɔɔng ka kɛtɔm sa lɛbaang sa Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, wa ɔttanɛ lakke ɔkkpɛlɛ.
66016015	“Gɔpɔlɔyɔng, nle nffu tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ussip. Laggele lale za balɔɔt ba bataanɛ kwet kwet bakat iwɔkɔlɔ abbɛ, nkwaaning basi kɛkɔɔ lɛssɛ bakkpit izzit inaangbɛ, ka kpelegedee.”
66016016	Liyeeng ’sɔng baang likɔɔm babeet baffu babbi ɛfɛɛn nnyɔn, ka ɛfɛɛn a bakkwɔɔnɛ Armageddon ka kukaan a Hebrew.
66016017	Uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa innammikkyaat usikili ulɔlɔ wa ammɛ ɔllɔt ka kɛffa. Agagaga lɛmmwɔɔl lɛtta ka ugbaal a kibeet lɛttɛ, “Kɔsaalbong.”
66016018	Immwalang inaang, àkkpálá ɔtta, ɛkpansi ɛnnyɛkɛ. Ka ɔlɔɔt ussinɛ ɔfal, ɛkpansi ning baang ba ɛtaka ɛnnyɛkɛ. Uwɔng baang ɔdɔkɔnɛ kɛnnyɛkɛ ɛkpansi sa kɛttanɛ lɛbbɔl.
66016019	Lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang lɛfaka bɛfaak bɛkkyaat. Billu ka ikaan ɔkkpɛlɛ bɛbɛpɛ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ukke Babylon killu sa lɛbaang, ɔnaangsɛ kɛvva batak ommonggo ammɛ. Batak ’bɔng baang, batak a binyanga ammɛ.
66016020	Lakkpɔ ɛkpansi ɔkkpɛlɛ lataak ka bannyi. Ikpok ɔkkpɛlɛ ikkyaap.
66016021	Uteep lattaal za lalɔɔpnɛ gaang gaang uvvoong balɔɔt. Balɔɔt babbaat Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kwa lattaal ’zɔng baang. Ɔdɔkɔ akama wa lɛbaang.
66017001	Uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvɔn ka tɔkɔlɔ bayilabɔtɔɔm bannambakkyaat ba bayanganɛ bɛfɔɔm bɛnnambɛkkyaat, uffu ka ɛfɛɛn anaam, ɔttɛ, “Affu nyɔɔwɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bayɔɔnɛ wanavva àkkpàlà akama wa lɛbaang. Wanavva àkkpàlà ’wɔng baang ulenɛ lɛffɛ za lɛbaang ’zɔng baang za babɔɔknɛzɛ bakkɛtɛ iyɔngɔ ggbadam.
66017002	Babeet ɛkpansi bàkúp wanavva àkkpàlà wa lɛbaang ’wɔng baang. Balɔɔt a vveengodde babimi ka bavvanɛ batak a kɛssɛ-kɛzak ammɛ.”
66017003	Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kɔnnaanɛ lakke kɔsamnɛ umii ka kasɛkɛ kɛmat. Nyɛn wanavva ka ɔtaanɛ ka libat ukolo ɛsɛɛn la lakɔɔl ibbyap ka bakkpɔknɛyɛ ka kkwɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang ɛyanga lattɔ lannangakkyaat la iffi zzɔɔp.
66017004	Wanavva ’wɔng baang ɔdɔkɔ ɔwɔkɔlɔ babili la bakolo iwɔkɔlɔ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ubeet. Bagbɔgbɔmɛ bɛfɛɛn a kitook bya banaangnɛ byɛ la gold, ɔbɛtɛ la ifɔɔk akpana la lattaal za lakkaamnɛ kappya. Ɔkɔɔm ommonggo wa banaangmɛnɛ la gold. Laggbo la bɛfɛɛn bya bɛppwanɛ ɔlɔɔt bya bissimɛnɛ ka kɛssɛ-kɛzak ammɛ biyipibong baang.
66017005	Ka lɛttɔ lusso ammɛ, bakkpɔkmɛ lɛkɔɔl za lɛyanganɛ ifɛɛt a lalup. “Ɔgabwɔ a Babylon, abakka ikkpàlà ɔkkpɛlɛ, ɔfɛɛt-ifɛtɛ a vveengodde.”
66017006	Nyɛn nsan nttɛ wanavva ’wɔng baang linnyi balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la linnyi balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba bawwɔɔlnɛbɛ ka batelenɛ Jesus libimimɛnɛ. Ɛkɛtɛ ya nyɛnmɛnɛ, kɔkɛɛlɛnɛ gaang gaang.
66017007	Uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔbapnɛ ɔttɛ, “Kɔkɛɛlɛwɔ ’bɔng? Vvenɛ nbwɔɔlɔwɔ kɔlɔɔk ifɛɛt a wanavva ’wɔng baang la ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang ya ɛyanganɛ lattɔ lannangakkyaat la iffi zzɔɔp, ya ɛtɔkɔmɛnɛ.
66017008	Ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang ya ayɛnnɛ ɛdɔkɔ ele ka kuddu, ɔzzànga mung ebbebong. Ɛdɔkɔ ɛttɛ ɛtta ka lubbe gwa lɛbaang effu, ɔzzànga mung vvenɛ emii bawwɔɔlyɛ. Balɔɔt ba ballunɛ ka ɛkpansi ba lakɔɔl abbɛ latakanɛ la kɛkkpɔk lile ka luvva balɔɔt a kuddu vvenɛ kɔkɛɛlɛbɛ ka bale bayɛn ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang ya ɛdɔkɔnɛ ele ka kuddu, gedegede mung ele libbe. Ɔzzànga vvenɛ ɛppyɛlɛ ɛbbal liffu.
66017009	“Akɔɔm bikɔɔm asan ’kwɔng. Lattɔ lanngakkyaat lalenɛ ikpok innammikkyaat, ya wanavva ’wɔng baang ɔtaanɛ. Babeet bassɛ bale bannambakkaat.
66017010	Ba kubbwɔɔk battɔbong. Vvɔn utii baang ka kizzi-lɛttɔ. Ɔzzànga wa vvɔn ba ɔtaka uffu. Ɛkɛtɛ ya ule uffu baala uttumu ka kibeet.
66017011	Ɛsɛɛn ya ɛdɔkɔnɛ etii ikokolo ɔ̀zzánga mung esi ka kuddu lɛbɛlɛ lile, ulenɛ ubeet wa ɔnaangnɛ ka babeet bannambanna wa ɔdɔkɔnɛ ka ɔkɔɔm-ɛtɔk a kɛkaan a babeet ba bannambakkyaat wa ufeelenɛ umii bawwɔɔlmɛ.
66017012	“Iffi ’yɔng baag zzɔɔp ya ayɛnnɛ ilenɛ babeet zzɔɔp ba batakanɛ litte kɛkɔɔm ɛfɛɛn. Abbɛ balenɛ ba bale bannyibɛ lakke kɛkɔɔm ɛfɛɛn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ babeet ka waan ɛkɛtɛ ssup la ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang.
66017013	Babeet ’bɔng baang ɔkkpɛlɛ abbɛ ba zzɔɔp bayanga luttina ggwɔn, basam lakke abbɛ bannyi ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang.
66017014	Vvenɛ ballu Waan-ɛtɔɔn ’wɔng baang kullu; ɔzzànga Waan-ɛtɔɔn ’wɔng la balɔɔt a kɔssɛ ammɛ ba ɔsanganɛ, bayila kwa ammɛ, vvenɛ ballu kullu babɛpɛ babeet ’bɔng baang ka ulenɛ Uyini Bayini, ule Ubeet a Babeet.”
66017015	Uyilabɔtɔɔm ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ’wɔng baang ɔlɔɔk la anaam ɔttɛ, “Bannyi ba ayɛnnɛ baang ba wanavva àkkpàlà ’wɔng baang ɔtaanɛ, balenɛ ifɔɔn, balɔɔt a kikkwu ɔkkpɛlɛ la ikaan.
66017016	Iffi ’yɔng baang zzɔɔp ya ayɛnnɛ la ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang vvenɛ bayanga kɔlɔɔk la wanavva àkkpàlà ’wɔng baang. Vvenɛ batɔkmɛ bɛfɛɛn bya ɔyanganɛ, bakkyaamɛ bafɔngɔ umii kɛkɔɔ. Vvenɛ bazzimɛ ɛsɛɛn a kkwɔɔt basammɛ bassɛɛn ka lɔkɔɔn ɔkkɔm.
66017017	Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔssɛɛnnɛbɛ lɔnngwa gwa kɛnaang kwa kulemɛnɛ ka luppyam ɔttɛ bayanga luttina ggwɔn, basam lakke abbɛ za kɛkɔɔm ɛfɛɛn bannyi ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang ɔddɔkɔddɔkɔ lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛnaang ka lɔkkwɔɔn.
66017018	“Wanavva ’wɔng baang wa ayɛnnɛ ulenɛ lɛffɛ za lɛbaang za lɛkɔɔmnɛ babeet ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ɛkpansi.”
66018001	Nkwɔng kɔsaknɛ, nyɛn uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔk ka ussinɛ ka libat uffu. Ɔyanga lakke za lɛbaang. Lakke ammɛ lanaangnɛ ɛkpansi ɔkkpɛlɛ eppwolo.
66018002	Ubungu ka lɛmmwɔɔl za lɛbaang ɔttɛ, “Ɔttɔbong! Babylon wa lɛbaang ɔttɔbong! Usseke wa labun a babbu ɔkkpɛlɛ la liyeeng sa lisinɛ lɛyyɛɛp. Lilɔɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ sa lisinɛ lɛyyɛɛp, la bunɔɔn a latun bɛppyɛɛ billu baang.
66018003	Unnyimɛ batak ɔttɛ ufee balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔnaangbɛ bavva bɛ. Batak a kɛssɛ-kɛzak ammɛ. Babeet ɛkpansi bamini la ammɛ. Bakkpɛɛkɔ ɛkpansi, ɔyyɛɛpnɛ ka babbu linaang ammɛ sa usinɛ likkwoong ɔkkyaa ɔfɔngɔ.”
66018004	Nbbal lippyee lɛmmwɔɔl ka lɛlɔɔknɛ ka libat lɛttɛ, “Attayɔng, balɔɔt anaam. Atta assekemɛyɔng! Tɛ̀ttɛ́ akupmɛyɔng anaangyɔng bubbi bwa ammɛ ɔnaangnɛ, tɛ̀ttɛ́ affu atulyɔng akama ammɛ ayɛnyɔng!
66018005	Bakkwonobong bubbi ammɛ buggolo buffɔ ka libat. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ukkebong babbu linaang ammɛ.
66018006	Akɔɔmmɛyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ammɛ ɔkɔɔmwɔnɛyɔng bbwak. Akatmɛ asakyɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ammɛ ɔnaangwɔnɛyɔng. Ass}e}enmɛyɔng batak ba bakkaamnɛ bayipi ka ommonggo bikkpit ppwap tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ammɛ ɔssɛɛnwɔnɛyɔng.
66018007	Ayɔɔmɛyɔng akama wa lɛbaang ɔsak lakke la bizozo pya ɔnaangmɛnɛ kɛyɔɔng. Ɔtaa uffik kɛyɔɔng ka luppyam ɔttɛ, ‘Anaam mung Ubeet a wanavva. Anaam ɔlɔɔt wa walam ubbenɛ ɔkɔngɔnɛ lissi, bukee ba nbɛlɛ lɛsan!’
66018008	Ka kulenɛ ning mung, akama la iffaak, la buwɔɔng vvenɛ bɛwwɔɔlmɛ kɛtɔm ssɔn. Vvenɛ bafɔɔpmɛ ka lɔkɔɔn ka Uyini, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔkaalnɛ kɛkaal ammɛ ɔttanɛ liggbenge.”
66018009	Babeet ɛkpansi ba bassɛnɛ la ammɛ banaang bubbi vvenɛ bakkwa ka bale bayɛn isɔngɔ ya bafɔɔpmɛnɛ ka ittanɛ ittukulu ka lɛffɛ ammɛ.
66018010	Bale babee fulufulu ka akama ammɛ ɔbbwɔpɔnɛ balɔɔt, balɔɔk battɛ, “Kɔbbɔl gaang kɔgbaa ka ɔgabwɔ lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang Babylon bale ka bayɛnnɛ akama!”
66018011	Bassɛ-kappya ka ɛkpansi bakkwa, bataa kullu ka ɔlɔɔt wa ɔlɛɛpnɛbɛ bɛfɛɛn usinɛ lɛbɛlɛ lile.
66018012	Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔbbalnɛ gold la silver, la lattaal za layyɛɛpnɛ, la ibba la iwuu, bɛssɛ la bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bya bɛkkaamnɛ kappya lɛlɛɛp usi lɛbɛlɛ lile.
66018013	Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔlɛɛpnɛ bɛfɛɛn bya bɛyyɛɛpnɛ kizoom, bɛfɛɛn bya bɛnaangnɛ ubbu usi lɛddɔlɔ, batak la bannɛ, iwee la igwugwulu, ibal la igɔdɔ, iyim la immutu, babili la balɔɔt, usi lɛbɛlɛ lile.
66018014	Bassɛ-kappya balɔɔk la ammɛ battɛ, “Bɛfɛɛn bya doddo ɔkkpɛlɛ bya aggyannɛ bɛkkyaapbong. Iyyɛɛp annyɔɔng la litaan ɔkkpɛlɛ bɛtaakbong. Ba abɛlɛyɔng byɛ lɛggyan akopoyɔng.”
66018015	Bassɛ-kappya ba ɔyyɛɛpnɛbɛ ka kɛssɛ-kappya ka lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang vvenɛ babee fulufulu. Akama wanavva ’wɔng baang ɔbbwɔpɔbɛ lɔbbwɔpɔ. vvenɛ bakkwa bataa kullu,
66018016	balɔɔk battɛ, “Kɔttalabong! Kɔbbwɔpɔ kɛlɔɔk la lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang za lɛbaang! Ɔtaa ɔwɔkɔlɔ iwɔkɔlɔ ya ikkaamnɛ kappya, ɔbɛtɛ la gold la lattaal za layyɛɛpnɛ.
66018017	Iyyɛɛp ammɛ itaakbong gbɔɔ sukusuku ɛkɛtɛ nnyɔn!” Bazzilɛttɔ ka ikkpaat la battele-ka-ikkpaat la balɔɔt balɔk ba baddunɛ kwa lɔyɔngɔ basseke ka babeenɛ fulufulu,
66018018	bakkwa ka bayɛnnɛ isɔngɔ ya bafɔɔpmɛnɛ battɛ, “Lɛffɛ lɛlɔk ba lile za lɛbaang ɔgbaa la lɛffɛ ’zɔng mung.”
66018019	Ballɔt ibut ka lattɔ bakkwa battɛ, “Kɔttalabong gaang tɛ. Kɔbbɔlbong gaang la lɛffɛ ’zɔng za lɛbaang tɛ. Azzɛ lilenɛ lɛffɛ za balɔɔt bassɛnɛ lɔssa lɔssa ɔyyɛɛpbɛ. Mung ɔtakabong bɛfɛɛn ammɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ ɛkɛtɛ nnyɔn.”
66018020	Annyɔɔng ba libat, aggeleyɔng ka lubbe ammɛ. Balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la bayilabɔtɔɔm a Jesus la bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm aggeleyɔng. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm unnyimɛbong kibbi ka kɔlɔɔk kwa ɔnaangnɛ la annyɔɔng!
66018021	Uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa lɛbaang a lɛbaang ɔttɔngbong lɛttaal za liggbengenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kukook ɔssɛɛn ka lɔyɔngɔ ɔttɛ, “Uwɔng ulenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bale bazzɔɔk lɛffɛ a Babylon za lɛbaang ka lɛgabwɔ, ɔlɔɔt usizɛ ka zzeen lɛbɛlɛ lɛyɛn.
66018022	Kisoom a bakkpa-buggɔ la basoom-a-kisoom la bawɔl a lippet la bawɔl iffi ba abɛlɛyɔng lippyee. Ɔssɛ-kappya ɔlɔk ba abɛlɛyɔng lɛyanga, gɔɔ lɔsap a kukook ba abɛlɛyɔng lippyee.
66018023	Buppwolo otinika bulɔk ba bubɛlɛ lile ka tɔkɔlɔ annɔ. Lɛmmwɔɔl a batɔk-a-bwanavva la ballu-bwalam ba abɛlɛyɔng lippyee ka tɔkɔlɔ annɔ. Bassɛ-kappya annɔ badɔkɔ bayanga lakke za lɛbaang ka ɛkpansi. Akɔɔm kɛkkala lɛlaak a bɛmaanga afɛɛt balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ka ɛkpansi.”
66018024	Babylon ɔyɛn akama ka bayɛnnɛ linnyi bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la linnyi balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka lɛffɛ ammɛ. Iii, linnyi balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba bawwɔɔlnɛbɛ ka ɛkpansi.
66019001	Nkwɔng kɔsaknɛ, nppyee lɔsap tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛkaan a balɔɔt ka libat ka balɔɔknɛ battɛ, “Abunguyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Lakke, la ikkala la lɛgabbwɔ bile ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ayyɔɔt.
66019002	Kɛkaal ɔkaal ka lɔkkwɔɔn bbwak. Ɔwwɔɔlbong wa àkkpàlà wa ɔbɛpɛnɛ ɛkpansi la kɛssɛ-kɛzak ammɛ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyɔɔmɛbong akama ka awwɔɔlnɛ ibɔɔyi ammɛ.”
66019003	Babbal libungu battɛ, “Abunguyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm! Isɔngɔ ya lɛffɛ ’zɔng lɛkkɔmnɛ imiibong ka libat kɛfal a kɛfal!”
66019004	Lɔlɔp la bagɛlɛnya banna la isɛɛn inna ’yɔng baang ittɔ ka lisse iwomo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔtaanɛ ka ugbaal a kibeet battɛ, “Abunguyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, kulening.”
66019005	Nppyee lɛmmwɔɔl ka lissinɛ ka ugbaal a kibeet lɛlɔɔk lɛttɛ, “Babili Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkkpɛlɛ, waan gɔɔ ɔgɛlɛnya wa utelemɛnɛ, abunguyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ayyɔɔt.”
66019006	Ɔzzánga nppyee lɔsap tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lammwɔɔl a kɛkaan a balɔɔt, tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɛttɔl a bannyi la lɔsap akkpálá. Nppyee ka balɔɔknɛ battɛ, “Abunguyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, Uyini ayyɔɔt, wa ɔyanganɛ lakke ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ammɛ ulenɛ ubeet.
66019007	Affu iggeleyɔng, ɔwaayɔngyɛlɛ. Ibunguyɔng lakke ammɛ. Ɛkɛtɛ ɛffɔbong ya libbeel a Waan-ɛtɔɔn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Wanavva ɔbamamɛbong kɛyɔɔng ɔkatsɛ.
66019008	Bannyimɛbong ulata ubba battɛ ukwula.” (Ulata ubba ’wɔng baang ulenɛ linaang a balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm sa bbwak.)
66019009	Uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ’wɔng baang ɔlɔɔk la anaam ɔttɛ, “Akkpɔk ’kwɔng: Laggele lale za balɔɔt ba babwɔɔlɔnɛbɛ libbeel a Waan-ɛtɔɔn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.” Ɔbbal lɛlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Uwɔng lammwɔɔl za lɔkkwɔɔn, lassi ka Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
66019010	Nttɔ ka lisse nwomo uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ’wɔng baang. Ɔzzánga ɔttɛ, “Fɔngɔ ning kɛnaang. Anaam nssɛ nle bɔɔyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm tɛ̀ttɛ̀ annɔ la ikpana annɔ la balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba bayilanɛ lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk gwa Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔnɛ. Atele Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.” Lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk gwa Jesus ɔbwɔɔlɔnɛ lɔddanɛ bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
66019011	Lukpaaggbeede luwongolonɛ nyɛn ulata eyim. Ɔlɔɔt wa uttelenɛyɛ bakkwɔɔmɛ ‘Kiyila la Lɔkkwɔɔn.’ Ɔzza bɛkaal la bɔkaat, ullu lakɔɔng ammɛ.
66019012	Zzeen ammɛ lakoot tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lalaak a lɔkɔɔn. Ɔyanga bɛttɔpɔ ggbadam ka lɛttɔ ka kɔttɔpɔnɛ. Ɔyanga lɛkɔɔl baang ka ɔkkpɔknɛ ka kkwɔɔt. Ɔzzànga ɔlɔɔt wa ɔsannɛ lɛkɔɔl ’zɔng baang ɔgbaa la ammɛ biini ba ule.
66019013	Ewuulu ya ɔwɔkɔlɔnɛ ele linnyi linnyi. Bakkwɔɔmɛ ‘Lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm’.
66019014	Isɔgya ya libat ittele ka balata iyim ikupmɛ la balata iwɔkɔlɔ ka kkwɔɔt.
66019015	Ogge wa ɔlamnɛ, wa ule ɔkɔɔm ɔbɛtɛ ifɔɔn ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔttamɛ ka kamma. Vvenɛ ɔkɔɔm ibbyap ɔkɔɔmbɛ. Vvenɛ ɔkaam batak ka ɛfɛɛn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔkaamnɛ batak a binyanga ammɛ.
66019016	Ɔkkpɔk lɛkɔɔl ka ubba ammɛ la kikkpɔ ɔttɛ, “Ubeet a babeet, la Uyini bayini.”
66019017	Nyɛn uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka ubeenɛ ka livve-luwee. Ubungu ɔkkwɔɔ bunɔɔn ɔkkpɛlɛ ka libat ɔttɛ, “Affu ataayɔng ɛfɛɛn kkwɔn, azziyɔng libbeel Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm za lɛbaang.
66019018	Affu azziyɔng ikkpa-kkwɔɔt a babeet la bazzilɛttɔ isɔgya, la ikkpa-kkwɔɔt iyim la battele-uttele, la ikkpa-kkwɔɔt a balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ, babili la ba basinɛ babili lile, ba labaang la ba ssup!”
66019019	Ɔzzánga nyɛn ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang la babeet ɛkpansi la isɔgya abbɛ ka baggbanɛ ballu ɔlɔɔt wa uttelenɛ ka eyim la isɔgya ammɛ kullu.
66019020	Bakaa ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang bassɛɛn igbakkpɔpɔ, la ɔkkala-lɛlaak wa ɔttɛnɛ ammɛ uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔnaangnɛ bɛmaanga ka lusso annyɛ. (Ɔkɔɔm bɛmaanga ’byɔng baang ɔfɛɛt balɔɔt ba bayanganɛ eleme ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang la ba batelenɛ ɛlɔɔp annyɛ.) Basam ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang la ɔkkala-lɛlaak bassɛɛn ka lɛkam a lɔkɔɔn a ndegeledum.
66019021	Ogge wa ɔttanɛ ka kamma ɔlɔɔt wa uttele ka eyim ɔwwɔɔl isɔgya abbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Bunɔɔn ɔkkpɛlɛ buzzi ɛkkpa-kkwɔɔt abbɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bukkwoongnɛ.
66020001	Nyɛn Uyilabɔtɔɔm ka ussinɛ ka libat usini uffu kuttɔɔk la ɛkpɔkɔlɔ lúbbé ’gwɔng baang gwa lɔddɔngnɛ ka kɔbɔɔk ka ɔkɔɔmnɛ la iyɛɛgba ya ilɔɔpnɛ.
66020002	Ɔkaa ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang ya elenɛ utumalɔɔt ɛzzɔkɔ ya elenɛ Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm-a-kuyeeng ɔlɔk Satan ɔssɛɛnmɛ nggbakkɔpɔ ka innɔ likkpa iffa la kufaak.
66020003	Uyilabɔtɔɔm ɔsammɛ ɔssɛɛn ka tɔkɔlɔ lúbbé ’gwɔng baang ɔssɛɛn ɛkpɔkɔlɔ ɔkakamɛ nkwaaning usi lɛbɛlɛ likkwoong ɔtta uffu ɔfɛɛt vveeng ’wɔng mung ɔssɛɛn ka kɔlɔɔk ɔddɔkɔddɔkɔ innɔ likkpa iffa la kufaak ’yɔng baang liggba. Nkwɔng kulenɛ lɛsak vvenɛ bakkyaamɛ bafɔngɔ ka waan ɛkɛtɛ ssup.
66020004	Nyɛn igbaal a kibeet. Balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba bataanɛ ka annyɛ, bannyibongbɛ lakke za kɛkaal a kɛkaal. Ɔgbaa, nyɛn liyeeng a balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba bawwɔɔlnɛbɛ ka babwɔɔlɔnɛ lɔkkwɔɔn a kɔlɔɔk gwa Jesus ɔlɔɔknɛ la kwa lɛmmwɔɔl Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang la ɛlɔɔp annyɛ ba bataka batele. Gɔɔ eleme ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang ba bataka banaang ka lɛttɔ-lusso la labɔɔk abbɛ. Baffubong bataa ka kuddu bakɔɔm ɛfɛɛn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ babeet la Christ ka innɔ likkpa iffa la kufaak.
66020005	Babbu balɔk basi lifungala ka lubbe bappyɛlɛ bataa ka kuddu tɔttɔt innɔ likkpa iffa la kufaak ’yɔng baang isak. Uwɔng ulenɛ ɔkɔɔm-ɛtɔk a kifungala babbu ka lubbe.
66020006	Laggele la ppyɛɛ wa lɛbaang a lɛbaang ule wa balɔɔt ’bɔng baang ba batoolonɛbɛ la babbu ba bakɔɔmnɛ ɛtɔk bafungalabɛ ka lubbe. Lùbbe gwa lule ka lɔbbalnɛ liffu lakke ka kwɔɔt abbɛ ba lɔbɛlɛ lɛyanga. Bale basseke bassɛɛn-a-luzɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la Christ. Vvenɛ bakɔɔm ɛfɛɛn la Christ ka innɔ likkpa iffa la kufaak.
66020007	Innɔ likkpa ’sɔng iffa la kufaak lilenɛ lɛsaal, vvenɛ basanga Satan ka igbakkɔpɔ.
66020008	Vvenɛ umii ɔfɛɛt balɔɔt ba ballunɛ ifɛɛn ifɛɛn ka ɛkpansi. Uwɔng ulenɛ Gog la Magog. Satan vvenɛ ɔkɔɔmbɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ uffu lɛkɔɔng, bayipi tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kususuk ka tɔkɔlɔ lɔyɔngɔ.
66020009	Bawaala ɔkkpɛlɛ ɛkpansi bakkpit laffɛ balɔɔt Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la laffɛ za lasaapmɛnɛ. Keem lɔkɔɔn lussi ka libat luffu luzzibɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ.
66020010	Bakaa Ɔnaang-a-kɛsɛɛm-a-kuyeeng wa ɔfɛɛtnɛbɛ bassɛɛn ka tɔkɔlɔ lɛkam a lɔkɔɔn za lɛbaang la ndegeledum ka ɛfɛɛn a baggbanɛ ɛsɛɛn ’yɔng baang la ɔkkala-lɛlaak wa ɔttɛnɛ ammɛ uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lɛkaa bamii bassɛɛn. Bale bataa baang bayɛn akama bappyee bɔssɔp kikoon la kɛtɔm kɛfal a kɛfal.
66020011	Nyɛn ulata ugbaal a kibeet wa lɛbaang la ɔlɔɔt wa ataanɛ ka ammɛ. Ɛkpansi la libat bɛmma bimii ka libat ka ɛfɛɛn ammɛ ulenɛ, la kɛyɛn bisi lɛbɛlɛ lile.
66020012	Keem nyɛn babbu ba labaang la ba utiti ɔkkpɛlɛ ka babeenɛ ka lusso ugbaal a kibeet Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Bawongolo livva. Bawongolo luvva gwa lulenɛ luvva kuddu. Kɛkaal a babbu badɔkɔ bakaal bakup kwa balenɛ lɛnaang bale lɛkkpɔk bassɛɛn ka livva ’sɔng baang.
66020013	Lihu lɛsanga babbu ba tɔkɔlɔ azzɛ linnyi. Lubbe lɔsanga babbu ba aggwɛ lɔtta ka vveeng. Badɔkɔ bakaal kɛkaal abbɛ bakup kwa balenɛ lɛnaang.
66020014	Basam lùbbé la ɛkpansi aggwɛ bassɛɛn ka lɛkam a lɔkɔɔn gwa lɛbaang. (Lɛkam a lɔkɔɔn ’zɔng baang lilenɛ lùbbé gwa ibaala).
66020015	Ɔlɔɔt duu wa basimɛnɛ lɛkɔɔl ammɛ lɛkkpɔk ka luvva kuddu badɔkɔ basammɛ bassɛɛn ka tɔkɔlɔ lɛkam a lɔkɔɔn gwa lɛbaang.
66021001	Nyɛn ufaa libat la ufaa ɛkpansi. Ɛkpansi ya ikeeng la libat za ikeeng bɛtaak, iyɔngɔ ikkyaap.
66021002	Nyɛn Killu sa Doddo, Ufaa-Jerusalem, ka ussinɛ ka libat ka ɛfɛɛn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm uffu. Ɔbamabong bbwak ɔkat tɛ̀ttɛ̀ wanavva killu ɔnaangnɛ ilɔngɔlɔ ukup ulam.
66021003	Nppyee lɛmmwɔɔl ka lɛlɔɔknɛ lɛgaga ka ugbaal a kibeet lɛttɛ, “Ssala Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm lile ka balɔɔt! Vvenɛ ɔtaa la abbɛ, abbɛ bàzzánga balɔɔt ammɛ. Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm biini ule ule baang la abbɛ, vvenɛ ule Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm abbɛ.
66021004	Vvenɛ ɔkkpɔlɔbɛ liyeen. Lubbe ba lɔbɛlɛ lile gɔɔ akama. Gɔɔ kullu la bɔssɔp. Batɔm a bɛfɛɛn bɛtaakbong.”
66021005	Ɔzzanga ɔlɔɔt wa ɔtaanɛ ka ugbaal a kibeet ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Gɔɔ gedegede mung nppyɛlɛbong nnaang bɛfɛɛn ɔkkpɛlɛ bɛzzanga bɛfaa.” Ɔlɔɔk unnyinɛ ɔgbaa ɔttɛ, “Akkpɔk ’kwɔng, lammwɔɔl ’zɔng lale lɔkkwɔɔn, lale ka kiyila.”
66021006	Ɔzzanga ɔttɛ, “Kɔsaalbong. Anaam nlenɛ Alpha, nle Omega, lutte la lakpeke. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa bannyi basaapmɛnɛ, vvenɛ nnyimɛ bannyi ba bassinɛ ka bannyi kuddu.
66021007	Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ɔbɛtɛnɛ, vvenɛ ɔtɔk ’kwɔng ka anaam: vvenɛ anaam nle Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ammɛ, ammɛ ule ɔlɔɔt anaam.
66021008	Ɔzzanga ssala babbwɔp a bazzi-issɛ, la banaang a bubbi, la bawwɔɔl a balɔɔt, la banaang a babbu lilɔɔk, la banaang a bɛmaanga, la batele ilɔɔp, la bakkala lalaak, ɛfɛɛn ya abbɛ elenɛ lɛkkɔm a lɔkɔɔn ’zɔng baang za likutnɛ la ndegeledum ka tɔkɔlɔ, baang ulenɛ lubbe gwa ibaala.
66021009	Uyilabɔtɔɔm vvɔn, ka tɔkɔlɔ bayilabɔtɔɔm bannambakkyaat ba bayanganɛ bɛfɔɔm bɛnnambɛkkyaat, ya ikama ya lakpeke innammikkyaat ilenɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ, uffu ka ɛfɛɛn anaam ɔttɛ, “Affu vvenɛ nyɔɔwɔ wanavva libbeel ’wɔng wa Waan-ɛtɔɔn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
66021010	Kuyeeng kɔnnaanɛ lakke, uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ’wɔng baang ɔsamnɛ umii utele ka libat a lɛttaal. Ɔyɔɔnɛ Jerusalem, killu sa doddo ka kisininɛ ka libat ɛfɛɛn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm kiffu kuttɔɔk.
66021011	Kippwolo tɛ̀ttɛ̀ lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm. Lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang lippwolo tɛ̀ttɛ̀ Jasper, ulata lɛttaal.
66021012	Lɛyanga kɛbat sa kiggolonɛ la bikkwu zzɔɔppabɛffa, la bayilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm zzɔɔppabaffa ba bakatnɛyɛ. Ka bikkwu ’byɔng baang bakkpɔk lakɔɔl a ifɔɔn ’yɔng baang zzɔɔppiffa ya balɔɔt a Israel.
66021013	Ɔdɔkɔ bikkwu bɛkkyaat ka kufoom kkwɔn. Bɛkkyaat ka lusso livve luwee lɔfɔm, bɛkkyaat ka libat a lɔfɔɔn, bɛkkyaat ka kuttɔɔk a lɔfɔɔn.
66021014	Kɛbat a lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang badɔkɔ babɔɔksɛ ka lattaal zɔɔppalaffa za bakkpɔknɛ lakɔɔl a bayilabɔtɔɔm a Waanɛtɔɔn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ba zzɔɔppabaffa.
66021015	Uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔlɔɔknɛ la anaam ɔyanga bissɛ-lɔlɔɔm pya banaangnɛpyɛ la gold pya ɔlɔɔmnɛ lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang, la bikkwu la kɛbat.
66021016	Lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang ka bɔggbam lile tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɔlɔm, lɛyanga lagook lanna. Uyilabɔtɔɔm ɔlɔɔm lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang la bissɛ-lɔlɔɔm ammɛ. Lɛdɔkɔ innɔ mile ikkyaat la lalɔp lakkyaat la mile kubbwɔɔk ka bɔlɔm la bɔggbam la buggolo.
66021017	Uyilabɔtɔɔm ɔlɔɔm kɛbat ɔgbaa. Kɛdɔkɔ lalɔp zzɔɔp la bukkpɔ zzillavvɔn ka buggolo ka bɔfɛɛn bwa ɔkɔɔmnɛ ɔlɔɔm.
66021018	Kɛbat a ggwoon ’sɔng baag bakɔɔm lattaal a Jasper banaangnɛ. Killu biini banaangsɛ la gold wa uyekelenɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ biyenge.
66021019	Lutte kɛbat a lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang badɔkɔ banaangsɛ la lattaal za doddo, Lɛttaal za ikeeng sa bakɔɔmnɛ batte lutte lɛ̀zzànga ‘Jasper’ lɛttaal za ibaala lɛ̀zzànga ‘Sapphire’ za lakkyaat lɛ̀zzànga ‘Agate’ ka lanna lɛ̀zzànga ‘Emerald’.
66021020	Ka kubbwɔɔk, ‘Onyx’, ka bwɔlaaning, lɛ̀zzànga ‘Carnelian’, za lannangakkyaat lɛ̀zzànga ‘Quartz’ wa lɛgɔk a lɛgɔk, za lannanganna lɛ̀zzànga ‘Beryl’, za ɔsɛlɛzzɔɔp lɛ̀zzànga ‘Topaz’, za zzɔɔp lɛ̀zzànga ‘Chalcedony’, za zzɔɔppavvon lɛ̀zzànga ‘Turquoise’, za zzɔɔppiffa lɛzzanga ‘Amethyst’.
66021021	Bikkwu ’byɔng baang zzɔɔppabɛffa bɛdɔkɔnɛ ifɔɔk akpana. Kikkwu la ssɔn bakɔɔm ɛfɔɔk akpana banaagnsɛ. Itɔk ɔkkpɛlɛ ka lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang banaangyɛ la gold. Appyɛɛknɛ ayɛnwɔ kɛyɔɔng tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kiyenge.
66021022	Ggwoon-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm nsi lɛyɛn ka lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang, ka ggwoon ammɛ ulenɛ Uyini, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔyanganɛ lakke ɔkkpɛlɛ, la Waan-ɛtɔɔn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.
66021023	Lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang kwa livve-luwee gɔɔ kwa ettuma ba battina battɛ bippwolo bivvoongbɛ, ka buppwolo lakke Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bulenɛ baang ka buppwolonɛ bullɔtbɛ. Waan-ɛtɔɔn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɛtaanɛbɛ tɛ̀ttɛ̀ otinika.
66021024	Balɔɔt ɛkpansi vvenɛ bakɔɔm buppwolo ammɛ bassɛ. Babeet ɛkpansi vvenɛ bakɔɔm iyyɛɛp abbɛ baffu bassɛɛn ka abbwɛ.
66021025	Bikkwu lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang bile bɛtaa ppwool ɛkɛtɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. La kɛfɛɛn baala bile ka kisul kisinɛ lile.
66021026	Vvenɛ bakɔɔm lakke la iyyɛɛp ɛkpansi baffu ka lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang.
66021027	Ɔzzànga bwa businɛ lɛyyɛɛp bulɔk baala bumal ka lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang. Gɔɔ ɔlɔɔt wa ɔnaangnɛ bɛfɛɛn izzit ɔlɔk ɔkkala lɛlaak baala ɔmalzɛ. Ule balɔɔt ba lakɔɔl abbɛ lalenɛ ka luvva Waan-ɛtɔɔn a kuddu keem ka bale bamal ka lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang.
66022001	Uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔyɔɔnɛ lɔyɔngɔ bannyi kuddu mgbaa. Lɔttɔɔl tɛ̀ttɛ̀ bɔfɛɛn bwa kkpaladada. Bannyi bassi ka ugbaal a kibeet, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, la Waan-ɛtɔɔn baffu.
66022002	Battɔl basak ka kasɛkɛ lɛffɛ. Lasan a bɛssɛ kuddu ladɔkɔ baang ka labeenɛ ka lafoom a lɔssa azzɛ laffa laffa, bɛwɔm lakkpo bikkpit zzɔɔppabɛffa ka kukkpa, kikkpit ssɔn ka ettuma. Ɔzzànga livva assɛ bakɔɔm battula ɛkpansi.
66022003	Bɔfɛɛn bwa bulenɛ ka lifɔk Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bwɛ baala ayɛn ka lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang. Ugbaal a kibeet Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la wa Waan-ɛtɔɔn Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm bile baang ka tɔkɔlɔ lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang. Ibbɔɔyi ammɛ vvenɛ bazɔɔm, bannyimɛ latele.
66022004	Vvenɛ bayɛn lusso ammɛ. Lɛkɔɔl ammɛ bale bakkpɔkzɛ ka lɛttɔ lusso abbɛ.
66022005	Kisul kɛlɔk vvenɛ ba kɛbɛlɛ lile. Itinika vvenɛ ba babɛlɛ lɛggyan ka Uyini ule usseke buppwolo abbɛ. Vvenɛ bataa tɛ̀ttɛ̀ babeet ba bayanganɛ lakke za kɛfal a kɛfal.
66022006	Uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔlɔɔk la anaam ɔttɛ, “Lammwɔɔl ’zɔng mung lale ka lɔkkwɔɔn, lale za kɛtɔk kɛssɛɛn ka luppyam. Uyini, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm wa ɔsamnɛ Kuyeeng ammɛ unnyi bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ɔsanga uyilabɔtɔɔm ammɛ ɔtɔɔm ɔttɛ ɔyɔɔ ibbɔɔyi ammɛ kwa kule kɔkka lɛnaang.”
66022007	Jesus ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Gɔpɔlɔyɔng! Nle ka nffunɛ gedegede mung, laggele lale za balɔɔt ba batelenɛ lammwɔɔl za babwɔɔlɔnɛbɛ kwa kule kɔnaang ka tɔkɔlɔ luvva ’gwɔng mung.”
66022008	Anaam John nppyeebong bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng, nyɛnbyɛ ɔkkpɛlɛ. Ka nppyeenɛ, nyɛnbyɛ nvve, nkun laddu ka lataak Uyilabɔtɔɔm wa ulenɛnɛ bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng baang lɛyɔɔ, nzɔɔm nnyimɛ.
66022009	Ɔzzánga ɔlɔɔk la anaam ɔttɛ, “Ning kanaang, anaam nssɛ nle bɔɔyi tɛ̀ttɛ̀ annɔ la ikpana annɔ bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, la balɔɔt ɔkkpɛlɛ ba batelenɛ lammwɔɔl za luvva ’gwɔng mung. Azɔɔm annyiyɔng Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm.”
66022010	Ɔlɔɔk la anaam ɔttɛ, “Tɛ̀ttɛ́ asam lammwɔɔl a bappyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka luvva ’gwɔng mung aloko tɛ̀ttɛ̀ kɔlɔɔk a lalup. Liggbili lɛkkɛtɛbong za bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ bile ka bɛnaangnɛ.
66022011	Ɔlɔɔt duu wa ulenɛ ɔnaang-a-bubbi, ɔtaa baang la kɛnaang a bubbi ammɛ. Ɔlɔɔt duu wa eleme ammɛ esinɛ lɛyyɛɛp, ɔtaa baang la ubbu eleme ammɛ. Ɔlɔɔt wa ulenɛ ka ɔnaangnɛ budoddo, ɔkkaammɛ ɔnaang ning baang. Ɔlɔɔt wa ɔppyɛɛnɛ ɔsammɛ kɛyɔɔng unnyi Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm, vvenɛ ɔkkaammɛ ɔnaang ning baang.”
66022012	Jesus ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Gɔpɔlɔyɔng! Nle nkka liffu. Vvenɛ nkɔɔm lɛsɔɔk anaam nffu nnyi ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn tɛ̀ttɛ̀ ɔnaagnnɛ ɔffɔ.
66022013	Anaam nlenɛ Alpha la Omega–Ɔkɔɔm-ɛtɔk la Usseke-isimi. Anaam nlenɛ lutte la lakpeke.
66022014	Laggele lale za balɔɔt ba bazzaanɛ iwɔkɔlɔ abbɛ illaat. Ning baang bayangabong lakke za kizzi lakkpo bɛssɛ za lawɔmnɛ ka lɛsan a kɛssɛ-kuddu, la lakke za kɛssɛ́ ssɔng ka lɛmma kikkwu kɛmal ka tɔkɔlɔ a ssala.
66022015	Ɔzzànga balɔɔt ba basinɛ ka tɔkɔlɔ lɛffɛ ’zɔng baang lile, balenɛ ba bamininɛ abbɛ-abbɛ. Bwaanbwalam bamini la babbɛ bwaanbwalam. Bwanavva bamini la babbɛ bwanavva. Bakkoop kɛnaang a ilat la kɛnaang babbu lilɔɔk, la kɛwwɔɔl a balɔɔt. Mbɔng baang bazɔɔm ilɔɔp, bakkala lɛlaak ka lammwɔɔl ɔgbaa la linaang.
66022016	“Anaam Jesus, ntɔɔmbong uyilabɔtɔɔm Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm nttɛ uffu ɔbwɔɔlɔwɔyɔng bɛfɛɛn ’byɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ ka idda luzɔɔm. Anaam nssi ka kikkwu a David. Anaam nlenɛ annyannyannya waanettuma lɔfɔm.”
66022017	Kuyeeng-Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm la Wanavva killu battɛ, “Affu!” Ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn wa uppyeenɛ ’kwɔng vvenɛ ɔlɔɔk ɔttɛ, “Affuyɔng!” Ɔlɔɔt duu wa bannyi basaapmɛnɛ uffu ɔtɔk bannyi kuddu ɔvva ka lɛsɔɔk.
66022018	Anaam, John, nttama ɔlɔɔt la vvɔn wa uppyeenɛ lammwɔɔl a uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ka luvva ’gwɔng. Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔgbaanɛ bɔfɛɛn bulɔk ka azzɛ, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔgbaamɛ akama wa balenɛ lɛlɔɔk ka luvva ’gwɔng mung.
66022019	Ɔlɔɔt ɔlɔk ɔsanganɛ bɔfɛɛn bulɔk ɔzzɔɔk ka lammwɔɔl za uppyee-kutolo Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ulenɛ lɛlɔɔk ɔssɛɛn ka luvva ’gwɔng mung, Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm vvenɛ ɔtɔk etini likkpo kɛssɛ kuddu ya ammɛ la etini ammɛ ya lɛffɛ Ɔlɔɔmɔlɔɔm ya balenɛ lɛlɔɔk ka luvva ’gwɔng mung.
66022020	Ammɛ wa ubeenɛ ttɛɛsɛ lilɔɔk ’sɔng mung ɔkkpɛlɛ ɔttɛ, “Kule ka lɔkkwɔɔn, nle nkka lɛppyɛlɛ nffu.” Kule ning baang. Affu, Uyini, Jesus.
66022021	Numa ppyɛɛ a Jesus, Uyini, ɔtaa la annyɔɔng ɔkkpɛlɛ!
